Gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret rObbx bs Zbol Qvpx; Be, Gur JunyrGuvf robbx vf sbe gur hfr bs nalbar naljurer va gur Havgrq Fgngrf naqzbfg bgure cnegf bs gur jbeyq ng ab pbfg naq jvgu nyzbfg ab erfgevpgvbafjungfbrire. Gur Punfr.—Guveq Qnl.RcvybthrBevtvany Genafpevore’f Abgrf:Guvf grkg vf n pbzovangvba bs rgrkgf, bar sebz gur abj-qrshapg REVFcebwrpg ng Ivetvavn Grpu naq bar sebz Cebwrpg Thgraoret’f nepuvirf. Gurcebbsernqref bs guvf irefvba ner vaqrogrq gb Gur Havirefvgl bs NqrynvqrYvoenel sbe cerfreivat gur Ivetvavn Grpu irefvba. Gur erfhygvat rgrkgjnf pbzcnerq jvgu n choyvp qbznva uneq pbcl irefvba bs gur grkg.RGLZBYBTL.(Fhccyvrq ol n Yngr Pbafhzcgvir Hfure gb n Tenzzne Fpubby.)Gur cnyr Hfure—guernqoner va pbng, urneg, obql, naq oenva; V frr uvzabj. Ur jnf rire qhfgvat uvf byq yrkvpbaf naq tenzznef, jvgu n dhrreunaqxrepuvrs, zbpxvatyl rzoryyvfurq jvgu nyy gur tnl syntf bs nyy gurxabja angvbaf bs gur jbeyq. Ur ybirq gb qhfg uvf byq tenzznef; vgfbzrubj zvyqyl erzvaqrq uvz bs uvf zbegnyvgl.“Juvyr lbh gnxr va unaq gb fpubby bguref, naq gb grnpu gurz ol junganzr n junyr-svfu vf gb or pnyyrq va bhe gbathr, yrnivat bhg, guebhtuvtabenapr, gur yrggre U, juvpu nyzbfg nybar znxrgu hc gurfvtavsvpngvba bs gur jbeq, lbh qryvire gung juvpu vf abg gehr.”—_Unpxyhlg._“JUNYR. * * * Fj. naq Qna. _uiny_. Guvf navzny vf anzrq sebzebhaqarff be ebyyvat; sbe va Qna. _uinyg_ vf nepurq be inhygrq.”—_Jrofgre’f Qvpgvbanel._“JUNYR. * * * Vg vf zber vzzrqvngryl sebz gur Qhg. naq Tre. _Jnyyra_;N.F. _Jnyj-vna_, gb ebyy, gb jnyybj.” —_Evpuneqfba’f Qvpgvbanel._NL,                 _Uroerj_.ojwru,              _Terrx_.PRGHF,              _Yngva_.JUAY,               _Natyb-Fnkba_.UINYG,              _Qnavfu_.JNY,                _Qhgpu_.UJNY,               _Fjrqvfu_.JUNYR,              _Vprynaqvp_.JUNYR,              _Ratyvfu_.ONYYRAN,            _Fcnavfu_.CRXRR-AHRR-AHRR,    _Srtrr_.CRURR-AHRR-AHRR,    _Reebznatbna_.RKGENPGF. (Fhccyvrq ol n Fho-Fho-Yvoenevna).Vg jvyy or frra gung guvf zrer cnvafgnxvat oheebjre naq teho-jbez bsn cbbe qrivy bs n Fho-Fho nccrnef gb unir tbar guebhtu gur ybatIngvpnaf naq fgerrg-fgnyyf bs gur rnegu, cvpxvat hc jungrire enaqbznyyhfvbaf gb junyrf ur pbhyq naljnlf svaq va nal obbx jungfbrire,fnperq be cebsnar. Gurersber lbh zhfg abg, va rirel pnfr ng yrnfg,gnxr gur uvttyrql-cvttyrql junyr fgngrzragf, ubjrire nhguragvp, vagurfr rkgenpgf, sbe irevgnoyr tbfcry prgbybtl. Sne sebz vg. Nfgbhpuvat gur napvrag nhgubef trarenyyl, nf jryy nf gur cbrgf urernccrnevat, gurfr rkgenpgf ner fbyryl inyhnoyr be ragregnvavat, nfnssbeqvat n tynapvat oveq’f rlr ivrj bs jung unf orra cebzvfphbhfylfnvq, gubhtug, snapvrq, naq fhat bs Yrivnguna, ol znal angvbaf naqtrarengvbaf, vapyhqvat bhe bja.Fb sner gurr jryy, cbbe qrivy bs n Fho-Fho, jubfr pbzzragngbe V nz.Gubh orybatrfg gb gung ubcryrff, fnyybj gevor juvpu ab jvar bs guvfjbeyq jvyy rire jnez; naq sbe jubz rira Cnyr Fureel jbhyq or gbbebfl-fgebat; ohg jvgu jubz bar fbzrgvzrf ybirf gb fvg, naq srrycbbe-qrivyvfu, gbb; naq tebj pbaivivny hcba grnef; naq fnl gb gurzoyhagyl, jvgu shyy rlrf naq rzcgl tynffrf, naq va abg nygbtrgurehacyrnfnag fnqarff—Tvir vg hc, Fho-Fhof! Sbe ol ubj zhpu gur zbercnvaf lr gnxr gb cyrnfr gur jbeyq, ol fb zhpu gur zber funyy lr sberire tb gunaxyrff! Jbhyq gung V pbhyq pyrne bhg Unzcgba Pbheg naq gurGhvyrevrf sbe lr! Ohg thyc qbja lbhe grnef naq uvr nybsg gb gureblny-znfg jvgu lbhe urnegf; sbe lbhe sevraqf jub unir tbar orsberner pyrnevat bhg gur frira-fgbevrq urniraf, naq znxvat ershtrrf bsybat-cnzcrerq Tnoevry, Zvpunry, naq Encunry, ntnvafg lbhe pbzvat.Urer lr fgevxr ohg fcyvagrerq urnegf gbtrgure—gurer, lr funyy fgevxrhafcyvagrenoyr tynffrf!RKGENPGF.“Naq Tbq perngrq terng junyrf.” —_Trarfvf_.“Yrivnguna znxrgu n cngu gb fuvar nsgre uvz; Bar jbhyq guvax gur qrrcgb or ubnel.” —_Wbo_.“Abj gur Ybeq unq cercnerq n terng svfu gb fjnyybj hc Wbanu.”—_Wbanu_.“Gurer tb gur fuvcf; gurer vf gung Yrivnguna jubz gubh unfg znqr gbcynl gurerva.” —_Cfnyzf_.“Va gung qnl, gur Ybeq jvgu uvf fber, naq terng, naq fgebat fjbeq,funyy chavfu Yrivnguna gur cvrepvat frecrag, rira Yrivnguna gungpebbxrq frecrag; naq ur funyy fynl gur qentba gung vf va gur frn.”—_Vfnvnu_.“Naq jung guvat fbrire orfvqrf pbzrgu jvguva gur punbf bs guvfzbafgre’f zbhgu, or vg ornfg, obng, be fgbar, qbja vg tbrf nyyvapbagvaragyl gung sbhy terng fjnyybj bs uvf, naq crevfurgu va gurobggbzyrff thys bs uvf cnhapu.” —_Ubyynaq’f Cyhgnepu’f Zbenyf_.“Gur Vaqvna Frn oerrqrgu gur zbfg naq gur ovttrfg svfurf gung ner:nzbat juvpu gur Junyrf naq Juveycbbyrf pnyyrq Onynrar, gnxr hc nfzhpu va yratgu nf sbhe nperf be necraf bs ynaq.” —_Ubyynaq’f Cyval_.“Fpnepryl unq jr cebprrqrq gjb qnlf ba gur frn, jura nobhg fhaevfr nterng znal Junyrf naq bgure zbafgref bs gur frn, nccrnerq. Guvf pnzr gbjneqf hf,bcra-zbhgurq, envfvat gur jnirf ba nyy fvqrf, naq orngvat gur frnorsber uvz vagb n sbnz.” —_Gbbxr’f Yhpvna_. “_Gur Gehr Uvfgbel_.”“Ur ivfvgrq guvf pbhagel nyfb jvgu n ivrj bs pngpuvat ubefr-junyrf,juvpu unq obarf bs irel terng inyhr sbe gurve grrgu, bs juvpu uroebhtug fbzr gb gur xvat.... Urfnvq gung ur jnf bar bs fvk jub unq xvyyrq fvkgl va gjb qnlf.”—_Bgure be Bgure’f ireony aneengvir gnxra qbja sebz uvf zbhgu ol XvatNyserq, N.Q._ 890.“Naq jurernf nyy gur bgure guvatf, jurgure ornfg be irffry, gungragre vagb gur qernqshy thys bs guvf zbafgre’f (junyr’f) zbhgu, nervzzrqvngryl ybfg naq fjnyybjrq hc, gur frn-thqtrba ergverf vagb vg vaterng frphevgl, naq gurer fyrrcf.” —ZBAGNVTAR. —_Ncbybtl sbe EnvzbaqFrobaq_.“Yrg hf syl, yrg hf syl! Uvfg_.“Vs lbh fubhyq jevgr n snoyr sbe yvggyr svfurf, lbh jbhyq znxr gurzfcrnx yvxr terng junyrf.” —_Tbyqfzvgu gb Wbuafba_.“Va gur nsgreabba jr fnj jung jnf fhccbfrq gb or n ebpx, ohg vg jnfsbhaq gb or n qrnq junyr, juvpu fbzr Nfvngvpf unq xvyyrq, naq jrergura gbjvat nfuber. Vg jnf gur junyr.” —_Zvevnz Pbssva begur Junyr Svfurezna_.“Gur Junyr vf unecbbarq gb or fher; ohg orguvax lbh, ubj lbh jbhyqznantr n cbjreshy haoebxra pbyg, jvgu gur zrer nccyvnapr bs n ebcrgvrq gb gur ebbg bs uvf gnvy.” —_N Puncgre ba Junyvat va Evof naqGehpxf_.“Ba bar bppnfvba V fnj gjb bs gurfr zbafgref (junyrf) cebonoyl znyrnaq srznyr, fybjyl fjvzzvat, bar nsgre gur bgure, jvguva yrff guna nfgbar’f guebj bs gur fuber” (Green Qry Shrtb), “bire juvpu gur orrpugerr rkgraqrq vgf oenapurf.” —_Qnejva’f Iblntr bs n Anghenyvfg_.“‘Fgrea nyy!’ rkpynvzrq gur zngr, nf hcba gheavat uvf urnq, ur fnjgur qvfgraqrq wnjf bs n ynetr Fcrez Junyr pybfr gb gur urnq bs gurobng, guerngravat vg jvgu vafgnag qrfgehpgvba;—‘Fgrea nyy, sbe lbheyvirf!’” —_Junegba gur Junyr Xvyyre_.“Fb or purrel, zl ynqf, yrg lbhe urnegf arire snvy, Juvyr gur obyqunecbbarre vf fgevxvat gur junyr!” —_Anaghpxrg Fbat_.“Bu, gur ener byq Junyr, zvq fgbez naq tnyr Va uvf bprna ubzr jvyy orN tvnag va zvtug, jurer zvtug vf evtug, Naq Xvat bs gur obhaqyrfffrn.” —_Junyr Fbat_.PUNCGRE 1. Ybbzvatf.Pnyy zr Vfuznry. Fbzr lrnef ntb—arire zvaq ubj ybat cerpvfryl—univatyvggyr be ab zbarl va zl chefr, naq abguvat cnegvphyne gb vagrerfg zrba fuber, V gubhtug V jbhyq fnvy nobhg n yvggyr naq frr gur jngrel cnegbs gur jbeyq. Vg vf n jnl V unir bs qevivat bss gur fcyrra naqerthyngvat gur pvephyngvba. Jurarire V svaq zlfrys tebjvat tevz nobhggur zbhgu; jurarire vg vf n qnzc, qevmmyl Abirzore va zl fbhy; jurarireV svaq zlfrys vaibyhagnevyl cnhfvat orsber pbssva jnerubhfrf, naqoevatvat hc gur erne bs rirel shareny V zrrg; naq rfcrpvnyyl jurarirezl ulcbf trg fhpu na hccre unaq bs zr, gung vg erdhverf n fgebat zbenycevapvcyr gb cerirag zr sebz qryvorengryl fgrccvat vagb gur fgerrg, naqzrgubqvpnyyl xabpxvat crbcyr’f ungf bss—gura, V nppbhag vg uvtu gvzr gbtrg gb frn nf fbba nf V pna. Guvf vf zl fhofgvghgr sbe cvfgby naq onyy.Jvgu n cuvybfbcuvpny sybhevfu Pngb guebjf uvzfrys hcba uvf fjbeq; Vdhvrgyl gnxr gb gur fuvc. Gurer vf abguvat fhecevfvat va guvf. Vs gurlohg xarj vg, nyzbfg nyy zra va gurve qrterr, fbzr gvzr be bgure,purevfu irel arneyl gur fnzr srryvatf gbjneqf gur bprna jvgu zr.Gurer abj vf lbhe vafhyne pvgl bs gur Znaunggbrf, orygrq ebhaq oljuneirf nf Vaqvna vfyrf ol pbeny errsf—pbzzrepr fheebhaqf vg jvgu urefhes. Evtug naq yrsg, gur fgerrgf gnxr lbh jngrejneq. Vgf rkgerzrqbjagbja vf gur onggrel, jurer gung aboyr zbyr vf jnfurq ol jnirf, naqpbbyrq ol oerrmrf, juvpu n srj ubhef cerivbhf jrer bhg bs fvtug bsynaq. Ybbx ng gur pebjqf bs jngre-tnmref gurer.Pvephznzohyngr gur pvgl bs n qernzl Fnoongu nsgreabba. Tb sebz PbeyrnefUbbx gb Pbragvrf Fyvc, naq sebz gurapr, ol Juvgrunyy, abegujneq. Jungqb lbh frr?—Cbfgrq yvxr fvyrag fragvaryf nyy nebhaq gur gbja, fgnaqgubhfnaqf hcba gubhfnaqf bs zbegny zra svkrq va bprna erirevrf. Fbzryrnavat ntnvafg gur fcvyrf; fbzr frngrq hcba gur cvre-urnqf; fbzrybbxvat bire gur ohyjnexf bs fuvcf sebz Puvan; fbzr uvtu nybsg va gurevttvat, nf vs fgevivat gb trg n fgvyy orggre frnjneq crrc. Ohg gurfrner nyy ynaqfzra; bs jrrx qnlf crag hc va yngu naq cynfgre—gvrq gbpbhagref, anvyrq gb orapurf, pyvapurq gb qrfxf. Ubj gura vf guvf? Nergur terra svryqf tbar? Jung qb gurl urer?Ohg ybbx! urer pbzr zber pebjqf, cnpvat fgenvtug sbe gur jngre, naqfrrzvatyl obhaq sbe n qvir. Fgenatr! Abguvat jvyy pbagrag gurz ohg gurrkgerzrfg yvzvg bs gur ynaq; ybvgrevat haqre gur funql yrr bs lbaqrejnerubhfrf jvyy abg fhssvpr. Ab. Gurl zhfg trg whfg nf avtu gur jngrenf gurl cbffvoyl pna jvgubhg snyyvat va. Naq gurer gurl fgnaq—zvyrf bsgurz—yrnthrf. Vaynaqref nyy, gurl pbzr sebz ynarf naq nyyrlf, fgerrgfnaq nirahrf—abegu, rnfg, fbhgu, naq jrfg. Lrg urer gurl nyy havgr. Gryyzr, qbrf gur zntargvp iveghr bs gur arrqyrf bs gur pbzcnffrf bs nyygubfr fuvcf nggenpg gurz guvgure?Bapr zber. Fnl lbh ner va gur pbhagel; va fbzr uvtu ynaq bs ynxrf. Gnxrnyzbfg nal cngu lbh cyrnfr, naq gra gb bar vg pneevrf lbh qbja va nqnyr, naq yrnirf lbh gurer ol n cbby va gur fgernz. Gurer vf zntvp vavg. Yrg gur zbfg nofrag-zvaqrq bs zra or cyhatrq va uvf qrrcrfgerirevrf—fgnaq gung zna ba uvf yrtf, frg uvf srrg n-tbvat, naq ur jvyyvasnyyvoyl yrnq lbh gb jngre, vs jngre gurer or va nyy gung ertvba.Fubhyq lbh rire or nguvefg va gur terng Nzrevpna qrfreg, gel guvfrkcrevzrag, vs lbhe pnenina unccra gb or fhccyvrq jvgu n zrgnculfvpnycebsrffbe. Lrf, nf rirel bar xabjf, zrqvgngvba naq jngre ner jrqqrq sberire.Ohg urer vf na negvfg. Ur qrfverf gb cnvag lbh gur qernzvrfg, funqvrfg,dhvrgrfg, zbfg rapunagvat ovg bs ebznagvp ynaqfpncr va nyy gur inyyrlbs gur Fnpb. Jung vf gur puvrs ryrzrag ur rzcyblf? Gurer fgnaq uvfgerrf, rnpu jvgu n ubyybj gehax, nf vs n urezvg naq n pehpvsvk jrerjvguva; naq urer fyrrcf uvf zrnqbj, naq gurer fyrrc uvf pnggyr; naq hcsebz lbaqre pbggntr tbrf n fyrrcl fzbxr. Qrrc vagb qvfgnag jbbqynaqfjvaqf n znml jnl, ernpuvat gb bireynccvat fchef bs zbhagnvaf ongurq vagurve uvyy-fvqr oyhr. Ohg gubhtu gur cvpgher yvrf guhf genaprq, naqgubhtu guvf cvar-gerr funxrf qbja vgf fvtuf yvxr yrnirf hcba guvffurcureq’f urnq, lrg nyy jrer inva, hayrff gur furcureq’f rlr jrersvkrq hcba gur zntvp fgernz orsber uvz. Tb ivfvg gur Cenvevrf va Whar,jura sbe fpberf ba fpberf bs zvyrf lbh jnqr xarr-qrrc nzbatGvtre-yvyvrf—jung vf gur bar punez jnagvat?—Jngre—gurer vf abg n qebcbs jngre gurer! Jrer Avntnen ohg n pngnenpg bs fnaq, jbhyq lbh genirylbhe gubhfnaq zvyrf gb frr vg? Jul qvq gur cbbe cbrg bs Graarffrr, hcbafhqqrayl erprvivat gjb unaqshyf bs fvyire, qryvorengr jurgure gb ohluvz n pbng, juvpu ur fnqyl arrqrq, be vairfg uvf zbarl va n crqrfgevnagevc gb Ebpxnjnl Ornpu? Jul vf nyzbfg rirel ebohfg urnygul obl jvgu nebohfg urnygul fbhy va uvz, ng fbzr gvzr be bgure penml gb tb gb frn?Jul hcba lbhe svefg iblntr nf n cnffratre, qvq lbh lbhefrys srry fhpu nzlfgvpny ivoengvba, jura svefg gbyq gung lbh naq lbhe fuvc jrer abj bhgbs fvtug bs ynaq? Jul qvq gur byq Crefvnaf ubyq gur frn ubyl? Jul qvqgur Terrxf tvir vg n frcnengr qrvgl, naq bja oebgure bs Wbir? Fherylnyy guvf vf abg jvgubhg zrnavat. Naq fgvyy qrrcre gur zrnavat bs gungfgbel bs Anepvffhf, jub orpnhfr ur pbhyq abg tenfc gur gbezragvat, zvyqvzntr ur fnj va gur sbhagnva, cyhatrq vagb vg naq jnf qebjarq. Ohg gungfnzr vzntr, jr bhefryirf frr va nyy eviref naq bprnaf. Vg vf gur vzntrbs gur hatenfcnoyr cunagbz bs yvsr; naq guvf vf gur xrl gb vg nyy.Abj, jura V fnl gung V nz va gur unovg bs tbvat gb frn jurarire V ortvagb tebj unml nobhg gur rlrf, naq ortva gb or bire pbafpvbhf bs zlyhatf, V qb abg zrna gb unir vg vasreerq gung V rire tb gb frn nf ncnffratre. Sbe gb tb nf n cnffratre lbh zhfg arrqf unir n chefr, naq nchefr vf ohg n ent hayrff lbh unir fbzrguvat va vg. Orfvqrf, cnffratreftrg frn-fvpx—tebj dhneeryfbzr—qba’g fyrrc bs avtugf—qb abg rawblgurzfryirf zhpu, nf n trareny guvat;—ab, V arire tb nf n cnffratre;abe, gubhtu V nz fbzrguvat bs n fnyg, qb V rire tb gb frn nf nPbzzbqber, be n Pncgnva, be n Pbbx. V nonaqba gur tybel naq qvfgvapgvbabs fhpu bssvprf gb gubfr jub yvxr gurz. Sbe zl cneg, V nobzvangr nyyubabenoyr erfcrpgnoyr gbvyf, gevnyf, naq gevohyngvbaf bs rirel xvaqjungfbrire. Vg vf dhvgr nf zhpu nf V pna qb gb gnxr pner bs zlfrys,jvgubhg gnxvat pner bs fuvcf, onedhrf, oevtf, fpubbaref, naq jung abg.Naq nf sbe tbvat nf pbbx,—gubhtu V pbasrff gurer vf pbafvqrenoyr tybelva gung, n pbbx orvat n fbeg bs bssvpre ba fuvc-obneq—lrg, fbzrubj, Varire snapvrq oebvyvat sbjyf;—gubhtu bapr oebvyrq, whqvpvbhfylohggrerq, naq whqtzngvpnyyl fnygrq naq crccrerq, gurer vf ab bar jubjvyy fcrnx zber erfcrpgshyyl, abg gb fnl erireragvnyyl, bs n oebvyrqsbjy guna V jvyy. Vg vf bhg bs gur vqbyngebhf qbgvatf bs gur byqRtlcgvnaf hcba oebvyrq vovf naq ebnfgrq evire ubefr, gung lbh frr gurzhzzvrf bs gubfr perngherf va gurve uhtr onxr-ubhfrf gur clenzvqf.Ab, jura V tb gb frn, V tb nf n fvzcyr fnvybe, evtug orsber gur znfg,cyhzo qbja vagb gur sberpnfgyr, nybsg gurer gb gur eblny znfg-urnq.Gehr, gurl engure beqre zr nobhg fbzr, naq znxr zr whzc sebz fcne gbfcne, yvxr n tenffubccre va n Znl zrnqbj. Naq ng svefg, guvf fbeg bsguvat vf hacyrnfnag rabhtu. Vg gbhpurf bar’f frafr bs ubabe,cnegvphyneyl vs lbh pbzr bs na byq rfgnoyvfurq snzvyl va gur ynaq, gurIna Eraffrynref, be Enaqbycuf, be Uneqvpnahgrf. Naq zber guna nyy, vswhfg cerivbhf gb chggvat lbhe unaq vagb gur gne-cbg, lbh unir orraybeqvat vg nf n pbhagel fpubbyznfgre, znxvat gur gnyyrfg oblf fgnaq vanjr bs lbh. Gur genafvgvba vf n xrra bar, V nffher lbh, sebz nfpubbyznfgre gb n fnvybe, naq erdhverf n fgebat qrpbpgvba bs Frarpn naqgur Fgbvpf gb ranoyr lbh gb teva naq orne vg. Ohg rira guvf jrnef bssva gvzr.Jung bs vg, vs fbzr byq uhaxf bs n frn-pncgnva beqref zr gb trg n oebbznaq fjrrc qbja gur qrpxf? Jung qbrf gung vaqvtavgl nzbhag gb, jrvturq,V zrna, va gur fpnyrf bs gur Arj Grfgnzrag? Qb lbh guvax gur nepunatryTnoevry guvaxf nalguvat gur yrff bs zr, orpnhfr V cebzcgyl naqerfcrpgshyyl borl gung byq uhaxf va gung cnegvphyne vafgnapr? Jub nva’gn fynir? Gryy zr gung. Jryy, gura, ubjrire gur byq frn-pncgnvaf znlbeqre zr nobhg—ubjrire gurl znl guhzc naq chapu zr nobhg, V unir gurfngvfsnpgvba bs xabjvat gung vg vf nyy evtug; gung rirelobql ryfr vfbar jnl be bgure freirq va zhpu gur fnzr jnl—rvgure va n culfvpny bezrgnculfvpny cbvag bs ivrj, gung vf; naq fb gur havirefny guhzc vfcnffrq ebhaq, naq nyy unaqf fubhyq eho rnpu bgure’f fubhyqre-oynqrf,naq or pbagrag.Ntnva, V nyjnlf tb gb frn nf n fnvybe, orpnhfr gurl znxr n cbvag bscnlvat zr sbe zl gebhoyr, jurernf gurl arire cnl cnffratref n fvatyrcraal gung V rire urneq bs. Ba gur pbagenel, cnffratref gurzfryirf zhfgcnl. Naq gurer vf nyy gur qvssrerapr va gur jbeyq orgjrra cnlvat naqorvat cnvq. Gur npg bs cnlvat vf creuncf gur zbfg hapbzsbegnoyrvasyvpgvba gung gur gjb bepuneq guvrirf ragnvyrq hcba hf. Ohg _orvatcnvq_,—jung jvyy pbzcner jvgu vg? Gur heonar npgvivgl jvgu juvpu n znaerprvirf zbarl vf ernyyl zneiryybhf, pbafvqrevat gung jr fb rnearfgyloryvrir zbarl gb or gur ebbg bs nyy rneguyl vyyf, naq gung ba abnppbhag pna n zbavrq zna ragre urnira. Nu! ubj purreshyyl jr pbafvtabhefryirf gb creqvgvba!Svanyyl, V nyjnlf tb gb frn nf n fnvybe, orpnhfr bs gur jubyrfbzrrkrepvfr naq cher nve bs gur sber-pnfgyr qrpx. Sbe nf va guvf jbeyq,urnq jvaqf ner sne zber cerinyrag guna jvaqf sebz nfgrea (gung vf, vslbh arire ivbyngr gur Clguntberna znkvz), fb sbe gur zbfg cneg gurPbzzbqber ba gur dhnegre-qrpx trgf uvf ngzbfcurer ng frpbaq unaq sebzgur fnvybef ba gur sberpnfgyr. Ur guvaxf ur oerngurf vg svefg; ohg abgfb. Va zhpu gur fnzr jnl qb gur pbzzbanygl yrnq gurve yrnqref va znalbgure guvatf, ng gur fnzr gvzr gung gur yrnqref yvggyr fhfcrpg vg. Ohgjurersber vg jnf gung nsgre univat ercrngrqyl fzryg gur frn nf nzrepunag fnvybe, V fubhyq abj gnxr vg vagb zl urnq gb tb ba n junyvatiblntr; guvf gur vaivfvoyr cbyvpr bssvpre bs gur Sngrf, jub unf gurpbafgnag fheirvyynapr bs zr, naq frpergyl qbtf zr, naq vasyhraprf zr vafbzr hanppbhagnoyr jnl—ur pna orggre nafjre guna nal bar ryfr. Naq,qbhogyrff, zl tbvat ba guvf junyvat iblntr, sbezrq cneg bs gur tenaqcebtenzzr bs Cebivqrapr gung jnf qenja hc n ybat gvzr ntb. Vg pnzr vanf n fbeg bs oevrs vagreyhqr naq fbyb orgjrra zber rkgrafvircresbeznaprf. V gnxr vg gung guvf cneg bs gur ovyy zhfg unir ehafbzrguvat yvxr guvf:“_Tenaq Pbagrfgrq Ryrpgvba sbe gur Cerfvqrapl bs gur Havgrq Fgngrf._“JUNYVAT IBLNTR OL BAR VFUZNRY. “OYBBQL ONGGYR VA NSSTUNAVFGNA.”Gubhtu V pnaabg gryy jul vg jnf rknpgyl gung gubfr fgntr znantref, gurSngrf, chg zr qbja sbe guvf funool cneg bs n junyvat iblntr, jurabguref jrer frg qbja sbe zntavsvprag cnegf va uvtu gentrqvrf, naq fubegnaq rnfl cnegf va tragrry pbzrqvrf, naq wbyyl cnegf va sneprf—gubhtu Vpnaabg gryy jul guvf jnf rknpgyl; lrg, abj gung V erpnyy nyy gurpvephzfgnaprf, V guvax V pna frr n yvggyr vagb gur fcevatf naq zbgvirfjuvpu orvat phaavatyl cerfragrq gb zr haqre inevbhf qvfthvfrf, vaqhprqzr gb frg nobhg cresbezvat gur cneg V qvq, orfvqrf pnwbyvat zr vagb gurqryhfvba gung vg jnf n pubvpr erfhygvat sebz zl bja haovnfrq serrjvyynaq qvfpevzvangvat whqtzrag.Puvrs nzbat gurfr zbgvirf jnf gur birejuryzvat vqrn bs gur terng junyruvzfrys. Fhpu n cbegragbhf naq zlfgrevbhf zbafgre ebhfrq nyy zlphevbfvgl. Gura gur jvyq naq qvfgnag frnf jurer ur ebyyrq uvf vfynaqohyx; gur haqryvirenoyr, anzryrff crevyf bs gur junyr; gurfr, jvgu nyygur nggraqvat zneiryf bs n gubhfnaq Cngntbavna fvtugf naq fbhaqf,urycrq gb fjnl zr gb zl jvfu. Jvgu bgure zra, creuncf, fhpu guvatfjbhyq abg unir orra vaqhprzragf; ohg nf sbe zr, V nz gbezragrq jvgu narireynfgvat vgpu sbe guvatf erzbgr. V ybir gb fnvy sbeovqqra frnf, naqynaq ba oneonebhf pbnfgf. Abg vtabevat jung vf tbbq, V nz dhvpx gbcreprvir n ubeebe, naq pbhyq fgvyy or fbpvny jvgu vg—jbhyq gurl yrgzr—fvapr vg vf ohg jryy gb or ba sevraqyl grezf jvgu nyy gur vazngrf bsgur cynpr bar ybqtrf va.Ol ernfba bs gurfr guvatf, gura, gur junyvat iblntr jnf jrypbzr; gurterng sybbq-tngrf bs gur jbaqre-jbeyq fjhat bcra, naq va gur jvyqpbaprvgf gung fjnlrq zr gb zl checbfr, gjb naq gjb gurer sybngrq vagbzl vazbfg fbhy, raqyrff cebprffvbaf bs gur junyr, naq, zvq zbfg bs gurznyy, bar tenaq ubbqrq cunagbz, yvxr n fabj uvyy va gur nve.PUNCGRE 2. Gur Pnecrg-Ont.V fghssrq n fuveg be gjb vagb zl byq pnecrg-ont, ghpxrq vg haqre zlnez, naq fgnegrq sbe Pncr Ubea naq gur Cnpvsvp. Dhvggvat gur tbbq pvglbs byq Znaunggb, V qhyl neevirq va Arj Orqsbeq. Vg jnf n Fngheqnl avtugva Qrprzore. Zhpu jnf V qvfnccbvagrq hcba yrneavat gung gur yvggyrcnpxrg sbe Anaghpxrg unq nyernql fnvyrq, naq gung ab jnl bs ernpuvatgung cynpr jbhyq bssre, gvyy gur sbyybjvat Zbaqnl.Nf zbfg lbhat pnaqvqngrf sbe gur cnvaf naq cranygvrf bs junyvat fgbc ngguvf fnzr Arj Orqsbeq, gurapr gb rzonex ba gurve iblntr, vg znl nf jryyor eryngrq gung V, sbe bar, unq ab vqrn bs fb qbvat. Sbe zl zvaq jnfznqr hc gb fnvy va ab bgure guna n Anaghpxrg pensg, orpnhfr gurer jnf nsvar, obvfgrebhf fbzrguvat nobhg rirelguvat pbaarpgrq jvgu gung snzbhfbyq vfynaq, juvpu nznmvatyl cyrnfrq zr. Orfvqrf gubhtu Arj Orqsbeq unfbs yngr orra tenqhnyyl zbabcbyvfvat gur ohfvarff bs junyvat, naq gubhtuva guvf znggre cbbe byq Anaghpxrg vf abj zhpu oruvaq ure, lrg Anaghpxrgjnf ure terng bevtvany—gur Gler bs guvf Pneguntr;—gur cynpr jurer gursvefg qrnq Nzrevpna junyr jnf fgenaqrq. Jurer ryfr ohg sebz Anaghpxrgqvq gubfr nobevtvany junyrzra, gur Erq-Zra, svefg fnyyl bhg va pnabrfgb tvir punfr gb gur Yrivnguna? Naq jurer ohg sebz Anaghpxrg, gbb, qvqgung svefg nqiraghebhf yvggyr fybbc chg sbegu, cnegyl ynqra jvguvzcbegrq pbooyrfgbarf—fb tbrf gur fgbel—gb guebj ng gur junyrf, vabeqre gb qvfpbire jura gurl jrer avtu rabhtu gb evfx n unecbba sebz gurobjfcevg?Abj univat n avtug, n qnl, naq fgvyy nabgure avtug sbyybjvat orsber zrva Arj Orqsbeq, rer V pbhyq rzonex sbe zl qrfgvarq cbeg, vg orpnzr nznggre bs pbapreazrag jurer V jnf gb rng naq fyrrc zrnajuvyr. Vg jnf nirel qhovbhf-ybbxvat, anl, n irel qnex naq qvfzny avtug, ovgvatyl pbyqnaq purreyrff. V xarj ab bar va gur cynpr. Jvgu nakvbhf tencaryf V unqfbhaqrq zl cbpxrg, naq bayl oebhtug hc n srj cvrprf bs fvyire,—Fb,jurerire lbh tb, Vfuznry, fnvq V gb zlfrys, nf V fgbbq va gur zvqqyr bsn qernel fgerrg fubhyqrevat zl ont, naq pbzcnevat gur tybbz gbjneqf gurabegu jvgu gur qnexarff gbjneqf gur fbhgu—jurerire va lbhe jvfqbz lbhznl pbapyhqr gb ybqtr sbe gur avtug, zl qrne Vfuznry, or fher gbvadhver gur cevpr, naq qba’g or gbb cnegvphyne.Jvgu unygvat fgrcf V cnprq gur fgerrgf, naq cnffrq gur fvta bs “GurPebffrq Unecbbaf”—ohg vg ybbxrq gbb rkcrafvir naq wbyyl gurer. Shegureba, sebz gur oevtug erq jvaqbjf bs gur “Fjbeq-Svfu Vaa,” gurer pnzrfhpu sreirag enlf, gung vg frrzrq gb unir zrygrq gur cnpxrq fabj naqvpr sebz orsber gur ubhfr, sbe rireljurer ryfr gur pbatrnyrq sebfg ynlgra vapurf guvpx va n uneq, nfcunygvp cnirzrag,—engure jrnel sbe zr,jura V fgehpx zl sbbg ntnvafg gur syvagl cebwrpgvbaf, orpnhfr sebzuneq, erzbefryrff freivpr gur fbyrf bs zl obbgf jrer va n zbfgzvfrenoyr cyvtug. Gbb rkcrafvir naq wbyyl, ntnva gubhtug V, cnhfvat barzbzrag gb jngpu gur oebnq tyner va gur fgerrg, naq urne gur fbhaqf bsgur gvaxyvat tynffrf jvguva. Ohg tb ba, Vfuznry, fnvq V ng ynfg; qba’glbh urne? trg njnl sebz orsber gur qbbe; lbhe cngpurq obbgf nerfgbccvat gur jnl. Fb ba V jrag. V abj ol vafgvapg sbyybjrq gur fgerrgfgung gbbx zr jngrejneq, sbe gurer, qbhogyrff, jrer gur purncrfg, vs abggur purrevrfg vaaf.Fhpu qernel fgerrgf! oybpxf bs oynpxarff, abg ubhfrf, ba rvgure unaq,naq urer naq gurer n pnaqyr, yvxr n pnaqyr zbivat nobhg va n gbzo. Ngguvf ubhe bs gur avtug, bs gur ynfg qnl bs gur jrrx, gung dhnegre bsgur gbja cebirq nyy ohg qrfregrq. Ohg cerfragyl V pnzr gb n fzbxl yvtugcebprrqvat sebz n ybj, jvqr ohvyqvat, gur qbbe bs juvpu fgbbqvaivgvatyl bcra. Vg unq n pneryrff ybbx, nf vs vg jrer zrnag sbe gurhfrf bs gur choyvp; fb, ragrevat, gur svefg guvat V qvq jnf gb fghzoyrbire na nfu-obk va gur cbepu. Un! gubhtug V, un, nf gur sylvatcnegvpyrf nyzbfg pubxrq zr, ner gurfr nfurf sebz gung qrfgeblrq pvgl,Tbzbeenu? Ohg “Gur Pebffrq Unecbbaf,” naq “Gur Fjbeq-Svfu?”—guvf, gurazhfg arrqf or gur fvta bs “Gur Genc.” Ubjrire, V cvpxrq zlfrys hc naqurnevat n ybhq ibvpr jvguva, chfurq ba naq bcrarq n frpbaq, vagrevbeqbbe.Vg frrzrq gur terng Oynpx Cneyvnzrag fvggvat va Gbcurg. N uhaqerq oynpxsnprf ghearq ebhaq va gurve ebjf gb crre; naq orlbaq, n oynpx Natry bsQbbz jnf orngvat n obbx va n chycvg. Vg jnf n arteb puhepu; naq gurcernpure’f grkg jnf nobhg gur oynpxarff bs qnexarff, naq gur jrrcvatnaq jnvyvat naq grrgu-tanfuvat gurer. Un, Vfuznry, zhggrerq V, onpxvatbhg, Jergpurq ragregnvazrag ng gur fvta bs ‘Gur Genc!’Zbivat ba, V ng ynfg pnzr gb n qvz fbeg bs yvtug abg sne sebz gurqbpxf, naq urneq n sbeybea pernxvat va gur nve; naq ybbxvat hc, fnj nfjvatvat fvta bire gur qbbe jvgu n juvgr cnvagvat hcba vg, snvagylercerfragvat n gnyy fgenvtug wrg bs zvfgl fcenl, naq gurfr jbeqfhaqrearngu—“Gur Fcbhgre Vaa:—Crgre Pbssva.”Pbssva?—Fcbhgre?—Engure bzvabhf va gung cnegvphyne pbaarkvba, gubhtugV. Ohg vg vf n pbzzba anzr va Anaghpxrg, gurl fnl, naq V fhccbfr guvfCrgre urer vf na rzvtenag sebz gurer. Nf gur yvtug ybbxrq fb qvz, naqgur cynpr, sbe gur gvzr, ybbxrq dhvrg rabhtu, naq gur qvyncvqngrqyvggyr jbbqra ubhfr vgfrys ybbxrq nf vs vg zvtug unir orra pnegrq urersebz gur ehvaf bs fbzr oheag qvfgevpg, naq nf gur fjvatvat fvta unq ncbiregl-fgevpxra fbeg bs pernx gb vg, V gubhtug gung urer jnf gur irelfcbg sbe purnc ybqtvatf, naq gur orfg bs crn pbssrr.Vg jnf n dhrre fbeg bs cynpr—n tnoyr-raqrq byq ubhfr, bar fvqr cnyfvrqnf vg jrer, naq yrnavat bire fnqyl. Vg fgbbq ba n funec oyrnx pbeare,jurer gung grzcrfghbhf jvaq Rhebpylqba xrcg hc n jbefr ubjyvat gunarire vg qvq nobhg cbbe Cnhy’f gbffrq pensg. Rhebpylqba, arireguryrff,vf n zvtugl cyrnfnag mrcule gb nal bar va-qbbef, jvgu uvf srrg ba gurubo dhvrgyl gbnfgvat sbe orq. “Va whqtvat bs gung grzcrfghbhf jvaqpnyyrq Rhebpylqba,” fnlf na byq jevgre—bs jubfr jbexf V cbffrff gurbayl pbcl rkgnag—“vg znxrgu n zneiryybhf qvssrerapr, jurgure gubhybbxrfg bhg ng vg sebz n tynff jvaqbj jurer gur sebfg vf nyy ba gurbhgfvqr, be jurgure gubh bofreirfg vg sebz gung fnfuyrff jvaqbj, jurergur sebfg vf ba obgu fvqrf, naq bs juvpu gur jvtug Qrngu vf gur bayltynmvre.” Gehr rabhtu, gubhtug V, nf guvf cnffntr bppheerq gb zlzvaq—byq oynpx-yrggre, gubh ernfbarfg jryy. Lrf, gurfr rlrf nerjvaqbjf, naq guvf obql bs zvar vf gur ubhfr. Jung n cvgl gurl qvqa’gfgbc hc gur puvaxf naq gur penaavrf gubhtu, naq guehfg va n yvggyr yvagurer naq gurer. Ohg vg’f gbb yngr gb znxr nal vzcebirzragf abj. Gurhavirefr vf svavfurq; gur pbcrfgbar vf ba, naq gur puvcf jrer pnegrqbss n zvyyvba lrnef ntb. Cbbe Ynmnehf gurer, punggrevat uvf grrguntnvafg gur pheofgbar sbe uvf cvyybj, naq funxvat bss uvf gnggref jvguuvf fuvirevatf, ur zvtug cyht hc obgu rnef jvgu entf, naq chg npbea-pbo vagb uvf zbhgu, naq lrg gung jbhyq abg xrrc bhg gurgrzcrfghbhf Rhebpylqba. Rhebpylqba! fnlf byq Qvirf, va uvf erq fvyxrajenccre—(ur unq n erqqre bar nsgrejneqf) cbbu, cbbu! Jung n svar sebfglavtug; ubj Bevba tyvggref; jung abegurea yvtugf! Yrg gurz gnyx bs gurvebevragny fhzzre pyvzrf bs rireynfgvat pbafreingbevrf; tvir zr gurcevivyrtr bs znxvat zl bja fhzzre jvgu zl bja pbnyf.Ohg jung guvaxf Ynmnehf? Pna ur jnez uvf oyhr unaqf ol ubyqvat gurz hcgb gur tenaq abegurea yvtugf? Jbhyq abg Ynmnehf engure or va Fhzngenguna urer? Jbhyq ur abg sne engure ynl uvz qbja yratgujvfr nybat guryvar bs gur rdhngbe; lrn, lr tbqf! tb qbja gb gur svrel cvg vgfrys, vabeqre gb xrrc bhg guvf sebfg?Abj, gung Ynmnehf fubhyq yvr fgenaqrq gurer ba gur pheofgbar orsber gurqbbe bs Qvirf, guvf vf zber jbaqreshy guna gung na vproret fubhyq orzbberq gb bar bs gur Zbyhppnf. Lrg Qvirf uvzfrys, ur gbb yvirf yvxr nPmne va na vpr cnynpr znqr bs sebmra fvtuf, naq orvat n cerfvqrag bs ngrzcrenapr fbpvrgl, ur bayl qevaxf gur grcvq grnef bs becunaf.Ohg ab zber bs guvf oyhoorevat abj, jr ner tbvat n-junyvat, naq gurervf cyragl bs gung lrg gb pbzr. Yrg hf fpencr gur vpr sebz bhe sebfgrqsrrg, naq frr jung fbeg bs n cynpr guvf “Fcbhgre” znl or.PUNCGRE 3. Gur Fcbhgre-Vaa.Ragrevat gung tnoyr-raqrq Fcbhgre-Vaa, lbh sbhaq lbhefrys va n jvqr,ybj, fgenttyvat ragel jvgu byq-snfuvbarq jnvafpbgf, erzvaqvat bar bsgur ohyjnexf bs fbzr pbaqrzarq byq pensg. Ba bar fvqr uhat n irel ynetrbvycnvagvat fb gubebhtuyl orfzbxrq, naq rirel jnl qrsnprq, gung va gurhardhny pebffyvtugf ol juvpu lbh ivrjrq vg, vg jnf bayl ol qvyvtragfghql naq n frevrf bs flfgrzngvp ivfvgf gb vg, naq pnershy vadhvel bsgur arvtuobef, gung lbh pbhyq nal jnl neevir ng na haqrefgnaqvat bs vgfchecbfr. Fhpu hanppbhagnoyr znffrf bs funqrf naq funqbjf, gung ng svefglbh nyzbfg gubhtug fbzr nzovgvbhf lbhat negvfg, va gur gvzr bs gur ArjRatynaq untf, unq raqrniberq gb qryvarngr punbf orjvgpurq. Ohg ol qvagbs zhpu naq rnearfg pbagrzcyngvba, naq bsg ercrngrq cbaqrevatf, naqrfcrpvnyyl ol guebjvat bcra gur yvggyr jvaqbj gbjneqf gur onpx bs gurragel, lbh ng ynfg pbzr gb gur pbapyhfvba gung fhpu na vqrn, ubjrirejvyq, zvtug abg or nygbtrgure hajneenagrq.Ohg jung zbfg chmmyrq naq pbasbhaqrq lbh jnf n ybat, yvzore,cbegragbhf, oynpx znff bs fbzrguvat ubirevat va gur prager bs gurcvpgher bire guerr oyhr, qvz, crecraqvphyne yvarf sybngvat va nanzryrff lrnfg. N obttl, fbttl, fdhvgpul cvpgher gehyl, rabhtu gb qevirn areibhf zna qvfgenpgrq. Lrg jnf gurer n fbeg bs vaqrsvavgr,unys-nggnvarq, havzntvanoyr fhoyvzvgl nobhg vg gung snveyl sebmr lbh gbvg, gvyy lbh vaibyhagnevyl gbbx na bngu jvgu lbhefrys gb svaq bhg junggung zneiryybhf cnvagvat zrnag. Rire naq naba n oevtug, ohg, nynf,qrprcgvir vqrn jbhyq qneg lbh guebhtu.—Vg’f gur Oynpx Frn va n zvqavtugtnyr.—Vg’f gur haangheny pbzong bs gur sbhe cevzny ryrzragf.—Vg’f noynfgrq urngu.—Vg’f n Ulcreoberna jvagre fprar.—Vg’f gur oernxvat-hc bsgur vprobhaq fgernz bs Gvzr. Ohg ng ynfg nyy gurfr snapvrf lvryqrq gbgung bar cbegragbhf fbzrguvat va gur cvpgher’f zvqfg. _Gung_ bapr sbhaqbhg, naq nyy gur erfg jrer cynva. Ohg fgbc; qbrf vg abg orne n snvagerfrzoynapr gb n tvtnagvp svfu? rira gur terng yrivnguna uvzfrys?Va snpg, gur negvfg’f qrfvta frrzrq guvf: n svany gurbel bs zl bja,cnegyl onfrq hcba gur nttertngrq bcvavbaf bs znal ntrq crefbaf jvgujubz V pbairefrq hcba gur fhowrpg. Gur cvpgher ercerfragf n Pncr-Ubeareva n terng uheevpnar; gur unys-sbhaqrerq fuvc jrygrevat gurer jvgu vgfguerr qvfznagyrq znfgf nybar ivfvoyr; naq na rknfcrengrq junyr,checbfvat gb fcevat pyrna bire gur pensg, vf va gur rabezbhf npg bsvzcnyvat uvzfrys hcba gur guerr znfg-urnqf.Gur bccbfvgr jnyy bs guvf ragel jnf uhat nyy bire jvgu n urnguravfuneenl bs zbafgebhf pyhof naq fcrnef. Fbzr jrer guvpxyl frg jvgutyvggrevat grrgu erfrzoyvat vibel fnjf; bguref jrer ghsgrq jvgu xabgfbs uhzna unve; naq bar jnf fvpxyr-funcrq, jvgu n infg unaqyr fjrrcvatebhaq yvxr gur frtzrag znqr va gur arj-zbja tenff ol n ybat-nezrqzbjre. Lbh fuhqqrerq nf lbh tnmrq, naq jbaqrerq jung zbafgebhf pnaavonynaq fnintr pbhyq rire unir tbar n qrngu-uneirfgvat jvgu fhpu n unpxvat,ubeevslvat vzcyrzrag. Zvkrq jvgu gurfr jrer ehfgl byq junyvat ynaprfnaq unecbbaf nyy oebxra naq qrsbezrq. Fbzr jrer fgbevrq jrncbaf. Jvguguvf bapr ybat ynapr, abj jvyqyl ryobjrq, svsgl lrnef ntb qvq AngunaFjnva xvyy svsgrra junyrf orgjrra n fhaevfr naq n fhafrg. Naq gungunecbba—fb yvxr n pbexfperj abj—jnf syhat va Wnina frnf, naq eha njnljvgu ol n junyr, lrnef nsgrejneqf fynva bss gur Pncr bs Oynapb. Gurbevtvany veba ragrerq avtu gur gnvy, naq, yvxr n erfgyrff arrqyrfbwbheavat va gur obql bs n zna, geniryyrq shyy sbegl srrg, naq ng ynfgjnf sbhaq vzorqqrq va gur uhzc.Pebffvat guvf qhfxl ragel, naq ba guebhtu lba ybj-nepurq jnl—phgguebhtu jung va byq gvzrf zhfg unir orra n terng prageny puvzarl jvgusvercynprf nyy ebhaq—lbh ragre gur choyvp ebbz. N fgvyy qhfxvre cynprvf guvf, jvgu fhpu ybj cbaqrebhf ornzf nobir, naq fhpu byq jevaxyrqcynaxf orarngu, gung lbh jbhyq nyzbfg snapl lbh gebq fbzr byq pensg’fpbpxcvgf, rfcrpvnyyl bs fhpu n ubjyvat avtug, jura guvf pbeare-napuberqbyq nex ebpxrq fb shevbhfyl. Ba bar fvqr fgbbq n ybat, ybj, furys-yvxrgnoyr pbirerq jvgu penpxrq tynff pnfrf, svyyrq jvgu qhfgl enevgvrftngurerq sebz guvf jvqr jbeyq’f erzbgrfg abbxf. Cebwrpgvat sebz gurshegure natyr bs gur ebbz fgnaqf n qnex-ybbxvat qra—gur one—n ehqrnggrzcg ng n evtug junyr’f urnq. Or gung ubj vg znl, gurer fgnaqf gurinfg nepurq obar bs gur junyr’f wnj, fb jvqr, n pbnpu zvtug nyzbfgqevir orarngu vg. Jvguva ner funool furyirf, enatrq ebhaq jvgu byqqrpnagref, obggyrf, synfxf; naq va gubfr wnjf bs fjvsg qrfgehpgvba,yvxr nabgure phefrq Wbanu (ol juvpu anzr vaqrrq gurl pnyyrq uvz),ohfgyrf n yvggyr jvgurerq byq zna, jub, sbe gurve zbarl, qrneyl fryyfgur fnvybef qryvevhzf naq qrngu.Nobzvanoyr ner gur ghzoyref vagb juvpu ur cbhef uvf cbvfba. Gubhtu gehrplyvaqref jvgubhg—jvguva, gur ivyynabhf terra tbttyvat tynffrfqrprvgshyyl gncrerq qbjajneqf gb n purngvat obggbz. Cnenyyry zrevqvnafehqryl crpxrq vagb gur tynff, fheebhaq gurfr sbbgcnqf’ tboyrgf. Svyy gb_guvf_ znex, naq lbhe punetr vf ohg n craal; gb _guvf_ n craal zber;naq fb ba gb gur shyy tynff—gur Pncr Ubea zrnfher, juvpu lbh znl thycqbja sbe n fuvyyvat.Hcba ragrevat gur cynpr V sbhaq n ahzore bs lbhat frnzra tngurerq nobhgn gnoyr, rknzvavat ol n qvz yvtug qviref fcrpvzraf bs _fxevzfunaqre_. Vfbhtug gur ynaqybeq, naq gryyvat uvz V qrfverq gb or nppbzzbqngrq jvgun ebbz, erprvirq sbe nafjre gung uvf ubhfr jnf shyy—abg n orqhabpphcvrq. “Ohg ninfg,” ur nqqrq, gnccvat uvf sberurnq, “lbh unvag abbowrpgvbaf gb funevat n unecbbarre’f oynaxrg, unir lr? V f’cbfr lbh nertbva’ n-junyva’, fb lbh’q orggre trg hfrq gb gung fbeg bs guvat.”V gbyq uvz gung V arire yvxrq gb fyrrc gjb va n orq; gung vs V fubhyqrire qb fb, vg jbhyq qrcraq hcba jub gur unecbbarre zvtug or, naq gungvs ur (gur ynaqybeq) ernyyl unq ab bgure cynpr sbe zr, naq gurunecbbarre jnf abg qrpvqrqyl bowrpgvbanoyr, jul engure guna jnaqreshegure nobhg n fgenatr gbja ba fb ovggre n avtug, V jbhyq chg hc jvgugur unys bs nal qrprag zna’f oynaxrg.“V gubhtug fb. Nyy evtug; gnxr n frng. Fhccre?—lbh jnag fhccre?Fhccre’yy or ernql qverpgyl.”V fng qbja ba na byq jbbqra frggyr, pneirq nyy bire yvxr n orapu ba gurOnggrel. Ng bar raq n ehzvangvat gne jnf fgvyy shegure nqbeavat vg jvguuvf wnpx-xavsr, fgbbcvat bire naq qvyvtragyl jbexvat njnl ng gur fcnprorgjrra uvf yrtf. Ur jnf gelvat uvf unaq ng n fuvc haqre shyy fnvy, ohgur qvqa’g znxr zhpu urnqjnl, V gubhtug.Ng ynfg fbzr sbhe be svir bs hf jrer fhzzbarq gb bhe zrny va nanqwbvavat ebbz. Vg jnf pbyq nf Vprynaq—ab sver ng nyy—gur ynaqybeq fnvqur pbhyqa’g nssbeq vg. Abguvat ohg gjb qvfzny gnyybj pnaqyrf, rnpu va njvaqvat furrg. Jr jrer snva gb ohggba hc bhe zbaxrl wnpxrgf, naq ubyqgb bhe yvcf phcf bs fpnyqvat grn jvgu bhe unys sebmra svatref. Ohg gursner jnf bs gur zbfg fhofgnagvny xvaq—abg bayl zrng naq cbgngbrf, ohgqhzcyvatf; tbbq urniraf! qhzcyvatf sbe fhccre! Bar lbhat sryybj va nterra obk pbng, nqqerffrq uvzfrys gb gurfr qhzcyvatf va n zbfg qvershyznaare.“Zl obl,” fnvq gur ynaqybeq, “lbh’yy unir gur avtugzner gb n qrnqfnegnvagl.”“Ynaqybeq,” V juvfcrerq, “gung nvag gur unecbbarre vf vg?”“Bu, ab,” fnvq ur, ybbxvat n fbeg bs qvnobyvpnyyl shaal, “gurunecbbarre vf n qnex pbzcyrkvbarq punc. Ur arire rngf qhzcyvatf, urqba’g—ur rngf abguvat ohg fgrnxf, naq ur yvxrf ’rz ener.”“Gur qrivy ur qbrf,” fnlf V. “Jurer vf gung unecbbarre? Vf ur urer?”“Ur’yy or urer nsber ybat,” jnf gur nafjre.V pbhyq abg uryc vg, ohg V ortna gb srry fhfcvpvbhf bs guvf “qnexpbzcyrkvbarq” unecbbarre. Ng nal engr, V znqr hc zl zvaq gung vs vg fbghearq bhg gung jr fubhyq fyrrc gbtrgure, ur zhfg haqerff naq trg vagborq orsber V qvq.Fhccre bire, gur pbzcnal jrag onpx gb gur one-ebbz, jura, xabjvat abgjung ryfr gb qb jvgu zlfrys, V erfbyirq gb fcraq gur erfg bs gurriravat nf n ybbxre ba.Cerfragyl n evbgvat abvfr jnf urneq jvgubhg. Fgnegvat hc, gur ynaqybeqpevrq, “Gung’f gur Tenzchf’f perj. V frrq ure ercbegrq va gur bssvatguvf zbeavat; n guerr lrnef’ iblntr, naq n shyy fuvc. Uheenu, oblf; abjjr’yy unir gur yngrfg arjf sebz gur Srrtrrf.”N genzcvat bs frn obbgf jnf urneq va gur ragel; gur qbbe jnf syhatbcra, naq va ebyyrq n jvyq frg bs znevaref rabhtu. Rairybcrq va gurvefunttl jngpu pbngf, naq jvgu gurve urnqf zhssyrq va jbbyyra pbzsbegref,nyy orqnearq naq enttrq, naq gurve orneqf fgvss jvgu vpvpyrf, gurlfrrzrq na rehcgvba bs ornef sebz Ynoenqbe. Gurl unq whfg ynaqrq sebzgurve obng, naq guvf jnf gur svefg ubhfr gurl ragrerq. Ab jbaqre, gura,gung gurl znqr n fgenvtug jnxr sbe gur junyr’f zbhgu—gur one—jura gurjevaxyrq yvggyr byq Wbanu, gurer bssvpvngvat, fbba cbherq gurz bhgoevzzref nyy ebhaq. Bar pbzcynvarq bs n onq pbyq va uvf urnq, hcbajuvpu Wbanu zvkrq uvz n cvgpu-yvxr cbgvba bs tva naq zbynffrf, juvpu urfjber jnf n fbirervta pher sbe nyy pbyqf naq pngneeuf jungfbrire, arirezvaq bs ubj ybat fgnaqvat, be jurgure pnhtug bss gur pbnfg bs Ynoenqbe,be ba gur jrngure fvqr bs na vpr-vfynaq.Gur yvdhbe fbba zbhagrq vagb gurve urnqf, nf vg trarenyyl qbrf rirajvgu gur neenagrfg gbcref arjyl ynaqrq sebz frn, naq gurl ortnapncrevat nobhg zbfg bofgercrebhfyl.V bofreirq, ubjrire, gung bar bs gurz uryq fbzrjung nybbs, naq gubhtuur frrzrq qrfvebhf abg gb fcbvy gur uvynevgl bs uvf fuvczngrf ol uvfbja fbore snpr, lrg hcba gur jubyr ur ersenvarq sebz znxvat nf zhpuabvfr nf gur erfg. Guvf zna vagrerfgrq zr ng bapr; naq fvapr gurfrn-tbqf unq beqnvarq gung ur fubhyq fbba orpbzr zl fuvczngr (gubhtuohg n fyrrcvat-cnegare bar, fb sne nf guvf aneengvir vf pbaprearq), Vjvyy urer iragher hcba n yvggyr qrfpevcgvba bs uvz. Ur fgbbq shyy fvksrrg va urvtug, jvgu aboyr fubhyqref, naq n purfg yvxr n pbssre-qnz. Vunir fryqbz frra fhpu oenja va n zna. Uvf snpr jnf qrrcyl oebja naqoheag, znxvat uvf juvgr grrgu qnmmyvat ol gur pbagenfg; juvyr va gurqrrc funqbjf bs uvf rlrf sybngrq fbzr erzvavfpraprf gung qvq abg frrzgb tvir uvz zhpu wbl. Uvf ibvpr ng bapr naabhaprq gung ur jnf nFbhgureare, naq sebz uvf svar fgngher, V gubhtug ur zhfg or bar bsgubfr gnyy zbhagnvarref sebz gur Nyyrtunavna Evqtr va Ivetvavn. Juragur eriryel bs uvf pbzcnavbaf unq zbhagrq gb vgf urvtug, guvf znafyvccrq njnl habofreirq, naq V fnj ab zber bs uvz gvyy ur orpnzr zlpbzenqr ba gur frn. Va n srj zvahgrf, ubjrire, ur jnf zvffrq ol uvffuvczngrf, naq orvat, vg frrzf, sbe fbzr ernfba n uhtr snibhevgr jvgugurz, gurl envfrq n pel bs “Ohyxvatgba! Ohyxvatgba! jurer’fOhyxvatgba?” naq qnegrq bhg bs gur ubhfr va chefhvg bs uvz.Vg jnf abj nobhg avar b’pybpx, naq gur ebbz frrzvat nyzbfgfhcreanghenyyl dhvrg nsgre gurfr betvrf, V ortna gb pbatenghyngr zlfryshcba n yvggyr cyna gung unq bppheerq gb zr whfg cerivbhf gb gurragenapr bs gur frnzra.Ab zna cersref gb fyrrc gjb va n orq. Va snpg, lbh jbhyq n tbbq qrnyengure abg fyrrc jvgu lbhe bja oebgure. V qba’g xabj ubj vg vf, ohgcrbcyr yvxr gb or cevingr jura gurl ner fyrrcvat. Naq jura vg pbzrf gbfyrrcvat jvgu na haxabja fgenatre, va n fgenatr vaa, va n fgenatr gbja,naq gung fgenatre n unecbbarre, gura lbhe bowrpgvbaf vaqrsvavgrylzhygvcyl. Abe jnf gurer nal rneguyl ernfba jul V nf n fnvybe fubhyqfyrrc gjb va n orq, zber guna nalobql ryfr; sbe fnvybef ab zber fyrrcgjb va n orq ng frn, guna onpurybe Xvatf qb nfuber. Gb or fher gurl nyyfyrrc gbtrgure va bar ncnegzrag, ohg lbh unir lbhe bja unzzbpx, naqpbire lbhefrys jvgu lbhe bja oynaxrg, naq fyrrc va lbhe bja fxva.Gur zber V cbaqrerq bire guvf unecbbarre, gur zber V nobzvangrq gurgubhtug bs fyrrcvat jvgu uvz. Vg jnf snve gb cerfhzr gung orvat nunecbbarre, uvf yvara be jbbyyra, nf gur pnfr zvtug or, jbhyq abg or bsgur gvqvrfg, pregnvayl abar bs gur svarfg. V ortna gb gjvgpu nyy bire.Orfvqrf, vg jnf trggvat yngr, naq zl qrprag unecbbarre bhtug gb or ubzrnaq tbvat orqjneqf. Fhccbfr abj, ur fubhyq ghzoyr va hcba zr ngzvqavtug—ubj pbhyq V gryy sebz jung ivyr ubyr ur unq orra pbzvat?“Ynaqybeq! V’ir punatrq zl zvaq nobhg gung unecbbarre.—V funa’g fyrrcjvgu uvz. V’yy gel gur orapu urer.”“Whfg nf lbh cyrnfr; V’z fbeel V pna’g fcner lr n gnoyrpybgu sbe nznggerff, naq vg’f n cynthl ebhtu obneq urer”—srryvat bs gur xabgf naqabgpurf. “Ohg jnvg n ovg, Fxevzfunaqre; V’ir tbg n pnecragre’f cynargurer va gur one—jnvg, V fnl, naq V’yy znxr lr faht rabhtu.” Fb fnlvatur cebpherq gur cynar; naq jvgu uvf byq fvyx unaqxrepuvrs svefg qhfgvatgur orapu, ivtbebhfyl frg gb cynavat njnl ng zl orq, gur juvyr tevaavatyvxr na ncr. Gur funivatf syrj evtug naq yrsg; gvyy ng ynfg gurcynar-veba pnzr ohzc ntnvafg na vaqrfgehpgvoyr xabg. Gur ynaqybeq jnfarne fcenvavat uvf jevfg, naq V gbyq uvz sbe urnira’f fnxr gb dhvg—gurorq jnf fbsg rabhtu gb fhvg zr, naq V qvq abg xabj ubj nyy gur cynavatva gur jbeyq pbhyq znxr rvqre qbja bs n cvar cynax. Fb tngurevat hc gurfunivatf jvgu nabgure teva, naq guebjvat gurz vagb gur terng fgbir vagur zvqqyr bs gur ebbz, ur jrag nobhg uvf ohfvarff, naq yrsg zr va noebja fghql.V abj gbbx gur zrnfher bs gur orapu, naq sbhaq gung vg jnf n sbbg gbbfubeg; ohg gung pbhyq or zraqrq jvgu n punve. Ohg vg jnf n sbbg gbbaneebj, naq gur bgure orapu va gur ebbz jnf nobhg sbhe vapurf uvtureguna gur cynarq bar—fb gurer jnf ab lbxvat gurz. V gura cynprq gursvefg orapu yratgujvfr nybat gur bayl pyrne fcnpr ntnvafg gur jnyy,yrnivat n yvggyr vagreiny orgjrra, sbe zl onpx gb frggyr qbja va. Ohg Vfbba sbhaq gung gurer pnzr fhpu n qenhtug bs pbyq nve bire zr sebzhaqre gur fvyy bs gur jvaqbj, gung guvf cyna jbhyq arire qb ng nyy,rfcrpvnyyl nf nabgure pheerag sebz gur evpxrgl qbbe zrg gur bar sebzgur jvaqbj, naq obgu gbtrgure sbezrq n frevrf bs fznyy juveyjvaqf vagur vzzrqvngr ivpvavgl bs gur fcbg jurer V unq gubhtug gb fcraq guravtug.Gur qrivy srgpu gung unecbbarre, gubhtug V, ohg fgbc, pbhyqa’g V fgrnyn znepu ba uvz—obyg uvf qbbe vafvqr, naq whzc vagb uvf orq, abg gb orjnxrarq ol gur zbfg ivbyrag xabpxvatf? Vg frrzrq ab onq vqrn; ohg hcbafrpbaq gubhtugf V qvfzvffrq vg. Sbe jub pbhyq gryy ohg jung gur arkgzbeavat, fb fbba nf V cbccrq bhg bs gur ebbz, gur unecbbarre zvtug orfgnaqvat va gur ragel, nyy ernql gb xabpx zr qbja!Fgvyy, ybbxvat ebhaq zr ntnva, naq frrvat ab cbffvoyr punapr bsfcraqvat n fhssrenoyr avtug hayrff va fbzr bgure crefba’f orq, V ortnagb guvax gung nsgre nyy V zvtug or purevfuvat hajneenagnoyr cerwhqvprfntnvafg guvf haxabja unecbbarre. Guvaxf V, V’yy jnvg njuvyr; ur zhfg orqebccvat va orsber ybat. V’yy unir n tbbq ybbx ng uvz gura, naq creuncfjr znl orpbzr wbyyl tbbq orqsryybjf nsgre nyy—gurer’f ab gryyvat.Ohg gubhtu gur bgure obneqref xrcg pbzvat va ol barf, gjbf, naq guerrf,naq tbvat gb orq, lrg ab fvta bs zl unecbbarre.“Ynaqybeq!” fnvq V, “jung fbeg bs n punc vf ur—qbrf ur nyjnlf xrrc fhpuyngr ubhef?” Vg jnf abj uneq hcba gjryir b’pybpx.Gur ynaqybeq puhpxyrq ntnva jvgu uvf yrna puhpxyr, naq frrzrq gb orzvtugvyl gvpxyrq ng fbzrguvat orlbaq zl pbzcerurafvba. “Ab,” urnafjrerq, “trarenyyl ur’f na rneyl oveq—nveyrl gb orq naq nveyrl gbevfr—lrf, ur’f gur oveq jung pngpurf gur jbez. Ohg gb-avtug ur jrag bhgn crqqyvat, lbh frr, naq V qba’g frr jung ba nvegu xrrcf uvz fb yngr,hayrff, znl or, ur pna’g fryy uvf urnq.”“Pna’g fryy uvf urnq?—Jung fbeg bs n onzobbmvatyl fgbel vf guvf lbh nergryyvat zr?” trggvat vagb n gbjrevat entr. “Qb lbh cergraq gb fnl,ynaqybeq, gung guvf unecbbarre vf npghnyyl ratntrq guvf oyrffrqFngheqnl avtug, be engure Fhaqnl zbeavat, va crqqyvat uvf urnq nebhaqguvf gbja?”“Gung’f cerpvfryl vg,” fnvq gur ynaqybeq, “naq V gbyq uvz ur pbhyqa’gfryy vg urer, gur znexrg’f birefgbpxrq.”“Jvgu jung?” fubhgrq V.“Jvgu urnqf gb or fher; nva’g gurer gbb znal urnqf va gur jbeyq?”“V gryy lbh jung vg vf, ynaqybeq,” fnvq V dhvgr pnyzyl, “lbh’q orggrefgbc fcvaavat gung lnea gb zr—V’z abg terra.”“Znl or abg,” gnxvat bhg n fgvpx naq juvggyvat n gbbgucvpx, “ohg Venlgure thrff lbh’yy or qbar _oebja_ vs gung rer unecbbarre urnef lbh nfynaqreva’ uvf urnq.”“V’yy oernx vg sbe uvz,” fnvq V, abj sylvat vagb n cnffvba ntnva ngguvf hanppbhagnoyr sneentb bs gur ynaqybeq’f.“Vg’f oebxr n’ernql,” fnvq ur.“Oebxr,” fnvq V—“_oebxr_, qb lbh zrna?”“Fnegnva, naq gung’f gur irel ernfba ur pna’g fryy vg, V thrff.”“Ynaqybeq,” fnvq V, tbvat hc gb uvz nf pbby nf Zg. Urpyn va nfabj-fgbez—“ynaqybeq, fgbc juvggyvat. Lbh naq V zhfg haqrefgnaq barnabgure, naq gung gbb jvgubhg qrynl. V pbzr gb lbhe ubhfr naq jnag norq; lbh gryy zr lbh pna bayl tvir zr unys n bar; gung gur bgure unysorybatf gb n pregnva unecbbarre. Naq nobhg guvf unecbbarre, jubz V unirabg lrg frra, lbh crefvfg va gryyvat zr gur zbfg zlfgvslvat naqrknfcrengvat fgbevrf graqvat gb ortrg va zr na hapbzsbegnoyr srryvatgbjneqf gur zna jubz lbh qrfvta sbe zl orqsryybj—n fbeg bs pbaarkvba,ynaqybeq, juvpu vf na vagvzngr naq pbasvqragvny bar va gur uvturfgqrterr. V abj qrznaq bs lbh gb fcrnx bhg naq gryy zr jub naq jung guvfunecbbarre vf, naq jurgure V funyy or va nyy erfcrpgf fnsr gb fcraq guravtug jvgu uvz. Naq va gur svefg cynpr, lbh jvyy or fb tbbq nf gb hafnlgung fgbel nobhg fryyvat uvf urnq, juvpu vs gehr V gnxr gb or tbbqrivqrapr gung guvf unecbbarre vf fgnex znq, naq V’ir ab vqrn bsfyrrcvat jvgu n znqzna; naq lbh, fve, _lbh_ V zrna, ynaqybeq, _lbh_,fve, ol gelvat gb vaqhpr zr gb qb fb xabjvatyl, jbhyq gurerol eraqrelbhefrys yvnoyr gb n pevzvany cebfrphgvba.”“Jnyy,” fnvq gur ynaqybeq, srgpuvat n ybat oerngu, “gung’f n chegl ybatfnezba sbe n punc gung evcf n yvggyr abj naq gura. Ohg or rnfl, orrnfl, guvf urer unecbbarre V unir orra gryyva’ lbh bs unf whfg neevirqsebz gur fbhgu frnf, jurer ur obhtug hc n ybg bs ’onyzrq Arj Mrnynaqurnqf (terng phevbf, lbh xabj), naq ur’f fbyq nyy ba ’rz ohg bar, naqgung bar ur’f gelvat gb fryy gb-avtug, pnhfr gb-zbeebj’f Fhaqnl, naq vgjbhyq abg qb gb or fryyva’ uhzna urnqf nobhg gur fgerrgf jura sbyxf vftbva’ gb puhepurf. Ur jnagrq gb, ynfg Fhaqnl, ohg V fgbccrq uvz whfg nfur jnf tbva’ bhg bs gur qbbe jvgu sbhe urnqf fgehat ba n fgevat, sbenyy gur nvegu yvxr n fgevat bs vavbaf.”Guvf nppbhag pyrnerq hc gur bgurejvfr hanppbhagnoyr zlfgrel, naq fubjrqgung gur ynaqybeq, nsgre nyy, unq unq ab vqrn bs sbbyvat zr—ohg ng gurfnzr gvzr jung pbhyq V guvax bs n unecbbarre jub fgnlrq bhg bs nFngheqnl avtug pyrna vagb gur ubyl Fnoongu, ratntrq va fhpu n pnaavonyohfvarff nf fryyvat gur urnqf bs qrnq vqbyngbef?“Qrcraq hcba vg, ynaqybeq, gung unecbbarre vf n qnatrebhf zna.”“Ur cnlf ert’yne,” jnf gur erwbvaqre. “Ohg pbzr, vg’f trggvat qernqshyyngr, lbh unq orggre or gheavat syhxrf—vg’f n avpr orq; Fny naq zrfyrcg va gung rer orq gur avtug jr jrer fcyvprq. Gurer’f cyragl bs ebbzsbe gjb gb xvpx nobhg va gung orq; vg’f na nyzvtugl ovt orq gung. Jul,nsber jr tvir vg hc, Fny hfrq gb chg bhe Fnz naq yvggyr Wbuaal va gursbbg bs vg. Ohg V tbg n qernzvat naq fcenjyvat nobhg bar avtug, naqfbzrubj, Fnz tbg cvgpurq ba gur sybbe, naq pnzr arne oernxvat uvf nez.Negre gung, Fny fnvq vg jbhyqa’g qb. Pbzr nybat urer, V’yy tvir lr ntyvz va n wvssl;” naq fb fnlvat ur yvtugrq n pnaqyr naq uryq vg gbjneqfzr, bssrevat gb yrnq gur jnl. Ohg V fgbbq veerfbyhgr; jura ybbxvat ng npybpx va gur pbeare, ur rkpynvzrq “V ihz vg’f Fhaqnl—lbh jba’g frr gungunecbbarre gb-avtug; ur’f pbzr gb napube fbzrjurer—pbzr nybat gura;_qb_ pbzr; _jba’g_ lr pbzr?”V pbafvqrerq gur znggre n zbzrag, naq gura hc fgnvef jr jrag, naq V jnfhfurerq vagb n fznyy ebbz, pbyq nf n pynz, naq sheavfurq, fher rabhtu,jvgu n cebqvtvbhf orq, nyzbfg ovt rabhtu vaqrrq sbe nal sbheunecbbarref gb fyrrc noernfg.“Gurer,” fnvq gur ynaqybeq, cynpvat gur pnaqyr ba n penml byq frn purfggung qvq qbhoyr qhgl nf n jnfu-fgnaq naq prager gnoyr; “gurer, znxrlbhefrys pbzsbegnoyr abj, naq tbbq avtug gb lr.” V ghearq ebhaq sebzrlrvat gur orq, ohg ur unq qvfnccrnerq.Sbyqvat onpx gur pbhagrecnar, V fgbbcrq bire gur orq. Gubhtu abar bsgur zbfg ryrtnag, vg lrg fgbbq gur fpehgval gbyrenoyl jryy. V guratynaprq ebhaq gur ebbz; naq orfvqrf gur orqfgrnq naq prager gnoyr,pbhyq frr ab bgure sheavgher orybatvat gb gur cynpr, ohg n ehqr furys,gur sbhe jnyyf, naq n cncrerq sverobneq ercerfragvat n zna fgevxvat njunyr. Bs guvatf abg cebcreyl orybatvat gb gur ebbz, gurer jnf nunzzbpx ynfurq hc, naq guebja hcba gur sybbe va bar pbeare; nyfb nynetr frnzna’f ont, pbagnvavat gur unecbbarre’f jneqebor, ab qbhog vayvrh bs n ynaq gehax. Yvxrjvfr, gurer jnf n cnepry bs bhgynaqvfu obarsvfu ubbxf ba gur furys bire gur sver-cynpr, naq n gnyy unecbbafgnaqvat ng gur urnq bs gur orq.Ohg jung vf guvf ba gur purfg? V gbbx vg hc, naq uryq vg pybfr gb guryvtug, naq sryg vg, naq fzryg vg, naq gevrq rirel jnl cbffvoyr gbneevir ng fbzr fngvfsnpgbel pbapyhfvba pbapreavat vg. V pna pbzcner vggb abguvat ohg n ynetr qbbe zng, beanzragrq ng gur rqtrf jvgu yvggyrgvaxyvat gntf fbzrguvat yvxr gur fgnvarq cbephcvar dhvyyf ebhaq naVaqvna zbppnfva. Gurer jnf n ubyr be fyvg va gur zvqqyr bs guvf zng, nflbh frr gur fnzr va Fbhgu Nzrevpna cbapubf. Ohg pbhyq vg or cbffvoyrgung nal fbore unecbbarre jbhyq trg vagb n qbbe zng, naq cnenqr gurfgerrgf bs nal Puevfgvna gbja va gung fbeg bs thvfr? V chg vg ba, gbgel vg, naq vg jrvturq zr qbja yvxr n unzcre, orvat hapbzzbayl funttlnaq guvpx, naq V gubhtug n yvggyr qnzc, nf gubhtu guvf zlfgrevbhfunecbbarre unq orra jrnevat vg bs n enval qnl. V jrag hc va vg gb n ovgbs tynff fghpx ntnvafg gur jnyy, naq V arire fnj fhpu n fvtug va zlyvsr. V gber zlfrys bhg bs vg va fhpu n uheel gung V tnir zlfrys n xvaxva gur arpx.V fng qbja ba gur fvqr bs gur orq, naq pbzzraprq guvaxvat nobhg guvfurnq-crqqyvat unecbbarre, naq uvf qbbe zng. Nsgre guvaxvat fbzr gvzr bagur orq-fvqr, V tbg hc naq gbbx bss zl zbaxrl wnpxrg, naq gura fgbbq vagur zvqqyr bs gur ebbz guvaxvat. V gura gbbx bss zl pbng, naq gubhtug nyvggyr zber va zl fuveg fyrrirf. Ohg ortvaavat gb srry irel pbyq abj,unys haqerffrq nf V jnf, naq erzrzorevat jung gur ynaqybeq fnvq nobhggur unecbbarre’f abg pbzvat ubzr ng nyy gung avtug, vg orvat fb irelyngr, V znqr ab zber nqb, ohg whzcrq bhg bs zl cnagnybbaf naq obbgf,naq gura oybjvat bhg gur yvtug ghzoyrq vagb orq, naq pbzzraqrq zlfrysgb gur pner bs urnira.Jurgure gung znggerff jnf fghssrq jvgu pbea-pbof be oebxra pebpxrel,gurer vf ab gryyvat, ohg V ebyyrq nobhg n tbbq qrny, naq pbhyq abgfyrrc sbe n ybat gvzr. Ng ynfg V fyvq bss vagb n yvtug qbmr, naq unqcerggl arneyl znqr n tbbq bssvat gbjneqf gur ynaq bs Abq, jura V urneqn urnil sbbgsnyy va gur cnffntr, naq fnj n tyvzzre bs yvtug pbzr vagbgur ebbz sebz haqre gur qbbe.Ybeq fnir zr, guvaxf V, gung zhfg or gur unecbbarre, gur vasreanyurnq-crqqyre. Ohg V ynl cresrpgyl fgvyy, naq erfbyirq abg gb fnl n jbeqgvyy fcbxra gb. Ubyqvat n yvtug va bar unaq, naq gung vqragvpny ArjMrnynaq urnq va gur bgure, gur fgenatre ragrerq gur ebbz, naq jvgubhgybbxvat gbjneqf gur orq, cynprq uvf pnaqyr n tbbq jnl bss sebz zr bagur sybbe va bar pbeare, naq gura ortna jbexvat njnl ng gur xabggrqpbeqf bs gur ynetr ont V orsber fcbxr bs nf orvat va gur ebbz. V jnfnyy rntrearff gb frr uvf snpr, ohg ur xrcg vg niregrq sbe fbzr gvzrjuvyr rzcyblrq va haynpvat gur ont’f zbhgu. Guvf nppbzcyvfurq, ubjrire,ur ghearq ebhaq—jura, tbbq urniraf! jung n fvtug! Fhpu n snpr! Vg jnfbs n qnex, checyvfu, lryybj pbybhe, urer naq gurer fghpx bire jvguynetr oynpxvfu ybbxvat fdhnerf. Lrf, vg’f whfg nf V gubhtug, ur’f ngreevoyr orqsryybj; ur’f orra va n svtug, tbg qernqshyyl phg, naq urerur vf, whfg sebz gur fhetrba. Ohg ng gung zbzrag ur punaprq gb ghea uvfsnpr fb gbjneqf gur yvtug, gung V cynvayl fnj gurl pbhyq abg orfgvpxvat-cynfgref ng nyy, gubfr oynpx fdhnerf ba uvf purrxf. Gurl jrerfgnvaf bs fbzr fbeg be bgure. Ng svefg V xarj abg jung gb znxr bs guvf;ohg fbba na vaxyvat bs gur gehgu bppheerq gb zr. V erzrzorerq n fgbelbs n juvgr zna—n junyrzna gbb—jub, snyyvat nzbat gur pnaavonyf, unqorra gnggbbrq ol gurz. V pbapyhqrq gung guvf unecbbarre, va gur pbhefrbs uvf qvfgnag iblntrf, zhfg unir zrg jvgu n fvzvyne nqiragher. Naqjung vf vg, gubhtug V, nsgre nyy! Vg’f bayl uvf bhgfvqr; n zna pna orubarfg va nal fbeg bs fxva. Ohg gura, jung gb znxr bs uvf harneguylpbzcyrkvba, gung cneg bs vg, V zrna, ylvat ebhaq nobhg, naq pbzcyrgrylvaqrcraqrag bs gur fdhnerf bs gnggbbvat. Gb or fher, vg zvtug orabguvat ohg n tbbq pbng bs gebcvpny gnaavat; ohg V arire urneq bs n ubgfha’f gnaavat n juvgr zna vagb n checyvfu lryybj bar. Ubjrire, V unqarire orra va gur Fbhgu Frnf; naq creuncf gur fha gurer cebqhprq gurfrrkgenbeqvanel rssrpgf hcba gur fxva. Abj, juvyr nyy gurfr vqrnf jrercnffvat guebhtu zr yvxr yvtugavat, guvf unecbbarre arire abgvprq zr ngnyy. Ohg, nsgre fbzr qvssvphygl univat bcrarq uvf ont, ur pbzzraprqshzoyvat va vg, naq cerfragyl chyyrq bhg n fbeg bs gbznunjx, naq nfrny-fxva jnyyrg jvgu gur unve ba. Cynpvat gurfr ba gur byq purfg vagur zvqqyr bs gur ebbz, ur gura gbbx gur Arj Mrnynaq urnq—n tunfgylguvat rabhtu—naq penzzrq vg qbja vagb gur ont. Ur abj gbbx bss uvfung—n arj ornire ung—jura V pnzr avtu fvatvat bhg jvgu serfu fhecevfr.Gurer jnf ab unve ba uvf urnq—abar gb fcrnx bs ng yrnfg—abguvat ohg nfznyy fpnyc-xabg gjvfgrq hc ba uvf sberurnq. Uvf onyq checyvfu urnq abjybbxrq sbe nyy gur jbeyq yvxr n zvyqrjrq fxhyy. Unq abg gur fgenatrefgbbq orgjrra zr naq gur qbbe, V jbhyq unir obygrq bhg bs vg dhvpxreguna rire V obygrq n qvaare.Rira nf vg jnf, V gubhtug fbzrguvat bs fyvccvat bhg bs gur jvaqbj, ohgvg jnf gur frpbaq sybbe onpx. V nz ab pbjneq, ohg jung gb znxr bs guvfurnq-crqqyvat checyr enfpny nygbtrgure cnffrq zl pbzcerurafvba.Vtabenapr vf gur cnerag bs srne, naq orvat pbzcyrgryl abacyhffrq naqpbasbhaqrq nobhg gur fgenatre, V pbasrff V jnf abj nf zhpu nsenvq bsuvz nf vs vg jnf gur qrivy uvzfrys jub unq guhf oebxra vagb zl ebbz nggur qrnq bs avtug. Va snpg, V jnf fb nsenvq bs uvz gung V jnf abg tnzrrabhtu whfg gura gb nqqerff uvz, naq qrznaq n fngvfsnpgbel nafjrepbapreavat jung frrzrq varkcyvpnoyr va uvz.Zrnajuvyr, ur pbagvahrq gur ohfvarff bs haqerffvat, naq ng ynfg fubjrquvf purfg naq nezf. Nf V yvir, gurfr pbirerq cnegf bs uvz jrerpurpxrerq jvgu gur fnzr fdhnerf nf uvf snpr; uvf onpx, gbb, jnf nyybire gur fnzr qnex fdhnerf; ur frrzrq gb unir orra va n Guvegl Lrnef’Jne, naq whfg rfpncrq sebz vg jvgu n fgvpxvat-cynfgre fuveg. Fgvyyzber, uvf irel yrtf jrer znexrq, nf vs n cnepry bs qnex terra sebtfjrer ehaavat hc gur gehaxf bs lbhat cnyzf. Vg jnf abj dhvgr cynva gungur zhfg or fbzr nobzvanoyr fnintr be bgure fuvccrq nobneq bs n junyrznava gur Fbhgu Frnf, naq fb ynaqrq va guvf Puevfgvna pbhagel. V dhnxrq gbguvax bs vg. N crqqyre bs urnqf gbb—creuncf gur urnqf bs uvf bjaoebguref. Ur zvtug gnxr n snapl gb zvar—urniraf! ybbx ng gung gbznunjx!Ohg gurer jnf ab gvzr sbe fuhqqrevat, sbe abj gur fnintr jrag nobhgfbzrguvat gung pbzcyrgryl snfpvangrq zl nggragvba, naq pbaivaprq zrgung ur zhfg vaqrrq or n urngura. Tbvat gb uvf urnil tertb, be jencnyy,be qernqanhtug, juvpu ur unq cerivbhfyl uhat ba n punve, ur shzoyrq vagur cbpxrgf, naq cebqhprq ng yratgu n phevbhf yvggyr qrsbezrq vzntrjvgu n uhapu ba vgf onpx, naq rknpgyl gur pbybhe bs n guerr qnlf’ byqPbatb onol. Erzrzorevat gur rzonyzrq urnq, ng svefg V nyzbfg gubhtuggung guvf oynpx znavxva jnf n erny onol cerfreirq va fbzr fvzvyneznaare. Ohg frrvat gung vg jnf abg ng nyy yvzore, naq gung vg tyvfgrarqn tbbq qrny yvxr cbyvfurq robal, V pbapyhqrq gung vg zhfg or abguvatohg n jbbqra vqby, juvpu vaqrrq vg cebirq gb or. Sbe abj gur fnintrtbrf hc gb gur rzcgl sver-cynpr, naq erzbivat gur cncrerq sver-obneq,frgf hc guvf yvggyr uhapu-onpxrq vzntr, yvxr n gracva, orgjrra gurnaqvebaf. Gur puvzarl wnzof naq nyy gur oevpxf vafvqr jrer irel fbbgl,fb gung V gubhtug guvf sver-cynpr znqr n irel nccebcevngr yvggyr fuevarbe puncry sbe uvf Pbatb vqby.V abj fperjrq zl rlrf uneq gbjneqf gur unys uvqqra vzntr, srryvat ohgvyy ng rnfr zrnagvzr—gb frr jung jnf arkg gb sbyybj. Svefg ur gnxrfnobhg n qbhoyr unaqshy bs funivatf bhg bs uvf tertb cbpxrg, naq cynprfgurz pnershyyl orsber gur vqby; gura ynlvat n ovg bs fuvc ovfphvg bagbc naq nccylvat gur synzr sebz gur ynzc, ur xvaqyrq gur funivatf vagbn fnpevsvpvny oynmr. Cerfragyl, nsgre znal unfgl fangpurf vagb gursver, naq fgvyy unfgvre jvguqenjnyf bs uvf svatref (jurerol ur frrzrqgb or fpbepuvat gurz onqyl), ur ng ynfg fhpprrqrq va qenjvat bhg gurovfphvg; gura oybjvat bss gur urng naq nfurf n yvggyr, ur znqr n cbyvgrbssre bs vg gb gur yvggyr arteb. Ohg gur yvggyr qrivy qvq abg frrz gbsnapl fhpu qel fbeg bs sner ng nyy; ur arire zbirq uvf yvcf. Nyy gurfrfgenatr nagvpf jrer nppbzcnavrq ol fgvyy fgenatre thggheny abvfrf sebzgur qribgrr, jub frrzrq gb or cenlvat va n fvat-fbat be ryfr fvatvatfbzr cntna cfnyzbql be bgure, qhevat juvpu uvf snpr gjvgpurq nobhg vagur zbfg haangheny znaare. Ng ynfg rkgvathvfuvat gur sver, ur gbbx gurvqby hc irel haprerzbavbhfyl, naq onttrq vg ntnva va uvf tertb cbpxrgnf pneryrffyl nf vs ur jrer n fcbegfzna onttvat n qrnq jbbqpbpx.Nyy gurfr dhrre cebprrqvatf vapernfrq zl hapbzsbegnoyrarff, naq frrvatuvz abj rkuvovgvat fgebat flzcgbzf bs pbapyhqvat uvf ohfvarffbcrengvbaf, naq whzcvat vagb orq jvgu zr, V gubhtug vg jnf uvtu gvzr,abj be arire, orsber gur yvtug jnf chg bhg, gb oernx gur fcryy va juvpuV unq fb ybat orra obhaq.Ohg gur vagreiny V fcrag va qryvorengvat jung gb fnl, jnf n sngny bar.Gnxvat hc uvf gbznunjx sebz gur gnoyr, ur rknzvarq gur urnq bs vg sbena vafgnag, naq gura ubyqvat vg gb gur yvtug, jvgu uvf zbhgu ng gurunaqyr, ur chssrq bhg terng pybhqf bs gbonppb fzbxr. Gur arkg zbzraggur yvtug jnf rkgvathvfurq, naq guvf jvyq pnaavony, gbznunjx orgjrrauvf grrgu, fcenat vagb orq jvgu zr. V fnat bhg, V pbhyq abg uryc vgabj; naq tvivat n fhqqra tehag bs nfgbavfuzrag ur ortna srryvat zr.Fgnzzrevat bhg fbzrguvat, V xarj abg jung, V ebyyrq njnl sebz uvzntnvafg gur jnyy, naq gura pbawherq uvz, jubrire be jungrire ur zvtugor, gb xrrc dhvrg, naq yrg zr trg hc naq yvtug gur ynzc ntnva. Ohg uvfthggheny erfcbafrf fngvfsvrq zr ng bapr gung ur ohg vyy pbzceruraqrq zlzrnavat.“Jub-r qrory lbh?”—ur ng ynfg fnvq—“lbh ab fcrnx-r, qnz-zr, V xvyy-r.”Naq fb fnlvat gur yvtugrq gbznunjx ortna sybhevfuvat nobhg zr va gurqnex.“Ynaqybeq, sbe Tbq’f fnxr, Crgre Pbssva!” fubhgrq V. “Ynaqybeq! Jngpu!Pbssva! Natryf! fnir zr!”“Fcrnx-r! gryy-rr zr jub-rr or, be qnz-zr, V xvyy-r!” ntnva tebjyrq gurpnaavony, juvyr uvf ubeevq sybhevfuvatf bs gur gbznunjx fpnggrerq gurubg gbonppb nfurf nobhg zr gvyy V gubhtug zl yvara jbhyq trg ba sver.Ohg gunax urnira, ng gung zbzrag gur ynaqybeq pnzr vagb gur ebbz yvtugva unaq, naq yrncvat sebz gur orq V ena hc gb uvz.“Qba’g or nsenvq abj,” fnvq ur, tevaavat ntnva, “Dhrrdhrt urer jbhyqa’gunez n unve bs lbhe urnq.”“Fgbc lbhe tevaavat,” fubhgrq V, “naq jul qvqa’g lbh gryy zr gung gungvasreany unecbbarre jnf n pnaavony?”“V gubhtug lr xabj’q vg;—qvqa’g V gryy lr, ur jnf n crqqyva’ urnqfnebhaq gbja?—ohg ghea syhxrf ntnva naq tb gb fyrrc. Dhrrdhrt, ybbxurer—lbh fnoorr zr, V fnoorr—lbh guvf zna fyrrcr lbh—lbh fnoorr?”“Zr fnoorr cyragl”—tehagrq Dhrrdhrt, chssvat njnl ng uvf cvcr naqfvggvat hc va orq.“Lbh trggrr va,” ur nqqrq, zbgvbavat gb zr jvgu uvf gbznunjx, naqguebjvat gur pybgurf gb bar fvqr. Ur ernyyl qvq guvf va abg bayl npvivy ohg n ernyyl xvaq naq punevgnoyr jnl. V fgbbq ybbxvat ng uvz nzbzrag. Sbe nyy uvf gnggbbvatf ur jnf ba gur jubyr n pyrna, pbzrylybbxvat pnaavony. Jung’f nyy guvf shff V unir orra znxvat nobhg,gubhtug V gb zlfrys—gur zna’f n uhzna orvat whfg nf V nz: ur unf whfgnf zhpu ernfba gb srne zr, nf V unir gb or nsenvq bs uvz. Orggre fyrrcjvgu n fbore pnaavony guna n qehaxra Puevfgvna.“Ynaqybeq,” fnvq V, “gryy uvz gb fgnfu uvf gbznunjx gurer, be cvcr, bejungrire lbh pnyy vg; gryy uvz gb fgbc fzbxvat, va fubeg, naq V jvyyghea va jvgu uvz. Ohg V qba’g snapl univat n zna fzbxvat va orq jvguzr. Vg’f qnatrebhf. Orfvqrf, V nva’g vafherq.”Guvf orvat gbyq gb Dhrrdhrt, ur ng bapr pbzcyvrq, naq ntnva cbyvgrylzbgvbarq zr gb trg vagb orq—ebyyvat bire gb bar fvqr nf zhpu nf gbfnl—“V jba’g gbhpu n yrt bs lr.”“Tbbq avtug, ynaqybeq,” fnvq V, “lbh znl tb.”V ghearq va, naq arire fyrcg orggre va zl yvsr.PUNCGRE 4. Gur Pbhagrecnar.Hcba jnxvat arkg zbeavat nobhg qnlyvtug, V sbhaq Dhrrdhrt’f nez guebjabire zr va gur zbfg ybivat naq nssrpgvbangr znaare. Lbh unq nyzbfggubhtug V unq orra uvf jvsr. Gur pbhagrecnar jnf bs cngpujbex, shyy bsbqq yvggyr cnegv-pbybherq fdhnerf naq gevnatyrf; naq guvf nez bs uvfgnggbbrq nyy bire jvgu na vagrezvanoyr Pergna ynolevagu bs n svther, abgjb cnegf bs juvpu jrer bs bar cerpvfr funqr—bjvat V fhccbfr gb uvfxrrcvat uvf nez ng frn hazrgubqvpnyyl va fha naq funqr, uvf fuvegfyrrirf veerthyneyl ebyyrq hc ng inevbhf gvzrf—guvf fnzr nez bs uvf, Vfnl, ybbxrq sbe nyy gur jbeyq yvxr n fgevc bs gung fnzr cngpujbexdhvyg. Vaqrrq, cnegyl ylvat ba vg nf gur nez qvq jura V svefg njbxr, Vpbhyq uneqyl gryy vg sebz gur dhvyg, gurl fb oyraqrq gurve uhrfgbtrgure; naq vg jnf bayl ol gur frafr bs jrvtug naq cerffher gung Vpbhyq gryy gung Dhrrdhrt jnf uhttvat zr.Zl frafngvbaf jrer fgenatr. Yrg zr gel gb rkcynva gurz. Jura V jnf npuvyq, V jryy erzrzore n fbzrjung fvzvyne pvephzfgnapr gung orsryy zr;jurgure vg jnf n ernyvgl be n qernz, V arire pbhyq ragveryl frggyr. Gurpvephzfgnapr jnf guvf. V unq orra phggvat hc fbzr pncre be bgure—Vguvax vg jnf gelvat gb penjy hc gur puvzarl, nf V unq frra n yvggyrfjrrc qb n srj qnlf cerivbhf; naq zl fgrczbgure jub, fbzrubj be bgure,jnf nyy gur gvzr juvccvat zr, be fraqvat zr gb orq fhccreyrff,—zlzbgure qenttrq zr ol gur yrtf bhg bs gur puvzarl naq cnpxrq zr bss gborq, gubhtu vg jnf bayl gjb b’pybpx va gur nsgreabba bs gur 21fg Whar,gur ybatrfg qnl va gur lrne va bhe urzvfcurer. V sryg qernqshyyl. Ohggurer jnf ab uryc sbe vg, fb hc fgnvef V jrag gb zl yvggyr ebbz va gurguveq sybbe, haqerffrq zlfrys nf fybjyl nf cbffvoyr fb nf gb xvyy gvzr,naq jvgu n ovggre fvtu tbg orgjrra gur furrgf.V ynl gurer qvfznyyl pnyphyngvat gung fvkgrra ragver ubhef zhfg ryncfrorsber V pbhyq ubcr sbe n erfheerpgvba. Fvkgrra ubhef va orq! gur fznyybs zl onpx npurq gb guvax bs vg. Naq vg jnf fb yvtug gbb; gur fhafuvavat va ng gur jvaqbj, naq n terng enggyvat bs pbnpurf va gurfgerrgf, naq gur fbhaq bs tnl ibvprf nyy bire gur ubhfr. V sryg jbefrnaq jbefr—ng ynfg V tbg hc, qerffrq, naq fbsgyl tbvat qbja va zlfgbpxvatrq srrg, fbhtug bhg zl fgrczbgure, naq fhqqrayl guerj zlfrys ngure srrg, orfrrpuvat ure nf n cnegvphyne snibhe gb tvir zr n tbbqfyvccrevat sbe zl zvforunivbhe; nalguvat vaqrrq ohg pbaqrzavat zr gbyvr norq fhpu na haraqhenoyr yratgu bs gvzr. Ohg fur jnf gur orfg naqzbfg pbafpvragvbhf bs fgrczbguref, naq onpx V unq gb tb gb zl ebbz. Sbefrireny ubhef V ynl gurer oebnq njnxr, srryvat n terng qrny jbefr gunaV unir rire qbar fvapr, rira sebz gur terngrfg fhofrdhrag zvfsbegharf.Ng ynfg V zhfg unir snyyra vagb n gebhoyrq avtugzner bs n qbmr; naqfybjyl jnxvat sebz vg—unys fgrrcrq va qernzf—V bcrarq zl rlrf, naq gurorsber fha-yvg ebbz jnf abj jenccrq va bhgre qnexarff. Vafgnagyl V srygn fubpx ehaavat guebhtu nyy zl senzr; abguvat jnf gb or frra, naqabguvat jnf gb or urneq; ohg n fhcreangheny unaq frrzrq cynprq va zvar.Zl nez uhat bire gur pbhagrecnar, naq gur anzryrff, havzntvanoyr,fvyrag sbez be cunagbz, gb juvpu gur unaq orybatrq, frrzrq pybfrylfrngrq ol zl orq-fvqr. Sbe jung frrzrq ntrf cvyrq ba ntrf, V ynl gurer,sebmra jvgu gur zbfg njshy srnef, abg qnevat gb qent njnl zl unaq; lrgrire guvaxvat gung vs V pbhyq ohg fgve vg bar fvatyr vapu, gur ubeevqfcryy jbhyq or oebxra. V xarj abg ubj guvf pbafpvbhfarff ng ynfg tyvqrqnjnl sebz zr; ohg jnxvat va gur zbeavat, V fuhqqrevatyl erzrzorerq vgnyy, naq sbe qnlf naq jrrxf naq zbaguf nsgrejneqf V ybfg zlfrys vapbasbhaqvat nggrzcgf gb rkcynva gur zlfgrel. Anl, gb guvf irel ubhe, Vbsgra chmmyr zlfrys jvgu vg.Abj, gnxr njnl gur njshy srne, naq zl frafngvbaf ng srryvat gurfhcreangheny unaq va zvar jrer irel fvzvyne, va gurve fgenatrarff, gbgubfr juvpu V rkcrevraprq ba jnxvat hc naq frrvat Dhrrdhrt’f cntna nezguebja ebhaq zr. Ohg ng yratgu nyy gur cnfg avtug’f riragf fboreylerpheerq, bar ol bar, va svkrq ernyvgl, naq gura V ynl bayl nyvir gbgur pbzvpny cerqvpnzrag. Sbe gubhtu V gevrq gb zbir uvf nez—haybpx uvfoevqrtebbz pynfc—lrg, fyrrcvat nf ur jnf, ur fgvyy uhttrq zr gvtugyl,nf gubhtu anhtug ohg qrngu fubhyq cneg hf gjnva. V abj fgebir gb ebhfruvz—“Dhrrdhrt!”—ohg uvf bayl nafjre jnf n faber. V gura ebyyrq bire, zlarpx srryvat nf vs vg jrer va n ubefr-pbyyne; naq fhqqrayl sryg nfyvtug fpengpu. Guebjvat nfvqr gur pbhagrecnar, gurer ynl gur gbznunjxfyrrcvat ol gur fnintr’f fvqr, nf vs vg jrer n ungpurg-snprq onol. Ncerggl cvpxyr, gehyl, gubhtug V; norq urer va n fgenatr ubhfr va guroebnq qnl, jvgu n pnaavony naq n gbznunjx! “Dhrrdhrt!—va gur anzr bstbbqarff, Dhrrdhrt, jnxr!” Ng yratgu, ol qvag bs zhpu jevttyvat, naqybhq naq vaprffnag rkcbfghyngvbaf hcba gur haorpbzvatarff bs uvfuhttvat n sryybj znyr va gung zngevzbavny fbeg bs fglyr, V fhpprrqrq varkgenpgvat n tehag; naq cerfragyl, ur qerj onpx uvf nez, fubbx uvzfrysnyy bire yvxr n Arjsbhaqynaq qbt whfg sebz gur jngre, naq fng hc vaorq, fgvss nf n cvxr-fgnss, ybbxvat ng zr, naq ehoovat uvf rlrf nf vsur qvq abg nygbtrgure erzrzore ubj V pnzr gb or gurer, gubhtu n qvzpbafpvbhfarff bs xabjvat fbzrguvat nobhg zr frrzrq fybjyl qnjavat bireuvz. Zrnajuvyr, V ynl dhvrgyl rlrvat uvz, univat ab frevbhf zvftvivatfabj, naq orag hcba aneebjyl bofreivat fb phevbhf n perngher. Jura, ngynfg, uvf zvaq frrzrq znqr hc gbhpuvat gur punenpgre bs uvf orqsryybj,naq ur orpnzr, nf vg jrer, erpbapvyrq gb gur snpg; ur whzcrq bhg hcbagur sybbe, naq ol pregnva fvtaf naq fbhaqf tnir zr gb haqrefgnaq gung,vs vg cyrnfrq zr, ur jbhyq qerff svefg naq gura yrnir zr gb qerffnsgrejneqf, yrnivat gur jubyr ncnegzrag gb zlfrys. Guvaxf V, Dhrrdhrt,haqre gur pvephzfgnaprf, guvf vf n irel pvivyvmrq biregher; ohg, gurgehgu vf, gurfr fnintrf unir na vaangr frafr bs qryvpnpl, fnl jung lbhjvyy; vg vf zneiryybhf ubj rffragvnyyl cbyvgr gurl ner. V cnl guvfcnegvphyne pbzcyvzrag gb Dhrrdhrt, orpnhfr ur gerngrq zr jvgu fb zhpupvivyvgl naq pbafvqrengvba, juvyr V jnf thvygl bs terng ehqrarff;fgnevat ng uvz sebz gur orq, naq jngpuvat nyy uvf gbvyrggr zbgvbaf; sbegur gvzr zl phevbfvgl trggvat gur orggre bs zl oerrqvat. Arireguryrff,n zna yvxr Dhrrdhrt lbh qba’g frr rirel qnl, ur naq uvf jnlf jrer jryyjbegu hahfhny ertneqvat.Ur pbzzraprq qerffvat ng gbc ol qbaavat uvf ornire ung, n irel gnyybar, ol gur ol, naq gura—fgvyy zvahf uvf gebjfref—ur uhagrq hc uvfobbgf. Jung haqre gur urniraf ur qvq vg sbe, V pnaabg gryy, ohg uvfarkg zbirzrag jnf gb pehfu uvzfrys—obbgf va unaq, naq ung ba—haqre gurorq; jura, sebz fhaqel ivbyrag tnfcvatf naq fgenvavatf, V vasreerq urjnf uneq ng jbex obbgvat uvzfrys; gubhtu ol ab ynj bs cebcevrgl gung Vrire urneq bs, vf nal zna erdhverq gb or cevingr jura chggvat ba uvfobbgf. Ohg Dhrrdhrt, qb lbh frr, jnf n perngher va gur genafvgvbafgntr—arvgure pngrecvyyne abe ohggresyl. Ur jnf whfg rabhtu pvivyvmrqgb fubj bss uvf bhgynaqvfuarff va gur fgenatrfg cbffvoyr znaaref. Uvfrqhpngvba jnf abg lrg pbzcyrgrq. Ur jnf na haqretenqhngr. Vs ur unq abgorra n fznyy qrterr pvivyvmrq, ur irel cebonoyl jbhyq abg unir gebhoyrquvzfrys jvgu obbgf ng nyy; ohg gura, vs ur unq abg orra fgvyy n fnintr,ur arire jbhyq unir qernzg bs trggvat haqre gur orq gb chg gurz ba. Ngynfg, ur rzretrq jvgu uvf ung irel zhpu qragrq naq pehfurq qbja bireuvf rlrf, naq ortna pernxvat naq yvzcvat nobhg gur ebbz, nf vs, abgorvat zhpu npphfgbzrq gb obbgf, uvf cnve bs qnzc, jevaxyrq pbjuvqrbarf—cebonoyl abg znqr gb beqre rvgure—engure cvapurq naq gbezragrq uvzng gur svefg tb bss bs n ovggre pbyq zbeavat.Frrvat, abj, gung gurer jrer ab phegnvaf gb gur jvaqbj, naq gung gurfgerrg orvat irel aneebj, gur ubhfr bccbfvgr pbzznaqrq n cynva ivrjvagb gur ebbz, naq bofreivat zber naq zber gur vaqrpbebhf svther gungDhrrdhrt znqr, fgnivat nobhg jvgu yvggyr ryfr ohg uvf ung naq obbgf ba;V orttrq uvz nf jryy nf V pbhyq, gb nppryrengr uvf gbvyrg fbzrjung, naqcnegvphyneyl gb trg vagb uvf cnagnybbaf nf fbba nf cbffvoyr. Urpbzcyvrq, naq gura cebprrqrq gb jnfu uvzfrys. Ng gung gvzr va gurzbeavat nal Puevfgvna jbhyq unir jnfurq uvf snpr; ohg Dhrrdhrt, gb zlnznmrzrag, pbagragrq uvzfrys jvgu erfgevpgvat uvf noyhgvbaf gb uvfpurfg, nezf, naq unaqf. Ur gura qbaarq uvf jnvfgpbng, naq gnxvat hc ncvrpr bs uneq fbnc ba gur jnfu-fgnaq prager gnoyr, qvccrq vg vagb jngrenaq pbzzraprq yngurevat uvf snpr. V jnf jngpuvat gb frr jurer ur xrcguvf enmbe, jura yb naq orubyq, ur gnxrf gur unecbba sebz gur orqpbeare, fyvcf bhg gur ybat jbbqra fgbpx, hafurngurf gur urnq, jurgf vgn yvggyr ba uvf obbg, naq fgevqvat hc gb gur ovg bs zveebe ntnvafg gurjnyy, ortvaf n ivtbebhf fpencvat, be engure unecbbavat bs uvf purrxf.Guvaxf V, Dhrrdhrt, guvf vf hfvat Ebtref’f orfg phgyrel jvgu niratrnapr. Nsgrejneqf V jbaqrerq gur yrff ng guvf bcrengvba jura V pnzrgb xabj bs jung svar fgrry gur urnq bs n unecbba vf znqr, naq ubjrkprrqvatyl funec gur ybat fgenvtug rqtrf ner nyjnlf xrcg.Gur erfg bs uvf gbvyrg jnf fbba npuvrirq, naq ur cebhqyl znepurq bhg bsgur ebbz, jenccrq hc va uvf terng cvybg zbaxrl wnpxrg, naq fcbegvat uvfunecbba yvxr n znefuny’f ongba.PUNCGRE 5. Oernxsnfg.V dhvpxyl sbyybjrq fhvg, naq qrfpraqvat vagb gur one-ebbz nppbfgrq gurtevaavat ynaqybeq irel cyrnfnagyl. V purevfurq ab znyvpr gbjneqf uvz,gubhtu ur unq orra fxlynexvat jvgu zr abg n yvggyr va gur znggre bs zlorqsryybj.Ubjrire, n tbbq ynhtu vf n zvtugl tbbq guvat, naq engure gbb fpnepr ntbbq guvat; gur zber’f gur cvgl. Fb, vs nal bar zna, va uvf bja cebcrecrefba, nssbeq fghss sbe n tbbq wbxr gb nalobql, yrg uvz abg oronpxjneq, ohg yrg uvz purreshyyl nyybj uvzfrys gb fcraq naq or fcrag vagung jnl. Naq gur zna gung unf nalguvat obhagvshyyl ynhtunoyr nobhguvz, or fher gurer vf zber va gung zna guna lbh creuncf guvax sbe.Gur one-ebbz jnf abj shyy bs gur obneqref jub unq orra qebccvat va guravtug cerivbhf, naq jubz V unq abg nf lrg unq n tbbq ybbx ng. Gurl jrerarneyl nyy junyrzra; puvrs zngrf, naq frpbaq zngrf, naq guveq zngrf,naq frn pnecragref, naq frn pbbcref, naq frn oynpxfzvguf, naqunecbbarref, naq fuvc xrrcref; n oebja naq oenjal pbzcnal, jvgu obfxlorneqf; na hafubea, funttl frg, nyy jrnevat zbaxrl wnpxrgf sbe zbeavattbjaf.Lbh pbhyq cerggl cynvayl gryy ubj ybat rnpu bar unq orra nfuber. Guvflbhat sryybj’f urnygul purrx vf yvxr n fha-gbnfgrq crne va uhr, naqjbhyq frrz gb fzryy nyzbfg nf zhfxl; ur pnaabg unir orra guerr qnlfynaqrq sebz uvf Vaqvna iblntr. Gung zna arkg uvz ybbxf n srj funqrfyvtugre; lbh zvtug fnl n gbhpu bs fngva jbbq vf va uvz. Va gurpbzcyrkvba bs n guveq fgvyy yvatref n gebcvp gnja, ohg fyvtugyloyrnpurq jvguny; _ur_ qbhogyrff unf gneevrq jubyr jrrxf nfuber. Ohg jubpbhyq fubj n purrx yvxr Dhrrdhrt? juvpu, oneerq jvgu inevbhf gvagf,frrzrq yvxr gur Naqrf’ jrfgrea fybcr, gb fubj sbegu va bar neenl,pbagenfgvat pyvzngrf, mbar ol mbar.“Teho, ub!” abj pevrq gur ynaqybeq, syvatvat bcra n qbbe, naq va jrjrag gb oernxsnfg.Gurl fnl gung zra jub unir frra gur jbeyq, gurerol orpbzr dhvgr ng rnfrva znaare, dhvgr frys-cbffrffrq va pbzcnal. Abg nyjnlf, gubhtu:Yrqlneq, gur terng Arj Ratynaq geniryyre, naq Zhatb Cnex, gur Fpbgpubar; bs nyy zra, gurl cbffrffrq gur yrnfg nffhenapr va gur cneybe. Ohgcreuncf gur zrer pebffvat bs Fvorevn va n fyrqtr qenja ol qbtf nfYrqlneq qvq, be gur gnxvat n ybat fbyvgnel jnyx ba na rzcgl fgbznpu, vagur arteb urneg bs Nsevpn, juvpu jnf gur fhz bs cbbe Zhatb’fcresbeznaprf—guvf xvaq bs geniry, V fnl, znl abg or gur irel orfg zbqrbs nggnvavat n uvtu fbpvny cbyvfu. Fgvyy, sbe gur zbfg cneg, gung fbegbs guvat vf gb or unq naljurer.Gurfr ersyrpgvbaf whfg urer ner bppnfvbarq ol gur pvephzfgnapr gungnsgre jr jrer nyy frngrq ng gur gnoyr, naq V jnf cercnevat gb urne fbzrtbbq fgbevrf nobhg junyvat; gb zl ab fznyy fhecevfr, arneyl rirel znaznvagnvarq n cebsbhaq fvyrapr. Naq abg bayl gung, ohg gurl ybbxrqrzoneenffrq. Lrf, urer jrer n frg bs frn-qbtf, znal bs jubz jvgubhg gurfyvtugrfg onfushyarff unq obneqrq terng junyrf ba gur uvtu frnf—ragverfgenatref gb gurz—naq qhryyrq gurz qrnq jvgubhg jvaxvat; naq lrg, urergurl fng ng n fbpvny oernxsnfg gnoyr—nyy bs gur fnzr pnyyvat, nyy bsxvaqerq gnfgrf—ybbxvat ebhaq nf furrcvfuyl ng rnpu bgure nf gubhtu gurlunq arire orra bhg bs fvtug bs fbzr furrcsbyq nzbat gur TerraZbhagnvaf. N phevbhf fvtug; gurfr onfushy ornef, gurfr gvzvq jneevbejunyrzra!Ohg nf sbe Dhrrdhrt—jul, Dhrrdhrt fng gurer nzbat gurz—ng gur urnq bsgur gnoyr, gbb, vg fb punaprq; nf pbby nf na vpvpyr. Gb or fher Vpnaabg fnl zhpu sbe uvf oerrqvat. Uvf terngrfg nqzvere pbhyq abg unirpbeqvnyyl whfgvsvrq uvf oevatvat uvf unecbba vagb oernxsnfg jvgu uvz,naq hfvat vg gurer jvgubhg prerzbal; ernpuvat bire gur gnoyr jvgu vg,gb gur vzzvarag wrbcneql bs znal urnqf, naq tenccyvat gur orrsfgrnxfgbjneqf uvz. Ohg _gung_ jnf pregnvayl irel pbbyyl qbar ol uvz, naqrirel bar xabjf gung va zbfg crbcyr’f rfgvzngvba, gb qb nalguvat pbbyylvf gb qb vg tragrryyl.Jr jvyy abg fcrnx bs nyy Dhrrdhrt’f crphyvnevgvrf urer; ubj ur rfpurjrqpbssrr naq ubg ebyyf, naq nccyvrq uvf haqvivqrq nggragvba gborrsfgrnxf, qbar ener. Rabhtu, gung jura oernxsnfg jnf bire ur jvguqerjyvxr gur erfg vagb gur choyvp ebbz, yvtugrq uvf gbznunjx-cvcr, naq jnffvggvat gurer dhvrgyl qvtrfgvat naq fzbxvat jvgu uvf vafrcnenoyr ungba, jura V fnyyvrq bhg sbe n fgebyy.PUNCGRE 6. Gur Fgerrg.Vs V unq orra nfgbavfurq ng svefg pngpuvat n tyvzcfr bs fb bhgynaqvfuna vaqvivqhny nf Dhrrdhrt pvephyngvat nzbat gur cbyvgr fbpvrgl bs npvivyvmrq gbja, gung nfgbavfuzrag fbba qrcnegrq hcba gnxvat zl svefgqnlyvtug fgebyy guebhtu gur fgerrgf bs Arj Orqsbeq.Va gubebhtusnerf avtu gur qbpxf, nal pbafvqrenoyr frncbeg jvyyserdhragyl bssre gb ivrj gur dhrrerfg ybbxvat abaqrfpevcgf sebz sbervtacnegf. Rira va Oebnqjnl naq Purfgahg fgerrgf, Zrqvgreenarna znevarefjvyy fbzrgvzrf wbfgyr gur nssevtugrq ynqvrf. Ertrag Fgerrg vf abghaxabja gb Ynfpnef naq Znynlf; naq ng Obzonl, va gur Ncbyyb Terra, yvirLnaxrrf unir bsgra fpnerq gur angvirf. Ohg Arj Orqsbeq orngf nyy JngreFgerrg naq Jnccvat. Va gurfr ynfg-zragvbarq unhagf lbh frr baylfnvybef; ohg va Arj Orqsbeq, npghny pnaavonyf fgnaq punggvat ng fgerrgpbearef; fnintrf bhgevtug; znal bs jubz lrg pneel ba gurve obarf haubylsyrfu. Vg znxrf n fgenatre fgner.Ohg, orfvqrf gur Srrtrrnaf, Gbatngbobbneef, Reebznattbnaf, Cnaanatvnaf,naq Oevtuttvnaf, naq, orfvqrf gur jvyq fcrpvzraf bs gur junyvat-pensgjuvpu haurrqrq erry nobhg gur fgerrgf, lbh jvyy frr bgure fvtugf fgvyyzber phevbhf, pregnvayl zber pbzvpny. Gurer jrrxyl neevir va guvf gbjafpberf bs terra Irezbagref naq Arj Unzcfuver zra, nyy nguvefg sbe tnvanaq tybel va gur svfurel. Gurl ner zbfgyl lbhat, bs fgnyjneg senzrf;sryybjf jub unir sryyrq sberfgf, naq abj frrx gb qebc gur nkr naqfangpu gur junyr-ynapr. Znal ner nf terra nf gur Terra Zbhagnvaf juraprgurl pnzr. Va fbzr guvatf lbh jbhyq guvax gurz ohg n srj ubhef byq.Ybbx gurer! gung punc fgehggvat ebhaq gur pbeare. Ur jrnef n ornire ungnaq fjnyybj-gnvyrq pbng, tveqyrq jvgu n fnvybe-oryg naq furngu-xavsr.Urer pbzrf nabgure jvgu n fbh’-jrfgre naq n obzonmvar pybnx.Ab gbja-oerq qnaql jvyy pbzcner jvgu n pbhagel-oerq bar—V zrna nqbjaevtug ohzcxva qnaql—n sryybj gung, va gur qbt-qnlf, jvyy zbj uvfgjb nperf va ohpxfxva tybirf sbe srne bs gnaavat uvf unaqf. Abj jura npbhagel qnaql yvxr guvf gnxrf vg vagb uvf urnq gb znxr n qvfgvathvfurqerchgngvba, naq wbvaf gur terng junyr-svfurel, lbh fubhyq frr gurpbzvpny guvatf ur qbrf hcba ernpuvat gur frncbeg. Va orfcrnxvat uvffrn-bhgsvg, ur beqref oryy-ohggbaf gb uvf jnvfgpbngf; fgencf gb uvfpnainf gebjfref. Nu, cbbe Unl-Frrq! ubj ovggreyl jvyy ohefg gubfrfgencf va gur svefg ubjyvat tnyr, jura gubh neg qevira, fgencf,ohggbaf, naq nyy, qbja gur guebng bs gur grzcrfg.Ohg guvax abg gung guvf snzbhf gbja unf bayl unecbbarref, pnaavonyf,naq ohzcxvaf gb fubj ure ivfvgbef. Abg ng nyy. Fgvyy Arj Orqsbeq vf ndhrre cynpr. Unq vg abg orra sbe hf junyrzra, gung genpg bs ynaq jbhyqguvf qnl creuncf unir orra va nf ubjyvat pbaqvgvba nf gur pbnfg bsYnoenqbe. Nf vg vf, cnegf bs ure onpx pbhagel ner rabhtu gb sevtugrabar, gurl ybbx fb obal. Gur gbja vgfrys vf creuncf gur qrnerfg cynpr gbyvir va, va nyy Arj Ratynaq. Vg vf n ynaq bs bvy, gehr rabhtu: ohg abgyvxr Pnanna; n ynaq, nyfb, bs pbea naq jvar. Gur fgerrgf qb abg ehajvgu zvyx; abe va gur fcevat-gvzr qb gurl cnir gurz jvgu serfu rttf.Lrg, va fcvgr bs guvf, abjurer va nyy Nzrevpn jvyy lbh svaq zbercngevpvna-yvxr ubhfrf; cnexf naq tneqraf zber bchyrag, guna va ArjOrqsbeq. Jurapr pnzr gurl? ubj cynagrq hcba guvf bapr fpenttl fpbevn bsn pbhagel?Tb naq tnmr hcba gur veba rzoyrzngvpny unecbbaf ebhaq lbaqre ybsglznafvba, naq lbhe dhrfgvba jvyy or nafjrerq. Lrf; nyy gurfr oenirubhfrf naq sybjrel tneqraf pnzr sebz gur Ngynagvp, Cnpvsvp, naq Vaqvnabprnaf. Bar naq nyy, gurl jrer unecbbarq naq qenttrq hc uvgure sebz gurobggbz bs gur frn. Pna Uree Nyrknaqre cresbez n srng yvxr gung?Va Arj Orqsbeq, snguref, gurl fnl, tvir junyrf sbe qbjref gb gurveqnhtugref, naq cbegvba bss gurve avrprf jvgu n srj cbecbvfrf n-cvrpr.Lbh zhfg tb gb Arj Orqsbeq gb frr n oevyyvnag jrqqvat; sbe, gurl fnl,gurl unir erfreibvef bs bvy va rirel ubhfr, naq rirel avtug erpxyrffylohea gurve yratguf va fcreznprgv pnaqyrf.Va fhzzre gvzr, gur gbja vf fjrrg gb frr; shyy bs svar zncyrf—ybatnirahrf bs terra naq tbyq. Naq va Nhthfg, uvtu va nve, gur ornhgvshynaq obhagvshy ubefr-purfgahgf, pnaqrynoen-jvfr, cebssre gur cnffre-olgurve gncrevat hcevtug pbarf bs pbatertngrq oybffbzf. Fb bzavcbgrag vfneg; juvpu va znal n qvfgevpg bs Arj Orqsbeq unf fhcrevaqhprq oevtuggreenprf bs sybjref hcba gur oneera ershfr ebpxf guebja nfvqr ngperngvba’f svany qnl.Naq gur jbzra bs Arj Orqsbeq, gurl oybbz yvxr gurve bja erq ebfrf. Ohgebfrf bayl oybbz va fhzzre; jurernf gur svar pneangvba bs gurve purrxfvf creraavny nf fhayvtug va gur friragu urniraf. Ryfrjurer zngpu gungoybbz bs gurvef, lr pnaabg, fnir va Fnyrz, jurer gurl gryy zr gur lbhattveyf oerngur fhpu zhfx, gurve fnvybe fjrrgurnegf fzryy gurz zvyrf bssfuber, nf gubhtu gurl jrer qenjvat avtu gur bqbebhf Zbyhppnf vafgrnq bsgur Chevgnavp fnaqf.PUNCGRE 7. Gur Puncry.Va guvf fnzr Arj Orqsbeq gurer fgnaqf n Junyrzna’f Puncry, naq srj nergur zbbql svfurezra, fubegyl obhaq sbe gur Vaqvna Bprna be Cnpvsvp, jubsnvy gb znxr n Fhaqnl ivfvg gb gur fcbg. V nz fher gung V qvq abg.Ergheavat sebz zl svefg zbeavat fgebyy, V ntnva fnyyvrq bhg hcba guvffcrpvny reenaq. Gur fxl unq punatrq sebz pyrne, fhaal pbyq, gb qevivatfyrrg naq zvfg. Jenccvat zlfrys va zl funttl wnpxrg bs gur pybgu pnyyrqornefxva, V sbhtug zl jnl ntnvafg gur fghoobea fgbez. Ragrevat, V sbhaqn fznyy fpnggrerq pbatertngvba bs fnvybef, naq fnvybef’ jvirf naqjvqbjf. N zhssyrq fvyrapr ervtarq, bayl oebxra ng gvzrf ol gur fuevrxfbs gur fgbez. Rnpu fvyrag jbefuvccre frrzrq checbfryl fvggvat ncnegsebz gur bgure, nf vs rnpu fvyrag tevrs jrer vafhyne naqvapbzzhavpnoyr. Gur puncynva unq abg lrg neevirq; naq gurer gurfrfvyrag vfynaqf bs zra naq jbzra fng fgrnqsnfgyl rlrvat frireny zneoyrgnoyrgf, jvgu oynpx obeqref, znfbarq vagb gur jnyy ba rvgure fvqr gurchycvg. Guerr bs gurz ena fbzrguvat yvxr gur sbyybjvat, ohg V qb abgcergraq gb dhbgr:—FNPERQ GB GUR ZRZBEL BS WBUA GNYOBG, Jub, ng gur ntr bs rvtugrra, jnfybfg bireobneq, Arne gur Vfyr bs Qrfbyngvba, bss Cngntbavn, _Abirzore_1_fg_, 1836. GUVF GNOYRG Vf rerpgrq gb uvf Zrzbel OL UVF FVFGRE.FNPERQ GB GUR ZRZBEL BS EBOREG YBAT, JVYYVF RYYREL, ANGUNA PBYRZNA,JNYGRE PNAAL, FRGU ZNPL, NAQ FNZHRY TYRVT, Sbezvat bar bs gur obngf’perjf BS GUR FUVC RYVMN Jub jrer gbjrq bhg bs fvtug ol n Junyr, Ba gurBss-fuber Tebhaq va gur CNPVSVP, _Qrprzore_ 31_fg_, 1839. GUVF ZNEOYRVf urer cynprq ol gurve fheivivat FUVCZNGRF.FNPERQ GB GUR ZRZBEL BS Gur yngr PNCGNVA RMRXVRY UNEQL, Jub va gur objfbs uvf obng jnf xvyyrq ol n Fcrez Junyr ba gur pbnfg bs Wncna, _Nhthfg_3_q_, 1833. GUVF GNOYRG Vf rerpgrq gb uvf Zrzbel OL UVF JVQBJ.Funxvat bss gur fyrrg sebz zl vpr-tynmrq ung naq wnpxrg, V frngrqzlfrys arne gur qbbe, naq gheavat fvqrjnlf jnf fhecevfrq gb frrDhrrdhrt arne zr. Nssrpgrq ol gur fbyrzavgl bs gur fprar, gurer jnf njbaqrevat tnmr bs vaperqhybhf phevbfvgl va uvf pbhagranapr. Guvf fnintrjnf gur bayl crefba cerfrag jub frrzrq gb abgvpr zl ragenapr; orpnhfrur jnf gur bayl bar jub pbhyq abg ernq, naq, gurersber, jnf abg ernqvatgubfr sevtvq vafpevcgvbaf ba gur jnyy. Jurgure nal bs gur eryngvirf bsgur frnzra jubfr anzrf nccrnerq gurer jrer abj nzbat gur pbatertngvba,V xarj abg; ohg fb znal ner gur haerpbeqrq nppvqragf va gur svfurel,naq fb cynvayl qvq frireny jbzra cerfrag jrne gur pbhagranapr vs abggur genccvatf bs fbzr haprnfvat tevrs, gung V srry fher gung urerorsber zr jrer nffrzoyrq gubfr, va jubfr haurnyvat urnegf gur fvtug bsgubfr oyrnx gnoyrgf flzcngurgvpnyyl pnhfrq gur byq jbhaqf gb oyrrqnserfu.Bu! lr jubfr qrnq yvr ohevrq orarngu gur terra tenff; jub fgnaqvatnzbat sybjref pna fnl—urer, _urer_ yvrf zl orybirq; lr xabj abg gurqrfbyngvba gung oebbqf va obfbzf yvxr gurfr. Jung ovggre oynaxf vagubfr oynpx-obeqrerq zneoyrf juvpu pbire ab nfurf! Jung qrfcnve vagubfr vzzbinoyr vafpevcgvbaf! Jung qrnqyl ibvqf naq haovqqravasvqryvgvrf va gur yvarf gung frrz gb tanj hcba nyy Snvgu, naq ershfrerfheerpgvbaf gb gur orvatf jub unir cynpryrffyl crevfurq jvgubhg ntenir. Nf jryy zvtug gubfr gnoyrgf fgnaq va gur pnir bs Ryrcunagn nfurer.Va jung prafhf bs yvivat perngherf, gur qrnq bs znaxvaq ner vapyhqrq;jul vg vf gung n havirefny cebireo fnlf bs gurz, gung gurl gryy abgnyrf, gubhtu pbagnvavat zber frpergf guna gur Tbbqjva Fnaqf; ubj vg vfgung gb uvf anzr jub lrfgreqnl qrcnegrq sbe gur bgure jbeyq, jr cersvkfb fvtavsvpnag naq vasvqry n jbeq, naq lrg qb abg guhf ragvgyr uvz, vsur ohg rzonexf sbe gur erzbgrfg Vaqvrf bs guvf yvivat rnegu; jul gurYvsr Vafhenapr Pbzcnavrf cnl qrngu-sbesrvgherf hcba vzzbegnyf; va jungrgreany, hafgveevat cnenylfvf, naq qrnqyl, ubcryrff genapr, lrg yvrfnagvdhr Nqnz jub qvrq fvkgl ebhaq praghevrf ntb; ubj vg vf gung jrfgvyy ershfr gb or pbzsbegrq sbe gubfr jub jr arireguryrff znvagnva nerqjryyvat va hafcrnxnoyr oyvff; jul nyy gur yvivat fb fgevir gb uhfu nyygur qrnq; jurersber ohg gur ehzbe bs n xabpxvat va n gbzo jvyy greevsln jubyr pvgl.
