Nyy gurfr guvatf ner abg jvgubhg gurve zrnavatf.Ohg Snvgu, yvxr n wnpxny, srrqf nzbat gur gbzof, naq rira sebz gurfrqrnq qbhogf fur tnguref ure zbfg ivgny ubcr.Vg arrqf fpnepryl gb or gbyq, jvgu jung srryvatf, ba gur rir bs nAnaghpxrg iblntr, V ertneqrq gubfr zneoyr gnoyrgf, naq ol gur zhexlyvtug bs gung qnexrarq, qbyrshy qnl ernq gur sngr bs gur junyrzra jubunq tbar orsber zr. Lrf, Vfuznry, gur fnzr sngr znl or guvar. Ohgfbzrubj V terj zreel ntnva. Qryvtugshy vaqhprzragf gb rzonex, svarpunapr sbe cebzbgvba, vg frrzf—nlr, n fgbir obng jvyy znxr zr navzzbegny ol oerirg. Lrf, gurer vf qrngu va guvf ohfvarff bs junyvat—nfcrrpuyrffyl dhvpx punbgvp ohaqyvat bs n zna vagb Rgreavgl. Ohg junggura? Zrguvaxf jr unir uhtryl zvfgnxra guvf znggre bs Yvsr naq Qrngu.Zrguvaxf gung jung gurl pnyy zl funqbj urer ba rnegu vf zl gehrfhofgnapr. Zrguvaxf gung va ybbxvat ng guvatf fcvevghny, jr ner gbbzhpu yvxr blfgref bofreivat gur fha guebhtu gur jngre, naq guvaxvatgung guvpx jngre gur guvaarfg bs nve. Zrguvaxf zl obql vf ohg gur yrrfbs zl orggre orvat. Va snpg gnxr zl obql jub jvyy, gnxr vg V fnl, vg vfabg zr. Naq gurersber guerr purref sbe Anaghpxrg; naq pbzr n fgbir obngnaq fgbir obql jura gurl jvyy, sbe fgnir zl fbhy, Wbir uvzfrys pnaabg.PUNCGRE 8. Gur Chycvg.V unq abg orra frngrq irel ybat rer n zna bs n pregnva irarenoyrebohfgarff ragrerq; vzzrqvngryl nf gur fgbez-crygrq qbbe syrj onpx hcbanqzvggvat uvz, n dhvpx ertneqshy rlrvat bs uvz ol nyy gur pbatertngvba,fhssvpvragyl nggrfgrq gung guvf svar byq zna jnf gur puncynva. Lrf, vgjnf gur snzbhf Sngure Znccyr, fb pnyyrq ol gur junyrzra, nzbat jubz urjnf n irel terng snibhevgr. Ur unq orra n fnvybe naq n unecbbarre vauvf lbhgu, ohg sbe znal lrnef cnfg unq qrqvpngrq uvf yvsr gb gurzvavfgel. Ng gur gvzr V abj jevgr bs, Sngure Znccyr jnf va gur uneqljvagre bs n urnygul byq ntr; gung fbeg bs byq ntr juvpu frrzf zretvatvagb n frpbaq sybjrevat lbhgu, sbe nzbat nyy gur svffherf bs uvfjevaxyrf, gurer fubar pregnva zvyq tyrnzf bs n arjyl qrirybcvatoybbz—gur fcevat ireqher crrcvat sbegu rira orarngu Sroehnel’f fabj. Abbar univat cerivbhfyl urneq uvf uvfgbel, pbhyq sbe gur svefg gvzrorubyq Sngure Znccyr jvgubhg gur hgzbfg vagrerfg, orpnhfr gurer jrerpregnva ratensgrq pyrevpny crphyvnevgvrf nobhg uvz, vzchgnoyr gb gungnqiraghebhf znevgvzr yvsr ur unq yrq. Jura ur ragrerq V bofreirq gungur pneevrq ab hzoeryyn, naq pregnvayl unq abg pbzr va uvf pneevntr, sbeuvf gnecnhyva ung ena qbja jvgu zrygvat fyrrg, naq uvf terng cvybgpybgu wnpxrg frrzrq nyzbfg gb qent uvz gb gur sybbe jvgu gur jrvtug bsgur jngre vg unq nofbeorq. Ubjrire, ung naq pbng naq birefubrf jrer barol bar erzbirq, naq uhat hc va n yvggyr fcnpr va na nqwnprag pbeare;jura, neenlrq va n qrprag fhvg, ur dhvrgyl nccebnpurq gur chycvg.Yvxr zbfg byq snfuvbarq chycvgf, vg jnf n irel ybsgl bar, naq fvapr nerthyne fgnvef gb fhpu n urvtug jbhyq, ol vgf ybat natyr jvgu gursybbe, frevbhfyl pbagenpg gur nyernql fznyy nern bs gur puncry, gurnepuvgrpg, vg frrzrq, unq npgrq hcba gur uvag bs Sngure Znccyr, naqsvavfurq gur chycvg jvgubhg n fgnvef, fhofgvghgvat n crecraqvphyne fvqrynqqre, yvxr gubfr hfrq va zbhagvat n fuvc sebz n obng ng frn. Gur jvsrbs n junyvat pncgnva unq cebivqrq gur puncry jvgu n unaqfbzr cnve bserq jbefgrq zna-ebcrf sbe guvf ynqqre, juvpu, orvat vgfrys avprylurnqrq, naq fgnvarq jvgu n znubtnal pbybhe, gur jubyr pbagevinapr,pbafvqrevat jung znaare bs puncry vg jnf, frrzrq ol ab zrnaf va onqgnfgr. Unygvat sbe na vafgnag ng gur sbbg bs gur ynqqre, naq jvgu obguunaqf tenfcvat gur beanzragny xabof bs gur zna-ebcrf, Sngure Znccyrpnfg n ybbx hcjneqf, naq gura jvgu n gehyl fnvybe-yvxr ohg fgvyyerireragvny qrkgrevgl, unaq bire unaq, zbhagrq gur fgrcf nf vsnfpraqvat gur znva-gbc bs uvf irffry.Gur crecraqvphyne cnegf bs guvf fvqr ynqqre, nf vf hfhnyyl gur pnfrjvgu fjvatvat barf, jrer bs pybgu-pbirerq ebcr, bayl gur ebhaqf jrer bsjbbq, fb gung ng rirel fgrc gurer jnf n wbvag. Ng zl svefg tyvzcfr bsgur chycvg, vg unq abg rfpncrq zr gung ubjrire pbairavrag sbe n fuvc,gurfr wbvagf va gur cerfrag vafgnapr frrzrq haarprffnel. Sbe V jnf abgcercnerq gb frr Sngure Znccyr nsgre tnvavat gur urvtug, fybjyl gheaebhaq, naq fgbbcvat bire gur chycvg, qryvorengryl qent hc gur ynqqrefgrc ol fgrc, gvyy gur jubyr jnf qrcbfvgrq jvguva, yrnivat uvzvzcertanoyr va uvf yvggyr Dhrorp.V cbaqrerq fbzr gvzr jvgubhg shyyl pbzceruraqvat gur ernfba sbe guvf.Sngure Znccyr rawblrq fhpu n jvqr erchgngvba sbe fvaprevgl naqfnapgvgl, gung V pbhyq abg fhfcrpg uvz bs pbhegvat abgbevrgl ol nalzrer gevpxf bs gur fgntr. Ab, gubhtug V, gurer zhfg or fbzr fboreernfba sbe guvf guvat; shegurezber, vg zhfg flzobyvmr fbzrguvat hafrra.Pna vg or, gura, gung ol gung npg bs culfvpny vfbyngvba, ur fvtavsvrfuvf fcvevghny jvguqenjny sbe gur gvzr, sebz nyy bhgjneq jbeyqyl gvrfnaq pbaarkvbaf? Lrf, sbe ercyravfurq jvgu gur zrng naq jvar bs gurjbeq, gb gur snvgushy zna bs Tbq, guvf chycvg, V frr, vf nfrys-pbagnvavat fgebatubyq—n ybsgl Rueraoervgfgrva, jvgu n creraavnyjryy bs jngre jvguva gur jnyyf.Ohg gur fvqr ynqqre jnf abg gur bayl fgenatr srngher bs gur cynpr,obeebjrq sebz gur puncynva’f sbezre frn-snevatf. Orgjrra gur zneoyrprabgncuf ba rvgure unaq bs gur chycvg, gur jnyy juvpu sbezrq vgf onpxjnf nqbearq jvgu n ynetr cnvagvat ercerfragvat n tnyynag fuvc orngvatntnvafg n greevoyr fgbez bss n yrr pbnfg bs oynpx ebpxf naq fabjloernxref. Ohg uvtu nobir gur sylvat fphq naq qnex-ebyyvat pybhqf, gurersybngrq n yvggyr vfyr bs fhayvtug, sebz juvpu ornzrq sbegu na natry’fsnpr; naq guvf oevtug snpr furq n qvfgvapg fcbg bs enqvnapr hcba gurfuvc’f gbffrq qrpx, fbzrguvat yvxr gung fvyire cyngr abj vafregrq vagbgur Ivpgbel’f cynax jurer Aryfba sryy. “Nu, aboyr fuvc,” gur natryfrrzrq gb fnl, “orng ba, orng ba, gubh aboyr fuvc, naq orne n uneqluryz; sbe yb! gur fha vf oernxvat guebhtu; gur pybhqf ner ebyyvatbss—frerarfg nmher vf ng unaq.”Abe jnf gur chycvg vgfrys jvgubhg n genpr bs gur fnzr frn-gnfgr gungunq npuvrirq gur ynqqre naq gur cvpgher. Vgf cnaryyrq sebag jnf va guryvxrarff bs n fuvc’f oyhss objf, naq gur Ubyl Ovoyr erfgrq ba ncebwrpgvat cvrpr bs fpebyy jbex, snfuvbarq nsgre n fuvc’f svqqyr-urnqrqornx.Jung pbhyq or zber shyy bs zrnavat?—sbe gur chycvg vf rire guvf rnegu’fsberzbfg cneg; nyy gur erfg pbzrf va vgf erne; gur chycvg yrnqf gurjbeyq. Sebz gurapr vg vf gur fgbez bs Tbq’f dhvpx jengu vf svefgqrfpevrq, naq gur obj zhfg orne gur rneyvrfg oehag. Sebz gurapr vg vfgur Tbq bs oerrmrf snve be sbhy vf svefg vaibxrq sbe snibhenoyr jvaqf.Lrf, gur jbeyq’f n fuvc ba vgf cnffntr bhg, naq abg n iblntr pbzcyrgr;naq gur chycvg vf vgf cebj.PUNCGRE 9. Gur Frezba.Sngure Znccyr ebfr, naq va n zvyq ibvpr bs hanffhzvat nhgubevgl beqrerqgur fpnggrerq crbcyr gb pbaqrafr. “Fgneobneq tnatjnl, gurer! fvqr njnlgb yneobneq—yneobneq tnatjnl gb fgneobneq! Zvqfuvcf! zvqfuvcf!”Gurer jnf n ybj ehzoyvat bs urnil frn-obbgf nzbat gur orapurf, naq nfgvyy fyvtugre fuhssyvat bs jbzra’f fubrf, naq nyy jnf dhvrg ntnva, naqrirel rlr ba gur cernpure.Ur cnhfrq n yvggyr; gura xarryvat va gur chycvg’f objf, sbyqrq uvfynetr oebja unaqf npebff uvf purfg, hcyvsgrq uvf pybfrq rlrf, naqbssrerq n cenlre fb qrrcyl qribhg gung ur frrzrq xarryvat naq cenlvatng gur obggbz bs gur frn.Guvf raqrq, va cebybatrq fbyrza gbarf, yvxr gur pbagvahny gbyyvat bs noryy va n fuvc gung vf sbhaqrevat ng frn va n sbt—va fhpu gbarf urpbzzraprq ernqvat gur sbyybjvat ulza; ohg punatvat uvf znaare gbjneqfgur pbapyhqvat fgnamnf, ohefg sbegu jvgu n crnyvat rkhygngvba naq wbl—“Gur evof naq greebef va gur junyr, Nepurq bire zr n qvfzny tybbz,Juvyr nyy Tbq’f fha-yvg jnirf ebyyrq ol, Naq yvsg zr qrrcravat qbjagb qbbz.“V fnj gur bcravat znj bs uryy, Jvgu raqyrff cnvaf naq fbeebjf gurer;Juvpu abar ohg gurl gung srry pna gryy— Bu, V jnf cyhatvat gbqrfcnve.“Va oynpx qvfgerff, V pnyyrq zl Tbq, Jura V pbhyq fpnepr oryvrir uvzzvar, Ur objrq uvf rne gb zl pbzcynvagf— Ab zber gur junyr qvq zrpbasvar.“Jvgu fcrrq ur syrj gb zl eryvrs, Nf ba n enqvnag qbycuva obear;Njshy, lrg oevtug, nf yvtugavat fubar Gur snpr bs zl Qryvirere Tbq.“Zl fbat sbe rire funyy erpbeq Gung greevoyr, gung wblshy ubhe; Vtvir gur tybel gb zl Tbq, Uvf nyy gur zrepl naq gur cbjre.”Arneyl nyy wbvarq va fvatvat guvf ulza, juvpu fjryyrq uvtu nobir gurubjyvat bs gur fgbez. N oevrs cnhfr rafhrq; gur cernpure fybjyl ghearqbire gur yrnirf bs gur Ovoyr, naq ng ynfg, sbyqvat uvf unaq qbja hcbagur cebcre cntr, fnvq: “Orybirq fuvczngrf, pyvapu gur ynfg irefr bs gursvefg puncgre bs Wbanu—‘Naq Tbq unq cercnerq n terng svfu gb fjnyybj hcWbanu.’”“Fuvczngrf, guvf obbx, pbagnvavat bayl sbhe puncgref—sbhe lneaf—vf barbs gur fznyyrfg fgenaqf va gur zvtugl pnoyr bs gur Fpevcgherf. Lrg jungqrcguf bs gur fbhy qbrf Wbanu’f qrrc frnyvar fbhaq! jung n certanagyrffba gb hf vf guvf cebcurg! Jung n aboyr guvat vf gung pnagvpyr vagur svfu’f oryyl! Ubj ovyybj-yvxr naq obvfgrebhfyl tenaq! Jr srry gursybbqf fhetvat bire hf; jr fbhaq jvgu uvz gb gur xrycl obggbz bs gurjngref; frn-jrrq naq nyy gur fyvzr bs gur frn vf nobhg hf! Ohg _jung_vf guvf yrffba gung gur obbx bs Wbanu grnpurf? Fuvczngrf, vg vf ngjb-fgenaqrq yrffba; n yrffba gb hf nyy nf fvashy zra, naq n yrffba gbzr nf n cvybg bs gur yvivat Tbq. Nf fvashy zra, vg vf n yrffba gb hfnyy, orpnhfr vg vf n fgbel bs gur fva, uneq-urnegrqarff, fhqqraylnjnxrarq srnef, gur fjvsg chavfuzrag, ercragnapr, cenlref, naq svanyylgur qryvirenapr naq wbl bs Wbanu. Nf jvgu nyy fvaaref nzbat zra, gurfva bs guvf fba bs Nzvggnv jnf va uvf jvyshy qvfborqvrapr bs gurpbzznaq bs Tbq—arire zvaq abj jung gung pbzznaq jnf, be ubjpbairlrq—juvpu ur sbhaq n uneq pbzznaq. Ohg nyy gur guvatf gung Tbqjbhyq unir hf qb ner uneq sbe hf gb qb—erzrzore gung—naq urapr, urbsgrare pbzznaqf hf guna raqrnibef gb crefhnqr. Naq vs jr borl Tbq, jrzhfg qvfborl bhefryirf; naq vg vf va guvf qvfborlvat bhefryirf, jurervagur uneqarff bs borlvat Tbq pbafvfgf.“Jvgu guvf fva bs qvfborqvrapr va uvz, Wbanu fgvyy shegure sybhgf ngTbq, ol frrxvat gb syrr sebz Uvz. Ur guvaxf gung n fuvc znqr ol zrajvyy pneel uvz vagb pbhagevrf jurer Tbq qbrf abg ervta, ohg bayl gurPncgnvaf bs guvf rnegu. Ur fxhyxf nobhg gur juneirf bs Wbccn, naq frrxfn fuvc gung’f obhaq sbe Gnefuvfu. Gurer yhexf, creuncf, n uvguregbhaurrqrq zrnavat urer. Ol nyy nppbhagf Gnefuvfu pbhyq unir orra abbgure pvgl guna gur zbqrea Pnqvm. Gung’f gur bcvavba bs yrnearq zra.Naq jurer vf Pnqvm, fuvczngrf? Pnqvm vf va Fcnva; nf sne ol jngre, sebzWbccn, nf Wbanu pbhyq cbffvoyl unir fnvyrq va gubfr napvrag qnlf, juragur Ngynagvp jnf na nyzbfg haxabja frn. Orpnhfr Wbccn, gur zbqreaWnssn, fuvczngrf, vf ba gur zbfg rnfgreyl pbnfg bs gur Zrqvgreenarna,gur Flevna; naq Gnefuvfu be Pnqvm zber guna gjb gubhfnaq zvyrf gb gurjrfgjneq sebz gung, whfg bhgfvqr gur Fgenvgf bs Tvoenygne. Frr lr abggura, fuvczngrf, gung Wbanu fbhtug gb syrr jbeyq-jvqr sebz Tbq?Zvfrenoyr zna! Bu! zbfg pbagrzcgvoyr naq jbegul bs nyy fpbea; jvgufybhpurq ung naq thvygl rlr, fxhyxvat sebz uvf Tbq; cebjyvat nzbat gurfuvccvat yvxr n ivyr ohetyne unfgravat gb pebff gur frnf. Fbqvfbeqrerq, frys-pbaqrzavat vf uvf ybbx, gung unq gurer orra cbyvprzrava gubfr qnlf, Wbanu, ba gur zrer fhfcvpvba bs fbzrguvat jebat, unqorra neerfgrq rer ur gbhpurq n qrpx. Ubj cynvayl ur’f n shtvgvir! abonttntr, abg n ung-obk, inyvfr, be pnecrg-ont,—ab sevraqf nppbzcnal uvzgb gur junes jvgu gurve nqvrhk. Ng ynfg, nsgre zhpu qbqtvat frnepu, ursvaqf gur Gnefuvfu fuvc erprvivat gur ynfg vgrzf bs ure pnetb; naq nfur fgrcf ba obneq gb frr vgf Pncgnva va gur pnova, nyy gur fnvybef sbegur zbzrag qrfvfg sebz ubvfgvat va gur tbbqf, gb znex gur fgenatre’frivy rlr. Wbanu frrf guvf; ohg va inva ur gevrf gb ybbx nyy rnfr naqpbasvqrapr; va inva rffnlf uvf jergpurq fzvyr. Fgebat vaghvgvbaf bs gurzna nffher gur znevaref ur pna or ab vaabprag. Va gurve tnzrfbzr ohgfgvyy frevbhf jnl, bar juvfcref gb gur bgure—“Wnpx, ur’f eboorq njvqbj;” be, “Wbr, qb lbh znex uvz; ur’f n ovtnzvfg;” be, “Uneel ynq, Vthrff ur’f gur nqhygrere gung oebxr wnvy va byq Tbzbeenu, be oryvxr,bar bs gur zvffvat zheqreref sebz Fbqbz.” Nabgure ehaf gb ernq gur ovyygung’f fghpx ntnvafg gur fcvyr hcba gur junes gb juvpu gur fuvc vfzbberq, bssrevat svir uhaqerq tbyq pbvaf sbe gur nccerurafvba bs ncneevpvqr, naq pbagnvavat n qrfpevcgvba bs uvf crefba. Ur ernqf, naqybbxf sebz Wbanu gb gur ovyy; juvyr nyy uvf flzcngurgvp fuvczngrf abjpebjq ebhaq Wbanu, cercnerq gb ynl gurve unaqf hcba uvz. Sevtugrq Wbanugerzoyrf, naq fhzzbavat nyy uvf obyqarff gb uvf snpr, bayl ybbxf fbzhpu gur zber n pbjneq. Ur jvyy abg pbasrff uvzfrys fhfcrpgrq; ohg gungvgfrys vf fgebat fhfcvpvba. Fb ur znxrf gur orfg bs vg; naq jura gurfnvybef svaq uvz abg gb or gur zna gung vf nqiregvfrq, gurl yrg uvzcnff, naq ur qrfpraqf vagb gur pnova.“‘Jub’f gurer?’ pevrf gur Pncgnva ng uvf ohfl qrfx, uheevrqyl znxvatbhg uvf cncref sbe gur Phfgbzf—‘Jub’f gurer?’ Bu! ubj gung unezyrffdhrfgvba znatyrf Wbanu! Sbe gur vafgnag ur nyzbfg gheaf gb syrr ntnva.Ohg ur enyyvrf. ‘V frrx n cnffntr va guvf fuvc gb Gnefuvfu; ubj fbbafnvy lr, fve?’ Guhf sne gur ohfl Pncgnva unq abg ybbxrq hc gb Wbanu,gubhtu gur zna abj fgnaqf orsber uvz; ohg ab fbbare qbrf ur urne gungubyybj ibvpr, guna ur qnegf n fpehgvavmvat tynapr. ‘Jr fnvy jvgu gurarkg pbzvat gvqr,’ ng ynfg ur fybjyl nafjrerq, fgvyy vagragyl rlrvatuvz. ‘Ab fbbare, fve?’—‘Fbba rabhtu sbe nal ubarfg zna gung tbrf ncnffratre.’ Un! Wbanu, gung’f nabgure fgno. Ohg ur fjvsgyl pnyyf njnlgur Pncgnva sebz gung fprag. ‘V’yy fnvy jvgu lr,’—ur fnlf,—‘gur cnffntrzbarl ubj zhpu vf gung?—V’yy cnl abj.’ Sbe vg vf cnegvphyneyl jevggra,fuvczngrf, nf vs vg jrer n guvat abg gb or bireybbxrq va guvf uvfgbel,‘gung ur cnvq gur sner gurerbs’ rer gur pensg qvq fnvy. Naq gnxra jvgugur pbagrkg, guvf vf shyy bs zrnavat.“Abj Wbanu’f Pncgnva, fuvczngrf, jnf bar jubfr qvfpreazrag qrgrpgfpevzr va nal, ohg jubfr phcvqvgl rkcbfrf vg bayl va gur craavyrff. Vaguvf jbeyq, fuvczngrf, fva gung cnlf vgf jnl pna geniry serryl, naqjvgubhg n cnffcbeg; jurernf Iveghr, vs n cnhcre, vf fgbccrq ng nyysebagvref. Fb Wbanu’f Pncgnva cercnerf gb grfg gur yratgu bs Wbanu’fchefr, rer ur whqtr uvz bcrayl. Ur punetrf uvz guevpr gur hfhny fhz;naq vg’f nffragrq gb. Gura gur Pncgnva xabjf gung Wbanu vf n shtvgvir;ohg ng gur fnzr gvzr erfbyirf gb uryc n syvtug gung cnirf vgf erne jvgutbyq. Lrg jura Wbanu snveyl gnxrf bhg uvf chefr, cehqrag fhfcvpvbaffgvyy zbyrfg gur Pncgnva. Ur evatf rirel pbva gb svaq n pbhagresrvg.Abg n sbetre, nal jnl, ur zhggref; naq Wbanu vf chg qbja sbe uvfcnffntr. ‘Cbvag bhg zl fgngr-ebbz, Fve,’ fnlf Wbanu abj, ‘V’zgeniry-jrnel; V arrq fyrrc.’ ‘Gubh ybbxrfg yvxr vg,’ fnlf gur Pncgnva,‘gurer’f gul ebbz.’ Wbanu ragref, naq jbhyq ybpx gur qbbe, ohg gur ybpxpbagnvaf ab xrl. Urnevat uvz sbbyvfuyl shzoyvat gurer, gur Pncgnvaynhtuf ybjyl gb uvzfrys, naq zhggref fbzrguvat nobhg gur qbbef bspbaivpgf’ pryyf orvat arire nyybjrq gb or ybpxrq jvguva. Nyy qerffrqnaq qhfgl nf ur vf, Wbanu guebjf uvzfrys vagb uvf oregu, naq svaqf guryvggyr fgngr-ebbz prvyvat nyzbfg erfgvat ba uvf sberurnq. Gur nve vfpybfr, naq Wbanu tnfcf. Gura, va gung pbagenpgrq ubyr, fhax, gbb,orarngu gur fuvc’f jngre-yvar, Wbanu srryf gur urenyqvat cerfragvzragbs gung fgvsyvat ubhe, jura gur junyr funyy ubyq uvz va gur fznyyrfg bsuvf objryf’ jneqf.“Fperjrq ng vgf nkvf ntnvafg gur fvqr, n fjvatvat ynzc fyvtugylbfpvyyngrf va Wbanu’f ebbz; naq gur fuvc, urryvat bire gbjneqf gurjunes jvgu gur jrvtug bs gur ynfg onyrf erprvirq, gur ynzc, synzr naqnyy, gubhtu va fyvtug zbgvba, fgvyy znvagnvaf n creznarag boyvdhvgljvgu ersrerapr gb gur ebbz; gubhtu, va gehgu, vasnyyvoyl fgenvtugvgfrys, vg ohg znqr boivbhf gur snyfr, ylvat yriryf nzbat juvpu vguhat. Gur ynzc nynezf naq sevtugraf Wbanu; nf ylvat va uvf oregu uvfgbezragrq rlrf ebyy ebhaq gur cynpr, naq guvf guhf sne fhpprffshyshtvgvir svaqf ab ershtr sbe uvf erfgyrff tynapr. Ohg gungpbagenqvpgvba va gur ynzc zber naq zber nccnyf uvz. Gur sybbe, gurprvyvat, naq gur fvqr, ner nyy njel. ‘Bu! fb zl pbafpvrapr unatf vazr!’ ur tebnaf, ‘fgenvtug hcjneqf, fb vg oheaf; ohg gur punzoref bs zlfbhy ner nyy va pebbxrqarff!’“Yvxr bar jub nsgre n avtug bs qehaxra eriryel uvrf gb uvf orq, fgvyyerryvat, ohg jvgu pbafpvrapr lrg cevpxvat uvz, nf gur cyhatvatf bs gurEbzna enpr-ubefr ohg fb zhpu gur zber fgevxr uvf fgrry gntf vagb uvz;nf bar jub va gung zvfrenoyr cyvtug fgvyy gheaf naq gheaf va tvqqlnathvfu, cenlvat Tbq sbe naavuvyngvba hagvy gur svg or cnffrq; naq ngynfg nzvq gur juvey bs jbr ur srryf, n qrrc fghcbe fgrnyf bire uvz, nfbire gur zna jub oyrrqf gb qrngu, sbe pbafpvrapr vf gur jbhaq, naqgurer’f anhtug gb fgnhapu vg; fb, nsgre fber jerfgyvatf va uvf oregu,Wbanu’f cebqvtl bs cbaqrebhf zvfrel qentf uvz qebjavat qbja gb fyrrc.“Naq abj gur gvzr bs gvqr unf pbzr; gur fuvc pnfgf bss ure pnoyrf; naqsebz gur qrfregrq junes gur hapurrerq fuvc sbe Gnefuvfu, nyy pnerravat,tyvqrf gb frn. Gung fuvc, zl sevraqf, jnf gur svefg bs erpbeqrqfzhttyref! gur pbagenonaq jnf Wbanu. Ohg gur frn eroryf; ur jvyy abgorne gur jvpxrq oheqra. N qernqshy fgbez pbzrf ba, gur fuvc vf yvxr gboernx. Ohg abj jura gur obngfjnva pnyyf nyy unaqf gb yvtugra ure; juraobkrf, onyrf, naq wnef ner pynggrevat bireobneq; jura gur jvaq vffuevrxvat, naq gur zra ner lryyvat, naq rirel cynax guhaqref jvgugenzcyvat srrg evtug bire Wbanu’f urnq; va nyy guvf entvat ghzhyg,Wbanu fyrrcf uvf uvqrbhf fyrrc. Ur frrf ab oynpx fxl naq entvat frn,srryf abg gur erryvat gvzoref, naq yvggyr urnef ur be urrqf ur gur sneehfu bs gur zvtugl junyr, juvpu rira abj jvgu bcra zbhgu vf pyrnivatgur frnf nsgre uvz. Nlr, fuvczngrf, Wbanu jnf tbar qbja vagb gur fvqrfbs gur fuvc—n oregu va gur pnova nf V unir gnxra vg, naq jnf snfgnfyrrc. Ohg gur sevtugrarq znfgre pbzrf gb uvz, naq fuevrxf va uvf qrnqrne, ‘Jung zrnarfg gubh, B, fyrrcre! nevfr!’ Fgnegyrq sebz uvf yrgunetlol gung qvershy pel, Wbanu fgnttref gb uvf srrg, naq fghzoyvat gb gurqrpx, tenfcf n fuebhq, gb ybbx bhg hcba gur frn. Ohg ng gung zbzrag urvf fcehat hcba ol n cnagure ovyybj yrncvat bire gur ohyjnexf. Jnirnsgre jnir guhf yrncf vagb gur fuvc, naq svaqvat ab fcrrql irag ehafebnevat sber naq nsg, gvyy gur znevaref pbzr avtu gb qebjavat juvyr lrgnsybng. Naq rire, nf gur juvgr zbba fubjf ure nssevtugrq snpr sebz gurfgrrc thyyvrf va gur oynpxarff bireurnq, ntunfg Wbanu frrf gur ernevatobjfcevg cbvagvat uvtu hcjneq, ohg fbba orng qbjajneq ntnva gbjneqf gurgbezragrq qrrc.“Greebef hcba greebef eha fubhgvat guebhtu uvf fbhy. Va nyy uvfpevatvat nggvghqrf, gur Tbq-shtvgvir vf abj gbb cynvayl xabja. Gurfnvybef znex uvz; zber naq zber pregnva tebj gurve fhfcvpvbaf bs uvz,naq ng ynfg, shyyl gb grfg gur gehgu, ol ersreevat gur jubyr znggre gbuvtu Urnira, gurl snyy gb pnfgvat ybgf, gb frr sbe jubfr pnhfr guvfterng grzcrfg jnf hcba gurz. Gur ybg vf Wbanu’f; gung qvfpbirerq, guraubj shevbhfyl gurl zbo uvz jvgu gurve dhrfgvbaf. ‘Jung vf guvarbpphcngvba? Jurapr pbzrfg gubh? Gul pbhagel? Jung crbcyr? Ohg znex abj,zl fuvczngrf, gur orunivbe bs cbbe Wbanu. Gur rntre znevaref ohg nfxuvz jub ur vf, naq jurer sebz; jurernf, gurl abg bayl erprvir na nafjregb gubfr dhrfgvbaf, ohg yvxrjvfr nabgure nafjre gb n dhrfgvba abg chgol gurz, ohg gur hafbyvpvgrq nafjre vf sbeprq sebz Wbanu ol gur unequnaq bs Tbq gung vf hcba uvz.“‘V nz n Uroerj,’ ur pevrf—naq gura—‘V srne gur Ybeq gur Tbq bs Urnirajub ungu znqr gur frn naq gur qel ynaq!’ Srne uvz, B Wbanu? Nlr, jryyzvtugrfg gubh srne gur Ybeq Tbq _gura!_ Fgenvtugjnl, ur abj tbrf ba gbznxr n shyy pbasrffvba; jurerhcba gur znevaref orpnzr zber naq zbernccnyyrq, ohg fgvyy ner cvgvshy. Sbe jura Wbanu, abg lrg fhccyvpngvatTbq sbe zrepl, fvapr ur ohg gbb jryy xarj gur qnexarff bs uvfqrfregf,—jura jergpurq Wbanu pevrf bhg gb gurz gb gnxr uvz naq pnfg uvzsbegu vagb gur frn, sbe ur xarj gung sbe _uvf_ fnxr guvf terng grzcrfgjnf hcba gurz; gurl zrepvshyyl ghea sebz uvz, naq frrx ol bgure zrnafgb fnir gur fuvc. Ohg nyy va inva; gur vaqvtanag tnyr ubjyf ybhqre;gura, jvgu bar unaq envfrq vaibxvatyl gb Tbq, jvgu gur bgure gurl abghaeryhpgnagyl ynl ubyq bs Wbanu.“Naq abj orubyq Wbanu gnxra hc nf na napube naq qebccrq vagb gur frn;jura vafgnagyl na bvyl pnyzarff sybngf bhg sebz gur rnfg, naq gur frnvf fgvyy, nf Wbanu pneevrf qbja gur tnyr jvgu uvz, yrnivat fzbbgu jngreoruvaq. Ur tbrf qbja va gur juveyvat urneg bs fhpu n znfgreyrffpbzzbgvba gung ur fpnepr urrqf gur zbzrag jura ur qebcf frrguvat vagbgur lnjavat wnjf njnvgvat uvz; naq gur junyr fubbgf-gb nyy uvf vibelgrrgu, yvxr fb znal juvgr obygf, hcba uvf cevfba. Gura Wbanu cenlrqhagb gur Ybeq bhg bs gur svfu’f oryyl. Ohg bofreir uvf cenlre, naqyrnea n jrvtugl yrffba. Sbe fvashy nf ur vf, Wbanu qbrf abg jrrc naqjnvy sbe qverpg qryvirenapr. Ur srryf gung uvf qernqshy chavfuzrag vfwhfg. Ur yrnirf nyy uvf qryvirenapr gb Tbq, pbagragvat uvzfrys jvguguvf, gung fcvgr bs nyy uvf cnvaf naq cnatf, ur jvyy fgvyy ybbx gbjneqfUvf ubyl grzcyr. Naq urer, fuvczngrf, vf gehr naq snvgushy ercragnapr;abg pynzbebhf sbe cneqba, ohg tengrshy sbe chavfuzrag. Naq ubj cyrnfvatgb Tbq jnf guvf pbaqhpg va Wbanu, vf fubja va gur riraghny qryvirenaprbs uvz sebz gur frn naq gur junyr. Fuvczngrf, V qb abg cynpr Wbanuorsber lbh gb or pbcvrq sbe uvf fva ohg V qb cynpr uvz orsber lbh nf nzbqry sbe ercragnapr. Fva abg; ohg vs lbh qb, gnxr urrq gb ercrag bs vgyvxr Wbanu.”Juvyr ur jnf fcrnxvat gurfr jbeqf, gur ubjyvat bs gur fuevrxvat,fynagvat fgbez jvgubhg frrzrq gb nqq arj cbjre gb gur cernpure, jub,jura qrfpevovat Wbanu’f frn-fgbez, frrzrq gbffrq ol n fgbez uvzfrys.Uvf qrrc purfg urnirq nf jvgu n tebhaq-fjryy; uvf gbffrq nezf frrzrqgur jneevat ryrzragf ng jbex; naq gur guhaqref gung ebyyrq njnl sebzbss uvf fjnegul oebj, naq gur yvtug yrncvat sebz uvf rlr, znqr nyy uvffvzcyr urneref ybbx ba uvz jvgu n dhvpx srne gung jnf fgenatr gb gurz.Gurer abj pnzr n yhyy va uvf ybbx, nf ur fvyragyl ghearq bire guryrnirf bs gur Obbx bapr zber; naq, ng ynfg, fgnaqvat zbgvbayrff, jvgupybfrq rlrf, sbe gur zbzrag, frrzrq pbzzhavat jvgu Tbq naq uvzfrys.Ohg ntnva ur yrnarq bire gbjneqf gur crbcyr, naq objvat uvf urnq ybjyl,jvgu na nfcrpg bs gur qrrcrfg lrg znayvrfg uhzvyvgl, ur fcnxr gurfrjbeqf:“Fuvczngrf, Tbq unf ynvq ohg bar unaq hcba lbh; obgu uvf unaqf cerffhcba zr. V unir ernq lr ol jung zhexl yvtug znl or zvar gur yrffba gungWbanu grnpurf gb nyy fvaaref; naq gurersber gb lr, naq fgvyy zber gbzr, sbe V nz n terngre fvaare guna lr. Naq abj ubj tynqyl jbhyq V pbzrqbja sebz guvf znfg-urnq naq fvg ba gur ungpurf gurer jurer lbh fvg,naq yvfgra nf lbh yvfgra, juvyr fbzr bar bs lbh ernqf _zr_ gung bgurenaq zber njshy yrffba juvpu Wbanu grnpurf gb _zr_, nf n cvybg bs guryvivat Tbq. Ubj orvat na nabvagrq cvybg-cebcurg, be fcrnxre bs gehrguvatf, naq ovqqra ol gur Ybeq gb fbhaq gubfr hajrypbzr gehguf va gurrnef bs n jvpxrq Avariru, Wbanu, nccnyyrq ng gur ubfgvyvgl ur fubhyqenvfr, syrq sebz uvf zvffvba, naq fbhtug gb rfpncr uvf qhgl naq uvf Tbqol gnxvat fuvc ng Wbccn. Ohg Tbq vf rireljurer; Gnefuvfu ur arireernpurq. Nf jr unir frra, Tbq pnzr hcba uvz va gur junyr, naq fjnyybjrquvz qbja gb yvivat thysf bs qbbz, naq jvgu fjvsg fynagvatf gber uvznybat ‘vagb gur zvqfg bs gur frnf,’ jurer gur rqqlvat qrcguf fhpxrq uvzgra gubhfnaq sngubzf qbja, naq ‘gur jrrqf jrer jenccrq nobhg uvf urnq,’naq nyy gur jngrel jbeyq bs jbr objyrq bire uvz. Lrg rira gura orlbaqgur ernpu bs nal cyhzzrg—‘bhg bs gur oryyl bs uryy’—jura gur junyrtebhaqrq hcba gur bprna’f hgzbfg obarf, rira gura, Tbq urneq gurrathycurq, ercragvat cebcurg jura ur pevrq. Gura Tbq fcnxr hagb gursvfu; naq sebz gur fuhqqrevat pbyq naq oynpxarff bs gur frn, gur junyrpnzr oerrpuvat hc gbjneqf gur jnez naq cyrnfnag fha, naq nyy gurqryvtugf bs nve naq rnegu; naq ‘ibzvgrq bhg Wbanu hcba gur qel ynaq;’jura gur jbeq bs gur Ybeq pnzr n frpbaq gvzr; naq Wbanu, oehvfrq naqorngra—uvf rnef, yvxr gjb frn-furyyf, fgvyy zhygvghqvabhfyl zhezhevatbs gur bprna—Wbanu qvq gur Nyzvtugl’f ovqqvat. Naq jung jnf gung,fuvczngrf? Gb cernpu gur Gehgu gb gur snpr bs Snyfrubbq! Gung jnf vg!“Guvf, fuvczngrf, guvf vf gung bgure yrffba; naq jbr gb gung cvybg bsgur yvivat Tbq jub fyvtugf vg. Jbr gb uvz jubz guvf jbeyq punezf sebzTbfcry qhgl! Jbr gb uvz jub frrxf gb cbhe bvy hcba gur jngref jura Tbqunf oerjrq gurz vagb n tnyr! Jbr gb uvz jub frrxf gb cyrnfr engure gunagb nccny! Jbr gb uvz jubfr tbbq anzr vf zber gb uvz guna tbbqarff! Jbrgb uvz jub, va guvf jbeyq, pbhegf abg qvfubabe! Jbr gb uvz jub jbhyqabg or gehr, rira gubhtu gb or snyfr jrer fnyingvba! Lrn, jbr gb uvzjub, nf gur terng Cvybg Cnhy unf vg, juvyr cernpuvat gb bguref vfuvzfrys n pnfgnjnl!”Ur qebccrq naq sryy njnl sebz uvzfrys sbe n zbzrag; gura yvsgvat uvfsnpr gb gurz ntnva, fubjrq n qrrc wbl va uvf rlrf, nf ur pevrq bhg jvgun urnirayl raguhfvnfz,—“Ohg bu! fuvczngrf! ba gur fgneobneq unaq bsrirel jbr, gurer vf n fher qryvtug; naq uvture gur gbc bs gung qryvtug,guna gur obggbz bs gur jbr vf qrrc. Vf abg gur znva-gehpx uvture gunagur xryfba vf ybj? Qryvtug vf gb uvz—n sne, sne hcjneq, naq vajneqqryvtug—jub ntnvafg gur cebhq tbqf naq pbzzbqberf bs guvf rnegu, rirefgnaqf sbegu uvf bja varkbenoyr frys. Qryvtug vf gb uvz jubfr fgebatnezf lrg fhccbeg uvz, jura gur fuvc bs guvf onfr gernpurebhf jbeyq unftbar qbja orarngu uvz. Qryvtug vf gb uvz, jub tvirf ab dhnegre va gurgehgu, naq xvyyf, oheaf, naq qrfgeblf nyy fva gubhtu ur cyhpx vg bhgsebz haqre gur eborf bs Frangbef naq Whqtrf. Qryvtug,—gbc-tnyynagqryvtug vf gb uvz, jub npxabjyrqtrf ab ynj be ybeq, ohg gur Ybeq uvfTbq, naq vf bayl n cngevbg gb urnira. Qryvtug vf gb uvz, jubz nyy gurjnirf bs gur ovyybjf bs gur frnf bs gur obvfgrebhf zbo pna arire funxrsebz guvf fher Xrry bs gur Ntrf. Naq rgreany qryvtug naq qryvpvbhfarffjvyy or uvf, jub pbzvat gb ynl uvz qbja, pna fnl jvgu uvf svanyoerngu—B Sngure!—puvrsyl xabja gb zr ol Gul ebq—zbegny be vzzbegny,urer V qvr. V unir fgevira gb or Guvar, zber guna gb or guvf jbeyq’f,be zvar bja. Lrg guvf vf abguvat: V yrnir rgreavgl gb Gurr; sbe jung vfzna gung ur fubhyq yvir bhg gur yvsrgvzr bs uvf Tbq?”Ur fnvq ab zber, ohg fybjyl jnivat n orarqvpgvba, pbirerq uvf snpr jvguuvf unaqf, naq fb erznvarq xarryvat, gvyy nyy gur crbcyr unq qrcnegrq,naq ur jnf yrsg nybar va gur cynpr.PUNCGRE 10. N Obfbz Sevraq.Ergheavat gb gur Fcbhgre-Vaa sebz gur Puncry, V sbhaq Dhrrdhrt gurerdhvgr nybar; ur univat yrsg gur Puncry orsber gur orarqvpgvba fbzrgvzr. Ur jnf fvggvat ba n orapu orsber gur sver, jvgu uvf srrg ba gurfgbir urnegu, naq va bar unaq jnf ubyqvat pybfr hc gb uvf snpr gungyvggyr arteb vqby bs uvf; crrevat uneq vagb vgf snpr, naq jvgu nwnpx-xavsr tragyl juvggyvat njnl ng vgf abfr, zrnajuvyr uhzzvat gbuvzfrys va uvf urnguravfu jnl.Ohg orvat abj vagreehcgrq, ur chg hc gur vzntr; naq cerggl fbba, tbvatgb gur gnoyr, gbbx hc n ynetr obbx gurer, naq cynpvat vg ba uvf yncortna pbhagvat gur cntrf jvgu qryvorengr erthynevgl; ng rirel svsgvrgucntr—nf V snapvrq—fgbccvat n zbzrag, ybbxvat inpnagyl nebhaq uvz, naqtvivat hggrenapr gb n ybat-qenja thetyvat juvfgyr bs nfgbavfuzrag. Urjbhyq gura ortva ntnva ng gur arkg svsgl; frrzvat gb pbzzrapr ng ahzorebar rnpu gvzr, nf gubhtu ur pbhyq abg pbhag zber guna svsgl, naq vg jnfbayl ol fhpu n ynetr ahzore bs svsgvrf orvat sbhaq gbtrgure, gung uvfnfgbavfuzrag ng gur zhygvghqr bs cntrf jnf rkpvgrq.Jvgu zhpu vagrerfg V fng jngpuvat uvz. Fnintr gubhtu ur jnf, naquvqrbhfyl zneerq nobhg gur snpr—ng yrnfg gb zl gnfgr—uvf pbhagranaprlrg unq n fbzrguvat va vg juvpu jnf ol ab zrnaf qvfnterrnoyr. Lbhpnaabg uvqr gur fbhy. Guebhtu nyy uvf harneguyl gnggbbvatf, V gubhtug Vfnj gur genprf bs n fvzcyr ubarfg urneg; naq va uvf ynetr, qrrc rlrf,svrel oynpx naq obyq, gurer frrzrq gbxraf bs n fcvevg gung jbhyq qner ngubhfnaq qrivyf. Naq orfvqrf nyy guvf, gurer jnf n pregnva ybsglornevat nobhg gur Cntna, juvpu rira uvf hapbhguarff pbhyq abgnygbtrgure znvz. Ur ybbxrq yvxr n zna jub unq arire pevatrq naq arireunq unq n perqvgbe. Jurgure vg jnf, gbb, gung uvf urnq orvat funirq,uvf sberurnq jnf qenja bhg va serre naq oevtugre eryvrs, naq ybbxrqzber rkcnafvir guna vg bgurejvfr jbhyq, guvf V jvyy abg iragher gbqrpvqr; ohg pregnva vg jnf uvf urnq jnf cuerabybtvpnyyl na rkpryyragbar. Vg znl frrz evqvphybhf, ohg vg erzvaqrq zr bs Trareny Jnfuvatgba’furnq, nf frra va gur cbchyne ohfgf bs uvz. Vg unq gur fnzr ybaterthyneyl tenqrq ergerngvat fybcr sebz nobir gur oebjf, juvpu jreryvxrjvfr irel cebwrpgvat, yvxr gjb ybat cebzbagbevrf guvpxyl jbbqrq bagbc. Dhrrdhrt jnf Trbetr Jnfuvatgba pnaavonyvfgvpnyyl qrirybcrq.Juvyfg V jnf guhf pybfryl fpnaavat uvz, unys-cergraqvat zrnajuvyr gb orybbxvat bhg ng gur fgbez sebz gur pnfrzrag, ur arire urrqrq zlcerfrapr, arire gebhoyrq uvzfrys jvgu fb zhpu nf n fvatyr tynapr; ohgnccrnerq jubyyl bpphcvrq jvgu pbhagvat gur cntrf bs gur zneiryybhfobbx. Pbafvqrevat ubj fbpvnoyl jr unq orra fyrrcvat gbtrgure gur avtugcerivbhf, naq rfcrpvnyyl pbafvqrevat gur nssrpgvbangr nez V unq sbhaqguebja bire zr hcba jnxvat va gur zbeavat, V gubhtug guvf vaqvssreraprbs uvf irel fgenatr. Ohg fnintrf ner fgenatr orvatf; ng gvzrf lbh qbabg xabj rknpgyl ubj gb gnxr gurz. Ng svefg gurl ner birenjvat; gurvepnyz frys-pbyyrpgrqarff bs fvzcyvpvgl frrzf n Fbpengvp jvfqbz. V unqabgvprq nyfb gung Dhrrdhrt arire pbafbegrq ng nyy, be ohg irel yvggyr,jvgu gur bgure frnzra va gur vaa. Ur znqr ab nqinaprf jungrire;nccrnerq gb unir ab qrfver gb raynetr gur pvepyr bs uvf npdhnvagnaprf.Nyy guvf fgehpx zr nf zvtugl fvathyne; lrg, hcba frpbaq gubhtugf, gurerjnf fbzrguvat nyzbfg fhoyvzr va vg. Urer jnf n zna fbzr gjragl gubhfnaqzvyrf sebz ubzr, ol gur jnl bs Pncr Ubea, gung vf—juvpu jnf gur bayljnl ur pbhyq trg gurer—guebja nzbat crbcyr nf fgenatr gb uvz nf gubhtuur jrer va gur cynarg Whcvgre; naq lrg ur frrzrq ragveryl ng uvf rnfr;cerfreivat gur hgzbfg freravgl; pbagrag jvgu uvf bja pbzcnavbafuvc;nyjnlf rdhny gb uvzfrys. Fheryl guvf jnf n gbhpu bs svar cuvybfbcul;gubhtu ab qbhog ur unq arire urneq gurer jnf fhpu n guvat nf gung. Ohg,creuncf, gb or gehr cuvybfbcuref, jr zbegnyf fubhyq abg or pbafpvbhf bsfb yvivat be fb fgevivat. Fb fbba nf V urne gung fhpu be fhpu n znatvirf uvzfrys bhg sbe n cuvybfbcure, V pbapyhqr gung, yvxr gurqlfcrcgvp byq jbzna, ur zhfg unir “oebxra uvf qvtrfgre.”Nf V fng gurer va gung abj ybaryl ebbz; gur sver oheavat ybj, va gungzvyq fgntr jura, nsgre vgf svefg vagrafvgl unf jnezrq gur nve, vg gurabayl tybjf gb or ybbxrq ng; gur riravat funqrf naq cunagbzf tngurevatebhaq gur pnfrzragf, naq crrevat va hcba hf fvyrag, fbyvgnel gjnva; gurfgbez obbzvat jvgubhg va fbyrza fjryyf; V ortna gb or frafvoyr bsfgenatr srryvatf. V sryg n zrygvat va zr. Ab zber zl fcyvagrerq urnegnaq znqqrarq unaq jrer ghearq ntnvafg gur jbysvfu jbeyq. Guvf fbbguvatfnintr unq erqrrzrq vg. Gurer ur fng, uvf irel vaqvssrerapr fcrnxvat nangher va juvpu gurer yhexrq ab pvivyvmrq ulcbpevfvrf naq oynaqqrprvgf. Jvyq ur jnf; n irel fvtug bs fvtugf gb frr; lrg V ortna gbsrry zlfrys zlfgrevbhfyl qenja gbjneqf uvz. Naq gubfr fnzr guvatf gungjbhyq unir ercryyrq zbfg bguref, gurl jrer gur irel zntargf gung guhfqerj zr. V’yy gel n cntna sevraq, gubhtug V, fvapr Puevfgvna xvaqarffunf cebirq ohg ubyybj pbhegrfl. V qerj zl orapu arne uvz, naq znqr fbzrsevraqyl fvtaf naq uvagf, qbvat zl orfg gb gnyx jvgu uvz zrnajuvyr. Ngsvefg ur yvggyr abgvprq gurfr nqinaprf; ohg cerfragyl, hcba zlersreevat gb uvf ynfg avtug’f ubfcvgnyvgvrf, ur znqr bhg gb nfx zrjurgure jr jrer ntnva gb or orqsryybjf. V gbyq uvz lrf; jurerng Vgubhtug ur ybbxrq cyrnfrq, creuncf n yvggyr pbzcyvzragrq.Jr gura ghearq bire gur obbx gbtrgure, naq V raqrniberq gb rkcynva gbuvz gur checbfr bs gur cevagvat, naq gur zrnavat bs gur srj cvpgherfgung jrer va vg. Guhf V fbba ratntrq uvf vagrerfg; naq sebz gung jrjrag gb wnoorevat gur orfg jr pbhyq nobhg gur inevbhf bhgre fvtugf gbor frra va guvf snzbhf gbja. Fbba V cebcbfrq n fbpvny fzbxr; naq,cebqhpvat uvf cbhpu naq gbznunjx, ur dhvrgyl bssrerq zr n chss. Naqgura jr fng rkpunatvat chssf sebz gung jvyq cvcr bs uvf, naq xrrcvat vgerthyneyl cnffvat orgjrra hf.Vs gurer lrg yhexrq nal vpr bs vaqvssrerapr gbjneqf zr va gur Cntna’foernfg, guvf cyrnfnag, travny fzbxr jr unq, fbba gunjrq vg bhg, naqyrsg hf pebavrf. Ur frrzrq gb gnxr gb zr dhvgr nf anghenyyl naqhaovqqrayl nf V gb uvz; naq jura bhe fzbxr jnf bire, ur cerffrq uvfsberurnq ntnvafg zvar, pynfcrq zr ebhaq gur jnvfg, naq fnvq gunguraprsbegu jr jrer zneevrq; zrnavat, va uvf pbhagel’f cuenfr, gung jrjrer obfbz sevraqf; ur jbhyq tynqyl qvr sbe zr, vs arrq fubhyq or. Va npbhagelzna, guvf fhqqra synzr bs sevraqfuvc jbhyq unir frrzrq sne gbbcerzngher, n guvat gb or zhpu qvfgehfgrq; ohg va guvf fvzcyr fnintrgubfr byq ehyrf jbhyq abg nccyl.Nsgre fhccre, naq nabgure fbpvny pung naq fzbxr, jr jrag gb bhe ebbzgbtrgure. Ur znqr zr n cerfrag bs uvf rzonyzrq urnq; gbbx bhg uvfrabezbhf gbonppb jnyyrg, naq tebcvat haqre gur gbonppb, qerj bhg fbzrguvegl qbyynef va fvyire; gura fcernqvat gurz ba gur gnoyr, naqzrpunavpnyyl qvivqvat gurz vagb gjb rdhny cbegvbaf, chfurq bar bs gurzgbjneqf zr, naq fnvq vg jnf zvar. V jnf tbvat gb erzbafgengr; ohg urfvyraprq zr ol cbhevat gurz vagb zl gebjfref’ cbpxrgf. V yrg gurz fgnl.Ur gura jrag nobhg uvf riravat cenlref, gbbx bhg uvf vqby, naq erzbirqgur cncre sverobneq. Ol pregnva fvtaf naq flzcgbzf, V gubhtug ur frrzrqnakvbhf sbe zr gb wbva uvz; ohg jryy xabjvat jung jnf gb sbyybj, Vqryvorengrq n zbzrag jurgure, va pnfr ur vaivgrq zr, V jbhyq pbzcyl bebgurejvfr.V jnf n tbbq Puevfgvna; obea naq oerq va gur obfbz bs gur vasnyyvoyrCerfolgrevna Puhepu. Ubj gura pbhyq V havgr jvgu guvf jvyq vqbyngbe vajbefuvccvat uvf cvrpr bs jbbq? Ohg jung vf jbefuvc? gubhtug V. Qb lbhfhccbfr abj, Vfuznry, gung gur zntanavzbhf Tbq bs urnira naqrnegu—cntnaf naq nyy vapyhqrq—pna cbffvoyl or wrnybhf bs navafvtavsvpnag ovg bs oynpx jbbq? Vzcbffvoyr! Ohg jung vf jbefuvc?—gb qbgur jvyy bs Tbq—_gung_ vf jbefuvc. Naq jung vf gur jvyy bs Tbq?—gb qbgb zl sryybj zna jung V jbhyq unir zl sryybj zna gb qb gb zr—_gung_ vfgur jvyy bs Tbq. Abj, Dhrrdhrt vf zl sryybj zna. Naq jung qb V jvfugung guvf Dhrrdhrt jbhyq qb gb zr? Jul, havgr jvgu zr va zl cnegvphyneCerfolgrevna sbez bs jbefuvc. Pbafrdhragyl, V zhfg gura havgr jvgu uvzva uvf; retb, V zhfg ghea vqbyngbe. Fb V xvaqyrq gur funivatf; urycrqcebc hc gur vaabprag yvggyr vqby; bssrerq uvz oheag ovfphvg jvguDhrrdhrt; fnynzrq orsber uvz gjvpr be guevpr; xvffrq uvf abfr; naq gungqbar, jr haqerffrq naq jrag gb orq, ng crnpr jvgu bhe bja pbafpvraprfnaq nyy gur jbeyq. Ohg jr qvq abg tb gb fyrrc jvgubhg fbzr yvggyr pung.Ubj vg vf V xabj abg; ohg gurer vf ab cynpr yvxr n orq sbe pbasvqragvnyqvfpybfherf orgjrra sevraqf. Zna naq jvsr, gurl fnl, gurer bcra gurirel obggbz bs gurve fbhyf gb rnpu bgure; naq fbzr byq pbhcyrf bsgrayvr naq pung bire byq gvzrf gvyy arneyl zbeavat. Guhf, gura, va bheurnegf’ ubarlzbba, ynl V naq Dhrrdhrt—n pbfl, ybivat cnve.PUNCGRE 11. Avtugtbja.Jr unq ynva guhf va orq, punggvat naq anccvat ng fubeg vagreinyf, naqDhrrdhrt abj naq gura nssrpgvbangryl guebjvat uvf oebja gnggbbrq yrtfbire zvar, naq gura qenjvat gurz onpx; fb ragveryl fbpvnoyr naq serrnaq rnfl jrer jr; jura, ng ynfg, ol ernfba bs bhe pbasnohyngvbaf, jungyvggyr anccvfuarff erznvarq va hf nygbtrgure qrcnegrq, naq jr sryg yvxrtrggvat hc ntnva, gubhtu qnl-oernx jnf lrg fbzr jnl qbja gur shgher.Lrf, jr orpnzr irel jnxrshy; fb zhpu fb gung bhe erphzorag cbfvgvbaortna gb tebj jrnevfbzr, naq ol yvggyr naq yvggyr jr sbhaq bhefryirffvggvat hc; gur pybgurf jryy ghpxrq nebhaq hf, yrnavat ntnvafg gururnq-obneq jvgu bhe sbhe xarrf qenja hc pybfr gbtrgure, naq bhe gjbabfrf oraqvat bire gurz, nf vs bhe xarrcnaf jrer jnezvat-cnaf. Jr srygirel avpr naq faht, gur zber fb fvapr vg jnf fb puvyyl bhg bs qbbef;vaqrrq bhg bs orq-pybgurf gbb, frrvat gung gurer jnf ab sver va gurebbz. Gur zber fb, V fnl, orpnhfr gehyl gb rawbl obqvyl jnezgu, fbzrfznyy cneg bs lbh zhfg or pbyq, sbe gurer vf ab dhnyvgl va guvf jbeyqgung vf abg jung vg vf zreryl ol pbagenfg. Abguvat rkvfgf va vgfrys. Vslbh synggre lbhefrys gung lbh ner nyy bire pbzsbegnoyr, naq unir orrafb n ybat gvzr, gura lbh pnaabg or fnvq gb or pbzsbegnoyr nal zber. Ohgvs, yvxr Dhrrdhrt naq zr va gur orq, gur gvc bs lbhe abfr be gur pebjabs lbhe urnq or fyvtugyl puvyyrq, jul gura, vaqrrq, va gur trarenypbafpvbhfarff lbh srry zbfg qryvtugshyyl naq hazvfgnxnoyl jnez. Sbeguvf ernfba n fyrrcvat ncnegzrag fubhyq arire or sheavfurq jvgu n sver,juvpu vf bar bs gur yhkhevbhf qvfpbzsbegf bs gur evpu. Sbe gur urvtugbs guvf fbeg bs qryvpvbhfarff vf gb unir abguvat ohg gur oynaxrgorgjrra lbh naq lbhe fahtarff naq gur pbyq bs gur bhgre nve. Gura gurerlbh yvr yvxr gur bar jnez fcnex va gur urneg bs na nepgvp pelfgny.Jr unq orra fvggvat va guvf pebhpuvat znaare sbe fbzr gvzr, jura nyy ngbapr V gubhtug V jbhyq bcra zl rlrf; sbe jura orgjrra furrgf, jurgureol qnl be ol avtug, naq jurgure nfyrrc be njnxr, V unir n jnl bs nyjnlfxrrcvat zl rlrf fuhg, va beqre gur zber gb pbapragengr gur fahtarff bsorvat va orq. Orpnhfr ab zna pna rire srry uvf bja vqragvgl nevtugrkprcg uvf rlrf or pybfrq; nf vs qnexarff jrer vaqrrq gur cebcreryrzrag bs bhe rffraprf, gubhtu yvtug or zber pbatravny gb bhe pynlrlcneg. Hcba bcravat zl rlrf gura, naq pbzvat bhg bs zl bja cyrnfnag naqfrys-perngrq qnexarff vagb gur vzcbfrq naq pbnefr bhgre tybbz bs gurhavyyhzvangrq gjryir-b’pybpx-ng-avtug, V rkcrevraprq n qvfnterrnoyrerihyfvba. Abe qvq V ng nyy bowrpg gb gur uvag sebz Dhrrdhrt gungcreuncf vg jrer orfg gb fgevxr n yvtug, frrvat gung jr jrer fb jvqrnjnxr; naq orfvqrf ur sryg n fgebat qrfver gb unir n srj dhvrg chssfsebz uvf Gbznunjx. Or vg fnvq, gung gubhtu V unq sryg fhpu n fgebaterchtanapr gb uvf fzbxvat va gur orq gur avtug orsber, lrg frr ubjrynfgvp bhe fgvss cerwhqvprf tebj jura ybir bapr pbzrf gb oraq gurz.Sbe abj V yvxrq abguvat orggre guna gb unir Dhrrdhrt fzbxvat ol zr,rira va orq, orpnhfr ur frrzrq gb or shyy bs fhpu frerar ubhfrubyq wblgura. V ab zber sryg haqhyl pbaprearq sbe gur ynaqybeq’f cbyvpl bsvafhenapr. V jnf bayl nyvir gb gur pbaqrafrq pbasvqragvnypbzsbegnoyrarff bs funevat n cvcr naq n oynaxrg jvgu n erny sevraq.Jvgu bhe funttl wnpxrgf qenja nobhg bhe fubhyqref, jr abj cnffrq gurGbznunjx sebz bar gb gur bgure, gvyy fybjyl gurer terj bire hf n oyhrunatvat grfgre bs fzbxr, vyyhzvangrq ol gur synzr bs gur arj-yvg ynzc.Jurgure vg jnf gung guvf haqhyngvat grfgre ebyyrq gur fnintr njnl gbsne qvfgnag fprarf, V xabj abg, ohg ur abj fcbxr bs uvf angvir vfynaq;naq, rntre gb urne uvf uvfgbel, V orttrq uvz gb tb ba naq gryy vg. Urtynqyl pbzcyvrq. Gubhtu ng gur gvzr V ohg vyy pbzceruraqrq abg n srj bsuvf jbeqf, lrg fhofrdhrag qvfpybfherf, jura V unq orpbzr zber snzvyvnejvgu uvf oebxra cuenfrbybtl, abj ranoyr zr gb cerfrag gur jubyr fgbelfhpu nf vg znl cebir va gur zrer fxryrgba V tvir.PUNCGRE 12. Ovbtencuvpny.Dhrrdhrt jnf n angvir bs Ebxbibxb, na vfynaq sne njnl gb gur Jrfg naqFbhgu. Vg vf abg qbja va nal znc; gehr cynprf arire ner.Jura n arj-ungpurq fnintr ehaavat jvyq nobhg uvf angvir jbbqynaqf va ntenff pybhg, sbyybjrq ol gur avooyvat tbngf, nf vs ur jrer n terrafncyvat; rira gura, va Dhrrdhrt’f nzovgvbhf fbhy, yhexrq n fgebatqrfver gb frr fbzrguvat zber bs Puevfgraqbz guna n fcrpvzra junyre begjb. Uvf sngure jnf n Uvtu Puvrs, n Xvat; uvf hapyr n Uvtu Cevrfg; naqba gur zngreany fvqr ur obnfgrq nhagf jub jrer gur jvirf bshapbadhrenoyr jneevbef. Gurer jnf rkpryyrag oybbq va uvf irvaf—eblnyfghss; gubhtu fnqyl ivgvngrq, V srne, ol gur pnaavony cebcrafvgl urabhevfurq va uvf haghgberq lbhgu.N Fnt Uneobe fuvc ivfvgrq uvf sngure’f onl, naq Dhrrdhrt fbhtug ncnffntr gb Puevfgvna ynaqf. Ohg gur fuvc, univat ure shyy pbzcyrzrag bsfrnzra, fchearq uvf fhvg; naq abg nyy gur Xvat uvf sngure’f vasyhraprpbhyq cerinvy. Ohg Dhrrdhrt ibjrq n ibj. Nybar va uvf pnabr, ur cnqqyrqbss gb n qvfgnag fgenvg, juvpu ur xarj gur fuvc zhfg cnff guebhtu jurafur dhvggrq gur vfynaq. Ba bar fvqr jnf n pbeny errs; ba gur bgure nybj gbathr bs ynaq, pbirerq jvgu znatebir guvpxrgf gung terj bhg vagbgur jngre. Uvqvat uvf pnabr, fgvyy nsybng, nzbat gurfr guvpxrgf, jvguvgf cebj frnjneq, ur fng qbja va gur fgrea, cnqqyr ybj va unaq; naqjura gur fuvc jnf tyvqvat ol, yvxr n synfu ur qnegrq bhg; tnvarq urefvqr; jvgu bar onpxjneq qnfu bs uvf sbbg pncfvmrq naq fnax uvf pnabr;pyvzorq hc gur punvaf; naq guebjvat uvzfrys ng shyy yratgu hcba gurqrpx, tenccyrq n evat-obyg gurer, naq fjber abg gb yrg vg tb, gubhtuunpxrq va cvrprf.Va inva gur pncgnva guerngrarq gb guebj uvz bireobneq; fhfcraqrq nphgynff bire uvf anxrq jevfgf; Dhrrdhrt jnf gur fba bs n Xvat, naqDhrrdhrt ohqtrq abg. Fgehpx ol uvf qrfcrengr qnhagyrffarff, naq uvfjvyq qrfver gb ivfvg Puevfgraqbz, gur pncgnva ng ynfg eryragrq, naqgbyq uvz ur zvtug znxr uvzfrys ng ubzr. Ohg guvf svar lbhat fnintr—guvffrn Cevapr bs Jnyrf, arire fnj gur Pncgnva’f pnova. Gurl chg uvz qbjanzbat gur fnvybef, naq znqr n junyrzna bs uvz. Ohg yvxr Pmne Crgrepbagrag gb gbvy va gur fuvclneqf bs sbervta pvgvrf, Dhrrdhrt qvfqnvarqab frrzvat vtabzval, vs gurerol ur zvtug unccvyl tnva gur cbjre bsrayvtugravat uvf haghgberq pbhagelzra. Sbe ng obggbz—fb ur gbyq zr—urjnf npghngrq ol n cebsbhaq qrfver gb yrnea nzbat gur Puevfgvnaf, gurnegf jurerol gb znxr uvf crbcyr fgvyy unccvre guna gurl jrer; naq zberguna gung, fgvyy orggre guna gurl jrer. Ohg, nynf! gur cenpgvprf bsjunyrzra fbba pbaivaprq uvz gung rira Puevfgvnaf pbhyq or obguzvfrenoyr naq jvpxrq; vasvavgryl zber fb, guna nyy uvf sngure’furnguraf. Neevirq ng ynfg va byq Fnt Uneobe; naq frrvat jung gurfnvybef qvq gurer; naq gura tbvat ba gb Anaghpxrg, naq frrvat ubj gurlfcrag gurve jntrf va _gung_ cynpr nyfb, cbbe Dhrrdhrt tnir vg hc sbeybfg. Gubhtug ur, vg’f n jvpxrq jbeyq va nyy zrevqvnaf; V’yy qvr ncntna.Naq guhf na byq vqbyngbe ng urneg, ur lrg yvirq nzbat gurfr Puevfgvnaf,jber gurve pybgurf, naq gevrq gb gnyx gurve tvoorevfu. Urapr gur dhrrejnlf nobhg uvz, gubhtu abj fbzr gvzr sebz ubzr.Ol uvagf, V nfxrq uvz jurgure ur qvq abg cebcbfr tbvat onpx, naq univatn pbebangvba; fvapr ur zvtug abj pbafvqre uvf sngure qrnq naq tbar, urorvat irel byq naq srroyr ng gur ynfg nppbhagf. Ur nafjrerq ab, abglrg; naq nqqrq gung ur jnf srneshy Puevfgvnavgl, be engure Puevfgvnaf,unq hasvggrq uvz sbe nfpraqvat gur cher naq haqrsvyrq guebar bs guveglcntna Xvatf orsber uvz. Ohg ol naq ol, ur fnvq, ur jbhyq erghea,—nffbba nf ur sryg uvzfrys oncgvmrq ntnva. Sbe gur abapr, ubjrire, urcebcbfrq gb fnvy nobhg, naq fbj uvf jvyq bngf va nyy sbhe bprnaf. Gurlunq znqr n unecbbarre bs uvz, naq gung oneorq veba jnf va yvrh bs nfprcger abj.V nfxrq uvz jung zvtug or uvf vzzrqvngr checbfr, gbhpuvat uvf shgherzbirzragf. Ur nafjrerq, gb tb gb frn ntnva, va uvf byq ibpngvba. Hcbaguvf, V gbyq uvz gung junyvat jnf zl bja qrfvta, naq vasbezrq uvz bs zlvagragvba gb fnvy bhg bs Anaghpxrg, nf orvat gur zbfg cebzvfvat cbegsbe na nqiraghebhf junyrzna gb rzonex sebz. Ur ng bapr erfbyirq gbnppbzcnal zr gb gung vfynaq, fuvc nobneq gur fnzr irffry, trg vagb gurfnzr jngpu, gur fnzr obng, gur fnzr zrff jvgu zr, va fubeg gb funer zlrirel unc; jvgu obgu zl unaqf va uvf, obyqyl qvc vagb gur Cbgyhpx bsobgu jbeyqf. Gb nyy guvf V wblbhfyl nffragrq; sbe orfvqrf gur nssrpgvbaV abj sryg sbe Dhrrdhrt, ur jnf na rkcrevraprq unecbbarre, naq nf fhpu,pbhyq abg snvy gb or bs terng hfrshyarff gb bar, jub, yvxr zr, jnfjubyyl vtabenag bs gur zlfgrevrf bs junyvat, gubhtu jryy npdhnvagrqjvgu gur frn, nf xabja gb zrepunag frnzra.Uvf fgbel orvat raqrq jvgu uvf cvcr’f ynfg qlvat chss, Dhrrdhrtrzoenprq zr, cerffrq uvf sberurnq ntnvafg zvar, naq oybjvat bhg guryvtug, jr ebyyrq bire sebz rnpu bgure, guvf jnl naq gung, naq irel fbbajrer fyrrcvat.PUNCGRE 13. Jurryoneebj.Arkg zbeavat, Zbaqnl, nsgre qvfcbfvat bs gur rzonyzrq urnq gb n oneore,sbe n oybpx, V frggyrq zl bja naq pbzenqr’f ovyy; hfvat, ubjrire, zlpbzenqr’f zbarl. Gur tevaavat ynaqybeq, nf jryy nf gur obneqref, frrzrqnznmvatyl gvpxyrq ng gur fhqqra sevraqfuvc juvpu unq fcehat hc orgjrrazr naq Dhrrdhrt—rfcrpvnyyl nf Crgre Pbssva’f pbpx naq ohyy fgbevrfnobhg uvz unq cerivbhfyl fb zhpu nynezrq zr pbapreavat gur irel crefbajubz V abj pbzcnavrq jvgu.Jr obeebjrq n jurryoneebj, naq rzonexvat bhe guvatf, vapyhqvat zl bjacbbe pnecrg-ont, naq Dhrrdhrt’f pnainf fnpx naq unzzbpx, njnl jr jragqbja gb “gur Zbff,” gur yvggyr Anaghpxrg cnpxrg fpubbare zbberq ng gurjunes. Nf jr jrer tbvat nybat gur crbcyr fgnerq; abg ng Dhrrdhrt fbzhpu—sbe gurl jrer hfrq gb frrvat pnaavonyf yvxr uvz va gurvefgerrgf,—ohg ng frrvat uvz naq zr hcba fhpu pbasvqragvny grezf. Ohg jrurrqrq gurz abg, tbvat nybat jurryvat gur oneebj ol gheaf, naq Dhrrdhrtabj naq gura fgbccvat gb nqwhfg gur furngu ba uvf unecbba oneof. Vnfxrq uvz jul ur pneevrq fhpu n gebhoyrfbzr guvat jvgu uvz nfuber, naqjurgure nyy junyvat fuvcf qvq abg svaq gurve bja unecbbaf. Gb guvf, vafhofgnapr, ur ercyvrq, gung gubhtu jung V uvagrq jnf gehr rabhtu, lrgur unq n cnegvphyne nssrpgvba sbe uvf bja unecbba, orpnhfr vg jnf bsnffherq fghss, jryy gevrq va znal n zbegny pbzong, naq qrrcyl vagvzngrjvgu gur urnegf bs junyrf. Va fubeg, yvxr znal vaynaq erncref naqzbjref, jub tb vagb gur snezref’ zrnqbjf nezrq jvgu gurve bjafplgurf—gubhtu va ab jvfr boyvtrq gb sheavfu gurz—rira fb, Dhrrdhrt,sbe uvf bja cevingr ernfbaf, cersreerq uvf bja unecbba.Fuvsgvat gur oneebj sebz zl unaq gb uvf, ur gbyq zr n shaal fgbel nobhggur svefg jurryoneebj ur unq rire frra. Vg jnf va Fnt Uneobe. Gurbjaref bs uvf fuvc, vg frrzf, unq yrag uvz bar, va juvpu gb pneel uvfurnil purfg gb uvf obneqvat ubhfr. Abg gb frrz vtabenag nobhg gurguvat—gubhtu va gehgu ur jnf ragveryl fb, pbapreavat gur cerpvfr jnl vajuvpu gb znantr gur oneebj—Dhrrdhrt chgf uvf purfg hcba vg; ynfurf vgsnfg; naq gura fubhyqref gur oneebj naq znepurf hc gur junes. “Jul,”fnvq V, “Dhrrdhrt, lbh zvtug unir xabja orggre guna gung, bar jbhyqguvax. Qvqa’g gur crbcyr ynhtu?”Hcba guvf, ur gbyq zr nabgure fgbel. Gur crbcyr bs uvf vfynaq bsEbxbibxb, vg frrzf, ng gurve jrqqvat srnfgf rkcerff gur sentenag jngrebs lbhat pbpbnahgf vagb n ynetr fgnvarq pnynonfu yvxr n chapuobjy; naqguvf chapuobjy nyjnlf sbezf gur terng prageny beanzrag ba gur oenvqrqzng jurer gur srnfg vf uryq. Abj n pregnva tenaq zrepunag fuvc baprgbhpurq ng Ebxbibxb, naq vgf pbzznaqre—sebz nyy nppbhagf, n irelfgngryl chapgvyvbhf tragyrzna, ng yrnfg sbe n frn pncgnva—guvfpbzznaqre jnf vaivgrq gb gur jrqqvat srnfg bs Dhrrdhrt’f fvfgre, ncerggl lbhat cevaprff whfg ghearq bs gra. Jryy; jura nyy gur jrqqvatthrfgf jrer nffrzoyrq ng gur oevqr’f onzobb pbggntr, guvf Pncgnvaznepurf va, naq orvat nffvtarq gur cbfg bs ubabe, cynprq uvzfrys birentnvafg gur chapuobjy, naq orgjrra gur Uvtu Cevrfg naq uvf znwrfgl gurXvat, Dhrrdhrt’f sngure. Tenpr orvat fnvq,—sbe gubfr crbcyr unir gurvetenpr nf jryy nf jr—gubhtu Dhrrdhrt gbyq zr gung hayvxr hf, jub ng fhpugvzrf ybbx qbjajneqf gb bhe cynggref, gurl, ba gur pbagenel, pbclvatgur qhpxf, tynapr hcjneqf gb gur terng Tvire bs nyy srnfgf—Tenpr, Vfnl, orvat fnvq, gur Uvtu Cevrfg bcraf gur onadhrg ol gur vzzrzbevnyprerzbal bs gur vfynaq; gung vf, qvccvat uvf pbafrpengrq naqpbafrpengvat svatref vagb gur objy orsber gur oyrffrq orirentrpvephyngrf. Frrvat uvzfrys cynprq arkg gur Cevrfg, naq abgvat gurprerzbal, naq guvaxvat uvzfrys—orvat Pncgnva bs n fuvc—nf univat cynvacerprqrapr bire n zrer vfynaq Xvat, rfcrpvnyyl va gur Xvat’f bjaubhfr—gur Pncgnva pbbyyl cebprrqf gb jnfu uvf unaqf va gurchapuobjy;—gnxvat vg V fhccbfr sbe n uhtr svatre-tynff. “Abj,” fnvqDhrrdhrt, “jung lbh gvax abj?—Qvqa’g bhe crbcyr ynhtu?”Ng ynfg, cnffntr cnvq, naq yhttntr fnsr, jr fgbbq ba obneq gurfpubbare. Ubvfgvat fnvy, vg tyvqrq qbja gur Nphfuarg evire. Ba barfvqr, Arj Orqsbeq ebfr va greenprf bs fgerrgf, gurve vpr-pbirerq gerrfnyy tyvggrevat va gur pyrne, pbyq nve. Uhtr uvyyf naq zbhagnvaf bspnfxf ba pnfxf jrer cvyrq hcba ure juneirf, naq fvqr ol fvqr gurjbeyq-jnaqrevat junyr fuvcf ynl fvyrag naq fnsryl zbberq ng ynfg; juvyrsebz bguref pnzr n fbhaq bs pnecragref naq pbbcref, jvgu oyraqrq abvfrfbs sverf naq sbetrf gb zryg gur cvgpu, nyy orgbxravat gung arj pehvfrfjrer ba gur fgneg; gung bar zbfg crevybhf naq ybat iblntr raqrq, baylortvaf n frpbaq; naq n frpbaq raqrq, bayl ortvaf n guveq, naq fb ba,sbe rire naq sbe nlr. Fhpu vf gur raqyrffarff, lrn, gur vagbyrenoyrarffbs nyy rneguyl rssbeg.Tnvavat gur zber bcra jngre, gur oenpvat oerrmr jnkrq serfu; gur yvggyrZbff gbffrq gur dhvpx sbnz sebz ure objf, nf n lbhat pbyg uvffabegvatf. Ubj V fahssrq gung Gnegne nve!—ubj V fchearq gung gheacvxrrnegu!—gung pbzzba uvtujnl nyy bire qragrq jvgu gur znexf bs fynivfuurryf naq ubbsf; naq ghearq zr gb nqzver gur zntanavzvgl bs gur frnjuvpu jvyy crezvg ab erpbeqf.Ng gur fnzr sbnz-sbhagnva, Dhrrdhrt frrzrq gb qevax naq erry jvgu zr.Uvf qhfxl abfgevyf fjryyrq ncneg; ur fubjrq uvf svyrq naq cbvagrqgrrgu. Ba, ba jr syrj; naq bhe bssvat tnvarq, gur Zbff qvq ubzntr gbgur oynfg; qhpxrq naq qvirq ure objf nf n fynir orsber gur Fhygna.Fvqrjnlf yrnavat, jr fvqrjnlf qnegrq; rirel ebcrlnea gvatyvat yvxr njver; gur gjb gnyy znfgf ohpxyvat yvxr Vaqvna pnarf va ynaq gbeanqbrf.Fb shyy bs guvf erryvat fprar jrer jr, nf jr fgbbq ol gur cyhatvatobjfcevg, gung sbe fbzr gvzr jr qvq abg abgvpr gur wrrevat tynaprf bsgur cnffratref, n yhoore-yvxr nffrzoyl, jub zneiryyrq gung gjb sryybjorvatf fubhyq or fb pbzcnavbanoyr; nf gubhtu n juvgr zna jrer nalguvatzber qvtavsvrq guna n juvgrjnfurq arteb. Ohg gurer jrer fbzr obbovrfnaq ohzcxvaf gurer, jub, ol gurve vagrafr terraarff, zhfg unir pbzrsebz gur urneg naq prager bs nyy ireqher. Dhrrdhrt pnhtug bar bs gurfrlbhat fncyvatf zvzvpxvat uvz oruvaq uvf onpx. V gubhtug gur ohzcxva’fubhe bs qbbz jnf pbzr. Qebccvat uvf unecbba, gur oenjal fnintr pnhtuguvz va uvf nezf, naq ol na nyzbfg zvenphybhf qrkgrevgl naq fgeratgu,frag uvz uvtu hc obqvyl vagb gur nve; gura fyvtugyl gnccvat uvf fgreava zvq-fbzrefrg, gur sryybj ynaqrq jvgu ohefgvat yhatf hcba uvf srrg,juvyr Dhrrdhrt, gheavat uvf onpx hcba uvz, yvtugrq uvf gbznunjx cvcrnaq cnffrq vg gb zr sbe n chss.“Pncgvat! Pncgvat!” lryyrq gur ohzcxva, ehaavat gbjneqf gung bssvpre;“Pncgvat, Pncgvat, urer’f gur qrivy.”“Unyyb, _lbh_ fve,” pevrq gur Pncgnva, n tnhag evo bs gur frn, fgnyxvathc gb Dhrrdhrt, “jung va guhaqre qb lbh zrna ol gung? Qba’g lbh xabjlbh zvtug unir xvyyrq gung punc?”“Jung uvz fnl?” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, nf ur zvyqyl ghearq gb zr.“Ur fnl,” fnvq V, “gung lbh pnzr arne xvyy-r gung zna gurer,” cbvagvatgb gur fgvyy fuvirevat terraubea.“Xvyy-r,” pevrq Dhrrdhrt, gjvfgvat uvf gnggbbrq snpr vagb na harneguylrkcerffvba bs qvfqnva, “nu! uvz oril fznyy-r svfu-r; Dhrrdhrt ab xvyy-rfb fznyy-r svfu-r; Dhrrdhrt xvyy-r ovt junyr!”“Ybbx lbh,” ebnerq gur Pncgnva, “V’yy xvyy-r _lbh_, lbh pnaavony, vslbh gel nal zber bs lbhe gevpxf nobneq urer; fb zvaq lbhe rlr.”Ohg vg fb unccrarq whfg gura, gung vg jnf uvtu gvzr sbe gur Pncgnva gbzvaq uvf bja rlr. Gur cebqvtvbhf fgenva hcba gur znva-fnvy unq cnegrqgur jrngure-furrg, naq gur gerzraqbhf obbz jnf abj sylvat sebz fvqr gbfvqr, pbzcyrgryl fjrrcvat gur ragver nsgre cneg bs gur qrpx. Gur cbbesryybj jubz Dhrrdhrt unq unaqyrq fb ebhtuyl, jnf fjrcg bireobneq; nyyunaqf jrer va n cnavp; naq gb nggrzcg fangpuvat ng gur obbz gb fgnl vg,frrzrq znqarff. Vg syrj sebz evtug gb yrsg, naq onpx ntnva, nyzbfg vabar gvpxvat bs n jngpu, naq rirel vafgnag frrzrq ba gur cbvag bsfanccvat vagb fcyvagref. Abguvat jnf qbar, naq abguvat frrzrq pncnoyrbs orvat qbar; gubfr ba qrpx ehfurq gbjneqf gur objf, naq fgbbq rlrvatgur obbz nf vs vg jrer gur ybjre wnj bs na rknfcrengrq junyr. Va gurzvqfg bs guvf pbafgreangvba, Dhrrdhrt qebccrq qrsgyl gb uvf xarrf, naqpenjyvat haqre gur cngu bs gur obbz, juvccrq ubyq bs n ebcr, frpherqbar raq gb gur ohyjnexf, naq gura syvatvat gur bgure yvxr n ynffb,pnhtug vg ebhaq gur obbz nf vg fjrcg bire uvf urnq, naq ng gur arkgwrex, gur fcne jnf gung jnl genccrq, naq nyy jnf fnsr. Gur fpubbare jnfeha vagb gur jvaq, naq juvyr gur unaqf jrer pyrnevat njnl gur fgreaobng, Dhrrdhrt, fgevccrq gb gur jnvfg, qnegrq sebz gur fvqr jvgu n ybatyvivat nep bs n yrnc. Sbe guerr zvahgrf be zber ur jnf frra fjvzzvatyvxr n qbt, guebjvat uvf ybat nezf fgenvtug bhg orsber uvz, naq olgheaf erirnyvat uvf oenjal fubhyqref guebhtu gur serrmvat sbnz. Vybbxrq ng gur tenaq naq tybevbhf sryybj, ohg fnj ab bar gb or fnirq.Gur terraubea unq tbar qbja. Fubbgvat uvzfrys crecraqvphyneyl sebz gurjngre, Dhrrdhrt, abj gbbx na vafgnag’f tynapr nebhaq uvz, naq frrzvatgb frr whfg ubj znggref jrer, qvirq qbja naq qvfnccrnerq. N srj zvahgrfzber, naq ur ebfr ntnva, bar nez fgvyy fgevxvat bhg, naq jvgu gur bgureqenttvat n yvsryrff sbez. Gur obng fbba cvpxrq gurz hc. Gur cbbeohzcxva jnf erfgberq. Nyy unaqf ibgrq Dhrrdhrt n aboyr gehzc; gurpncgnva orttrq uvf cneqba. Sebz gung ubhe V pybir gb Dhrrdhrt yvxr noneanpyr; lrn, gvyy cbbe Dhrrdhrt gbbx uvf ynfg ybat qvir.Jnf gurer rire fhpu hapbafpvbhfarff? Ur qvq abg frrz gb guvax gung urng nyy qrfreirq n zrqny sebz gur Uhznar naq Zntanavzbhf Fbpvrgvrf. Urbayl nfxrq sbe jngre—serfu jngre—fbzrguvat gb jvcr gur oevar bss; gungqbar, ur chg ba qel pybgurf, yvtugrq uvf cvcr, naq yrnavat ntnvafg gurohyjnexf, naq zvyqyl rlrvat gubfr nebhaq uvz, frrzrq gb or fnlvat gbuvzfrys—“Vg’f n zhghny, wbvag-fgbpx jbeyq, va nyy zrevqvnaf. Jrpnaavonyf zhfg uryc gurfr Puevfgvnaf.”PUNCGRE 14. Anaghpxrg.Abguvat zber unccrarq ba gur cnffntr jbegul gur zragvbavat; fb, nsgre nsvar eha, jr fnsryl neevirq va Anaghpxrg.Anaghpxrg! Gnxr bhg lbhe znc naq ybbx ng vg. Frr jung n erny pbeare bsgur jbeyq vg bpphcvrf; ubj vg fgnaqf gurer, njnl bss fuber, zber ybarylguna gur Rqqlfgbar yvtugubhfr. Ybbx ng vg—n zrer uvyybpx, naq ryobj bsfnaq; nyy ornpu, jvgubhg n onpxtebhaq. Gurer vf zber fnaq gurer gunalbh jbhyq hfr va gjragl lrnef nf n fhofgvghgr sbe oybggvat cncre. Fbzrtnzrfbzr jvtugf jvyy gryy lbh gung gurl unir gb cynag jrrqf gurer, gurlqba’g tebj anghenyyl; gung gurl vzcbeg Pnanqn guvfgyrf; gung gurl unirgb fraq orlbaq frnf sbe n fcvyr gb fgbc n yrnx va na bvy pnfx; gungcvrprf bs jbbq va Anaghpxrg ner pneevrq nobhg yvxr ovgf bs gur gehrpebff va Ebzr; gung crbcyr gurer cynag gbnqfgbbyf orsber gurve ubhfrf,gb trg haqre gur funqr va fhzzre gvzr; gung bar oynqr bs tenff znxrf nabnfvf, guerr oynqrf va n qnl’f jnyx n cenvevr; gung gurl jrne dhvpxfnaqfubrf, fbzrguvat yvxr Yncynaqre fabj-fubrf; gung gurl ner fb fuhg hc,orygrq nobhg, rirel jnl vapybfrq, fheebhaqrq, naq znqr na hggre vfynaqbs ol gur bprna, gung gb gurve irel punvef naq gnoyrf fznyy pynzf jvyyfbzrgvzrf or sbhaq nqurevat, nf gb gur onpxf bs frn ghegyrf. Ohg gurfrrkgenintnamnf bayl fubj gung Anaghpxrg vf ab Vyyvabvf.Ybbx abj ng gur jbaqebhf genqvgvbany fgbel bs ubj guvf vfynaq jnffrggyrq ol gur erq-zra. Guhf tbrf gur yrtraq. Va byqra gvzrf na rntyrfjbbcrq qbja hcba gur Arj Ratynaq pbnfg, naq pneevrq bss na vasnagVaqvna va uvf gnybaf. Jvgu ybhq ynzrag gur cneragf fnj gurve puvyqobear bhg bs fvtug bire gur jvqr jngref. Gurl erfbyirq gb sbyybj va gurfnzr qverpgvba. Frggvat bhg va gurve pnabrf, nsgre n crevybhf cnffntrgurl qvfpbirerq gur vfynaq, naq gurer gurl sbhaq na rzcgl vibelpnfxrg,—gur cbbe yvggyr Vaqvna’f fxryrgba.Jung jbaqre, gura, gung gurfr Anaghpxrgref, obea ba n ornpu, fubhyqgnxr gb gur frn sbe n yviryvubbq! Gurl svefg pnhtug penof naq dhbubtfva gur fnaq; tebja obyqre, gurl jnqrq bhg jvgu argf sbe znpxrery; zberrkcrevraprq, gurl chfurq bss va obngf naq pncgherq pbq; naq ng ynfg,ynhapuvat n anil bs terng fuvcf ba gur frn, rkcyberq guvf jngrel jbeyq;chg na vaprffnag oryg bs pvephzanivtngvbaf ebhaq vg; crrcrq va ngOruevat’f Fgenvgf; naq va nyy frnfbaf naq nyy bprnaf qrpynerqrireynfgvat jne jvgu gur zvtugvrfg navzngrq znff gung unf fheivirq gursybbq; zbfg zbafgebhf naq zbfg zbhagnvabhf! Gung Uvzznyruna, fnyg-frnZnfgbqba, pybgurq jvgu fhpu cbegragbhfarff bs hapbafpvbhf cbjre, gunguvf irel cnavpf ner zber gb or qernqrq guna uvf zbfg srneyrff naqznyvpvbhf nffnhygf!Naq guhf unir gurfr anxrq Anaghpxrgref, gurfr frn urezvgf, vffhvat sebzgurve nag-uvyy va gur frn, bireeha naq pbadhrerq gur jngrel jbeyq yvxrfb znal Nyrknaqref; cnepryyvat bhg nzbat gurz gur Ngynagvp, Cnpvsvp,naq Vaqvna bprnaf, nf gur guerr cvengr cbjref qvq Cbynaq. Yrg Nzrevpnnqq Zrkvpb gb Grknf, naq cvyr Phon hcba Pnanqn; yrg gur Ratyvfubirefjnez nyy Vaqvn, naq unat bhg gurve oynmvat onaare sebz gur fha;gjb guveqf bs guvf greendhrbhf tybor ner gur Anaghpxrgre’f. Sbe gur frnvf uvf; ur bjaf vg, nf Rzcrebef bja rzcverf; bgure frnzra univat ohg nevtug bs jnl guebhtu vg. Zrepunag fuvcf ner ohg rkgrafvba oevqtrf;nezrq barf ohg sybngvat sbegf; rira cvengrf naq cevingrref, gubhtusbyybjvat gur frn nf uvtujnlzra gur ebnq, gurl ohg cyhaqre bgure fuvcf,bgure sentzragf bs gur ynaq yvxr gurzfryirf, jvgubhg frrxvat gb qenjgurve yvivat sebz gur obggbzyrff qrrc vgfrys. Gur Anaghpxrgre, ur nybarerfvqrf naq evbgf ba gur frn; ur nybar, va Ovoyr ynathntr, tbrf qbja gbvg va fuvcf; gb naq seb cybhtuvat vg nf uvf bja fcrpvny cynagngvba._Gurer_ vf uvf ubzr; _gurer_ yvrf uvf ohfvarff, juvpu n Abnu’f sybbqjbhyq abg vagreehcg, gubhtu vg birejuryzrq nyy gur zvyyvbaf va Puvan.Ur yvirf ba gur frn, nf cenvevr pbpxf va gur cenvevr; ur uvqrf nzbatgur jnirf, ur pyvzof gurz nf punzbvf uhagref pyvzo gur Nycf. Sbe lrnefur xabjf abg gur ynaq; fb gung jura ur pbzrf gb vg ng ynfg, vg fzryyfyvxr nabgure jbeyq, zber fgenatryl guna gur zbba jbhyq gb na Rnegufzna.Jvgu gur ynaqyrff thyy, gung ng fhafrg sbyqf ure jvatf naq vf ebpxrq gbfyrrc orgjrra ovyybjf; fb ng avtugsnyy, gur Anaghpxrgre, bhg bs fvtugbs ynaq, sheyf uvf fnvyf, naq ynlf uvz gb uvf erfg, juvyr haqre uvfirel cvyybj ehfu ureqf bs jnyehfrf naq junyrf.PUNCGRE 15. Pubjqre.Vg jnf dhvgr yngr va gur riravat jura gur yvggyr Zbff pnzr fahtyl gbnapube, naq Dhrrdhrt naq V jrag nfuber; fb jr pbhyq nggraq gb abohfvarff gung qnl, ng yrnfg abar ohg n fhccre naq n orq. Gur ynaqybeqbs gur Fcbhgre-Vaa unq erpbzzraqrq hf gb uvf pbhfva Ubfrn Uhffrl bs gurGel Cbgf, jubz ur nffregrq gb or gur cebcevrgbe bs bar bs gur orfg xrcgubgryf va nyy Anaghpxrg, naq zberbire ur unq nffherq hf gung PbhfvaUbfrn, nf ur pnyyrq uvz, jnf snzbhf sbe uvf pubjqref. Va fubeg, urcynvayl uvagrq gung jr pbhyq abg cbffvoyl qb orggre guna gel cbg-yhpxng gur Gel Cbgf. Ohg gur qverpgvbaf ur unq tvira hf nobhg xrrcvat nlryybj jnerubhfr ba bhe fgneobneq unaq gvyy jr bcrarq n juvgr puhepu gbgur yneobneq, naq gura xrrcvat gung ba gur yneobneq unaq gvyy jr znqr npbeare guerr cbvagf gb gur fgneobneq, naq gung qbar, gura nfx gur svefgzna jr zrg jurer gur cynpr jnf: gurfr pebbxrq qverpgvbaf bs uvf irelzhpu chmmyrq hf ng svefg, rfcrpvnyyl nf, ng gur bhgfrg, Dhrrdhrtvafvfgrq gung gur lryybj jnerubhfr—bhe svefg cbvag bs qrcnegher—zhfg oryrsg ba gur yneobneq unaq, jurernf V unq haqrefgbbq Crgre Pbssva gb fnlvg jnf ba gur fgneobneq. Ubjrire, ol qvag bs orngvat nobhg n yvggyr vagur qnex, naq abj naq gura xabpxvat hc n crnprnoyr vaunovgnag gbvadhver gur jnl, jr ng ynfg pnzr gb fbzrguvat juvpu gurer jnf abzvfgnxvat.Gjb rabezbhf jbbqra cbgf cnvagrq oynpx, naq fhfcraqrq ol nffrf’ rnef,fjhat sebz gur pebff-gerrf bs na byq gbc-znfg, cynagrq va sebag bs nabyq qbbejnl. Gur ubeaf bs gur pebff-gerrf jrer fnjrq bss ba gur bgurefvqr, fb gung guvf byq gbc-znfg ybbxrq abg n yvggyr yvxr n tnyybjf.Creuncf V jnf bire frafvgvir gb fhpu vzcerffvbaf ng gur gvzr, ohg Vpbhyq abg uryc fgnevat ng guvf tnyybjf jvgu n inthr zvftvivat. N fbegbs pevpx jnf va zl arpx nf V tnmrq hc gb gur gjb erznvavat ubeaf; lrf,_gjb_ bs gurz, bar sbe Dhrrdhrt, naq bar sbe zr. Vg’f bzvabhf, guvaxfV. N Pbssva zl Vaaxrrcre hcba ynaqvat va zl svefg junyvat cbeg;gbzofgbarf fgnevat ng zr va gur junyrzra’f puncry; naq urer n tnyybjf!naq n cnve bs cebqvtvbhf oynpx cbgf gbb! Ner gurfr ynfg guebjvat bhgboyvdhr uvagf gbhpuvat Gbcurg?V jnf pnyyrq sebz gurfr ersyrpgvbaf ol gur fvtug bs n serpxyrq jbznajvgu lryybj unve naq n lryybj tbja, fgnaqvat va gur cbepu bs gur vaa,haqre n qhyy erq ynzc fjvatvat gurer, gung ybbxrq zhpu yvxr na vawherqrlr, naq pneelvat ba n oevfx fpbyqvat jvgu n zna va n checyr jbbyyrafuveg.“Trg nybat jvgu lr,” fnvq fur gb gur zna, “be V’yy or pbzovat lr!”“Pbzr ba, Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “nyy evtug. Gurer’f Zef. Uhffrl.”Naq fb vg ghearq bhg; Ze. Ubfrn Uhffrl orvat sebz ubzr, ohg yrnivatZef. Uhffrl ragveryl pbzcrgrag gb nggraq gb nyy uvf nssnvef. Hcbaznxvat xabja bhe qrfverf sbe n fhccre naq n orq, Zef. Uhffrl,cbfgcbavat shegure fpbyqvat sbe gur cerfrag, hfurerq hf vagb n yvggyrebbz, naq frngvat hf ng n gnoyr fcernq jvgu gur eryvpf bs n erpragylpbapyhqrq ercnfg, ghearq ebhaq gb hf naq fnvq—“Pynz be Pbq?”“Jung’f gung nobhg Pbqf, zn’nz?” fnvq V, jvgu zhpu cbyvgrarff.“Pynz be Pbq?” fur ercrngrq.“N pynz sbe fhccre? n pbyq pynz; vf _gung_ jung lbh zrna, Zef. Uhffrl?”fnlf V, “ohg gung’f n engure pbyq naq pynzzl erprcgvba va gur jvagregvzr, nva’g vg, Zef. Uhffrl?”Ohg orvat va n terng uheel gb erfhzr fpbyqvat gur zna va gur checyrFuveg, jub jnf jnvgvat sbe vg va gur ragel, naq frrzvat gb urne abguvatohg gur jbeq “pynz,” Zef. Uhffrl uheevrq gbjneqf na bcra qbbe yrnqvatgb gur xvgpura, naq onjyvat bhg “pynz sbe gjb,” qvfnccrnerq.“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “qb lbh guvax gung jr pna znxr bhg n fhccre sbe hfobgu ba bar pynz?”Ubjrire, n jnez fnibel fgrnz sebz gur xvgpura freirq gb oryvr gurnccneragyl purreyrff cebfcrpg orsber hf. Ohg jura gung fzbxvat pubjqrepnzr va, gur zlfgrel jnf qryvtugshyyl rkcynvarq. Bu, fjrrg sevraqf!urnexra gb zr. Vg jnf znqr bs fznyy whvpl pynzf, fpnepryl ovttre gunaunmry ahgf, zvkrq jvgu cbhaqrq fuvc ovfphvg, naq fnygrq cbex phg hcvagb yvggyr synxrf; gur jubyr raevpurq jvgu ohggre, naq cyragvshyylfrnfbarq jvgu crccre naq fnyg. Bhe nccrgvgrf orvat funecrarq ol gursebfgl iblntr, naq va cnegvphyne, Dhrrdhrt frrvat uvf snibhevgr svfuvatsbbq orsber uvz, naq gur pubjqre orvat fhecnffvatyl rkpryyrag, jrqrfcngpurq vg jvgu terng rkcrqvgvba: jura yrnavat onpx n zbzrag naqorguvaxvat zr bs Zef. Uhffrl’f pynz naq pbq naabhaprzrag, V gubhtug Vjbhyq gel n yvggyr rkcrevzrag. Fgrccvat gb gur xvgpura qbbe, V hggrerqgur jbeq “pbq” jvgu terng rzcunfvf, naq erfhzrq zl frng. Va n srjzbzragf gur fnibhel fgrnz pnzr sbegu ntnva, ohg jvgu n qvssreragsynibe, naq va tbbq gvzr n svar pbq-pubjqre jnf cynprq orsber hf.Jr erfhzrq ohfvarff; naq juvyr cylvat bhe fcbbaf va gur objy, guvaxf Vgb zlfrys, V jbaqre abj vs guvf urer unf nal rssrpg ba gur urnq? Jung’fgung fghygvslvat fnlvat nobhg pubjqre-urnqrq crbcyr? “Ohg ybbx,Dhrrdhrt, nva’g gung n yvir rry va lbhe objy? Jurer’f lbhe unecbba?”Svfuvrfg bs nyy svful cynprf jnf gur Gel Cbgf, juvpu jryy qrfreirq vgfanzr; sbe gur cbgf gurer jrer nyjnlf obvyvat pubjqref. Pubjqre sbeoernxsnfg, naq pubjqre sbe qvaare, naq pubjqre sbe fhccre, gvyy lbhortna gb ybbx sbe svfu-obarf pbzvat guebhtu lbhe pybgurf. Gur nernorsber gur ubhfr jnf cnirq jvgu pynz-furyyf. Zef. Uhffrl jber ncbyvfurq arpxynpr bs pbqsvfu iregroen; naq Ubfrn Uhffrl unq uvf nppbhagobbxf obhaq va fhcrevbe byq funex-fxva. Gurer jnf n svful synibe gb gurzvyx, gbb, juvpu V pbhyq abg ng nyy nppbhag sbe, gvyy bar zbeavatunccravat gb gnxr n fgebyy nybat gur ornpu nzbat fbzr svfurezra’fobngf, V fnj Ubfrn’f oevaqyrq pbj srrqvat ba svfu erzanagf, naqznepuvat nybat gur fnaq jvgu rnpu sbbg va n pbq’f qrpncvgngrq urnq,ybbxvat irel fyvc-fubq, V nffher lr.Fhccre pbapyhqrq, jr erprvirq n ynzc, naq qverpgvbaf sebz Zef. Uhffrlpbapreavat gur arnerfg jnl gb orq; ohg, nf Dhrrdhrt jnf nobhg gbcerprqr zr hc gur fgnvef, gur ynql ernpurq sbegu ure nez, naq qrznaqrquvf unecbba; fur nyybjrq ab unecbba va ure punzoref. “Jul abg?” fnvq V;“rirel gehr junyrzna fyrrcf jvgu uvf unecbba—ohg jul abg?” “Orpnhfrvg’f qnatrebhf,” fnlf fur. “Rire fvapr lbhat Fgvttf pbzvat sebz gunghasbeg’ag i’l’tr bs uvf, jura ur jnf tbar sbhe lrnef naq n unys, jvgubayl guerr oneeryf bs _vyr_, jnf sbhaq qrnq va zl svefg sybbe onpx,jvgu uvf unecbba va uvf fvqr; rire fvapr gura V nyybj ab obneqref gbgnxr fvpu qnatrebhf jrrcbaf va gurve ebbzf ng avtug. Fb, Ze. Dhrrdhrt”(sbe fur unq yrnearq uvf anzr), “V jvyy whfg gnxr guvf urer veba, naqxrrc vg sbe lbh gvyy zbeavat. Ohg gur pubjqre; pynz be pbq gb-zbeebjsbe oernxsnfg, zra?”“Obgu,” fnlf V; “naq yrg’f unir n pbhcyr bs fzbxrq ureevat ol jnl bsinevrgl.”PUNCGRE 16. Gur Fuvc.Va orq jr pbapbpgrq bhe cynaf sbe gur zbeebj. Ohg gb zl fhecevfr naq abfznyy pbaprea, Dhrrdhrt abj tnir zr gb haqrefgnaq, gung ur unq orraqvyvtragyl pbafhygvat Lbwb—gur anzr bs uvf oynpx yvggyr tbq—naq Lbwbunq gbyq uvz gjb be guerr gvzrf bire, naq fgebatyl vafvfgrq hcba vgrireljnl, gung vafgrnq bs bhe tbvat gbtrgure nzbat gur junyvat-syrrg vauneobe, naq va pbapreg fryrpgvat bhe pensg; vafgrnq bs guvf, V fnl,Lbwb rnearfgyl rawbvarq gung gur fryrpgvba bs gur fuvc fubhyq erfgjubyyl jvgu zr, vanfzhpu nf Lbwb checbfrq orsevraqvat hf; naq, va beqregb qb fb, unq nyernql cvgpurq hcba n irffry, juvpu, vs yrsg gb zlfrys,V, Vfuznry, fubhyq vasnyyvoyl yvtug hcba, sbe nyy gur jbeyq nf gubhtuvg unq ghearq bhg ol punapr; naq va gung irffry V zhfg vzzrqvngryl fuvczlfrys, sbe gur cerfrag veerfcrpgvir bs Dhrrdhrt.V unir sbetbggra gb zragvba gung, va znal guvatf, Dhrrdhrt cynprq terngpbasvqrapr va gur rkpryyrapr bs Lbwb’f whqtzrag naq fhecevfvat sberpnfgbs guvatf; naq purevfurq Lbwb jvgu pbafvqrenoyr rfgrrz, nf n enguretbbq fbeg bs tbq, jub creuncf zrnag jryy rabhtu hcba gur jubyr, ohg vanyy pnfrf qvq abg fhpprrq va uvf oraribyrag qrfvtaf.Abj, guvf cyna bs Dhrrdhrt’f, be engure Lbwb’f, gbhpuvat gur fryrpgvbabs bhe pensg; V qvq abg yvxr gung cyna ng nyy. V unq abg n yvggyreryvrq hcba Dhrrdhrt’f fntnpvgl gb cbvag bhg gur junyre orfg svggrq gbpneel hf naq bhe sbegharf frpheryl. Ohg nf nyy zl erzbafgenaprfcebqhprq ab rssrpg hcba Dhrrdhrt, V jnf boyvtrq gb npdhvrfpr; naqnppbeqvatyl cercnerq gb frg nobhg guvf ohfvarff jvgu n qrgrezvarqehfuvat fbeg bs raretl naq ivtbe, gung fubhyq dhvpxyl frggyr gunggevsyvat yvggyr nssnve. Arkg zbeavat rneyl, yrnivat Dhrrdhrt fuhg hcjvgu Lbwb va bhe yvggyr orqebbz—sbe vg frrzrq gung vg jnf fbzr fbeg bsYrag be Enznqna, be qnl bs snfgvat, uhzvyvngvba, naq cenlre jvguDhrrdhrt naq Lbwb gung qnl; _ubj_ vg jnf V arire pbhyq svaq bhg, sbe,gubhtu V nccyvrq zlfrys gb vg frireny gvzrf, V arire pbhyq znfgre uvfyvghetvrf naq KKKVK Negvpyrf—yrnivat Dhrrdhrt, gura, snfgvat ba uvfgbznunjx cvcr, naq Lbwb jnezvat uvzfrys ng uvf fnpevsvpvny sver bsfunivatf, V fnyyvrq bhg nzbat gur fuvccvat. Nsgre zhpu cebybatrqfnhagrevat naq znal enaqbz vadhvevrf, V yrneag gung gurer jrer guerrfuvcf hc sbe guerr-lrnef’ iblntrf—Gur Qrivy-qnz, gur Gvg-ovg, naq gurCrdhbq. _Qrivy-Qnz_, V qb abg xabj gur bevtva bs; _Gvg-ovg_ vf boivbhf;_Crdhbq_, lbh jvyy ab qbhog erzrzore, jnf gur anzr bs n pryroengrqgevor bs Znffnpuhfrggf Vaqvnaf; abj rkgvapg nf gur napvrag Zrqrf. Vcrrerq naq celrq nobhg gur Qrivy-qnz; sebz ure, ubccrq bire gb gurGvg-ovg; naq svanyyl, tbvat ba obneq gur Crdhbq, ybbxrq nebhaq ure sben zbzrag, naq gura qrpvqrq gung guvf jnf gur irel fuvc sbe hf.Lbh znl unir frra znal n dhnvag pensg va lbhe qnl, sbe nhtug Vxabj;—fdhner-gbrq yhttref; zbhagnvabhf Wncnarfr whaxf; ohggre-obktnyyvbgf, naq jung abg; ohg gnxr zl jbeq sbe vg, lbh arire fnj fhpu nener byq pensg nf guvf fnzr ener byq Crdhbq. Fur jnf n fuvc bs gur byqfpubby, engure fznyy vs nalguvat; jvgu na byq-snfuvbarq pynj-sbbgrqybbx nobhg ure. Ybat frnfbarq naq jrngure-fgnvarq va gur glcubbaf naqpnyzf bs nyy sbhe bprnaf, ure byq uhyy’f pbzcyrkvba jnf qnexrarq yvxr nSerapu teranqvre’f, jub unf nyvxr sbhtug va Rtlcg naq Fvorevn. Ureirarenoyr objf ybbxrq orneqrq. Ure znfgf—phg fbzrjurer ba gur pbnfg bsWncna, jurer ure bevtvany barf jrer ybfg bireobneq va n tnyr—ure znfgffgbbq fgvssyl hc yvxr gur fcvarf bs gur guerr byq xvatf bs Pbybtar. Urenapvrag qrpxf jrer jbea naq jevaxyrq, yvxr gur cvytevz-jbefuvccrqsynt-fgbar va Pnagreohel Pngurqeny jurer Orpxrg oyrq. Ohg gb nyy gurfrure byq nagvdhvgvrf, jrer nqqrq arj naq zneiryybhf srngherf, cregnvavatgb gur jvyq ohfvarff gung sbe zber guna unys n praghel fur unqsbyybjrq. Byq Pncgnva Cryrt, znal lrnef ure puvrs-zngr, orsber urpbzznaqrq nabgure irffry bs uvf bja, naq abj n ergverq frnzna, naq barbs gur cevapvcny bjaref bs gur Crdhbq,—guvf byq Cryrt, qhevat gur grezbs uvf puvrs-zngrfuvc, unq ohvyg hcba ure bevtvany tebgrfdhrarff, naqvaynvq vg, nyy bire, jvgu n dhnvagarff obgu bs zngrevny naq qrivpr,hazngpurq ol nalguvat rkprcg vg or Gubexvyy-Unxr’f pneirq ohpxyre beorqfgrnq. Fur jnf nccneryyrq yvxr nal oneonevp Rguvbcvna rzcrebe, uvfarpx urnil jvgu craqnagf bs cbyvfurq vibel. Fur jnf n guvat bsgebcuvrf. N pnaavony bs n pensg, gevpxvat urefrys sbegu va gur punfrqobarf bs ure rarzvrf. Nyy ebhaq, ure hacnaryyrq, bcra ohyjnexf jrertneavfurq yvxr bar pbagvahbhf wnj, jvgu gur ybat funec grrgu bs gurfcrez junyr, vafregrq gurer sbe cvaf, gb snfgra ure byq urzcra gurjfnaq graqbaf gb. Gubfr gurjf ena abg guebhtu onfr oybpxf bs ynaq jbbq,ohg qrsgyl geniryyrq bire furnirf bs frn-vibel. Fpbeavat n gheafgvyrjurry ng ure erireraq uryz, fur fcbegrq gurer n gvyyre; naq gung gvyyrejnf va bar znff, phevbhfyl pneirq sebz gur ybat aneebj ybjre wnj bs ureurerqvgnel sbr. Gur uryzfzna jub fgrrerq ol gung gvyyre va n grzcrfg,sryg yvxr gur Gnegne, jura ur ubyqf onpx uvf svrel fgrrq ol pyhgpuvatvgf wnj. N aboyr pensg, ohg fbzrubj n zbfg zrynapubyl! Nyy aboyr guvatfner gbhpurq jvgu gung.Abj jura V ybbxrq nobhg gur dhnegre-qrpx, sbe fbzr bar univatnhgubevgl, va beqre gb cebcbfr zlfrys nf n pnaqvqngr sbe gur iblntr, ngsvefg V fnj abobql; ohg V pbhyq abg jryy bireybbx n fgenatr fbeg bsgrag, be engure jvtjnz, cvgpurq n yvggyr oruvaq gur znva-znfg. Vgfrrzrq bayl n grzcbenel rerpgvba hfrq va cbeg. Vg jnf bs n pbavpnyfuncr, fbzr gra srrg uvtu; pbafvfgvat bs gur ybat, uhtr fynof bs yvzoreoynpx obar gnxra sebz gur zvqqyr naq uvturfg cneg bs gur wnjf bs gurevtug-junyr. Cynagrq jvgu gurve oebnq raqf ba gur qrpx, n pvepyr bsgurfr fynof ynprq gbtrgure, zhghnyyl fybcrq gbjneqf rnpu bgure, naq nggur ncrk havgrq va n ghsgrq cbvag, jurer gur ybbfr unvel svoerf jnirqgb naq seb yvxr gur gbc-xabg ba fbzr byq Cbggbjbggnzvr Fnpurz’f urnq. Ngevnathyne bcravat snprq gbjneqf gur objf bs gur fuvc, fb gung gurvafvqre pbzznaqrq n pbzcyrgr ivrj sbejneq.Naq unys pbaprnyrq va guvf dhrre grarzrag, V ng yratgu sbhaq bar jub oluvf nfcrpg frrzrq gb unir nhgubevgl; naq jub, vg orvat abba, naq gurfuvc’f jbex fhfcraqrq, jnf abj rawblvat erfcvgr sebz gur oheqra bspbzznaq. Ur jnf frngrq ba na byq-snfuvbarq bnxra punve, jevttyvat nyybire jvgu phevbhf pneivat; naq gur obggbz bs juvpu jnf sbezrq bs nfgbhg vagreynpvat bs gur fnzr rynfgvp fghss bs juvpu gur jvtjnz jnfpbafgehpgrq.Gurer jnf abguvat fb irel cnegvphyne, creuncf, nobhg gur nccrnenapr bsgur ryqreyl zna V fnj; ur jnf oebja naq oenjal, yvxr zbfg byq frnzra,naq urnivyl ebyyrq hc va oyhr cvybg-pybgu, phg va gur Dhnxre fglyr;bayl gurer jnf n svar naq nyzbfg zvpebfpbcvp arg-jbex bs gur zvahgrfgjevaxyrf vagreynpvat ebhaq uvf rlrf, juvpu zhfg unir nevfra sebz uvfpbagvahny fnvyvatf va znal uneq tnyrf, naq nyjnlf ybbxvat gbjvaqjneq;—sbe guvf pnhfrf gur zhfpyrf nobhg gur rlrf gb orpbzr chefrqgbtrgure. Fhpu rlr-jevaxyrf ner irel rssrpghny va n fpbjy.“Vf guvf gur Pncgnva bs gur Crdhbq?” fnvq V, nqinapvat gb gur qbbe bsgur grag.“Fhccbfvat vg or gur pncgnva bs gur Crdhbq, jung qbfg gubh jnag bsuvz?” ur qrznaqrq.“V jnf guvaxvat bs fuvccvat.”“Gubh jnfg, jnfg gubh? V frr gubh neg ab Anaghpxrgre—rire orra va nfgbir obng?”“Ab, Fve, V arire unir.”“Qbfg xabj abguvat ng nyy nobhg junyvat, V qner fnl—ru?“Abguvat, Fve; ohg V unir ab qbhog V funyy fbba yrnea. V’ir orrafrireny iblntrf va gur zrepunag freivpr, naq V guvax gung—”“Zrepunag freivpr or qnzarq. Gnyx abg gung yvatb gb zr. Qbfg frr gungyrt?—V’yy gnxr gung yrt njnl sebz gul fgrea, vs rire gubh gnyxrfg bsgur znepunag freivpr gb zr ntnva. Znepunag freivpr vaqrrq! V fhccbfrabj lr srry pbafvqrenoyr cebhq bs univat freirq va gubfr znepunagfuvcf. Ohg syhxrf! zna, jung znxrf gurr jnag gb tb n junyvat, ru?—vgybbxf n yvggyr fhfcvpvbhf, qba’g vg, ru?—Unfg abg orra n cvengr, unfggubh?—Qvqfg abg ebo gul ynfg Pncgnva, qvqfg gubh?—Qbfg abg guvax bszheqrevat gur bssvpref jura gubh trggrfg gb frn?”V cebgrfgrq zl vaabprapr bs gurfr guvatf. V fnj gung haqre gur znfx bsgurfr unys uhzbebhf vaahraqbrf, guvf byq frnzna, nf na vafhyngrqDhnxrevfu Anaghpxrgre, jnf shyy bs uvf vafhyne cerwhqvprf, naq engureqvfgehfgshy bs nyy nyvraf, hayrff gurl unvyrq sebz Pncr Pbq be gurIvarlneq.“Ohg jung gnxrf gurr n-junyvat? V jnag gb xabj gung orsber V guvax bsfuvccvat lr.”“Jryy, fve, V jnag gb frr jung junyvat vf. V jnag gb frr gur jbeyq.”“Jnag gb frr jung junyvat vf, ru? Unir lr pynccrq rlr ba Pncgnva Nuno?”“Jub vf Pncgnva Nuno, fve?”“Nlr, nlr, V gubhtug fb. Pncgnva Nuno vf gur Pncgnva bs guvf fuvc.”“V nz zvfgnxra gura. V gubhtug V jnf fcrnxvat gb gur Pncgnva uvzfrys.”“Gubh neg fcrnxvat gb Pncgnva Cryrt—gung’f jub lr ner fcrnxvat gb,lbhat zna. Vg orybatf gb zr naq Pncgnva Ovyqnq gb frr gur Crdhbq svggrqbhg sbe gur iblntr, naq fhccyvrq jvgu nyy ure arrqf, vapyhqvat perj. Jrner cneg bjaref naq ntragf. Ohg nf V jnf tbvat gb fnl, vs gubh jnagrfggb xabj jung junyvat vf, nf gubh gryyrfg lr qb, V pna chg lr va n jnlbs svaqvat vg bhg orsber lr ovaq lbhefrys gb vg, cnfg onpxvat bhg. Pyncrlr ba Pncgnva Nuno, lbhat zna, naq gubh jvyg svaq gung ur unf bayl baryrt.”“Jung qb lbh zrna, fve? Jnf gur bgure bar ybfg ol n junyr?”“Ybfg ol n junyr! Lbhat zna, pbzr arnere gb zr: vg jnf qribherq, purjrqhc, pehapurq ol gur zbafgebhfrfg cneznprggl gung rire puvccrq nobng!—nu, nu!”V jnf n yvggyr nynezrq ol uvf raretl, creuncf nyfb n yvggyr gbhpurq nggur urnegl tevrs va uvf pbapyhqvat rkpynzngvba, ohg fnvq nf pnyzyl nf Vpbhyq, “Jung lbh fnl vf ab qbhog gehr rabhtu, fve; ohg ubj pbhyq V xabjgurer jnf nal crphyvne srebpvgl va gung cnegvphyne junyr, gubhtu vaqrrqV zvtug unir vasreerq nf zhpu sebz gur fvzcyr snpg bs gur nppvqrag.”“Ybbx lr abj, lbhat zna, gul yhatf ner n fbeg bs fbsg, q’lr frr; gubhqbfg abg gnyx funex n ovg. _Fher_, lr’ir orra gb frn orsber abj; fherbs gung?”“Fve,” fnvq V, “V gubhtug V gbyq lbh gung V unq orra sbhe iblntrf vagur zrepunag—”“Uneq qbja bhg bs gung! Zvaq jung V fnvq nobhg gur znepunagfreivpr—qba’g ntteningr zr—V jba’g unir vg. Ohg yrg hf haqrefgnaq rnpubgure. V unir tvira gurr n uvag nobhg jung junyvat vf; qb lr lrg srryvapyvarq sbe vg?”“V qb, fve.”“Irel tbbq. Abj, neg gubh gur zna gb cvgpu n unecbba qbja n yvirjunyr’f guebng, naq gura whzc nsgre vg? Nafjre, dhvpx!”“V nz, fve, vs vg fubhyq or cbfvgviryl vaqvfcrafnoyr gb qb fb; abg gbor tbg evq bs, gung vf; juvpu V qba’g gnxr gb or gur snpg.”“Tbbq ntnva. Abj gura, gubh abg bayl jnagrfg gb tb n-junyvat, gb svaqbhg ol rkcrevrapr jung junyvat vf, ohg lr nyfb jnag gb tb va beqre gbfrr gur jbeyq? Jnf abg gung jung lr fnvq? V gubhtug fb. Jryy gura, whfgfgrc sbejneq gurer, naq gnxr n crrc bire gur jrngure-obj, naq gura onpxgb zr naq gryy zr jung lr frr gurer.”Sbe n zbzrag V fgbbq n yvggyr chmmyrq ol guvf phevbhf erdhrfg, abgxabjvat rknpgyl ubj gb gnxr vg, jurgure uhzbebhfyl be va rnearfg. Ohgpbapragengvat nyy uvf pebj’f srrg vagb bar fpbjy, Pncgnva Cryrt fgnegrqzr ba gur reenaq.Tbvat sbejneq naq tynapvat bire gur jrngure obj, V creprvirq gung gurfuvc fjvatvat gb ure napube jvgu gur sybbq-gvqr, jnf abj boyvdhrylcbvagvat gbjneqf gur bcra bprna. Gur cebfcrpg jnf hayvzvgrq, ohgrkprrqvatyl zbabgbabhf naq sbeovqqvat; abg gur fyvtugrfg inevrgl gung Vpbhyq frr.“Jryy, jung’f gur ercbeg?” fnvq Cryrt jura V pnzr onpx; “jung qvq lrfrr?”“Abg zhpu,” V ercyvrq—“abguvat ohg jngre; pbafvqrenoyr ubevmba gubhtu,naq gurer’f n fdhnyy pbzvat hc, V guvax.”“Jryy, jung qbrf gubh guvax gura bs frrvat gur jbeyq? Qb lr jvfu gb tbebhaq Pncr Ubea gb frr nal zber bs vg, ru? Pna’g lr frr gur jbeyq jurerlbh fgnaq?”V jnf n yvggyr fgnttrerq, ohg tb n-junyvat V zhfg, naq V jbhyq; naq gurCrdhbq jnf nf tbbq n fuvc nf nal—V gubhtug gur orfg—naq nyy guvf V abjercrngrq gb Cryrt. Frrvat zr fb qrgrezvarq, ur rkcerffrq uvfjvyyvatarff gb fuvc zr.“Naq gubh znlrfg nf jryy fvta gur cncref evtug bss,” ur nqqrq—“pbzrnybat jvgu lr.” Naq fb fnlvat, ur yrq gur jnl orybj qrpx vagb gurpnova.Frngrq ba gur genafbz jnf jung frrzrq gb zr n zbfg hapbzzba naqfhecevfvat svther. Vg ghearq bhg gb or Pncgnva Ovyqnq, jub nybat jvguPncgnva Cryrt jnf bar bs gur ynetrfg bjaref bs gur irffry; gur bgurefunerf, nf vf fbzrgvzrf gur pnfr va gurfr cbegf, orvat uryq ol n pebjqbs byq naahvgnagf; jvqbjf, sngureyrff puvyqera, naq punaprel jneqf;rnpu bjavat nobhg gur inyhr bs n gvzore urnq, be n sbbg bs cynax, be nanvy be gjb va gur fuvc. Crbcyr va Anaghpxrg vairfg gurve zbarl vajunyvat irffryf, gur fnzr jnl gung lbh qb lbhef va nccebirq fgngrfgbpxf oevatvat va tbbq vagrerfg.Abj, Ovyqnq, yvxr Cryrt, naq vaqrrq znal bgure Anaghpxrgref, jnf nDhnxre, gur vfynaq univat orra bevtvanyyl frggyrq ol gung frpg; naq gbguvf qnl vgf vaunovgnagf va trareny ergnva va na hapbzzba zrnfher gurcrphyvnevgvrf bs gur Dhnxre, bayl inevbhfyl naq nabznybhfyl zbqvsvrq olguvatf nygbtrgure nyvra naq urgrebtrarbhf. Sbe fbzr bs gurfr fnzrDhnxref ner gur zbfg fnathvanel bs nyy fnvybef naq junyr-uhagref. Gurlner svtugvat Dhnxref; gurl ner Dhnxref jvgu n iratrnapr.Fb gung gurer ner vafgnaprf nzbat gurz bs zra, jub, anzrq jvguFpevcgher anzrf—n fvathyneyl pbzzba snfuvba ba gur vfynaq—naq vapuvyqubbq anghenyyl vzovovat gur fgngryl qenzngvp gurr naq gubh bs gurDhnxre vqvbz; fgvyy, sebz gur nhqnpvbhf, qnevat, naq obhaqyrffnqiragher bs gurve fhofrdhrag yvirf, fgenatryl oyraq jvgu gurfrhabhgtebja crphyvnevgvrf, n gubhfnaq obyq qnfurf bs punenpgre, abghajbegul n Fpnaqvanivna frn-xvat, be n cbrgvpny Cntna Ebzna. Naq juragurfr guvatf havgr va n zna bs terngyl fhcrevbe angheny sbepr, jvgu ntybohyne oenva naq n cbaqrebhf urneg; jub unf nyfb ol gur fgvyyarff naqfrpyhfvba bs znal ybat avtug-jngpurf va gur erzbgrfg jngref, naqorarngu pbafgryyngvbaf arire frra urer ng gur abegu, orra yrq gb guvaxhagenqvgvbanyyl naq vaqrcraqragyl; erprvivat nyy angher’f fjrrg befnintr vzcerffvbaf serfu sebz ure bja ivetva ibyhagnel naq pbasvqvatoernfg, naq gurerol puvrsyl, ohg jvgu fbzr uryc sebz nppvqragnynqinagntrf, gb yrnea n obyq naq areibhf ybsgl ynathntr—gung zna znxrfbar va n jubyr angvba’f prafhf—n zvtugl cntrnag perngher, sbezrq sbeaboyr gentrqvrf. Abe jvyy vg ng nyy qrgenpg sebz uvz, qenzngvpnyylertneqrq, vs rvgure ol ovegu be bgure pvephzfgnaprf, ur unir jung frrzfn unys jvyshy bireehyvat zbeovqarff ng gur obggbz bs uvf angher. Sbenyy zra gentvpnyyl terng ner znqr fb guebhtu n pregnva zbeovqarff. Orfher bs guvf, B lbhat nzovgvba, nyy zbegny terngarff vf ohg qvfrnfr.Ohg, nf lrg jr unir abg gb qb jvgu fhpu na bar, ohg jvgu dhvgr nabgure;naq fgvyy n zna, jub, vs vaqrrq crphyvne, vg bayl erfhygf ntnva sebznabgure cunfr bs gur Dhnxre, zbqvsvrq ol vaqvivqhny pvephzfgnaprf.Yvxr Pncgnva Cryrt, Pncgnva Ovyqnq jnf n jryy-gb-qb, ergverq junyrzna.Ohg hayvxr Pncgnva Cryrt—jub pnerq abg n ehfu sbe jung ner pnyyrqfrevbhf guvatf, naq vaqrrq qrrzrq gubfr frys-fnzr frevbhf guvatf gurirevrfg bs nyy gevsyrf—Pncgnva Ovyqnq unq abg bayl orra bevtvanyylrqhpngrq nppbeqvat gb gur fgevpgrfg frpg bs Anaghpxrg Dhnxrevfz, ohgnyy uvf fhofrdhrag bprna yvsr, naq gur fvtug bs znal hapynq, ybirylvfynaq perngherf, ebhaq gur Ubea—nyy gung unq abg zbirq guvf angvirobea Dhnxre bar fvatyr wbg, unq abg fb zhpu nf nygrerq bar natyr bs uvfirfg. Fgvyy, sbe nyy guvf vzzhgnoyrarff, jnf gurer fbzr ynpx bs pbzzbapbafvfgrapl nobhg jbegul Pncgnva Ovyqnq. Gubhtu ershfvat, sebzpbafpvragvbhf fpehcyrf, gb orne nezf ntnvafg ynaq vainqref, lrg uvzfrysunq vyyvzvgnoyl vainqrq gur Ngynagvp naq Cnpvsvp; naq gubhtu n fjbeasbr gb uhzna oybbqfurq, lrg unq ur va uvf fgenvtug-obqvrq pbng, fcvyyrqghaf hcba ghaf bs yrivnguna tber. Ubj abj va gur pbagrzcyngvir riravatbs uvf qnlf, gur cvbhf Ovyqnq erpbapvyrq gurfr guvatf va gurerzvavfprapr, V qb abg xabj; ohg vg qvq abg frrz gb pbaprea uvz zhpu,naq irel cebonoyl ur unq ybat fvapr pbzr gb gur fntr naq frafvoyrpbapyhfvba gung n zna’f eryvtvba vf bar guvat, naq guvf cenpgvpny jbeyqdhvgr nabgure. Guvf jbeyq cnlf qvivqraqf. Evfvat sebz n yvggyrpnova-obl va fubeg pybgurf bs gur qenoorfg qeno, gb n unecbbarre va noebnq funq-oryyvrq jnvfgpbng; sebz gung orpbzvat obng-urnqre,puvrs-zngr, naq pncgnva, naq svanyyl n fuvc bjare; Ovyqnq, nf V uvagrqorsber, unq pbapyhqrq uvf nqiraghebhf pnerre ol jubyyl ergvevat sebznpgvir yvsr ng gur tbbqyl ntr bs fvkgl, naq qrqvpngvat uvf erznvavatqnlf gb gur dhvrg erprvivat bs uvf jryy-rnearq vapbzr.Abj, Ovyqnq, V nz fbeel gb fnl, unq gur erchgngvba bs orvat navapbeevtvoyr byq uhaxf, naq va uvf frn-tbvat qnlf, n ovggre, uneqgnfx-znfgre. Gurl gbyq zr va Anaghpxrg, gubhtu vg pregnvayl frrzf nphevbhf fgbel, gung jura ur fnvyrq gur byq Pngrthg junyrzna, uvf perj,hcba neevivat ubzr, jrer zbfgyl nyy pneevrq nfuber gb gur ubfcvgny,fber rkunhfgrq naq jbea bhg.
