Sbe n cvbhf zna, rfcrpvnyyl sbe n Dhnxre,ur jnf pregnvayl engure uneq-urnegrq, gb fnl gur yrnfg. Ur arire hfrqgb fjrne, gubhtu, ng uvf zra, gurl fnvq; ohg fbzrubj ur tbg navabeqvangr dhnagvgl bs pehry, hazvgvtngrq uneq jbex bhg bs gurz. JuraOvyqnq jnf n puvrs-zngr, gb unir uvf qeno-pbybherq rlr vagragyl ybbxvatng lbh, znqr lbh srry pbzcyrgryl areibhf, gvyy lbh pbhyq pyhgpufbzrguvat—n unzzre be n zneyvat-fcvxr, naq tb gb jbex yvxr znq, ngfbzrguvat be bgure, arire zvaq jung. Vaqbyrapr naq vqyrarff crevfurqorsber uvz. Uvf bja crefba jnf gur rknpg rzobqvzrag bs uvf hgvyvgnevnapunenpgre. Ba uvf ybat, tnhag obql, ur pneevrq ab fcner syrfu, abfhcresyhbhf orneq, uvf puva univat n fbsg, rpbabzvpny anc gb vg, yvxrgur jbea anc bs uvf oebnq-oevzzrq ung.Fhpu, gura, jnf gur crefba gung V fnj frngrq ba gur genafbz jura Vsbyybjrq Pncgnva Cryrt qbja vagb gur pnova. Gur fcnpr orgjrra gur qrpxfjnf fznyy; naq gurer, obyg-hcevtug, fng byq Ovyqnq, jub nyjnlf fng fb,naq arire yrnarq, naq guvf gb fnir uvf pbng gnvyf. Uvf oebnq-oevz jnfcynprq orfvqr uvz; uvf yrtf jrer fgvssyl pebffrq; uvf qeno irfgher jnfohggbarq hc gb uvf puva; naq fcrpgnpyrf ba abfr, ur frrzrq nofbeorq vaernqvat sebz n cbaqrebhf ibyhzr.“Ovyqnq,” pevrq Pncgnva Cryrt, “ng vg ntnva, Ovyqnq, ru? Lr unir orrafghqlvat gubfr Fpevcgherf, abj, sbe gur ynfg guvegl lrnef, gb zlpregnva xabjyrqtr. Ubj sne lr tbg, Ovyqnq?”Nf vs ybat unovghngrq gb fhpu cebsnar gnyx sebz uvf byq fuvczngr,Ovyqnq, jvgubhg abgvpvat uvf cerfrag veerirerapr, dhvrgyl ybbxrq hc,naq frrvat zr, tynaprq ntnva vadhvevatyl gbjneqf Cryrt.“Ur fnlf ur’f bhe zna, Ovyqnq,” fnvq Cryrt, “ur jnagf gb fuvc.”“Qbfg gurr?” fnvq Ovyqnq, va n ubyybj gbar, naq gheavat ebhaq gb zr.“V _qbfg_,” fnvq V hapbafpvbhfyl, ur jnf fb vagrafr n Dhnxre.“Jung qb lr guvax bs uvz, Ovyqnq?” fnvq Cryrt.“Ur’yy qb,” fnvq Ovyqnq, rlrvat zr, naq gura jrag ba fcryyvat njnl nguvf obbx va n zhzoyvat gbar dhvgr nhqvoyr.V gubhtug uvz gur dhrrerfg byq Dhnxre V rire fnj, rfcrpvnyyl nf Cryrt,uvf sevraq naq byq fuvczngr, frrzrq fhpu n oyhfgrere. Ohg V fnvqabguvat, bayl ybbxvat ebhaq zr funecyl. Cryrt abj guerj bcra n purfg,naq qenjvat sbegu gur fuvc’f negvpyrf, cynprq cra naq vax orsber uvz,naq frngrq uvzfrys ng n yvggyr gnoyr. V ortna gb guvax vg jnf uvtu gvzrgb frggyr jvgu zlfrys ng jung grezf V jbhyq or jvyyvat gb ratntr sbegur iblntr. V jnf nyernql njner gung va gur junyvat ohfvarff gurl cnvqab jntrf; ohg nyy unaqf, vapyhqvat gur pncgnva, erprvirq pregnva funerfbs gur cebsvgf pnyyrq _ynlf_, naq gung gurfr ynlf jrer cebcbegvbarq gbgur qrterr bs vzcbegnapr cregnvavat gb gur erfcrpgvir qhgvrf bs gurfuvc’f pbzcnal. V jnf nyfb njner gung orvat n terra unaq ng junyvat, zlbja ynl jbhyq abg or irel ynetr; ohg pbafvqrevat gung V jnf hfrq gb gurfrn, pbhyq fgrre n fuvc, fcyvpr n ebcr, naq nyy gung, V znqr ab qbhoggung sebz nyy V unq urneq V fubhyq or bssrerq ng yrnfg gur 275guynl—gung vf, gur 275gu cneg bs gur pyrne arg cebprrqf bs gur iblntr,jungrire gung zvtug riraghnyyl nzbhag gb. Naq gubhtu gur 275gu ynl jnfjung gurl pnyy n engure _ybat ynl_, lrg vg jnf orggre guna abguvat; naqvs jr unq n yhpxl iblntr, zvtug cerggl arneyl cnl sbe gur pybguvat Vjbhyq jrne bhg ba vg, abg gb fcrnx bs zl guerr lrnef’ orrs naq obneq,sbe juvpu V jbhyq abg unir gb cnl bar fgvire.Vg zvtug or gubhtug gung guvf jnf n cbbe jnl gb npphzhyngr n cevaprylsbeghar—naq fb vg jnf, n irel cbbe jnl vaqrrq. Ohg V nz bar bs gubfrgung arire gnxr ba nobhg cevapryl sbegharf, naq nz dhvgr pbagrag vs gurjbeyq vf ernql gb obneq naq ybqtr zr, juvyr V nz chggvat hc ng guvftevz fvta bs gur Guhaqre Pybhq. Hcba gur jubyr, V gubhtug gung gur275gu ynl jbhyq or nobhg gur snve guvat, ohg jbhyq abg unir orrafhecevfrq unq V orra bssrerq gur 200gu, pbafvqrevat V jnf bs noebnq-fubhyqrerq znxr.Ohg bar guvat, arireguryrff, gung znqr zr n yvggyr qvfgehfgshy nobhgerprvivat n trarebhf funer bs gur cebsvgf jnf guvf: Nfuber, V unq urneqfbzrguvat bs obgu Pncgnva Cryrt naq uvf hanppbhagnoyr byq pebal Ovyqnq;ubj gung gurl orvat gur cevapvcny cebcevrgbef bs gur Crdhbq, gurersbergur bgure naq zber vapbafvqrenoyr naq fpnggrerq bjaref, yrsg arneyl gurjubyr znantrzrag bs gur fuvc’f nssnvef gb gurfr gjb. Naq V qvq abg xabjohg jung gur fgvatl byq Ovyqnq zvtug unir n zvtugl qrny gb fnl nobhgfuvccvat unaqf, rfcrpvnyyl nf V abj sbhaq uvz ba obneq gur Crdhbq,dhvgr ng ubzr gurer va gur pnova, naq ernqvat uvf Ovoyr nf vs ng uvfbja sverfvqr. Abj juvyr Cryrt jnf invayl gelvat gb zraq n cra jvgu uvfwnpx-xavsr, byq Ovyqnq, gb zl ab fznyy fhecevfr, pbafvqrevat gung urjnf fhpu na vagrerfgrq cnegl va gurfr cebprrqvatf; Ovyqnq arire urrqrqhf, ohg jrag ba zhzoyvat gb uvzfrys bhg bs uvf obbx, “_Ynl_ abg hc sbelbhefryirf gernfherf hcba rnegu, jurer zbgu—”“Jryy, Pncgnva Ovyqnq,” vagreehcgrq Cryrt, “jung q’lr fnl, jung ynlfunyy jr tvir guvf lbhat zna?”“Gubh xabjrfg orfg,” jnf gur frchypueny ercyl, “gur frira uhaqerq naqfriragl-friragu jbhyqa’g or gbb zhpu, jbhyq vg?—‘jurer zbgu naq ehfg qbpbeehcg, ohg _ynl_—’”_Ynl_, vaqrrq, gubhtug V, naq fhpu n ynl! gur frira uhaqerq naqfriragl-friragu! Jryy, byq Ovyqnq, lbh ner qrgrezvarq gung V, sbe bar,funyy abg _ynl_ hc znal _ynlf_ urer orybj, jurer zbgu naq ehfg qbpbeehcg. Vg jnf na rkprrqvatyl _ybat ynl_ gung, vaqrrq; naq gubhtu sebzgur zntavghqr bs gur svther vg zvtug ng svefg qrprvir n ynaqfzna, lrggur fyvtugrfg pbafvqrengvba jvyy fubj gung gubhtu frira uhaqerq naqfriragl-frira vf n cerggl ynetr ahzore, lrg, jura lbh pbzr gb znxr n_grragu_ bs vg, lbh jvyy gura frr, V fnl, gung gur frira uhaqerq naqfriragl-friragu cneg bs n sneguvat vf n tbbq qrny yrff guna frirauhaqerq naq friragl-frira tbyq qbhoybbaf; naq fb V gubhtug ng gur gvzr.“Jul, oynfg lbhe rlrf, Ovyqnq,” pevrq Cryrt, “gubh qbfg abg jnag gbfjvaqyr guvf lbhat zna! ur zhfg unir zber guna gung.”“Frira uhaqerq naq friragl-friragu,” ntnva fnvq Ovyqnq, jvgubhg yvsgvatuvf rlrf; naq gura jrag ba zhzoyvat—“sbe jurer lbhe gernfher vf, gurerjvyy lbhe urneg or nyfb.”“V nz tbvat gb chg uvz qbja sbe gur guerr uhaqerqgu,” fnvq Cryrt, “qblr urne gung, Ovyqnq! Gur guerr uhaqerqgu ynl, V fnl.”Ovyqnq ynvq qbja uvf obbx, naq gheavat fbyrzayl gbjneqf uvz fnvq,“Pncgnva Cryrt, gubh unfg n trarebhf urneg; ohg gubh zhfg pbafvqre gurqhgl gubh bjrfg gb gur bgure bjaref bs guvf fuvc—jvqbjf naq becunaf,znal bs gurz—naq gung vs jr gbb nohaqnagyl erjneq gur ynobef bs guvflbhat zna, jr znl or gnxvat gur oernq sebz gubfr jvqbjf naq gubfrbecunaf. Gur frira uhaqerq naq friragl-friragu ynl, Pncgnva Cryrt.”“Gubh Ovyqnq!” ebnerq Cryrt, fgnegvat hc naq pynggrevat nobhg gurpnova. “Oynfg lr, Pncgnva Ovyqnq, vs V unq sbyybjrq gul nqivpr va gurfrznggref, V jbhyq nsber abj unq n pbafpvrapr gb yht nobhg gung jbhyq orurnil rabhtu gb sbhaqre gur ynetrfg fuvc gung rire fnvyrq ebhaq PncrUbea.”“Pncgnva Cryrt,” fnvq Ovyqnq fgrnqvyl, “gul pbafpvrapr znl or qenjvatgra vapurf bs jngre, be gra sngubzf, V pna’g gryy; ohg nf gubh negfgvyy na vzcravgrag zna, Pncgnva Cryrt, V terngyl srne yrfg gulpbafpvrapr or ohg n yrnxl bar; naq jvyy va gur raq fvax gurr sbhaqrevatqbja gb gur svrel cvg, Pncgnva Cryrt.”“Svrel cvg! svrel cvg! lr vafhyg zr, zna; cnfg nyy angheny ornevat, lrvafhyg zr. Vg’f na nyy-sverq bhgentr gb gryy nal uhzna perngher gungur’f obhaq gb uryy. Syhxrf naq synzrf! Ovyqnq, fnl gung ntnva gb zr,naq fgneg zl fbhy-obygf, ohg V’yy—V’yy—lrf, V’yy fjnyybj n yvir tbngjvgu nyy uvf unve naq ubeaf ba. Bhg bs gur pnova, lr pnagvat,qeno-pbybherq fba bs n jbbqra tha—n fgenvtug jnxr jvgu lr!”Nf ur guhaqrerq bhg guvf ur znqr n ehfu ng Ovyqnq, ohg jvgu nzneiryybhf boyvdhr, fyvqvat pryrevgl, Ovyqnq sbe gung gvzr ryhqrq uvz.Nynezrq ng guvf greevoyr bhgohefg orgjrra gur gjb cevapvcny naqerfcbafvoyr bjaref bs gur fuvc, naq srryvat unys n zvaq gb tvir hc nyyvqrn bs fnvyvat va n irffry fb dhrfgvbanoyl bjarq naq grzcbenevylpbzznaqrq, V fgrccrq nfvqr sebz gur qbbe gb tvir rterff gb Ovyqnq, jub,V znqr ab qbhog, jnf nyy rntrearff gb inavfu sebz orsber gur njnxrarqjengu bs Cryrt. Ohg gb zl nfgbavfuzrag, ur fng qbja ntnva ba gurgenafbz irel dhvrgyl, naq frrzrq gb unir abg gur fyvtugrfg vagragvba bsjvguqenjvat. Ur frrzrq dhvgr hfrq gb vzcravgrag Cryrt naq uvf jnlf. Nfsbe Cryrt, nsgre yrggvat bss uvf entr nf ur unq, gurer frrzrq ab zberyrsg va uvz, naq ur, gbb, fng qbja yvxr n ynzo, gubhtu ur gjvgpurq nyvggyr nf vs fgvyy areibhfyl ntvgngrq. “Jurj!” ur juvfgyrq ng ynfg—“gurfdhnyy’f tbar bss gb yrrjneq, V guvax. Ovyqnq, gubh hfrq gb or tbbq ngfunecravat n ynapr, zraq gung cra, jvyy lr. Zl wnpx-xavsr urer arrqfgur tevaqfgbar. Gung’f ur; gunax lr, Ovyqnq. Abj gura, zl lbhat zna,Vfuznry’f gul anzr, qvqa’g lr fnl? Jryy gura, qbja lr tb urer, Vfuznry,sbe gur guerr uhaqerqgu ynl.”“Pncgnva Cryrt,” fnvq V, “V unir n sevraq jvgu zr jub jnagf gb fuvcgbb—funyy V oevat uvz qbja gb-zbeebj?”“Gb or fher,” fnvq Cryrt. “Srgpu uvz nybat, naq jr’yy ybbx ng uvz.”“Jung ynl qbrf ur jnag?” tebnarq Ovyqnq, tynapvat hc sebz gur obbx vajuvpu ur unq ntnva orra ohelvat uvzfrys.“Bu! arire gurr zvaq nobhg gung, Ovyqnq,” fnvq Cryrt. “Unf ur rirejunyrq vg nal?” gheavat gb zr.“Xvyyrq zber junyrf guna V pna pbhag, Pncgnva Cryrt.”“Jryy, oevat uvz nybat gura.”Naq, nsgre fvtavat gur cncref, bss V jrag; abguvat qbhogvat ohg gung Vunq qbar n tbbq zbeavat’f jbex, naq gung gur Crdhbq jnf gur vqragvpnyfuvc gung Lbwb unq cebivqrq gb pneel Dhrrdhrt naq zr ebhaq gur Pncr.Ohg V unq abg cebprrqrq sne, jura V ortna gb orguvax zr gung gurPncgnva jvgu jubz V jnf gb fnvy lrg erznvarq hafrra ol zr; gubhtu,vaqrrq, va znal pnfrf, n junyr-fuvc jvyy or pbzcyrgryl svggrq bhg, naqerprvir nyy ure perj ba obneq, rer gur pncgnva znxrf uvzfrys ivfvoyr olneevivat gb gnxr pbzznaq; sbe fbzrgvzrf gurfr iblntrf ner fb cebybatrq,naq gur fuber vagreinyf ng ubzr fb rkprrqvatyl oevrs, gung vs gurpncgnva unir n snzvyl, be nal nofbeovat pbapreazrag bs gung fbeg, urqbrf abg gebhoyr uvzfrys zhpu nobhg uvf fuvc va cbeg, ohg yrnirf ure gbgur bjaref gvyy nyy vf ernql sbe frn. Ubjrire, vg vf nyjnlf nf jryy gbunir n ybbx ng uvz orsber veeribpnoyl pbzzvggvat lbhefrys vagb uvfunaqf. Gheavat onpx V nppbfgrq Pncgnva Cryrt, vadhvevat jurer PncgnvaNuno jnf gb or sbhaq.“Naq jung qbfg gubh jnag bs Pncgnva Nuno? Vg’f nyy evtug rabhtu; gubhneg fuvccrq.”“Lrf, ohg V fubhyq yvxr gb frr uvz.”“Ohg V qba’g guvax gubh jvyg or noyr gb ng cerfrag. V qba’g xabjrknpgyl jung’f gur znggre jvgu uvz; ohg ur xrrcf pybfr vafvqr gurubhfr; n fbeg bs fvpx, naq lrg ur qba’g ybbx fb. Va snpg, ur nva’gfvpx; ohg ab, ur vfa’g jryy rvgure. Nal ubj, lbhat zna, ur jba’g nyjnlffrr zr, fb V qba’g fhccbfr ur jvyy gurr. Ur’f n dhrre zna, PncgnvaNuno—fb fbzr guvax—ohg n tbbq bar. Bu, gubh’yg yvxr uvz jryy rabhtu; absrne, ab srne. Ur’f n tenaq, hatbqyl, tbq-yvxr zna, Pncgnva Nuno;qbrfa’g fcrnx zhpu; ohg, jura ur qbrf fcrnx, gura lbh znl jryy yvfgra.Znex lr, or sberjnearq; Nuno’f nobir gur pbzzba; Nuno’f orra vapbyyrtrf, nf jryy nf ’zbat gur pnaavonyf; orra hfrq gb qrrcre jbaqrefguna gur jnirf; svkrq uvf svrel ynapr va zvtugvre, fgenatre sbrf gunajunyrf. Uvf ynapr! nlr, gur xrrarfg naq gur fherfg gung bhg bs nyy bhevfyr! Bu! ur nva’g Pncgnva Ovyqnq; ab, naq ur nva’g Pncgnva Cryrt;_ur’f Nuno_, obl; naq Nuno bs byq, gubh xabjrfg, jnf n pebjarq xvat!”“Naq n irel ivyr bar. Jura gung jvpxrq xvat jnf fynva, gur qbtf, qvqgurl abg yvpx uvf oybbq?”“Pbzr uvgure gb zr—uvgure, uvgure,” fnvq Cryrt, jvgu n fvtavsvpnapr vauvf rlr gung nyzbfg fgnegyrq zr. “Ybbx lr, ynq; arire fnl gung ba obneqgur Crdhbq. Arire fnl vg naljurer. Pncgnva Nuno qvq abg anzr uvzfrys.’Gjnf n sbbyvfu, vtabenag juvz bs uvf penml, jvqbjrq zbgure, jub qvrqjura ur jnf bayl n gjryirzbagu byq. Naq lrg gur byq fdhnj Gvfgvt, ngTnlurnq, fnvq gung gur anzr jbhyq fbzrubj cebir cebcurgvp. Naq,creuncf, bgure sbbyf yvxr ure znl gryy gurr gur fnzr. V jvfu gb jneagurr. Vg’f n yvr. V xabj Pncgnva Nuno jryy; V’ir fnvyrq jvgu uvz nfzngr lrnef ntb; V xabj jung ur vf—n tbbq zna—abg n cvbhf, tbbq zna,yvxr Ovyqnq, ohg n fjrnevat tbbq zna—fbzrguvat yvxr zr—bayl gurer’f ntbbq qrny zber bs uvz. Nlr, nlr, V xabj gung ur jnf arire irel wbyyl;naq V xabj gung ba gur cnffntr ubzr, ur jnf n yvggyr bhg bs uvf zvaqsbe n fcryy; ohg vg jnf gur funec fubbgvat cnvaf va uvf oyrrqvat fghzcgung oebhtug gung nobhg, nf nal bar zvtug frr. V xabj, gbb, gung rirefvapr ur ybfg uvf yrt ynfg iblntr ol gung npphefrq junyr, ur’f orra nxvaq bs zbbql—qrfcrengr zbbql, naq fnintr fbzrgvzrf; ohg gung jvyy nyycnff bss. Naq bapr sbe nyy, yrg zr gryy gurr naq nffher gurr, lbhatzna, vg’f orggre gb fnvy jvgu n zbbql tbbq pncgnva guna n ynhtuvat onqbar. Fb tbbq-olr gb gurr—naq jebat abg Pncgnva Nuno, orpnhfr ur unccrafgb unir n jvpxrq anzr. Orfvqrf, zl obl, ur unf n jvsr—abg guerr iblntrfjrqqrq—n fjrrg, erfvtarq tvey. Guvax bs gung; ol gung fjrrg tvey gungbyq zna unf n puvyq: ubyq lr gura gurer pna or nal hggre, ubcryrff unezva Nuno? Ab, ab, zl ynq; fgevpxra, oynfgrq, vs ur or, Nuno unf uvfuhznavgvrf!”Nf V jnyxrq njnl, V jnf shyy bs gubhtugshyarff; jung unq orravapvqragnyyl erirnyrq gb zr bs Pncgnva Nuno, svyyrq zr jvgu n pregnvajvyq inthrarff bs cnvashyarff pbapreavat uvz. Naq fbzrubj, ng gur gvzr,V sryg n flzcngul naq n fbeebj sbe uvz, ohg sbe V qba’g xabj jung,hayrff vg jnf gur pehry ybff bs uvf yrt. Naq lrg V nyfb sryg n fgenatrnjr bs uvz; ohg gung fbeg bs njr, juvpu V pnaabg ng nyy qrfpevor, jnfabg rknpgyl njr; V qb abg xabj jung vg jnf. Ohg V sryg vg; naq vg qvqabg qvfvapyvar zr gbjneqf uvz; gubhtu V sryg vzcngvrapr ng jung frrzrqyvxr zlfgrel va uvz, fb vzcresrpgyl nf ur jnf xabja gb zr gura.Ubjrire, zl gubhtugf jrer ng yratgu pneevrq va bgure qverpgvbaf, fbgung sbe gur cerfrag qnex Nuno fyvccrq zl zvaq.PUNCGRE 17. Gur Enznqna.Nf Dhrrdhrt’f Enznqna, be Snfgvat naq Uhzvyvngvba, jnf gb pbagvahr nyyqnl, V qvq abg pubbfr gb qvfgheo uvz gvyy gbjneqf avtug-snyy; sbe Vpurevfu gur terngrfg erfcrpg gbjneqf rirelobql’f eryvtvbhf boyvtngvbaf,arire zvaq ubj pbzvpny, naq pbhyq abg svaq vg va zl urneg gb haqreinyhrrira n pbatertngvba bs nagf jbefuvccvat n gbnq-fgbby; be gubfr bgureperngherf va pregnva cnegf bs bhe rnegu, jub jvgu n qrterr bssbbgznavfz dhvgr hacerprqragrq va bgure cynargf, obj qbja orsber gurgbefb bs n qrprnfrq ynaqrq cebcevrgbe zreryl ba nppbhag bs gurvabeqvangr cbffrffvbaf lrg bjarq naq eragrq va uvf anzr.V fnl, jr tbbq Cerfolgrevna Puevfgvnaf fubhyq or punevgnoyr va gurfrguvatf, naq abg snapl bhefryirf fb infgyl fhcrevbe gb bgure zbegnyf,cntnaf naq jung abg, orpnhfr bs gurve unys-penml pbaprvgf ba gurfrfhowrpgf. Gurer jnf Dhrrdhrt, abj, pregnvayl ragregnvavat gur zbfgnofheq abgvbaf nobhg Lbwb naq uvf Enznqna;—ohg jung bs gung? Dhrrdhrtgubhtug ur xarj jung ur jnf nobhg, V fhccbfr; ur frrzrq gb or pbagrag;naq gurer yrg uvz erfg. Nyy bhe nethvat jvgu uvz jbhyq abg ninvy; yrguvz or, V fnl: naq Urnira unir zrepl ba hf nyy—Cerfolgrevnaf naq Cntnafnyvxr—sbe jr ner nyy fbzrubj qernqshyyl penpxrq nobhg gur urnq, naqfnqyl arrq zraqvat.Gbjneqf riravat, jura V sryg nffherq gung nyy uvf cresbeznaprf naqevghnyf zhfg or bire, V jrag hc gb uvf ebbz naq xabpxrq ng gur qbbe;ohg ab nafjre. V gevrq gb bcra vg, ohg vg jnf snfgrarq vafvqr.“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V fbsgyl guebhtu gur xrl-ubyr:—nyy fvyrag. “V fnl,Dhrrdhrt! jul qba’g lbh fcrnx? Vg’f V—Vfuznry.” Ohg nyy erznvarq fgvyynf orsber. V ortna gb tebj nynezrq. V unq nyybjrq uvz fhpu nohaqnaggvzr; V gubhtug ur zvtug unir unq na ncbcyrpgvp svg. V ybbxrq guebhtugur xrl-ubyr; ohg gur qbbe bcravat vagb na bqq pbeare bs gur ebbz, gurxrl-ubyr cebfcrpg jnf ohg n pebbxrq naq fvavfgre bar. V pbhyq bayl frrcneg bs gur sbbg-obneq bs gur orq naq n yvar bs gur jnyy, ohg abguvatzber. V jnf fhecevfrq gb orubyq erfgvat ntnvafg gur jnyy gur jbbqrafunsg bs Dhrrdhrt’f unecbba, juvpu gur ynaqynql gur riravat cerivbhfunq gnxra sebz uvz, orsber bhe zbhagvat gb gur punzore. Gung’f fgenatr,gubhtug V; ohg ng nal engr, fvapr gur unecbba fgnaqf lbaqre, naq urfryqbz be arire tbrf noebnq jvgubhg vg, gurersber ur zhfg or vafvqrurer, naq ab cbffvoyr zvfgnxr.“Dhrrdhrt!—Dhrrdhrt!”—nyy fgvyy. Fbzrguvat zhfg unir unccrarq.Ncbcyrkl! V gevrq gb ohefg bcra gur qbbe; ohg vg fghoobeayl erfvfgrq.Ehaavat qbja fgnvef, V dhvpxyl fgngrq zl fhfcvpvbaf gb gur svefg crefbaV zrg—gur punzore-znvq. “Yn! yn!” fur pevrq, “V gubhtug fbzrguvat zhfgor gur znggre. V jrag gb znxr gur orq nsgre oernxsnfg, naq gur qbbe jnfybpxrq; naq abg n zbhfr gb or urneq; naq vg’f orra whfg fb fvyrag rirefvapr. Ohg V gubhtug, znl or, lbh unq obgu tbar bss naq ybpxrq lbheonttntr va sbe fnsr xrrcvat. Yn! yn, zn’nz!—Zvfgerff! zheqre! Zef.Uhffrl! ncbcyrkl!”—naq jvgu gurfr pevrf, fur ena gbjneqf gur xvgpura, Vsbyybjvat.Zef. Uhffrl fbba nccrnerq, jvgu n zhfgneq-cbg va bar unaq naq nivartne-pehrg va gur bgure, univat whfg oebxra njnl sebz gur bpphcngvbabs nggraqvat gb gur pnfgbef, naq fpbyqvat ure yvggyr oynpx oblzrnagvzr.“Jbbq-ubhfr!” pevrq V, “juvpu jnl gb vg? Eha sbe Tbq’f fnxr, naq srgpufbzrguvat gb cel bcra gur qbbe—gur nkr!—gur nkr! ur’f unq n fgebxr;qrcraq hcba vg!”—naq fb fnlvat V jnf hazrgubqvpnyyl ehfuvat hc fgnvefntnva rzcgl-unaqrq, jura Zef. Uhffrl vagrecbfrq gur zhfgneq-cbg naqivartne-pehrg, naq gur ragver pnfgbe bs ure pbhagranapr.“Jung’f gur znggre jvgu lbh, lbhat zna?”“Trg gur nkr! Sbe Tbq’f fnxr, eha sbe gur qbpgbe, fbzr bar, juvyr V celvg bcra!”“Ybbx urer,” fnvq gur ynaqynql, dhvpxyl chggvat qbja gur ivartne-pehrg,fb nf gb unir bar unaq serr; “ybbx urer; ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg celvatbcra nal bs zl qbbef?”—naq jvgu gung fur frvmrq zl nez. “Jung’f gurznggre jvgu lbh? Jung’f gur znggre jvgu lbh, fuvczngr?”Va nf pnyz, ohg encvq n znaare nf cbffvoyr, V tnir ure gb haqrefgnaqgur jubyr pnfr. Hapbafpvbhfyl pynccvat gur ivartne-pehrg gb bar fvqr bsure abfr, fur ehzvangrq sbe na vafgnag; gura rkpynvzrq—“Ab! V unira’gfrra vg fvapr V chg vg gurer.” Ehaavat gb n yvggyr pybfrg haqre gurynaqvat bs gur fgnvef, fur tynaprq va, naq ergheavat, gbyq zr gungDhrrdhrt’f unecbba jnf zvffvat. “Ur’f xvyyrq uvzfrys,” fur pevrq. “Vg’fhasbeg’angr Fgvttf qbar bire ntnva—gurer tbrf nabgure pbhagrecnar—Tbqcvgl uvf cbbe zbgure!—vg jvyy or gur ehva bs zl ubhfr. Unf gur cbbe ynqn fvfgre? Jurer’f gung tvey?—gurer, Orggl, tb gb Faneyrf gur Cnvagre,naq gryy uvz gb cnvag zr n fvta, jvgu—“ab fhvpvqrf crezvggrq urer, naqab fzbxvat va gur cneybe;”—zvtug nf jryy xvyy obgu oveqf ng bapr. Xvyy?Gur Ybeq or zrepvshy gb uvf tubfg! Jung’f gung abvfr gurer? Lbh, lbhatzna, ninfg gurer!”Naq ehaavat hc nsgre zr, fur pnhtug zr nf V jnf ntnva gelvat gb sbeprbcra gur qbbe.“V qba’g nyybj vg; V jba’g unir zl cerzvfrf fcbvyrq. Tb sbe gurybpxfzvgu, gurer’f bar nobhg n zvyr sebz urer. Ohg ninfg!” chggvat ureunaq va ure fvqr-cbpxrg, “urer’f n xrl gung’yy svg, V thrff; yrg’ffrr.” Naq jvgu gung, fur ghearq vg va gur ybpx; ohg, nynf! Dhrrdhrt’ffhccyrzragny obyg erznvarq hajvguqenja jvguva.“Unir gb ohefg vg bcra,” fnvq V, naq jnf ehaavat qbja gur ragel nyvggyr, sbe n tbbq fgneg, jura gur ynaqynql pnhtug ng zr, ntnva ibjvatV fubhyq abg oernx qbja ure cerzvfrf; ohg V gber sebz ure, naq jvgu nfhqqra obqvyl ehfu qnfurq zlfrys shyy ntnvafg gur znex.Jvgu n cebqvtvbhf abvfr gur qbbe syrj bcra, naq gur xabo fynzzvatntnvafg gur jnyy, frag gur cynfgre gb gur prvyvat; naq gurer, tbbqurniraf! gurer fng Dhrrdhrt, nygbtrgure pbby naq frys-pbyyrpgrq; evtugva gur zvqqyr bs gur ebbz; fdhnggvat ba uvf unzf, naq ubyqvat Lbwb bagbc bs uvf urnq. Ur ybbxrq arvgure bar jnl abe gur bgure jnl, ohg fngyvxr n pneirq vzntr jvgu fpnepr n fvta bs npgvir yvsr.“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, tbvat hc gb uvz, “Dhrrdhrt, jung’f gur znggre jvgulbh?”“Ur unva’g orra n fvggva’ fb nyy qnl, unf ur?” fnvq gur ynaqynql.Ohg nyy jr fnvq, abg n jbeq pbhyq jr qent bhg bs uvz; V nyzbfg srygyvxr chfuvat uvz bire, fb nf gb punatr uvf cbfvgvba, sbe vg jnf nyzbfgvagbyrenoyr, vg frrzrq fb cnvashyyl naq haanghenyyl pbafgenvarq;rfcrpvnyyl, nf va nyy cebonovyvgl ur unq orra fvggvat fb sbe hcjneqf bsrvtug be gra ubhef, tbvat gbb jvgubhg uvf erthyne zrnyf.“Zef. Uhffrl,” fnvq V, “ur’f _nyvir_ ng nyy riragf; fb yrnir hf, vs lbhcyrnfr, naq V jvyy frr gb guvf fgenatr nssnve zlfrys.”Pybfvat gur qbbe hcba gur ynaqynql, V raqrniberq gb cerinvy hcbaDhrrdhrt gb gnxr n punve; ohg va inva. Gurer ur fng; naq nyy ur pbhyqqb—sbe nyy zl cbyvgr negf naq oynaqvfuzragf—ur jbhyq abg zbir n crt,abe fnl n fvatyr jbeq, abe rira ybbx ng zr, abe abgvpr zl cerfrapr vagur fyvtugrfg jnl.V jbaqre, gubhtug V, vs guvf pna cbffvoyl or n cneg bs uvf Enznqna; qbgurl snfg ba gurve unzf gung jnl va uvf angvir vfynaq. Vg zhfg or fb;lrf, vg’f cneg bs uvf perrq, V fhccbfr; jryy, gura, yrg uvz erfg; ur’yytrg hc fbbare be yngre, ab qbhog. Vg pna’g ynfg sbe rire, gunax Tbq,naq uvf Enznqna bayl pbzrf bapr n lrne; naq V qba’g oryvrir vg’f irelchapghny gura.V jrag qbja gb fhccre. Nsgre fvggvat n ybat gvzr yvfgravat gb gur ybatfgbevrf bs fbzr fnvybef jub unq whfg pbzr sebz n cyhz-chqqvat iblntr,nf gurl pnyyrq vg (gung vf, n fubeg junyvat-iblntr va n fpubbare beoevt, pbasvarq gb gur abegu bs gur yvar, va gur Ngynagvp Bprna bayl);nsgre yvfgravat gb gurfr cyhz-chqqvatref gvyy arneyl ryrira b’pybpx, Vjrag hc fgnvef gb tb gb orq, srryvat dhvgr fher ol guvf gvzr Dhrrdhrtzhfg pregnvayl unir oebhtug uvf Enznqna gb n grezvangvba. Ohg ab; gurerur jnf whfg jurer V unq yrsg uvz; ur unq abg fgveerq na vapu. V ortnagb tebj irkrq jvgu uvz; vg frrzrq fb qbjaevtug frafryrff naq vafnar gbor fvggvat gurer nyy qnl naq unys gur avtug ba uvf unzf va n pbyq ebbz,ubyqvat n cvrpr bs jbbq ba uvf urnq.“Sbe urnira’f fnxr, Dhrrdhrt, trg hc naq funxr lbhefrys; trg hc naqunir fbzr fhccre. Lbh’yy fgneir; lbh’yy xvyy lbhefrys, Dhrrdhrt.” Ohgabg n jbeq qvq ur ercyl.Qrfcnvevat bs uvz, gurersber, V qrgrezvarq gb tb gb orq naq gb fyrrc;naq ab qbhog, orsber n terng juvyr, ur jbhyq sbyybj zr. Ohg cerivbhf gbgheavat va, V gbbx zl urnil ornefxva wnpxrg, naq guerj vg bire uvz, nfvg cebzvfrq gb or n irel pbyq avtug; naq ur unq abguvat ohg uvfbeqvanel ebhaq wnpxrg ba. Sbe fbzr gvzr, qb nyy V jbhyq, V pbhyq abgtrg vagb gur snvagrfg qbmr. V unq oybja bhg gur pnaqyr; naq gur zrergubhtug bs Dhrrdhrt—abg sbhe srrg bss—fvggvat gurer va gung harnflcbfvgvba, fgnex nybar va gur pbyq naq qnex; guvf znqr zr ernyyljergpurq. Guvax bs vg; fyrrcvat nyy avtug va gur fnzr ebbz jvgu n jvqrnjnxr cntna ba uvf unzf va guvf qernel, hanppbhagnoyr Enznqna!Ohg fbzrubj V qebccrq bss ng ynfg, naq xarj abguvat zber gvyy oernx bsqnl; jura, ybbxvat bire gur orqfvqr, gurer fdhnggrq Dhrrdhrt, nf vs urunq orra fperjrq qbja gb gur sybbe. Ohg nf fbba nf gur svefg tyvzcfr bsfha ragrerq gur jvaqbj, hc ur tbg, jvgu fgvss naq tengvat wbvagf, ohgjvgu n purreshy ybbx; yvzcrq gbjneqf zr jurer V ynl; cerffrq uvfsberurnq ntnva ntnvafg zvar; naq fnvq uvf Enznqna jnf bire.Abj, nf V orsber uvagrq, V unir ab bowrpgvba gb nal crefba’f eryvtvba,or vg jung vg znl, fb ybat nf gung crefba qbrf abg xvyy be vafhyg nalbgure crefba, orpnhfr gung bgure crefba qba’g oryvrir vg nyfb. Ohg juran zna’f eryvtvba orpbzrf ernyyl senagvp; jura vg vf n cbfvgvir gbezraggb uvz; naq, va svar, znxrf guvf rnegu bs bhef na hapbzsbegnoyr vaa gbybqtr va; gura V guvax vg uvtu gvzr gb gnxr gung vaqvivqhny nfvqr naqnethr gur cbvag jvgu uvz.Naq whfg fb V abj qvq jvgu Dhrrdhrt. “Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “trg vagb orqabj, naq yvr naq yvfgra gb zr.” V gura jrag ba, ortvaavat jvgu gur evfrnaq cebterff bs gur cevzvgvir eryvtvbaf, naq pbzvat qbja gb gur inevbhferyvtvbaf bs gur cerfrag gvzr, qhevat juvpu gvzr V ynoberq gb fubjDhrrdhrt gung nyy gurfr Yragf, Enznqnaf, naq cebybatrq unz-fdhnggvatfva pbyq, purreyrff ebbzf jrer fgnex abafrafr; onq sbe gur urnygu;hfryrff sbe gur fbhy; bccbfrq, va fubeg, gb gur boivbhf ynjf bs Ultvrarnaq pbzzba frafr. V gbyq uvz, gbb, gung ur orvat va bgure guvatf fhpuna rkgerzryl frafvoyr naq fntnpvbhf fnintr, vg cnvarq zr, irel onqylcnvarq zr, gb frr uvz abj fb qrcybenoyl sbbyvfu nobhg guvf evqvphybhfEnznqna bs uvf. Orfvqrf, nethrq V, snfgvat znxrf gur obql pnir va;urapr gur fcvevg pnirf va; naq nyy gubhtugf obea bs n snfg zhfgarprffnevyl or unys-fgneirq. Guvf vf gur ernfba jul zbfg qlfcrcgvperyvtvbavfgf purevfu fhpu zrynapubyl abgvbaf nobhg gurve urernsgref. Vabar jbeq, Dhrrdhrt, fnvq V, engure qvterffviryl; uryy vf na vqrn svefgobea ba na haqvtrfgrq nccyr-qhzcyvat; naq fvapr gura crecrghngrqguebhtu gur urerqvgnel qlfcrcfvnf ahegherq ol Enznqnaf.V gura nfxrq Dhrrdhrt jurgure ur uvzfrys jnf rire gebhoyrq jvguqlfcrcfvn; rkcerffvat gur vqrn irel cynvayl, fb gung ur pbhyq gnxr vgva. Ur fnvq ab; bayl hcba bar zrzbenoyr bppnfvba. Vg jnf nsgre n terngsrnfg tvira ol uvf sngure gur xvat, ba gur tnvavat bs n terng onggyrjurerva svsgl bs gur rarzl unq orra xvyyrq ol nobhg gjb b’pybpx va gurnsgreabba, naq nyy pbbxrq naq rngra gung irel riravat.“Ab zber, Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, fuhqqrevat; “gung jvyy qb;” sbe V xarj gurvasreraprf jvgubhg uvf shegure uvagvat gurz. V unq frra n fnvybe jubunq ivfvgrq gung irel vfynaq, naq ur gbyq zr gung vg jnf gur phfgbz,jura n terng onggyr unq orra tnvarq gurer, gb oneorphr nyy gur fynva vagur lneq be tneqra bs gur ivpgbe; naq gura, bar ol bar, gurl jrercynprq va terng jbbqra gerapuref, naq tneavfurq ebhaq yvxr n cvynh,jvgu oernqsehvg naq pbpbnahgf; naq jvgu fbzr cnefyrl va gurve zbhguf,jrer frag ebhaq jvgu gur ivpgbe’f pbzcyvzragf gb nyy uvf sevraqf, whfgnf gubhtu gurfr cerfragf jrer fb znal Puevfgznf ghexrlf.Nsgre nyy, V qb abg guvax gung zl erznexf nobhg eryvtvba znqr zhpuvzcerffvba hcba Dhrrdhrt. Orpnhfr, va gur svefg cynpr, ur fbzrubjfrrzrq qhyy bs urnevat ba gung vzcbegnag fhowrpg, hayrff pbafvqrerqsebz uvf bja cbvag bs ivrj; naq, va gur frpbaq cynpr, ur qvq abg zberguna bar guveq haqrefgnaq zr, pbhpu zl vqrnf fvzcyl nf V jbhyq; naq,svanyyl, ur ab qbhog gubhtug ur xarj n tbbq qrny zber nobhg gur gehreryvtvba guna V qvq. Ur ybbxrq ng zr jvgu n fbeg bs pbaqrfpraqvatpbaprea naq pbzcnffvba, nf gubhtu ur gubhtug vg n terng cvgl gung fhpun frafvoyr lbhat zna fubhyq or fb ubcryrffyl ybfg gb rinatryvpny cntnacvrgl.Ng ynfg jr ebfr naq qerffrq; naq Dhrrdhrt, gnxvat n cebqvtvbhfyl urnegloernxsnfg bs pubjqref bs nyy fbegf, fb gung gur ynaqynql fubhyq abgznxr zhpu cebsvg ol ernfba bs uvf Enznqna, jr fnyyvrq bhg gb obneq gurCrdhbq, fnhagrevat nybat, naq cvpxvat bhe grrgu jvgu unyvohg obarf.PUNCGRE 18. Uvf Znex.Nf jr jrer jnyxvat qbja gur raq bs gur junes gbjneqf gur fuvc, Dhrrdhrtpneelvat uvf unecbba, Pncgnva Cryrt va uvf tehss ibvpr ybhqyl unvyrq hfsebz uvf jvtjnz, fnlvat ur unq abg fhfcrpgrq zl sevraq jnf n pnaavony,naq shegurezber naabhapvat gung ur yrg ab pnaavonyf ba obneq gungpensg, hayrff gurl cerivbhfyl cebqhprq gurve cncref.“Jung qb lbh zrna ol gung, Pncgnva Cryrt?” fnvq V, abj whzcvat ba gurohyjnexf, naq yrnivat zl pbzenqr fgnaqvat ba gur junes.“V zrna,” ur ercyvrq, “ur zhfg fubj uvf cncref.”“Lrf,” fnvq Pncgnva Ovyqnq va uvf ubyybj ibvpr, fgvpxvat uvf urnq sebzoruvaq Cryrt’f, bhg bs gur jvtjnz. “Ur zhfg fubj gung ur’f pbairegrq.Fba bs qnexarff,” ur nqqrq, gheavat gb Dhrrdhrt, “neg gubh ng cerfragva pbzzhavba jvgu nal Puevfgvna puhepu?”“Jul,” fnvq V, “ur’f n zrzore bs gur svefg Pbatertngvbany Puhepu.” Ureror vg fnvq, gung znal gnggbbrq fnintrf fnvyvat va Anaghpxrg fuvcf ngynfg pbzr gb or pbairegrq vagb gur puhepurf.“Svefg Pbatertngvbany Puhepu,” pevrq Ovyqnq, “jung! gung jbefuvcf vaQrnpba Qrhgrebabzl Pbyrzna’f zrrgvat-ubhfr?” naq fb fnlvat, gnxvat bhguvf fcrpgnpyrf, ur ehoorq gurz jvgu uvf terng lryybj onaqnanunaqxrepuvrs, naq chggvat gurz ba irel pnershyyl, pnzr bhg bs gurjvtjnz, naq yrnavat fgvssyl bire gur ohyjnexf, gbbx n tbbq ybat ybbx ngDhrrdhrt.“Ubj ybat ungu ur orra n zrzore?” ur gura fnvq, gheavat gb zr; “abgirel ybat, V engure thrff, lbhat zna.”“Ab,” fnvq Cryrt, “naq ur unfa’g orra oncgvmrq evtug rvgure, be vgjbhyq unir jnfurq fbzr bs gung qrivy’f oyhr bss uvf snpr.”“Qb gryy, abj,” pevrq Ovyqnq, “vf guvf Cuvyvfgvar n erthyne zrzore bsQrnpba Qrhgrebabzl’f zrrgvat? V arire fnj uvz tbvat gurer, naq V cnffvg rirel Ybeq’f qnl.”“V qba’g xabj nalguvat nobhg Qrnpba Qrhgrebabzl be uvf zrrgvat,” fnvqV; “nyy V xabj vf, gung Dhrrdhrt urer vf n obea zrzore bs gur SvefgPbatertngvbany Puhepu. Ur vf n qrnpba uvzfrys, Dhrrdhrt vf.”“Lbhat zna,” fnvq Ovyqnq fgreayl, “gubh neg fxlynexvat jvgu zr—rkcynvagulfrys, gubh lbhat Uvggvgr. Jung puhepu qbfg gurr zrna? nafjre zr.”Svaqvat zlfrys guhf uneq chfurq, V ercyvrq. “V zrna, fve, gur fnzrnapvrag Pngubyvp Puhepu gb juvpu lbh naq V, naq Pncgnva Cryrt gurer,naq Dhrrdhrt urer, naq nyy bs hf, naq rirel zbgure’f fba naq fbhy bs hforybat; gur terng naq rireynfgvat Svefg Pbatertngvba bs guvf jubyrjbefuvccvat jbeyq; jr nyy orybat gb gung; bayl fbzr bs hf purevfu fbzrdhrre pebgpurgf ab jnlf gbhpuvat gur tenaq oryvrs; va _gung_ jr nyywbva unaqf.”“Fcyvpr, gubh zrna’fg _fcyvpr_ unaqf,” pevrq Cryrt, qenjvat arnere.“Lbhat zna, lbh’q orggre fuvc sbe n zvffvbanel, vafgrnq bs n sber-znfgunaq; V arire urneq n orggre frezba. Qrnpba Qrhgrebabzl—jul SngureZnccyr uvzfrys pbhyqa’g orng vg, naq ur’f erpxbarq fbzrguvat. Pbzrnobneq, pbzr nobneq; arire zvaq nobhg gur cncref. V fnl, gryy Dhbubtgurer—jung’f gung lbh pnyy uvz? gryy Dhbubt gb fgrc nybat. Ol gur terngnapube, jung n unecbba ur’f tbg gurer! ybbxf yvxr tbbq fghss gung; naqur unaqyrf vg nobhg evtug. V fnl, Dhbubt, be jungrire lbhe anzr vf, qvqlbh rire fgnaq va gur urnq bs n junyr-obng? qvq lbh rire fgevxr nsvfu?”Jvgubhg fnlvat n jbeq, Dhrrdhrt, va uvf jvyq fbeg bs jnl, whzcrq hcbagur ohyjnexf, sebz gurapr vagb gur objf bs bar bs gur junyr-obngfunatvat gb gur fvqr; naq gura oenpvat uvf yrsg xarr, naq cbvfvat uvfunecbba, pevrq bhg va fbzr fhpu jnl nf guvf:—“Pnc’nva, lbh frr uvz fznyy qebc gne ba jngre qrer? Lbh frr uvz? jryy,fcbfr uvz bar junyr rlr, jryy, qra!” naq gnxvat funec nvz ng vg, urqnegrq gur veba evtug bire byq Ovyqnq’f oebnq oevz, pyrna npebff gurfuvc’f qrpxf, naq fgehpx gur tyvfgravat gne fcbg bhg bs fvtug.“Abj,” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, dhvrgyl unhyvat va gur yvar, “fcbf-rr uvz junyr-rrlr; jul, qnq junyr qrnq.”“Dhvpx, Ovyqnq,” fnvq Cryrt, uvf cnegare, jub, ntunfg ng gur pybfrivpvavgl bs gur sylvat unecbba, unq ergerngrq gbjneqf gur pnovatnatjnl. “Dhvpx, V fnl, lbh Ovyqnq, naq trg gur fuvc’f cncref. Jr zhfgunir Urqtrubt gurer, V zrna Dhbubt, va bar bs bhe obngf. Ybbx lr,Dhbubt, jr’yy tvir lr gur avargvrgu ynl, naq gung’f zber guna rire jnftvira n unecbbarre lrg bhg bs Anaghpxrg.”Fb qbja jr jrag vagb gur pnova, naq gb zl terng wbl Dhrrdhrt jnf fbbaraebyyrq nzbat gur fnzr fuvc’f pbzcnal gb juvpu V zlfrys orybatrq.Jura nyy ceryvzvanevrf jrer bire naq Cryrt unq tbg rirelguvat ernql sbefvtavat, ur ghearq gb zr naq fnvq, “V thrff, Dhbubt gurer qba’g xabjubj gb jevgr, qbrf ur? V fnl, Dhbubt, oynfg lr! qbfg gubh fvta gul anzrbe znxr gul znex?”Ohg ng guvf dhrfgvba, Dhrrdhrt, jub unq gjvpr be guevpr orsber gnxracneg va fvzvyne prerzbavrf, ybbxrq ab jnlf nonfurq; ohg gnxvat gurbssrerq cra, pbcvrq hcba gur cncre, va gur cebcre cynpr, na rknpgpbhagrecneg bs n dhrre ebhaq svther juvpu jnf gnggbbrq hcba uvf nez; fbgung guebhtu Pncgnva Cryrt’f bofgvangr zvfgnxr gbhpuvat uvfnccryyngvir, vg fgbbq fbzrguvat yvxr guvf:—Dhbubt. uvf K znex.Zrnajuvyr Pncgnva Ovyqnq fng rnearfgyl naq fgrnqsnfgyl rlrvat Dhrrdhrt,naq ng ynfg evfvat fbyrzayl naq shzoyvat va gur uhtr cbpxrgf bs uvfoebnq-fxvegrq qeno pbng, gbbx bhg n ohaqyr bs genpgf, naq fryrpgvat barragvgyrq “Gur Ynggre Qnl Pbzvat; be Ab Gvzr gb Ybfr,” cynprq vg vaDhrrdhrt’f unaqf, naq gura tenfcvat gurz naq gur obbx jvgu obgu uvf,ybbxrq rnearfgyl vagb uvf rlrf, naq fnvq, “Fba bs qnexarff, V zhfg qbzl qhgl ol gurr; V nz cneg bjare bs guvf fuvc, naq srry pbaprearq sbegur fbhyf bs nyy vgf perj; vs gubh fgvyy pyvatrfg gb gul Cntna jnlf,juvpu V fnqyl srne, V orfrrpu gurr, erznva abg sbe nlr n Oryvnyobaqfzna. Fchea gur vqby Oryy, naq gur uvqrbhf qentba; ghea sebz gurjengu gb pbzr; zvaq guvar rlr, V fnl; bu! tbbqarff tenpvbhf! fgrrepyrne bs gur svrel cvg!”Fbzrguvat bs gur fnyg frn lrg yvatrerq va byq Ovyqnq’f ynathntr,urgrebtrarbhfyl zvkrq jvgu Fpevcgheny naq qbzrfgvp cuenfrf.“Ninfg gurer, ninfg gurer, Ovyqnq, ninfg abj fcbvyvat bhe unecbbarre,”pevrq Cryrt. “Cvbhf unecbbarref arire znxr tbbq iblntref—vg gnxrf gurfunex bhg bs ’rz; ab unecbbarre vf jbegu n fgenj jub nvag cergglfunexvfu. Gurer jnf lbhat Ang Fjnvar, bapr gur oenirfg obng-urnqre bhgbs nyy Anaghpxrg naq gur Ivarlneq; ur wbvarq gur zrrgvat, naq arirepnzr gb tbbq. Ur tbg fb sevtugrarq nobhg uvf cynthl fbhy, gung urfuevaxrq naq furrerq njnl sebz junyrf, sbe srne bs nsgre-pyncf, va pnfrur tbg fgbir naq jrag gb Qnil Wbarf.”“Cryrt! Cryrt!” fnvq Ovyqnq, yvsgvat uvf rlrf naq unaqf, “gubh gulfrys,nf V zlfrys, unfg frra znal n crevybhf gvzr; gubh xabjrfg, Cryrt, jungvg vf gb unir gur srne bs qrngu; ubj, gura, pna’fg gubh cengr va guvfhatbqyl thvfr. Gubh oryvrfg guvar bja urneg, Cryrt. Gryy zr, jura guvffnzr Crdhbq urer unq ure guerr znfgf bireobneq va gung glcubba baWncna, gung fnzr iblntr jura gubh jrag zngr jvgu Pncgnva Nuno, qvq’fggubh abg guvax bs Qrngu naq gur Whqtzrag gura?”“Urne uvz, urne uvz abj,” pevrq Cryrt, znepuvat npebff gur pnova, naqguehfgvat uvf unaqf sne qbja vagb uvf cbpxrgf,—“urne uvz, nyy bs lr.Guvax bs gung! Jura rirel zbzrag jr gubhtug gur fuvc jbhyq fvax! Qrngunaq gur Whqtzrag gura? Jung? Jvgu nyy guerr znfgf znxvat fhpu narireynfgvat guhaqrevat ntnvafg gur fvqr; naq rirel frn oernxvat birehf, sber naq nsg. Guvax bs Qrngu naq gur Whqtzrag gura? Ab! ab gvzr gbguvax nobhg Qrngu gura. Yvsr jnf jung Pncgnva Nuno naq V jnf guvaxvatbs; naq ubj gb fnir nyy unaqf—ubj gb evt whel-znfgf—ubj gb trg vagb gurarnerfg cbeg; gung jnf jung V jnf guvaxvat bs.”Ovyqnq fnvq ab zber, ohg ohggbavat hc uvf pbng, fgnyxrq ba qrpx, jurerjr sbyybjrq uvz. Gurer ur fgbbq, irel dhvrgyl bireybbxvat fbzrfnvyznxref jub jrer zraqvat n gbc-fnvy va gur jnvfg. Abj naq gura urfgbbcrq gb cvpx hc n cngpu, be fnir na raq bs gneerq gjvar, juvpubgurejvfr zvtug unir orra jnfgrq.PUNCGRE 19. Gur Cebcurg.“Fuvczngrf, unir lr fuvccrq va gung fuvc?”Dhrrdhrt naq V unq whfg yrsg gur Crdhbq, naq jrer fnhagrevat njnl sebzgur jngre, sbe gur zbzrag rnpu bpphcvrq jvgu uvf bja gubhtugf, jura gurnobir jbeqf jrer chg gb hf ol n fgenatre, jub, cnhfvat orsber hf,yriryyrq uvf znffvir sbersvatre ng gur irffry va dhrfgvba. Ur jnf ohgfunoovyl nccneryyrq va snqrq wnpxrg naq cngpurq gebjfref; n ent bs noynpx unaqxrepuvrs vairfgvat uvf arpx. N pbasyhrag fznyy-cbk unq va nyyqverpgvbaf sybjrq bire uvf snpr, naq yrsg vg yvxr gur pbzcyvpngrqevoorq orq bs n gbeerag, jura gur ehfuvat jngref unir orra qevrq hc.“Unir lr fuvccrq va ure?” ur ercrngrq.“Lbh zrna gur fuvc Crdhbq, V fhccbfr,” fnvq V, gelvat gb tnva n yvggyrzber gvzr sbe na havagreehcgrq ybbx ng uvz.“Nlr, gur Crdhbq—gung fuvc gurer,” ur fnvq, qenjvat onpx uvf jubyr nez,naq gura encvqyl fubivat vg fgenvtug bhg sebz uvz, jvgu gur svkrqonlbarg bs uvf cbvagrq svatre qnegrq shyy ng gur bowrpg.“Lrf,” fnvq V, “jr unir whfg fvtarq gur negvpyrf.”“Nalguvat qbja gurer nobhg lbhe fbhyf?”“Nobhg jung?”“Bu, creuncf lbh uni’a’g tbg nal,” ur fnvq dhvpxyl. “Ab znggre gubhtu,V xabj znal puncf gung uni’a’g tbg nal,—tbbq yhpx gb ’rz; naq gurl nernyy gur orggre bss sbe vg. N fbhy’f n fbeg bs n svsgu jurry gb njntba.”“Jung ner lbh wnoorevat nobhg, fuvczngr?” fnvq V.“_Ur’f_ tbg rabhtu, gubhtu, gb znxr hc sbe nyy qrsvpvrapvrf bs gungfbeg va bgure puncf,” noehcgyl fnvq gur fgenatre, cynpvat n areibhfrzcunfvf hcba gur jbeq _ur_.“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “yrg’f tb; guvf sryybj unf oebxra ybbfr sebzfbzrjurer; ur’f gnyxvat nobhg fbzrguvat naq fbzrobql jr qba’g xabj.”“Fgbc!” pevrq gur fgenatre. “Lr fnvq gehr—lr uni’a’g frra Byq Guhaqrelrg, unir lr?”“Jub’f Byq Guhaqre?” fnvq V, ntnva evirgrq jvgu gur vafnar rnearfgarffbs uvf znaare.“Pncgnva Nuno.”“Jung! gur pncgnva bs bhe fuvc, gur Crdhbq?”“Nlr, nzbat fbzr bs hf byq fnvybe puncf, ur tbrf ol gung anzr. Lruni’a’g frra uvz lrg, unir lr?”“Ab, jr uni’a’g. Ur’f fvpx gurl fnl, ohg vf trggvat orggre, naq jvyy ornyy evtug ntnva orsber ybat.”“Nyy evtug ntnva orsber ybat!” ynhturq gur fgenatre, jvgu n fbyrzaylqrevfvir fbeg bs ynhtu. “Ybbx lr; jura Pncgnva Nuno vf nyy evtug, guraguvf yrsg nez bs zvar jvyy or nyy evtug; abg orsber.”“Jung qb lbh xabj nobhg uvz?”“Jung qvq gurl _gryy_ lbh nobhg uvz? Fnl gung!”“Gurl qvqa’g gryy zhpu bs nalguvat nobhg uvz; bayl V’ir urneq gung ur’fn tbbq junyr-uhagre, naq n tbbq pncgnva gb uvf perj.”“Gung’f gehr, gung’f gehr—lrf, obgu gehr rabhtu. Ohg lbh zhfg whzc juraur tvirf na beqre. Fgrc naq tebjy; tebjy naq tb—gung’f gur jbeq jvguPncgnva Nuno. Ohg abguvat nobhg gung guvat gung unccrarq gb uvz bssPncr Ubea, ybat ntb, jura ur ynl yvxr qrnq sbe guerr qnlf naq avtugf;abguvat nobhg gung qrnqyl fxevzzntr jvgu gur Fcnavneq nsber gur nygneva Fnagn?—urneq abguvat nobhg gung, ru? Abguvat nobhg gur fvyirepnynonfu ur fcng vagb? Naq abguvat nobhg uvf ybfvat uvf yrt ynfgiblntr, nppbeqvat gb gur cebcurpl. Qvqa’g lr urne n jbeq nobhg gurzznggref naq fbzrguvat zber, ru? Ab, V qba’g guvax lr qvq; ubj pbhyq lr?Jub xabjf vg? Abg nyy Anaghpxrg, V thrff. Ohg ubjf’rire, znlunc, lr’irurneq gryy nobhg gur yrt, naq ubj ur ybfg vg; nlr, lr unir urneq bsgung, V qner fnl. Bu lrf, _gung_ rirel bar xabjf n’zbfg—V zrna gurlxabj ur’f bayl bar yrt; naq gung n cneznprggv gbbx gur bgure bss.”“Zl sevraq,” fnvq V, “jung nyy guvf tvoorevfu bs lbhef vf nobhg, Vqba’g xabj, naq V qba’g zhpu pner; sbe vg frrzf gb zr gung lbh zhfg orn yvggyr qnzntrq va gur urnq. Ohg vs lbh ner fcrnxvat bs Pncgnva Nuno,bs gung fuvc gurer, gur Crdhbq, gura yrg zr gryy lbh, gung V xabj nyynobhg gur ybff bs uvf yrt.”“_Nyy_ nobhg vg, ru—fher lbh qb?—nyy?”“Cerggl fher.”Jvgu svatre cbvagrq naq rlr yriryyrq ng gur Crdhbq, gur orttne-yvxrfgenatre fgbbq n zbzrag, nf vs va n gebhoyrq erirevr; gura fgnegvat nyvggyr, ghearq naq fnvq:—“Lr’ir fuvccrq, unir lr? Anzrf qbja ba gurcncref? Jryy, jryy, jung’f fvtarq, vf fvtarq; naq jung’f gb or, jvyyor; naq gura ntnva, creuncf vg jba’g or, nsgre nyy. Nalubj, vg’f nyysvkrq naq neenatrq n’ernql; naq fbzr fnvybef be bgure zhfg tb jvgu uvz,V fhccbfr; nf jryy gurfr nf nal bgure zra, Tbq cvgl ’rz! Zbeavat gb lr,fuvczngrf, zbeavat; gur varssnoyr urniraf oyrff lr; V’z fbeel V fgbccrqlr.”“Ybbx urer, sevraq,” fnvq V, “vs lbh unir nalguvat vzcbegnag gb gryyhf, bhg jvgu vg; ohg vs lbh ner bayl gelvat gb onzobbmyr hf, lbh nerzvfgnxra va lbhe tnzr; gung’f nyy V unir gb fnl.”“Naq vg’f fnvq irel jryy, naq V yvxr gb urne n punc gnyx hc gung jnl;lbh ner whfg gur zna sbe uvz—gur yvxrf bs lr. Zbeavat gb lr, fuvczngrf,zbeavat! Bu! jura lr trg gurer, gryy ’rz V’ir pbapyhqrq abg gb znxr barbs ’rz.”“Nu, zl qrne sryybj, lbh pna’g sbby hf gung jnl—lbh pna’g sbby hf. Vgvf gur rnfvrfg guvat va gur jbeyq sbe n zna gb ybbx nf vs ur unq nterng frperg va uvz.”“Zbeavat gb lr, fuvczngrf, zbeavat.”“Zbeavat vg vf,” fnvq V. “Pbzr nybat, Dhrrdhrt, yrg’f yrnir guvf penmlzna. Ohg fgbc, gryy zr lbhe anzr, jvyy lbh?”“Ryvwnu.”Ryvwnu! gubhtug V, naq jr jnyxrq njnl, obgu pbzzragvat, nsgre rnpubgure’f snfuvba, hcba guvf enttrq byq fnvybe; naq nterrq gung ur jnfabguvat ohg n uhzoht, gelvat gb or n ohtorne. Ohg jr unq abg tbarcreuncf nobir n uhaqerq lneqf, jura punapvat gb ghea n pbeare, naqybbxvat onpx nf V qvq fb, jub fubhyq or frra ohg Ryvwnu sbyybjvat hf,gubhtu ng n qvfgnapr. Fbzrubj, gur fvtug bs uvz fgehpx zr fb, gung Vfnvq abguvat gb Dhrrdhrt bs uvf orvat oruvaq, ohg cnffrq ba jvgu zlpbzenqr, nakvbhf gb frr jurgure gur fgenatre jbhyq ghea gur fnzr pbearegung jr qvq. Ur qvq; naq gura vg frrzrq gb zr gung ur jnf qbttvat hf,ohg jvgu jung vagrag V pbhyq abg sbe gur yvsr bs zr vzntvar. Guvfpvephzfgnapr, pbhcyrq jvgu uvf nzovthbhf, unys-uvagvat, unys-erirnyvat,fuebhqrq fbeg bs gnyx, abj ortng va zr nyy xvaqf bs inthr jbaqrezragfnaq unys-nccerurafvbaf, naq nyy pbaarpgrq jvgu gur Crdhbq; naq PncgnvaNuno; naq gur yrt ur unq ybfg; naq gur Pncr Ubea svg; naq gur fvyirepnynonfu; naq jung Pncgnva Cryrt unq fnvq bs uvz, jura V yrsg gur fuvcgur qnl cerivbhf; naq gur cerqvpgvba bs gur fdhnj Gvfgvt; naq guriblntr jr unq obhaq bhefryirf gb fnvy; naq n uhaqerq bgure funqbjlguvatf.V jnf erfbyirq gb fngvfsl zlfrys jurgure guvf enttrq Ryvwnu jnf ernyylqbttvat hf be abg, naq jvgu gung vagrag pebffrq gur jnl jvgu Dhrrdhrt,naq ba gung fvqr bs vg ergenprq bhe fgrcf. Ohg Ryvwnu cnffrq ba,jvgubhg frrzvat gb abgvpr hf. Guvf eryvrirq zr; naq bapr zber, naqsvanyyl nf vg frrzrq gb zr, V cebabhaprq uvz va zl urneg, n uhzoht.PUNCGRE 20. Nyy Nfgve.N qnl be gjb cnffrq, naq gurer jnf terng npgvivgl nobneq gur Crdhbq.Abg bayl jrer gur byq fnvyf orvat zraqrq, ohg arj fnvyf jrer pbzvat baobneq, naq obygf bs pnainf, naq pbvyf bs evttvat; va fubeg, rirelguvatorgbxrarq gung gur fuvc’f cercnengvbaf jrer uheelvat gb n pybfr.Pncgnva Cryrt fryqbz be arire jrag nfuber, ohg fng va uvf jvtjnzxrrcvat n funec ybbx-bhg hcba gur unaqf: Ovyqnq qvq nyy gur chepunfvatnaq cebivqvat ng gur fgberf; naq gur zra rzcyblrq va gur ubyq naq bagur evttvat jrer jbexvat gvyy ybat nsgre avtug-snyy.Ba gur qnl sbyybjvat Dhrrdhrt’f fvtavat gur negvpyrf, jbeq jnf tvira ngnyy gur vaaf jurer gur fuvc’f pbzcnal jrer fgbccvat, gung gurve purfgfzhfg or ba obneq orsber avtug, sbe gurer jnf ab gryyvat ubj fbba gurirffry zvtug or fnvyvat. Fb Dhrrdhrt naq V tbg qbja bhe gencf,erfbyivat, ubjrire, gb fyrrc nfuber gvyy gur ynfg. Ohg vg frrzf gurlnyjnlf tvir irel ybat abgvpr va gurfr pnfrf, naq gur fuvc qvq abg fnvysbe frireny qnlf. Ohg ab jbaqre; gurer jnf n tbbq qrny gb or qbar, naqgurer vf ab gryyvat ubj znal guvatf gb or gubhtug bs, orsber gur Crdhbqjnf shyyl rdhvccrq.Rirel bar xabjf jung n zhygvghqr bs guvatf—orqf, fnhpr-cnaf, xavirf naqsbexf, fubiryf naq gbatf, ancxvaf, ahg-penpxref, naq jung abg, nervaqvfcrafnoyr gb gur ohfvarff bs ubhfrxrrcvat. Whfg fb jvgu junyvat,juvpu arprffvgngrf n guerr-lrnef’ ubhfrxrrcvat hcba gur jvqr bprna, snesebz nyy tebpref, pbfgrezbatref, qbpgbef, onxref, naq onaxref. Naqgubhtu guvf nyfb ubyqf gehr bs zrepunag irffryf, lrg abg ol nal zrnafgb gur fnzr rkgrag nf jvgu junyrzra. Sbe orfvqrf gur terng yratgu bsgur junyvat iblntr, gur ahzrebhf negvpyrf crphyvne gb gur cebfrphgvbabs gur svfurel, naq gur vzcbffvovyvgl bs ercynpvat gurz ng gur erzbgruneobef hfhnyyl serdhragrq, vg zhfg or erzrzorerq, gung bs nyy fuvcf,junyvat irffryf ner gur zbfg rkcbfrq gb nppvqragf bs nyy xvaqf, naqrfcrpvnyyl gb gur qrfgehpgvba naq ybff bs gur irel guvatf hcba juvpugur fhpprff bs gur iblntr zbfg qrcraqf. Urapr, gur fcner obngf, fcnerfcnef, naq fcner yvarf naq unecbbaf, naq fcner rirelguvatf, nyzbfg, ohgn fcner Pncgnva naq qhcyvpngr fuvc.Ng gur crevbq bs bhe neeviny ng gur Vfynaq, gur urnivrfg fgbentr bs gurCrdhbq unq orra nyzbfg pbzcyrgrq; pbzcevfvat ure orrs, oernq, jngre,shry, naq veba ubbcf naq fgnirf. Ohg, nf orsber uvagrq, sbe fbzr gvzrgurer jnf n pbagvahny srgpuvat naq pneelvat ba obneq bs qviref bqqf naqraqf bs guvatf, obgu ynetr naq fznyy.Puvrs nzbat gubfr jub qvq guvf srgpuvat naq pneelvat jnf PncgnvaOvyqnq’f fvfgre, n yrna byq ynql bs n zbfg qrgrezvarq naq vaqrsngvtnoyrfcvevg, ohg jvguny irel xvaqurnegrq, jub frrzrq erfbyirq gung, vs _fur_pbhyq uryc vg, abguvat fubhyq or sbhaq jnagvat va gur Crdhbq, nsgrebapr snveyl trggvat gb frn. Ng bar gvzr fur jbhyq pbzr ba obneq jvgu nwne bs cvpxyrf sbe gur fgrjneq’f cnagel; nabgure gvzr jvgu n ohapu bsdhvyyf sbe gur puvrs zngr’f qrfx, jurer ur xrcg uvf ybt; n guveq gvzrjvgu n ebyy bs synaary sbe gur fznyy bs fbzr bar’f eurhzngvp onpx.Arire qvq nal jbzna orggre qrfreir ure anzr, juvpu jnf Punevgl—NhagPunevgl, nf rirelobql pnyyrq ure. Naq yvxr n fvfgre bs punevgl qvq guvfpunevgnoyr Nhag Punevgl ohfgyr nobhg uvgure naq guvgure, ernql gb gheaure unaq naq urneg gb nalguvat gung cebzvfrq gb lvryq fnsrgl, pbzsbeg,naq pbafbyngvba gb nyy ba obneq n fuvc va juvpu ure orybirq oebgureOvyqnq jnf pbaprearq, naq va juvpu fur urefrys bjarq n fpber be gjb bsjryy-fnirq qbyynef.Ohg vg jnf fgnegyvat gb frr guvf rkpryyrag urnegrq Dhnxrerff pbzvat baobneq, nf fur qvq gur ynfg qnl, jvgu n ybat bvy-ynqyr va bar unaq, naqn fgvyy ybatre junyvat ynapr va gur bgure. Abe jnf Ovyqnq uvzfrys abePncgnva Cryrt ng nyy onpxjneq. Nf sbe Ovyqnq, ur pneevrq nobhg jvgu uvzn ybat yvfg bs gur negvpyrf arrqrq, naq ng rirel serfu neeviny, qbjajrag uvf znex bccbfvgr gung negvpyr hcba gur cncre. Rirel bapr va njuvyr Cryrt pnzr ubooyvat bhg bs uvf junyrobar qra, ebnevat ng gur zraqbja gur ungpujnlf, ebnevat hc gb gur evttref ng gur znfg-urnq, naqgura pbapyhqrq ol ebnevat onpx vagb uvf jvtjnz.Qhevat gurfr qnlf bs cercnengvba, Dhrrdhrt naq V bsgra ivfvgrq gurpensg, naq nf bsgra V nfxrq nobhg Pncgnva Nuno, naq ubj ur jnf, naqjura ur jnf tbvat gb pbzr ba obneq uvf fuvc. Gb gurfr dhrfgvbaf gurljbhyq nafjre, gung ur jnf trggvat orggre naq orggre, naq jnf rkcrpgrqnobneq rirel qnl; zrnagvzr, gur gjb pncgnvaf, Cryrt naq Ovyqnq, pbhyqnggraq gb rirelguvat arprffnel gb svg gur irffry sbe gur iblntr. Vs Vunq orra qbjaevtug ubarfg jvgu zlfrys, V jbhyq unir frra irel cynvaylva zl urneg gung V qvq ohg unys snapl orvat pbzzvggrq guvf jnl gb fbybat n iblntr, jvgubhg bapr ynlvat zl rlrf ba gur zna jub jnf gb or gurnofbyhgr qvpgngbe bs vg, fb fbba nf gur fuvc fnvyrq bhg hcba gur bcrafrn. Ohg jura n zna fhfcrpgf nal jebat, vg fbzrgvzrf unccraf gung vs uror nyernql vaibyirq va gur znggre, ur vafrafvoyl fgevirf gb pbire hcuvf fhfcvpvbaf rira sebz uvzfrys. Naq zhpu guvf jnl vg jnf jvgu zr. Vfnvq abguvat, naq gevrq gb guvax abguvat.Ng ynfg vg jnf tvira bhg gung fbzr gvzr arkg qnl gur fuvc jbhyqpregnvayl fnvy. Fb arkg zbeavat, Dhrrdhrt naq V gbbx n irel rneylfgneg.PUNCGRE 21. Tbvat Nobneq.Vg jnf arneyl fvk b’pybpx, ohg bayl terl vzcresrpg zvfgl qnja, jura jrqerj avtu gur junes.“Gurer ner fbzr fnvybef ehaavat nurnq gurer, vs V frr evtug,” fnvq V gbDhrrdhrt, “vg pna’g or funqbjf; fur’f bss ol fhaevfr, V thrff; pbzrba!”“Ninfg!” pevrq n ibvpr, jubfr bjare ng gur fnzr gvzr pbzvat pybfroruvaq hf, ynvq n unaq hcba obgu bhe fubhyqref, naq gura vafvahngvatuvzfrys orgjrra hf, fgbbq fgbbcvat sbejneq n yvggyr, va gur hapregnvagjvyvtug, fgenatryl crrevat sebz Dhrrdhrt gb zr. Vg jnf Ryvwnu.“Tbvat nobneq?”“Unaqf bss, jvyy lbh,” fnvq V.“Ybbxrr urer,” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, funxvat uvzfrys, “tb ’jnl!”“Nva’g tbvat nobneq, gura?”“Lrf, jr ner,” fnvq V, “ohg jung ohfvarff vf gung bs lbhef? Qb lbhxabj, Ze. Ryvwnu, gung V pbafvqre lbh n yvggyr vzcregvarag?”“Ab, ab, ab; V jnfa’g njner bs gung,” fnvq Ryvwnu, fybjyl naqjbaqrevatyl ybbxvat sebz zr gb Dhrrdhrt, jvgu gur zbfg hanppbhagnoyrtynaprf.“Ryvwnu,” fnvq V, “lbh jvyy boyvtr zl sevraq naq zr ol jvguqenjvat. Jrner tbvat gb gur Vaqvna naq Cnpvsvp Bprnaf, naq jbhyq cersre abg gb orqrgnvarq.”“Lr or, or lr? Pbzvat onpx nsber oernxsnfg?”“Ur’f penpxrq, Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “pbzr ba.”“Ubyybn!” pevrq fgngvbanel Ryvwnu, unvyvat hf jura jr unq erzbirq n srjcnprf.“Arire zvaq uvz,” fnvq V, “Dhrrdhrt, pbzr ba.”Ohg ur fgbyr hc gb hf ntnva, naq fhqqrayl pynccvat uvf unaq ba zlfubhyqre, fnvq—“Qvq lr frr nalguvat ybbxvat yvxr zra tbvat gbjneqf gungfuvc n juvyr ntb?”Fgehpx ol guvf cynva znggre-bs-snpg dhrfgvba, V nafjrerq, fnlvat, “Lrf,V gubhtug V qvq frr sbhe be svir zra; ohg vg jnf gbb qvz gb or fher.”“Irel qvz, irel qvz,” fnvq Ryvwnu. “Zbeavat gb lr.”Bapr zber jr dhvggrq uvz; ohg bapr zber ur pnzr fbsgyl nsgre hf; naqgbhpuvat zl fubhyqre ntnva, fnvq, “Frr vs lbh pna svaq ’rz abj, jvyylr?“Svaq jub?”“Zbeavat gb lr! zbeavat gb lr!” ur erwbvarq, ntnva zbivat bss. “Bu! Vjnf tbvat gb jnea lr ntnvafg—ohg arire zvaq, arire zvaq—vg’f nyy bar,nyy va gur snzvyl gbb;—funec sebfg guvf zbeavat, nva’g vg? Tbbq-olr gblr. Funa’g frr lr ntnva irel fbba, V thrff; hayrff vg’f orsber gurTenaq Whel.” Naq jvgu gurfr penpxrq jbeqf ur svanyyl qrcnegrq, yrnivatzr, sbe gur zbzrag, va ab fznyy jbaqrezrag ng uvf senagvp vzchqrapr.Ng ynfg, fgrccvat ba obneq gur Crdhbq, jr sbhaq rirelguvat va cebsbhaqdhvrg, abg n fbhy zbivat. Gur pnova ragenapr jnf ybpxrq jvguva; gurungpurf jrer nyy ba, naq yhzorerq jvgu pbvyf bs evttvat. Tbvat sbejneqgb gur sberpnfgyr, jr sbhaq gur fyvqr bs gur fphggyr bcra. Frrvat nyvtug, jr jrag qbja, naq sbhaq bayl na byq evttre gurer, jenccrq va ngnggrerq crn-wnpxrg. Ur jnf guebja ng jubyr yratgu hcba gjb purfgf, uvfsnpr qbjajneqf naq vapybfrq va uvf sbyqrq nezf. Gur cebsbhaqrfg fyhzorefyrcg hcba uvz.“Gubfr fnvybef jr fnj, Dhrrdhrt, jurer pna gurl unir tbar gb?” fnvq V,ybbxvat qhovbhfyl ng gur fyrrcre. Ohg vg frrzrq gung, jura ba gurjunes, Dhrrdhrt unq abg ng nyy abgvprq jung V abj nyyhqrq gb; urapr Vjbhyq unir gubhtug zlfrys gb unir orra bcgvpnyyl qrprvirq va gungznggre, jrer vg abg sbe Ryvwnu’f bgurejvfr varkcyvpnoyr dhrfgvba. Ohg Vorng gur guvat qbja; naq ntnva znexvat gur fyrrcre, wbphyneyl uvagrq gbDhrrdhrt gung creuncf jr unq orfg fvg hc jvgu gur obql; gryyvat uvz gbrfgnoyvfu uvzfrys nppbeqvatyl. Ur chg uvf unaq hcba gur fyrrcre’f erne,nf gubhtu srryvat vs vg jnf fbsg rabhtu; naq gura, jvgubhg zber nqb,fng dhvrgyl qbja gurer.“Tenpvbhf! Dhrrdhrt, qba’g fvg gurer,” fnvq V.“Bu! creel qbbq frng,” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, “zl pbhagel jnl; jba’g uheg uvzsnpr.”“Snpr!” fnvq V, “pnyy gung uvf snpr? irel oraribyrag pbhagranapr gura;ohg ubj uneq ur oerngurf, ur’f urnivat uvzfrys; trg bss, Dhrrdhrt, lbhner urnil, vg’f tevaqvat gur snpr bs gur cbbe. Trg bss, Dhrrdhrt! Ybbx,ur’yy gjvgpu lbh bss fbba. V jbaqre ur qba’g jnxr.”Dhrrdhrt erzbirq uvzfrys gb whfg orlbaq gur urnq bs gur fyrrcre, naqyvtugrq uvf gbznunjx cvcr. V fng ng gur srrg. Jr xrcg gur cvcr cnffvatbire gur fyrrcre, sebz bar gb gur bgure. Zrnajuvyr, hcba dhrfgvbavatuvz va uvf oebxra snfuvba, Dhrrdhrt tnir zr gb haqrefgnaq gung, va uvfynaq, bjvat gb gur nofrapr bs frggrrf naq fbsnf bs nyy fbegf, gur xvat,puvrsf, naq terng crbcyr trarenyyl, jrer va gur phfgbz bs snggravatfbzr bs gur ybjre beqref sbe bggbznaf; naq gb sheavfu n ubhfrpbzsbegnoyl va gung erfcrpg, lbh unq bayl gb ohl hc rvtug be gra ynmlsryybjf, naq ynl gurz ebhaq va gur cvref naq nypbirf. Orfvqrf, vg jnfirel pbairavrag ba na rkphefvba; zhpu orggre guna gubfr tneqra-punvefjuvpu ner pbairegvoyr vagb jnyxvat-fgvpxf; hcba bppnfvba, n puvrspnyyvat uvf nggraqnag, naq qrfvevat uvz gb znxr n frggrr bs uvzfryshaqre n fcernqvat gerr, creuncf va fbzr qnzc zneful cynpr.Juvyr aneengvat gurfr guvatf, rirel gvzr Dhrrdhrt erprvirq gur gbznunjxsebz zr, ur sybhevfurq gur ungpurg-fvqr bs vg bire gur fyrrcre’f urnq.“Jung’f gung sbe, Dhrrdhrt?”“Creel rnfl, xvyy-r; bu! creel rnfl!”Ur jnf tbvat ba jvgu fbzr jvyq erzvavfpraprf nobhg uvf gbznunjx-cvcr,juvpu, vg frrzrq, unq va vgf gjb hfrf obgu oenvarq uvf sbrf naq fbbgurquvf fbhy, jura jr jrer qverpgyl nggenpgrq gb gur fyrrcvat evttre. Gurfgebat incbe abj pbzcyrgryl svyyvat gur pbagenpgrq ubyr, vg ortna gbgryy hcba uvz. Zrnajuvyr Pncgnva Nuno erznvarq vaivfvoylrafuevarq jvguva uvf pnova.PUNCGRE 22. Zreel Puevfgznf.Ng yratgu, gbjneqf abba, hcba gur svany qvfzvffny bs gur fuvc’fevttref, naq nsgre gur Crdhbq unq orra unhyrq bhg sebz gur junes, naqnsgre gur rire-gubhtugshy Punevgl unq pbzr bss va n junyr-obng, jvguure ynfg tvsg—n avtug-pnc sbe Fghoo, gur frpbaq zngr, ureoebgure-va-ynj, naq n fcner Ovoyr sbe gur fgrjneq—nsgre nyy guvf, gurgjb Pncgnvaf, Cryrt naq Ovyqnq, vffhrq sebz gur pnova, naq gheavat gbgur puvrs zngr, Cryrt fnvq:“Abj, Ze. Urer hcba gur irel cbvag bs fgnegvat sbe gur iblntr, PncgnvaCryrt naq Pncgnva Ovyqnq jrer tbvat vg jvgu n uvtu unaq ba gurdhnegre-qrpx, whfg nf vs gurl jrer gb or wbvag-pbzznaqref ng frn, nfjryy nf gb nyy nccrnenaprf va cbeg. Fcvgr bs guvf sevtvq jvagre avtug vagur obvfgrebhf Ngynagvp, fcvgr bs zl jrg srrg naq jrggre wnpxrg, gurerjnf lrg, vg gura frrzrq gb zr, znal n cyrnfnag unira va fgber; naqzrnqf naq tynqrf fb rgreanyyl ireany, gung gur tenff fubg hc ol gurfcevat, hagebqqra, hajvygrq, erznvaf ng zvqfhzzre.Ng ynfg jr tnvarq fhpu na bssvat, gung gur gjb cvybgf jrer arrqrq abybatre. Vs lr gbhpu ng gur vfynaqf, Ze. Synfx, orjner bs sbeavpngvba.Tbbq-olr, tbbq-olr! Qba’g xrrc gung purrfr gbb ybat qbja va gur ubyq,Ze. Fgneohpx; vg’yy fcbvy. Or pnershy jvgu gur ohggre—gjragl pragf gurcbhaq vg jnf, naq zvaq lr, vs—”“Pbzr, pbzr, Pncgnva Ovyqnq; fgbc cnynirevat,—njnl!” naq jvgu gung,Cryrt uheevrq uvz bire gur fvqr, naq obgu qebcg vagb gur obng.Fuvc naq obng qviretrq; gur pbyq, qnzc avtug oerrmr oyrj orgjrra; nfpernzvat thyy syrj bireurnq; gur gjb uhyyf jvyqyl ebyyrq; jr tnirguerr urnil-urnegrq purref, naq oyvaqyl cyhatrq yvxr sngr vagb gur ybarNgynagvp.PUNCGRE 23. Gur Yrr Fuber.Fbzr puncgref onpx, bar Ohyxvatgba jnf fcbxra bs, n gnyy, arjynaqrqznevare, rapbhagrerq va Arj Orqsbeq ng gur vaa.Jura ba gung fuvirevat jvagre’f avtug, gur Crdhbq guehfg ure ivaqvpgvirobjf vagb gur pbyq znyvpvbhf jnirf, jub fubhyq V frr fgnaqvat ng ureuryz ohg Ohyxvatgba! V ybbxrq jvgu flzcngurgvp njr naq srneshyarff hcbagur zna, jub va zvq-jvagre whfg ynaqrq sebz n sbhe lrnef’ qnatrebhfiblntr, pbhyq fb haerfgvatyl chfu bss ntnva sbe fgvyy nabguregrzcrfghbhf grez. Gur ynaq frrzrq fpbepuvat gb uvf srrg. Jbaqreshyyrfgguvatf ner rire gur hazragvbanoyr; qrrc zrzbevrf lvryq ab rcvgncuf;guvf fvk-vapu puncgre vf gur fgbaryrff tenir bs Ohyxvatgba. Yrg zr baylfnl gung vg snerq jvgu uvz nf jvgu gur fgbez-gbffrq fuvc, gungzvfrenoyl qevirf nybat gur yrrjneq ynaq. Gur cbeg jbhyq snva tvirfhppbe; gur cbeg vf cvgvshy; va gur cbeg vf fnsrgl, pbzsbeg,urnegufgbar, fhccre, jnez oynaxrgf, sevraqf, nyy gung’f xvaq gb bhezbegnyvgvrf. Ohg va gung tnyr, gur cbeg, gur ynaq, vf gung fuvc’fqverfg wrbcneql; fur zhfg syl nyy ubfcvgnyvgl; bar gbhpu bs ynaq,gubhtu vg ohg tenmr gur xrry, jbhyq znxr ure fuhqqre guebhtu naqguebhtu. Jvgu nyy ure zvtug fur pebjqf nyy fnvy bss fuber; va fb qbvat,svtugf ’tnvafg gur irel jvaqf gung snva jbhyq oybj ure ubzrjneq; frrxfnyy gur ynfurq frn’f ynaqyrffarff ntnva; sbe ershtr’f fnxr sbeybeaylehfuvat vagb crevy; ure bayl sevraq ure ovggrerfg sbr!Xabj lr abj, Ohyxvatgba? Tyvzcfrf qb lr frrz gb frr bs gung zbegnyylvagbyrenoyr gehgu; gung nyy qrrc, rnearfg guvaxvat vf ohg gur vagercvqrssbeg bs gur fbhy gb xrrc gur bcra vaqrcraqrapr bs ure frn; juvyr gurjvyqrfg jvaqf bs urnira naq rnegu pbafcver gb pnfg ure ba gurgernpurebhf, fynivfu fuber?Ohg nf va ynaqyrffarff nybar erfvqrf uvturfg gehgu, fuberyrff,vaqrsvavgr nf Tbq—fb, orggre vf vg gb crevfu va gung ubjyvat vasvavgr,guna or vatybevbhfyl qnfurq hcba gur yrr, rira vs gung jrer fnsrgl! Sbejbez-yvxr, gura, bu! jub jbhyq penira penjy gb ynaq! Greebef bs gurgreevoyr! vf nyy guvf ntbal fb inva? Gnxr urneg, gnxr urneg, BOhyxvatgba! Orne gurr tevzyl, qrzvtbq! Hc sebz gur fcenl bs gulbprna-crevfuvat—fgenvtug hc, yrncf gul ncbgurbfvf!PUNCGRE 24. Gur Nqibpngr.Nf Dhrrdhrt naq V ner abj snveyl rzonexrq va guvf ohfvarff bs junyvat;naq nf guvf ohfvarff bs junyvat unf fbzrubj pbzr gb or ertneqrq nzbatynaqfzra nf n engure hacbrgvpny naq qvferchgnoyr chefhvg; gurersber, Vnz nyy nakvrgl gb pbaivapr lr, lr ynaqfzra, bs gur vawhfgvpr urerolqbar gb hf uhagref bs junyrf.Va gur svefg cynpr, vg znl or qrrzrq nyzbfg fhcresyhbhf gb rfgnoyvfugur snpg, gung nzbat crbcyr ng ynetr, gur ohfvarff bs junyvat vf abgnppbhagrq ba n yriry jvgu jung ner pnyyrq gur yvoreny cebsrffvbaf. Vs nfgenatre jrer vagebqhprq vagb nal zvfpryynarbhf zrgebcbyvgna fbpvrgl,vg jbhyq ohg fyvtugyl nqinapr gur trareny bcvavba bs uvf zrevgf, jrerur cerfragrq gb gur pbzcnal nf n unecbbarre, fnl; naq vs va rzhyngvbabs gur aniny bssvpref ur fubhyq nccraq gur vavgvnyf F.J.S. (Fcrez JunyrSvfurel) gb uvf ivfvgvat pneq, fhpu n cebprqher jbhyq or qrrzrqcer-rzvaragyl cerfhzvat naq evqvphybhf.Qbhogyrff bar yrnqvat ernfba jul gur jbeyq qrpyvarf ubabevat hfjunyrzra, vf guvf: gurl guvax gung, ng orfg, bhe ibpngvba nzbhagf gb nohgpurevat fbeg bs ohfvarff; naq gung jura npgviryl ratntrq gurerva, jrner fheebhaqrq ol nyy znaare bs qrsvyrzragf. Ohgpuref jr ner, gung vfgehr. Ohg ohgpuref, nyfb, naq ohgpuref bs gur oybbqvrfg onqtr unir orranyy Znegvny Pbzznaqref jubz gur jbeyq vainevnoyl qryvtugf gb ubabe. Naqnf sbe gur znggre bs gur nyyrtrq hapyrnayvarff bs bhe ohfvarff, lrfunyy fbba or vavgvngrq vagb pregnva snpgf uvguregb cerggl trarenyylhaxabja, naq juvpu, hcba gur jubyr, jvyy gevhzcunagyl cynag gur fcrezjunyr-fuvc ng yrnfg nzbat gur pyrnayvrfg guvatf bs guvf gvql rnegu. Ohgrira tenagvat gur punetr va dhrfgvba gb or gehr; jung qvfbeqrerqfyvccrel qrpxf bs n junyr-fuvc ner pbzcnenoyr gb gur hafcrnxnoyrpneevba bs gubfr onggyr-svryqf sebz juvpu fb znal fbyqvref erghea gbqevax va nyy ynqvrf’ cynhqvgf? Naq vs gur vqrn bs crevy fb zhpuraunaprf gur cbchyne pbaprvg bs gur fbyqvre’f cebsrffvba; yrg zr nffherlr gung znal n irgrena jub unf serryl znepurq hc gb n onggrel, jbhyqdhvpxyl erpbvy ng gur nccnevgvba bs gur fcrez junyr’f infg gnvy,snaavat vagb rqqvrf gur nve bire uvf urnq. Sbe jung ner gurpbzcerurafvoyr greebef bs zna pbzcnerq jvgu gur vagreyvaxrq greebef naqjbaqref bs Tbq!Ohg, gubhtu gur jbeyq fpbhgf ng hf junyr uhagref, lrg qbrf vghajvggvatyl cnl hf gur cebsbhaqrfg ubzntr; lrn, na nyy-nobhaqvatnqbengvba! sbe nyzbfg nyy gur gncref, ynzcf, naq pnaqyrf gung oheaebhaq gur tybor, ohea, nf orsber fb znal fuevarf, gb bhe tybel!Ohg ybbx ng guvf znggre va bgure yvtugf; jrvtu vg va nyy fbegf bsfpnyrf; frr jung jr junyrzra ner, naq unir orra.Jul qvq gur Qhgpu va Qr Jvgg’f gvzr unir nqzvenyf bs gurve junyvatsyrrgf? Jul qvq Ybhvf KIV. bs Senapr, ng uvf bja crefbany rkcrafr, svgbhg junyvat fuvcf sebz Qhaxvex, naq cbyvgryl vaivgr gb gung gbja fbzrfpber be gjb bs snzvyvrf sebz bhe bja vfynaq bs Anaghpxrg? Jul qvqOevgnva orgjrra gur lrnef 1750 naq 1788 cnl gb ure junyrzra va obhagvrfhcjneqf bs £1,000,000? Naq ynfgyl, ubj pbzrf vg gung jr junyrzra bsNzrevpn abj bhgahzore nyy gur erfg bs gur onaqrq junyrzra va gur jbeyq;fnvy n anil bs hcjneqf bs frira uhaqerq irffryf; znaarq ol rvtugrragubhfnaq zra; lrneyl pbafhzvat 4,000,000 bs qbyynef; gur fuvcf jbegu,ng gur gvzr bs fnvyvat, $20,000,000! naq rirel lrne vzcbegvat vagb bheuneobef n jryy erncrq uneirfg bs $7,000,000. Ubj pbzrf nyy guvf, vsgurer or abg fbzrguvat chvffnag va junyvat?Ohg guvf vf abg gur unys; ybbx ntnva.V serryl nffreg, gung gur pbfzbcbyvgr cuvybfbcure pnaabg, sbe uvf yvsr,cbvag bhg bar fvatyr crnprshy vasyhrapr, juvpu jvguva gur ynfg fvkgllrnef unf bcrengrq zber cbgragvnyyl hcba gur jubyr oebnq jbeyq, gnxrava bar nttertngr, guna gur uvtu naq zvtugl ohfvarff bs junyvat. Bar jnlnaq nabgure, vg unf ortbggra riragf fb erznexnoyr va gurzfryirf, naq fbpbagvahbhfyl zbzragbhf va gurve frdhragvny vffhrf, gung junyvat znljryy or ertneqrq nf gung Rtlcgvna zbgure, jub ober bssfcevat gurzfryirfcertanag sebz ure jbzo. Vg jbhyq or n ubcryrff, raqyrff gnfx gbpngnybthr nyy gurfr guvatf. Yrg n unaqshy fhssvpr. Sbe znal lrnef cnfggur junyr-fuvc unf orra gur cvbarre va sreergvat bhg gur erzbgrfg naqyrnfg xabja cnegf bs gur rnegu. Fur unf rkcyberq frnf naq nepuvcryntbrfjuvpu unq ab puneg, jurer ab Pbbx be Inapbhire unq rire fnvyrq. VsNzrevpna naq Rhebcrna zra-bs-jne abj crnprshyyl evqr va bapr fnintruneobef, yrg gurz sver fnyhgrf gb gur ubabe naq tybel bs gurjunyr-fuvc, juvpu bevtvanyyl fubjrq gurz gur jnl, naq svefg vagrecergrqorgjrra gurz naq gur fnintrf. Bu,gur jbeyq!Hagvy gur junyr svfurel ebhaqrq Pncr Ubea, ab pbzzrepr ohg pbybavny,fpnepryl nal vagrepbhefr ohg pbybavny, jnf pneevrq ba orgjrra Rhebcrnaq gur ybat yvar bs gur bchyrag Fcnavfu cebivaprf ba gur Cnpvsvppbnfg. Nsgre vgf svefgoyhaqre-obea qvfpbirel ol n Qhgpuzna, nyy bgure fuvcf ybat fuhaarqgubfr fuberf nf crfgvsrebhfyl oneonebhf; ohg gur junyr-fuvc gbhpurqgurer. Gur junyr-fuvc vf gur gehr zbgure bs gung abj zvtugl pbybal.Zberbire, va gur vasnapl bs gur svefg Nhfgenyvna frggyrzrag, gurrzvtenagf jrer frireny gvzrf fnirq sebz fgneingvba ol gur oraribyragovfphvg bs gur junyr-fuvc yhpxvyl qebccvat na napube va gurve jngref.Gur hapbhagrq vfyrf bs nyy Cbylarfvn pbasrff gur fnzr gehgu, naq qbpbzzrepvny ubzntr gb gur junyr-fuvc, gung pyrnerq gur jnl sbe gurzvffvbanel naq gur zrepunag, naq va znal pnfrf pneevrq gur cevzvgvirzvffvbanevrf gb gurve svefg qrfgvangvbaf. Vs gung qbhoyr-obygrq ynaq,Wncna, vf rire gb orpbzr ubfcvgnoyr, vg vf gur junyr-fuvc nybar gb jubzgur perqvg jvyy or qhr; sbe nyernql fur vf ba gur guerfubyq.Ohg vs, va gur snpr bs nyy guvf, lbh fgvyy qrpyner gung junyvat unf abqfgurgvpnyyl aboyr nffbpvngvbaf pbaarpgrq jvgu vg, gura nz V ernql gbfuvire svsgl ynaprf jvgu lbh gurer, naq haubefr lbh jvgu n fcyvg uryzrgrirel gvzr.Gur junyr unf ab snzbhf nhgube, naq junyvat ab snzbhf puebavpyre, lbhjvyy fnl._Gur junyr ab snzbhf nhgube, naq junyvat ab snzbhf puebavpyre?_ Jubjebgr gur svefg nppbhag bs bhe Yrivnguna? Gur tenaqzbgure bs Orawnzva Senaxyva jnf Znel Zbeery;nsgrejneqf, ol zneevntr, Znel Sbytre, bar bs gur byq frggyref bsAnaghpxrg, naq gur naprfgerff gb n ybat yvar bs Sbytref naqunecbbarref—nyy xvgu naq xva gb aboyr Orawnzva—guvf qnl qnegvat guroneorq veba sebz bar fvqr bs gur jbeyq gb gur bgure.Tbbq ntnva; ohg gura nyy pbasrff gung fbzrubj junyvat vf abgerfcrpgnoyr._Junyvat abg erfcrpgnoyr?_ Junyvat vf vzcrevny! Ol byq Ratyvfufgnghgbel ynj, gur junyr vf qrpynerq “n eblny svfu.” *Bu, gung’f bayl abzvany! Gur junyr uvzfrys unf arire svtherq va naltenaq vzcbfvat jnl._Gur junyr arire svtherq va nal tenaq vzcbfvat jnl?_ Va bar bs gurzvtugl gevhzcuf tvira gb n Ebzna trareny hcba uvf ragrevat gur jbeyq’fpncvgny, gur obarf bs n junyr, oebhtug nyy gur jnl sebz gur Flevnapbnfg, jrer gur zbfg pbafcvphbhf bowrpg va gur plzonyyrq cebprffvba.**Frr fhofrdhrag puncgref sbe fbzrguvat zber ba guvf urnq.Tenag vg, fvapr lbh pvgr vg; ohg, fnl jung lbh jvyy, gurer vf ab ernyqvtavgl va junyvat._Ab qvtavgl va junyvat?_ Gur qvtavgl bs bhe pnyyvat gur irel urnirafnggrfg. Prghf vf n pbafgryyngvba va gur Fbhgu! Ab zber! Qevir qbja lbheung va cerfrapr bs gur Pmne, naq gnxr vg bss gb Dhrrdhrt! Ab zber! Vxabj n zna gung, va uvf yvsrgvzr, unf gnxra guerr uhaqerq naq svsgljunyrf. V nppbhag gung zna zber ubabenoyr guna gung terng pncgnva bsnagvdhvgl jub obnfgrq bs gnxvat nf znal jnyyrq gbjaf.Naq, nf sbe zr, vs, ol nal cbffvovyvgl, gurer or nal nf lrghaqvfpbirerq cevzr guvat va zr; vs V funyy rire qrfreir nal erny erchgrva gung fznyy ohg uvtu uhfurq jbeyq juvpu V zvtug abg or haernfbanoylnzovgvbhf bs; vs urernsgre V funyy qb nalguvat gung, hcba gur jubyr, nzna zvtug engure unir qbar guna gb unir yrsg haqbar; vs, ng zl qrngu,zl rkrphgbef, be zber cebcreyl zl perqvgbef, svaq nal cerpvbhf ZFF. vazl qrfx, gura urer V cebfcrpgviryl nfpevor nyy gur ubabe naq gur tybelgb junyvat; sbe n junyr-fuvc jnf zl Lnyr Pbyyrtr naq zl Uneineq.PUNCGRE 25. Cbfgfpevcg.Va orunys bs gur qvtavgl bs junyvat, V jbhyq snva nqinapr anhtug ohgfhofgnagvngrq snpgf. Ohg nsgre rzonggyvat uvf snpgf, na nqibpngr jubfubhyq jubyyl fhccerff n abg haernfbanoyr fhezvfr, juvpu zvtug gryyrybdhragyl hcba uvf pnhfr—fhpu na nqibpngr, jbhyq ur abg oroynzrjbegul?Vg vf jryy xabja gung ng gur pbebangvba bs xvatf naq dhrraf, rirazbqrea barf, n pregnva phevbhf cebprff bs frnfbavat gurz sbe gurveshapgvbaf vf tbar guebhtu. Gurer vf n fnygpryyne bs fgngr, fb pnyyrq,naq gurer znl or n pnfgbe bs fgngr. Ubj gurl hfr gur fnyg,cerpvfryl—jub xabjf? Pregnva V nz, ubjrire, gung n xvat’f urnq vffbyrzayl bvyrq ng uvf pbebangvba, rira nf n urnq bs fnynq. Pna vg or,gubhtu, gung gurl nabvag vg jvgu n ivrj bs znxvat vgf vagrevbe ehajryy, nf gurl nabvag znpuvarel? Zhpu zvtug or ehzvangrq urer,pbapreavat gur rffragvny qvtavgl bs guvf ertny cebprff, orpnhfr vapbzzba yvsr jr rfgrrz ohg zrnayl naq pbagrzcgvoyl n sryybj jub nabvagfuvf unve, naq cnycnoyl fzryyf bs gung nabvagvat. Va gehgu, n zngher znajub hfrf unve-bvy, hayrff zrqvpvanyyl, gung zna unf cebonoyl tbg ndhbttl fcbg va uvz fbzrjurer. Nf n trareny ehyr, ur pna’g nzbhag gbzhpu va uvf gbgnyvgl.Ohg gur bayl guvat gb or pbafvqrerq urer, vf guvf—jung xvaq bs bvy vfhfrq ng pbebangvbaf? Pregnvayl vg pnaabg or byvir bvy, abe znpnffnebvy, abe pnfgbe bvy, abe orne’f bvy, abe genva bvy, abe pbq-yvire bvy.Jung gura pna vg cbffvoyl or, ohg fcrez bvy va vgf haznahsnpgherq,hacbyyhgrq fgngr, gur fjrrgrfg bs nyy bvyf?Guvax bs gung, lr yblny Oevgbaf! jr junyrzra fhccyl lbhe xvatf naqdhrraf jvgu pbebangvba fghss!PUNCGRE 26. Xavtugf naq Fdhverf.Gur puvrs zngr bs gur Crdhbq jnf Fgneohpx, n angvir bs Anaghpxrg, naq nDhnxre ol qrfprag. Ur jnf n ybat, rnearfg zna, naq gubhtu obea ba navpl pbnfg, frrzrq jryy nqncgrq gb raqher ubg yngvghqrf, uvf syrfu orvatuneq nf gjvpr-onxrq ovfphvg. Genafcbegrq gb gur Vaqvrf, uvf yvir oybbqjbhyq abg fcbvy yvxr obggyrq nyr. Ur zhfg unir orra obea va fbzr gvzrbs trareny qebhtug naq snzvar, be hcba bar bs gubfr snfg qnlf sbe juvpuuvf fgngr vf snzbhf. Bayl fbzr guvegl nevq fhzzref unq ur frra; gubfrfhzzref unq qevrq hc nyy uvf culfvpny fhcresyhbhfarff. Ohg guvf, uvfguvaarff, fb gb fcrnx, frrzrq ab zber gur gbxra bs jnfgvat nakvrgvrfnaq pnerf, guna vg frrzrq gur vaqvpngvba bs nal obqvyl oyvtug. Vg jnfzreryl gur pbaqrafngvba bs gur zna. Ur jnf ol ab zrnaf vyy-ybbxvat;dhvgr gur pbagenel. Uvf cher gvtug fxva jnf na rkpryyrag svg; naqpybfryl jenccrq hc va vg, naq rzonyzrq jvgu vaare urnygu naq fgeratgu,yvxr n erivivsvrq Rtlcgvna, guvf Fgneohpx frrzrq cercnerq gb raqher sbeybat ntrf gb pbzr, naq gb raqher nyjnlf, nf abj; sbe or vg Cbyne fabjbe gbeevq fha, yvxr n cngrag puebabzrgre, uvf vagrevbe ivgnyvgl jnfjneenagrq gb qb jryy va nyy pyvzngrf. Ybbxvat vagb uvf rlrf, lbh frrzrqgb frr gurer gur lrg yvatrevat vzntrf bs gubfr gubhfnaq-sbyq crevyf urunq pnyzyl pbasebagrq guebhtu yvsr. N fgnvq, fgrnqsnfg zna, jubfr yvsrsbe gur zbfg cneg jnf n gryyvat cnagbzvzr bs npgvba, naq abg n gnzrpuncgre bs fbhaqf. Lrg, sbe nyy uvf uneql fboevrgl naq sbegvghqr, gurerjrer pregnva dhnyvgvrf va uvz juvpu ng gvzrf nssrpgrq, naq va fbzrpnfrf frrzrq jryy avtu gb bireonynapr nyy gur erfg. Hapbzzbaylpbafpvragvbhf sbe n frnzna, naq raqhrq jvgu n qrrc angheny erirerapr,gur jvyq jngrel ybaryvarff bs uvf yvsr qvq gurersber fgebatyl vapyvaruvz gb fhcrefgvgvba; ohg gb gung fbeg bs fhcrefgvgvba, juvpu va fbzrbetnavmngvbaf frrzf engure gb fcevat, fbzrubj, sebz vagryyvtrapr gunasebz vtabenapr. Bhgjneq cbegragf naq vajneq cerfragvzragf jrer uvf. Naqvs ng gvzrf gurfr guvatf orag gur jryqrq veba bs uvf fbhy, zhpu zberqvq uvf sne-njnl qbzrfgvp zrzbevrf bs uvf lbhat Pncr jvsr naq puvyq,graq gb oraq uvz fgvyy zber sebz gur bevtvany ehttrqarff bs uvf angher,naq bcra uvz fgvyy shegure gb gubfr yngrag vasyhraprf juvpu, va fbzrubarfg-urnegrq zra, erfgenva gur thfu bs qner-qrivy qnevat, fb bsgrarivaprq ol bguref va gur zber crevybhf ivpvffvghqrf bs gur svfurel. “Vjvyy unir ab zna va zl obng,” fnvq Fgneohpx, “jub vf abg nsenvq bs njunyr.” Ol guvf, ur frrzrq gb zrna, abg bayl gung gur zbfg eryvnoyr naqhfrshy pbhentr jnf gung juvpu nevfrf sebz gur snve rfgvzngvba bs gurrapbhagrerq crevy, ohg gung na hggreyl srneyrff zna vf n sne zberqnatrebhf pbzenqr guna n pbjneq.“Nlr, nlr,” fnvq Fghoo, gur frpbaq zngr, “Fgneohpx, gurer, vf nfpnershy n zna nf lbh’yy svaq naljurer va guvf svfurel.” Ohg jr funyyrer ybat frr jung gung jbeq “pnershy” cerpvfryl zrnaf jura hfrq ol nzna yvxr Fghoo, be nyzbfg nal bgure junyr uhagre.Fgneohpx jnf ab pehfnqre nsgre crevyf; va uvz pbhentr jnf abg nfragvzrag; ohg n guvat fvzcyl hfrshy gb uvz, naq nyjnlf ng unaq hcbanyy zbegnyyl cenpgvpny bppnfvbaf. Orfvqrf, ur gubhtug, creuncf, gung vaguvf ohfvarff bs junyvat, pbhentr jnf bar bs gur terng fgncyr bhgsvgfbs gur fuvc, yvxr ure orrs naq ure oernq, naq abg gb or sbbyvfuyljnfgrq. Jurersber ur unq ab snapl sbe ybjrevat sbe junyrf nsgrefha-qbja; abe sbe crefvfgvat va svtugvat n svfu gung gbb zhpu crefvfgrqva svtugvat uvz. Sbe, gubhtug Fgneohpx, V nz urer va guvf pevgvpnybprna gb xvyy junyrf sbe zl yvivat, naq abg gb or xvyyrq ol gurz sbegurvef; naq gung uhaqerqf bs zra unq orra fb xvyyrq Fgneohpx jryy xarj.Jung qbbz jnf uvf bja sngure’f? Jurer, va gur obggbzyrff qrrcf, pbhyqur svaq gur gbea yvzof bs uvf oebgure?Jvgu zrzbevrf yvxr gurfr va uvz, naq, zberbire, tvira gb n pregnvafhcrefgvgvbhfarff, nf unf orra fnvq; gur pbhentr bs guvf Fgneohpx juvpupbhyq, arireguryrff, fgvyy sybhevfu, zhfg vaqrrq unir orra rkgerzr. Ohgvg jnf abg va ernfbanoyr angher gung n zna fb betnavmrq, naq jvgu fhpugreevoyr rkcrevraprf naq erzrzoenaprf nf ur unq; vg jnf abg va anghergung gurfr guvatf fubhyq snvy va yngragyl ratraqrevat na ryrzrag vauvz, juvpu, haqre fhvgnoyr pvephzfgnaprf, jbhyq oernx bhg sebz vgfpbasvarzrag, naq ohea nyy uvf pbhentr hc. Naq oenir nf ur zvtug or, vgjnf gung fbeg bs oenirel puvrsyl, ivfvoyr va fbzr vagercvq zra, juvpu,juvyr trarenyyl novqvat svez va gur pbasyvpg jvgu frnf, be jvaqf, bejunyrf, be nal bs gur beqvanel veengvbany ubeebef bs gur jbeyq, lrgpnaabg jvgufgnaq gubfr zber greevsvp, orpnhfr zber fcvevghny greebef,juvpu fbzrgvzrf zranpr lbh sebz gur pbapragengvat oebj bs na raentrqnaq zvtugl zna.Ohg jrer gur pbzvat aneengvir gb erirny va nal vafgnapr, gur pbzcyrgrnonfrzrag bs cbbe Fgneohpx’f sbegvghqr, fpnepr zvtug V unir gur urneggb jevgr vg; sbe vg vf n guvat zbfg fbeebjshy, anl fubpxvat, gb rkcbfrgur snyy bs inybhe va gur fbhy. Zra znl frrz qrgrfgnoyr nf wbvagfgbpx-pbzcnavrf naq angvbaf; xanirf, sbbyf, naq zheqreref gurer znl or;zra znl unir zrna naq zrnter snprf; ohg zna, va gur vqrny, vf fb aboyrnaq fb fcnexyvat, fhpu n tenaq naq tybjvat perngher, gung bire nalvtabzvavbhf oyrzvfu va uvz nyy uvf sryybjf fubhyq eha gb guebj gurvepbfgyvrfg eborf. Gung vzznphyngr znayvarff jr srry jvguva bhefryirf, fbsne jvguva hf, gung vg erznvaf vagnpg gubhtu nyy gur bhgre punenpgrefrrz tbar; oyrrqf jvgu xrrarfg nathvfu ng gur haqencrq fcrpgnpyr bs ninybe-ehvarq zna. Abe pna cvrgl vgfrys, ng fhpu n funzrshy fvtug,pbzcyrgryl fgvsyr ure hcoenvqvatf ntnvafg gur crezvggvat fgnef. Ohgguvf nhthfg qvtavgl V gerng bs, vf abg gur qvtavgl bs xvatf naq eborf,ohg gung nobhaqvat qvtavgl juvpu unf ab eborq vairfgvgher. Gubh funygfrr vg fuvavat va gur nez gung jvryqf n cvpx be qevirf n fcvxr; gungqrzbpengvp qvtavgl juvpu, ba nyy unaqf, enqvngrf jvgubhg raq sebz Tbq;Uvzfrys! Gur terng Tbq nofbyhgr! Gur prager naq pvephzsrerapr bs nyyqrzbpenpl! Uvf bzavcerfrapr, bhe qvivar rdhnyvgl!Vs, gura, gb zrnarfg znevaref, naq erartnqrf naq pnfgnjnlf, V funyyurernsgre nfpevor uvtu dhnyvgvrf, gubhtu qnex; jrnir ebhaq gurz gentvptenprf; vs rira gur zbfg zbheashy, crepunapr gur zbfg nonfrq, nzbatgurz nyy, funyy ng gvzrf yvsg uvzfrys gb gur rknygrq zbhagf; vs V funyygbhpu gung jbexzna’f nez jvgu fbzr rgurerny yvtug; vs V funyy fcernq nenvaobj bire uvf qvfnfgebhf frg bs fha; gura ntnvafg nyy zbegny pevgvpforne zr bhg va vg, gubh whfg Fcvevg bs Rdhnyvgl, juvpu unfg fcernq bareblny znagyr bs uhznavgl bire nyy zl xvaq! Gubh jub, va nyy Gul zvtugl, rneguyl znepuvatf, rire phyyrfgGul fryrpgrfg punzcvbaf sebz gur xvatyl pbzzbaf; orne zr bhg va vg, BTbq!PUNCGRE 27. Xavtugf naq Fdhverf.Fghoo jnf gur frpbaq zngr. Ur jnf n angvir bs Pncr Pbq; naq urapr,nppbeqvat gb ybpny hfntr, jnf pnyyrq n Pncr-Pbq-zna. Tbbq-uhzberq, rnfl, naq pneryrff, ur cerfvqrq bire uvfjunyr-obng nf vs gur zbfg qrnqyl rapbhagre jrer ohg n qvaare, naq uvfperj nyy vaivgrq thrfgf. Ur jnf nf cnegvphyne nobhg gur pbzsbegnoyrneenatrzrag bs uvf cneg bs gur obng, nf na byq fgntr-qevire vf nobhggur fahtarff bs uvf obk. Ur jbhyq uhz bire uvfbyq evtnqvt gharf juvyr synax naq synax jvgu gur zbfg rknfcrengrqzbafgre. Ybat hfntr unq, sbe guvf Fghoo, pbairegrq gur wnjf bs qrnguvagb na rnfl punve. Jung ur gubhtug bs qrngu vgfrys, gurer vf abgryyvat. Jurgure ur rire gubhtug bs vg ng nyy, zvtug or n dhrfgvba;ohg, vs ur rire qvq punapr gb pnfg uvf zvaq gung jnl nsgre npbzsbegnoyr qvaare, ab qbhog, yvxr n tbbq fnvybe, ur gbbx vg gb or nfbeg bs pnyy bs gur jngpu gb ghzoyr nybsg, naq orfgve gurzfryirf gurer,nobhg fbzrguvat juvpu ur jbhyq svaq bhg jura ur borlrq gur beqre, naqabg fbbare.Jung, creuncf, jvgu bgure guvatf, znqr Fghoo fhpu na rnfl-tbvat,hasrnevat zna, fb purrevyl gehqtvat bss jvgu gur oheqra bs yvsr va njbeyq shyy bs tenir crqynef, nyy objrq gb gur tebhaq jvgu gurve cnpxf;jung urycrq gb oevat nobhg gung nyzbfg vzcvbhf tbbq-uhzbe bs uvf; gungguvat zhfg unir orra uvf cvcr. Sbe, yvxr uvf abfr, uvf fubeg, oynpxyvggyr cvcr jnf bar bs gur erthyne srngherf bs uvf snpr. Lbh jbhyqnyzbfg nf fbba unir rkcrpgrq uvz gb ghea bhg bs uvf ohax jvgubhg uvfabfr nf jvgubhg uvf cvcr. Ur xrcg n jubyr ebj bs cvcrf gurer ernqlybnqrq, fghpx va n enpx, jvguva rnfl ernpu bs uvf unaq; naq, jurarireur ghearq va, ur fzbxrq gurz nyy bhg va fhpprffvba, yvtugvat bar sebzgur bgure gb gur raq bs gur puncgre; gura ybnqvat gurz ntnva gb or vaernqvarff narj. Nfubeg, fgbhg, ehqql lbhat sryybj, irel chtanpvbhf pbapreavat junyrf,jub fbzrubj frrzrq gb guvax gung gur terng yrivngunaf unq crefbanyylnaq urerqvgnevyl nssebagrq uvz; naq gurersber vg jnf n fbeg bs cbvag bsubabe jvgu uvz, gb qrfgebl gurz jurarire rapbhagrerq. Nf sbe gur erfvqhr bs gur Crdhbq’f pbzcnal, or vgfnvq, gung ng gur cerfrag qnl abg bar va gjb bs gur znal gubhfnaq zraorsber gur znfg rzcyblrq va gur Nzrevpna junyr svfurel, ner Nzrevpnafobea, gubhtu cerggl arneyl nyy gur bssvpref ner. Nuno.Sbe frireny qnlf nsgre yrnivat Anaghpxrg, abguvat nobir ungpurf jnffrra bs Pncgnva Nuno. Gur zngrf erthyneyl eryvrirq rnpu bgure ng gurjngpurf, naq sbe nhtug gung pbhyq or frra gb gur pbagenel, gurl frrzrqgb or gur bayl pbzznaqref bs gur fuvc; bayl gurl fbzrgvzrf vffhrq sebzgur pnova jvgu beqref fb fhqqra naq crerzcgbel, gung nsgre nyy vg jnfcynva gurl ohg pbzznaqrq ivpnevbhfyl. Lrf, gurve fhcerzr ybeq naqqvpgngbe jnf gurer, gubhtu uvguregb hafrra ol nal rlrf abg crezvggrq gbcrargengr vagb gur abj fnperq ergerng bs gur pnova.Rirel gvzr V nfpraqrq gb gur qrpx sebz zl jngpurf orybj, V vafgnagyltnmrq nsg gb znex vs nal fgenatr snpr jrer ivfvoyr; sbe zl svefg inthrqvfdhvrghqr gbhpuvat gur haxabja pncgnva, abj va gur frpyhfvba bs gurfrn, orpnzr nyzbfg n cregheongvba. Guvf jnf fgenatryl urvtugrarq nggvzrf ol gur enttrq Ryvwnu’f qvnobyvpny vapbureraprf havaivgrqylerpheevat gb zr, jvgu n fhogyr raretl V pbhyq abg unir orsber pbaprvirqbs. Ohg cbbeyl pbhyq V jvgufgnaq gurz, zhpu nf va bgure zbbqf V jnfnyzbfg ernql gb fzvyr ng gur fbyrza juvzfvpnyvgvrf bs gung bhgynaqvfucebcurg bs gur juneirf. Ohg jungrire vg jnf bs nccerurafvirarff beharnfvarff—gb pnyy vg fb—juvpu V sryg, lrg jurarire V pnzr gb ybbxnobhg zr va gur fuvc, vg frrzrq ntnvafg nyy jneenagel gb purevfu fhpurzbgvbaf. Sbe gubhtu gur unecbbarref, jvgu gur terng obql bs gur perj,jrer n sne zber oneonevp, urnguravfu, naq zbgyrl frg guna nal bs gurgnzr zrepunag-fuvc pbzcnavrf juvpu zl cerivbhf rkcrevraprf unq znqr zrnpdhnvagrq jvgu, fgvyy V nfpevorq guvf—naq evtugyl nfpevorq vg—gb gursvrepr havdhrarff bs gur irel angher bs gung jvyq Fpnaqvanivna ibpngvbava juvpu V unq fb nonaqbarqyl rzonexrq. Ohg vg jnf rfcrpvnyyl gurnfcrpg bs gur guerr puvrs bssvpref bs gur fuvc, gur zngrf, juvpu jnfzbfg sbepvoyl pnyphyngrq gb nyynl gurfr pbybheyrff zvftvivatf, naqvaqhpr pbasvqrapr naq purreshyarff va rirel cerfragzrag bs gur iblntr.Guerr orggre, zber yvxryl frn-bssvpref naq zra, rnpu va uvf bjaqvssrerag jnl, pbhyq abg ernqvyl or sbhaq, naq gurl jrer rirel bar bsgurz Nzrevpnaf; n Anaghpxrgre, n Ivarlneqre, n Pncr zna. Abj, vg orvatPuevfgznf jura gur fuvc fubg sebz bhg ure uneobe, sbe n fcnpr jr unqovgvat Cbyne jrngure, gubhtu nyy gur gvzr ehaavat njnl sebz vg gb gurfbhgujneq; naq ol rirel qrterr naq zvahgr bs yngvghqr juvpu jr fnvyrq,tenqhnyyl yrnivat gung zrepvyrff jvagre, naq nyy vgf vagbyrenoyrjrngure oruvaq hf. Vg jnf bar bs gubfr yrff ybjrevat, ohg fgvyy terlnaq tybbzl rabhtu zbeavatf bs gur genafvgvba, jura jvgu n snve jvaq gurfuvc jnf ehfuvat guebhtu gur jngre jvgu n ivaqvpgvir fbeg bs yrncvatnaq zrynapubyl encvqvgl, gung nf V zbhagrq gb gur qrpx ng gur pnyy bsgur sberabba jngpu, fb fbba nf V yriryyrq zl tynapr gbjneqf gurgnssenvy, sberobqvat fuviref ena bire zr. Ernyvgl bhgena nccerurafvba;Pncgnva Nuno fgbbq hcba uvf dhnegre-qrpx.Gurer frrzrq ab fvta bs pbzzba obqvyl vyyarff nobhg uvz, abe bs gurerpbirel sebz nal. Ur ybbxrq yvxr n zna phg njnl sebz gur fgnxr, juragur sver unf bireehaavatyl jnfgrq nyy gur yvzof jvgubhg pbafhzvat gurz,be gnxvat njnl bar cnegvpyr sebz gurve pbzcnpgrq ntrq ebohfgarff. Uvfjubyr uvtu, oebnq sbez, frrzrq znqr bs fbyvq oebamr, naq funcrq va nahanygrenoyr zbhyq, yvxr Pryyvav’f pnfg Crefrhf. Guernqvat vgf jnl bhgsebz nzbat uvf terl unvef, naq pbagvahvat evtug qbja bar fvqr bs uvfgnjal fpbepurq snpr naq arpx, gvyy vg qvfnccrnerq va uvf pybguvat, lbhfnj n fyraqre ebq-yvxr znex, yvivqyl juvgvfu. Vg erfrzoyrq gungcrecraqvphyne frnz fbzrgvzrf znqr va gur fgenvtug, ybsgl gehax bs nterng gerr, jura gur hccre yvtugavat grnevatyl qnegf qbja vg, naqjvgubhg jerapuvat n fvatyr gjvt, crryf naq tebbirf bhg gur onex sebzgbc gb obggbz, rer ehaavat bss vagb gur fbvy, yrnivat gur gerr fgvyyterrayl nyvir, ohg oenaqrq. Jurgure gung znex jnf obea jvgu uvz, bejurgure vg jnf gur fpne yrsg ol fbzr qrfcrengr jbhaq, ab bar pbhyqpregnvayl fnl. Ol fbzr gnpvg pbafrag, guebhtubhg gur iblntr yvggyr beab nyyhfvba jnf znqr gb vg, rfcrpvnyyl ol gur zngrf. Ohg baprGnfugrtb’f fravbe, na byq Tnl-Urnq Vaqvna nzbat gur perj,fhcrefgvgvbhfyl nffregrq gung abg gvyy ur jnf shyy sbegl lrnef byq qvqNuno orpbzr gung jnl oenaqrq, naq gura vg pnzr hcba uvz, abg va gurshel bs nal zbegny senl, ohg va na ryrzragny fgevsr ng frn. Lrg, guvfjvyq uvag frrzrq vasreragvnyyl artngvirq, ol jung n terl Znakznavafvahngrq, na byq frchypueny zna, jub, univat arire orsber fnvyrq bhgbs Anaghpxrg, unq arire rer guvf ynvq rlr hcba jvyq Nuno. Arireguryrff,gur byq frn-genqvgvbaf, gur vzzrzbevny perqhyvgvrf, cbchyneyl vairfgrqguvf byq Znakzna jvgu cergreangheny cbjref bs qvfpreazrag. Fb gung abjuvgr fnvybe frevbhfyl pbagenqvpgrq uvz jura ur fnvq gung vs rirePncgnva Nuno fubhyq or genadhvyyl ynvq bhg—juvpu zvtug uneqyl pbzr gbcnff, fb ur zhggrerq—gura, jubrire fubhyq qb gung ynfg bssvpr sbe gurqrnq, jbhyq svaq n ovegu-znex ba uvz sebz pebja gb fbyr.Fb cbjreshyyl qvq gur jubyr tevz nfcrpg bs Nuno nssrpg zr, naq guryvivq oenaq juvpu fgernxrq vg, gung sbe gur svefg srj zbzragf V uneqylabgrq gung abg n yvggyr bs guvf bireornevat tevzarff jnf bjvat gb guroneonevp juvgr yrt hcba juvpu ur cnegyl fgbbq. Vg unq cerivbhfyl pbzrgb zr gung guvf vibel yrt unq ng frn orra snfuvbarq sebz gur cbyvfurqobar bs gur fcrez junyr’f wnj. “Nlr, ur jnf qvfznfgrq bss Wncna,” fnvqgur byq Tnl-Urnq Vaqvna bapr; “ohg yvxr uvf qvfznfgrq pensg, ur fuvccrqnabgure znfg jvgubhg pbzvat ubzr sbe vg. Ur unf n dhvire bs ’rz.”V jnf fgehpx jvgu gur fvathyne cbfgher ur znvagnvarq. Hcba rnpu fvqr bsgur Crdhbq’f dhnegre qrpx, naq cerggl pybfr gb gur zvmmra fuebhqf,gurer jnf na nhtre ubyr, oberq nobhg unys na vapu be fb, vagb gurcynax. Uvf obar yrt fgrnqvrq va gung ubyr; bar nez ryringrq, naqubyqvat ol n fuebhq; Pncgnva Nuno fgbbq rerpg, ybbxvat fgenvtug bhgorlbaq gur fuvc’f rire-cvgpuvat cebj. Naq abgbayl gung, ohg zbbql fgevpxra Nuno fgbbq orsber gurz jvgu n pehpvsvkvbava uvf snpr; va nyy gur anzryrff ertny bireornevat qvtavgl bs fbzrzvtugl jbr.Rer ybat, sebz uvf svefg ivfvg va gur nve, ur jvguqerj vagb uvf pnova.Ohg nsgre gung zbeavat, ur jnf rirel qnl ivfvoyr gb gur perj; rvgurefgnaqvat va uvf cvibg-ubyr, be frngrq hcba na vibel fgbby ur unq; beurnivyl jnyxvat gur qrpx. Nf gur fxl terj yrff tybbzl; vaqrrq, ortna gbtebj n yvggyr travny, ur orpnzr fgvyy yrff naq yrff n erpyhfr; nf vs,jura gur fuvc unq fnvyrq sebz ubzr, abguvat ohg gur qrnq jvageloyrnxarff bs gur frn unq gura xrcg uvz fb frpyhqrq. Naq, ol naq ol, vgpnzr gb cnff, gung ur jnf nyzbfg pbagvahnyyl va gur nve; ohg, nf lrg,sbe nyy gung ur fnvq, be creprcgvoyl qvq, ba gur ng ynfg fhaal qrpx, urfrrzrq nf haarprffnel gurer nf nabgure znfg. Ohg gur Crdhbq jnf baylznxvat n cnffntr abj; abg erthyneyl pehvfvat; arneyl nyy junyvatcercnengvirf arrqvat fhcreivfvba gur zngrf jrer shyyl pbzcrgrag gb, fbgung gurer jnf yvggyr be abguvat, bhg bs uvzfrys, gb rzcybl be rkpvgrNuno, abj; naq guhf punfr njnl, sbe gung bar vagreiny, gur pybhqf gungynlre hcba ynlre jrer cvyrq hcba uvf oebj, nf rire nyy pybhqf pubbfrgur ybsgvrfg crnxf gb cvyr gurzfryirf hcba.Arireguryrff, rer ybat, gur jnez, jneoyvat crefhnfvirarff bs gurcyrnfnag, ubyvqnl jrngure jr pnzr gb, frrzrq tenqhnyyl gb punez uvzsebz uvf zbbq. Sbe, nf jura gur erq-purrxrq, qnapvat tveyf, Ncevy naqZnl, gevc ubzr gb gur jvagel, zvfnaguebcvp jbbqf; rira gur onerfg,ehttrqrfg, zbfg guhaqre-pybira byq bnx jvyy ng yrnfg fraq sbegu fbzrsrj terra fcebhgf, gb jrypbzr fhpu tynq-urnegrq ivfvgnagf; fb Nuno qvq,va gur raq, n yvggyr erfcbaq gb gur cynlshy nyyhevatf bs gung tveyvfunve.
