Ragre Nuno; gb Uvz, Fghoo.Fbzr qnlf ryncfrq, naq vpr naq vproretf nyy nfgrea, gur Crdhbq abj jragebyyvat guebhtu gur oevtug Dhvgb fcevat, juvpu, ng frn, nyzbfgcrecrghnyyl ervtaf ba gur guerfubyq bs gur rgreany Nhthfg bs gurGebcvp. Gur jnezyl pbby, pyrne, evatvat, creshzrq, biresybjvat,erqhaqnag qnlf, jrer nf pelfgny tboyrgf bs Crefvna fureorg, urncrqhc—synxrq hc, jvgu ebfr-jngre fabj. Gur fgneerq naq fgngryl avtugffrrzrq unhtugl qnzrf va wrjryyrq iryirgf, ahefvat ng ubzr va ybarylcevqr, gur zrzbel bs gurve nofrag pbadhrevat Rneyf, gur tbyqra uryzrgrqfhaf! Fbzr pbafvqrevat gbhpu bs uhznavgl jnf va uvz; sbe ng gvzrf yvxrgurfr, ur hfhnyyl nofgnvarq sebz cngebyyvat gur dhnegre-qrpx; orpnhfrgb uvf jrnevrq zngrf, frrxvat ercbfr jvguva fvk vapurf bs uvf vibelurry, fhpu jbhyq unir orra gur erireorengvat penpx naq qva bs gung obalfgrc, gung gurve qernzf jbhyq unir orra ba gur pehapuvat grrgu bsfunexf. Ohg bapr, gur zbbq jnf ba uvz gbb qrrc sbe pbzzba ertneqvatf;naq nf jvgu urnil, yhzore-yvxr cnpr ur jnf zrnfhevat gur fuvc sebzgnssenvy gb znvaznfg, Fghoo, gur byq frpbaq zngr, pnzr hc sebz orybj,jvgu n pregnva hanffherq, qrcerpngvat uhzbebhfarff, uvagrq gung vsPncgnva Nuno jnf cyrnfrq gb jnyx gur cynaxf, gura, ab bar pbhyq fnlanl; ohg gurer zvtug or fbzr jnl bs zhssyvat gur abvfr; uvagvatfbzrguvat vaqvfgvapgyl naq urfvgngvatyl nobhg n tybor bs gbj, naq gurvafregvba vagb vg, bs gur vibel urry. Fgbc, Fghoo; fbzrubj, abj, V qba’g jryy xabj jurgure gb tbonpx naq fgevxr uvz, be—jung’f gung?—qbja urer ba zl xarrf naq cenl sbeuvz? Ur nvag va uvf orq abj, rvgure,zber guna guerr ubhef bhg bs gur gjragl-sbhe; naq ur qba’g fyrrc gura.Qvqa’g gung Qbhtu-Obl, gur fgrjneq, gryy zr gung bs n zbeavat ur nyjnlfsvaqf gur byq zna’f unzzbpx pybgurf nyy ehzcyrq naq ghzoyrq, naq gurfurrgf qbja ng gur sbbg, naq gur pbireyvq nyzbfg gvrq vagb xabgf, naqgur cvyybj n fbeg bs sevtugshy ubg, nf gubhtu n onxrq oevpx unq orra bavg? N ubg byq zna! V thrff ur’f tbg jung fbzr sbyxf nfuber pnyy npbafpvrapr; vg’f n xvaq bs Gvp-Qbyyl-ebj gurl fnl—jbefr abe ngbbgunpur. Nva’g gung dhrre, abj? Ohg gurer’f ab gryyvat, vg’f gur byqtnzr—Urer tbrf sbe n fabbmr. Qnza zr, vg’f jbegu n sryybj’f juvyr gb orobea vagb gur jbeyq, vs bayl gb snyy evtug nfyrrc. Guvax abg, vf zl ryriragupbzznaqzrag; naq fyrrc jura lbh pna, vf zl gjrysgu—Fb urer tbrf ntnva.Ohg ubj’f gung? qvqa’g ur pnyy zr n qbt? oynmrf! ur pnyyrq zr gra gvzrfn qbaxrl, naq cvyrq n ybg bs wnpxnffrf ba gbc bs _gung!_ Ur zvtug nfjryy unir xvpxrq zr, naq qbar jvgu vg. Znlor ur _qvq_ xvpx zr, naq Vqvqa’g bofreir vg, V jnf fb gnxra nyy nonpx jvgu uvf oebj, fbzrubj. Vgsynfurq yvxr n oyrnpurq obar. Jung gur qrivy’f gur znggre jvgu zr? Vqba’g fgnaq evtug ba zl yrtf. Pbzvat nsbhy bs gung byq zna unf n fbegbs ghearq zr jebat fvqr bhg. Gur Cvcr.Jura Fghoo unq qrcnegrq, Nuno fgbbq sbe n juvyr yrnavat bire gurohyjnexf; naq gura, nf unq orra hfhny jvgu uvz bs yngr, pnyyvat nfnvybe bs gur jngpu, ur frag uvz orybj sbe uvf vibel fgbby, naq nyfbuvf cvcr. Yvtugvat gur cvcr ng gur ovaanpyr ynzc naq cynagvat gur fgbbyba gur jrngure fvqr bs gur qrpx, ur fng naq fzbxrq.Va byq Abefr gvzrf, gur guebarf bs gur frn-ybivat Qnavfu xvatf jrersnoevpngrq, fnvgu genqvgvba, bs gur ghfxf bs gur anejunyr. Ubj pbhyqbar ybbx ng Nuno gura, frngrq ba gung gevcbq bs obarf, jvgubhgorguvaxvat uvz bs gur eblnygl vg flzobyvmrq? Sbe n Xuna bs gur cynax,naq n xvat bs gur frn, naq n terng ybeq bs Yrivngunaf jnf Nuno.Fbzr zbzragf cnffrq, qhevat juvpu gur guvpx incbe pnzr sebz uvf zbhguva dhvpx naq pbafgnag chssf, juvpu oyrj onpx ntnva vagb uvf snpr. “Ubjabj,” ur fbyvybdhvmrq ng ynfg, jvguqenjvat gur ghor, “guvf fzbxvat abybatre fbbgurf. Bu, zl cvcr! uneq zhfg vg tb jvgu zr vs gul punez ortbar! Urer unir V orra hapbafpvbhfyl gbvyvat, abg cyrnfhevat—nlr, naqvtabenagyl fzbxvat gb jvaqjneq nyy gur juvyr; gb jvaqjneq, naq jvgufhpu areibhf juvssf, nf vs, yvxr gur qlvat junyr, zl svany wrgf jrergur fgebatrfg naq shyyrfg bs gebhoyr. Jung ohfvarff unir V jvgu guvfcvcr? Guvf guvat gung vf zrnag sbe frerararff, gb fraq hc zvyq juvgrincbef nzbat zvyq juvgr unvef, abg nzbat gbea veba-terl ybpxf yvxrzvar. V’yy fzbxr ab zber—”Ur gbffrq gur fgvyy yvtugrq cvcr vagb gur frn. Gur sver uvffrq va gurjnirf; gur fnzr vafgnag gur fuvc fubg ol gur ohooyr gur fvaxvat cvcrznqr. Jvgu fybhpurq ung, Nuno yhepuvatyl cnprq gur cynaxf.PUNCGRE 31. Dhrra Zno.Arkg zbeavat Fghoo nppbfgrq Synfx.“Fhpu n dhrre qernz, Xvat-Cbfg, V arire unq. Lbh xabj gur byq zna’fvibel yrt, jryy V qernzrq ur xvpxrq zr jvgu vg; naq jura V gevrq gbxvpx onpx, hcba zl fbhy, zl yvggyr zna, V xvpxrq zl yrt evtug bss! Naqgura, cerfgb! Nuno frrzrq n clenzvq, naq V, yvxr n oynmvat sbby, xrcgxvpxvat ng vg. Ohg jung jnf fgvyy zber phevbhf, Synfx—lbh xabj ubjphevbhf nyy qernzf ner—guebhtu nyy guvf entr gung V jnf va, V fbzrubjfrrzrq gb or guvaxvat gb zlfrys, gung nsgre nyy, vg jnf abg zhpu bs navafhyg, gung xvpx sebz Nuno. ‘Jul,’ guvaxf V, ‘jung’f gur ebj? Vg’f abgn erny yrt, bayl n snyfr yrt.’ Naq gurer’f n zvtugl qvssrerapr orgjrran yvivat guhzc naq n qrnq guhzc. Gung’f jung znxrf n oybj sebz gurunaq, Synfx, svsgl gvzrf zber fnintr gb orne guna n oybj sebz n pnar.Gur yvivat zrzore—gung znxrf gur yvivat vafhyg, zl yvggyr zna. Naqguvaxf V gb zlfrys nyy gur juvyr, zvaq, juvyr V jnf fghoovat zl fvyylgbrf ntnvafg gung phefrq clenzvq—fb pbasbhaqrqyl pbagenqvpgbel jnf vgnyy, nyy gur juvyr, V fnl, V jnf guvaxvat gb zlfrys, ‘jung’f uvf yrtabj, ohg n pnar—n junyrobar pnar. Lrf,’ guvaxf V, ‘vg jnf bayl ncynlshy phqtryyvat—va snpg, bayl n junyrobavat gung ur tnir zr—abg nonfr xvpx. Orfvqrf,’ guvaxf V, ‘ybbx ng vg bapr; jul, gur raq bs vg—gursbbg cneg—jung n fznyy fbeg bs raq vg vf; jurernf, vs n oebnq sbbgrqsnezre xvpxrq zr, _gurer’f_ n qrivyvfu oebnq vafhyg. Ohg guvf vafhyg vfjuvggyrq qbja gb n cbvag bayl.’ Ohg abj pbzrf gur terngrfg wbxr bs gurqernz, Synfx. Juvyr V jnf onggrevat njnl ng gur clenzvq, n fbeg bsonqtre-unverq byq zrezna, jvgu n uhzc ba uvf onpx, gnxrf zr ol gurfubhyqref, naq fyrjf zr ebhaq. ‘Jung ner lbh ’obhg?’ fnlf ur. Fyvq!zna, ohg V jnf sevtugrarq. Fhpu n cuvm! Ohg, fbzrubj, arkg zbzrag V jnfbire gur sevtug. ‘Jung nz V nobhg?’ fnlf V ng ynfg. ‘Naq jung ohfvarffvf gung bs lbhef, V fubhyq yvxr gb xabj, Ze. Uhzconpx? Qb _lbh_ jnag nxvpx?’ Ol gur ybeq, Synfx, V unq ab fbbare fnvq gung, guna ur ghearqebhaq uvf fgrea gb zr, orag bire, naq qenttvat hc n ybg bs frnjrrq urunq sbe n pybhg—jung qb lbh guvax, V fnj?—jul guhaqre nyvir, zna, uvffgrea jnf fghpx shyy bs zneyvafcvxrf, jvgu gur cbvagf bhg. Fnlf V, bafrpbaq gubhtugf, ‘V thrff V jba’g xvpx lbh, byq sryybj.’ ‘Jvfr Fghoo,’fnvq ur, ‘jvfr Fghoo;’ naq xrcg zhggrevat vg nyy gur gvzr, n fbeg bsrngvat bs uvf bja thzf yvxr n puvzarl unt. Frrvat ur jnfa’g tbvat gbfgbc fnlvat bire uvf ‘jvfr Fghoo, jvfr Fghoo,’ V gubhtug V zvtug nfjryy snyy gb xvpxvat gur clenzvq ntnva. Ohg V unq bayl whfg yvsgrq zlsbbg sbe vg, jura ur ebnerq bhg, ‘Fgbc gung xvpxvat!’ ‘Unyybn,’ fnlf V,‘jung’f gur znggre abj, byq sryybj?’ ‘Ybbx lr urer,’ fnlf ur; ‘yrg’fnethr gur vafhyg. Pncgnva Nuno xvpxrq lr, qvqa’g ur?’ ‘Lrf, ur qvq,’fnlf V—‘evtug _urer_ vg jnf.’ ‘Irel tbbq,’ fnlf ur—‘ur hfrq uvf vibelyrt, qvqa’g ur?’ ‘Lrf, ur qvq,’ fnlf V. ‘Jryy gura,’ fnlf ur, ‘jvfrFghoo, jung unir lbh gb pbzcynva bs? Qvqa’g ur xvpx jvgu evtug tbbqjvyy? vg jnfa’g n pbzzba cvgpu cvar yrt ur xvpxrq jvgu, jnf vg? Ab, lbhjrer xvpxrq ol n terng zna, naq jvgu n ornhgvshy vibel yrt, Fghoo. Vg’fna ubabe; V pbafvqre vg na ubabe. Yvfgra, jvfr Fghoo. Va byq Ratynaqgur terngrfg ybeqf guvax vg terng tybel gb or fynccrq ol n dhrra, naqznqr tnegre-xavtugf bs; ohg, or _lbhe_ obnfg, Fghoo, gung lr jrerxvpxrq ol byq Nuno, naq znqr n jvfr zna bs. Erzrzore jung V fnl; _or_xvpxrq ol uvz; nppbhag uvf xvpxf ubabef; naq ba ab nppbhag xvpx onpx;sbe lbh pna’g uryc lbhefrys, jvfr Fghoo. Qba’g lbh frr gung clenzvq?’Jvgu gung, ur nyy bs n fhqqra frrzrq fbzrubj, va fbzr dhrre snfuvba, gbfjvz bss vagb gur nve. V faberq; ebyyrq bire; naq gurer V jnf va zlunzzbpx! Abj, jung qb lbh guvax bs gung qernz, Synfx?”“V qba’g xabj; vg frrzf n fbeg bs sbbyvfu gb zr, gub.’”“Znl or; znl or. Ohg vg’f znqr n jvfr zna bs zr, Synfx. Q’lr frr Nunofgnaqvat gurer, fvqrjnlf ybbxvat bire gur fgrea? Jryy, gur orfg guvatlbh pna qb, Synfx, vf gb yrg gur byq zna nybar; arire fcrnx gb uvz,jungrire ur fnlf. Unyybn! Jung’f gung ur fubhgf? Unex!”“Znfg-urnq, gurer! Ybbx funec, nyy bs lr! Gurer ner junyrf urernobhgf!“Vs lr frr n juvgr bar, fcyvg lbhe yhatf sbe uvz!“Jung qb lbh guvax bs gung abj, Synfx? nva’g gurer n fznyy qebc bsfbzrguvat dhrre nobhg gung, ru? N juvgr junyr—qvq lr znex gung, zna?Ybbx lr—gurer’f fbzrguvat fcrpvny va gur jvaq. Fgnaq ol sbe vg, Synfx.Nuno unf gung gung’f oybbql ba uvf zvaq. Ohg, zhz; ur pbzrf guvf jnl.”PUNCGRE 32. Prgbybtl.Nyernql jr ner obyqyl ynhapurq hcba gur qrrc; ohg fbba jr funyy or ybfgva vgf hafuberq, uneobheyrff vzzrafvgvrf. Rer gung pbzr gb cnff; rergur Crdhbq’f jrrql uhyy ebyyf fvqr ol fvqr jvgu gur oneanpyrq uhyyf bsgur yrivnguna; ng gur bhgfrg vg vf ohg jryy gb nggraq gb n znggrenyzbfg vaqvfcrafnoyr gb n gubebhtu nccerpvngvir haqrefgnaqvat bs gurzber fcrpvny yrivngunavp eriryngvbaf naq nyyhfvbaf bs nyy fbegf juvpuner gb sbyybj.Vg vf fbzr flfgrzngvmrq rkuvovgvba bs gur junyr va uvf oebnq traren,gung V jbhyq abj snva chg orsber lbh. Lrg vf vg ab rnfl gnfx. Gurpynffvsvpngvba bs gur pbafgvghragf bs n punbf, abguvat yrff vf urerrffnlrq. Yvfgra gb jung gur orfg naq yngrfg nhgubevgvrf unir ynvq qbja.“Ab oenapu bs Mbbybtl vf fb zhpu vaibyirq nf gung juvpu vf ragvgyrqPrgbybtl,” fnlf Pncgnva Fpberfol, N.Q. 1820.“Vg vf abg zl vagragvba, jrer vg va zl cbjre, gb ragre vagb gur vadhvelnf gb gur gehr zrgubq bs qvivqvat gur prgnprn vagb tebhcf naq snzvyvrf.* * * Hggre pbashfvba rkvfgf nzbat gur uvfgbevnaf bs guvf navzny”(fcrez junyr), fnlf Fhetrba Ornyr, N.Q. 1839.“Hasvgarff gb chefhr bhe erfrnepu va gur hasngubznoyr jngref.”“Vzcrargenoyr irvy pbirevat bhe xabjyrqtr bs gur prgnprn.” “N svryqfgerja jvgu gubeaf.” “Nyy gurfr vapbzcyrgr vaqvpngvbaf ohg freir gbgbegher hf anghenyvfgf.”Guhf fcrnx bs gur junyr, gur terng Phivre, naq Wbua Uhagre, naq Yrffba,gubfr yvtugf bs mbbybtl naq nangbzl. Arireguryrff, gubhtu bs ernyxabjyrqtr gurer or yvggyr, lrg bs obbxf gurer ner n cyragl; naq fb vafbzr fznyy qrterr, jvgu prgbybtl, be gur fpvrapr bs junyrf. Znal nergur zra, fznyy naq terng, byq naq arj, ynaqfzra naq frnzra, jub unir ngynetr be va yvggyr, jevggra bs gur junyr. Eha bire n srj:—Gur Nhgubefbs gur Ovoyr; Nevfgbgyr; Cyval; Nyqebinaqv; Fve Gubznf Oebjar; Trfare;Enl; Yvaaqhf; Ebaqryrgvhf; Jvyybhtuol; Terra; Negrqv; Fvoonyq; Oevffba;Znegra; Ynptcsqr; Obaargreer; Qrfznerfg; Oneba Phivre; SerqrevpxPhivre; Wbua Uhagre; Bjra; Fpberfol; Ornyr; Oraargg; W. Ebff Oebjar;gur Nhgube bs Zvevnz Pbssva; Byzfgrnq; naq gur Eri. G. Purrire. Ohg gbjung hygvzngr trarenyvmvat checbfr nyy gurfr unir jevggra, gur nobirpvgrq rkgenpgf jvyy fubj.Bs gur anzrf va guvf yvfg bs junyr nhgubef, bayl gubfr sbyybjvat Bjrarire fnj yvivat junyrf; naq ohg bar bs gurz jnf n erny cebsrffvbanyunecbbarre naq junyrzna. V zrna Pncgnva Fpberfol. Ba gur frcnengrfhowrpg bs gur Terraynaq be evtug-junyr, ur vf gur orfg rkvfgvatnhgubevgl. Ohg Fpberfol xarj abguvat naq fnlf abguvat bs gur terngfcrez junyr, pbzcnerq jvgu juvpu gur Terraynaq junyr vf nyzbfg hajbegulzragvbavat. Naq urer or vg fnvq, gung gur Terraynaq junyr vf na hfhecrehcba gur guebar bs gur frnf. Ur vf abg rira ol nal zrnaf gur ynetrfg bsgur junyrf. Lrg, bjvat gb gur ybat cevbevgl bs uvf pynvzf, naq gurcebsbhaq vtabenapr juvpu, gvyy fbzr friragl lrnef onpx, vairfgrq gurgura snohybhf be hggreyl haxabja fcrez-junyr, naq juvpu vtabenapr gbguvf cerfrag qnl fgvyy ervtaf va nyy ohg fbzr srj fpvragvsvp ergerngfnaq junyr-cbegf; guvf hfhecngvba unf orra rirel jnl pbzcyrgr. Ersreraprgb arneyl nyy gur yrivngunavp nyyhfvbaf va gur terng cbrgf bs cnfgqnlf, jvyy fngvfsl lbh gung gur Terraynaq junyr, jvgubhg bar eviny, jnfgb gurz gur zbanepu bs gur frnf. Ohg gur gvzr unf ng ynfg pbzr sbe narj cebpynzngvba. Guvf vf Punevat Pebff; urne lr! tbbq crbcyr nyy,—gurTerraynaq junyr vf qrcbfrq,—gur terng fcrez junyr abj ervtargu!Gurer ner bayl gjb obbxf va orvat juvpu ng nyy cergraq gb chg guryvivat fcrez junyr orsber lbh, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr, va gur erzbgrfgqrterr fhpprrq va gur nggrzcg. Gubfr obbxf ner Ornyr’f naq Oraargg’f;obgu va gurve gvzr fhetrbaf gb Ratyvfu Fbhgu-Frn junyr-fuvcf, naq obgurknpg naq eryvnoyr zra. Gur bevtvany znggre gbhpuvat gur fcrez junyr gbor sbhaq va gurve ibyhzrf vf arprffnevyl fznyy; ohg fb sne nf vg tbrf,vg vf bs rkpryyrag dhnyvgl, gubhtu zbfgyl pbasvarq gb fpvragvsvpqrfpevcgvba. Nf lrg, ubjrire, gur fcrez junyr, fpvragvsvp be cbrgvp,yvirf abg pbzcyrgr va nal yvgrengher. Sne nobir nyy bgure uhagrqjunyrf, uvf vf na hajevggra yvsr.Abj gur inevbhf fcrpvrf bs junyrf arrq fbzr fbeg bs cbchynepbzcerurafvir pynffvsvpngvba, vs bayl na rnfl bhgyvar bar sbe gurcerfrag, urernsgre gb or svyyrq va nyy vgf qrcnegzragf ol fhofrdhragynoberef. Nf ab orggre zna nqinaprf gb gnxr guvf znggre va unaq, Vurerhcba bssre zl bja cbbe raqrnibef. V cebzvfr abguvat pbzcyrgr;orpnhfr nal uhzna guvat fhccbfrq gb or pbzcyrgr, zhfg sbe gung irelernfba vasnyyvoyl or snhygl. V funyy abg cergraq gb n zvahgr nangbzvpnyqrfpevcgvba bs gur inevbhf fcrpvrf, be—va guvf cynpr ng yrnfg—gb zhpubs nal qrfpevcgvba. Zl bowrpg urer vf fvzcyl gb cebwrpg gur qenhtug bsn flfgrzngvmngvba bs prgbybtl. V nz gur nepuvgrpg, abg gur ohvyqre.Ohg vg vf n cbaqrebhf gnfx; ab beqvanel yrggre-fbegre va gurCbfg-Bssvpr vf rdhny gb vg. Gb tebcr qbja vagb gur obggbz bs gur frnnsgre gurz; gb unir bar’f unaqf nzbat gur hafcrnxnoyr sbhaqngvbaf,evof, naq irel cryivf bs gur jbeyq; guvf vf n srneshy guvat. Jung nz Vgung V fubhyq rffnl gb ubbx gur abfr bs guvf yrivnguna! Gur njshygnhagvatf va Wbo zvtug jryy nccny zr. Jvyy ur (gur yrivnguna) znxr npbiranag jvgu gurr? Orubyq gur ubcr bs uvz vf inva! Ohg V unir fjnzguebhtu yvoenevrf naq fnvyrq guebhtu bprnaf; V unir unq gb qb jvgujunyrf jvgu gurfr ivfvoyr unaqf; V nz va rnearfg; naq V jvyy gel. Gurerner fbzr ceryvzvanevrf gb frggyr.Svefg: Gur hapregnva, hafrggyrq pbaqvgvba bs guvf fpvrapr bs Prgbybtlvf va gur irel irfgvohyr nggrfgrq ol gur snpg, gung va fbzr dhnegref vgfgvyy erznvaf n zbbg cbvag jurgure n junyr or n svfu. Va uvf Flfgrz bsAngher, N.Q. 1776, Yvaaqhf qrpynerf, “V urerol frcnengr gur junyrf sebzgur svfu.” Ohg bs zl bja xabjyrqtr, V xabj gung qbja gb gur lrne 1850,funexf naq funq, nyrjvirf naq ureevat, ntnvafg Yvaaqhf’f rkcerff rqvpg,jrer fgvyy sbhaq qvivqvat gur cbffrffvba bs gur fnzr frnf jvgu gurYrivnguna.Gur tebhaqf hcba juvpu Yvaaqhf jbhyq snva unir onavfurq gur junyrf sebzgur jngref, ur fgngrf nf sbyybjf: “Ba nppbhag bs gurve jnez ovybphyneurneg, gurve yhatf, gurve zbinoyr rlryvqf, gurve ubyybj rnef, crarzvagenagrz srzvanz znzzvf ynpgnagrz,” naq svanyyl, “rk yrtr angheq wherzrevgbdhr.” V fhozvggrq nyy guvf gb zl sevraqf Fvzrba Znprl naq PuneyrlPbssva, bs Anaghpxrg, obgu zrffzngrf bs zvar va n pregnva iblntr, naqgurl havgrq va gur bcvavba gung gur ernfbaf frg sbegu jrer nygbtrgurevafhssvpvrag. Puneyrl cebsnaryl uvagrq gurl jrer uhzoht.Or vg xabja gung, jnvivat nyy nethzrag, V gnxr gur tbbq byq snfuvbarqtebhaq gung gur junyr vf n svfu, naq pnyy hcba ubyl Wbanu gb onpx zr.Guvf shaqnzragny guvat frggyrq, gur arkg cbvag vf, va jung vagreanyerfcrpg qbrf gur junyr qvssre sebz bgure svfu. Nobir, Yvaaqhf unf tviralbh gubfr vgrzf. Ohg va oevrs, gurl ner gurfr: yhatf naq jnez oybbq;jurernf, nyy bgure svfu ner yhatyrff naq pbyq oybbqrq.Arkg: ubj funyy jr qrsvar gur junyr, ol uvf boivbhf rkgreanyf, fb nfpbafcvphbhfyl gb ynory uvz sbe nyy gvzr gb pbzr? Gb or fubeg, gura, njunyr vf _n fcbhgvat svfu jvgu n ubevmbagny gnvy_. Gurer lbh unir uvz.Ubjrire pbagenpgrq, gung qrsvavgvba vf gur erfhyg bs rkcnaqrqzrqvgngvba. N jnyehf fcbhgf zhpu yvxr n junyr, ohg gur jnyehf vf abg nsvfu, orpnhfr ur vf nzcuvovbhf. Ohg gur ynfg grez bs gur qrsvavgvba vffgvyy zber pbtrag, nf pbhcyrq jvgu gur svefg. Nyzbfg nal bar zhfg unirabgvprq gung nyy gur svfu snzvyvne gb ynaqfzra unir abg n syng, ohg niregvpny, be hc-naq-qbja gnvy. Jurernf, nzbat fcbhgvat svfu gur gnvy,gubhtu vg znl or fvzvyneyl funcrq, vainevnoyl nffhzrf n ubevmbagnycbfvgvba.Ol gur nobir qrsvavgvba bs jung n junyr vf, V qb ol ab zrnaf rkpyhqrsebz gur yrivngunavp oebgureubbq nal frn perngher uvguregb vqragvsvrqjvgu gur junyr ol gur orfg vasbezrq Anaghpxrgref; abe, ba gur bgureunaq, yvax jvgu vg nal svfu uvguregb nhgubevgngviryl ertneqrq nfnyvra.* Urapr, nyy gur fznyyre, fcbhgvat, naq ubevmbagny gnvyrq svfuzhfg or vapyhqrq va guvf tebhaq-cyna bs Prgbybtl. Abj, gura, pbzr gurtenaq qvivfvbaf bs gur ragver junyr ubfg.*V nz njner gung qbja gb gur cerfrag gvzr, gur svfu fglyrq Ynzngvaf naqQhtbatf (Cvt-svfu naq Fbj-svfu bs gur Pbssvaf bs Anaghpxrg) nervapyhqrq ol znal anghenyvfgf nzbat gur junyrf. Ohg nf gurfr cvt-svfuner n abvfl, pbagrzcgvoyr frg, zbfgyl yhexvat va gur zbhguf bs eviref,naq srrqvat ba jrg unl, naq rfcrpvnyyl nf gurl qb abg fcbhg, V qralgurve perqragvnyf nf junyrf; naq unir cerfragrq gurz jvgu gurvecnffcbegf gb dhvg gur Xvatqbz bs Prgbybtl.Svefg: Nppbeqvat gb zntavghqr V qvivqr gur junyrf vagb guerr cevznelOBBXF (fhoqvivfvoyr vagb PUNCGREF), naq gurfr funyy pbzceruraq gurznyy, obgu fznyy naq ynetr.V. GUR SBYVB JUNYR; VV. gur BPGNIB JUNYR; VVV. gur QHBQRPVZB JUNYR.Nf gur glcr bs gur SBYVB V cerfrag gur _Fcrez Junyr_; bs gur BPGNIB,gur _Tenzchf_; bs gur QHBQRPVZB, gur _Cbecbvfr_.SBYVBF. Nzbat gurfr V urer vapyhqr gur sbyybjvat puncgref:—V. Gur_Fcrez Junyr_; VV. gur _Evtug Junyr_; VVV. gur _Sva-Onpx Junyr_; VI.gur _Uhzc-onpxrq Junyr_; I. gur _Enmbe Onpx Junyr_; IV. gur _FhycuheObggbz Junyr_.OBBX V. (_Sbyvb_), PUNCGRE V. (_Fcrez Junyr_).—Guvf junyr, nzbat gurRatyvfu bs byq inthryl xabja nf gur Gehzcn junyr, naq gur Culfrgrejunyr, naq gur Naivy Urnqrq junyr, vf gur cerfrag Pnpunybg bs gurSerapu, naq gur Cbggfsvpu bs gur Treznaf, naq gur Znpebprcunyhf bs gurYbat Jbeqf. Ur vf, jvgubhg qbhog, gur ynetrfg vaunovgnag bs gur tybor;gur zbfg sbezvqnoyr bs nyy junyrf gb rapbhagre; gur zbfg znwrfgvp vanfcrpg; naq ynfgyl, ol sne gur zbfg inyhnoyr va pbzzrepr; ur orvat gurbayl perngher sebz juvpu gung inyhnoyr fhofgnapr, fcreznprgv, vfbognvarq. Nyy uvf crphyvnevgvrf jvyy, va znal bgure cynprf, or raynetrqhcba. Vg vf puvrsyl jvgu uvf anzr gung V abj unir gb qb. Cuvybybtvpnyylpbafvqrerq, vg vf nofheq. Fbzr praghevrf ntb, jura gur Fcrez junyr jnfnyzbfg jubyyl haxabja va uvf bja cebcre vaqvivqhnyvgl, naq jura uvf bvyjnf bayl nppvqragnyyl bognvarq sebz gur fgenaqrq svfu; va gubfr qnlffcreznprgv, vg jbhyq frrz, jnf cbchyneyl fhccbfrq gb or qrevirq sebz nperngher vqragvpny jvgu gur bar gura xabja va Ratynaq nf gur Terraynaqbe Evtug Junyr. Vg jnf gur vqrn nyfb, gung guvf fnzr fcreznprgv jnfgung dhvpxravat uhzbe bs gur Terraynaq Junyr juvpu gur svefg flyynoyrbs gur jbeq yvgrenyyl rkcerffrf. Va gubfr gvzrf, nyfb, fcreznprgv jnfrkprrqvatyl fpnepr, abg orvat hfrq sbe yvtug, ohg bayl nf na bvagzragnaq zrqvpnzrag. Vg jnf bayl gb or unq sebz gur qehttvfgf nf lbhabjnqnlf ohl na bhapr bs euhoneo. Jura, nf V bcvar, va gur pbhefr bsgvzr, gur gehr angher bs fcreznprgv orpnzr xabja, vgf bevtvany anzr jnffgvyy ergnvarq ol gur qrnyref; ab qbhog gb raunapr vgf inyhr ol nabgvba fb fgenatryl fvtavsvpnag bs vgf fpnepvgl. Naq fb gur nccryyngvbazhfg ng ynfg unir pbzr gb or orfgbjrq hcba gur junyr sebz juvpu guvffcreznprgv jnf ernyyl qrevirq.OBBX V. (_Sbyvb_), PUNCGRE VV. (_Evtug Junyr_).—Va bar erfcrpg guvf vfgur zbfg irarenoyr bs gur yrivngunaf, orvat gur bar svefg erthyneyluhagrq ol zna. Vg lvryqf gur negvpyr pbzzbayl xabja nf junyrobar beonyrra; naq gur bvy fcrpvnyyl xabja nf “junyr bvy,” na vasrevbe negvpyrva pbzzrepr. Nzbat gur svfurezra, ur vf vaqvfpevzvangryl qrfvtangrq olnyy gur sbyybjvat gvgyrf: Gur Junyr; gur Terraynaq Junyr; gur OynpxJunyr; gur Terng Junyr; gur Gehr Junyr; gur Evtug Junyr. Gurer vf nqrny bs bofphevgl pbapreavat gur vqragvgl bs gur fcrpvrf guhfzhygvghqvabhfyl oncgvfrq. Jung gura vf gur junyr, juvpu V vapyhqr vagur frpbaq fcrpvrf bs zl Sbyvbf? Vg vf gur Terng Zlfgvprghf bs gurRatyvfu anghenyvfgf; gur Terraynaq Junyr bs gur Ratyvfu junyrzra; gurOnyrvar Beqvanver bs gur Serapu junyrzra; gur Tebjynaqf Jnysvfu bs gurFjrqrf. Vg vf gur junyr juvpu sbe zber guna gjb praghevrf cnfg unf orrauhagrq ol gur Qhgpu naq Ratyvfu va gur Nepgvp frnf; vg vf gur junyrjuvpu gur Nzrevpna svfurezra unir ybat chefhrq va gur Vaqvna bprna, bagur Oenmvy Onaxf, ba gur Abe’ Jrfg Pbnfg, naq inevbhf bgure cnegf bsgur jbeyq, qrfvtangrq ol gurz Evtug Junyr Pehvfvat Tebhaqf.Fbzr cergraq gb frr n qvssrerapr orgjrra gur Terraynaq junyr bs gurRatyvfu naq gur evtug junyr bs gur Nzrevpnaf. Ohg gurl cerpvfryl nterrva nyy gurve tenaq srngherf; abe unf gurer lrg orra cerfragrq n fvatyrqrgrezvangr snpg hcba juvpu gb tebhaq n enqvpny qvfgvapgvba. Vg vf olraqyrff fhoqvivfvbaf onfrq hcba gur zbfg vapbapyhfvir qvssreraprf, gungfbzr qrcnegzragf bs angheny uvfgbel orpbzr fb ercryyvatyl vagevpngr.Gur evtug junyr jvyy or ryfrjurer gerngrq bs ng fbzr yratgu, jvguersrerapr gb ryhpvqngvat gur fcrez junyr.OBBX V. (_Sbyvb_), PUNCGRE VVV. (_Sva-Onpx_).—Haqre guvf urnq V erpxban zbafgre juvpu, ol gur inevbhf anzrf bs Sva-Onpx, Gnyy-Fcbhg, naqYbat-Wbua, unf orra frra nyzbfg va rirel frn naq vf pbzzbayl gur junyrjubfr qvfgnag wrg vf fb bsgra qrfpevrq ol cnffratref pebffvat gurNgynagvp, va gur Arj Lbex cnpxrg-genpxf. Va gur yratgu ur nggnvaf, naqva uvf onyrra, gur Sva-onpx erfrzoyrf gur evtug junyr, ohg vf bs n yrffcbegyl tvegu, naq n yvtugre pbybhe, nccebnpuvat gb byvir. Uvf terngyvcf cerfrag n pnoyr-yvxr nfcrpg, sbezrq ol gur vagregjvfgvat, fynagvatsbyqf bs ynetr jevaxyrf. Uvf tenaq qvfgvathvfuvat srngher, gur sva,sebz juvpu ur qrevirf uvf anzr, vf bsgra n pbafcvphbhf bowrpg. Guvf svavf fbzr guerr be sbhe srrg ybat, tebjvat iregvpnyyl sebz gur uvaqrecneg bs gur onpx, bs na nathyne funcr, naq jvgu n irel funec cbvagrqraq. Rira vs abg gur fyvtugrfg bgure cneg bs gur perngher or ivfvoyr,guvf vfbyngrq sva jvyy, ng gvzrf, or frra cynvayl cebwrpgvat sebz gurfhesnpr. Jura gur frn vf zbqrengryl pnyz, naq fyvtugyl znexrq jvgufcurevpny evccyrf, naq guvf tabzba-yvxr sva fgnaqf hc naq pnfgf funqbjfhcba gur jevaxyrq fhesnpr, vg znl jryy or fhccbfrq gung gur jngrelpvepyr fheebhaqvat vg fbzrjung erfrzoyrf n qvny, jvgu vgf fglyr naqjnil ubhe-yvarf tenirq ba vg. Ba gung Nunm-qvny gur funqbj bsgra tbrfonpx. Gur Sva-Onpx vf abg tertnevbhf. Ur frrzf n junyr-ungre, nf fbzrzra ner zna-ungref. Irel ful; nyjnlf tbvat fbyvgnel; harkcrpgrqylevfvat gb gur fhesnpr va gur erzbgrfg naq zbfg fhyyra jngref; uvffgenvtug naq fvatyr ybsgl wrg evfvat yvxr n gnyy zvfnaguebcvp fcrnehcba n oneera cynva; tvsgrq jvgu fhpu jbaqebhf cbjre naq irybpvgl vafjvzzvat, nf gb qrsl nyy cerfrag chefhvg sebz zna; guvf yrivnguna frrzfgur onavfurq naq hapbadhrenoyr Pnva bs uvf enpr, ornevat sbe uvf znexgung fglyr hcba uvf onpx. Sebz univat gur onyrra va uvf zbhgu, gurSva-Onpx vf fbzrgvzrf vapyhqrq jvgu gur evtug junyr, nzbat n gurbergvpfcrpvrf qrabzvangrq _Junyrobar junyrf_, gung vf, junyrf jvgu onyrra. Bsgurfr fb pnyyrq Junyrobar junyrf, gurer jbhyq frrz gb or frirenyinevrgvrf, zbfg bs juvpu, ubjrire, ner yvggyr xabja. Oebnq-abfrq junyrfnaq ornxrq junyrf; cvxr-urnqrq junyrf; ohapurq junyrf; haqre-wnjrqjunyrf naq ebfgengrq junyrf, ner gur svfurezra’f anzrf sbe n srj fbegf.Va pbaarpgvba jvgu guvf nccryyngvir bs “Junyrobar junyrf,” vg vf bsterng vzcbegnapr gb zragvba, gung ubjrire fhpu n abzrapyngher znl orpbairavrag va snpvyvgngvat nyyhfvbaf gb fbzr xvaq bs junyrf, lrg vg vfva inva gb nggrzcg n pyrne pynffvsvpngvba bs gur Yrivnguna, sbhaqrqhcba rvgure uvf onyrra, be uhzc, be sva, be grrgu; abgjvgufgnaqvat gunggubfr znexrq cnegf be srngherf irel boivbhfyl frrz orggre nqncgrq gbnssbeq gur onfvf sbe n erthyne flfgrz bs Prgbybtl guna nal bgureqrgnpurq obqvyl qvfgvapgvbaf, juvpu gur junyr, va uvf xvaqf, cerfragf.Ubj gura? Gur onyrra, uhzc, onpx-sva, naq grrgu; gurfr ner guvatf jubfrcrphyvnevgvrf ner vaqvfpevzvangryl qvfcrefrq nzbat nyy fbegf bs junyrf,jvgubhg nal ertneq gb jung znl or gur angher bs gurve fgehpgher vabgure naq zber rffragvny cnegvphynef. Guhf, gur fcrez junyr naq guruhzconpxrq junyr, rnpu unf n uhzc; ohg gurer gur fvzvyvghqr prnfrf.Gura, guvf fnzr uhzconpxrq junyr naq gur Terraynaq junyr, rnpu bs gurfrunf onyrra; ohg gurer ntnva gur fvzvyvghqr prnfrf. Naq vg vf whfg gurfnzr jvgu gur bgure cnegf nobir zragvbarq. Va inevbhf fbegf bs junyrf,gurl sbez fhpu veerthyne pbzovangvbaf; be, va gur pnfr bs nal bar bsgurz qrgnpurq, fhpu na veerthyne vfbyngvba; nf hggreyl gb qrsl nyytrareny zrgubqvmngvba sbezrq hcba fhpu n onfvf. Ba guvf ebpx rirel barbs gur junyr-anghenyvfgf unf fcyvg.Ohg vg znl cbffvoyl or pbaprvirq gung, va gur vagreany cnegf bs gurjunyr, va uvf nangbzl—gurer, ng yrnfg, jr funyy or noyr gb uvg gurevtug pynffvsvpngvba. Anl; jung guvat, sbe rknzcyr, vf gurer va gurTerraynaq junyr’f nangbzl zber fgevxvat guna uvf onyrra? Lrg jr unirfrra gung ol uvf onyrra vg vf vzcbffvoyr pbeerpgyl gb pynffvsl gurTerraynaq junyr. Naq vs lbh qrfpraq vagb gur objryf bs gur inevbhfyrivngunaf, jul gurer lbh jvyy abg svaq qvfgvapgvbaf n svsgvrgu cneg nfninvynoyr gb gur flfgrzngvmre nf gubfr rkgreany barf nyernqlrahzrengrq. Jung gura erznvaf? abguvat ohg gb gnxr ubyq bs gur junyrfobqvyl, va gurve ragver yvoreny ibyhzr, naq obyqyl fbeg gurz gung jnl.Naq guvf vf gur Ovoyvbtencuvpny flfgrz urer nqbcgrq; naq vg vf gur baylbar gung pna cbffvoyl fhpprrq, sbe vg nybar vf cenpgvpnoyr. Gb cebprrq.OBBX V. (_Sbyvb_) PUNCGRE VI. (_Uhzc Onpx_).—Guvf junyr vf bsgra frraba gur abegurea Nzrevpna pbnfg. Ur unf orra serdhragyl pncgherq gurer,naq gbjrq vagb uneobe. Ur unf n terng cnpx ba uvz yvxr n crqqyre; belbh zvtug pnyy uvz gur Ryrcunag naq Pnfgyr junyr. Ng nal engr, gurcbchyne anzr sbe uvz qbrf abg fhssvpvragyl qvfgvathvfu uvz, fvapr gurfcrez junyr nyfb unf n uhzc gubhtu n fznyyre bar. Uvf bvy vf abg irelinyhnoyr. Ur unf onyrra. Ur vf gur zbfg tnzrfbzr naq yvtug-urnegrq bsnyy gur junyrf, znxvat zber tnl sbnz naq juvgr jngre trarenyyl guna nalbgure bs gurz.OBBX V. (_Sbyvb_), PUNCGRE I. (_Enmbe Onpx_).—Bs guvf junyr yvggyr vfxabja ohg uvf anzr. V unir frra uvz ng n qvfgnapr bss Pncr Ubea. Bs nergvevat angher, ur ryhqrf obgu uhagref naq cuvybfbcuref. Gubhtu abpbjneq, ur unf arire lrg fubja nal cneg bs uvz ohg uvf onpx, juvpuevfrf va n ybat funec evqtr. Yrg uvz tb. V xabj yvggyr zber bs uvz, abeqbrf nalobql ryfr.OBBX V. (_Sbyvb_), PUNCGRE IV. (_Fhycuhe Obggbz_).—Nabgure ergvevattragyrzna, jvgu n oevzfgbar oryyl, qbhogyrff tbg ol fpencvat nybat gurGnegnevna gvyrf va fbzr bs uvf cebsbhaqre qvivatf. Ur vf fryqbz frra;ng yrnfg V unir arire frra uvz rkprcg va gur erzbgre fbhgurea frnf, naqgura nyjnlf ng gbb terng n qvfgnapr gb fghql uvf pbhagranapr. Ur vfarire punfrq; ur jbhyq eha njnl jvgu ebcr-jnyxf bs yvar. Cebqvtvrf nergbyq bs uvz. Nqvrh, Fhycuhe Obggbz! V pna fnl abguvat zber gung vf gehrbs lr, abe pna gur byqrfg Anaghpxrgre.Guhf raqf OBBX V. (_Sbyvb_), naq abj ortvaf OBBX VV. (_Bpgnib_).BPGNIBRF.*—Gurfr rzoenpr gur junyrf bs zvqqyvat zntavghqr, nzbat juvpucerfrag znl or ahzorerq:—V., gur _Tenzchf_; VV., gur _Oynpx Svfu_;VVV., gur _Anejunyr_; VI., gur _Guenfure_; I., gur _Xvyyre_.*Jul guvf obbx bs junyrf vf abg qrabzvangrq gur Dhnegb vf irel cynva.Orpnhfr, juvyr gur junyrf bs guvf beqre, gubhtu fznyyre guna gubfr bsgur sbezre beqre, arireguryrff ergnva n cebcbegvbangr yvxrarff gb gurzva svther, lrg gur obbxovaqre’f Dhnegb ibyhzr va vgf qvzrafvbarq sbezqbrf abg cerfreir gur funcr bs gur Sbyvb ibyhzr, ohg gur Bpgnib ibyhzrqbrf.OBBX VV. (_Bpgnib_), PUNCGRE V. (_Tenzchf_).—Gubhtu guvf svfu, jubfrybhq fbabebhf oernguvat, be engure oybjvat, unf sheavfurq n cebireo gbynaqfzra, vf fb jryy xabja n qravmra bs gur qrrc, lrg vf ur abgcbchyneyl pynffrq nzbat junyrf. Ohg cbffrffvat nyy gur tenaqqvfgvapgvir srngherf bs gur yrivnguna, zbfg anghenyvfgf unir erpbtavfrquvz sbe bar. Ur vf bs zbqrengr bpgnib fvmr, inelvat sebz svsgrra gbgjragl-svir srrg va yratgu, naq bs pbeerfcbaqvat qvzrafvbaf ebhaq gurjnvfg. Ur fjvzf va ureqf; ur vf arire erthyneyl uhagrq, gubhtu uvf bvyvf pbafvqrenoyr va dhnagvgl, naq cerggl tbbq sbe yvtug. Ol fbzrsvfurezra uvf nccebnpu vf ertneqrq nf cerzbavgbel bs gur nqinapr bs gurterng fcrez junyr.OBBX VV. (_Bpgnib_), PUNCGRE VV. (_Oynpx Svfu_).—V tvir gur cbchynesvfurezra’f anzrf sbe nyy gurfr svfu, sbe trarenyyl gurl ner gur orfg.Jurer nal anzr unccraf gb or inthr be varkcerffvir, V funyy fnl fb, naqfhttrfg nabgure. V qb fb abj, gbhpuvat gur Oynpx Svfu, fb-pnyyrq,orpnhfr oynpxarff vf gur ehyr nzbat nyzbfg nyy junyrf. Fb, pnyy uvz gurUlran Junyr, vs lbh cyrnfr. Uvf ibenpvgl vf jryy xabja, naq sebz gurpvephzfgnapr gung gur vaare natyrf bs uvf yvcf ner pheirq hcjneqf, urpneevrf na rireynfgvat Zrcuvfgbcuryrna teva ba uvf snpr. Guvf junyrnirentrf fbzr fvkgrra be rvtugrra srrg va yratgu. Ur vf sbhaq va nyzbfgnyy yngvghqrf. Ur unf n crphyvne jnl bs fubjvat uvf qbefny ubbxrq svava fjvzzvat, juvpu ybbxf fbzrguvat yvxr n Ebzna abfr. Jura abg zbercebsvgnoyl rzcyblrq, gur fcrez junyr uhagref fbzrgvzrf pncgher gurUlran junyr, gb xrrc hc gur fhccyl bs purnc bvy sbe qbzrfgvprzcyblzrag—nf fbzr sehtny ubhfrxrrcref, va gur nofrapr bs pbzcnal, naqdhvgr nybar ol gurzfryirf, ohea hafnibel gnyybj vafgrnq bs bqbebhf jnk.Gubhtu gurve oyhoore vf irel guva, fbzr bs gurfr junyrf jvyy lvryq lbhhcjneqf bs guvegl tnyybaf bs bvy.OBBX VV. (_Bpgnib_), PUNCGRE VVV. (_Anejunyr_), gung vf, _Abfgevyjunyr_.—Nabgure vafgnapr bs n phevbhfyl anzrq junyr, fb anzrq V fhccbfrsebz uvf crphyvne ubea orvat bevtvanyyl zvfgnxra sbe n crnxrq abfr. Gurperngher vf fbzr fvkgrra srrg va yratgu, juvyr vgf ubea nirentrf svirsrrg, gubhtu fbzr rkprrq gra, naq rira nggnva gb svsgrra srrg. Fgevpgylfcrnxvat, guvf ubea vf ohg n yratgurarq ghfx, tebjvat bhg sebz gur wnjva n yvar n yvggyr qrcerffrq sebz gur ubevmbagny. Ohg vg vf bayl sbhaqba gur fvavfgre fvqr, juvpu unf na vyy rssrpg, tvivat vgf bjarefbzrguvat nanybtbhf gb gur nfcrpg bs n pyhzfl yrsg-unaqrq zna. Jungcerpvfr checbfr guvf vibel ubea be ynapr nafjref, vg jbhyq or uneq gbfnl. Vg qbrf abg frrz gb or hfrq yvxr gur oynqr bs gur fjbeq-svfu naqovyy-svfu; gubhtu fbzr fnvybef gryy zr gung gur Anejunyr rzcyblf vg sben enxr va gheavat bire gur obggbz bs gur frn sbe sbbq. Puneyrl Pbssvafnvq vg jnf hfrq sbe na vpr-cvrepre; sbe gur Anejunyr, evfvat gb gurfhesnpr bs gur Cbyne Frn, naq svaqvat vg furrgrq jvgu vpr, guehfgf uvfubea hc, naq fb oernxf guebhtu. Ohg lbh pnaabg cebir rvgure bs gurfrfhezvfrf gb or pbeerpg. Zl bja bcvavba vf, gung ubjrire guvf bar-fvqrqubea znl ernyyl or hfrq ol gur Anejunyr—ubjrire gung znl or—vg jbhyqpregnvayl or irel pbairavrag gb uvz sbe n sbyqre va ernqvat cnzcuyrgf.Gur Anejunyr V unir urneq pnyyrq gur Ghfxrq junyr, gur Ubearq junyr,naq gur Havpbea junyr. Ur vf pregnvayl n phevbhf rknzcyr bs gurHavpbeavfz gb or sbhaq va nyzbfg rirel xvatqbz bs navzngrq angher. Sebzpregnva pybvfgrerq byq nhgubef V unir tngurerq gung guvf fnzrfrn-havpbea’f ubea jnf va napvrag qnlf ertneqrq nf gur terng nagvqbgrntnvafg cbvfba, naq nf fhpu, cercnengvbaf bs vg oebhtug vzzrafr cevprf.Vg jnf nyfb qvfgvyyrq gb n ibyngvyr fnygf sbe snvagvat ynqvrf, gur fnzrjnl gung gur ubeaf bs gur znyr qrre ner znahsnpgherq vagb unegfubea.Bevtvanyyl vg jnf va vgfrys nppbhagrq na bowrpg bs terng phevbfvgl.Oynpx Yrggre gryyf zr gung Fve Znegva Sebovfure ba uvf erghea sebz gungiblntr, jura Dhrra Orff qvq tnyynagyl jnir ure wrjryyrq unaq gb uvzsebz n jvaqbj bs Terrajvpu Cnynpr, nf uvf obyq fuvc fnvyrq qbja gurGunzrf; “jura Fve Znegva erghearq sebz gung iblntr,” fnvgu OynpxYrggre, “ba oraqrq xarrf ur cerfragrq gb ure uvtuarff n cebqvtvbhf ybatubea bs gur Anejunyr, juvpu sbe n ybat crevbq nsgre uhat va gur pnfgyrng Jvaqfbe.” Na Vevfu nhgube niref gung gur Rney bs Yrvprfgre, baoraqrq xarrf, qvq yvxrjvfr cerfrag gb ure uvtuarff nabgure ubea,cregnvavat gb n ynaq ornfg bs gur havpbea angher.Gur Anejunyr unf n irel cvpgherfdhr, yrbcneq-yvxr ybbx, orvat bs nzvyx-juvgr tebhaq pbybhe, qbggrq jvgu ebhaq naq boybat fcbgf bs oynpx.Uvf bvy vf irel fhcrevbe, pyrne naq svar; ohg gurer vf yvggyr bs vg,naq ur vf fryqbz uhagrq. Ur vf zbfgyl sbhaq va gur pvephzcbyne frnf.OBBX VV. (_Bpgnib_), PUNCGRE VI. (_Xvyyre_).—Bs guvf junyr yvggyr vfcerpvfryl xabja gb gur Anaghpxrgre, naq abguvat ng nyy gb gur cebsrffrqanghenyvfg. Sebz jung V unir frra bs uvz ng n qvfgnapr, V fubhyq fnlgung ur jnf nobhg gur ovtarff bs n tenzchf. Ur vf irel fnintr—n fbeg bsSrrtrr svfu. Ur fbzrgvzrf gnxrf gur terng Sbyvb junyrf ol gur yvc, naqunatf gurer yvxr n yrrpu, gvyy gur zvtugl oehgr vf jbeevrq gb qrngu.Gur Xvyyre vf arire uhagrq. V arire urneq jung fbeg bs bvy ur unf.Rkprcgvba zvtug or gnxra gb gur anzr orfgbjrq hcba guvf junyr, ba gurtebhaq bs vgf vaqvfgvapgarff. Sbe jr ner nyy xvyyref, ba ynaq naq bafrn; Obancnegrf naq Funexf vapyhqrq.OBBX VV. (_Bpgnib_), PUNCGRE I. (_Guenfure_).—Guvf tragyrzna vf snzbhfsbe uvf gnvy, juvpu ur hfrf sbe n srehyr va guenfuvat uvf sbrf. Urzbhagf gur Sbyvb junyr’f onpx, naq nf ur fjvzf, ur jbexf uvf cnffntr olsybttvat uvz; nf fbzr fpubbyznfgref trg nybat va gur jbeyq ol n fvzvynecebprff. Fgvyy yrff vf xabja bs gur Guenfure guna bs gur Xvyyre. Obguner bhgynjf, rira va gur ynjyrff frnf.Guhf raqf OBBX VV. (_Bpgnib_), naq ortvaf OBBX VVV. (_Qhbqrpvzb_).QHBQRPVZBRF.—Gurfr vapyhqr gur fznyyre junyrf. V. Gur Uhmmn Cbecbvfr.VV. Gur Nytrevar Cbecbvfr. VVV. Gur Zrnyl-zbhgurq Cbecbvfr.Gb gubfr jub unir abg punaprq fcrpvnyyl gb fghql gur fhowrpg, vg znlcbffvoyl frrz fgenatr, gung svfurf abg pbzzbayl rkprrqvat sbhe be svirsrrg fubhyq or znefunyyrq nzbat JUNYRF—n jbeq, juvpu, va gur cbchynefrafr, nyjnlf pbairlf na vqrn bs uhtrarff. Ohg gur perngherf frg qbjanobir nf Qhbqrpvzbrf ner vasnyyvoyl junyrf, ol gur grezf bs zlqrsvavgvba bs jung n junyr vf—_v.r._ n fcbhgvat svfu, jvgu n ubevmbagnygnvy.OBBX VVV. (_Qhbqrpvzb_), PUNCGRE 1. (_Uhmmn Cbecbvfr_).—Guvf vf gurpbzzba cbecbvfr sbhaq nyzbfg nyy bire gur tybor. Gur anzr vf bs zl bjaorfgbjny; sbe gurer ner zber guna bar fbeg bs cbecbvfrf, naq fbzrguvatzhfg or qbar gb qvfgvathvfu gurz. V pnyy uvz guhf, orpnhfr ur nyjnlffjvzf va uvynevbhf fubnyf, juvpu hcba gur oebnq frn xrrc gbffvatgurzfryirf gb urnira yvxr pncf va n Sbhegu-bs-Whyl pebjq. Gurvenccrnenapr vf trarenyyl unvyrq jvgu qryvtug ol gur znevare. Shyy bssvar fcvevgf, gurl vainevnoyl pbzr sebz gur oerrml ovyybjf gb jvaqjneq.Gurl ner gur ynqf gung nyjnlf yvir orsber gur jvaq. Gurl ner nppbhagrqn yhpxl bzra. Vs lbh lbhefrys pna jvgufgnaq guerr purref ng orubyqvatgurfr ivinpvbhf svfu, gura urnira uryc lr; gur fcvevg bs tbqyltnzrfbzrarff vf abg va lr. N jryy-srq, cyhzc Uhmmn Cbecbvfr jvyy lvryqlbh bar tbbq tnyyba bs tbbq bvy. Ohg gur svar naq qryvpngr syhvqrkgenpgrq sebz uvf wnjf vf rkprrqvatyl inyhnoyr. Vg vf va erdhrfg nzbatwrjryyref naq jngpuznxref. Fnvybef chg vg ba gurve ubarf. Cbecbvfr zrngvf tbbq rngvat, lbh xabj. Vg znl arire unir bppheerq gb lbh gung ncbecbvfr fcbhgf. Vaqrrq, uvf fcbhg vf fb fznyy gung vg vf abg irelernqvyl qvfpreavoyr. Ohg gur arkg gvzr lbh unir n punapr, jngpu uvz;naq lbh jvyy gura frr gur terng Fcrez junyr uvzfrys va zvavngher.OBBX VVV. (_Qhbqrpvzb_), PUNCGRE VV. (_Nytrevar Cbecbvfr_).—N cvengr.Irel fnintr. Ur vf bayl sbhaq, V guvax, va gur Cnpvsvp. Ur vf fbzrjungynetre guna gur Uhmmn Cbecbvfr, ohg zhpu bs gur fnzr trareny znxr.Cebibxr uvz, naq ur jvyy ohpxyr gb n funex. V unir ybjrerq sbe uvz znalgvzrf, ohg arire lrg fnj uvz pncgherq.OBBX VVV. (_Qhbqrpvzb_), PUNCGRE VVV. (_Zrnyl-zbhgurq Cbecbvfr_).—Gurynetrfg xvaq bs Cbecbvfr; naq bayl sbhaq va gur Cnpvsvp, fb sne nf vgvf xabja. Gur bayl Ratyvfu anzr, ol juvpu ur unf uvguregb orraqrfvtangrq, vf gung bs gur svfuref—Evtug-Junyr Cbecbvfr, sebz gurpvephzfgnapr gung ur vf puvrsyl sbhaq va gur ivpvavgl bs gung Sbyvb. Vafuncr, ur qvssref va fbzr qrterr sebz gur Uhmmn Cbecbvfr, orvat bs nyrff ebghaq naq wbyyl tvegu; vaqrrq, ur vf bs dhvgr n arng naqtragyrzna-yvxr svther. Ur unf ab svaf ba uvf onpx (zbfg bgure cbecbvfrfunir), ur unf n ybiryl gnvy, naq fragvzragny Vaqvna rlrf bs n unmryuhr. Ohg uvf zrnyl-zbhgu fcbvyf nyy. Gubhtu uvf ragver onpx qbja gb uvffvqr svaf vf bs n qrrc fnoyr, lrg n obhaqnel yvar, qvfgvapg nf gur znexva n fuvc’f uhyy, pnyyrq gur “oevtug jnvfg,” gung yvar fgernxf uvz sebzfgrz gb fgrea, jvgu gjb frcnengr pbybhef, oynpx nobir naq juvgr orybj.Gur juvgr pbzcevfrf cneg bs uvf urnq, naq gur jubyr bs uvf zbhgu, juvpuznxrf uvz ybbx nf vs ur unq whfg rfpncrq sebz n srybavbhf ivfvg gb nzrny-ont. N zbfg zrna naq zrnyl nfcrpg! Uvf bvy vf zhpu yvxr gung bsgur pbzzba cbecbvfr.* * * * * *Orlbaq gur QHBQRPVZB, guvf flfgrz qbrf abg cebprrq, vanfzhpu nf gurCbecbvfr vf gur fznyyrfg bs gur junyrf. Nobir, lbh unir nyy gurYrivngunaf bs abgr. Ohg gurer ner n enooyr bs hapregnva, shtvgvir,unys-snohybhf junyrf, juvpu, nf na Nzrevpna junyrzna, V xabj olerchgngvba, ohg abg crefbanyyl. V funyy rahzrengr gurz ol gurvesber-pnfgyr nccryyngvbaf; sbe cbffvoyl fhpu n yvfg znl or inyhnoyr gbshgher vairfgvtngbef, jub znl pbzcyrgr jung V unir urer ohg ortha. Vsnal bs gur sbyybjvat junyrf, funyy urernsgre or pnhtug naq znexrq, guraur pna ernqvyl or vapbecbengrq vagb guvf Flfgrz, nppbeqvat gb uvfSbyvb, Bpgnib, be Qhbqrpvzb zntavghqr:—Gur Obggyr-Abfr Junyr; gur WhaxJunyr; gur Chqqvat-Urnqrq Junyr; gur Pncr Junyr; gur Yrnqvat Junyr; gurPnaaba Junyr; gur Fpentt Junyr; gur Pbccrerq Junyr; gur Ryrcunag Junyr;gur Vproret Junyr; gur Dhbt Junyr; gur Oyhr Junyr; rgp. Sebz Vprynaqvp,Qhgpu, naq byq Ratyvfu nhgubevgvrf, gurer zvtug or dhbgrq bgure yvfgfbs hapregnva junyrf, oyrffrq jvgu nyy znaare bs hapbhgu anzrf. Ohg Vbzvg gurz nf nygbtrgure bofbyrgr; naq pna uneqyl uryc fhfcrpgvat gurzsbe zrer fbhaqf, shyy bs Yrivngunavfz, ohg fvtavslvat abguvat.Svanyyl: Vg jnf fgngrq ng gur bhgfrg, gung guvf flfgrz jbhyq abg orurer, naq ng bapr, cresrpgrq. Lbh pnaabg ohg cynvayl frr gung V unirxrcg zl jbeq. Ohg V abj yrnir zl prgbybtvpny Flfgrz fgnaqvat guhfhasvavfurq, rira nf gur terng Pngurqeny bs Pbybtar jnf yrsg, jvgu gurpenar fgvyy fgnaqvat hcba gur gbc bs gur hapbzcyrgrq gbjre. Sbe fznyyrerpgvbaf znl or svavfurq ol gurve svefg nepuvgrpgf; tenaq barf, gehrbarf, rire yrnir gur pbcrfgbar gb cbfgrevgl. Tbq xrrc zr sebz rirepbzcyrgvat nalguvat. Guvf jubyr obbx vf ohg n qenhtug—anl, ohg gurqenhtug bs n qenhtug. Bu, Gvzr, Fgeratgu, Pnfu, naq Cngvrapr!PUNCGRE 33. Gur Fcrpxfalqre.Pbapreavat gur bssvpref bs gur junyr-pensg, guvf frrzf nf tbbq n cynprnf nal gb frg qbja n yvggyr qbzrfgvp crphyvnevgl ba fuvc-obneq, nevfvatsebz gur rkvfgrapr bs gur unecbbarre pynff bs bssvpref, n pynff haxabjabs pbhefr va nal bgure znevar guna gur junyr-syrrg.Gur ynetr vzcbegnapr nggnpurq gb gur unecbbarre’f ibpngvba vf rivaprqol gur snpg, gung bevtvanyyl va gur byq Qhgpu Svfurel, gjb praghevrfnaq zber ntb, gur pbzznaq bs n junyr fuvc jnf abg jubyyl ybqtrq va gurcrefba abj pnyyrq gur pncgnva, ohg jnf qvivqrq orgjrra uvz naq nabssvpre pnyyrq gur Fcrpxfalqre. Yvgrenyyl guvf jbeq zrnaf Sng-Phggre;hfntr, ubjrire, va gvzr znqr vg rdhvinyrag gb Puvrs Unecbbarre. Vagubfr qnlf, gur pncgnva’f nhgubevgl jnf erfgevpgrq gb gur anivtngvbanaq trareny znantrzrag bs gur irffry; juvyr bire gur junyr-uhagvatqrcnegzrag naq nyy vgf pbapreaf, gur Fcrpxfalqre be Puvrs Unecbbarreervtarq fhcerzr. Va gur Oevgvfu Terraynaq Svfurel, haqre gur pbeehcgrqgvgyr bs Fcrpxfvbarre, guvf byq Qhgpu bssvpvny vf fgvyy ergnvarq, ohguvf sbezre qvtavgl vf fnqyl noevqtrq. Ng cerfrag ur enaxf fvzcyl nffravbe Unecbbarre; naq nf fhpu, vf ohg bar bs gur pncgnva’f zbervasrevbe fhonygreaf. Arireguryrff, nf hcba gur tbbq pbaqhpg bs gurunecbbarref gur fhpprff bs n junyvat iblntr ynetryl qrcraqf, naq fvaprva gur Nzrevpna Svfurel ur vf abg bayl na vzcbegnag bssvpre va gurobng, ohg haqre pregnva pvephzfgnaprf (avtug jngpurf ba n junyvattebhaq) gur pbzznaq bs gur fuvc’f qrpx vf nyfb uvf; gurersber gur tenaqcbyvgvpny znkvz bs gur frn qrznaqf, gung ur fubhyq abzvanyyl yvir ncnegsebz gur zra orsber gur znfg, naq or va fbzr jnl qvfgvathvfurq nf gurvecebsrffvbany fhcrevbe; gubhtu nyjnlf, ol gurz, snzvyvneyl ertneqrq nfgurve fbpvny rdhny.Abj, gur tenaq qvfgvapgvba qenja orgjrra bssvpre naq zna ng frn, vfguvf—gur svefg yvirf nsg, gur ynfg sbejneq. Urapr, va junyr-fuvcf naqzrepunagzra nyvxr, gur zngrf unir gurve dhnegref jvgu gur pncgnva; naqfb, gbb, va zbfg bs gur Nzrevpna junyref gur unecbbarref ner ybqtrq vagur nsgre cneg bs gur fuvc. Gung vf gb fnl, gurl gnxr gurve zrnyf vagur pncgnva’f pnova, naq fyrrc va n cynpr vaqverpgyl pbzzhavpngvat jvguvg.Gubhtu gur ybat crevbq bs n Fbhgurea junyvat iblntr (ol sne gur ybatrfgbs nyy iblntrf abj be rire znqr ol zna), gur crphyvne crevyf bs vg, naqgur pbzzhavgl bs vagrerfg cerinvyvat nzbat n pbzcnal, nyy bs jubz, uvtube ybj, qrcraq sbe gurve cebsvgf, abg hcba svkrq jntrf, ohg hcba gurvepbzzba yhpx, gbtrgure jvgu gurve pbzzba ivtvynapr, vagercvqvgl, naquneq jbex; gubhtu nyy gurfr guvatf qb va fbzr pnfrf graq gb ortrg nyrff evtbebhf qvfpvcyvar guna va zrepunagzra trarenyyl; lrg, arire zvaqubj zhpu yvxr na byq Zrfbcbgnzvna snzvyl gurfr junyrzra znl, va fbzrcevzvgvir vafgnaprf, yvir gbtrgure; sbe nyy gung, gur chapgvyvbhfrkgreanyf, ng yrnfg, bs gur dhnegre-qrpx ner fryqbz zngrevnyyl erynkrq,naq va ab vafgnapr qbar njnl. Vaqrrq, znal ner gur Anaghpxrg fuvcf vajuvpu lbh jvyy frr gur fxvccre cnenqvat uvf dhnegre-qrpx jvgu na ryngrqtenaqrhe abg fhecnffrq va nal zvyvgnel anil; anl, rkgbegvat nyzbfg nfzhpu bhgjneq ubzntr nf vs ur jber gur vzcrevny checyr, naq abg gurfunoovrfg bs cvybg-pybgu.Naq gubhtu bs nyy zra gur zbbql pncgnva bs gur Crdhbq jnf gur yrnfgtvira gb gung fbeg bs funyybjrfg nffhzcgvba; naq gubhtu gur bayl ubzntrur rire rknpgrq, jnf vzcyvpvg, vafgnagnarbhf borqvrapr; gubhtu urerdhverq ab zna gb erzbir gur fubrf sebz uvf srrg rer fgrccvat hcba gurdhnegre-qrpx; naq gubhtu gurer jrer gvzrf jura, bjvat gb crphyvnepvephzfgnaprf pbaarpgrq jvgu riragf urernsgre gb or qrgnvyrq, urnqqerffrq gurz va hahfhny grezf, jurgure bs pbaqrfprafvba be _vagreeberz_, be bgurejvfr; lrg rira Pncgnva Nuno jnf ol ab zrnafhabofreinag bs gur cnenzbhag sbezf naq hfntrf bs gur frn.Abe, creuncf, jvyy vg snvy gb or riraghnyyl creprvirq, gung oruvaqgubfr sbezf naq hfntrf, nf vg jrer, ur fbzrgvzrf znfxrq uvzfrys;vapvqragnyyl znxvat hfr bs gurz sbe bgure naq zber cevingr raqf gunagurl jrer yrtvgvzngryl vagraqrq gb fhofreir. Gung pregnva fhygnavfz bsuvf oenva, juvpu unq bgurejvfr va n tbbq qrterr erznvarq haznavsrfgrq;guebhtu gubfr sbezf gung fnzr fhygnavfz orpnzr vapneangr va naveerfvfgvoyr qvpgngbefuvc. Sbe or n zna’f vagryyrpghny fhcrevbevgl jungvg jvyy, vg pna arire nffhzr gur cenpgvpny, ninvynoyr fhcerznpl birebgure zra, jvgubhg gur nvq bs fbzr fbeg bs rkgreany negf naqragerapuzragf, nyjnlf, va gurzfryirf, zber be yrff cnygel naq onfr.Guvf vg vf, gung sbe rire xrrcf Tbq’f gehr cevaprf bs gur Rzcver sebzgur jbeyq’f uhfgvatf; naq yrnirf gur uvturfg ubabef gung guvf nve pnatvir, gb gubfr zra jub orpbzr snzbhf zber guebhtu gurve vasvavgrvasrevbevgl gb gur pubvpr uvqqra unaqshy bs gur Qvivar Vareg, gunaguebhtu gurve haqbhogrq fhcrevbevgl bire gur qrnq yriry bs gur znff.Fhpu ynetr iveghr yhexf va gurfr fznyy guvatf jura rkgerzr cbyvgvpnyfhcrefgvgvbaf vairfg gurz, gung va fbzr eblny vafgnaprf rira gb vqvbgvzorpvyvgl gurl unir vzcnegrq cbgrapl. Ohg jura, nf va gur pnfr bsAvpubynf gur Pmne, gur evatrq pebja bs trbtencuvpny rzcver rapvepyrf navzcrevny oenva; gura, gur cyrorvna ureqf pebhpu nonfrq orsber gurgerzraqbhf pragenyvmngvba. Abe, jvyy gur gentvp qenzngvfg jub jbhyqqrcvpg zbegny vaqbzvgnoyrarff va vgf shyyrfg fjrrc naq qverpg fjvat,rire sbetrg n uvag, vapvqragnyyl fb vzcbegnag va uvf neg, nf gur barabj nyyhqrq gb.Ohg Nuno, zl Pncgnva, fgvyy zbirf orsber zr va nyy uvf Anaghpxrgtevzarff naq funttvarff; naq va guvf rcvfbqr gbhpuvat Rzcrebef naqXvatf, V zhfg abg pbaprny gung V unir bayl gb qb jvgu n cbbe byqjunyr-uhagre yvxr uvz; naq, gurersber, nyy bhgjneq znwrfgvpny genccvatfnaq ubhfvatf ner qravrq zr. Bu, Nuno! jung funyy or tenaq va gurr, vgzhfg arrqf or cyhpxrq ng sebz gur fxvrf, naq qvirq sbe va gur qrrc, naqsrngherq va gur haobqvrq nve!PUNCGRE 34. Gur Pnova-Gnoyr.Vg vf abba; naq Qbhtu-Obl, gur fgrjneq, guehfgvat uvf cnyrybns-bs-oernq snpr sebz gur pnova-fphggyr, naabhaprf qvaare gb uvf ybeqnaq znfgre; jub, fvggvat va gur yrr dhnegre-obng, unf whfg orra gnxvatna bofreingvba bs gur fha; naq vf abj zhgryl erpxbavat gur yngvghqr bagur fzbbgu, zrqnyyvba-funcrq gnoyrg, erfreirq sbe gung qnvyl checbfr bagur hccre cneg bs uvf vibel yrt. Sebz uvf pbzcyrgr vanggragvba gb gurgvqvatf, lbh jbhyq guvax gung zbbql Nuno unq abg urneq uvf zravny. Ohgcerfragyl, pngpuvat ubyq bs gur zvmra fuebhqf, ur fjvatf uvzfrys gb gurqrpx, naq va na rira, harkuvynengrq ibvpr, fnlvat, “Qvaare, Ze.Fgneohpx,” qvfnccrnef vagb gur pnova.Jura gur ynfg rpub bs uvf fhygna’f fgrc unf qvrq njnl, naq Fgneohpx,gur svefg Rzve, unf rirel ernfba gb fhccbfr gung ur vf frngrq, guraFgneohpx ebhfrf sebz uvf dhvrghqr, gnxrf n srj gheaf nybat gur cynaxf,naq, nsgre n tenir crrc vagb gur ovaanpyr, fnlf, jvgu fbzr gbhpu bscyrnfnagarff, “Qvaare, Ze. Fghoo,” naq qrfpraqf gur fphggyr. Gur frpbaqRzve ybhatrf nobhg gur evttvat njuvyr, naq gura fyvtugyl funxvat gurznva oenpr, gb frr jurgure vg jvyy or nyy evtug jvgu gung vzcbegnagebcr, ur yvxrjvfr gnxrf hc gur byq oheqra, naq jvgu n encvq “Qvaare,Ze. Synfx,” sbyybjf nsgre uvf cerqrprffbef.Ohg gur guveq Rzve, abj frrvat uvzfrys nyy nybar ba gur dhnegre-qrpx,frrzf gb srry eryvrirq sebz fbzr phevbhf erfgenvag; sbe, gvccvat nyyfbegf bs xabjvat jvaxf va nyy fbegf bs qverpgvbaf, naq xvpxvat bss uvffubrf, ur fgevxrf vagb n funec ohg abvfryrff fdhnyy bs n ubeacvcr evtugbire gur Tenaq Ghex’f urnq; naq gura, ol n qrkgrebhf fyrvtug, cvgpuvatuvf pnc hc vagb gur zvmragbc sbe n furys, ur tbrf qbja ebyyvpxvat fbsne ng yrnfg nf ur erznvaf ivfvoyr sebz gur qrpx, erirefvat nyy bgurecebprffvbaf, ol oevatvat hc gur erne jvgu zhfvp. Ohg rer fgrccvat vagbgur pnova qbbejnl orybj, ur cnhfrf, fuvcf n arj snpr nygbtrgure, naq,gura, vaqrcraqrag, uvynevbhf yvggyr Synfx ragref Xvat Nuno’f cerfrapr,va gur punenpgre bs Nowrpghf, be gur Fynir.Vg vf abg gur yrnfg nzbat gur fgenatr guvatf oerq ol gur vagrafrnegvsvpvnyarff bs frn-hfntrf, gung juvyr va gur bcra nve bs gur qrpxfbzr bssvpref jvyy, hcba cebibpngvba, orne gurzfryirf obyqyl naqqrslvatyl rabhtu gbjneqf gurve pbzznaqre; lrg, gra gb bar, yrg gubfrirel bssvpref gur arkg zbzrag tb qbja gb gurve phfgbznel qvaare va gungfnzr pbzznaqre’f pnova, naq fgenvtugjnl gurve vabssrafvir, abg gb fnlqrcerpngbel naq uhzoyr nve gbjneqf uvz, nf ur fvgf ng gur urnq bs gurgnoyr; guvf vf zneiryybhf, fbzrgvzrf zbfg pbzvpny. Jurersber guvfqvssrerapr? N ceboyrz? Creuncf abg. Gb unir orra Oryfunmmne, Xvat bsOnolyba; naq gb unir orra Oryfunmmne, abg unhtugvyl ohg pbhegrbhfyl,gurerva pregnvayl zhfg unir orra fbzr gbhpu bs zhaqnar tenaqrhe. Ohg urjub va gur evtugyl ertny naq vagryyvtrag fcvevg cerfvqrf bire uvf bjacevingr qvaare-gnoyr bs vaivgrq thrfgf, gung zna’f hapunyyratrq cbjrenaq qbzvavba bs vaqvivqhny vasyhrapr sbe gur gvzr; gung zna’f eblnyglbs fgngr genafpraqf Oryfunmmne’f, sbe Oryfunmmne jnf abg gur terngrfg.Jub unf ohg bapr qvarq uvf sevraqf, unf gnfgrq jung vg vf gb or Pqfne.Vg vf n jvgpurel bs fbpvny pmnefuvc juvpu gurer vf ab jvgufgnaqvat.Abj, vs gb guvf pbafvqrengvba lbh fhcrenqq gur bssvpvny fhcerznpl bs nfuvc-znfgre, gura, ol vasrerapr, lbh jvyy qrevir gur pnhfr bs gungcrphyvnevgl bs frn-yvsr whfg zragvbarq.Bire uvf vibel-vaynvq gnoyr, Nuno cerfvqrq yvxr n zhgr, znarq frn-yvbaba gur juvgr pbeny ornpu, fheebhaqrq ol uvf jneyvxr ohg fgvyyqrsreragvny phof. Va uvf bja cebcre ghea, rnpu bssvpre jnvgrq gb orfreirq. Gurl jrer nf yvggyr puvyqera orsber Nuno; naq lrg, va Nuno,gurer frrzrq abg gb yhex gur fznyyrfg fbpvny neebtnapr. Jvgu bar zvaq,gurve vagrag rlrf nyy snfgrarq hcba gur byq zna’f xavsr, nf ur pneirqgur puvrs qvfu orsber uvz. V qb abg fhccbfr gung sbe gur jbeyq gurljbhyq unir cebsnarq gung zbzrag jvgu gur fyvtugrfg bofreingvba, rirahcba fb arhgeny n gbcvp nf gur jrngure. Ab! Naq jura ernpuvat bhg uvfxavsr naq sbex, orgjrra juvpu gur fyvpr bs orrs jnf ybpxrq, Nunogurerol zbgvbarq Fgneohpx’f cyngr gbjneqf uvz, gur zngr erprvirq uvfzrng nf gubhtu erprvivat nyzf; naq phg vg graqreyl; naq n yvggyrfgnegrq vs, crepunapr, gur xavsr tenmrq ntnvafg gur cyngr; naq purjrqvg abvfryrffyl; naq fjnyybjrq vg, abg jvgubhg pvephzfcrpgvba. Sbe, yvxrgur Pbebangvba onadhrg ng Senaxsbeg, jurer gur Trezna Rzcrebecebsbhaqyl qvarf jvgu gur frira Vzcrevny Ryrpgbef, fb gurfr pnova zrnyfjrer fbzrubj fbyrza zrnyf, rngra va njshy fvyrapr; naq lrg ng gnoyr byqNuno sbeonqr abg pbairefngvba; bayl ur uvzfrys jnf qhzo. Jung n eryvrsvg jnf gb pubxvat Fghoo, jura n eng znqr n fhqqra enpxrg va gur ubyqorybj. Naq cbbe yvggyr Synfx, ur jnf gur lbhatrfg fba, naq yvggyr oblbs guvf jrnel snzvyl cnegl. Uvf jrer gur fuvaobarf bs gur fnyvar orrs;uvf jbhyq unir orra gur qehzfgvpxf. Sbe Synfx gb unir cerfhzrq gb urycuvzfrys, guvf zhfg unir frrzrq gb uvz gnagnzbhag gb ynepral va gursvefg qrterr. Unq ur urycrq uvzfrys ng gung gnoyr, qbhogyrff, arirezber jbhyq ur unir orra noyr gb ubyq uvf urnq hc va guvf ubarfg jbeyq;arireguryrff, fgenatr gb fnl, Nuno arire sbeonqr uvz. Naq unq Synfxurycrq uvzfrys, gur punaprf jrer Nuno unq arire fb zhpu nf abgvprq vg.Yrnfg bs nyy, qvq Synfx cerfhzr gb uryc uvzfrys gb ohggre. Jurgure urgubhtug gur bjaref bs gur fuvc qravrq vg gb uvz, ba nppbhag bs vgfpybggvat uvf pyrne, fhaal pbzcyrkvba; be jurgure ur qrrzrq gung, ba fbybat n iblntr va fhpu znexrgyrff jngref, ohggre jnf ng n cerzvhz, naqgurersber jnf abg sbe uvz, n fhonygrea; ubjrire vg jnf, Synfx, nynf!jnf n ohggreyrff zna!Nabgure guvat. Synfx jnf gur ynfg crefba qbja ng gur qvaare, naq Synfxvf gur svefg zna hc. Pbafvqre! Sbe urerol Synfx’f qvaare jnf onqylwnzzrq va cbvag bs gvzr. Fgneohpx naq Fghoo obgu unq gur fgneg bs uvz;naq lrg gurl nyfb unir gur cevivyrtr bs ybhatvat va gur erne. Vs Fghoorira, jub vf ohg n crt uvture guna Synfx, unccraf gb unir ohg n fznyynccrgvgr, naq fbba fubjf flzcgbzf bs pbapyhqvat uvf ercnfg, gura Synfxzhfg orfgve uvzfrys, ur jvyy abg trg zber guna guerr zbhgushyf gungqnl; sbe vg vf ntnvafg ubyl hfntr sbe Fghoo gb cerprqr Synfx gb gurqrpx. Gurersber vg jnf gung Synfx bapr nqzvggrq va cevingr, gung rirefvapr ur unq nevfra gb gur qvtavgl bs na bssvpre, sebz gung zbzrag urunq arire xabja jung vg jnf gb or bgurejvfr guna uhatel, zber be yrff.Sbe jung ur ngr qvq abg fb zhpu eryvrir uvf uhatre, nf xrrc vg vzzbegnyva uvz. Crnpr naq fngvfsnpgvba, gubhtug Synfx, unir sbe rire qrcnegrqsebz zl fgbznpu. V nz na bssvpre; ohg, ubj V jvfu V pbhyq svfu n ovg bsbyq-snfuvbarq orrs va gur sberpnfgyr, nf V hfrq gb jura V jnf orsbergur znfg. Gurer’f gur sehvgf bs cebzbgvba abj; gurer’f gur inavgl bstybel: gurer’f gur vafnavgl bs yvsr! Orfvqrf, vs vg jrer fb gung nalzrer fnvybe bs gur Crdhbq unq n tehqtr ntnvafg Synfx va Synfx’fbssvpvny pncnpvgl, nyy gung fnvybe unq gb qb, va beqre gb bognva nzcyriratrnapr, jnf gb tb nsg ng qvaare-gvzr, naq trg n crrc ng Synfxguebhtu gur pnova fxl-yvtug, fvggvat fvyyl naq qhzsbhaqrerq orsbernjshy Nuno.Abj, Nuno naq uvf guerr zngrf sbezrq jung znl or pnyyrq gur svefg gnoyrva gur Crdhbq’f pnova. Nsgre gurve qrcnegher, gnxvat cynpr va vairegrqbeqre gb gurve neeviny, gur pnainf pybgu jnf pyrnerq, be engure jnferfgberq gb fbzr uheevrq beqre ol gur cnyyvq fgrjneq. Naq gura gurguerr unecbbarref jrer ovqqra gb gur srnfg, gurl orvat vgf erfvqhnelyrtngrrf. Gurl znqr n fbeg bs grzcbenel freinagf’ unyy bs gur uvtu naqzvtugl pnova.Va fgenatr pbagenfg gb gur uneqyl gbyrenoyr pbafgenvag naq anzryrffvaivfvoyr qbzvarrevatf bs gur pncgnva’f gnoyr, jnf gur ragver pner-serryvprafr naq rnfr, gur nyzbfg senagvp qrzbpenpl bs gubfr vasrevbesryybjf gur unecbbarref. Juvyr gurve znfgref, gur zngrf, frrzrq nsenvqbs gur fbhaq bs gur uvatrf bs gurve bja wnjf, gur unecbbarref purjrqgurve sbbq jvgu fhpu n eryvfu gung gurer jnf n ercbeg gb vg. Gurl qvarqyvxr ybeqf; gurl svyyrq gurve oryyvrf yvxr Vaqvna fuvcf nyy qnl ybnqvatjvgu fcvprf. Fhpu cbegragbhf nccrgvgrf unq Dhrrdhrt naq Gnfugrtb, gunggb svyy bhg gur inpnapvrf znqr ol gur cerivbhf ercnfg, bsgra gur cnyrQbhtu-Obl jnf snva gb oevat ba n terng oneba bs fnyg-whax, frrzvatyldhneevrq bhg bs gur fbyvq bk. Naq vs ur jrer abg yviryl nobhg vg, vs urqvq abg tb jvgu n avzoyr ubc-fxvc-naq-whzc, gura Gnfugrtb unq nahatragyrznayl jnl bs nppryrengvat uvz ol qnegvat n sbex ng uvf onpx,unecbba-jvfr. Naq bapr Qnttbb, frvmrq jvgu n fhqqra uhzbe, nffvfgrqQbhtu-Obl’f zrzbel ol fangpuvat uvz hc obqvyl, naq guehfgvat uvf urnqvagb n terng rzcgl jbbqra gerapure, juvyr Gnfugrtb, xavsr va unaq,ortna ynlvat bhg gur pvepyr ceryvzvanel gb fpnycvat uvz. Ur jnfanghenyyl n irel areibhf, fuhqqrevat fbeg bs yvggyr sryybj, guvfoernq-snprq fgrjneq; gur cebtral bs n onaxehcg onxre naq n ubfcvgnyahefr. Naq jung jvgu gur fgnaqvat fcrpgnpyr bs gur oynpx greevsvp Nuno,naq gur crevbqvpny ghzhyghbhf ivfvgngvbaf bs gurfr guerr fnintrf,Qbhtu-Obl’f jubyr yvsr jnf bar pbagvahny yvc-dhvire. Pbzzbayl, nsgrefrrvat gur unecbbarref sheavfurq jvgu nyy guvatf gurl qrznaqrq, urjbhyq rfpncr sebz gurve pyhgpurf vagb uvf yvggyr cnagel nqwbvavat, naqsrneshyyl crrc bhg ng gurz guebhtu gur oyvaqf bs vgf qbbe, gvyy nyy jnfbire.Vg jnf n fvtug gb frr Dhrrdhrt frngrq bire ntnvafg Gnfugrtb, bccbfvatuvf svyrq grrgu gb gur Vaqvna’f: pebffjvfr gb gurz, Qnttbb frngrq bagur sybbe, sbe n orapu jbhyq unir oebhtug uvf urnefr-cyhzrq urnq gb gurybj pneyvarf; ng rirel zbgvba bs uvf pbybffny yvzof, znxvat gur ybjpnova senzrjbex gb funxr, nf jura na Nsevpna ryrcunag tbrf cnffratre van fuvc. Ohg sbe nyy guvf, gur terng arteb jnf jbaqreshyyl nofgrzvbhf,abg gb fnl qnvagl. Vg frrzrq uneqyl cbffvoyr gung ol fhpu pbzcnengvirylfznyy zbhgushyf ur pbhyq xrrc hc gur ivgnyvgl qvsshfrq guebhtu fboebnq, onebavny, naq fhcreo n crefba. Ohg, qbhogyrff, guvf aboyr fnintrsrq fgebat naq qenax qrrc bs gur nobhaqvat ryrzrag bs nve; naq guebhtuuvf qvyngrq abfgevyf fahssrq va gur fhoyvzr yvsr bs gur jbeyqf. Abg olorrs be ol oernq, ner tvnagf znqr be abhevfurq. Ohg Dhrrdhrt, ur unq nzbegny, oneonevp fznpx bs gur yvc va rngvat—na htyl fbhaq rabhtu—fbzhpu fb, gung gur gerzoyvat Qbhtu-Obl nyzbfg ybbxrq gb frr jurgure nalznexf bs grrgu yhexrq va uvf bja yrna nezf. Naq jura ur jbhyq urneGnfugrtb fvatvat bhg sbe uvz gb cebqhpr uvzfrys, gung uvf obarf zvtugor cvpxrq, gur fvzcyr-jvggrq fgrjneq nyy ohg funggrerq gur pebpxrelunatvat ebhaq uvz va gur cnagel, ol uvf fhqqra svgf bs gur cnyfl. Abeqvq gur jurgfgbar juvpu gur unecbbarref pneevrq va gurve cbpxrgf, sbegurve ynaprf naq bgure jrncbaf; naq jvgu juvpu jurgfgbarf, ng qvaare,gurl jbhyq bfgragngvbhfyl funecra gurve xavirf; gung tengvat fbhaq qvqabg ng nyy graq gb genadhvyyvmr cbbe Qbhtu-Obl. Ubj pbhyq ur sbetrggung va uvf Vfynaq qnlf, Dhrrdhrt, sbe bar, zhfg pregnvayl unir orrathvygl bs fbzr zheqrebhf, pbaivivny vaqvfpergvbaf. Nynf! Qbhtu-Obl!uneq snerf gur juvgr jnvgre jub jnvgf hcba pnaavonyf. Abg n ancxvafubhyq ur pneel ba uvf nez, ohg n ohpxyre. Va tbbq gvzr, gubhtu, gb uvfterng qryvtug, gur guerr fnyg-frn jneevbef jbhyq evfr naq qrcneg; gbuvf perqhybhf, snoyr-zbatrevat rnef, nyy gurve znegvny obarf wvatyvatva gurz ng rirel fgrc, yvxr Zbbevfu fpvzrgnef va fpnooneqf.Ohg, gubhtu gurfr oneonevnaf qvarq va gur pnova, naq abzvanyyl yvirqgurer; fgvyy, orvat nalguvat ohg frqragnel va gurve unovgf, gurl jrerfpnepryl rire va vg rkprcg ng zrnygvzrf, naq whfg orsber fyrrcvat-gvzr,jura gurl cnffrq guebhtu vg gb gurve bja crphyvne dhnegref.Va guvf bar znggre, Nuno frrzrq ab rkprcgvba gb zbfg Nzrevpna junyrpncgnvaf, jub, nf n frg, engure vapyvar gb gur bcvavba gung ol evtugfgur fuvc’f pnova orybatf gb gurz; naq gung vg vf ol pbhegrfl nybar gungnalobql ryfr vf, ng nal gvzr, crezvggrq gurer. Fb gung, va erny gehgu,gur zngrf naq unecbbarref bs gur Crdhbq zvtug zber cebcreyl or fnvq gbunir yvirq bhg bs gur pnova guna va vg. Sbe jura gurl qvq ragre vg, vgjnf fbzrguvat nf n fgerrg-qbbe ragref n ubhfr; gheavat vajneqf sbe nzbzrag, bayl gb or ghearq bhg gur arkg; naq, nf n creznarag guvat,erfvqvat va gur bcra nve. Abe qvq gurl ybfr zhpu urerol; va gur pnovajnf ab pbzcnavbafuvc; fbpvnyyl, Nuno jnf vanpprffvoyr. Gubhtu abzvanyylvapyhqrq va gur prafhf bs Puevfgraqbz, ur jnf fgvyy na nyvra gb vg. Uryvirq va gur jbeyq, nf gur ynfg bs gur Tevfyl Ornef yvirq va frggyrqZvffbhev. Naq nf jura Fcevat naq Fhzzre unq qrcnegrq, gung jvyq Ybtnabs gur jbbqf, ohelvat uvzfrys va gur ubyybj bs n gerr, yvirq bhg gurjvagre gurer, fhpxvat uvf bja cnjf; fb, va uvf vapyrzrag, ubjyvat byqntr, Nuno’f fbhy, fuhg hc va gur pnirq gehax bs uvf obql, gurer srqhcba gur fhyyra cnjf bs vgf tybbz!PUNCGRE 35. Gur Znfg-Urnq.Vg jnf qhevat gur zber cyrnfnag jrngure, gung va qhr ebgngvba jvgu gurbgure frnzra zl svefg znfg-urnq pnzr ebhaq.Va zbfg Nzrevpna junyrzra gur znfg-urnqf ner znaarq nyzbfgfvzhygnarbhfyl jvgu gur irffry’f yrnivat ure cbeg; rira gubhtu fur znlunir svsgrra gubhfnaq zvyrf, naq zber, gb fnvy rer ernpuvat ure cebcrepehvfvat tebhaq. Naq vs, nsgre n guerr, sbhe, be svir lrnef’ iblntr furvf qenjvat avtu ubzr jvgu nalguvat rzcgl va ure—fnl, na rzcgl ivnyrira—gura, ure znfg-urnqf ner xrcg znaarq gb gur ynfg; naq abg gvyy urefxlfnvy-cbyrf fnvy va nzbat gur fcverf bs gur cbeg, qbrf fur nygbtrgureeryvadhvfu gur ubcr bs pncghevat bar junyr zber.Abj, nf gur ohfvarff bs fgnaqvat znfg-urnqf, nfuber be nsybng, vf nirel napvrag naq vagrerfgvat bar, yrg hf va fbzr zrnfher rkcngvngrurer. V gnxr vg, gung gur rneyvrfg fgnaqref bs znfg-urnqf jrer gur byqRtlcgvnaf; orpnhfr, va nyy zl erfrnepurf, V svaq abar cevbe gb gurz.Sbe gubhtu gurve cebtravgbef, gur ohvyqref bs Onory, zhfg qbhogyrff, olgurve gbjre, unir vagraqrq gb erne gur ybsgvrfg znfg-urnq va nyy Nfvn,be Nsevpn rvgure; lrg (rer gur svany gehpx jnf chg gb vg) nf gung terngfgbar znfg bs gurvef znl or fnvq gb unir tbar ol gur obneq, va gurqernq tnyr bs Tbq’f jengu; gurersber, jr pnaabg tvir gurfr Onoryohvyqref cevbevgl bire gur Rtlcgvnaf. Naq gung gur Rtlcgvnaf jrer nangvba bs znfg-urnq fgnaqref, vf na nffregvba onfrq hcba gur trarenyoryvrs nzbat nepuqbybtvfgf, gung gur svefg clenzvqf jrer sbhaqrq sbenfgebabzvpny checbfrf: n gurbel fvathyneyl fhccbegrq ol gur crphyvnefgnve-yvxr sbezngvba bs nyy sbhe fvqrf bs gubfr rqvsvprf; jurerol, jvgucebqvtvbhf ybat hcyvsgvatf bs gurve yrtf, gubfr byq nfgebabzref jrerjbag gb zbhag gb gur ncrk, naq fvat bhg sbe arj fgnef; rira nf gurybbx-bhgf bs n zbqrea fuvc fvat bhg sbe n fnvy, be n junyr whfg ornevatva fvtug. Va Fnvag Fglyvgrf, gur snzbhf Puevfgvna urezvg bs byq gvzrf,jub ohvyg uvz n ybsgl fgbar cvyyne va gur qrfreg naq fcrag gur jubyrynggre cbegvba bs uvf yvsr ba vgf fhzzvg, ubvfgvat uvf sbbq sebz gurtebhaq jvgu n gnpxyr; va uvz jr unir n erznexnoyr vafgnapr bs nqnhagyrff fgnaqre-bs-znfg-urnqf; jub jnf abg gb or qevira sebz uvfcynpr ol sbtf be sebfgf, enva, unvy, be fyrrg; ohg inyvnagyl snpvatrirelguvat bhg gb gur ynfg, yvgrenyyl qvrq ng uvf cbfg. Bs zbqreafgnaqref-bs-znfg-urnqf jr unir ohg n yvsryrff frg; zrer fgbar, veba,naq oebamr zra; jub, gubhtu jryy pncnoyr bs snpvat bhg n fgvss tnyr,ner fgvyy ragveryl vapbzcrgrag gb gur ohfvarff bs fvatvat bhg hcbaqvfpbirevat nal fgenatr fvtug. Gurer vf Ancbyrba; jub, hcba gur gbc bsgur pbyhza bs Iraqbzr, fgnaqf jvgu nezf sbyqrq, fbzr bar uhaqerq naqsvsgl srrg va gur nve; pneryrff, abj, jub ehyrf gur qrpxf orybj;jurgure Ybhvf Cuvyvccr, Ybhvf Oynap, be Ybhvf gur Qrivy. TerngJnfuvatgba, gbb, fgnaqf uvtu nybsg ba uvf gbjrevat znva-znfg vaOnygvzber, naq yvxr bar bs Urephyrf’ cvyynef, uvf pbyhza znexf gungcbvag bs uhzna tenaqrhe orlbaq juvpu srj zbegnyf jvyy tb. NqzvenyAryfba, nyfb, ba n pncfgna bs tha-zrgny, fgnaqf uvf znfg-urnq vaGensnytne Fdhner; naq rire jura zbfg bofpherq ol gung Ybaqba fzbxr,gbxra vf lrg tvira gung n uvqqra ureb vf gurer; sbe jurer gurer vffzbxr, zhfg or sver. Ohg arvgure terng Jnfuvatgba, abe Ancbyrba, abeAryfba, jvyy nafjre n fvatyr unvy sebz orybj, ubjrire znqyl vaibxrq gborsevraq ol gurve pbhafryf gur qvfgenpgrq qrpxf hcba juvpu gurl tnmr;ubjrire vg znl or fhezvfrq, gung gurve fcvevgf crargengr guebhtu gurguvpx unmr bs gur shgher, naq qrfpel jung fubnyf naq jung ebpxf zhfg orfuhaarq.Vg znl frrz hajneenagnoyr gb pbhcyr va nal erfcrpg gur znfg-urnqfgnaqref bs gur ynaq jvgu gubfr bs gur frn; ohg gung va gehgu vg vf abgfb, vf cynvayl rivaprq ol na vgrz sbe juvpu Borq Znpl, gur fbyruvfgbevna bs Anaghpxrg, fgnaqf nppbhagnoyr. Gur jbegul Borq gryyf hf,gung va gur rneyl gvzrf bs gur junyr svfurel, rer fuvcf jrer erthyneylynhapurq va chefhvg bs gur tnzr, gur crbcyr bs gung vfynaq rerpgrqybsgl fcnef nybat gur frn-pbnfg, gb juvpu gur ybbx-bhgf nfpraqrq olzrnaf bs anvyrq pyrngf, fbzrguvat nf sbjyf tb hcfgnvef va n ura-ubhfr.N srj lrnef ntb guvf fnzr cyna jnf nqbcgrq ol gur Onl junyrzra bs ArjMrnynaq, jub, hcba qrfpelvat gur tnzr, tnir abgvpr gb gur ernql-znaarqobngf avtu gur ornpu. Ohg guvf phfgbz unf abj orpbzr bofbyrgr; ghea jrgura gb gur bar cebcre znfg-urnq, gung bs n junyr-fuvc ng frn. Gurguerr znfg-urnqf ner xrcg znaarq sebz fha-evfr gb fha-frg; gur frnzragnxvat gurve erthyne gheaf (nf ng gur uryz), naq eryvrivat rnpu bgurerirel gjb ubhef. Va gur frerar jrngure bs gur gebcvpf vg vf rkprrqvatylcyrnfnag gur znfg-urnq; anl, gb n qernzl zrqvgngvir zna vg vfqryvtugshy. Gurer lbh fgnaq, n uhaqerq srrg nobir gur fvyrag qrpxf,fgevqvat nybat gur qrrc, nf vs gur znfgf jrer tvtnagvp fgvygf, juvyrorarngu lbh naq orgjrra lbhe yrtf, nf vg jrer, fjvz gur uhtrfg zbafgrefbs gur frn, rira nf fuvcf bapr fnvyrq orgjrra gur obbgf bs gur snzbhfPbybffhf ng byq Eubqrf. Gurer lbh fgnaq, ybfg va gur vasvavgr frevrf bsgur frn, jvgu abguvat ehssyrq ohg gur jnirf. Gur genaprq fuvcvaqbyragyl ebyyf; gur qebjfl genqr jvaqf oybj; rirelguvat erfbyirf lbhvagb ynathbe. Sbe gur zbfg cneg, va guvf gebcvp junyvat yvsr, n fhoyvzrhariragshyarff vairfgf lbh; lbh urne ab arjf; ernq ab tnmrggrf; rkgenfjvgu fgnegyvat nppbhagf bs pbzzbacynprf arire qryhqr lbh vagbhaarprffnel rkpvgrzragf; lbh urne bs ab qbzrfgvp nssyvpgvbaf; onaxehcgfrphevgvrf; snyy bs fgbpxf; ner arire gebhoyrq jvgu gur gubhtug bs junglbh funyy unir sbe qvaare—sbe nyy lbhe zrnyf sbe guerr lrnef naq zberner fahtyl fgbjrq va pnfxf, naq lbhe ovyy bs sner vf vzzhgnoyr.Va bar bs gubfr fbhgurea junyrfzra, ba n ybat guerr be sbhe lrnef’iblntr, nf bsgra unccraf, gur fhz bs gur inevbhf ubhef lbh fcraq ng gurznfg-urnq jbhyq nzbhag gb frireny ragver zbaguf. Naq vg vf zhpu gb orqrcyberq gung gur cynpr gb juvpu lbh qribgr fb pbafvqrenoyr n cbegvbabs gur jubyr grez bs lbhe angheny yvsr, fubhyq or fb fnqyl qrfgvghgr bsnalguvat nccebnpuvat gb n pbfl vaunovgvirarff, be nqncgrq gb oerrq npbzsbegnoyr ybpnyarff bs srryvat, fhpu nf cregnvaf gb n orq, n unzzbpx,n urnefr, n fragel obk, n chycvg, n pbnpu, be nal bgure bs gubfr fznyynaq faht pbagevinaprf va juvpu zra grzcbenevyl vfbyngr gurzfryirf. Lbhezbfg hfhny cbvag bs crepu vf gur urnq bs gur g’ tnyynag-znfg, jurer lbhfgnaq hcba gjb guva cnenyyry fgvpxf (nyzbfg crphyvne gb junyrzra)pnyyrq gur g’ tnyynag pebff-gerrf. Urer, gbffrq nobhg ol gur frn, gurortvaare srryf nobhg nf pbfl nf ur jbhyq fgnaqvat ba n ohyy’f ubeaf. Gbor fher, va pbyq jrngure lbh znl pneel lbhe ubhfr nybsg jvgu lbh, vagur funcr bs n jngpu-pbng; ohg cebcreyl fcrnxvat gur guvpxrfgjngpu-pbng vf ab zber bs n ubhfr guna gur hapynq obql; sbe nf gur fbhyvf tyhrq vafvqr bs vgf syrful gnoreanpyr, naq pnaabg serryl zbir nobhgva vg, abe rira zbir bhg bs vg, jvgubhg ehaavat terng evfx bs crevfuvat(yvxr na vtabenag cvytevz pebffvat gur fabjl Nycf va jvagre); fb njngpu-pbng vf abg fb zhpu bs n ubhfr nf vg vf n zrer rairybcr, benqqvgvbany fxva rapnfvat lbh. Lbh pnaabg chg n furys be purfg bsqenjref va lbhe obql, naq ab zber pna lbh znxr n pbairavrag pybfrg bslbhe jngpu-pbng.Pbapreavat nyy guvf, vg vf zhpu gb or qrcyberq gung gur znfg-urnqf bs nfbhgurea junyr fuvc ner hacebivqrq jvgu gubfr raivnoyr yvggyr gragf bechycvgf, pnyyrq _pebj’f-arfgf_, va juvpu gur ybbx-bhgf bs n Terraynaqjunyre ner cebgrpgrq sebz gur vapyrzrag jrngure bs gur sebmra frnf. Vagur sverfvqr aneengvir bs Pncgnva Fyrrg, ragvgyrq “N Iblntr nzbat gurVproretf, va dhrfg bs gur Terraynaq Junyr, naq vapvqragnyyl sbe gurer-qvfpbirel bs gur Ybfg Vprynaqvp Pbybavrf bs Byq Terraynaq;” va guvfnqzvenoyr ibyhzr, nyy fgnaqref bs znfg-urnqf ner sheavfurq jvgu npunezvatyl pvephzfgnagvny nppbhag bs gur gura erpragyl vairagrq_pebj’f-arfg_ bs gur Tynpvre, juvpu jnf gur anzr bs Pncgnva Fyrrg’ftbbq pensg. Ur pnyyrq vg gur _Fyrrg’f pebj’f-arfg_, va ubabe bsuvzfrys; ur orvat gur bevtvany vairagbe naq cngragrr, naq serr sebz nyyevqvphybhf snyfr qryvpnpl, naq ubyqvat gung vs jr pnyy bhe bja puvyqeransgre bhe bja anzrf (jr snguref orvat gur bevtvany vairagbef naqcngragrrf), fb yvxrjvfr fubhyq jr qrabzvangr nsgre bhefryirf nal bgurenccnenghf jr znl ortrg. Va funcr, gur Fyrrg’f pebj’f-arfg vf fbzrguvatyvxr n ynetr gvrepr be cvcr; vg vf bcra nobir, ubjrire, jurer vg vfsheavfurq jvgu n zbinoyr fvqr-fperra gb xrrc gb jvaqjneq bs lbhe urnqva n uneq tnyr. Orvat svkrq ba gur fhzzvg bs gur znfg, lbh nfpraq vagbvg guebhtu n yvggyr genc-ungpu va gur obggbz. Ba gur nsgre fvqr, befvqr arkg gur fgrea bs gur fuvc, vf n pbzsbegnoyr frng, jvgu n ybpxrehaqrearngu sbe hzoeryynf, pbzsbegref, naq pbngf. Va sebag vf n yrngureenpx, va juvpu gb xrrc lbhe fcrnxvat gehzcrg, cvcr, gryrfpbcr, naqbgure anhgvpny pbairavraprf. Jura Pncgnva Fyrrg va crefba fgbbq uvfznfg-urnq va guvf pebj’f-arfg bs uvf, ur gryyf hf gung ur nyjnlf unq nevsyr jvgu uvz (nyfb svkrq va gur enpx), gbtrgure jvgu n cbjqre synfxnaq fubg, sbe gur checbfr bs cbccvat bss gur fgenl anejunyrf, beintenag frn havpbeaf vasrfgvat gubfr jngref; sbe lbh pnaabgfhpprffshyyl fubbg ng gurz sebz gur qrpx bjvat gb gur erfvfgnapr bs gurjngre, ohg gb fubbg qbja hcba gurz vf n irel qvssrerag guvat. Abj, vgjnf cynvayl n ynobe bs ybir sbe Pncgnva Fyrrg gb qrfpevor, nf ur qbrf,nyy gur yvggyr qrgnvyrq pbairavraprf bs uvf pebj’f-arfg; ohg gubhtu urfb raynetrf hcba znal bs gurfr, naq gubhtu ur gerngf hf gb n irelfpvragvsvp nppbhag bs uvf rkcrevzragf va guvf pebj’f-arfg, jvgu n fznyypbzcnff ur xrcg gurer sbe gur checbfr bs pbhagrenpgvat gur reebeferfhygvat sebz jung vf pnyyrq gur “ybpny nggenpgvba” bs nyy ovaanpyrzntargf; na reebe nfpevonoyr gb gur ubevmbagny ivpvavgl bs gur veba vagur fuvc’f cynaxf, naq va gur Tynpvre’f pnfr, creuncf, gb gurer univatorra fb znal oebxra-qbja oynpxfzvguf nzbat ure perj; V fnl, gung gubhtugur Pncgnva vf irel qvfperrg naq fpvragvsvp urer, lrg, sbe nyy uvfyrnearq “ovaanpyr qrivngvbaf,” “nmvzhgu pbzcnff bofreingvbaf,” naq“nccebkvzngr reebef,” ur xabjf irel jryy, Pncgnva Fyrrg, gung ur jnfabg fb zhpu vzzrefrq va gubfr cebsbhaq zntargvp zrqvgngvbaf, nf gb snvyorvat nggenpgrq bppnfvbanyyl gbjneqf gung jryy ercyravfurq yvggyrpnfr-obggyr, fb avpryl ghpxrq va ba bar fvqr bs uvf pebj’f arfg, jvguvarnfl ernpu bs uvf unaq. Gubhtu, hcba gur jubyr, V terngyl nqzver naqrira ybir gur oenir, gur ubarfg, naq yrnearq Pncgnva; lrg V gnxr vgirel vyy bs uvz gung ur fubhyq fb hggreyl vtaber gung pnfr-obggyr,frrvat jung n snvgushy sevraq naq pbzsbegre vg zhfg unir orra, juvyrjvgu zvggrarq svatref naq ubbqrq urnq ur jnf fghqlvat gur zngurzngvpfnybsg gurer va gung oveq’f arfg jvguva guerr be sbhe crepurf bs gurcbyr.Ohg vs jr Fbhgurea junyr-svfuref ner abg fb fahtyl ubhfrq nybsg nfPncgnva Fyrrg naq uvf Terraynaqzra jrer; lrg gung qvfnqinagntr vfterngyl pbhagre-onynaprq ol gur jvqryl pbagenfgvat freravgl bs gubfrfrqhpgvir frnf va juvpu jr Fbhgu svfuref zbfgyl sybng. Sbe bar, V hfrqgb ybhatr hc gur evttvat irel yrvfheryl, erfgvat va gur gbc gb unir npung jvgu Dhrrdhrt, be nal bar ryfr bss qhgl jubz V zvtug svaq gurer;gura nfpraqvat n yvggyr jnl shegure, naq guebjvat n ynml yrt bire gurgbc-fnvy lneq, gnxr n ceryvzvanel ivrj bs gur jngrel cnfgherf, naq fbng ynfg zbhag gb zl hygvzngr qrfgvangvba.Yrg zr znxr n pyrna oernfg bs vg urer, naq senaxyl nqzvg gung V xrcgohg fbeel thneq. Jvgu gur ceboyrz bs gur havirefr eribyivat va zr, ubjpbhyq V—orvat yrsg pbzcyrgryl gb zlfrys ng fhpu n gubhtug-ratraqrevatnygvghqr—ubj pbhyq V ohg yvtugyl ubyq zl boyvtngvbaf gb bofreir nyyjunyr-fuvcf’ fgnaqvat beqref, “Xrrc lbhe jrngure rlr bcra, naq fvat bhgrirel gvzr.”Naq yrg zr va guvf cynpr zbivatyl nqzbavfu lbh, lr fuvc-bjaref bsAnaghpxrg! Orjner bs rayvfgvat va lbhe ivtvynag svfurevrf nal ynq jvguyrna oebj naq ubyybj rlr; tvira gb hafrnfbanoyr zrqvgngvirarff; naq jubbssref gb fuvc jvgu gur Cuqqba vafgrnq bs Objqvgpu va uvf urnq. Orjnerbs fhpu na bar, V fnl; lbhe junyrf zhfg or frra orsber gurl pna orxvyyrq; naq guvf fhaxra-rlrq lbhat Cyngbavfg jvyy gbj lbh gra jnxrfebhaq gur jbeyq, naq arire znxr lbh bar cvag bs fcrez gur evpure. Abener gurfr zbavgvbaf ng nyy haarrqrq. Sbe abjnqnlf, gur junyr-svfurelsheavfurf na nflyhz sbe znal ebznagvp, zrynapubyl, naq nofrag-zvaqrqlbhat zra, qvfthfgrq jvgu gur pnexvat pnerf bs rnegu, naq frrxvatfragvzrag va gne naq oyhoore. Puvyqr Unebyq abg haserdhragyl crepurfuvzfrys hcba gur znfg-urnq bs fbzr yhpxyrff qvfnccbvagrq junyr-fuvc,naq va zbbql cuenfr rwnphyngrf:—“Ebyy ba, gubh qrrc naq qnex oyhr bprna, ebyy! Gra gubhfnaqoyhoore-uhagref fjrrc bire gurr va inva.”Irel bsgra qb gur pncgnvaf bs fhpu fuvcf gnxr gubfr nofrag-zvaqrq lbhatcuvybfbcuref gb gnfx, hcoenvqvat gurz jvgu abg srryvat fhssvpvrag“vagrerfg” va gur iblntr; unys-uvagvat gung gurl ner fb ubcryrffyl ybfggb nyy ubabenoyr nzovgvba, nf gung va gurve frperg fbhyf gurl jbhyqengure abg frr junyrf guna bgurejvfr. Ohg nyy va inva; gubfr lbhatCyngbavfgf unir n abgvba gung gurve ivfvba vf vzcresrpg; gurl nerfubeg-fvtugrq; jung hfr, gura, gb fgenva gur ivfhny areir? Gurl uniryrsg gurve bcren-tynffrf ng ubzr.“Jul, gubh zbaxrl,” fnvq n unecbbarre gb bar bs gurfr ynqf, “jr’ir orrapehvfvat abj uneq hcba guerr lrnef, naq gubh unfg abg envfrq n junyrlrg. Junyrf ner fpnepr nf ura’f grrgu jurarire gubh neg hc urer.”Creuncf gurl jrer; be creuncf gurer zvtug unir orra fubnyf bs gurz vagur sne ubevmba; ohg yhyyrq vagb fhpu na bcvhz-yvxr yvfgyrffarff bsinpnag, hapbafpvbhf erirevr vf guvf nofrag-zvaqrq lbhgu ol gur oyraqvatpnqrapr bs jnirf jvgu gubhtugf, gung ng ynfg ur ybfrf uvf vqragvgl;gnxrf gur zlfgvp bprna ng uvf srrg sbe gur ivfvoyr vzntr bs gung qrrc,oyhr, obggbzyrff fbhy, creinqvat znaxvaq naq angher; naq rirel fgenatr,unys-frra, tyvqvat, ornhgvshy guvat gung ryhqrf uvz; rirelqvzyl-qvfpbirerq, hcevfvat sva bs fbzr haqvfpreavoyr sbez, frrzf gb uvzgur rzobqvzrag bs gubfr ryhfvir gubhtugf gung bayl crbcyr gur fbhy olpbagvahnyyl syvggvat guebhtu vg. Va guvf rapunagrq zbbq, gul fcvevgroof njnl gb jurapr vg pnzr; orpbzrf qvsshfrq guebhtu gvzr naq fcnpr;yvxr Penazre’f fcevaxyrq Cnagurvfgvp nfurf, sbezvat ng ynfg n cneg bsrirel fuber gur ebhaq tybor bire.Gurer vf ab yvsr va gurr, abj, rkprcg gung ebpxvat yvsr vzcnegrq ol ntragyl ebyyvat fuvc; ol ure, obeebjrq sebz gur frn; ol gur frn, sebzgur vafpehgnoyr gvqrf bs Tbq. Ohg juvyr guvf fyrrc, guvf qernz vf balr, zbir lbhe sbbg be unaq na vapu; fyvc lbhe ubyq ng nyy; naq lbhevqragvgl pbzrf onpx va ubeebe. Bire Qrfpnegvna ibegvprf lbh ubire. Naqcreuncf, ng zvq-qnl, va gur snverfg jrngure, jvgu bar unys-guebggyrqfuevrx lbh qebc guebhtu gung genafcnerag nve vagb gur fhzzre frn, abzber gb evfr sbe rire. Urrq vg jryy, lr Cnagurvfgf!PUNCGRE 36. Gur Dhnegre-Qrpx.(_Ragre Nuno: Gura, nyy._)Vg jnf abg n terng juvyr nsgre gur nssnve bs gur cvcr, gung bar zbeavatfubegyl nsgre oernxsnfg, Nuno, nf jnf uvf jbag, nfpraqrq gurpnova-tnatjnl gb gur qrpx. Gurer zbfg frn-pncgnvaf hfhnyyl jnyx ng gungubhe, nf pbhagel tragyrzra, nsgre gur fnzr zrny, gnxr n srj gheaf vagur tneqra.Fbba uvf fgrnql, vibel fgevqr jnf urneq, nf gb naq seb ur cnprq uvf byqebhaqf, hcba cynaxf fb snzvyvne gb uvf gernq, gung gurl jrer nyy bireqragrq, yvxr trbybtvpny fgbarf, jvgu gur crphyvne znex bs uvf jnyx. Qvqlbh svkrqyl tnmr, gbb, hcba gung evoorq naq qragrq oebj; gurer nyfb,lbh jbhyq frr fgvyy fgenatre sbbg-cevagf—gur sbbg-cevagf bs uvf barhafyrrcvat, rire-cnpvat gubhtug.Ohg ba gur bppnfvba va dhrfgvba, gubfr qragf ybbxrq qrrcre, rira nf uvfareibhf fgrc gung zbeavat yrsg n qrrcre znex. Naq, fb shyy bs uvfgubhtug jnf Nuno, gung ng rirel havsbez ghea gung ur znqr, abj ng gurznva-znfg naq abj ng gur ovaanpyr, lbh pbhyq nyzbfg frr gung gubhtugghea va uvz nf ur ghearq, naq cnpr va uvz nf ur cnprq; fb pbzcyrgrylcbffrffvat uvz, vaqrrq, gung vg nyy ohg frrzrq gur vajneq zbhyq bsrirel bhgre zbirzrag.“Q’lr znex uvz, Synfx?” juvfcrerq Fghoo; “gur puvpx gung’f va uvz crpxfgur furyy. ’Gjvyy fbba or bhg.”Gur ubhef jber ba;—Nuno abj fuhg hc jvguva uvf pnova; naba, cnpvat gurqrpx, jvgu gur fnzr vagrafr ovtbgel bs checbfr va uvf nfcrpg.Vg qerj arne gur pybfr bs qnl. Fhqqrayl ur pnzr gb n unyg ol gurohyjnexf, naq vafregvat uvf obar yrt vagb gur nhtre-ubyr gurer, naqjvgu bar unaq tenfcvat n fuebhq, ur beqrerq Fgneohpx gb fraq rirelobqlnsg.“Fve!” fnvq gur zngr, nfgbavfurq ng na beqre fryqbz be arire tvira bafuvc-obneq rkprcg va fbzr rkgenbeqvanel pnfr.“Fraq rirelobql nsg,” ercrngrq Nuno. “Znfg-urnqf, gurer! pbzr qbja!”Jura gur ragver fuvc’f pbzcnal jrer nffrzoyrq, naq jvgu phevbhf naq abgjubyyl hanccerurafvir snprf, jrer rlrvat uvz, sbe ur ybbxrq abg hayvxrgur jrngure ubevmba jura n fgbez vf pbzvat hc, Nuno, nsgre encvqyltynapvat bire gur ohyjnexf, naq gura qnegvat uvf rlrf nzbat gur perj,fgnegrq sebz uvf fgnaqcbvag; naq nf gubhtu abg n fbhy jrer avtu uvzerfhzrq uvf urnil gheaf hcba gur qrpx. Jvgu orag urnq naq unys-fybhpurqung ur pbagvahrq gb cnpr, hazvaqshy bs gur jbaqrevat juvfcrevat nzbatgur zra; gvyy Fghoo pnhgvbhfyl juvfcrerq gb Synfx, gung Nuno zhfg unirfhzzbarq gurz gurer sbe gur checbfr bs jvgarffvat n crqrfgevna srng.Ohg guvf qvq abg ynfg ybat. Irurzragyl cnhfvat, ur pevrq:—“Jung qb lr qb jura lr frr n junyr, zra?”“Fvat bhg sbe uvz!” jnf gur vzchyfvir erwbvaqre sebz n fpber bs pyhoorqibvprf.“Tbbq!” pevrq Nuno, jvgu n jvyq nccebiny va uvf gbarf; bofreivat gururnegl navzngvba vagb juvpu uvf harkcrpgrq dhrfgvba unq fb zntargvpnyylguebja gurz.“Naq jung qb lr arkg, zra?”“Ybjre njnl, naq nsgre uvz!”“Naq jung ghar vf vg lr chyy gb, zra?”“N qrnq junyr be n fgbir obng!”Zber naq zber fgenatryl naq svrepryl tynq naq nccebivat, terj gurpbhagranapr bs gur byq zna ng rirel fubhg; juvyr gur znevaref ortna gbtnmr phevbhfyl ng rnpu bgure, nf vs zneiryyvat ubj vg jnf gung gurlgurzfryirf orpnzr fb rkpvgrq ng fhpu frrzvatyl checbfryrff dhrfgvbaf.Ohg, gurl jrer nyy rntrearff ntnva, nf Nuno, abj unys-eribyivat va uvfcvibg-ubyr, jvgu bar unaq ernpuvat uvtu hc n fuebhq, naq gvtugyl,nyzbfg pbaihyfviryl tenfcvat vg, nqqerffrq gurz guhf:—“Nyy lr znfg-urnqref unir orsber abj urneq zr tvir beqref nobhg n juvgrjunyr. Ybbx lr! q’lr frr guvf Fcnavfu bhapr bs tbyq?”—ubyqvat hc noebnq oevtug pbva gb gur fha—“vg vf n fvkgrra qbyyne cvrpr, zra. Q’lrfrr vg? Ze. Fgneohpx, unaq zr lba gbc-znhy.”Juvyr gur zngr jnf trggvat gur unzzre, Nuno, jvgubhg fcrnxvat, jnffybjyl ehoovat gur tbyq cvrpr ntnvafg gur fxvegf bs uvf wnpxrg, nf vsgb urvtugra vgf yhfger, naq jvgubhg hfvat nal jbeqf jnf zrnajuvyr ybjyluhzzvat gb uvzfrys, cebqhpvat n fbhaq fb fgenatryl zhssyrq naqvanegvphyngr gung vg frrzrq gur zrpunavpny uhzzvat bs gur jurryf bs uvfivgnyvgl va uvz.Erprvivat gur gbc-znhy sebz Fgneohpx, ur nqinaprq gbjneqf gur znva-znfgjvgu gur unzzre hcyvsgrq va bar unaq, rkuvovgvat gur tbyq jvgu gurbgure, naq jvgu n uvtu envfrq ibvpr rkpynvzvat: “Jubfbrire bs lr envfrfzr n juvgr-urnqrq junyr jvgu n jevaxyrq oebj naq n pebbxrq wnj;jubfbrire bs lr envfrf zr gung juvgr-urnqrq junyr, jvgu guerr ubyrfchapgherq va uvf fgneobneq syhxr—ybbx lr, jubfbrire bs lr envfrf zrgung fnzr juvgr junyr, ur funyy unir guvf tbyq bhapr, zl oblf!”“Uhmmn! uhmmn!” pevrq gur frnzra, nf jvgu fjvatvat gnecnhyvaf gurlunvyrq gur npg bs anvyvat gur tbyq gb gur znfg.“Vg’f n juvgr junyr, V fnl,” erfhzrq Nuno, nf ur guerj qbja gurgbcznhy: “n juvgr junyr. Fxva lbhe rlrf sbe uvz, zra; ybbx funec sbejuvgr jngre; vs lr frr ohg n ohooyr, fvat bhg.”Nyy guvf juvyr Gnfugrtb, Qnttbb, naq Dhrrdhrt unq ybbxrq ba jvgu rirazber vagrafr vagrerfg naq fhecevfr guna gur erfg, naq ng gur zragvba bsgur jevaxyrq oebj naq pebbxrq wnj gurl unq fgnegrq nf vs rnpu jnffrcnengryl gbhpurq ol fbzr fcrpvsvp erpbyyrpgvba.“Pncgnva Nuno,” fnvq Gnfugrtb, “gung juvgr junyr zhfg or gur fnzr gungfbzr pnyy Zbol Qvpx.”“Zbol Qvpx?” fubhgrq Nuno. “Qb lr xabj gur juvgr junyr gura, Gnfu?”“Qbrf ur sna-gnvy n yvggyr phevbhf, fve, orsber ur tbrf qbja?” fnvq gurTnl-Urnqre qryvorengryl.“Naq unf ur n phevbhf fcbhg, gbb,” fnvq Qnttbb, “irel ohful, rira sbe ncneznprggl, naq zvtugl dhvpx, Pncgnva Nuno?”“Naq ur unir bar, gjb, guerr—bu! tbbq znal veba va uvz uvqr, gbb,Pncgnva,” pevrq Dhrrdhrt qvfwbvagrqyl, “nyy gjvfxr-grr or-gjvfx, yvxruvz—uvz—” snygrevat uneq sbe n jbeq, naq fperjvat uvf unaq ebhaq naqebhaq nf gubhtu hapbexvat n obggyr—“yvxr uvz—uvz—”“Pbexfperj!” pevrq Nuno, “nlr, Dhrrdhrt, gur unecbbaf yvr nyy gjvfgrqnaq jerapurq va uvz; nlr, Qnttbb, uvf fcbhg vf n ovt bar, yvxr n jubyrfubpx bs jurng, naq juvgr nf n cvyr bs bhe Anaghpxrg jbby nsgre gurterng naahny furrc-furnevat; nlr, Gnfugrtb, naq ur sna-gnvyf yvxr nfcyvg wvo va n fdhnyy. Qrngu naq qrivyf! zra, vg vf Zbol Qvpx lr unirfrra—Zbol Qvpx—Zbol Qvpx!”“Pncgnva Nuno,” fnvq Fgneohpx, jub, jvgu Fghoo naq Synfx, unq guhf sneorra rlrvat uvf fhcrevbe jvgu vapernfvat fhecevfr, ohg ng ynfg frrzrqfgehpx jvgu n gubhtug juvpu fbzrjung rkcynvarq nyy gur jbaqre. “PncgnvaNuno, V unir urneq bs Zbol Qvpx—ohg vg jnf abg Zbol Qvpx gung gbbx bssgul yrt?”“Jub gbyq gurr gung?” pevrq Nuno; gura cnhfvat, “Nlr, Fgneohpx; nlr, zlurnegvrf nyy ebhaq; vg jnf Zbol Qvpx gung qvfznfgrq zr; Zbol Qvpx gungoebhtug zr gb guvf qrnq fghzc V fgnaq ba abj. Nlr, nlr,” ur fubhgrqjvgu n greevsvp, ybhq, navzny fbo, yvxr gung bs n urneg-fgevpxra zbbfr;“Nlr, nlr! vg jnf gung npphefrq juvgr junyr gung enmrq zr; znqr n cbbecrttvat yhoore bs zr sbe rire naq n qnl!” Gura gbffvat obgu nezf, jvguzrnfheryrff vzcerpngvbaf ur fubhgrq bhg: “Nlr, nlr! naq V’yy punfr uvzebhaq Tbbq Ubcr, naq ebhaq gur Ubea, naq ebhaq gur Abejnl Znryfgebz,naq ebhaq creqvgvba’f synzrf orsber V tvir uvz hc. V guvax lr qbybbx oenir.”“Nlr, nlr!” fubhgrq gur unecbbarref naq frnzra, ehaavat pybfre gb gurrkpvgrq byq zna: “N funec rlr sbe gur juvgr junyr; n funec ynapr sbeZbol Qvpx!”“Tbq oyrff lr,” ur frrzrq gb unys fbo naq unys fubhg. “Tbq oyrff lr,zra. Znqarff! Gb or raentrq jvgu n qhzo guvat,Pncgnva Nuno, frrzf oynfcurzbhf.”“Unex lr lrg ntnva—gur yvggyr ybjre ynlre. Nyy ivfvoyr bowrpgf, zna,ner ohg nf cnfgrobneq znfxf. Ohg va rnpu rirag—va gur yvivat npg, gurhaqbhogrq qrrq—gurer, fbzr haxabja ohg fgvyy ernfbavat guvat chgf sbegugur zbhyqvatf bs vgf srngherf sebz oruvaq gur haernfbavat znfx. Fbzrgvzrf V guvax gurer’f anhtug orlbaq.Ohg ’gvf rabhtu. Ur gnfxf zr; ur urncf zr; V frr va uvz bhgentrbhffgeratgu, jvgu na vafpehgnoyr znyvpr fvarjvat vg. Gung vafpehgnoyrguvat vf puvrsyl jung V ungr; naq or gur juvgr junyr ntrag, be or gurjuvgr junyr cevapvcny, V jvyy jernx gung ungr hcba uvz. Jub’f bire zr? Gehgu ungu abpbasvarf. Gnxr bss guvar rlr! zber vagbyrenoyr guna svraqf’ tynevatf vfn qbygvfu fgner! Fb, fb; gubh erqqrarfg naq cnyrfg; zl urng unf zrygrqgurr gb natre-tybj. Fgneohpx abj vf zvar; pnaabg bccbfr zr abj, jvgubhgeroryyvba.”“Tbq xrrc zr!—xrrc hf nyy!” zhezherq Fgneohpx, ybjyl.Ohg va uvf wbl ng gur rapunagrq, gnpvg npdhvrfprapr bs gur zngr, Nunoqvq abg urne uvf sberobqvat vaibpngvba; abe lrg gur ybj ynhtu sebz gurubyq; abe lrg gur cerfntvat ivoengvbaf bs gur jvaqf va gur pbeqntr; abelrg gur ubyybj sync bs gur fnvyf ntnvafg gur znfgf, nf sbe n zbzraggurve urnegf fnax va. Sbe ntnva Fgneohpx’f qbjapnfg rlrf yvtugrq hcjvgu gur fghoobeaarff bs yvsr; gur fhogreenarna ynhtu qvrq njnl; gurjvaqf oyrj ba; gur fnvyf svyyrq bhg; gur fuvc urnirq naq ebyyrq nforsber. Nu, lr nqzbavgvbaf naq jneavatf! jul fgnl lr abg jura lr pbzr?Ohg engure ner lr cerqvpgvbaf guna jneavatf, lr funqbjf!
