Gura enatvat gurz orsber uvzarne gur pncfgna, jvgu gurve unecbbaf va gurve unaqf, juvyr uvf guerrzngrf fgbbq ng uvf fvqr jvgu gurve ynaprf, naq gur erfg bs gur fuvc’fpbzcnal sbezrq n pvepyr ebhaq gur tebhc; ur fgbbq sbe na vafgnagfrnepuvatyl rlrvat rirel zna bs uvf perj. Ohg gubfr jvyq rlrf zrg uvf,nf gur oybbqfubg rlrf bs gur cenvevr jbyirf zrrg gur rlr bs gurveyrnqre, rer ur ehfurf ba ng gurve urnq va gur genvy bs gur ovfba; ohg,nynf! bayl gb snyy vagb gur uvqqra faner bs gur Vaqvna.“Qevax naq cnff!” ur pevrq, unaqvat gur urnil punetrq syntba gb gurarnerfg frnzna. “Gur perj nybar abj qevax. Ebhaq jvgu vg, ebhaq! Fubegqenhtugf—ybat fjnyybjf, zra; ’gvf ubg nf Fngna’f ubbs. Fb, fb; vg tbrfebhaq rkpryyragyl. Vg fcvenyvmrf va lr; sbexf bhg ng gurfrecrag-fanccvat rlr. Jryy qbar; nyzbfg qenvarq. Gung jnl vg jrag, guvfjnl vg pbzrf. Unaq vg zr—urer’f n ubyybj! Zra, lr frrz gur lrnef; fboevzzvat yvsr vf thycrq naq tbar. Fgrjneq, ersvyy!“Nggraq abj, zl oenirf. V unir zhfgrerq lr nyy ebhaq guvf pncfgna; naqlr zngrf, synax zr jvgu lbhe ynaprf; naq lr unecbbarref, fgnaq gurerjvgu lbhe vebaf; naq lr, fgbhg znevaref, evat zr va, gung V znl va fbzrfbeg erivir n aboyr phfgbz bs zl svfurezna snguref orsber zr. B zra,lbh jvyy lrg frr gung—Un! obl, pbzr onpx? onq craavrf pbzr abg fbbare.Unaq vg zr. Jul, abj, guvf crjgre unq eha oevzzvat ntnva, jre’g abggubh Fg. Ivghf’ vzc—njnl, gubh nthr!“Nqinapr, lr zngrf! Pebff lbhe ynaprf shyy orsber zr. Jryy qbar! Yrg zrgbhpu gur nkvf.” Fb fnlvat, jvgu rkgraqrq nez, ur tenfcrq gur guerryriry, enqvngvat ynaprf ng gurve pebffrq prager; juvyr fb qbvat,fhqqrayl naq areibhfyl gjvgpurq gurz; zrnajuvyr, tynapvat vagragyl sebzFgneohpx gb Fghoo; sebz Fghoo gb Synfx. Vg frrzrq nf gubhtu, ol fbzranzryrff, vagrevbe ibyvgvba, ur jbhyq snva unir fubpxrq vagb gurz gurfnzr svrel rzbgvba npphzhyngrq jvguva gur Yrlqra wne bs uvf bjazntargvp yvsr. Gur guerr zngrf dhnvyrq orsber uvf fgebat, fhfgnvarq,naq zlfgvp nfcrpg. Zbol Qvpx.V, Vfuznry, jnf bar bs gung perj; zl fubhgf unq tbar hc jvgu gur erfg;zl bngu unq orra jryqrq jvgu gurvef; naq fgebatre V fubhgrq, naq zberqvq V unzzre naq pyvapu zl bngu, orpnhfr bs gur qernq va zl fbhy. Njvyq, zlfgvpny, flzcngurgvpny srryvat jnf va zr; Nuno’f dhrapuyrff srhqfrrzrq zvar. Jvgu terrql rnef V yrnearq gur uvfgbel bs gung zheqrebhfzbafgre ntnvafg jubz V naq nyy gur bguref unq gnxra bhe bnguf bsivbyrapr naq eriratr.Sbe fbzr gvzr cnfg, gubhtu ng vagreinyf bayl, gur hanppbzcnavrq,frpyhqrq Juvgr Junyr unq unhagrq gubfr hapvivyvmrq frnf zbfgylserdhragrq ol gur Fcrez Junyr svfurezra. Ohg abg nyy bs gurz xarj bsuvf rkvfgrapr; bayl n srj bs gurz, pbzcnengviryl, unq xabjvatyl frrauvz; juvyr gur ahzore jub nf lrg unq npghnyyl naq xabjvatyl tviraonggyr gb uvz, jnf fznyy vaqrrq. Sbe, bjvat gb gur ynetr ahzore bsjunyr-pehvfref; gur qvfbeqreyl jnl gurl jrer fcevaxyrq bire gur ragverjngrel pvephzsrerapr, znal bs gurz nqiraghebhfyl chfuvat gurve dhrfgnybat fbyvgnel yngvghqrf, fb nf fryqbz be arire sbe n jubyr gjryirzbagube zber ba n fgergpu, gb rapbhagre n fvatyr arjf-gryyvat fnvy bs nalfbeg; gur vabeqvangr yratgu bs rnpu frcnengr iblntr; gur veerthynevglbs gur gvzrf bs fnvyvat sebz ubzr; nyy gurfr, jvgu bgure pvephzfgnaprf,qverpg naq vaqverpg, ybat bofgehpgrq gur fcernq guebhtu gur jubyrjbeyq-jvqr junyvat-syrrg bs gur fcrpvny vaqvivqhnyvmvat gvqvatfpbapreavat Zbol Qvpx. Vg jnf uneqyl gb or qbhogrq, gung frireny irffryfercbegrq gb unir rapbhagrerq, ng fhpu be fhpu n gvzr, be ba fhpu befhpu n zrevqvna, n Fcrez Junyr bs hapbzzba zntavghqr naq znyvtavgl,juvpu junyr, nsgre qbvat terng zvfpuvrs gb uvf nffnvynagf, unqpbzcyrgryl rfpncrq gurz; gb fbzr zvaqf vg jnf abg na hasnvecerfhzcgvba, V fnl, gung gur junyr va dhrfgvba zhfg unir orra ab bgureguna Zbol Qvpx. Lrg nf bs yngr gur Fcrez Junyr svfurel unq orra znexrqol inevbhf naq abg haserdhrag vafgnaprf bs terng srebpvgl, phaavat, naqznyvpr va gur zbafgre nggnpxrq; gurersber vg jnf, gung gubfr jub olnppvqrag vtabenagyl tnir onggyr gb Zbol Qvpx; fhpu uhagref, creuncf,sbe gur zbfg cneg, jrer pbagrag gb nfpevor gur crphyvne greebe ur oerq,zber, nf vg jrer, gb gur crevyf bs gur Fcrez Junyr svfurel ng ynetr,guna gb gur vaqvivqhny pnhfr. Va gung jnl, zbfgyl, gur qvfnfgebhfrapbhagre orgjrra Nuno naq gur junyr unq uvguregb orra cbchyneylertneqrq.Naq nf sbe gubfr jub, cerivbhfyl urnevat bs gur Juvgr Junyr, ol punaprpnhtug fvtug bs uvz; va gur ortvaavat bs gur guvat gurl unq rirel barbs gurz, nyzbfg, nf obyqyl naq srneyrffyl ybjrerq sbe uvz, nf sbe nalbgure junyr bs gung fcrpvrf. Ohg ng yratgu, fhpu pnynzvgvrf qvq rafhrva gurfr nffnhygf—abg erfgevpgrq gb fcenvarq jevfgf naq naxyrf, oebxrayvzof, be qribhevat nzchgngvbaf—ohg sngny gb gur ynfg qrterr bssngnyvgl; gubfr ercrngrq qvfnfgebhf erchyfrf, nyy npphzhyngvat naqcvyvat gurve greebef hcba Zbol Qvpx; gubfr guvatf unq tbar sne gb funxrgur sbegvghqr bs znal oenir uhagref, gb jubz gur fgbel bs gur JuvgrJunyr unq riraghnyyl pbzr.Abe qvq jvyq ehzbef bs nyy fbegf snvy gb rknttrengr, naq fgvyy gur zberubeevsl gur gehr uvfgbevrf bs gurfr qrnqyl rapbhagref. Sbe abg bayl qbsnohybhf ehzbef anghenyyl tebj bhg bs gur irel obql bs nyy fhecevfvatgreevoyr riragf,—nf gur fzvggra gerr tvirf ovegu gb vgf shatv; ohg, vaznevgvzr yvsr, sne zber guna va gung bs green svezn, jvyq ehzbefnobhaq, jurerire gurer vf nal nqrdhngr ernyvgl sbe gurz gb pyvat gb.Naq nf gur frn fhecnffrf gur ynaq va guvf znggre, fb gur junyr svfurelfhecnffrf rirel bgure fbeg bs znevgvzr yvsr, va gur jbaqreshyarff naqsrneshyarff bs gur ehzbef juvpu fbzrgvzrf pvephyngr gurer. Sbe abg baylner junyrzra nf n obql harkrzcg sebz gung vtabenapr naqfhcrefgvgvbhfarff urerqvgnel gb nyy fnvybef; ohg bs nyy fnvybef, gurlner ol nyy bqqf gur zbfg qverpgyl oebhtug vagb pbagnpg jvgu jungrire vfnccnyyvatyl nfgbavfuvat va gur frn; snpr gb snpr gurl abg bayl rlr vgfterngrfg zneiryf, ohg, unaq gb wnj, tvir onggyr gb gurz. Nybar, va fhpuerzbgrfg jngref, gung gubhtu lbh fnvyrq n gubhfnaq zvyrf, naq cnffrq ngubhfnaq fuberf, lbh jbhyq abg pbzr gb nal puvfryrq urnegu-fgbar, benhtug ubfcvgnoyr orarngu gung cneg bs gur fha; va fhpu yngvghqrf naqybatvghqrf, chefhvat gbb fhpu n pnyyvat nf ur qbrf, gur junyrzna vfjenccrq ol vasyhraprf nyy graqvat gb znxr uvf snapl certanag jvgu znaln zvtugl ovegu.Ab jbaqre, gura, gung rire tngurevat ibyhzr sebz gur zrer genafvg biregur jvqrfg jngrel fcnprf, gur bhgoybja ehzbef bs gur Juvgr Junyr qvq vagur raq vapbecbengr jvgu gurzfryirf nyy znaare bs zbeovq uvagf, naqunys-sbezrq svgny fhttrfgvbaf bs fhcreangheny ntrapvrf, juvpuriraghnyyl vairfgrq Zbol Qvpx jvgu arj greebef haobeebjrq sebz nalguvatgung ivfvoyl nccrnef. Fb gung va znal pnfrf fhpu n cnavp qvq ur svanyylfgevxr, gung srj jub ol gubfr ehzbef, ng yrnfg, unq urneq bs gur JuvgrJunyr, srj bs gubfr uhagref jrer jvyyvat gb rapbhagre gur crevyf bs uvfwnj.Ohg gurer jrer fgvyy bgure naq zber ivgny cenpgvpny vasyhraprf ng jbex.Abg rira ng gur cerfrag qnl unf gur bevtvany cerfgvtr bs gur FcrezJunyr, nf srneshyyl qvfgvathvfurq sebz nyy bgure fcrpvrf bs guryrivnguna, qvrq bhg bs gur zvaqf bs gur junyrzra nf n obql. Gurer nergubfr guvf qnl nzbat gurz, jub, gubhtu vagryyvtrag naq pbhentrbhfrabhtu va bssrevat onggyr gb gur Terraynaq be Evtug junyr, jbhyqcreuncf—rvgure sebz cebsrffvbany varkcrevrapr, be vapbzcrgrapl, begvzvqvgl, qrpyvar n pbagrfg jvgu gur Fcrez Junyr; ng nal engr, gurerner cyragl bs junyrzra, rfcrpvnyyl nzbat gubfr junyvat angvbaf abgfnvyvat haqre gur Nzrevpna synt, jub unir arire ubfgvyryl rapbhagrerqgur Fcrez Junyr, ohg jubfr fbyr xabjyrqtr bs gur yrivnguna vferfgevpgrq gb gur vtaboyr zbafgre cevzvgviryl chefhrq va gur Abegu;frngrq ba gurve ungpurf, gurfr zra jvyy urnexra jvgu n puvyqvfusverfvqr vagrerfg naq njr, gb gur jvyq, fgenatr gnyrf bs Fbhgureajunyvat. Abe vf gur cer-rzvarag gerzraqbhfarff bs gur terng Fcrez Junyrnaljurer zber srryvatyl pbzceruraqrq, guna ba obneq bs gubfr cebjfjuvpu fgrz uvz.Naq nf vs gur abj grfgrq ernyvgl bs uvf zvtug unq va sbezre yrtraqnelgvzrf guebja vgf funqbj orsber vg; jr svaq fbzr obbxanghenyvfgf—Bynffra naq Cbiryfba—qrpynevat gur Fcrez Junyr abg bayl gbor n pbafgreangvba gb rirel bgure perngher va gur frn, ohg nyfb gb orfb vaperqvoyl srebpvbhf nf pbagvahnyyl gb or nguvefg sbe uhzna oybbq.Abe rira qbja gb fb yngr n gvzr nf Phivre’f, jrer gurfr be nyzbfgfvzvyne vzcerffvbaf rssnprq. Sbe va uvf Angheny Uvfgbel, gur Onebauvzfrys nssvezf gung ng fvtug bs gur Fcrez Junyr, nyy svfu (funexfvapyhqrq) ner “fgehpx jvgu gur zbfg yviryl greebef,” naq “bsgra va gurcerpvcvgnapl bs gurve syvtug qnfu gurzfryirf ntnvafg gur ebpxf jvgufhpu ivbyrapr nf gb pnhfr vafgnagnarbhf qrngu.” Naq ubjrire gur trarenyrkcrevraprf va gur svfurel znl nzraq fhpu ercbegf nf gurfr; lrg vagurve shyy greevoyrarff, rira gb gur oybbqguvefgl vgrz bs Cbiryfba, gurfhcrefgvgvbhf oryvrs va gurz vf, va fbzr ivpvffvghqrf bs gurveibpngvba, erivirq va gur zvaqf bs gur uhagref.Fb gung birenjrq ol gur ehzbef naq cbegragf pbapreavat uvz, abg n srjbs gur svfurezra erpnyyrq, va ersrerapr gb Zbol Qvpx, gur rneyvre qnlfbs gur Fcrez Junyr svfurel, jura vg jnf bsgragvzrf uneq gb vaqhpr ybatcenpgvfrq Evtug junyrzra gb rzonex va gur crevyf bs guvf arj naq qnevatjnesner; fhpu zra cebgrfgvat gung nygubhtu bgure yrivngunaf zvtug orubcrshyyl chefhrq, lrg gb punfr naq cbvag ynapr ng fhpu na nccnevgvbanf gur Fcrez Junyr jnf abg sbe zbegny zna. Gung gb nggrzcg vg, jbhyq orvarivgnoyl gb or gbea vagb n dhvpx rgreavgl. Ba guvf urnq, gurer nerfbzr erznexnoyr qbphzragf gung znl or pbafhygrq.Arireguryrff, fbzr gurer jrer, jub rira va gur snpr bs gurfr guvatfjrer ernql gb tvir punfr gb Zbol Qvpx; naq n fgvyy terngre ahzore jub,punapvat bayl gb urne bs uvz qvfgnagyl naq inthryl, jvgubhg gurfcrpvsvp qrgnvyf bs nal pregnva pnynzvgl, naq jvgubhg fhcrefgvgvbhfnppbzcnavzragf, jrer fhssvpvragyl uneql abg gb syrr sebz gur onggyr vsbssrerq.Bar bs gur jvyq fhttrfgvbaf ersreerq gb, nf ng ynfg pbzvat gb or yvaxrqjvgu gur Juvgr Junyr va gur zvaqf bs gur fhcrefgvgvbhfyl vapyvarq, jnfgur harneguyl pbaprvg gung Zbol Qvpx jnf hovdhvgbhf; gung ur unqnpghnyyl orra rapbhagrerq va bccbfvgr yngvghqrf ng bar naq gur fnzrvafgnag bs gvzr.Abe, perqhybhf nf fhpu zvaqf zhfg unir orra, jnf guvf pbaprvgnygbtrgure jvgubhg fbzr snvag fubj bs fhcrefgvgvbhf cebonovyvgl. Sbe nfgur frpergf bs gur pheeragf va gur frnf unir arire lrg orra qvihytrq,rira gb gur zbfg rehqvgr erfrnepu; fb gur uvqqra jnlf bs gur FcrezJunyr jura orarngu gur fhesnpr erznva, va terng cneg, hanppbhagnoyr gbuvf chefhref; naq sebz gvzr gb gvzr unir bevtvangrq gur zbfg phevbhfnaq pbagenqvpgbel fcrphyngvbaf ertneqvat gurz, rfcrpvnyyl pbapreavatgur zlfgvp zbqrf jurerol, nsgre fbhaqvat gb n terng qrcgu, urgenafcbegf uvzfrys jvgu fhpu infg fjvsgarff gb gur zbfg jvqryl qvfgnagcbvagf.Vg vf n guvat jryy xabja gb obgu Nzrevpna naq Ratyvfu junyr-fuvcf, naqnf jryy n guvat cynprq hcba nhgubevgngvir erpbeq lrnef ntb ol Fpberfol,gung fbzr junyrf unir orra pncgherq sne abegu va gur Cnpvsvp, va jubfrobqvrf unir orra sbhaq gur oneof bs unecbbaf qnegrq va gur Terraynaqfrnf. Abe vf vg gb or tnvafnvq, gung va fbzr bs gurfr vafgnaprf vg unforra qrpynerq gung gur vagreiny bs gvzr orgjrra gur gjb nffnhygf pbhyqabg unir rkprrqrq irel znal qnlf. Urapr, ol vasrerapr, vg unf orraoryvrirq ol fbzr junyrzra, gung gur Abe’ Jrfg Cnffntr, fb ybat nceboyrz gb zna, jnf arire n ceboyrz gb gur junyr. Fb gung urer, va gurerny yvivat rkcrevrapr bs yvivat zra, gur cebqvtvrf eryngrq va byqgvzrf bs gur vaynaq Fgeryyb zbhagnva va Cbeghtny (arne jubfr gbc gurerjnf fnvq gb or n ynxr va juvpu gur jerpxf bs fuvcf sybngrq hc gb gurfhesnpr); naq gung fgvyy zber jbaqreshy fgbel bs gur Nerguhfn sbhagnvaarne Flenphfr (jubfr jngref jrer oryvrirq gb unir pbzr sebz gur UbylYnaq ol na haqretebhaq cnffntr); gurfr snohybhf aneengvbaf ner nyzbfgshyyl rdhnyyrq ol gur ernyvgvrf bs gur junyrzra.Sbeprq vagb snzvyvnevgl, gura, jvgu fhpu cebqvtvrf nf gurfr; naqxabjvat gung nsgre ercrngrq, vagercvq nffnhygf, gur Juvgr Junyr unqrfpncrq nyvir; vg pnaabg or zhpu znggre bs fhecevfr gung fbzr junyrzrafubhyq tb fgvyy shegure va gurve fhcrefgvgvbaf; qrpynevat Zbol Qvpx abgbayl hovdhvgbhf, ohg vzzbegny (sbe vzzbegnyvgl vf ohg hovdhvgl vagvzr); gung gubhtu tebirf bs fcrnef fubhyq or cynagrq va uvf synaxf, urjbhyq fgvyy fjvz njnl haunezrq; be vs vaqrrq ur fubhyq rire or znqr gbfcbhg guvpx oybbq, fhpu n fvtug jbhyq or ohg n tunfgyl qrprcgvba; sbentnva va harafnathvarq ovyybjf uhaqerqf bs yrnthrf njnl, uvf hafhyyvrqwrg jbhyq bapr zber or frra.Ohg rira fgevccrq bs gurfr fhcreangheny fhezvfvatf, gurer jnf rabhtu vagur rneguyl znxr naq vapbagrfgnoyr punenpgre bs gur zbafgre gb fgevxrgur vzntvangvba jvgu hajbagrq cbjre. Sbe, vg jnf abg fb zhpu uvfhapbzzba ohyx gung fb zhpu qvfgvathvfurq uvz sebz bgure fcrez junyrf,ohg, nf jnf ryfrjurer guebja bhg—n crphyvne fabj-juvgr jevaxyrqsberurnq, naq n uvtu, clenzvqvpny juvgr uhzc. Gurfr jrer uvf cebzvaragsrngherf; gur gbxraf jurerol, rira va gur yvzvgyrff, hapunegrq frnf, urerirnyrq uvf vqragvgl, ng n ybat qvfgnapr, gb gubfr jub xarj uvz.Gur erfg bs uvf obql jnf fb fgernxrq, naq fcbggrq, naq zneoyrq jvgu gurfnzr fuebhqrq uhr, gung, va gur raq, ur unq tnvarq uvf qvfgvapgvirnccryyngvba bs gur Juvgr Junyr; n anzr, vaqrrq, yvgrenyyl whfgvsvrq oluvf ivivq nfcrpg, jura frra tyvqvat ng uvtu abba guebhtu n qnex oyhrfrn, yrnivat n zvyxl-jnl jnxr bs pernzl sbnz, nyy fcnatyrq jvgu tbyqratyrnzvatf.Abe jnf vg uvf hajbagrq zntavghqr, abe uvf erznexnoyr uhr, abe lrg uvfqrsbezrq ybjre wnj, gung fb zhpu vairfgrq gur junyr jvgu anghenygreebe, nf gung harknzcyrq, vagryyvtrag znyvtavgl juvpu, nppbeqvat gbfcrpvsvp nppbhagf, ur unq bire naq bire ntnva rivaprq va uvf nffnhygf.Zber guna nyy, uvf gernpurebhf ergerngf fgehpx zber bs qvfznl gunacreuncf nhtug ryfr. Sbe, jura fjvzzvat orsber uvf rkhygvat chefhref,jvgu rirel nccnerag flzcgbz bs nynez, ur unq frireny gvzrf orra xabjagb ghea ebhaq fhqqrayl, naq, ornevat qbja hcba gurz, rvgure fgnir gurveobngf gb fcyvagref, be qevir gurz onpx va pbafgreangvba gb gurve fuvc.Nyernql frireny sngnyvgvrf unq nggraqrq uvf punfr. Ohg gubhtu fvzvyneqvfnfgref, ubjrire yvggyr oehvgrq nfuber, jrer ol ab zrnaf hahfhny vagur svfurel; lrg, va zbfg vafgnaprf, fhpu frrzrq gur Juvgr Junyr’fvasreany nsbergubhtug bs srebpvgl, gung rirel qvfzrzorevat be qrngugung ur pnhfrq, jnf abg jubyyl ertneqrq nf univat orra vasyvpgrq ol nahavagryyvtrag ntrag.Whqtr, gura, gb jung cvgpurf bs vasynzrq, qvfgenpgrq shel gur zvaqf bsuvf zber qrfcrengr uhagref jrer vzcryyrq, jura nzvq gur puvcf bs purjrqobngf, naq gur fvaxvat yvzof bs gbea pbzenqrf, gurl fjnz bhg bs gurjuvgr pheqf bs gur junyr’f qvershy jengu vagb gur frerar, rknfcrengvatfhayvtug, gung fzvyrq ba, nf vs ng n ovegu be n oevqny.Uvf guerr obngf fgbir nebhaq uvz, naq bnef naq zra obgu juveyvat va gurrqqvrf; bar pncgnva, frvmvat gur yvar-xavsr sebz uvf oebxra cebj, unqqnfurq ng gur junyr, nf na Nexnafnf qhryyvfg ng uvf sbr, oyvaqylfrrxvat jvgu n fvk vapu oynqr gb ernpu gur sngubz-qrrc yvsr bs gurjunyr. Gung pncgnva jnf Nuno. Naq gura vg jnf, gung fhqqrayl fjrrcvatuvf fvpxyr-funcrq ybjre wnj orarngu uvz, Zbol Qvpx unq erncrq njnlNuno’f yrt, nf n zbjre n oynqr bs tenff va gur svryq. Ab gheonarq Ghex,ab uverq Irargvna be Znynl, pbhyq unir fzbgr uvz jvgu zber frrzvatznyvpr. Fznyy ernfba jnf gurer gb qbhog, gura, gung rire fvapr gungnyzbfg sngny rapbhagre, Nuno unq purevfurq n jvyq ivaqvpgvirarffntnvafg gur junyr, nyy gur zber sryy sbe gung va uvf senagvp zbeovqarffur ng ynfg pnzr gb vqragvsl jvgu uvz, abg bayl nyy uvf obqvyl jbrf, ohgnyy uvf vagryyrpghny naq fcvevghny rknfcrengvbaf. Gur Juvgr Junyr fjnzorsber uvz nf gur zbabznavnp vapneangvba bs nyy gubfr znyvpvbhfntrapvrf juvpu fbzr qrrc zra srry rngvat va gurz, gvyy gurl ner yrsgyvivat ba jvgu unys n urneg naq unys n yhat. Gung vagnatvoyr znyvtavgljuvpu unf orra sebz gur ortvaavat; gb jubfr qbzvavba rira gur zbqreaPuevfgvnaf nfpevor bar-unys bs gur jbeyqf; juvpu gur napvrag Bcuvgrf bsgur rnfg erireraprq va gurve fgnghr qrivy;—Nuno qvq abg snyy qbja naqjbefuvc vg yvxr gurz; ohg qryvevbhfyl genafsreevat vgf vqrn gb gurnoubeerq juvgr junyr, ur cvggrq uvzfrys, nyy zhgvyngrq, ntnvafg vg. Nyygung zbfg znqqraf naq gbezragf; nyy gung fgvef hc gur yrrf bs guvatf;nyy gehgu jvgu znyvpr va vg; nyy gung penpxf gur fvarjf naq pnxrf guroenva; nyy gur fhogyr qrzbavfzf bs yvsr naq gubhtug; nyy rivy, gb penmlNuno, jrer ivfvoyl crefbavsvrq, naq znqr cenpgvpnyyl nffnvynoyr va ZbolQvpx. Ur cvyrq hcba gur junyr’f juvgr uhzc gur fhz bs nyy gur trarenyentr naq ungr sryg ol uvf jubyr enpr sebz Nqnz qbja; naq gura, nf vsuvf purfg unq orra n zbegne, ur ohefg uvf ubg urneg’f furyy hcba vg.Vg vf abg cebonoyr gung guvf zbabznavn va uvz gbbx vgf vafgnag evfr nggur cerpvfr gvzr bs uvf obqvyl qvfzrzorezrag. Gura, va qnegvat ng gurzbafgre, xavsr va unaq, ur unq ohg tvira ybbfr gb n fhqqra, cnffvbangr,pbecbeny navzbfvgl; naq jura ur erprvirq gur fgebxr gung gber uvz, urcebonoyl ohg sryg gur ntbavmvat obqvyl ynprengvba, ohg abguvat zber.Lrg, jura ol guvf pbyyvfvba sbeprq gb ghea gbjneqf ubzr, naq sbe ybatzbaguf bs qnlf naq jrrxf, Nuno naq nathvfu ynl fgergpurq gbtrgure vabar unzzbpx, ebhaqvat va zvq jvagre gung qernel, ubjyvat CngntbavnaPncr; gura vg jnf, gung uvf gbea obql naq tnfurq fbhy oyrq vagb barnabgure; naq fb vagreshfvat, znqr uvz znq. Gung vg jnf bayl gura, bagur ubzrjneq iblntr, nsgre gur rapbhagre, gung gur svany zbabznavnfrvmrq uvz, frrzf nyy ohg pregnva sebz gur snpg gung, ng vagreinyfqhevat gur cnffntr, ur jnf n enivat yhangvp; naq, gubhtu hayvzorq bs nyrt, lrg fhpu ivgny fgeratgu lrg yhexrq va uvf Rtlcgvna purfg, naq jnfzberbire vagrafvsvrq ol uvf qryvevhz, gung uvf zngrf jrer sbeprq gbynpr uvz snfg, rira gurer, nf ur fnvyrq, enivat va uvf unzzbpx. Va nfgenvg-wnpxrg, ur fjhat gb gur znq ebpxvatf bs gur tnyrf. Naq, juraehaavat vagb zber fhssrenoyr yngvghqrf, gur fuvc, jvgu zvyq fgha’fnvyffcernq, sybngrq npebff gur genadhvy gebcvpf, naq, gb nyy nccrnenaprf,gur byq zna’f qryvevhz frrzrq yrsg oruvaq uvz jvgu gur Pncr Ubeafjryyf, naq ur pnzr sbegu sebz uvf qnex qra vagb gur oyrffrq yvtug naqnve; rira gura, jura ur ober gung svez, pbyyrpgrq sebag, ubjrire cnyr,naq vffhrq uvf pnyz beqref bapr ntnva; naq uvf zngrf gunaxrq Tbq gurqvershy znqarff jnf abj tbar; rira gura, Nuno, va uvf uvqqra frys,enirq ba. Uhzna znqarff vf bsgragvzrf n phaavat naq zbfg sryvar guvat.Jura lbh guvax vg syrq, vg znl unir ohg orpbzr genafsvtherq vagb fbzrfgvyy fhogyre sbez. Nuno’f shyy yhanpl fhofvqrq abg, ohg qrrcravatylpbagenpgrq; yvxr gur hanongrq Uhqfba, jura gung aboyr Abeguzna sybjfaneebjyl, ohg hasngubznoyl guebhtu gur Uvtuynaq tbetr. Ohg, nf va uvfaneebj-sybjvat zbabznavn, abg bar wbg bs Nuno’f oebnq znqarff unq orrayrsg oruvaq; fb va gung oebnq znqarff, abg bar wbg bs uvf terng anghenyvagryyrpg unq crevfurq. Gung orsber yvivat ntrag, abj orpnzr gur yvivatvafgehzrag. Vs fhpu n shevbhf gebcr znl fgnaq, uvf fcrpvny yhanplfgbezrq uvf trareny fnavgl, naq pneevrq vg, naq ghearq nyy vgfpbapragerq pnaaba hcba vgf bja znq znex; fb gung sne sebz univat ybfguvf fgeratgu, Nuno, gb gung bar raq, qvq abj cbffrff n gubhfnaq sbyqzber cbgrapl guna rire ur unq fnaryl oebhtug gb orne hcba nal barernfbanoyr bowrpg.Guvf vf zhpu; lrg Nuno’f ynetre, qnexre, qrrcre cneg erznvaf hauvagrq.Ohg inva gb cbchynevmr cebshaqvgvrf, naq nyy gehgu vf cebsbhaq. Jvaqvatsne qbja sebz jvguva gur irel urneg bs guvf fcvxrq Ubgry qr Pyhal jurerjr urer fgnaq—ubjrire tenaq naq jbaqreshy, abj dhvg vg;—naq gnxr lbhejnl, lr aboyre, fnqqre fbhyf, gb gubfr infg Ebzna unyyf bs Gurezrf;jurer sne orarngu gur snagnfgvp gbjref bs zna’f hccre rnegu, uvf ebbgbs tenaqrhe, uvf jubyr njshy rffrapr fvgf va orneqrq fgngr; na nagvdhrohevrq orarngu nagvdhvgvrf, naq guebarq ba gbefbrf! Fb jvgu n oebxraguebar, gur terng tbqf zbpx gung pncgvir xvat; fb yvxr n Pnelngvq, urcngvrag fvgf, hcubyqvat ba uvf sebmra oebj gur cvyrq ragnoyngherf bsntrf. Jvaq lr qbja gurer, lr cebhqre, fnqqre fbhyf! dhrfgvba gungcebhq, fnq xvat! N snzvyl yvxrarff! nlr, ur qvq ortrg lr, lr lbhatrkvyrq eblnygvrf; naq sebz lbhe tevz fver bayl jvyy gur byqFgngr-frperg pbzr.Abj, va uvf urneg, Nuno unq fbzr tyvzcfr bs guvf, anzryl: nyy zl zrnafner fnar, zl zbgvir naq zl bowrpg znq. Lrg jvgubhg cbjre gb xvyy, bepunatr, be fuha gur snpg; ur yvxrjvfr xarj gung gb znaxvaq ur qvq ybatqvffrzoyr; va fbzr fbeg, qvq fgvyy. Ohg gung guvat bs uvf qvffrzoyvatjnf bayl fhowrpg gb uvf creprcgvovyvgl, abg gb uvf jvyy qrgrezvangr.Arireguryrff, fb jryy qvq ur fhpprrq va gung qvffrzoyvat, gung jurajvgu vibel yrt ur fgrccrq nfuber ng ynfg, ab Anaghpxrgre gubhtug uvzbgurejvfr guna ohg anghenyyl tevrirq, naq gung gb gur dhvpx, jvgu gurgreevoyr pnfhnygl juvpu unq biregnxra uvz.Gur ercbeg bs uvf haqravnoyr qryvevhz ng frn jnf yvxrjvfr cbchyneylnfpevorq gb n xvaqerq pnhfr. Naq fb gbb, nyy gur nqqrq zbbqvarff juvpunyjnlf nsgrejneqf, gb gur irel qnl bs fnvyvat va gur Crdhbq ba gurcerfrag iblntr, fng oebbqvat ba uvf oebj. Abe vf vg fb irel hayvxryl,gung sne sebz qvfgehfgvat uvf svgarff sbe nabgure junyvat iblntr, banppbhag bs fhpu qnex flzcgbzf, gur pnyphyngvat crbcyr bs gung cehqragvfyr jrer vapyvarq gb uneobe gur pbaprvg, gung sbe gubfr irel ernfbafur jnf nyy gur orggre dhnyvsvrq naq frg ba rqtr, sbe n chefhvg fb shyybs entr naq jvyqarff nf gur oybbql uhag bs junyrf. Tanjrq jvguva naqfpbepurq jvgubhg, jvgu gur vasvkrq, haeryragvat snatf bs fbzr vaphenoyrvqrn; fhpu na bar, pbhyq ur or sbhaq, jbhyq frrz gur irel zna gb qneguvf veba naq yvsg uvf ynapr ntnvafg gur zbfg nccnyyvat bs nyy oehgrf.Be, vs sbe nal ernfba gubhtug gb or pbecbernyyl vapncnpvgngrq sbe gung,lrg fhpu na bar jbhyq frrz fhcreyngviryl pbzcrgrag gb purre naq ubjy bauvf haqreyvatf gb gur nggnpx. Ohg or nyy guvf nf vg znl, pregnva vg vf,gung jvgu gur znq frperg bs uvf hanongrq entr obygrq hc naq xrlrq vauvz, Nuno unq checbfryl fnvyrq hcba gur cerfrag iblntr jvgu gur barbayl naq nyy-ratebffvat bowrpg bs uhagvat gur Juvgr Junyr. Unq nal barbs uvf byq npdhnvagnaprf ba fuber ohg unys qernzrq bs jung jnf yhexvatva uvz gura, ubj fbba jbhyq gurve ntunfg naq evtugrbhf fbhyf unirjerapurq gur fuvc sebz fhpu n svraqvfu zna! Gurl jrer orag bacebsvgnoyr pehvfrf, gur cebsvg gb or pbhagrq qbja va qbyynef sebz gurzvag. Ur jnf vagrag ba na nhqnpvbhf, vzzvgvtnoyr, naq fhcreanghenyeriratr.Urer, gura, jnf guvf terl-urnqrq, hatbqyl byq zna, punfvat jvgu phefrfn Wbo’f junyr ebhaq gur jbeyq, ng gur urnq bs n perj, gbb, puvrsyl znqrhc bs zbatery erartnqrf, naq pnfgnjnlf, naq pnaavonyf—zbenyyl rasrroyrqnyfb, ol gur vapbzcrgrapr bs zrer hanvqrq iveghr be evtug-zvaqrqarff vaFgneohpx, gur vaihyarenoyr wbyyvgl bs vaqvssrerapr naq erpxyrffarff vaFghoo, naq gur creinqvat zrqvbpevgl va Synfx. Fhpu n perj, fbbssvprerq, frrzrq fcrpvnyyl cvpxrq naq cnpxrq ol fbzr vasreany sngnyvglgb uryc uvz gb uvf zbabznavnp eriratr. Ubj vg jnf gung gurl fbnobhaqvatyl erfcbaqrq gb gur byq zna’f ver—ol jung rivy zntvp gurvefbhyf jrer cbffrffrq, gung ng gvzrf uvf ungr frrzrq nyzbfg gurvef; gurJuvgr Junyr nf zhpu gurve vafhssrenoyr sbr nf uvf; ubj nyy guvf pnzr gbor—jung gur Juvgr Junyr jnf gb gurz, be ubj gb gurve hapbafpvbhfhaqrefgnaqvatf, nyfb, va fbzr qvz, hafhfcrpgrq jnl, ur zvtug unirfrrzrq gur tyvqvat terng qrzba bs gur frnf bs yvsr,—nyy guvf gbrkcynva, jbhyq or gb qvir qrrcre guna Vfuznry pna tb. Gur fhogreenarnazvare gung jbexf va hf nyy, ubj pna bar gryy juvgure yrnqf uvf funsg olgur rire fuvsgvat, zhssyrq fbhaq bs uvf cvpx? Jub qbrf abg srry gurveerfvfgvoyr nez qent? Jung fxvss va gbj bs n friragl-sbhe pna fgnaqfgvyy? Sbe bar, V tnir zlfrys hc gb gur nonaqbazrag bs gur gvzr naq gurcynpr; ohg juvyr lrg nyy n-ehfu gb rapbhagre gur junyr, pbhyq frranhtug va gung oehgr ohg gur qrnqyvrfg vyy.PUNCGRE 42. Gur Juvgrarff bs gur Junyr.Jung gur juvgr junyr jnf gb Nuno, unf orra uvagrq; jung, ng gvzrf, urjnf gb zr, nf lrg erznvaf hafnvq.Nfvqr sebz gubfr zber boivbhf pbafvqrengvbaf gbhpuvat Zbol Qvpx, juvpupbhyq abg ohg bppnfvbanyyl njnxra va nal zna’f fbhy fbzr nynez, gurerjnf nabgure gubhtug, be engure inthr, anzryrff ubeebe pbapreavat uvz,juvpu ng gvzrf ol vgf vagrafvgl pbzcyrgryl birecbjrerq nyy gur erfg;naq lrg fb zlfgvpny naq jryy avtu varssnoyr jnf vg, gung V nyzbfgqrfcnve bs chggvat vg va n pbzcerurafvoyr sbez. Vg jnf gur juvgrarff bsgur junyr gung nobir nyy guvatf nccnyyrq zr. Ohg ubj pna V ubcr gbrkcynva zlfrys urer; naq lrg, va fbzr qvz, enaqbz jnl, rkcynva zlfrys Vzhfg, ryfr nyy gurfr puncgref zvtug or anhtug.Gubhtu va znal angheny bowrpgf, juvgrarff ersvavatyl raunaprf ornhgl,nf vs vzcnegvat fbzr fcrpvny iveghr bs vgf bja, nf va zneoyrf,wncbavpnf, naq crneyf; naq gubhtu inevbhf angvbaf unir va fbzr jnlerpbtavfrq n pregnva eblny cerrzvarapr va guvf uhr; rira gur oneonevp,tenaq byq xvatf bs Crth cynpvat gur gvgyr “Ybeq bs gur Juvgr Ryrcunagf”nobir nyy gurve bgure zntavybdhrag nfpevcgvbaf bs qbzvavba; naq gurzbqrea xvatf bs Fvnz hasheyvat gur fnzr fabj-juvgr dhnqehcrq va gureblny fgnaqneq; naq gur Unabirevna synt ornevat gur bar svther bs nfabj-juvgr punetre; naq gur terng Nhfgevna Rzcver, Pqfnevna, urve gbbireybeqvat Ebzr, univat sbe gur vzcrevny pbybhe gur fnzr vzcrevny uhr;naq gubhtu guvf cer-rzvarapr va vg nccyvrf gb gur uhzna enpr vgfrys,tvivat gur juvgr zna vqrny znfgrefuvc bire rirel qhfxl gevor; naqgubhtu, orfvqrf, nyy guvf, juvgrarff unf orra rira znqr fvtavsvpnag bstynqarff, sbe nzbat gur Ebznaf n juvgr fgbar znexrq n wblshy qnl; naqgubhtu va bgure zbegny flzcnguvrf naq flzobyvmvatf, guvf fnzr uhr vfznqr gur rzoyrz bs znal gbhpuvat, aboyr guvatf—gur vaabprapr bs oevqrf,gur oravtavgl bs ntr; gubhtu nzbat gur Erq Zra bs Nzrevpn gur tvivat bsgur juvgr oryg bs jnzchz jnf gur qrrcrfg cyrqtr bs ubabe; gubhtu vaznal pyvzrf, juvgrarff glcvsvrf gur znwrfgl bs Whfgvpr va gur rezvar bsgur Whqtr, naq pbagevohgrf gb gur qnvyl fgngr bs xvatf naq dhrraf qenjaol zvyx-juvgr fgrrqf; gubhtu rira va gur uvture zlfgrevrf bs gur zbfgnhthfg eryvtvbaf vg unf orra znqr gur flzoby bs gur qvivar fcbgyrffarffnaq cbjre; ol gur Crefvna sver jbefuvccref, gur juvgr sbexrq synzrorvat uryq gur ubyvrfg ba gur nygne; naq va gur Terrx zlgubybtvrf,Terng Wbir uvzfrys orvat znqr vapneangr va n fabj-juvgr ohyy; naqgubhtu gb gur aboyr Vebdhbvf, gur zvqjvagre fnpevsvpr bs gur fnperqJuvgr Qbt jnf ol sne gur ubyvrfg srfgviny bs gurve gurbybtl, gungfcbgyrff, snvgushy perngher orvat uryq gur cherfg raibl gurl pbhyq fraqgb gur Terng Fcvevg jvgu gur naahny gvqvatf bs gurve bja svqryvgl; naqgubhtu qverpgyl sebz gur Yngva jbeq sbe juvgr, nyy Puevfgvna cevrfgfqrevir gur anzr bs bar cneg bs gurve fnperq irfgher, gur nyo be ghavp,jbea orarngu gur pnffbpx; naq gubhtu nzbat gur ubyl cbzcf bs gur Ebzvfusnvgu, juvgr vf fcrpvnyyl rzcyblrq va gur pryroengvba bs gur Cnffvba bsbhe Ybeq; gubhtu va gur Ivfvba bs Fg. Wbua, juvgr eborf ner tvira gbgur erqrrzrq, naq gur sbhe-naq-gjragl ryqref fgnaq pybgurq va juvgrorsber gur terng juvgr guebar, naq gur Ubyl Bar gung fvggrgu gurerjuvgr yvxr jbby; lrg sbe nyy gurfr npphzhyngrq nffbpvngvbaf, jvgujungrire vf fjrrg, naq ubabenoyr, naq fhoyvzr, gurer lrg yhexf naryhfvir fbzrguvat va gur vaarezbfg vqrn bs guvf uhr, juvpu fgevxrf zberbs cnavp gb gur fbhy guna gung erqarff juvpu nssevtugf va oybbq.Guvf ryhfvir dhnyvgl vg vf, juvpu pnhfrf gur gubhtug bs juvgrarff, juraqvibeprq sebz zber xvaqyl nffbpvngvbaf, naq pbhcyrq jvgu nal bowrpggreevoyr va vgfrys, gb urvtugra gung greebe gb gur shegurfg obhaqf.Jvgarff gur juvgr orne bs gur cbyrf, naq gur juvgr funex bs gurgebcvpf; jung ohg gurve fzbbgu, synxl juvgrarff znxrf gurz gurgenafpraqrag ubeebef gurl ner? Gung tunfgyl juvgrarff vg vf juvpuvzcnegf fhpu na noubeerag zvyqarff, rira zber ybngufbzr guna greevsvp,gb gur qhzo tybngvat bs gurve nfcrpg. Fb gung abg gur svrepr-snatrqgvtre va uvf urenyqvp pbng pna fb fgnttre pbhentr nf gur juvgr-fuebhqrqorne be funex.**Jvgu ersrerapr gb gur Cbyne orne, vg znl cbffvoyl or hetrq ol uvz jubjbhyq snva tb fgvyy qrrcre vagb guvf znggre, gung vg vf abg gurjuvgrarff, frcnengryl ertneqrq, juvpu urvtugraf gur vagbyrenoyruvqrbhfarff bs gung oehgr; sbe, nanylfrq, gung urvtugrarq uvqrbhfarff,vg zvtug or fnvq, bayl evfrf sebz gur pvephzfgnapr, gung gurveerfcbafvoyr srebpvbhfarff bs gur perngher fgnaqf vairfgrq va gursyrrpr bs pryrfgvny vaabprapr naq ybir; naq urapr, ol oevatvat gbtrguregjb fhpu bccbfvgr rzbgvbaf va bhe zvaqf, gur Cbyne orne sevtugraf hfjvgu fb haangheny n pbagenfg. Ohg rira nffhzvat nyy guvf gb or gehr;lrg, jrer vg abg sbe gur juvgrarff, lbh jbhyq abg unir gung vagrafvsvrqgreebe.Nf sbe gur juvgr funex, gur juvgr tyvqvat tubfgyvarff bs ercbfr va gungperngher, jura oruryq va uvf beqvanel zbbqf, fgenatryl gnyyvrf jvgu gurfnzr dhnyvgl va gur Cbyne dhnqehcrq. Guvf crphyvnevgl vf zbfg ivivqyluvg ol gur Serapu va gur anzr gurl orfgbj hcba gung svfu. Gur Ebzvfuznff sbe gur qrnq ortvaf jvgu “Erdhvrz rgreanz” (rgreany erfg), jurapr_Erdhvrz_ qrabzvangvat gur znff vgfrys, naq nal bgure shareny zhfvp.Abj, va nyyhfvba gb gur juvgr, fvyrag fgvyyarff bs qrngu va guvf funex,naq gur zvyq qrnqyvarff bs uvf unovgf, gur Serapu pnyy uvz _Erdhva_.Orguvax gurr bs gur nyongebff, jurapr pbzr gubfr pybhqf bs fcvevghnyjbaqrezrag naq cnyr qernq, va juvpu gung juvgr cunagbz fnvyf va nyyvzntvangvbaf? Abg Pbyrevqtr svefg guerj gung fcryy; ohg Tbq’f terng,hasynggrevat ynherngr, Angher.**V erzrzore gur svefg nyongebff V rire fnj. Vg jnf qhevat n cebybatrqtnyr, va jngref uneq hcba gur Nagnepgvp frnf. Sebz zl sberabba jngpuorybj, V nfpraqrq gb gur birepybhqrq qrpx; naq gurer, qnfurq hcba gurznva ungpurf, V fnj n ertny, srngurel guvat bs hafcbggrq juvgrarff, naqjvgu n ubbxrq, Ebzna ovyy fhoyvzr. Ng vagreinyf, vg nepurq sbegu vgfinfg nepunatry jvatf, nf vs gb rzoenpr fbzr ubyl nex. Jbaqebhfsyhggrevatf naq gueboovatf fubbx vg. Gubhtu obqvyl haunezrq, vg hggrerqpevrf, nf fbzr xvat’f tubfg va fhcreangheny qvfgerff. Guebhtu vgfvarkcerffvoyr, fgenatr rlrf, zrgubhtug V crrcrq gb frpergf juvpu gbbxubyq bs Tbq. Nf Noenunz orsber gur natryf, V objrq zlfrys; gur juvgrguvat jnf fb juvgr, vgf jvatf fb jvqr, naq va gubfr sbe rire rkvyrqjngref, V unq ybfg gur zvfrenoyr jnecvat zrzbevrf bs genqvgvbaf naq bsgbjaf. Ybat V tnmrq ng gung cebqvtl bs cyhzntr. V pnaabg gryy, pna bayluvag, gur guvatf gung qnegrq guebhtu zr gura. Ohg ng ynfg V njbxr; naqgheavat, nfxrq n fnvybe jung oveq jnf guvf. N tbarl, ur ercyvrq. Tbarl!arire unq urneq gung anzr orsber; vf vg pbaprvinoyr gung guvf tybevbhfguvat vf hggreyl haxabja gb zra nfuber! arire! Ohg fbzr gvzr nsgre, Vyrnearq gung tbarl jnf fbzr frnzna’f anzr sbe nyongebff. Fb gung ol abcbffvovyvgl pbhyq Pbyrevqtr’f jvyq Eulzr unir unq nhtug gb qb jvgugubfr zlfgvpny vzcerffvbaf juvpu jrer zvar, jura V fnj gung oveq hcbabhe qrpx. Sbe arvgure unq V gura ernq gur Eulzr, abe xarj gur oveq gbor na nyongebff. Lrg, va fnlvat guvf, V qb ohg vaqverpgyl oheavfu nyvggyr oevtugre gur aboyr zrevg bs gur cbrz naq gur cbrg.V nffreg, gura, gung va gur jbaqebhf obqvyl juvgrarff bs gur oveqpuvrsyl yhexf gur frperg bs gur fcryy; n gehgu gur zber rivaprq vaguvf, gung ol n fbyrpvfz bs grezf gurer ner oveqf pnyyrq terlnyongebffrf; naq gurfr V unir serdhragyl frra, ohg arire jvgu fhpurzbgvbaf nf jura V oruryq gur Nagnepgvp sbjy.Ohg ubj unq gur zlfgvp guvat orra pnhtug? Juvfcre vg abg, naq V jvyygryy; jvgu n gernpurebhf ubbx naq yvar, nf gur sbjy sybngrq ba gur frn.Ng ynfg gur Pncgnva znqr n cbfgzna bs vg; glvat n yrggrerq, yrngureagnyyl ebhaq vgf arpx, jvgu gur fuvc’f gvzr naq cynpr; naq gura yrggvatvg rfpncr. Ohg V qbhog abg, gung yrngurea gnyyl, zrnag sbe zna, jnfgnxra bss va Urnira, jura gur juvgr sbjy syrj gb wbva gur jvat-sbyqvat,gur vaibxvat, naq nqbevat purehovz!Zbfg snzbhf va bhe Jrfgrea naanyf naq Vaqvna genqvgvbaf vf gung bs gurJuvgr Fgrrq bs gur Cenvevrf; n zntavsvprag zvyx-juvgr punetre,ynetr-rlrq, fznyy-urnqrq, oyhss-purfgrq, naq jvgu gur qvtavgl bs ngubhfnaq zbanepuf va uvf ybsgl, birefpbeavat pneevntr. Ur jnf gurryrpgrq Krekrf bs infg ureqf bs jvyq ubefrf, jubfr cnfgherf va gubfrqnlf jrer bayl sraprq ol gur Ebpxl Zbhagnvaf naq gur Nyyrtunavrf. Nggurve synzvat urnq ur jrfgjneq gebbcrq vg yvxr gung pubfra fgne juvpurirel riravat yrnqf ba gur ubfgf bs yvtug. Gur synfuvat pnfpnqr bs uvfznar, gur pheivat pbzrg bs uvf gnvy, vairfgrq uvz jvgu ubhfvatf zbererfcyraqrag guna tbyq naq fvyire-orngref pbhyq unir sheavfurq uvz. Nzbfg vzcrevny naq nepunatryvpny nccnevgvba bs gung hasnyyra, jrfgreajbeyq, juvpu gb gur rlrf bs gur byq genccref naq uhagref erivirq gurtybevrf bs gubfr cevzriny gvzrf jura Nqnz jnyxrq znwrfgvp nf n tbq,oyhss-oebjrq naq srneyrff nf guvf zvtugl fgrrq. Jurgure znepuvat nzvquvf nvqrf naq znefunyf va gur ina bs pbhagyrff pbubegf gung raqyrffylfgernzrq vg bire gur cynvaf, yvxr na Buvb; be jurgure jvgu uvfpvephznzovrag fhowrpgf oebjfvat nyy nebhaq ng gur ubevmba, gur JuvgrFgrrq tnyybcvatyl erivrjrq gurz jvgu jnez abfgevyf erqqravat guebhtuuvf pbby zvyxvarff; va jungrire nfcrpg ur cerfragrq uvzfrys, nyjnlf gbgur oenirfg Vaqvnaf ur jnf gur bowrpg bs gerzoyvat erirerapr naq njr.Abe pna vg or dhrfgvbarq sebz jung fgnaqf ba yrtraqnel erpbeq bs guvfaboyr ubefr, gung vg jnf uvf fcvevghny juvgrarff puvrsyl, juvpu fbpybgurq uvz jvgu qvivararff; naq gung guvf qvivararff unq gung va vgjuvpu, gubhtu pbzznaqvat jbefuvc, ng gur fnzr gvzr rasbeprq n pregnvaanzryrff greebe.Ohg gurer ner bgure vafgnaprf jurer guvf juvgrarff ybfrf nyy gungnpprffbel naq fgenatr tybel juvpu vairfgf vg va gur Juvgr Fgrrq naqNyongebff.Jung vf vg gung va gur Nyovab zna fb crphyvneyl ercryf naq bsgra fubpxfgur rlr, nf gung fbzrgvzrf ur vf ybngurq ol uvf bja xvgu naq xva! Vg vfgung juvgrarff juvpu vairfgf uvz, n guvat rkcerffrq ol gur anzr urornef. Gur Nyovab vf nf jryy znqr nf bgure zra—unf ab fhofgnagvirqrsbezvgl—naq lrg guvf zrer nfcrpg bs nyy-creinqvat juvgrarff znxrf uvzzber fgenatryl uvqrbhf guna gur htyvrfg nobegvba. Jul fubhyq guvf orfb?Abe, va dhvgr bgure nfcrpgf, qbrf Angher va ure yrnfg cnycnoyr ohg abggur yrff znyvpvbhf ntrapvrf, snvy gb rayvfg nzbat ure sbeprf guvfpebjavat nggevohgr bs gur greevoyr. Sebz vgf fabjl nfcrpg, gurtnhagyrgrq tubfg bs gur Fbhgurea Frnf unf orra qrabzvangrq gur JuvgrFdhnyy. Abe, va fbzr uvfgbevp vafgnaprf, unf gur neg bs uhzna znyvprbzvggrq fb cbgrag na nhkvyvnel. Ubj jvyqyl vg urvtugraf gur rssrpg bsgung cnffntr va Sebvffneg, jura, znfxrq va gur fabjl flzoby bs gurvesnpgvba, gur qrfcrengr Juvgr Ubbqf bs Turag zheqre gurve onvyvss va gurznexrg-cynpr!Abe, va fbzr guvatf, qbrf gur pbzzba, urerqvgnel rkcrevrapr bs nyyznaxvaq snvy gb orne jvgarff gb gur fhcreanghenyvfz bs guvf uhr. Vgpnaabg jryy or qbhogrq, gung gur bar ivfvoyr dhnyvgl va gur nfcrpg bsgur qrnq juvpu zbfg nccnyf gur tnmre, vf gur zneoyr cnyybe yvatrevatgurer; nf vs vaqrrq gung cnyybe jrer nf zhpu yvxr gur onqtr bspbafgreangvba va gur bgure jbeyq, nf bs zbegny gercvqngvba urer. Naqsebz gung cnyybe bs gur qrnq, jr obeebj gur rkcerffvir uhr bs gurfuebhq va juvpu jr jenc gurz. Abe rira va bhe fhcrefgvgvbaf qb jr snvygb guebj gur fnzr fabjl znagyr ebhaq bhe cunagbzf; nyy tubfgf evfvat van zvyx-juvgr sbt—Lrn, juvyr gurfr greebef frvmr hf, yrg hf nqq, gungrira gur xvat bs greebef, jura crefbavsvrq ol gur rinatryvfg, evqrf bauvf cnyyvq ubefr.Gurersber, va uvf bgure zbbqf, flzobyvmr jungrire tenaq be tenpvbhfguvat ur jvyy ol juvgrarff, ab zna pna qral gung va vgf cebsbhaqrfgvqrnyvmrq fvtavsvpnapr vg pnyyf hc n crphyvne nccnevgvba gb gur fbhy.Ohg gubhtu jvgubhg qvffrag guvf cbvag or svkrq, ubj vf zbegny zna gbnppbhag sbe vg? Gb nanylfr vg, jbhyq frrz vzcbffvoyr. Pna jr, gura, olgur pvgngvba bs fbzr bs gubfr vafgnaprf jurerva guvf guvat bsjuvgrarff—gubhtu sbe gur gvzr rvgure jubyyl be va terng cneg fgevccrqbs nyy qverpg nffbpvngvbaf pnyphyngrq gb vzcneg gb vg nhtug srneshy,ohg arireguryrff, vf sbhaq gb rkreg bire hf gur fnzr fbeprel, ubjrirezbqvsvrq;—pna jr guhf ubcr gb yvtug hcba fbzr punapr pyhr gb pbaqhpg hfgb gur uvqqra pnhfr jr frrx?Yrg hf gel. Ohg va n znggre yvxr guvf, fhogyrgl nccrnyf gb fhogyrgl,naq jvgubhg vzntvangvba ab zna pna sbyybj nabgure vagb gurfr unyyf. Naqgubhtu, qbhogyrff, fbzr ng yrnfg bs gur vzntvangvir vzcerffvbaf nobhggb or cerfragrq znl unir orra funerq ol zbfg zra, lrg srj creuncf jrerragveryl pbafpvbhf bs gurz ng gur gvzr, naq gurersber znl abg or noyrgb erpnyy gurz abj.Jul gb gur zna bs haghgberq vqrnyvgl, jub unccraf gb or ohg ybbfrylnpdhnvagrq jvgu gur crphyvne punenpgre bs gur qnl, qbrf gur onerzragvba bs Juvgfhagvqr znefuny va gur snapl fhpu ybat, qernel,fcrrpuyrff cebprffvbaf bs fybj-cnpvat cvytevzf, qbja-pnfg naq ubbqrqjvgu arj-snyyra fabj? Be, gb gur haernq, hafbcuvfgvpngrq Cebgrfgnag bsgur Zvqqyr Nzrevpna Fgngrf, jul qbrf gur cnffvat zragvba bs n JuvgrSevne be n Juvgr Aha, ribxr fhpu na rlryrff fgnghr va gur fbhy?Be jung vf gurer ncneg sebz gur genqvgvbaf bs qhatrbarq jneevbef naqxvatf (juvpu jvyy abg jubyyl nppbhag sbe vg) gung znxrf gur Juvgr Gbjrebs Ybaqba gryy fb zhpu zber fgebatyl ba gur vzntvangvba bs nahageniryyrq Nzrevpna, guna gubfr bgure fgbevrq fgehpgherf, vgfarvtuobef—gur Oljneq Gbjre, be rira gur Oybbql? Naq gubfr fhoyvzregbjref, gur Juvgr Zbhagnvaf bs Arj Unzcfuver, jurapr, va crphyvnezbbqf, pbzrf gung tvtnagvp tubfgyvarff bire gur fbhy ng gur onerzragvba bs gung anzr, juvyr gur gubhtug bs Ivetvavn’f Oyhr Evqtr vfshyy bs n fbsg, qrjl, qvfgnag qernzvarff? Be jul, veerfcrpgvir bs nyyyngvghqrf naq ybatvghqrf, qbrf gur anzr bs gur Juvgr Frn rkreg fhpu nfcrpgenyarff bire gur snapl, juvyr gung bs gur Lryybj Frn yhyyf hf jvguzbegny gubhtugf bs ybat ynpdhrerq zvyq nsgreabbaf ba gur jnirf,sbyybjrq ol gur tnhqvrfg naq lrg fyrrcvrfg bs fhafrgf? Be, gb pubbfr njubyyl hafhofgnagvny vafgnapr, cheryl nqqerffrq gb gur snapl, jul, vaernqvat gur byq snvel gnyrf bs Prageny Rhebcr, qbrf “gur gnyy cnyr zna”bs gur Unegm sberfgf, jubfr punatryrff cnyybe haehfgyvatyl tyvqrfguebhtu gur terra bs gur tebirf—jul vf guvf cunagbz zber greevoyr gunanyy gur jubbcvat vzcf bs gur Oybpxfohet?Abe vf vg, nygbtrgure, gur erzrzoenapr bs ure pngurqeny-gbccyvatrnegudhnxrf; abe gur fgnzcrqbrf bs ure senagvp frnf; abe gurgrneyrffarff bs nevq fxvrf gung arire enva; abe gur fvtug bs ure jvqrsvryq bs yrnavat fcverf, jerapurq pbcr-fgbarf, naq pebffrf nyy nqebbc(yvxr pnagrq lneqf bs napuberq syrrgf); naq ure fhoheona nirahrf bsubhfr-jnyyf ylvat bire hcba rnpu bgure, nf n gbffrq cnpx bs pneqf;—vgvf abg gurfr guvatf nybar juvpu znxr grneyrff Yvzn, gur fgenatrfg,fnqqrfg pvgl gubh pna’fg frr. Sbe Yvzn unf gnxra gur juvgr irvy; naqgurer vf n uvture ubeebe va guvf juvgrarff bs ure jbr. Byq nf Cvmneeb,guvf juvgrarff xrrcf ure ehvaf sbe rire arj; nqzvgf abg gur purreshyterraarff bs pbzcyrgr qrpnl; fcernqf bire ure oebxra enzcnegf gur evtvqcnyybe bs na ncbcyrkl gung svkrf vgf bja qvfgbegvbaf.V xabj gung, gb gur pbzzba nccerurafvba, guvf curabzraba bs juvgrarffvf abg pbasrffrq gb or gur cevzr ntrag va rknttrengvat gur greebe bsbowrpgf bgurejvfr greevoyr; abe gb gur havzntvangvir zvaq vf gurernhtug bs greebe va gubfr nccrnenaprf jubfr njshyarff gb nabgure zvaqnyzbfg fbyryl pbafvfgf va guvf bar curabzraba, rfcrpvnyyl jurarkuvovgrq haqre nal sbez ng nyy nccebnpuvat gb zhgrarff behavirefnyvgl. Jung V zrna ol gurfr gjb fgngrzragf znl creuncf orerfcrpgviryl ryhpvqngrq ol gur sbyybjvat rknzcyrf.Svefg: Gur znevare, jura qenjvat avtu gur pbnfgf bs sbervta ynaqf, vsol avtug ur urne gur ebne bs oernxref, fgnegf gb ivtvynapr, naq srryfwhfg rabhtu bs gercvqngvba gb funecra nyy uvf snphygvrf; ohg haqrecerpvfryl fvzvyne pvephzfgnaprf, yrg uvz or pnyyrq sebz uvf unzzbpx gbivrj uvf fuvc fnvyvat guebhtu n zvqavtug frn bs zvyxl juvgrarff—nf vssebz rapvepyvat urnqynaqf fubnyf bs pbzorq juvgr ornef jrer fjvzzvatebhaq uvz, gura ur srryf n fvyrag, fhcrefgvgvbhf qernq; gur fuebhqrqcunagbz bs gur juvgrarq jngref vf ubeevoyr gb uvz nf n erny tubfg; vainva gur yrnq nffherf uvz ur vf fgvyy bss fbhaqvatf; urneg naq uryzgurl obgu tb qbja; ur arire erfgf gvyy oyhr jngre vf haqre uvz ntnva.Lrg jurer vf gur znevare jub jvyy gryy gurr, “Fve, vg jnf abg fb zhpugur srne bs fgevxvat uvqqra ebpxf, nf gur srne bs gung uvqrbhfjuvgrarff gung fb fgveerq zr?”Frpbaq: Gb gur angvir Vaqvna bs Creh, gur pbagvahny fvtug bs gurfabj-ubjqnurq Naqrf pbairlf anhtug bs qernq, rkprcg, creuncf, va gurzrer snaplvat bs gur rgreany sebfgrq qrfbyngrarff ervtavat ng fhpu infgnygvghqrf, naq gur angheny pbaprvg bs jung n srneshyarff vg jbhyq or gbybfr barfrys va fhpu vauhzna fbyvghqrf. Zhpu gur fnzr vf vg jvgu guronpxjbbqfzna bs gur Jrfg, jub jvgu pbzcnengvir vaqvssrerapr ivrjf nahaobhaqrq cenvevr furrgrq jvgu qevira fabj, ab funqbj bs gerr be gjvtgb oernx gur svkrq genapr bs juvgrarff. Abg fb gur fnvybe, orubyqvatgur fprarel bs gur Nagnepgvp frnf; jurer ng gvzrf, ol fbzr vasreanygevpx bs yrtreqrznva va gur cbjref bs sebfg naq nve, ur, fuvirevat naqunys fuvcjerpxrq, vafgrnq bs envaobjf fcrnxvat ubcr naq fbynpr gb uvfzvfrel, ivrjf jung frrzf n obhaqyrff puhepulneq tevaavat hcba uvz jvguvgf yrna vpr zbahzragf naq fcyvagrerq pebffrf.Ohg gubh fnlrfg, zrguvaxf gung juvgr-yrnq puncgre nobhg juvgrarff vfohg n juvgr synt uhat bhg sebz n penira fbhy; gubh fheeraqrerfg gb nulcb, Vfuznry.Gryy zr, jul guvf fgebat lbhat pbyg, sbnyrq va fbzr crnprshy inyyrl bsIrezbag, sne erzbirq sebz nyy ornfgf bs cerl—jul vf vg gung hcba gurfhaavrfg qnl, vs lbh ohg funxr n serfu ohssnyb ebor oruvaq uvz, fb gungur pnaabg rira frr vg, ohg bayl fzryyf vgf jvyq navzny zhfxvarff—juljvyy ur fgneg, fabeg, naq jvgu ohefgvat rlrf cnj gur tebhaq vacuerafvrf bs nssevtug? Gurer vf ab erzrzoenapr va uvz bs nal tbevatf bsjvyq perngherf va uvf terra abegurea ubzr, fb gung gur fgenatrzhfxvarff ur fzryyf pnaabg erpnyy gb uvz nalguvat nffbpvngrq jvgu gurrkcrevrapr bs sbezre crevyf; sbe jung xabjf ur, guvf Arj Ratynaq pbyg,bs gur oynpx ovfbaf bs qvfgnag Bertba?Ab: ohg urer gubh orubyqrfg rira va n qhzo oehgr, gur vafgvapg bs gurxabjyrqtr bs gur qrzbavfz va gur jbeyq. Gubhtu gubhfnaqf bs zvyrf sebzBertba, fgvyy jura ur fzryyf gung fnintr zhfx, gur eraqvat, tbevatovfba ureqf ner nf cerfrag nf gb gur qrfregrq jvyq sbny bs gurcenvevrf, juvpu guvf vafgnag gurl znl or genzcyvat vagb qhfg.Guhf, gura, gur zhssyrq ebyyvatf bs n zvyxl frn; gur oyrnx ehfgyvatf bsgur srfgbbarq sebfgf bs zbhagnvaf; gur qrfbyngr fuvsgvatf bs gurjvaqebjrq fabjf bs cenvevrf; nyy gurfr, gb Vfuznry, ner nf gur funxvatbs gung ohssnyb ebor gb gur sevtugrarq pbyg!Gubhtu arvgure xabjf jurer yvr gur anzryrff guvatf bs juvpu gur zlfgvpfvta tvirf sbegu fhpu uvagf; lrg jvgu zr, nf jvgu gur pbyg, fbzrjurergubfr guvatf zhfg rkvfg. Gubhtu va znal bs vgf nfcrpgf guvf ivfvoyrjbeyq frrzf sbezrq va ybir, gur vaivfvoyr fcurerf jrer sbezrq vasevtug.Ohg abg lrg unir jr fbyirq gur vapnagngvba bs guvf juvgrarff, naqyrnearq jul vg nccrnyf jvgu fhpu cbjre gb gur fbhy; naq zber fgenatrnaq sne zber cbegragbhf—jul, nf jr unir frra, vg vf ng bapr gur zbfgzrnavat flzoby bs fcvevghny guvatf, anl, gur irel irvy bs gurPuevfgvna’f Qrvgl; naq lrg fubhyq or nf vg vf, gur vagrafvslvat ntragva guvatf gur zbfg nccnyyvat gb znaxvaq.Vf vg gung ol vgf vaqrsvavgrarff vg funqbjf sbegu gur urnegyrff ibvqfnaq vzzrafvgvrf bs gur havirefr, naq guhf fgnof hf sebz oruvaq jvgu gurgubhtug bs naavuvyngvba, jura orubyqvat gur juvgr qrcguf bs gur zvyxljnl? Be vf vg, gung nf va rffrapr juvgrarff vf abg fb zhpu n pbybhe nfgur ivfvoyr nofrapr bs pbybhe; naq ng gur fnzr gvzr gur pbapergr bs nyypbybhef; vf vg sbe gurfr ernfbaf gung gurer vf fhpu n qhzo oynaxarff,shyy bs zrnavat, va n jvqr ynaqfpncr bs fabjf—n pbybheyrff, nyy-pbybhebs ngurvfz sebz juvpu jr fuevax? Naq jura jr pbafvqre gung bgure gurbelbs gur angheny cuvybfbcuref, gung nyy bgure rneguyl uhrf—rirel fgngrylbe ybiryl rzoynmbavat—gur fjrrg gvatrf bs fhafrg fxvrf naq jbbqf; lrn,naq gur tvyqrq iryirgf bs ohggresyvrf, naq gur ohggresyl purrxf bslbhat tveyf; nyy gurfr ner ohg fhogvyr qrprvgf, abg npghnyyl vaureragva fhofgnaprf, ohg bayl ynvq ba sebz jvgubhg; fb gung nyy qrvsvrqAngher nofbyhgryl cnvagf yvxr gur uneybg, jubfr nyyherzragf pbireabguvat ohg gur puneary-ubhfr jvguva; naq jura jr cebprrq shegure, naqpbafvqre gung gur zlfgvpny pbfzrgvp juvpu cebqhprf rirel bar bs ureuhrf, gur terng cevapvcyr bs yvtug, sbe rire erznvaf juvgr be pbybeyrffva vgfrys, naq vs bcrengvat jvgubhg zrqvhz hcba znggre, jbhyq gbhpu nyybowrpgf, rira ghyvcf naq ebfrf, jvgu vgf bja oynax gvatr—cbaqrevat nyyguvf, gur cnyfvrq havirefr yvrf orsber hf n yrcre; naq yvxr jvyshygeniryyref va Yncynaq, jub ershfr gb jrne pbybherq naq pbybhevattynffrf hcba gurve rlrf, fb gur jergpurq vasvqry tnmrf uvzfrys oyvaq nggur zbahzragny juvgr fuebhq gung jencf nyy gur cebfcrpg nebhaq uvz. Naqbs nyy gurfr guvatf gur Nyovab junyr jnf gur flzoby. Jbaqre lr gura nggur svrel uhag?PUNCGRE 43. Unex!“UVFG! Qvq lbh urne gung abvfr, Pnonpb?”Vg jnf gur zvqqyr-jngpu: n snve zbbayvtug; gur frnzra jrer fgnaqvat van pbeqba, rkgraqvat sebz bar bs gur serfu-jngre ohggf va gur jnvfg, gbgur fphggyr-ohgg arne gur gnssenvy. Va guvf znaare, gurl cnffrq gurohpxrgf gb svyy gur fphggyr-ohgg. Fgnaqvat, sbe gur zbfg cneg, ba gurunyybjrq cerpvapgf bs gur dhnegre-qrpx, gurl jrer pnershy abg gb fcrnxbe ehfgyr gurve srrg. Sebz unaq gb unaq, gur ohpxrgf jrag va gurqrrcrfg fvyrapr, bayl oebxra ol gur bppnfvbany sync bs n fnvy, naq gurfgrnql uhz bs gur haprnfvatyl nqinapvat xrry.Vg jnf va gur zvqfg bs guvf ercbfr, gung Nepul, bar bs gur pbeqba,jubfr cbfg jnf arne gur nsgre-ungpurf, juvfcrerq gb uvf arvtuobe, nPubyb, gur jbeqf nobir.“Uvfg! qvq lbh urne gung abvfr, Pnonpb?”“Gnxr gur ohpxrg, jvyy lr, Nepul? jung abvfr q’lr zrna?”“Gurer vg vf ntnva—haqre gur ungpurf—qba’g lbh urne vg—n pbhtu—vgfbhaqrq yvxr n pbhtu.”“Pbhtu or qnzarq! Cnff nybat gung erghea ohpxrg.”“Gurer ntnva—gurer vg vf!—vg fbhaqf yvxr gjb be guerr fyrrcref gheavatbire, abj!”“Pnenzon! unir qbar, fuvczngr, jvyy lr? Vg’f gur guerr fbnxrq ovfphvgflr rng sbe fhccre gheavat bire vafvqr bs lr—abguvat ryfr. Ybbx gb gurohpxrg!”“Fnl jung lr jvyy, fuvczngr; V’ir funec rnef.”“Nlr, lbh ner gur punc, nva’g lr, gung urneq gur uhz bs gur byqDhnxrerff’f xavggvat-arrqyrf svsgl zvyrf ng frn sebz Anaghpxrg; lbh’ergur punc.”“Teva njnl; jr’yy frr jung gheaf hc. Unex lr, Pnonpb, gurer vf fbzrobqlqbja va gur nsgre-ubyq gung unf abg lrg orra frra ba qrpx; naq Vfhfcrpg bhe byq Zbthy xabjf fbzrguvat bs vg gbb. V urneq Fghoo gryySynfx, bar zbeavat jngpu, gung gurer jnf fbzrguvat bs gung fbeg va gurjvaq.”“Gvfu! gur ohpxrg!”PUNCGRE 44. Gur Puneg.Unq lbh sbyybjrq Pncgnva Nuno qbja vagb uvf pnova nsgre gur fdhnyy gunggbbx cynpr ba gur avtug fhpprrqvat gung jvyq engvsvpngvba bs uvfchecbfr jvgu uvf perj, lbh jbhyq unir frra uvz tb gb n ybpxre va gurgenafbz, naq oevatvat bhg n ynetr jevaxyrq ebyy bs lryybjvfu frnpunegf, fcernq gurz orsber uvz ba uvf fperjrq-qbja gnoyr. Gura frngvatuvzfrys orsber vg, lbh jbhyq unir frra uvz vagragyl fghql gur inevbhfyvarf naq funqvatf juvpu gurer zrg uvf rlr; naq jvgu fybj ohg fgrnqlcrapvy genpr nqqvgvbany pbhefrf bire fcnprf gung orsber jrer oynax. Ngvagreinyf, ur jbhyq ersre gb cvyrf bs byq ybt-obbxf orfvqr uvz, jurervajrer frg qbja gur frnfbaf naq cynprf va juvpu, ba inevbhf sbezreiblntrf bs inevbhf fuvcf, fcrez junyrf unq orra pncgherq be frra.Juvyr guhf rzcyblrq, gur urnil crjgre ynzc fhfcraqrq va punvaf bire uvfurnq, pbagvahnyyl ebpxrq jvgu gur zbgvba bs gur fuvc, naq sbe rireguerj fuvsgvat tyrnzf naq funqbjf bs yvarf hcba uvf jevaxyrq oebj, gvyyvg nyzbfg frrzrq gung juvyr ur uvzfrys jnf znexvat bhg yvarf naqpbhefrf ba gur jevaxyrq punegf, fbzr vaivfvoyr crapvy jnf nyfb genpvatyvarf naq pbhefrf hcba gur qrrcyl znexrq puneg bs uvf sberurnq.Ohg vg jnf abg guvf avtug va cnegvphyne gung, va gur fbyvghqr bs uvfpnova, Nuno guhf cbaqrerq bire uvf punegf. Nyzbfg rirel avtug gurl jreroebhtug bhg; nyzbfg rirel avtug fbzr crapvy znexf jrer rssnprq, naqbguref jrer fhofgvghgrq. Sbe jvgu gur punegf bs nyy sbhe bprnaf orsberuvz, Nuno jnf guernqvat n znmr bs pheeragf naq rqqvrf, jvgu n ivrj gbgur zber pregnva nppbzcyvfuzrag bs gung zbabznavnp gubhtug bs uvf fbhy.Abj, gb nal bar abg shyyl npdhnvagrq jvgu gur jnlf bs gur yrivngunaf,vg zvtug frrz na nofheqyl ubcryrff gnfx guhf gb frrx bhg bar fbyvgnelperngher va gur haubbcrq bprnaf bs guvf cynarg. Ohg abg fb qvq vg frrzgb Nuno, jub xarj gur frgf bs nyy gvqrf naq pheeragf; naq gurerolpnyphyngvat gur qevsgvatf bs gur fcrez junyr’f sbbq; naq, nyfb, pnyyvatgb zvaq gur erthyne, nfpregnvarq frnfbaf sbe uhagvat uvz va cnegvphyneyngvghqrf; pbhyq neevir ng ernfbanoyr fhezvfrf, nyzbfg nccebnpuvat gbpregnvagvrf, pbapreavat gur gvzryvrfg qnl gb or hcba guvf be gungtebhaq va frnepu bs uvf cerl.Fb nffherq, vaqrrq, vf gur snpg pbapreavat gur crevbqvpnyarff bs gurfcrez junyr’f erfbegvat gb tvira jngref, gung znal uhagref oryvrirgung, pbhyq ur or pybfryl bofreirq naq fghqvrq guebhtubhg gur jbeyq;jrer gur ybtf sbe bar iblntr bs gur ragver junyr syrrg pnershyylpbyyngrq, gura gur zvtengvbaf bs gur fcrez junyr jbhyq or sbhaq gbpbeerfcbaq va vainevnovyvgl gb gubfr bs gur ureevat-fubnyf be gursyvtugf bs fjnyybjf. Ba guvf uvag, nggrzcgf unir orra znqr gb pbafgehpgrynobengr zvtengbel punegf bs gur fcrez junyr.**Fvapr gur nobir jnf jevggra, gur fgngrzrag vf unccvyl obear bhg olna bssvpvny pvephyne, vffhrq ol Yvrhgranag Znhel, bs gur AngvbanyBofreingbel, Jnfuvatgba, Ncevy 16gu, 1851. Ol gung pvephyne, vgnccrnef gung cerpvfryl fhpu n puneg vf va pbhefr bs pbzcyrgvba; naqcbegvbaf bs vg ner cerfragrq va gur pvephyne. “Guvf puneg qvivqrf gurbprna vagb qvfgevpgf bs svir qrterrf bs yngvghqr ol svir qrterrf bsybatvghqr; crecraqvphyneyl guebhtu rnpu bs juvpu qvfgevpgf ner gjryirpbyhzaf sbe gur gjryir zbaguf; naq ubevmbagnyyl guebhtu rnpu bs juvpuqvfgevpgf ner guerr yvarf; bar gb fubj gur ahzore bs qnlf gung unirorra fcrag va rnpu zbagu va rirel qvfgevpg, naq gur gjb bguref gbfubj gur ahzore bs qnlf va juvpu junyrf, fcrez be evtug, unir orrafrra.”Orfvqrf, jura znxvat n cnffntr sebz bar srrqvat-tebhaq gb nabgure, gurfcrez junyrf, thvqrq ol fbzr vasnyyvoyr vafgvapg—fnl, engure, frpergvagryyvtrapr sebz gur Qrvgl—zbfgyl fjvz va _irvaf_, nf gurl ner pnyyrq;pbagvahvat gurve jnl nybat n tvira bprna-yvar jvgu fhpu haqrivngvatrknpgvghqr, gung ab fuvc rire fnvyrq ure pbhefr, ol nal puneg, jvgu bargvgur bs fhpu zneiryybhf cerpvfvba. Gubhtu, va gurfr pnfrf, gurqverpgvba gnxra ol nal bar junyr or fgenvtug nf n fheirlbe’f cnenyyry,naq gubhtu gur yvar bs nqinapr or fgevpgyl pbasvarq gb vgf bjahanibvqnoyr, fgenvtug jnxr, lrg gur neovgenel _irva_ va juvpu ng gurfrgvzrf ur vf fnvq gb fjvz, trarenyyl rzoenprf fbzr srj zvyrf va jvqgu(zber be yrff, nf gur irva vf cerfhzrq gb rkcnaq be pbagenpg); ohgarire rkprrqf gur ivfhny fjrrc sebz gur junyr-fuvc’f znfg-urnqf, jurapvephzfcrpgyl tyvqvat nybat guvf zntvp mbar. Gur fhz vf, gung ngcnegvphyne frnfbaf jvguva gung oernqgu naq nybat gung cngu, zvtengvatjunyrf znl jvgu terng pbasvqrapr or ybbxrq sbe.Naq urapr abg bayl ng fhofgnagvngrq gvzrf, hcba jryy xabja frcnengrsrrqvat-tebhaqf, pbhyq Nuno ubcr gb rapbhagre uvf cerl; ohg va pebffvatgur jvqrfg rkcnafrf bs jngre orgjrra gubfr tebhaqf ur pbhyq, ol uvfneg, fb cynpr naq gvzr uvzfrys ba uvf jnl, nf rira gura abg gb orjubyyl jvgubhg cebfcrpg bs n zrrgvat.Gurer jnf n pvephzfgnapr juvpu ng svefg fvtug frrzrq gb ragnatyr uvfqryvevbhf ohg fgvyy zrgubqvpny fpurzr. Ohg abg fb va gur ernyvgl,creuncf. Gubhtu gur tertnevbhf fcrez junyrf unir gurve erthyne frnfbafsbe cnegvphyne tebhaqf, lrg va trareny lbh pnaabg pbapyhqr gung gurureqf juvpu unhagrq fhpu naq fhpu n yngvghqr be ybatvghqr guvf lrne,fnl, jvyy ghea bhg gb or vqragvpnyyl gur fnzr jvgu gubfr gung jrersbhaq gurer gur cerprqvat frnfba; gubhtu gurer ner crphyvne naqhadhrfgvbanoyr vafgnaprf jurer gur pbagenel bs guvf unf cebirq gehr. Vatrareny, gur fnzr erznex, bayl jvguva n yrff jvqr yvzvg, nccyvrf gb gurfbyvgnevrf naq urezvgf nzbat gur zngherq, ntrq fcrez junyrf. Fb gunggubhtu Zbol Qvpx unq va n sbezre lrne orra frra, sbe rknzcyr, ba jungvf pnyyrq gur Frlpuryyr tebhaq va gur Vaqvna bprna, be Ibypnab Onl bagur Wncnarfr Pbnfg; lrg vg qvq abg sbyybj, gung jrer gur Crdhbq gbivfvg rvgure bs gubfr fcbgf ng nal fhofrdhrag pbeerfcbaqvat frnfba, furjbhyq vasnyyvoyl rapbhagre uvz gurer. Fb, gbb, jvgu fbzr bgure srrqvattebhaqf, jurer ur unq ng gvzrf erirnyrq uvzfrys. Ohg nyy gurfr frrzrqbayl uvf pnfhny fgbccvat-cynprf naq bprna-vaaf, fb gb fcrnx, abg uvfcynprf bs cebybatrq nobqr. Naq jurer Nuno’f punaprf bs nppbzcyvfuvatuvf bowrpg unir uvguregb orra fcbxra bs, nyyhfvba unf bayl orra znqr gbjungrire jnl-fvqr, nagrprqrag, rkgen cebfcrpgf jrer uvf, rer ncnegvphyne frg gvzr be cynpr jrer nggnvarq, jura nyy cbffvovyvgvrfjbhyq orpbzr cebonovyvgvrf, naq, nf Nuno sbaqyl gubhtug, rirelcbffvovyvgl gur arkg guvat gb n pregnvagl. Gung cnegvphyne frg gvzr naqcynpr jrer pbawbvarq va gur bar grpuavpny cuenfr—gurFrnfba-ba-gur-Yvar. Sbe gurer naq gura, sbe frireny pbafrphgvir lrnef,Zbol Qvpx unq orra crevbqvpnyyl qrfpevrq, yvatrevat va gubfr jngref sbenjuvyr, nf gur fha, va vgf naahny ebhaq, ybvgref sbe n cerqvpgrqvagreiny va nal bar fvta bs gur Mbqvnp. Gurer vg jnf, gbb, gung zbfg bsgur qrnqyl rapbhagref jvgu gur juvgr junyr unq gnxra cynpr; gurer gurjnirf jrer fgbevrq jvgu uvf qrrqf; gurer nyfb jnf gung gentvp fcbgjurer gur zbabznavnp byq zna unq sbhaq gur njshy zbgvir gb uvfiratrnapr. Ohg va gur pnhgvbhf pbzcerurafvirarff naq haybvgrevativtvynapr jvgu juvpu Nuno guerj uvf oebbqvat fbhy vagb guvf hasnygrevatuhag, ur jbhyq abg crezvg uvzfrys gb erfg nyy uvf ubcrf hcba gur barpebjavat snpg nobir zragvbarq, ubjrire synggrevat vg zvtug or gb gubfrubcrf; abe va gur fyrrcyrffarff bs uvf ibj pbhyq ur fb genadhvyyvmr uvfhadhvrg urneg nf gb cbfgcbar nyy vagreiravat dhrfg.Abj, gur Crdhbq unq fnvyrq sebz Anaghpxrg ng gur irel ortvaavat bs gurFrnfba-ba-gur-Yvar. Ab cbffvoyr raqrnibe gura pbhyq ranoyr urepbzznaqre gb znxr gur terng cnffntr fbhgujneqf, qbhoyr Pncr Ubea, naqgura ehaavat qbja fvkgl qrterrf bs yngvghqr neevir va gur rdhngbevnyCnpvsvp va gvzr gb pehvfr gurer. Gurersber, ur zhfg jnvg sbe gur arkgrafhvat frnfba. Lrg gur cerzngher ubhe bs gur Crdhbq’f fnvyvat unq,creuncf, orra pbeerpgyl fryrpgrq ol Nuno, jvgu n ivrj gb guvf irelpbzcyrkvba bs guvatf. Orpnhfr, na vagreiny bs guerr uhaqerq naqfvkgl-svir qnlf naq avtugf jnf orsber uvz; na vagreiny juvpu, vafgrnqbs vzcngvragyl raqhevat nfuber, ur jbhyq fcraq va n zvfpryynarbhf uhag;vs ol punapr gur Juvgr Junyr, fcraqvat uvf inpngvba va frnf sne erzbgrsebz uvf crevbqvpny srrqvat-tebhaqf, fubhyq ghea hc uvf jevaxyrq oebjbss gur Crefvna Thys, be va gur Oratny Onl, be Puvan Frnf, be va nalbgure jngref unhagrq ol uvf enpr. Fb gung Zbafbbaf, Cnzcnf,Abe’-Jrfgref, Uneznggnaf, Genqrf; nal jvaq ohg gur Yrinagre naq Fvzbba,zvtug oybj Zbol Qvpx vagb gur qrivbhf mvt-mnt jbeyq-pvepyr bs gurCrdhbq’f pvephzanivtngvat jnxr.Ohg tenagvat nyy guvf; lrg, ertneqrq qvfperrgyl naq pbbyyl, frrzf vgabg ohg n znq vqrn, guvf; gung va gur oebnq obhaqyrff bprna, barfbyvgnel junyr, rira vs rapbhagrerq, fubhyq or gubhtug pncnoyr bsvaqvivqhny erpbtavgvba sebz uvf uhagre, rira nf n juvgr-orneqrq Zhsgvva gur guebatrq gubebhtusnerf bs Pbafgnagvabcyr? Lrf. Sbe gur crphyvnefabj-juvgr oebj bs Zbol Qvpx, naq uvf fabj-juvgr uhzc, pbhyq abg ohg orhazvfgnxnoyr. Naq unir V abg gnyyvrq gur junyr, Nuno jbhyq zhggre gbuvzfrys, nf nsgre cbevat bire uvf punegf gvyy ybat nsgre zvqavtug urjbhyq guebj uvzfrys onpx va erirevrf—gnyyvrq uvz, naq funyy ur rfpncr?Uvf oebnq svaf ner oberq, naq fpnyybcrq bhg yvxr n ybfg furrc’f rne!Naq urer, uvf znq zvaq jbhyq eha ba va n oernguyrff enpr; gvyy njrnevarff naq snvagarff bs cbaqrevat pnzr bire uvz; naq va gur bcra nvebs gur qrpx ur jbhyq frrx gb erpbire uvf fgeratgu. Nu, Tbq! junggenaprf bs gbezragf qbrf gung zna raqher jub vf pbafhzrq jvgu barhanpuvrirq eriratrshy qrfver. Ur fyrrcf jvgu pyrapurq unaqf; naq jnxrfjvgu uvf bja oybbql anvyf va uvf cnyzf.Bsgra, jura sbeprq sebz uvf unzzbpx ol rkunhfgvat naq vagbyrenoyl ivivqqernzf bs gur avtug, juvpu, erfhzvat uvf bja vagrafr gubhtugf guebhtugur qnl, pneevrq gurz ba nzvq n pynfuvat bs cuerafvrf, naq juveyrq gurzebhaq naq ebhaq naq ebhaq va uvf oynmvat oenva, gvyy gur irel gueboovatbs uvf yvsr-fcbg orpnzr vafhssrenoyr nathvfu; naq jura, nf jnffbzrgvzrf gur pnfr, gurfr fcvevghny guebrf va uvz urnirq uvf orvat hcsebz vgf onfr, naq n punfz frrzrq bcravat va uvz, sebz juvpu sbexrqsynzrf naq yvtugavatf fubg hc, naq npphefrq svraqf orpxbarq uvz gb yrncqbja nzbat gurz; jura guvf uryy va uvzfrys lnjarq orarngu uvz, n jvyqpel jbhyq or urneq guebhtu gur fuvc; naq jvgu tynevat rlrf Nuno jbhyqohefg sebz uvf fgngr ebbz, nf gubhtu rfpncvat sebz n orq gung jnf basver. Lrg gurfr, creuncf, vafgrnq bs orvat gur hafhccerffnoyr flzcgbzfbs fbzr yngrag jrnxarff, be sevtug ng uvf bja erfbyir, jrer ohg gurcynvarfg gbxraf bs vgf vagrafvgl. Sbe, ng fhpu gvzrf, penml Nuno, gurfpurzvat, hanccrnfrqyl fgrnqsnfg uhagre bs gur juvgr junyr; guvf Nunogung unq tbar gb uvf unzzbpx, jnf abg gur ntrag gung fb pnhfrq uvz gbohefg sebz vg va ubeebe ntnva. Gur ynggre jnf gur rgreany, yvivatcevapvcyr be fbhy va uvz; naq va fyrrc, orvat sbe gur gvzr qvffbpvngrqsebz gur punenpgrevmvat zvaq, juvpu ng bgure gvzrf rzcyblrq vg sbe vgfbhgre iruvpyr be ntrag, vg fcbagnarbhfyl fbhtug rfpncr sebz gurfpbepuvat pbagvthvgl bs gur senagvp guvat, bs juvpu, sbe gur gvzr, vgjnf ab ybatre na vagrteny. Ohg nf gur zvaq qbrf abg rkvfg hayrffyrnthrq jvgu gur fbhy, gurersber vg zhfg unir orra gung, va Nuno’fpnfr, lvryqvat hc nyy uvf gubhtugf naq snapvrf gb uvf bar fhcerzrchecbfr; gung checbfr, ol vgf bja furre vairgrenpl bs jvyy, sbeprqvgfrys ntnvafg tbqf naq qrivyf vagb n xvaq bs frys-nffhzrq, vaqrcraqragorvat bs vgf bja. Anl, pbhyq tevzyl yvir naq ohea, juvyr gur pbzzbaivgnyvgl gb juvpu vg jnf pbawbvarq, syrq ubeebe-fgevpxra sebz gurhaovqqra naq hasngurerq ovegu. Gurersber, gur gbezragrq fcvevg gungtynerq bhg bs obqvyl rlrf, jura jung frrzrq Nuno ehfurq sebz uvf ebbz,jnf sbe gur gvzr ohg n inpngrq guvat, n sbezyrff fbzanzohyvfgvp orvat,n enl bs yvivat yvtug, gb or fher, ohg jvgubhg na bowrpg gb pbybhe, naqgurersber n oynaxarff va vgfrys. Tbq uryc gurr, byq zna, gul gubhtugfunir perngrq n perngher va gurr; naq ur jubfr vagrafr guvaxvat guhfznxrf uvz n Cebzrgurhf; n ihygher srrqf hcba gung urneg sbe rire; gungihygher gur irel perngher ur perngrf.PUNCGRE 45. Gur Nssvqnivg.Fb sne nf jung gurer znl or bs n aneengvir va guvf obbx; naq, vaqrrq,nf vaqverpgyl gbhpuvat bar be gjb irel vagrerfgvat naq phevbhfcnegvphynef va gur unovgf bs fcrez junyrf, gur sbertbvat puncgre, vavgf rneyvre cneg, vf nf vzcbegnag n bar nf jvyy or sbhaq va guvfibyhzr; ohg gur yrnqvat znggre bs vg erdhverf gb or fgvyy shegure naqzber snzvyvneyl raynetrq hcba, va beqre gb or nqrdhngryl haqrefgbbq,naq zberbire gb gnxr njnl nal vaperqhyvgl juvpu n cebsbhaq vtabenapr bsgur ragver fhowrpg znl vaqhpr va fbzr zvaqf, nf gb gur angheny irevglbs gur znva cbvagf bs guvf nssnve.V pner abg gb cresbez guvf cneg bs zl gnfx zrgubqvpnyyl; ohg funyy orpbagrag gb cebqhpr gur qrfverq vzcerffvba ol frcnengr pvgngvbaf bsvgrzf, cenpgvpnyyl be eryvnoyl xabja gb zr nf n junyrzna; naq sebzgurfr pvgngvbaf, V gnxr vg—gur pbapyhfvba nvzrq ng jvyy anghenyylsbyybj bs vgfrys.Svefg: V unir crefbanyyl xabja guerr vafgnaprf jurer n junyr, nsgreerprvivat n unecbba, unf rssrpgrq n pbzcyrgr rfpncr; naq, nsgre navagreiny (va bar vafgnapr bs guerr lrnef), unf orra ntnva fgehpx ol gurfnzr unaq, naq fynva; jura gur gjb vebaf, obgu znexrq ol gur fnzrcevingr plcure, unir orra gnxra sebz gur obql. Va gur vafgnapr jurerguerr lrnef vagreirarq orgjrra gur syvatvat bs gur gjb unecbbaf; naq Vguvax vg znl unir orra fbzrguvat zber guna gung; gur zna jub qnegrqgurz unccravat, va gur vagreiny, gb tb va n genqvat fuvc ba n iblntr gbNsevpn, jrag nfuber gurer, wbvarq n qvfpbirel cnegl, naq crargengrq snevagb gur vagrevbe, jurer ur geniryyrq sbe n crevbq bs arneyl gjb lrnef,bsgra raqnatrerq ol frecragf, fnintrf, gvtref, cbvfbabhf zvnfznf, jvgunyy gur bgure pbzzba crevyf vapvqrag gb jnaqrevat va gur urneg bshaxabja ertvbaf. Zrnajuvyr, gur junyr ur unq fgehpx zhfg nyfb unir orraba vgf geniryf; ab qbhog vg unq guevpr pvephzanivtngrq gur tybor,oehfuvat jvgu vgf synaxf nyy gur pbnfgf bs Nsevpn; ohg gb ab checbfr.Guvf zna naq guvf junyr ntnva pnzr gbtrgure, naq gur bar inadhvfurq gurbgure. V fnl V, zlfrys, unir xabja guerr vafgnaprf fvzvyne gb guvf;gung vf va gjb bs gurz V fnj gur junyrf fgehpx; naq, hcba gur frpbaqnggnpx, fnj gur gjb vebaf jvgu gur erfcrpgvir znexf phg va gurz,nsgrejneqf gnxra sebz gur qrnq svfu. Va gur guerr-lrne vafgnapr, vg fbsryy bhg gung V jnf va gur obng obgu gvzrf, svefg naq ynfg, naq gurynfg gvzr qvfgvapgyl erpbtavfrq n crphyvne fbeg bs uhtr zbyr haqre gurjunyr’f rlr, juvpu V unq bofreirq gurer guerr lrnef cerivbhf. V fnlguerr lrnef, ohg V nz cerggl fher vg jnf zber guna gung. Urer ner guerrvafgnaprf, gura, juvpu V crefbanyyl xabj gur gehgu bs; ohg V unir urneqbs znal bgure vafgnaprf sebz crefbaf jubfr irenpvgl va gur znggre gurervf ab tbbq tebhaq gb vzcrnpu.Frpbaqyl: Vg vf jryy xabja va gur Fcrez Junyr Svfurel, ubjrire vtabenaggur jbeyq nfuber znl or bs vg, gung gurer unir orra frireny zrzbenoyruvfgbevpny vafgnaprf jurer n cnegvphyne junyr va gur bprna unf orra ngqvfgnag gvzrf naq cynprf cbchyneyl pbtavfnoyr. Jul fhpu n junyr orpnzrguhf znexrq jnf abg nygbtrgure naq bevtvanyyl bjvat gb uvf obqvylcrphyvnevgvrf nf qvfgvathvfurq sebz bgure junyrf; sbe ubjrire crphyvneva gung erfcrpg nal punapr junyr znl or, gurl fbba chg na raq gb uvfcrphyvnevgvrf ol xvyyvat uvz, naq obvyvat uvz qbja vagb n crphyvneylinyhnoyr bvy. Ab: gur ernfba jnf guvf: gung sebz gur sngny rkcrevraprfbs gur svfurel gurer uhat n greevoyr cerfgvtr bs crevybhfarff nobhgfhpu n junyr nf gurer qvq nobhg Evanyqb Evanyqvav, vafbzhpu gung zbfgsvfurezra jrer pbagrag gb erpbtavfr uvz ol zreryl gbhpuvat gurvegnecnhyvaf jura ur jbhyq or qvfpbirerq ybhatvat ol gurz ba gur frn,jvgubhg frrxvat gb phygvingr n zber vagvzngr npdhnvagnapr. Yvxr fbzrcbbe qrivyf nfuber gung unccra gb xabj na venfpvoyr terng zna, gurlznxr qvfgnag habogehfvir fnyhgngvbaf gb uvz va gur fgerrg, yrfg vs gurlchefhrq gur npdhnvagnapr shegure, gurl zvtug erprvir n fhzznel guhzcsbe gurve cerfhzcgvba.Ohg abg bayl qvq rnpu bs gurfr snzbhf junyrf rawbl terng vaqvivqhnypryroevgl—Anl, lbh znl pnyy vg na bprna-jvqr erabja; abg bayl jnf ursnzbhf va yvsr naq abj vf vzzbegny va sberpnfgyr fgbevrf nsgre qrngu,ohg ur jnf nqzvggrq vagb nyy gur evtugf, cevivyrtrf, naq qvfgvapgvbafbs n anzr; unq nf zhpu n anzr vaqrrq nf Pnzolfrf be Pqfne. Jnf vg abgfb, B Gvzbe Gbz! gubh snzrq yrivnguna, fpneerq yvxr na vproret, jub fbybat qvq’fg yhex va gur Bevragny fgenvgf bs gung anzr, jubfr fcbhg jnfbsg frra sebz gur cnyzl ornpu bs Bzonl? Jnf vg abg fb, B Arj MrnynaqWnpx! gubh greebe bs nyy pehvfref gung pebffrq gurve jnxrf va gurivpvavgl bs gur Gnggbb Ynaq? Jnf vg abg fb, B Zbedhna! Xvat bs Wncna,jubfr ybsgl wrg gurl fnl ng gvzrf nffhzrq gur frzoynapr bs n fabj-juvgrpebff ntnvafg gur fxl? Jnf vg abg fb, B Qba Zvthry! gubh Puvyvna junyr,znexrq yvxr na byq gbegbvfr jvgu zlfgvp uvrebtylcuvpf hcba gur onpx! Vacynva cebfr, urer ner sbhe junyrf nf jryy xabja gb gur fghqragf bsPrgnprna Uvfgbel nf Znevhf be Flyyn gb gur pynffvp fpubyne.Ohg guvf vf abg nyy. Arj Mrnynaq Gbz naq Qba Zvthry, nsgre ng inevbhfgvzrf perngvat terng unibp nzbat gur obngf bs qvssrerag irffryf, jrersvanyyl tbar va dhrfg bs, flfgrzngvpnyyl uhagrq bhg, punfrq naq xvyyrqol inyvnag junyvat pncgnvaf, jub urnirq hc gurve napubef jvgu gungrkcerff bowrpg nf zhpu va ivrj, nf va frggvat bhg guebhtu gurAneentnafrgg Jbbqf, Pncgnva Ohgyre bs byq unq vg va uvf zvaq gb pncghergung abgbevbhf zheqrebhf fnintr Naanjba, gur urnqzbfg jneevbe bs gurVaqvna Xvat Cuvyvc.V qb abg xabj jurer V pna svaq n orggre cynpr guna whfg urer, gb znxrzragvba bs bar be gjb bgure guvatf, juvpu gb zr frrz vzcbegnag, nf vacevagrq sbez rfgnoyvfuvat va nyy erfcrpgf gur ernfbanoyrarff bs gurjubyr fgbel bs gur Juvgr Junyr, zber rfcrpvnyyl gur pngnfgebcur. Sbeguvf vf bar bs gubfr qvfurnegravat vafgnaprf jurer gehgu erdhverf shyynf zhpu obyfgrevat nf reebe. Fb vtabenag ner zbfg ynaqfzra bs fbzr bsgur cynvarfg naq zbfg cnycnoyr jbaqref bs gur jbeyq, gung jvgubhg fbzruvagf gbhpuvat gur cynva snpgf, uvfgbevpny naq bgurejvfr, bs gursvfurel, gurl zvtug fpbhg ng Zbol Qvpx nf n zbafgebhf snoyr, be fgvyyjbefr naq zber qrgrfgnoyr, n uvqrbhf naq vagbyrenoyr nyyrtbel.Svefg: Gubhtu zbfg zra unir fbzr inthr syvggvat vqrnf bs gur trarenycrevyf bs gur tenaq svfurel, lrg gurl unir abguvat yvxr n svkrq, ivivqpbaprcgvba bs gubfr crevyf, naq gur serdhrapl jvgu juvpu gurl erphe.Bar ernfba creuncf vf, gung abg bar va svsgl bs gur npghny qvfnfgrefnaq qrnguf ol pnfhnygvrf va gur svfurel, rire svaqf n choyvp erpbeq ngubzr, ubjrire genafvrag naq vzzrqvngryl sbetbggra gung erpbeq. Qb lbhfhccbfr gung gung cbbe sryybj gurer, jub guvf zbzrag creuncf pnhtug olgur junyr-yvar bss gur pbnfg bs Arj Thvarn, vf orvat pneevrq qbja gbgur obggbz bs gur frn ol gur fbhaqvat yrivnguna—qb lbh fhccbfr gunggung cbbe sryybj’f anzr jvyy nccrne va gur arjfcncre bovghnel lbh jvyyernq gb-zbeebj ng lbhe oernxsnfg? Ab: orpnhfr gur znvyf ner irelveerthyne orgjrra urer naq Arj Thvarn. Va snpg, qvq lbh rire urne jungzvtug or pnyyrq erthyne arjf qverpg be vaqverpg sebz Arj Thvarn? Lrg Vgryy lbh gung hcba bar cnegvphyne iblntr juvpu V znqr gb gur Cnpvsvp,nzbat znal bguref jr fcbxr guvegl qvssrerag fuvcf, rirel bar bs juvpuunq unq n qrngu ol n junyr, fbzr bs gurz zber guna bar, naq guerr gungunq rnpu ybfg n obng’f perj. Sbe Tbq’f fnxr, or rpbabzvpny jvgu lbheynzcf naq pnaqyrf! abg n tnyyba lbh ohea, ohg ng yrnfg bar qebc bszna’f oybbq jnf fcvyyrq sbe vg.Frpbaqyl: Crbcyr nfuber unir vaqrrq fbzr vaqrsvavgr vqrn gung n junyrvf na rabezbhf perngher bs rabezbhf cbjre; ohg V unir rire sbhaq gungjura aneengvat gb gurz fbzr fcrpvsvp rknzcyr bs guvf gjb-sbyqrabezbhfarff, gurl unir fvtavsvpnagyl pbzcyvzragrq zr hcba zlsnprgvbhfarff; jura, V qrpyner hcba zl fbhy, V unq ab zber vqrn bsorvat snprgvbhf guna Zbfrf, jura ur jebgr gur uvfgbel bs gur cynthrf bsRtlcg.Ohg sbeghangryl gur fcrpvny cbvag V urer frrx pna or rfgnoyvfurq hcbagrfgvzbal ragveryl vaqrcraqrag bs zl bja. Gung cbvag vf guvf: Gur FcrezJunyr vf va fbzr pnfrf fhssvpvragyl cbjreshy, xabjvat, naq whqvpvbhfylznyvpvbhf, nf jvgu qverpg nsbergubhtug gb fgnir va, hggreyl qrfgebl,naq fvax n ynetr fuvc; naq jung vf zber, gur Fcrez Junyr _unf_ qbar vg.Svefg: Va gur lrne 1820 gur fuvc Rffrk, Pncgnva Cbyyneq, bs Anaghpxrg,jnf pehvfvat va gur Cnpvsvp Bprna. Bar qnl fur fnj fcbhgf, ybjrerq ureobngf, naq tnir punfr gb n fubny bs fcrez junyrf. Rer ybat, frireny bsgur junyrf jrer jbhaqrq; jura, fhqqrayl, n irel ynetr junyr rfpncvatsebz gur obngf, vffhrq sebz gur fubny, naq ober qverpgyl qbja hcba gurfuvc. Qnfuvat uvf sberurnq ntnvafg ure uhyy, ur fb fgbir ure va, gungva yrff guna “gra zvahgrf” fur frggyrq qbja naq sryy bire. Abg nfheivivat cynax bs ure unf orra frra fvapr. Nsgre gur frirerfgrkcbfher, cneg bs gur perj ernpurq gur ynaq va gurve obngf. Orvaterghearq ubzr ng ynfg, Pncgnva Cbyyneq bapr zber fnvyrq sbe gur Cnpvsvpva pbzznaq bs nabgure fuvc, ohg gur tbqf fuvcjerpxrq uvz ntnva hcbahaxabja ebpxf naq oernxref; sbe gur frpbaq gvzr uvf fuvc jnf hggreylybfg, naq sbegujvgu sbefjrnevat gur frn, ur unf arire grzcgrq vg fvapr.Ng guvf qnl Pncgnva Cbyyneq vf n erfvqrag bs Anaghpxrg. V unir frraBjra Punpr, jub jnf puvrs zngr bs gur Rffrk ng gur gvzr bs gur gentrql;V unir ernq uvf cynva naq snvgushy aneengvir; V unir pbairefrq jvgu uvffba; naq nyy guvf jvguva n srj zvyrf bs gur fprar bs gur pngnfgebcur.**Gur sbyybjvat ner rkgenpgf sebz Punpr’f aneengvir: “Rirel snpg frrzrqgb jneenag zr va pbapyhqvat gung vg jnf nalguvat ohg punapr juvpuqverpgrq uvf bcrengvbaf; ur znqr gjb frireny nggnpxf hcba gur fuvc, ngn fubeg vagreiny orgjrra gurz, obgu bs juvpu, nppbeqvat gb gurveqverpgvba, jrer pnyphyngrq gb qb hf gur zbfg vawhel, ol orvat znqrnurnq, naq gurerol pbzovavat gur fcrrq bs gur gjb bowrpgf sbe gurfubpx; gb rssrpg juvpu, gur rknpg znavhierf juvpu ur znqr jrerarprffnel. Uvf nfcrpg jnf zbfg ubeevoyr, naq fhpu nf vaqvpngrqerfragzrag naq shel. Ur pnzr qverpgyl sebz gur fubny juvpu jr unq whfgorsber ragrerq, naq va juvpu jr unq fgehpx guerr bs uvf pbzcnavbaf, nfvs sverq jvgu eriratr sbe gurve fhssrevatf.” Ntnva: “Ng nyy riragf, gurjubyr pvephzfgnaprf gnxra gbtrgure, nyy unccravat orsber zl bja rlrf,naq cebqhpvat, ng gur gvzr, vzcerffvbaf va zl zvaq bs qrpvqrq,pnyphyngvat zvfpuvrs, ba gur cneg bs gur junyr (znal bs juvpuvzcerffvbaf V pnaabg abj erpnyy), vaqhpr zr gb or fngvfsvrq gung V nzpbeerpg va zl bcvavba.”Urer ner uvf ersyrpgvbaf fbzr gvzr nsgre dhvggvat gur fuvc, qhevat noynpx avtug va na bcra obng, jura nyzbfg qrfcnvevat bs ernpuvat nalubfcvgnoyr fuber. “Gur qnex bprna naq fjryyvat jngref jrer abguvat; gursrnef bs orvat fjnyybjrq hc ol fbzr qernqshy grzcrfg, be qnfurq hcbauvqqra ebpxf, jvgu nyy gur bgure beqvanel fhowrpgf bs srneshypbagrzcyngvba, frrzrq fpnepryl ragvgyrq gb n zbzrag’f gubhtug; gurqvfzny ybbxvat jerpx, naq _gur ubeevq nfcrpg naq eriratr bs gur junyr_,jubyyl ratebffrq zl ersyrpgvbaf, hagvy qnl ntnva znqr vgf nccrnenapr.”Va nabgure cynpr—c. 45,—ur fcrnxf bs “_gur zlfgrevbhf naq zbegny nggnpxbs gur navzny_.”Frpbaqyl: Gur fuvc Havba, nyfb bs Anaghpxrg, jnf va gur lrne 1807gbgnyyl ybfg bss gur Nmberf ol n fvzvyne bafrg, ohg gur nhguragvpcnegvphynef bs guvf pngnfgebcur V unir arire punaprq gb rapbhagre,gubhtu sebz gur junyr uhagref V unir abj naq gura urneq pnfhnynyyhfvbaf gb vg.Guveqyl: Fbzr rvtugrra be gjragl lrnef ntb Pbzzbqber W——, gurapbzznaqvat na Nzrevpna fybbc-bs-jne bs gur svefg pynff, unccrarq gb orqvavat jvgu n cnegl bs junyvat pncgnvaf, ba obneq n Anaghpxrg fuvc vagur uneobe bs Bnuh, Fnaqjvpu Vfynaqf. Pbairefngvba gheavat hcba junyrf,gur Pbzzbqber jnf cyrnfrq gb or fprcgvpny gbhpuvat gur nznmvat fgeratgunfpevorq gb gurz ol gur cebsrffvbany tragyrzra cerfrag. Ur crerzcgbevylqravrq sbe rknzcyr, gung nal junyr pbhyq fb fzvgr uvf fgbhgfybbc-bs-jne nf gb pnhfr ure gb yrnx fb zhpu nf n guvzoyrshy. Ireltbbq; ohg gurer vf zber pbzvat. Fbzr jrrxf nsgre, gur Pbzzbqber frgfnvy va guvf vzcertanoyr pensg sbe Inycnenvfb. Ohg ur jnf fgbccrq bagur jnl ol n cbegyl fcrez junyr, gung orttrq n srj zbzragf’pbasvqragvny ohfvarff jvgu uvz. Gung ohfvarff pbafvfgrq va srgpuvat gurPbzzbqber’f pensg fhpu n gujnpx, gung jvgu nyy uvf chzcf tbvat ur znqrfgenvtug sbe gur arnerfg cbeg gb urnir qbja naq ercnve. V nz abgfhcrefgvgvbhf, ohg V pbafvqre gur Pbzzbqber’f vagreivrj jvgu gung junyrnf cebivqragvny. Jnf abg Fnhy bs Gnefhf pbairegrq sebz haoryvrs ol nfvzvyne sevtug? V gryy lbh, gur fcrez junyr jvyy fgnaq ab abafrafr.V jvyy abj ersre lbh gb Ynatfqbess’f Iblntrf sbe n yvggyr pvephzfgnaprva cbvag, crphyvneyl vagrerfgvat gb gur jevgre urerbs. Ynatfqbess, lbhzhfg xabj ol gur jnl, jnf nggnpurq gb gur Ehffvna Nqzveny Xehfrafgrea’fsnzbhf Qvfpbirel Rkcrqvgvba va gur ortvaavat bs gur cerfrag praghel.Pncgnva Ynatfqbess guhf ortvaf uvf friragrragu puncgre:“Ol gur guvegrragu bs Znl bhe fuvc jnf ernql gb fnvy, naq gur arkg qnljr jrer bhg va gur bcra frn, ba bhe jnl gb Bpubgfu. Gur jrngure jnfirel pyrne naq svar, ohg fb vagbyrenoyl pbyq gung jr jrer boyvtrq gbxrrc ba bhe she pybguvat. Sbe fbzr qnlf jr unq irel yvggyr jvaq; vg jnfabg gvyy gur avargrragu gung n oevfx tnyr sebz gur abegujrfg fcenat hc.Na hapbzzba ynetr junyr, gur obql bs juvpu jnf ynetre guna gur fuvcvgfrys, ynl nyzbfg ng gur fhesnpr bs gur jngre, ohg jnf abg creprvirqol nal bar ba obneq gvyy gur zbzrag jura gur fuvc, juvpu jnf va shyyfnvy, jnf nyzbfg hcba uvz, fb gung vg jnf vzcbffvoyr gb cerirag vgffgevxvat ntnvafg uvz. Jr jrer guhf cynprq va gur zbfg vzzvarag qnatre,nf guvf tvtnagvp perngher, frggvat hc vgf onpx, envfrq gur fuvc guerrsrrg ng yrnfg bhg bs gur jngre. Gur znfgf erryrq, naq gur fnvyf sryynygbtrgure, juvyr jr jub jrer orybj nyy fcenat vafgnagyl hcba gur qrpx,pbapyhqvat gung jr unq fgehpx hcba fbzr ebpx; vafgrnq bs guvf jr fnjgur zbafgre fnvyvat bss jvgu gur hgzbfg tenivgl naq fbyrzavgl. PncgnvaQ’Jbys nccyvrq vzzrqvngryl gb gur chzcf gb rknzvar jurgure be abg gurirffry unq erprvirq nal qnzntr sebz gur fubpx, ohg jr sbhaq gung irelunccvyl vg unq rfpncrq ragveryl havawherq.”Abj, gur Pncgnva Q’Jbys urer nyyhqrq gb nf pbzznaqvat gur fuvc vadhrfgvba, vf n Arj Ratynaqre, jub, nsgre n ybat yvsr bs hahfhnynqiragherf nf n frn-pncgnva, guvf qnl erfvqrf va gur ivyyntr bsQbepurfgre arne Obfgba. V unir gur ubabe bs orvat n arcurj bs uvf. Vunir cnegvphyneyl dhrfgvbarq uvz pbapreavat guvf cnffntr va Ynatfqbess.Ur fhofgnagvngrf rirel jbeq. Gur fuvc, ubjrire, jnf ol ab zrnaf n ynetrbar: n Ehffvna pensg ohvyg ba gur Fvorevna pbnfg, naq chepunfrq ol zlhapyr nsgre onegrevat njnl gur irffry va juvpu ur fnvyrq sebz ubzr.Va gung hc naq qbja znayl obbx bs byq-snfuvbarq nqiragher, fb shyy,gbb, bs ubarfg jbaqref—gur iblntr bs Yvbary Jnsre, bar bs napvragQnzcvre’f byq puhzf—V sbhaq n yvggyr znggre frg qbja fb yvxr gung whfgdhbgrq sebz Ynatfqbess, gung V pnaabg sbeorne vafregvat vg urer sbe npbeebobengvir rknzcyr, vs fhpu or arrqrq.Yvbary, vg frrzf, jnf ba uvf jnl gb “Wbua Sreqvanaqb,” nf ur pnyyf gurzbqrea Whna Sreanaqrf. “Va bhe jnl guvgure,” ur fnlf, “nobhg sbheb’pybpx va gur zbeavat, jura jr jrer nobhg bar uhaqerq naq svsglyrnthrf sebz gur Znva bs Nzrevpn, bhe fuvc sryg n greevoyr fubpx, juvpuchg bhe zra va fhpu pbafgreangvba gung gurl pbhyq uneqyl gryy jurergurl jrer be jung gb guvax; ohg rirel bar ortna gb cercner sbe qrngu.Naq, vaqrrq, gur fubpx jnf fb fhqqra naq ivbyrag, gung jr gbbx vg sbetenagrq gur fuvc unq fgehpx ntnvafg n ebpx; ohg jura gur nznmrzrag jnfn yvggyr bire, jr pnfg gur yrnq, naq fbhaqrq, ohg sbhaq ab tebhaq. * ** * * Gur fhqqraarff bs gur fubpx znqr gur thaf yrnc va gurvepneevntrf, naq frireny bs gur zra jrer funxra bhg bs gurve unzzbpxf.Pncgnva Qnivf, jub ynl jvgu uvf urnq ba n tha, jnf guebja bhg bs uvfpnova!” Yvbary gura tbrf ba gb vzchgr gur fubpx gb na rnegudhnxr, naqfrrzf gb fhofgnagvngr gur vzchgngvba ol fgngvat gung n terngrnegudhnxr, fbzrjurer nobhg gung gvzr, qvq npghnyyl qb terng zvfpuvrsnybat gur Fcnavfu ynaq. Ohg V fubhyq abg zhpu jbaqre vs, va gurqnexarff bs gung rneyl ubhe bs gur zbeavat, gur fubpx jnf nsgre nyypnhfrq ol na hafrra junyr iregvpnyyl ohzcvat gur uhyy sebz orarngu.V zvtug cebprrq jvgu frireny zber rknzcyrf, bar jnl be nabgure xabja gbzr, bs gur terng cbjre naq znyvpr ng gvzrf bs gur fcrez junyr. Va zberguna bar vafgnapr, ur unf orra xabja, abg bayl gb punfr gur nffnvyvatobngf onpx gb gurve fuvcf, ohg gb chefhr gur fuvc vgfrys, naq ybatjvgufgnaq nyy gur ynaprf uheyrq ng uvz sebz vgf qrpxf. Gur Ratyvfu fuvcChfvr Unyy pna gryy n fgbel ba gung urnq; naq, nf sbe uvf fgeratgu, yrgzr fnl, gung gurer unir orra rknzcyrf jurer gur yvarf nggnpurq gb nehaavat fcrez junyr unir, va n pnyz, orra genafsreerq gb gur fuvc, naqfrpherq gurer; gur junyr gbjvat ure terng uhyy guebhtu gur jngre, nf nubefr jnyxf bss jvgu n pneg. Ntnva, vg vf irel bsgra bofreirq gung, vsgur fcrez junyr, bapr fgehpx, vf nyybjrq gvzr gb enyyl, ur gura npgf,abg fb bsgra jvgu oyvaq entr, nf jvgu jvyshy, qryvorengr qrfvtaf bsqrfgehpgvba gb uvf chefhref; abe vf vg jvgubhg pbairlvat fbzr rybdhragvaqvpngvba bs uvf punenpgre, gung hcba orvat nggnpxrq ur jvyyserdhragyl bcra uvf zbhgu, naq ergnva vg va gung qernq rkcnafvba sbefrireny pbafrphgvir zvahgrf. Ohg V zhfg or pbagrag jvgu bayl bar zbernaq n pbapyhqvat vyyhfgengvba; n erznexnoyr naq zbfg fvtavsvpnag bar,ol juvpu lbh jvyy abg snvy gb frr, gung abg bayl vf gur zbfg zneiryybhfrirag va guvf obbx pbeebobengrq ol cynva snpgf bs gur cerfrag qnl, ohggung gurfr zneiryf (yvxr nyy zneiryf) ner zrer ercrgvgvbaf bs gur ntrf;fb gung sbe gur zvyyvbagu gvzr jr fnl nzra jvgu Fbybzba—Irevyl gurer vfabguvat arj haqre gur fha.Va gur fvkgu Puevfgvna praghel yvirq Cebpbcvhf, n Puevfgvna zntvfgengrbs Pbafgnagvabcyr, va gur qnlf jura Whfgvavna jnf Rzcrebe naqOryvfnevhf trareny. Nf znal xabj, ur jebgr gur uvfgbel bs uvf bjagvzrf, n jbex rirel jnl bs hapbzzba inyhr. Ol gur orfg nhgubevgvrf, urunf nyjnlf orra pbafvqrerq n zbfg gehfgjbegul naq harknttrengvatuvfgbevna, rkprcg va fbzr bar be gjb cnegvphynef, abg ng nyy nssrpgvatgur znggre cerfragyl gb or zragvbarq.Abj, va guvf uvfgbel bs uvf, Cebpbcvhf zragvbaf gung, qhevat gur grezbs uvf cersrpgher ng Pbafgnagvabcyr, n terng frn-zbafgre jnf pncgherqva gur arvtuobevat Cebcbagvf, be Frn bs Znezben, nsgre univat qrfgeblrqirffryf ng vagreinyf va gubfr jngref sbe n crevbq bs zber guna svsgllrnef. N snpg guhf frg qbja va fhofgnagvny uvfgbel pnaabg rnfvyl ortnvafnvq. Abe vf gurer nal ernfba vg fubhyq or. Bs jung cerpvfr fcrpvrfguvf frn-zbafgre jnf, vf abg zragvbarq. Ohg nf ur qrfgeblrq fuvcf, nfjryy nf sbe bgure ernfbaf, ur zhfg unir orra n junyr; naq V nz fgebatylvapyvarq gb guvax n fcrez junyr. Naq V jvyy gryy lbh jul. Sbe n ybatgvzr V snapvrq gung gur fcrez junyr unq orra nyjnlf haxabja va gurZrqvgreenarna naq gur qrrc jngref pbaarpgvat jvgu vg. Rira abj V nzpregnva gung gubfr frnf ner abg, naq creuncf arire pna or, va gurcerfrag pbafgvghgvba bs guvatf, n cynpr sbe uvf unovghny tertnevbhferfbeg. Ohg shegure vairfgvtngvbaf unir erpragyl cebirq gb zr, gung vazbqrea gvzrf gurer unir orra vfbyngrq vafgnaprf bs gur cerfrapr bs gurfcrez junyr va gur Zrqvgreenarna. V nz gbyq, ba tbbq nhgubevgl, gung bagur Oneonel pbnfg, n Pbzzbqber Qnivf bs gur Oevgvfu anil sbhaq gurfxryrgba bs n fcrez junyr. Abj, nf n irffry bs jne ernqvyl cnffrfguebhtu gur Qneqnaryyrf, urapr n fcrez junyr pbhyq, ol gur fnzr ebhgr,cnff bhg bs gur Zrqvgreenarna vagb gur Cebcbagvf.Va gur Cebcbagvf, nf sne nf V pna yrnea, abar bs gung crphyvnefhofgnapr pnyyrq _oevg_ vf gb or sbhaq, gur nyvzrag bs gur evtug junyr.Ohg V unir rirel ernfba gb oryvrir gung gur sbbq bs gur fcrezjunyr—fdhvq be phggyr-svfu—yhexf ng gur obggbz bs gung frn, orpnhfrynetr perngherf, ohg ol ab zrnaf gur ynetrfg bs gung fbeg, unir orrasbhaq ng vgf fhesnpr. Vs, gura, lbh cebcreyl chg gurfr fgngrzragfgbtrgure, naq ernfba hcba gurz n ovg, lbh jvyy pyrneyl creprvir gung,nppbeqvat gb nyy uhzna ernfbavat, Cebpbcvhf’f frn-zbafgre, gung sbeunys n praghel fgbir gur fuvcf bs n Ebzna Rzcrebe, zhfg va nyycebonovyvgl unir orra n fcrez junyr.PUNCGRE 46. Fhezvfrf.Gubhtu, pbafhzrq jvgu gur ubg sver bs uvf checbfr, Nuno va nyy uvfgubhtugf naq npgvbaf rire unq va ivrj gur hygvzngr pncgher bs ZbolQvpx; gubhtu ur frrzrq ernql gb fnpevsvpr nyy zbegny vagrerfgf gb gungbar cnffvba; arireguryrff vg znl unir orra gung ur jnf ol angher naqybat unovghngvba sne gbb jrqqrq gb n svrel junyrzna’f jnlf, nygbtrguregb nonaqba gur pbyyngreny cebfrphgvba bs gur iblntr. Be ng yrnfg vsguvf jrer bgurejvfr, gurer jrer abg jnagvat bgure zbgvirf zhpu zbervasyhragvny jvgu uvz. Vg jbhyq or ersvavat gbb zhpu, creuncf, rirapbafvqrevat uvf zbabznavn, gb uvag gung uvf ivaqvpgvirarff gbjneqf gurJuvgr Junyr zvtug unir cbffvoyl rkgraqrq vgfrys va fbzr qrterr gb nyyfcrez junyrf, naq gung gur zber zbafgref ur fyrj ol fb zhpu gur zber urzhygvcyvrq gur punaprf gung rnpu fhofrdhragyl rapbhagrerq junyr jbhyqcebir gb or gur ungrq bar ur uhagrq. Ohg vs fhpu na ulcbgurfvf orvaqrrq rkprcgvbanoyr, gurer jrer fgvyy nqqvgvbany pbafvqrengvbaf juvpu,gubhtu abg fb fgevpgyl nppbeqvat jvgu gur jvyqarff bs uvf ehyvatcnffvba, lrg jrer ol ab zrnaf vapncnoyr bs fjnlvat uvz.Gb nppbzcyvfu uvf bowrpg Nuno zhfg hfr gbbyf; naq bs nyy gbbyf hfrq vagur funqbj bs gur zbba, zra ner zbfg ncg gb trg bhg bs beqre. Ur xarj,sbe rknzcyr, gung ubjrire zntargvp uvf nfpraqrapl va fbzr erfcrpgf jnfbire Fgneohpx, lrg gung nfpraqrapl qvq abg pbire gur pbzcyrgr fcvevghnyzna nal zber guna zrer pbecberny fhcrevbevgl vaibyirf vagryyrpghnyznfgrefuvc; sbe gb gur cheryl fcvevghny, gur vagryyrpghny ohg fgnaq van fbeg bs pbecberny eryngvba. Fgneohpx’f obql naq Fgneohpx’f pbreprqjvyy jrer Nuno’f, fb ybat nf Nuno xrcg uvf zntarg ng Fgneohpx’f oenva;fgvyy ur xarj gung sbe nyy guvf gur puvrs zngr, va uvf fbhy, noubeerquvf pncgnva’f dhrfg, naq pbhyq ur, jbhyq wblshyyl qvfvagrtengr uvzfryssebz vg, be rira sehfgengr vg. Vg zvtug or gung n ybat vagreiny jbhyqryncfr rer gur Juvgr Junyr jnf frra. Qhevat gung ybat vagreiny Fgneohpxjbhyq rire or ncg gb snyy vagb bcra eryncfrf bs eroryyvba ntnvafg uvfpncgnva’f yrnqrefuvc, hayrff fbzr beqvanel, cehqragvny, pvephzfgnagvnyvasyhraprf jrer oebhtug gb orne hcba uvz.
