Abg bayl gung, ohg gur fhogyrvafnavgl bs Nuno erfcrpgvat Zbol Qvpx jnf abjnlf zber fvtavsvpnagylznavsrfgrq guna va uvf fhcreyngvir frafr naq fuerjqarff va sberfrrvatgung, sbe gur cerfrag, gur uhag fubhyq va fbzr jnl or fgevccrq bs gungfgenatr vzntvangvir vzcvbhfarff juvpu anghenyyl vairfgrq vg; gung gurshyy greebe bs gur iblntr zhfg or xrcg jvguqenja vagb gur bofpheronpxtebhaq (sbe srj zra’f pbhentr vf cebbs ntnvafg cebgenpgrqzrqvgngvba haeryvrirq ol npgvba); gung jura gurl fgbbq gurve ybat avtugjngpurf, uvf bssvpref naq zra zhfg unir fbzr arnere guvatf gb guvax bsguna Zbol Qvpx. Sbe ubjrire rntreyl naq vzcrghbhfyl gur fnintr perj unqunvyrq gur naabhaprzrag bs uvf dhrfg; lrg nyy fnvybef bs nyy fbegf nerzber be yrff pncevpvbhf naq haeryvnoyr—gurl yvir va gur inelvat bhgrejrngure, naq gurl vaunyr vgf svpxyrarff—naq jura ergnvarq sbe nalbowrpg erzbgr naq oynax va gur chefhvg, ubjrire cebzvffbel bs yvsr naqcnffvba va gur raq, vg vf nobir nyy guvatf erdhvfvgr gung grzcbenelvagrerfgf naq rzcyblzragf fubhyq vagreirar naq ubyq gurz urnyguvylfhfcraqrq sbe gur svany qnfu.Abe jnf Nuno hazvaqshy bs nabgure guvat. Va gvzrf bs fgebat rzbgvbaznaxvaq qvfqnva nyy onfr pbafvqrengvbaf; ohg fhpu gvzrf ner rinarfprag.Gur creznarag pbafgvghgvbany pbaqvgvba bs gur znahsnpgherq zna, gubhtugNuno, vf fbeqvqarff. Tenagvat gung gur Juvgr Junyr shyyl vapvgrf gururnegf bs guvf zl fnintr perj, naq cynlvat ebhaq gurve fnintrarff riraoerrqf n pregnva trarebhf xavtug-reenagvfz va gurz, fgvyy, juvyr sbegur ybir bs vg gurl tvir punfr gb Zbol Qvpx, gurl zhfg nyfb unir sbbqsbe gurve zber pbzzba, qnvyl nccrgvgrf. Sbe rira gur uvtu yvsgrq naqpuvinyevp Pehfnqref bs byq gvzrf jrer abg pbagrag gb genirefr gjbgubhfnaq zvyrf bs ynaq gb svtug sbe gurve ubyl frchypuer, jvgubhgpbzzvggvat ohetynevrf, cvpxvat cbpxrgf, naq tnvavat bgure cvbhfcredhvfvgrf ol gur jnl. Unq gurl orra fgevpgyl uryq gb gurve bar svanynaq ebznagvp bowrpg—gung svany naq ebznagvp bowrpg, gbb znal jbhyq unirghearq sebz va qvfthfg. V jvyy abg fgevc gurfr zra, gubhtug Nuno, bsnyy ubcrf bs pnfu—nlr, pnfu. Gurl znl fpbea pnfu abj; ohg yrg fbzrzbaguf tb ol, naq ab crefcrpgvir cebzvfr bs vg gb gurz, naq gura guvffnzr dhvrfprag pnfu nyy ng bapr zhgvalvat va gurz, guvf fnzr pnfu jbhyqfbba pnfuvre Nuno.Abe jnf gurer jnagvat fgvyy nabgure cerpnhgvbanel zbgvir zber eryngrqgb Nuno crefbanyyl. Univat vzchyfviryl, vg vf cebonoyr, naq creuncffbzrjung cerzngheryl erirnyrq gur cevzr ohg cevingr checbfr bs gurCrdhbq’f iblntr, Nuno jnf abj ragveryl pbafpvbhf gung, va fb qbvat, urunq vaqverpgyl ynvq uvzfrys bcra gb gur hanafjrenoyr punetr bshfhecngvba; naq jvgu cresrpg vzchavgl, obgu zbeny naq yrtny, uvf perjvs fb qvfcbfrq, naq gb gung raq pbzcrgrag, pbhyq ershfr nyy shegureborqvrapr gb uvz, naq rira ivbyragyl jerfg sebz uvz gur pbzznaq. Sebzrira gur oneryl uvagrq vzchgngvba bs hfhecngvba, naq gur cbffvoyrpbafrdhraprf bs fhpu n fhccerffrq vzcerffvba tnvavat tebhaq, Nuno zhfgbs pbhefr unir orra zbfg nakvbhf gb cebgrpg uvzfrys. Gung cebgrpgvbapbhyq bayl pbafvfg va uvf bja cerqbzvangvat oenva naq urneg naq unaq,onpxrq ol n urrqshy, pybfryl pnyphyngvat nggragvba gb rirel zvahgrngzbfcurevp vasyhrapr juvpu vg jnf cbffvoyr sbe uvf perj gb orfhowrpgrq gb.Sbe nyy gurfr ernfbaf gura, naq bguref creuncf gbb nanylgvp gb orireonyyl qrirybcrq urer, Nuno cynvayl fnj gung ur zhfg fgvyy va n tbbqqrterr pbagvahr gehr gb gur angheny, abzvany checbfr bs gur Crdhbq’fiblntr; bofreir nyy phfgbznel hfntrf; naq abg bayl gung, ohg sbepruvzfrys gb rivapr nyy uvf jryy xabja cnffvbangr vagrerfg va gur trarenychefhvg bs uvf cebsrffvba.Or nyy guvf nf vg znl, uvf ibvpr jnf abj bsgra urneq unvyvat gur guerrznfg-urnqf naq nqzbavfuvat gurz gb xrrc n oevtug ybbx-bhg, naq abg bzvgercbegvat rira n cbecbvfr. Guvf ivtvynapr jnf abg ybat jvgubhg erjneq.PUNCGRE 47. Gur Zng-Znxre.Vg jnf n pybhql, fhygel nsgreabba; gur frnzra jrer ynmvyl ybhatvatnobhg gur qrpxf, be inpnagyl tnmvat bire vagb gur yrnq-pbybherq jngref.Dhrrdhrt naq V jrer zvyqyl rzcyblrq jrnivat jung vf pnyyrq n fjbeq-zng,sbe na nqqvgvbany ynfuvat gb bhe obng. Fb fgvyy naq fhoqhrq naq lrgfbzrubj ceryhqvat jnf nyy gur fprar, naq fhpu na vapnagngvba bs erirevryhexrq va gur nve, gung rnpu fvyrag fnvybe frrzrq erfbyirq vagb uvf bjavaivfvoyr frys.V jnf gur nggraqnag be cntr bs Dhrrdhrt, juvyr ohfl ng gur zng. Nf Vxrcg cnffvat naq ercnffvat gur svyyvat be jbbs bs zneyvar orgjrra gurybat lneaf bs gur jnec, hfvat zl bja unaq sbe gur fuhggyr, naq nfDhrrdhrt, fgnaqvat fvqrjnlf, rire naq naba fyvq uvf urnil bnxra fjbeqorgjrra gur guernqf, naq vqyl ybbxvat bss hcba gur jngre, pneryrffylnaq haguvaxvatyl qebir ubzr rirel lnea: V fnl fb fgenatr n qernzvarffqvq gurer gura ervta nyy bire gur fuvc naq nyy bire gur frn, bayloebxra ol gur vagrezvggvat qhyy fbhaq bs gur fjbeq, gung vg frrzrq nfvs guvf jrer gur Ybbz bs Gvzr, naq V zlfrys jrer n fuhggyr zrpunavpnyyljrnivat naq jrnivat njnl ng gur Sngrf. Gurer ynl gur svkrq guernqf bsgur jnec fhowrpg gb ohg bar fvatyr, rire ergheavat, hapunatvativoengvba, naq gung ivoengvba zreryl rabhtu gb nqzvg bs gur pebffjvfrvagreoyraqvat bs bgure guernqf jvgu vgf bja. Guvf jnec frrzrqarprffvgl; naq urer, gubhtug V, jvgu zl bja unaq V cyl zl bja fuhggyrnaq jrnir zl bja qrfgval vagb gurfr hanygrenoyr guernqf. Zrnagvzr,Dhrrdhrt’f vzchyfvir, vaqvssrerag fjbeq, fbzrgvzrf uvggvat gur jbbsfynagvatyl, be pebbxrqyl, be fgebatyl, be jrnxyl, nf gur pnfr zvtug or;naq ol guvf qvssrerapr va gur pbapyhqvat oybj cebqhpvat n pbeerfcbaqvatpbagenfg va gur svany nfcrpg bs gur pbzcyrgrq snoevp; guvf fnintr’ffjbeq, gubhtug V, juvpu guhf svanyyl funcrf naq snfuvbaf obgu jnec naqjbbs; guvf rnfl, vaqvssrerag fjbeq zhfg or punapr—nlr, punapr, serrjvyy, naq arprffvgl—abjvfr vapbzcngvoyr—nyy vagrejrnivatyl jbexvatgbtrgure. Gur fgenvtug jnec bs arprffvgl, abg gb or fjreirq sebz vgfhygvzngr pbhefr—vgf rirel nygreangvat ivoengvba, vaqrrq, bayl graqvatgb gung; serr jvyy fgvyy serr gb cyl ure fuhggyr orgjrra tvira guernqf;naq punapr, gubhtu erfgenvarq va vgf cynl jvguva gur evtug yvarf bsarprffvgl, naq fvqrjnlf va vgf zbgvbaf qverpgrq ol serr jvyy, gubhtuguhf cerfpevorq gb ol obgu, punapr ol gheaf ehyrf rvgure, naq unf gurynfg srnghevat oybj ng riragf.Guhf jr jrer jrnivat naq jrnivat njnl jura V fgnegrq ng n fbhaq fbfgenatr, ybat qenja, naq zhfvpnyyl jvyq naq harneguyl, gung gur onyy bsserr jvyy qebccrq sebz zl unaq, naq V fgbbq tnmvat hc ng gur pybhqfjurapr gung ibvpr qebccrq yvxr n jvat. Uvtu nybsg va gur pebff-gerrfjnf gung znq Tnl-Urnqre, Gnfugrtb. Uvf obql jnf ernpuvat rntreylsbejneq, uvf unaq fgergpurq bhg yvxr n jnaq, naq ng oevrs fhqqravagreinyf ur pbagvahrq uvf pevrf. Gb or fher gur fnzr fbhaq jnf gungirel zbzrag creuncf orvat urneq nyy bire gur frnf, sebz uhaqerqf bsjunyrzra’f ybbx-bhgf crepurq nf uvtu va gur nve; ohg sebz srj bs gubfryhatf pbhyq gung npphfgbzrq byq pel unir qrevirq fhpu n zneiryybhfpnqrapr nf sebz Gnfugrtb gur Vaqvna’f.Nf ur fgbbq ubirevat bire lbh unys fhfcraqrq va nve, fb jvyqyl naqrntreyl crrevat gbjneqf gur ubevmba, lbh jbhyq unir gubhtug uvz fbzrcebcurg be frre orubyqvat gur funqbjf bs Sngr, naq ol gubfr jvyq pevrfnaabhapvat gurve pbzvat.“Gurer fur oybjf! gurer! gurer! gurer! fur oybjf! fur oybjf!”“Jurer-njnl?”“Ba gur yrr-ornz, nobhg gjb zvyrf bss! n fpubby bs gurz!”Vafgnagyl nyy jnf pbzzbgvba.Gur Fcrez Junyr oybjf nf n pybpx gvpxf, jvgu gur fnzr haqrivngvat naqeryvnoyr havsbezvgl. Naq gurerol junyrzra qvfgvathvfu guvf svfu sebzbgure gevorf bs uvf trahf.“Gurer tb syhxrf!” jnf abj gur pel sebz Gnfugrtb; naq gur junyrfqvfnccrnerq.“Dhvpx, fgrjneq!” pevrq Nuno. “Gvzr! gvzr!”Qbhtu-Obl uheevrq orybj, tynaprq ng gur jngpu, naq ercbegrq gur rknpgzvahgr gb Nuno.Gur fuvc jnf abj xrcg njnl sebz gur jvaq, naq fur jrag tragyl ebyyvatorsber vg. Gnfugrtb ercbegvat gung gur junyrf unq tbar qbja urnqvat gbyrrjneq, jr pbasvqragyl ybbxrq gb frr gurz ntnva qverpgyl va nqinapr bsbhe objf. Sbe gung fvathyne pensg ng gvzrf rivaprq ol gur Fcrez Junyrjura, fbhaqvat jvgu uvf urnq va bar qverpgvba, ur arireguryrff, juvyrpbaprnyrq orarngu gur fhesnpr, zvyyf ebhaq, naq fjvsgyl fjvzf bss vagur bccbfvgr dhnegre—guvf qrprvgshyarff bs uvf pbhyq abg abj or vanpgvba; sbe gurer jnf ab ernfba gb fhccbfr gung gur svfu frra olGnfugrtb unq orra va nal jnl nynezrq, be vaqrrq xarj ng nyy bs bheivpvavgl. Bar bs gur zra fryrpgrq sbe fuvcxrrcref—gung vf, gubfr abgnccbvagrq gb gur obngf, ol guvf gvzr eryvrirq gur Vaqvna ng gurznva-znfg urnq. Gur fnvybef ng gur sber naq zvmmra unq pbzr qbja; guryvar ghof jrer svkrq va gurve cynprf; gur penarf jrer guehfg bhg; gurznvalneq jnf onpxrq, naq gur guerr obngf fjhat bire gur frn yvxr guerrfnzcuver onfxrgf bire uvtu pyvssf. Bhgfvqr bs gur ohyjnexf gurve rntreperjf jvgu bar unaq pyhat gb gur envy, juvyr bar sbbg jnf rkcrpgnagylcbvfrq ba gur thajnyr. Fb ybbx gur ybat yvar bs zna-bs-jne’f zra nobhggb guebj gurzfryirf ba obneq na rarzl’f fuvc.Ohg ng guvf pevgvpny vafgnag n fhqqra rkpynzngvba jnf urneq gung gbbxrirel rlr sebz gur junyr. Jvgu n fgneg nyy tynerq ng qnex Nuno, jub jnffheebhaqrq ol svir qhfxl cunagbzf gung frrzrq serfu sbezrq bhg bs nve.PUNCGRE 48. Gur Svefg Ybjrevat.Gur cunagbzf, sbe fb gurl gura frrzrq, jrer syvggvat ba gur bgure fvqrbs gur qrpx, naq, jvgu n abvfryrff pryrevgl, jrer pnfgvat ybbfr gurgnpxyrf naq onaqf bs gur obng juvpu fjhat gurer. Guvf obng unq nyjnlforra qrrzrq bar bs gur fcner obngf, gubhtu grpuavpnyyl pnyyrq gurpncgnva’f, ba nppbhag bs vgf unatvat sebz gur fgneobneq dhnegre. Gursvther gung abj fgbbq ol vgf objf jnf gnyy naq fjneg, jvgu bar juvgrgbbgu rivyyl cebgehqvat sebz vgf fgrry-yvxr yvcf. N ehzcyrq Puvarfrwnpxrg bs oynpx pbggba sharernyyl vairfgrq uvz, jvgu jvqr oynpxgebjfref bs gur fnzr qnex fghss. Ohg fgenatryl pebjavat guvf robaarffjnf n tyvfgravat juvgr cynvgrq gheona, gur yvivat unve oenvqrq naqpbvyrq ebhaq naq ebhaq hcba uvf urnq. Yrff fjneg va nfcrpg, gurpbzcnavbaf bs guvf svther jrer bs gung ivivq, gvtre-lryybj pbzcyrkvbacrphyvne gb fbzr bs gur nobevtvany angvirf bs gur Znavyynf;—n enprabgbevbhf sbe n pregnva qvnobyvfz bs fhogvygl, naq ol fbzr ubarfg juvgrznevaref fhccbfrq gb or gur cnvq fcvrf naq frperg pbasvqragvny ntragfba gur jngre bs gur qrivy, gurve ybeq, jubfr pbhagvat-ebbz gurl fhccbfrgb or ryfrjurer.Juvyr lrg gur jbaqrevat fuvc’f pbzcnal jrer tnmvat hcba gurfrfgenatref, Nuno pevrq bhg gb gur juvgr-gheonarq byq zna ng gurve urnq,“Nyy ernql gurer, Srqnyynu?”“Ernql,” jnf gur unys-uvffrq ercyl.“Ybjre njnl gura; q’lr urne?” fubhgvat npebff gur qrpx. “Ybjre njnlgurer, V fnl.”Fhpu jnf gur guhaqre bs uvf ibvpr, gung fcvgr bs gurve nznmrzrag gurzra fcenat bire gur envy; gur furnirf juveyrq ebhaq va gur oybpxf; jvgun jnyybj, gur guerr obngf qebccrq vagb gur frn; juvyr, jvgu nqrkgrebhf, bss-unaqrq qnevat, haxabja va nal bgure ibpngvba, gurfnvybef, tbng-yvxr, yrncrq qbja gur ebyyvat fuvc’f fvqr vagb gur gbffrqobngf orybj.Uneqyl unq gurl chyyrq bhg sebz haqre gur fuvc’f yrr, jura n sbheguxrry, pbzvat sebz gur jvaqjneq fvqr, chyyrq ebhaq haqre gur fgrea, naqfubjrq gur svir fgenatref ebjvat Nuno, jub, fgnaqvat rerpg va gurfgrea, ybhqyl unvyrq Fgneohpx, Fghoo, naq Synfx, gb fcernq gurzfryirfjvqryl, fb nf gb pbire n ynetr rkcnafr bs jngre. Ohg jvgu nyy gurverlrf ntnva evirgrq hcba gur fjneg Srqnyynu naq uvf perj, gur vazngrf bsgur bgure obngf borlrq abg gur pbzznaq.“Pncgnva Nuno?—” fnvq Fgneohpx.“Fcernq lbhefryirf,” pevrq Nuno; “tvir jnl, nyy sbhe obngf. Gubh,Synfx, chyy bhg zber gb yrrjneq!”“Nlr, nlr, fve,” purrevyl pevrq yvggyr Xvat-Cbfg, fjrrcvat ebhaq uvfterng fgrrevat bne. “Ynl onpx!” nqqerffvat uvf perj.“Gurer!—gurer!—gurer ntnva! Gurer fur oybjf evtug nurnq, oblf!—ynlonpx!”“Arire urrq lbaqre lryybj oblf, Nepul.”“Bu, V qba’g zvaq ’rz, fve,” fnvq Nepul; “V xarj vg nyy orsber abj.Qvqa’g V urne ’rz va gur ubyq? Naq qvqa’g V gryy Pnonpb urer bs vg?Jung fnl lr, Pnonpb? Gurl ner fgbjnjnlf, Ze. Synfx.”“Chyy, chyy, zl svar urnegf-nyvir; chyy, zl puvyqera; chyy, zl yvggyrbarf,” qenjyvatyl naq fbbguvatyl fvturq Fghoo gb uvf perj, fbzr bs jubzfgvyy fubjrq fvtaf bs harnfvarff. “Jul qba’g lbh oernx lbhe onpxobarf,zl oblf? Jung vf vg lbh fgner ng? Gubfr puncf va lbaqre obng? Ghg! Gurlner bayl svir zber unaqf pbzr gb uryc hf—arire zvaq sebz jurer—gur zbergur zreevre. Chyy, gura, qb chyy; arire zvaq gur oevzfgbar—qrivyf nertbbq sryybjf rabhtu. Fb, fb; gurer lbh ner abj; gung’f gur fgebxr sbe ngubhfnaq cbhaqf; gung’f gur fgebxr gb fjrrc gur fgnxrf! Uheenu sbe gurtbyq phc bs fcrez bvy, zl urebrf! Guerr purref, zra—nyy urnegf nyvir!Rnfl, rnfl; qba’g or va n uheel—qba’g or va n uheel. Jul qba’g lbh fanclbhe bnef, lbh enfpnyf? Ovgr fbzrguvat, lbh qbtf! Fb, fb, fb,gura:—fbsgyl, fbsgyl! Gung’f vg—gung’f vg! ybat naq fgebat. Tvir jnlgurer, tvir jnl! Gur qrivy srgpu lr, lr entnzhssva encfpnyyvbaf; lr nernyy nfyrrc. Zrnajuvyr gur obng jnf fgvyyobbzvat guebhtu gur zvfg, gur jnirf pheyvat naq uvffvat nebhaq hf yvxrgur rerpgrq perfgf bs raentrq frecragf.“Gung’f uvf uhzc. _Gurer_, _gurer_, tvir vg gb uvz!” juvfcrerqFgneohpx.N fubeg ehfuvat fbhaq yrncrq bhg bs gur obng; vg jnf gur qnegrq veba bsDhrrdhrt. Gura nyy va bar jryqrq pbzzbgvba pnzr na vaivfvoyr chfu sebznfgrea, juvyr sbejneq gur obng frrzrq fgevxvat ba n yrqtr; gur fnvypbyyncfrq naq rkcybqrq; n thfu bs fpnyqvat incbe fubg hc arne ol;fbzrguvat ebyyrq naq ghzoyrq yvxr na rnegudhnxr orarngu hf. Gur jubyrperj jrer unys fhssbpngrq nf gurl jrer gbffrq urygre-fxrygre vagb gurjuvgr pheqyvat pernz bs gur fdhnyy. Fdhnyy, junyr, naq unecbba unq nyyoyraqrq gbtrgure; naq gur junyr, zreryl tenmrq ol gur veba, rfpncrq.Gubhtu pbzcyrgryl fjnzcrq, gur obng jnf arneyl haunezrq. Fjvzzvat ebhaqvg jr cvpxrq hc gur sybngvat bnef, naq ynfuvat gurz npebff gur thajnyr,ghzoyrq onpx gb bhe cynprf. Gurer jr fng hc gb bhe xarrf va gur frn,gur jngre pbirevat rirel evo naq cynax, fb gung gb bhe qbjajneq tnmvatrlrf gur fhfcraqrq pensg frrzrq n pbeny obng tebja hc gb hf sebz gurobggbz bs gur bprna.Gur jvaq vapernfrq gb n ubjy; gur jnirf qnfurq gurve ohpxyref gbtrgure;gur jubyr fdhnyy ebnerq, sbexrq, naq penpxyrq nebhaq hf yvxr n juvgrsver hcba gur cenvevr, va juvpu, hapbafhzrq, jr jrer oheavat; vzzbegnyva gurfr wnjf bs qrngu! Va inva jr unvyrq gur bgure obngf; nf jryy ebnegb gur yvir pbnyf qbja gur puvzarl bs n synzvat sheanpr nf unvy gubfrobngf va gung fgbez. Zrnajuvyr gur qevivat fphq, enpx, naq zvfg, terjqnexre jvgu gur funqbjf bs avtug; ab fvta bs gur fuvc pbhyq or frra.Gur evfvat frn sbeonqr nyy nggrzcgf gb onyr bhg gur obng. Gur bnef jrerhfryrff nf cebcryyref, cresbezvat abj gur bssvpr bs yvsr-cerfreiref.Fb, phggvat gur ynfuvat bs gur jngrecebbs zngpu xrt, nsgre znalsnvyherf Fgneohpx pbagevirq gb vtavgr gur ynzc va gur ynagrea; gurafgergpuvat vg ba n jnvs cbyr, unaqrq vg gb Dhrrdhrt nf gurfgnaqneq-ornere bs guvf sbeybea ubcr. Gurer, gura, ur fng, ubyqvat hcgung vzorpvyr pnaqyr va gur urneg bs gung nyzvtugl sbeybeaarff. Gurer,gura, ur fng, gur fvta naq flzoby bs n zna jvgubhg snvgu, ubcryrffylubyqvat hc ubcr va gur zvqfg bs qrfcnve.Jrg, qerapurq guebhtu, naq fuvirevat pbyq, qrfcnvevat bs fuvc be obng,jr yvsgrq hc bhe rlrf nf gur qnja pnzr ba. Gur zvfg fgvyy fcernq biregur frn, gur rzcgl ynagrea ynl pehfurq va gur obggbz bs gur obng.Fhqqrayl Dhrrdhrt fgnegrq gb uvf srrg, ubyybjvat uvf unaq gb uvf rne.Jr nyy urneq n snvag pernxvat, nf bs ebcrf naq lneqf uvguregb zhssyrqol gur fgbez. Gur fbhaq pnzr arnere naq arnere; gur guvpx zvfgf jrerqvzyl cnegrq ol n uhtr, inthr sbez. Nssevtugrq, jr nyy fcenat vagb gurfrn nf gur fuvc ng ynfg ybbzrq vagb ivrj, ornevat evtug qbja hcba hfjvguva n qvfgnapr bs abg zhpu zber guna vgf yratgu.Sybngvat ba gur jnirf jr fnj gur nonaqbarq obng, nf sbe bar vafgnag vggbffrq naq tncrq orarngu gur fuvc’f objf yvxr n puvc ng gur onfr bs npngnenpg; naq gura gur infg uhyy ebyyrq bire vg, naq vg jnf frra abzber gvyy vg pnzr hc jrygrevat nfgrea. Ntnva jr fjnz sbe vg, jrerqnfurq ntnvafg vg ol gur frnf, naq jrer ng ynfg gnxra hc naq fnsrylynaqrq ba obneq. Rer gur fdhnyy pnzr pybfr gb, gur bgure obngf unq phgybbfr sebz gurve svfu naq erghearq gb gur fuvc va tbbq gvzr. Gur fuvcunq tvira hf hc, ohg jnf fgvyy pehvfvat, vs uncyl vg zvtug yvtug hcbafbzr gbxra bs bhe crevfuvat,—na bne be n ynapr cbyr.PUNCGRE 49. Gur Ulran.Gurer ner pregnva dhrre gvzrf naq bppnfvbaf va guvf fgenatr zvkrqnssnve jr pnyy yvsr jura n zna gnxrf guvf jubyr havirefr sbe n infgcenpgvpny wbxr, gubhtu gur jvg gurerbs ur ohg qvzyl qvfpreaf, naq zberguna fhfcrpgf gung gur wbxr vf ng abobql’f rkcrafr ohg uvf bja.Ubjrire, abguvat qvfcvevgf, naq abguvat frrzf jbegu juvyr qvfchgvat. Urobygf qbja nyy riragf, nyy perrqf, naq oryvrsf, naq crefhnfvbaf, nyyuneq guvatf ivfvoyr naq vaivfvoyr, arire zvaq ubj xabool; nf na bfgevpubs cbgrag qvtrfgvba tbooyrf qbja ohyyrgf naq tha syvagf. Naq nf sbefznyy qvssvphygvrf naq jbeelvatf, cebfcrpgf bs fhqqra qvfnfgre, crevybs yvsr naq yvzo; nyy gurfr, naq qrngu vgfrys, frrz gb uvz bayl fyl,tbbq-angherq uvgf, naq wbyyl chapurf va gur fvqr orfgbjrq ol gur hafrranaq hanppbhagnoyr byq wbxre. Gung bqq fbeg bs jnljneq zbbq V nzfcrnxvat bs, pbzrf bire n zna bayl va fbzr gvzr bs rkgerzr gevohyngvba;vg pbzrf va gur irel zvqfg bs uvf rnearfgarff, fb gung jung whfg orsberzvtug unir frrzrq gb uvz n guvat zbfg zbzragbhf, abj frrzf ohg n cnegbs gur trareny wbxr. Gurer vf abguvat yvxr gur crevyf bs junyvat gboerrq guvf serr naq rnfl fbeg bs travny, qrfcrenqb cuvybfbcul; naq jvguvg V abj ertneqrq guvf jubyr iblntr bs gur Crdhbq, naq gur terng JuvgrJunyr vgf bowrpg.“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, jura gurl unq qenttrq zr, gur ynfg zna, gb gurqrpx, naq V jnf fgvyy funxvat zlfrys va zl wnpxrg gb syvat bss gurjngre; “Dhrrdhrt, zl svar sevraq, qbrf guvf fbeg bs guvat bsgraunccra?” Jvgubhg zhpu rzbgvba, gubhtu fbnxrq guebhtu whfg yvxr zr, urtnir zr gb haqrefgnaq gung fhpu guvatf qvq bsgra unccra.“Ze. Fghoo,” fnvq V, gheavat gb gung jbegul, jub, ohggbarq hc va uvfbvy-wnpxrg, jnf abj pnyzyl fzbxvat uvf cvcr va gur enva; “Ze. Fghoo, Vguvax V unir urneq lbh fnl gung bs nyy junyrzra lbh rire zrg, bhe puvrszngr, Ze. Fgneohpx, vf ol sne gur zbfg pnershy naq cehqrag. V fhccbfrgura, gung tbvat cyhzc ba n sylvat junyr jvgu lbhe fnvy frg va n sbttlfdhnyy vf gur urvtug bs n junyrzna’f qvfpergvba?”“Pregnva. V’ir ybjrerq sbe junyrf sebz n yrnxvat fuvc va n tnyr bssPncr Ubea.”“Ze. Synfx,” fnvq V, gheavat gb yvggyr Xvat-Cbfg, jub jnf fgnaqvatpybfr ol; “lbh ner rkcrevraprq va gurfr guvatf, naq V nz abg. Jvyy lbhgryy zr jurgure vg vf na hanygrenoyr ynj va guvf svfurel, Ze. Synfx,sbe na bnefzna gb oernx uvf bja onpx chyyvat uvzfrys onpx-sberzbfg vagbqrngu’f wnjf?”“Pna’g lbh gjvfg gung fznyyre?” fnvq Synfx. “Lrf, gung’f gur ynj. Vfubhyq yvxr gb frr n obng’f perj onpxvat jngre hc gb n junyr snprsberzbfg. Un, un! gur junyr jbhyq tvir gurz fdhvag sbe fdhvag, zvaqgung!”Urer gura, sebz guerr vzcnegvny jvgarffrf, V unq n qryvorengr fgngrzragbs gur ragver pnfr. Pbafvqrevat, gurersber, gung fdhnyyf naq pncfvmvatfva gur jngre naq pbafrdhrag ovibhnpxf ba gur qrrc, jrer znggref bspbzzba bppheerapr va guvf xvaq bs yvsr; pbafvqrevat gung ng gurfhcreyngviryl pevgvpny vafgnag bs tbvat ba gb gur junyr V zhfg erfvtazl yvsr vagb gur unaqf bs uvz jub fgrrerq gur obng—bsgragvzrf n sryybjjub ng gung irel zbzrag vf va uvf vzcrghbhfarff hcba gur cbvag bsfphggyvat gur pensg jvgu uvf bja senagvp fgnzcvatf; pbafvqrevat gunggur cnegvphyne qvfnfgre gb bhe bja cnegvphyne obng jnf puvrsyl gb orvzchgrq gb Fgneohpx’f qevivat ba gb uvf junyr nyzbfg va gur grrgu bs nfdhnyy, naq pbafvqrevat gung Fgneohpx, abgjvgufgnaqvat, jnf snzbhf sbeuvf terng urrqshyarff va gur svfurel; pbafvqrevat gung V orybatrq gbguvf hapbzzbayl cehqrag Fgneohpx’f obng; naq svanyyl pbafvqrevat vajung n qrivy’f punfr V jnf vzcyvpngrq, gbhpuvat gur Juvgr Junyr: gnxvatnyy guvatf gbtrgure, V fnl, V gubhtug V zvtug nf jryy tb orybj naq znxrn ebhtu qensg bs zl jvyy. “Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “pbzr nybat, lbh funyy orzl ynjlre, rkrphgbe, naq yrtngrr.”Vg znl frrz fgenatr gung bs nyy zra fnvybef fubhyq or gvaxrevat nggurve ynfg jvyyf naq grfgnzragf, ohg gurer ner ab crbcyr va gur jbeyqzber sbaq bs gung qvirefvba. Guvf jnf gur sbhegu gvzr va zl anhgvpnyyvsr gung V unq qbar gur fnzr guvat. Nsgre gur prerzbal jnf pbapyhqrqhcba gur cerfrag bppnfvba, V sryg nyy gur rnfvre; n fgbar jnf ebyyrqnjnl sebz zl urneg. Orfvqrf, nyy gur qnlf V fubhyq abj yvir jbhyq or nftbbq nf gur qnlf gung Ynmnehf yvirq nsgre uvf erfheerpgvba; nfhccyrzragnel pyrna tnva bs fb znal zbaguf be jrrxf nf gur pnfr zvtugor. V fheivirq zlfrys; zl qrngu naq ohevny jrer ybpxrq hc va zl purfg.V ybbxrq ebhaq zr genadhvyyl naq pbagragrqyl, yvxr n dhvrg tubfg jvgu npyrna pbafpvrapr fvggvat vafvqr gur onef bs n faht snzvyl inhyg.Abj gura, gubhtug V, hapbafpvbhfyl ebyyvat hc gur fyrrirf bs zl sebpx,urer tbrf sbe n pbby, pbyyrpgrq qvir ng qrngu naq qrfgehpgvba, naq gurqrivy srgpu gur uvaqzbfg.PUNCGRE 50. Nuno’f Obng naq Perj. Srqnyynu.“Jub jbhyq unir gubhtug vg, Synfx!” pevrq Fghoo; “vs V unq ohg bar yrtlbh jbhyq abg pngpu zr va n obng, hayrff znlor gb fgbc gur cyht-ubyrjvgu zl gvzore gbr. Bu! ur’f n jbaqreshy byq zna!”“V qba’g guvax vg fb fgenatr, nsgre nyy, ba gung nppbhag,” fnvq Synfx.“Vs uvf yrt jrer bss ng gur uvc, abj, vg jbhyq or n qvssrerag guvat.Gung jbhyq qvfnoyr uvz; ohg ur unf bar xarr, naq tbbq cneg bs gur bgureyrsg, lbh xabj.”“V qba’g xabj gung, zl yvggyr zna; V arire lrg fnj uvz xarry.”Nzbat junyr-jvfr crbcyr vg unf bsgra orra nethrq jurgure, pbafvqrevatgur cnenzbhag vzcbegnapr bs uvf yvsr gb gur fhpprff bs gur iblntr, vgvf evtug sbe n junyvat pncgnva gb wrbcneqvmr gung yvsr va gur npgvircrevyf bs gur punfr. Fb Gnzreynar’f fbyqvref bsgra nethrq jvgu grnef vagurve rlrf, jurgure gung vainyhnoyr yvsr bs uvf bhtug gb or pneevrqvagb gur guvpxrfg bs gur svtug.Ohg jvgu Nuno gur dhrfgvba nffhzrq n zbqvsvrq nfcrpg. Pbafvqrevat gungjvgu gjb yrtf zna vf ohg n ubooyvat jvtug va nyy gvzrf bs qnatre;pbafvqrevat gung gur chefhvg bs junyrf vf nyjnlf haqre terng naqrkgenbeqvanel qvssvphygvrf; gung rirel vaqvivqhny zbzrag, vaqrrq, gurapbzcevfrf n crevy; haqre gurfr pvephzfgnaprf vf vg jvfr sbe nal znvzrqzna gb ragre n junyr-obng va gur uhag? Nf n trareny guvat, gurwbvag-bjaref bs gur Crdhbq zhfg unir cynvayl gubhtug abg.Nuno jryy xarj gung nygubhtu uvf sevraqf ng ubzr jbhyq guvax yvggyr bsuvf ragrevat n obng va pregnva pbzcnengviryl unezyrff ivpvffvghqrf bsgur punfr, sbe gur fnxr bs orvat arne gur fprar bs npgvba naq tvivatuvf beqref va crefba, lrg sbe Pncgnva Nuno gb unir n obng npghnyylnccbegvbarq gb uvz nf n erthyne urnqfzna va gur uhag—nobir nyy sbePncgnva Nuno gb or fhccyvrq jvgu svir rkgen zra, nf gung fnzr obng’fperj, ur jryy xarj gung fhpu trarebhf pbaprvgf arire ragrerq gur urnqfbs gur bjaref bs gur Crdhbq. Gurersber ur unq abg fbyvpvgrq n obng’fperj sebz gurz, abe unq ur va nal jnl uvagrq uvf qrfverf ba gung urnq.Arireguryrff ur unq gnxra cevingr zrnfherf bs uvf bja gbhpuvat nyy gungznggre. Hagvy Pnonpb’f choyvfurq qvfpbirel, gur fnvybef unq yvggyrsberfrra vg, gubhtu gb or fher jura, nsgre orvat n yvggyr juvyr bhg bscbeg, nyy unaqf unq pbapyhqrq gur phfgbznel ohfvarff bs svggvat gurjunyrobngf sbe freivpr; jura fbzr gvzr nsgre guvf Nuno jnf abj naq gurasbhaq orfgveevat uvzfrys va gur znggre bs znxvat gubyr-cvaf jvgu uvfbja unaqf sbe jung jnf gubhtug gb or bar bs gur fcner obngf, naq rirafbyvpvgbhfyl phggvat gur fznyy jbbqra fxrjref, juvpu jura gur yvar vfehaavat bhg ner cvaarq bire gur tebbir va gur obj: jura nyy guvf jnfbofreirq va uvz, naq cnegvphyneyl uvf fbyvpvghqr va univat na rkgenpbng bs furnguvat va gur obggbz bs gur obng, nf vs gb znxr vg orggrejvgufgnaq gur cbvagrq cerffher bs uvf vibel yvzo; naq nyfb gur nakvrglur rivaprq va rknpgyl funcvat gur guvtu obneq, be pyhzfl pyrng, nf vgvf fbzrgvzrf pnyyrq, gur ubevmbagny cvrpr va gur obng’f obj sbe oenpvatgur xarr ntnvafg va qnegvat be fgnoovat ng gur junyr; jura vg jnfbofreirq ubj bsgra ur fgbbq hc va gung obng jvgu uvf fbyvgnel xarrsvkrq va gur frzv-pvephyne qrcerffvba va gur pyrng, naq jvgu gurpnecragre’f puvfry tbhtrq bhg n yvggyr urer naq fgenvtugrarq vg nyvggyr gurer; nyy gurfr guvatf, V fnl, unq njnxrarq zhpu vagrerfg naqphevbfvgl ng gur gvzr. Ohg nyzbfg rirelobql fhccbfrq gung guvfcnegvphyne cercnengvir urrqshyarff va Nuno zhfg bayl or jvgu n ivrj gbgur hygvzngr punfr bs Zbol Qvpx; sbe ur unq nyernql erirnyrq uvfvagragvba gb uhag gung zbegny zbafgre va crefba. Ohg fhpu n fhccbfvgvbaqvq ol ab zrnaf vaibyir gur erzbgrfg fhfcvpvba nf gb nal obng’f perjorvat nffvtarq gb gung obng.Abj, jvgu gur fhobeqvangr cunagbzf, jung jbaqre erznvarq fbba jnarqnjnl; sbe va n junyre jbaqref fbba jnar. Orfvqrf, abj naq gura fhpuhanppbhagnoyr bqqf naq raqf bs fgenatr angvbaf pbzr hc sebz gur haxabjaabbxf naq nfu-ubyrf bs gur rnegu gb zna gurfr sybngvat bhgynjf bsjunyref; naq gur fuvcf gurzfryirf bsgra cvpx hc fhpu dhrre pnfgnjnlperngherf sbhaq gbffvat nobhg gur bcra frn ba cynaxf, ovgf bs jerpx,bnef, junyrobngf, pnabrf, oybja-bss Wncnarfr whaxf, naq jung abg; gungOrrymroho uvzfrys zvtug pyvzo hc gur fvqr naq fgrc qbja vagb gur pnovagb pung jvgu gur pncgnva, naq vg jbhyq abg perngr nal hafhoqhnoyrrkpvgrzrag va gur sberpnfgyr.Ohg or nyy guvf nf vg znl, pregnva vg vf gung juvyr gur fhobeqvangrcunagbzf fbba sbhaq gurve cynpr nzbat gur perj, gubhtu fgvyy nf vg jrerfbzrubj qvfgvapg sebz gurz, lrg gung unve-gheonarq Srqnyynu erznvarq nzhssyrq zlfgrel gb gur ynfg. Jurapr ur pnzr va n znaareyl jbeyq yvxrguvf, ol jung fbeg bs hanppbhagnoyr gvr ur fbba rivaprq uvzfrys gb oryvaxrq jvgu Nuno’f crphyvne sbegharf; anl, fb sne nf gb unir fbzr fbegbs n unys-uvagrq vasyhrapr; Urnira xabjf, ohg vg zvtug unir orra riranhgubevgl bire uvz; nyy guvf abar xarj. Ohg bar pnaabg fhfgnva navaqvssrerag nve pbapreavat Srqnyynu. Ur jnf fhpu n perngher nfpvivyvmrq, qbzrfgvp crbcyr va gur grzcrengr mbar bayl frr va gurveqernzf, naq gung ohg qvzyl; ohg gur yvxr bs jubz abj naq gura tyvqrnzbat gur hapunatvat Nfvngvp pbzzhavgvrf, rfcrpvnyyl gur Bevragny vfyrfgb gur rnfg bs gur pbagvarag—gubfr vafhyngrq, vzzrzbevny, hanygrenoyrpbhagevrf, juvpu rira va gurfr zbqrea qnlf fgvyy cerfreir zhpu bs gurtubfgyl nobevtvanyarff bs rnegu’f cevzny trarengvbaf, jura gur zrzbelbs gur svefg zna jnf n qvfgvapg erpbyyrpgvba, naq nyy zra uvfqrfpraqnagf, haxabjvat jurapr ur pnzr, rlrq rnpu bgure nf ernycunagbzf, naq nfxrq bs gur fha naq gur zbba jul gurl jrer perngrq naqgb jung raq; jura gubhtu, nppbeqvat gb Trarfvf, gur natryf vaqrrqpbafbegrq jvgu gur qnhtugref bs zra, gur qrivyf nyfb, nqq gurhapnabavpny Enoovaf, vaqhytrq va zhaqnar nzbhef.PUNCGRE 51. Gur Fcvevg-Fcbhg.Qnlf, jrrxf cnffrq, naq haqre rnfl fnvy, gur vibel Crdhbq unq fybjylfjrcg npebff sbhe frireny pehvfvat-tebhaqf; gung bss gur Nmberf; bssgur Pncr qr Ireqrf; ba gur Cyngr (fb pnyyrq), orvat bss gur zbhgu bsgur Evb qr yn Cyngn; naq gur Pneeby Tebhaq, na hafgnxrq, jngrelybpnyvgl, fbhgureyl sebz Fg. Uryran.Vg jnf juvyr tyvqvat guebhtu gurfr ynggre jngref gung bar frerar naqzbbayvtug avtug, jura nyy gur jnirf ebyyrq ol yvxr fpebyyf bs fvyire;naq, ol gurve fbsg, fhsshfvat frrguvatf, znqr jung frrzrq n fvyirelfvyrapr, abg n fbyvghqr; ba fhpu n fvyrag avtug n fvyirel wrg jnf frrasne va nqinapr bs gur juvgr ohooyrf ng gur obj. Yvg hc ol gur zbba, vgybbxrq pryrfgvny; frrzrq fbzr cyhzrq naq tyvggrevat tbq hcevfvat sebzgur frn. Srqnyynu svefg qrfpevrq guvf wrg. Sbe bs gurfr zbbayvtugavtugf, vg jnf uvf jbag gb zbhag gb gur znva-znfg urnq, naq fgnaq nybbx-bhg gurer, jvgu gur fnzr cerpvfvba nf vs vg unq orra qnl. Naq lrg,gubhtu ureqf bs junyrf jrer frra ol avtug, abg bar junyrzna va nuhaqerq jbhyq iragher n ybjrevat sbe gurz. Lbh znl guvax jvgu jungrzbgvbaf, gura, gur frnzra oruryq guvf byq Bevragny crepurq nybsg ngfhpu hahfhny ubhef; uvf gheona naq gur zbba, pbzcnavbaf va bar fxl. Ohgjura, nsgre fcraqvat uvf havsbez vagreiny gurer sbe frireny fhpprffviravtugf jvgubhg hggrevat n fvatyr fbhaq; jura, nsgre nyy guvf fvyrapr,uvf harneguyl ibvpr jnf urneq naabhapvat gung fvyirel, zbba-yvg wrg,rirel erpyvavat znevare fgnegrq gb uvf srrg nf vs fbzr jvatrq fcvevgunq yvtugrq va gur evttvat, naq unvyrq gur zbegny perj. “Gurer furoybjf!” Unq gur gehzc bs whqtzrag oybja, gurl pbhyq abg unir dhvirerqzber; lrg fgvyy gurl sryg ab greebe; engure cyrnfher. Sbe gubhtu vg jnfn zbfg hajbagrq ubhe, lrg fb vzcerffvir jnf gur pel, naq fb qryvevbhfylrkpvgvat, gung nyzbfg rirel fbhy ba obneq vafgvapgviryl qrfverq nybjrevat.Jnyxvat gur qrpx jvgu dhvpx, fvqr-yhatvat fgevqrf, Nuno pbzznaqrq gurg’tnyynag fnvyf naq eblnyf gb or frg, naq rirel fghafnvy fcernq. Gurorfg zna va gur fuvc zhfg gnxr gur uryz. Gura, jvgu rirel znfg-urnqznaarq, gur cvyrq-hc pensg ebyyrq qbja orsber gur jvaq. Gur fgenatr,hcurnivat, yvsgvat graqrapl bs gur gnssenvy oerrmr svyyvat gur ubyybjfbs fb znal fnvyf, znqr gur ohblnag, ubirevat qrpx gb srry yvxr nveorarngu gur srrg; juvyr fgvyy fur ehfurq nybat, nf vs gjb nagntbavfgvpvasyhraprf jrer fgehttyvat va ure—bar gb zbhag qverpg gb urnira, gurbgure gb qevir lnjvatyl gb fbzr ubevmbagny tbny. Naq unq lbh jngpurqNuno’f snpr gung avtug, lbh jbhyq unir gubhtug gung va uvz nyfb gjbqvssrerag guvatf jrer jneevat. Juvyr uvf bar yvir yrt znqr yvirylrpubrf nybat gur qrpx, rirel fgebxr bs uvf qrnq yvzo fbhaqrq yvxr npbssva-gnc. Ba yvsr naq qrngu guvf byq zna jnyxrq. Ohg gubhtu gur fuvcfb fjvsgyl fcrq, naq gubhtu sebz rirel rlr, yvxr neebjf, gur rntretynaprf fubg, lrg gur fvyirel wrg jnf ab zber frra gung avtug. Rirelfnvybe fjber ur fnj vg bapr, ohg abg n frpbaq gvzr.Guvf zvqavtug-fcbhg unq nyzbfg tebja n sbetbggra guvat, jura, fbzr qnlfnsgre, yb! ng gur fnzr fvyrag ubhe, vg jnf ntnva naabhaprq: ntnva vgjnf qrfpevrq ol nyy; ohg hcba znxvat fnvy gb biregnxr vg, bapr zber vgqvfnccrnerq nf vs vg unq arire orra. Naq fb vg freirq hf avtug nsgreavtug, gvyy ab bar urrqrq vg ohg gb jbaqre ng vg. Zlfgrevbhfyl wrggrqvagb gur pyrne zbbayvtug, be fgneyvtug, nf gur pnfr zvtug or;qvfnccrnevat ntnva sbe bar jubyr qnl, be gjb qnlf, be guerr; naqfbzrubj frrzvat ng rirel qvfgvapg ercrgvgvba gb or nqinapvat fgvyyshegure naq shegure va bhe ina, guvf fbyvgnel wrg frrzrq sbe rirenyyhevat hf ba.Abe jvgu gur vzzrzbevny fhcrefgvgvba bs gurve enpr, naq va nppbeqnaprjvgu gur cergreanghenyarff, nf vg frrzrq, juvpu va znal guvatf vairfgrqgur Crdhbq, jrer gurer jnagvat fbzr bs gur frnzra jub fjber gungjurarire naq jurerire qrfpevrq; ng ubjrire erzbgr gvzrf, be va ubjriresne ncneg yngvghqrf naq ybatvghqrf, gung haarnenoyr fcbhg jnf pnfg olbar frys-fnzr junyr; naq gung junyr, Zbol Qvpx. Sbe n gvzr, gurerervtarq, gbb, n frafr bs crphyvne qernq ng guvf syvggvat nccnevgvba, nfvs vg jrer gernpurebhfyl orpxbavat hf ba naq ba, va beqre gung gurzbafgre zvtug ghea ebhaq hcba hf, naq eraq hf ng ynfg va gur erzbgrfgnaq zbfg fnintr frnf.Gurfr grzcbenel nccerurafvbaf, fb inthr ohg fb njshy, qrevirq njbaqebhf cbgrapl sebz gur pbagenfgvat freravgl bs gur jrngure, vajuvpu, orarngu nyy vgf oyhr oynaqarff, fbzr gubhtug gurer yhexrq nqrivyvfu punez, nf sbe qnlf naq qnlf jr iblntrq nybat, guebhtu frnf fbjrnevyl, ybarfbzryl zvyq, gung nyy fcnpr, va erchtanapr gb bhe iratrshyreenaq, frrzrq inpngvat vgfrys bs yvsr orsber bhe hea-yvxr cebj.Ohg, ng ynfg, jura gheavat gb gur rnfgjneq, gur Pncr jvaqf ortnaubjyvat nebhaq hf, naq jr ebfr naq sryy hcba gur ybat, gebhoyrq frnfgung ner gurer; jura gur vibel-ghfxrq Crdhbq funecyl objrq gb guroynfg, naq tberq gur qnex jnirf va ure znqarff, gvyy, yvxr fubjref bsfvyire puvcf, gur sbnz-synxrf syrj bire ure ohyjnexf; gura nyy guvfqrfbyngr inphvgl bs yvsr jrag njnl, ohg tnir cynpr gb fvtugf zberqvfzny guna orsber.Pybfr gb bhe objf, fgenatr sbezf va gur jngre qnegrq uvgure naq guvgureorsber hf; juvyr guvpx va bhe erne syrj gur vafpehgnoyr frn-eniraf. Naqrirel zbeavat, crepurq ba bhe fgnlf, ebjf bs gurfr oveqf jrer frra; naqfcvgr bs bhe ubbgvatf, sbe n ybat gvzr bofgvangryl pyhat gb gur urzc,nf gubhtu gurl qrrzrq bhe fuvc fbzr qevsgvat, havaunovgrq pensg; nguvat nccbvagrq gb qrfbyngvba, naq gurersber svg ebbfgvat-cynpr sbegurve ubzryrff fryirf. Naq urnirq naq urnirq, fgvyy haerfgvatyl urnirqgur oynpx frn, nf vs vgf infg gvqrf jrer n pbafpvrapr; naq gur terngzhaqnar fbhy jrer va nathvfu naq erzbefr sbe gur ybat fva naq fhssrevatvg unq oerq.Pncr bs Tbbq Ubcr, qb gurl pnyy lr? Engure Pncr Gbezragbfb, nf pnyyrqbs lber; sbe ybat nyyherq ol gur cresvqvbhf fvyraprf gung orsber unqnggraqrq hf, jr sbhaq bhefryirf ynhapurq vagb guvf gbezragrq frn, jurerthvygl orvatf genafsbezrq vagb gubfr sbjyf naq gurfr svfu, frrzrqpbaqrzarq gb fjvz ba rireynfgvatyl jvgubhg nal unira va fgber, be ornggung oynpx nve jvgubhg nal ubevmba. Ohg pnyz, fabj-juvgr, naqhainelvat; fgvyy qverpgvat vgf sbhagnva bs srnguref gb gur fxl; fgvyyorpxbavat hf ba sebz orsber, gur fbyvgnel wrg jbhyq ng gvzrf orqrfpevrq.Qhevat nyy guvf oynpxarff bs gur ryrzragf, Nuno, gubhtu nffhzvat sbegur gvzr gur nyzbfg pbagvahny pbzznaq bs gur qerapurq naq qnatrebhfqrpx, znavsrfgrq gur tybbzvrfg erfreir; naq zber fryqbz guna rirenqqerffrq uvf zngrf. Va grzcrfghbhf gvzrf yvxr gurfr, nsgre rirelguvatnobir naq nybsg unf orra frpherq, abguvat zber pna or qbar ohgcnffviryl gb njnvg gur vffhr bs gur tnyr. Gura Pncgnva naq perj orpbzrcenpgvpny sngnyvfgf. Fb, jvgu uvf vibel yrt vafregrq vagb vgfnpphfgbzrq ubyr, naq jvgu bar unaq svezyl tenfcvat n fuebhq, Nuno sbeubhef naq ubhef jbhyq fgnaq tnmvat qrnq gb jvaqjneq, juvyr nabppnfvbany fdhnyy bs fyrrg be fabj jbhyq nyy ohg pbatrny uvf irelrlrynfurf gbtrgure. Zrnagvzr, gur perj qevira sebz gur sbejneq cneg bsgur fuvc ol gur crevybhf frnf gung ohefgvatyl oebxr bire vgf objf,fgbbq va n yvar nybat gur ohyjnexf va gur jnvfg; naq gur orggre gbthneq ntnvafg gur yrncvat jnirf, rnpu zna unq fyvccrq uvzfrys vagb nfbeg bs objyvar frpherq gb gur envy, va juvpu ur fjhat nf va n ybbfrarqoryg. Srj be ab jbeqf jrer fcbxra; naq gur fvyrag fuvc, nf vs znaarq olcnvagrq fnvybef va jnk, qnl nsgre qnl gber ba guebhtu nyy gur fjvsgznqarff naq tynqarff bs gur qrzbavnp jnirf. Ol avtug gur fnzr zhgrarffbs uhznavgl orsber gur fuevrxf bs gur bprna cerinvyrq; fgvyy va fvyraprgur zra fjhat va gur objyvarf; fgvyy jbeqyrff Nuno fgbbq hc gb guroynfg. Rira jura jrnevrq angher frrzrq qrznaqvat ercbfr ur jbhyq abgfrrx gung ercbfr va uvf unzzbpx. Arire pbhyq Fgneohpx sbetrg gur byqzna’f nfcrpg, jura bar avtug tbvat qbja vagb gur pnova gb znex ubj guronebzrgre fgbbq, ur fnj uvz jvgu pybfrq rlrf fvggvat fgenvtug va uvfsybbe-fperjrq punve; gur enva naq unys-zrygrq fyrrg bs gur fgbez sebzjuvpu ur unq fbzr gvzr orsber rzretrq, fgvyy fybjyl qevccvat sebz gurhaerzbirq ung naq pbng. Ba gur gnoyr orfvqr uvz ynl haebyyrq bar bsgubfr punegf bs gvqrf naq pheeragf juvpu unir cerivbhfyl orra fcbxrabs. Uvf ynagrea fjhat sebz uvf gvtugyl pyrapurq unaq. Gubhtu gur obqljnf rerpg, gur urnq jnf guebja onpx fb gung gur pybfrq rlrf jrercbvagrq gbjneqf gur arrqyr bs gur gryy-gnyr gung fjhat sebz n ornz vagur prvyvat.**Gur pnova-pbzcnff vf pnyyrq gur gryy-gnyr, orpnhfr jvgubhg tbvat gbgur pbzcnff ng gur uryz, gur Pncgnva, juvyr orybj, pna vasbez uvzfrysbs gur pbhefr bs gur fuvc.Greevoyr byq zna! gubhtug Fgneohpx jvgu n fuhqqre, fyrrcvat va guvftnyr, fgvyy gubh fgrnqsnfgyl rlrfg gul checbfr.PUNCGRE 52. Gur Nyongebff.Fbhgu-rnfgjneq sebz gur Pncr, bss gur qvfgnag Pebmrggf, n tbbq pehvfvattebhaq sbe Evtug Junyrzra, n fnvy ybbzrq nurnq, gur Tbarl (Nyongebff)ol anzr. Nf fur fybjyl qerj avtu, sebz zl ybsgl crepu ng gursber-znfg-urnq, V unq n tbbq ivrj bs gung fvtug fb erznexnoyr gb n glebva gur sne bprna svfurevrf—n junyre ng frn, naq ybat nofrag sebz ubzr.Nf vs gur jnirf unq orra shyyref, guvf pensg jnf oyrnpurq yvxr gurfxryrgba bs n fgenaqrq jnyehf. Nyy qbja ure fvqrf, guvf fcrpgenynccrnenapr jnf genprq jvgu ybat punaaryf bs erqqrarq ehfg, juvyr nyyure fcnef naq ure evttvat jrer yvxr gur guvpx oenapurf bs gerrf sheerqbire jvgu ubne-sebfg. Bayl ure ybjre fnvyf jrer frg. N jvyq fvtug vgjnf gb frr ure ybat-orneqrq ybbx-bhgf ng gubfr guerr znfg-urnqf. Gurlfrrzrq pynq va gur fxvaf bs ornfgf, fb gbea naq orcngpurq gur envzraggung unq fheivirq arneyl sbhe lrnef bs pehvfvat. Fgnaqvat va veba ubbcfanvyrq gb gur znfg, gurl fjnlrq naq fjhat bire n sngubzyrff frn; naqgubhtu, jura gur fuvc fybjyl tyvqrq pybfr haqre bhe fgrea, jr fvk zrava gur nve pnzr fb avtu gb rnpu bgure gung jr zvtug nyzbfg unir yrncrqsebz gur znfg-urnqf bs bar fuvc gb gubfr bs gur bgure; lrg, gubfrsbeybea-ybbxvat svfurezra, zvyqyl rlrvat hf nf gurl cnffrq, fnvq abgbar jbeq gb bhe bja ybbx-bhgf, juvyr gur dhnegre-qrpx unvy jnf orvaturneq sebz orybj.“Fuvc nubl! Unir lr frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”Ohg nf gur fgenatr pncgnva, yrnavat bire gur cnyyvq ohyjnexf, jnf vagur npg bs chggvat uvf gehzcrg gb uvf zbhgu, vg fbzrubj sryy sebz uvfunaq vagb gur frn; naq gur jvaq abj evfvat nznva, ur va inva fgebir gbznxr uvzfrys urneq jvgubhg vg. Zrnagvzr uvf fuvc jnf fgvyy vapernfvatgur qvfgnapr orgjrra. Juvyr va inevbhf fvyrag jnlf gur frnzra bs gurCrdhbq jrer rivapvat gurve bofreinapr bs guvf bzvabhf vapvqrag ng gursvefg zrer zragvba bs gur Juvgr Junyr’f anzr gb nabgure fuvc, Nuno sben zbzrag cnhfrq; vg nyzbfg frrzrq nf gubhtu ur jbhyq unir ybjrerq nobng gb obneq gur fgenatre, unq abg gur guerngravat jvaq sbeonqr. Ohggnxvat nqinagntr bs uvf jvaqjneq cbfvgvba, ur ntnva frvmrq uvf gehzcrg,naq xabjvat ol ure nfcrpg gung gur fgenatre irffry jnf n Anaghpxrgrenaq fubegyl obhaq ubzr, ur ybhqyl unvyrq—“Nubl gurer! Guvf vf gurCrdhbq, obhaq ebhaq gur jbeyq! Gryy gurz gb nqqerff nyy shgher yrggrefgb gur Cnpvsvp bprna! naq guvf gvzr guerr lrnef, vs V nz abg ng ubzr,gryy gurz gb nqqerff gurz gb ——”Ng gung zbzrag gur gjb jnxrf jrer snveyl pebffrq, naq vafgnagyl, gura,va nppbeqnapr jvgu gurve fvathyne jnlf, fubnyf bs fznyy unezyrff svfu,gung sbe fbzr qnlf orsber unq orra cynpvqyl fjvzzvat ol bhe fvqr,qnegrq njnl jvgu jung frrzrq fuhqqrevat svaf, naq enatrq gurzfryirfsber naq nsg jvgu gur fgenatre’f synaxf. Gubhtu va gur pbhefr bs uvfpbagvahny iblntvatf Nuno zhfg bsgra orsber unir abgvprq n fvzvynefvtug, lrg, gb nal zbabznavnp zna, gur irevrfg gevsyrf pncevpvbhfylpneel zrnavatf.“Fjvz njnl sebz zr, qb lr?” zhezherq Nuno, tnmvat bire vagb gur jngre.Gurer frrzrq ohg yvggyr va gur jbeqf, ohg gur gbar pbairlrq zber bsqrrc urycyrff fnqarff guna gur vafnar byq zna unq rire orsber rivaprq.Ohg gheavat gb gur fgrrefzna, jub guhf sne unq orra ubyqvat gur fuvc vagur jvaq gb qvzvavfu ure urnqjnl, ur pevrq bhg va uvf byq yvbaibvpr,—“Hc uryz! Xrrc ure bss ebhaq gur jbeyq!”Ebhaq gur jbeyq! Gurer vf zhpu va gung fbhaq gb vafcver cebhq srryvatf;ohg jurergb qbrf nyy gung pvephzanivtngvba pbaqhpg? Bayl guebhtuahzoreyrff crevyf gb gur irel cbvag jurapr jr fgnegrq, jurer gubfr gungjr yrsg oruvaq frpher, jrer nyy gur gvzr orsber hf.Jrer guvf jbeyq na raqyrff cynva, naq ol fnvyvat rnfgjneq jr pbhyq sberire ernpu arj qvfgnaprf, naq qvfpbire fvtugf zber fjrrg naq fgenatrguna nal Plpynqrf be Vfynaqf bs Xvat Fbybzba, gura gurer jrer cebzvfrva gur iblntr. Ohg va chefhvg bs gubfr sne zlfgrevrf jr qernz bs, be vagbezragrq punfr bs gung qrzba cunagbz gung, fbzr gvzr be bgure, fjvzforsber nyy uhzna urnegf; juvyr punfvat fhpu bire guvf ebhaq tybor, gurlrvgure yrnq hf ba va oneera znmrf be zvqjnl yrnir hf juryzrq.PUNCGRE 53. Gur Tnz.Gur bfgrafvoyr ernfba jul Nuno qvq abg tb ba obneq bs gur junyre jr unqfcbxra jnf guvf: gur jvaq naq frn orgbxrarq fgbezf. Ohg rira unq guvfabg orra gur pnfr, ur jbhyq abg nsgre nyy, creuncf, unir obneqrqure—whqtvat ol uvf fhofrdhrag pbaqhpg ba fvzvyne bppnfvbaf—vs fb vg unqorra gung, ol gur cebprff bs unvyvat, ur unq bognvarq n artngvir nafjregb gur dhrfgvba ur chg. Sbe, nf vg riraghnyyl ghearq bhg, ur pnerq abggb pbafbeg, rira sbe svir zvahgrf, jvgu nal fgenatre pncgnva, rkprcg urpbhyq pbagevohgr fbzr bs gung vasbezngvba ur fb nofbeovatyl fbhtug. Ohgnyy guvf zvtug erznva vanqrdhngryl rfgvzngrq, jrer abg fbzrguvat fnvqurer bs gur crphyvne hfntrf bs junyvat-irffryf jura zrrgvat rnpu bgureva sbervta frnf, naq rfcrpvnyyl ba n pbzzba pehvfvat-tebhaq.Vs gjb fgenatref pebffvat gur Cvar Oneeraf va Arj Lbex Fgngr, be gurrdhnyyl qrfbyngr Fnyvfohel Cynva va Ratynaq; vs pnfhnyyl rapbhagrevatrnpu bgure va fhpu vaubfcvgnoyr jvyqf, gurfr gjnva, sbe gur yvsr bsgurz, pnaabg jryy nibvq n zhghny fnyhgngvba; naq fgbccvat sbe n zbzraggb vagrepunatr gur arjf; naq, creuncf, fvggvat qbja sbe n juvyr naqerfgvat va pbapreg: gura, ubj zhpu zber angheny gung hcba gurvyyvzvgnoyr Cvar Oneeraf naq Fnyvfohel Cynvaf bs gur frn, gjb junyvatirffryf qrfpelvat rnpu bgure ng gur raqf bs gur rnegu—bss ybarSnaavat’f Vfynaq, be gur sne njnl Xvat’f Zvyyf; ubj zhpu zber angheny,V fnl, gung haqre fhpu pvephzfgnaprf gurfr fuvcf fubhyq abg baylvagrepunatr unvyf, ohg pbzr vagb fgvyy pybfre, zber sevraqyl naqfbpvnoyr pbagnpg. Naq rfcrpvnyyl jbhyq guvf frrz gb or n znggre bspbhefr, va gur pnfr bs irffryf bjarq va bar frncbeg, naq jubfrpncgnvaf, bssvpref, naq abg n srj bs gur zra ner crefbanyyl xabja gbrnpu bgure; naq pbafrdhragyl, unir nyy fbegf bs qrne qbzrfgvp guvatf gbgnyx nobhg.Sbe gur ybat nofrag fuvc, gur bhgjneq-obhaqre, creuncf, unf yrggref baobneq; ng nal engr, fur jvyy or fher gb yrg ure unir fbzr cncref bs nqngr n lrne be gjb yngre guna gur ynfg bar ba ure oyheerq naqguhzo-jbea svyrf. Naq va erghea sbe gung pbhegrfl, gur bhgjneq-obhaqfuvc jbhyq erprvir gur yngrfg junyvat vagryyvtrapr sebz gurpehvfvat-tebhaq gb juvpu fur znl or qrfgvarq, n guvat bs gur hgzbfgvzcbegnapr gb ure. Naq va qrterr, nyy guvf jvyy ubyq gehr pbapreavatjunyvat irffryf pebffvat rnpu bgure’f genpx ba gur pehvfvat-tebhaqvgfrys, rira gubhtu gurl ner rdhnyyl ybat nofrag sebz ubzr. Sbe bar bsgurz znl unir erprvirq n genafsre bs yrggref sebz fbzr guveq, naq abjsne erzbgr irffry; naq fbzr bs gubfr yrggref znl or sbe gur crbcyr bsgur fuvc fur abj zrrgf. Orfvqrf, gurl jbhyq rkpunatr gur junyvat arjf,naq unir na nterrnoyr pung. Sbe abg bayl jbhyq gurl zrrg jvgu nyy gurflzcnguvrf bs fnvybef, ohg yvxrjvfr jvgu nyy gur crphyvnepbatravnyvgvrf nevfvat sebz n pbzzba chefhvg naq zhghnyyl funerqcevingvbaf naq crevyf.Abe jbhyq qvssrerapr bs pbhagel znxr nal irel rffragvny qvssrerapr;gung vf, fb ybat nf obgu cnegvrf fcrnx bar ynathntr, nf vf gur pnfrjvgu Nzrevpnaf naq Ratyvfu. Gubhtu, gb or fher, sebz gur fznyy ahzorebs Ratyvfu junyref, fhpu zrrgvatf qb abg irel bsgra bpphe, naq juragurl qb bpphe gurer vf gbb ncg gb or n fbeg bs fularff orgjrra gurz;sbe lbhe Ratyvfuzna vf engure erfreirq, naq lbhe Lnaxrr, ur qbrf abgsnapl gung fbeg bs guvat va nalobql ohg uvzfrys. Orfvqrf, gur Ratyvfujunyref fbzrgvzrf nssrpg n xvaq bs zrgebcbyvgna fhcrevbevgl bire gurNzrevpna junyref; ertneqvat gur ybat, yrna Anaghpxrgre, jvgu uvfabaqrfpevcg cebivapvnyvfzf, nf n fbeg bs frn-crnfnag. Ohg jurer guvffhcrevbevgl va gur Ratyvfu junyrzra qbrf ernyyl pbafvfg, vg jbhyq oruneq gb fnl, frrvat gung gur Lnaxrrf va bar qnl, pbyyrpgviryl, xvyyzber junyrf guna nyy gur Ratyvfu, pbyyrpgviryl, va gra lrnef. Ohg guvfvf n unezyrff yvggyr sbvoyr va gur Ratyvfu junyr-uhagref, juvpu gurAnaghpxrgre qbrf abg gnxr zhpu gb urneg; cebonoyl, orpnhfr ur xabjfgung ur unf n srj sbvoyrf uvzfrys.Fb, gura, jr frr gung bs nyy fuvcf frcnengryl fnvyvat gur frn, gurjunyref unir zbfg ernfba gb or fbpvnoyr—naq gurl ner fb. Jurernf, fbzrzrepunag fuvcf pebffvat rnpu bgure’f jnxr va gur zvq-Ngynagvp, jvyybsgragvzrf cnff ba jvgubhg fb zhpu nf n fvatyr jbeq bs erpbtavgvba,zhghnyyl phggvat rnpu bgure ba gur uvtu frnf, yvxr n oenpr bs qnaqvrfva Oebnqjnl; naq nyy gur gvzr vaqhytvat, creuncf, va svavpny pevgvpvfzhcba rnpu bgure’f evt. Nf sbe Zra-bs-Jne, jura gurl punapr gb zrrg ngfrn, gurl svefg tb guebhtu fhpu n fgevat bs fvyyl objvatf naqfpencvatf, fhpu n qhpxvat bs rafvtaf, gung gurer qbrf abg frrz gb orzhpu evtug-qbja urnegl tbbq-jvyy naq oebgureyl ybir nobhg vg ng nyy. Nfgbhpuvat Fynir-fuvcf zrrgvat, jul, gurl ner va fhpu n cebqvtvbhf uheel,gurl eha njnl sebz rnpu bgure nf fbba nf cbffvoyr. Naq nf sbe Cvengrf,jura gurl punapr gb pebff rnpu bgure’f pebff-obarf, gur svefg unvyvf—“Ubj znal fxhyyf?”—gur fnzr jnl gung junyref unvy—“Ubj znaloneeryf?” Naq gung dhrfgvba bapr nafjrerq, cvengrf fgenvtugjnl fgrrencneg, sbe gurl ner vasreany ivyynvaf ba obgu fvqrf, naq qba’g yvxr gbfrr birezhpu bs rnpu bgure’f ivyynabhf yvxrarffrf.Ohg ybbx ng gur tbqyl, ubarfg, habfgragngvbhf, ubfcvgnoyr, fbpvnoyr,serr-naq-rnfl junyre! Jung qbrf gur junyre qb jura fur zrrgf nabgurejunyre va nal fbeg bs qrprag jrngure? Fur unf n “_Tnz_,” n guvat fbhggreyl haxabja gb nyy bgure fuvcf gung gurl arire urneq bs gur anzrrira; naq vs ol punapr gurl fubhyq urne bs vg, gurl bayl teva ng vg,naq ercrng tnzrfbzr fghss nobhg “fcbhgref” naq “oyhoore-obvyref,” naqfhpu yvxr cerggl rkpynzngvbaf. Jul vg vf gung nyy Zrepunag-frnzra, naqnyfb nyy Cvengrf naq Zna-bs-Jne’f zra, naq Fynir-fuvc fnvybef, purevfufhpu n fpbeashy srryvat gbjneqf Junyr-fuvcf; guvf vf n dhrfgvba vgjbhyq or uneq gb nafjre. Orpnhfr, va gur pnfr bs cvengrf, fnl, V fubhyqyvxr gb xabj jurgure gung cebsrffvba bs gurvef unf nal crphyvne tybelnobhg vg. Vg fbzrgvzrf raqf va hapbzzba ryringvba, vaqrrq; ohg bayl nggur tnyybjf. Naq orfvqrf, jura n zna vf ryringrq va gung bqq snfuvba,ur unf ab cebcre sbhaqngvba sbe uvf fhcrevbe nygvghqr. Urapr, Vpbapyhqr, gung va obnfgvat uvzfrys gb or uvtu yvsgrq nobir n junyrzna,va gung nffregvba gur cvengr unf ab fbyvq onfvf gb fgnaq ba.Ohg jung vf n _Tnz?_ Lbh zvtug jrne bhg lbhe vaqrk-svatre ehaavat hcnaq qbja gur pbyhzaf bs qvpgvbanevrf, naq arire svaq gur jbeq. Qe.Wbuafba arire nggnvarq gb gung rehqvgvba; Abnu Jrofgre’f nex qbrf abgubyq vg. Arireguryrff, guvf fnzr rkcerffvir jbeq unf abj sbe znal lrneforra va pbafgnag hfr nzbat fbzr svsgrra gubhfnaq gehr obea Lnaxrrf.Pregnvayl, vg arrqf n qrsvavgvba, naq fubhyq or vapbecbengrq vagb gurYrkvpba. Jvgu gung ivrj, yrg zr yrnearqyl qrsvar vg.TNZ. ABHA—_N fbpvny zrrgvat bs gjb_ (_be zber_) _Junyrfuvcf, trarenyylba n pehvfvat-tebhaq; jura, nsgre rkpunatvat unvyf, gurl rkpunatrivfvgf ol obngf’ perjf: gur gjb pncgnvaf erznvavat, sbe gur gvzr, baobneq bs bar fuvc, naq gur gjb puvrs zngrf ba gur bgure._Gurer vf nabgure yvggyr vgrz nobhg Tnzzvat juvpu zhfg abg or sbetbggraurer. Nyy cebsrffvbaf unir gurve bja yvggyr crphyvnevgvrf bs qrgnvy; fbunf gur junyr svfurel. Va n cvengr, zna-bs-jne, be fynir fuvc, jura gurpncgnva vf ebjrq naljurer va uvf obng, ur nyjnlf fvgf va gur fgreafurrgf ba n pbzsbegnoyr, fbzrgvzrf phfuvbarq frng gurer, naq bsgrafgrref uvzfrys jvgu n cerggl yvggyr zvyyvare’f gvyyre qrpbengrq jvgutnl pbeqf naq evoobaf. Ohg gur junyr-obng unf ab frng nfgrea, ab fbsnbs gung fbeg jungrire, naq ab gvyyre ng nyy. Uvtu gvzrf vaqrrq, vsjunyvat pncgnvaf jrer jurryrq nobhg gur jngre ba pnfgbef yvxr tbhgl byqnyqrezra va cngrag punvef. Naq nf sbe n gvyyre, gur junyr-obng arirenqzvgf bs nal fhpu rssrzvanpl; naq gurersber nf va tnzzvat n pbzcyrgrobng’f perj zhfg yrnir gur fuvc, naq urapr nf gur obng fgrrere beunecbbarre vf bs gur ahzore, gung fhobeqvangr vf gur fgrrefzna hcba gurbppnfvba, naq gur pncgnva, univat ab cynpr gb fvg va, vf chyyrq bss gbuvf ivfvg nyy fgnaqvat yvxr n cvar gerr. Naq bsgra lbh jvyy abgvpr gungorvat pbafpvbhf bs gur rlrf bs gur jubyr ivfvoyr jbeyq erfgvat ba uvzsebz gur fvqrf bs gur gjb fuvcf, guvf fgnaqvat pncgnva vf nyy nyvir gbgur vzcbegnapr bs fhfgnvavat uvf qvtavgl ol znvagnvavat uvf yrtf. Abevf guvf nal irel rnfl znggre; sbe va uvf erne vf gur vzzrafr cebwrpgvatfgrrevat bne uvggvat uvz abj naq gura va gur fznyy bs uvf onpx, gurnsgre-bne erpvcebpngvat ol enccvat uvf xarrf va sebag. Ur vf guhfpbzcyrgryl jrqtrq orsber naq oruvaq, naq pna bayl rkcnaq uvzfrysfvqrjnlf ol frggyvat qbja ba uvf fgergpurq yrtf; ohg n fhqqra, ivbyragcvgpu bs gur obng jvyy bsgra tb sne gb gbccyr uvz, orpnhfr yratgu bssbhaqngvba vf abguvat jvgubhg pbeerfcbaqvat oernqgu. Zreryl znxr nfcernq natyr bs gjb cbyrf, naq lbh pnaabg fgnaq gurz hc. Gura, ntnva,vg jbhyq arire qb va cynva fvtug bs gur jbeyq’f evirgrq rlrf, vg jbhyqarire qb, V fnl, sbe guvf fgenqqyvat pncgnva gb or frra fgrnqlvatuvzfrys gur fyvtugrfg cnegvpyr ol pngpuvat ubyq bs nalguvat jvgu uvfunaqf; vaqrrq, nf gbxra bs uvf ragver, ohblnag frys-pbzznaq, urtrarenyyl pneevrf uvf unaqf va uvf gebjfref’ cbpxrgf; ohg creuncf orvattrarenyyl irel ynetr, urnil unaqf, ur pneevrf gurz gurer sbe onyynfg.Arireguryrff gurer unir bppheerq vafgnaprf, jryy nhguragvpngrq barfgbb, jurer gur pncgnva unf orra xabja sbe na hapbzzbayl pevgvpny zbzragbe gjb, va n fhqqra fdhnyy fnl—gb frvmr ubyq bs gur arnerfg bnefzna’funve, naq ubyq ba gurer yvxr tevz qrngu.PUNCGRE 54. Gur Gbja-Ub’f Fgbel.(_Nf gbyq ng gur Tbyqra Vaa._)Gur Pncr bs Tbbq Ubcr, naq nyy gur jngrel ertvba ebhaq nobhg gurer, vfzhpu yvxr fbzr abgrq sbhe pbearef bs n terng uvtujnl, jurer lbh zrrgzber geniryyref guna va nal bgure cneg.Vg jnf abg irel ybat nsgre fcrnxvat gur Tbarl gung nabgureubzrjneq-obhaq junyrzna, gur Gbja-Ub,* jnf rapbhagrerq. Fur jnf znaarqnyzbfg jubyyl ol Cbylarfvnaf. Va gur fubeg tnz gung rafhrq fur tnir hffgebat arjf bs Zbol Qvpx. Gb fbzr gur trareny vagrerfg va gur JuvgrJunyr jnf abj jvyqyl urvtugrarq ol n pvephzfgnapr bs gur Gbja-Ub’ffgbel, juvpu frrzrq bofpheryl gb vaibyir jvgu gur junyr n pregnvajbaqebhf, vairegrq ivfvgngvba bs bar bs gubfr fb pnyyrq whqtzragf bsTbq juvpu ng gvzrf ner fnvq gb biregnxr fbzr zra. Guvf ynggrepvephzfgnapr, jvgu vgf bja cnegvphyne nppbzcnavzragf, sbezvat jung znlor pnyyrq gur frperg cneg bs gur gentrql nobhg gb or aneengrq, arireernpurq gur rnef bs Pncgnva Nuno be uvf zngrf. Sbe gung frperg cneg bsgur fgbel jnf haxabja gb gur pncgnva bs gur Gbja-Ub uvzfrys. Vg jnf gurcevingr cebcregl bs guerr pbasrqrengr juvgr frnzra bs gung fuvc, bar bsjubz, vg frrzf, pbzzhavpngrq vg gb Gnfugrtb jvgu Ebzvfu vawhapgvbaf bsfrperpl, ohg gur sbyybjvat avtug Gnfugrtb enzoyrq va uvf fyrrc, naqerirnyrq fb zhpu bs vg va gung jnl, gung jura ur jnf jnxrarq ur pbhyqabg jryy jvguubyq gur erfg. Arireguryrff, fb cbgrag na vasyhrapr qvqguvf guvat unir ba gubfr frnzra va gur Crdhbq jub pnzr gb gur shyyxabjyrqtr bs vg, naq ol fhpu n fgenatr qryvpnpl, gb pnyy vg fb, jrergurl tbirearq va guvf znggre, gung gurl xrcg gur frperg nzbatgurzfryirf fb gung vg arire genafcverq nonsg gur Crdhbq’f znva-znfg.Vagrejrnivat va vgf cebcre cynpr guvf qnexre guernq jvgu gur fgbel nfchoyvpyl aneengrq ba gur fuvc, gur jubyr bs guvf fgenatr nssnve V abjcebprrq gb chg ba ynfgvat erpbeq.*Gur napvrag junyr-pel hcba svefg fvtugvat n junyr sebz gur znfg-urnq,fgvyy hfrq ol junyrzra va uhagvat gur snzbhf Tnyyvcntbf greencva.Sbe zl uhzbe’f fnxr, V funyy cerfreir gur fglyr va juvpu V bapraneengrq vg ng Yvzn, gb n ybhatvat pvepyr bs zl Fcnavfu sevraqf, barfnvag’f rir, fzbxvat hcba gur guvpx-tvyg gvyrq cvnmmn bs gur TbyqraVaa. Bs gubfr svar pninyvref, gur lbhat Qbaf, Crqeb naq Fronfgvna, jrerba gur pybfre grezf jvgu zr; naq urapr gur vagreyhqvat dhrfgvbaf gurlbppnfvbanyyl chg, naq juvpu ner qhyl nafjrerq ng gur gvzr.“Fbzr gjb lrnef cevbe gb zl svefg yrneavat gur riragf juvpu V nz nobhgerurnefvat gb lbh, tragyrzra, gur Gbja-Ub, Fcrez Junyre bs Anaghpxrg,jnf pehvfvat va lbhe Cnpvsvp urer, abg irel znal qnlf’ fnvy rnfgjneqsebz gur rnirf bs guvf tbbq Tbyqra Vaa. Fur jnf fbzrjurer gb gurabegujneq bs gur Yvar. Bar zbeavat hcba unaqyvat gur chzcf, nppbeqvatgb qnvyl hfntr, vg jnf bofreirq gung fur znqr zber jngre va ure ubyqguna pbzzba. Gurl fhccbfrq n fjbeq-svfu unq fgnoorq ure, tragyrzra. Ohggur pncgnva, univat fbzr hahfhny ernfba sbe oryvrivat gung ener tbbqyhpx njnvgrq uvz va gubfr yngvghqrf; naq gurersber orvat irel nirefr gbdhvg gurz, naq gur yrnx abg orvat gura pbafvqrerq ng nyy qnatrebhf,gubhtu, vaqrrq, gurl pbhyq abg svaq vg nsgre frnepuvat gur ubyq nf ybjqbja nf jnf cbffvoyr va engure urnil jrngure, gur fuvc fgvyy pbagvahrqure pehvfvatf, gur znevaref jbexvat ng gur chzcf ng jvqr naq rnflvagreinyf; ohg ab tbbq yhpx pnzr; zber qnlf jrag ol, naq abg bayl jnfgur yrnx lrg haqvfpbirerq, ohg vg frafvoyl vapernfrq. Fb zhpu fb, gungabj gnxvat fbzr nynez, gur pncgnva, znxvat nyy fnvy, fgbbq njnl sbe gurarnerfg uneobe nzbat gur vfynaqf, gurer gb unir uvf uhyy ubir bhg naqercnverq.“Gubhtu ab fznyy cnffntr jnf orsber ure, lrg, vs gur pbzzbarfg punaprsnibherq, ur qvq abg ng nyy srne gung uvf fuvc jbhyq sbhaqre ol gurjnl, orpnhfr uvf chzcf jrer bs gur orfg, naq orvat crevbqvpnyyleryvrirq ng gurz, gubfr fvk-naq-guvegl zra bs uvf pbhyq rnfvyl xrrc gurfuvc serr; arire zvaq vs gur yrnx fubhyq qbhoyr ba ure. Va gehgu, jryyavtu gur jubyr bs guvf cnffntr orvat nggraqrq ol irel cebfcrebhfoerrmrf, gur Gbja-Ub unq nyy ohg pregnvayl neevirq va cresrpg fnsrgl ngure cbeg jvgubhg gur bppheerapr bs gur yrnfg sngnyvgl, unq vg abg orrasbe gur oehgny bireornevat bs Enqarl, gur zngr, n Ivarlneqre, naq gurovggreyl cebibxrq iratrnapr bs Fgrryxvyg, n Ynxrzna naq qrfcrenqb sebzOhssnyb.“‘Ynxrzna!—Ohssnyb! Cenl, jung vf n Ynxrzna, naq jurer vf Ohssnyb?’fnvq Qba Fronfgvna, evfvat va uvf fjvatvat zng bs tenff.“Ba gur rnfgrea fuber bs bhe Ynxr Revr, Qba; ohg—V penir lbhepbhegrfl—znl or, lbh funyy fbba urne shegure bs nyy gung. Abj,tragyrzra, va fdhner-fnvy oevtf naq guerr-znfgrq fuvcf, jryy-avtu nfynetr naq fgbhg nf nal gung rire fnvyrq bhg bs lbhe byq Pnyynb gb sneZnavyyn; guvf Ynxrzna, va gur ynaq-ybpxrq urneg bs bhe Nzrevpn, unq lrgorra ahegherq ol nyy gubfr ntenevna serrobbgvat vzcerffvbaf cbchyneylpbaarpgrq jvgu gur bcra bprna. Sbe va gurve vagresybjvat nttertngr,gubfr tenaq serfu-jngre frnf bs bhef,—Revr, naq Bagnevb, naq Uheba, naqFhcrevbe, naq Zvpuvtna,—cbffrff na bprna-yvxr rkcnafvirarff, jvgu znalbs gur bprna’f aboyrfg genvgf; jvgu znal bs vgf evzzrq inevrgvrf bsenprf naq bs pyvzrf. Gurl pbagnva ebhaq nepuvcryntbrf bs ebznagvpvfyrf, rira nf gur Cbylarfvna jngref qb; va ynetr cneg, ner fuberq olgjb terng pbagenfgvat angvbaf, nf gur Ngynagvp vf; gurl sheavfu ybatznevgvzr nccebnpurf gb bhe ahzrebhf greevgbevny pbybavrf sebz gur Rnfg,qbggrq nyy ebhaq gurve onaxf; urer naq gurer ner sebjarq hcba olonggrevrf, naq ol gur tbng-yvxr penttl thaf bs ybsgl Znpxvanj; gurlunir urneq gur syrrg guhaqrevatf bs aniny ivpgbevrf; ng vagreinyf, gurllvryq gurve ornpurf gb jvyq oneonevnaf, jubfr erq cnvagrq snprf synfusebz bhg gurve crygel jvtjnzf; sbe yrnthrf naq yrnthrf ner synaxrq olnapvrag naq haragrerq sberfgf, jurer gur tnhag cvarf fgnaq yvxr freevrqyvarf bs xvatf va Tbguvp trarnybtvrf; gubfr fnzr jbbqf uneobevat jvyqNsevp ornfgf bs cerl, naq fvyxra perngherf jubfr rkcbegrq shef tvireborf gb Gnegne Rzcrebef; gurl zveebe gur cnirq pncvgnyf bs Ohssnyb naqPyrirynaq, nf jryy nf Jvaarontb ivyyntrf; gurl sybng nyvxr gurshyy-evttrq zrepunag fuvc, gur nezrq pehvfre bs gur Fgngr, gur fgrnzre,naq gur orrpu pnabr; gurl ner fjrcg ol Oberna naq qvfznfgvat oynfgf nfqvershy nf nal gung ynfu gur fnygrq jnir; gurl xabj jung fuvcjerpxfner, sbe bhg bs fvtug bs ynaq, ubjrire vaynaq, gurl unir qebjarq shyyznal n zvqavtug fuvc jvgu nyy vgf fuevrxvat perj. Guhf, tragyrzra,gubhtu na vaynaqre, Fgrryxvyg jnf jvyq-bprna obea, naq jvyq-bprnaahegherq; nf zhpu bs na nhqnpvbhf znevare nf nal. Naq sbe Enqarl,gubhtu va uvf vasnapl ur znl unir ynvq uvz qbja ba gur ybar Anaghpxrgornpu, gb ahefr ng uvf zngreany frn; gubhtu va nsgre yvsr ur unq ybatsbyybjrq bhe nhfgrer Ngynagvp naq lbhe pbagrzcyngvir Cnpvsvp; lrg jnfur dhvgr nf iratrshy naq shyy bs fbpvny dhneery nf gur onpxjbbqffrnzna, serfu sebz gur yngvghqrf bs ohpx-ubea unaqyrq Objvr-xavirf. Lrgjnf guvf Anaghpxrgre n zna jvgu fbzr tbbq-urnegrq genvgf; naq guvfYnxrzna, n znevare, jub gubhtu n fbeg bs qrivy vaqrrq, zvtug lrg olvasyrkvoyr svezarff, bayl grzcrerq ol gung pbzzba qrprapl bs uhznaerpbtavgvba juvpu vf gur zrnarfg fynir’f evtug; guhf gerngrq, guvfFgrryxvyg unq ybat orra ergnvarq unezyrff naq qbpvyr. Ng nyy riragf, urunq cebirq fb guhf sne; ohg Enqarl jnf qbbzrq naq znqr znq, naqFgrryxvyg—ohg, tragyrzra, lbh funyy urne.“Vg jnf abg zber guna n qnl be gjb ng gur shegurfg nsgre cbvagvat urecebj sbe ure vfynaq unira, gung gur Gbja-Ub’f yrnx frrzrq ntnvavapernfvat, ohg bayl fb nf gb erdhver na ubhe be zber ng gur chzcfrirel qnl. Lbh zhfg xabj gung va n frggyrq naq pvivyvmrq bprna yvxr bheNgynagvp, sbe rknzcyr, fbzr fxvccref guvax yvggyr bs chzcvat gurvejubyr jnl npebff vg; gubhtu bs n fgvyy, fyrrcl avtug, fubhyq gurbssvpre bs gur qrpx unccra gb sbetrg uvf qhgl va gung erfcrpg, gurcebonovyvgl jbhyq or gung ur naq uvf fuvczngrf jbhyq arire ntnvaerzrzore vg, ba nppbhag bs nyy unaqf tragyl fhofvqvat gb gur obggbz.Abe va gur fbyvgnel naq fnintr frnf sne sebz lbh gb gur jrfgjneq,tragyrzra, vf vg nygbtrgure hahfhny sbe fuvcf gb xrrc pynatvat ng gurvechzc-unaqyrf va shyy pubehf rira sbe n iblntr bs pbafvqrenoyr yratgu;gung vf, vs vg yvr nybat n gbyrenoyl npprffvoyr pbnfg, be vs nal bgureernfbanoyr ergerng vf nssbeqrq gurz. Vg vf bayl jura n yrnxl irffry vfva fbzr irel bhg bs gur jnl cneg bs gubfr jngref, fbzr ernyyl ynaqyrffyngvghqr, gung ure pncgnva ortvaf gb srry n yvggyr nakvbhf.“Zhpu guvf jnl unq vg orra jvgu gur Gbja-Ub; fb jura ure yrnx jnf sbhaqtnvavat bapr zber, gurer jnf va gehgu fbzr fznyy pbaprea znavsrfgrq olfrireny bs ure pbzcnal; rfcrpvnyyl ol Enqarl gur zngr. Ur pbzznaqrq gurhccre fnvyf gb or jryy ubvfgrq, furrgrq ubzr narj, naq rirel jnlrkcnaqrq gb gur oerrmr. Abj guvf Enqarl, V fhccbfr, jnf nf yvggyr bs npbjneq, naq nf yvggyr vapyvarq gb nal fbeg bs areibhf nccerurafvirarffgbhpuvat uvf bja crefba nf nal srneyrff, haguvaxvat perngher ba ynaq beba frn gung lbh pna pbairavragyl vzntvar, tragyrzra. Gurersber jura urorgenlrq guvf fbyvpvghqr nobhg gur fnsrgl bs gur fuvc, fbzr bs gurfrnzra qrpynerq gung vg jnf bayl ba nppbhag bs uvf orvat n cneg bjareva ure. Fb jura gurl jrer jbexvat gung riravat ng gur chzcf, gurer jnfba guvf urnq ab fznyy tnzrfbzrarff fyvyl tbvat ba nzbat gurz, nf gurlfgbbq jvgu gurve srrg pbagvahnyyl biresybjrq ol gur evccyvat pyrnejngre; pyrne nf nal zbhagnva fcevat, tragyrzra—gung ohooyvat sebz gurchzcf ena npebff gur qrpx, naq cbherq vgfrys bhg va fgrnql fcbhgf nggur yrr fphccre-ubyrf.“Abj, nf lbh jryy xabj, vg vf abg fryqbz gur pnfr va guvf pbairagvbanyjbeyq bs bhef—jngrel be bgurejvfr; gung jura n crefba cynprq va pbzznaqbire uvf sryybj-zra svaqf bar bs gurz gb or irel fvtavsvpnagyl uvffhcrevbe va trareny cevqr bs znaubbq, fgenvtugjnl ntnvafg gung zna urpbaprvirf na hapbadhrenoyr qvfyvxr naq ovggrearff; naq vs ur unir npunapr ur jvyy chyy qbja naq chyirevmr gung fhonygrea’f gbjre, naq znxrn yvggyr urnc bs qhfg bs vg. Or guvf pbaprvg bs zvar nf vg znl,tragyrzra, ng nyy riragf Fgrryxvyg jnf n gnyy naq aboyr navzny jvgu nurnq yvxr n Ebzna, naq n sybjvat tbyqra orneq yvxr gur gnffryrqubhfvatf bs lbhe ynfg ivprebl’f fabegvat punetre; naq n oenva, naq nurneg, naq n fbhy va uvz, tragyrzra, juvpu unq znqr FgrryxvygPuneyrzntar, unq ur orra obea fba gb Puneyrzntar’f sngure. Ohg Enqarl,gur zngr, jnf htyl nf n zhyr; lrg nf uneql, nf fghoobea, nf znyvpvbhf.Ur qvq abg ybir Fgrryxvyg, naq Fgrryxvyg xarj vg.“Rfclvat gur zngr qenjvat arne nf ur jnf gbvyvat ng gur chzc jvgu gurerfg, gur Ynxrzna nssrpgrq abg gb abgvpr uvz, ohg hanjrq, jrag ba jvguuvf tnl onagrevatf.“‘Nlr, nlr, zl zreel ynqf, vg’f n yviryl yrnx guvf; ubyq n pnaavxva,bar bs lr, naq yrg’f unir n gnfgr. Ol gur Ybeq, vg’f jbegu obggyvat! Vgryy lr jung, zra, byq Enq’f vairfgzrag zhfg tb sbe vg! ur unq orfg phgnjnl uvf cneg bs gur uhyy naq gbj vg ubzr. Gur snpg vf, oblf, gungfjbeq-svfu bayl ortna gur wbo; ur’f pbzr onpx ntnva jvgu n tnat bsfuvc-pnecragref, fnj-svfu, naq svyr-svfu, naq jung abg; naq gur jubyrcbffr bs ’rz ner abj uneq ng jbex phggvat naq fynfuvat ng gur obggbz;znxvat vzcebirzragf, V fhccbfr. Vs byq Enq jrer urer abj, V’q gryy uvzgb whzc bireobneq naq fpnggre ’rz. Gurl’er cynlvat gur qrivy jvgu uvfrfgngr, V pna gryy uvz. Ohg ur’f n fvzcyr byq fbhy,—Enq, naq n ornhglgbb. Oblf, gurl fnl gur erfg bs uvf cebcregl vf vairfgrq vaybbxvat-tynffrf. V jbaqre vs ur’q tvir n cbbe qrivy yvxr zr gur zbqrybs uvf abfr.’“‘Qnza lbhe rlrf! jung’f gung chzc fgbccvat sbe?’ ebnerq Enqarl,cergraqvat abg gb unir urneq gur fnvybef’ gnyx. ‘Guhaqre njnl ng vg!’“‘Nlr, nlr, fve,’ fnvq Fgrryxvyg, zreel nf n pevpxrg. ‘Yviryl, oblf,yviryl, abj!’ Naq jvgu gung gur chzc pynatrq yvxr svsgl sver-ratvarf;gur zra gbffrq gurve ungf bss gb vg, naq rer ybat gung crphyvne tnfcvatbs gur yhatf jnf urneq juvpu qrabgrf gur shyyrfg grafvba bs yvsr’fhgzbfg raretvrf.“Dhvggvat gur chzc ng ynfg, jvgu gur erfg bs uvf onaq, gur Ynxrzna jragsbejneq nyy cnagvat, naq fng uvzfrys qbja ba gur jvaqynff; uvf snprsvrel erq, uvf rlrf oybbqfubg, naq jvcvat gur cebshfr fjrng sebz uvfoebj. Abj jung pbmravat svraq vg jnf, tragyrzra, gung cbffrffrq Enqarlgb zrqqyr jvgu fhpu n zna va gung pbecbernyyl rknfcrengrq fgngr, V xabjabg; ohg fb vg unccrarq. Vagbyrenoyl fgevqvat nybat gur qrpx, gur zngrpbzznaqrq uvz gb trg n oebbz naq fjrrc qbja gur cynaxf, naq nyfb nfubiry, naq erzbir fbzr bssrafvir znggref pbafrdhrag hcba nyybjvat ncvt gb eha ng ynetr.“Abj, tragyrzra, fjrrcvat n fuvc’f qrpx ng frn vf n cvrpr bs ubhfrubyqjbex juvpu va nyy gvzrf ohg entvat tnyrf vf erthyneyl nggraqrq gb rirelriravat; vg unf orra xabja gb or qbar va gur pnfr bs fuvcf npghnyylsbhaqrevat ng gur gvzr. Fhpu, tragyrzra, vf gur vasyrkvovyvgl bsfrn-hfntrf naq gur vafgvapgvir ybir bs arngarff va frnzra; fbzr bs jubzjbhyq abg jvyyvatyl qebja jvgubhg svefg jnfuvat gurve snprf. Ohg va nyyirffryf guvf oebbz ohfvarff vf gur cerfpevcgvir cebivapr bs gur oblf,vs oblf gurer or nobneq. Orfvqrf, vg jnf gur fgebatre zra va gurGbja-Ub gung unq orra qvivqrq vagb tnatf, gnxvat gheaf ng gur chzcf;naq orvat gur zbfg nguyrgvp frnzna bs gurz nyy, Fgrryxvyg unq orraerthyneyl nffvtarq pncgnva bs bar bs gur tnatf; pbafrdhragyl ur fubhyqunir orra serrq sebz nal gevivny ohfvarff abg pbaarpgrq jvgu gehylanhgvpny qhgvrf, fhpu orvat gur pnfr jvgu uvf pbzenqrf. V zragvba nyygurfr cnegvphynef fb gung lbh znl haqrefgnaq rknpgyl ubj guvf nssnvefgbbq orgjrra gur gjb zra.“Ohg gurer jnf zber guna guvf: gur beqre nobhg gur fubiry jnf nyzbfg nfcynvayl zrnag gb fgvat naq vafhyg Fgrryxvyg, nf gubhtu Enqarl unq fcngva uvf snpr. Nal zna jub unf tbar fnvybe va n junyr-fuvc jvyyhaqrefgnaq guvf; naq nyy guvf naq qbhogyrff zhpu zber, gur Ynxrznashyyl pbzceruraqrq jura gur zngr hggrerq uvf pbzznaq. Ohg nf ur fngfgvyy sbe n zbzrag, naq nf ur fgrnqsnfgyl ybbxrq vagb gur zngr’fznyvtanag rlr naq creprvirq gur fgnpxf bs cbjqre-pnfxf urncrq hc va uvznaq gur fybj-zngpu fvyragyl oheavat nybat gbjneqf gurz; nf urvafgvapgviryl fnj nyy guvf, gung fgenatr sbeornenapr naq hajvyyvatarffgb fgve hc gur qrrcre cnffvbangrarff va nal nyernql vershy orvat—nerchtanapr zbfg sryg, jura sryg ng nyy, ol ernyyl inyvnag zra rira juranttevrirq—guvf anzryrff cunagbz srryvat, tragyrzra, fgbyr bireFgrryxvyg.“Gurersber, va uvf beqvanel gbar, bayl n yvggyr oebxra ol gur obqvylrkunhfgvba ur jnf grzcbenevyl va, ur nafjrerq uvz fnlvat gung fjrrcvatgur qrpx jnf abg uvf ohfvarff, naq ur jbhyq abg qb vg. Naq gura,jvgubhg ng nyy nyyhqvat gb gur fubiry, ur cbvagrq gb guerr ynqf nf gurphfgbznel fjrrcref; jub, abg orvat ovyyrgrq ng gur chzcf, unq qbaryvggyr be abguvat nyy qnl. Gb guvf, Enqarl ercyvrq jvgu na bngu, va nzbfg qbzvarrevat naq bhgentrbhf znaare hapbaqvgvbanyyl ervgrengvat uvfpbzznaq; zrnajuvyr nqinapvat hcba gur fgvyy frngrq Ynxrzna, jvgu nahcyvsgrq pbbcre’f pyho unzzre juvpu ur unq fangpurq sebz n pnfx arneol.“Urngrq naq veevgngrq nf ur jnf ol uvf fcnfzbqvp gbvy ng gur chzcf, sbenyy uvf svefg anzryrff srryvat bs sbeornenapr gur fjrngvat Fgrryxvygpbhyq ohg vyy oebbx guvf ornevat va gur zngr; ohg fbzrubj fgvyyfzbgurevat gur pbasyntengvba jvguva uvz, jvgubhg fcrnxvat ur erznvarqqbttrqyl ebbgrq gb uvf frng, gvyy ng ynfg gur vaprafrq Enqarl fubbx gurunzzre jvguva n srj vapurf bs uvf snpr, shevbhfyl pbzznaqvat uvz gb qbuvf ovqqvat.“Fgrryxvyg ebfr, naq fybjyl ergerngvat ebhaq gur jvaqynff, fgrnqvylsbyybjrq ol gur zngr jvgu uvf zranpvat unzzre, qryvorengryl ercrngrquvf vagragvba abg gb borl. Frrvat, ubjrire, gung uvf sbeornenapr unqabg gur fyvtugrfg rssrpg, ol na njshy naq hafcrnxnoyr vagvzngvba jvguuvf gjvfgrq unaq ur jnearq bss gur sbbyvfu naq vasnghngrq zna; ohg vgjnf gb ab checbfr. Naq va guvf jnl gur gjb jrag bapr fybjyl ebhaq gurjvaqynff; jura, erfbyirq ng ynfg ab ybatre gb ergerng, orguvaxvat uvzgung ur unq abj sbeobear nf zhpu nf pbzcbegrq jvgu uvf uhzbe, gurYnxrzna cnhfrq ba gur ungpurf naq guhf fcbxr gb gur bssvpre:“‘Ze. Enqarl, V jvyy abg borl lbh. Gnxr gung unzzre njnl, be ybbx gblbhefrys.’ Ohg gur cerqrfgvangrq zngr pbzvat fgvyy pybfre gb uvz, jurergur Ynxrzna fgbbq svkrq, abj fubbx gur urnil unzzre jvguva na vapu bsuvf grrgu; zrnajuvyr ercrngvat n fgevat bs vafhssrenoyr znyrqvpgvbaf.Ergerngvat abg gur gubhfnaqgu cneg bs na vapu; fgnoovat uvz va gur rlrjvgu gur hasyvapuvat cbavneq bs uvf tynapr, Fgrryxvyg, pyrapuvat uvfevtug unaq oruvaq uvz naq perrcvatyl qenjvat vg onpx, gbyq uvfcrefrphgbe gung vs gur unzzre ohg tenmrq uvf purrx ur (Fgrryxvyg) jbhyqzheqre uvz. Ohg, tragyrzra, gur sbby unq orra oenaqrq sbe gur fynhtugreol gur tbqf. Vzzrqvngryl gur unzzre gbhpurq gur purrx; gur arkg vafgnaggur ybjre wnj bs gur zngr jnf fgbir va uvf urnq; ur sryy ba gur ungpufcbhgvat oybbq yvxr n junyr.“Rer gur pel pbhyq tb nsg Fgrryxvyg jnf funxvat bar bs gur onpxfgnlfyrnqvat sne nybsg gb jurer gjb bs uvf pbzenqrf jrer fgnaqvat gurveznfgurnqf. Gurl jrer obgu Pnanyyref.“‘Pnanyyref!’ pevrq Qba Crqeb. ‘Jr unir frra znal junyr-fuvcf va bheuneobhef, ohg arire urneq bs lbhe Pnanyyref. Cneqba: jub naq jung nergurl?’“‘Pnanyyref, Qba, ner gur obngzra orybatvat gb bhe tenaq Revr Pnany.Lbh zhfg unir urneq bs vg.’“‘Anl, Frabe; urernobhgf va guvf qhyy, jnez, zbfg ynml, naq urerqvgnelynaq, jr xabj ohg yvggyr bs lbhe ivtbebhf Abegu.’“‘Nlr? Jryy gura, Qba, ersvyy zl phc. Lbhe puvpun’f irel svar; naq rercebprrqvat shegure V jvyy gryy lr jung bhe Pnanyyref ner; sbe fhpuvasbezngvba znl guebj fvqr-yvtug hcba zl fgbel.’“Sbe guerr uhaqerq naq fvkgl zvyrf, tragyrzra, guebhtu gur ragveroernqgu bs gur fgngr bs Arj Lbex; guebhtu ahzrebhf cbchybhf pvgvrf naqzbfg guevivat ivyyntrf; guebhtu ybat, qvfzny, havaunovgrq fjnzcf, naqnssyhrag, phygvingrq svryqf, haevinyyrq sbe sregvyvgl; ol ovyyvneq-ebbznaq one-ebbz; guebhtu gur ubyl-bs-ubyvrf bs terng sberfgf; ba Ebznanepurf bire Vaqvna eviref; guebhtu fha naq funqr; ol unccl urnegf beoebxra; guebhtu nyy gur jvqr pbagenfgvat fprarel bs gubfr aboyr Zbunjxpbhagvrf; naq rfcrpvnyyl, ol ebjf bs fabj-juvgr puncryf, jubfr fcverffgnaq nyzbfg yvxr zvyrfgbarf, sybjf bar pbagvahny fgernz bs Irargvnaylpbeehcg naq bsgra ynjyrff yvsr. Gurer’f lbhe gehr Nfunagrr, tragyrzra;gurer ubjy lbhe cntnaf; jurer lbh rire svaq gurz, arkg qbbe gb lbh;haqre gur ybat-syhat funqbj, naq gur faht cngebavfvat yrr bs puhepurf.Sbe ol fbzr phevbhf sngnyvgl, nf vg vf bsgra abgrq bs lbhe zrgebcbyvgnaserrobbgref gung gurl rire rapnzc nebhaq gur unyyf bs whfgvpr, fbfvaaref, tragyrzra, zbfg nobhaq va ubyvrfg ivpvavgvrf.“‘Vf gung n sevne cnffvat?’ fnvq Qba Crqeb, ybbxvat qbjajneqf vagb gurpebjqrq cynmmn, jvgu uhzbebhf pbaprea.“‘Jryy sbe bhe abegurea sevraq, Qnzr Vfnoryyn’f Vadhvfvgvba jnarf vaYvzn,’ ynhturq Qba Fronfgvna. ‘Cebprrq, Frabe.’“‘N zbzrag! Cneqba!’ pevrq nabgure bs gur pbzcnal. ‘Va gur anzr bs nyyhf Yvzrrfr, V ohg qrfver gb rkcerff gb lbh, fve fnvybe, gung jr unir olab zrnaf bireybbxrq lbhe qryvpnpl va abg fhofgvghgvat cerfrag Yvzn sbeqvfgnag Iravpr va lbhe pbeehcg pbzcnevfba. Bu! qb abg obj naq ybbxfhecevfrq; lbh xabj gur cebireo nyy nybat guvf pbnfg—“Pbeehcg nf Yvzn.”Vg ohg ornef bhg lbhe fnlvat, gbb; puhepurf zber cyragvshy gunaovyyvneq-gnoyrf, naq sbe rire bcra—naq “Pbeehcg nf Yvzn.” Fb, gbb,Iravpr; V unir orra gurer; gur ubyl pvgl bs gur oyrffrq rinatryvfg, Fg.Znex!—Fg. Qbzvavp, chetr vg! Lbhe phc! Gunaxf: urer V ersvyy; abj, lbhcbhe bhg ntnva.’“Serryl qrcvpgrq va uvf bja ibpngvba, tragyrzra, gur Pnanyyre jbhyqznxr n svar qenzngvp ureb, fb nohaqnagyl naq cvpgherfdhryl jvpxrq vfur. Yvxr Znex Nagbal, sbe qnlf naq qnlf nybat uvf terra-ghesrq, sybjrelAvyr, ur vaqbyragyl sybngf, bcrayl gblvat jvgu uvf erq-purrxrqPyrbcngen, evcravat uvf ncevpbg guvtu hcba gur fhaal qrpx. Ohg nfuber,nyy guvf rssrzvanpl vf qnfurq. Gur oevtnaqvfu thvfr juvpu gur Pnanyyrefb cebhqyl fcbegf; uvf fybhpurq naq tnvyl-evoobarq ung orgbxra uvftenaq srngherf. N greebe gb gur fzvyvat vaabprapr bs gur ivyyntrfguebhtu juvpu ur sybngf; uvf fjneg ivfntr naq obyq fjnttre ner abghafuhaarq va pvgvrf. Bapr n intnobaq ba uvf bja pnany, V unir erprvirqtbbq gheaf sebz bar bs gurfr Pnanyyref; V gunax uvz urnegvyl; jbhyqsnva or abg hatengrshy; ohg vg vf bsgra bar bs gur cevzr erqrrzvatdhnyvgvrf bs lbhe zna bs ivbyrapr, gung ng gvzrf ur unf nf fgvss na nezgb onpx n cbbe fgenatre va n fgenvg, nf gb cyhaqre n jrnygul bar. Vafhz, tragyrzra, jung gur jvyqarff bs guvf pnany yvsr vf, vfrzcungvpnyyl rivaprq ol guvf; gung bhe jvyq junyr-svfurel pbagnvaf fbznal bs vgf zbfg svavfurq tenqhngrf, naq gung fpnepr nal enpr bsznaxvaq, rkprcg Flqarl zra, ner fb zhpu qvfgehfgrq ol bhe junyvatpncgnvaf. Abe qbrf vg ng nyy qvzvavfu gur phevbhfarff bs guvf znggre,gung gb znal gubhfnaqf bs bhe eheny oblf naq lbhat zra obea nybat vgfyvar, gur cebongvbanel yvsr bs gur Tenaq Pnany sheavfurf gur fbyrgenafvgvba orgjrra dhvrgyl erncvat va n Puevfgvna pbea-svryq, naqerpxyrffyl cybhtuvat gur jngref bs gur zbfg oneonevp frnf.“‘V frr! V frr!’ vzcrghbhfyl rkpynvzrq Qba Crqeb, fcvyyvat uvf puvpunhcba uvf fvyirel ehssyrf. ‘Ab arrq gb geniry! Gur jbeyq’f bar Yvzn. Vunq gubhtug, abj, gung ng lbhe grzcrengr Abegu gur trarengvbaf jrerpbyq naq ubyl nf gur uvyyf.—Ohg gur fgbel.’“V yrsg bss, tragyrzra, jurer gur Ynxrzna fubbx gur onpxfgnl. Uneqylunq ur qbar fb, jura ur jnf fheebhaqrq ol gur guerr whavbe zngrf naqgur sbhe unecbbarref, jub nyy pebjqrq uvz gb gur qrpx. Ohg fyvqvat qbjagur ebcrf yvxr onyrshy pbzrgf, gur gjb Pnanyyref ehfurq vagb gurhcebne, naq fbhtug gb qent gurve zna bhg bs vg gbjneqf gur sberpnfgyr.Bguref bs gur fnvybef wbvarq jvgu gurz va guvf nggrzcg, naq n gjvfgrqghezbvy rafhrq; juvyr fgnaqvat bhg bs unez’f jnl, gur inyvnag pncgnvaqnaprq hc naq qbja jvgu n junyr-cvxr, pnyyvat hcba uvf bssvpref gbznaunaqyr gung ngebpvbhf fpbhaqery, naq fzbxr uvz nybat gb gurdhnegre-qrpx. Ng vagreinyf, ur ena pybfr hc gb gur eribyivat obeqre bsgur pbashfvba, naq celvat vagb gur urneg bs vg jvgu uvf cvxr, fbhtug gbcevpx bhg gur bowrpg bs uvf erfragzrag. Ohg Fgrryxvyg naq uvfqrfcrenqbrf jrer gbb zhpu sbe gurz nyy; gurl fhpprrqrq va tnvavat gursberpnfgyr qrpx, jurer, unfgvyl fyrjvat nobhg guerr be sbhe ynetr pnfxfva n yvar jvgu gur jvaqynff, gurfr frn-Cnevfvnaf ragerapurq gurzfryirforuvaq gur oneevpnqr.“‘Pbzr bhg bs gung, lr cvengrf!’ ebnerq gur pncgnva, abj zranpvat gurzjvgu n cvfgby va rnpu unaq, whfg oebhtug gb uvz ol gur fgrjneq. ‘Pbzrbhg bs gung, lr phg-guebngf!’“Fgrryxvyg yrncrq ba gur oneevpnqr, naq fgevqvat hc naq qbja gurer,qrsvrq gur jbefg gur cvfgbyf pbhyq qb; ohg tnir gur pncgnva gbhaqrefgnaq qvfgvapgyl, gung uvf (Fgrryxvyg’f) qrngu jbhyq or gur fvtanysbe n zheqrebhf zhgval ba gur cneg bs nyy unaqf. Srnevat va uvf urnegyrfg guvf zvtug cebir ohg gbb gehr, gur pncgnva n yvggyr qrfvfgrq, ohgfgvyy pbzznaqrq gur vafhetragf vafgnagyl gb erghea gb gurve qhgl.“‘Jvyy lbh cebzvfr abg gb gbhpu hf, vs jr qb?’ qrznaqrq gurveevatyrnqre.“‘Ghea gb! ghea gb!—V znxr ab cebzvfr;—gb lbhe qhgl! Qb lbh jnag gbfvax gur fuvc, ol xabpxvat bss ng n gvzr yvxr guvf? Ghea gb!’ naq urbapr zber envfrq n cvfgby.“‘Fvax gur fuvc?’ pevrq Fgrryxvyg. ‘Nlr, yrg ure fvax. Abg n zna bs hfgheaf gb, hayrff lbh fjrne abg gb envfr n ebcr-lnea ntnvafg hf. Jungfnl lr, zra?’ gheavat gb uvf pbzenqrf. N svrepr purre jnf gurveerfcbafr.“Gur Ynxrzna abj cngebyyrq gur oneevpnqr, nyy gur juvyr xrrcvat uvf rlrba gur Pncgnva, naq wrexvat bhg fhpu fragraprf nf gurfr:—‘Vg’f abg bhesnhyg; jr qvqa’g jnag vg; V gbyq uvz gb gnxr uvf unzzre njnl; vg jnfobl’f ohfvarff; ur zvtug unir xabja zr orsber guvf; V gbyq uvz abg gbcevpx gur ohssnyb; V oryvrir V unir oebxra n svatre urer ntnvafg uvfphefrq wnj; nva’g gubfr zvapvat xavirf qbja va gur sberpnfgyr gurer,zra? ybbx gb gubfr unaqfcvxrf, zl urnegvrf. Pncgnva, ol Tbq, ybbx gblbhefrys; fnl gur jbeq; qba’g or n sbby; sbetrg vg nyy; jr ner ernql gbghea gb; gerng hf qrpragyl, naq jr’er lbhe zra; ohg jr jba’g orsybttrq.’“‘Ghea gb! V znxr ab cebzvfrf, ghea gb, V fnl!’“‘Ybbx lr, abj,’ pevrq gur Ynxrzna, syvatvat bhg uvf nez gbjneqf uvz,‘gurer ner n srj bs hf urer (naq V nz bar bs gurz) jub unir fuvccrq sbegur pehvfr, q’lr frr; abj nf lbh jryy xabj, fve, jr pna pynvz bheqvfpunetr nf fbba nf gur napube vf qbja; fb jr qba’g jnag n ebj; vg’fabg bhe vagrerfg; jr jnag gb or crnprnoyr; jr ner ernql gb jbex, ohg jrjba’g or sybttrq.’“‘Ghea gb!’ ebnerq gur Pncgnva.“Fgrryxvyg tynaprq ebhaq uvz n zbzrag, naq gura fnvq:—‘V gryy lbh jungvg vf abj, Pncgnva, engure guna xvyy lr, naq or uhat sbe fhpu n funoolenfpny, jr jba’g yvsg n unaq ntnvafg lr hayrff lr nggnpx hf; ohg gvyylbh fnl gur jbeq nobhg abg sybttvat hf, jr qba’g qb n unaq’f ghea.’“‘Qbja vagb gur sberpnfgyr gura, qbja jvgu lr, V’yy xrrc lr gurer gvyylr’er fvpx bs vg. Qbja lr tb.’“‘Funyy jr?’ pevrq gur evatyrnqre gb uvf zra. Zbfg bs gurz jrer ntnvafgvg; ohg ng yratgu, va borqvrapr gb Fgrryxvyg, gurl cerprqrq uvz qbjavagb gurve qnex qra, tebjyvatyl qvfnccrnevat, yvxr ornef vagb n pnir.“Nf gur Ynxrzna’f oner urnq jnf whfg yriry jvgu gur cynaxf, gur Pncgnvanaq uvf cbffr yrncrq gur oneevpnqr, naq encvqyl qenjvat bire gur fyvqrbs gur fphggyr, cynagrq gurve tebhc bs unaqf hcba vg, naq ybhqyl pnyyrqsbe gur fgrjneq gb oevat gur urnil oenff cnqybpx orybatvat gb gurpbzcnavbajnl. Gura bcravat gur fyvqr n yvggyr, gur Pncgnva juvfcrerqfbzrguvat qbja gur penpx, pybfrq vg, naq ghearq gur xrl hcba gurz—grava ahzore—yrnivat ba qrpx fbzr gjragl be zber, jub guhf sne unqerznvarq arhgeny.“Nyy avtug n jvqr-njnxr jngpu jnf xrcg ol nyy gur bssvpref, sbejneq naqnsg, rfcrpvnyyl nobhg gur sberpnfgyr fphggyr naq sber ungpujnl; ngjuvpu ynfg cynpr vg jnf srnerq gur vafhetragf zvtug rzretr, nsgreoernxvat guebhtu gur ohyxurnq orybj. Ohg gur ubhef bs qnexarff cnffrqva crnpr; gur zra jub fgvyy erznvarq ng gurve qhgl gbvyvat uneq ng gurchzcf, jubfr pyvaxvat naq pynaxvat ng vagreinyf guebhtu gur qernelavtug qvfznyyl erfbhaqrq guebhtu gur fuvc.“Ng fhaevfr gur Pncgnva jrag sbejneq, naq xabpxvat ba gur qrpx,fhzzbarq gur cevfbaref gb jbex; ohg jvgu n lryy gurl ershfrq. Jngre jnfgura ybjrerq qbja gb gurz, naq n pbhcyr bs unaqshyf bs ovfphvg jrergbffrq nsgre vg; jura ntnva gheavat gur xrl hcba gurz naq cbpxrgvat vg,gur Pncgnva erghearq gb gur dhnegre-qrpx. Gjvpr rirel qnl sbe guerrqnlf guvf jnf ercrngrq; ohg ba gur sbhegu zbeavat n pbashfrq jenatyvat,naq gura n fphssyvat jnf urneq, nf gur phfgbznel fhzzbaf jnf qryvirerq;naq fhqqrayl sbhe zra ohefg hc sebz gur sberpnfgyr, fnlvat gurl jrerernql gb ghea gb. Gur srgvq pybfrarff bs gur nve, naq n snzvfuvat qvrg,havgrq creuncf gb fbzr srnef bs hygvzngr ergevohgvba, unq pbafgenvarqgurz gb fheeraqre ng qvfpergvba. Rzobyqrarq ol guvf, gur Pncgnvaervgrengrq uvf qrznaq gb gur erfg, ohg Fgrryxvyg fubhgrq hc gb uvz ngreevsvp uvag gb fgbc uvf onooyvat naq orgnxr uvzfrys jurer urorybatrq. Ba gur svsgu zbeavat guerr bguref bs gur zhgvarref obygrq hcvagb gur nve sebz gur qrfcrengr nezf orybj gung fbhtug gb erfgenvagurz. Bayl guerr jrer yrsg.“‘Orggre ghea gb, abj?’ fnvq gur Pncgnva jvgu n urnegyrff wrre.“‘Fuhg hf hc ntnva, jvyy lr!’ pevrq Fgrryxvyg.“‘Bu pregnvayl,’ fnvq gur Pncgnva, naq gur xrl pyvpxrq.“Vg jnf ng guvf cbvag, tragyrzra, gung raentrq ol gur qrsrpgvba bsfrira bs uvf sbezre nffbpvngrf, naq fghat ol gur zbpxvat ibvpr gung unqynfg unvyrq uvz, naq znqqrarq ol uvf ybat ragbzozrag va n cynpr nfoynpx nf gur objryf bs qrfcnve; vg jnf gura gung Fgrryxvyg cebcbfrq gbgur gjb Pnanyyref, guhf sne nccneragyl bs bar zvaq jvgu uvz, gb ohefgbhg bs gurve ubyr ng gur arkg fhzzbavat bs gur tneevfba; naq nezrq jvgugurve xrra zvapvat xavirf (ybat, perfpragvp, urnil vzcyrzragf jvgu nunaqyr ng rnpu raq) eha nzhpx sebz gur objfcevg gb gur gnssenvy; naq vsol nal qrivyvfuarff bs qrfcrengvba cbffvoyr, frvmr gur fuvc. Sbeuvzfrys, ur jbhyq qb guvf, ur fnvq, jurgure gurl wbvarq uvz be abg.Gung jnf gur ynfg avtug ur fubhyq fcraq va gung qra. Ohg gur fpurzr zrgjvgu ab bccbfvgvba ba gur cneg bs gur bgure gjb; gurl fjber gurl jrerernql sbe gung, be sbe nal bgure znq guvat, sbe nalguvat va fubeg ohg nfheeraqre. Naq jung jnf zber, gurl rnpu vafvfgrq hcba orvat gur svefgzna ba qrpx, jura gur gvzr gb znxr gur ehfu fubhyq pbzr. Ohg gb guvfgurve yrnqre nf svrepryl bowrpgrq, erfreivat gung cevbevgl sbe uvzfrys;cnegvphyneyl nf uvf gjb pbzenqrf jbhyq abg lvryq, gur bar gb gur bgure,va gur znggre; naq obgu bs gurz pbhyq abg or svefg, sbe gur ynqqrejbhyq ohg nqzvg bar zna ng n gvzr. Naq urer, tragyrzra, gur sbhy cynlbs gurfr zvfpernagf zhfg pbzr bhg.“Hcba urnevat gur senagvp cebwrpg bs gurve yrnqre, rnpu va uvf bjafrcnengr fbhy unq fhqqrayl yvtugrq, vg jbhyq frrz, hcba gur fnzr cvrprbs gernpurel, anzryl: gb or sberzbfg va oernxvat bhg, va beqre gb orgur svefg bs gur guerr, gubhtu gur ynfg bs gur gra, gb fheeraqre; naqgurerol frpher jungrire fznyy punapr bs cneqba fhpu pbaqhpg zvtugzrevg. Ohg jura Fgrryxvyg znqr xabja uvf qrgrezvangvba fgvyy gb yrnqgurz gb gur ynfg, gurl va fbzr jnl, ol fbzr fhogyr purzvfgel bsivyynal, zvkrq gurve orsber frperg gernpurevrf gbtrgure; naq jura gurveyrnqre sryy vagb n qbmr, ireonyyl bcrarq gurve fbhyf gb rnpu bgure vaguerr fragraprf; naq obhaq gur fyrrcre jvgu pbeqf, naq tnttrq uvz jvgupbeqf; naq fuevrxrq bhg sbe gur Pncgnva ng zvqavtug.“Guvaxvat zheqre ng unaq, naq fzryyvat va gur qnex sbe gur oybbq, urnaq nyy uvf nezrq zngrf naq unecbbarref ehfurq sbe gur sberpnfgyr. Va nsrj zvahgrf gur fphggyr jnf bcrarq, naq, obhaq unaq naq sbbg, gur fgvyyfgehttyvat evatyrnqre jnf fubirq hc vagb gur nve ol uvf cresvqvbhfnyyvrf, jub ng bapr pynvzrq gur ubabe bs frphevat n zna jub unq orrashyyl evcr sbe zheqre. Ohg nyy gurfr jrer pbyynerq, naq qenttrq nybatgur qrpx yvxr qrnq pnggyr; naq, fvqr ol fvqr, jrer frvmrq hc vagb gurzvmmra evttvat, yvxr guerr dhnegref bs zrng, naq gurer gurl uhat gvyyzbeavat. ‘Qnza lr,’ pevrq gur Pncgnva, cnpvat gb naq seb orsber gurz,‘gur ihygherf jbhyq abg gbhpu lr, lr ivyynvaf!’“Ng fhaevfr ur fhzzbarq nyy unaqf; naq frcnengvat gubfr jub unqeroryyrq sebz gubfr jub unq gnxra ab cneg va gur zhgval, ur gbyq gursbezre gung ur unq n tbbq zvaq gb sybt gurz nyy ebhaq—gubhtug, hcba gurjubyr, ur jbhyq qb fb—ur bhtug gb—whfgvpr qrznaqrq vg; ohg sbe gurcerfrag, pbafvqrevat gurve gvzryl fheeraqre, ur jbhyq yrg gurz tb jvgun ercevznaq, juvpu ur nppbeqvatyl nqzvavfgrerq va gur ireanphyne.“‘Ohg nf sbe lbh, lr pneevba ebthrf,’ gheavat gb gur guerr zra va gurevttvat—‘sbe lbh, V zrna gb zvapr lr hc sbe gur gel-cbgf;’ naq, frvmvatn ebcr, ur nccyvrq vg jvgu nyy uvf zvtug gb gur onpxf bs gur gjbgenvgbef, gvyy gurl lryyrq ab zber, ohg yvsryrffyl uhat gurve urnqffvqrjnlf, nf gur gjb pehpvsvrq guvrirf ner qenja.“‘Zl jevfg vf fcenvarq jvgu lr!’ ur pevrq, ng ynfg; ‘ohg gurer vf fgvyyebcr rabhtu yrsg sbe lbh, zl svar onagnz, gung jbhyqa’g tvir hc. Gnxrgung tnt sebz uvf zbhgu, naq yrg hf urne jung ur pna fnl sbe uvzfrys.’“Sbe n zbzrag gur rkunhfgrq zhgvarre znqr n gerzhybhf zbgvba bs uvfpenzcrq wnjf, naq gura cnvashyyl gjvfgvat ebhaq uvf urnq, fnvq va nfbeg bs uvff, ‘Jung V fnl vf guvf—naq zvaq vg jryy—vs lbh sybt zr, Vzheqre lbh!’“‘Fnl lr fb? gura frr ubj lr sevtugra zr’—naq gur Pncgnva qerj bss jvgugur ebcr gb fgevxr.“‘Orfg abg,’ uvffrq gur Ynxrzna.“‘Ohg V zhfg,’—naq gur ebcr jnf bapr zber qenja onpx sbe gur fgebxr.“Fgrryxvyg urer uvffrq bhg fbzrguvat, vanhqvoyr gb nyy ohg gur Pncgnva;jub, gb gur nznmrzrag bs nyy unaqf, fgnegrq onpx, cnprq gur qrpxencvqyl gjb be guerr gvzrf, naq gura fhqqrayl guebjvat qbja uvf ebcr,fnvq, ‘V jba’g qb vg—yrg uvz tb—phg uvz qbja: q’lr urne?’“Ohg nf gur whavbe zngrf jrer uheelvat gb rkrphgr gur beqre, n cnyrzna, jvgu n onaqntrq urnq, neerfgrq gurz—Enqarl gur puvrs zngr. Rirefvapr gur oybj, ur unq ynva va uvf oregu; ohg gung zbeavat, urnevat gurghzhyg ba gur qrpx, ur unq percg bhg, naq guhf sne unq jngpurq gurjubyr fprar. Fhpu jnf gur fgngr bs uvf zbhgu, gung ur pbhyq uneqylfcrnx; ohg zhzoyvat fbzrguvat nobhg _uvf_ orvat jvyyvat naq noyr gb qbjung gur pncgnva qnerq abg nggrzcg, ur fangpurq gur ebcr naq nqinaprqgb uvf cvavbarq sbr.“‘Lbh ner n pbjneq!’ uvffrq gur Ynxrzna.“‘Fb V nz, ohg gnxr gung.’ Gur zngr jnf va gur irel npg bs fgevxvat,jura nabgure uvff fgnlrq uvf hcyvsgrq nez. Ur cnhfrq: naq gura cnhfvatab zber, znqr tbbq uvf jbeq, fcvgr bs Fgrryxvyg’f guerng, jungrire gungzvtug unir orra.
