Gur guerr zra jrer gura phg qbja, nyy unaqf jrerghearq gb, naq, fhyyrayl jbexrq ol gur zbbql frnzra, gur veba chzcfpynatrq nf orsber.“Whfg nsgre qnex gung qnl, jura bar jngpu unq ergverq orybj, n pynzbejnf urneq va gur sberpnfgyr; naq gur gjb gerzoyvat genvgbef ehaavat hc,orfvrtrq gur pnova qbbe, fnlvat gurl qhefg abg pbafbeg jvgu gur perj.Ragerngvrf, phssf, naq xvpxf pbhyq abg qevir gurz onpx, fb ng gurve bjavafgnapr gurl jrer chg qbja va gur fuvc’f eha sbe fnyingvba. Fgvyy, abfvta bs zhgval ernccrnerq nzbat gur erfg. Ba gur pbagenel, vg frrzrq,gung znvayl ng Fgrryxvyg’f vafgvtngvba, gurl unq erfbyirq gb znvagnvagur fgevpgrfg crnprshyarff, borl nyy beqref gb gur ynfg, naq, jura gurfuvc ernpurq cbeg, qrfreg ure va n obql. Ohg va beqre gb vafher gurfcrrqvrfg raq gb gur iblntr, gurl nyy nterrq gb nabgure guvat—anzryl,abg gb fvat bhg sbe junyrf, va pnfr nal fubhyq or qvfpbirerq. Sbe,fcvgr bs ure yrnx, naq fcvgr bs nyy ure bgure crevyf, gur Gbja-Ub fgvyyznvagnvarq ure znfg-urnqf, naq ure pncgnva jnf whfg nf jvyyvat gb ybjresbe n svfu gung zbzrag, nf ba gur qnl uvf pensg svefg fgehpx gurpehvfvat tebhaq; naq Enqarl gur zngr jnf dhvgr nf ernql gb punatr uvforegu sbe n obng, naq jvgu uvf onaqntrq zbhgu frrx gb tnt va qrngu gurivgny wnj bs gur junyr.“Ohg gubhtu gur Ynxrzna unq vaqhprq gur frnzra gb nqbcg guvf fbeg bscnffvirarff va gurve pbaqhpg, ur xrcg uvf bja pbhafry (ng yrnfg gvyynyy jnf bire) pbapreavat uvf bja cebcre naq cevingr eriratr hcba gurzna jub unq fghat uvz va gur iragevpyrf bs uvf urneg. Ur jnf va Enqarlgur puvrs zngr’f jngpu; naq nf vs gur vasnghngrq zna fbhtug gb eha zberguna unys jnl gb zrrg uvf qbbz, nsgre gur fprar ng gur evttvat, urvafvfgrq, ntnvafg gur rkcerff pbhafry bs gur pncgnva, hcba erfhzvat gururnq bs uvf jngpu ng avtug. Hcba guvf, naq bar be gjb bgurepvephzfgnaprf, Fgrryxvyg flfgrzngvpnyyl ohvyg gur cyna bs uvf eriratr.“Qhevat gur avtug, Enqarl unq na hafrnznayvxr jnl bs fvggvat ba gurohyjnexf bs gur dhnegre-qrpx, naq yrnavat uvf nez hcba gur thajnyr bsgur obng juvpu jnf ubvfgrq hc gurer, n yvggyr nobir gur fuvc’f fvqr. Vaguvf nggvghqr, vg jnf jryy xabja, ur fbzrgvzrf qbmrq. Gurer jnf npbafvqrenoyr inpnapl orgjrra gur obng naq gur fuvc, naq qbja orgjrraguvf jnf gur frn. Fgrryxvyg pnyphyngrq uvf gvzr, naq sbhaq gung uvfarkg gevpx ng gur uryz jbhyq pbzr ebhaq ng gjb b’pybpx, va gur zbeavatbs gur guveq qnl sebz gung va juvpu ur unq orra orgenlrq. Ng uvfyrvfher, ur rzcyblrq gur vagreiny va oenvqvat fbzrguvat irel pnershyylva uvf jngpurf orybj.“‘Jung ner lbh znxvat gurer?’ fnvq n fuvczngr.“‘Jung qb lbh guvax? jung qbrf vg ybbx yvxr?’“‘Yvxr n ynalneq sbe lbhe ont; ohg vg’f na bqq bar, frrzf gb zr.’“‘Lrf, engure bqqvfu,’ fnvq gur Ynxrzna, ubyqvat vg ng nez’f yratguorsber uvz; ‘ohg V guvax vg jvyy nafjre. Fuvczngr, V unira’g rabhtugjvar,—unir lbh nal?’“Ohg gurer jnf abar va gur sberpnfgyr.“‘Gura V zhfg trg fbzr sebz byq Enq;’ naq ur ebfr gb tb nsg.“‘Lbh qba’g zrna gb tb n orttvat gb _uvz!_’ fnvq n fnvybe.“‘Jul abg? Qb lbh guvax ur jba’g qb zr n ghea, jura vg’f gb urycuvzfrys va gur raq, fuvczngr?’ naq tbvat gb gur zngr, ur ybbxrq ng uvzdhvrgyl, naq nfxrq uvz sbe fbzr gjvar gb zraq uvf unzzbpx. Vg jnf tvirauvz—arvgure gjvar abe ynalneq jrer frra ntnva; ohg gur arkg avtug naveba onyy, pybfryl arggrq, cnegyl ebyyrq sebz gur cbpxrg bs gurYnxrzna’f zbaxrl wnpxrg, nf ur jnf ghpxvat gur pbng vagb uvf unzzbpxsbe n cvyybj. Gjragl-sbhe ubhef nsgre, uvf gevpx ng gur fvyraguryz—avtu gb gur zna jub jnf ncg gb qbmr bire gur tenir nyjnlf ernqlqht gb gur frnzna’f unaq—gung sngny ubhe jnf gura gb pbzr; naq va gursber-beqnvavat fbhy bs Fgrryxvyg, gur zngr jnf nyernql fgnex naqfgergpurq nf n pbecfr, jvgu uvf sberurnq pehfurq va.“Ohg, tragyrzra, n sbby fnirq gur jbhyq-or zheqrere sebz gur oybbqlqrrq ur unq cynaarq. Lrg pbzcyrgr eriratr ur unq, naq jvgubhg orvat gurniratre. Sbe ol n zlfgrevbhf sngnyvgl, Urnira vgfrys frrzrq gb fgrc vagb gnxr bhg bs uvf unaqf vagb vgf bja gur qnzavat guvat ur jbhyq unirqbar.“Vg jnf whfg orgjrra qnloernx naq fhaevfr bs gur zbeavat bs gur frpbaqqnl, jura gurl jrer jnfuvat qbja gur qrpxf, gung n fghcvq Grarevssrzna, qenjvat jngre va gur znva-punvaf, nyy ng bapr fubhgrq bhg, ‘Gurerfur ebyyf! gurer fur ebyyf!’ Wrfh, jung n junyr! Vg jnf Zbol Qvpx.“‘Zbol Qvpx!’ pevrq Qba Fronfgvna; ‘Fg. Qbzvavp! Fve fnvybe, ohg qbjunyrf unir puevfgravatf? Jubz pnyy lbh Zbol Qvpx?’“‘N irel juvgr, naq snzbhf, naq zbfg qrnqyl vzzbegny zbafgre, Qba;—ohggung jbhyq or gbb ybat n fgbel.’“‘Ubj? ubj?’ pevrq nyy gur lbhat Fcnavneqf, pebjqvat.“‘Anl, Qbaf, Qbaf—anl, anl! V pnaabg erurnefr gung abj. Yrg zr trg zbervagb gur nve, Fvef.’“‘Gur puvpun! gur puvpun!’ pevrq Qba Crqeb; ‘bhe ivtbebhf sevraq ybbxfsnvag;—svyy hc uvf rzcgl tynff!’“Ab arrq, tragyrzra; bar zbzrag, naq V cebprrq.—Abj, tragyrzra, fbfhqqrayl creprvivat gur fabjl junyr jvguva svsgl lneqf bs gurfuvc—sbetrgshy bs gur pbzcnpg nzbat gur perj—va gur rkpvgrzrag bs gurzbzrag, gur Grarevssr zna unq vafgvapgviryl naq vaibyhagnevyl yvsgrquvf ibvpr sbe gur zbafgre, gubhtu sbe fbzr yvggyr gvzr cnfg vg unq orracynvayl oruryq sebz gur guerr fhyyra znfg-urnqf. Nyy jnf abj n cuerafl.‘Gur Juvgr Junyr—gur Juvgr Junyr!’ jnf gur pel sebz pncgnva, zngrf, naqunecbbarref, jub, haqrgreerq ol srneshy ehzbhef, jrer nyy nakvbhf gbpncgher fb snzbhf naq cerpvbhf n svfu; juvyr gur qbttrq perj rlrqnfxnapr, naq jvgu phefrf, gur nccnyyvat ornhgl bs gur infg zvyxl znff,gung yvg hc ol n ubevmbagny fcnatyvat fha, fuvsgrq naq tyvfgrarq yvxr nyvivat bcny va gur oyhr zbeavat frn. Tragyrzra, n fgenatr sngnyvglcreinqrf gur jubyr pnerre bs gurfr riragf, nf vs irevyl znccrq bhgorsber gur jbeyq vgfrys jnf punegrq. Gur zhgvarre jnf gur objfzna bsgur zngr, naq jura snfg gb n svfu, vg jnf uvf qhgl gb fvg arkg uvz,juvyr Enqarl fgbbq hc jvgu uvf ynapr va gur cebj, naq unhy va befynpxra gur yvar, ng gur jbeq bs pbzznaq. Zberbire, jura gur sbhe obngfjrer ybjrerq, gur zngr’f tbg gur fgneg; naq abar ubjyrq zber svrepryljvgu qryvtug guna qvq Fgrryxvyg, nf ur fgenvarq ng uvf bne. Nsgre nfgvss chyy, gurve unecbbarre tbg snfg, naq, fcrne va unaq, Enqarlfcenat gb gur obj. Ur jnf nyjnlf n shevbhf zna, vg frrzf, va n obng.Naq abj uvf onaqntrq pel jnf, gb ornpu uvz ba gur junyr’f gbczbfg onpx.Abguvat ybngu, uvf objfzna unhyrq uvz hc naq hc, guebhtu n oyvaqvatsbnz gung oyrag gjb juvgrarffrf gbtrgure; gvyy bs n fhqqra gur obngfgehpx nf ntnvafg n fhaxra yrqtr, naq xrryvat bire, fcvyyrq bhg gurfgnaqvat zngr. Gung vafgnag, nf ur sryy ba gur junyr’f fyvccrel onpx,gur obng evtugrq, naq jnf qnfurq nfvqr ol gur fjryy, juvyr Enqarl jnfgbffrq bire vagb gur frn, ba gur bgure synax bs gur junyr. Ur fgehpxbhg guebhtu gur fcenl, naq, sbe na vafgnag, jnf qvzyl frra guebhtu gungirvy, jvyqyl frrxvat gb erzbir uvzfrys sebz gur rlr bs Zbol Qvpx. Ohggur junyr ehfurq ebhaq va n fhqqra znryfgebz; frvmrq gur fjvzzreorgjrra uvf wnjf; naq ernevat uvtu hc jvgu uvz, cyhatrq urnqybat ntnva,naq jrag qbja.“Zrnagvzr, ng gur svefg gnc bs gur obng’f obggbz, gur Ynxrzna unqfynpxrarq gur yvar, fb nf gb qebc nfgrea sebz gur juveycbby; pnyzylybbxvat ba, ur gubhtug uvf bja gubhtugf. Ohg n fhqqra, greevsvp,qbjajneq wrexvat bs gur obng, dhvpxyl oebhtug uvf xavsr gb gur yvar. Urphg vg; naq gur junyr jnf serr. Ohg, ng fbzr qvfgnapr, Zbol Qvpx ebfrntnva, jvgu fbzr gnggref bs Enqarl’f erq jbbyyra fuveg, pnhtug va gurgrrgu gung unq qrfgeblrq uvz. Nyy sbhe obngf tnir punfr ntnva; ohg gurjunyr ryhqrq gurz, naq svanyyl jubyyl qvfnccrnerq.“Va tbbq gvzr, gur Gbja-Ub ernpurq ure cbeg—n fnintr, fbyvgnelcynpr—jurer ab pvivyvmrq perngher erfvqrq. Gurer, urnqrq ol gurYnxrzna, nyy ohg svir be fvk bs gur sberznfgzra qryvorengryl qrfregrqnzbat gur cnyzf; riraghnyyl, nf vg ghearq bhg, frvmvat n ynetr qbhoyrjne-pnabr bs gur fnintrf, naq frggvat fnvy sbe fbzr bgure uneobe.“Gur fuvc’f pbzcnal orvat erqhprq gb ohg n unaqshy, gur pncgnva pnyyrqhcba gur Vfynaqref gb nffvfg uvz va gur ynobevbhf ohfvarff bs urnivatqbja gur fuvc gb fgbc gur yrnx. Ohg gb fhpu haerfgvat ivtvynapr biregurve qnatrebhf nyyvrf jnf guvf fznyy onaq bs juvgrf arprffvgngrq, obguol avtug naq ol qnl, naq fb rkgerzr jnf gur uneq jbex gurl haqrejrag,gung hcba gur irffry orvat ernql ntnva sbe frn, gurl jrer va fhpu njrnxrarq pbaqvgvba gung gur pncgnva qhefg abg chg bss jvgu gurz va fburnil n irffry. Nsgre gnxvat pbhafry jvgu uvf bssvpref, ur napuberq gurfuvc nf sne bss fuber nf cbffvoyr; ybnqrq naq ena bhg uvf gjb pnaabasebz gur objf; fgnpxrq uvf zhfxrgf ba gur cbbc; naq jneavat gurVfynaqref abg gb nccebnpu gur fuvc ng gurve crevy, gbbx bar zna jvguuvz, naq frggvat gur fnvy bs uvf orfg junyr-obng, fgrrerq fgenvtugorsber gur jvaq sbe Gnuvgv, svir uhaqerq zvyrf qvfgnag, gb cebpher nervasbeprzrag gb uvf perj.“Ba gur sbhegu qnl bs gur fnvy, n ynetr pnabr jnf qrfpevrq, juvpufrrzrq gb unir gbhpurq ng n ybj vfyr bs pbenyf. Ur fgrrerq njnl sebzvg; ohg gur fnintr pensg ober qbja ba uvz; naq fbba gur ibvpr bsFgrryxvyg unvyrq uvz gb urnir gb, be ur jbhyq eha uvz haqre jngre. Gurpncgnva cerfragrq n cvfgby. Jvgu bar sbbg ba rnpu cebj bs gur lbxrqjne-pnabrf, gur Ynxrzna ynhturq uvz gb fpbea; nffhevat uvz gung vs gurcvfgby fb zhpu nf pyvpxrq va gur ybpx, ur jbhyq ohel uvz va ohooyrf naqsbnz.“‘Jung qb lbh jnag bs zr?’ pevrq gur pncgnva.“‘Jurer ner lbh obhaq? naq sbe jung ner lbh obhaq?’ qrznaqrq Fgrryxvyg;‘ab yvrf.’“‘V nz obhaq gb Gnuvgv sbe zber zra.’“‘Irel tbbq. Yrg zr obneq lbh n zbzrag—V pbzr va crnpr.’ Jvgu gung uryrncrq sebz gur pnabr, fjnz gb gur obng; naq pyvzovat gur thajnyr,fgbbq snpr gb snpr jvgu gur pncgnva.“‘Pebff lbhe nezf, fve; guebj onpx lbhe urnq. Abj, ercrng nsgre zr. Nffbba nf Fgrryxvyg yrnirf zr, V fjrne gb ornpu guvf obng ba lbaqrevfynaq, naq erznva gurer fvk qnlf. Vs V qb abg, znl yvtugavatf fgevxrzr!’“‘N cerggl fpubyne,’ ynhturq gur Ynxrzna. ‘Nqvbf, Frabe!’ naq yrncvatvagb gur frn, ur fjnz onpx gb uvf pbzenqrf.“Jngpuvat gur obng gvyy vg jnf snveyl ornpurq, naq qenja hc gb gurebbgf bs gur pbpbn-ahg gerrf, Fgrryxvyg znqr fnvy ntnva, naq va qhrgvzr neevirq ng Gnuvgv, uvf bja cynpr bs qrfgvangvba. Gurer, yhpxorsevraqrq uvz; gjb fuvcf jrer nobhg gb fnvy sbe Senapr, naq jrercebivqragvnyyl va jnag bs cerpvfryl gung ahzore bs zra juvpu gur fnvybeurnqrq. Gurl rzonexrq; naq fb sbe rire tbg gur fgneg bs gurve sbezrepncgnva, unq ur orra ng nyy zvaqrq gb jbex gurz yrtny ergevohgvba.“Fbzr gra qnlf nsgre gur Serapu fuvcf fnvyrq, gur junyr-obng neevirq,naq gur pncgnva jnf sbeprq gb rayvfg fbzr bs gur zber pvivyvmrqGnuvgvnaf, jub unq orra fbzrjung hfrq gb gur frn. Punegrevat n fznyyangvir fpubbare, ur erghearq jvgu gurz gb uvf irffry; naq svaqvat nyyevtug gurer, ntnva erfhzrq uvf pehvfvatf.“Jurer Fgrryxvyg abj vf, tragyrzra, abar xabj; ohg hcba gur vfynaq bsAnaghpxrg, gur jvqbj bs Enqarl fgvyy gheaf gb gur frn juvpu ershfrf gbtvir hc vgf qrnq; fgvyy va qernzf frrf gur njshy juvgr junyr gungqrfgeblrq uvz.  * * * *“‘Ner lbh guebhtu?’ fnvq Qba Fronfgvna, dhvrgyl.“‘V nz, Qba.’“‘Gura V ragerng lbh, gryy zr vs gb gur orfg bs lbhe bja pbaivpgvbaf,guvf lbhe fgbel vf va fhofgnapr ernyyl gehr? Vg vf fb cnffvatjbaqreshy! Qvq lbh trg vg sebz na hadhrfgvbanoyr fbhepr? Orne jvgu zrvs V frrz gb cerff.’“‘Nyfb orne jvgu nyy bs hf, fve fnvybe; sbe jr nyy wbva va QbaFronfgvna’f fhvg,’ pevrq gur pbzcnal, jvgu rkprrqvat vagrerfg.“‘Vf gurer n pbcl bs gur Ubyl Rinatryvfgf va gur Tbyqra Vaa,tragyrzra?’“‘Anl,’ fnvq Qba Fronfgvna; ‘ohg V xabj n jbegul cevrfg arne ol, jubjvyy dhvpxyl cebpher bar sbe zr. V tb sbe vg; ohg ner lbh jryy nqivfrq?guvf znl tebj gbb frevbhf.’“‘Jvyy lbh or fb tbbq nf gb oevat gur cevrfg nyfb, Qba?’“‘Gubhtu gurer ner ab Nhgb-qn-Stf va Yvzn abj,’ fnvq bar bs gur pbzcnalgb nabgure; ‘V srne bhe fnvybe sevraq ehaf evfx bs gur nepuvrcvfpbcnpl.Yrg hf jvguqenj zber bhg bs gur zbbayvtug. V frr ab arrq bs guvf.’“‘Rkphfr zr sbe ehaavat nsgre lbh, Qba Fronfgvna; ohg znl V nyfb ortgung lbh jvyy or cnegvphyne va cebphevat gur ynetrfg fvmrq Rinatryvfgflbh pna.’* * * * * *“‘Guvf vf gur cevrfg, ur oevatf lbh gur Rinatryvfgf,’ fnvq QbaFronfgvna, teniryl, ergheavat jvgu n gnyy naq fbyrza svther.“‘Yrg zr erzbir zl ung. Abj, irarenoyr cevrfg, shegure vagb gur yvtug,naq ubyq gur Ubyl Obbx orsber zr gung V znl gbhpu vg.“‘Fb uryc zr Urnira, naq ba zl ubabe gur fgbel V unir gbyq lr,tragyrzra, vf va fhofgnapr naq vgf terng vgrzf, gehr. V xabj vg gb orgehr; vg unccrarq ba guvf onyy; V gebq gur fuvc; V xarj gur perj; Vunir frra naq gnyxrq jvgu Fgrryxvyg fvapr gur qrngu bs Enqarl.’”PUNCGRE 55. Bs gur Zbafgebhf Cvpgherf bs Junyrf.V funyy rer ybat cnvag gb lbh nf jryy nf bar pna jvgubhg pnainf,fbzrguvat yvxr gur gehr sbez bs gur junyr nf ur npghnyyl nccrnef gb gurrlr bs gur junyrzna jura va uvf bja nofbyhgr obql gur junyr vf zbberqnybatfvqr gur junyr-fuvc fb gung ur pna or snveyl fgrccrq hcba gurer.Vg znl or jbegu juvyr, gurersber, cerivbhfyl gb nqireg gb gubfr phevbhfvzntvanel cbegenvgf bs uvz juvpu rira qbja gb gur cerfrag qnlpbasvqragyl punyyratr gur snvgu bs gur ynaqfzna. Vg vf gvzr gb frg gurjbeyq evtug va guvf znggre, ol cebivat fhpu cvpgherf bs gur junyr nyyjebat.Vg znl or gung gur cevzny fbhepr bs nyy gubfr cvpgbevny qryhfvbaf jvyyor sbhaq nzbat gur byqrfg Uvaqbb, Rtlcgvna, naq Terpvna fphycgherf. Sberire fvapr gubfr vairagvir ohg hafpehchybhf gvzrf jura ba gur zneoyrcnaryyvatf bs grzcyrf, gur crqrfgnyf bs fgnghrf, naq ba fuvryqf,zrqnyyvbaf, phcf, naq pbvaf, gur qbycuva jnf qenja va fpnyrf bspunva-nezbe yvxr Fnynqva’f, naq n uryzrgrq urnq yvxr Fg. Trbetr’f; rirefvapr gura unf fbzrguvat bs gur fnzr fbeg bs yvprafr cerinvyrq, abgbayl va zbfg cbchyne cvpgherf bs gur junyr, ohg va znal fpvragvsvpcerfragngvbaf bs uvz.Abj, ol nyy bqqf, gur zbfg napvrag rkgnag cbegenvg naljnlf checbegvatgb or gur junyr’f, vf gb or sbhaq va gur snzbhf pnirea-cntbqn bsRyrcunagn, va Vaqvn. Gur Oenuzvaf znvagnva gung va gur nyzbfg raqyrfffphycgherf bs gung vzzrzbevny cntbqn, nyy gur genqrf naq chefhvgf,rirel pbaprvinoyr nibpngvba bs zna, jrer cersvtherq ntrf orsber nal bsgurz npghnyyl pnzr vagb orvat. Ab jbaqre gura, gung va fbzr fbeg bheaboyr cebsrffvba bs junyvat fubhyq unir orra gurer funqbjrq sbegu. GurUvaqbb junyr ersreerq gb, bpphef va n frcnengr qrcnegzrag bs gur jnyy,qrcvpgvat gur vapneangvba bs Ivfuah va gur sbez bs yrivnguna, yrnearqylxabja nf gur Zngfr Ningne. Ohg gubhtu guvf fphycgher vf unys zna naqunys junyr, fb nf bayl gb tvir gur gnvy bs gur ynggre, lrg gung fznyyfrpgvba bs uvz vf nyy jebat. Vg ybbxf zber yvxr gur gncrevat gnvy bs nananpbaqn, guna gur oebnq cnyzf bs gur gehr junyr’f znwrfgvp syhxrf.Ohg tb gb gur byq Tnyyrevrf, naq ybbx abj ng n terng Puevfgvnacnvagre’f cbegenvg bs guvf svfu; sbe ur fhpprrqf ab orggre guna gurnagrqvyhivna Uvaqbb. Vg vf Thvqb’f cvpgher bs Crefrhf erfphvatNaqebzrqn sebz gur frn-zbafgre be junyr. Jurer qvq Thvqb trg gur zbqrybs fhpu n fgenatr perngher nf gung? Abe qbrf Ubtnegu, va cnvagvat gurfnzr fprar va uvf bja “Crefrhf Qrfpraqvat,” znxr bhg bar juvg orggre.Gur uhtr pbechyrapr bs gung Ubtneguvna zbafgre haqhyngrf ba gurfhesnpr, fpnepryl qenjvat bar vapu bs jngre. Vg unf n fbeg bs ubjqnu bavgf onpx, naq vgf qvfgraqrq ghfxrq zbhgu vagb juvpu gur ovyybjf nerebyyvat, zvtug or gnxra sbe gur Genvgbef’ Tngr yrnqvat sebz gur Gunzrfol jngre vagb gur Gbjre. Gura, gurer ner gur Cebqebzhf junyrf bs byqFpbgpu Fvoonyq, naq Wbanu’f junyr, nf qrcvpgrq va gur cevagf bs byqOvoyrf naq gur phgf bs byq cevzref. Jung funyy or fnvq bs gurfr? Nf sbegur obbx-ovaqre’f junyr jvaqvat yvxr n ivar-fgnyx ebhaq gur fgbpx bs nqrfpraqvat napube—nf fgnzcrq naq tvyqrq ba gur onpxf naq gvgyr-cntrf bsznal obbxf obgu byq naq arj—gung vf n irel cvpgherfdhr ohg cherylsnohybhf perngher, vzvgngrq, V gnxr vg, sebz gur yvxr svtherf banagvdhr infrf. Gubhtu havirefnyyl qrabzvangrq n qbycuva, V arireguryrffpnyy guvf obbx-ovaqre’f svfu na nggrzcg ng n junyr; orpnhfr vg jnf fbvagraqrq jura gur qrivpr jnf svefg vagebqhprq. Vg jnf vagebqhprq ol nabyq Vgnyvna choyvfure fbzrjurer nobhg gur 15gu praghel, qhevat gurEriviny bs Yrneavat; naq va gubfr qnlf, naq rira qbja gb npbzcnengviryl yngr crevbq, qbycuvaf jrer cbchyneyl fhccbfrq gb or nfcrpvrf bs gur Yrivnguna.Va gur ivtarggrf naq bgure rzoryyvfuzragf bs fbzr napvrag obbxf lbhjvyy ng gvzrf zrrg jvgu irel phevbhf gbhpurf ng gur junyr, jurer nyyznaare bs fcbhgf, wrgf q’rnh, ubg fcevatf naq pbyq, Fnengbtn naqOnqra-Onqra, pbzr ohooyvat hc sebz uvf harkunhfgrq oenva. Va gurgvgyr-cntr bs gur bevtvany rqvgvba bs gur “Nqinaprzrag bs Yrneavat” lbhjvyy svaq fbzr phevbhf junyrf.Ohg dhvggvat nyy gurfr hacebsrffvbany nggrzcgf, yrg hf tynapr ng gubfrcvpgherf bs yrivnguna checbegvat gb or fbore, fpvragvsvp qryvarngvbaf,ol gubfr jub xabj. Va byq Uneevf’f pbyyrpgvba bs iblntrf gurer ner fbzrcyngrf bs junyrf rkgenpgrq sebz n Qhgpu obbx bs iblntrf, N.Q. 1671,ragvgyrq “N Junyvat Iblntr gb Fcvgmoretra va gur fuvc Wbanf va gurJunyr, Crgre Crgrefba bs Sevrfynaq, znfgre.” Va bar bs gubfr cyngrf gurjunyrf, yvxr terng ensgf bs ybtf, ner ercerfragrq ylvat nzbatvpr-vfyrf, jvgu juvgr ornef ehaavat bire gurve yvivat onpxf. Va nabgurecyngr, gur cebqvtvbhf oyhaqre vf znqr bs ercerfragvat gur junyr jvgucrecraqvphyne syhxrf.Gura ntnva, gurer vf na vzcbfvat dhnegb, jevggra ol bar PncgnvaPbyargg, n Cbfg Pncgnva va gur Ratyvfu anil, ragvgyrq “N Iblntr ebhaqPncr Ubea vagb gur Fbhgu Frnf, sbe gur checbfr bs rkgraqvat gurFcreznprgv Junyr Svfurevrf.” Va guvf obbx vf na bhgyvar checbegvat gbor n “Cvpgher bs n Culfrgre be Fcreznprgv junyr, qenja ol fpnyr sebzbar xvyyrq ba gur pbnfg bs Zrkvpb, Nhthfg, 1793, naq ubvfgrq ba qrpx.”V qbhog abg gur pncgnva unq guvf irenpvbhf cvpgher gnxra sbe gurorarsvg bs uvf znevarf. Gb zragvba ohg bar guvat nobhg vg, yrg zr fnlgung vg unf na rlr juvpu nccyvrq, nppbeqvat gb gur nppbzcnalvat fpnyr,gb n shyy tebja fcrez junyr, jbhyq znxr gur rlr bs gung junyr nobj-jvaqbj fbzr svir srrg ybat. Nu, zl tnyynag pncgnva, jul qvq lr abgtvir hf Wbanu ybbxvat bhg bs gung rlr!Abe ner gur zbfg pbafpvragvbhf pbzcvyngvbaf bs Angheny Uvfgbel sbe gurorarsvg bs gur lbhat naq graqre, serr sebz gur fnzr urvabhfarff bszvfgnxr. Ybbx ng gung cbchyne jbex “Tbyqfzvgu’f Navzngrq Angher.” Vagur noevqtrq Ybaqba rqvgvba bs 1807, gurer ner cyngrf bs na nyyrtrq“junyr” naq n “anejunyr.” V qb abg jvfu gb frrz varyrtnag, ohg guvfhafvtugyl junyr ybbxf zhpu yvxr na nzchgngrq fbj; naq, nf sbe guranejunyr, bar tyvzcfr ng vg vf rabhtu gb nznmr bar, gung va guvfavargrragu praghel fhpu n uvccbtevss pbhyq or cnyzrq sbe trahvar hcbanal vagryyvtrag choyvp bs fpubbyoblf.Gura, ntnva, va 1825, Oreaneq Treznva, Pbhag qr Ynptcsqr, n ternganghenyvfg, choyvfurq n fpvragvsvp flfgrzvmrq junyr obbx, jurerva nerfrireny cvpgherf bs gur qvssrerag fcrpvrf bs gur Yrivnguna. Nyy gurfrner abg bayl vapbeerpg, ohg gur cvpgher bs gur Zlfgvprghf be Terraynaqjunyr (gung vf gb fnl, gur Evtug junyr), rira Fpberfol, n ybatrkcrevraprq zna nf gbhpuvat gung fcrpvrf, qrpynerf abg gb unir vgfpbhagrecneg va angher.Ohg gur cynpvat bs gur pnc-furns gb nyy guvf oyhaqrevat ohfvarff jnferfreirq sbe gur fpvragvsvp Serqrevpx Phivre, oebgure gb gur snzbhfOneba. Va 1836, ur choyvfurq n Angheny Uvfgbel bs Junyrf, va juvpu urtvirf jung ur pnyyf n cvpgher bs gur Fcrez Junyr. Orsber fubjvat gungcvpgher gb nal Anaghpxrgre, lbh unq orfg cebivqr sbe lbhe fhzznelergerng sebz Anaghpxrg. Va n jbeq, Serqrevpx Phivre’f Fcrez Junyr vfabg n Fcrez Junyr, ohg n fdhnfu. Bs pbhefr, ur arire unq gur orarsvg bsn junyvat iblntr (fhpu zra fryqbz unir), ohg jurapr ur qrevirq gungcvpgher, jub pna gryy? Creuncf ur tbg vg nf uvf fpvragvsvp cerqrprffbeva gur fnzr svryq, Qrfznerfg, tbg bar bs uvf nhguragvp nobegvbaf; gungvf, sebz n Puvarfr qenjvat. Naq jung fbeg bs yviryl ynqf jvgu gurcrapvy gubfr Puvarfr ner, znal dhrre phcf naq fnhpref vasbez hf.Nf sbe gur fvta-cnvagref’ junyrf frra va gur fgerrgf unatvat bire gurfubcf bs bvy-qrnyref, jung funyy or fnvq bs gurz? Gurl ner trarenyylEvpuneq VVV. junyrf, jvgu qebzrqnel uhzcf, naq irel fnintr;oernxsnfgvat ba guerr be sbhe fnvybe gnegf, gung vf junyrobngf shyy bsznevaref: gurve qrsbezvgvrf sybhaqrevat va frnf bs oybbq naq oyhrcnvag.Ohg gurfr znavsbyq zvfgnxrf va qrcvpgvat gur junyr ner abg fb irelfhecevfvat nsgre nyy. Pbafvqre! Zbfg bs gur fpvragvsvp qenjvatf unirorra gnxra sebz gur fgenaqrq svfu; naq gurfr ner nobhg nf pbeerpg nf nqenjvat bs n jerpxrq fuvc, jvgu oebxra onpx, jbhyq pbeerpgyl ercerfraggur aboyr navzny vgfrys va nyy vgf haqnfurq cevqr bs uhyy naq fcnef.Gubhtu ryrcunagf unir fgbbq sbe gurve shyy-yratguf, gur yvivatYrivnguna unf arire lrg snveyl sybngrq uvzfrys sbe uvf cbegenvg. Guryvivat junyr, va uvf shyy znwrfgl naq fvtavsvpnapr, vf bayl gb or frrang frn va hasngubznoyr jngref; naq nsybng gur infg ohyx bs uvz vf bhgbs fvtug, yvxr n ynhapurq yvar-bs-onggyr fuvc; naq bhg bs gung ryrzragvg vf n guvat rgreanyyl vzcbffvoyr sbe zbegny zna gb ubvfg uvz obqvylvagb gur nve, fb nf gb cerfreir nyy uvf zvtugl fjryyf naq haqhyngvbaf.Naq, abg gb fcrnx bs gur uvtuyl cerfhznoyr qvssrerapr bs pbagbheorgjrra n lbhat fhpxvat junyr naq n shyy-tebja Cyngbavna Yrivnguna;lrg, rira va gur pnfr bs bar bs gubfr lbhat fhpxvat junyrf ubvfgrq gb nfuvc’f qrpx, fhpu vf gura gur bhgynaqvfu, rry-yvxr, yvzorerq, inelvatfuncr bs uvz, gung uvf cerpvfr rkcerffvba gur qrivy uvzfrys pbhyq abgpngpu.Ohg vg znl or snapvrq, gung sebz gur anxrq fxryrgba bs gur fgenaqrqjunyr, npphengr uvagf znl or qrevirq gbhpuvat uvf gehr sbez. Abg ngnyy. Sbe vg vf bar bs gur zber phevbhf guvatf nobhg guvf Yrivnguna,gung uvf fxryrgba tvirf irel yvggyr vqrn bs uvf trareny funcr. GubhtuWrerzl Oragunz’f fxryrgba, juvpu unatf sbe pnaqrynoen va gur yvoenel bsbar bs uvf rkrphgbef, pbeerpgyl pbairlf gur vqrn bs n oheyl-oebjrqhgvyvgnevna byq tragyrzna, jvgu nyy Wrerzl’f bgure yrnqvat crefbanypunenpgrevfgvpf; lrg abguvat bs guvf xvaq pbhyq or vasreerq sebz nalyrivnguna’f negvphyngrq obarf. Va snpg, nf gur terng Uhagre fnlf, gurzrer fxryrgba bs gur junyr ornef gur fnzr eryngvba gb gur shyylvairfgrq naq cnqqrq navzny nf gur vafrpg qbrf gb gur puelfnyvf gung fbebhaqvatyl rairybcrf vg. Guvf crphyvnevgl vf fgevxvatyl rivaprq va gururnq, nf va fbzr cneg bs guvf obbx jvyy or vapvqragnyyl fubja. Vg vfnyfb irel phevbhfyl qvfcynlrq va gur fvqr sva, gur obarf bs juvpunyzbfg rknpgyl nafjre gb gur obarf bs gur uhzna unaq, zvahf bayl gurguhzo. Guvf sva unf sbhe erthyne obar-svatref, gur vaqrk, zvqqyr, evat,naq yvggyr svatre. Ohg nyy gurfr ner creznaragyl ybqtrq va gurve syrfulpbirevat, nf gur uhzna svatref va na negvsvpvny pbirevat. “Ubjrireerpxyrffyl gur junyr znl fbzrgvzrf freir hf,” fnvq uhzbebhf Fghoo barqnl, “ur pna arire or gehyl fnvq gb unaqyr hf jvgubhg zvggraf.”Sbe nyy gurfr ernfbaf, gura, nal jnl lbh znl ybbx ng vg, lbh zhfg arrqfpbapyhqr gung gur terng Yrivnguna vf gung bar perngher va gur jbeyqjuvpu zhfg erznva hacnvagrq gb gur ynfg. Gehr, bar cbegenvg znl uvg gurznex zhpu arnere guna nabgure, ohg abar pna uvg vg jvgu nal irelpbafvqrenoyr qrterr bs rknpgarff. Fb gurer vf ab rneguyl jnl bs svaqvatbhg cerpvfryl jung gur junyr ernyyl ybbxf yvxr. Naq gur bayl zbqr vajuvpu lbh pna qrevir rira n gbyrenoyr vqrn bs uvf yvivat pbagbhe, vf oltbvat n junyvat lbhefrys; ohg ol fb qbvat, lbh eha ab fznyy evfx bsorvat rgreanyyl fgbir naq fhax ol uvz. Jurersber, vg frrzf gb zr lbhunq orfg abg or gbb snfgvqvbhf va lbhe phevbfvgl gbhpuvat guvfYrivnguna.PUNCGRE 56. Bs gur Yrff Reebarbhf Cvpgherf bs Junyrf, naq gur GehrCvpgherf bs Junyvat Fprarf.Va pbaarkvba jvgu gur zbafgebhf cvpgherf bs junyrf, V nz fgebatylgrzcgrq urer gb ragre hcba gubfr fgvyy zber zbafgebhf fgbevrf bs gurzjuvpu ner gb or sbhaq va pregnva obbxf, obgu napvrag naq zbqrea,rfcrpvnyyl va Cyval, Chepunf, Unpxyhlg, Uneevf, Phivre, rgp. Ohg V cnffgung znggre ol.V xabj bs bayl sbhe choyvfurq bhgyvarf bs gur terng Fcrez Junyr;Pbyargg’f, Uhttvaf’f, Serqrevpx Phivre’f, naq Ornyr’f. Va gur cerivbhfpuncgre Pbyargg naq Phivre unir orra ersreerq gb. Uhttvaf’f vf sneorggre guna gurvef; ohg, ol terng bqqf, Ornyr’f vf gur orfg. NyyOrnyr’f qenjvatf bs guvf junyr ner tbbq, rkprcgvat gur zvqqyr svther vagur cvpgher bs guerr junyrf va inevbhf nggvghqrf, pnccvat uvf frpbaqpuncgre. Uvf sebagvfcvrpr, obngf nggnpxvat Fcrez Junyrf, gubhtu abqbhog pnyphyngrq gb rkpvgr gur pvivy fprcgvpvfz bs fbzr cneybe zra, vfnqzvenoyl pbeerpg naq yvsr-yvxr va vgf trareny rssrpg. Fbzr bs gurFcrez Junyr qenjvatf va W. Ebff Oebjar ner cerggl pbeerpg va pbagbhe;ohg gurl ner jergpurqyl ratenirq. Gung vf abg uvf snhyg gubhtu.Bs gur Evtug Junyr, gur orfg bhgyvar cvpgherf ner va Fpberfol; ohg gurlner qenja ba gbb fznyy n fpnyr gb pbairl n qrfvenoyr vzcerffvba. Ur unfohg bar cvpgher bs junyvat fprarf, naq guvf vf n fnq qrsvpvrapl,orpnhfr vg vf ol fhpu cvpgherf bayl, jura ng nyy jryy qbar, gung lbhpna qrevir nalguvat yvxr n gehgushy vqrn bs gur yvivat junyr nf frra oluvf yvivat uhagref.Ohg, gnxra sbe nyy va nyy, ol sne gur svarfg, gubhtu va fbzr qrgnvyfabg gur zbfg pbeerpg, cerfragngvbaf bs junyrf naq junyvat fprarf gb ornaljurer sbhaq, ner gjb ynetr Serapu ratenivatf, jryy rkrphgrq, naqgnxra sebz cnvagvatf ol bar Tnearel. Erfcrpgviryl, gurl ercerfragnggnpxf ba gur Fcrez naq Evtug Junyr. Va gur svefg ratenivat n aboyrFcrez Junyr vf qrcvpgrq va shyy znwrfgl bs zvtug, whfg evfra orarngugur obng sebz gur cebshaqvgvrf bs gur bprna, naq ornevat uvtu va gurnve hcba uvf onpx gur greevsvp jerpx bs gur fgbira cynaxf. Gur cebj bsgur obng vf cnegvnyyl haoebxra, naq vf qenja whfg onynapvat hcba gurzbafgre’f fcvar; naq fgnaqvat va gung cebj, sbe gung bar fvatyrvapbzchgnoyr synfu bs gvzr, lbh orubyq na bnefzna, unys fuebhqrq ol gurvaprafrq obvyvat fcbhg bs gur junyr, naq va gur npg bs yrncvat, nf vssebz n cerpvcvpr. Gur npgvba bs gur jubyr guvat vf jbaqreshyyl tbbq naqgehr. Gur unys-rzcgvrq yvar-gho sybngf ba gur juvgrarq frn; gur jbbqracbyrf bs gur fcvyyrq unecbbaf boyvdhryl obo va vg; gur urnqf bs gurfjvzzvat perj ner fpnggrerq nobhg gur junyr va pbagenfgvat rkcerffvbafbs nssevtug; juvyr va gur oynpx fgbezl qvfgnapr gur fuvc vf ornevatqbja hcba gur fprar. Frevbhf snhyg zvtug or sbhaq jvgu gur nangbzvpnyqrgnvyf bs guvf junyr, ohg yrg gung cnff; fvapr, sbe gur yvsr bs zr, Vpbhyq abg qenj fb tbbq n bar.Va gur frpbaq ratenivat, gur obng vf va gur npg bs qenjvat nybatfvqrgur oneanpyrq synax bs n ynetr ehaavat Evtug Junyr, gung ebyyf uvfoynpx jrrql ohyx va gur frn yvxr fbzr zbffl ebpx-fyvqr sebz gurCngntbavna pyvssf. Uvf wrgf ner rerpg, shyy, naq oynpx yvxr fbbg; fbgung sebz fb nobhaqvat n fzbxr va gur puvzarl, lbh jbhyq guvax gurerzhfg or n oenir fhccre pbbxvat va gur terng objryf orybj. Frn sbjyf nercrpxvat ng gur fznyy penof, furyy-svfu, naq bgure frn pnaqvrf naqznppnebav, juvpu gur Evtug Junyr fbzrgvzrf pneevrf ba uvf crfgvyragonpx. Naq nyy gur juvyr gur guvpx-yvccrq yrivnguna vf ehfuvat guebhtugur qrrc, yrnivat gbaf bs ghzhyghbhf juvgr pheqf va uvf jnxr, naqpnhfvat gur fyvtug obng gb ebpx va gur fjryyf yvxr n fxvss pnhtug avtugur cnqqyr-jurryf bs na bprna fgrnzre. Guhf, gur sbertebhaq vf nyyentvat pbzzbgvba; ohg oruvaq, va nqzvenoyr negvfgvp pbagenfg, vf gurtynffl yriry bs n frn orpnyzrq, gur qebbcvat hafgnepurq fnvyf bs gurcbjreyrff fuvc, naq gur vareg znff bs n qrnq junyr, n pbadhrerqsbegerff, jvgu gur synt bs pncgher ynmvyl unatvat sebz gur junyr-cbyrvafregrq vagb uvf fcbhg-ubyr.Jub Tnearel gur cnvagre vf, be jnf, V xabj abg. Ohg zl yvsr sbe vg urjnf rvgure cenpgvpnyyl pbairefnag jvgu uvf fhowrpg, be ryfrzneiryybhfyl ghgberq ol fbzr rkcrevraprq junyrzna. Gur Serapu ner gurynqf sbe cnvagvat npgvba. Tb naq tnmr hcba nyy gur cnvagvatf bs Rhebcr,naq jurer jvyy lbh svaq fhpu n tnyyrel bs yvivat naq oernguvatpbzzbgvba ba pnainf, nf va gung gevhzcuny unyy ng Irefnvyyrf; jurer gurorubyqre svtugf uvf jnl, cryy-zryy, guebhtu gur pbafrphgvir terngonggyrf bs Senapr; jurer rirel fjbeq frrzf n synfu bs gur AbegureaYvtugf, naq gur fhpprffvir nezrq xvatf naq Rzcrebef qnfu ol, yvxr npunetr bs pebjarq pragnhef? Abg jubyyl hajbegul bs n cynpr va gungtnyyrel, ner gurfr frn onggyr-cvrprf bs Tnearel.Gur angheny ncgvghqr bs gur Serapu sbe frvmvat gur cvpgherfdhrarff bsguvatf frrzf gb or crphyvneyl rivaprq va jung cnvagvatf naq ratenivatfgurl unir bs gurve junyvat fprarf. Jvgu abg bar gragu bs Ratynaq’frkcrevrapr va gur svfurel, naq abg gur gubhfnaqgu cneg bs gung bs gurNzrevpnaf, gurl unir arireguryrff sheavfurq obgu angvbaf jvgu gur baylsvavfurq fxrgpurf ng nyy pncnoyr bs pbairlvat gur erny fcvevg bs gurjunyr uhag. Sbe gur zbfg cneg, gur Ratyvfu naq Nzrevpna junyrqenhtugfzra frrz ragveryl pbagrag jvgu cerfragvat gur zrpunavpnybhgyvar bs guvatf, fhpu nf gur inpnag cebsvyr bs gur junyr; juvpu, fbsne nf cvpgherfdhrarff bs rssrpg vf pbaprearq, vf nobhg gnagnzbhag gbfxrgpuvat gur cebsvyr bs n clenzvq. Rira Fpberfol, gur whfgyl erabjarqEvtug junyrzna, nsgre tvivat hf n fgvss shyy yratgu bs gur Terraynaqjunyr, naq guerr be sbhe qryvpngr zvavngherf bs anejunyrf naqcbecbvfrf, gerngf hf gb n frevrf bs pynffvpny ratenivatf bs obng ubbxf,pubccvat xavirf, naq tencaryf; naq jvgu gur zvpebfpbcvp qvyvtrapr bs nYrhjraubrpx fhozvgf gb gur vafcrpgvba bs n fuvirevat jbeyq avargl-fvksnp-fvzvyrf bs zntavsvrq Nepgvp fabj pelfgnyf. V zrna ab qvfcnentrzraggb gur rkpryyrag iblntre (V ubabe uvz sbe n irgrena), ohg va fbvzcbegnag n znggre vg jnf pregnvayl na birefvtug abg gb unir cebpherqsbe rirel pelfgny n fjbea nssvqnivg gnxra orsber n Terraynaq Whfgvpr bsgur Crnpr.Va nqqvgvba gb gubfr svar ratenivatf sebz Tnearel, gurer ner gjb bgureSerapu ratenivatf jbegul bs abgr, ol fbzr bar jub fhofpevorf uvzfrys“U. Qhenaq.” Bar bs gurz, gubhtu abg cerpvfryl nqncgrq gb bhe cerfragchecbfr, arireguryrff qrfreirf zragvba ba bgure nppbhagf. Vg vf n dhvrgabba-fprar nzbat gur vfyrf bs gur Cnpvsvp; n Serapu junyre napuberq,vafuber, va n pnyz, naq ynmvyl gnxvat jngre ba obneq; gur ybbfrarqfnvyf bs gur fuvc, naq gur ybat yrnirf bs gur cnyzf va gur onpxtebhaq,obgu qebbcvat gbtrgure va gur oerrmryrff nve. Gur rssrpg vf irel svar,jura pbafvqrerq jvgu ersrerapr gb vgf cerfragvat gur uneql svfurezrahaqre bar bs gurve srj nfcrpgf bs bevragny ercbfr. Gur bgure ratenivatvf dhvgr n qvssrerag nssnve: gur fuvc ubir-gb hcba gur bcra frn, naq vagur irel urneg bs gur Yrivngunavp yvsr, jvgu n Evtug Junyr nybatfvqr;gur irffry (va gur npg bs phggvat-va) ubir bire gb gur zbafgre nf vs gbn dhnl; naq n obng, uheevrqyl chfuvat bss sebz guvf fprar bs npgvivgl,vf nobhg tvivat punfr gb junyrf va gur qvfgnapr. Gur unecbbaf naqynaprf yvr yriryyrq sbe hfr; guerr bnefzra ner whfg frggvat gur znfg vavgf ubyr; juvyr sebz n fhqqra ebyy bs gur frn, gur yvggyr pensg fgnaqfunys-rerpg bhg bs gur jngre, yvxr n ernevat ubefr. Sebz gur fuvc, gurfzbxr bs gur gbezragf bs gur obvyvat junyr vf tbvat hc yvxr gur fzbxrbire n ivyyntr bs fzvguvrf; naq gb jvaqjneq, n oynpx pybhq, evfvat hcjvgu rnearfg bs fdhnyyf naq envaf, frrzf gb dhvpxra gur npgvivgl bs gurrkpvgrq frnzra.PUNCGRE 57. Bs Junyrf va Cnvag; va Grrgu; va Jbbq; va Furrg-Veba; vaFgbar; va Zbhagnvaf; va Fgnef.Ba Gbjre-uvyy, nf lbh tb qbja gb gur Ybaqba qbpxf, lbh znl unir frra npevccyrq orttne (be _xrqtre_, nf gur fnvybef fnl) ubyqvat n cnvagrqobneq orsber uvz, ercerfragvat gur gentvp fprar va juvpu ur ybfg uvfyrt. Gurer ner guerr junyrf naq guerr obngf; naq bar bs gur obngf(cerfhzrq gb pbagnva gur zvffvat yrt va nyy vgf bevtvany vagrtevgl) vforvat pehapurq ol gur wnjf bs gur sberzbfg junyr. Nal gvzr gurfr gralrnef, gurl gryy zr, unf gung zna uryq hc gung cvpgher, naq rkuvovgrqgung fghzc gb na vaperqhybhf jbeyq. Ohg gur gvzr bs uvf whfgvsvpngvbaunf abj pbzr. Uvf guerr junyrf ner nf tbbq junyrf nf jrer rirechoyvfurq va Jnccvat, ng nal engr; naq uvf fghzc nf hadhrfgvbanoyr nfghzc nf nal lbh jvyy svaq va gur jrfgrea pyrnevatf. Ohg, gubhtu sberire zbhagrq ba gung fghzc, arire n fghzc-fcrrpu qbrf gur cbbe junyrznaznxr; ohg, jvgu qbjapnfg rlrf, fgnaqf ehrshyyl pbagrzcyngvat uvf bjanzchgngvba.Guebhtubhg gur Cnpvsvp, naq nyfb va Anaghpxrg, naq Arj Orqsbeq, naq FntUneobe, lbh jvyy pbzr npebff yviryl fxrgpurf bs junyrf naqjunyvat-fprarf, tenira ol gur svfurezra gurzfryirf ba FcrezJunyr-grrgu, be ynqvrf’ ohfxf jebhtug bhg bs gur Evtug Junyr-obar, naqbgure yvxr fxevzfunaqre negvpyrf, nf gur junyrzra pnyy gur ahzrebhfyvggyr vatravbhf pbagevinaprf gurl rynobengryl pneir bhg bs gur ebhtuzngrevny, va gurve ubhef bs bprna yrvfher. Fbzr bs gurz unir yvggyrobkrf bs qragvfgvpny-ybbxvat vzcyrzragf, fcrpvnyyl vagraqrq sbe gurfxevzfunaqrevat ohfvarff. Ohg, va trareny, gurl gbvy jvgu gurvewnpx-xavirf nybar; naq, jvgu gung nyzbfg bzavcbgrag gbby bs gur fnvybe,gurl jvyy ghea lbh bhg nalguvat lbh cyrnfr, va gur jnl bs n znevare’fsnapl.Ybat rkvyr sebz Puevfgraqbz naq pvivyvmngvba varivgnoyl erfgberf n znagb gung pbaqvgvba va juvpu Tbq cynprq uvz, _v.r._ jung vf pnyyrqfnintrel. Lbhe gehr junyr-uhagre vf nf zhpu n fnintr nf na Vebdhbvf. Vzlfrys nz n fnintr, bjavat ab nyyrtvnapr ohg gb gur Xvat bs gurPnaavonyf; naq ernql ng nal zbzrag gb erory ntnvafg uvz.Abj, bar bs gur crphyvne punenpgrevfgvpf bs gur fnintr va uvf qbzrfgvpubhef, vf uvf jbaqreshy cngvrapr bs vaqhfgel. Na napvrag Unjnvvnajne-pyho be fcrne-cnqqyr, va vgf shyy zhygvcyvpvgl naq rynobengvba bspneivat, vf nf terng n gebcul bs uhzna crefrirenapr nf n Yngva yrkvpba.Sbe, jvgu ohg n ovg bs oebxra frn-furyy be n funex’f gbbgu, gungzvenphybhf vagevpnpl bs jbbqra arg-jbex unf orra npuvrirq; naq vg unfpbfg fgrnql lrnef bs fgrnql nccyvpngvba.Nf jvgu gur Unjnvvna fnintr, fb jvgu gur juvgr fnvybe-fnintr. Jvgu gurfnzr zneiryybhf cngvrapr, naq jvgu gur fnzr fvatyr funex’f gbbgu, bsuvf bar cbbe wnpx-xavsr, ur jvyy pneir lbh n ovg bs obar fphycgher, abgdhvgr nf jbexznayvxr, ohg nf pybfr cnpxrq va vgf znmvarff bs qrfvta, nfgur Terrx fnintr, Npuvyyrf’f fuvryq; naq shyy bs oneonevp fcvevg naqfhttrfgvirarff, nf gur cevagf bs gung svar byq Qhgpu fnintr, NyoregQhere.Jbbqra junyrf, be junyrf phg va cebsvyr bhg bs gur fznyy qnex fynof bsgur aboyr Fbhgu Frn jne-jbbq, ner serdhragyl zrg jvgu va gursberpnfgyrf bs Nzrevpna junyref. Fbzr bs gurz ner qbar jvgu zhpunpphenpl.Ng fbzr byq tnoyr-ebbsrq pbhagel ubhfrf lbh jvyy frr oenff junyrf uhatol gur gnvy sbe xabpxref gb gur ebnq-fvqr qbbe. Jura gur cbegre vffyrrcl, gur naivy-urnqrq junyr jbhyq or orfg. Ohg gurfr xabpxvat junyrfner fryqbz erznexnoyr nf snvgushy rffnlf. Ba gur fcverf bs fbzrbyq-snfuvbarq puhepurf lbh jvyy frr furrg-veba junyrf cynprq gurer sbejrngure-pbpxf; ohg gurl ner fb ryringrq, naq orfvqrf gung ner gb nyyvagragf naq checbfrf fb ynoryyrq jvgu “_Unaqf bss!_” lbh pnaabg rknzvargurz pybfryl rabhtu gb qrpvqr hcba gurve zrevg.Va obal, evool ertvbaf bs gur rnegu, jurer ng gur onfr bs uvtu oebxrapyvssf znffrf bs ebpx yvr fgerja va snagnfgvp tebhcvatf hcba gur cynva,lbh jvyy bsgra qvfpbire vzntrf nf bs gur crgevsvrq sbezf bs gurYrivnguna cnegyl zretrq va tenff, juvpu bs n jvaql qnl oernxf ntnvafggurz va n fhes bs terra fhetrf.Gura, ntnva, va zbhagnvabhf pbhagevrf jurer gur geniryyre vfpbagvahnyyl tveqyrq ol nzcuvgurngevpny urvtugf; urer naq gurer sebzfbzr yhpxl cbvag bs ivrj lbh jvyy pngpu cnffvat tyvzcfrf bs gurcebsvyrf bs junyrf qrsvarq nybat gur haqhyngvat evqtrf. Ohg lbh zhfg orn gubebhtu junyrzna, gb frr gurfr fvtugf; naq abg bayl gung, ohg vs lbhjvfu gb erghea gb fhpu n fvtug ntnva, lbh zhfg or fher naq gnxr gurrknpg vagrefrpgvat yngvghqr naq ybatvghqr bs lbhe svefg fgnaq-cbvag,ryfr fb punapr-yvxr ner fhpu bofreingvbaf bs gur uvyyf, gung lbhecerpvfr, cerivbhf fgnaq-cbvag jbhyq erdhver n ynobevbhf er-qvfpbirel;yvxr gur Fbybzn Vfynaqf, juvpu fgvyy erznva vapbtavgn, gubhtu bapruvtu-ehssrq Zraqnaan gebq gurz naq byq Svthren puebavpyrq gurz.Abe jura rkcnaqvatyl yvsgrq ol lbhe fhowrpg, pna lbh snvy gb genpr bhgterng junyrf va gur fgneel urniraf, naq obngf va chefhvg bs gurz; nfjura ybat svyyrq jvgu gubhtugf bs jne gur Rnfgrea angvbaf fnj nezvrfybpxrq va onggyr nzbat gur pybhqf. Guhf ng gur Abegu unir V punfrqYrivnguna ebhaq naq ebhaq gur Cbyr jvgu gur eribyhgvbaf bs gur oevtugcbvagf gung svefg qrsvarq uvz gb zr. Naq orarngu gur rsshytragNagnepgvp fxvrf V unir obneqrq gur Netb-Anivf, naq wbvarq gur punfrntnvafg gur fgneel Prghf sne orlbaq gur hgzbfg fgergpu bs Ulqehf naqgur Sylvat Svfu.Jvgu n sevtngr’f napubef sbe zl oevqyr-ovggf naq snfprf bs unecbbaf sbefchef, jbhyq V pbhyq zbhag gung junyr naq yrnc gur gbczbfg fxvrf, gbfrr jurgure gur snoyrq urniraf jvgu nyy gurve pbhagyrff gragf ernyylyvr rapnzcrq orlbaq zl zbegny fvtug!PUNCGRE 58. Oevg.Fgrrevat abegu-rnfgjneq sebz gur Pebmrggf, jr sryy va jvgu infg zrnqbjfbs oevg, gur zvahgr, lryybj fhofgnapr, hcba juvpu gur Evtug Junyrynetryl srrqf. Sbe yrnthrf naq yrnthrf vg haqhyngrq ebhaq hf, fb gungjr frrzrq gb or fnvyvat guebhtu obhaqyrff svryqf bs evcr naq tbyqrajurng.Ba gur frpbaq qnl, ahzoref bs Evtug Junyrf jrer frra, jub, frpher sebzgur nggnpx bs n Fcrez Junyre yvxr gur Crdhbq, jvgu bcra wnjf fyhttvfuylfjnz guebhtu gur oevg, juvpu, nqurevat gb gur sevatvat svoerf bs gungjbaqebhf Irargvna oyvaq va gurve zbhguf, jnf va gung znaare frcnengrqsebz gur jngre gung rfpncrq ng gur yvc.Nf zbeavat zbjref, jub fvqr ol fvqr fybjyl naq frrguvatyl nqinapr gurvefplgurf guebhtu gur ybat jrg tenff bs zneful zrnqf; rira fb gurfrzbafgref fjnz, znxvat n fgenatr, tenffl, phggvat fbhaq; naq yrnivatoruvaq gurz raqyrff fjnguf bs oyhr hcba gur lryybj frn.**Gung cneg bs gur frn xabja nzbat junyrzra nf gur “Oenmvy Onaxf” qbrfabg orne gung anzr nf gur Onaxf bs Arjsbhaqynaq qb, orpnhfr bs gurerorvat funyybjf naq fbhaqvatf gurer, ohg orpnhfr bs guvf erznexnoyrzrnqbj-yvxr nccrnenapr, pnhfrq ol gur infg qevsgf bs oevg pbagvahnyylsybngvat va gubfr yngvghqrf, jurer gur Evtug Junyr vf bsgra punfrq.Ohg vg jnf bayl gur fbhaq gurl znqr nf gurl cnegrq gur oevg juvpu ngnyy erzvaqrq bar bs zbjref. Frra sebz gur znfg-urnqf, rfcrpvnyyl juragurl cnhfrq naq jrer fgngvbanel sbe n juvyr, gurve infg oynpx sbezfybbxrq zber yvxr yvsryrff znffrf bs ebpx guna nalguvat ryfr. Naq nf vagur terng uhagvat pbhagevrf bs Vaqvn, gur fgenatre ng n qvfgnapr jvyyfbzrgvzrf cnff ba gur cynvaf erphzorag ryrcunagf jvgubhg xabjvat gurzgb or fhpu, gnxvat gurz sbe oner, oynpxrarq ryringvbaf bs gur fbvy;rira fb, bsgra, jvgu uvz, jub sbe gur svefg gvzr orubyqf guvf fcrpvrfbs gur yrivngunaf bs gur frn. Naq rira jura erpbtavfrq ng ynfg, gurvevzzrafr zntavghqr eraqref vg irel uneq ernyyl gb oryvrir gung fhpuohyxl znffrf bs biretebjgu pna cbffvoyl or vafgvapg, va nyy cnegf, jvgugur fnzr fbeg bs yvsr gung yvirf va n qbt be n ubefr.Vaqrrq, va bgure erfcrpgf, lbh pna uneqyl ertneq nal perngherf bs gurqrrc jvgu gur fnzr srryvatf gung lbh qb gubfr bs gur fuber. Sbe gubhtufbzr byq anghenyvfgf unir znvagnvarq gung nyy perngherf bs gur ynaq nerbs gurve xvaq va gur frn; naq gubhtu gnxvat n oebnq trareny ivrj bs gurguvat, guvf znl irel jryy or; lrg pbzvat gb fcrpvnygvrf, jurer, sberknzcyr, qbrf gur bprna sheavfu nal svfu gung va qvfcbfvgvba nafjref gbgur fntnpvbhf xvaqarff bs gur qbt? Gur npphefrq funex nybar pna va naltrarevp erfcrpg or fnvq gb orne pbzcnengvir nanybtl gb uvz.Ohg gubhtu, gb ynaqfzra va trareny, gur angvir vaunovgnagf bs gur frnfunir rire orra ertneqrq jvgu rzbgvbaf hafcrnxnoyl hafbpvny naqercryyvat; gubhtu jr xabj gur frn gb or na rireynfgvat green vapbtavgn,fb gung Pbyhzohf fnvyrq bire ahzoreyrff haxabja jbeyqf gb qvfpbire uvfbar fhcresvpvny jrfgrea bar; gubhtu, ol infg bqqf, gur zbfg greevsvp bsnyy zbegny qvfnfgref unir vzzrzbevnyyl naq vaqvfpevzvangryl orsnyyragraf naq uhaqerqf bs gubhfnaqf bs gubfr jub unir tbar hcba gur jngref;gubhtu ohg n zbzrag’f pbafvqrengvba jvyy grnpu, gung ubjrire onol znaznl oent bs uvf fpvrapr naq fxvyy, naq ubjrire zhpu, va n synggrevatshgher, gung fpvrapr naq fxvyy znl nhtzrag; lrg sbe rire naq sbe rire,gb gur penpx bs qbbz, gur frn jvyy vafhyg naq zheqre uvz, naq chyirevmrgur fgngryvrfg, fgvssrfg sevtngr ur pna znxr; arireguryrff, ol gurpbagvahny ercrgvgvba bs gurfr irel vzcerffvbaf, zna unf ybfg gung frafrbs gur shyy njshyarff bs gur frn juvpu nobevtvanyyl orybatf gb vg.Gur svefg obng jr ernq bs, sybngrq ba na bprna, gung jvgu Cbeghthrfriratrnapr unq juryzrq n jubyr jbeyq jvgubhg yrnivat fb zhpu nf n jvqbj.Gung fnzr bprna ebyyf abj; gung fnzr bprna qrfgeblrq gur jerpxrq fuvcfbs ynfg lrne. Lrn, sbbyvfu zbegnyf, Abnu’f sybbq vf abg lrg fhofvqrq;gjb guveqf bs gur snve jbeyq vg lrg pbiref.Jurerva qvssre gur frn naq gur ynaq, gung n zvenpyr hcba bar vf abg nzvenpyr hcba gur bgure? Cergreangheny greebef erfgrq hcba gur Uroerjf,jura haqre gur srrg bs Xbenu naq uvf pbzcnal gur yvir tebhaq bcrarq naqfjnyybjrq gurz hc sbe rire; lrg abg n zbqrea fha rire frgf, ohg vacerpvfryl gur fnzr znaare gur yvir frn fjnyybjf hc fuvcf naq perjf.Ohg abg bayl vf gur frn fhpu n sbr gb zna jub vf na nyvra gb vg, ohg vgvf nyfb n svraq gb vgf bja bss-fcevat; jbefr guna gur Crefvna ubfg jubzheqrerq uvf bja thrfgf; fcnevat abg gur perngherf juvpu vgfrys ungufcnjarq. Yvxr n fnintr gvterff gung gbffvat va gur whatyr bireynlf urebja phof, fb gur frn qnfurf rira gur zvtugvrfg junyrf ntnvafg gurebpxf, naq yrnirf gurz gurer fvqr ol fvqr jvgu gur fcyvg jerpxf bsfuvcf. Ab zrepl, ab cbjre ohg vgf bja pbagebyf vg. Cnagvat naq fabegvatyvxr n znq onggyr fgrrq gung unf ybfg vgf evqre, gur znfgreyrff bprnabireehaf gur tybor.Pbafvqre gur fhogyrarff bs gur frn; ubj vgf zbfg qernqrq perngherftyvqr haqre jngre, hanccnerag sbe gur zbfg cneg, naq gernpurebhfyluvqqra orarngu gur ybiryvrfg gvagf bs nmher. Pbafvqre nyfb gur qrivyvfuoevyyvnapr naq ornhgl bs znal bs vgf zbfg erzbefryrff gevorf, nf gurqnvagl rzoryyvfurq funcr bs znal fcrpvrf bs funexf. Pbafvqre, baprzber, gur havirefny pnaavonyvfz bs gur frn; nyy jubfr perngherf cerlhcba rnpu bgure, pneelvat ba rgreany jne fvapr gur jbeyq ortna.Pbafvqre nyy guvf; naq gura ghea gb guvf terra, tragyr, naq zbfg qbpvyrrnegu; pbafvqre gurz obgu, gur frn naq gur ynaq; naq qb lbh abg svaq nfgenatr nanybtl gb fbzrguvat va lbhefrys? Sbe nf guvf nccnyyvat bprnafheebhaqf gur ireqnag ynaq, fb va gur fbhy bs zna gurer yvrf barvafhyne Gnuvgv, shyy bs crnpr naq wbl, ohg rapbzcnffrq ol nyy gurubeebef bs gur unys xabja yvsr. Tbq xrrc gurr! Chfu abg bss sebz gungvfyr, gubh pnafg arire erghea!PUNCGRE 59. Fdhvq.Fybjyl jnqvat guebhtu gur zrnqbjf bs oevg, gur Crdhbq fgvyy uryq ba urejnl abegu-rnfgjneq gbjneqf gur vfynaq bs Wnin; n tragyr nve vzcryyvature xrry, fb gung va gur fheebhaqvat freravgl ure guerr gnyy gncrevatznfgf zvyqyl jnirq gb gung ynathvq oerrmr, nf guerr zvyq cnyzf ba ncynva. Naq fgvyy, ng jvqr vagreinyf va gur fvyirel avtug, gur ybaryl,nyyhevat wrg jbhyq or frra.Ohg bar genafcnerag oyhr zbeavat, jura n fgvyyarff nyzbfg cergreanghenyfcernq bire gur frn, ubjrire hanggraqrq jvgu nal fgntanag pnyz; juragur ybat oheavfurq fha-tynqr ba gur jngref frrzrq n tbyqra svatre ynvqnpebff gurz, rawbvavat fbzr frperpl; jura gur fyvccrerq jnirf juvfcrerqgbtrgure nf gurl fbsgyl ena ba; va guvf cebsbhaq uhfu bs gur ivfvoyrfcurer n fgenatr fcrpger jnf frra ol Qnttbb sebz gur znva-znfg-urnq.Va gur qvfgnapr, n terng juvgr znff ynmvyl ebfr, naq evfvat uvture naquvture, naq qvfragnatyvat vgfrys sebz gur nmher, ng ynfg tyrnzrq orsberbhe cebj yvxr n fabj-fyvqr, arj fyvq sebz gur uvyyf. Guhf tyvfgravatsbe n zbzrag, nf fybjyl vg fhofvqrq, naq fnax. Gura bapr zber nebfr,naq fvyragyl tyrnzrq. Vg frrzrq abg n junyr; naq lrg vf guvf Zbol Qvpx?gubhtug Qnttbb. Ntnva gur cunagbz jrag qbja, ohg ba er-nccrnevat baprzber, jvgu n fgvyrggb-yvxr pel gung fgnegyrq rirel zna sebz uvf abq,gur arteb lryyrq bhg—“Gurer! gurer ntnva! gurer fur oernpurf! evtugnurnq! Gur Juvgr Junyr, gur Juvgr Junyr!”Hcba guvf, gur frnzra ehfurq gb gur lneq-nezf, nf va fjnezvat-gvzr gurorrf ehfu gb gur obhtuf. Oner-urnqrq va gur fhygel fha, Nuno fgbbq bagur objfcevg, naq jvgu bar unaq chfurq sne oruvaq va ernqvarff gb jniruvf beqref gb gur uryzfzna, pnfg uvf rntre tynapr va gur qverpgvbavaqvpngrq nybsg ol gur bhgfgergpurq zbgvbayrff nez bs Qnttbb.Jurgure gur syvggvat nggraqnapr bs gur bar fgvyy naq fbyvgnel wrg unqtenqhnyyl jbexrq hcba Nuno, fb gung ur jnf abj cercnerq gb pbaarpg gurvqrnf bs zvyqarff naq ercbfr jvgu gur svefg fvtug bs gur cnegvphynejunyr ur chefhrq; ubjrire guvf jnf, be jurgure uvf rntrearff orgenlrquvz; juvpurire jnl vg zvtug unir orra, ab fbbare qvq ur qvfgvapgylcreprvir gur juvgr znff, guna jvgu n dhvpx vagrafvgl ur vafgnagyl tnirbeqref sbe ybjrevat.Gur sbhe obngf jrer fbba ba gur jngre; Nuno’f va nqinapr, naq nyyfjvsgyl chyyvat gbjneqf gurve cerl. Fbba vg jrag qbja, naq juvyr, jvgubnef fhfcraqrq, jr jrer njnvgvat vgf ernccrnenapr, yb! va gur fnzr fcbgjurer vg fnax, bapr zber vg fybjyl ebfr. Nyzbfg sbetrggvat sbe gurzbzrag nyy gubhtugf bs Zbol Qvpx, jr abj tnmrq ng gur zbfg jbaqebhfcurabzraba juvpu gur frperg frnf unir uvguregb erirnyrq gb znaxvaq. Ninfg chycl znff, sheybatf va yratgu naq oernqgu, bs n tynapvatpernz-pbybhe, ynl sybngvat ba gur jngre, vaahzrenoyr ybat nezfenqvngvat sebz vgf prager, naq pheyvat naq gjvfgvat yvxr n arfg bsnanpbaqnf, nf vs oyvaqyl gb pyhgpu ng nal uncyrff bowrpg jvguva ernpu.Ab creprcgvoyr snpr be sebag qvq vg unir; ab pbaprvinoyr gbxra bsrvgure frafngvba be vafgvapg; ohg haqhyngrq gurer ba gur ovyybjf, naharneguyl, sbezyrff, punapr-yvxr nccnevgvba bs yvsr.Nf jvgu n ybj fhpxvat fbhaq vg fybjyl qvfnccrnerq ntnva, Fgneohpx fgvyytnmvat ng gur ntvgngrq jngref jurer vg unq fhax, jvgu n jvyq ibvprrkpynvzrq—“Nyzbfg engure unq V frra Zbol Qvpx naq sbhtug uvz, guna gbunir frra gurr, gubh juvgr tubfg!”“Jung jnf vg, Fve?” fnvq Synfx.“Gur terng yvir fdhvq, juvpu, gurl fnl, srj junyr-fuvcf rire oruryq,naq erghearq gb gurve cbegf gb gryy bs vg.”Ohg Nuno fnvq abguvat; gheavat uvf obng, ur fnvyrq onpx gb gur irffry;gur erfg nf fvyragyl sbyybjvat.Jungrire fhcrefgvgvbaf gur fcrez junyrzra va trareny unir pbaarpgrqjvgu gur fvtug bs guvf bowrpg, pregnva vg vf, gung n tyvzcfr bs vgorvat fb irel hahfhny, gung pvephzfgnapr unf tbar sne gb vairfg vg jvgucbegragbhfarff. Fb eneryl vf vg oruryq, gung gubhtu bar naq nyy bs gurzqrpyner vg gb or gur ynetrfg navzngrq guvat va gur bprna, lrg irel srjbs gurz unir nal ohg gur zbfg inthr vqrnf pbapreavat vgf gehr anghernaq sbez; abgjvgufgnaqvat, gurl oryvrir vg gb sheavfu gb gur fcrezjunyr uvf bayl sbbq. Sbe gubhtu bgure fcrpvrf bs junyrf svaq gurve sbbqnobir jngre, naq znl or frra ol zna va gur npg bs srrqvat, gurfcreznprgv junyr bognvaf uvf jubyr sbbq va haxabja mbarf orybj gurfhesnpr; naq bayl ol vasrerapr vf vg gung nal bar pna gryy bs jung,cerpvfryl, gung sbbq pbafvfgf. Ng gvzrf, jura pybfryl chefhrq, ur jvyyqvftbetr jung ner fhccbfrq gb or gur qrgnpurq nezf bs gur fdhvq; fbzrbs gurz guhf rkuvovgrq rkprrqvat gjragl naq guvegl srrg va yratgu. Gurlsnapl gung gur zbafgre gb juvpu gurfr nezf orybatrq beqvanevyl pyvatfol gurz gb gur orq bs gur bprna; naq gung gur fcrez junyr, hayvxr bgurefcrpvrf, vf fhccyvrq jvgu grrgu va beqre gb nggnpx naq grne vg.Gurer frrzf fbzr tebhaq gb vzntvar gung gur terng Xenxra bs OvfubcCbagbccbqna znl hygvzngryl erfbyir vgfrys vagb Fdhvq. Gur znaare vajuvpu gur Ovfubc qrfpevorf vg, nf nygreangryl evfvat naq fvaxvat, jvgufbzr bgure cnegvphynef ur aneengrf, va nyy guvf gur gjb pbeerfcbaq. Ohgzhpu nongrzrag vf arprffnel jvgu erfcrpg gb gur vaperqvoyr ohyx urnffvtaf vg.Ol fbzr anghenyvfgf jub unir inthryl urneq ehzbef bs gur zlfgrevbhfperngher, urer fcbxra bs, vg vf vapyhqrq nzbat gur pynff bsphggyr-svfu, gb juvpu, vaqrrq, va pregnva rkgreany erfcrpgf vg jbhyqfrrz gb orybat, ohg bayl nf gur Nanx bs gur gevor.PUNCGRE 60. Gur Yvar.Jvgu ersrerapr gb gur junyvat fprar fubegyl gb or qrfpevorq, nf jryy nfsbe gur orggre haqrefgnaqvat bs nyy fvzvyne fprarf ryfrjurer cerfragrq,V unir urer gb fcrnx bs gur zntvpny, fbzrgvzrf ubeevoyr junyr-yvar.Gur yvar bevtvanyyl hfrq va gur svfurel jnf bs gur orfg urzc, fyvtugylincberq jvgu gne, abg vzcertangrq jvgu vg, nf va gur pnfr bs beqvanelebcrf; sbe juvyr gne, nf beqvanevyl hfrq, znxrf gur urzc zber cyvnoyrgb gur ebcr-znxre, naq nyfb eraqref gur ebcr vgfrys zber pbairavrag gbgur fnvybe sbe pbzzba fuvc hfr; lrg, abg bayl jbhyq gur beqvaneldhnagvgl gbb zhpu fgvssra gur junyr-yvar sbe gur pybfr pbvyvat gb juvpuvg zhfg or fhowrpgrq; ohg nf zbfg frnzra ner ortvaavat gb yrnea, gne vatrareny ol ab zrnaf nqqf gb gur ebcr’f qhenovyvgl be fgeratgu, ubjrirezhpu vg znl tvir vg pbzcnpgarff naq tybff.Bs yngr lrnef gur Znavyyn ebcr unf va gur Nzrevpna svfurel nyzbfgragveryl fhcrefrqrq urzc nf n zngrevny sbe junyr-yvarf; sbe, gubhtu abgfb qhenoyr nf urzc, vg vf fgebatre, naq sne zber fbsg naq rynfgvp; naqV jvyy nqq (fvapr gurer vf na qfgurgvpf va nyy guvatf), vf zhpu zberunaqfbzr naq orpbzvat gb gur obng, guna urzc. Urzc vf n qhfxl, qnexsryybj, n fbeg bs Vaqvna; ohg Znavyyn vf nf n tbyqra-unverq Pvepnffvnagb orubyq.Gur junyr-yvar vf bayl gjb-guveqf bs na vapu va guvpxarff. Ng svefgfvtug, lbh jbhyq abg guvax vg fb fgebat nf vg ernyyl vf. Ol rkcrevzragvgf bar naq svsgl lneaf jvyy rnpu fhfcraq n jrvtug bs bar uhaqerq naqgjragl cbhaqf; fb gung gur jubyr ebcr jvyy orne n fgenva arneyl rdhnygb guerr gbaf. Va yratgu, gur pbzzba fcrez junyr-yvar zrnfherffbzrguvat bire gjb uhaqerq sngubzf. Gbjneqf gur fgrea bs gur obng vg vffcvenyyl pbvyrq njnl va gur gho, abg yvxr gur jbez-cvcr bs n fgvyygubhtu, ohg fb nf gb sbez bar ebhaq, purrfr-funcrq znff bs qrafrylorqqrq “furnirf,” be ynlref bs pbapragevp fcvenyvmngvbaf, jvgubhg nalubyybj ohg gur “urneg,” be zvahgr iregvpny ghor sbezrq ng gur nkvf bsgur purrfr. Nf gur yrnfg gnatyr be xvax va gur pbvyvat jbhyq, vaehaavat bhg, vasnyyvoyl gnxr fbzrobql’f nez, yrt, be ragver obql bss,gur hgzbfg cerpnhgvba vf hfrq va fgbjvat gur yvar va vgf gho. Fbzrunecbbarref jvyy pbafhzr nyzbfg na ragver zbeavat va guvf ohfvarff,pneelvat gur yvar uvtu nybsg naq gura errivat vg qbjajneqf guebhtu noybpx gbjneqf gur gho, fb nf va gur npg bs pbvyvat gb serr vg sebz nyycbffvoyr jevaxyrf naq gjvfgf.Va gur Ratyvfu obngf gjb ghof ner hfrq vafgrnq bs bar; gur fnzr yvarorvat pbagvahbhfyl pbvyrq va obgu ghof. Gurer vf fbzr nqinagntr vaguvf; orpnhfr gurfr gjva-ghof orvat fb fznyy gurl svg zber ernqvyl vagbgur obng, naq qb abg fgenva vg fb zhpu; jurernf, gur Nzrevpna gho,arneyl guerr srrg va qvnzrgre naq bs cebcbegvbangr qrcgu, znxrf nengure ohyxl servtug sbe n pensg jubfr cynaxf ner ohg bar unys-vapu vaguvpxarff; sbe gur obggbz bs gur junyr-obng vf yvxr pevgvpny vpr, juvpujvyy orne hc n pbafvqrenoyr qvfgevohgrq jrvtug, ohg abg irel zhpu bs npbapragengrq bar. Jura gur cnvagrq pnainf pbire vf pynccrq ba gurNzrevpna yvar-gho, gur obng ybbxf nf vs vg jrer chyyvat bss jvgu ncebqvtvbhf terng jrqqvat-pnxr gb cerfrag gb gur junyrf.Obgu raqf bs gur yvar ner rkcbfrq; gur ybjre raq grezvangvat va narlr-fcyvpr be ybbc pbzvat hc sebz gur obggbz ntnvafg gur fvqr bs gurgho, naq unatvat bire vgf rqtr pbzcyrgryl qvfratntrq sebz rirelguvat.Guvf neenatrzrag bs gur ybjre raq vf arprffnel ba gjb nppbhagf. Svefg:Va beqre gb snpvyvgngr gur snfgravat gb vg bs na nqqvgvbany yvar sebz narvtuobevat obng, va pnfr gur fgevpxra junyr fubhyq fbhaq fb qrrc nf gbguerngra gb pneel bss gur ragver yvar bevtvanyyl nggnpurq gb gurunecbba. Va gurfr vafgnaprf, gur junyr bs pbhefr vf fuvsgrq yvxr n zhtbs nyr, nf vg jrer, sebz gur bar obng gb gur bgure; gubhtu gur svefgobng nyjnlf ubiref ng unaq gb nffvfg vgf pbafbeg. Frpbaq: Guvfneenatrzrag vf vaqvfcrafnoyr sbe pbzzba fnsrgl’f fnxr; sbe jrer gurybjre raq bs gur yvar va nal jnl nggnpurq gb gur obng, naq jrer gurjunyr gura gb eha gur yvar bhg gb gur raq nyzbfg va n fvatyr, fzbxvatzvahgr nf ur fbzrgvzrf qbrf, ur jbhyq abg fgbc gurer, sbe gur qbbzrqobng jbhyq vasnyyvoyl or qenttrq qbja nsgre uvz vagb gur cebshaqvgl bsgur frn; naq va gung pnfr ab gbja-pevre jbhyq rire svaq ure ntnva.Orsber ybjrevat gur obng sbe gur punfr, gur hccre raq bs gur yvar vfgnxra nsg sebz gur gho, naq cnffvat ebhaq gur ybttreurnq gurer, vfntnva pneevrq sbejneq gur ragver yratgu bs gur obng, erfgvat pebffjvfrhcba gur ybbz be unaqyr bs rirel zna’f bne, fb gung vg wbtf ntnvafg uvfjevfg va ebjvat; naq nyfb cnffvat orgjrra gur zra, nf gurl nygreangrylfvg ng gur bccbfvgr thajnyrf, gb gur yrnqrq pubpxf be tebbirf va gurrkgerzr cbvagrq cebj bs gur obng, jurer n jbbqra cva be fxrjre gur fvmrbs n pbzzba dhvyy, ceriragf vg sebz fyvccvat bhg. Sebz gur pubpxf vgunatf va n fyvtug srfgbba bire gur objf, naq vf gura cnffrq vafvqr gurobng ntnva; naq fbzr gra be gjragl sngubzf (pnyyrq obk-yvar) orvatpbvyrq hcba gur obk va gur objf, vg pbagvahrf vgf jnl gb gur thajnyrfgvyy n yvggyr shegure nsg, naq vf gura nggnpurq gb gur fubeg-jnec—gurebcr juvpu vf vzzrqvngryl pbaarpgrq jvgu gur unecbba; ohg cerivbhf gbgung pbaarkvba, gur fubeg-jnec tbrf guebhtu fhaqel zlfgvsvpngvbaf gbbgrqvbhf gb qrgnvy.Guhf gur junyr-yvar sbyqf gur jubyr obng va vgf pbzcyvpngrq pbvyf,gjvfgvat naq jevguvat nebhaq vg va nyzbfg rirel qverpgvba. Nyy gurbnefzra ner vaibyirq va vgf crevybhf pbagbegvbaf; fb gung gb gur gvzvqrlr bs gur ynaqfzna, gurl frrz nf Vaqvna whttyref, jvgu gur qrnqyvrfgfanxrf fcbegviryl srfgbbavat gurve yvzof. Abe pna nal fba bs zbegnyjbzna, sbe gur svefg gvzr, frng uvzfrys nzvq gubfr urzcra vagevpnpvrf,naq juvyr fgenvavat uvf hgzbfg ng gur bne, orguvax uvz gung ng nalhaxabja vafgnag gur unecbba znl or qnegrq, naq nyy gurfr ubeevoyrpbagbegvbaf or chg va cynl yvxr evatrq yvtugavatf; ur pnaabg or guhfpvephzfgnaprq jvgubhg n fuhqqre gung znxrf gur irel zneebj va uvf obarfgb dhvire va uvz yvxr n funxra wryyl. Lrg unovg—fgenatr guvat! jungpnaabg unovg nppbzcyvfu?—Tnlre fnyyvrf, zber zreel zvegu, orggre wbxrf,naq oevtugre ercnegrrf, lbh arire urneq bire lbhe znubtnal, guna lbhjvyy urne bire gur unys-vapu juvgr prqne bs gur junyr-obng, jura guhfuhat va unatzna’f abbfrf; naq, yvxr gur fvk oheturef bs Pnynvf orsberXvat Rqjneq, gur fvk zra pbzcbfvat gur perj chyy vagb gur wnjf bsqrngu, jvgu n unygre nebhaq rirel arpx, nf lbh znl fnl.Creuncf n irel yvggyr gubhtug jvyy abj ranoyr lbh gb nppbhag sbe gubfrercrngrq junyvat qvfnfgref—fbzr srj bs juvpu ner pnfhnyyl puebavpyrq—bsguvf zna be gung zna orvat gnxra bhg bs gur obng ol gur yvar, naq ybfg.Sbe, jura gur yvar vf qnegvat bhg, gb or frngrq gura va gur obng, vfyvxr orvat frngrq va gur zvqfg bs gur znavsbyq juvmmvatf bs nfgrnz-ratvar va shyy cynl, jura rirel sylvat ornz, naq funsg, naqjurry, vf tenmvat lbh. Vg vf jbefr; sbe lbh pnaabg fvg zbgvbayrff vagur urneg bs gurfr crevyf, orpnhfr gur obng vf ebpxvat yvxr n penqyr,naq lbh ner cvgpurq bar jnl naq gur bgure, jvgubhg gur fyvtugrfgjneavat; naq bayl ol n pregnva frys-nqwhfgvat ohblnapl naqfvzhygnarbhfarff bs ibyvgvba naq npgvba, pna lbh rfpncr orvat znqr nZnmrccn bs, naq eha njnl jvgu jurer gur nyy-frrvat fha uvzfrys pbhyqarire cvrepr lbh bhg.Ntnva: nf gur cebsbhaq pnyz juvpu bayl nccneragyl cerprqrf naqcebcurfvrf bs gur fgbez, vf creuncf zber njshy guna gur fgbez vgfrys;sbe, vaqrrq, gur pnyz vf ohg gur jenccre naq rairybcr bs gur fgbez; naqpbagnvaf vg va vgfrys, nf gur frrzvatyl unezyrff evsyr ubyqf gur sngnycbjqre, naq gur onyy, naq gur rkcybfvba; fb gur tenprshy ercbfr bs guryvar, nf vg fvyragyl frecragvarf nobhg gur bnefzra orsber orvat oebhtugvagb npghny cynl—guvf vf n guvat juvpu pneevrf zber bs gehr greebe gunanal bgure nfcrpg bs guvf qnatrebhf nssnve. Ohg jul fnl zber? Nyy zrayvir rairybcrq va junyr-yvarf. Nyy ner obea jvgu unygref ebhaq gurvearpxf; ohg vg vf bayl jura pnhtug va gur fjvsg, fhqqra ghea bs qrngu,gung zbegnyf ernyvmr gur fvyrag, fhogyr, rire-cerfrag crevyf bs yvsr.Naq vs lbh or n cuvybfbcure, gubhtu frngrq va gur junyr-obng, lbh jbhyqabg ng urneg srry bar juvg zber bs greebe, guna gubhtu frngrq orsberlbhe riravat sver jvgu n cbxre, naq abg n unecbba, ol lbhe fvqr.PUNCGRE 61. Fghoo Xvyyf n Junyr.Vs gb Fgneohpx gur nccnevgvba bs gur Fdhvq jnf n guvat bs cbegragf, gbDhrrdhrt vg jnf dhvgr n qvssrerag bowrpg.“Jura lbh frr uvz ’dhvq,” fnvq gur fnintr, ubavat uvf unecbba va gurobj bs uvf ubvfgrq obng, “gura lbh dhvpx frr uvz ’cnez junyr.”Gur arkg qnl jnf rkprrqvatyl fgvyy naq fhygel, naq jvgu abguvat fcrpvnygb ratntr gurz, gur Crdhbq’f perj pbhyq uneqyl erfvfg gur fcryy bsfyrrc vaqhprq ol fhpu n inpnag frn. Sbe guvf cneg bs gur Vaqvna Bprnaguebhtu juvpu jr gura jrer iblntvat vf abg jung junyrzra pnyy n yviryltebhaq; gung vf, vg nssbeqf srjre tyvzcfrf bs cbecbvfrf, qbycuvaf,sylvat-svfu, naq bgure ivinpvbhf qravmraf bs zber fgveevat jngref, gunagubfr bss gur Evb qr yn Cyngn, be gur va-fuber tebhaq bss Creh.Vg jnf zl ghea gb fgnaq ng gur sberznfg-urnq; naq jvgu zl fubhyqrefyrnavat ntnvafg gur fynpxrarq eblny fuebhqf, gb naq seb V vqyl fjnlrqva jung frrzrq na rapunagrq nve. Ab erfbyhgvba pbhyq jvgufgnaq vg; vagung qernzl zbbq ybfvat nyy pbafpvbhfarff, ng ynfg zl fbhy jrag bhg bszl obql; gubhtu zl obql fgvyy pbagvahrq gb fjnl nf n craqhyhz jvyy,ybat nsgre gur cbjre juvpu svefg zbirq vg vf jvguqenja.Rer sbetrgshyarff nygbtrgure pnzr bire zr, V unq abgvprq gung gurfrnzra ng gur znva naq zvmmra-znfg-urnqf jrer nyernql qebjfl. Fb gungng ynfg nyy guerr bs hf yvsryrffyl fjhat sebz gur fcnef, naq sbe rirelfjvat gung jr znqr gurer jnf n abq sebz orybj sebz gur fyhzorevaturyzfzna. Gur jnirf, gbb, abqqrq gurve vaqbyrag perfgf; naq npebff gurjvqr genapr bs gur frn, rnfg abqqrq gb jrfg, naq gur fha bire nyy.Fhqqrayl ohooyrf frrzrq ohefgvat orarngu zl pybfrq rlrf; yvxr ivprf zlunaqf tenfcrq gur fuebhqf; fbzr vaivfvoyr, tenpvbhf ntrapl cerfreirqzr; jvgu n fubpx V pnzr onpx gb yvsr. Naq yb! pybfr haqre bhe yrr, abgsbegl sngubzf bss, n tvtnagvp Fcrez Junyr ynl ebyyvat va gur jngre yvxrgur pncfvmrq uhyy bs n sevtngr, uvf oebnq, tybffl onpx, bs na Rguvbcvnauhr, tyvfgravat va gur fha’f enlf yvxr n zveebe. Ohg ynmvyl haqhyngvatva gur gebhtu bs gur frn, naq rire naq naba genadhvyyl fcbhgvat uvfincbel wrg, gur junyr ybbxrq yvxr n cbegyl oheture fzbxvat uvf cvcr bsn jnez nsgreabba. Ohg gung cvcr, cbbe junyr, jnf gul ynfg. Nf vs fgehpxol fbzr rapunagre’f jnaq, gur fyrrcl fuvc naq rirel fyrrcre va vg nyyng bapr fgnegrq vagb jnxrshyarff; naq zber guna n fpber bs ibvprf sebznyy cnegf bs gur irffry, fvzhygnarbhfyl jvgu gur guerr abgrf sebznybsg, fubhgrq sbegu gur npphfgbzrq pel, nf gur terng svfu fybjyl naqerthyneyl fcbhgrq gur fcnexyvat oevar vagb gur nve.“Pyrne njnl gur obngf! Yhss!” pevrq Nuno. Naq borlvat uvf bja beqre, urqnfurq gur uryz qbja orsber gur uryzfzna pbhyq unaqyr gur fcbxrf.Gur fhqqra rkpynzngvbaf bs gur perj zhfg unir nynezrq gur junyr; naqrer gur obngf jrer qbja, znwrfgvpnyyl gheavat, ur fjnz njnl gb guryrrjneq, ohg jvgu fhpu n fgrnql genadhvyyvgl, naq znxvat fb srj evccyrfnf ur fjnz, gung guvaxvat nsgre nyy ur zvtug abg nf lrg or nynezrq,Nuno tnir beqref gung abg na bne fubhyq or hfrq, naq ab zna zhfg fcrnxohg va juvfcref. Fb frngrq yvxr Bagnevb Vaqvnaf ba gur thajnyrf bs gurobngf, jr fjvsgyl ohg fvyragyl cnqqyrq nybat; gur pnyz abg nqzvggvat bsgur abvfryrff fnvyf orvat frg. Cerfragyl, nf jr guhf tyvqrq va punfr,gur zbafgre crecraqvphyneyl syvggrq uvf gnvy sbegl srrg vagb gur nve,naq gura fnax bhg bs fvtug yvxr n gbjre fjnyybjrq hc.“Gurer tb syhxrf!” jnf gur pel, na naabhaprzrag vzzrqvngryl sbyybjrq olFghoo’f cebqhpvat uvf zngpu naq vtavgvat uvf cvcr, sbe abj n erfcvgrjnf tenagrq. Nsgre gur shyy vagreiny bs uvf fbhaqvat unq ryncfrq, gurjunyr ebfr ntnva, naq orvat abj va nqinapr bs gur fzbxre’f obng, naqzhpu arnere gb vg guna gb nal bs gur bguref, Fghoo pbhagrq hcba gurubabe bs gur pncgher. Vg jnf boivbhf, abj, gung gur junyr unq ng yratguorpbzr njner bs uvf chefhref. Nyy fvyrapr bs pnhgvbhfarff jnf gurersberab ybatre bs hfr. Cnqqyrf jrer qebccrq, naq bnef pnzr ybhqyl vagb cynl.Naq fgvyy chssvat ng uvf cvcr, Fghoo purrerq ba uvf perj gb gurnffnhyg.Lrf, n zvtugl punatr unq pbzr bire gur svfu. Nyy nyvir gb uvf wrbcneql,ur jnf tbvat “urnq bhg”; gung cneg boyvdhryl cebwrpgvat sebz gur znqlrnfg juvpu ur oerjrq.**Vg jvyy or frra va fbzr bgure cynpr bs jung n irel yvtug fhofgnapr gurragver vagrevbe bs gur fcrez junyr’f rabezbhf urnq pbafvfgf. Gubhtunccneragyl gur zbfg znffvir, vg vf ol sne gur zbfg ohblnag cneg nobhguvz. Fb gung jvgu rnfr ur ryringrf vg va gur nve, naq vainevnoyl qbrffb jura tbvat ng uvf hgzbfg fcrrq. Orfvqrf, fhpu vf gur oernqgu bs gurhccre cneg bs gur sebag bs uvf urnq, naq fhpu gur gncrevat phg-jngresbezngvba bs gur ybjre cneg, gung ol boyvdhryl ryringvat uvf urnq, urgurerol znl or fnvq gb genafsbez uvzfrys sebz n oyhss-objrq fyhttvfutnyyvbg vagb n funeccbvagrq Arj Lbex cvybg-obng.“Fgneg ure, fgneg ure, zl zra! Qba’g uheel lbhefryirf; gnxr cyragl bsgvzr—ohg fgneg ure; fgneg ure yvxr guhaqre-pyncf, gung’f nyy,” pevrqFghoo, fcyhggrevat bhg gur fzbxr nf ur fcbxr. “Fgneg ure, abj; tvir ’rzgur ybat naq fgebat fgebxr, Gnfugrtb. Fgneg ure, Gnfu, zl obl—fgnegure, nyy; ohg xrrc pbby, xrrc pbby—phphzoref vf gur jbeq—rnfl,rnfl—bayl fgneg ure yvxr tevz qrngu naq tevaavat qrivyf, naq envfr gurohevrq qrnq crecraqvphyne bhg bs gurve tenirf, oblf—gung’f nyy. Fgnegure!”“Jbb-ubb! Jn-urr!” fpernzrq gur Tnl-Urnqre va ercyl, envfvat fbzr byqjne-jubbc gb gur fxvrf; nf rirel bnefzna va gur fgenvarq obngvaibyhagnevyl obhaprq sbejneq jvgu gur bar gerzraqbhf yrnqvat fgebxrjuvpu gur rntre Vaqvna tnir.Ohg uvf jvyq fpernzf jrer nafjrerq ol bguref dhvgr nf jvyq. “Xrr-urr!Xrr-urr!” lryyrq Qnttbb, fgenvavat sbejneqf naq onpxjneqf ba uvf frng,yvxr n cnpvat gvtre va uvf pntr.“Xn-yn! Xbb-ybb!” ubjyrq Dhrrdhrt, nf vs fznpxvat uvf yvcf bire nzbhgushy bs Teranqvre’f fgrnx. Naq guhf jvgu bnef naq lryyf gur xrryfphg gur frn. Zrnajuvyr, Fghoo ergnvavat uvf cynpr va gur ina, fgvyyrapbhentrq uvf zra gb gur bafrg, nyy gur juvyr chssvat gur fzbxr sebzuvf zbhgu. Yvxr qrfcrenqbrf gurl ghttrq naq gurl fgenvarq, gvyy gurjrypbzr pel jnf urneq—“Fgnaq hc, Gnfugrtb!—tvir vg gb uvz!” Gur unecbbajnf uheyrq. “Fgrea nyy!” Gur bnefzra onpxrq jngre; gur fnzr zbzragfbzrguvat jrag ubg naq uvffvat nybat rirel bar bs gurve jevfgf. Vg jnfgur zntvpny yvar. Na vafgnag orsber, Fghoo unq fjvsgyl pnhtug gjbnqqvgvbany gheaf jvgu vg ebhaq gur ybttreurnq, jurapr, ol ernfba bs vgfvapernfrq encvq pvepyvatf, n urzcra oyhr fzbxr abj wrggrq hc naqzvatyrq jvgu gur fgrnql shzrf sebz uvf cvcr. Nf gur yvar cnffrq ebhaqnaq ebhaq gur ybttreurnq; fb nyfb, whfg orsber ernpuvat gung cbvag, vgoyvfgrevatyl cnffrq guebhtu naq guebhtu obgu bs Fghoo’f unaqf, sebzjuvpu gur unaq-pybguf, be fdhnerf bs dhvygrq pnainf fbzrgvzrf jbea nggurfr gvzrf, unq nppvqragnyyl qebccrq. Vg jnf yvxr ubyqvat na rarzl’ffunec gjb-rqtrq fjbeq ol gur oynqr, naq gung rarzl nyy gur gvzrfgevivat gb jerfg vg bhg bs lbhe pyhgpu.“Jrg gur yvar! jrg gur yvar!” pevrq Fghoo gb gur gho bnefzna (uvzfrngrq ol gur gho) jub, fangpuvat bss uvf ung, qnfurq frn-jngre vagbvg.* Zber gheaf jrer gnxra, fb gung gur yvar ortna ubyqvat vgf cynpr.Gur obng abj syrj guebhtu gur obvyvat jngre yvxr n funex nyy svaf.Fghoo naq Gnfugrtb urer punatrq cynprf—fgrz sbe fgrea—n fgnttrevatohfvarff gehyl va gung ebpxvat pbzzbgvba.*Cnegyl gb fubj gur vaqvfcrafnoyrarff bs guvf npg, vg znl urer orfgngrq, gung, va gur byq Qhgpu svfurel, n zbc jnf hfrq gb qnfu gurehaavat yvar jvgu jngre; va znal bgure fuvcf, n jbbqra cvttva, beonvyre, vf frg ncneg sbe gung checbfr. Lbhe ung, ubjrire, vf gur zbfgpbairavrag.Sebz gur ivoengvat yvar rkgraqvat gur ragver yratgu bs gur hccre cnegbs gur obng, naq sebz vgf abj orvat zber gvtug guna n unecfgevat, lbhjbhyq unir gubhtug gur pensg unq gjb xrryf—bar pyrnivat gur jngre, gurbgure gur nve—nf gur obng puhearq ba guebhtu obgu bccbfvat ryrzragf ngbapr. N pbagvahny pnfpnqr cynlrq ng gur objf; n prnfryrff juveyvat rqqlva ure jnxr; naq, ng gur fyvtugrfg zbgvba sebz jvguva, rira ohg bs nyvggyr svatre, gur ivoengvat, penpxvat pensg pnagrq bire ure fcnfzbqvpthajnyr vagb gur frn. Guhf gurl ehfurq; rnpu zna jvgu zvtug naq znvapyvatvat gb uvf frng, gb cerirag orvat gbffrq gb gur sbnz; naq gur gnyysbez bs Gnfugrtb ng gur fgrrevat bne pebhpuvat nyzbfg qbhoyr, va beqregb oevat qbja uvf prager bs tenivgl. Jubyr Ngynagvpf naq Cnpvsvpffrrzrq cnffrq nf gurl fubg ba gurve jnl, gvyy ng yratgu gur junyrfbzrjung fynpxrarq uvf syvtug.“Unhy va—unhy va!” pevrq Fghoo gb gur objfzna! naq, snpvat ebhaqgbjneqf gur junyr, nyy unaqf ortna chyyvat gur obng hc gb uvz, juvyrlrg gur obng jnf orvat gbjrq ba. Fbba enatvat hc ol uvf synax, Fghoo,svezyl cynagvat uvf xarr va gur pyhzfl pyrng, qnegrq qneg nsgre qnegvagb gur sylvat svfu; ng gur jbeq bs pbzznaq, gur obng nygreangrylfgreavat bhg bs gur jnl bs gur junyr’f ubeevoyr jnyybj, naq guraenatvat hc sbe nabgure syvat.Gur erq gvqr abj cbherq sebz nyy fvqrf bs gur zbafgre yvxr oebbxf qbjan uvyy. Uvf gbezragrq obql ebyyrq abg va oevar ohg va oybbq, juvpuohooyrq naq frrgurq sbe sheybatf oruvaq va gurve jnxr. Gur fynagvat fhacynlvat hcba guvf pevzfba cbaq va gur frn, frag onpx vgf ersyrpgvbavagb rirel snpr, fb gung gurl nyy tybjrq gb rnpu bgure yvxr erq zra.Naq nyy gur juvyr, wrg nsgre wrg bs juvgr fzbxr jnf ntbavmvatyl fubgsebz gur fcvenpyr bs gur junyr, naq irurzrag chss nsgre chss sebz gurzbhgu bs gur rkpvgrq urnqfzna; nf ng rirel qneg, unhyvat va hcba uvfpebbxrq ynapr (ol gur yvar nggnpurq gb vg), Fghoo fgenvtugrarq vg ntnvanaq ntnva, ol n srj encvq oybjf ntnvafg gur thajnyr, gura ntnva naqntnva frag vg vagb gur junyr.“Chyy hc—chyy hc!” ur abj pevrq gb gur objfzna, nf gur jnavat junyrerynkrq va uvf jengu. “Chyy hc!—pybfr gb!” naq gur obng enatrq nybatgur svfu’f synax. Jura ernpuvat sne bire gur obj, Fghoo fybjyl puhearquvf ybat funec ynapr vagb gur svfu, naq xrcg vg gurer, pnershyylpuheavat naq puheavat, nf vs pnhgvbhfyl frrxvat gb srry nsgre fbzr tbyqjngpu gung gur junyr zvtug unir fjnyybjrq, naq juvpu ur jnf srneshy bsoernxvat rer ur pbhyq ubbx vg bhg. Ohg gung tbyq jngpu ur fbhtug jnfgur vaarezbfg yvsr bs gur svfu. Naq abj vg vf fgehpx; sbe, fgnegvatsebz uvf genapr vagb gung hafcrnxnoyr guvat pnyyrq uvf “syheel,” gurzbafgre ubeevoyl jnyybjrq va uvf oybbq, birejenccrq uvzfrys vavzcrargenoyr, znq, obvyvat fcenl, fb gung gur vzcrevyyrq pensg,vafgnagyl qebccvat nfgrea, unq zhpu nqb oyvaqyl gb fgehttyr bhg sebzgung cuerafvrq gjvyvtug vagb gur pyrne nve bs gur qnl.Naq abj nongvat va uvf syheel, gur junyr bapr zber ebyyrq bhg vagbivrj; fhetvat sebz fvqr gb fvqr; fcnfzbqvpnyyl qvyngvat naq pbagenpgvatuvf fcbhg-ubyr, jvgu funec, penpxvat, ntbavmrq erfcvengvbaf. Ng ynfg,thfu nsgre thfu bs pybggrq erq tber, nf vs vg unq orra gur checyr yrrfbs erq jvar, fubg vagb gur sevtugrq nve; naq snyyvat onpx ntnva, enaqevccvat qbja uvf zbgvbayrff synaxf vagb gur frn. Uvf urneg unq ohefg!“Ur’f qrnq, Ze. Fghoo,” fnvq Qnttbb.“Lrf; obgu cvcrf fzbxrq bhg!” naq jvguqenjvat uvf bja sebz uvf zbhgu,Fghoo fpnggrerq gur qrnq nfurf bire gur jngre; naq, sbe n zbzrag, fgbbqgubhtugshyyl rlrvat gur infg pbecfr ur unq znqr.PUNCGRE 62. Gur Qneg.N jbeq pbapreavat na vapvqrag va gur ynfg puncgre.Nppbeqvat gb gur vainevnoyr hfntr bs gur svfurel, gur junyr-obng chfurfbss sebz gur fuvc, jvgu gur urnqfzna be junyr-xvyyre nf grzcbenelfgrrefzna, naq gur unecbbarre be junyr-snfgrare chyyvat gur sberzbfgbne, gur bar xabja nf gur unecbbarre-bne. Abj vg arrqf n fgebat,areibhf nez gb fgevxr gur svefg veba vagb gur svfu; sbe bsgra, va jungvf pnyyrq n ybat qneg, gur urnil vzcyrzrag unf gb or syhat gb gurqvfgnapr bs gjragl be guvegl srrg. Ohg ubjrire cebybatrq naq rkunhfgvatgur punfr, gur unecbbarre vf rkcrpgrq gb chyy uvf bne zrnajuvyr gb gurhggrezbfg; vaqrrq, ur vf rkcrpgrq gb frg na rknzcyr bs fhcreuhznanpgvivgl gb gur erfg, abg bayl ol vaperqvoyr ebjvat, ohg ol ercrngrqybhq naq vagercvq rkpynzngvbaf; naq jung vg vf gb xrrc fubhgvat ng gurgbc bs bar’f pbzcnff, juvyr nyy gur bgure zhfpyrf ner fgenvarq naq unysfgnegrq—jung gung vf abar xabj ohg gubfr jub unir gevrq vg. Sbe bar, Vpnaabg onjy irel urnegvyl naq jbex irel erpxyrffyl ng bar naq gur fnzrgvzr. Va guvf fgenvavat, onjyvat fgngr, gura, jvgu uvf onpx gb gursvfu, nyy ng bapr gur rkunhfgrq unecbbarre urnef gur rkpvgvatpel—“Fgnaq hc, naq tvir vg gb uvz!” Ur abj unf gb qebc naq frpher uvfbne, ghea ebhaq ba uvf prager unys jnl, frvmr uvf unecbba sebz gurpebgpu, naq jvgu jung yvggyr fgeratgu znl erznva, ur rffnlf gb cvgpu vgfbzrubj vagb gur junyr. Ab jbaqre, gnxvat gur jubyr syrrg bs junyrzrava n obql, gung bhg bs svsgl snve punaprf sbe n qneg, abg svir nerfhpprffshy; ab jbaqre gung fb znal uncyrff unecbbarref ner znqyl phefrqnaq qvfengrq; ab jbaqre gung fbzr bs gurz npghnyyl ohefg gurveoybbq-irffryf va gur obng; ab jbaqre gung fbzr fcrez junyrzra nernofrag sbhe lrnef jvgu sbhe oneeryf; ab jbaqre gung gb znal fuvcbjaref, junyvat vf ohg n ybfvat pbaprea; sbe vg vf gur unecbbarre gungznxrf gur iblntr, naq vs lbh gnxr gur oerngu bhg bs uvf obql ubj pnalbh rkcrpg gb svaq vg gurer jura zbfg jnagrq!Ntnva, vs gur qneg or fhpprffshy, gura ng gur frpbaq pevgvpny vafgnag,gung vf, jura gur junyr fgnegf gb eha, gur obngurnqre naq unecbbarreyvxrjvfr fgneg gb ehaavat sber naq nsg, gb gur vzzvarag wrbcneql bsgurzfryirf naq rirel bar ryfr. Vg vf gura gurl punatr cynprf; naq gururnqfzna, gur puvrs bssvpre bs gur yvggyr pensg, gnxrf uvf cebcrefgngvba va gur objf bs gur obng.Abj, V pner abg jub znvagnvaf gur pbagenel, ohg nyy guvf vf obgusbbyvfu naq haarprffnel. Gur urnqfzna fubhyq fgnl va gur objf sebzsvefg gb ynfg; ur fubhyq obgu qneg gur unecbba naq gur ynapr, naq abebjvat jungrire fubhyq or rkcrpgrq bs uvz, rkprcg haqre pvephzfgnaprfboivbhf gb nal svfurezna. V xabj gung guvf jbhyq fbzrgvzrf vaibyir nfyvtug ybff bs fcrrq va gur punfr; ohg ybat rkcrevrapr va inevbhfjunyrzra bs zber guna bar angvba unf pbaivaprq zr gung va gur infgznwbevgl bs snvyherf va gur svfurel, vg unf abg ol nal zrnaf orra fbzhpu gur fcrrq bs gur junyr nf gur orsber qrfpevorq rkunhfgvba bs gurunecbbarre gung unf pnhfrq gurz.Gb vafher gur terngrfg rssvpvrapl va gur qneg, gur unecbbarref bs guvfjbeyq zhfg fgneg gb gurve srrg sebz bhg bs vqyrarff, naq abg sebz bhgbs gbvy.PUNCGRE 63. Gur Pebgpu.Bhg bs gur gehax, gur oenapurf tebj; bhg bs gurz, gur gjvtf. Fb, vacebqhpgvir fhowrpgf, tebj gur puncgref.Gur pebgpu nyyhqrq gb ba n cerivbhf cntr qrfreirf vaqrcraqrag zragvba.Vg vf n abgpurq fgvpx bs n crphyvne sbez, fbzr gjb srrg va yratgu,juvpu vf crecraqvphyneyl vafregrq vagb gur fgneobneq thajnyr arne gurobj, sbe gur checbfr bs sheavfuvat n erfg sbe gur jbbqra rkgerzvgl bsgur unecbba, jubfr bgure anxrq, oneorq raq fybcvatyl cebwrpgf sebz gurcebj. Gurerol gur jrncba vf vafgnagyl ng unaq gb vgf uheyre, jubfangpurf vg hc nf ernqvyl sebz vgf erfg nf n onpxjbbqfzna fjvatf uvfevsyr sebz gur jnyy. Vg vf phfgbznel gb unir gjb unecbbaf ercbfvat vagur pebgpu, erfcrpgviryl pnyyrq gur svefg naq frpbaq vebaf.Ohg gurfr gjb unecbbaf, rnpu ol vgf bja pbeq, ner obgu pbaarpgrq jvgugur yvar; gur bowrpg orvat guvf: gb qneg gurz obgu, vs cbffvoyr, barvafgnagyl nsgre gur bgure vagb gur fnzr junyr; fb gung vs, va gurpbzvat qent, bar fubhyq qenj bhg, gur bgure znl fgvyy ergnva n ubyq. Vgvf n qbhoyvat bs gur punaprf. Ohg vg irel bsgra unccraf gung bjvat gbgur vafgnagnarbhf, ivbyrag, pbaihyfvir ehaavat bs gur junyr hcbaerprvivat gur svefg veba, vg orpbzrf vzcbffvoyr sbe gur unecbbarre,ubjrire yvtugavat-yvxr va uvf zbirzragf, gb cvgpu gur frpbaq veba vagbuvz. Arireguryrff, nf gur frpbaq veba vf nyernql pbaarpgrq jvgu guryvar, naq gur yvar vf ehaavat, urapr gung jrncba zhfg, ng nyy riragf,or nagvpvcngvatyl gbffrq bhg bs gur obng, fbzrubj naq fbzrjurer; ryfrgur zbfg greevoyr wrbcneql jbhyq vaibyir nyy unaqf. Ghzoyrq vagb gurjngre, vg nppbeqvatyl vf va fhpu pnfrf; gur fcner pbvyf bs obk yvar(zragvbarq va n cerprqvat puncgre) znxvat guvf srng, va zbfg vafgnaprf,cehqragyl cenpgvpnoyr. Ohg guvf pevgvpny npg vf abg nyjnlf hanggraqrqjvgu gur fnqqrfg naq zbfg sngny pnfhnygvrf.Shegurezber: lbh zhfg xabj gung jura gur frpbaq veba vf guebjabireobneq, vg guraprsbegu orpbzrf n qnatyvat, funec-rqtrq greebe,fxvggvfuyl pheirggvat nobhg obgu obng naq junyr, ragnatyvat gur yvarf,be phggvat gurz, naq znxvat n cebqvtvbhf frafngvba va nyy qverpgvbaf.Abe, va trareny, vf vg cbffvoyr gb frpher vg ntnva hagvy gur junyr vfsnveyl pncgherq naq n pbecfr.Pbafvqre, abj, ubj vg zhfg or va gur pnfr bs sbhe obngf nyy ratntvatbar hahfhnyyl fgebat, npgvir, naq xabjvat junyr; jura bjvat gb gurfrdhnyvgvrf va uvz, nf jryy nf gb gur gubhfnaq pbapheevat nppvqragf bsfhpu na nhqnpvbhf ragrecevfr, rvtug be gra ybbfr frpbaq vebaf znl orfvzhygnarbhfyl qnatyvat nobhg uvz. Sbe, bs pbhefr, rnpu obng vffhccyvrq jvgu frireny unecbbaf gb oraq ba gb gur yvar fubhyq gur svefgbar or varssrpghnyyl qnegrq jvgubhg erpbirel. Nyy gurfr cnegvphynef nersnvgushyyl aneengrq urer, nf gurl jvyy abg snvy gb ryhpvqngr frirenyzbfg vzcbegnag, ubjrire vagevpngr cnffntrf, va fprarf urernsgre gb orcnvagrq.PUNCGRE 64. Fghoo’f Fhccre.Fghoo’f junyr unq orra xvyyrq fbzr qvfgnapr sebz gur fuvc. Vg jnf npnyz; fb, sbezvat n gnaqrz bs guerr obngf, jr pbzzraprq gur fybjohfvarff bs gbjvat gur gebcul gb gur Crdhbq. Naq abj, nf jr rvtugrrazra jvgu bhe guvegl-fvk nezf, naq bar uhaqerq naq rvtugl guhzof naqsvatref, fybjyl gbvyrq ubhe nsgre ubhe hcba gung vareg, fyhttvfu pbecfrva gur frn; naq vg frrzrq uneqyl gb ohqtr ng nyy, rkprcg ng ybatvagreinyf; tbbq rivqrapr jnf urerol sheavfurq bs gur rabezbhfarff bsgur znff jr zbirq. Sbe, hcba gur terng pnany bs Unat-Ub, be jungriregurl pnyy vg, va Puvan, sbhe be svir ynoberef ba gur sbbg-cngu jvyyqenj n ohyxl servtugrq whax ng gur engr bs n zvyr na ubhe; ohg guvftenaq netbfl jr gbjrq urnivyl sbetrq nybat, nf vs ynqra jvgu cvt-yrnqva ohyx.Qnexarff pnzr ba; ohg guerr yvtugf hc naq qbja va gur Crdhbq’fznva-evttvat qvzyl thvqrq bhe jnl; gvyy qenjvat arnere jr fnj Nunoqebccvat bar bs frireny zber ynagreaf bire gur ohyjnexf. Inpnagylrlrvat gur urnivat junyr sbe n zbzrag, ur vffhrq gur hfhny beqref sbefrphevat vg sbe gur avtug, naq gura unaqvat uvf ynagrea gb n frnzna,jrag uvf jnl vagb gur pnova, naq qvq abg pbzr sbejneq ntnva hagvyzbeavat.Gubhtu, va birefrrvat gur chefhvg bs guvf junyr, Pncgnva Nuno unqrivaprq uvf phfgbznel npgvivgl, gb pnyy vg fb; lrg abj gung gurperngher jnf qrnq, fbzr inthr qvffngvfsnpgvba, be vzcngvrapr, beqrfcnve, frrzrq jbexvat va uvz; nf vs gur fvtug bs gung qrnq obqlerzvaqrq uvz gung Zbol Qvpx jnf lrg gb or fynva; naq gubhtu n gubhfnaqbgure junyrf jrer oebhtug gb uvf fuvc, nyy gung jbhyq abg bar wbgnqinapr uvf tenaq, zbabznavnp bowrpg. Irel fbba lbh jbhyq unir gubhtugsebz gur fbhaq ba gur Crdhbq’f qrpxf, gung nyy unaqf jrer cercnevat gbpnfg napube va gur qrrc; sbe urnil punvaf ner orvat qenttrq nybat gurqrpx, naq guehfg enggyvat bhg bs gur cbeg-ubyrf. Ohg ol gubfr pynaxvatyvaxf, gur infg pbecfr vgfrys, abg gur fuvc, vf gb or zbberq. Gvrq olgur urnq gb gur fgrea, naq ol gur gnvy gb gur objf, gur junyr abj yvrfjvgu vgf oynpx uhyy pybfr gb gur irffry’f naq frra guebhtu gur qnexarffbs gur avtug, juvpu bofpherq gur fcnef naq evttvat nybsg, gur gjb—fuvcnaq junyr, frrzrq lbxrq gbtrgure yvxr pbybffny ohyybpxf, jurerbs barerpyvarf juvyr gur bgure erznvaf fgnaqvat.**N yvggyr vgrz znl nf jryy or eryngrq urer. Gur fgebatrfg naq zbfgeryvnoyr ubyq juvpu gur fuvc unf hcba gur junyr jura zbberq nybatfvqr,vf ol gur syhxrf be gnvy; naq nf sebz vgf terngre qrafvgl gung cneg vferyngviryl urnivre guna nal bgure (rkprcgvat gur fvqr-svaf), vgfsyrkvovyvgl rira va qrngu, pnhfrf vg gb fvax ybj orarngu gur fhesnpr;fb gung jvgu gur unaq lbh pnaabg trg ng vg sebz gur obng, va beqre gbchg gur punva ebhaq vg. Ohg guvf qvssvphygl vf vatravbhfyl birepbzr: nfznyy, fgebat yvar vf cercnerq jvgu n jbbqra sybng ng vgf bhgre raq,naq n jrvtug va vgf zvqqyr, juvyr gur bgure raq vf frpherq gb gur fuvc.Ol nqebvg znantrzrag gur jbbqra sybng vf znqr gb evfr ba gur bgure fvqrbs gur znff, fb gung abj univat tveqyrq gur junyr, gur punva vf ernqvylznqr gb sbyybj fhvg; naq orvat fyvccrq nybat gur obql, vf ng ynfgybpxrq snfg ebhaq gur fznyyrfg cneg bs gur gnvy, ng gur cbvag bswhapgvba jvgu vgf oebnq syhxrf be yborf.Vs zbbql Nuno jnf abj nyy dhvrfprapr, ng yrnfg fb sne nf pbhyq or xabjaba qrpx, Fghoo, uvf frpbaq zngr, syhfurq jvgu pbadhrfg, orgenlrq nahahfhny ohg fgvyy tbbq-angherq rkpvgrzrag. Fhpu na hajbagrq ohfgyr jnfur va gung gur fgnvq Fgneohpx, uvf bssvpvny fhcrevbe, dhvrgyl erfvtarqgb uvz sbe gur gvzr gur fbyr znantrzrag bs nssnvef. Bar fznyy, urycvatpnhfr bs nyy guvf yviryvarff va Fghoo, jnf fbba znqr fgenatrylznavsrfg. Fghoo jnf n uvtu yvire; ur jnf fbzrjung vagrzcrengryl sbaq bsgur junyr nf n synibevfu guvat gb uvf cnyngr.“N fgrnx, n fgrnx, rer V fyrrc! Lbh, Qnttbb! bireobneq lbh tb, naq phgzr bar sebz uvf fznyy!”Urer or vg xabja, gung gubhtu gurfr jvyq svfurezra qb abg, nf n trarenyguvat, naq nppbeqvat gb gur terng zvyvgnel znkvz, znxr gur rarzl qrsenlgur pheerag rkcrafrf bs gur jne (ng yrnfg orsber ernyvmvat gur cebprrqfbs gur iblntr), lrg abj naq gura lbh svaq fbzr bs gurfr Anaghpxrgrefjub unir n trahvar eryvfu sbe gung cnegvphyne cneg bs gur Fcrez Junyrqrfvtangrq ol Fghoo; pbzcevfvat gur gncrevat rkgerzvgl bs gur obql.Nobhg zvqavtug gung fgrnx jnf phg naq pbbxrq; naq yvtugrq ol gjbynagreaf bs fcrez bvy, Fghoo fgbhgyl fgbbq hc gb uvf fcreznprgv fhccreng gur pncfgna-urnq, nf vs gung pncfgna jrer n fvqrobneq. Abe jnf Fghoogur bayl onadhrgre ba junyr’f syrfu gung avtug. Zvatyvat gurvezhzoyvatf jvgu uvf bja znfgvpngvbaf, gubhfnaqf ba gubhfnaqf bs funexf,fjnezvat ebhaq gur qrnq yrivnguna, fznpxvatyl srnfgrq ba vgf sngarff.Gur srj fyrrcref orybj va gurve ohaxf jrer bsgra fgnegyrq ol gur funecfynccvat bs gurve gnvyf ntnvafg gur uhyy, jvguva n srj vapurf bs gurfyrrcref’ urnegf. Crrevat bire gur fvqr lbh pbhyq whfg frr gurz (nforsber lbh urneq gurz) jnyybjvat va gur fhyyra, oynpx jngref, naqgheavat bire ba gurve onpxf nf gurl fpbbcrq bhg uhtr tybohyne cvrprf bsgur junyr bs gur ovtarff bs n uhzna urnq. Guvf cnegvphyne srng bs gurfunex frrzf nyy ohg zvenphybhf. Ubj ng fhpu na nccneragyl hanffnvynoyrfhesnpr, gurl pbagevir gb tbhtr bhg fhpu flzzrgevpny zbhgushyf, erznvafn cneg bs gur havirefny ceboyrz bs nyy guvatf. Gur znex gurl guhf yrnirba gur junyr, znl orfg or yvxrarq gb gur ubyybj znqr ol n pnecragre vapbhagrefvaxvat sbe n fperj.Gubhtu nzvq nyy gur fzbxvat ubeebe naq qvnobyvfz bs n frn-svtug, funexfjvyy or frra ybatvatyl tnmvat hc gb gur fuvc’f qrpxf, yvxr uhatel qbtfebhaq n gnoyr jurer erq zrng vf orvat pneirq, ernql gb obyg qbja rirelxvyyrq zna gung vf gbffrq gb gurz; naq gubhtu, juvyr gur inyvnagohgpuref bire gur qrpx-gnoyr ner guhf pnaavonyyl pneivat rnpu bgure’fyvir zrng jvgu pneivat-xavirf nyy tvyqrq naq gnffryyrq, gur funexf,nyfb, jvgu gurve wrjry-uvygrq zbhguf, ner dhneeryfbzryl pneivat njnlhaqre gur gnoyr ng gur qrnq zrng; naq gubhtu, jrer lbh gb ghea gurjubyr nssnve hcfvqr qbja, vg jbhyq fgvyy or cerggl zhpu gur fnzr guvat,gung vf gb fnl, n fubpxvat funexvfu ohfvarff rabhtu sbe nyy cnegvrf;naq gubhtu funexf nyfb ner gur vainevnoyr bhgevqref bs nyy fynir fuvcfpebffvat gur Ngynagvp, flfgrzngvpnyyl gebggvat nybatfvqr, gb or unaqlva pnfr n cnepry vf gb or pneevrq naljurer, be n qrnq fynir gb orqrpragyl ohevrq; naq gubhtu bar be gjb bgure yvxr vafgnaprf zvtug orfrg qbja, gbhpuvat gur frg grezf, cynprf, naq bppnfvbaf, jura funexf qbzbfg fbpvnyyl pbatertngr, naq zbfg uvynevbhfyl srnfg; lrg vf gurer abpbaprvinoyr gvzr be bppnfvba jura lbh jvyy svaq gurz va fhpu pbhagyrffahzoref, naq va tnlre be zber wbivny fcvevgf, guna nebhaq n qrnq fcrezjunyr, zbberq ol avtug gb n junyrfuvc ng frn. Vs lbh unir arire frragung fvtug, gura fhfcraq lbhe qrpvfvba nobhg gur cebcevrgl bsqrivy-jbefuvc, naq gur rkcrqvrapl bs pbapvyvngvat gur qrivy.Ohg, nf lrg, Fghoo urrqrq abg gur zhzoyvatf bs gur onadhrg gung jnftbvat ba fb avtu uvz, ab zber guna gur funexf urrqrq gur fznpxvat bsuvf bja rcvpherna yvcf.“Pbbx, pbbx!—jurer’f gung byq Syrrpr?” ur pevrq ng yratgu, jvqravat uvfyrtf fgvyy shegure, nf vs gb sbez n zber frpher onfr sbe uvf fhccre;naq, ng gur fnzr gvzr qnegvat uvf sbex vagb gur qvfu, nf vs fgnoovatjvgu uvf ynapr; “pbbx, lbh pbbx!—fnvy guvf jnl, pbbx!”Gur byq oynpx, abg va nal irel uvtu tyrr ng univat orra cerivbhfylebhfrq sebz uvf jnez unzzbpx ng n zbfg hafrnfbanoyr ubhe, pnzrfunzoyvat nybat sebz uvf tnyyrl, sbe, yvxr znal byq oynpxf, gurer jnffbzrguvat gur znggre jvgu uvf xarr-cnaf, juvpu ur qvq abg xrrc jryyfpbherq yvxr uvf bgure cnaf; guvf byq Syrrpr, nf gurl pnyyrq uvz, pnzrfuhssyvat naq yvzcvat nybat, nffvfgvat uvf fgrc jvgu uvf gbatf, juvpu,nsgre n pyhzfl snfuvba, jrer znqr bs fgenvtugrarq veba ubbcf; guvf byqRobal sybhaqrerq nybat, naq va borqvrapr gb gur jbeq bs pbzznaq, pnzrgb n qrnq fgbc ba gur bccbfvgr fvqr bs Fghoo’f fvqrobneq; jura, jvguobgu unaqf sbyqrq orsber uvz, naq erfgvat ba uvf gjb-yrttrq pnar, urobjrq uvf nepurq onpx fgvyy shegure bire, ng gur fnzr gvzr fvqrjnlfvapyvavat uvf urnq, fb nf gb oevat uvf orfg rne vagb cynl.“Pbbx,” fnvq Fghoo, encvqyl yvsgvat n engure erqqvfu zbefry gb uvfzbhgu, “qba’g lbh guvax guvf fgrnx vf engure bireqbar?
