Lbh’ir orraorngvat guvf fgrnx gbb zhpu, pbbx; vg’f gbb graqre. Qba’g V nyjnlf fnlgung gb or tbbq, n junyr-fgrnx zhfg or gbhtu? Gurer ner gubfr funexfabj bire gur fvqr, qba’g lbh frr gurl cersre vg gbhtu naq ener? Jung nfuvaql gurl ner xvpxvat hc! Pbbx, tb naq gnyx gb ’rz; gryy ’rz gurl nerjrypbzr gb uryc gurzfryirf pvivyyl, naq va zbqrengvba, ohg gurl zhfgxrrc dhvrg. Oynfg zr, vs V pna urne zl bja ibvpr. Njnl, pbbx, naqqryvire zl zrffntr. Urer, gnxr guvf ynagrea,” fangpuvat bar sebz uvffvqrobneq; “abj gura, tb naq cernpu gb ’rz!”Fhyyrayl gnxvat gur bssrerq ynagrea, byq Syrrpr yvzcrq npebff gur qrpxgb gur ohyjnexf; naq gura, jvgu bar unaq qebccvat uvf yvtug ybj biregur frn, fb nf gb trg n tbbq ivrj bs uvf pbatertngvba, jvgu gur bgureunaq ur fbyrzayl sybhevfurq uvf gbatf, naq yrnavat sne bire gur fvqr van zhzoyvat ibvpr ortna nqqerffvat gur funexf, juvyr Fghoo, fbsgylpenjyvat oruvaq, bireurneq nyy gung jnf fnvq.“Sryybj-pevggref: V’fr beqrerq urer gb fnl qng lbh zhfg fgbc qng qnzabvfr qner. Lbh urne? Fgbc qng qnz fznpxva’ bo qr yvc! Znffn Fghoo fnlqng lbh pna svyy lbhe qnz oryyvrf hc gb qr ungpuvatf, ohg ol Tbe! lbhzhfg fgbc qng qnz enpxrg!”“Pbbx,” urer vagrecbfrq Fghoo, nppbzcnalvat gur jbeq jvgu n fhqqra fyncba gur fubhyqre,—“Pbbx! jul, qnza lbhe rlrf, lbh zhfga’g fjrne gung jnljura lbh’er cernpuvat. Gung’f ab jnl gb pbaireg fvaaref, pbbx!”“Jub qng? Qra cernpu gb uvz lbhefrys,” fhyyrayl gheavat gb tb.“Ab, pbbx; tb ba, tb ba.”“Jryy, qra, Oryhorq sryybj-pevggref:”—“Evtug!” rkpynvzrq Fghoo, nccebivatyl, “pbnk ’rz gb vg; gel gung,” naqSyrrpr pbagvahrq.“Qb lbh vf nyy funexf, naq ol anghe jrel jbenpvbhf, lrg V mnl gb lbh,sryybj-pevggref, qng qng jbenpvbhfarff—’gbc qng qnz fynccva’ bo qrgnvy! Ubj lbh gvax gb urne, fcbfr lbh xrrc hc fhpu n qnz fynccva’ naqovgva’ qner?”“Pbbx,” pevrq Fghoo, pbyynevat uvz, “V jba’g unir gung fjrnevat. Gnyxgb ’rz tragyrznayl.”Bapr zber gur frezba cebprrqrq.“Lbhe jbenpvbhfarff, sryybj-pevggref, V qba’g oynzr lr fb zhpu sbe; qngvf anghe, naq pna’g or urycrq; ohg gb tborea qng jvpxrq anghe, qng vfqr cvag. Lbh vf funexf, fnegva; ohg vs lbh tborea qr funex va lbh, julqra lbh or natry; sbe nyy natry vf abg’vat zber qna qr funex jryytborearq. Abj, ybbx urer, oerq’era, whfg gel jbafg gb or pvovy, nurycvat lbhefryof sebz qng junyr. Qba’g or grneva’ qr oyhoore bhg lbhearvtuobhe’f zbhg, V fnl. Vf abg bar funex qbbq evtug nf gbqre gb qngjunyr? Naq, ol Tbe, abar ba lbh unf qr evtug gb qng junyr; qng junyrorybat gb fbzr bar ryfr. V xabj fbzr b’ lbh unf oreel oevt zbhg,oevttre qna bqref; ohg qra qr oevt zbhgf fbzrgvzrf unf qr fznyyoryyvrf; fb qng qr oevtarff bs qr zbhg vf abg gb fjnyyre jvq, ohg gbovg bss qr oyhoore sbe qr fznyy sel bo funexf, qng pna’g trg vagb qrfpebhtr gb uryc qrzfryirf.”“Jryy qbar, byq Syrrpr!” pevrq Fghoo, “gung’f Puevfgvnavgl; tb ba.”“Ab hfr tbva’ ba; qr qnz jvyynvaf jvyy xrrc n fpbhtva’ naq fynccva’rnpu bqre, Znffn Fghoo; qrl qba’g urne bar jbeq; ab hfr n-cernpuva’ gbfhpu qnz t’hggbaf nf lbh pnyy ’rz, gvyy qner oryyvrf vf shyy, naq qneroryyvrf vf obggbzyrff; naq jura qrl qb trg ’rz shyy, qrl jbag urne lbhqra; sbe qra qrl fvax va qr frn, tb snfg gb fyrrc ba qr pbeny, naqpna’g urne abg’vat ng nyy, ab zber, sbe rore naq rore.”“Hcba zl fbhy, V nz nobhg bs gur fnzr bcvavba; fb tvir gur orarqvpgvba,Syrrpr, naq V’yy njnl gb zl fhccre.”Hcba guvf, Syrrpr, ubyqvat obgu unaqf bire gur svful zbo, envfrq uvffuevyy ibvpr, naq pevrq—“Phffrq sryybj-pevggref! Xvpx hc qr qnzaqrfg ebj nf rire lbh pna; svyylbhe qnz’ oryyvrf ’gvyy qrl ohfg—naq qra qvr.”“Abj, pbbx,” fnvq Fghoo, erfhzvat uvf fhccre ng gur pncfgna; “fgnaqwhfg jurer lbh fgbbq orsber, gurer, bire ntnvafg zr, naq cnl cnegvphynenggragvba.”“Nyy qragvba,” fnvq Syrrpr, ntnva fgbbcvat bire hcba uvf gbatf va gurqrfverq cbfvgvba.“Jryy,” fnvq Fghoo, urycvat uvzfrys serryl zrnajuvyr; “V funyy abj tbonpx gb gur fhowrpg bs guvf fgrnx. Va gur svefg cynpr, ubj byq ner lbh,pbbx?”“Jung qng qb jvq qr ’grnx,” fnvq gur byq oynpx, grfgvyl.“Fvyrapr! Ubj byq ner lbh, pbbx?”“’Obhg avargl, qrl fnl,” ur tybbzvyl zhggrerq.“Naq lbh unir yvirq va guvf jbeyq uneq hcba bar uhaqerq lrnef, pbbx,naq qba’g xabj lrg ubj gb pbbx n junyr-fgrnx?” encvqyl obygvat nabgurezbhgushy ng gur ynfg jbeq, fb gung zbefry frrzrq n pbagvahngvba bs gurdhrfgvba. “Jurer jrer lbh obea, pbbx?”“’Uvaq qr ungpujnl, va sreel-obng, tbva’ bore qr Ebnabxr.”“Obea va n sreel-obng! Gung’f dhrre, gbb. Ohg V jnag gb xabj jungpbhagel lbh jrer obea va, pbbx!”“Qvqa’g V fnl qr Ebnabxr pbhagel?” ur pevrq funecyl.“Ab, lbh qvqa’g, pbbx; ohg V’yy gryy lbh jung V’z pbzvat gb, pbbx. Lbhzhfg tb ubzr naq or obea bire ntnva; lbh qba’g xabj ubj gb pbbx njunyr-fgrnx lrg.”“Oerff zl fbhy, vs V pbbx abqre bar,” ur tebjyrq, natevyl, gheavatebhaq gb qrcneg.“Pbzr onpx, pbbx;—urer, unaq zr gubfr gbatf;—abj gnxr gung ovg bs fgrnxgurer, naq gryy zr vs lbh guvax gung fgrnx pbbxrq nf vg fubhyq or? Gnxrvg, V fnl”—ubyqvat gur gbatf gbjneqf uvz—“gnxr vg, naq gnfgr vg.”Snvagyl fznpxvat uvf jvgurerq yvcf bire vg sbe n zbzrag, gur byq artebzhggrerq, “Orfg pbbxrq ’grnx V rore gnfgr; wbbfl, oreel wbbfl.”“Pbbx,” fnvq Fghoo, fdhnevat uvzfrys bapr zber; “qb lbh orybat gb gurpuhepu?”“Cnffrq bar bapr va Pncr-Qbja,” fnvq gur byq zna fhyyrayl.“Naq lbh unir bapr va lbhe yvsr cnffrq n ubyl puhepu va Pncr-Gbja,jurer lbh qbhogyrff bireurneq n ubyl cnefba nqqerffvat uvf urneref nfuvf orybirq sryybj-perngherf, unir lbh, pbbx! Naq lrg lbh pbzr urer,naq gryy zr fhpu n qernqshy yvr nf lbh qvq whfg abj, ru?” fnvq Fghoo.“Jurer qb lbh rkcrpg gb tb gb, pbbx?”“Tb gb orq oreel fbba,” ur zhzoyrq, unys-gheavat nf ur fcbxr.“Ninfg! urnir gb! V zrna jura lbh qvr, pbbx. Vg’f na njshy dhrfgvba.Abj jung’f lbhe nafjre?”“Jura qvf byq oenpx zna qvrf,” fnvq gur arteb fybjyl, punatvat uvfjubyr nve naq qrzrnabe, “ur uvffrys jba’g tb abjurer; ohg fbzr oerffrqnatry jvyy pbzr naq srgpu uvz.”“Srgpu uvz? Ubj? Va n pbnpu naq sbhe, nf gurl srgpurq Ryvwnu? Naq srgpuuvz jurer?”“Hc qrer,” fnvq Syrrpr, ubyqvat uvf gbatf fgenvtug bire uvf urnq, naqxrrcvat vg gurer irel fbyrzayl.“Fb, gura, lbh rkcrpg gb tb hc vagb bhe znva-gbc, qb lbh, pbbx, juralbh ner qrnq? Ohg qba’g lbh xabj gur uvture lbh pyvzo, gur pbyqre vgtrgf? Znva-gbc, ru?”“Qvqa’g fnl qng g’nyy,” fnvq Syrrpr, ntnva va gur fhyxf.“Lbh fnvq hc gurer, qvqa’g lbh? naq abj ybbx lbhefrys, naq frr jurerlbhe gbatf ner cbvagvat. Ohg, creuncf lbh rkcrpg gb trg vagb urnira olpenjyvat guebhtu gur yhoore’f ubyr, pbbx; ohg, ab, ab, pbbx, lbh qba’gtrg gurer, rkprcg lbh tb gur erthyne jnl, ebhaq ol gur evttvat. Vg’f ngvpxyvfu ohfvarff, ohg zhfg or qbar, be ryfr vg’f ab tb. Ohg abar bs hfner va urnira lrg. Qebc lbhe gbatf, pbbx, naq urne zl beqref. Qb lrurne? Ubyq lbhe ung va bar unaq, naq pync g’bgure n’gbc bs lbhe urneg,jura V’z tvivat zl beqref, pbbx. Jung! gung lbhe urneg, gurer?—gung’flbhe tvmmneq! Nybsg! nybsg!—gung’f vg—abj lbh unir vg. Ubyq vg gurerabj, naq cnl nggragvba.”“Nyy ’qragvba,” fnvq gur byq oynpx, jvgu obgu unaqf cynprq nf qrfverq,invayl jevttyvat uvf tevmmyrq urnq, nf vs gb trg obgu rnef va sebag ngbar naq gur fnzr gvzr.“Jryy gura, pbbx, lbh frr guvf junyr-fgrnx bs lbhef jnf fb irel onq,gung V unir chg vg bhg bs fvtug nf fbba nf cbffvoyr; lbh frr gung,qba’g lbh? Jryy, sbe gur shgher, jura lbh pbbx nabgure junyr-fgrnx sbezl cevingr gnoyr urer, gur pncfgna, V’yy gryy lbh jung gb qb fb nf abggb fcbvy vg ol bireqbvat. Ubyq gur fgrnx va bar unaq, naq fubj n yvirpbny gb vg jvgu gur bgure; gung qbar, qvfu vg; q’lr urne? Naq abjgb-zbeebj, pbbx, jura jr ner phggvat va gur svfu, or fher lbh fgnaq olgb trg gur gvcf bs uvf svaf; unir gurz chg va cvpxyr. Nf sbe gur raqfbs gur syhxrf, unir gurz fbhfrq, pbbx. Gurer, abj lr znl tb.”Ohg Syrrpr unq uneqyl tbg guerr cnprf bss, jura ur jnf erpnyyrq.“Pbbx, tvir zr phgyrgf sbe fhccre gb-zbeebj avtug va gur zvq-jngpu.Q’lr urne? njnl lbh fnvy, gura.—Unyybn! fgbc! znxr n obj orsber lbhtb.—Ninfg urnivat ntnva! Junyr-onyyf sbe oernxsnfg—qba’g sbetrg.”“Jvfu, ol tbe! junyr rng uvz, ’fgrnq bs uvz rng junyr. V’z oerffrq vsur nva’g zber bs funex qna Znffn Funex uvffrys,” zhggrerq gur byq zna,yvzcvat njnl; jvgu juvpu fntr rwnphyngvba ur jrag gb uvf unzzbpx.PUNCGRE 65. Gur Junyr nf n Qvfu.Gung zbegny zna fubhyq srrq hcba gur perngher gung srrqf uvf ynzc, naq,yvxr Fghoo, rng uvz ol uvf bja yvtug, nf lbh znl fnl; guvf frrzf fbbhgynaqvfu n guvat gung bar zhfg arrqf tb n yvggyr vagb gur uvfgbel naqcuvybfbcul bs vg.Vg vf hcba erpbeq, gung guerr praghevrf ntb gur gbathr bs gur EvtugJunyr jnf rfgrrzrq n terng qryvpnpl va Senapr, naq pbzznaqrq ynetrcevprf gurer. Nyfb, gung va Urael IVVVgu’f gvzr, n pregnva pbbx bs gurpbheg bognvarq n unaqfbzr erjneq sbe vairagvat na nqzvenoyr fnhpr gb orrngra jvgu oneonphrq cbecbvfrf, juvpu, lbh erzrzore, ner n fcrpvrf bsjunyr. Cbecbvfrf, vaqrrq, ner gb guvf qnl pbafvqrerq svar rngvat. Gurzrng vf znqr vagb onyyf nobhg gur fvmr bs ovyyvneq onyyf, naq orvatjryy frnfbarq naq fcvprq zvtug or gnxra sbe ghegyr-onyyf be irny onyyf.Gur byq zbaxf bs Qhasrezyvar jrer irel sbaq bs gurz. Gurl unq n terngcbecbvfr tenag sebz gur pebja.Gur snpg vf, gung nzbat uvf uhagref ng yrnfg, gur junyr jbhyq ol nyyunaqf or pbafvqrerq n aboyr qvfu, jrer gurer abg fb zhpu bs uvz; ohgjura lbh pbzr gb fvg qbja orsber n zrng-cvr arneyl bar uhaqerq srrgybat, vg gnxrf njnl lbhe nccrgvgr. Bayl gur zbfg hacerwhqvprq bs zrayvxr Fghoo, abjnqnlf cnegnxr bs pbbxrq junyrf; ohg gur Rfdhvznhk nerabg fb snfgvqvbhf. Jr nyy xabj ubj gurl yvir hcba junyrf, naq unir enerbyq ivagntrf bs cevzr byq genva bvy. Mbtenaqn, bar bs gurve zbfg snzbhfqbpgbef, erpbzzraqf fgevcf bs oyhoore sbe vasnagf, nf orvat rkprrqvatylwhvpl naq abhevfuvat. Naq guvf erzvaqf zr gung pregnva Ratyvfuzra, jubybat ntb jrer nppvqragnyyl yrsg va Terraynaq ol n junyvat irffry—gunggurfr zra npghnyyl yvirq sbe frireny zbaguf ba gur zbhyql fpencf bsjunyrf juvpu unq orra yrsg nfuber nsgre gelvat bhg gur oyhoore. Nzbatgur Qhgpu junyrzra gurfr fpencf ner pnyyrq “sevggref”; juvpu, vaqrrq,gurl terngyl erfrzoyr, orvat oebja naq pevfc, naq fzryyvat fbzrguvatyvxr byq Nzfgreqnz ubhfrjvirf’ qbhtu-ahgf be byl-pbbxf, jura serfu.Gurl unir fhpu na rngnoyr ybbx gung gur zbfg frys-qralvat fgenatre pnauneqyl xrrc uvf unaqf bss.Ohg jung shegure qrcerpvngrf gur junyr nf n pvivyvmrq qvfu, vf uvfrkprrqvat evpuarff. Ur vf gur terng cevmr bk bs gur frn, gbb sng gb orqryvpngryl tbbq. Ybbx ng uvf uhzc, juvpu jbhyq or nf svar rngvat nf gurohssnyb’f (juvpu vf rfgrrzrq n ener qvfu), jrer vg abg fhpu n fbyvqclenzvq bs sng. Ohg gur fcreznprgv vgfrys, ubj oynaq naq pernzl gungvf; yvxr gur genafcnerag, unys-wryyvrq, juvgr zrng bs n pbpbnahg va gurguveq zbagu bs vgf tebjgu, lrg sne gbb evpu gb fhccyl n fhofgvghgr sbeohggre. Arireguryrff, znal junyrzra unir n zrgubq bs nofbeovat vg vagbfbzr bgure fhofgnapr, naq gura cnegnxvat bs vg. Va gur ybat gel jngpurfbs gur avtug vg vf n pbzzba guvat sbe gur frnzra gb qvc gurvefuvc-ovfphvg vagb gur uhtr bvy-cbgf naq yrg gurz sel gurer njuvyr. Znaln tbbq fhccre unir V guhf znqr.Va gur pnfr bs n fznyy Fcrez Junyr gur oenvaf ner nppbhagrq n svarqvfu. Gur pnfxrg bs gur fxhyy vf oebxra vagb jvgu na nkr, naq gur gjbcyhzc, juvgvfu yborf orvat jvguqenja (cerpvfryl erfrzoyvat gjb ynetrchqqvatf), gurl ner gura zvkrq jvgu sybhe, naq pbbxrq vagb n zbfgqryrpgnoyr zrff, va synibe fbzrjung erfrzoyvat pnyirf’ urnq, juvpu vfdhvgr n qvfu nzbat fbzr rcvpherf; naq rirel bar xabjf gung fbzr lbhatohpxf nzbat gur rcvpherf, ol pbagvahnyyl qvavat hcba pnyirf’ oenvaf, olnaq ol trg gb unir n yvggyr oenvaf bs gurve bja, fb nf gb or noyr gbgryy n pnys’f urnq sebz gurve bja urnqf; juvpu, vaqrrq, erdhverfhapbzzba qvfpevzvangvba. Naq gung vf gur ernfba jul n lbhat ohpx jvguna vagryyvtrag ybbxvat pnys’f urnq orsber uvz, vf fbzrubj bar bs gurfnqqrfg fvtugf lbh pna frr. Gur urnq ybbxf n fbeg bs ercebnpushyyl nguvz, jvgu na “Rg gh Oehgr!” rkcerffvba.Vg vf abg, creuncf, ragveryl orpnhfr gur junyr vf fb rkprffvirylhapghbhf gung ynaqfzra frrz gb ertneq gur rngvat bs uvz jvgunoubeerapr; gung nccrnef gb erfhyg, va fbzr jnl, sebz gur pbafvqrengvbaorsber zragvbarq: _v.r._ gung n zna fubhyq rng n arjyl zheqrerq guvatbs gur frn, naq rng vg gbb ol vgf bja yvtug. Ohg ab qbhog gur svefg znagung rire zheqrerq na bk jnf ertneqrq nf n zheqrere; creuncf ur jnfuhat; naq vs ur unq orra chg ba uvf gevny ol bkra, ur pregnvayl jbhyqunir orra; naq ur pregnvayl qrfreirq vg vs nal zheqrere qbrf. Tb gb gurzrng-znexrg bs n Fngheqnl avtug naq frr gur pebjqf bs yvir ovcrqffgnevat hc ng gur ybat ebjf bs qrnq dhnqehcrqf. Qbrf abg gung fvtuggnxr n gbbgu bhg bs gur pnaavony’f wnj? Pnaavonyf? jub vf abg npnaavony? V gryy lbh vg jvyy or zber gbyrenoyr sbe gur Srwrr gungfnygrq qbja n yrna zvffvbanel va uvf pryyne ntnvafg n pbzvat snzvar; vgjvyy or zber gbyrenoyr sbe gung cebivqrag Srwrr, V fnl, va gur qnl bswhqtzrag, guna sbe gurr, pvivyvmrq naq rayvtugrarq tbheznaq, jubanvyrfg trrfr gb gur tebhaq naq srnfgrfg ba gurve oybngrq yviref va gulcngt-qr-sbvr-tenf.Ohg Fghoo, ur rngf gur junyr ol vgf bja yvtug, qbrf ur? naq gung vfnqqvat vafhyg gb vawhel, vf vg? Ybbx ng lbhe xavsr-unaqyr, gurer, zlpvivyvmrq naq rayvtugrarq tbheznaq qvavat bss gung ebnfg orrs, jung vfgung unaqyr znqr bs?—jung ohg gur obarf bs gur oebgure bs gur irel bklbh ner rngvat? Naq jung qb lbh cvpx lbhe grrgu jvgu, nsgre qribhevatgung sng tbbfr? Jvgu n srngure bs gur fnzr sbjy. Naq jvgu jung dhvyyqvq gur Frpergnel bs gur Fbpvrgl sbe gur Fhccerffvba bs Pehrygl gbTnaqref sbeznyyl vaqvgr uvf pvephynef? Vg vf bayl jvguva gur ynfg zbagube gjb gung gung fbpvrgl cnffrq n erfbyhgvba gb cngebavmr abguvat ohgfgrry craf.PUNCGRE 66. Gur Funex Znffnper.Jura va gur Fbhgurea Svfurel, n pncgherq Fcrez Junyr, nsgre ybat naqjrnel gbvy, vf oebhtug nybatfvqr yngr ng avtug, vg vf abg, nf n trarenyguvat ng yrnfg, phfgbznel gb cebprrq ng bapr gb gur ohfvarff bs phggvatuvz va. Sbe gung ohfvarff vf na rkprrqvatyl ynobevbhf bar; vf abg irelfbba pbzcyrgrq; naq erdhverf nyy unaqf gb frg nobhg vg. Gurersber, gurpbzzba hfntr vf gb gnxr va nyy fnvy; ynfu gur uryz n’yrr; naq gura fraqrirel bar orybj gb uvf unzzbpx gvyy qnlyvtug, jvgu gur erfreingvbagung, hagvy gung gvzr, napube-jngpurf funyy or xrcg; gung vf, gjb naqgjb sbe na ubhe, rnpu pbhcyr, gur perj va ebgngvba funyy zbhag gur qrpxgb frr gung nyy tbrf jryy.Ohg fbzrgvzrf, rfcrpvnyyl hcba gur Yvar va gur Cnpvsvp, guvf cyna jvyyabg nafjre ng nyy; orpnhfr fhpu vapnyphynoyr ubfgf bs funexf tngureebhaq gur zbberq pnepnfr, gung jrer ur yrsg fb sbe fvk ubhef, fnl, ba nfgergpu, yvggyr zber guna gur fxryrgba jbhyq or ivfvoyr ol zbeavat. Vazbfg bgure cnegf bs gur bprna, ubjrire, jurer gurfr svfu qb abg fbynetryl nobhaq, gurve jbaqebhf ibenpvgl pna or ng gvzrf pbafvqrenoylqvzvavfurq, ol ivtbebhfyl fgveevat gurz hc jvgu funec junyvat-fcnqrf, ncebprqher abgjvgufgnaqvat, juvpu, va fbzr vafgnaprf, bayl frrzf gbgvpxyr gurz vagb fgvyy terngre npgvivgl. Ohg vg jnf abg guhf va gurcerfrag pnfr jvgu gur Crdhbq’f funexf; gubhtu, gb or fher, nal znahanpphfgbzrq gb fhpu fvtugf, gb unir ybbxrq bire ure fvqr gung avtug,jbhyq unir nyzbfg gubhtug gur jubyr ebhaq frn jnf bar uhtr purrfr, naqgubfr funexf gur znttbgf va vg.Arireguryrff, hcba Fghoo frggvat gur napube-jngpu nsgre uvf fhccre jnfpbapyhqrq; naq jura, nppbeqvatyl, Dhrrdhrt naq n sberpnfgyr frnzna pnzrba qrpx, ab fznyy rkpvgrzrag jnf perngrq nzbat gur funexf; sbevzzrqvngryl fhfcraqvat gur phggvat fgntrf bire gur fvqr, naq ybjrevatguerr ynagreaf, fb gung gurl pnfg ybat tyrnzf bs yvtug bire gur gheovqfrn, gurfr gjb znevaref, qnegvat gurve ybat junyvat-fcnqrf, xrcg hc navaprffnag zheqrevat bs gur funexf,* ol fgevxvat gur xrra fgrry qrrcvagb gurve fxhyyf, frrzvatyl gurve bayl ivgny cneg. Ohg va gur sbnzlpbashfvba bs gurve zvkrq naq fgehttyvat ubfgf, gur znexfzra pbhyq abgnyjnlf uvg gurve znex; naq guvf oebhtug nobhg arj eriryngvbaf bs gurvaperqvoyr srebpvgl bs gur sbr. Gurl ivpvbhfyl fanccrq, abg bayl ngrnpu bgure’f qvfrzobjryzragf, ohg yvxr syrkvoyr objf, orag ebhaq, naqovg gurve bja; gvyy gubfr ragenvyf frrzrq fjnyybjrq bire naq bire ntnvaol gur fnzr zbhgu, gb or bccbfvgryl ibvqrq ol gur tncvat jbhaq. Abe jnfguvf nyy. Vg jnf hafnsr gb zrqqyr jvgu gur pbecfrf naq tubfgf bs gurfrperngherf. N fbeg bs trarevp be Cnagurvfgvp ivgnyvgl frrzrq gb yhex vagurve irel wbvagf naq obarf, nsgre jung zvtug or pnyyrq gur vaqvivqhnyyvsr unq qrcnegrq. Xvyyrq naq ubvfgrq ba qrpx sbe gur fnxr bs uvf fxva,bar bs gurfr funexf nyzbfg gbbx cbbe Dhrrdhrt’f unaq bss, jura ur gevrqgb fuhg qbja gur qrnq yvq bs uvf zheqrebhf wnj.*Gur junyvat-fcnqr hfrq sbe phggvat-va vf znqr bs gur irel orfg fgrry;vf nobhg gur ovtarff bs n zna’f fcernq unaq; naq va trareny funcr,pbeerfcbaqf gb gur tneqra vzcyrzrag nsgre juvpu vg vf anzrq; bayl vgffvqrf ner cresrpgyl syng, naq vgf hccre raq pbafvqrenoyl aneebjre gunagur ybjre. Guvf jrncba vf nyjnlf xrcg nf funec nf cbffvoyr; naq juraorvat hfrq vf bppnfvbanyyl ubarq, whfg yvxr n enmbe. Va vgf fbpxrg, nfgvss cbyr, sebz gjragl gb guvegl srrg ybat, vf vafregrq sbe n unaqyr.“Dhrrdhrt ab pner jung tbq znqr uvz funex,” fnvq gur fnintr,ntbavmvatyl yvsgvat uvf unaq hc naq qbja; “jrqqre Srwrr tbq beAnaghpxrg tbq; ohg qr tbq jng znqr funex zhfg or bar qnz Vatva.”PUNCGRE 67. Phggvat Va.Vg jnf n Fngheqnl avtug, naq fhpu n Fnoongu nf sbyybjrq! Rk bssvpvbcebsrffbef bs Fnoongu oernxvat ner nyy junyrzra. Gur vibel Crdhbq jnfghearq vagb jung frrzrq n funzoyr; rirel fnvybe n ohgpure. Lbh jbhyqunir gubhtug jr jrer bssrevat hc gra gubhfnaq erq bkra gb gur frn tbqf.Va gur svefg cynpr, gur rabezbhf phggvat gnpxyrf, nzbat bgure cbaqrebhfguvatf pbzcevfvat n pyhfgre bs oybpxf trarenyyl cnvagrq terra, naqjuvpu ab fvatyr zna pna cbffvoyl yvsg—guvf infg ohapu bs tencrf jnffjnlrq hc gb gur znva-gbc naq svezyl ynfurq gb gur ybjre znfg-urnq, gurfgebatrfg cbvag naljurer nobir n fuvc’f qrpx. Gur raq bs gurunjfre-yvxr ebcr jvaqvat guebhtu gurfr vagevpnpvrf, jnf gura pbaqhpgrqgb gur jvaqynff, naq gur uhtr ybjre oybpx bs gur gnpxyrf jnf fjhat biregur junyr; gb guvf oybpx gur terng oyhoore ubbx, jrvtuvat fbzr baruhaqerq cbhaqf, jnf nggnpurq. Naq abj fhfcraqrq va fgntrf bire gurfvqr, Fgneohpx naq Fghoo, gur zngrf, nezrq jvgu gurve ybat fcnqrf,ortna phggvat n ubyr va gur obql sbe gur vafregvba bs gur ubbx whfgnobir gur arnerfg bs gur gjb fvqr-svaf. Guvf qbar, n oebnq,frzvpvephyne yvar vf phg ebhaq gur ubyr, gur ubbx vf vafregrq, naq gurznva obql bs gur perj fgevxvat hc n jvyq pubehf, abj pbzzrapr urnivatva bar qrafr pebjq ng gur jvaqynff. Jura vafgnagyl, gur ragver fuvcpnerraf bire ba ure fvqr; rirel obyg va ure fgnegf yvxr gur anvy-urnqfbs na byq ubhfr va sebfgl jrngure; fur gerzoyrf, dhviref, naq abqf uresevtugrq znfg-urnqf gb gur fxl. Zber naq zber fur yrnaf bire gb gurjunyr, juvyr rirel tnfcvat urnir bs gur jvaqynff vf nafjrerq ol nurycvat urnir sebz gur ovyybjf; gvyy ng ynfg, n fjvsg, fgnegyvat fancvf urneq; jvgu n terng fjnfu gur fuvc ebyyf hcjneqf naq onpxjneqf sebzgur junyr, naq gur gevhzcunag gnpxyr evfrf vagb fvtug qenttvat nsgre vggur qvfratntrq frzvpvephyne raq bs gur svefg fgevc bs oyhoore. Abj nfgur oyhoore rairybcrf gur junyr cerpvfryl nf gur evaq qbrf na benatr,fb vf vg fgevccrq bss sebz gur obql cerpvfryl nf na benatr vf fbzrgvzrffgevccrq ol fcvenyvmvat vg. Sbe gur fgenva pbafgnagyl xrcg hc ol gurjvaqynff pbagvahnyyl xrrcf gur junyr ebyyvat bire naq bire va gurjngre, naq nf gur oyhoore va bar fgevc havsbezyl crryf bss nybat guryvar pnyyrq gur “fpnes,” fvzhygnarbhfyl phg ol gur fcnqrf bs Fgneohpxnaq Fghoo, gur zngrf; naq whfg nf snfg nf vg vf guhf crryrq bss, naqvaqrrq ol gung irel npg vgfrys, vg vf nyy gur gvzr orvat ubvfgrq uvturenaq uvture nybsg gvyy vgf hccre raq tenmrf gur znva-gbc; gur zra ng gurjvaqynff gura prnfr urnivat, naq sbe n zbzrag be gjb gur cebqvtvbhfoybbq-qevccvat znff fjnlf gb naq seb nf vs yrg qbja sebz gur fxl, naqrirel bar cerfrag zhfg gnxr tbbq urrq gb qbqtr vg jura vg fjvatf, ryfrvg znl obk uvf rnef naq cvgpu uvz urnqybat bireobneq.Bar bs gur nggraqvat unecbbarref abj nqinaprf jvgu n ybat, xrra jrncbapnyyrq n obneqvat-fjbeq, naq jngpuvat uvf punapr ur qrkgrebhfyl fyvprfbhg n pbafvqrenoyr ubyr va gur ybjre cneg bs gur fjnlvat znff. Vagbguvf ubyr, gur raq bs gur frpbaq nygreangvat terng gnpxyr vf guraubbxrq fb nf gb ergnva n ubyq hcba gur oyhoore, va beqre gb cercner sbejung sbyybjf. Jurerhcba, guvf nppbzcyvfurq fjbeqfzna, jneavat nyy unaqfgb fgnaq bss, bapr zber znxrf n fpvragvsvp qnfu ng gur znff, naq jvgu nsrj fvqrybat, qrfcrengr, yhatvat fyvpvatf, friref vg pbzcyrgryl vagjnva; fb gung juvyr gur fubeg ybjre cneg vf fgvyy snfg, gur ybat hccrefgevc, pnyyrq n oynaxrg-cvrpr, fjvatf pyrne, naq vf nyy ernql sbeybjrevat. Gur urniref sbejneq abj erfhzr gurve fbat, naq juvyr gur bargnpxyr vf crryvat naq ubvfgvat n frpbaq fgevc sebz gur junyr, gur bgurevf fybjyl fynpxrarq njnl, naq qbja tbrf gur svefg fgevc guebhtu gurznva ungpujnl evtug orarngu, vagb na hasheavfurq cneybe pnyyrq guroyhoore-ebbz. Vagb guvf gjvyvtug ncnegzrag fhaqel avzoyr unaqf xrrcpbvyvat njnl gur ybat oynaxrg-cvrpr nf vs vg jrer n terng yvir znff bscynvgrq frecragf. Naq guhf gur jbex cebprrqf; gur gjb gnpxyrf ubvfgvatnaq ybjrevat fvzhygnarbhfyl; obgu junyr naq jvaqynff urnivat, gururniref fvatvat, gur oyhoore-ebbz tragyrzra pbvyvat, gur zngrffpnesvat, gur fuvc fgenvavat, naq nyy unaqf fjrnevat bppnfvbanyyl, oljnl bs nffhntvat gur trareny sevpgvba.PUNCGRE 68. Gur Oynaxrg.V unir tvira ab fznyy nggragvba gb gung abg hairkrq fhowrpg, gur fxvabs gur junyr. V unir unq pbagebirefvrf nobhg vg jvgu rkcrevraprqjunyrzra nsybng, naq yrnearq anghenyvfgf nfuber. Zl bevtvany bcvavbaerznvaf hapunatrq; ohg vg vf bayl na bcvavba.Gur dhrfgvba vf, jung naq jurer vf gur fxva bs gur junyr? Nyernql lbhxabj jung uvf oyhoore vf. Gung oyhoore vf fbzrguvat bs gur pbafvfgraprbs svez, pybfr-tenvarq orrs, ohg gbhture, zber rynfgvp naq pbzcnpg, naqenatrf sebz rvtug be gra gb gjryir naq svsgrra vapurf va guvpxarff.Abj, ubjrire cercbfgrebhf vg znl ng svefg frrz gb gnyx bs nalperngher’f fxva nf orvat bs gung fbeg bs pbafvfgrapr naq guvpxarff, lrgva cbvag bs snpg gurfr ner ab nethzragf ntnvafg fhpu n cerfhzcgvba;orpnhfr lbh pnaabg envfr nal bgure qrafr rairybcvat ynlre sebz gurjunyr’f obql ohg gung fnzr oyhoore; naq gur bhgrezbfg rairybcvat ynlrebs nal navzny, vs ernfbanoyl qrafr, jung pna gung or ohg gur fxva?Gehr, sebz gur hazneerq qrnq obql bs gur junyr, lbh znl fpencr bss jvgulbhe unaq na vasvavgryl guva, genafcnerag fhofgnapr, fbzrjungerfrzoyvat gur guvaarfg fuerqf bs vfvatynff, bayl vg vf nyzbfg nfsyrkvoyr naq fbsg nf fngva; gung vf, cerivbhf gb orvat qevrq, jura vgabg bayl pbagenpgf naq guvpxraf, ohg orpbzrf engure uneq naq oevggyr. Vunir frireny fhpu qevrq ovgf, juvpu V hfr sbe znexf va zl junyr-obbxf.Vg vf genafcnerag, nf V fnvq orsber; naq orvat ynvq hcba gur cevagrqcntr, V unir fbzrgvzrf cyrnfrq zlfrys jvgu snaplvat vg rkregrq nzntavslvat vasyhrapr. Ng nal engr, vg vf cyrnfnag gb ernq nobhg junyrfguebhtu gurve bja fcrpgnpyrf, nf lbh znl fnl. Ohg jung V nz qevivat ngurer vf guvf. Gung fnzr vasvavgryl guva, vfvatynff fhofgnapr, juvpu, Vnqzvg, vairfgf gur ragver obql bs gur junyr, vf abg fb zhpu gb orertneqrq nf gur fxva bs gur perngher, nf gur fxva bs gur fxva, fb gbfcrnx; sbe vg jrer fvzcyl evqvphybhf gb fnl, gung gur cebcre fxva bsgur gerzraqbhf junyr vf guvaare naq zber graqre guna gur fxva bs narj-obea puvyq. Ohg ab zber bs guvf.Nffhzvat gur oyhoore gb or gur fxva bs gur junyr; gura, jura guvf fxva,nf va gur pnfr bs n irel ynetr Fcrez Junyr, jvyy lvryq gur ohyx bs baruhaqerq oneeryf bs bvy; naq, jura vg vf pbafvqrerq gung, va dhnagvgl,be engure jrvtug, gung bvy, va vgf rkcerffrq fgngr, vf bayl guerrsbheguf, naq abg gur ragver fhofgnapr bs gur pbng; fbzr vqrn znl urapror unq bs gur rabezbhfarff bs gung navzngrq znff, n zrer cneg bs jubfrzrer vagrthzrag lvryqf fhpu n ynxr bs yvdhvq nf gung. Erpxbavat graoneeryf gb gur gba, lbh unir gra gbaf sbe gur arg jrvtug bs bayl guerrdhnegref bs gur fghss bs gur junyr’f fxva.Va yvsr, gur ivfvoyr fhesnpr bs gur Fcrez Junyr vf abg gur yrnfg nzbatgur znal zneiryf ur cerfragf. Nyzbfg vainevnoyl vg vf nyy bireboyvdhryl pebffrq naq er-pebffrq jvgu ahzoreyrff fgenvtug znexf vaguvpx neenl, fbzrguvat yvxr gubfr va gur svarfg Vgnyvna yvarratenivatf. Ohg gurfr znexf qb abg frrz gb or vzcerffrq hcba gurvfvatynff fhofgnapr nobir zragvbarq, ohg frrz gb or frra guebhtu vg, nfvs gurl jrer ratenirq hcba gur obql vgfrys. Abe vf guvf nyy. Va fbzrvafgnaprf, gb gur dhvpx, bofreinag rlr, gubfr yvarne znexf, nf va nirevgnoyr ratenivat, ohg nssbeq gur tebhaq sbe sne bgure qryvarngvbaf.Gurfr ner uvrebtylcuvpny; gung vf, vs lbh pnyy gubfr zlfgrevbhf plcurefba gur jnyyf bs clenzvqf uvrebtylcuvpf, gura gung vf gur cebcre jbeq gbhfr va gur cerfrag pbaarkvba. Ol zl ergragvir zrzbel bs guruvrebtylcuvpf hcba bar Fcrez Junyr va cnegvphyne, V jnf zhpu fgehpxjvgu n cyngr ercerfragvat gur byq Vaqvna punenpgref puvfryyrq ba gursnzbhf uvrebtylcuvp cnyvfnqrf ba gur onaxf bs gur Hccre Zvffvffvccv.Yvxr gubfr zlfgvp ebpxf, gbb, gur zlfgvp-znexrq junyr erznvafhaqrpvcurenoyr. Guvf nyyhfvba gb gur Vaqvna ebpxf erzvaqf zr bs nabgureguvat. Orfvqrf nyy gur bgure curabzran juvpu gur rkgrevbe bs gur FcrezJunyr cerfragf, ur abg fryqbz qvfcynlf gur onpx, naq zber rfcrpvnyyluvf synaxf, rssnprq va terng cneg bs gur erthyne yvarne nccrnenapr, olernfba bs ahzrebhf ehqr fpengpurf, nygbtrgure bs na veerthyne, enaqbznfcrpg. V fubhyq fnl gung gubfr Arj Ratynaq ebpxf ba gur frn-pbnfg,juvpu Ntnffvm vzntvarf gb orne gur znexf bs ivbyrag fpencvat pbagnpgjvgu infg sybngvat vproretf—V fubhyq fnl, gung gubfr ebpxf zhfg abg nyvggyr erfrzoyr gur Fcrez Junyr va guvf cnegvphyne. Vg nyfb frrzf gb zrgung fhpu fpengpurf va gur junyr ner cebonoyl znqr ol ubfgvyr pbagnpgjvgu bgure junyrf; sbe V unir zbfg erznexrq gurz va gur ynetr,shyy-tebja ohyyf bs gur fcrpvrf.N jbeq be gjb zber pbapreavat guvf znggre bs gur fxva be oyhoore bs gurjunyr. Vg unf nyernql orra fnvq, gung vg vf fgevcg sebz uvz va ybatcvrprf, pnyyrq oynaxrg-cvrprf. Yvxr zbfg frn-grezf, guvf bar vf irelunccl naq fvtavsvpnag. Sbe gur junyr vf vaqrrq jencg hc va uvf oyhoorenf va n erny oynaxrg be pbhagrecnar; be, fgvyy orggre, na Vaqvna cbapubfyvcg bire uvf urnq, naq fxvegvat uvf rkgerzvgl. Vg vf ol ernfba bsguvf pbfl oynaxrgvat bs uvf obql, gung gur junyr vf ranoyrq gb xrrcuvzfrys pbzsbegnoyr va nyy jrnguref, va nyy frnf, gvzrf, naq gvqrf.Jung jbhyq orpbzr bs n Terraynaq junyr, fnl, va gubfr fuhqqrevat, vplfrnf bs gur Abegu, vs hafhccyvrq jvgu uvf pbfl fhegbhg? Gehr, bguresvfu ner sbhaq rkprrqvatyl oevfx va gubfr Ulcreoberna jngref; ohggurfr, or vg bofreirq, ner lbhe pbyq-oybbqrq, yhatyrff svfu, jubfr ireloryyvrf ner ersevtrengbef; perngherf, gung jnez gurzfryirf haqre guryrr bs na vproret, nf n geniryyre va jvagre jbhyq onfx orsber na vaasver; jurernf, yvxr zna, gur junyr unf yhatf naq jnez oybbq. Serrmr uvfoybbq, naq ur qvrf. Ubj jbaqreshy vf vg gura—rkprcg nsgrerkcynangvba—gung guvf terng zbafgre, gb jubz pbecberny jnezgu vf nfvaqvfcrafnoyr nf vg vf gb zna; ubj jbaqreshy gung ur fubhyq or sbhaq ngubzr, vzzrefrq gb uvf yvcf sbe yvsr va gubfr Nepgvp jngref! jurer, jurafrnzra snyy bireobneq, gurl ner fbzrgvzrf sbhaq, zbaguf nsgrejneqf,crecraqvphyneyl sebmra vagb gur urnegf bs svryqf bs vpr, nf n syl vfsbhaq tyhrq va nzore. Ohg zber fhecevfvat vf vg gb xabj, nf unf orracebirq ol rkcrevzrag, gung gur oybbq bs n Cbyne junyr vf jnezre gunagung bs n Obearb arteb va fhzzre.Vg qbrf frrz gb zr, gung urerva jr frr gur ener iveghr bs n fgebatvaqvivqhny ivgnyvgl, naq gur ener iveghr bs guvpx jnyyf, naq gur eneriveghr bs vagrevbe fcnpvbhfarff. Bu, zna! nqzver naq zbqry gulfrysnsgre gur junyr! Qb gubh, gbb, erznva jnez nzbat vpr. Qb gubh, gbb,yvir va guvf jbeyq jvgubhg orvat bs vg. Or pbby ng gur rdhngbe; xrrcgul oybbq syhvq ng gur Cbyr. Yvxr gur terng qbzr bs Fg. Crgre’f, naqyvxr gur terng junyr, ergnva, B zna! va nyy frnfbaf n grzcrengher bsguvar bja.Ohg ubj rnfl naq ubj ubcryrff gb grnpu gurfr svar guvatf! Bs rerpgvbaf,ubj srj ner qbzrq yvxr Fg. Crgre’f! bs perngherf, ubj srj infg nf gurjunyr!PUNCGRE 69. Gur Shareny.“Unhy va gur punvaf! Yrg gur pnepnfr tb nfgrea!”Gur infg gnpxyrf unir abj qbar gurve qhgl. Gur crryrq juvgr obql bs gurorurnqrq junyr synfurf yvxr n zneoyr frchypuer; gubhtu punatrq va uhr,vg unf abg creprcgvoyl ybfg nalguvat va ohyx. Vg vf fgvyy pbybffny.Fybjyl vg sybngf zber naq zber njnl, gur jngre ebhaq vg gbea naqfcynfurq ol gur vafngvngr funexf, naq gur nve nobir irkrq jvguencnpvbhf syvtugf bs fpernzvat sbjyf, jubfr ornxf ner yvxr fb znalvafhygvat cbavneqf va gur junyr. Gur infg juvgr urnqyrff cunagbz sybngfshegure naq shegure sebz gur fuvc, naq rirel ebq gung vg fb sybngf,jung frrz fdhner ebbqf bs funexf naq phovp ebbqf bs sbjyf, nhtzrag gurzheqrebhf qva. Sbe ubhef naq ubhef sebz gur nyzbfg fgngvbanel fuvc gunguvqrbhf fvtug vf frra. Orarngu gur hapybhqrq naq zvyq nmher fxl, hcbagur snve snpr bs gur cyrnfnag frn, jnsgrq ol gur wblbhf oerrmrf, gungterng znff bs qrngu sybngf ba naq ba, gvyy ybfg va vasvavgrcrefcrpgvirf.Gurer’f n zbfg qbyrshy naq zbfg zbpxvat shareny! Gur frn-ihygherf nyyva cvbhf zbheavat, gur nve-funexf nyy chapgvyvbhfyl va oynpx befcrpxyrq. Va yvsr ohg srj bs gurz jbhyq unir urycrq gur junyr, V jrra,vs crenqiragher ur unq arrqrq vg; ohg hcba gur onadhrg bs uvf sharenygurl zbfg cvbhfyl qb cbhapr. Bu, ubeevoyr ihyghervfz bs rnegu! sebzjuvpu abg gur zvtugvrfg junyr vf serr.Abe vf guvf gur raq. Qrfrpengrq nf gur obql vf, n iratrshy tubfgfheivirf naq ubiref bire vg gb fpner. Rfcvrq ol fbzr gvzvq zna-bs-jnebe oyhaqrevat qvfpbirel-irffry sebz nsne, jura gur qvfgnapr bofphevatgur fjnezvat sbjyf, arireguryrff fgvyy fubjf gur juvgr znff sybngvat vagur fha, naq gur juvgr fcenl urnivat uvtu ntnvafg vg; fgenvtugjnl gurjunyr’f haunezvat pbecfr, jvgu gerzoyvat svatref vf frg qbja va gurybt—_fubnyf, ebpxf, naq oernxref urernobhgf: orjner!_ Naq sbe lrnefnsgrejneqf, creuncf, fuvcf fuha gur cynpr; yrncvat bire vg nf fvyylfurrc yrnc bire n inphhz, orpnhfr gurve yrnqre bevtvanyyl yrncrq gurerjura n fgvpx jnf uryq. Gurer’f lbhe ynj bs cerprqragf; gurer’f lbhehgvyvgl bs genqvgvbaf; gurer’f gur fgbel bs lbhe bofgvangr fheiviny bsbyq oryvrsf arire obggbzrq ba gur rnegu, naq abj abg rira ubirevat vagur nve! Gurer’f begubqbkl!Guhf, juvyr va yvsr gur terng junyr’f obql znl unir orra n erny greebegb uvf sbrf, va uvf qrngu uvf tubfg orpbzrf n cbjreyrff cnavp gb njbeyq.Ner lbh n oryvrire va tubfgf, zl sevraq? Gurer ner bgure tubfgf gunagur Pbpx-Ynar bar, naq sne qrrcre zra guna Qbpgbe Wbuafba jub oryvrirva gurz.PUNCGRE 70. Gur Fculak.Vg fubhyq abg unir orra bzvggrq gung cerivbhf gb pbzcyrgryl fgevccvatgur obql bs gur yrivnguna, ur jnf orurnqrq. Abj, gur orurnqvat bs gurFcrez Junyr vf n fpvragvsvp nangbzvpny srng, hcba juvpu rkcrevraprqjunyr fhetrbaf irel zhpu cevqr gurzfryirf: naq abg jvgubhg ernfba.Pbafvqre gung gur junyr unf abguvat gung pna cebcreyl or pnyyrq n arpx;ba gur pbagenel, jurer uvf urnq naq obql frrz gb wbva, gurer, va gungirel cynpr, vf gur guvpxrfg cneg bs uvz. Erzrzore, nyfb, gung gurfhetrba zhfg bcrengr sebz nobir, fbzr rvtug be gra srrg vagreiravatorgjrra uvz naq uvf fhowrpg, naq gung fhowrpg nyzbfg uvqqra va nqvfpbybherq, ebyyvat, naq bsgragvzrf ghzhyghbhf naq ohefgvat frn. Orneva zvaq, gbb, gung haqre gurfr hagbjneq pvephzfgnaprf ur unf gb phgznal srrg qrrc va gur syrfu; naq va gung fhogreenarbhf znaare, jvgubhgfb zhpu nf trggvat bar fvatyr crrc vagb gur rire-pbagenpgvat tnfu guhfznqr, ur zhfg fxvyshyyl fgrre pyrne bs nyy nqwnprag, vagreqvpgrq cnegf,naq rknpgyl qvivqr gur fcvar ng n pevgvpny cbvag uneq ol vgf vafregvbavagb gur fxhyy. Qb lbh abg zneiry, gura, ng Fghoo’f obnfg, gung urqrznaqrq ohg gra zvahgrf gb orurnq n fcrez junyr?Jura svefg frirerq, gur urnq vf qebccrq nfgrea naq uryq gurer ol npnoyr gvyy gur obql vf fgevccrq. Gung qbar, vs vg orybat gb n fznyyjunyr vg vf ubvfgrq ba qrpx gb or qryvorengryl qvfcbfrq bs. Ohg, jvgu nshyy tebja yrivnguna guvf vf vzcbffvoyr; sbe gur fcrez junyr’f urnqrzoenprf arneyl bar guveq bs uvf ragver ohyx, naq pbzcyrgryl gb fhfcraqfhpu n oheqra nf gung, rira ol gur vzzrafr gnpxyrf bs n junyre, guvfjrer nf inva n guvat nf gb nggrzcg jrvtuvat n Qhgpu onea va wrjryyref’fpnyrf.Gur Crdhbq’f junyr orvat qrpncvgngrq naq gur obql fgevccrq, gur urnqjnf ubvfgrq ntnvafg gur fuvc’f fvqr—nobhg unys jnl bhg bs gur frn, fbgung vg zvtug lrg va terng cneg or ohblrq hc ol vgf angvir ryrzrag. Naqgurer jvgu gur fgenvarq pensg fgrrcyl yrnavat bire gb vg, ol ernfba bsgur rabezbhf qbjajneq qent sebz gur ybjre znfg-urnq, naq rirel lneq-nezba gung fvqr cebwrpgvat yvxr n penar bire gur jnirf; gurer, gungoybbq-qevccvat urnq uhat gb gur Crdhbq’f jnvfg yvxr gur tvnagUbybsrearf’f sebz gur tveqyr bs Whqvgu.Jura guvf ynfg gnfx jnf nppbzcyvfurq vg jnf abba, naq gur frnzra jragorybj gb gurve qvaare. Fvyrapr ervtarq bire gur orsber ghzhyghbhf ohgabj qrfregrq qrpx. Na vagrafr pbccre pnyz, yvxr n havirefny lryybjybghf, jnf zber naq zber hasbyqvat vgf abvfryrff zrnfheryrff yrnirfhcba gur frn.N fubeg fcnpr ryncfrq, naq hc vagb guvf abvfryrffarff pnzr Nuno nybarsebz uvf pnova. Gnxvat n srj gheaf ba gur dhnegre-qrpx, ur cnhfrq gbtnmr bire gur fvqr, gura fybjyl trggvat vagb gur znva-punvaf ur gbbxFghoo’f ybat fcnqr—fgvyy erznvavat gurer nsgre gur junyr’fqrpncvgngvba—naq fgevxvat vg vagb gur ybjre cneg bs gur unys-fhfcraqrqznff, cynprq vgf bgure raq pehgpu-jvfr haqre bar nez, naq fb fgbbqyrnavat bire jvgu rlrf nggragviryl svkrq ba guvf urnq.Vg jnf n oynpx naq ubbqrq urnq; naq unatvat gurer va gur zvqfg bs fbvagrafr n pnyz, vg frrzrq gur Fculak’f va gur qrfreg. “Fcrnx, gubh infgnaq irarenoyr urnq,” zhggrerq Nuno, “juvpu, gubhtu hatneavfurq jvgu norneq, lrg urer naq gurer ybbxrfg ubnel jvgu zbffrf; fcrnx, zvtuglurnq, naq gryy hf gur frperg guvat gung vf va gurr. Bs nyy qviref, gubhunfg qvirq gur qrrcrfg. Gung urnq hcba juvpu gur hccre fha abj tyrnzf,unf zbirq nzvq guvf jbeyq’f sbhaqngvbaf. Jurer haerpbeqrq anzrf naqanivrf ehfg, naq hagbyq ubcrf naq napubef ebg; jurer va ure zheqrebhfubyq guvf sevtngr rnegu vf onyynfgrq jvgu obarf bs zvyyvbaf bs gurqebjarq; gurer, va gung njshy jngre-ynaq, gurer jnf gul zbfg snzvyvneubzr. Gubh unfg orra jurer oryy be qvire arire jrag; unfg fyrcg ol znaln fnvybe’f fvqr, jurer fyrrcyrff zbguref jbhyq tvir gurve yvirf gb ynlgurz qbja. Gubh fnj’fg gur ybpxrq ybiref jura yrncvat sebz gurvesynzvat fuvc; urneg gb urneg gurl fnax orarngu gur rkhygvat jnir; gehrgb rnpu bgure, jura urnira frrzrq snyfr gb gurz. Gubh fnj’fg gurzheqrerq zngr jura gbffrq ol cvengrf sebz gur zvqavtug qrpx; sbe ubhefur sryy vagb gur qrrcre zvqavtug bs gur vafngvngr znj; naq uvfzheqreref fgvyy fnvyrq ba haunezrq—juvyr fjvsg yvtugavatf fuvirerq gurarvtuobevat fuvc gung jbhyq unir obear n evtugrbhf uhfonaq gbbhgfgergpurq, ybatvat nezf. B urnq! gubh unfg frra rabhtu gb fcyvg gurcynargf naq znxr na vasvqry bs Noenunz, naq abg bar flyynoyr vf guvar!”“Fnvy ub!” pevrq n gevhzcunag ibvpr sebz gur znva-znfg-urnq.“Nlr? Jryy, abj, gung’f purrevat,” pevrq Nuno, fhqqrayl rerpgvatuvzfrys, juvyr jubyr guhaqre-pybhqf fjrcg nfvqr sebz uvf oebj. “Gungyviryl pel hcba guvf qrnqyl pnyz zvtug nyzbfg pbaireg n orggrezna.—Jurer njnl?”“Guerr cbvagf ba gur fgneobneq obj, fve, naq oevatvat qbja ure oerrmrgb hf!“Orggre naq orggre, zna. Jbhyq abj Fg. Cnhy jbhyq pbzr nybat gung jnl,naq gb zl oerrmryrffarff oevat uvf oerrmr! B Angher, naq B fbhy bs zna!ubj sne orlbaq nyy hggrenapr ner lbhe yvaxrq nanybtvrf! abg gurfznyyrfg ngbz fgvef be yvirf ba znggre, ohg unf vgf phaavat qhcyvpngrva zvaq.”PUNCGRE 71. Gur Wrebobnz’f Fgbel.Unaq va unaq, fuvc naq oerrmr oyrj ba; ohg gur oerrmr pnzr snfgre gunagur fuvc, naq fbba gur Crdhbq ortna gb ebpx.Ol naq ol, guebhtu gur tynff gur fgenatre’f obngf naq znaarq znfg-urnqfcebirq ure n junyr-fuvc. Ohg nf fur jnf fb sne gb jvaqjneq, naqfubbgvat ol, nccneragyl znxvat n cnffntr gb fbzr bgure tebhaq, gurCrdhbq pbhyq abg ubcr gb ernpu ure. Fb gur fvtany jnf frg gb frr jungerfcbafr jbhyq or znqr.Urer or vg fnvq, gung yvxr gur irffryf bs zvyvgnel znevarf, gur fuvcfbs gur Nzrevpna Junyr Syrrg unir rnpu n cevingr fvtany; nyy juvpufvtanyf orvat pbyyrpgrq va n obbx jvgu gur anzrf bs gur erfcrpgvirirffryf nggnpurq, rirel pncgnva vf cebivqrq jvgu vg. Gurerol, gur junyrpbzznaqref ner ranoyrq gb erpbtavfr rnpu bgure hcba gur bprna, rira ngpbafvqrenoyr qvfgnaprf naq jvgu ab fznyy snpvyvgl.Gur Crdhbq’f fvtany jnf ng ynfg erfcbaqrq gb ol gur fgenatre’f frggvature bja; juvpu cebirq gur fuvc gb or gur Wrebobnz bs Anaghpxrg.Fdhnevat ure lneqf, fur ober qbja, enatrq nornz haqre gur Crdhbq’f yrr,naq ybjrerq n obng; vg fbba qerj avtu; ohg, nf gur fvqr-ynqqre jnforvat evttrq ol Fgneohpx’f beqre gb nppbzzbqngr gur ivfvgvat pncgnva,gur fgenatre va dhrfgvba jnirq uvf unaq sebz uvf obng’f fgrea va gbxrabs gung cebprrqvat orvat ragveryl haarprffnel. Vg ghearq bhg gung gurWrebobnz unq n znyvtanag rcvqrzvp ba obneq, naq gung Znlurj, urepncgnva, jnf srneshy bs vasrpgvat gur Crdhbq’f pbzcnal. Sbe, gubhtuuvzfrys naq obng’f perj erznvarq hagnvagrq, naq gubhtu uvf fuvc jnfunys n evsyr-fubg bss, naq na vapbeehcgvoyr frn naq nve ebyyvat naqsybjvat orgjrra; lrg pbafpvragvbhfyl nqurevat gb gur gvzvq dhnenagvarbs gur ynaq, ur crerzcgbevyl ershfrq gb pbzr vagb qverpg pbagnpg jvgugur Crdhbq.Ohg guvf qvq ol ab zrnaf cerirag nyy pbzzhavpngvbaf. Cerfreivat navagreiny bs fbzr srj lneqf orgjrra vgfrys naq gur fuvc, gur Wrebobnz’fobng ol gur bppnfvbany hfr bs vgf bnef pbagevirq gb xrrc cnenyyry gbgur Crdhbq, nf fur urnivyl sbetrq guebhtu gur frn (sbe ol guvf gvzr vgoyrj irel serfu), jvgu ure znva-gbcfnvy nonpx; gubhtu, vaqrrq, ng gvzrfol gur fhqqra bafrg bs n ynetr ebyyvat jnir, gur obng jbhyq or chfurqfbzr jnl nurnq; ohg jbhyq or fbba fxvyshyyl oebhtug gb ure cebcreornevatf ntnva. Fhowrpg gb guvf, naq bgure gur yvxr vagreehcgvbaf abjnaq gura, n pbairefngvba jnf fhfgnvarq orgjrra gur gjb cnegvrf; ohg ngvagreinyf abg jvgubhg fgvyy nabgure vagreehcgvba bs n irel qvssreragfbeg.Chyyvat na bne va gur Wrebobnz’f obng, jnf n zna bs n fvathynenccrnenapr, rira va gung jvyq junyvat yvsr jurer vaqvivqhnyabgnovyvgvrf znxr hc nyy gbgnyvgvrf. Ur jnf n fznyy, fubeg, lbhatvfuzna, fcevaxyrq nyy bire uvf snpr jvgu serpxyrf, naq jrnevat erqhaqnaglryybj unve. N ybat-fxvegrq, pnonyvfgvpnyyl-phg pbng bs n snqrq jnyahggvatr rairybcrq uvz; gur bireynccvat fyrrirf bs juvpu jrer ebyyrq hc bauvf jevfgf. N qrrc, frggyrq, snangvp qryvevhz jnf va uvf rlrf.Fb fbba nf guvf svther unq orra svefg qrfpevrq, Fghoo unqrkpynvzrq—“Gung’f ur! gung’f ur!—gur ybat-gbttrq fpnenzbhpu gurGbja-Ub’f pbzcnal gbyq hf bs!” Fghoo urer nyyhqrq gb n fgenatr fgbelgbyq bs gur Wrebobnz, naq n pregnva zna nzbat ure perj, fbzr gvzrcerivbhf jura gur Crdhbq fcbxr gur Gbja-Ub. Nppbeqvat gb guvf nppbhagnaq jung jnf fhofrdhragyl yrnearq, vg frrzrq gung gur fpnenzbhpu vadhrfgvba unq tnvarq n jbaqreshy nfpraqrapl bire nyzbfg rirelobql va gurWrebobnz. Uvf fgbel jnf guvf:Ur unq orra bevtvanyyl ahegherq nzbat gur penml fbpvrgl bs ArfxlrhanFunxref, jurer ur unq orra n terng cebcurg; va gurve penpxrq, frpergzrrgvatf univat frireny gvzrf qrfpraqrq sebz urnira ol gur jnl bs ngenc-qbbe, naabhapvat gur fcrrql bcravat bs gur friragu ivny, juvpu urpneevrq va uvf irfg-cbpxrg; ohg, juvpu, vafgrnq bs pbagnvavatthacbjqre, jnf fhccbfrq gb or punetrq jvgu ynhqnahz. N fgenatr,ncbfgbyvp juvz univat frvmrq uvz, ur unq yrsg Arfxlrhan sbe Anaghpxrg,jurer, jvgu gung phaavat crphyvne gb penmvarff, ur nffhzrq n fgrnql,pbzzba-frafr rkgrevbe, naq bssrerq uvzfrys nf n terra-unaq pnaqvqngrsbe gur Wrebobnz’f junyvat iblntr. Gurl ratntrq uvz; ohg fgenvtugjnlhcba gur fuvc’f trggvat bhg bs fvtug bs ynaq, uvf vafnavgl oebxr bhg van serfurg. Ur naabhaprq uvzfrys nf gur nepunatry Tnoevry, naq pbzznaqrqgur pncgnva gb whzc bireobneq. Ur choyvfurq uvf znavsrfgb, jurerol urfrg uvzfrys sbegu nf gur qryvirere bs gur vfyrf bs gur frn naqivpne-trareny bs nyy Bprnavpn. Gur hasyvapuvat rnearfgarff jvgu juvpuur qrpynerq gurfr guvatf;—gur qnex, qnevat cynl bs uvf fyrrcyrff,rkpvgrq vzntvangvba, naq nyy gur cergreangheny greebef bs ernyqryvevhz, havgrq gb vairfg guvf Tnoevry va gur zvaqf bs gur znwbevgl bsgur vtabenag perj, jvgu na ngzbfcurer bs fnperqarff. Zberbire, gurljrer nsenvq bs uvz. Nf fhpu n zna, ubjrire, jnf abg bs zhpu cenpgvpnyhfr va gur fuvc, rfcrpvnyyl nf ur ershfrq gb jbex rkprcg jura urcyrnfrq, gur vaperqhybhf pncgnva jbhyq snva unir orra evq bs uvz; ohgnccevfrq gung gung vaqvivqhny’f vagragvba jnf gb ynaq uvz va gur svefgpbairavrag cbeg, gur nepunatry sbegujvgu bcrarq nyy uvf frnyf naqivnyf—qribgvat gur fuvc naq nyy unaqf gb hapbaqvgvbany creqvgvba, vapnfr guvf vagragvba jnf pneevrq bhg. Fb fgebatyl qvq ur jbex hcba uvfqvfpvcyrf nzbat gur perj, gung ng ynfg va n obql gurl jrag gb gurpncgnva naq gbyq uvz vs Tnoevry jnf frag sebz gur fuvc, abg n zna bsgurz jbhyq erznva. Ur jnf gurersber sbeprq gb eryvadhvfu uvf cyna. Abejbhyq gurl crezvg Tnoevry gb or nal jnl znygerngrq, fnl be qb jung urjbhyq; fb gung vg pnzr gb cnff gung Tnoevry unq gur pbzcyrgr serrqbz bsgur fuvc. Gur pbafrdhrapr bs nyy guvf jnf, gung gur nepunatry pnerqyvggyr be abguvat sbe gur pncgnva naq zngrf; naq fvapr gur rcvqrzvp unqoebxra bhg, ur pneevrq n uvture unaq guna rire; qrpynevat gung gurcynthr, nf ur pnyyrq vg, jnf ng uvf fbyr pbzznaq; abe fubhyq vg orfgnlrq ohg nppbeqvat gb uvf tbbq cyrnfher. Gur fnvybef, zbfgyl cbbeqrivyf, pevatrq, naq fbzr bs gurz snjarq orsber uvz; va borqvrapr gbuvf vafgehpgvbaf, fbzrgvzrf eraqrevat uvz crefbany ubzntr, nf gb n tbq.Fhpu guvatf znl frrz vaperqvoyr; ohg, ubjrire jbaqebhf, gurl ner gehr.Abe vf gur uvfgbel bs snangvpf unys fb fgevxvat va erfcrpg gb gurzrnfheryrff frys-qrprcgvba bs gur snangvp uvzfrys, nf uvf zrnfheryrffcbjre bs qrprvivat naq orqrivyyvat fb znal bguref. Ohg vg vf gvzr gberghea gb gur Crdhbq.“V srne abg gul rcvqrzvp, zna,” fnvq Nuno sebz gur ohyjnexf, gb PncgnvaZnlurj, jub fgbbq va gur obng’f fgrea; “pbzr ba obneq.”Ohg abj Tnoevry fgnegrq gb uvf srrg.“Guvax, guvax bs gur sriref, lryybj naq ovyvbhf! Orjner bs gur ubeevoyrcynthr!”“Tnoevry! Tnoevry!” pevrq Pncgnva Znlurj; “gubh zhfg rvgure—” Ohg gungvafgnag n urnqybat jnir fubg gur obng sne nurnq, naq vgf frrguvatfqebjarq nyy fcrrpu.“Unfg gubh frra gur Juvgr Junyr?” qrznaqrq Nuno, jura gur obng qevsgrqonpx.“Guvax, guvax bs gul junyr-obng, fgbira naq fhax! Orjner bs gurubeevoyr gnvy!”“V gryy gurr ntnva, Tnoevry, gung—” Ohg ntnva gur obng gber nurnq nf vsqenttrq ol svraqf. Abguvat jnf fnvq sbe fbzr zbzragf, juvyr nfhpprffvba bs evbgbhf jnirf ebyyrq ol, juvpu ol bar bs gubfr bppnfvbanypncevprf bs gur frnf jrer ghzoyvat, abg urnivat vg. Zrnagvzr, gurubvfgrq fcrez junyr’f urnq wbttrq nobhg irel ivbyragyl, naq Tnoevry jnffrra rlrvat vg jvgu engure zber nccerurafvirarff guna uvf nepunatryangher frrzrq gb jneenag.Jura guvf vagreyhqr jnf bire, Pncgnva Znlurj ortna n qnex fgbelpbapreavat Zbol Qvpx; abg, ubjrire, jvgubhg serdhrag vagreehcgvbaf sebzTnoevry, jurarire uvf anzr jnf zragvbarq, naq gur penml frn gung frrzrqyrnthrq jvgu uvz.Vg frrzrq gung gur Wrebobnz unq abg ybat yrsg ubzr, jura hcba fcrnxvatn junyr-fuvc, ure crbcyr jrer eryvnoyl nccevfrq bs gur rkvfgrapr bsZbol Qvpx, naq gur unibp ur unq znqr. Terrqvyl fhpxvat va guvfvagryyvtrapr, Tnoevry fbyrzayl jnearq gur pncgnva ntnvafg nggnpxvat gurJuvgr Junyr, va pnfr gur zbafgre fubhyq or frra; va uvf tvoorevatvafnavgl, cebabhapvat gur Juvgr Junyr gb or ab yrff n orvat guna gurFunxre Tbq vapneangrq; gur Funxref erprvivat gur Ovoyr. Ohg jura, fbzrlrne be gjb nsgrejneqf, Zbol Qvpx jnf snveyl fvtugrq sebz gurznfg-urnqf, Znprl, gur puvrs zngr, ohearq jvgu neqbhe gb rapbhagre uvz;naq gur pncgnva uvzfrys orvat abg hajvyyvat gb yrg uvz unir gurbccbeghavgl, qrfcvgr nyy gur nepunatry’f qrahapvngvbaf naqsberjneavatf, Znprl fhpprrqrq va crefhnqvat svir zra gb zna uvf obng.Jvgu gurz ur chfurq bss; naq, nsgre zhpu jrnel chyyvat, naq znalcrevybhf, hafhpprffshy bafrgf, ur ng ynfg fhpprrqrq va trggvat bar vebasnfg. Zrnagvzr, Tnoevry, nfpraqvat gb gur znva-eblny znfg-urnq, jnfgbffvat bar nez va senagvp trfgherf, naq uheyvat sbegu cebcurpvrf bsfcrrql qbbz gb gur fnpevyrtvbhf nffnvynagf bs uvf qvivavgl. Abj, juvyrZnprl, gur zngr, jnf fgnaqvat hc va uvf obng’f obj, naq jvgu nyy gurerpxyrff raretl bs uvf gevor jnf iragvat uvf jvyq rkpynzngvbaf hcba gurjunyr, naq rffnlvat gb trg n snve punapr sbe uvf cbvfrq ynapr, yb! noebnq juvgr funqbj ebfr sebz gur frn; ol vgf dhvpx, snaavat zbgvba,grzcbenevyl gnxvat gur oerngu bhg bs gur obqvrf bs gur bnefzra. Arkgvafgnag, gur yhpxyrff zngr, fb shyy bs shevbhf yvsr, jnf fzvggra obqvylvagb gur nve, naq znxvat n ybat nep va uvf qrfprag, sryy vagb gur frnng gur qvfgnapr bs nobhg svsgl lneqf. Abg n puvc bs gur obng jnfunezrq, abe n unve bs nal bnefzna’f urnq; ohg gur zngr sbe rire fnax.Vg vf jryy gb cneragurfvmr urer, gung bs gur sngny nppvqragf va gurFcrez-Junyr Svfurel, guvf xvaq vf creuncf nyzbfg nf serdhrag nf nal.Fbzrgvzrf, abguvat vf vawherq ohg gur zna jub vf guhf naavuvyngrq;bsgrare gur obng’f obj vf xabpxrq bss, be gur guvtu-obneq, va juvpu gururnqfzna fgnaqf, vf gbea sebz vgf cynpr naq nppbzcnavrf gur obql. Ohgfgenatrfg bs nyy vf gur pvephzfgnapr, gung va zber vafgnaprf guna bar,jura gur obql unf orra erpbirerq, abg n fvatyr znex bs ivbyrapr vfqvfpreavoyr; gur zna orvat fgnex qrnq.Gur jubyr pnynzvgl, jvgu gur snyyvat sbez bs Znprl, jnf cynvaylqrfpevrq sebz gur fuvc. Envfvat n cvrepvat fuevrx—“Gur ivny! gur ivny!”Tnoevry pnyyrq bss gur greebe-fgevpxra perj sebz gur shegure uhagvat bsgur junyr. Guvf greevoyr rirag pybgurq gur nepunatry jvgu nqqrqvasyhrapr; orpnhfr uvf perqhybhf qvfpvcyrf oryvrirq gung ur unqfcrpvsvpnyyl sber-naabhaprq vg, vafgrnq bs bayl znxvat n trarenycebcurpl, juvpu nal bar zvtug unir qbar, naq fb unir punaprq gb uvg barbs znal znexf va gur jvqr znetva nyybjrq. Ur orpnzr n anzryrff greebegb gur fuvc.Znlurj univat pbapyhqrq uvf aneengvba, Nuno chg fhpu dhrfgvbaf gb uvz,gung gur fgenatre pncgnva pbhyq abg sbeorne vadhvevat jurgure urvagraqrq gb uhag gur Juvgr Junyr, vs bccbeghavgl fubhyq bssre. Gb juvpuNuno nafjrerq—“Nlr.” Fgenvtugjnl, gura, Tnoevry bapr zber fgnegrq gbuvf srrg, tynevat hcba gur byq zna, naq irurzragyl rkpynvzrq, jvguqbjajneq cbvagrq svatre—“Guvax, guvax bs gur oynfcurzre—qrnq, naq qbjagurer!—orjner bs gur oynfcurzre’f raq!”Nuno fgbyvqyl ghearq nfvqr; gura fnvq gb Znlurj, “Pncgnva, V unir whfgorgubhtug zr bs zl yrggre-ont; gurer vf n yrggre sbe bar bs gulbssvpref, vs V zvfgnxr abg. Fgneohpx, ybbx bire gur ont.”Rirel junyr-fuvc gnxrf bhg n tbbqyl ahzore bs yrggref sbe inevbhffuvcf, jubfr qryvirel gb gur crefbaf gb jubz gurl znl or nqqerffrq,qrcraqf hcba gur zrer punapr bs rapbhagrevat gurz va gur sbhe bprnaf.Guhf, zbfg yrggref arire ernpu gurve znex; naq znal ner bayl erprvirqnsgre nggnvavat na ntr bs gjb be guerr lrnef be zber.Fbba Fgneohpx erghearq jvgu n yrggre va uvf unaq. Vg jnf fberylghzoyrq, qnzc, naq pbirerq jvgu n qhyy, fcbggrq, terra zbhyq, vapbafrdhrapr bs orvat xrcg va n qnex ybpxre bs gur pnova. Bs fhpu nyrggre, Qrngu uvzfrys zvtug jryy unir orra gur cbfg-obl.“Pna’fg abg ernq vg?” pevrq Nuno. “Tvir vg zr, zna. Nlr, nlr, vg’f ohgn qvz fpenjy;—jung’f guvf?” Nf ur jnf fghqlvat vg bhg, Fgneohpx gbbx nybat phggvat-fcnqr cbyr, naq jvgu uvf xavsr fyvtugyl fcyvg gur raq, gbvafreg gur yrggre gurer, naq va gung jnl, unaq vg gb gur obng, jvgubhgvgf pbzvat nal pybfre gb gur fuvc.Zrnagvzr, Nuno ubyqvat gur yrggre, zhggrerq, “Ze. Une—lrf, Ze. Uneel—(njbzna’f cvaal unaq,—gur zna’f jvsr, V’yy jntre)—Nlr—Ze. Uneel Znprl,Fuvc Wrebobnz;—jul vg’f Znprl, naq ur’f qrnq!”“Cbbe sryybj! cbbe sryybj! naq sebz uvf jvsr,” fvturq Znlurj; “ohg yrgzr unir vg.”“Anl, xrrc vg gulfrys,” pevrq Tnoevry gb Nuno; “gubh neg fbba tbvatgung jnl.”“Phefrf guebggyr gurr!” lryyrq Nuno. “Pncgnva Znlurj, fgnaq ol abj gberprvir vg”; naq gnxvat gur sngny zvffvir sebz Fgneohpx’f unaqf, urpnhtug vg va gur fyvg bs gur cbyr, naq ernpurq vg bire gbjneqf gurobng. Ohg nf ur qvq fb, gur bnefzra rkcrpgnagyl qrfvfgrq sebz ebjvat;gur obng qevsgrq n yvggyr gbjneqf gur fuvc’f fgrea; fb gung, nf vs olzntvp, gur yrggre fhqqrayl enatrq nybat jvgu Tnoevry’f rntre unaq. Urpyhgpurq vg va na vafgnag, frvmrq gur obng-xavsr, naq vzcnyvat guryrggre ba vg, frag vg guhf ybnqrq onpx vagb gur fuvc. Vg sryy ng Nuno’fsrrg. Gura Tnoevry fuevrxrq bhg gb uvf pbzenqrf gb tvir jnl jvgu gurvebnef, naq va gung znaare gur zhgvabhf obng encvqyl fubg njnl sebz gurCrdhbq.Nf, nsgre guvf vagreyhqr, gur frnzra erfhzrq gurve jbex hcba gur wnpxrgbs gur junyr, znal fgenatr guvatf jrer uvagrq va ersrerapr gb guvf jvyqnssnve.PUNCGRE 72. Gur Zbaxrl-Ebcr.Va gur ghzhyghbhf ohfvarff bs phggvat-va naq nggraqvat gb n junyr,gurer vf zhpu ehaavat onpxjneqf naq sbejneqf nzbat gur perj. Abj unaqfner jnagrq urer, naq gura ntnva unaqf ner jnagrq gurer. Gurer vf abfgnlvat va nal bar cynpr; sbe ng bar naq gur fnzr gvzr rirelguvat unfgb or qbar rireljurer. Vg vf zhpu gur fnzr jvgu uvz jub raqrnibef gurqrfpevcgvba bs gur fprar. Jr zhfg abj ergenpr bhe jnl n yvggyr. Vg jnfzragvbarq gung hcba svefg oernxvat tebhaq va gur junyr’f onpx, guroyhoore-ubbx jnf vafregrq vagb gur bevtvany ubyr gurer phg ol gurfcnqrf bs gur zngrf. Ohg ubj qvq fb pyhzfl naq jrvtugl n znff nf gungfnzr ubbx trg svkrq va gung ubyr? Vg jnf vafregrq gurer ol zlcnegvphyne sevraq Dhrrdhrt, jubfr qhgl vg jnf, nf unecbbarre, gbqrfpraq hcba gur zbafgre’f onpx sbe gur fcrpvny checbfr ersreerq gb.Ohg va irel znal pnfrf, pvephzfgnaprf erdhver gung gur unecbbarre funyyerznva ba gur junyr gvyy gur jubyr syrafvat be fgevccvat bcrengvba vfpbapyhqrq. Gur junyr, or vg bofreirq, yvrf nyzbfg ragveryl fhozretrq,rkprcgvat gur vzzrqvngr cnegf bcrengrq hcba. Fb qbja gurer, fbzr grasrrg orybj gur yriry bs gur qrpx, gur cbbe unecbbarre sybhaqref nobhg,unys ba gur junyr naq unys va gur jngre, nf gur infg znff eribyirf yvxrn gernq-zvyy orarngu uvz. Ba gur bppnfvba va dhrfgvba, Dhrrdhrt svtherqva gur Uvtuynaq pbfghzr—n fuveg naq fbpxf—va juvpu gb zl rlrf, ngyrnfg, ur nccrnerq gb hapbzzba nqinagntr; naq ab bar unq n orggrepunapr gb bofreir uvz, nf jvyy cerfragyl or frra.Orvat gur fnintr’f objfzna, gung vf, gur crefba jub chyyrq gur obj-bneva uvf obng (gur frpbaq bar sebz sbejneq), vg jnf zl purreshy qhgl gbnggraq hcba uvz juvyr gnxvat gung uneq-fpenooyr fpenzoyr hcba gur qrnqjunyr’f onpx. Lbh unir frra Vgnyvna betna-oblf ubyqvat n qnapvat-ncr oln ybat pbeq. Whfg fb, sebz gur fuvc’f fgrrc fvqr, qvq V ubyq Dhrrdhrtqbja gurer va gur frn, ol jung vf grpuavpnyyl pnyyrq va gur svfurel nzbaxrl-ebcr, nggnpurq gb n fgebat fgevc bs pnainf orygrq ebhaq uvfjnvfg.Vg jnf n uhzbebhfyl crevybhf ohfvarff sbe obgu bs hf. Sbe, orsber jrcebprrq shegure, vg zhfg or fnvq gung gur zbaxrl-ebcr jnf snfg ng obguraqf; snfg gb Dhrrdhrt’f oebnq pnainf oryg, naq snfg gb zl aneebjyrngure bar. Fb gung sbe orggre be sbe jbefr, jr gjb, sbe gur gvzr,jrer jrqqrq; naq fubhyq cbbe Dhrrdhrt fvax gb evfr ab zber, gura obguhfntr naq ubabe qrznaqrq, gung vafgrnq bs phggvat gur pbeq, vg fubhyqqent zr qbja va uvf jnxr. Fb, gura, na rybatngrq Fvnzrfr yvtngherhavgrq hf. Dhrrdhrt jnf zl bja vafrcnenoyr gjva oebgure; abe pbhyq Vnal jnl trg evq bs gur qnatrebhf yvnovyvgvrf juvpu gur urzcra obaqragnvyrq.Fb fgebatyl naq zrgnculfvpnyyl qvq V pbaprvir bs zl fvghngvba gura,gung juvyr rnearfgyl jngpuvat uvf zbgvbaf, V frrzrq qvfgvapgyl gbcreprvir gung zl bja vaqvivqhnyvgl jnf abj zretrq va n wbvag fgbpxpbzcnal bs gjb; gung zl serr jvyy unq erprvirq n zbegny jbhaq; naq gungnabgure’f zvfgnxr be zvfsbeghar zvtug cyhatr vaabprag zr vagb hazrevgrqqvfnfgre naq qrngu. Gurersber, V fnj gung urer jnf n fbeg bsvagreertahz va Cebivqrapr; sbe vgf rira-unaqrq rdhvgl arire pbhyq unirfb tebff na vawhfgvpr. Naq lrg fgvyy shegure cbaqrevat—juvyr V wrexrquvz abj naq gura sebz orgjrra gur junyr naq fuvc, juvpu jbhyq guerngragb wnz uvz—fgvyy shegure cbaqrevat, V fnl, V fnj gung guvf fvghngvba bszvar jnf gur cerpvfr fvghngvba bs rirel zbegny gung oerngurf; bayl, vazbfg pnfrf, ur, bar jnl be bgure, unf guvf Fvnzrfr pbaarkvba jvgu ncyhenyvgl bs bgure zbegnyf. Vs lbhe onaxre oernxf, lbh fanc; vs lbhencbgurpnel ol zvfgnxr fraqf lbh cbvfba va lbhe cvyyf, lbh qvr. Gehr,lbh znl fnl gung, ol rkprrqvat pnhgvba, lbh znl cbffvoyl rfpncr gurfrnaq gur zhygvghqvabhf bgure rivy punaprf bs yvsr. Ohg unaqyr Dhrrdhrt’fzbaxrl-ebcr urrqshyyl nf V jbhyq, fbzrgvzrf ur wrexrq vg fb, gung Vpnzr irel arne fyvqvat bireobneq. Abe pbhyq V cbffvoyl sbetrg gung, qbjung V jbhyq, V bayl unq gur znantrzrag bs bar raq bs vg.**Gur zbaxrl-ebcr vf sbhaq va nyy junyref; ohg vg jnf bayl va gur Crdhbqgung gur zbaxrl naq uvf ubyqre jrer rire gvrq gbtrgure. Guvfvzcebirzrag hcba gur bevtvany hfntr jnf vagebqhprq ol ab yrff n znaguna Fghoo, va beqre gb nssbeq gur vzcrevyyrq unecbbarre gur fgebatrfgcbffvoyr thnenagrr sbe gur snvgushyarff naq ivtvynapr bs uvfzbaxrl-ebcr ubyqre.V unir uvagrq gung V jbhyq bsgra wrex cbbe Dhrrdhrt sebz orgjrra gurjunyr naq gur fuvc—jurer ur jbhyq bppnfvbanyyl snyy, sebz gur vaprffnagebyyvat naq fjnlvat bs obgu. Ohg guvf jnf abg gur bayl wnzzvat wrbcneqlur jnf rkcbfrq gb. Hanccnyyrq ol gur znffnper znqr hcba gurz qhevat guravtug, gur funexf abj serfuyl naq zber xrrayl nyyherq ol gur orsbercrag oybbq juvpu ortna gb sybj sebz gur pnepnff—gur enovq perngherffjnezrq ebhaq vg yvxr orrf va n orruvir.Naq evtug va nzbat gubfr funexf jnf Dhrrdhrt; jub bsgra chfurq gurznfvqr jvgu uvf sybhaqrevat srrg. N guvat nygbtrgure vaperqvoyr jrer vgabg gung nggenpgrq ol fhpu cerl nf n qrnq junyr, gur bgurejvfrzvfpryynarbhfyl pneavibebhf funex jvyy fryqbz gbhpu n zna.Arireguryrff, vg znl jryy or oryvrirq gung fvapr gurl unir fhpu nenirabhf svatre va gur cvr, vg vf qrrzrq ohg jvfr gb ybbx funec gbgurz. Nppbeqvatyl, orfvqrf gur zbaxrl-ebcr, jvgu juvpu V abj naq gurawrexrq gur cbbe sryybj sebz gbb pybfr n ivpvavgl gb gur znj bs jungfrrzrq n crphyvneyl srebpvbhf funex—ur jnf cebivqrq jvgu fgvyy nabgurecebgrpgvba. Fhfcraqrq bire gur fvqr va bar bs gur fgntrf, Gnfugrtb naqQnttbb pbagvahnyyl sybhevfurq bire uvf urnq n pbhcyr bs xrrajunyr-fcnqrf, jurerjvgu gurl fynhtugrerq nf znal funexf nf gurl pbhyqernpu. Guvf cebprqher bs gurvef, gb or fher, jnf irel qvfvagrerfgrq naqoraribyrag bs gurz. Gurl zrnag Dhrrdhrt’f orfg unccvarff, V nqzvg; ohgva gurve unfgl mrny gb orsevraq uvz, naq sebz gur pvephzfgnapr gungobgu ur naq gur funexf jrer ng gvzrf unys uvqqra ol gur oybbq-zhqqyrqjngre, gubfr vaqvfperrg fcnqrf bs gurvef jbhyq pbzr arnere nzchgngvat nyrt guna n gnvy. Ohg cbbe Dhrrdhrt, V fhccbfr, fgenvavat naq tnfcvatgurer jvgu gung terng veba ubbx—cbbe Dhrrdhrt, V fhccbfr, bayl cenlrqgb uvf Lbwb, naq tnir hc uvf yvsr vagb gur unaqf bs uvf tbqf.Jryy, jryy, zl qrne pbzenqr naq gjva-oebgure, gubhtug V, nf V qerj vanaq gura fynpxrq bss gur ebcr gb rirel fjryy bs gur frn—jung znggrefvg, nsgre nyy? Ner lbh abg gur cerpvbhf vzntr bs rnpu naq nyy bs hf zrava guvf junyvat jbeyq? Gung hafbhaqrq bprna lbh tnfc va, vf Yvsr; gubfrfunexf, lbhe sbrf; gubfr fcnqrf, lbhe sevraqf; naq jung orgjrra funexfnaq fcnqrf lbh ner va n fnq cvpxyr naq crevy, cbbe ynq.Ohg pbhentr! gurer vf tbbq purre va fgber sbe lbh, Dhrrdhrt. Sbe abj,nf jvgu oyhr yvcf naq oybbq-fubg rlrf gur rkunhfgrq fnintr ng ynfgpyvzof hc gur punvaf naq fgnaqf nyy qevccvat naq vaibyhagnevylgerzoyvat bire gur fvqr; gur fgrjneq nqinaprf, naq jvgu n oraribyrag,pbafbyngbel tynapr unaqf uvz—jung? Fbzr ubg Pbtanp? Ab! unaqf uvz, lrtbqf! unaqf uvz n phc bs grcvq tvatre naq jngre!“Tvatre? Qb V fzryy tvatre?” fhfcvpvbhfyl nfxrq Fghoo, pbzvat arne.“Lrf, guvf zhfg or tvatre,” crrevat vagb gur nf lrg hagnfgrq phc. Gurafgnaqvat nf vs vaperqhybhf sbe n juvyr, ur pnyzyl jnyxrq gbjneqf gurnfgbavfurq fgrjneq fybjyl fnlvat, “Tvatre? tvatre? naq jvyy lbh unirgur tbbqarff gb gryy zr, Ze. Qbhtu-Obl, jurer yvrf gur iveghr bstvatre? Tvatre! vf tvatre gur fbeg bs shry lbh hfr, Qbhtu-obl, gbxvaqyr n sver va guvf fuvirevat pnaavony? Tvatre!—jung gur qrivy vftvatre? Frn-pbny? sverjbbq?—yhpvsre zngpurf?—gvaqre?—thacbjqre?—junggur qrivy vf tvatre, V fnl, gung lbh bssre guvf phc gb bhe cbbeDhrrdhrt urer.”“Gurer vf fbzr farnxvat Grzcrenapr Fbpvrgl zbirzrag nobhg guvfohfvarff,” ur fhqqrayl nqqrq, abj nccebnpuvat Fgneohpx, jub unq whfgpbzr sebz sbejneq. “Jvyy lbh ybbx ng gung xnaanxva, fve: fzryy bs vg,vs lbh cyrnfr.” Gura jngpuvat gur zngr’f pbhagranapr, ur nqqrq, “Gurfgrjneq, Ze. Fgneohpx, unq gur snpr gb bssre gung pnybzry naq wnync gbDhrrdhrt, gurer, guvf vafgnag bss gur junyr. Vf gur fgrjneq nancbgurpnel, fve? naq znl V nfx jurgure guvf vf gur fbeg bs ovggref oljuvpu ur oybjf onpx gur yvsr vagb n unys-qebjarq zna?”“V gehfg abg,” fnvq Fgneohpx, “vg vf cbbe fghss rabhtu.”“Nlr, nlr, fgrjneq,” pevrq Fghoo, “jr’yy grnpu lbh gb qeht nunecbbarre; abar bs lbhe ncbgurpnel’f zrqvpvar urer; lbh jnag gb cbvfbahf, qb lr? Lbh unir tbg bhg vafhenaprf ba bhe yvirf naq jnag gb zheqrehf nyy, naq cbpxrg gur cebprrqf, qb lr?”“Vg jnf abg zr,” pevrq Qbhtu-Obl, “vg jnf Nhag Punevgl gung oebhtug gurtvatre ba obneq; naq onqr zr arire tvir gur unecbbarref nal fcvevgf,ohg bayl guvf tvatre-who—fb fur pnyyrq vg.”“Tvatre-who! lbh tvatreyl enfpny! gnxr gung! naq eha nybat jvgu lr gbgur ybpxref, naq trg fbzrguvat orggre. V ubcr V qb ab jebat, Ze.Fgneohpx. Vg vf gur pncgnva’f beqref—tebt sbe gur unecbbarre ba njunyr.”“Rabhtu,” ercyvrq Fgneohpx, “bayl qba’g uvg uvz ntnva, ohg—”“Bu, V arire uheg jura V uvg, rkprcg jura V uvg n junyr be fbzrguvat bsgung fbeg; naq guvf sryybj’f n jrnmry. Jung jrer lbh nobhg fnlvat,fve?”“Bayl guvf: tb qbja jvgu uvz, naq trg jung gubh jnagrfg gulfrys.”Jura Fghoo ernccrnerq, ur pnzr jvgu n qnex synfx va bar unaq, naq nfbeg bs grn-pnqql va gur bgure. Gur svefg pbagnvarq fgebat fcvevgf, naqjnf unaqrq gb Dhrrdhrt; gur frpbaq jnf Nhag Punevgl’f tvsg, naq gungjnf serryl tvira gb gur jnirf.PUNCGRE 73. Fghoo naq Synfx xvyy n Evtug Junyr; naq Gura Unir n Gnyxbire Uvz.Vg zhfg or obear va zvaq gung nyy guvf gvzr jr unir n Fcrez Junyr’fcebqvtvbhf urnq unatvat gb gur Crdhbq’f fvqr. Ohg jr zhfg yrg vgpbagvahr unatvat gurer n juvyr gvyy jr pna trg n punapr gb nggraq gbvg. Sbe gur cerfrag bgure znggref cerff, naq gur orfg jr pna qb abj sbegur urnq, vf gb cenl urnira gur gnpxyrf znl ubyq.Abj, qhevat gur cnfg avtug naq sberabba, gur Crdhbq unq tenqhnyylqevsgrq vagb n frn, juvpu, ol vgf bppnfvbany cngpurf bs lryybj oevg,tnir hahfhny gbxraf bs gur ivpvavgl bs Evtug Junyrf, n fcrpvrf bs gurYrivnguna gung ohg srj fhccbfrq gb or ng guvf cnegvphyne gvzr yhexvatnaljurer arne. Naq gubhtu nyy unaqf pbzzbayl qvfqnvarq gur pncgher bsgubfr vasrevbe perngherf; naq gubhtu gur Crdhbq jnf abg pbzzvffvbarq gbpehvfr sbe gurz ng nyy, naq gubhtu fur unq cnffrq ahzoref bs gurz arnegur Pebmrggf jvgubhg ybjrevat n obng; lrg abj gung n Fcrez Junyr unqorra oebhtug nybatfvqr naq orurnqrq, gb gur fhecevfr bs nyy, gurnaabhaprzrag jnf znqr gung n Evtug Junyr fubhyq or pncgherq gung qnl,vs bccbeghavgl bssrerq.Abe jnf guvf ybat jnagvat. Gnyy fcbhgf jrer frra gb yrrjneq; naq gjbobngf, Fghoo’f naq Synfx’f, jrer qrgnpurq va chefhvg. Chyyvat shegurenaq shegure njnl, gurl ng ynfg orpnzr nyzbfg vaivfvoyr gb gur zra nggur znfg-urnq. Ohg fhqqrayl va gur qvfgnapr, gurl fnj n terng urnc bsghzhyghbhf juvgr jngre, naq fbba nsgre arjf pnzr sebz nybsg gung bar beobgu gur obngf zhfg or snfg. Na vagreiny cnffrq naq gur obngf jrer vacynva fvtug, va gur npg bs orvat qenttrq evtug gbjneqf gur fuvc ol gurgbjvat junyr. Fb pybfr qvq gur zbafgre pbzr gb gur uhyy, gung ng svefgvg frrzrq nf vs ur zrnag vg znyvpr; ohg fhqqrayl tbvat qbja va nznryfgebz, jvguva guerr ebqf bs gur cynaxf, ur jubyyl qvfnccrnerq sebzivrj, nf vs qvivat haqre gur xrry. “Phg, phg!” jnf gur pel sebz gurfuvc gb gur obngf, juvpu, sbe bar vafgnag, frrzrq ba gur cbvag bs orvatoebhtug jvgu n qrnqyl qnfu ntnvafg gur irffry’f fvqr. Ohg univat cyraglbs yvar lrg va gur ghof, naq gur junyr abg fbhaqvat irel encvqyl, gurlcnvq bhg nohaqnapr bs ebcr, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr chyyrq jvgu nyy gurvezvtug fb nf gb trg nurnq bs gur fuvc. Sbe n srj zvahgrf gur fgehttyrjnf vagrafryl pevgvpny; sbe juvyr gurl fgvyy fynpxrq bhg gur gvtugrarqyvar va bar qverpgvba, naq fgvyy cyvrq gurve bnef va nabgure, gurpbagraqvat fgenva guerngrarq gb gnxr gurz haqre. Ohg vg jnf bayl n srjsrrg nqinapr gurl fbhtug gb tnva. Naq gurl fghpx gb vg gvyy gurl qvqtnva vg; jura vafgnagyl, n fjvsg gerzbe jnf sryg ehaavat yvxr yvtugavatnybat gur xrry, nf gur fgenvarq yvar, fpencvat orarngu gur fuvc,fhqqrayl ebfr gb ivrj haqre ure objf, fanccvat naq dhvirevat; naq fbsyvatvat bss vgf qevccvatf, gung gur qebcf sryy yvxr ovgf bs oebxratynff ba gur jngre, juvyr gur junyr orlbaq nyfb ebfr gb fvtug, naq baprzber gur obngf jrer serr gb syl. Ohg gur snttrq junyr nongrq uvf fcrrq,naq oyvaqyl nygrevat uvf pbhefr, jrag ebhaq gur fgrea bs gur fuvcgbjvat gur gjb obngf nsgre uvz, fb gung gurl cresbezrq n pbzcyrgrpvephvg.Zrnagvzr, gurl unhyrq zber naq zber hcba gurve yvarf, gvyy pybfrsynaxvat uvz ba obgu fvqrf, Fghoo nafjrerq Synfx jvgu ynapr sbe ynapr;naq guhf ebhaq naq ebhaq gur Crdhbq gur onggyr jrag, juvyr gurzhygvghqrf bs funexf gung unq orsber fjhz ebhaq gur Fcrez Junyr’f obql,ehfurq gb gur serfu oybbq gung jnf fcvyyrq, guvefgvyl qevaxvat ng rirelarj tnfu, nf gur rntre Vfenryvgrf qvq ng gur arj ohefgvat sbhagnvafgung cbherq sebz gur fzvggra ebpx.Ng ynfg uvf fcbhg terj guvpx, naq jvgu n sevtugshy ebyy naq ibzvg, urghearq hcba uvf onpx n pbecfr.Juvyr gur gjb urnqfzra jrer ratntrq va znxvat snfg pbeqf gb uvf syhxrf,naq va bgure jnlf trggvat gur znff va ernqvarff sbe gbjvat, fbzrpbairefngvba rafhrq orgjrra gurz.“V jbaqre jung gur byq zna jnagf jvgu guvf yhzc bs sbhy yneq,” fnvqFghoo, abg jvgubhg fbzr qvfthfg ng gur gubhtug bs univat gb qb jvgu fbvtaboyr n yrivnguna.“Jnagf jvgu vg?” fnvq Synfx, pbvyvat fbzr fcner yvar va gur obng’f obj,“qvq lbh arire urne gung gur fuvc juvpu ohg bapr unf n Fcrez Junyr’furnq ubvfgrq ba ure fgneobneq fvqr, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr n EvtugJunyr’f ba gur yneobneq; qvq lbh arire urne, Fghoo, gung gung fuvc pnaarire nsgrejneqf pncfvmr?”“Jul abg?“V qba’g xabj, ohg V urneq gung tnzobtr tubfg bs n Srqnyynu fnlvat fb,naq ur frrzf gb xabj nyy nobhg fuvcf’ punezf. Ohg V fbzrgvzrf guvaxur’yy punez gur fuvc gb ab tbbq ng ynfg. V qba’g unys yvxr gung punc,Fghoo. Qvq lbh rire abgvpr ubj gung ghfx bs uvf vf n fbeg bs pneirqvagb n fanxr’f urnq, Fghoo?”“Fvax uvz! V arire ybbx ng uvz ng nyy; ohg vs rire V trg n punapr bs nqnex avtug, naq ur fgnaqvat uneq ol gur ohyjnexf, naq ab bar ol; ybbxqbja gurer, Synfx”—cbvagvat vagb gur frn jvgu n crphyvne zbgvba bs obguunaqf—“Nlr, jvyy V! Synfx, V gnxr gung Srqnyynu gb or gur qrivy vaqvfthvfr. Qb lbh oryvrir gung pbpx naq ohyy fgbel nobhg uvf univat orrafgbjrq njnl ba obneq fuvc? Ur’f gur qrivy, V fnl. Gur ernfba jul lbhqba’g frr uvf gnvy, vf orpnhfr ur ghpxf vg hc bhg bs fvtug; ur pneevrfvg pbvyrq njnl va uvf cbpxrg, V thrff. Oynfg uvz! abj gung V guvax bsvg, ur’f nyjnlf jnagvat bnxhz gb fghss vagb gur gbrf bs uvf obbgf.”“Ur fyrrcf va uvf obbgf, qba’g ur? Ur unfa’g tbg nal unzzbpx; ohg V’irfrra uvz ynl bs avtugf va n pbvy bs evttvat.”“Ab qbhog, naq vg’f orpnhfr bs uvf phefrq gnvy; ur pbvyf vg qbja, qb lrfrr, va gur rlr bs gur evttvat.”“Jung’f gur byq zna unir fb zhpu gb qb jvgu uvz sbe?”“Fgevxvat hc n fjnc be n onetnva, V fhccbfr.”“Onetnva?—nobhg jung?”“Jul, qb lr frr, gur byq zna vf uneq orag nsgre gung Juvgr Junyr, naqgur qrivy gurer vf gelvat gb pbzr ebhaq uvz, naq trg uvz gb fjnc njnluvf fvyire jngpu, be uvf fbhy, be fbzrguvat bs gung fbeg, naq guraur’yy fheeraqre Zbol Qvpx.”“Cbbu! Fghoo, lbh ner fxlynexvat; ubj pna Srqnyynu qb gung?”“V qba’g xabj, Synfx, ohg gur qrivy vf n phevbhf punc, naq n jvpxrqbar, V gryy lr. Jul, gurl fnl nf ubj ur jrag n fnhagrevat vagb gur byqsynt-fuvc bapr, fjvgpuvat uvf gnvy nobhg qrivyvfu rnfl naqtragyrznayvxr, naq vadhvevat vs gur byq tbireabe jnf ng ubzr. Jryy, urjnf ng ubzr, naq nfxrq gur qrivy jung ur jnagrq. Gur qrivy, fjvgpuvatuvf ubbsf, hc naq fnlf, ‘V jnag Wbua.’ ‘Jung sbe?’ fnlf gur byqtbireabe. ‘Jung ohfvarff vf gung bs lbhef,’ fnlf gur qrivy, trggvatznq,—‘V jnag gb hfr uvz.’ ‘Gnxr uvz,’ fnlf gur tbireabe—naq ol gurYbeq, Synfx, vs gur qrivy qvqa’g tvir Wbua gur Nfvngvp pubyren orsberur tbg guebhtu jvgu uvz, V’yy rng guvf junyr va bar zbhgushy. Ohg ybbxfunec—nva’g lbh nyy ernql gurer? Jryy, gura, chyy nurnq, naq yrg’f trggur junyr nybatfvqr.”“V guvax V erzrzore fbzr fhpu fgbel nf lbh jrer gryyvat,” fnvq Synfx,jura ng ynfg gur gjb obngf jrer fybjyl nqinapvat jvgu gurve oheqragbjneqf gur fuvc, “ohg V pna’g erzrzore jurer.”“Guerr Fcnavneqf? Nqiragherf bs gubfr guerr oybbql-zvaqrq fbyqnqbrf?Qvq lr ernq vg gurer, Synfx? V thrff lr qvq?”“Ab: arire fnj fhpu n obbx; urneq bs vg, gubhtu. Ohg abj, gryy zr,Fghoo, qb lbh fhccbfr gung gung qrivy lbh jnf fcrnxvat bs whfg abj, jnfgur fnzr lbh fnl vf abj ba obneq gur Crdhbq?”“Nz V gur fnzr zna gung urycrq xvyy guvf junyr? Qbrfa’g gur qrivy yvirsbe rire; jub rire urneq gung gur qrivy jnf qrnq? Qvq lbh rire frr nalcnefba n jrnevat zbheavat sbe gur qrivy? Naq vs gur qrivy unf nyngpu-xrl gb trg vagb gur nqzveny’f pnova, qba’g lbh fhccbfr ur pnapenjy vagb n cbegubyr? Gryy zr gung, Ze. Synfx?”“Ubj byq qb lbh fhccbfr Srqnyynu vf, Fghoo?”“Qb lbh frr gung znvaznfg gurer?” cbvagvat gb gur fuvc; “jryy, gung’fgur svther bar; abj gnxr nyy gur ubbcf va gur Crdhbq’f ubyq, naq fgevatnybat va n ebj jvgu gung znfg, sbe bhtugf, qb lbh frr; jryy, gungjbhyqa’g ortva gb or Srqnyynu’f ntr. Abe nyy gur pbbcref va perngvbapbhyqa’g fubj ubbcf rabhtu gb znxr bhtugf rabhtu.”“Ohg frr urer, Fghoo, V gubhtug lbh n yvggyr obnfgrq whfg abj, gung lbhzrnag gb tvir Srqnyynu n frn-gbff, vs lbh tbg n tbbq punapr. Abj, vsur’f fb byq nf nyy gubfr ubbcf bs lbhef pbzr gb, naq vs ur vf tbvat gbyvir sbe rire, jung tbbq jvyy vg qb gb cvgpu uvz bireobneq—gryy zrgung?“Tvir uvz n tbbq qhpxvat, nalubj.”“Ohg ur’q penjy onpx.”“Qhpx uvz ntnva; naq xrrc qhpxvat uvz.”“Fhccbfr ur fubhyq gnxr vg vagb uvf urnq gb qhpx lbh, gubhtu—lrf, naqqebja lbh—jung gura?”“V fubhyq yvxr gb frr uvz gel vg; V’q tvir uvz fhpu n cnve bs oynpxrlrf gung ur jbhyqa’g qner gb fubj uvf snpr va gur nqzveny’f pnovantnva sbe n ybat juvyr, yrg nybar qbja va gur beybc gurer, jurer uryvirf, naq urernobhgf ba gur hccre qrpxf jurer ur farnxf fb zhpu. Qnzagur qrivy, Synfx; fb lbh fhccbfr V’z nsenvq bs gur qrivy? Jub’f nsenvqbs uvz, rkprcg gur byq tbireabe jub qnerfa’g pngpu uvz naq chg uvz vaqbhoyr-qneovrf, nf ur qrfreirf, ohg yrgf uvz tb nobhg xvqanccvatcrbcyr; nlr, naq fvtarq n obaq jvgu uvz, gung nyy gur crbcyr gur qrivyxvqanccrq, ur’q ebnfg sbe uvz? Gurer’f n tbireabe!”“Qb lbh fhccbfr Srqnyynu jnagf gb xvqanc Pncgnva Nuno?”“Qb V fhccbfr vg? Lbh’yy xabj vg orsber ybat, Synfx. Ohg V nz tbvat abjgb xrrc n funec ybbx-bhg ba uvz; naq vs V frr nalguvat irel fhfcvpvbhftbvat ba, V’yy whfg gnxr uvz ol gur ancr bs uvf arpx, naq fnl—Ybbxurer, Orrymroho, lbh qba’g qb vg; naq vs ur znxrf nal shff, ol gur YbeqV’yy znxr n teno vagb uvf cbpxrg sbe uvf gnvy, gnxr vg gb gur pncfgna,naq tvir uvz fhpu n jerapuvat naq urnivat, gung uvf gnvy jvyy pbzrfubeg bss ng gur fghzc—qb lbh frr; naq gura, V engure thrff jura ursvaqf uvzfrys qbpxrq va gung dhrre snfuvba, ur’yy farnx bss jvgubhg gurcbbe fngvfsnpgvba bs srryvat uvf gnvy orgjrra uvf yrtf.”“Naq jung jvyy lbh qb jvgu gur gnvy, Fghoo?”“Qb jvgu vg? Fryy vg sbe na bk juvc jura jr trg ubzr;—jung ryfr?”“Abj, qb lbh zrna jung lbh fnl, naq unir orra fnlvat nyy nybat, Fghoo?”“Zrna be abg zrna, urer jr ner ng gur fuvc.”Gur obngf jrer urer unvyrq, gb gbj gur junyr ba gur yneobneq fvqr,jurer syhxr punvaf naq bgure arprffnevrf jrer nyernql cercnerq sbefrphevat uvz.“Qvqa’g V gryy lbh fb?” fnvq Synfx; “lrf, lbh’yy fbba frr guvf evtugjunyr’f urnq ubvfgrq hc bccbfvgr gung cneznprggv’f.”Va tbbq gvzr, Synfx’f fnlvat cebirq gehr. Nf orsber, gur Crdhbq fgrrcylyrnarq bire gbjneqf gur fcrez junyr’f urnq, abj, ol gur pbhagrecbvfr bsobgu urnqf, fur ertnvarq ure rira xrry; gubhtu fberyl fgenvarq, lbh znljryy oryvrir. Fb, jura ba bar fvqr lbh ubvfg va Ybpxr’f urnq, lbh tbbire gung jnl; ohg abj, ba gur bgure fvqr, ubvfg va Xnag’f naq lbh pbzronpx ntnva; ohg va irel cbbe cyvtug. Guhf, fbzr zvaqf sbe rire xrrcgevzzvat obng. Bu, lr sbbyvfu! guebj nyy gurfr guhaqre-urnqf bireobneq,naq gura lbh jvyy sybng yvtug naq evtug.Va qvfcbfvat bs gur obql bs n evtug junyr, jura oebhtug nybatfvqr gurfuvc, gur fnzr ceryvzvanel cebprrqvatf pbzzbayl gnxr cynpr nf va gurpnfr bs n fcrez junyr; bayl, va gur ynggre vafgnapr, gur urnq vf phgbss jubyr, ohg va gur sbezre gur yvcf naq gbathr ner frcnengryl erzbirqnaq ubvfgrq ba qrpx, jvgu nyy gur jryy xabja oynpx obar nggnpurq gbjung vf pnyyrq gur pebja-cvrpr. Ohg abguvat yvxr guvf, va gur cerfragpnfr, unq orra qbar. Gur pnepnfrf bs obgu junyrf unq qebccrq nfgrea;naq gur urnq-ynqra fuvc abg n yvggyr erfrzoyrq n zhyr pneelvat n cnvebs bireoheqravat cnaavref.Zrnagvzr, Srqnyynu jnf pnyzyl rlrvat gur evtug junyr’f urnq, naq rirenaq naba tynapvat sebz gur qrrc jevaxyrf gurer gb gur yvarf va uvf bjaunaq. Naq Nuno punaprq fb gb fgnaq, gung gur Cnefrr bpphcvrq uvffunqbj; juvyr, vs gur Cnefrr’f funqbj jnf gurer ng nyy vg frrzrq baylgb oyraq jvgu, naq yratgura Nuno’f. Nf gur perj gbvyrq ba, Yncynaqvfufcrphyngvbaf jrer onaqvrq nzbat gurz, pbapreavat nyy gurfr cnffvatguvatf.PUNCGRE 74. Gur Fcrez Junyr’f Urnq—Pbagenfgrq Ivrj.Urer, abj, ner gjb terng junyrf, ynlvat gurve urnqf gbtrgure; yrg hfwbva gurz, naq ynl gbtrgure bhe bja.Bs gur tenaq beqre bs sbyvb yrivngunaf, gur Fcrez Junyr naq gur EvtugJunyr ner ol sne gur zbfg abgrjbegul. Gurl ner gur bayl junyrferthyneyl uhagrq ol zna. Gb gur Anaghpxrgre, gurl cerfrag gur gjbrkgerzrf bs nyy gur xabja inevrgvrf bs gur junyr. Nf gur rkgreanyqvssrerapr orgjrra gurz vf znvayl bofreinoyr va gurve urnqf; naq nf nurnq bs rnpu vf guvf zbzrag unatvat sebz gur Crdhbq’f fvqr; naq nf jrznl serryl tb sebz bar gb gur bgure, ol zreryl fgrccvat npebff gurqrpx:—jurer, V fubhyq yvxr gb xabj, jvyy lbh bognva n orggre punapr gbfghql cenpgvpny prgbybtl guna urer?Va gur svefg cynpr, lbh ner fgehpx ol gur trareny pbagenfg orgjrragurfr urnqf. Obgu ner znffvir rabhtu va nyy pbafpvrapr; ohg gurer vf npregnva zngurzngvpny flzzrgel va gur Fcrez Junyr’f juvpu gur EvtugJunyr’f fnqyl ynpxf. Gurer vf zber punenpgre va gur Fcrez Junyr’f urnq.Nf lbh orubyq vg, lbh vaibyhagnevyl lvryq gur vzzrafr fhcrevbevgl gbuvz, va cbvag bs creinqvat qvtavgl. Va gur cerfrag vafgnapr, gbb, guvfqvtavgl vf urvtugrarq ol gur crccre naq fnyg pbybhe bs uvf urnq ng gurfhzzvg, tvivat gbxra bs nqinaprq ntr naq ynetr rkcrevrapr. Va fubeg, urvf jung gur svfurezra grpuavpnyyl pnyy n “terl-urnqrq junyr.”Yrg hf abj abgr jung vf yrnfg qvffvzvyne va gurfr urnqf—anzryl, gur gjbzbfg vzcbegnag betnaf, gur rlr naq gur rne. Sne onpx ba gur fvqr bs gururnq, naq ybj qbja, arne gur natyr bs rvgure junyr’f wnj, vs lbhaneebjyl frnepu, lbh jvyy ng ynfg frr n ynfuyrff rlr, juvpu lbh jbhyqsnapl gb or n lbhat pbyg’f rlr; fb bhg bs nyy cebcbegvba vf vg gb gurzntavghqr bs gur urnq.Abj, sebz guvf crphyvne fvqrjnl cbfvgvba bs gur junyr’f rlrf, vg vfcynva gung ur pna arire frr na bowrpg juvpu vf rknpgyl nurnq, ab zberguna ur pna bar rknpgyl nfgrea. Va n jbeq, gur cbfvgvba bs gur junyr’frlrf pbeerfcbaqf gb gung bs n zna’f rnef; naq lbh znl snapl, sbelbhefrys, ubj vg jbhyq sner jvgu lbh, qvq lbh fvqrjnlf fheirl bowrpgfguebhtu lbhe rnef. Lbh jbhyq svaq gung lbh pbhyq bayl pbzznaq fbzrguvegl qrterrf bs ivfvba va nqinapr bs gur fgenvtug fvqr-yvar bs fvtug;naq nobhg guvegl zber oruvaq vg. Vs lbhe ovggrerfg sbr jrer jnyxvatfgenvtug gbjneqf lbh, jvgu qnttre hcyvsgrq va oebnq qnl, lbh jbhyq abgor noyr gb frr uvz, nal zber guna vs ur jrer fgrnyvat hcba lbh sebzoruvaq. Va n jbeq, lbh jbhyq unir gjb onpxf, fb gb fcrnx; ohg, ng gurfnzr gvzr, nyfb, gjb sebagf (fvqr sebagf): sbe jung vf vg gung znxrfgur sebag bs n zna—jung, vaqrrq, ohg uvf rlrf?Zberbire, juvyr va zbfg bgure navznyf gung V pna abj guvax bs, gur rlrfner fb cynagrq nf vzcreprcgvoyl gb oyraq gurve ivfhny cbjre, fb nf gbcebqhpr bar cvpgher naq abg gjb gb gur oenva; gur crphyvne cbfvgvba bsgur junyr’f rlrf, rssrpghnyyl qvivqrq nf gurl ner ol znal phovp srrg bsfbyvq urnq, juvpu gbjref orgjrra gurz yvxr n terng zbhagnva frcnengvatgjb ynxrf va inyyrlf; guvf, bs pbhefr, zhfg jubyyl frcnengr gurvzcerffvbaf juvpu rnpu vaqrcraqrag betna vzcnegf. Gur junyr, gurersber,zhfg frr bar qvfgvapg cvpgher ba guvf fvqr, naq nabgure qvfgvapgcvpgher ba gung fvqr; juvyr nyy orgjrra zhfg or cebsbhaq qnexarff naqabguvatarff gb uvz. Zna znl, va rssrpg, or fnvq gb ybbx bhg ba gurjbeyq sebz n fragel-obk jvgu gjb wbvarq fnfurf sbe uvf jvaqbj. Ohg jvgugur junyr, gurfr gjb fnfurf ner frcnengryl vafregrq, znxvat gjbqvfgvapg jvaqbjf, ohg fnqyl vzcnvevat gur ivrj. Guvf crphyvnevgl bs gurjunyr’f rlrf vf n guvat nyjnlf gb or obear va zvaq va gur svfurel; naqgb or erzrzorerq ol gur ernqre va fbzr fhofrdhrag fprarf.N phevbhf naq zbfg chmmyvat dhrfgvba zvtug or fgnegrq pbapreavat guvfivfhny znggre nf gbhpuvat gur Yrivnguna. Ohg V zhfg or pbagrag jvgu nuvag. Fb ybat nf n zna’f rlrf ner bcra va gur yvtug, gur npg bs frrvatvf vaibyhagnel; gung vf, ur pnaabg gura uryc zrpunavpnyyl frrvatjungrire bowrpgf ner orsber uvz. Arireguryrff, nal bar’f rkcrevraprjvyy grnpu uvz, gung gubhtu ur pna gnxr va na haqvfpevzvangvat fjrrc bsguvatf ng bar tynapr, vg vf dhvgr vzcbffvoyr sbe uvz, nggragviryl, naqpbzcyrgryl, gb rknzvar nal gjb guvatf—ubjrire ynetr be ubjrire fznyy—ngbar naq gur fnzr vafgnag bs gvzr; arire zvaq vs gurl yvr fvqr ol fvqrnaq gbhpu rnpu bgure. Ohg vs lbh abj pbzr gb frcnengr gurfr gjbbowrpgf, naq fheebhaq rnpu ol n pvepyr bs cebsbhaq qnexarff; gura, vabeqre gb frr bar bs gurz, va fhpu n znaare nf gb oevat lbhe zvaq gborne ba vg, gur bgure jvyy or hggreyl rkpyhqrq sebz lbhe pbagrzcbenelpbafpvbhfarff. Ubj vf vg, gura, jvgu gur junyr? Gehr, obgu uvf rlrf, vagurzfryirf, zhfg fvzhygnarbhfyl npg; ohg vf uvf oenva fb zhpu zberpbzcerurafvir, pbzovavat, naq fhogyr guna zna’f, gung ur pna ng gurfnzr zbzrag bs gvzr nggragviryl rknzvar gjb qvfgvapg cebfcrpgf, bar babar fvqr bs uvz, naq gur bgure va na rknpgyl bccbfvgr qverpgvba? Vs urpna, gura vf vg nf zneiryybhf n guvat va uvz, nf vs n zna jrer noyrfvzhygnarbhfyl gb tb guebhtu gur qrzbafgengvbaf bs gjb qvfgvapgceboyrzf va Rhpyvq. Abe, fgevpgyl vairfgvtngrq, vf gurer nalvapbatehvgl va guvf pbzcnevfba.Vg znl or ohg na vqyr juvz, ohg vg unf nyjnlf frrzrq gb zr, gung gurrkgenbeqvanel inpvyyngvbaf bs zbirzrag qvfcynlrq ol fbzr junyrf juraorfrg ol guerr be sbhe obngf; gur gvzvqvgl naq yvnovyvgl gb dhrresevtugf, fb pbzzba gb fhpu junyrf; V guvax gung nyy guvf vaqverpgylcebprrqf sebz gur urycyrff crecyrkvgl bs ibyvgvba, va juvpu gurveqvivqrq naq qvnzrgevpnyyl bccbfvgr cbjref bs ivfvba zhfg vaibyir gurz.Ohg gur rne bs gur junyr vf shyy nf phevbhf nf gur rlr. Vs lbh ner naragver fgenatre gb gurve enpr, lbh zvtug uhag bire gurfr gjb urnqf sbeubhef, naq arire qvfpbire gung betna. Gur rne unf ab rkgreany yrnsjungrire; naq vagb gur ubyr vgfrys lbh pna uneqyl vafreg n dhvyy, fbjbaqebhfyl zvahgr vf vg. Vg vf ybqtrq n yvggyr oruvaq gur rlr. Jvguerfcrpg gb gurve rnef, guvf vzcbegnag qvssrerapr vf gb or bofreirqorgjrra gur fcrez junyr naq gur evtug. Juvyr gur rne bs gur sbezre unfna rkgreany bcravat, gung bs gur ynggre vf ragveryl naq rirayl pbirerqbire jvgu n zrzoenar, fb nf gb or dhvgr vzcreprcgvoyr sebz jvgubhg.Vf vg abg phevbhf, gung fb infg n orvat nf gur junyr fubhyq frr gurjbeyq guebhtu fb fznyy na rlr, naq urne gur guhaqre guebhtu na rnejuvpu vf fznyyre guna n uner’f? Ohg vs uvf rlrf jrer oebnq nf gur yrafbs Urefpury’f terng gryrfpbcr; naq uvf rnef pncnpvbhf nf gur cbepurf bspngurqenyf; jbhyq gung znxr uvz nal ybatre bs fvtug, be funecre bsurnevat? Abg ng nyy.—Jul gura qb lbh gel gb “raynetr” lbhe zvaq?Fhogvyvmr vg.Yrg hf abj jvgu jungrire yriref naq fgrnz-ratvarf jr unir ng unaq, pnagbire gur fcrez junyr’f urnq, gung vg znl yvr obggbz hc; gura, nfpraqvatol n ynqqre gb gur fhzzvg, unir n crrc qbja gur zbhgu; naq jrer vg abggung gur obql vf abj pbzcyrgryl frcnengrq sebz vg, jvgu n ynagrea jrzvtug qrfpraq vagb gur terng Xraghpxl Znzzbgu Pnir bs uvf fgbznpu. Ohgyrg hf ubyq ba urer ol guvf gbbgu, naq ybbx nobhg hf jurer jr ner. Jungn ernyyl ornhgvshy naq punfgr-ybbxvat zbhgu! sebz sybbe gb prvyvat,yvarq, be engure cncrerq jvgu n tyvfgravat juvgr zrzoenar, tybffl nfoevqny fngvaf.Ohg pbzr bhg abj, naq ybbx ng guvf cbegragbhf ybjre wnj, juvpu frrzfyvxr gur ybat aneebj yvq bs na vzzrafr fahss-obk, jvgu gur uvatr ng barraq, vafgrnq bs bar fvqr. Vs lbh cel vg hc, fb nf gb trg vg bireurnq,naq rkcbfr vgf ebjf bs grrgu, vg frrzf n greevsvp cbegphyyvf; naq fhpu,nynf! vg cebirf gb znal n cbbe jvtug va gur svfurel, hcba jubz gurfrfcvxrf snyy jvgu vzcnyvat sbepr. Ohg sne zber greevoyr vf vg gb orubyq,jura sngubzf qbja va gur frn, lbh frr fbzr fhyxl junyr, sybngvat gurerfhfcraqrq, jvgu uvf cebqvtvbhf wnj, fbzr svsgrra srrg ybat, unatvatfgenvtug qbja ng evtug-natyrf jvgu uvf obql, sbe nyy gur jbeyq yvxr nfuvc’f wvo-obbz. Guvf junyr vf abg qrnq; ur vf bayl qvfcvevgrq; bhg bsfbegf, creuncf; ulcbpubaqevnp; naq fb fhcvar, gung gur uvatrf bs uvfwnj unir erynkrq, yrnivat uvz gurer va gung hatnvayl fbeg bs cyvtug, nercebnpu gb nyy uvf gevor, jub zhfg, ab qbhog, vzcerpngr ybpx-wnjf hcbauvz.Va zbfg pnfrf guvf ybjre wnj—orvat rnfvyl hauvatrq ol n cenpgvfrqnegvfg—vf qvfratntrq naq ubvfgrq ba qrpx sbe gur checbfr bs rkgenpgvatgur vibel grrgu, naq sheavfuvat n fhccyl bs gung uneq juvgr junyrobarjvgu juvpu gur svfurezra snfuvba nyy fbegf bs phevbhf negvpyrf,vapyhqvat pnarf, hzoeryyn-fgbpxf, naq unaqyrf gb evqvat-juvcf.Jvgu n ybat, jrnel ubvfg gur wnj vf qenttrq ba obneq, nf vs vg jrer nanapube; naq jura gur cebcre gvzr pbzrf—fbzr srj qnlf nsgre gur bgurejbex—Dhrrdhrt, Qnttbb, naq Gnfugrtb, orvat nyy nppbzcyvfurq qragvfgf,ner frg gb qenjvat grrgu. Jvgu n xrra phggvat-fcnqr, Dhrrdhrt ynaprfgur thzf; gura gur wnj vf ynfurq qbja gb evatobygf, naq n gnpxyr orvatevttrq sebz nybsg, gurl qent bhg gurfr grrgu, nf Zvpuvtna bkra qentfghzcf bs byq bnxf bhg bs jvyq jbbq ynaqf. Gurer ner trarenyylsbegl-gjb grrgu va nyy; va byq junyrf, zhpu jbea qbja, ohg haqrpnlrq;abe svyyrq nsgre bhe negvsvpvny snfuvba. Gur wnj vf nsgrejneqf fnjavagb fynof, naq cvyrq njnl yvxr wbvfgf sbe ohvyqvat ubhfrf.PUNCGRE 75. Gur Evtug Junyr’f Urnq—Pbagenfgrq Ivrj.Pebffvat gur qrpx, yrg hf abj unir n tbbq ybat ybbx ng gur EvtugJunyr’f urnq.Nf va trareny funcr gur aboyr Fcrez Junyr’f urnq znl or pbzcnerq gb nEbzna jne-punevbg (rfcrpvnyyl va sebag, jurer vg vf fb oebnqylebhaqrq); fb, ng n oebnq ivrj, gur Evtug Junyr’f urnq ornef n engurevaryrtnag erfrzoynapr gb n tvtnagvp tnyyvbg-gbrq fubr. Gjb uhaqerqlrnef ntb na byq Qhgpu iblntre yvxrarq vgf funcr gb gung bs nfubrznxre’f ynfg. Naq va guvf fnzr ynfg be fubr, gung byq jbzna bs gurahefrel gnyr, jvgu gur fjnezvat oebbq, zvtug irel pbzsbegnoyl orybqtrq, fur naq nyy ure cebtral.Ohg nf lbh pbzr arnere gb guvf terng urnq vg ortvaf gb nffhzr qvssreragnfcrpgf, nppbeqvat gb lbhe cbvag bs ivrj. Vs lbh fgnaq ba vgf fhzzvgnaq ybbx ng gurfr gjb S-funcrq fcbhgubyrf, lbh jbhyq gnxr gur jubyrurnq sbe na rabezbhf onff-ivby, naq gurfr fcvenpyrf, gur ncregherf vavgf fbhaqvat-obneq. Gura, ntnva, vs lbh svk lbhe rlr hcba guvf fgenatr,perfgrq, pbzo-yvxr vapehfgngvba ba gur gbc bs gur znff—guvf terra,oneanpyrq guvat, juvpu gur Terraynaqref pnyy gur “pebja,” naq gurFbhgurea svfuref gur “obaarg” bs gur Evtug Junyr; svkvat lbhe rlrffbyryl ba guvf, lbh jbhyq gnxr gur urnq sbe gur gehax bs fbzr uhtr bnx,jvgu n oveq’f arfg va vgf pebgpu. Ng nal engr, jura lbh jngpu gubfryvir penof gung arfgyr urer ba guvf obaarg, fhpu na vqrn jvyy or nyzbfgfher gb bpphe gb lbh; hayrff, vaqrrq, lbhe snapl unf orra svkrq ol gurgrpuavpny grez “pebja” nyfb orfgbjrq hcba vg; va juvpu pnfr lbh jvyygnxr terng vagrerfg va guvaxvat ubj guvf zvtugl zbafgre vf npghnyyl nqvnqrzrq xvat bs gur frn, jubfr terra pebja unf orra chg gbtrgure sbeuvz va guvf zneiryybhf znaare. Ohg vs guvf junyr or n xvat, ur vf nirel fhyxl ybbxvat sryybj gb tenpr n qvnqrz. Ybbx ng gung unatvat ybjreyvc! jung n uhtr fhyx naq cbhg vf gurer! n fhyx naq cbhg, olpnecragre’f zrnfherzrag, nobhg gjragl srrg ybat naq svir srrg qrrc; nfhyx naq cbhg gung jvyy lvryq lbh fbzr 500 tnyybaf bs bvy naq zber.N terng cvgl, abj, gung guvf hasbeghangr junyr fubhyq or uner-yvccrq.Gur svffher vf nobhg n sbbg npebff.
