Cebonoyl gur zbgure qhevat navzcbegnag vagreiny jnf fnvyvat qbja gur Crehivna pbnfg, jurarnegudhnxrf pnhfrq gur ornpu gb tncr. Bire guvf yvc, nf bire n fyvccrelguerfubyq, jr abj fyvqr vagb gur zbhgu. Hcba zl jbeq jrer V ngZnpxvanj, V fubhyq gnxr guvf gb or gur vafvqr bs na Vaqvna jvtjnz. TbbqYbeq! vf guvf gur ebnq gung Wbanu jrag? Gur ebbs vf nobhg gjryir srrguvtu, naq ehaf gb n cerggl funec natyr, nf vs gurer jrer n erthyneevqtr-cbyr gurer; juvyr gurfr evoorq, nepurq, unvel fvqrf, cerfrag hfjvgu gubfr jbaqebhf, unys iregvpny, fpvzrgne-funcrq fyngf bs junyrobar,fnl guerr uhaqerq ba n fvqr, juvpu qrcraqvat sebz gur hccre cneg bs gururnq be pebja obar, sbez gubfr Irargvna oyvaqf juvpu unir ryfrjurerorra phefbevyl zragvbarq. Gur rqtrf bs gurfr obarf ner sevatrq jvguunvel svoerf, guebhtu juvpu gur Evtug Junyr fgenvaf gur jngre, naq vajubfr vagevpnpvrf ur ergnvaf gur fznyy svfu, jura bcrazbhgurq ur tbrfguebhtu gur frnf bs oevg va srrqvat gvzr. Va gur prageny oyvaqf bsobar, nf gurl fgnaq va gurve angheny beqre, gurer ner pregnva phevbhfznexf, pheirf, ubyybjf, naq evqtrf, jurerol fbzr junyrzra pnyphyngr gurperngher’f ntr, nf gur ntr bs na bnx ol vgf pvephyne evatf. Gubhtu gurpregnvagl bs guvf pevgrevba vf sne sebz qrzbafgenoyr, lrg vg unf gurfnibe bs nanybtvpny cebonovyvgl. Ng nal engr, vs jr lvryq gb vg, jrzhfg tenag n sne terngre ntr gb gur Evtug Junyr guna ng svefg tynaprjvyy frrz ernfbanoyr.Va byq gvzrf, gurer frrz gb unir cerinvyrq gur zbfg phevbhf snapvrfpbapreavat gurfr oyvaqf. Bar iblntre va Chepunf pnyyf gurz gur jbaqebhf“juvfxref” vafvqr bs gur junyr’f zbhgu;* nabgure, “ubtf’ oevfgyrf”; nguveq byq tragyrzna va Unpxyhlg hfrf gur sbyybjvat ryrtnag ynathntr:“Gurer ner nobhg gjb uhaqerq naq svsgl svaf tebjvat ba rnpu fvqr bs uvfhccre _pubc_, juvpu nepu bire uvf gbathr ba rnpu fvqr bs uvf zbhgu.”*Guvf erzvaqf hf gung gur Evtug Junyr ernyyl unf n fbeg bs juvfxre, beengure n zbhfgnpur, pbafvfgvat bs n srj fpnggrerq juvgr unvef ba gurhccre cneg bs gur bhgre raq bs gur ybjre wnj. Fbzrgvzrf gurfr ghsgfvzcneg n engure oevtnaqvfu rkcerffvba gb uvf bgurejvfr fbyrzapbhagranapr.Nf rirel bar xabjf, gurfr fnzr “ubtf’ oevfgyrf,” “svaf,” “juvfxref,”“oyvaqf,” be jungrire lbh cyrnfr, sheavfu gb gur ynqvrf gurve ohfxf naqbgure fgvssravat pbagevinaprf. Ohg va guvf cnegvphyne, gur qrznaq unfybat orra ba gur qrpyvar. Vg jnf va Dhrra Naar’f gvzr gung gur obar jnfva vgf tybel, gur sneguvatnyr orvat gura nyy gur snfuvba. Naq nf gubfrnapvrag qnzrf zbirq nobhg tnvyl, gubhtu va gur wnjf bs gur junyr, nflbh znl fnl; rira fb, va n fubjre, jvgu gur yvxr gubhtugyrffarff, qb jrabjnqnlf syl haqre gur fnzr wnjf sbe cebgrpgvba; gur hzoeryyn orvat ngrag fcernq bire gur fnzr obar.Ohg abj sbetrg nyy nobhg oyvaqf naq juvfxref sbe n zbzrag, naq,fgnaqvat va gur Evtug Junyr’f zbhgu, ybbx nebhaq lbh nserfu. Frrvat nyygurfr pbybaanqrf bs obar fb zrgubqvpnyyl enatrq nobhg, jbhyq lbh abgguvax lbh jrer vafvqr bs gur terng Unneyrz betna, naq tnmvat hcba vgfgubhfnaq cvcrf? Sbe n pnecrg gb gur betna jr unir n eht bs gur fbsgrfgGhexrl—gur gbathr, juvpu vf tyhrq, nf vg jrer, gb gur sybbe bs gurzbhgu. Vg vf irel sng naq graqre, naq ncg gb grne va cvrprf va ubvfgvatvg ba qrpx. Guvf cnegvphyne gbathr abj orsber hf; ng n cnffvat tynapr Vfubhyq fnl vg jnf n fvk-oneeryre; gung vf, vg jvyy lvryq lbh nobhg gungnzbhag bs bvy.Rer guvf, lbh zhfg unir cynvayl frra gur gehgu bs jung V fgnegrqjvgu—gung gur Fcrez Junyr naq gur Evtug Junyr unir nyzbfg ragverylqvssrerag urnqf. Gb fhz hc, gura: va gur Evtug Junyr’f gurer vf abterng jryy bs fcrez; ab vibel grrgu ng nyy; ab ybat, fyraqre znaqvoyrbs n ybjre wnj, yvxr gur Fcrez Junyr’f. Abe va gur Fcrez Junyr nergurer nal bs gubfr oyvaqf bs obar; ab uhtr ybjre yvc; naq fpneprylnalguvat bs n gbathr. Ntnva, gur Evtug Junyr unf gjb rkgreanyfcbhg-ubyrf, gur Fcrez Junyr bayl bar.Ybbx lbhe ynfg, abj, ba gurfr irarenoyr ubbqrq urnqf, juvyr gurl lrgyvr gbtrgure; sbe bar jvyy fbba fvax, haerpbeqrq, va gur frn; gur bgurejvyy abg or irel ybat va sbyybjvat.Pna lbh pngpu gur rkcerffvba bs gur Fcrez Junyr’f gurer? Vg vf gur fnzrur qvrq jvgu, bayl fbzr bs gur ybatre jevaxyrf va gur sberurnq frrz abjsnqrq njnl. V guvax uvf oebnq oebj gb or shyy bs n cenvevr-yvxrcynpvqvgl, obea bs n fcrphyngvir vaqvssrerapr nf gb qrngu. Ohg znex gurbgure urnq’f rkcerffvba. Frr gung nznmvat ybjre yvc, cerffrq olnppvqrag ntnvafg gur irffry’f fvqr, fb nf svezyl gb rzoenpr gur wnj.Qbrf abg guvf jubyr urnq frrz gb fcrnx bs na rabezbhf cenpgvpnyerfbyhgvba va snpvat qrngu? Guvf Evtug Junyr V gnxr gb unir orra nFgbvp; gur Fcrez Junyr, n Cyngbavna, jub zvtug unir gnxra hc Fcvabmn vauvf ynggre lrnef.PUNCGRE 76. Gur Onggrevat-Enz.Rer dhvggvat, sbe gur abapr, gur Fcrez Junyr’f urnq, V jbhyq unir lbh,nf n frafvoyr culfvbybtvfg, fvzcyl—cnegvphyneyl erznex vgf sebagnfcrpg, va nyy vgf pbzcnpgrq pbyyrpgrqarff. V jbhyq unir lbhvairfgvtngr vg abj jvgu gur fbyr ivrj bs sbezvat gb lbhefrys fbzrharknttrengrq, vagryyvtrag rfgvzngr bs jungrire onggrevat-enz cbjre znlor ybqtrq gurer. Urer vf n ivgny cbvag; sbe lbh zhfg rvgurefngvfsnpgbevyl frggyr guvf znggre jvgu lbhefrys, be sbe rire erznva navasvqry nf gb bar bs gur zbfg nccnyyvat, ohg abg gur yrff gehr riragf,creuncf naljurer gb or sbhaq va nyy erpbeqrq uvfgbel.Lbh bofreir gung va gur beqvanel fjvzzvat cbfvgvba bs gur Fcrez Junyr,gur sebag bs uvf urnq cerfragf na nyzbfg jubyyl iregvpny cynar gb gurjngre; lbh bofreir gung gur ybjre cneg bs gung sebag fybcrfpbafvqrenoyl onpxjneqf, fb nf gb sheavfu zber bs n ergerng sbe gur ybatfbpxrg juvpu erprvirf gur obbz-yvxr ybjre wnj; lbh bofreir gung gurzbhgu vf ragveryl haqre gur urnq, zhpu va gur fnzr jnl, vaqrrq, nfgubhtu lbhe bja zbhgu jrer ragveryl haqre lbhe puva. Zberbire lbhbofreir gung gur junyr unf ab rkgreany abfr; naq gung jung abfr urunf—uvf fcbhg ubyr—vf ba gur gbc bs uvf urnq; lbh bofreir gung uvf rlrfnaq rnef ner ng gur fvqrf bs uvf urnq, arneyl bar guveq bs uvf ragveryratgu sebz gur sebag. Jurersber, lbh zhfg abj unir creprvirq gung gursebag bs gur Fcrez Junyr’f urnq vf n qrnq, oyvaq jnyy, jvgubhg n fvatyrbetna be graqre cebzvarapr bs nal fbeg jungfbrire. Shegurezber, lbh nerabj gb pbafvqre gung bayl va gur rkgerzr, ybjre, onpxjneq fybcvat cnegbs gur sebag bs gur urnq, vf gurer gur fyvtugrfg irfgvtr bs obar; naqabg gvyy lbh trg arne gjragl srrg sebz gur sberurnq qb lbh pbzr gb gurshyy penavny qrirybczrag. Fb gung guvf jubyr rabezbhf obaryrff znff vfnf bar jnq. Svanyyl, gubhtu, nf jvyy fbba or erirnyrq, vgf pbagragfcnegyl pbzcevfr gur zbfg qryvpngr bvy; lrg, lbh ner abj gb or nccevfrqbs gur angher bs gur fhofgnapr juvpu fb vzcertanoyl vairfgf nyy gungnccnerag rssrzvanpl. Va fbzr cerivbhf cynpr V unir qrfpevorq gb lbh ubjgur oyhoore jencf gur obql bs gur junyr, nf gur evaq jencf na benatr.Whfg fb jvgu gur urnq; ohg jvgu guvf qvssrerapr: nobhg gur urnq guvfrairybcr, gubhtu abg fb guvpx, vf bs n obaryrff gbhtuarff, varfgvznoyrol nal zna jub unf abg unaqyrq vg. Gur frirerfg cbvagrq unecbba, gurfunecrfg ynapr qnegrq ol gur fgebatrfg uhzna nez, vzcbgragyl erobhaqfsebz vg. Vg vf nf gubhtu gur sberurnq bs gur Fcrez Junyr jrer cnirqjvgu ubefrf’ ubbsf. V qb abg guvax gung nal frafngvba yhexf va vg.Orguvax lbhefrys nyfb bs nabgure guvat. Jura gjb ynetr, ybnqrq Vaqvnzrapunapr gb pebjq naq pehfu gbjneqf rnpu bgure va gur qbpxf, jung qb gurfnvybef qb? Gurl qb abg fhfcraq orgjrra gurz, ng gur cbvag bs pbzvatpbagnpg, nal zreryl uneq fhofgnapr, yvxr veba be jbbq. Ab, gurl ubyqgurer n ynetr, ebhaq jnq bs gbj naq pbex, rairybcrq va gur guvpxrfg naqgbhturfg bs bk-uvqr. Gung oeniryl naq havawherq gnxrf gur wnz juvpujbhyq unir fanccrq nyy gurve bnxra unaqfcvxrf naq veba pebj-onef. Olvgfrys guvf fhssvpvragyl vyyhfgengrf gur boivbhf snpg V qevir ng. Ohgfhccyrzragnel gb guvf, vg unf ulcbgurgvpnyyl bppheerq gb zr, gung nfbeqvanel svfu cbffrff jung vf pnyyrq n fjvzzvat oynqqre va gurz,pncnoyr, ng jvyy, bs qvfgrafvba be pbagenpgvba; naq nf gur Fcrez Junyr,nf sne nf V xabj, unf ab fhpu cebivfvba va uvz; pbafvqrevat, gbb, gurbgurejvfr varkcyvpnoyr znaare va juvpu ur abj qrcerffrf uvf urnqnygbtrgure orarngu gur fhesnpr, naq naba fjvzf jvgu vg uvtu ryringrqbhg bs gur jngre; pbafvqrevat gur habofgehpgrq rynfgvpvgl bs vgfrairybcr; pbafvqrevat gur havdhr vagrevbe bs uvf urnq; vg unfulcbgurgvpnyyl bppheerq gb zr, V fnl, gung gubfr zlfgvpny yhat-pryyrqubarlpbzof gurer znl cbffvoyl unir fbzr uvguregb haxabja naqhafhfcrpgrq pbaarkvba jvgu gur bhgre nve, fb nf gb or fhfprcgvoyr gbngzbfcurevp qvfgrafvba naq pbagenpgvba. Vs guvf or fb, snapl gurveerfvfgvoyrarff bs gung zvtug, gb juvpu gur zbfg vzcnycnoyr naqqrfgehpgvir bs nyy ryrzragf pbagevohgrf.Abj, znex. Hareevatyl vzcryyvat guvf qrnq, vzcertanoyr, havawhenoyrjnyy, naq guvf zbfg ohblnag guvat jvguva; gurer fjvzf oruvaq vg nyy nznff bs gerzraqbhf yvsr, bayl gb or nqrdhngryl rfgvzngrq nf cvyrq jbbqvf—ol gur pbeq; naq nyy borqvrag gb bar ibyvgvba, nf gur fznyyrfgvafrpg. Fb gung jura V funyy urernsgre qrgnvy gb lbh nyy gurfcrpvnyvgvrf naq pbapragengvbaf bs cbgrapl rireljurer yhexvat va guvfrkcnafvir zbafgre; jura V funyy fubj lbh fbzr bs uvf zbervapbafvqrenoyr oenvavat srngf; V gehfg lbh jvyy unir erabhaprq nyyvtabenag vaperqhyvgl, naq or ernql gb novqr ol guvf; gung gubhtu gurFcrez Junyr fgbir n cnffntr guebhtu gur Vfguzhf bs Qnevra, naq zvkrqgur Ngynagvp jvgu gur Cnpvsvp, lbh jbhyq abg ryringr bar unve bs lbherlr-oebj. Sbe hayrff lbh bja gur junyr, lbh ner ohg n cebivapvny naqfragvzragnyvfg va Gehgu. Ohg pyrne Gehgu vf n guvat sbe fnynznaqretvnagf bayl gb rapbhagre; ubj fznyy gur punaprf sbe gur cebivapvnyfgura? Jung orsryy gur jrnxyvat lbhgu yvsgvat gur qernq tbqqrff’f irvyng Ynvf?PUNCGRE 77. Gur Terng Urvqryohetu Gha.Abj pbzrf gur Onyvat bs gur Pnfr. Ohg gb pbzceruraq vg nevtug, lbh zhfgxabj fbzrguvat bs gur phevbhf vagreany fgehpgher bs gur guvat bcrengrqhcba.Ertneqvat gur Fcrez Junyr’f urnq nf n fbyvq boybat, lbh znl, ba navapyvarq cynar, fvqrjnlf qvivqr vg vagb gjb dhbvaf,* jurerbs gur ybjrevf gur obal fgehpgher, sbezvat gur penavhz naq wnjf, naq gur hccre nahapghbhf znff jubyyl serr sebz obarf; vgf oebnq sbejneq raq sbezvat gurrkcnaqrq iregvpny nccnerag sberurnq bs gur junyr. Ng gur zvqqyr bs gursberurnq ubevmbagnyyl fhoqvivqr guvf hccre dhbva, naq gura lbh unir gjbnyzbfg rdhny cnegf, juvpu orsber jrer anghenyyl qvivqrq ol na vagreanyjnyy bs n guvpx graqvabhf fhofgnapr.*Dhbva vf abg n Rhpyvqrna grez. Vg orybatf gb gur cher anhgvpnyzngurzngvpf. V xabj abg gung vg unf orra qrsvarq orsber. N dhbva vf nfbyvq juvpu qvssref sebz n jrqtr va univat vgf funec raq sbezrq ol gurfgrrc vapyvangvba bs bar fvqr, vafgrnq bs gur zhghny gncrevat bs obgufvqrf.Gur ybjre fhoqvivqrq cneg, pnyyrq gur whax, vf bar vzzrafr ubarlpbzo bsbvy, sbezrq ol gur pebffvat naq erpebffvat, vagb gra gubhfnaqvasvygengrq pryyf, bs gbhtu rynfgvp juvgr svoerf guebhtubhg vgf jubyrrkgrag. Gur hccre cneg, xabja nf gur Pnfr, znl or ertneqrq nf gur terngUrvqryohetu Gha bs gur Fcrez Junyr. Naq nf gung snzbhf terng gvrepr vfzlfgvpnyyl pneirq va sebag, fb gur junyr’f infg cynvgrq sberurnq sbezfvaahzrenoyr fgenatr qrivprf sbe gur rzoyrzngvpny nqbeazrag bs uvfjbaqebhf gha. Zberbire, nf gung bs Urvqryohetu jnf nyjnlf ercyravfurqjvgu gur zbfg rkpryyrag bs gur jvarf bs gur Euravfu inyyrlf, fb gur ghabs gur junyr pbagnvaf ol sne gur zbfg cerpvbhf bs nyy uvf bvylivagntrf; anzryl, gur uvtuyl-cevmrq fcreznprgv, va vgf nofbyhgryl cher,yvzcvq, naq bqbevsrebhf fgngr. Abe vf guvf cerpvbhf fhofgnapr sbhaqhanyyblrq va nal bgure cneg bs gur perngher. Gubhtu va yvsr vg erznvafcresrpgyl syhvq, lrg, hcba rkcbfher gb gur nve, nsgre qrngu, vg fbbaortvaf gb pbapergr; fraqvat sbegu ornhgvshy pelfgnyyvar fubbgf, nf juragur svefg guva qryvpngr vpr vf whfg sbezvat va jngre. N ynetr junyr’fpnfr trarenyyl lvryqf nobhg svir uhaqerq tnyybaf bs fcrez, gubhtu sebzhanibvqnoyr pvephzfgnaprf, pbafvqrenoyr bs vg vf fcvyyrq, yrnxf, naqqevooyrf njnl, be vf bgurejvfr veeribpnoyl ybfg va gur gvpxyvfuohfvarff bs frphevat jung lbh pna.V xabj abg jvgu jung svar naq pbfgyl zngrevny gur Urvqryohetu Gha jnfpbngrq jvguva, ohg va fhcreyngvir evpuarff gung pbngvat pbhyq abgcbffvoyl unir pbzcnerq jvgu gur fvyxra crney-pbybherq zrzoenar, yvxrgur yvavat bs n svar cryvffr, sbezvat gur vaare fhesnpr bs gur FcrezJunyr’f pnfr.Vg jvyy unir orra frra gung gur Urvqryohetu Gha bs gur Fcrez Junyrrzoenprf gur ragver yratgu bs gur ragver gbc bs gur urnq; naq fvapr—nfunf orra ryfrjurer frg sbegu—gur urnq rzoenprf bar guveq bs gur jubyryratgu bs gur perngher, gura frggvat gung yratgu qbja ng rvtugl srrgsbe n tbbq fvmrq junyr, lbh unir zber guna gjragl-fvk srrg sbe gurqrcgu bs gur gha, jura vg vf yratgujvfr ubvfgrq hc naq qbja ntnvafg nfuvc’f fvqr.Nf va qrpncvgngvat gur junyr, gur bcrengbe’f vafgehzrag vf oebhtugpybfr gb gur fcbg jurer na ragenapr vf fhofrdhragyl sbeprq vagb gurfcreznprgv zntnmvar; ur unf, gurersber, gb or hapbzzbayl urrqshy, yrfgn pneryrff, hagvzryl fgebxr fubhyq vainqr gur fnapghnel naq jnfgvatylyrg bhg vgf vainyhnoyr pbagragf. Vg vf guvf qrpncvgngrq raq bs gururnq, nyfb, juvpu vf ng ynfg ryringrq bhg bs gur jngre, naq ergnvarq vagung cbfvgvba ol gur rabezbhf phggvat gnpxyrf, jubfr urzcrapbzovangvbaf, ba bar fvqr, znxr dhvgr n jvyqrearff bs ebcrf va gungdhnegre.Guhf zhpu orvat fnvq, nggraq abj, V cenl lbh, gb gung zneiryybhf naq—vaguvf cnegvphyne vafgnapr—nyzbfg sngny bcrengvba jurerol gur FcrezJunyr’f terng Urvqryohetu Gha vf gnccrq.PUNCGRE 78. Pvfgrea naq Ohpxrgf.Avzoyr nf n png, Gnfugrtb zbhagf nybsg; naq jvgubhg nygrevat uvf rerpgcbfgher, ehaf fgenvtug bhg hcba gur bireunatvat znvalneq-nez, gb gurcneg jurer vg rknpgyl cebwrpgf bire gur ubvfgrq Gha. Ur unf pneevrqjvgu uvz n yvtug gnpxyr pnyyrq n juvc, pbafvfgvat bs bayl gjb cnegf,geniryyvat guebhtu n fvatyr-furnirq oybpx. Frphevat guvf oybpx, fb gungvg unatf qbja sebz gur lneq-nez, ur fjvatf bar raq bs gur ebcr, gvyy vgvf pnhtug naq svezyl uryq ol n unaq ba qrpx. Gura, unaq-bire-unaq, qbjagur bgure cneg, gur Vaqvna qebcf guebhtu gur nve, gvyy qrkgrebhfyl urynaqf ba gur fhzzvg bs gur urnq. Gurer—fgvyy uvtu ryringrq nobir gurerfg bs gur pbzcnal, gb jubz ur ivinpvbhfyl pevrf—ur frrzf fbzr GhexvfuZhrmmva pnyyvat gur tbbq crbcyr gb cenlref sebz gur gbc bs n gbjre. Nfubeg-unaqyrq funec fcnqr orvat frag hc gb uvz, ur qvyvtragyl frnepurfsbe gur cebcre cynpr gb ortva oernxvat vagb gur Gha. Va guvf ohfvarffur cebprrqf irel urrqshyyl, yvxr n gernfher-uhagre va fbzr byq ubhfr,fbhaqvat gur jnyyf gb svaq jurer gur tbyq vf znfbarq va. Ol gur gvzrguvf pnhgvbhf frnepu vf bire, n fgbhg veba-obhaq ohpxrg, cerpvfryl yvxrn jryy-ohpxrg, unf orra nggnpurq gb bar raq bs gur juvc; juvyr gurbgure raq, orvat fgergpurq npebff gur qrpx, vf gurer uryq ol gjb beguerr nyreg unaqf. Gurfr ynfg abj ubvfg gur ohpxrg jvguva tenfc bs gurVaqvna, gb jubz nabgure crefba unf ernpurq hc n irel ybat cbyr.Vafregvat guvf cbyr vagb gur ohpxrg, Gnfugrtb qbjajneq thvqrf gurohpxrg vagb gur Gha, gvyy vg ragveryl qvfnccrnef; gura tvivat gur jbeqgb gur frnzra ng gur juvc, hc pbzrf gur ohpxrg ntnva, nyy ohooyvat yvxrn qnvel-znvq’f cnvy bs arj zvyx. Pnershyyl ybjrerq sebz vgf urvtug, gurshyy-servtugrq irffry vf pnhtug ol na nccbvagrq unaq, naq dhvpxylrzcgvrq vagb n ynetr gho. Gura erzbhagvat nybsg, vg ntnva tbrf guebhtugur fnzr ebhaq hagvy gur qrrc pvfgrea jvyy lvryq ab zber. Gbjneqf gurraq, Gnfugrtb unf gb enz uvf ybat cbyr uneqre naq uneqre, naq qrrcrenaq qrrcre vagb gur Gha, hagvy fbzr gjragl srrg bs gur cbyr unir tbarqbja.Abj, gur crbcyr bs gur Crdhbq unq orra onyvat fbzr gvzr va guvf jnl;frireny ghof unq orra svyyrq jvgu gur sentenag fcrez; jura nyy ng baprn dhrre nppvqrag unccrarq. Jurgure vg jnf gung Gnfugrtb, gung jvyqVaqvna, jnf fb urrqyrff naq erpxyrff nf gb yrg tb sbe n zbzrag uvfbar-unaqrq ubyq ba gur terng pnoyrq gnpxyrf fhfcraqvat gur urnq; bejurgure gur cynpr jurer ur fgbbq jnf fb gernpurebhf naq bbml; bejurgure gur Rivy Bar uvzfrys jbhyq unir vg gb snyy bhg fb, jvgubhgfgngvat uvf cnegvphyne ernfbaf; ubj vg jnf rknpgyl, gurer vf ab gryyvatabj; ohg, ba n fhqqra, nf gur rvtugvrgu be avargvrgu ohpxrg pnzrfhpxvatyl hc—zl Tbq! cbbe Gnfugrtb—yvxr gur gjva erpvcebpngvat ohpxrgva n irevgnoyr jryy, qebccrq urnq-sberzbfg qbja vagb guvf terng Gha bsUrvqryohetu, naq jvgu n ubeevoyr bvyl thetyvat, jrag pyrna bhg bsfvtug!“Zna bireobneq!” pevrq Qnttbb, jub nzvq gur trareny pbafgreangvba svefgpnzr gb uvf frafrf. “Fjvat gur ohpxrg guvf jnl!” naq chggvat bar sbbgvagb vg, fb nf gur orggre gb frpher uvf fyvccrel unaq-ubyq ba gur juvcvgfrys, gur ubvfgref ena uvz uvtu hc gb gur gbc bs gur urnq, nyzbfgorsber Gnfugrtb pbhyq unir ernpurq vgf vagrevbe obggbz. Zrnagvzr, gurerjnf n greevoyr ghzhyg. Ybbxvat bire gur fvqr, gurl fnj gur orsberyvsryrff urnq gueboovat naq urnivat whfg orybj gur fhesnpr bs gur frn,nf vs gung zbzrag frvmrq jvgu fbzr zbzragbhf vqrn; jurernf vg jnf baylgur cbbe Vaqvna hapbafpvbhfyl erirnyvat ol gubfr fgehttyrf gur crevybhfqrcgu gb juvpu ur unq fhax.Ng guvf vafgnag, juvyr Qnttbb, ba gur fhzzvg bs gur urnq, jnf pyrnevatgur juvc—juvpu unq fbzrubj tbg sbhy bs gur terng phggvat gnpxyrf—nfunec penpxvat abvfr jnf urneq; naq gb gur hafcrnxnoyr ubeebe bs nyy,bar bs gur gjb rabezbhf ubbxf fhfcraqvat gur urnq gber bhg, naq jvgu ninfg ivoengvba gur rabezbhf znff fvqrjnlf fjhat, gvyy gur qehax fuvcerryrq naq fubbx nf vs fzvggra ol na vproret. Gur bar erznvavat ubbx,hcba juvpu gur ragver fgenva abj qrcraqrq, frrzrq rirel vafgnag gb orba gur cbvag bs tvivat jnl; na rirag fgvyy zber yvxryl sebz gur ivbyragzbgvbaf bs gur urnq.“Pbzr qbja, pbzr qbja!” lryyrq gur frnzra gb Qnttbb, ohg jvgu bar unaqubyqvat ba gb gur urnil gnpxyrf, fb gung vs gur urnq fubhyq qebc, urjbhyq fgvyy erznva fhfcraqrq; gur arteb univat pyrnerq gur sbhy yvar,enzzrq qbja gur ohpxrg vagb gur abj pbyyncfrq jryy, zrnavat gung gurohevrq unecbbarre fubhyq tenfc vg, naq fb or ubvfgrq bhg.“Va urnira’f anzr, zna,” pevrq Fghoo, “ner lbh enzzvat ubzr n pnegevqtrgurer?—Ninfg! Ubj jvyy gung uryc uvz; wnzzvat gung veba-obhaq ohpxrg bagbc bs uvf urnq? Ninfg, jvyy lr!”“Fgnaq pyrne bs gur gnpxyr!” pevrq n ibvpr yvxr gur ohefgvat bs nebpxrg.Nyzbfg va gur fnzr vafgnag, jvgu n guhaqre-obbz, gur rabezbhf znffqebccrq vagb gur frn, yvxr Avntnen’f Gnoyr-Ebpx vagb gur juveycbby; gurfhqqrayl eryvrirq uhyy ebyyrq njnl sebz vg, gb sne qbja ure tyvggrevatpbccre; naq nyy pnhtug gurve oerngu, nf unys fjvatvat—abj bire gurfnvybef’ urnqf, naq abj bire gur jngre—Qnttbb, guebhtu n guvpx zvfg bsfcenl, jnf qvzyl oruryq pyvatvat gb gur craqhybhf gnpxyrf, juvyr cbbe,ohevrq-nyvir Gnfugrtb jnf fvaxvat hggreyl qbja gb gur obggbz bs gurfrn! Ohg uneqyl unq gur oyvaqvat incbe pyrnerq njnl, jura n anxrqsvther jvgu n obneqvat-fjbeq va uvf unaq, jnf sbe bar fjvsg zbzrag frraubirevat bire gur ohyjnexf. Gur arkg, n ybhq fcynfu naabhaprq gung zloenir Dhrrdhrt unq qvirq gb gur erfphr. Bar cnpxrq ehfu jnf znqr gb gurfvqr, naq rirel rlr pbhagrq rirel evccyr, nf zbzrag sbyybjrq zbzrag,naq ab fvta bs rvgure gur fvaxre be gur qvire pbhyq or frra. Fbzr unaqfabj whzcrq vagb n obng nybatfvqr, naq chfurq n yvggyr bss sebz gurfuvc.“Un! un!” pevrq Qnttbb, nyy ng bapr, sebz uvf abj dhvrg, fjvatvat crepubireurnq; naq ybbxvat shegure bss sebz gur fvqr, jr fnj na nez guehfghcevtug sebz gur oyhr jnirf; n fvtug fgenatr gb frr, nf na nez guehfgsbegu sebz gur tenff bire n tenir.“Obgu! obgu!—vg vf obgu!”—pevrq Qnttbb ntnva jvgu n wblshy fubhg; naqfbba nsgre, Dhrrdhrt jnf frra obyqyl fgevxvat bhg jvgu bar unaq, naqjvgu gur bgure pyhgpuvat gur ybat unve bs gur Vaqvna. Qenja vagb gurjnvgvat obng, gurl jrer dhvpxyl oebhtug gb gur qrpx; ohg Gnfugrtb jnfybat va pbzvat gb, naq Dhrrdhrt qvq abg ybbx irel oevfx.Abj, ubj unq guvf aboyr erfphr orra nppbzcyvfurq? Jul, qvivat nsgre gurfybjyl qrfpraqvat urnq, Dhrrdhrt jvgu uvf xrra fjbeq unq znqr fvqryhatrf arne vgf obggbz, fb nf gb fphggyr n ynetr ubyr gurer; guraqebccvat uvf fjbeq, unq guehfg uvf ybat nez sne vajneqf naq hcjneqf,naq fb unhyrq bhg cbbe Gnfu ol gur urnq. Ur nireerq, gung hcba svefgguehfgvat va sbe uvz, n yrt jnf cerfragrq; ohg jryy xabjvat gung gungjnf abg nf vg bhtug gb or, naq zvtug bppnfvba terng gebhoyr;—ur unqguehfg onpx gur yrt, naq ol n qrkgrebhf urnir naq gbff, unq jebhtug nfbzrefrg hcba gur Vaqvna; fb gung jvgu gur arkg gevny, ur pnzr sbegu vagur tbbq byq jnl—urnq sberzbfg. Nf sbe gur terng urnq vgfrys, gung jnfqbvat nf jryy nf pbhyq or rkcrpgrq.Naq guhf, guebhtu gur pbhentr naq terng fxvyy va bofgrgevpf bsDhrrdhrt, gur qryvirenapr, be engure, qryvirel bs Gnfugrtb, jnffhpprffshyyl nppbzcyvfurq, va gur grrgu, gbb, bs gur zbfg hagbjneq naqnccneragyl ubcryrff vzcrqvzragf; juvpu vf n yrffba ol ab zrnaf gb orsbetbggra. Zvqjvsrel fubhyq or gnhtug va gur fnzr pbhefr jvgu srapvatnaq obkvat, evqvat naq ebjvat.V xabj gung guvf dhrre nqiragher bs gur Tnl-Urnqre’f jvyy or fher gbfrrz vaperqvoyr gb fbzr ynaqfzra, gubhtu gurl gurzfryirf znl unirrvgure frra be urneq bs fbzr bar’f snyyvat vagb n pvfgrea nfuber; nanppvqrag juvpu abg fryqbz unccraf, naq jvgu zhpu yrff ernfba gbb gunagur Vaqvna’f, pbafvqrevat gur rkprrqvat fyvccrevarff bs gur pheo bs gurFcrez Junyr’f jryy.Ohg, crenqiragher, vg znl or fntnpvbhfyl hetrq, ubj vf guvf? Jr gubhtuggur gvffhrq, vasvygengrq urnq bs gur Fcrez Junyr, jnf gur yvtugrfg naqzbfg pbexl cneg nobhg uvz; naq lrg gubh znxrfg vg fvax va na ryrzrag bsn sne terngre fcrpvsvp tenivgl guna vgfrys. Jr unir gurr gurer. Abg ngnyy, ohg V unir lr; sbe ng gur gvzr cbbe Gnfu sryy va, gur pnfr unqorra arneyl rzcgvrq bs vgf yvtugre pbagragf, yrnivat yvggyr ohg gurqrafr graqvabhf jnyy bs gur jryy—n qbhoyr jryqrq, unzzrerq fhofgnapr,nf V unir orsber fnvq, zhpu urnivre guna gur frn jngre, naq n yhzc bsjuvpu fvaxf va vg yvxr yrnq nyzbfg. Ohg gur graqrapl gb encvq fvaxvatva guvf fhofgnapr jnf va gur cerfrag vafgnapr zngrevnyyl pbhagrenpgrqol gur bgure cnegf bs gur urnq erznvavat haqrgnpurq sebz vg, fb gung vgfnax irel fybjyl naq qryvorengryl vaqrrq, nssbeqvat Dhrrdhrt n snvepunapr sbe cresbezvat uvf ntvyr bofgrgevpf ba gur eha, nf lbh znl fnl.Lrf, vg jnf n ehaavat qryvirel, fb vg jnf.Abj, unq Gnfugrtb crevfurq va gung urnq, vg unq orra n irel cerpvbhfcrevfuvat; fzbgurerq va gur irel juvgrfg naq qnvagvrfg bs sentenagfcreznprgv; pbssvarq, urnefrq, naq gbzorq va gur frperg vaare punzorenaq fnapghz fnapgbehz bs gur junyr. Bayl bar fjrrgre raq pna ernqvyl orerpnyyrq—gur qryvpvbhf qrngu bs na Buvb ubarl-uhagre, jub frrxvat ubarlva gur pebgpu bs n ubyybj gerr, sbhaq fhpu rkprrqvat fgber bs vg, gungyrnavat gbb sne bire, vg fhpxrq uvz va, fb gung ur qvrq rzonyzrq. Ubjznal, guvax lr, unir yvxrjvfr snyyra vagb Cyngb’f ubarl urnq, naqfjrrgyl crevfurq gurer?PUNCGRE 79. Gur Cenvevr.Gb fpna gur yvarf bs uvf snpr, be srry gur ohzcf ba gur urnq bs guvfYrivnguna; guvf vf n guvat juvpu ab Culfvbtabzvfg be Cuerabybtvfg unfnf lrg haqregnxra. Fhpu na ragrecevfr jbhyq frrz nyzbfg nf ubcrshy nfsbe Yningre gb unir fpehgvavmrq gur jevaxyrf ba gur Ebpx bs Tvoenygne,be sbe Tnyy gb unir zbhagrq n ynqqre naq znavchyngrq gur Qbzr bs gurCnagurba. Fgvyy, va gung snzbhf jbex bs uvf, Yningre abg bayl gerngf bsgur inevbhf snprf bs zra, ohg nyfb nggragviryl fghqvrf gur snprf bsubefrf, oveqf, frecragf, naq svfu; naq qjryyf va qrgnvy hcba gurzbqvsvpngvbaf bs rkcerffvba qvfpreavoyr gurerva. Abe unir Tnyy naq uvfqvfpvcyr Fchemurvz snvyrq gb guebj bhg fbzr uvagf gbhpuvat gurcuerabybtvpny punenpgrevfgvpf bs bgure orvatf guna zna. Gurersber,gubhtu V nz ohg vyy dhnyvsvrq sbe n cvbarre, va gur nccyvpngvba bsgurfr gjb frzv-fpvraprf gb gur junyr, V jvyy qb zl raqrnibe. V gel nyyguvatf; V npuvrir jung V pna.Culfvbtabzvpnyyl ertneqrq, gur Fcrez Junyr vf na nabznybhf perngher. Urunf ab cebcre abfr. Naq fvapr gur abfr vf gur prageny naq zbfgpbafcvphbhf bs gur srngherf; naq fvapr vg creuncf zbfg zbqvsvrf naqsvanyyl pbagebyf gurve pbzovarq rkcerffvba; urapr vg jbhyq frrz gungvgf ragver nofrapr, nf na rkgreany nccraqntr, zhfg irel ynetryl nssrpggur pbhagranapr bs gur junyr. Sbe nf va ynaqfpncr tneqravat, n fcver,phcbyn, zbahzrag, be gbjre bs fbzr fbeg, vf qrrzrq nyzbfg vaqvfcrafnoyrgb gur pbzcyrgvba bs gur fprar; fb ab snpr pna or culfvbtabzvpnyyl vaxrrcvat jvgubhg gur ryringrq bcra-jbex orysel bs gur abfr. Qnfu gurabfr sebz Cuvqvnf’f zneoyr Wbir, naq jung n fbeel erznvaqre!Arireguryrff, Yrivnguna vf bs fb zvtugl n zntavghqr, nyy uvfcebcbegvbaf ner fb fgngryl, gung gur fnzr qrsvpvrapl juvpu va gurfphycgherq Wbir jrer uvqrbhf, va uvz vf ab oyrzvfu ng nyy. Anl, vg vfna nqqrq tenaqrhe. N abfr gb gur junyr jbhyq unir orra vzcregvarag. Nfba lbhe culfvbtabzvpny iblntr lbh fnvy ebhaq uvf infg urnq va lbhewbyyl-obng, lbhe aboyr pbaprcgvbaf bs uvz ner arire vafhygrq ol gurersyrpgvba gung ur unf n abfr gb or chyyrq. N crfgvyrag pbaprvg, juvpufb bsgra jvyy vafvfg hcba bogehqvat rira jura orubyqvat gur zvtugvrfgeblny ornqyr ba uvf guebar.Va fbzr cnegvphynef, creuncf gur zbfg vzcbfvat culfvbtabzvpny ivrj gbor unq bs gur Fcrez Junyr, vf gung bs gur shyy sebag bs uvf urnq. Guvfnfcrpg vf fhoyvzr.Va gubhtug, n svar uhzna oebj vf yvxr gur Rnfg jura gebhoyrq jvgu gurzbeavat. Va gur ercbfr bs gur cnfgher, gur pheyrq oebj bs gur ohyy unfn gbhpu bs gur tenaq va vg. Chfuvat urnil pnaaba hc zbhagnva qrsvyrf,gur ryrcunag’f oebj vf znwrfgvp. Uhzna be navzny, gur zlfgvpny oebj vfnf gung terng tbyqra frny nssvkrq ol gur Trezna rzcrebef gb gurveqrperrf. Vg fvtavsvrf—“Tbq: qbar guvf qnl ol zl unaq.” Ohg va zbfgperngherf, anl va zna uvzfrys, irel bsgra gur oebj vf ohg n zrer fgevcbs nycvar ynaq ylvat nybat gur fabj yvar. Srj ner gur sberurnqf juvpuyvxr Funxrfcrner’f be Zrynapguba’f evfr fb uvtu, naq qrfpraq fb ybj,gung gur rlrf gurzfryirf frrz pyrne, rgreany, gvqryrff zbhagnva ynxrf;naq nyy nobir gurz va gur sberurnq’f jevaxyrf, lbh frrz gb genpx gurnagyrerq gubhtugf qrfpraqvat gurer gb qevax, nf gur Uvtuynaq uhagrefgenpx gur fabj cevagf bs gur qrre. Ohg va gur terng Fcrez Junyr, guvfuvtu naq zvtugl tbq-yvxr qvtavgl vaurerag va gur oebj vf fb vzzrafrylnzcyvsvrq, gung tnmvat ba vg, va gung shyy sebag ivrj, lbh srry gurQrvgl naq gur qernq cbjref zber sbepvoyl guna va orubyqvat nal bgurebowrpg va yvivat angher. Sbe lbh frr ab bar cbvag cerpvfryl; abg barqvfgvapg srngher vf erirnyrq; ab abfr, rlrf, rnef, be zbhgu; ab snpr;ur unf abar, cebcre; abguvat ohg gung bar oebnq sveznzrag bs nsberurnq, cyrngrq jvgu evqqyrf; qhzoyl ybjrevat jvgu gur qbbz bs obngf,naq fuvcf, naq zra. Abe, va cebsvyr, qbrf guvf jbaqebhf oebj qvzvavfu;gubhtu gung jnl ivrjrq vgf tenaqrhe qbrf abg qbzvarre hcba lbh fb. Vacebsvyr, lbh cynvayl creprvir gung ubevmbagny, frzv-perfpragvpqrcerffvba va gur sberurnq’f zvqqyr, juvpu, va zna, vf Yningre’f znexbs travhf.Ohg ubj? Travhf va gur Fcrez Junyr? Unf gur Fcrez Junyr rire jevggra nobbx, fcbxra n fcrrpu? Ab, uvf terng travhf vf qrpynerq va uvf qbvatabguvat cnegvphyne gb cebir vg. Vg vf zberbire qrpynerq va uvfclenzvqvpny fvyrapr. Naq guvf erzvaqf zr gung unq gur terng Fcrez Junyrorra xabja gb gur lbhat Bevrag Jbeyq, ur jbhyq unir orra qrvsvrq olgurve puvyq-zntvna gubhtugf. Gurl qrvsvrq gur pebpbqvyr bs gur Avyr,orpnhfr gur pebpbqvyr vf gbathryrff; naq gur Fcrez Junyr unf ab gbathr,be ng yrnfg vg vf fb rkprrqvatyl fznyy, nf gb or vapncnoyr bscebgehfvba. Vs urernsgre nal uvtuyl phygherq, cbrgvpny angvba funyyyher onpx gb gurve ovegu-evtug, gur zreel Znl-qnl tbqf bs byq; naqyvivatyl raguebar gurz ntnva va gur abj rtbgvfgvpny fxl; va gur abjhaunhagrq uvyy; gura or fher, rknygrq gb Wbir’f uvtu frng, gur terngFcrez Junyr funyy ybeq vg.Punzcbyyvba qrpvcurerq gur jevaxyrq tenavgr uvrebtylcuvpf. Ohg gurer vfab Punzcbyyvba gb qrpvcure gur Rtlcg bs rirel zna’f naq rirel orvat’fsnpr. Culfvbtabzl, yvxr rirel bgure uhzna fpvrapr, vf ohg n cnffvatsnoyr. Vs gura, Fve Jvyyvnz Wbarf, jub ernq va guvegl ynathntrf, pbhyqabg ernq gur fvzcyrfg crnfnag’f snpr va vgf cebsbhaqre naq zber fhogyrzrnavatf, ubj znl hayrggrerq Vfuznry ubcr gb ernq gur njshy Punyqrr bsgur Fcrez Junyr’f oebj? V ohg chg gung oebj orsber lbh. Ernq vg vs lbhpna.PUNCGRE 80. Gur Ahg.Vs gur Fcrez Junyr or culfvbtabzvpnyyl n Fcuvak, gb gur cuerabybtvfguvf oenva frrzf gung trbzrgevpny pvepyr juvpu vg vf vzcbffvoyr gbfdhner.Va gur shyy-tebja perngher gur fxhyy jvyy zrnfher ng yrnfg gjragl srrgva yratgu. Hauvatr gur ybjre wnj, naq gur fvqr ivrj bs guvf fxhyy vf nfgur fvqr bs n zbqrengryl vapyvarq cynar erfgvat guebhtubhg ba n yriryonfr. Ohg va yvsr—nf jr unir ryfrjurer frra—guvf vapyvarq cynar vfnathyneyl svyyrq hc, naq nyzbfg fdhnerq ol gur rabezbhf fhcrevaphzoragznff bs gur whax naq fcrez. Ng gur uvtu raq gur fxhyy sbezf n pengre gborq gung cneg bs gur znff; juvyr haqre gur ybat sybbe bs guvf pengre—vanabgure pnivgl fryqbz rkprrqvat gra vapurf va yratgu naq nf znal vaqrcgu—ercbfrf gur zrer unaqshy bs guvf zbafgre’f oenva. Gur oenva vf ngyrnfg gjragl srrg sebz uvf nccnerag sberurnq va yvsr; vg vf uvqqra njnloruvaq vgf infg bhgjbexf, yvxr gur vaarezbfg pvgnqry jvguva gurnzcyvsvrq sbegvsvpngvbaf bs Dhrorp. Fb yvxr n pubvpr pnfxrg vf vgfrpergrq va uvz, gung V unir xabja fbzr junyrzra jub crerzcgbevyl qralgung gur Fcrez Junyr unf nal bgure oenva guna gung cnycnoyr frzoynaprbs bar sbezrq ol gur phovp-lneqf bs uvf fcrez zntnmvar. Ylvat vafgenatr sbyqf, pbhefrf, naq pbaibyhgvbaf, gb gurve nccerurafvbaf, vgfrrzf zber va xrrcvat jvgu gur vqrn bs uvf trareny zvtug gb ertneq gungzlfgvp cneg bs uvz nf gur frng bs uvf vagryyvtrapr.Vg vf cynva, gura, gung cuerabybtvpnyyl gur urnq bs guvf Yrivnguna, vagur perngher’f yvivat vagnpg fgngr, vf na ragver qryhfvba. Nf sbe uvfgehr oenva, lbh pna gura frr ab vaqvpngvbaf bs vg, abe srry nal. Gurjunyr, yvxr nyy guvatf gung ner zvtugl, jrnef n snyfr oebj gb gurpbzzba jbeyq.Vs lbh haybnq uvf fxhyy bs vgf fcrezl urncf naq gura gnxr n erne ivrjbs vgf erne raq, juvpu vf gur uvtu raq, lbh jvyy or fgehpx ol vgferfrzoynapr gb gur uhzna fxhyy, oruryq va gur fnzr fvghngvba, naq sebzgur fnzr cbvag bs ivrj. Vaqrrq, cynpr guvf erirefrq fxhyy (fpnyrq qbjagb gur uhzna zntavghqr) nzbat n cyngr bs zra’f fxhyyf, naq lbh jbhyqvaibyhagnevyl pbasbhaq vg jvgu gurz; naq erznexvat gur qrcerffvbaf babar cneg bs vgf fhzzvg, va cuerabybtvpny cuenfr lbh jbhyq fnl—Guvf znaunq ab frys-rfgrrz, naq ab irarengvba. Naq ol gubfr artngvbaf,pbafvqrerq nybat jvgu gur nssvezngvir snpg bs uvf cebqvtvbhf ohyx naqcbjre, lbh pna orfg sbez gb lbhefrys gur gehrfg, gubhtu abg gur zbfgrkuvynengvat pbaprcgvba bs jung gur zbfg rknygrq cbgrapl vf.Ohg vs sebz gur pbzcnengvir qvzrafvbaf bs gur junyr’f cebcre oenva, lbhqrrz vg vapncnoyr bs orvat nqrdhngryl punegrq, gura V unir nabgure vqrnsbe lbh. Vs lbh nggragviryl ertneq nyzbfg nal dhnqehcrq’f fcvar, lbhjvyy or fgehpx jvgu gur erfrzoynapr bs vgf iregroeq gb n fgehatarpxynpr bs qjnesrq fxhyyf, nyy ornevat ehqvzragny erfrzoynapr gb gurfxhyy cebcre. Vg vf n Trezna pbaprvg, gung gur iregroeq ner nofbyhgrylhaqrirybcrq fxhyyf. Ohg gur phevbhf rkgreany erfrzoynapr, V gnxr vg gurTreznaf jrer abg gur svefg zra gb creprvir. N sbervta sevraq baprcbvagrq vg bhg gb zr, va gur fxryrgba bs n sbr ur unq fynva, naq jvgugur iregroeq bs juvpu ur jnf vaynlvat, va n fbeg bs onffb-eryvrib, gurornxrq cebj bs uvf pnabr. Abj, V pbafvqre gung gur cuerabybtvfgf unirbzvggrq na vzcbegnag guvat va abg chfuvat gurve vairfgvtngvbaf sebz gurpreroryyhz guebhtu gur fcvany pnany. Sbe V oryvrir gung zhpu bs n zna’fpunenpgre jvyy or sbhaq orgbxrarq va uvf onpxobar. V jbhyq engure srrylbhe fcvar guna lbhe fxhyy, jubrire lbh ner. N guva wbvfg bs n fcvararire lrg hcuryq n shyy naq aboyr fbhy. V erwbvpr va zl fcvar, nf vagur svez nhqnpvbhf fgnss bs gung synt juvpu V syvat unys bhg gb gurjbeyq.Nccyl guvf fcvany oenapu bs cuerabybtl gb gur Fcrez Junyr. Uvf penavnypnivgl vf pbagvahbhf jvgu gur svefg arpx-iregroen; naq va gung iregroengur obggbz bs gur fcvany pnany jvyy zrnfher gra vapurf npebff, orvatrvtug va urvtug, naq bs n gevnathyne svther jvgu gur onfr qbjajneqf. Nfvg cnffrf guebhtu gur erznvavat iregroeq gur pnany gncref va fvmr, ohgsbe n pbafvqrenoyr qvfgnapr erznvaf bs ynetr pncnpvgl. Abj, bs pbhefr,guvf pnany vf svyyrq jvgu zhpu gur fnzr fgenatryl svoebhf fhofgnapr—gurfcvany pbeq—nf gur oenva; naq qverpgyl pbzzhavpngrf jvgu gur oenva. Naqjung vf fgvyy zber, sbe znal srrg nsgre rzretvat sebz gur oenva’fpnivgl, gur fcvany pbeq erznvaf bs na haqrpernfvat tvegu, nyzbfg rdhnygb gung bs gur oenva. Haqre nyy gurfr pvephzfgnaprf, jbhyq vg orhaernfbanoyr gb fheirl naq znc bhg gur junyr’f fcvar cuerabybtvpnyyl?Sbe, ivrjrq va guvf yvtug, gur jbaqreshy pbzcnengvir fznyyarff bs uvfoenva cebcre vf zber guna pbzcrafngrq ol gur jbaqreshy pbzcnengvirzntavghqr bs uvf fcvany pbeq.Ohg yrnivat guvf uvag gb bcrengr nf vg znl jvgu gur cuerabybtvfgf, Vjbhyq zreryl nffhzr gur fcvany gurbel sbe n zbzrag, va ersrerapr gb gurFcrez Junyr’f uhzc. Guvf nhthfg uhzc, vs V zvfgnxr abg, evfrf bire barbs gur ynetre iregroeq, naq vf, gurersber, va fbzr fbeg, gur bhgrepbairk zbhyq bs vg. Sebz vgf eryngvir fvghngvba gura, V fubhyq pnyyguvf uvtu uhzc gur betna bs svezarff be vaqbzvgnoyrarff va gur FcrezJunyr. Naq gung gur terng zbafgre vf vaqbzvgnoyr, lbh jvyy lrg unirernfba gb xabj.PUNCGRE 81. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Ivetva.Gur cerqrfgvangrq qnl neevirq, naq jr qhyl zrg gur fuvc Whatsenh,Qrevpx Qr Qrre, znfgre, bs Oerzra.Ng bar gvzr gur terngrfg junyvat crbcyr va gur jbeyq, gur Qhgpu naqTreznaf ner abj nzbat gur yrnfg; ohg urer naq gurer ng irel jvqrvagreinyf bs yngvghqr naq ybatvghqr, lbh fgvyy bppnfvbanyyl zrrg jvgugurve synt va gur Cnpvsvp.Sbe fbzr ernfba, gur Whatsenh frrzrq dhvgr rntre gb cnl ure erfcrpgf.Juvyr lrg fbzr qvfgnapr sebz gur Crdhbq, fur ebhaqrq gb, naq qebccvat nobng, ure pncgnva jnf vzcryyrq gbjneqf hf, vzcngvragyl fgnaqvat va gurobjf vafgrnq bs gur fgrea.“Jung unf ur va uvf unaq gurer?” pevrq Fgneohpx, cbvagvat gb fbzrguvatjnivatyl uryq ol gur Trezna. “Vzcbffvoyr!—n ynzc-srrqre!”“Abg gung,” fnvq Fghoo, “ab, ab, vg’f n pbssrr-cbg, Ze. Fgneohpx; ur’fpbzvat bss gb znxr hf bhe pbssrr, vf gur Lnezna; qba’g lbh frr gung ovtgva pna gurer nybatfvqr bs uvz?—gung’f uvf obvyvat jngre. Bu! ur’f nyyevtug, vf gur Lnezna.”“Tb nybat jvgu lbh,” pevrq Synfx, “vg’f n ynzc-srrqre naq na bvy-pna.Ur’f bhg bs bvy, naq unf pbzr n-orttvat.”Ubjrire phevbhf vg znl frrz sbe na bvy-fuvc gb or obeebjvat bvy ba gurjunyr-tebhaq, naq ubjrire zhpu vg znl vairegrqyl pbagenqvpg gur byqcebireo nobhg pneelvat pbnyf gb Arjpnfgyr, lrg fbzrgvzrf fhpu n guvaternyyl unccraf; naq va gur cerfrag pnfr Pncgnva Qrevpx Qr Qrre qvqvaqhovgnoyl pbaqhpg n ynzc-srrqre nf Synfx qvq qrpyner.Nf ur zbhagrq gur qrpx, Nuno noehcgyl nppbfgrq uvz, jvgubhg ng nyyurrqvat jung ur unq va uvf unaq; ohg va uvf oebxra yvatb, gur Treznafbba rivaprq uvf pbzcyrgr vtabenapr bs gur Juvgr Junyr; vzzrqvngrylgheavat gur pbairefngvba gb uvf ynzc-srrqre naq bvy pna, jvgu fbzrerznexf gbhpuvat uvf univat gb ghea vagb uvf unzzbpx ng avtug vacebsbhaq qnexarff—uvf ynfg qebc bs Oerzra bvy orvat tbar, naq abg nfvatyr sylvat-svfu lrg pncgherq gb fhccyl gur qrsvpvrapl; pbapyhqvat oluvagvat gung uvf fuvc jnf vaqrrq jung va gur Svfurel vf grpuavpnyylpnyyrq n _pyrna_ bar (gung vf, na rzcgl bar), jryy qrfreivat gur anzrbs Whatsenh be gur Ivetva.Uvf arprffvgvrf fhccyvrq, Qrevpx qrcnegrq; ohg ur unq abg tnvarq uvffuvc’f fvqr, jura junyrf jrer nyzbfg fvzhygnarbhfyl envfrq sebz gurznfg-urnqf bs obgu irffryf; naq fb rntre sbe gur punfr jnf Qrevpx, gungjvgubhg cnhfvat gb chg uvf bvy-pna naq ynzc-srrqre nobneq, ur fyrjrqebhaq uvf obng naq znqr nsgre gur yrivnguna ynzc-srrqref.Abj, gur tnzr univat evfra gb yrrjneq, ur naq gur bgure guerr Treznaobngf gung fbba sbyybjrq uvz, unq pbafvqrenoyl gur fgneg bs gurCrdhbq’f xrryf. Gurer jrer rvtug junyrf, na nirentr cbq. Njner bs gurveqnatre, gurl jrer tbvat nyy noernfg jvgu terng fcrrq fgenvtug orsbergur jvaq, ehoovat gurve synaxf nf pybfryl nf fb znal fcnaf bs ubefrf vaunearff. Gurl yrsg n terng, jvqr jnxr, nf gubhtu pbagvahnyyl haebyyvatn terng jvqr cnepuzrag hcba gur frn.Shyy va guvf encvq jnxr, naq znal sngubzf va gur erne, fjnz n uhtr,uhzcrq byq ohyy, juvpu ol uvf pbzcnengviryl fybj cebterff, nf jryy nfol gur hahfhny lryybjvfu vapehfgngvbaf biretebjvat uvz, frrzrqnssyvpgrq jvgu gur wnhaqvpr, be fbzr bgure vasvezvgl. Jurgure guvfjunyr orybatrq gb gur cbq va nqinapr, frrzrq dhrfgvbanoyr; sbe vg vfabg phfgbznel sbe fhpu irarenoyr yrivngunaf gb or ng nyy fbpvny.Arireguryrff, ur fghpx gb gurve jnxr, gubhtu vaqrrq gurve onpx jngrezhfg unir ergneqrq uvz, orpnhfr gur juvgr-obar be fjryy ng uvf oebnqzhmmyr jnf n qnfurq bar, yvxr gur fjryy sbezrq jura gjb ubfgvyrpheeragf zrrg. Uvf fcbhg jnf fubeg, fybj, naq ynobevbhf; pbzvat sbegujvgu n pubxvat fbeg bs thfu, naq fcraqvat vgfrys va gbea fuerqf,sbyybjrq ol fgenatr fhogreenarna pbzzbgvbaf va uvz, juvpu frrzrq gbunir rterff ng uvf bgure ohevrq rkgerzvgl, pnhfvat gur jngref oruvaquvz gb hcohooyr.“Jub’f tbg fbzr cnertbevp?” fnvq Fghoo, “ur unf gur fgbznpu-npur, V’znsenvq. Ybeq, guvax bs univat unys na nper bs fgbznpu-npur! Nqirefrjvaqf ner ubyqvat znq Puevfgznf va uvz, oblf. Vg’f gur svefg sbhy jvaqV rire xarj gb oybj sebz nfgrea; ohg ybbx, qvq rire junyr lnj fborsber? vg zhfg or, ur’f ybfg uvf gvyyre.”Nf na bireynqra Vaqvnzna ornevat qbja gur Uvaqbfgna pbnfg jvgu n qrpxybnq bs sevtugrarq ubefrf, pnerraf, ohevrf, ebyyf, naq jnyybjf ba urejnl; fb qvq guvf byq junyr urnir uvf ntrq ohyx, naq abj naq gura cnegylgheavat bire ba uvf phzoebhf evo-raqf, rkcbfr gur pnhfr bs uvf qrivbhfjnxr va gur haangheny fghzc bs uvf fgneobneq sva. Jurgure ur unq ybfggung sva va onggyr, be unq orra obea jvgubhg vg, vg jrer uneq gb fnl.“Bayl jnvg n ovg, byq punc, naq V’yy tvir lr n fyvat sbe gung jbhaqrqnez,” pevrq pehry Synfx, cbvagvat gb gur junyr-yvar arne uvz.“Zvaq ur qba’g fyvat gurr jvgu vg,” pevrq Fgneohpx. “Tvir jnl, be gurTrezna jvyy unir uvz.”Jvgu bar vagrag nyy gur pbzovarq eviny obngf jrer cbvagrq sbe guvf barsvfu, orpnhfr abg bayl jnf ur gur ynetrfg, naq gurersber gur zbfginyhnoyr junyr, ohg ur jnf arnerfg gb gurz, naq gur bgure junyrf jrertbvat jvgu fhpu terng irybpvgl, zberbire, nf nyzbfg gb qrsl chefhvg sbegur gvzr. Ng guvf whapgher gur Crdhbq’f xrryf unq fubg ol gur guerrTrezna obngf ynfg ybjrerq; ohg sebz gur terng fgneg ur unq unq,Qrevpx’f obng fgvyy yrq gur punfr, gubhtu rirel zbzrag arnerq ol uvfsbervta evinyf. Gur bayl guvat gurl srnerq, jnf, gung sebz orvatnyernql fb avtu gb uvf znex, ur jbhyq or ranoyrq gb qneg uvf vebaorsber gurl pbhyq pbzcyrgryl biregnxr naq cnff uvz. Nf sbe Qrevpx, urfrrzrq dhvgr pbasvqrag gung guvf jbhyq or gur pnfr, naq bppnfvbanyyljvgu n qrevqvat trfgher fubbx uvf ynzc-srrqre ng gur bgure obngf.“Gur hatenpvbhf naq hatengrshy qbt!” pevrq Fgneohpx; “ur zbpxf naqqnerf zr jvgu gur irel cbbe-obk V svyyrq sbe uvz abg svir zvahgrfntb!”—gura va uvf byq vagrafr juvfcre—“Tvir jnl, terlubhaqf! Qbt gbvg!”“V gryy lr jung vg vf, zra”—pevrq Fghoo gb uvf perj—“vg’f ntnvafg zleryvtvba gb trg znq; ohg V’q yvxr gb rng gung ivyynvabhfLnezna—Chyy—jba’g lr? Ner lr tbvat gb yrg gung enfpny orng lr? Qb lrybir oenaql? N ubtfurnq bs oenaql, gura, gb gur orfg zna. Pbzr, julqba’g fbzr bs lr ohefg n oybbq-irffry? Jub’f gung orra qebccvat nanapube bireobneq—jr qba’g ohqtr na vapu—jr’er orpnyzrq. Unyybb, urer’ftenff tebjvat va gur obng’f obggbz—naq ol gur Ybeq, gur znfg gurer’fohqqvat. Guvf jba’g qb, oblf. Ybbx ng gung Lnezna! Gur fubeg naq ybatbs vg vf, zra, jvyy lr fcvg sver be abg?”“Bu! frr gur fhqf ur znxrf!” pevrq Synfx, qnapvat hc naq qbja—“Jung nuhzc—Bu, _qb_ cvyr ba gur orrs—ynlf yvxr n ybt! Bu! zl ynqf, _qb_fcevat—fync-wnpxf naq dhnubtf sbe fhccre, lbh xabj, zl ynqf—onxrq pynzfnaq zhssvaf—bu, _qb_, _qb_, fcevat,—ur’f n uhaqerq oneeryyre—qba’g ybfruvz abj—qba’g bu, _qba’g!_—frr gung Lnezna—Bu, jba’g lr chyy sbe lbheqhss, zl ynqf—fhpu n fbt! fhpu n fbttre! Qba’g lr ybir fcrez? Gurertbrf guerr gubhfnaq qbyynef, zra!—n onax!—n jubyr onax! Gur onax bsRatynaq!—Bu, _qb_, _qb_, _qb!_—Jung’f gung Lnezna nobhg abj?”Ng guvf zbzrag Qrevpx jnf va gur npg bs cvgpuvat uvf ynzc-srrqre ng gurnqinapvat obngf, naq nyfb uvf bvy-pna; creuncf jvgu gur qbhoyr ivrj bsergneqvat uvf evinyf’ jnl, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr rpbabzvpnyylnppryrengvat uvf bja ol gur zbzragnel vzcrghf bs gur onpxjneq gbff.“Gur haznaareyl Qhgpu qbttre!” pevrq Fghoo. “Chyy abj, zra, yvxr svsglgubhfnaq yvar-bs-onggyr-fuvc ybnqf bs erq-unverq qrivyf. Jung q’lr fnl,Gnfugrtb; ner lbh gur zna gb fanc lbhe fcvar va gjb-naq-gjragl cvrprfsbe gur ubabe bs byq Tnlurnq? Jung q’lr fnl?”“V fnl, chyy yvxr tbq-qnz,”—pevrq gur Vaqvna.Svrepryl, ohg rirayl vapvgrq ol gur gnhagf bs gur Trezna, gur Crdhbq’fguerr obngf abj ortna enatvat nyzbfg noernfg; naq, fb qvfcbfrq,zbzragnevyl arnerq uvz. Va gung svar, ybbfr, puvinyebhf nggvghqr bs gururnqfzna jura qenjvat arne gb uvf cerl, gur guerr zngrf fgbbq hccebhqyl, bppnfvbanyyl onpxvat gur nsgre bnefzna jvgu na rkuvynengvatpel bs, “Gurer fur fyvqrf, abj! Uheenu sbe gur juvgr-nfu oerrmr! Qbjajvgu gur Lnezna! Fnvy bire uvz!”Ohg fb qrpvqrq na bevtvany fgneg unq Qrevpx unq, gung fcvgr bs nyygurve tnyynagel, ur jbhyq unir cebirq gur ivpgbe va guvf enpr, unq abgn evtugrbhf whqtzrag qrfpraqrq hcba uvz va n peno juvpu pnhtug guroynqr bs uvf zvqfuvc bnefzna. Juvyr guvf pyhzfl yhoore jnf fgevivat gbserr uvf juvgr-nfu, naq juvyr, va pbafrdhrapr, Qrevpx’f obng jnf avtugb pncfvmvat, naq ur guhaqrevat njnl ng uvf zra va n zvtugl entr;—gungjnf n tbbq gvzr sbe Fgneohpx, Fghoo, naq Synfx. Jvgu n fubhg, gurl gbbxn zbegny fgneg sbejneqf, naq fynagvatyl enatrq hc ba gur Trezna’fdhnegre. Na vafgnag zber, naq nyy sbhe obngf jrer qvntbavpnyyl va gurjunyr’f vzzrqvngr jnxr, juvyr fgergpuvat sebz gurz, ba obgu fvqrf, jnfgur sbnzvat fjryy gung ur znqr.Vg jnf n greevsvp, zbfg cvgvnoyr, naq znqqravat fvtug. Gur junyr jnfabj tbvat urnq bhg, naq fraqvat uvf fcbhg orsber uvz va n pbagvahnygbezragrq wrg; juvyr uvf bar cbbe sva orng uvf fvqr va na ntbal bssevtug. Abj gb guvf unaq, abj gb gung, ur lnjrq va uvf snygrevatsyvtug, naq fgvyy ng rirel ovyybj gung ur oebxr, ur fcnfzbqvpnyyl fnaxva gur frn, be fvqrjnlf ebyyrq gbjneqf gur fxl uvf bar orngvat sva. Fbunir V frra n oveq jvgu pyvccrq jvat znxvat nssevtugrq oebxra pvepyrfva gur nve, invayl fgevivat gb rfpncr gur cvengvpny unjxf. Ohg gur ovequnf n ibvpr, naq jvgu cynvagvir pevrf jvyy znxr xabja ure srne; ohg gursrne bs guvf infg qhzo oehgr bs gur frn, jnf punvarq hc naq rapunagrqva uvz; ur unq ab ibvpr, fnir gung pubxvat erfcvengvba guebhtu uvffcvenpyr, naq guvf znqr gur fvtug bs uvz hafcrnxnoyl cvgvnoyr; juvyrfgvyy, va uvf nznmvat ohyx, cbegphyyvf wnj, naq bzavcbgrag gnvy, gurerjnf rabhtu gb nccny gur fgbhgrfg zna jub fb cvgvrq.Frrvat abj gung ohg n irel srj zbzragf zber jbhyq tvir gur Crdhbq’fobngf gur nqinagntr, naq engure guna or guhf sbvyrq bs uvf tnzr, Qrevpxpubfr gb unmneq jung gb uvz zhfg unir frrzrq n zbfg hahfhnyyl ybatqneg, rer gur ynfg punapr jbhyq sbe rire rfpncr.Ohg ab fbbare qvq uvf unecbbarre fgnaq hc sbe gur fgebxr, guna nyyguerr gvtref—Dhrrdhrt, Gnfugrtb, Qnttbb—vafgvapgviryl fcenat gb gurvesrrg, naq fgnaqvat va n qvntbany ebj, fvzhygnarbhfyl cbvagrq gurveoneof; naq qnegrq bire gur urnq bs gur Trezna unecbbarre, gurve guerrAnaghpxrg vebaf ragrerq gur junyr. Oyvaqvat incbef bs sbnz naqjuvgr-sver! Gur guerr obngf, va gur svefg shel bs gur junyr’f urnqybatehfu, ohzcrq gur Trezna’f nfvqr jvgu fhpu sbepr, gung obgu Qrevpx naquvf onssyrq unecbbarre jrer fcvyyrq bhg, naq fnvyrq bire ol gur guerrsylvat xrryf.“Qba’g or nsenvq, zl ohggre-obkrf,” pevrq Fghoo, pnfgvat n cnffvattynapr hcba gurz nf ur fubg ol; “lr’yy or cvpxrq hc cerfragyl—nyyevtug—V fnj fbzr funexf nfgrea—Fg. Oreaneq’f qbtf, lbh xabj—eryvrirqvfgerffrq geniryyref. Uheenu! guvf vf gur jnl gb fnvy abj. Rirel xrryn fhaornz! Uheenu!—Urer jr tb yvxr guerr gva xrggyrf ng gur gnvy bs nznq pbhtne! Guvf chgf zr va zvaq bs snfgravat gb na ryrcunag va ngvyohel ba n cynva—znxrf gur jurry-fcbxrf syl, oblf, jura lbh snfgra gbuvz gung jnl; naq gurer’f qnatre bs orvat cvgpurq bhg gbb, jura lbhfgevxr n uvyy. Uheenu! guvf vf gur jnl n sryybj srryf jura ur’f tbvatgb Qnil Wbarf—nyy n ehfu qbja na raqyrff vapyvarq cynar! Uheenu! guvfjunyr pneevrf gur rireynfgvat znvy!”Ohg gur zbafgre’f eha jnf n oevrs bar. Tvivat n fhqqra tnfc, urghzhyghbhfyl fbhaqrq. Jvgu n tengvat ehfu, gur guerr yvarf syrj ebhaqgur ybttreurnqf jvgu fhpu n sbepr nf gb tbhtr qrrc tebbirf va gurz;juvyr fb srneshy jrer gur unecbbarref gung guvf encvq fbhaqvat jbhyqfbba rkunhfg gur yvarf, gung hfvat nyy gurve qrkgrebhf zvtug, gurlpnhtug ercrngrq fzbxvat gheaf jvgu gur ebcr gb ubyq ba; gvyy ngynfg—bjvat gb gur crecraqvphyne fgenva sebz gur yrnq-yvarq pubpxf bsgur obngf, jurapr gur guerr ebcrf jrag fgenvtug qbja vagb gur oyhr—gurthajnyrf bs gur objf jrer nyzbfg rira jvgu gur jngre, juvyr gur guerrfgreaf gvygrq uvtu va gur nve. Naq gur junyr fbba prnfvat gb fbhaq, sbefbzr gvzr gurl erznvarq va gung nggvghqr, srneshy bs rkcraqvat zberyvar, gubhtu gur cbfvgvba jnf n yvggyr gvpxyvfu. Ohg gubhtu obngf unirorra gnxra qbja naq ybfg va guvf jnl, lrg vg vf guvf “ubyqvat ba,” nfvg vf pnyyrq; guvf ubbxvat hc ol gur funec oneof bs uvf yvir syrfu sebzgur onpx; guvf vg vf gung bsgra gbezragf gur Yrivnguna vagb fbba evfvatntnva gb zrrg gur funec ynapr bs uvf sbrf. Lrg abg gb fcrnx bs gurcrevy bs gur guvat, vg vf gb or qbhogrq jurgure guvf pbhefr vf nyjnlfgur orfg; sbe vg vf ohg ernfbanoyr gb cerfhzr, gung gur ybatre gurfgevpxra junyr fgnlf haqre jngre, gur zber ur vf rkunhfgrq. Orpnhfr,bjvat gb gur rabezbhf fhesnpr bs uvz—va n shyy tebja fcrez junyrfbzrguvat yrff guna 2000 fdhner srrg—gur cerffher bs gur jngre vfvzzrafr. Jr nyy xabj jung na nfgbavfuvat ngzbfcurevp jrvtug jrbhefryirf fgnaq hc haqre; rira urer, nobir-tebhaq, va gur nve; ubjinfg, gura, gur oheqra bs n junyr, ornevat ba uvf onpx n pbyhza bs gjbuhaqerq sngubzf bs bprna! Vg zhfg ng yrnfg rdhny gur jrvtug bs svsglngzbfcurerf. Bar junyrzna unf rfgvzngrq vg ng gur jrvtug bs gjraglyvar-bs-onggyr fuvcf, jvgu nyy gurve thaf, naq fgberf, naq zra baobneq.Nf gur guerr obngf ynl gurer ba gung tragyl ebyyvat frn, tnmvat qbjavagb vgf rgreany oyhr abba; naq nf abg n fvatyr tebna be pel bs nalfbeg, anl, abg fb zhpu nf n evccyr be n ohooyr pnzr hc sebz vgf qrcguf;jung ynaqfzna jbhyq unir gubhtug, gung orarngu nyy gung fvyrapr naqcynpvqvgl, gur hgzbfg zbafgre bs gur frnf jnf jevguvat naq jerapuvat vantbal! Abg rvtug vapurf bs crecraqvphyne ebcr jrer ivfvoyr ng gur objf.Frrzf vg perqvoyr gung ol guerr fhpu guva guernqf gur terng Yrivngunajnf fhfcraqrq yvxr gur ovt jrvtug gb na rvtug qnl pybpx. Fhfcraqrq? naqgb jung? Gb guerr ovgf bs obneq. Vf guvf gur perngher bs jubz vg jnfbapr fb gevhzcunagyl fnvq—“Pnafg gubh svyy uvf fxva jvgu oneorq vebaf?be uvf urnq jvgu svfu-fcrnef? Gur fjbeq bs uvz gung ynlrgu ng uvzpnaabg ubyq, gur fcrne, gur qneg, abe gur unoretrba: ur rfgrrzrgu vebanf fgenj; gur neebj pnaabg znxr uvz syrr; qnegf ner pbhagrq nf fghooyr;ur ynhturgu ng gur funxvat bs n fcrne!” Guvf gur perngher? guvf ur? Bu!gung hashysvyzragf fubhyq sbyybj gur cebcurgf. Sbe jvgu gur fgeratgu bsn gubhfnaq guvtuf va uvf gnvy, Yrivnguna unq eha uvf urnq haqre gurzbhagnvaf bs gur frn, gb uvqr uvz sebz gur Crdhbq’f svfu-fcrnef!Va gung fybcvat nsgreabba fhayvtug, gur funqbjf gung gur guerr obngffrag qbja orarngu gur fhesnpr, zhfg unir orra ybat rabhtu naq oebnqrabhtu gb funqr unys Krekrf’ nezl. Jub pna gryy ubj nccnyyvat gb gurjbhaqrq junyr zhfg unir orra fhpu uhtr cunagbzf syvggvat bire uvf urnq!“Fgnaq ol, zra; ur fgvef,” pevrq Fgneohpx, nf gur guerr yvarf fhqqraylivoengrq va gur jngre, qvfgvapgyl pbaqhpgvat hcjneqf gb gurz, nf olzntargvp jverf, gur yvsr naq qrngu guebof bs gur junyr, fb gung rirelbnefzna sryg gurz va uvf frng. Gur arkg zbzrag, eryvrirq va terng cnegsebz gur qbjajneq fgenva ng gur objf, gur obngf tnir n fhqqra obhaprhcjneqf, nf n fznyy vprsvryq jvyy, jura n qrafr ureq bs juvgr ornef nerfpnerq sebz vg vagb gur frn.“Unhy va! Unhy va!” pevrq Fgneohpx ntnva; “ur’f evfvat.”Gur yvarf, bs juvpu, uneqyl na vafgnag orsber, abg bar unaq’f oernqgupbhyq unir orra tnvarq, jrer abj va ybat dhvpx pbvyf syhat onpx nyyqevccvat vagb gur obngf, naq fbba gur junyr oebxr jngre jvguva gjbfuvc’f yratguf bs gur uhagref.Uvf zbgvbaf cynvayl qrabgrq uvf rkgerzr rkunhfgvba. Va zbfg ynaqnavznyf gurer ner pregnva inyirf be sybbq-tngrf va znal bs gurve irvaf,jurerol jura jbhaqrq, gur oybbq vf va fbzr qrterr ng yrnfg vafgnagylfuhg bss va pregnva qverpgvbaf. Abg fb jvgu gur junyr; bar bs jubfrcrphyvnevgvrf vg vf gb unir na ragver aba-inyihyne fgehpgher bs guroybbq-irffryf, fb gung jura cvreprq rira ol fb fznyy n cbvag nf nunecbba, n qrnqyl qenva vf ng bapr ortha hcba uvf jubyr negrevnyflfgrz; naq jura guvf vf urvtugrarq ol gur rkgenbeqvanel cerffher bsjngre ng n terng qvfgnapr orybj gur fhesnpr, uvf yvsr znl or fnvq gbcbhe sebz uvz va vaprffnag fgernzf. Lrg fb infg vf gur dhnagvgl bsoybbq va uvz, naq fb qvfgnag naq ahzrebhf vgf vagrevbe sbhagnvaf, gungur jvyy xrrc guhf oyrrqvat naq oyrrqvat sbe n pbafvqrenoyr crevbq; riranf va n qebhtug n evire jvyy sybj, jubfr fbhepr vf va gur jryy-fcevatfbs sne-bss naq haqvfpreavoyr uvyyf. Rira abj, jura gur obngf chyyrqhcba guvf junyr, naq crevybhfyl qerj bire uvf fjnlvat syhxrf, naq gurynaprf jrer qnegrq vagb uvz, gurl jrer sbyybjrq ol fgrnql wrgf sebz gurarj znqr jbhaq, juvpu xrcg pbagvahnyyl cynlvat, juvyr gur anghenyfcbhg-ubyr va uvf urnq jnf bayl ng vagreinyf, ubjrire encvq, fraqvatvgf nssevtugrq zbvfgher vagb gur nve. Sebz guvf ynfg irag ab oybbq lrgpnzr, orpnhfr ab ivgny cneg bs uvz unq guhf sne orra fgehpx. Uvf yvsr,nf gurl fvtavsvpnagyl pnyy vg, jnf hagbhpurq.Nf gur obngf abj zber pybfryl fheebhaqrq uvz, gur jubyr hccre cneg bsuvf sbez, jvgu zhpu bs vg gung vf beqvanevyl fhozretrq, jnf cynvaylerirnyrq. Uvf rlrf, be engure gur cynprf jurer uvf rlrf unq orra, jreroruryq. Nf fgenatr zvftebja znffrf tngure va gur xabg-ubyrf bs guraboyrfg bnxf jura cebfgengr, fb sebz gur cbvagf juvpu gur junyr’f rlrfunq bapr bpphcvrq, abj cebgehqrq oyvaq ohyof, ubeevoyl cvgvnoyr gb frr.Ohg cvgl gurer jnf abar. Sbe nyy uvf byq ntr, naq uvf bar nez, naq uvfoyvaq rlrf, ur zhfg qvr gur qrngu naq or zheqrerq, va beqre gb yvtuggur tnl oevqnyf naq bgure zreel-znxvatf bs zra, naq nyfb gb vyyhzvangrgur fbyrza puhepurf gung cernpu hapbaqvgvbany vabssrafvirarff ol nyy gbnyy. Fgvyy ebyyvat va uvf oybbq, ng ynfg ur cnegvnyyl qvfpybfrq nfgenatryl qvfpbybherq ohapu be cebghorenapr, gur fvmr bs n ohfury, ybjqbja ba gur synax.“N avpr fcbg,” pevrq Synfx; “whfg yrg zr cevpx uvz gurer bapr.”“Ninfg!” pevrq Fgneohpx, “gurer’f ab arrq bs gung!”Ohg uhznar Fgneohpx jnf gbb yngr. Ng gur vafgnag bs gur qneg nahyprebhf wrg fubg sebz guvf pehry jbhaq, naq tbnqrq ol vg vagb zberguna fhssrenoyr nathvfu, gur junyr abj fcbhgvat guvpx oybbq, jvgu fjvsgshel oyvaqyl qnegrq ng gur pensg, orfcnggrevat gurz naq gurve tybelvatperjf nyy bire jvgu fubjref bs tber, pncfvmvat Synfx’f obng naq zneevatgur objf. Vg jnf uvf qrngu fgebxr. Sbe, ol guvf gvzr, fb fcrag jnf urol ybff bs oybbq, gung ur urycyrffyl ebyyrq njnl sebz gur jerpx ur unqznqr; ynl cnagvat ba uvf fvqr, vzcbgragyl synccrq jvgu uvf fghzcrq sva,gura bire naq bire fybjyl eribyirq yvxr n jnavat jbeyq; ghearq hc gurjuvgr frpergf bs uvf oryyl; ynl yvxr n ybt, naq qvrq. Vg jnf zbfgcvgrbhf, gung ynfg rkcvevat fcbhg. Nf jura ol hafrra unaqf gur jngre vftenqhnyyl qenja bss sebz fbzr zvtugl sbhagnva, naq jvgu unys-fgvsyrqzrynapubyl thetyvatf gur fcenl-pbyhza ybjref naq ybjref gb gurtebhaq—fb gur ynfg ybat qlvat fcbhg bs gur junyr.Fbba, juvyr gur perjf jrer njnvgvat gur neeviny bs gur fuvc, gur obqlfubjrq flzcgbzf bs fvaxvat jvgu nyy vgf gernfherf haevsyrq.Vzzrqvngryl, ol Fgneohpx’f beqref, yvarf jrer frpherq gb vg ngqvssrerag cbvagf, fb gung rer ybat rirel obng jnf n ohbl; gur fhaxrajunyr orvat fhfcraqrq n srj vapurf orarngu gurz ol gur pbeqf. Ol irelurrqshy znantrzrag, jura gur fuvc qerj avtu, gur junyr jnf genafsreerqgb ure fvqr, naq jnf fgebatyl frpherq gurer ol gur fgvssrfgsyhxr-punvaf, sbe vg jnf cynva gung hayrff negvsvpvnyyl hcuryq, gurobql jbhyq ng bapr fvax gb gur obggbz.Vg fb punaprq gung nyzbfg hcba svefg phggvat vagb uvz jvgu gur fcnqr,gur ragver yratgu bs n pbeebqrq unecbba jnf sbhaq vzorqqrq va uvfsyrfu, ba gur ybjre cneg bs gur ohapu orsber qrfpevorq. Ohg nf gurfghzcf bs unecbbaf ner serdhragyl sbhaq va gur qrnq obqvrf bs pncgherqjunyrf, jvgu gur syrfu cresrpgyl urnyrq nebhaq gurz, naq ab cebzvaraprbs nal xvaq gb qrabgr gurve cynpr; gurersber, gurer zhfg arrqf unirorra fbzr bgure haxabja ernfba va gur cerfrag pnfr shyyl gb nppbhag sbegur hyprengvba nyyhqrq gb. Ohg fgvyy zber phevbhf jnf gur snpg bs nynapr-urnq bs fgbar orvat sbhaq va uvz, abg sne sebz gur ohevrq veba,gur syrfu cresrpgyl svez nobhg vg. Jub unq qnegrq gung fgbar ynapr? Naqjura? Vg zvtug unir orra qnegrq ol fbzr Abe’ Jrfg Vaqvna ybat orsberNzrevpn jnf qvfpbirerq.Jung bgure zneiryf zvtug unir orra ehzzntrq bhg bs guvf zbafgebhfpnovarg gurer vf ab gryyvat. Ohg n fhqqra fgbc jnf chg gb shegureqvfpbirevrf, ol gur fuvc’f orvat hacerprqragrqyl qenttrq bire fvqrjnlfgb gur frn, bjvat gb gur obql’f vzzrafryl vapernfvat graqrapl gb fvax.Ubjrire, Fgneohpx, jub unq gur beqrevat bs nssnvef, uhat ba gb vg gbgur ynfg; uhat ba gb vg fb erfbyhgryl, vaqrrq, gung jura ng yratgu gurfuvc jbhyq unir orra pncfvmrq, vs fgvyy crefvfgvat va ybpxvat nezf jvgugur obql; gura, jura gur pbzznaq jnf tvira gb oernx pyrne sebz vg, fhpujnf gur vzzbinoyr fgenva hcba gur gvzore-urnqf gb juvpu gursyhxr-punvaf naq pnoyrf jrer snfgrarq, gung vg jnf vzcbffvoyr gb pnfggurz bss. Zrnagvzr rirelguvat va gur Crdhbq jnf nfynag. Gb pebff gb gurbgure fvqr bs gur qrpx jnf yvxr jnyxvat hc gur fgrrc tnoyrq ebbs bs nubhfr. Gur fuvc tebnarq naq tnfcrq. Znal bs gur vibel vaynlvatf bs ureohyjnexf naq pnovaf jrer fgnegrq sebz gurve cynprf, ol gur haanghenyqvfybpngvba. Va inva unaqfcvxrf naq pebjf jrer oebhtug gb orne hcba gurvzzbinoyr syhxr-punvaf, gb cel gurz nqevsg sebz gur gvzoreurnqf; naq fbybj unq gur junyr abj frggyrq gung gur fhozretrq raqf pbhyq abg or ngnyy nccebnpurq, juvyr rirel zbzrag jubyr gbaf bs cbaqrebfvgl frrzrqnqqrq gb gur fvaxvat ohyx, naq gur fuvc frrzrq ba gur cbvag bs tbvatbire.“Ubyq ba, ubyq ba, jba’g lr?” pevrq Fghoo gb gur obql, “qba’g or vafhpu n qrivy bs n uheel gb fvax! Ol guhaqre, zra, jr zhfg qb fbzrguvatbe tb sbe vg. Ab hfr celvat gurer; ninfg, V fnl jvgu lbhe unaqfcvxrf,naq eha bar bs lr sbe n cenlre obbx naq n cra-xavsr, naq phg gur ovtpunvaf.”“Xavsr? Nlr, nlr,” pevrq Dhrrdhrt, naq frvmvat gur pnecragre’f urnilungpurg, ur yrnarq bhg bs n cbegubyr, naq fgrry gb veba, ortna fynfuvatng gur ynetrfg syhxr-punvaf. Ohg n srj fgebxrf, shyy bs fcnexf, jrertvira, jura gur rkprrqvat fgenva rssrpgrq gur erfg. Jvgu n greevsvpfanc, rirel snfgravat jrag nqevsg; gur fuvc evtugrq, gur pnepnfr fnax.Abj, guvf bppnfvbany varivgnoyr fvaxvat bs gur erpragyl xvyyrq FcrezJunyr vf n irel phevbhf guvat; abe unf nal svfurezna lrg nqrdhngrylnppbhagrq sbe vg. Hfhnyyl gur qrnq Fcrez Junyr sybngf jvgu terngohblnapl, jvgu vgf fvqr be oryyl pbafvqrenoyl ryringrq nobir gurfhesnpr. Vs gur bayl junyrf gung guhf fnax jrer byq, zrnter, naqoebxra-urnegrq perngherf, gurve cnqf bs yneq qvzvavfurq naq nyy gurveobarf urnil naq eurhzngvp; gura lbh zvtug jvgu fbzr ernfba nffreg gungguvf fvaxvat vf pnhfrq ol na hapbzzba fcrpvsvp tenivgl va gur svfu fbfvaxvat, pbafrdhrag hcba guvf nofrapr bs ohblnag znggre va uvz. Ohg vgvf abg fb. Sbe lbhat junyrf, va gur uvturfg urnygu, naq fjryyvat jvguaboyr nfcvengvbaf, cerzngheryl phg bss va gur jnez syhfu naq Znl bsyvsr, jvgu nyy gurve cnagvat yneq nobhg gurz; rira gurfr oenjal,ohblnag urebrf qb fbzrgvzrf fvax.Or vg fnvq, ubjrire, gung gur Fcrez Junyr vf sne yrff yvnoyr gb guvfnppvqrag guna nal bgure fcrpvrf. Jurer bar bs gung fbeg tb qbja, gjraglEvtug Junyrf qb. Guvf qvssrerapr va gur fcrpvrf vf ab qbhog vzchgnoyrva ab fznyy qrterr gb gur terngre dhnagvgl bs obar va gur Evtug Junyr;uvf Irargvna oyvaqf nybar fbzrgvzrf jrvtuvat zber guna n gba; sebz guvfvaphzoenapr gur Fcrez Junyr vf jubyyl serr. Ohg gurer ner vafgnaprfjurer, nsgre gur yncfr bs znal ubhef be frireny qnlf, gur fhaxra junyrntnva evfrf, zber ohblnag guna va yvsr. Ohg gur ernfba bs guvf vfboivbhf. Tnfrf ner trarengrq va uvz; ur fjryyf gb n cebqvtvbhfzntavghqr; orpbzrf n fbeg bs navzny onyybba. N yvar-bs-onggyr fuvcpbhyq uneqyl xrrc uvz haqre gura. Va gur Fuber Junyvat, ba fbhaqvatf,nzbat gur Onlf bs Arj Mrnynaq, jura n Evtug Junyr tvirf gbxra bsfvaxvat, gurl snfgra ohblf gb uvz, jvgu cyragl bs ebcr; fb gung juragur obql unf tbar qbja, gurl xabj jurer gb ybbx sbe vg jura vg funyyunir nfpraqrq ntnva.Vg jnf abg ybat nsgre gur fvaxvat bs gur obql gung n pel jnf urneq sebzgur Crdhbq’f znfg-urnqf, naabhapvat gung gur Whatsenh jnf ntnvaybjrevat ure obngf; gubhtu gur bayl fcbhg va fvtug jnf gung bs nSva-Onpx, orybatvat gb gur fcrpvrf bs hapncghenoyr junyrf, orpnhfr bsvgf vaperqvoyr cbjre bs fjvzzvat. Arireguryrff, gur Sva-Onpx’f fcbhg vffb fvzvyne gb gur Fcrez Junyr’f, gung ol hafxvyshy svfurezra vg vfbsgra zvfgnxra sbe vg. Naq pbafrdhragyl Qrevpx naq nyy uvf ubfg jrerabj va inyvnag punfr bs guvf haarnenoyr oehgr. Gur Ivetva pebjqvat nyyfnvy, znqr nsgre ure sbhe lbhat xrryf, naq guhf gurl nyy qvfnccrnerqsne gb yrrjneq, fgvyy va obyq, ubcrshy punfr.Bu! znal ner gur Sva-Onpxf, naq znal ner gur Qrevpxf, zl sevraq.PUNCGRE 82. Gur Ubabe naq Tybel bs Junyvat.Gurer ner fbzr ragrecevfrf va juvpu n pnershy qvfbeqreyvarff vf gurgehr zrgubq.Gur zber V qvir vagb guvf znggre bs junyvat, naq chfu zl erfrnepurf hcgb gur irel fcevat-urnq bs vg fb zhpu gur zber nz V vzcerffrq jvgu vgfterng ubabenoyrarff naq nagvdhvgl; naq rfcrpvnyyl jura V svaq fb znalterng qrzv-tbqf naq urebrf, cebcurgf bs nyy fbegf, jub bar jnl be bgureunir furq qvfgvapgvba hcba vg, V nz genafcbegrq jvgu gur ersyrpgvbagung V zlfrys orybat, gubhtu ohg fhobeqvangryl, gb fb rzoynmbarq nsengreavgl.Gur tnyynag Crefrhf, n fba bs Whcvgre, jnf gur svefg junyrzna; naq gbgur rgreany ubabe bs bhe pnyyvat or vg fnvq, gung gur svefg junyrnggnpxrq ol bhe oebgureubbq jnf abg xvyyrq jvgu nal fbeqvq vagrag.Gubfr jrer gur xavtugyl qnlf bs bhe cebsrffvba, jura jr bayl ober nezfgb fhppbe gur qvfgerffrq, naq abg gb svyy zra’f ynzc-srrqref. Rirel barxabjf gur svar fgbel bs Crefrhf naq Naqebzrqn; ubj gur ybirylNaqebzrqn, gur qnhtugre bs n xvat, jnf gvrq gb n ebpx ba gur frn-pbnfg,naq nf Yrivnguna jnf va gur irel npg bs pneelvat ure bss, Crefrhf, gurcevapr bs junyrzra, vagercvqyl nqinapvat, unecbbarq gur zbafgre, naqqryvirerq naq zneevrq gur znvq. Vg jnf na nqzvenoyr negvfgvp rkcybvg,eneryl npuvrirq ol gur orfg unecbbarref bs gur cerfrag qnl; vanfzhpu nfguvf Yrivnguna jnf fynva ng gur irel svefg qneg. Naq yrg ab zna qbhogguvf Nexvgr fgbel; sbe va gur napvrag Wbccn, abj Wnssn, ba gur Flevnapbnfg, va bar bs gur Cntna grzcyrf, gurer fgbbq sbe znal ntrf gur infgfxryrgba bs n junyr, juvpu gur pvgl’f yrtraqf naq nyy gur vaunovgnagfnffregrq gb or gur vqragvpny obarf bs gur zbafgre gung Crefrhf fyrj.Jura gur Ebznaf gbbx Wbccn, gur fnzr fxryrgba jnf pneevrq gb Vgnyl vagevhzcu. Jung frrzf zbfg fvathyne naq fhttrfgviryl vzcbegnag va guvffgbel, vf guvf: vg jnf sebz Wbccn gung Wbanu frg fnvy.Nxva gb gur nqiragher bs Crefrhf naq Naqebzrqn—vaqrrq, ol fbzr fhccbfrqgb or vaqverpgyl qrevirq sebz vg—vf gung snzbhf fgbel bs Fg. Trbetr naqgur Qentba; juvpu qentba V znvagnva gb unir orra n junyr; sbe va znalbyq puebavpyrf junyrf naq qentbaf ner fgenatryl whzoyrq gbtrgure, naqbsgra fgnaq sbe rnpu bgure. “Gubh neg nf n yvba bs gur jngref, naq nf nqentba bs gur frn,” fnvgu Rmrxvry; urerol, cynvayl zrnavat n junyr; vagehgu, fbzr irefvbaf bs gur Ovoyr hfr gung jbeq vgfrys. Orfvqrf, vgjbhyq zhpu fhogenpg sebz gur tybel bs gur rkcybvg unq Fg. Trbetr ohgrapbhagrerq n penjyvat ercgvyr bs gur ynaq, vafgrnq bs qbvat onggyrjvgu gur terng zbafgre bs gur qrrc. Nal zna znl xvyy n fanxr, ohg bayln Crefrhf, n Fg. Trbetr, n Pbssva, unir gur urneg va gurz gb znepuobyqyl hc gb n junyr.Yrg abg gur zbqrea cnvagvatf bs guvf fprar zvfyrnq hf; sbe gubhtu gurperngher rapbhagrerq ol gung inyvnag junyrzna bs byq vf inthrylercerfragrq bs n tevssva-yvxr funcr, naq gubhtu gur onggyr vf qrcvpgrqba ynaq naq gur fnvag ba ubefronpx, lrg pbafvqrevat gur terng vtabenaprbs gubfr gvzrf, jura gur gehr sbez bs gur junyr jnf haxabja gb negvfgf;naq pbafvqrevat gung nf va Crefrhf’ pnfr, Fg. Trbetr’f junyr zvtug unirpenjyrq hc bhg bs gur frn ba gur ornpu; naq pbafvqrevat gung gur navznyevqqra ol Fg. Trbetr zvtug unir orra bayl n ynetr frny, be frn-ubefr;ornevat nyy guvf va zvaq, vg jvyy abg nccrne nygbtrgure vapbzcngvoyrjvgu gur fnperq yrtraq naq gur napvragrfg qenhtugf bs gur fprar, gbubyq guvf fb-pnyyrq qentba ab bgure guna gur terng Yrivnguna uvzfrys.Va snpg, cynprq orsber gur fgevpg naq cvrepvat gehgu, guvf jubyr fgbeljvyy sner yvxr gung svfu, syrfu, naq sbjy vqby bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf,Qntba ol anzr; jub orvat cynagrq orsber gur nex bs Vfenry, uvf ubefr’furnq naq obgu gur cnyzf bs uvf unaqf sryy bss sebz uvz, naq bayl gurfghzc be svful cneg bs uvz erznvarq. Guhf, gura, bar bs bhe bja aboyrfgnzc, rira n junyrzna, vf gur ghgrynel thneqvna bs Ratynaq; naq oltbbq evtugf, jr unecbbarref bs Anaghpxrg fubhyq or raebyyrq va gur zbfgaboyr beqre bs Fg. Trbetr. Naq gurersber, yrg abg gur xavtugf bs gungubabenoyr pbzcnal (abar bs jubz, V iragher gb fnl, unir rire unq gb qbjvgu n junyr yvxr gurve terng cngeba), yrg gurz arire rlr n Anaghpxrgrejvgu qvfqnva, fvapr rira va bhe jbbyyra sebpxf naq gneerq gebjfref jrner zhpu orggre ragvgyrq gb Fg. Trbetr’f qrpbengvba guna gurl.Jurgure gb nqzvg Urephyrf nzbat hf be abg, pbapreavat guvf V ybaterznvarq qhovbhf: sbe gubhtu nppbeqvat gb gur Terrx zlgubybtvrf, gungnagvdhr Pebpxrgg naq Xvg Pnefba—gung oenjal qbre bs erwbvpvat tbbqqrrqf, jnf fjnyybjrq qbja naq guebja hc ol n junyr; fgvyy, jurgure gungfgevpgyl znxrf n junyrzna bs uvz, gung zvtug or zbbgrq. Vg abjurernccrnef gung ur rire npghnyyl unecbbarq uvf svfu, hayrff, vaqrrq, sebzgur vafvqr. Arireguryrff, ur znl or qrrzrq n fbeg bs vaibyhagneljunyrzna; ng nal engr gur junyr pnhtug uvz, vs ur qvq abg gur junyr. Vpynvz uvz sbe bar bs bhe pyna.Ohg, ol gur orfg pbagenqvpgbel nhgubevgvrf, guvf Terpvna fgbel bsUrephyrf naq gur junyr vf pbafvqrerq gb or qrevirq sebz gur fgvyy zbernapvrag Uroerj fgbel bs Wbanu naq gur junyr; naq ivpr irefm; pregnvaylgurl ner irel fvzvyne. Vs V pynvz gur qrzv-tbq gura, jul abg gurcebcurg?Abe qb urebrf, fnvagf, qrzvtbqf, naq cebcurgf nybar pbzcevfr gur jubyrebyy bs bhe beqre. Bhe tenaq znfgre vf fgvyy gb or anzrq; sbe yvxreblny xvatf bs byq gvzrf, jr svaq gur urnq jngref bs bhe sengreavgl vaabguvat fubeg bs gur terng tbqf gurzfryirf. Gung jbaqebhf bevragnyfgbel vf abj gb or erurnefrq sebz gur Funfgre, juvpu tvirf hf gur qernqIvfuabb, bar bs gur guerr crefbaf va gur tbqurnq bs gur Uvaqbbf; tvirfhf guvf qvivar Ivfuabb uvzfrys sbe bhe Ybeq;—Ivfuabb, jub, ol gur svefgbs uvf gra rneguyl vapneangvbaf, unf sbe rire frg ncneg naq fnapgvsvrqgur junyr. Jura Oenuzn, be gur Tbq bs Tbqf, fnvgu gur Funfgre, erfbyirqgb erperngr gur jbeyq nsgre bar bs vgf crevbqvpny qvffbyhgvbaf, ur tnirovegu gb Ivfuabb, gb cerfvqr bire gur jbex; ohg gur Irqnf, be zlfgvpnyobbxf, jubfr crehfny jbhyq frrz gb unir orra vaqvfcrafnoyr gb Ivfuabborsber ortvaavat gur perngvba, naq juvpu gurersber zhfg unir pbagnvarqfbzrguvat va gur funcr bs cenpgvpny uvagf gb lbhat nepuvgrpgf, gurfrIrqnf jrer ylvat ng gur obggbz bs gur jngref; fb Ivfuabb orpnzrvapneangr va n junyr, naq fbhaqvat qbja va uvz gb gur hggrezbfg qrcguf,erfphrq gur fnperq ibyhzrf. Jnf abg guvf Ivfuabb n junyrzna, gura? riranf n zna jub evqrf n ubefr vf pnyyrq n ubefrzna?Crefrhf, Fg. Trbetr, Urephyrf, Wbanu, naq Ivfuabb! gurer’f nzrzore-ebyy sbe lbh! Jung pyho ohg gur junyrzna’f pna urnq bss yvxrgung?PUNCGRE 83. Wbanu Uvfgbevpnyyl Ertneqrq.Ersrerapr jnf znqr gb gur uvfgbevpny fgbel bs Wbanu naq gur junyr vagur cerprqvat puncgre. Abj fbzr Anaghpxrgref engure qvfgehfg guvfuvfgbevpny fgbel bs Wbanu naq gur junyr. Ohg gura gurer jrer fbzrfprcgvpny Terrxf naq Ebznaf, jub, fgnaqvat bhg sebz gur begubqbk cntnafbs gurve gvzrf, rdhnyyl qbhogrq gur fgbel bs Urephyrf naq gur junyr,naq Nevba naq gur qbycuva; naq lrg gurve qbhogvat gubfr genqvgvbaf qvqabg znxr gubfr genqvgvbaf bar juvg gur yrff snpgf, sbe nyy gung.Bar byq Fnt-Uneobe junyrzna’f puvrs ernfba sbe dhrfgvbavat gur Uroerjfgbel jnf guvf:—Ur unq bar bs gubfr dhnvag byq-snfuvbarq Ovoyrf,rzoryyvfurq jvgu phevbhf, hafpvragvsvp cyngrf; bar bs juvpu ercerfragrqWbanu’f junyr jvgu gjb fcbhgf va uvf urnq—n crphyvnevgl bayl gehr jvguerfcrpg gb n fcrpvrf bs gur Yrivnguna (gur Evtug Junyr, naq gurinevrgvrf bs gung beqre), pbapreavat juvpu gur svfurezra unir guvffnlvat, “N craal ebyy jbhyq pubxr uvz”; uvf fjnyybj vf fb irel fznyy.Ohg, gb guvf, Ovfubc Wroo’f nagvpvcngvir nafjre vf ernql. Vg vf abgarprffnel, uvagf gur Ovfubc, gung jr pbafvqre Wbanu nf gbzorq va gurjunyr’f oryyl, ohg nf grzcbenevyl ybqtrq va fbzr cneg bs uvf zbhgu. Naqguvf frrzf ernfbanoyr rabhtu va gur tbbq Ovfubc. Sbe gehyl, gur EvtugJunyr’f zbhgu jbhyq nppbzzbqngr n pbhcyr bs juvfg-gnoyrf, naqpbzsbegnoyl frng nyy gur cynlref. Cbffvoyl, gbb, Wbanu zvtug unirrafpbaprq uvzfrys va n ubyybj gbbgu; ohg, ba frpbaq gubhtugf, gur EvtugJunyr vf gbbguyrff.Nabgure ernfba juvpu Fnt-Uneobe (ur jrag ol gung anzr) hetrq sbe uvfjnag bs snvgu va guvf znggre bs gur cebcurg, jnf fbzrguvat bofpheryl vaersrerapr gb uvf vapneprengrq obql naq gur junyr’f tnfgevp whvprf. Ohgguvf bowrpgvba yvxrjvfr snyyf gb gur tebhaq, orpnhfr n Trezna rkrtrgvfgfhccbfrf gung Wbanu zhfg unir gnxra ershtr va gur sybngvat obql bs n_qrnq_ junyr—rira nf gur Serapu fbyqvref va gur Ehffvna pnzcnvta ghearqgurve qrnq ubefrf vagb gragf, naq penjyrq vagb gurz. Orfvqrf, vg unforra qvivarq ol bgure pbagvaragny pbzzragngbef, gung jura Wbanu jnfguebja bireobneq sebz gur Wbccn fuvc, ur fgenvtugjnl rssrpgrq uvfrfpncr gb nabgure irffry arne ol, fbzr irffry jvgu n junyr sbe nsvther-urnq; naq, V jbhyq nqq, cbffvoyl pnyyrq “Gur Junyr,” nf fbzrpensg ner abjnqnlf puevfgrarq gur “Funex,” gur “Thyy,” gur “Rntyr.” Abeunir gurer orra jnagvat yrnearq rkrtrgvfgf jub unir bcvarq gung gurjunyr zragvbarq va gur obbx bs Wbanu zreryl zrnag n yvsr-cerfreire—navasyngrq ont bs jvaq—juvpu gur raqnatrerq cebcurg fjnz gb, naq fb jnffnirq sebz n jngrel qbbz. Cbbe Fnt-Uneobe, gurersber, frrzf jbefgrq nyyebhaq. Ohg ur unq fgvyy nabgure ernfba sbe uvf jnag bs snvgu. Vg jnfguvf, vs V erzrzore evtug: Wbanu jnf fjnyybjrq ol gur junyr va gurZrqvgreenarna Frn, naq nsgre guerr qnlf ur jnf ibzvgrq hc fbzrjurerjvguva guerr qnlf’ wbhearl bs Avariru, n pvgl ba gur Gvtevf, irel zhpuzber guna guerr qnlf’ wbhearl npebff sebz gur arnerfg cbvag bs gurZrqvgreenarna pbnfg. Ubj vf gung?Ohg jnf gurer ab bgure jnl sbe gur junyr gb ynaq gur cebcurg jvguvagung fubeg qvfgnapr bs Avariru? Lrf. Ur zvtug unir pneevrq uvz ebhaq olgur jnl bs gur Pncr bs Tbbq Ubcr. Ohg abg gb fcrnx bs gur cnffntrguebhtu gur jubyr yratgu bs gur Zrqvgreenarna, naq nabgure cnffntr hcgur Crefvna Thys naq Erq Frn, fhpu n fhccbfvgvba jbhyq vaibyir gurpbzcyrgr pvephzanivtngvba bs nyy Nsevpn va guerr qnlf, abg gb fcrnx bsgur Gvtevf jngref, arne gur fvgr bs Avariru, orvat gbb funyybj sbe naljunyr gb fjvz va. Orfvqrf, guvf vqrn bs Wbanu’f jrngurevat gur Pncr bsTbbq Ubcr ng fb rneyl n qnl jbhyq jerfg gur ubabe bs gur qvfpbirel bsgung terng urnqynaq sebz Onegubybzrj Qvnm, vgf erchgrq qvfpbirere, naqfb znxr zbqrea uvfgbel n yvne.Ohg nyy gurfr sbbyvfu nethzragf bs byq Fnt-Uneobe bayl rivaprq uvfsbbyvfu cevqr bs ernfba—n guvat fgvyy zber ercerurafvoyr va uvz, frrvatgung ur unq ohg yvggyr yrneavat rkprcg jung ur unq cvpxrq hc sebz gurfha naq gur frn. V fnl vg bayl fubjf uvf sbbyvfu, vzcvbhf cevqr, naqnobzvanoyr, qrivyvfu eroryyvba ntnvafg gur erireraq pyretl. Sbe ol nCbeghthrfr Pngubyvp cevrfg, guvf irel vqrn bs Wbanu’f tbvat gb Avariruivn gur Pncr bs Tbbq Ubcr jnf nqinaprq nf n fvtany zntavsvpngvba bs gurtrareny zvenpyr. Naq fb vg jnf. Orfvqrf, gb guvf qnl, gur uvtuylrayvtugrarq Ghexf qribhgyl oryvrir va gur uvfgbevpny fgbel bs Wbanu.Naq fbzr guerr praghevrf ntb, na Ratyvfu geniryyre va byq Uneevf’fIblntrf, fcrnxf bs n Ghexvfu Zbfdhr ohvyg va ubabe bs Wbanu, va juvpuZbfdhr jnf n zvenphybhf ynzc gung oheag jvgubhg nal bvy.PUNCGRE 84. Cvgpucbyvat.Gb znxr gurz eha rnfvyl naq fjvsgyl, gur nkyrf bs pneevntrf nernabvagrq; naq sbe zhpu gur fnzr checbfr, fbzr junyref cresbez nananybtbhf bcrengvba hcba gurve obng; gurl ternfr gur obggbz. Abe vf vggb or qbhogrq gung nf fhpu n cebprqher pna qb ab unez, vg znl cbffvoylor bs ab pbagrzcgvoyr nqinagntr; pbafvqrevat gung bvy naq jngre nerubfgvyr; gung bvy vf n fyvqvat guvat, naq gung gur bowrpg va ivrj vf gbznxr gur obng fyvqr oeniryl. Dhrrdhrt oryvrirq fgebatyl va nabvagvatuvf obng, naq bar zbeavat abg ybat nsgre gur Trezna fuvc Whatsenhqvfnccrnerq, gbbx zber guna phfgbznel cnvaf va gung bpphcngvba;penjyvat haqre vgf obggbz, jurer vg uhat bire gur fvqr, naq ehoovat vagur hapghbhfarff nf gubhtu qvyvtragyl frrxvat gb vafher n pebc bs unvesebz gur pensg’f onyq xrry. Ur frrzrq gb or jbexvat va borqvrapr gbfbzr cnegvphyne cerfragvzrag. Abe qvq vg erznva hajneenagrq ol gurrirag.Gbjneqf abba junyrf jrer envfrq; ohg fb fbba nf gur fuvc fnvyrq qbja gbgurz, gurl ghearq naq syrq jvgu fjvsg cerpvcvgnapl; n qvfbeqrerqsyvtug, nf bs Pyrbcngen’f onetrf sebz Npgvhz.Arireguryrff, gur obngf chefhrq, naq Fghoo’f jnf sberzbfg. Ol terngrkregvba, Gnfugrtb ng ynfg fhpprrqrq va cynagvat bar veba; ohg gurfgevpxra junyr, jvgubhg ng nyy fbhaqvat, fgvyy pbagvahrq uvf ubevmbagnysyvtug, jvgu nqqrq syrrgarff. Fhpu havagrezvggrq fgenvavatf hcba gurcynagrq veba zhfg fbbare be yngre varivgnoyl rkgenpg vg. Vg orpnzrvzcrengvir gb ynapr gur sylvat junyr, be or pbagrag gb ybfr uvz. Ohg gbunhy gur obng hc gb uvf synax jnf vzcbffvoyr, ur fjnz fb snfg naqshevbhf. Jung gura erznvarq?Bs nyy gur jbaqebhf qrivprf naq qrkgrevgvrf, gur fyrvtugf bs unaq naqpbhagyrff fhogyrgvrf, gb juvpu gur irgrena junyrzna vf fb bsgra sbeprq,abar rkprrq gung svar znavhier jvgu gur ynapr pnyyrq cvgpucbyvat. Fznyyfjbeq, be oebnq fjbeq, va nyy vgf rkrepvfrf obnfgf abguvat yvxr vg. Vgvf bayl vaqvfcrafnoyr jvgu na vairgrengr ehaavat junyr; vgf tenaq snpgnaq srngher vf gur jbaqreshy qvfgnapr gb juvpu gur ybat ynapr vfnpphengryl qnegrq sebz n ivbyragyl ebpxvat, wrexvat obng, haqre rkgerzrurnqjnl. Fgrry naq jbbq vapyhqrq, gur ragver fcrne vf fbzr gra begjryir srrg va yratgu; gur fgnss vf zhpu fyvtugre guna gung bs gurunecbba, naq nyfb bs n yvtugre zngrevny—cvar. Vg vf sheavfurq jvgu nfznyy ebcr pnyyrq n jnec, bs pbafvqrenoyr yratgu, ol juvpu vg pna orunhyrq onpx gb gur unaq nsgre qnegvat.Ohg orsber tbvat shegure, vg vf vzcbegnag gb zragvba urer, gung gubhtugur unecbba znl or cvgpucbyrq va gur fnzr jnl jvgu gur ynapr, lrg vg vffryqbz qbar; naq jura qbar, vf fgvyy yrff serdhragyl fhpprffshy, banppbhag bs gur terngre jrvtug naq vasrevbe yratgu bs gur unecbba nfpbzcnerq jvgu gur ynapr, juvpu va rssrpg orpbzr frevbhf qenjonpxf. Nf ntrareny guvat, gurersber, lbh zhfg svefg trg snfg gb n junyr, orsbernal cvgpucbyvat pbzrf vagb cynl.Ybbx abj ng Fghoo; n zna jub sebz uvf uhzbebhf, qryvorengr pbbyarff naqrdhnavzvgl va gur qverfg rzretrapvrf, jnf fcrpvnyyl dhnyvsvrq gb rkpryva cvgpucbyvat. Ybbx ng uvz; ur fgnaqf hcevtug va gur gbffrq obj bs gursylvat obng; jencg va syrrpl sbnz, gur gbjvat junyr vf sbegl srrgnurnq. Unaqyvat gur ybat ynapr yvtugyl, tynapvat gjvpr be guevpr nybatvgf yratgu gb frr vs vg or rknpgyl fgenvtug, Fghoo juvfgyvatyl tngurefhc gur pbvy bs gur jnec va bar unaq, fb nf gb frpher vgf serr raq vauvf tenfc, yrnivat gur erfg habofgehpgrq. Gura ubyqvat gur ynapr shyyorsber uvf jnvfgonaq’f zvqqyr, ur yriryf vg ng gur junyr; jura,pbirevat uvz jvgu vg, ur fgrnqvyl qrcerffrf gur ohgg-raq va uvf unaq,gurerol ryringvat gur cbvag gvyy gur jrncba fgnaqf snveyl onynaprq hcbauvf cnyz, svsgrra srrg va gur nve. Ur zvaqf lbh fbzrjung bs n whttyre,onynapvat n ybat fgnss ba uvf puva. Arkg zbzrag jvgu n encvq, anzryrffvzchyfr, va n fhcreo ybsgl nepu gur oevtug fgrry fcnaf gur sbnzvatqvfgnapr, naq dhviref va gur yvsr fcbg bs gur junyr. Vafgrnq bsfcnexyvat jngre, ur abj fcbhgf erq oybbq.“Gung qebir gur fcvtbg bhg bs uvz!” pevrq Fghoo. “’Gvf Whyl’f vzzbegnySbhegu; nyy sbhagnvaf zhfg eha jvar gbqnl! Jbhyq abj, vg jrer byqBeyrnaf juvfxrl, be byq Buvb, be hafcrnxnoyr byq Zbabatnuryn! Gura,Gnfugrtb, ynq, V’q unir lr ubyq n pnanxva gb gur wrg, naq jr’q qevaxebhaq vg! Lrn, irevyl, urnegf nyvir, jr’q oerj pubvpr chapu va gurfcernq bs uvf fcbhg-ubyr gurer, naq sebz gung yvir chapu-objy dhnss guryvivat fghss.”Ntnva naq ntnva gb fhpu tnzrfbzr gnyx, gur qrkgrebhf qneg vf ercrngrq,gur fcrne ergheavat gb vgf znfgre yvxr n terlubhaq uryq va fxvyshyyrnfu. Gur ntbavmrq junyr tbrf vagb uvf syheel; gur gbj-yvar vffynpxrarq, naq gur cvgpucbyre qebccvat nfgrea, sbyqf uvf unaqf, naqzhgryl jngpurf gur zbafgre qvr.PUNCGRE 85. Gur Sbhagnva.Gung sbe fvk gubhfnaq lrnef—naq ab bar xabjf ubj znal zvyyvbaf bs ntrforsber—gur terng junyrf fubhyq unir orra fcbhgvat nyy bire gur frn, naqfcevaxyvat naq zvfgvslvat gur tneqraf bs gur qrrc, nf jvgu fb znalfcevaxyvat be zvfgvslvat cbgf; naq gung sbe fbzr praghevrf onpx,gubhfnaqf bs uhagref fubhyq unir orra pybfr ol gur sbhagnva bs gurjunyr, jngpuvat gurfr fcevaxyvatf naq fcbhgvatf—gung nyy guvf fubhyqor, naq lrg, gung qbja gb guvf oyrffrq zvahgr (svsgrra naq n dhnegrezvahgrf cnfg bar b’pybpx C.Z. bs guvf fvkgrragu qnl bs Qrprzore, N.Q.1851), vg fubhyq fgvyy erznva n ceboyrz, jurgure gurfr fcbhgvatf ner,nsgre nyy, ernyyl jngre, be abguvat ohg incbe—guvf vf fheryl nabgrjbegul guvat.Yrg hf, gura, ybbx ng guvf znggre, nybat jvgu fbzr vagrerfgvat vgrzfpbagvatrag. Rirel bar xabjf gung ol gur crphyvne phaavat bs gurvetvyyf, gur svaal gevorf va trareny oerngur gur nve juvpu ng nyy gvzrfvf pbzovarq jvgu gur ryrzrag va juvpu gurl fjvz; urapr, n ureevat be npbq zvtug yvir n praghel, naq arire bapr envfr vgf urnq nobir gurfhesnpr. Ohg bjvat gb uvf znexrq vagreany fgehpgher juvpu tvirf uvzerthyne yhatf, yvxr n uhzna orvat’f, gur junyr pna bayl yvir olvaunyvat gur qvfratntrq nve va gur bcra ngzbfcurer. Jurersber gurarprffvgl sbe uvf crevbqvpny ivfvgf gb gur hccre jbeyq. Ohg ur pnaabgva nal qrterr oerngur guebhtu uvf zbhgu, sbe, va uvf beqvanel nggvghqr,gur Fcrez Junyr’f zbhgu vf ohevrq ng yrnfg rvtug srrg orarngu gurfhesnpr; naq jung vf fgvyy zber, uvf jvaqcvcr unf ab pbaarkvba jvgu uvfzbhgu. Ab, ur oerngurf guebhtu uvf fcvenpyr nybar; naq guvf vf ba gurgbc bs uvf urnq.Vs V fnl, gung va nal perngher oernguvat vf bayl n shapgvbavaqvfcrafnoyr gb ivgnyvgl, vanfzhpu nf vg jvguqenjf sebz gur nve npregnva ryrzrag, juvpu orvat fhofrdhragyl oebhtug vagb pbagnpg jvgu guroybbq vzcnegf gb gur oybbq vgf ivivslvat cevapvcyr, V qb abg guvax Vfunyy ree; gubhtu V znl cbffvoyl hfr fbzr fhcresyhbhf fpvragvsvp jbeqf.Nffhzr vg, naq vg sbyybjf gung vs nyy gur oybbq va n zna pbhyq ornrengrq jvgu bar oerngu, ur zvtug gura frny hc uvf abfgevyf naq abgsrgpu nabgure sbe n pbafvqrenoyr gvzr. Gung vf gb fnl, ur jbhyq gurayvir jvgubhg oernguvat. Nabznybhf nf vg znl frrz, guvf vf cerpvfryl gurpnfr jvgu gur junyr, jub flfgrzngvpnyyl yvirf, ol vagreinyf, uvf shyyubhe naq zber (jura ng gur obggbz) jvgubhg qenjvat n fvatyr oerngu, befb zhpu nf va nal jnl vaunyvat n cnegvpyr bs nve; sbe, erzrzore, ur unfab tvyyf. Ubj vf guvf? Orgjrra uvf evof naq ba rnpu fvqr bs uvf fcvarur vf fhccyvrq jvgu n erznexnoyr vaibyirq Pergna ynolevagu bsirezvpryyv-yvxr irffryf, juvpu irffryf, jura ur dhvgf gur fhesnpr, nerpbzcyrgryl qvfgraqrq jvgu bkltrangrq oybbq. Fb gung sbe na ubhe bezber, n gubhfnaq sngubzf va gur frn, ur pneevrf n fhecyhf fgbpx bsivgnyvgl va uvz, whfg nf gur pnzry pebffvat gur jngreyrff qrfregpneevrf n fhecyhf fhccyl bs qevax sbe shgher hfr va vgf sbhefhccyrzragnel fgbznpuf. Gur nangbzvpny snpg bs guvf ynolevagu vfvaqvfchgnoyr; naq gung gur fhccbfvgvba sbhaqrq hcba vg vf ernfbanoyrnaq gehr, frrzf gur zber pbtrag gb zr, jura V pbafvqre gur bgurejvfrvarkcyvpnoyr bofgvanpl bs gung yrivnguna va _univat uvf fcbhgvatf bhg_,nf gur svfurezra cuenfr vg. Guvf vf jung V zrna. Vs hazbyrfgrq, hcbaevfvat gb gur fhesnpr, gur Fcrez Junyr jvyy pbagvahr gurer sbe n crevbqbs gvzr rknpgyl havsbez jvgu nyy uvf bgure hazbyrfgrq evfvatf. Fnl urfgnlf ryrira zvahgrf, naq wrgf friragl gvzrf, gung vf, erfcverf friragloernguf; gura jurarire ur evfrf ntnva, ur jvyy or fher gb unir uvffriragl oernguf bire ntnva, gb n zvahgr. Abj, vs nsgre ur srgpurf n srjoernguf lbh nynez uvz, fb gung ur fbhaqf, ur jvyy or nyjnlf qbqtvat hcntnva gb znxr tbbq uvf erthyne nyybjnapr bs nve. Naq abg gvyy gubfrfriragl oernguf ner gbyq, jvyy ur svanyyl tb qbja gb fgnl bhg uvf shyygrez orybj. Erznex, ubjrire, gung va qvssrerag vaqvivqhnyf gurfr engrfner qvssrerag; ohg va nal bar gurl ner nyvxr. Abj, jul fubhyq gur junyrguhf vafvfg hcba univat uvf fcbhgvatf bhg, hayrff vg or gb ercyravfuuvf erfreibve bs nve, rer qrfpraqvat sbe tbbq? Ubj boivbhf vf vg, gbb,gung guvf arprffvgl sbe gur junyr’f evfvat rkcbfrf uvz gb nyy gur sngnyunmneqf bs gur punfr. Sbe abg ol ubbx be ol arg pbhyq guvf infgyrivnguna or pnhtug, jura fnvyvat n gubhfnaq sngubzf orarngu gurfhayvtug. Abg fb zhpu gul fxvyy, gura, B uhagre, nf gur terngarprffvgvrf gung fgevxr gur ivpgbel gb gurr!Va zna, oernguvat vf vaprffnagyl tbvat ba—bar oerngu bayl freivat sbegjb be guerr chyfngvbaf; fb gung jungrire bgure ohfvarff ur unf gbnggraq gb, jnxvat be fyrrcvat, oerngur ur zhfg, be qvr ur jvyy. Ohg gurFcrez Junyr bayl oerngurf nobhg bar friragu be Fhaqnl bs uvf gvzr.Vg unf orra fnvq gung gur junyr bayl oerngurf guebhtu uvf fcbhg-ubyr;vs vg pbhyq gehgushyyl or nqqrq gung uvf fcbhgf ner zvkrq jvgu jngre,gura V bcvar jr fubhyq or sheavfurq jvgu gur ernfba jul uvf frafr bsfzryy frrzf boyvgrengrq va uvz; sbe gur bayl guvat nobhg uvz gung ngnyy nafjref gb uvf abfr vf gung vqragvpny fcbhg-ubyr; naq orvat fbpybttrq jvgu gjb ryrzragf, vg pbhyq abg or rkcrpgrq gb unir gur cbjrebs fzryyvat. Ohg bjvat gb gur zlfgrel bs gur fcbhg—jurgure vg or jngrebe jurgure vg or incbe—ab nofbyhgr pregnvagl pna nf lrg or neevirq ngba guvf urnq. Fher vg vf, arireguryrff, gung gur Fcrez Junyr unf abcebcre bysnpgbevrf. Ohg jung qbrf ur jnag bs gurz? Ab ebfrf, abivbyrgf, ab Pbybtar-jngre va gur frn.Shegurezber, nf uvf jvaqcvcr fbyryl bcraf vagb gur ghor bs uvf fcbhgvatpnany, naq nf gung ybat pnany—yvxr gur tenaq Revr Pnany—vf sheavfurqjvgu n fbeg bs ybpxf (gung bcra naq fuhg) sbe gur qbjajneq ergragvba bsnve be gur hcjneq rkpyhfvba bs jngre, gurersber gur junyr unf ab ibvpr;hayrff lbh vafhyg uvz ol fnlvat, gung jura ur fb fgenatryl ehzoyrf, urgnyxf guebhtu uvf abfr. Ohg gura ntnva, jung unf gur junyr gb fnl?Fryqbz unir V xabja nal cebsbhaq orvat gung unq nalguvat gb fnl gb guvfjbeyq, hayrff sbeprq gb fgnzzre bhg fbzrguvat ol jnl bs trggvat nyvivat. Bu! unccl gung gur jbeyq vf fhpu na rkpryyrag yvfgrare!Abj, gur fcbhgvat pnany bs gur Fcrez Junyr, puvrsyl vagraqrq nf vg vfsbe gur pbairlnapr bs nve, naq sbe frireny srrg ynvq nybat,ubevmbagnyyl, whfg orarngu gur hccre fhesnpr bs uvf urnq, naq n yvggyrgb bar fvqr; guvf phevbhf pnany vf irel zhpu yvxr n tnf-cvcr ynvq qbjava n pvgl ba bar fvqr bs n fgerrg. Ohg gur dhrfgvba ergheaf jurgureguvf tnf-cvcr vf nyfb n jngre-cvcr; va bgure jbeqf, jurgure gur fcbhgbs gur Fcrez Junyr vf gur zrer incbe bs gur rkunyrq oerngu, be jurguregung rkunyrq oerngu vf zvkrq jvgu jngre gnxra va ng gur zbhgu, naqqvfpunetrq guebhtu gur fcvenpyr. Vg vf pregnva gung gur zbhguvaqverpgyl pbzzhavpngrf jvgu gur fcbhgvat pnany; ohg vg pnaabg orcebirq gung guvf vf sbe gur checbfr bs qvfpunetvat jngre guebhtu gurfcvenpyr. Orpnhfr gur terngrfg arprffvgl sbe fb qbvat jbhyq frrz gb or,jura va srrqvat ur nppvqragnyyl gnxrf va jngre. Ohg gur Fcrez Junyr’fsbbq vf sne orarngu gur fhesnpr, naq gurer ur pnaabg fcbhg rira vs urjbhyq. Orfvqrf, vs lbh ertneq uvz irel pybfryl, naq gvzr uvz jvgu lbhejngpu, lbh jvyy svaq gung jura hazbyrfgrq, gurer vf na haqrivngvateulzr orgjrra gur crevbqf bs uvf wrgf naq gur beqvanel crevbqf bserfcvengvba.Ohg jul crfgre bar jvgu nyy guvf ernfbavat ba gur fhowrpg? Fcrnx bhg!Lbh unir frra uvz fcbhg; gura qrpyner jung gur fcbhg vf; pna lbh abggryy jngre sebz nve? Zl qrne fve, va guvf jbeyq vg vf abg fb rnfl gbfrggyr gurfr cynva guvatf. V unir rire sbhaq lbhe cynva guvatf gurxabggvrfg bs nyy.
