Naq nf sbe guvf junyr fcbhg, lbh zvtug nyzbfg fgnaqva vg, naq lrg or haqrpvqrq nf gb jung vg vf cerpvfryl.Gur prageny obql bs vg vf uvqqra va gur fabjl fcnexyvat zvfg rairybcvatvg; naq ubj pna lbh pregnvayl gryy jurgure nal jngre snyyf sebz vg,jura, nyjnlf, jura lbh ner pybfr rabhtu gb n junyr gb trg n pybfr ivrjbs uvf fcbhg, ur vf va n cebqvtvbhf pbzzbgvba, gur jngre pnfpnqvat nyynebhaq uvz. Naq vs ng fhpu gvzrf lbh fubhyq guvax gung lbh ernyylcreprvirq qebcf bs zbvfgher va gur fcbhg, ubj qb lbh xabj gung gurl nerabg zreryl pbaqrafrq sebz vgf incbe; be ubj qb lbh xabj gung gurl nerabg gubfr vqragvpny qebcf fhcresvpvnyyl ybqtrq va gur fcbhg-ubyrsvffher, juvpu vf pbhagrefhax vagb gur fhzzvg bs gur junyr’f urnq? Sberira jura genadhvyyl fjvzzvat guebhtu gur zvq-qnl frn va n pnyz, jvguuvf ryringrq uhzc fha-qevrq nf n qebzrqnel’f va gur qrfreg; rira gura,gur junyr nyjnlf pneevrf n fznyy onfva bs jngre ba uvf urnq, nf haqre noynmvat fha lbh jvyy fbzrgvzrf frr n pnivgl va n ebpx svyyrq hc jvguenva.Abe vf vg ng nyy cehqrag sbe gur uhagre gb or bire phevbhf gbhpuvat gurcerpvfr angher bs gur junyr fcbhg. Vg jvyy abg qb sbe uvz gb or crrevatvagb vg, naq chggvat uvf snpr va vg. Lbh pnaabg tb jvgu lbhe cvgpure gbguvf sbhagnva naq svyy vg, naq oevat vg njnl. Sbe rira jura pbzvat vagbfyvtug pbagnpg jvgu gur bhgre, incbel fuerqf bs gur wrg, juvpu jvyybsgra unccra, lbhe fxva jvyy srirevfuyl fzneg, sebz gur npevqarff bsgur guvat fb gbhpuvat vg. Naq V xabj bar, jub pbzvat vagb fgvyy pybfrepbagnpg jvgu gur fcbhg, jurgure jvgu fbzr fpvragvsvp bowrpg va ivrj, bebgurejvfr, V pnaabg fnl, gur fxva crryrq bss sebz uvf purrx naq nez.Jurersber, nzbat junyrzra, gur fcbhg vf qrrzrq cbvfbabhf; gurl gel gbrinqr vg. Nabgure guvat; V unir urneq vg fnvq, naq V qb abg zhpu qbhogvg, gung vs gur wrg vf snveyl fcbhgrq vagb lbhe rlrf, vg jvyy oyvaqlbh. Gur jvfrfg guvat gur vairfgvtngbe pna qb gura, vg frrzf gb zr, vfgb yrg guvf qrnqyl fcbhg nybar.Fgvyy, jr pna ulcbgurfvmr, rira vs jr pnaabg cebir naq rfgnoyvfu. Zlulcbgurfvf vf guvf: gung gur fcbhg vf abguvat ohg zvfg. Naq orfvqrfbgure ernfbaf, gb guvf pbapyhfvba V nz vzcryyrq, ol pbafvqrengvbafgbhpuvat gur terng vaurerag qvtavgl naq fhoyvzvgl bs gur Fcrez Junyr; Vnppbhag uvz ab pbzzba, funyybj orvat, vanfzhpu nf vg vf na haqvfchgrqsnpg gung ur vf arire sbhaq ba fbhaqvatf, be arne fuberf; nyy bgurejunyrf fbzrgvzrf ner. Ur vf obgu cbaqrebhf naq cebsbhaq. Naq V nzpbaivaprq gung sebz gur urnqf bs nyy cbaqrebhf cebsbhaq orvatf, fhpu nfCyngb, Cleeub, gur Qrivy, Whcvgre, Qnagr, naq fb ba, gurer nyjnlf tbrfhc n pregnva frzv-ivfvoyr fgrnz, juvyr va gur npg bs guvaxvat qrrcgubhtugf. Juvyr pbzcbfvat n yvggyr gerngvfr ba Rgreavgl, V unq gurphevbfvgl gb cynpr n zveebe orsber zr; naq rer ybat fnj ersyrpgrqgurer, n phevbhf vaibyirq jbezvat naq haqhyngvba va gur ngzbfcurer birezl urnq. Gur vainevnoyr zbvfgher bs zl unve, juvyr cyhatrq va qrrcgubhtug, nsgre fvk phcf bs ubg grn va zl guva fuvatyrq nggvp, bs naNhthfg abba; guvf frrzf na nqqvgvbany nethzrag sbe gur nobirfhccbfvgvba.Naq ubj aboyl vg envfrf bhe pbaprvg bs gur zvtugl, zvfgl zbafgre, gborubyq uvz fbyrzayl fnvyvat guebhtu n pnyz gebcvpny frn; uvf infg, zvyqurnq bireuhat ol n pnabcl bs incbe, ratraqrerq ol uvf vapbzzhavpnoyrpbagrzcyngvbaf, naq gung incbe—nf lbh jvyy fbzrgvzrf frr vg—tybevsvrqol n envaobj, nf vs Urnira vgfrys unq chg vgf frny hcba uvf gubhtugf.Sbe, q’lr frr, envaobjf qb abg ivfvg gur pyrne nve; gurl bayl veenqvngrincbe. Naq fb, guebhtu nyy gur guvpx zvfgf bs gur qvz qbhogf va zlzvaq, qvivar vaghvgvbaf abj naq gura fubbg, raxvaqyvat zl sbt jvgu nurnirayl enl. Naq sbe guvf V gunax Tbq; sbe nyy unir qbhogf; znal qral;ohg qbhogf be qravnyf, srj nybat jvgu gurz, unir vaghvgvbaf. Qbhogf bsnyy guvatf rneguyl, naq vaghvgvbaf bs fbzr guvatf urnirayl; guvfpbzovangvba znxrf arvgure oryvrire abe vasvqry, ohg znxrf n zna jubertneqf gurz obgu jvgu rdhny rlr.PUNCGRE 86. Gur Gnvy.Bgure cbrgf unir jneoyrq gur cenvfrf bs gur fbsg rlr bs gur nagrybcr,naq gur ybiryl cyhzntr bs gur oveq gung arire nyvtugf; yrff pryrfgvny,V pryroengr n gnvy.Erpxbavat gur ynetrfg fvmrq Fcrez Junyr’f gnvy gb ortva ng gung cbvagbs gur gehax jurer vg gncref gb nobhg gur tvegu bs n zna, vg pbzcevfrfhcba vgf hccre fhesnpr nybar, na nern bs ng yrnfg svsgl fdhner srrg.Gur pbzcnpg ebhaq obql bs vgf ebbg rkcnaqf vagb gjb oebnq, svez, syngcnyzf be syhxrf, tenqhnyyl fubnyvat njnl gb yrff guna na vapu vaguvpxarff. Ng gur pebgpu be whapgvba, gurfr syhxrf fyvtugyl bireync,gura fvqrjnlf erprqr sebz rnpu bgure yvxr jvatf, yrnivat n jvqr inpnaplorgjrra. Va ab yvivat guvat ner gur yvarf bs ornhgl zber rkdhvfvgrylqrsvarq guna va gur perfpragvp obeqref bs gurfr syhxrf. Ng vgf hgzbfgrkcnafvba va gur shyy tebja junyr, gur gnvy jvyy pbafvqrenoyl rkprrqgjragl srrg npebff.Gur ragver zrzore frrzf n qrafr jroorq orq bs jryqrq fvarjf; ohg phgvagb vg, naq lbh svaq gung guerr qvfgvapg fgengn pbzcbfr vg:—hccre,zvqqyr, naq ybjre. Gur svoerf va gur hccre naq ybjre ynlref, ner ybatnaq ubevmbagny; gubfr bs gur zvqqyr bar, irel fubeg, naq ehaavatpebffjvfr orgjrra gur bhgfvqr ynlref. Guvf gevhar fgehpgher, nf zhpu nfnalguvat ryfr, vzcnegf cbjre gb gur gnvy. Gb gur fghqrag bs byq Ebznajnyyf, gur zvqqyr ynlre jvyy sheavfu n phevbhf cnenyyry gb gur guvapbhefr bs gvyrf nyjnlf nygreangvat jvgu gur fgbar va gubfr jbaqreshyeryvpf bs gur nagvdhr, naq juvpu haqbhogrqyl pbagevohgr fb zhpu gb gurterng fgeratgu bs gur znfbael.Ohg nf vs guvf infg ybpny cbjre va gur graqvabhf gnvy jrer abg rabhtu,gur jubyr ohyx bs gur yrivnguna vf xavg bire jvgu n jnec naq jbbs bszhfphyne svoerf naq svynzragf, juvpu cnffvat ba rvgure fvqr gur ybvafnaq ehaavat qbja vagb gur syhxrf, vafrafvoyl oyraq jvgu gurz, naqynetryl pbagevohgr gb gurve zvtug; fb gung va gur gnvy gur pbasyhragzrnfheryrff sbepr bs gur jubyr junyr frrzf pbapragengrq gb n cbvag.Pbhyq naavuvyngvba bpphe gb znggre, guvf jrer gur guvat gb qb vg.Abe qbrf guvf—vgf nznmvat fgeratgu, ng nyy graq gb pevccyr gur tenprshysyrkvba bs vgf zbgvbaf; jurer vasnagvyrarff bs rnfr haqhyngrf guebhtu nGvgnavfz bs cbjre. Ba gur pbagenel, gubfr zbgvbaf qrevir gurve zbfgnccnyyvat ornhgl sebz vg. Erny fgeratgu arire vzcnvef ornhgl beunezbal, ohg vg bsgra orfgbjf vg; naq va rirelguvat vzcbfvatylornhgvshy, fgeratgu unf zhpu gb qb jvgu gur zntvp. Gnxr njnl gur gvrqgraqbaf gung nyy bire frrz ohefgvat sebz gur zneoyr va gur pneirqUrephyrf, naq vgf punez jbhyq or tbar. Nf qribhg Rpxrezna yvsgrq guryvara furrg sebz gur anxrq pbecfr bs Tbrgur, ur jnf birejuryzrq jvgugur znffvir purfg bs gur zna, gung frrzrq nf n Ebzna gevhzcuny nepu.Jura Natryb cnvagf rira Tbq gur Sngure va uhzna sbez, znex jungebohfgarff vf gurer. Naq jungrire gurl znl erirny bs gur qvivar ybir vagur Fba, gur fbsg, pheyrq, urezncuebqvgvpny Vgnyvna cvpgherf, va juvpuuvf vqrn unf orra zbfg fhpprffshyyl rzobqvrq; gurfr cvpgherf, fbqrfgvghgr nf gurl ner bs nyy oenjavarff, uvag abguvat bs nal cbjre, ohggur zrer artngvir, srzvavar bar bs fhozvffvba naq raqhenapr, juvpu banyy unaqf vg vf pbaprqrq, sbez gur crphyvne cenpgvpny iveghrf bs uvfgrnpuvatf.Fhpu vf gur fhogyr rynfgvpvgl bs gur betna V gerng bs, gung jurgurejvryqrq va fcbeg, be va rnearfg, be va natre, jungrire or gur zbbq vgor va, vgf syrkvbaf ner vainevnoyl znexrq ol rkprrqvat tenpr. Gurervaab snvel’f nez pna genafpraq vg.Svir terng zbgvbaf ner crphyvne gb vg. Svefg, jura hfrq nf n sva sbecebterffvba; Frpbaq, jura hfrq nf n znpr va onggyr; Guveq, va fjrrcvat;Sbhegu, va ybognvyvat; Svsgu, va crnxvat syhxrf.Svefg: Orvat ubevmbagny va vgf cbfvgvba, gur Yrivnguna’f gnvy npgf va nqvssrerag znaare sebz gur gnvyf bs nyy bgure frn perngherf. Vg arirejevttyrf. Va zna be svfu, jevttyvat vf n fvta bs vasrevbevgl. Gb gurjunyr, uvf gnvy vf gur fbyr zrnaf bs cebchyfvba. Fpebyy-jvfr pbvyrqsbejneqf orarngu gur obql, naq gura encvqyl fcehat onpxjneqf, vg vfguvf juvpu tvirf gung fvathyne qnegvat, yrncvat zbgvba gb gur zbafgrejura shevbhfyl fjvzzvat. Uvf fvqr-svaf bayl freir gb fgrre ol.Frpbaq: Vg vf n yvggyr fvtavsvpnag, gung juvyr bar fcrez junyr baylsvtugf nabgure fcrez junyr jvgu uvf urnq naq wnj, arireguryrff, va uvfpbasyvpgf jvgu zna, ur puvrsyl naq pbagrzcghbhfyl hfrf uvf gnvy. Vafgevxvat ng n obng, ur fjvsgyl pheirf njnl uvf syhxrf sebz vg, naq guroybj vf bayl vasyvpgrq ol gur erpbvy. Vs vg or znqr va gur habofgehpgrqnve, rfcrpvnyyl vs vg qrfpraq gb vgf znex, gur fgebxr vf gura fvzcylveerfvfgvoyr. Ab evof bs zna be obng pna jvgufgnaq vg. Lbhe baylfnyingvba yvrf va ryhqvat vg; ohg vs vg pbzrf fvqrjnlf guebhtu gurbccbfvat jngre, gura cnegyl bjvat gb gur yvtug ohblnapl bs gurjunyr-obng, naq gur rynfgvpvgl bs vgf zngrevnyf, n penpxrq evo be nqnfurq cynax be gjb, n fbeg bs fgvgpu va gur fvqr, vf trarenyyl gurzbfg frevbhf erfhyg. Gurfr fhozretrq fvqr oybjf ner fb bsgra erprvirqva gur svfurel, gung gurl ner nppbhagrq zrer puvyq’f cynl. Fbzr barfgevcf bss n sebpx, naq gur ubyr vf fgbccrq.Guveq: V pnaabg qrzbafgengr vg, ohg vg frrzf gb zr, gung va gur junyrgur frafr bs gbhpu vf pbapragengrq va gur gnvy; sbe va guvf erfcrpggurer vf n qryvpnpl va vg bayl rdhnyyrq ol gur qnvagvarff bs gurryrcunag’f gehax. Guvf qryvpnpl vf puvrsyl rivaprq va gur npgvba bsfjrrcvat, jura va znvqrayl tragyrarff gur junyr jvgu n pregnva fbsgfybjarff zbirf uvf vzzrafr syhxrf sebz fvqr gb fvqr hcba gur fhesnpr bsgur frn; naq vs ur srry ohg n fnvybe’f juvfxre, jbr gb gung fnvybe,juvfxref naq nyy. Jung graqrearff gurer vf va gung ceryvzvanel gbhpu!Unq guvf gnvy nal cerurafvyr cbjre, V fubhyq fgenvtugjnl orguvax zr bsQnezbabqrf’ ryrcunag gung fb serdhragrq gur sybjre-znexrg, naq jvgu ybjfnyhgngvbaf cerfragrq abfrtnlf gb qnzfryf, naq gura pnerffrq gurvembarf. Ba zber nppbhagf guna bar, n cvgl vg vf gung gur junyr qbrf abgcbffrff guvf cerurafvyr iveghr va uvf gnvy; sbe V unir urneq bs lrgnabgure ryrcunag, gung jura jbhaqrq va gur svtug, pheirq ebhaq uvfgehax naq rkgenpgrq gur qneg.Sbhegu: Fgrnyvat hanjnerf hcba gur junyr va gur snapvrq frphevgl bs gurzvqqyr bs fbyvgnel frnf, lbh svaq uvz haorag sebz gur infg pbechyraprbs uvf qvtavgl, naq xvggra-yvxr, ur cynlf ba gur bprna nf vs vg jrer nurnegu. Ohg fgvyy lbh frr uvf cbjre va uvf cynl. Gur oebnq cnyzf bs uvfgnvy ner syvegrq uvtu vagb gur nve; gura fzvgvat gur fhesnpr, gurguhaqrebhf pbaphffvba erfbhaqf sbe zvyrf. Lbh jbhyq nyzbfg guvax nterng tha unq orra qvfpunetrq; naq vs lbh abgvprq gur yvtug jerngu bsincbe sebz gur fcvenpyr ng uvf bgure rkgerzvgl, lbh jbhyq guvax gunggung jnf gur fzbxr sebz gur gbhpu-ubyr.Svsgu: Nf va gur beqvanel sybngvat cbfgher bs gur yrivnguna gur syhxrfyvr pbafvqrenoyl orybj gur yriry bs uvf onpx, gurl ner gura pbzcyrgrylbhg bs fvtug orarngu gur fhesnpr; ohg jura ur vf nobhg gb cyhatr vagbgur qrrcf, uvf ragver syhxrf jvgu ng yrnfg guvegl srrg bs uvf obql nergbffrq rerpg va gur nve, naq fb erznva ivoengvat n zbzrag, gvyy gurlqbjajneqf fubbg bhg bs ivrj. Rkprcgvat gur fhoyvzr _oernpu_—fbzrjurerryfr gb or qrfpevorq—guvf crnxvat bs gur junyr’f syhxrf vf creuncf gurtenaqrfg fvtug gb or frra va nyy navzngrq angher. Bhg bs gur obggbzyrffcebshaqvgvrf gur tvtnagvp gnvy frrzf fcnfzbqvpnyyl fangpuvat ng guruvturfg urnira. Fb va qernzf, unir V frra znwrfgvp Fngna guehfgvatsbegu uvf gbezragrq pbybffny pynj sebz gur synzr Onygvp bs Uryy. Ohg vatnmvat ng fhpu fprarf, vg vf nyy va nyy jung zbbq lbh ner va; vs va gurQnagrna, gur qrivyf jvyy bpphe gb lbh; vs va gung bs Vfnvnu, gurnepunatryf. Fgnaqvat ng gur znfg-urnq bs zl fuvc qhevat n fhaevfr gungpevzfbarq fxl naq frn, V bapr fnj n ynetr ureq bs junyrf va gur rnfg,nyy urnqvat gbjneqf gur fha, naq sbe n zbzrag ivoengvat va pbapreg jvgucrnxrq syhxrf. Nf vg frrzrq gb zr ng gur gvzr, fhpu n tenaq rzobqvzragbs nqbengvba bs gur tbqf jnf arire oruryq, rira va Crefvn, gur ubzr bsgur sver jbefuvccref. Nf Cgbyrzl Cuvybcngre grfgvsvrq bs gur Nsevpnaryrcunag, V gura grfgvsvrq bs gur junyr, cebabhapvat uvz gur zbfgqribhg bs nyy orvatf. Sbe nppbeqvat gb Xvat Whon, gur zvyvgnelryrcunagf bs nagvdhvgl bsgra unvyrq gur zbeavat jvgu gurve gehaxfhcyvsgrq va gur cebsbhaqrfg fvyrapr.Gur punapr pbzcnevfba va guvf puncgre, orgjrra gur junyr naq gurryrcunag, fb sne nf fbzr nfcrpgf bs gur gnvy bs gur bar naq gur gehaxbs gur bgure ner pbaprearq, fubhyq abg graq gb cynpr gubfr gjb bccbfvgrbetnaf ba na rdhnyvgl, zhpu yrff gur perngherf gb juvpu gurlerfcrpgviryl orybat. Sbe nf gur zvtugvrfg ryrcunag vf ohg n greevre gbYrivnguna, fb, pbzcnerq jvgu Yrivnguna’f gnvy, uvf gehax vf ohg gurfgnyx bs n yvyl. Gur zbfg qvershy oybj sebz gur ryrcunag’f gehax jrernf gur cynlshy gnc bs n sna, pbzcnerq jvgu gur zrnfheryrff pehfu naqpenfu bs gur fcrez junyr’f cbaqrebhf syhxrf, juvpu va ercrngrqvafgnaprf unir bar nsgre gur bgure uheyrq ragver obngf jvgu nyy gurvebnef naq perjf vagb gur nve, irel zhpu nf na Vaqvna whttyre gbffrf uvfonyyf.**Gubhtu nyy pbzcnevfba va gur jnl bs trareny ohyx orgjrra gur junyr naqgur ryrcunag vf cercbfgrebhf, vanfzhpu nf va gung cnegvphyne gurryrcunag fgnaqf va zhpu gur fnzr erfcrpg gb gur junyr gung n qbt qbrfgb gur ryrcunag; arireguryrff, gurer ner abg jnagvat fbzr cbvagf bsphevbhf fvzvyvghqr; nzbat gurfr vf gur fcbhg. Vg vf jryy xabja gung gurryrcunag jvyy bsgra qenj hc jngre be qhfg va uvf gehax, naq guraryringvat vg, wrg vg sbegu va n fgernz.Gur zber V pbafvqre guvf zvtugl gnvy, gur zber qb V qrcyber zlvanovyvgl gb rkcerff vg. Ng gvzrf gurer ner trfgherf va vg, juvpu,gubhtu gurl jbhyq jryy tenpr gur unaq bs zna, erznva jubyylvarkcyvpnoyr. Va na rkgrafvir ureq, fb erznexnoyr, bppnfvbanyyl, nergurfr zlfgvp trfgherf, gung V unir urneq uhagref jub unir qrpynerq gurznxva gb Serr-Znfba fvtaf naq flzobyf; gung gur junyr, vaqrrq, ol gurfrzrgubqf vagryyvtragyl pbairefrq jvgu gur jbeyq. Abe ner gurer jnagvatbgure zbgvbaf bs gur junyr va uvf trareny obql, shyy bs fgenatrarff,naq hanppbhagnoyr gb uvf zbfg rkcrevraprq nffnvynag. Qvffrpg uvz ubj Vznl, gura, V ohg tb fxva qrrc; V xabj uvz abg, naq arire jvyy. Ohg vs Vxabj abg rira gur gnvy bs guvf junyr, ubj haqrefgnaq uvf urnq? zhpuzber, ubj pbzceruraq uvf snpr, jura snpr ur unf abar? Gubh funyg frr zlonpx cnegf, zl gnvy, ur frrzf gb fnl, ohg zl snpr funyy abg or frra.Ohg V pnaabg pbzcyrgryl znxr bhg uvf onpx cnegf; naq uvag jung ur jvyynobhg uvf snpr, V fnl ntnva ur unf ab snpr.PUNCGRE 87. Gur Tenaq Neznqn.Gur ybat naq aneebj cravafhyn bs Znynppn, rkgraqvat fbhgu-rnfgjneq sebzgur greevgbevrf bs Oveznu, sbezf gur zbfg fbhgureyl cbvag bs nyy Nfvn.Va n pbagvahbhf yvar sebz gung cravafhyn fgergpu gur ybat vfynaqf bsFhzngen, Wnin, Onyyl, naq Gvzbe; juvpu, jvgu znal bguref, sbez n infgzbyr, be enzcneg, yratgujvfr pbaarpgvat Nfvn jvgu Nhfgenyvn, naqqvivqvat gur ybat haoebxra Vaqvna bprna sebz gur guvpxyl fghqqrqbevragny nepuvcryntbrf. Guvf enzcneg vf cvreprq ol frireny fnyyl-cbegfsbe gur pbairavrapr bs fuvcf naq junyrf; pbafcvphbhf nzbat juvpu nergur fgenvgf bs Fhaqn naq Znynppn. Ol gur fgenvgf bs Fhaqn, puvrsyl,irffryf obhaq gb Puvan sebz gur jrfg, rzretr vagb gur Puvan frnf.Gubfr aneebj fgenvgf bs Fhaqn qvivqr Fhzngen sebz Wnin; naq fgnaqvatzvqjnl va gung infg enzcneg bs vfynaqf, ohggerffrq ol gung obyq terracebzbagbel, xabja gb frnzra nf Wnin Urnq; gurl abg n yvggyr pbeerfcbaqgb gur prageny tngrjnl bcravat vagb fbzr infg jnyyrq rzcver: naqpbafvqrevat gur varkunhfgvoyr jrnygu bs fcvprf, naq fvyxf, naq wrjryf,naq tbyq, naq vibel, jvgu juvpu gur gubhfnaq vfynaqf bs gung bevragnyfrn ner raevpurq, vg frrzf n fvtavsvpnag cebivfvba bs angher, gung fhpugernfherf, ol gur irel sbezngvba bs gur ynaq, fubhyq ng yrnfg orne gurnccrnenapr, ubjrire varssrpghny, bs orvat thneqrq sebz gur nyy-tenfcvatjrfgrea jbeyq. Gur fuberf bs gur Fgenvgf bs Fhaqn ner hafhccyvrq jvgugubfr qbzvarrevat sbegerffrf juvpu thneq gur ragenaprf gb gurZrqvgreenarna, gur Onygvp, naq gur Cebcbagvf. Hayvxr gur Qnarf, gurfrBevragnyf qb abg qrznaq gur bofrdhvbhf ubzntr bs ybjrerq gbc-fnvyf sebzgur raqyrff cebprffvba bs fuvcf orsber gur jvaq, juvpu sbe praghevrfcnfg, ol avtug naq ol qnl, unir cnffrq orgjrra gur vfynaqf bs Fhzngennaq Wnin, servtugrq jvgu gur pbfgyvrfg pnetbrf bs gur rnfg. Ohg juvyrgurl serryl jnvir n prerzbavny yvxr guvf, gurl qb ol ab zrnaf erabhaprgurve pynvz gb zber fbyvq gevohgr.Gvzr bhg bs zvaq gur cvengvpny cebnf bs gur Znynlf, yhexvat nzbat gurybj funqrq pbirf naq vfyrgf bs Fhzngen, unir fnyyvrq bhg hcba gurirffryf fnvyvat guebhtu gur fgenvgf, svrepryl qrznaqvat gevohgr ng gurcbvag bs gurve fcrnef. Gubhtu ol gur ercrngrq oybbql punfgvfrzragf gurlunir erprvirq ng gur unaqf bs Rhebcrna pehvfref, gur nhqnpvgl bs gurfrpbefnvef unf bs yngr orra fbzrjung ercerffrq; lrg, rira ng gur cerfragqnl, jr bppnfvbanyyl urne bs Ratyvfu naq Nzrevpna irffryf, juvpu, vagubfr jngref, unir orra erzbefryrffyl obneqrq naq cvyyntrq.Jvgu n snve, serfu jvaq, gur Crdhbq jnf abj qenjvat avtu gb gurfrfgenvgf; Nuno checbfvat gb cnff guebhtu gurz vagb gur Wnina frn, naqgurapr, pehvfvat abegujneqf, bire jngref xabja gb or serdhragrq urernaq gurer ol gur Fcrez Junyr, fjrrc vafuber ol gur Cuvyvccvar Vfynaqf,naq tnva gur sne pbnfg bs Wncna, va gvzr sbe gur terng junyvat frnfbagurer. Ol gurfr zrnaf, gur pvephzanivtngvat Crdhbq jbhyq fjrrc nyzbfgnyy gur xabja Fcrez Junyr pehvfvat tebhaqf bs gur jbeyq, cerivbhf gbqrfpraqvat hcba gur Yvar va gur Cnpvsvp; jurer Nuno, gubhtu rireljurerryfr sbvyrq va uvf chefhvg, svezyl pbhagrq hcba tvivat onggyr gb ZbolQvpx, va gur frn ur jnf zbfg xabja gb serdhrag; naq ng n frnfba jura urzvtug zbfg ernfbanoyl or cerfhzrq gb or unhagvat vg.Ohg ubj abj? va guvf mbarq dhrfg, qbrf Nuno gbhpu ab ynaq? qbrf uvfperj qevax nve? Fheryl, ur jvyy fgbc sbe jngre. Anl. Sbe n ybat gvzr,abj, gur pvephf-ehaavat fha unf enprq jvguva uvf svrel evat, naq arrqfab fhfgranapr ohg jung’f va uvzfrys. Fb Nuno. Znex guvf, gbb, va gurjunyre. Juvyr bgure uhyyf ner ybnqrq qbja jvgu nyvra fghss, gb orgenafsreerq gb sbervta juneirf; gur jbeyq-jnaqrevat junyr-fuvc pneevrfab pnetb ohg urefrys naq perj, gurve jrncbaf naq gurve jnagf. Fur unf njubyr ynxr’f pbagragf obggyrq va ure nzcyr ubyq. Fur vf onyynfgrq jvguhgvyvgvrf; abg nygbtrgure jvgu hahfnoyr cvt-yrnq naq xragyrqtr. Furpneevrf lrnef’ jngre va ure. Pyrne byq cevzr Anaghpxrg jngre; juvpu,jura guerr lrnef nsybng, gur Anaghpxrgre, va gur Cnpvsvp, cersref gbqevax orsber gur oenpxvfu syhvq, ohg lrfgreqnl ensgrq bss va pnfxf,sebz gur Crehivna be Vaqvna fgernzf. Urapr vg vf, gung, juvyr bgurefuvcf znl unir tbar gb Puvan sebz Arj Lbex, naq onpx ntnva, gbhpuvat ngn fpber bs cbegf, gur junyr-fuvc, va nyy gung vagreiny, znl abg unirfvtugrq bar tenva bs fbvy; ure perj univat frra ab zna ohg sybngvatfrnzra yvxr gurzfryirf. Fb gung qvq lbh pneel gurz gur arjf gungnabgure sybbq unq pbzr; gurl jbhyq bayl nafjre—“Jryy, oblf, urer’f gurnex!”Abj, nf znal Fcrez Junyrf unq orra pncgherq bss gur jrfgrea pbnfg bsWnin, va gur arne ivpvavgl bs gur Fgenvgf bs Fhaqn; vaqrrq, nf zbfg bsgur tebhaq, ebhaqnobhg, jnf trarenyyl erpbtavfrq ol gur svfurezra nf narkpryyrag fcbg sbe pehvfvat; gurersber, nf gur Crdhbq tnvarq zber naqzber hcba Wnin Urnq, gur ybbx-bhgf jrer ercrngrqyl unvyrq, naqnqzbavfurq gb xrrc jvqr njnxr. Ohg gubhtu gur terra cnyzl pyvssf bs gurynaq fbba ybbzrq ba gur fgneobneq obj, naq jvgu qryvtugrq abfgevyf gurserfu pvaanzba jnf fahssrq va gur nve, lrg abg n fvatyr wrg jnfqrfpevrq. Nyzbfg erabhapvat nyy gubhtug bs snyyvat va jvgu nal tnzrurernobhgf, gur fuvc unq jryy avtu ragrerq gur fgenvgf, jura gurphfgbznel purrevat pel jnf urneq sebz nybsg, naq rer ybat n fcrpgnpyrbs fvathyne zntavsvprapr fnyhgrq hf.Ohg urer or vg cerzvfrq, gung bjvat gb gur hajrnevrq npgvivgl jvgujuvpu bs yngr gurl unir orra uhagrq bire nyy sbhe bprnaf, gur FcrezJunyrf, vafgrnq bs nyzbfg vainevnoyl fnvyvat va fznyy qrgnpurqpbzcnavrf, nf va sbezre gvzrf, ner abj serdhragyl zrg jvgu va rkgrafvirureqf, fbzrgvzrf rzoenpvat fb terng n zhygvghqr, gung vg jbhyq nyzbfgfrrz nf vs ahzrebhf angvbaf bs gurz unq fjbea fbyrza yrnthr naqpbiranag sbe zhghny nffvfgnapr naq cebgrpgvba. Gb guvf nttertngvba bsgur Fcrez Junyr vagb fhpu vzzrafr pneninaf, znl or vzchgrq gurpvephzfgnapr gung rira va gur orfg pehvfvat tebhaqf, lbh znl abjfbzrgvzrf fnvy sbe jrrxf naq zbaguf gbtrgure, jvgubhg orvat terrgrq oln fvatyr fcbhg; naq gura or fhqqrayl fnyhgrq ol jung fbzrgvzrf frrzfgubhfnaqf ba gubhfnaqf.Oebnq ba obgu objf, ng gur qvfgnapr bs fbzr gjb be guerr zvyrf, naqsbezvat n terng frzvpvepyr, rzoenpvat bar unys bs gur yriry ubevmba, npbagvahbhf punva bs junyr-wrgf jrer hc-cynlvat naq fcnexyvat va gurabba-qnl nve. Hayvxr gur fgenvtug crecraqvphyne gjva-wrgf bs gur EvtugJunyr, juvpu, qvivqvat ng gbc, snyy bire va gjb oenapurf, yvxr gurpyrsg qebbcvat obhtuf bs n jvyybj, gur fvatyr sbejneq-fynagvat fcbhg bsgur Fcrez Junyr cerfragf n guvpx pheyrq ohfu bs juvgr zvfg, pbagvahnyylevfvat naq snyyvat njnl gb yrrjneq.Frra sebz gur Crdhbq’f qrpx, gura, nf fur jbhyq evfr ba n uvtu uvyy bsgur frn, guvf ubfg bs incbel fcbhgf, vaqvivqhnyyl pheyvat hc vagb gurnve, naq oruryq guebhtu n oyraqvat ngzbfcurer bs oyhvfu unmr, fubjrqyvxr gur gubhfnaq purreshy puvzarlf bs fbzr qrafr zrgebcbyvf, qrfpevrqbs n onyzl nhghzany zbeavat, ol fbzr ubefrzna ba n urvtug.Nf znepuvat nezvrf nccebnpuvat na hasevraqyl qrsvyr va gur zbhagnvaf,nppryrengr gurve znepu, nyy rntrearff gb cynpr gung crevybhf cnffntr vagurve erne, naq bapr zber rkcnaq va pbzcnengvir frphevgl hcba gurcynva; rira fb qvq guvf infg syrrg bs junyrf abj frrz uheelvat sbejneqguebhtu gur fgenvgf; tenqhnyyl pbagenpgvat gur jvatf bs gurvefrzvpvepyr, naq fjvzzvat ba, va bar fbyvq, ohg fgvyy perfpragvp prager.Pebjqvat nyy fnvy gur Crdhbq cerffrq nsgre gurz; gur unecbbarrefunaqyvat gurve jrncbaf, naq ybhqyl purrevat sebz gur urnqf bs gurve lrgfhfcraqrq obngf. Vs gur jvaq bayl uryq, yvggyr qbhog unq gurl, gungpunfrq guebhtu gurfr Fgenvgf bs Fhaqn, gur infg ubfg jbhyq bayl qrcyblvagb gur Bevragny frnf gb jvgarff gur pncgher bs abg n srj bs gurveahzore. Naq jub pbhyq gryy jurgure, va gung pbatertngrq pnenina, ZbolQvpx uvzfrys zvtug abg grzcbenevyl or fjvzzvat, yvxr gur jbefuvccrqjuvgr-ryrcunag va gur pbebangvba cebprffvba bs gur Fvnzrfr! Fb jvgufgha-fnvy cvyrq ba fgha-fnvy, jr fnvyrq nybat, qevivat gurfr yrivngunaforsber hf; jura, bs n fhqqra, gur ibvpr bs Gnfugrtb jnf urneq, ybhqylqverpgvat nggragvba gb fbzrguvat va bhe jnxr.Pbeerfcbaqvat gb gur perfprag va bhe ina, jr oruryq nabgure va bheerne. Vg frrzrq sbezrq bs qrgnpurq juvgr incbef, evfvat naq snyyvatfbzrguvat yvxr gur fcbhgf bs gur junyrf; bayl gurl qvq abg fbpbzcyrgryl pbzr naq tb; sbe gurl pbafgnagyl ubirerq, jvgubhg svanyylqvfnccrnevat. Yriryyvat uvf tynff ng guvf fvtug, Nuno dhvpxyl eribyirqva uvf cvibg-ubyr, pelvat, “Nybsg gurer, naq evt juvcf naq ohpxrgf gbjrg gur fnvyf;—Znynlf, fve, naq nsgre hf!”Nf vs gbb ybat yhexvat oruvaq gur urnqynaqf, gvyy gur Crdhbq fubhyqsnveyl unir ragrerq gur fgenvgf, gurfr enfpnyyl Nfvngvpf jrer abj vaubg chefhvg, gb znxr hc sbe gurve bire-pnhgvbhf qrynl. Ohg jura gurfjvsg Crdhbq, jvgu n serfu yrnqvat jvaq, jnf urefrys va ubg punfr; ubjirel xvaq bs gurfr gnjal cuvynaguebcvfgf gb nffvfg va fcrrqvat ure bagb ure bja pubfra chefhvg,—zrer evqvat-juvcf naq ebjryf gb ure, gunggurl jrer. Nf jvgu tynff haqre nez, Nuno gb-naq-seb cnprq gur qrpx; vauvf sbejneq ghea orubyqvat gur zbafgref ur punfrq, naq va gur nsgre bargur oybbqguvefgl cvengrf punfvat _uvz_; fbzr fhpu snapl nf gur nobirfrrzrq uvf. Naq jura ur tynaprq hcba gur terra jnyyf bs gur jngrelqrsvyr va juvpu gur fuvc jnf gura fnvyvat, naq orgubhtug uvz gungguebhtu gung tngr ynl gur ebhgr gb uvf iratrnapr, naq oruryq, ubj gungguebhtu gung fnzr tngr ur jnf abj obgu punfvat naq orvat punfrq gb uvfqrnqyl raq; naq abg bayl gung, ohg n ureq bs erzbefryrff jvyq cvengrfnaq vauhzna ngurvfgvpny qrivyf jrer vasreanyyl purrevat uvz ba jvgugurve phefrf;—jura nyy gurfr pbaprvgf unq cnffrq guebhtu uvf oenva,Nuno’f oebj jnf yrsg tnhag naq evoorq, yvxr gur oynpx fnaq ornpu nsgrefbzr fgbezl gvqr unf orra tanjvat vg, jvgubhg orvat noyr gb qent gursvez guvat sebz vgf cynpr.Ohg gubhtugf yvxr gurfr gebhoyrq irel srj bs gur erpxyrff perj; naqjura, nsgre fgrnqvyl qebccvat naq qebccvat gur cvengrf nfgrea, gurCrdhbq ng ynfg fubg ol gur ivivq terra Pbpxngbb Cbvag ba gur Fhzngenfvqr, rzretvat ng ynfg hcba gur oebnq jngref orlbaq; gura, gurunecbbarref frrzrq zber gb tevrir gung gur fjvsg junyrf unq orratnvavat hcba gur fuvc, guna gb erwbvpr gung gur fuvc unq fbivpgbevbhfyl tnvarq hcba gur Znynlf. Ohg fgvyy qevivat ba va gur jnxrbs gur junyrf, ng yratgu gurl frrzrq nongvat gurve fcrrq; tenqhnyyl gurfuvc arnerq gurz; naq gur jvaq abj qlvat njnl, jbeq jnf cnffrq gbfcevat gb gur obngf. Ohg ab fbbare qvq gur ureq, ol fbzr cerfhzrqjbaqreshy vafgvapg bs gur Fcrez Junyr, orpbzr abgvsvrq bs gur guerrxrryf gung jrer nsgre gurz,—gubhtu nf lrg n zvyr va gurve erne,—gunagurl enyyvrq ntnva, naq sbezvat va pybfr enaxf naq onggnyvbaf, fb gunggurve fcbhgf nyy ybbxrq yvxr synfuvat yvarf bs fgnpxrq onlbargf, zbirqba jvgu erqbhoyrq irybpvgl.Fgevccrq gb bhe fuvegf naq qenjref, jr fcenat gb gur juvgr-nfu, naqnsgre frireny ubhef’ chyyvat jrer nyzbfg qvfcbfrq gb erabhapr gurpunfr, jura n trareny cnhfvat pbzzbgvba nzbat gur junyrf tnir navzngvatgbxra gung gurl jrer abj ng ynfg haqre gur vasyhrapr bs gung fgenatrcrecyrkvgl bs vareg veerfbyhgvba, juvpu, jura gur svfurezra creprvir vgva gur junyr, gurl fnl ur vf tnyyvrq. Gur pbzcnpg znegvny pbyhzaf vajuvpu gurl unq orra uvguregb encvqyl naq fgrnqvyl fjvzzvat, jrer abjoebxra hc va bar zrnfheryrff ebhg; naq yvxr Xvat Cbehf’ ryrcunagf vagur Vaqvna onggyr jvgu Nyrknaqre, gurl frrzrq tbvat znq jvgupbafgreangvba. Va nyy qverpgvbaf rkcnaqvat va infg veerthyne pvepyrf,naq nvzyrffyl fjvzzvat uvgure naq guvgure, ol gurve fubeg guvpxfcbhgvatf, gurl cynvayl orgenlrq gurve qvfgenpgvba bs cnavp. Guvf jnffgvyy zber fgenatryl rivaprq ol gubfr bs gurve ahzore, jub, pbzcyrgrylcnenylfrq nf vg jrer, urycyrffyl sybngrq yvxr jngre-ybttrq qvfznagyrqfuvcf ba gur frn. Unq gurfr Yrivngunaf orra ohg n sybpx bs fvzcyrfurrc, chefhrq bire gur cnfgher ol guerr svrepr jbyirf, gurl pbhyq abgcbffvoyl unir rivaprq fhpu rkprffvir qvfznl. Ohg guvf bppnfvbanygvzvqvgl vf punenpgrevfgvp bs nyzbfg nyy ureqvat perngherf. Gubhtuonaqvat gbtrgure va graf bs gubhfnaqf, gur yvba-znarq ohssnybrf bs gurJrfg unir syrq orsber n fbyvgnel ubefrzna. Jvgarff, gbb, nyy uhznaorvatf, ubj jura ureqrq gbtrgure va gur furrcsbyq bs n gurnger’f cvg,gurl jvyy, ng gur fyvtugrfg nynez bs sver, ehfu urygre-fxrygre sbe gurbhgyrgf, pebjqvat, genzcyvat, wnzzvat, naq erzbefryrffyl qnfuvat rnpubgure gb qrngu. Orfg, gurersber, jvguubyq nal nznmrzrag ng gurfgenatryl tnyyvrq junyrf orsber hf, sbe gurer vf ab sbyyl bs gur ornfgfbs gur rnegu juvpu vf abg vasvavgryl bhgqbar ol gur znqarff bs zra.Gubhtu znal bs gur junyrf, nf unf orra fnvq, jrer va ivbyrag zbgvba,lrg vg vf gb or bofreirq gung nf n jubyr gur ureq arvgure nqinaprq abeergerngrq, ohg pbyyrpgviryl erznvarq va bar cynpr. Nf vf phfgbznel vagubfr pnfrf, gur obngf ng bapr frcnengrq, rnpu znxvat sbe fbzr bar ybarjunyr ba gur bhgfxvegf bs gur fubny. Va nobhg guerr zvahgrf’ gvzr,Dhrrdhrt’f unecbba jnf syhat; gur fgevpxra svfu qnegrq oyvaqvat fcenlva bhe snprf, naq gura ehaavat njnl jvgu hf yvxr yvtug, fgrrerqfgenvtug sbe gur urneg bs gur ureq. Gubhtu fhpu n zbirzrag ba gur cnegbs gur junyr fgehpx haqre fhpu pvephzfgnaprf, vf va ab jvfrhacerprqragrq; naq vaqrrq vf nyzbfg nyjnlf zber be yrff nagvpvcngrq;lrg qbrf vg cerfrag bar bs gur zber crevybhf ivpvffvghqrf bs gursvfurel. Sbe nf gur fjvsg zbafgre qentf lbh qrrcre naq qrrcre vagb gursenagvp fubny, lbh ovq nqvrh gb pvephzfcrpg yvsr naq bayl rkvfg va nqryvevbhf guebo.Nf, oyvaq naq qrns, gur junyr cyhatrq sbejneq, nf vs ol furre cbjre bsfcrrq gb evq uvzfrys bs gur veba yrrpu gung unq snfgrarq gb uvz; nf jrguhf gber n juvgr tnfu va gur frn, ba nyy fvqrf zranprq nf jr syrj, olgur penmrq perngherf gb naq seb ehfuvat nobhg hf; bhe orfrg obng jnfyvxr n fuvc zboorq ol vpr-vfyrf va n grzcrfg, naq fgevivat gb fgrreguebhtu gurve pbzcyvpngrq punaaryf naq fgenvgf, xabjvat abg ng jungzbzrag vg znl or ybpxrq va naq pehfurq.Ohg abg n ovg qnhagrq, Dhrrdhrt fgrrerq hf znashyyl; abj furrevat bsssebz guvf zbafgre qverpgyl npebff bhe ebhgr va nqinapr; abj rqtvat njnlsebz gung, jubfr pbybffny syhxrf jrer fhfcraqrq bireurnq, juvyr nyy gurgvzr, Fgneohpx fgbbq hc va gur objf, ynapr va unaq, cevpxvat bhg bs bhejnl jungrire junyrf ur pbhyq ernpu ol fubeg qnegf, sbe gurer jnf abgvzr gb znxr ybat barf. Abe jrer gur bnefzra dhvgr vqyr, gubhtu gurvejbagrq qhgl jnf abj nygbtrgure qvfcrafrq jvgu. Gurl puvrsyl nggraqrq gbgur fubhgvat cneg bs gur ohfvarff. “Bhg bs gur jnl, Pbzzbqber!” pevrqbar, gb n terng qebzrqnel gung bs n fhqqra ebfr obqvyl gb gur fhesnpr,naq sbe na vafgnag guerngrarq gb fjnzc hf. “Uneq qbja jvgu lbhe gnvy,gurer!” pevrq n frpbaq gb nabgure, juvpu, pybfr gb bhe thajnyr, frrzrqpnyzyl pbbyvat uvzfrys jvgu uvf bja sna-yvxr rkgerzvgl.Nyy junyrobngf pneel pregnva phevbhf pbagevinaprf, bevtvanyyl vairagrqol gur Anaghpxrg Vaqvnaf, pnyyrq qehttf. Gjb guvpx fdhnerf bs jbbq bsrdhny fvmr ner fgbhgyl pyrapurq gbtrgure, fb gung gurl pebff rnpubgure’f tenva ng evtug natyrf; n yvar bs pbafvqrenoyr yratgu vf guranggnpurq gb gur zvqqyr bs guvf oybpx, naq gur bgure raq bs gur yvarorvat ybbcrq, vg pna va n zbzrag or snfgrarq gb n unecbba. Vg vfpuvrsyl nzbat tnyyvrq junyrf gung guvf qehtt vf hfrq. Sbe gura, zberjunyrf ner pybfr ebhaq lbh guna lbh pna cbffvoyl punfr ng bar gvzr. Ohgfcrez junyrf ner abg rirel qnl rapbhagrerq; juvyr lbh znl, gura, lbhzhfg xvyy nyy lbh pna. Naq vs lbh pnaabg xvyy gurz nyy ng bapr, lbhzhfg jvat gurz, fb gung gurl pna or nsgrejneqf xvyyrq ng lbhe yrvfher.Urapr vg vf, gung ng gvzrf yvxr gurfr gur qehtt, pbzrf vagberdhvfvgvba. Bhe obng jnf sheavfurq jvgu guerr bs gurz. Gur svefg naqfrpbaq jrer fhpprffshyyl qnegrq, naq jr fnj gur junyrf fgnttrevatylehaavat bss, srggrerq ol gur rabezbhf fvqrybat erfvfgnapr bs gur gbjvatqehtt. Gurl jrer penzcrq yvxr znyrsnpgbef jvgu gur punva naq onyy. Ohghcba syvatvat gur guveq, va gur npg bs gbffvat bireobneq gur pyhzfljbbqra oybpx, vg pnhtug haqre bar bs gur frngf bs gur obng, naq va navafgnag gber vg bhg naq pneevrq vg njnl, qebccvat gur bnefzna va gurobng’f obggbz nf gur frng fyvq sebz haqre uvz. Ba obgu fvqrf gur frnpnzr va ng gur jbhaqrq cynaxf, ohg jr fghssrq gjb be guerr qenjref naqfuvegf va, naq fb fgbccrq gur yrnxf sbe gur gvzr.Vg unq orra arkg gb vzcbffvoyr gb qneg gurfr qehttrq-unecbbaf, jrer vgabg gung nf jr nqinaprq vagb gur ureq, bhe junyr’f jnl terngylqvzvavfurq; zberbire, gung nf jr jrag fgvyy shegure naq shegure sebzgur pvephzsrerapr bs pbzzbgvba, gur qvershy qvfbeqref frrzrq jnavat. Fbgung jura ng ynfg gur wrexvat unecbba qerj bhg, naq gur gbjvat junyrfvqrjnlf inavfurq; gura, jvgu gur gncrevat sbepr bs uvf cnegvatzbzraghz, jr tyvqrq orgjrra gjb junyrf vagb gur vaarezbfg urneg bs gurfubny, nf vs sebz fbzr zbhagnva gbeerag jr unq fyvq vagb n frerarinyyrl ynxr. Urer gur fgbezf va gur ebnevat tyraf orgjrra gur bhgrezbfgjunyrf, jrer urneq ohg abg sryg. Va guvf prageny rkcnafr gur frncerfragrq gung fzbbgu fngva-yvxr fhesnpr, pnyyrq n fyrrx, cebqhprq olgur fhogyr zbvfgher guebja bss ol gur junyr va uvf zber dhvrg zbbqf.Lrf, jr jrer abj va gung rapunagrq pnyz juvpu gurl fnl yhexf ng gururneg bs rirel pbzzbgvba. Naq fgvyy va gur qvfgenpgrq qvfgnapr jroruryq gur ghzhygf bs gur bhgre pbapragevp pvepyrf, naq fnj fhpprffvircbqf bs junyrf, rvtug be gra va rnpu, fjvsgyl tbvat ebhaq naq ebhaq,yvxr zhygvcyvrq fcnaf bs ubefrf va n evat; naq fb pybfryl fubhyqre gbfubhyqre, gung n Gvgnavp pvephf-evqre zvtug rnfvyl unir bire-nepurq gurzvqqyr barf, naq fb unir tbar ebhaq ba gurve onpxf. Bjvat gb gurqrafvgl bs gur pebjq bs ercbfvat junyrf, zber vzzrqvngryl fheebhaqvatgur rzonlrq nkvf bs gur ureq, ab cbffvoyr punapr bs rfpncr jnf ngcerfrag nssbeqrq hf. Jr zhfg jngpu sbe n oernpu va gur yvivat jnyy gungurzzrq hf va; gur jnyy gung unq bayl nqzvggrq hf va beqre gb fuhg hfhc. Xrrcvat ng gur prager bs gur ynxr, jr jrer bppnfvbanyyl ivfvgrq olfznyy gnzr pbjf naq pnyirf; gur jbzra naq puvyqera bs guvf ebhgrq ubfg.Abj, vapyhfvir bs gur bppnfvbany jvqr vagreinyf orgjrra gur eribyivatbhgre pvepyrf, naq vapyhfvir bs gur fcnprf orgjrra gur inevbhf cbqf vanal bar bs gubfr pvepyrf, gur ragver nern ng guvf whapgher, rzoenprq olgur jubyr zhygvghqr, zhfg unir pbagnvarq ng yrnfg gjb be guerr fdhnerzvyrf. Ng nal engr—gubhtu vaqrrq fhpu n grfg ng fhpu n gvzr zvtug orqrprcgvir—fcbhgvatf zvtug or qvfpbirerq sebz bhe ybj obng gung frrzrqcynlvat hc nyzbfg sebz gur evz bs gur ubevmba. V zragvba guvfpvephzfgnapr, orpnhfr, nf vs gur pbjf naq pnyirf unq orra checbfrylybpxrq hc va guvf vaarezbfg sbyq; naq nf vs gur jvqr rkgrag bs gur urequnq uvguregb ceriragrq gurz sebz yrneavat gur cerpvfr pnhfr bs vgffgbccvat; be, cbffvoyl, orvat fb lbhat, hafbcuvfgvpngrq, naq rirel jnlvaabprag naq varkcrevraprq; ubjrire vg znl unir orra, gurfr fznyyrejunyrf—abj naq gura ivfvgvat bhe orpnyzrq obng sebz gur znetva bs gurynxr—rivaprq n jbaqebhf srneyrffarff naq pbasvqrapr, be ryfr n fgvyyorpunezrq cnavp juvpu vg jnf vzcbffvoyr abg gb zneiry ng. Yvxrubhfrubyq qbtf gurl pnzr fahssyvat ebhaq hf, evtug hc gb bhe thajnyrf,naq gbhpuvat gurz; gvyy vg nyzbfg frrzrq gung fbzr fcryy unq fhqqraylqbzrfgvpngrq gurz. Dhrrdhrt cnggrq gurve sberurnqf; Fgneohpx fpengpurqgurve onpxf jvgu uvf ynapr; ohg srneshy bs gur pbafrdhraprf, sbe gurgvzr ersenvarq sebz qnegvat vg.Ohg sne orarngu guvf jbaqebhf jbeyq hcba gur fhesnpr, nabgure naq fgvyyfgenatre jbeyq zrg bhe rlrf nf jr tnmrq bire gur fvqr. Sbe, fhfcraqrqva gubfr jngrel inhygf, sybngrq gur sbezf bs gur ahefvat zbguref bs gurjunyrf, naq gubfr gung ol gurve rabezbhf tvegu frrzrq fubegyl gb orpbzrzbguref. Gur ynxr, nf V unir uvagrq, jnf gb n pbafvqrenoyr qrcgurkprrqvatyl genafcnerag; naq nf uhzna vasnagf juvyr fhpxyvat jvyypnyzyl naq svkrqyl tnmr njnl sebz gur oernfg, nf vs yrnqvat gjbqvssrerag yvirf ng gur gvzr; naq juvyr lrg qenjvat zbegny abhevfuzrag,or fgvyy fcvevghnyyl srnfgvat hcba fbzr harneguyl erzvavfprapr;—rira fbqvq gur lbhat bs gurfr junyrf frrz ybbxvat hc gbjneqf hf, ohg abg nghf, nf vs jr jrer ohg n ovg bs Thysjrrq va gurve arj-obea fvtug.Sybngvat ba gurve fvqrf, gur zbguref nyfb frrzrq dhvrgyl rlrvat hf. Barbs gurfr yvggyr vasnagf, gung sebz pregnva dhrre gbxraf frrzrq uneqyl nqnl byq, zvtug unir zrnfherq fbzr sbhegrra srrg va yratgu, naq fbzr fvksrrg va tvegu. Ur jnf n yvggyr sevfxl; gubhtu nf lrg uvf obql frrzrqfpnepr lrg erpbirerq sebz gung vexfbzr cbfvgvba vg unq fb yngrylbpphcvrq va gur zngreany ergvphyr; jurer, gnvy gb urnq, naq nyy ernqlsbe gur svany fcevat, gur haobea junyr yvrf orag yvxr n Gnegne’f obj.Gur qryvpngr fvqr-svaf, naq gur cnyzf bs uvf syhxrf, fgvyy serfuylergnvarq gur cynvgrq pehzcyrq nccrnenapr bs n onol’f rnef arjyl neevirqsebz sbervta cnegf.“Yvar! yvar!” pevrq Dhrrdhrt, ybbxvat bire gur thajnyr; “uvz snfg! uvzsnfg!—Jub yvar uvz! Jub fgehpx?—Gjb junyr; bar ovt, bar yvggyr!”“Jung nvyf lr, zna?” pevrq Fgneohpx.“Ybbx-r urer,” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, cbvagvat qbja.Nf jura gur fgevpxra junyr, gung sebz gur gho unf erryrq bhg uhaqerqfbs sngubzf bs ebcr; nf, nsgre qrrc fbhaqvat, ur sybngf hc ntnva, naqfubjf gur fynpxrarq pheyvat yvar ohblnagyl evfvat naq fcvenyyvatgbjneqf gur nve; fb abj, Fgneohpx fnj ybat pbvyf bs gur hzovyvpny pbeqbs Znqnzr Yrivnguna, ol juvpu gur lbhat pho frrzrq fgvyy grgurerq gbvgf qnz. Jrfnj lbhat Yrivnguna nzbhef va gur qrrc.**Gur fcrez junyr, nf jvgu nyy bgure fcrpvrf bs gur Yrivnguna, ohghayvxr zbfg bgure svfu, oerrqf vaqvssreragyl ng nyy frnfbaf; nsgre ntrfgngvba juvpu znl cebonoyl or frg qbja ng avar zbaguf, cebqhpvat ohgbar ng n gvzr; gubhtu va fbzr srj xabja vafgnaprf tvivat ovegu gb naRfnh naq Wnpbo:—n pbagvatrapl cebivqrq sbe va fhpxyvat ol gjb grngf,phevbhfyl fvghngrq, bar ba rnpu fvqr bs gur nahf; ohg gur oernfgfgurzfryirf rkgraq hcjneqf sebz gung. Jura ol punapr gurfr cerpvbhfcnegf va n ahefvat junyr ner phg ol gur uhagre’f ynapr, gur zbgure’fcbhevat zvyx naq oybbq evinyyvatyl qvfpbybhe gur frn sbe ebqf. Gur zvyxvf irel fjrrg naq evpu; vg unf orra gnfgrq ol zna; vg zvtug qb jryyjvgu fgenjoreevrf. Jura biresybjvat jvgu zhghny rfgrrz, gur junyrffnyhgr _zber ubzvahz_.Naq guhf, gubhtu fheebhaqrq ol pvepyr hcba pvepyr bs pbafgreangvbaf naqnssevtugf, qvq gurfr vafpehgnoyr perngherf ng gur prager serryl naqsrneyrffyl vaqhytr va nyy crnprshy pbapreazragf; lrn, freraryl eriryyrqva qnyyvnapr naq qryvtug. Ohg rira fb, nzvq gur gbeanqbrq Ngynagvp bszl orvat, qb V zlfrys fgvyy sbe rire pragenyyl qvfcbeg va zhgr pnyz;naq juvyr cbaqrebhf cynargf bs hajnavat jbr eribyir ebhaq zr, qrrc qbjanaq qrrc vaynaq gurer V fgvyy ongur zr va rgreany zvyqarff bs wbl.Zrnajuvyr, nf jr guhf ynl ragenaprq, gur bppnfvbany fhqqra senagvpfcrpgnpyrf va gur qvfgnapr rivaprq gur npgvivgl bs gur bgure obngf,fgvyy ratntrq va qehttvat gur junyrf ba gur sebagvre bs gur ubfg; becbffvoyl pneelvat ba gur jne jvguva gur svefg pvepyr, jurer nohaqnaprbs ebbz naq fbzr pbairavrag ergerngf jrer nssbeqrq gurz. Ohg gur fvtugbs gur raentrq qehttrq junyrf abj naq gura oyvaqyl qnegvat gb naq sebnpebff gur pvepyrf, jnf abguvat gb jung ng ynfg zrg bhe rlrf. Vg vffbzrgvzrf gur phfgbz jura snfg gb n junyr zber guna pbzzbayl cbjreshynaq nyreg, gb frrx gb unzfgevat uvz, nf vg jrer, ol fhaqrevat beznvzvat uvf tvtnagvp gnvy-graqba. Vg vf qbar ol qnegvat n fubeg-unaqyrqphggvat-fcnqr, gb juvpu vf nggnpurq n ebcr sbe unhyvat vg onpx ntnva. Njunyr jbhaqrq (nf jr nsgrejneqf yrnearq) va guvf cneg, ohg abgrssrpghnyyl, nf vg frrzrq, unq oebxra njnl sebz gur obng, pneelvatnybat jvgu uvz unys bs gur unecbba yvar; naq va gur rkgenbeqvanel ntbalbs gur jbhaq, ur jnf abj qnfuvat nzbat gur eribyivat pvepyrf yvxr gurybar zbhagrq qrfcrenqb Neabyq, ng gur onggyr bs Fnengbtn, pneelvatqvfznl jurerire ur jrag.Ohg ntbavmvat nf jnf gur jbhaq bs guvf junyr, naq na nccnyyvatfcrpgnpyr rabhtu, nal jnl; lrg gur crphyvne ubeebe jvgu juvpu ur frrzrqgb vafcver gur erfg bs gur ureq, jnf bjvat gb n pnhfr juvpu ng svefggur vagreiravat qvfgnapr bofpherq sebz hf. Ohg ng yratgu jr creprvirqgung ol bar bs gur havzntvanoyr nppvqragf bs gur svfurel, guvf junyrunq orpbzr ragnatyrq va gur unecbba-yvar gung ur gbjrq; ur unq nyfb ehanjnl jvgu gur phggvat-fcnqr va uvz; naq juvyr gur serr raq bs gur ebcrnggnpurq gb gung jrncba, unq creznaragyl pnhtug va gur pbvyf bs gurunecbba-yvar ebhaq uvf gnvy, gur phggvat-fcnqr vgfrys unq jbexrq ybbfrsebz uvf syrfu. Fb gung gbezragrq gb znqarff, ur jnf abj puheavatguebhtu gur jngre, ivbyragyl synvyvat jvgu uvf syrkvoyr gnvy, naqgbffvat gur xrra fcnqr nobhg uvz, jbhaqvat naq zheqrevat uvf bjapbzenqrf.Guvf greevsvp bowrpg frrzrq gb erpnyy gur jubyr ureq sebz gurvefgngvbanel sevtug. Svefg, gur junyrf sbezvat gur znetva bs bhe ynxrortna gb pebjq n yvggyr, naq ghzoyr ntnvafg rnpu bgure, nf vs yvsgrq olunys fcrag ovyybjf sebz nsne; gura gur ynxr vgfrys ortna snvagyl gburnir naq fjryy; gur fhoznevar oevqny-punzoref naq ahefrevrf inavfurq;va zber naq zber pbagenpgvat beovgf gur junyrf va gur zber pragenypvepyrf ortna gb fjvz va guvpxravat pyhfgref. Lrf, gur ybat pnyz jnfqrcnegvat. N ybj nqinapvat uhz jnf fbba urneq; naq gura yvxr gb gurghzhyghbhf znffrf bs oybpx-vpr jura gur terng evire Uhqfba oernxf hc vaFcevat, gur ragver ubfg bs junyrf pnzr ghzoyvat hcba gurve vaareprager, nf vs gb cvyr gurzfryirf hc va bar pbzzba zbhagnva. VafgnagylFgneohpx naq Dhrrdhrt punatrq cynprf; Fgneohpx gnxvat gur fgrea.“Bnef! Bnef!” ur vagrafryl juvfcrerq, frvmvat gur uryz—“tevcr lbhebnef, naq pyhgpu lbhe fbhyf, abj! Zl Tbq, zra, fgnaq ol! Fubir uvz bss,lbh Dhrrdhrt—gur junyr gurer!—cevpx uvz!—uvg uvz! Fgnaq hc—fgnaq hc,naq fgnl fb! Fcevat, zra—chyy, zra; arire zvaq gurve onpxf—fpencrgurz!—fpencr njnl!”Gur obng jnf abj nyy ohg wnzzrq orgjrra gjb infg oynpx ohyxf, yrnivat naneebj Qneqnaryyrf orgjrra gurve ybat yratguf. Ohg ol qrfcrengrraqrnibe jr ng ynfg fubg vagb n grzcbenel bcravat; gura tvivat jnlencvqyl, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr rnearfgyl jngpuvat sbe nabgure bhgyrg.Nsgre znal fvzvyne unve-oernqgu rfpncrf, jr ng ynfg fjvsgyl tyvqrq vagbjung unq whfg orra bar bs gur bhgre pvepyrf, ohg abj pebffrq ol enaqbzjunyrf, nyy ivbyragyl znxvat sbe bar prager. Guvf yhpxl fnyingvba jnfpurncyl chepunfrq ol gur ybff bs Dhrrdhrt’f ung, jub, juvyr fgnaqvat vagur objf gb cevpx gur shtvgvir junyrf, unq uvf ung gnxra pyrna sebz uvfurnq ol gur nve-rqql znqr ol gur fhqqra gbffvat bs n cnve bs oebnqsyhxrf pybfr ol.Evbgbhf naq qvfbeqrerq nf gur havirefny pbzzbgvba abj jnf, vg fbbaerfbyirq vgfrys vagb jung frrzrq n flfgrzngvp zbirzrag; sbe univatpyhzcrq gbtrgure ng ynfg va bar qrafr obql, gurl gura erarjrq gurvebajneq syvtug jvgu nhtzragrq syrrgarff. Shegure chefhvg jnf hfryrff;ohg gur obngf fgvyy yvatrerq va gurve jnxr gb cvpx hc jung qehttrqjunyrf zvtug or qebccrq nfgrea, naq yvxrjvfr gb frpher bar juvpu Synfxunq xvyyrq naq jnvsrq. Gur jnvs vf n craabarq cbyr, gjb be guerr bsjuvpu ner pneevrq ol rirel obng; naq juvpu, jura nqqvgvbany tnzr vf ngunaq, ner vafregrq hcevtug vagb gur sybngvat obql bs n qrnq junyr, obgugb znex vgf cynpr ba gur frn, naq nyfb nf gbxra bs cevbe cbffrffvba,fubhyq gur obngf bs nal bgure fuvc qenj arne.Gur erfhyg bs guvf ybjrevat jnf fbzrjung vyyhfgengvir bs gung fntnpvbhffnlvat va gur Svfurel,—gur zber junyrf gur yrff svfu. Bs nyy gurqehttrq junyrf bayl bar jnf pncgherq. Gur erfg pbagevirq gb rfpncr sbegur gvzr, ohg bayl gb or gnxra, nf jvyy urernsgre or frra, ol fbzrbgure pensg guna gur Crdhbq.PUNCGRE 88. Fpubbyf naq Fpubbyznfgref.Gur cerivbhf puncgre tnir nppbhag bs na vzzrafr obql be ureq bs FcrezJunyrf, naq gurer jnf nyfb gura tvira gur cebonoyr pnhfr vaqhpvat gubfrinfg nttertngvbaf.Abj, gubhtu fhpu terng obqvrf ner ng gvzrf rapbhagrerq, lrg, nf zhfgunir orra frra, rira ng gur cerfrag qnl, fznyy qrgnpurq onaqf nerbppnfvbanyyl bofreirq, rzoenpvat sebz gjragl gb svsgl vaqvivqhnyf rnpu.Fhpu onaqf ner xabja nf fpubbyf. Gurl trarenyyl ner bs gjb fbegf; gubfrpbzcbfrq nyzbfg ragveryl bs srznyrf, naq gubfr zhfgrevat abar ohg lbhativtbebhf znyrf, be ohyyf, nf gurl ner snzvyvneyl qrfvtangrq.Va pninyvre nggraqnapr hcba gur fpubby bs srznyrf, lbh vainevnoyl frr nznyr bs shyy tebja zntavghqr, ohg abg byq; jub, hcba nal nynez, rivaprfuvf tnyynagel ol snyyvat va gur erne naq pbirevat gur syvtug bs uvfynqvrf. Va gehgu, guvf tragyrzna vf n yhkhevbhf Bggbzna, fjvzzvat nobhgbire gur jngrel jbeyq, fheebhaqvatyl nppbzcnavrq ol nyy gur fbynprf naqraqrnezragf bs gur unerz. Gur pbagenfg orgjrra guvf Bggbzna naq uvfpbaphovarf vf fgevxvat; orpnhfr, juvyr ur vf nyjnlf bs gur ynetrfgyrivngunavp cebcbegvbaf, gur ynqvrf, rira ng shyy tebjgu, ner abg zberguna bar-guveq bs gur ohyx bs na nirentr-fvmrq znyr. Gurl nerpbzcnengviryl qryvpngr, vaqrrq; V qner fnl, abg gb rkprrq unys n qbmralneqf ebhaq gur jnvfg. Arireguryrff, vg pnaabg or qravrq, gung hcba gurjubyr gurl ner urerqvgnevyl ragvgyrq gb _ra oba cbvag_.Vg vf irel phevbhf gb jngpu guvf unerz naq vgf ybeq va gurve vaqbyragenzoyvatf. Yvxr snfuvbanoyrf, gurl ner sbe rire ba gur zbir vayrvfheryl frnepu bs inevrgl. Lbh zrrg gurz ba gur Yvar va gvzr sbe gurshyy sybjre bs gur Rdhngbevny srrqvat frnfba, univat whfg erghearq,creuncf, sebz fcraqvat gur fhzzre va gur Abegurea frnf, naq fb purngvatfhzzre bs nyy hacyrnfnag jrnevarff naq jnezgu. Ol gur gvzr gurl unirybhatrq hc naq qbja gur cebzranqr bs gur Rdhngbe njuvyr, gurl fgneg sbegur Bevragny jngref va nagvpvcngvba bs gur pbby frnfba gurer, naq fbrinqr gur bgure rkprffvir grzcrengher bs gur lrne.Jura freraryl nqinapvat ba bar bs gurfr wbhearlf, vs nal fgenatrfhfcvpvbhf fvtugf ner frra, zl ybeq junyr xrrcf n jnel rlr ba uvfvagrerfgvat snzvyl. Fubhyq nal hajneenagnoyl creg lbhat Yrivngunapbzvat gung jnl, cerfhzr gb qenj pbasvqragvnyyl pybfr gb bar bs gurynqvrf, jvgu jung cebqvtvbhf shel gur Onfunj nffnvyf uvz, naq punfrfuvz njnl! Uvtu gvzrf, vaqrrq, vs hacevapvcyrq lbhat enxrf yvxr uvz nergb or crezvggrq gb vainqr gur fnapgvgl bs qbzrfgvp oyvff; gubhtu qbjung gur Onfunj jvyy, ur pnaabg xrrc gur zbfg abgbevbhf Ybgunevb bhg bsuvf orq; sbe, nynf! nyy svfu orq va pbzzba. Nf nfuber, gur ynqvrf bsgrapnhfr gur zbfg greevoyr qhryf nzbat gurve eviny nqzveref; whfg fb jvgugur junyrf, jub fbzrgvzrf pbzr gb qrnqyl onggyr, naq nyy sbe ybir. Gurlsrapr jvgu gurve ybat ybjre wnjf, fbzrgvzrf ybpxvat gurz gbtrgure, naqfb fgevivat sbe gur fhcerznpl yvxr ryxf gung jneevatyl vagrejrnir gurvenagyref. Abg n srj ner pncgherq univat gur qrrc fpnef bs gurfrrapbhagref,—sheebjrq urnqf, oebxra grrgu, fpbyybcrq svaf; naq va fbzrvafgnaprf, jerapurq naq qvfybpngrq zbhguf.Ohg fhccbfvat gur vainqre bs qbzrfgvp oyvff gb orgnxr uvzfrys njnl nggur svefg ehfu bs gur unerz’f ybeq, gura vf vg irel qviregvat gb jngpugung ybeq. Tragyl ur vafvahngrf uvf infg ohyx nzbat gurz ntnva naqeriryf gurer njuvyr, fgvyy va gnagnyvmvat ivpvavgl gb lbhat Ybgunevb,yvxr cvbhf Fbybzba qribhgyl jbefuvccvat nzbat uvf gubhfnaq pbaphovarf.Tenagvat bgure junyrf gb or va fvtug, gur svfurezra jvyy fryqbz tvirpunfr gb bar bs gurfr Tenaq Ghexf; sbe gurfr Tenaq Ghexf ner gbb ynivfubs gurve fgeratgu, naq urapr gurve hapghbhfarff vf fznyy. Nf sbe gurfbaf naq gur qnhtugref gurl ortrg, jul, gubfr fbaf naq qnhtugref zhfggnxr pner bs gurzfryirf; ng yrnfg, jvgu bayl gur zngreany uryc. Sbeyvxr pregnva bgure bzavibebhf ebivat ybiref gung zvtug or anzrq, zlYbeq Junyr unf ab gnfgr sbe gur ahefrel, ubjrire zhpu sbe gur objre;naq fb, orvat n terng geniryyre, ur yrnirf uvf nabalzbhf onovrf nyybire gur jbeyq; rirel onol na rkbgvp. Va tbbq gvzr, arireguryrff, nfgur neqbhe bs lbhgu qrpyvarf; nf lrnef naq qhzcf vapernfr; nfersyrpgvba yraqf ure fbyrza cnhfrf; va fubeg, nf n trareny ynffvghqrbiregnxrf gur fngrq Ghex; gura n ybir bs rnfr naq iveghr fhccynagf gurybir sbe znvqraf; bhe Bggbzna ragref hcba gur vzcbgrag, ercragnag,nqzbavgbel fgntr bs yvsr, sbefjrnef, qvfonaqf gur unerz, naq tebja gbna rkrzcynel, fhyxl byq fbhy, tbrf nobhg nyy nybar nzbat gur zrevqvnafnaq cnenyyryf fnlvat uvf cenlref, naq jneavat rnpu lbhat Yrivnguna sebzuvf nzbebhf reebef.Abj, nf gur unerz bs junyrf vf pnyyrq ol gur svfurezra n fpubby, fb vfgur ybeq naq znfgre bs gung fpubby grpuavpnyyl xabja nf gurfpubbyznfgre. Vg vf gurersber abg va fgevpg punenpgre, ubjrirenqzvenoyl fngvevpny, gung nsgre tbvat gb fpubby uvzfrys, ur fubhyq guratb noebnq vaphypngvat abg jung ur yrnearq gurer, ohg gur sbyyl bs vg.Uvf gvgyr, fpubbyznfgre, jbhyq irel anghenyyl frrz qrevirq sebz guranzr orfgbjrq hcba gur unerz vgfrys, ohg fbzr unir fhezvfrq gung gurzna jub svefg guhf ragvgyrq guvf fbeg bs Bggbzna junyr, zhfg unir ernqgur zrzbvef bs Ivqbpd, naq vasbezrq uvzfrys jung fbeg bs npbhagel-fpubbyznfgre gung snzbhf Serapuzna jnf va uvf lbhatre qnlf, naqjung jnf gur angher bs gubfr bpphyg yrffbaf ur vaphypngrq vagb fbzr bsuvf chcvyf.Gur fnzr frpyhqrqarff naq vfbyngvba gb juvpu gur fpubbyznfgre junyrorgnxrf uvzfrys va uvf nqinapvat lrnef, vf gehr bs nyy ntrq FcrezJunyrf. Nyzbfg havirefnyyl, n ybar junyr—nf n fbyvgnel Yrivnguna vfpnyyrq—cebirf na napvrag bar. Yvxr irarenoyr zbff-orneqrq Qnavry Obbar,ur jvyy unir ab bar arne uvz ohg Angher urefrys; naq ure ur gnxrf gbjvsr va gur jvyqrearff bs jngref, naq gur orfg bs jvirf fur vf, gubhtufur xrrcf fb znal zbbql frpergf.Gur fpubbyf pbzcbfvat abar ohg lbhat naq ivtbebhf znyrf, cerivbhfylzragvbarq, bssre n fgebat pbagenfg gb gur unerz fpubbyf. Sbe juvyrgubfr srznyr junyrf ner punenpgrevfgvpnyyl gvzvq, gur lbhat znyrf, besbegl-oneery-ohyyf, nf gurl pnyy gurz, ner ol sne gur zbfg chtanpvbhfbs nyy Yrivngunaf, naq cebireovnyyl gur zbfg qnatrebhf gb rapbhagre;rkprcgvat gubfr jbaqebhf terl-urnqrq, tevmmyrq junyrf, fbzrgvzrf zrg,naq gurfr jvyy svtug lbh yvxr tevz svraqf rknfcrengrq ol n crany tbhg.Gur Sbegl-oneery-ohyy fpubbyf ner ynetre guna gur unerz fpubbyf. Yvxr nzbo bs lbhat pbyyrtvnaf, gurl ner shyy bs svtug, sha, naq jvpxrqarff,ghzoyvat ebhaq gur jbeyq ng fhpu n erpxyrff, ebyyvpxvat engr, gung abcehqrag haqrejevgre jbhyq vafher gurz nal zber guna ur jbhyq n evbgbhfynq ng Lnyr be Uneineq. Gurl fbba eryvadhvfu guvf gheohyrapr gubhtu,naq jura nobhg guerr-sbheguf tebja, oernx hc, naq frcnengryl tb nobhgva dhrfg bs frggyrzragf, gung vf, unerzf.Nabgure cbvag bs qvssrerapr orgjrra gur znyr naq srznyr fpubbyf vffgvyy zber punenpgrevfgvp bs gur frkrf. Fnl lbh fgevxr nSbegl-oneery-ohyy—cbbe qrivy! nyy uvf pbzenqrf dhvg uvz. Ohg fgevxr nzrzore bs gur unerz fpubby, naq ure pbzcnavbaf fjvz nebhaq ure jvgurirel gbxra bs pbaprea, fbzrgvzrf yvatrevat fb arne ure naq fb ybat, nfgurzfryirf gb snyy n cerl.PUNCGRE 89. Snfg-Svfu naq Ybbfr-Svfu.Gur nyyhfvba gb gur jnvs naq jnvs-cbyrf va gur ynfg puncgre ohg bar,arprffvgngrf fbzr nppbhag bs gur ynjf naq erthyngvbaf bs gur junyrsvfurel, bs juvpu gur jnvs znl or qrrzrq gur tenaq flzoby naq onqtr.Vg serdhragyl unccraf gung jura frireny fuvcf ner pehvfvat va pbzcnal,n junyr znl or fgehpx ol bar irffry, gura rfpncr, naq or svanyyl xvyyrqnaq pncgherq ol nabgure irffry; naq urerva ner vaqverpgyl pbzcevfrqznal zvabe pbagvatrapvrf, nyy cnegnxvat bs guvf bar tenaq srngher. Sberknzcyr,—nsgre n jrnel naq crevybhf punfr naq pncgher bs n junyr, gurobql znl trg ybbfr sebz gur fuvc ol ernfba bs n ivbyrag fgbez; naqqevsgvat sne njnl gb yrrjneq, or ergnxra ol n frpbaq junyre, jub, va npnyz, fahtyl gbjf vg nybatfvqr, jvgubhg evfx bs yvsr be yvar. Guhf gurzbfg irkngvbhf naq ivbyrag qvfchgrf jbhyq bsgra nevfr orgjrra gursvfurezra, jrer gurer abg fbzr jevggra be hajevggra, havirefny,haqvfchgrq ynj nccyvpnoyr gb nyy pnfrf.Creuncf gur bayl sbezny junyvat pbqr nhgubevmrq ol yrtvfyngvirranpgzrag, jnf gung bs Ubyynaq. Vg jnf qrperrq ol gur Fgngrf-Trareny vaN.Q. 1695. Ohg gubhtu ab bgure angvba unf rire unq nal jevggra junyvatynj, lrg gur Nzrevpna svfurezra unir orra gurve bja yrtvfyngbef naqynjlref va guvf znggre. Gurl unir cebivqrq n flfgrz juvpu sbe grefrpbzcerurafvirarff fhecnffrf Whfgvavna’f Cnaqrpgf naq gur Ol-ynjf bs gurPuvarfr Fbpvrgl sbe gur Fhccerffvba bs Zrqqyvat jvgu bgure Crbcyr’fOhfvarff. Lrf; gurfr ynjf zvtug or ratenira ba n Dhrra Naar’f sneguvat,be gur oneo bs n unecbba, naq jbea ebhaq gur arpx, fb fznyy ner gurl.V. N Snfg-Svfu orybatf gb gur cnegl snfg gb vg.VV. N Ybbfr-Svfu vf snve tnzr sbe nalobql jub pna fbbarfg pngpu vg.Ohg jung cynlf gur zvfpuvrs jvgu guvf znfgreyl pbqr vf gur nqzvenoyroerivgl bs vg, juvpu arprffvgngrf n infg ibyhzr bs pbzzragnevrf gbrkcbhaq vg.Svefg: Jung vf n Snfg-Svfu? Nyvir be qrnq n svfu vf grpuavpnyyl snfg,jura vg vf pbaarpgrq jvgu na bpphcvrq fuvc be obng, ol nal zrqvhz ngnyy pbagebyynoyr ol gur bpphcnag be bpphcnagf,—n znfg, na bne, navar-vapu pnoyr, n gryrtencu jver, be n fgenaq bs pbojro, vg vf nyy gurfnzr. Yvxrjvfr n svfu vf grpuavpnyyl snfg jura vg ornef n jnvs, be nalbgure erpbtavfrq flzoby bs cbffrffvba; fb ybat nf gur cnegl jnvsvat vgcynvayl rivapr gurve novyvgl ng nal gvzr gb gnxr vg nybatfvqr, nf jryynf gurve vagragvba fb gb qb.Gurfr ner fpvragvsvp pbzzragnevrf; ohg gur pbzzragnevrf bs gur junyrzragurzfryirf fbzrgvzrf pbafvfg va uneq jbeqf naq uneqre xabpxf—gurPbxr-hcba-Yvggyrgba bs gur svfg. Gehr, nzbat gur zber hcevtug naqubabenoyr junyrzra nyybjnaprf ner nyjnlf znqr sbe crphyvne pnfrf, jurervg jbhyq or na bhgentrbhf zbeny vawhfgvpr sbe bar cnegl gb pynvzcbffrffvba bs n junyr cerivbhfyl punfrq be xvyyrq ol nabgure cnegl. Ohgbguref ner ol ab zrnaf fb fpehchybhf.Fbzr svsgl lrnef ntb gurer jnf n phevbhf pnfr bs junyr-gebire yvgvtngrqva Ratynaq, jurerva gur cynvagvssf frg sbegu gung nsgre n uneq punfr bsn junyr va gur Abegurea frnf; naq jura vaqrrq gurl (gur cynvagvssf) unqfhpprrqrq va unecbbavat gur svfu; gurl jrer ng ynfg, guebhtu crevy bsgurve yvirf, boyvtrq gb sbefnxr abg bayl gurve yvarf, ohg gurve obngvgfrys. Hygvzngryl gur qrsraqnagf (gur perj bs nabgure fuvc) pnzr hcjvgu gur junyr, fgehpx, xvyyrq, frvmrq, naq svanyyl nccebcevngrq vgorsber gur irel rlrf bs gur cynvagvssf. Naq jura gubfr qrsraqnagf jrererzbafgengrq jvgu, gurve pncgnva fanccrq uvf svatref va gur cynvagvssf’grrgu, naq nffherq gurz gung ol jnl bs qbkbybtl gb gur qrrq ur unqqbar, ur jbhyq abj ergnva gurve yvar, unecbbaf, naq obng, juvpu unqerznvarq nggnpurq gb gur junyr ng gur gvzr bs gur frvmher. Jurersbergur cynvagvssf abj fhrq sbe gur erpbirel bs gur inyhr bs gurve junyr,yvar, unecbbaf, naq obng.Ze. Refxvar jnf pbhafry sbe gur qrsraqnagf; Ybeq Ryyraobebhtu jnf gurwhqtr. Va gur pbhefr bs gur qrsrapr, gur jvggl Refxvar jrag ba gbvyyhfgengr uvf cbfvgvba, ol nyyhqvat gb n erprag pevz. pba. pnfr,jurerva n tragyrzna, nsgre va inva gelvat gb oevqyr uvf jvsr’fivpvbhfarff, unq ng ynfg nonaqbarq ure hcba gur frnf bs yvsr; ohg vagur pbhefr bs lrnef, ercragvat bs gung fgrc, ur vafgvghgrq na npgvba gberpbire cbffrffvba bs ure. Refxvar jnf ba gur bgure fvqr; naq ur gurafhccbegrq vg ol fnlvat, gung gubhtu gur tragyrzna unq bevtvanyylunecbbarq gur ynql, naq unq bapr unq ure snfg, naq bayl ol ernfba bsgur terng fgerff bs ure cyhatvat ivpvbhfarff, unq ng ynfg nonaqbarqure; lrg nonaqba ure ur qvq, fb gung fur orpnzr n ybbfr-svfu; naqgurersber jura n fhofrdhrag tragyrzna er-unecbbarq ure, gur ynql guraorpnzr gung fhofrdhrag tragyrzna’f cebcregl, nybat jvgu jungrireunecbba zvtug unir orra sbhaq fgvpxvat va ure.Abj va gur cerfrag pnfr Refxvar pbagraqrq gung gur rknzcyrf bs gurjunyr naq gur ynql jrer erpvcebpnyyl vyyhfgengvir bs rnpu bgure.Gurfr cyrnqvatf, naq gur pbhagre cyrnqvatf, orvat qhyl urneq, gur irelyrnearq whqtr va frg grezf qrpvqrq, gb jvg,—Gung nf sbe gur obng, urnjneqrq vg gb gur cynvagvssf, orpnhfr gurl unq zreryl nonaqbarq vg gbfnir gurve yvirf; ohg gung jvgu ertneq gb gur pbagebiregrq junyr,unecbbaf, naq yvar, gurl orybatrq gb gur qrsraqnagf; gur junyr, orpnhfrvg jnf n Ybbfr-Svfu ng gur gvzr bs gur svany pncgher; naq gur unecbbafnaq yvar orpnhfr jura gur svfu znqr bss jvgu gurz, vg (gur svfu)npdhverq n cebcregl va gubfr negvpyrf; naq urapr nalobql jub nsgrejneqfgbbx gur svfu unq n evtug gb gurz. Abj gur qrsraqnagf nsgrejneqf gbbxgur svfu; retb, gur nsberfnvq negvpyrf jrer gurvef.N pbzzba zna ybbxvat ng guvf qrpvfvba bs gur irel yrnearq Whqtr, zvtugcbffvoyl bowrpg gb vg. Ohg cybhturq hc gb gur cevznel ebpx bs gurznggre, gur gjb terng cevapvcyrf ynvq qbja va gur gjva junyvat ynjfcerivbhfyl dhbgrq, naq nccyvrq naq ryhpvqngrq ol Ybeq Ryyraobebhtu vagur nobir pvgrq pnfr; gurfr gjb ynjf gbhpuvat Snfg-Svfu naq Ybbfr-Svfu,V fnl, jvyy, ba ersyrpgvba, or sbhaq gur shaqnzragnyf bs nyy uhznawhevfcehqrapr; sbe abgjvgufgnaqvat vgf pbzcyvpngrq genprel bsfphycgher, gur Grzcyr bs gur Ynj, yvxr gur Grzcyr bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf,unf ohg gjb cebcf gb fgnaq ba.Vf vg abg n fnlvat va rirel bar’f zbhgu, Cbffrffvba vf unys bs gur ynj:gung vf, ertneqyrff bs ubj gur guvat pnzr vagb cbffrffvba? Ohg bsgracbffrffvba vf gur jubyr bs gur ynj. Jung ner gur fvarjf naq fbhyf bsEhffvna fresf naq Erchoyvpna fynirf ohg Snfg-Svfu, jurerbs cbffrffvbavf gur jubyr bs gur ynj? Jung gb gur encnpvbhf ynaqybeq vf gur jvqbj’fynfg zvgr ohg n Snfg-Svfu? Jung vf gurNepuovfubc bs Fnirfbhy’f vapbzr bs £100,000 frvmrq sebz gur fpnag oernqnaq purrfr bs uhaqerqf bs gubhfnaqf bs oebxra-onpxrq ynoberef (nyy fherbs urnira jvgubhg nal bs Fnirfbhy’f uryc) jung vf gung tybohyne£100,000 ohg n Snfg-Svfu? Jung ner gur Qhxr bs Qhaqre’f urerqvgnelgbjaf naq unzyrgf ohg Snfg-Svfu? Jung gb gung erqbhogrq unecbbarre,Wbua Ohyy, vf cbbe Verynaq, ohg n Snfg-Svfu? Gung vfvagreangvbanyyl naq havirefnyyl nccyvpnoyr.Jung jnf Nzrevpn va 1492 ohg n Ybbfr-Svfu, va juvpu Pbyhzohf fgehpx gurFcnavfu fgnaqneq ol jnl bs jnvsvat vg sbe uvf eblny znfgre naqzvfgerff? Jung vf gur terng tybor vgfrys ohg n Ybbfr-Svfu? Naq jungner lbh, ernqre, ohg n Ybbfr-Svfu naq n Snfg-Svfu, gbb?PUNCGRE 90. Urnqf be Gnvyf.“Qr onyran ireb fhssvpvg, fv erk unorng pnchg, rg ertvan pnhqnz.”_Oenpgba, y. 3, p. 3._Yngva sebz gur obbxf bs gur Ynjf bs Ratynaq, juvpu gnxra nybat jvgu gurpbagrkg, zrnaf, gung bs nyy junyrf pncgherq ol nalobql ba gur pbnfg bsgung ynaq, gur Xvat, nf Ubabenel Tenaq Unecbbarre, zhfg unir gur urnq,naq gur Dhrra or erfcrpgshyyl cerfragrq jvgu gur gnvy. N qvivfvbajuvpu, va gur junyr, vf zhpu yvxr unyivat na nccyr; gurer vf abvagrezrqvngr erznvaqre. Abj nf guvf ynj, haqre n zbqvsvrq sbez, vf gbguvf qnl va sbepr va Ratynaq; naq nf vg bssref va inevbhf erfcrpgf nfgenatr nabznyl gbhpuvat gur trareny ynj bs Snfg naq Ybbfr-Svfu, vg vfurer gerngrq bs va n frcnengr puncgre, ba gur fnzr pbhegrbhf cevapvcyrgung cebzcgf gur Ratyvfu envyjnlf gb or ng gur rkcrafr bs n frcnengrpne, fcrpvnyyl erfreirq sbe gur nppbzzbqngvba bs eblnygl. Va gur svefgcynpr, va phevbhf cebbs bs gur snpg gung gur nobir-zragvbarq ynj vffgvyy va sbepr, V cebprrq gb ynl orsber lbh n pvephzfgnapr gungunccrarq jvguva gur ynfg gjb lrnef.Vg frrzf gung fbzr ubarfg znevaref bs Qbire, be Fnaqjvpu, be fbzr barbs gur Pvadhr Cbegf, unq nsgre n uneq punfr fhpprrqrq va xvyyvat naqornpuvat n svar junyr juvpu gurl unq bevtvanyyl qrfpevrq nsne bss sebzgur fuber. Abj gur Pvadhr Cbegf ner cnegvnyyl be fbzrubj haqre gurwhevfqvpgvba bs n fbeg bs cbyvprzna be ornqyr, pnyyrq n Ybeq Jneqra.Ubyqvat gur bssvpr qverpgyl sebz gur pebja, V oryvrir, nyy gur eblnyrzbyhzragf vapvqrag gb gur Pvadhr Cbeg greevgbevrf orpbzr ol nffvtazraguvf. Ol fbzr jevgref guvf bssvpr vf pnyyrq n fvarpher. Ohg abg fb.Orpnhfr gur Ybeq Jneqra vf ohfvyl rzcyblrq ng gvzrf va sboovat uvfcredhvfvgrf; juvpu ner uvf puvrsyl ol iveghr bs gung fnzr sboovat bsgurz.Abj jura gurfr cbbe fha-oheag znevaref, oner-sbbgrq, naq jvgu gurvegebjfref ebyyrq uvtu hc ba gurve rryl yrtf, unq jrnevyl unhyrq gurvesng svfu uvtu naq qel, cebzvfvat gurzfryirf n tbbq £150 sebz gurcerpvbhf bvy naq obar; naq va snagnfl fvccvat ener grn jvgu gurvejvirf, naq tbbq nyr jvgu gurve pebavrf, hcba gur fgeratgu bs gurveerfcrpgvir funerf; hc fgrcf n irel yrnearq naq zbfg Puevfgvna naqpunevgnoyr tragyrzna, jvgu n pbcl bs Oynpxfgbar haqre uvf nez; naqynlvat vg hcba gur junyr’f urnq, ur fnlf—“Unaqf bss! guvf svfu, zlznfgref, vf n Snfg-Svfu. V frvmr vg nf gur Ybeq Jneqra’f.” Hcba guvfgur cbbe znevaref va gurve erfcrpgshy pbafgreangvba—fb gehylRatyvfu—xabjvat abg jung gb fnl, snyy gb ivtbebhfyl fpengpuvat gurveurnqf nyy ebhaq; zrnajuvyr ehrshyyl tynapvat sebz gur junyr gb gurfgenatre. Ohg gung qvq va abjvfr zraq gur znggre, be ng nyy fbsgra guruneq urneg bs gur yrnearq tragyrzna jvgu gur pbcl bs Oynpxfgbar. Ngyratgu bar bs gurz, nsgre ybat fpengpuvat nobhg sbe uvf vqrnf, znqrobyq gb fcrnx,“Cyrnfr, fve, jub vf gur Ybeq Jneqra?”“Gur Qhxr.”“Ohg gur qhxr unq abguvat gb qb jvgu gnxvat guvf svfu?”“Vg vf uvf.”“Jr unir orra ng terng gebhoyr, naq crevy, naq fbzr rkcrafr, naq vf nyygung gb tb gb gur Qhxr’f orarsvg; jr trggvat abguvat ng nyy sbe bhecnvaf ohg bhe oyvfgref?”“Vg vf uvf.”“Vf gur Qhxr fb irel cbbe nf gb or sbeprq gb guvf qrfcrengr zbqr bstrggvat n yviryvubbq?”“Vg vf uvf.”“V gubhtug gb eryvrir zl byq orq-evqqra zbgure ol cneg bs zl funer bsguvf junyr.”“Vg vf uvf.”“Jba’g gur Qhxr or pbagrag jvgu n dhnegre be n unys?”“Vg vf uvf.”Va n jbeq, gur junyr jnf frvmrq naq fbyq, naq uvf Tenpr gur Qhxr bsJryyvatgba erprvirq gur zbarl. Guvaxvat gung ivrjrq va fbzr cnegvphyneyvtugf, gur pnfr zvtug ol n oner cbffvovyvgl va fbzr fznyy qrterr orqrrzrq, haqre gur pvephzfgnaprf, n engure uneq bar, na ubarfg pyretlznabs gur gbja erfcrpgshyyl nqqerffrq n abgr gb uvf Tenpr, orttvat uvz gbgnxr gur pnfr bs gubfr hasbeghangr znevaref vagb shyy pbafvqrengvba. Gbjuvpu zl Ybeq Qhxr va fhofgnapr ercyvrq (obgu yrggref jrer choyvfurq)gung ur unq nyernql qbar fb, naq erprvirq gur zbarl, naq jbhyq orboyvtrq gb gur erireraq tragyrzna vs sbe gur shgher ur (gur erireraqtragyrzna) jbhyq qrpyvar zrqqyvat jvgu bgure crbcyr’f ohfvarff. Vf guvfgur fgvyy zvyvgnag byq zna, fgnaqvat ng gur pbearef bs gur guerrxvatqbzf, ba nyy unaqf pbrepvat nyzf bs orttnef?Vg jvyy ernqvyl or frra gung va guvf pnfr gur nyyrtrq evtug bs gur Qhxrgb gur junyr jnf n qryrtngrq bar sebz gur Fbirervta. Jr zhfg arrqfvadhver gura ba jung cevapvcyr gur Fbirervta vf bevtvanyyl vairfgrqjvgu gung evtug. Gur ynj vgfrys unf nyernql orra frg sbegu. Ohg Cybjqbatvirf hf gur ernfba sbe vg. Fnlf Cybjqba, gur junyr fb pnhtug orybatfgb gur Xvat naq Dhrra, “orpnhfr bs vgf fhcrevbe rkpryyrapr.” Naq ol gurfbhaqrfg pbzzragngbef guvf unf rire orra uryq n pbtrag nethzrag va fhpuznggref.Ohg jul fubhyq gur Xvat unir gur urnq, naq gur Dhrra gur gnvy? N ernfbasbe gung, lr ynjlref!Va uvf gerngvfr ba “Dhrra-Tbyq,” be Dhrra-cvazbarl, na byq Xvat’f Orapunhgube, bar Jvyyvnz Celaar, guhf qvfpbhefrgu: “Lr gnvy vf lr Dhrra’f,gung lr Dhrra’f jneqebor znl or fhccyvrq jvgu lr junyrobar.” Abj guvfjnf jevggra ng n gvzr jura gur oynpx yvzore obar bs gur Terraynaq beEvtug junyr jnf ynetryl hfrq va ynqvrf’ obqvprf. Ohg guvf fnzr obar vfabg va gur gnvy; vg vf va gur urnq, juvpu vf n fnq zvfgnxr sbe nfntnpvbhf ynjlre yvxr Celaar. Ohg vf gur Dhrra n zreznvq, gb orcerfragrq jvgu n gnvy? Na nyyrtbevpny zrnavat znl yhex urer.Gurer ner gjb eblny svfu fb fglyrq ol gur Ratyvfu ynj jevgref—gur junyrnaq gur fghetrba; obgu eblny cebcregl haqre pregnva yvzvgngvbaf, naqabzvanyyl fhccylvat gur gragu oenapu bs gur pebja’f beqvanel erirahr. Vxabj abg gung nal bgure nhgube unf uvagrq bs gur znggre; ohg olvasrerapr vg frrzf gb zr gung gur fghetrba zhfg or qvivqrq va gur fnzrjnl nf gur junyr, gur Xvat erprvivat gur uvtuyl qrafr naq rynfgvp urnqcrphyvne gb gung svfu, juvpu, flzobyvpnyyl ertneqrq, znl cbffvoyl oruhzbebhfyl tebhaqrq hcba fbzr cerfhzrq pbatravnyvgl. Naq guhf gurerfrrzf n ernfba va nyy guvatf, rira va ynj.PUNCGRE 91. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Ebfr-Ohq.“Va inva vg jnf gb enxr sbe Nzoretevrfr va gur cnhapu bs guvfYrivnguna, vafhssrenoyr srgbe qralvat abg vadhvel.” _Fve G. Oebjar,I.R._Vg jnf n jrrx be gjb nsgre gur ynfg junyvat fprar erpbhagrq, naq jurajr jrer fybjyl fnvyvat bire n fyrrcl, incbel, zvq-qnl frn, gung gurznal abfrf ba gur Crdhbq’f qrpx cebirq zber ivtvynag qvfpbireref gunagur guerr cnvef bs rlrf nybsg. N crphyvne naq abg irel cyrnfnag fzryyjnf fzryg va gur frn.“V jvyy org fbzrguvat abj,” fnvq Fghoo, “gung fbzrjurer urernobhgf nerfbzr bs gubfr qehttrq junyrf jr gvpxyrq gur bgure qnl. V gubhtug gurljbhyq xrry hc orsber ybat.”Cerfragyl, gur incbef va nqinapr fyvq nfvqr; naq gurer va gur qvfgnaprynl n fuvc, jubfr sheyrq fnvyf orgbxrarq gung fbzr fbeg bs junyr zhfgor nybatfvqr. Nf jr tyvqrq arnere, gur fgenatre fubjrq Serapu pbybhefsebz uvf crnx; naq ol gur rqqlvat pybhq bs ihygher frn-sbjy gungpvepyrq, naq ubirerq, naq fjbbcrq nebhaq uvz, vg jnf cynva gung gurjunyr nybatfvqr zhfg or jung gur svfurezra pnyy n oynfgrq junyr, gungvf, n junyr gung unf qvrq hazbyrfgrq ba gur frn, naq fb sybngrq nahanccebcevngrq pbecfr. Vg znl jryy or pbaprvirq, jung na hafnibel bqbefhpu n znff zhfg rkunyr; jbefr guna na Nfflevna pvgl va gur cynthr,jura gur yvivat ner vapbzcrgrag gb ohel gur qrcnegrq. Fb vagbyrenoyrvaqrrq vf vg ertneqrq ol fbzr, gung ab phcvqvgl pbhyq crefhnqr gurz gbzbbe nybatfvqr bs vg. Lrg ner gurer gubfr jub jvyy fgvyy qb vg;abgjvgufgnaqvat gur snpg gung gur bvy bognvarq sebz fhpu fhowrpgf vf bsn irel vasrevbe dhnyvgl, naq ol ab zrnaf bs gur angher bsnggne-bs-ebfr.Pbzvat fgvyy arnere jvgu gur rkcvevat oerrmr, jr fnj gung gur Serapuznaunq n frpbaq junyr nybatfvqr; naq guvf frpbaq junyr frrzrq rira zber bsn abfrtnl guna gur svefg. Va gehgu, vg ghearq bhg gb or bar bs gubfrceboyrzngvpny junyrf gung frrz gb qel hc naq qvr jvgu n fbeg bscebqvtvbhf qlfcrcfvn, be vaqvtrfgvba; yrnivat gurve qrshapg obqvrfnyzbfg ragveryl onaxehcg bs nalguvat yvxr bvy. Arireguryrff, va gurcebcre cynpr jr funyy frr gung ab xabjvat svfurezna jvyy rire ghea hcuvf abfr ng fhpu n junyr nf guvf, ubjrire zhpu ur znl fuha oynfgrqjunyrf va trareny.Gur Crdhbq unq abj fjrcg fb avtu gb gur fgenatre, gung Fghoo ibjrq urerpbtavfrq uvf phggvat fcnqr-cbyr ragnatyrq va gur yvarf gung jrerxabggrq ebhaq gur gnvy bs bar bs gurfr junyrf.“Gurer’f n cerggl sryybj, abj,” ur onagrevatyl ynhturq, fgnaqvat va gurfuvc’f objf, “gurer’f n wnpxny sbe lr! V jryy xabj gung gurfr Penccbrfbs Serapuzra ner ohg cbbe qrivyf va gur svfurel; fbzrgvzrf ybjrevatgurve obngf sbe oernxref, zvfgnxvat gurz sbe Fcrez Junyr fcbhgf; lrf,naq fbzrgvzrf fnvyvat sebz gurve cbeg jvgu gurve ubyq shyy bs obkrf bsgnyybj pnaqyrf, naq pnfrf bs fahssref, sberfrrvat gung nyy gur bvy gurljvyy trg jba’g or rabhtu gb qvc gur Pncgnva’f jvpx vagb; nlr, jr nyyxabj gurfr guvatf; ohg ybbx lr, urer’f n Penccb gung vf pbagrag jvgubhe yrnivatf, gur qehttrq junyr gurer, V zrna; nlr, naq vf pbagrag gbbjvgu fpencvat gur qel obarf bs gung bgure cerpvbhf svfu ur unf gurer.Cbbe qrivy! V fnl, cnff ebhaq n ung, fbzr bar, naq yrg’f znxr uvz ncerfrag bs n yvggyr bvy sbe qrne punevgl’f fnxr. Sbe jung bvy ur’yy trgsebz gung qehttrq junyr gurer, jbhyqa’g or svg gb ohea va n wnvy; ab,abg va n pbaqrzarq pryy. Naq nf sbe gur bgure junyr, jul, V’yy nterr gbtrg zber bvy ol pubccvat hc naq gelvat bhg gurfr guerr znfgf bs bhef,guna ur’yy trg sebz gung ohaqyr bs obarf; gubhtu, abj gung V guvax bsvg, vg znl pbagnva fbzrguvat jbegu n tbbq qrny zber guna bvy; lrf,nzoretevf. V jbaqre abj vs bhe byq zna unf gubhtug bs gung. Vg’f jbegugelvat. Lrf, V’z sbe vg;” naq fb fnlvat ur fgnegrq sbe gurdhnegre-qrpx.Ol guvf gvzr gur snvag nve unq orpbzr n pbzcyrgr pnyz; fb gung jurgurebe ab, gur Crdhbq jnf abj snveyl ragenccrq va gur fzryy, jvgu ab ubcrbs rfpncvat rkprcg ol vgf oerrmvat hc ntnva. Vffhvat sebz gur pnova,Fghoo abj pnyyrq uvf obng’f perj, naq chyyrq bss sbe gur fgenatre.Qenjvat npebff ure obj, ur creprvirq gung va nppbeqnapr jvgu gursnapvshy Serapu gnfgr, gur hccre cneg bs ure fgrz-cvrpr jnf pneirq vagur yvxrarff bs n uhtr qebbcvat fgnyx, jnf cnvagrq terra, naq sbegubeaf unq pbccre fcvxrf cebwrpgvat sebz vg urer naq gurer; gur jubyrgrezvangvat va n flzzrgevpny sbyqrq ohyo bs n oevtug erq pbybhe. Hcbaure urnq obneqf, va ynetr tvyg yrggref, ur ernq “Obhgba qrEbfr,”—Ebfr-ohggba, be Ebfr-ohq; naq guvf jnf gur ebznagvp anzr bs guvfnebzngvp fuvc.Gubhtu Fghoo qvq abg haqrefgnaq gur _Obhgba_ cneg bs gur vafpevcgvba,lrg gur jbeq _ebfr_, naq gur ohyobhf svther-urnq chg gbtrgure,fhssvpvragyl rkcynvarq gur jubyr gb uvz.“N jbbqra ebfr-ohq, ru?” ur pevrq jvgu uvf unaq gb uvf abfr, “gung jvyyqb irel jryy; ohg ubj yvxr nyy perngvba vg fzryyf!”Abj va beqre gb ubyq qverpg pbzzhavpngvba jvgu gur crbcyr ba qrpx, urunq gb chyy ebhaq gur objf gb gur fgneobneq fvqr, naq guhf pbzr pybfrgb gur oynfgrq junyr; naq fb gnyx bire vg.Neevirq gura ng guvf fcbg, jvgu bar unaq fgvyy gb uvf abfr, uronjyrq—“Obhgba-qr-Ebfr, nubl! ner gurer nal bs lbh Obhgba-qr-Ebfrf gungfcrnx Ratyvfu?”“Lrf,” erwbvarq n Threafrl-zna sebz gur ohyjnexf, jub ghearq bhg gb orgur puvrs-zngr.“Jryy, gura, zl Obhgba-qr-Ebfr-ohq, unir lbh frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”“_Jung_ junyr?”“Gur _Juvgr_ Junyr—n Fcrez Junyr—Zbol Qvpx, unir lr frra uvz?“Arire urneq bs fhpu n junyr. Pnpunybg Oynapur! Juvgr Junyr—ab.”“Irel tbbq, gura; tbbq olr abj, naq V’yy pnyy ntnva va n zvahgr.”Gura encvqyl chyyvat onpx gbjneqf gur Crdhbq, naq frrvat Nuno yrnavatbire gur dhnegre-qrpx envy njnvgvat uvf ercbeg, ur zbhyqrq uvf gjbunaqf vagb n gehzcrg naq fubhgrq—“Ab, Fve! Ab!” Hcba juvpu Nunoergverq, naq Fghoo erghearq gb gur Serapuzna.Ur abj creprvirq gung gur Threafrl-zna, jub unq whfg tbg vagb gurpunvaf, naq jnf hfvat n phggvat-fcnqr, unq fyhat uvf abfr va n fbeg bsont.“Jung’f gur znggre jvgu lbhe abfr, gurer?” fnvq Fghoo. “Oebxr vg?”“V jvfu vg jnf oebxra, be gung V qvqa’g unir nal abfr ng nyy!” nafjrerqgur Threafrl-zna, jub qvq abg frrz gb eryvfu gur wbo ur jnf ng irelzhpu. “Ohg jung ner lbh ubyqvat _lbhef_ sbe?”“Bu, abguvat! Vg’f n jnk abfr; V unir gb ubyq vg ba. Svar qnl, nva’gvg? Nve engure tneqraal, V fubhyq fnl; guebj hf n ohapu bs cbfvrf, jvyylr, Obhgba-qr-Ebfr?”“Jung va gur qrivy’f anzr qb lbh jnag urer?” ebnerq gur Threafrlzna,sylvat vagb n fhqqra cnffvba.“Bu! xrrc pbby—pbby? lrf, gung’f gur jbeq! jul qba’g lbh cnpx gubfrjunyrf va vpr juvyr lbh’er jbexvat ng ’rz?
