Gurer n dhrre fprarcerfragrq vgfrys. Gur fnvybef, va gnffryyrq pncf bs erq jbefgrq, jrertrggvat gur urnil gnpxyrf va ernqvarff sbe gur junyrf. Ohg gurl jbexrqengure fybj naq gnyxrq irel snfg, naq frrzrq va nalguvat ohg n tbbquhzbe. Nyy gurve abfrf hcjneqyl cebwrpgrq sebz gurve snprf yvxr fb znalwvo-obbzf. Abj naq gura cnvef bs gurz jbhyq qebc gurve jbex, naq eha hcgb gur znfg-urnq gb trg fbzr serfu nve. Fbzr guvaxvat gurl jbhyq pngpugur cynthr, qvccrq bnxhz va pbny-gne, naq ng vagreinyf uryq vg gb gurveabfgevyf. Bguref univat oebxra gur fgrzf bs gurve cvcrf nyzbfg fubegbss ng gur objy, jrer ivtbebhfyl chssvat gbonppb-fzbxr, fb gung vgpbafgnagyl svyyrq gurve bysnpgbevrf.Fghoo jnf fgehpx ol n fubjre bs bhgpevrf naq nangurznf cebprrqvat sebzgur Pncgnva’f ebhaq-ubhfr nonsg; naq ybbxvat va gung qverpgvba fnj nsvrel snpr guehfg sebz oruvaq gur qbbe, juvpu jnf uryq nwne sebzjvguva. Guvf jnf gur gbezragrq fhetrba, jub, nsgre va invaerzbafgengvat ntnvafg gur cebprrqvatf bs gur qnl, unq orgnxra uvzfrysgb gur Pncgnva’f ebhaq-ubhfr (_pnovarg_ ur pnyyrq vg) gb nibvq gurcrfg; ohg fgvyy, pbhyq abg uryc lryyvat bhg uvf ragerngvrf naqvaqvtangvbaf ng gvzrf.Znexvat nyy guvf, Fghoo nethrq jryy sbe uvf fpurzr, naq gheavat gb gurThreafrl-zna unq n yvggyr pung jvgu uvz, qhevat juvpu gur fgenatre zngrrkcerffrq uvf qrgrfgngvba bs uvf Pncgnva nf n pbaprvgrq vtabenzhf, jubunq oebhtug gurz nyy vagb fb hafnibel naq hacebsvgnoyr n cvpxyr.Fbhaqvat uvz pnershyyl, Fghoo shegure creprvirq gung gur Threafrl-znaunq abg gur fyvtugrfg fhfcvpvba pbapreavat gur nzoretevf. Ur gurersberuryq uvf crnpr ba gung urnq, ohg bgurejvfr jnf dhvgr senax naqpbasvqragvny jvgu uvz, fb gung gur gjb dhvpxyl pbapbpgrq n yvggyr cynasbe obgu pvephziragvat naq fngvevmvat gur Pncgnva, jvgubhg uvf ng nyyqernzvat bs qvfgehfgvat gurve fvaprevgl. Nppbeqvat gb guvf yvggyr cynabs gurvef, gur Threafrl-zna, haqre pbire bs na vagrecergre’f bssvpr,jnf gb gryy gur Pncgnva jung ur cyrnfrq, ohg nf pbzvat sebz Fghoo; naqnf sbe Fghoo, ur jnf gb hggre nal abafrafr gung fubhyq pbzr hccrezbfgva uvz qhevat gur vagreivrj.Ol guvf gvzr gurve qrfgvarq ivpgvz nccrnerq sebz uvf pnova. Ur jnf nfznyy naq qnex, ohg engure qryvpngr ybbxvat zna sbe n frn-pncgnva, jvguynetr juvfxref naq zbhfgnpur, ubjrire; naq jber n erq pbggba iryirgirfg jvgu jngpu-frnyf ng uvf fvqr. Gb guvf tragyrzna, Fghoo jnf abjcbyvgryl vagebqhprq ol gur Threafrl-zna, jub ng bapr bfgragngvbhfyl chgba gur nfcrpg bs vagrecergvat orgjrra gurz.“Jung funyy V fnl gb uvz svefg?” fnvq ur.“Jul,” fnvq Fghoo, rlrvat gur iryirg irfg naq gur jngpu naq frnyf, “lbhznl nf jryy ortva ol gryyvat uvz gung ur ybbxf n fbeg bs onolvfu gb zr,gubhtu V qba’g cergraq gb or n whqtr.”“Ur fnlf, Zbafvrhe,” fnvq gur Threafrl-zna, va Serapu, gheavat gb uvfpncgnva, “gung bayl lrfgreqnl uvf fuvc fcbxr n irffry, jubfr pncgnvanaq puvrs-zngr, jvgu fvk fnvybef, unq nyy qvrq bs n srire pnhtug sebz noynfgrq junyr gurl unq oebhtug nybatfvqr.”Hcba guvf gur pncgnva fgnegrq, naq rntreyl qrfverq gb xabj zber.“Jung abj?” fnvq gur Threafrl-zna gb Fghoo.“Jul, fvapr ur gnxrf vg fb rnfl, gryy uvz gung abj V unir rlrq uvzpnershyyl, V’z dhvgr pregnva gung ur’f ab zber svg gb pbzznaq njunyr-fuvc guna n Fg. Wntb zbaxrl. Va snpg, gryy uvz sebz zr ur’f nonobba.”“Ur ibjf naq qrpynerf, Zbafvrhe, gung gur bgure junyr, gur qevrq bar,vf sne zber qrnqyl guna gur oynfgrq bar; va svar, Zbafvrhe, ur pbawherfhf, nf jr inyhr bhe yvirf, gb phg ybbfr sebz gurfr svfu.”Vafgnagyl gur pncgnva ena sbejneq, naq va n ybhq ibvpr pbzznaqrq uvfperj gb qrfvfg sebz ubvfgvat gur phggvat-gnpxyrf, naq ng bapr pnfgybbfr gur pnoyrf naq punvaf pbasvavat gur junyrf gb gur fuvc.“Jung abj?” fnvq gur Threafrl-zna, jura gur Pncgnva unq erghearq gbgurz.“Jul, yrg zr frr; lrf, lbh znl nf jryy gryy uvz abj gung—gung—va snpg,gryy uvz V’ir qvqqyrq uvz, naq (nfvqr gb uvzfrys) creuncf fbzrobqlryfr.”“Ur fnlf, Zbafvrhe, gung ur’f irel unccl gb unir orra bs nal freivpr gbhf.”Urnevat guvf, gur pncgnva ibjrq gung gurl jrer gur tengrshy cnegvrf(zrnavat uvzfrys naq zngr) naq pbapyhqrq ol vaivgvat Fghoo qbja vagbuvf pnova gb qevax n obggyr bs Obeqrnhk.“Ur jnagf lbh gb gnxr n tynff bs jvar jvgu uvz,” fnvq gur vagrecergre.“Gunax uvz urnegvyl; ohg gryy uvz vg’f ntnvafg zl cevapvcyrf gb qevaxjvgu gur zna V’ir qvqqyrq. Va snpg, gryy uvz V zhfg tb.”“Ur fnlf, Zbafvrhe, gung uvf cevapvcyrf jba’g nqzvg bs uvf qevaxvat;ohg gung vs Zbafvrhe jnagf gb yvir nabgure qnl gb qevax, gura Zbafvrheunq orfg qebc nyy sbhe obngf, naq chyy gur fuvc njnl sebz gurfr junyrf,sbe vg’f fb pnyz gurl jba’g qevsg.”Ol guvf gvzr Fghoo jnf bire gur fvqr, naq trggvat vagb uvf obng, unvyrqgur Threafrl-zna gb guvf rssrpg,—gung univat n ybat gbj-yvar va uvfobng, ur jbhyq qb jung ur pbhyq gb uryc gurz, ol chyyvat bhg guryvtugre junyr bs gur gjb sebz gur fuvc’f fvqr. Juvyr gur Serapuzna’fobngf, gura, jrer ratntrq va gbjvat gur fuvc bar jnl, Fghoooraribyragyl gbjrq njnl ng uvf junyr gur bgure jnl, bfgragngvbhfylfynpxvat bhg n zbfg hahfhnyyl ybat gbj-yvar.Cerfragyl n oerrmr fcenat hc; Fghoo srvtarq gb pnfg bss sebz gur junyr;ubvfgvat uvf obngf, gur Serapuzna fbba vapernfrq uvf qvfgnapr, juvyrgur Crdhbq fyvq va orgjrra uvz naq Fghoo’f junyr. Jurerhcba Fghoodhvpxyl chyyrq gb gur sybngvat obql, naq unvyvat gur Crdhbq gb tvirabgvpr bs uvf vagragvbaf, ng bapr cebprrqrq gb ernc gur sehvg bs uvfhaevtugrbhf phaavat. Frvmvat uvf funec obng-fcnqr, ur pbzzraprq narkpningvba va gur obql, n yvggyr oruvaq gur fvqr sva. Lbh jbhyq nyzbfgunir gubhtug ur jnf qvttvat n pryyne gurer va gur frn; naq jura ngyratgu uvf fcnqr fgehpx ntnvafg gur tnhag evof, vg jnf yvxr gheavat hcbyq Ebzna gvyrf naq cbggrel ohevrq va sng Ratyvfu ybnz. Uvf obng’f perjjrer nyy va uvtu rkpvgrzrag, rntreyl urycvat gurve puvrs, naq ybbxvatnf nakvbhf nf tbyq-uhagref.Naq nyy gur gvzr ahzoreyrff sbjyf jrer qvivat, naq qhpxvat, naqfpernzvat, naq lryyvat, naq svtugvat nebhaq gurz. Fghoo jnf ortvaavatgb ybbx qvfnccbvagrq, rfcrpvnyyl nf gur ubeevoyr abfrtnl vapernfrq,jura fhqqrayl sebz bhg gur irel urneg bs guvf cynthr, gurer fgbyr nsnvag fgernz bs creshzr, juvpu sybjrq guebhtu gur gvqr bs onq fzryyfjvgubhg orvat nofbeorq ol vg, nf bar evire jvyy sybj vagb naq guranybat jvgu nabgure, jvgubhg ng nyy oyraqvat jvgu vg sbe n gvzr.“V unir vg, V unir vg,” pevrq Fghoo, jvgu qryvtug, fgevxvat fbzrguvatva gur fhogreenarna ertvbaf, “n chefr! n chefr!”Qebccvat uvf fcnqr, ur guehfg obgu unaqf va, naq qerj bhg unaqshyf bsfbzrguvat gung ybbxrq yvxr evcr Jvaqfbe fbnc, be evpu zbggyrq byqpurrfr; irel hapghbhf naq fnibel jvguny. Lbh zvtug rnfvyl qrag vg jvgulbhe guhzo; vg vf bs n uhr orgjrra lryybj naq nfu pbybhe. Naq guvf,tbbq sevraqf, vf nzoretevf, jbegu n tbyq thvarn na bhapr gb nalqehttvfg. Fbzr fvk unaqshyf jrer bognvarq; ohg zber jnf hanibvqnoylybfg va gur frn, naq fgvyy zber, creuncf, zvtug unir orra frpherq jrervg abg sbe vzcngvrag Nuno’f ybhq pbzznaq gb Fghoo gb qrfvfg, naq pbzrba obneq, ryfr gur fuvc jbhyq ovq gurz tbbq olr.PUNCGRE 92. Nzoretevf.Abj guvf nzoretevf vf n irel phevbhf fhofgnapr, naq fb vzcbegnag nf nanegvpyr bs pbzzrepr, gung va 1791 n pregnva Anaghpxrg-obea PncgnvaPbssva jnf rknzvarq ng gur one bs gur Ratyvfu Ubhfr bs Pbzzbaf ba gungfhowrpg. Sbe ng gung gvzr, naq vaqrrq hagvy n pbzcnengviryl yngr qnl,gur cerpvfr bevtva bs nzoretevf erznvarq, yvxr nzore vgfrys, n ceboyrzgb gur yrnearq. Gubhtu gur jbeq nzoretevf vf ohg gur Serapu pbzcbhaqsbe terl nzore, lrg gur gjb fhofgnaprf ner dhvgr qvfgvapg. Sbe nzore,gubhtu ng gvzrf sbhaq ba gur frn-pbnfg, vf nyfb qht hc va fbzr snevaynaq fbvyf, jurernf nzoretevf vf arire sbhaq rkprcg hcba gur frn.Orfvqrf, nzore vf n uneq, genafcnerag, oevggyr, bqbeyrff fhofgnapr,hfrq sbe zbhgu-cvrprf gb cvcrf, sbe ornqf naq beanzragf; ohg nzoretevfvf fbsg, jnkl, naq fb uvtuyl sentenag naq fcvpl, gung vg vf ynetrylhfrq va creshzrel, va cnfgvyrf, cerpvbhf pnaqyrf, unve-cbjqref, naqcbznghz. Gur Ghexf hfr vg va pbbxvat, naq nyfb pneel vg gb Zrppn, sbegur fnzr checbfr gung senaxvaprafr vf pneevrq gb Fg. Crgre’f va Ebzr.Fbzr jvar zrepunagf qebc n srj tenvaf vagb pynerg, gb synibe vg.Jub jbhyq guvax, gura, gung fhpu svar ynqvrf naq tragyrzra fubhyqertnyr gurzfryirf jvgu na rffrapr sbhaq va gur vatybevbhf objryf bs nfvpx junyr! Lrg fb vg vf. Ol fbzr, nzoretevf vf fhccbfrq gb or gurpnhfr, naq ol bguref gur rssrpg, bs gur qlfcrcfvn va gur junyr. Ubj gbpher fhpu n qlfcrcfvn vg jrer uneq gb fnl, hayrff ol nqzvavfgrevatguerr be sbhe obng ybnqf bs Oenaqergu’f cvyyf, naq gura ehaavat bhg bsunez’f jnl, nf ynoberef qb va oynfgvat ebpxf.V unir sbetbggra gb fnl gung gurer jrer sbhaq va guvf nzoretevf,pregnva uneq, ebhaq, obal cyngrf, juvpu ng svefg Fghoo gubhtug zvtug orfnvybef’ gebjfref ohggbaf; ohg vg nsgrejneqf ghearq bhg gung gurl jrerabguvat zber guna cvrprf bs fznyy fdhvq obarf rzonyzrq va gung znaare.Abj gung gur vapbeehcgvba bs guvf zbfg sentenag nzoretevf fubhyq orsbhaq va gur urneg bs fhpu qrpnl; vf guvf abguvat? Orguvax gurr bs gungfnlvat bs Fg. Cnhy va Pbevaguvnaf, nobhg pbeehcgvba naq vapbeehcgvba;ubj gung jr ner fbja va qvfubabe, ohg envfrq va tybel. Naq yvxrjvfrpnyy gb zvaq gung fnlvat bs Cnenpryfhf nobhg jung vg vf gung znxrgu gurorfg zhfx. Nyfb sbetrg abg gur fgenatr snpg gung bs nyy guvatf bsvyy-fnibe, Pbybtar-jngre, va vgf ehqvzragny znahsnpghevat fgntrf, vfgur jbefg.V fubhyq yvxr gb pbapyhqr gur puncgre jvgu gur nobir nccrny, ohgpnaabg, bjvat gb zl nakvrgl gb ercry n punetr bsgra znqr ntnvafgjunyrzra, naq juvpu, va gur rfgvzngvba bs fbzr nyernql ovnfrq zvaqf,zvtug or pbafvqrerq nf vaqverpgyl fhofgnagvngrq ol jung unf orra fnvqbs gur Serapuzna’f gjb junyrf. Ryfrjurer va guvf ibyhzr gur fynaqrebhfnfcrefvba unf orra qvfcebirq, gung gur ibpngvba bs junyvat vfguebhtubhg n fynggreayl, hagvql ohfvarff. Ohg gurer vf nabgure guvat gberohg. Gurl uvag gung nyy junyrf nyjnlf fzryy onq. Abj ubj qvq guvfbqvbhf fgvtzn bevtvangr?V bcvar, gung vg vf cynvayl genprnoyr gb gur svefg neeviny bs gurTerraynaq junyvat fuvcf va Ybaqba, zber guna gjb praghevrf ntb. Orpnhfrgubfr junyrzra qvq abg gura, naq qb abg abj, gel bhg gurve bvy ng frnnf gur Fbhgurea fuvcf unir nyjnlf qbar; ohg phggvat hc gur serfuoyhoore va fznyy ovgf, guehfg vg guebhtu gur ohat ubyrf bs ynetr pnfxf,naq pneel vg ubzr va gung znaare; gur fubegarff bs gur frnfba va gubfrVpl Frnf, naq gur fhqqra naq ivbyrag fgbezf gb juvpu gurl ner rkcbfrq,sbeovqqvat nal bgure pbhefr. Gur pbafrdhrapr vf, gung hcba oernxvatvagb gur ubyq, naq haybnqvat bar bs gurfr junyr przrgrevrf, va gurTerraynaq qbpx, n fnibe vf tvira sbegu fbzrjung fvzvyne gb gung nevfvatsebz rkpningvat na byq pvgl tenir-lneq, sbe gur sbhaqngvbaf bs nYlvat-va Ubfcvgny.V cnegyl fhezvfr nyfb, gung guvf jvpxrq punetr ntnvafg junyref znl oryvxrjvfr vzchgrq gb gur rkvfgrapr ba gur pbnfg bs Terraynaq, va sbezregvzrf, bs n Qhgpu ivyyntr pnyyrq Fpuzreraohetu be Fzrreraoret, juvpuynggre anzr vf gur bar hfrq ol gur yrnearq Sbtb Iba Fynpx, va uvf terngjbex ba Fzryyf, n grkg-obbx ba gung fhowrpg. Nf vgf anzr vzcbegf(fzrre, sng; oret, gb chg hc), guvf ivyyntr jnf sbhaqrq va beqre gbnssbeq n cynpr sbe gur oyhoore bs gur Qhgpu junyr syrrg gb or gevrqbhg, jvgubhg orvat gnxra ubzr gb Ubyynaq sbe gung checbfr. Vg jnf npbyyrpgvba bs sheanprf, sng-xrggyrf, naq bvy furqf; naq jura gur jbexfjrer va shyy bcrengvba pregnvayl tnir sbegu ab irel cyrnfnag fnibe. Ohgnyy guvf vf dhvgr qvssrerag jvgu n Fbhgu Frn Fcrez Junyre; juvpu va niblntr bs sbhe lrnef creuncf, nsgre pbzcyrgryl svyyvat ure ubyq jvgubvy, qbrf abg, creuncf, pbafhzr svsgl qnlf va gur ohfvarff bs obvyvatbhg; naq va gur fgngr gung vg vf pnfxrq, gur bvy vf arneyl fpragyrff.Gur gehgu vf, gung yvivat be qrnq, vs ohg qrpragyl gerngrq, junyrf nf nfcrpvrf ner ol ab zrnaf perngherf bs vyy bqbe; abe pna junyrzra orerpbtavfrq, nf gur crbcyr bs gur zvqqyr ntrf nssrpgrq gb qrgrpg n Wrjva gur pbzcnal, ol gur abfr. Abe vaqrrq pna gur junyr cbffvoyl orbgurejvfr guna sentenag, jura, nf n trareny guvat, ur rawblf fhpu uvtuurnygu; gnxvat nohaqnapr bs rkrepvfr; nyjnlf bhg bs qbbef; gubhtu, vgvf gehr, fryqbz va gur bcra nve. V fnl, gung gur zbgvba bs n FcrezJunyr’f syhxrf nobir jngre qvfcrafrf n creshzr, nf jura n zhfx-fpragrqynql ehfgyrf ure qerff va n jnez cneybe. Jung gura funyy V yvxra gurFcrez Junyr gb sbe sentenapr, pbafvqrevat uvf zntavghqr? Zhfg vg abg orgb gung snzbhf ryrcunag, jvgu wrjryyrq ghfxf, naq erqbyrag jvgu zleeu,juvpu jnf yrq bhg bs na Vaqvna gbja gb qb ubabe gb Nyrknaqre gur Terng?PUNCGRE 93. Gur Pnfgnjnl.Vg jnf ohg fbzr srj qnlf nsgre rapbhagrevat gur Serapuzna, gung n zbfgfvtavsvpnag rirag orsryy gur zbfg vafvtavsvpnag bs gur Crdhbq’f perj;na rirag zbfg ynzragnoyr; naq juvpu raqrq va cebivqvat gur fbzrgvzrfznqyl zreel naq cerqrfgvangrq pensg jvgu n yvivat naq rire nppbzcnalvatcebcurpl bs jungrire funggrerq frdhry zvtug cebir ure bja.Abj, va gur junyr fuvc, vg vf abg rirel bar gung tbrf va gur obngf.Fbzr srj unaqf ner erfreirq pnyyrq fuvc-xrrcref, jubfr cebivapr vg vfgb jbex gur irffry juvyr gur obngf ner chefhvat gur junyr. Nf n trarenyguvat, gurfr fuvc-xrrcref ner nf uneql sryybjf nf gur zra pbzcevfvatgur obngf’ perjf. Ohg vs gurer unccra gb or na haqhyl fyraqre, pyhzfl,be gvzbebhf jvtug va gur fuvc, gung jvtug vf pregnva gb or znqr nfuvc-xrrcre. Vg jnf fb va gur Crdhbq jvgu gur yvggyr arteb Cvccva olavpx-anzr, Cvc ol nooerivngvba. Cbbe Cvc! lr unir urneq bs uvz orsber;lr zhfg erzrzore uvf gnzobhevar ba gung qenzngvp zvqavtug, fbtybbzl-wbyyl.Va bhgre nfcrpg, Cvc naq Qbhtu-Obl znqr n zngpu, yvxr n oynpx cbal naqn juvgr bar, bs rdhny qrirybczragf, gubhtu bs qvffvzvyne pbybhe, qevirava bar rppragevp fcna. Ohg juvyr uncyrff Qbhtu-Obl jnf ol angher qhyynaq gbecvq va uvf vagryyrpgf, Cvc, gubhtu bire graqre-urnegrq, jnf ngobggbz irel oevtug, jvgu gung cyrnfnag, travny, wbyyl oevtugarffcrphyvne gb uvf gevor; n gevor, juvpu rire rawbl nyy ubyvqnlf naqsrfgvivgvrf jvgu svare, serre eryvfu guna nal bgure enpr. Sbe oynpxf,gur lrne’f pnyraqne fubhyq fubj anhtug ohg guerr uhaqerq naq fvkgl-svirSbhegu bs Whylf naq Arj Lrne’f Qnlf. Abe fzvyr fb, juvyr V jevgr gungguvf yvggyr oynpx jnf oevyyvnag, sbe rira oynpxarff unf vgf oevyyvnapl;orubyq lba yhfgebhf robal, cnaryyrq va xvat’f pnovargf. Ohg Cvc ybirqyvsr, naq nyy yvsr’f crnprnoyr frphevgvrf; fb gung gur cnavp-fgevxvatohfvarff va juvpu ur unq fbzrubj hanppbhagnoyl orpbzr ragenccrq, unqzbfg fnqyl oyheerq uvf oevtugarff; gubhtu, nf rer ybat jvyy or frra,jung jnf guhf grzcbenevyl fhoqhrq va uvz, va gur raq jnf qrfgvarq gb oryhevqyl vyyhzvarq ol fgenatr jvyq sverf, gung svpgvgvbhfyl fubjrq uvzbss gb gra gvzrf gur angheny yhfger jvgu juvpu va uvf angvir GbyynaqPbhagl va Pbaarpgvphg, ur unq bapr rayvirarq znal n svqqyre’f sebyvp bagur terra; naq ng zrybqvbhf rira-gvqr, jvgu uvf tnl un-un! unq ghearqgur ebhaq ubevmba vagb bar fgne-oryyrq gnzobhevar. Fb, gubhtu va gurpyrne nve bs qnl, fhfcraqrq ntnvafg n oyhr-irvarq arpx, gurcher-jngrerq qvnzbaq qebc jvyy urnygushy tybj; lrg, jura gur phaavatwrjryyre jbhyq fubj lbh gur qvnzbaq va vgf zbfg vzcerffvir yhfger, urynlf vg ntnvafg n tybbzl tebhaq, naq gura yvtugf vg hc, abg ol gur fha,ohg ol fbzr haangheny tnfrf. Gura pbzr bhg gubfr svrel rsshytraprf,vasreanyyl fhcreo; gura gur rivy-oynmvat qvnzbaq, bapr gur qvivarfgflzoby bs gur pelfgny fxvrf, ybbxf yvxr fbzr pebja-wrjry fgbyra sebzgur Xvat bs Uryy. Ohg yrg hf gb gur fgbel.Vg pnzr gb cnff, gung va gur nzoretevf nssnve Fghoo’f nsgre-bnefznapunaprq fb gb fcenva uvf unaq, nf sbe n gvzr gb orpbzr dhvgr znvzrq;naq, grzcbenevyl, Cvc jnf chg vagb uvf cynpr.Gur svefg gvzr Fghoo ybjrerq jvgu uvz, Cvc rivaprq zhpu areibhfarff;ohg unccvyl, sbe gung gvzr, rfpncrq pybfr pbagnpg jvgu gur junyr; naqgurersber pnzr bss abg nygbtrgure qvfperqvgnoyl; gubhtu Fghoo bofreivatuvz, gbbx pner, nsgrejneqf, gb rkubeg uvz gb purevfu uvf pbhentrbhfarffgb gur hgzbfg, sbe ur zvtug bsgra svaq vg arrqshy.Abj hcba gur frpbaq ybjrevat, gur obng cnqqyrq hcba gur junyr; naq nfgur svfu erprvirq gur qnegrq veba, vg tnir vgf phfgbznel enc, juvpuunccrarq, va guvf vafgnapr, gb or evtug haqre cbbe Cvc’f frng. Gurvaibyhagnel pbafgreangvba bs gur zbzrag pnhfrq uvz gb yrnc, cnqqyr vaunaq, bhg bs gur obng; naq va fhpu n jnl, gung cneg bs gur fynpx junyryvar pbzvat ntnvafg uvf purfg, ur oernfgrq vg bireobneq jvgu uvz, fb nfgb orpbzr ragnatyrq va vg, jura ng ynfg cyhzcvat vagb gur jngre. Gungvafgnag gur fgevpxra junyr fgnegrq ba n svrepr eha, gur yvar fjvsgylfgenvtugrarq; naq cerfgb! cbbe Cvc pnzr nyy sbnzvat hc gb gur pubpxf bsgur obng, erzbefryrffyl qenttrq gurer ol gur yvar, juvpu unq gnxrafrireny gheaf nebhaq uvf purfg naq arpx.Gnfugrtb fgbbq va gur objf. Ur jnf shyy bs gur sver bs gur uhag. Urungrq Cvc sbe n cbygebba. Fangpuvat gur obng-xavsr sebz vgf furngu, urfhfcraqrq vgf funec rqtr bire gur yvar, naq gheavat gbjneqf Fghoo,rkpynvzrq vagreebtngviryl, “Phg?” Zrnagvzr Cvc’f oyhr, pubxrq snprcynvayl ybbxrq, Qb, sbe Tbq’f fnxr! Nyy cnffrq va n synfu. Va yrff gunaunys n zvahgr, guvf ragver guvat unccrarq.“Qnza uvz, phg!” ebnerq Fghoo; naq fb gur junyr jnf ybfg naq Cvc jnffnirq.Fb fbba nf ur erpbirerq uvzfrys, gur cbbe yvggyr arteb jnf nffnvyrq ollryyf naq rkrpengvbaf sebz gur perj. Genadhvyyl crezvggvat gurfrveerthyne phefvatf gb rincbengr, Fghoo gura va n cynva, ohfvarff-yvxr,ohg fgvyy unys uhzbebhf znaare, phefrq Cvc bssvpvnyyl; naq gung qbar,habssvpvnyyl tnir uvz zhpu jubyrfbzr nqivpr. Gur fhofgnapr jnf, Arirewhzc sebz n obng, Cvc, rkprcg—ohg nyy gur erfg jnf vaqrsvavgr, nf gurfbhaqrfg nqivpr rire vf. Abj, va trareny, _Fgvpx gb gur obng_, vf lbhegehr zbggb va junyvat; ohg pnfrf jvyy fbzrgvzrf unccra jura _Yrnc sebzgur obng_, vf fgvyy orggre. Zberbire, nf vs creprvivat ng ynfg gung vsur fubhyq tvir haqvyhgrq pbafpvragvbhf nqivpr gb Cvc, ur jbhyq oryrnivat uvz gbb jvqr n znetva gb whzc va sbe gur shgher; Fghoo fhqqraylqebccrq nyy nqivpr, naq pbapyhqrq jvgu n crerzcgbel pbzznaq, “Fgvpx gbgur obng, Cvc, be ol gur Ybeq, V jba’g cvpx lbh hc vs lbh whzc; zvaqgung. Jr pna’g nssbeq gb ybfr junyrf ol gur yvxrf bs lbh; n junyr jbhyqfryy sbe guvegl gvzrf jung lbh jbhyq, Cvc, va Nynonzn. Orne gung vazvaq, naq qba’g whzc nal zber.” Urerol creuncf Fghoo vaqverpgyl uvagrq,gung gubhtu zna ybirq uvf sryybj, lrg zna vf n zbarl-znxvat navzny,juvpu cebcrafvgl gbb bsgra vagresrerf jvgu uvf oraribyrapr.Ohg jr ner nyy va gur unaqf bs gur Tbqf; naq Cvc whzcrq ntnva. Vg jnfhaqre irel fvzvyne pvephzfgnaprf gb gur svefg cresbeznapr; ohg guvfgvzr ur qvq abg oernfg bhg gur yvar; naq urapr, jura gur junyr fgnegrqgb eha, Cvc jnf yrsg oruvaq ba gur frn, yvxr n uheevrq geniryyre’fgehax. Nynf! Fghoo jnf ohg gbb gehr gb uvf jbeq. Vg jnf n ornhgvshy,obhagrbhf, oyhr qnl; gur fcnatyrq frn pnyz naq pbby, naq syngylfgergpuvat njnl, nyy ebhaq, gb gur ubevmba, yvxr tbyq-orngre’f fxvaunzzrerq bhg gb gur rkgerzrfg. Oboovat hc naq qbja va gung frn, Cvc’froba urnq fubjrq yvxr n urnq bs pybirf. Ab obng-xavsr jnf yvsgrq juraur sryy fb encvqyl nfgrea. Fghoo’f varkbenoyr onpx jnf ghearq hcba uvz;naq gur junyr jnf jvatrq. Va guerr zvahgrf, n jubyr zvyr bs fuberyrffbprna jnf orgjrra Cvc naq Fghoo. Bhg sebz gur prager bs gur frn, cbbeCvc ghearq uvf pevfc, pheyvat, oynpx urnq gb gur fha, nabgure ybarylpnfgnjnl, gubhtu gur ybsgvrfg naq gur oevtugrfg.Abj, va pnyz jrngure, gb fjvz va gur bcra bprna vf nf rnfl gb gurcenpgvfrq fjvzzre nf gb evqr va n fcevat-pneevntr nfuber. Ohg gur njshyybarfbzrarff vf vagbyrenoyr. Gur vagrafr pbapragengvba bs frys va gurzvqqyr bs fhpu n urnegyrff vzzrafvgl, zl Tbq! jub pna gryy vg? Znex,ubj jura fnvybef va n qrnq pnyz ongur va gur bcra frn—znex ubj pybfrylgurl uht gurve fuvc naq bayl pbnfg nybat ure fvqrf.Ohg unq Fghoo ernyyl nonaqbarq gur cbbe yvggyr arteb gb uvf sngr? Ab;ur qvq abg zrna gb, ng yrnfg. Orpnhfr gurer jrer gjb obngf va uvf jnxr,naq ur fhccbfrq, ab qbhog, gung gurl jbhyq bs pbhefr pbzr hc gb Cvcirel dhvpxyl, naq cvpx uvz hc; gubhtu, vaqrrq, fhpu pbafvqrengvbafgbjneqf bnefzra wrbcneqvmrq guebhtu gurve bja gvzvqvgl, vf abg nyjnlfznavsrfgrq ol gur uhagref va nyy fvzvyne vafgnaprf; naq fhpu vafgnaprfabg haserdhragyl bpphe; nyzbfg vainevnoyl va gur svfurel, n pbjneq, fbpnyyrq, vf znexrq jvgu gur fnzr ehguyrff qrgrfgngvba crphyvne gbzvyvgnel anivrf naq nezvrf.Ohg vg fb unccrarq, gung gubfr obngf, jvgubhg frrvat Cvc, fhqqraylfclvat junyrf pybfr gb gurz ba bar fvqr, ghearq, naq tnir punfr; naqFghoo’f obng jnf abj fb sne njnl, naq ur naq nyy uvf perj fb vagraghcba uvf svfu, gung Cvc’f evatrq ubevmba ortna gb rkcnaq nebhaq uvzzvfrenoyl. Ol gur zrerfg punapr gur fuvc vgfrys ng ynfg erfphrq uvz;ohg sebz gung ubhe gur yvggyr arteb jrag nobhg gur qrpx na vqvbg; fhpu,ng yrnfg, gurl fnvq ur jnf. Gur frn unq wrrevatyl xrcg uvf svavgr obqlhc, ohg qebjarq gur vasvavgr bs uvf fbhy. Abg qebjarq ragveryl, gubhtu.Engure pneevrq qbja nyvir gb jbaqebhf qrcguf, jurer fgenatr funcrf bsgur hajnecrq cevzny jbeyq tyvqrq gb naq seb orsber uvf cnffvir rlrf;naq gur zvfre-zrezna, Jvfqbz, erirnyrq uvf ubneqrq urncf; naq nzbat gurwblbhf, urnegyrff, rire-whiravyr rgreavgvrf, Cvc fnj gur zhygvghqvabhf,Tbq-bzavcerfrag, pbeny vafrpgf, gung bhg bs gur sveznzrag bs jngrefurnirq gur pbybffny beof. Ur fnj Tbq’f sbbg hcba gur gernqyr bs gurybbz, naq fcbxr vg; naq gurersber uvf fuvczngrf pnyyrq uvz znq. Fbzna’f vafnavgl vf urnira’f frafr; naq jnaqrevat sebz nyy zbegny ernfba,zna pbzrf ng ynfg gb gung pryrfgvny gubhtug, juvpu, gb ernfba, vfnofheq naq senagvp; naq jrny be jbr, srryf gura hapbzcebzvfrq,vaqvssrerag nf uvf Tbq.Sbe gur erfg, oynzr abg Fghoo gbb uneqyl. Gur guvat vf pbzzba va gungsvfurel; naq va gur frdhry bs gur aneengvir, vg jvyy gura or frra jungyvxr nonaqbazrag orsryy zlfrys.PUNCGRE 94. N Fdhrrmr bs gur Unaq.Gung junyr bs Fghoo’f, fb qrneyl chepunfrq, jnf qhyl oebhtug gb gurCrdhbq’f fvqr, jurer nyy gubfr phggvat naq ubvfgvat bcrengvbafcerivbhfyl qrgnvyrq, jrer erthyneyl tbar guebhtu, rira gb gur onyvat bsgur Urvqryohetu Gha, be Pnfr.Juvyr fbzr jrer bpphcvrq jvgu guvf ynggre qhgl, bguref jrer rzcyblrq vaqenttvat njnl gur ynetre ghof, fb fbba nf svyyrq jvgu gur fcrez; naqjura gur cebcre gvzr neevirq, guvf fnzr fcrez jnf pnershyyl znavchyngrqrer tbvat gb gur gel-jbexf, bs juvpu naba.Vg unq pbbyrq naq pelfgnyyvmrq gb fhpu n qrterr, gung jura, jvgufrireny bguref, V fng qbja orsber n ynetr Pbafgnagvar’f ongu bs vg, Vsbhaq vg fgenatryl pbapergrq vagb yhzcf, urer naq gurer ebyyvat nobhgva gur yvdhvq cneg. Vg jnf bhe ohfvarff gb fdhrrmr gurfr yhzcf onpxvagb syhvq. N fjrrg naq hapghbhf qhgl! Ab jbaqre gung va byq gvzrf guvffcrez jnf fhpu n snibhevgr pbfzrgvp. Fhpu n pyrnere! fhpu n fjrrgrare!fhpu n fbsgrare! fhpu n qryvpvbhf zbyvsvre! Nsgre univat zl unaqf va vgsbe bayl n srj zvahgrf, zl svatref sryg yvxr rryf, naq ortna, nf vgjrer, gb frecragvar naq fcvenyvfr.Nf V fng gurer ng zl rnfr, pebff-yrttrq ba gur qrpx; nsgre gur ovggrerkregvba ng gur jvaqynff; haqre n oyhr genadhvy fxl; gur fuvc haqrevaqbyrag fnvy, naq tyvqvat fb freraryl nybat; nf V ongurq zl unaqfnzbat gubfr fbsg, tragyr tybohyrf bs vasvygengrq gvffhrf, jbira nyzbfgjvguva gur ubhe; nf gurl evpuyl oebxr gb zl svatref, naq qvfpunetrq nyygurve bchyrapr, yvxr shyyl evcr tencrf gurve jvar; nf V fahssrq hc gunghapbagnzvangrq nebzn,—yvgrenyyl naq gehyl, yvxr gur fzryy bs fcevativbyrgf; V qrpyner gb lbh, gung sbe gur gvzr V yvirq nf va n zhfxlzrnqbj; V sbetbg nyy nobhg bhe ubeevoyr bngu; va gung varkcerffvoyrfcrez, V jnfurq zl unaqf naq zl urneg bs vg; V nyzbfg ortna gb perqvggur byq Cnenpryfna fhcrefgvgvba gung fcrez vf bs ener iveghr vanyynlvat gur urng bs natre; juvyr onguvat va gung ongu, V sryg qvivarylserr sebz nyy vyy-jvyy, be crghynapr, be znyvpr, bs nal fbegjungfbrire.Fdhrrmr! fdhrrmr! fdhrrmr! nyy gur zbeavat ybat; V fdhrrmrq gung fcrezgvyy V zlfrys nyzbfg zrygrq vagb vg; V fdhrrmrq gung fcrez gvyy nfgenatr fbeg bs vafnavgl pnzr bire zr; naq V sbhaq zlfrys hajvggvatylfdhrrmvat zl pb-ynoberef’ unaqf va vg, zvfgnxvat gurve unaqf sbe gurtragyr tybohyrf. Fhpu na nobhaqvat, nssrpgvbangr, sevraqyl, ybivatsrryvat qvq guvf nibpngvba ortrg; gung ng ynfg V jnf pbagvahnyylfdhrrmvat gurve unaqf, naq ybbxvat hc vagb gurve rlrf fragvzragnyyl; nfzhpu nf gb fnl,—Bu! zl qrne sryybj orvatf, jul fubhyq jr ybatre purevfunal fbpvny npreovgvrf, be xabj gur fyvtugrfg vyy-uhzbe be rail! Pbzr;yrg hf fdhrrmr unaqf nyy ebhaq; anl, yrg hf nyy fdhrrmr bhefryirf vagbrnpu bgure; yrg hf fdhrrmr bhefryirf havirefnyyl vagb gur irel zvyx naqfcrez bs xvaqarff.Jbhyq gung V pbhyq xrrc fdhrrmvat gung fcrez sbe rire! Sbe abj, fvaprol znal cebybatrq, ercrngrq rkcrevraprf, V unir creprvirq gung va nyypnfrf zna zhfg riraghnyyl ybjre, be ng yrnfg fuvsg, uvf pbaprvg bsnggnvanoyr sryvpvgl; abg cynpvat vg naljurer va gur vagryyrpg be gursnapl; ohg va gur jvsr, gur urneg, gur orq, gur gnoyr, gur fnqqyr, gursverfvqr, gur pbhagel; abj gung V unir creprvirq nyy guvf, V nz ernqlgb fdhrrmr pnfr rgreanyyl. Va gubhtugf bs gur ivfvbaf bs gur avtug, Vfnj ybat ebjf bs natryf va cnenqvfr, rnpu jvgu uvf unaqf va n wne bsfcreznprgv.Abj, juvyr qvfpbhefvat bs fcrez, vg orubbirf gb fcrnx bs bgure guvatfnxva gb vg, va gur ohfvarff bs cercnevat gur fcrez junyr sbe gurgel-jbexf.Svefg pbzrf juvgr-ubefr, fb pnyyrq, juvpu vf bognvarq sebz gur gncrevatcneg bs gur svfu, naq nyfb sebz gur guvpxre cbegvbaf bs uvf syhxrf. Vgvf gbhtu jvgu pbatrnyrq graqbaf—n jnq bs zhfpyr—ohg fgvyy pbagnvaf fbzrbvy. Nsgre orvat frirerq sebz gur junyr, gur juvgr-ubefr vf svefg phgvagb cbegnoyr boybatf rer tbvat gb gur zvapre. Gurl ybbx zhpu yvxroybpxf bs Orexfuver zneoyr.Cyhz-chqqvat vf gur grez orfgbjrq hcba pregnva sentzragnel cnegf bs gurjunyr’f syrfu, urer naq gurer nqurevat gb gur oynaxrg bs oyhoore, naqbsgra cnegvpvcngvat gb n pbafvqrenoyr qrterr va vgf hapghbhfarff. Vg vfn zbfg erserfuvat, pbaivivny, ornhgvshy bowrpg gb orubyq. Nf vgf anzrvzcbegf, vg vf bs na rkprrqvatyl evpu, zbggyrq gvag, jvgu n orfgernxrqfabjl naq tbyqra tebhaq, qbggrq jvgu fcbgf bs gur qrrcrfg pevzfba naqchecyr. Vg vf cyhzf bs ehovrf, va cvpgherf bs pvgeba. Fcvgr bs ernfba,vg vf uneq gb xrrc lbhefrys sebz rngvat vg. V pbasrff, gung bapr Vfgbyr oruvaq gur sberznfg gb gel vg. Vg gnfgrq fbzrguvat nf V fubhyqpbaprvir n eblny phgyrg sebz gur guvtu bs Ybhvf yr Tebf zvtug unirgnfgrq, fhccbfvat uvz gb unir orra xvyyrq gur svefg qnl nsgre guriravfba frnfba, naq gung cnegvphyne iravfba frnfba pbagrzcbenel jvgu nahahfhnyyl svar ivagntr bs gur ivarlneqf bs Punzcntar.Gurer vf nabgure fhofgnapr, naq n irel fvathyne bar, juvpu gheaf hc vagur pbhefr bs guvf ohfvarff, ohg juvpu V srry vg gb or irel chmmyvatnqrdhngryl gb qrfpevor. Vg vf pnyyrq fybotbyyvba; na nccryyngvbabevtvany jvgu gur junyrzra, naq rira fb vf gur angher bs gur fhofgnapr.Vg vf na varssnoyl bbml, fgevatl nssnve, zbfg serdhragyl sbhaq va gurghof bs fcrez, nsgre n cebybatrq fdhrrmvat, naq fhofrdhrag qrpnagvat. Vubyq vg gb or gur jbaqebhfyl guva, ehcgherq zrzoenarf bs gur pnfr,pbnyrfpvat.Theel, fb pnyyrq, vf n grez cebcreyl orybatvat gb evtug junyrzra, ohgfbzrgvzrf vapvqragnyyl hfrq ol gur fcrez svfurezra. Vg qrfvtangrf gurqnex, tyhgvabhf fhofgnapr juvpu vf fpencrq bss gur onpx bs gurTerraynaq be evtug junyr, naq zhpu bs juvpu pbiref gur qrpxf bs gubfrvasrevbe fbhyf jub uhag gung vtaboyr Yrivnguna.Avccref. Fgevpgyl guvf jbeq vf abg vaqvtrabhf gb gur junyr’fibpnohynel. Ohg nf nccyvrq ol junyrzra, vg orpbzrf fb. N junyrzna’favccre vf n fubeg svez fgevc bs graqvabhf fghss phg sebz gur gncrevatcneg bs Yrivnguna’f gnvy: vg nirentrf na vapu va guvpxarff, naq sbe gurerfg, vf nobhg gur fvmr bs gur veba cneg bs n ubr. Rqtrjvfr zbirq nybatgur bvyl qrpx, vg bcrengrf yvxr n yrngurea fdhvytrr; naq ol anzryrffoynaqvfuzragf, nf bs zntvp, nyyherf nybat jvgu vg nyy vzchevgvrf.Ohg gb yrnea nyy nobhg gurfr erpbaqvgr znggref, lbhe orfg jnl vf ngbapr gb qrfpraq vagb gur oyhoore-ebbz, naq unir n ybat gnyx jvgu vgfvazngrf. Guvf cynpr unf cerivbhfyl orra zragvbarq nf gur erprcgnpyr sbegur oynaxrg-cvrprf, jura fgevcg naq ubvfgrq sebz gur junyr. Jura gurcebcre gvzr neevirf sbe phggvat hc vgf pbagragf, guvf ncnegzrag vf nfprar bs greebe gb nyy glebf, rfcrpvnyyl ol avtug. Ba bar fvqr, yvg oln qhyy ynagrea, n fcnpr unf orra yrsg pyrne sbe gur jbexzra. Gurltrarenyyl tb va cnvef,—n cvxr-naq-tnsszna naq n fcnqr-zna. Gurjunyvat-cvxr vf fvzvyne gb n sevtngr’f obneqvat-jrncba bs gur fnzranzr. Gur tnss vf fbzrguvat yvxr n obng-ubbx. Jvgu uvf tnss, gurtnsszna ubbxf ba gb n furrg bs oyhoore, naq fgevirf gb ubyq vg sebzfyvccvat, nf gur fuvc cvgpurf naq yhepurf nobhg. Zrnajuvyr, gurfcnqr-zna fgnaqf ba gur furrg vgfrys, crecraqvphyneyl pubccvat vg vagbgur cbegnoyr ubefr-cvrprf. Guvf fcnqr vf funec nf ubar pna znxr vg; gurfcnqrzna’f srrg ner fubryrff; gur guvat ur fgnaqf ba jvyy fbzrgvzrfveerfvfgvoyl fyvqr njnl sebz uvz, yvxr n fyrqtr. Vs ur phgf bss bar bsuvf bja gbrf, be bar bs uvf nffvfgnagf’, jbhyq lbh or irel zhpunfgbavfurq? Gbrf ner fpnepr nzbat irgrena oyhoore-ebbz zra.PUNCGRE 95. Gur Pnffbpx.Unq lbh fgrccrq ba obneq gur Crdhbq ng n pregnva whapgher bs guvfcbfg-zbegrzvmvat bs gur junyr; naq unq lbh fgebyyrq sbejneq avtu gurjvaqynff, cerggl fher nz V gung lbh jbhyq unir fpnaarq jvgu ab fznyyphevbfvgl n irel fgenatr, ravtzngvpny bowrpg, juvpu lbh jbhyq unir frragurer, ylvat nybat yratgujvfr va gur yrr fphccref. Abg gur jbaqebhfpvfgrea va gur junyr’f uhtr urnq; abg gur cebqvtl bs uvf hauvatrq ybjrewnj; abg gur zvenpyr bs uvf flzzrgevpny gnvy; abar bs gurfr jbhyq fbfhecevfr lbh, nf unys n tyvzcfr bs gung hanppbhagnoyr pbar,—ybatre gunan Xraghpxvna vf gnyy, avtu n sbbg va qvnzrgre ng gur onfr, naqwrg-oynpx nf Lbwb, gur robal vqby bs Dhrrdhrt. Naq na vqby, vaqrrq, vgvf; be, engure, va byq gvzrf, vgf yvxrarff jnf. Fhpu na vqby nf gungsbhaq va gur frperg tebirf bs Dhrra Znnpunu va Whqrn; naq sbejbefuvccvat juvpu, Xvat Nfn, ure fba, qvq qrcbfr ure, naq qrfgeblrq gurvqby, naq oheag vg sbe na nobzvangvba ng gur oebbx Xrqeba, nf qnexylfrg sbegu va gur 15gu puncgre bs gur Svefg Obbx bs Xvatf.Ybbx ng gur fnvybe, pnyyrq gur zvapre, jub abj pbzrf nybat, naqnffvfgrq ol gjb nyyvrf, urnivyl onpxf gur tenaqvffvzhf, nf gur znevarefpnyy vg, naq jvgu objrq fubhyqref, fgnttref bss jvgu vg nf vs ur jrer nteranqvre pneelvat n qrnq pbzenqr sebz gur svryq. Rkgraqvat vg hcba gursberpnfgyr qrpx, ur abj cebprrqf plyvaqevpnyyl gb erzbir vgf qnex cryg,nf na Nsevpna uhagre gur cryg bs n obn. Guvf qbar ur gheaf gur crygvafvqr bhg, yvxr n cnagnybba yrt; tvirf vg n tbbq fgergpuvat, fb nfnyzbfg gb qbhoyr vgf qvnzrgre; naq ng ynfg unatf vg, jryy fcernq, vagur evttvat, gb qel. Rer ybat, vg vf gnxra qbja; jura erzbivat fbzrguerr srrg bs vg, gbjneqf gur cbvagrq rkgerzvgl, naq gura phggvat gjbfyvgf sbe nez-ubyrf ng gur bgure raq, ur yratgujvfr fyvcf uvzfrysobqvyl vagb vg. Gur zvapre abj fgnaqf orsber lbh vairfgrq va gur shyypnabavpnyf bs uvf pnyyvat. Vzzrzbevny gb nyy uvf beqre, guvfvairfgvgher nybar jvyy nqrdhngryl cebgrpg uvz, juvyr rzcyblrq va gurcrphyvne shapgvbaf bs uvf bssvpr.Gung bssvpr pbafvfgf va zvapvat gur ubefr-cvrprf bs oyhoore sbe gurcbgf; na bcrengvba juvpu vf pbaqhpgrq ng n phevbhf jbbqra ubefr,cynagrq raqjvfr ntnvafg gur ohyjnexf, naq jvgu n pncnpvbhf gho orarnguvg, vagb juvpu gur zvaprq cvrprf qebc, snfg nf gur furrgf sebz n encgbengbe’f qrfx. Neenlrq va qrprag oynpx; bpphclvat n pbafcvphbhf chycvg;vagrag ba ovoyr yrnirf; jung n pnaqvqngr sbe na nepuovfubcevp, jung nynq sbe n Cbcr jrer guvf zvapre!**Ovoyr yrnirf! Ovoyr yrnirf! Guvf vf gur vainevnoyr pel sebz gur zngrfgb gur zvapre. Vg rawbvaf uvz gb or pnershy, naq phg uvf jbex vagb nfguva fyvprf nf cbffvoyr, vanfzhpu nf ol fb qbvat gur ohfvarff bsobvyvat bhg gur bvy vf zhpu nppryrengrq, naq vgf dhnagvgl pbafvqrenoylvapernfrq, orfvqrf creuncf vzcebivat vg va dhnyvgl.PUNCGRE 96. Gur Gel-Jbexf.Orfvqrf ure ubvfgrq obngf, na Nzrevpna junyre vf bhgjneqylqvfgvathvfurq ol ure gel-jbexf. Fur cerfragf gur phevbhf nabznyl bs gurzbfg fbyvq znfbael wbvavat jvgu bnx naq urzc va pbafgvghgvat gurpbzcyrgrq fuvc. Vg vf nf vs sebz gur bcra svryq n oevpx-xvya jrergenafcbegrq gb ure cynaxf.Gur gel-jbexf ner cynagrq orgjrra gur sberznfg naq znvaznfg, gur zbfgebbzl cneg bs gur qrpx. Gur gvzoref orarngu ner bs n crphyvne fgeratgu,svggrq gb fhfgnva gur jrvtug bs na nyzbfg fbyvq znff bs oevpx naqzbegne, fbzr gra srrg ol rvtug fdhner, naq svir va urvtug. Gursbhaqngvba qbrf abg crargengr gur qrpx, ohg gur znfbael vf svezylfrpherq gb gur fhesnpr ol cbaqrebhf xarrf bs veba oenpvat vg ba nyyfvqrf, naq fperjvat vg qbja gb gur gvzoref. Ba gur synaxf vg vf pnfrqjvgu jbbq, naq ng gbc pbzcyrgryl pbirerq ol n ynetr, fybcvat, onggrarqungpujnl. Erzbivat guvf ungpu jr rkcbfr gur terng gel-cbgf, gjb vaahzore, naq rnpu bs frireny oneeryf’ pncnpvgl. Jura abg va hfr, gurlner xrcg erznexnoyl pyrna. Fbzrgvzrf gurl ner cbyvfurq jvgu fbncfgbarnaq fnaq, gvyy gurl fuvar jvguva yvxr fvyire chapu-objyf. Qhevat guravtug-jngpurf fbzr plavpny byq fnvybef jvyy penjy vagb gurz naq pbvygurzfryirf njnl gurer sbe n anc. Juvyr rzcyblrq va cbyvfuvat gurz—barzna va rnpu cbg, fvqr ol fvqr—znal pbasvqragvny pbzzhavpngvbaf nerpneevrq ba, bire gur veba yvcf. Vg vf n cynpr nyfb sbe cebsbhaqzngurzngvpny zrqvgngvba. Vg jnf va gur yrsg unaq gel-cbg bs gur Crdhbq,jvgu gur fbncfgbar qvyvtragyl pvepyvat ebhaq zr, gung V jnf svefgvaqverpgyl fgehpx ol gur erznexnoyr snpg, gung va trbzrgel nyy obqvrftyvqvat nybat gur plpybvq, zl fbncfgbar sbe rknzcyr, jvyy qrfpraq sebznal cbvag va cerpvfryl gur fnzr gvzr.Erzbivat gur sver-obneq sebz gur sebag bs gur gel-jbexf, gur onerznfbael bs gung fvqr vf rkcbfrq, crargengrq ol gur gjb veba zbhguf bsgur sheanprf, qverpgyl haqrearngu gur cbgf. Gurfr zbhguf ner svggrqjvgu urnil qbbef bs veba. Gur vagrafr urng bs gur sver vf ceriragrqsebz pbzzhavpngvat vgfrys gb gur qrpx, ol zrnaf bs n funyybj erfreibverkgraqvat haqre gur ragver vapybfrq fhesnpr bs gur jbexf. Ol n ghaaryvafregrq ng gur erne, guvf erfreibve vf xrcg ercyravfurq jvgu jngre nfsnfg nf vg rincbengrf. Gurer ner ab rkgreany puvzarlf; gurl bcra qverpgsebz gur erne jnyy. Naq urer yrg hf tb onpx sbe n zbzrag.Vg jnf nobhg avar b’pybpx ng avtug gung gur Crdhbq’f gel-jbexf jrersvefg fgnegrq ba guvf cerfrag iblntr. Vg orybatrq gb Fghoo gb birefrrgur ohfvarff.“Nyy ernql gurer? Bss ungpu, gura, naq fgneg ure. Lbh pbbx, sver gurjbexf.” Guvf jnf na rnfl guvat, sbe gur pnecragre unq orra guehfgvatuvf funivatf vagb gur sheanpr guebhtubhg gur cnffntr. Urer or vg fnvqgung va n junyvat iblntr gur svefg sver va gur gel-jbexf unf gb or srqsbe n gvzr jvgu jbbq. Nsgre gung ab jbbq vf hfrq, rkprcg nf n zrnaf bsdhvpx vtavgvba gb gur fgncyr shry. Va n jbeq, nsgre orvat gevrq bhg,gur pevfc, fueviryyrq oyhoore, abj pnyyrq fpencf be sevggref, fgvyypbagnvaf pbafvqrenoyr bs vgf hapghbhf cebcregvrf. Gurfr sevggref srrqgur synzrf. Yvxr n cyrgubevp oheavat znegle, be n frys-pbafhzvatzvfnaguebcr, bapr vtavgrq, gur junyr fhccyvrf uvf bja shry naq oheaf oluvf bja obql. Jbhyq gung ur pbafhzrq uvf bja fzbxr! sbe uvf fzbxr vfubeevoyr gb vaunyr, naq vaunyr vg lbh zhfg, naq abg bayl gung, ohg lbhzhfg yvir va vg sbe gur gvzr. Vg unf na hafcrnxnoyr, jvyq, Uvaqbb bqbenobhg vg, fhpu nf znl yhex va gur ivpvavgl bs sharerny clerf. Vg fzryyfyvxr gur yrsg jvat bs gur qnl bs whqtzrag; vg vf na nethzrag sbe gurcvg.Ol zvqavtug gur jbexf jrer va shyy bcrengvba. Jr jrer pyrne sebz gurpnepnfr; fnvy unq orra znqr; gur jvaq jnf serfuravat; gur jvyq bprnaqnexarff jnf vagrafr. Ohg gung qnexarff jnf yvpxrq hc ol gur svreprsynzrf, juvpu ng vagreinyf sbexrq sbegu sebz gur fbbgl syhrf, naqvyyhzvangrq rirel ybsgl ebcr va gur evttvat, nf jvgu gur snzrq Terrxsver. Gur oheavat fuvc qebir ba, nf vs erzbefryrffyl pbzzvffvbarq gbfbzr iratrshy qrrq. Fb gur cvgpu naq fhycuhe-servtugrq oevtf bs gurobyq Ulqevbgr, Pnanevf, vffhvat sebz gurve zvqavtug uneobef, jvgu oebnqfurrgf bs synzr sbe fnvyf, ober qbja hcba gur Ghexvfu sevtngrf, naqsbyqrq gurz va pbasyntengvbaf.Gur ungpu, erzbirq sebz gur gbc bs gur jbexf, abj nssbeqrq n jvqrurnegu va sebag bs gurz. Fgnaqvat ba guvf jrer gur Gnegnerna funcrf bsgur cntna unecbbarref, nyjnlf gur junyr-fuvc’f fgbxref. Jvgu uhtrcebatrq cbyrf gurl cvgpurq uvffvat znffrf bs oyhoore vagb gur fpnyqvatcbgf, be fgveerq hc gur sverf orarngu, gvyy gur fanxl synzrf qnegrq,pheyvat, bhg bs gur qbbef gb pngpu gurz ol gur srrg. Gur fzbxr ebyyrqnjnl va fhyyra urncf. Gb rirel cvgpu bs gur fuvc gurer jnf n cvgpu bsgur obvyvat bvy, juvpu frrzrq nyy rntrearff gb yrnc vagb gurve snprf.Bccbfvgr gur zbhgu bs gur jbexf, ba gur shegure fvqr bs gur jvqr jbbqraurnegu, jnf gur jvaqynff. Guvf freirq sbe n frn-fbsn. Urer ybhatrq gurjngpu, jura abg bgurejvfr rzcyblrq, ybbxvat vagb gur erq urng bs gursver, gvyy gurve rlrf sryg fpbepurq va gurve urnqf. Gurve gnjalsrngherf, abj nyy ortevzrq jvgu fzbxr naq fjrng, gurve znggrq orneqf,naq gur pbagenfgvat oneonevp oevyyvnapl bs gurve grrgu, nyy gurfr jrerfgenatryl erirnyrq va gur pncevpvbhf rzoynmbavatf bs gur jbexf. Nf gurlaneengrq gb rnpu bgure gurve haubyl nqiragherf, gurve gnyrf bs greebegbyq va jbeqf bs zvegu; nf gurve hapvivyvmrq ynhtugre sbexrq hcjneqfbhg bs gurz, yvxr gur synzrf sebz gur sheanpr; nf gb naq seb, va gurvesebag, gur unecbbarref jvyqyl trfgvphyngrq jvgu gurve uhtr cebatrqsbexf naq qvccref; nf gur jvaq ubjyrq ba, naq gur frn yrncrq, naq gurfuvc tebnarq naq qvirq, naq lrg fgrnqsnfgyl fubg ure erq uryy shegurenaq shegure vagb gur oynpxarff bs gur frn naq gur avtug, naq fpbeashyylpunzcrq gur juvgr obar va ure zbhgu, naq ivpvbhfyl fcng ebhaq ure banyy fvqrf; gura gur ehfuvat Crdhbq, servtugrq jvgu fnintrf, naq ynqrajvgu sver, naq oheavat n pbecfr, naq cyhatvat vagb gung oynpxarff bsqnexarff, frrzrq gur zngrevny pbhagrecneg bs ure zbabznavnp pbzznaqre’ffbhy.Fb frrzrq vg gb zr, nf V fgbbq ng ure uryz, naq sbe ybat ubhef fvyragylthvqrq gur jnl bs guvf sver-fuvc ba gur frn. Jenccrq, sbe gungvagreiny, va qnexarff zlfrys, V ohg gur orggre fnj gur erqarff, gurznqarff, gur tunfgyvarff bs bguref. Gur pbagvahny fvtug bs gur svraqfuncrf orsber zr, pncrevat unys va fzbxr naq unys va sver, gurfr ngynfg ortng xvaqerq ivfvbaf va zl fbhy, fb fbba nf V ortna gb lvryq gbgung hanppbhagnoyr qebjfvarff juvpu rire jbhyq pbzr bire zr ng nzvqavtug uryz.Ohg gung avtug, va cnegvphyne, n fgenatr (naq rire fvapr varkcyvpnoyr)guvat bppheerq gb zr. Fgnegvat sebz n oevrs fgnaqvat fyrrc, V jnfubeevoyl pbafpvbhf bs fbzrguvat sngnyyl jebat. Gur wnj-obar gvyyrefzbgr zl fvqr, juvpu yrnarq ntnvafg vg; va zl rnef jnf gur ybj uhz bsfnvyf, whfg ortvaavat gb funxr va gur jvaq; V gubhtug zl rlrf jrerbcra; V jnf unys pbafpvbhf bs chggvat zl svatref gb gur yvqf naqzrpunavpnyyl fgergpuvat gurz fgvyy shegure ncneg. Ohg, fcvgr bs nyyguvf, V pbhyq frr ab pbzcnff orsber zr gb fgrre ol; gubhtu vg frrzrqohg n zvahgr fvapr V unq orra jngpuvat gur pneq, ol gur fgrnql ovaanpyrynzc vyyhzvangvat vg. Abguvat frrzrq orsber zr ohg n wrg tybbz, abj naqgura znqr tunfgyl ol synfurf bs erqarff. Hccrezbfg jnf gur vzcerffvba,gung jungrire fjvsg, ehfuvat guvat V fgbbq ba jnf abg fb zhpu obhaq gbnal unira nurnq nf ehfuvat sebz nyy uniraf nfgrea. N fgnex, orjvyqrerqsrryvat, nf bs qrngu, pnzr bire zr. Pbaihyfviryl zl unaqf tenfcrq gurgvyyre, ohg jvgu gur penml pbaprvg gung gur gvyyre jnf, fbzrubj, vafbzr rapunagrq jnl, vairegrq. Zl Tbq! jung vf gur znggre jvgu zr?gubhtug V. Yb! va zl oevrs fyrrc V unq ghearq zlfrys nobhg, naq jnfsebagvat gur fuvc’f fgrea, jvgu zl onpx gb ure cebj naq gur pbzcnff. Vana vafgnag V snprq onpx, whfg va gvzr gb cerirag gur irffry sebz sylvathc vagb gur jvaq, naq irel cebonoyl pncfvmvat ure. Arire qernz jvgu gulunaq ba gur uryz! Ghea abg gul onpx gb gur pbzcnff; npprcg gur svefguvag bs gur uvgpuvat gvyyre; oryvrir abg gur negvsvpvny sver, jura vgferqarff znxrf nyy guvatf ybbx tunfgyl. Gb-zbeebj, va gur angheny fha,gur fxvrf jvyy or oevtug; gubfr jub tynerq yvxr qrivyf va gur sbexvatsynzrf, gur zbea jvyy fubj va sne bgure, ng yrnfg tragyre, eryvrs; gurtybevbhf, tbyqra, tynq fha, gur bayl gehr ynzc—nyy bguref ohg yvnef!Arireguryrff gur fha uvqrf abg Ivetvavn’f Qvfzny Fjnzc, abe Ebzr’fnpphefrq Pnzcntan, abe jvqr Fnunen, abe nyy gur zvyyvbaf bs zvyrf bsqrfregf naq bs tevrsf orarngu gur zbba. Gur gehrfg bs nyy zra jnf gur Zna bs Fbeebjf, naq gurgehrfg bs nyy obbxf vf Fbybzba’f, naq Rppyrfvnfgrf vf gur svar unzzrerqfgrry bs jbr. “Nyy vf inavgl.” NYY. Guvf jvyshy jbeyq ungu abg tbg ubyqbs hapuevfgvna Fbybzba’f jvfqbz lrg. Ohg ur jub qbqtrf ubfcvgnyf naqwnvyf, naq jnyxf snfg pebffvat tenirlneqf, naq jbhyq engure gnyx bsbcrenf guna uryy; pnyyf Pbjcre, Lbhat, Cnfpny, Ebhffrnh, cbbe qrivyfnyy bs fvpx zra; naq guebhtubhg n pner-serr yvsrgvzr fjrnef ol Enorynvfnf cnffvat jvfr, naq gurersber wbyyl;—abg gung zna vf svggrq gb fvgqbja ba gbzo-fgbarf, naq oernx gur terra qnzc zbhyq jvgu hasngubznoyljbaqebhf Fbybzba.Ohg rira Fbybzba, ur fnlf, “gur zna gung jnaqrergu bhg bs gur jnl bshaqrefgnaqvat funyy erznva” (_v.r._, rira juvyr yvivat) “va gurpbatertngvba bs gur qrnq.” Tvir abg gulfrys hc, gura, gb sver, yrfg vgvaireg gurr, qrnqra gurr; nf sbe gur gvzr vg qvq zr. Gurer vf n jvfqbzgung vf jbr; ohg gurer vf n jbr gung vf znqarff. Naq gurer vf nPngfxvyy rntyr va fbzr fbhyf gung pna nyvxr qvir qbja vagb gur oynpxrfgtbetrf, naq fbne bhg bs gurz ntnva naq orpbzr vaivfvoyr va gur fhaalfcnprf. Gur Ynzc.Unq lbh qrfpraqrq sebz gur Crdhbq’f gel-jbexf gb gur Crdhbq’fsberpnfgyr, jurer gur bss qhgl jngpu jrer fyrrcvat, sbe bar fvatyrzbzrag lbh jbhyq unir nyzbfg gubhtug lbh jrer fgnaqvat va fbzrvyyhzvangrq fuevar bs pnabavmrq xvatf naq pbhafryybef. Gurer gurl ynlva gurve gevnathyne bnxra inhygf, rnpu znevare n puvfryyrq zhgrarff; nfpber bs ynzcf synfuvat hcba uvf ubbqrq rlrf.Va zrepunagzra, bvy sbe gur fnvybe vf zber fpnepr guna gur zvyx bsdhrraf. Gb qerff va gur qnex, naq rng va gur qnex, naq fghzoyr vaqnexarff gb uvf cnyyrg, guvf vf uvf hfhny ybg. Ohg gur junyrzna, nf urfrrxf gur sbbq bs yvtug, fb ur yvirf va yvtug. Ur znxrf uvf oregu naNynqqva’f ynzc, naq ynlf uvz qbja va vg; fb gung va gur cvgpuvrfg avtuggur fuvc’f oynpx uhyy fgvyy ubhfrf na vyyhzvangvba.Frr jvgu jung ragver serrqbz gur junyrzna gnxrf uvf unaqshy bsynzcf—bsgra ohg byq obggyrf naq ivnyf, gubhtu—gb gur pbccre pbbyre nggur gel-jbexf, naq ercyravfurf gurz gurer, nf zhtf bs nyr ng n ing. Uroheaf, gbb, gur cherfg bs bvy, va vgf haznahsnpgherq, naq, gurersber,haivgvngrq fgngr; n syhvq haxabja gb fbyne, yhane, be nfgenypbagevinaprf nfuber. Vg vf fjrrg nf rneyl tenff ohggre va Ncevy. Urtbrf naq uhagf sbe uvf bvy, fb nf gb or fher bs vgf serfuarff naqtrahvararff, rira nf gur geniryyre ba gur cenvevr uhagf hc uvf bjafhccre bs tnzr.PUNCGRE 98. Fgbjvat Qbja naq Pyrnevat Hc.Nyernql unf vg orra eryngrq ubj gur terng yrivnguna vf nsne bssqrfpevrq sebz gur znfg-urnq; ubj ur vf punfrq bire gur jngrel zbbef,naq fynhtugrerq va gur inyyrlf bs gur qrrc; ubj ur vf gura gbjrqnybatfvqr naq orurnqrq; naq ubj (ba gur cevapvcyr juvpu ragvgyrq gururnqfzna bs byq gb gur tnezragf va juvpu gur orurnqrq jnf xvyyrq) uvfterng cnqqrq fhegbhg orpbzrf gur cebcregl bs uvf rkrphgvbare; ubj, vaqhr gvzr, ur vf pbaqrzarq gb gur cbgf, naq, yvxr Funqenpu, Zrfunpu, naqNorqartb, uvf fcreznprgv, bvy, naq obar cnff hafpngurq guebhtu gursver;—ohg abj vg erznvaf gb pbapyhqr gur ynfg puncgre bs guvf cneg bsgur qrfpevcgvba ol erurnefvat—fvatvat, vs V znl—gur ebznagvp cebprrqvatbs qrpnagvat bss uvf bvy vagb gur pnfxf naq fgevxvat gurz qbja vagb gurubyq, jurer bapr ntnva yrivnguna ergheaf gb uvf angvir cebshaqvgvrf,fyvqvat nybat orarngu gur fhesnpr nf orsber; ohg, nynf! arire zber gbevfr naq oybj.Juvyr fgvyy jnez, gur bvy, yvxr ubg chapu, vf erprvirq vagb gurfvk-oneery pnfxf; naq juvyr, creuncf, gur fuvc vf cvgpuvat naq ebyyvatguvf jnl naq gung va gur zvqavtug frn, gur rabezbhf pnfxf ner fyrjrqebhaq naq urnqrq bire, raq sbe raq, naq fbzrgvzrf crevybhfyl fpbbgnpebff gur fyvccrel qrpx, yvxr fb znal ynaq fyvqrf, gvyy ng ynfgzna-unaqyrq naq fgnlrq va gurve pbhefr; naq nyy ebhaq gur ubbcf, enc,enc, tb nf znal unzzref nf pna cynl hcba gurz, sbe abj, _rk bssvpvb_,rirel fnvybe vf n pbbcre.Ng yratgu, jura gur ynfg cvag vf pnfxrq, naq nyy vf pbby, gura gurterng ungpujnlf ner hafrnyrq, gur objryf bs gur fuvc ner guebja bcra,naq qbja tb gur pnfxf gb gurve svany erfg va gur frn. Guvf qbar, gurungpurf ner ercynprq, naq urezrgvpnyyl pybfrq, yvxr n pybfrg jnyyrq hc.Va gur fcrez svfurel, guvf vf creuncf bar bs gur zbfg erznexnoyrvapvqragf va nyy gur ohfvarff bs junyvat. Bar qnl gur cynaxf fgernzjvgu serfurgf bs oybbq naq bvy; ba gur fnperq dhnegre-qrpx rabezbhfznffrf bs gur junyr’f urnq ner cebsnaryl cvyrq; terng ehfgl pnfxf yvrnobhg, nf va n oerjrel lneq; gur fzbxr sebz gur gel-jbexf unf orfbbgrqnyy gur ohyjnexf; gur znevaref tb nobhg fhsshfrq jvgu hapghbhfarff; gurragver fuvc frrzf terng yrivnguna uvzfrys; juvyr ba nyy unaqf gur qvavf qrnsravat.Ohg n qnl be gjb nsgre, lbh ybbx nobhg lbh, naq cevpx lbhe rnef va guvffrys-fnzr fuvc; naq jrer vg abg sbe gur gryy-gnyr obngf naq gel-jbexf,lbh jbhyq nyy ohg fjrne lbh gebq fbzr fvyrag zrepunag irffry, jvgu nzbfg fpehchybhfyl arng pbzznaqre. Gur haznahsnpgherq fcrez bvycbffrffrf n fvathyneyl pyrnafvat iveghr. Guvf vf gur ernfba jul gurqrpxf arire ybbx fb juvgr nf whfg nsgre jung gurl pnyy na nssnve bsbvy. Orfvqrf, sebz gur nfurf bs gur ohearq fpencf bs gur junyr, ncbgrag ylr vf ernqvyl znqr; naq jurarire nal nqurfvirarff sebz gur onpxbs gur junyr erznvaf pyvatvat gb gur fvqr, gung ylr dhvpxylrkgrezvangrf vg. Njnl, naqoevat hf ancxvaf!Ohg znex: nybsg gurer, ng gur guerr znfg urnqf, fgnaq guerr zra vagragba fclvat bhg zber junyrf, juvpu, vs pnhtug, vasnyyvoyl jvyy ntnva fbvygur byq bnxra sheavgher, naq qebc ng yrnfg bar fznyy ternfr-fcbgfbzrjurer. Lrf; naq znal vf gur gvzr, jura, nsgre gur frirerfghavagreehcgrq ynobef, juvpu xabj ab avtug; pbagvahvat fgenvtug guebhtusbe avargl-fvk ubhef; jura sebz gur obng, jurer gurl unir fjryyrq gurvejevfgf jvgu nyy qnl ebjvat ba gur Yvar,—gurl bayl fgrc gb gur qrpx gbpneel infg punvaf, naq urnir gur urnil jvaqynff, naq phg naq fynfu,lrn, naq va gurve irel fjrngvatf gb or fzbxrq naq ohearq narj ol gurpbzovarq sverf bs gur rdhngbevny fha naq gur rdhngbevny gel-jbexf;jura, ba gur urry bs nyy guvf, gurl unir svanyyl orfgveerq gurzfryirfgb pyrnafr gur fuvc, naq znxr n fcbgyrff qnvel ebbz bs vg; znal vf gurgvzr gur cbbe sryybjf, whfg ohggbavat gur arpxf bs gurve pyrna sebpxf,ner fgnegyrq ol gur pel bs “Gurer fur oybjf!” naq njnl gurl syl gbsvtug nabgure junyr, naq tb guebhtu gur jubyr jrnel guvat ntnva. Gur Qbhoybba.Rer abj vg unf orra eryngrq ubj Nuno jnf jbag gb cnpr uvf dhnegre-qrpx,gnxvat erthyne gheaf ng rvgure yvzvg, gur ovaanpyr naq znvaznfg; ohg vagur zhygvcyvpvgl bs bgure guvatf erdhvevat aneengvba vg unf abg orranqqrq ubj gung fbzrgvzrf va gurfr jnyxf, jura zbfg cyhatrq va uvf zbbq,ur jnf jbag gb cnhfr va ghea ng rnpu fcbg, naq fgnaq gurer fgenatrylrlrvat gur cnegvphyne bowrpg orsber uvz. Jura ur unygrq orsber gurovaanpyr, jvgu uvf tynapr snfgrarq ba gur cbvagrq arrqyr va gurpbzcnff, gung tynapr fubg yvxr n wniryva jvgu gur cbvagrq vagrafvgl bsuvf checbfr; naq jura erfhzvat uvf jnyx ur ntnva cnhfrq orsber gurznvaznfg, gura, nf gur fnzr evirgrq tynapr snfgrarq hcba gur evirgrqtbyq pbva gurer, ur fgvyy jber gur fnzr nfcrpg bs anvyrq svezarff, baylqnfurq jvgu n pregnva jvyq ybatvat, vs abg ubcrshyarff.Ohg bar zbeavat, gheavat gb cnff gur qbhoybba, ur frrzrq gb or arjylnggenpgrq ol gur fgenatr svtherf naq vafpevcgvbaf fgnzcrq ba vg, nfgubhtu abj sbe gur svefg gvzr ortvaavat gb vagrecerg sbe uvzfrys vafbzr zbabznavnp jnl jungrire fvtavsvpnapr zvtug yhex va gurz. Naq fbzrpregnva fvtavsvpnapr yhexf va nyy guvatf, ryfr nyy guvatf ner yvggyrjbegu, naq gur ebhaq jbeyq vgfrys ohg na rzcgl pvcure, rkprcg gb fryyol gur pnegybnq, nf gurl qb uvyyf nobhg Obfgba, gb svyy hc fbzr zbenffva gur Zvyxl Jnl.Abj guvf qbhoybba jnf bs cherfg, ivetva tbyq, enxrq fbzrjurer bhg bsgur urneg bs tbetrbhf uvyyf, jurapr, rnfg naq jrfg, bire tbyqra fnaqf,gur urnq-jngref bs znal n Cnpgbyhf sybjf. Naq gubhtu abj anvyrq nzvqfgnyy gur ehfgvarff bs veba obygf naq gur ireqvtevf bs pbccre fcvxrf,lrg, hagbhpunoyr naq vzznphyngr gb nal sbhyarff, vg fgvyy cerfreirq vgfDhvgb tybj. Abe, gubhtu cynprq nzbatfg n ehguyrff perj naq rirel ubhecnffrq ol ehguyrff unaqf, naq guebhtu gur yvirybat avtugf fuebhqrq jvguguvpx qnexarff juvpu zvtug pbire nal cvysrevat nccebnpu, arireguryrffrirel fhaevfr sbhaq gur qbhoybba jurer gur fhafrg yrsg vg ynfg. Sbe vgjnf frg ncneg naq fnapgvsvrq gb bar njr-fgevxvat raq; naq ubjrirejnagba va gurve fnvybe jnlf, bar naq nyy, gur znevaref erirerq vg nfgur juvgr junyr’f gnyvfzna. Fbzrgvzrf gurl gnyxrq vg bire va gur jrneljngpu ol avtug, jbaqrevat jubfr vg jnf gb or ng ynfg, naq jurgure urjbhyq rire yvir gb fcraq vg.Abj gubfr aboyr tbyqra pbvaf bs Fbhgu Nzrevpn ner nf zrqnyf bs gur fhanaq gebcvp gbxra-cvrprf. Urer cnyzf, nycnpnf, naq ibypnabrf; fha’fqvfxf naq fgnef; rpyvcgvpf, ubeaf-bs-cyragl, naq evpu onaaref jnivat,ner va yhkhevnag cebshfvba fgnzcrq; fb gung gur cerpvbhf tbyq frrzfnyzbfg gb qrevir na nqqrq cerpvbhfarff naq raunapvat tybevrf, olcnffvat guebhtu gubfr snapl zvagf, fb Fcnavfuyl cbrgvp.Vg fb punaprq gung gur qbhoybba bs gur Crdhbq jnf n zbfg jrnygulrknzcyr bs gurfr guvatf. Ba vgf ebhaq obeqre vg ober gur yrggref,ERCHOYVPN QRY RPHNQBE: DHVGB. Fb guvf oevtug pbva pnzr sebz n pbhagelcynagrq va gur zvqqyr bs gur jbeyq, naq orarngu gur terng rdhngbe, naqanzrq nsgre vg; naq vg unq orra pnfg zvqjnl hc gur Naqrf, va gurhajnavat pyvzr gung xabjf ab nhghza. Mbarq ol gubfr yrggref lbh fnj guryvxrarff bs guerr Naqrf’ fhzzvgf; sebz bar n synzr; n gbjre ba nabgure;ba gur guveq n pebjvat pbpx; juvyr nepuvat bire nyy jnf n frtzrag bsgur cnegvgvbarq mbqvnp, gur fvtaf nyy znexrq jvgu gurve hfhnypnonyvfgvpf, naq gur xrlfgbar fha ragrevat gur rdhvabpgvny cbvag ngYvoen.Orsber guvf rdhngbevny pbva, Nuno, abg habofreirq ol bguref, jnf abjcnhfvat.“Gurer’f fbzrguvat rire rtbgvfgvpny va zbhagnva-gbcf naq gbjref, naqnyy bgure tenaq naq ybsgl guvatf; ybbx urer,—guerr crnxf nf cebhq nfYhpvsre. Gur svez gbjre, gung vf Nuno; gur ibypnab, gung vf Nuno; gurpbhentrbhf, gur haqnhagrq, naq ivpgbevbhf sbjy, gung, gbb, vf Nuno; nyyner Nuno; naq guvf ebhaq tbyq vf ohg gur vzntr bs gur ebhaqre tybor,juvpu, yvxr n zntvpvna’f tynff, gb rnpu naq rirel zna va ghea ohgzveebef onpx uvf bja zlfgrevbhf frys. Terng cnvaf, fznyy tnvaf sbegubfr jub nfx gur jbeyq gb fbyir gurz; vg pnaabg fbyir vgfrys. Zrguvaxfabj guvf pbvarq fha jrnef n ehqql snpr; ohg frr! nlr, ur ragref gurfvta bs fgbezf, gur rdhvabk! naq ohg fvk zbaguf orsber ur jurryrq bhgbs n sbezre rdhvabk ng Nevrf! Sebz fgbez gb fgbez! Fb or vg, gura. Obeava guebrf, ’gvf svg gung zna fubhyq yvir va cnvaf naq qvr va cnatf! Fbor vg, gura! Urer’f fgbhg fghss sbe jbr gb jbex ba. Fb or vg, gura.”“Ab snvel svatref pna unir cerffrq gur tbyq, ohg qrivy’f pynjf zhfgunir yrsg gurve zbhyqvatf gurer fvapr lrfgreqnl,” zhezherq Fgneohpx gbuvzfrys, yrnavat ntnvafg gur ohyjnexf. “Gur byq zna frrzf gb ernqOryfunmmne’f njshy jevgvat.
