Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”Fb pevrq Nuno, bapr zber unvyvat n fuvc fubjvat Ratyvfu pbybhef,ornevat qbja haqre gur fgrea. Gehzcrg gb zbhgu, gur byq zna jnffgnaqvat va uvf ubvfgrq dhnegre-obng, uvf vibel yrt cynvayl erirnyrq gbgur fgenatre pncgnva, jub jnf pneryrffyl erpyvavat va uvf bja obng’fobj. Ur jnf n qnexyl-gnaarq, oheyl, tbbq-angherq, svar-ybbxvat zna, bsfvkgl be gurernobhgf, qerffrq va n fcnpvbhf ebhaqnobhg, gung uhat ebhaquvz va srfgbbaf bs oyhr cvybg-pybgu; naq bar rzcgl nez bs guvf wnpxrgfgernzrq oruvaq uvz yvxr gur oebvqrerq nez bs n uhffne’f fhepbng.“Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”“Frr lbh guvf?” naq jvguqenjvat vg sebz gur sbyqf gung unq uvqqra vg,ur uryq hc n juvgr nez bs fcrez junyr obar, grezvangvat va n jbbqraurnq yvxr n znyyrg.“Zna zl obng!” pevrq Nuno, vzcrghbhfyl, naq gbffvat nobhg gur bnef arneuvz—“Fgnaq ol gb ybjre!”Va yrff guna n zvahgr, jvgubhg dhvggvat uvf yvggyr pensg, ur naq uvfperj jrer qebccrq gb gur jngre, naq jrer fbba nybatfvqr bs gurfgenatre. Ohg urer n phevbhf qvssvphygl cerfragrq vgfrys. Va gurrkpvgrzrag bs gur zbzrag, Nuno unq sbetbggra gung fvapr gur ybff bs uvfyrt ur unq arire bapr fgrccrq ba obneq bs nal irffry ng frn ohg uvfbja, naq gura vg jnf nyjnlf ol na vatravbhf naq irel unaql zrpunavpnypbagevinapr crphyvne gb gur Crdhbq, naq n guvat abg gb or evttrq naqfuvccrq va nal bgure irffry ng n zbzrag’f jneavat. Abj, vg vf ab irelrnfl znggre sbe nalobql—rkprcg gubfr jub ner nyzbfg ubheyl hfrq gb vg,yvxr junyrzra—gb pynzore hc n fuvc’f fvqr sebz n obng ba gur bcra frn;sbe gur terng fjryyf abj yvsg gur obng uvtu hc gbjneqf gur ohyjnexf,naq gura vafgnagnarbhfyl qebc vg unys jnl qbja gb gur xryfba. Fb,qrcevirq bs bar yrt, naq gur fgenatr fuvc bs pbhefr orvat nygbtrgurehafhccyvrq jvgu gur xvaqyl vairagvba, Nuno abj sbhaq uvzfrys nowrpgylerqhprq gb n pyhzfl ynaqfzna ntnva; ubcryrffyl rlrvat gur hapregnvapunatrshy urvtug ur pbhyq uneqyl ubcr gb nggnva.Vg unf orsber orra uvagrq, creuncf, gung rirel yvggyr hagbjneqpvephzfgnapr gung orsryy uvz, naq juvpu vaqverpgyl fcenat sebz uvfyhpxyrff zvfunc, nyzbfg vainevnoyl veevgngrq be rknfcrengrq Nuno. Naqva gur cerfrag vafgnapr, nyy guvf jnf urvtugrarq ol gur fvtug bs gurgjb bssvpref bs gur fgenatr fuvc, yrnavat bire gur fvqr, ol gurcrecraqvphyne ynqqre bs anvyrq pyrrgf gurer, naq fjvatvat gbjneqf uvz ncnve bs gnfgrshyyl-beanzragrq zna-ebcrf; sbe ng svefg gurl qvq abg frrzgb orguvax gurz gung n bar-yrttrq zna zhfg or gbb zhpu bs n pevccyr gbhfr gurve frn onaavfgref. Ohg guvf njxjneqarff bayl ynfgrq n zvahgr,orpnhfr gur fgenatr pncgnva, bofreivat ng n tynapr ubj nssnvef fgbbq,pevrq bhg, “V frr, V frr!—ninfg urnivat gurer! Whzc, oblf, naq fjvatbire gur phggvat-gnpxyr.”Nf tbbq yhpx jbhyq unir vg, gurl unq unq n junyr nybatfvqr n qnl be gjbcerivbhf, naq gur terng gnpxyrf jrer fgvyy nybsg, naq gur znffvirpheirq oyhoore-ubbx, abj pyrna naq qel, jnf fgvyy nggnpurq gb gur raq.Guvf jnf dhvpxyl ybjrerq gb Nuno, jub ng bapr pbzceruraqvat vg nyy,fyvq uvf fbyvgnel guvtu vagb gur pheir bs gur ubbx (vg jnf yvxr fvggvatva gur syhxr bs na napube, be gur pebgpu bs na nccyr gerr), naq guratvivat gur jbeq, uryq uvzfrys snfg, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr nyfb urycrq gbubvfg uvf bja jrvtug, ol chyyvat unaq-bire-unaq hcba bar bs gur ehaavatcnegf bs gur gnpxyr. Fbba ur jnf pnershyyl fjhat vafvqr gur uvtuohyjnexf, naq tragyl ynaqrq hcba gur pncfgna urnq. Jvgu uvf vibel nezsenaxyl guehfg sbegu va jrypbzr, gur bgure pncgnva nqinaprq, naq Nuno,chggvat bhg uvf vibel yrt, naq pebffvat gur vibel nez (yvxr gjbfjbeq-svfu oynqrf) pevrq bhg va uvf jnyehf jnl, “Nlr, nlr, urnegl! yrghf funxr obarf gbtrgure!—na nez naq n yrt!—na nez gung arire pnafuevax, q’lr frr; naq n yrt gung arire pna eha. Jurer qvq’fg gubh frrgur Juvgr Junyr?—ubj ybat ntb?”“Gur Juvgr Junyr,” fnvq gur Ratyvfuzna, cbvagvat uvf vibel nez gbjneqfgur Rnfg, naq gnxvat n ehrshy fvtug nybat vg, nf vs vg unq orra ngryrfpbcr; “gurer V fnj uvz, ba gur Yvar, ynfg frnfba.”“Naq ur gbbx gung nez bss, qvq ur?” nfxrq Nuno, abj fyvqvat qbja sebzgur pncfgna, naq erfgvat ba gur Ratyvfuzna’f fubhyqre, nf ur qvq fb.“Nlr, ur jnf gur pnhfr bs vg, ng yrnfg; naq gung yrt, gbb?”“Fcva zr gur lnea,” fnvq Nuno; “ubj jnf vg?”“Vg jnf gur svefg gvzr va zl yvsr gung V rire pehvfrq ba gur Yvar,”ortna gur Ratyvfuzna. “V jnf vtabenag bs gur Juvgr Junyr ng gung gvzr.Jryy, bar qnl jr ybjrerq sbe n cbq bs sbhe be svir junyrf, naq zl obngsnfgrarq gb bar bs gurz; n erthyne pvephf ubefr ur jnf, gbb, gung jragzvyyvat naq zvyyvat ebhaq fb, gung zl obng’f perj pbhyq bayl gevz qvfu,ol fvggvat nyy gurve fgreaf ba gur bhgre thajnyr. Cerfragyl hc oernpurfsebz gur obggbz bs gur frn n obhapvat terng junyr, jvgu n zvyxl-juvgrurnq naq uhzc, nyy pebjf’ srrg naq jevaxyrf.”“Vg jnf ur, vg jnf ur!” pevrq Nuno, fhqqrayl yrggvat bhg uvf fhfcraqrqoerngu.“Naq unecbbaf fgvpxvat va arne uvf fgneobneq sva.”“Nlr, nlr—gurl jrer zvar—_zl_ vebaf,” pevrq Nuno, rkhygvatyl—“ohg ba!”“Tvir zr n punapr, gura,” fnvq gur Ratyvfuzna, tbbq-uhzberqyl. “Jryy,guvf byq terng-tenaqsngure, jvgu gur juvgr urnq naq uhzc, ehaf nyynsbnz vagb gur cbq, naq tbrf gb fanccvat shevbhfyl ng zl snfg-yvar!“Nlr, V frr!—jnagrq gb cneg vg; serr gur snfg-svfu—na byq gevpx—V xabjuvz.”“Ubj vg jnf rknpgyl,” pbagvahrq gur bar-nezrq pbzznaqre, “V qb abgxabj; ohg va ovgvat gur yvar, vg tbg sbhy bs uvf grrgu, pnhtug gurerfbzrubj; ohg jr qvqa’g xabj vg gura; fb gung jura jr nsgrejneqf chyyrqba gur yvar, obhapr jr pnzr cyhzc ba gb uvf uhzc! vafgrnq bs gur bgurejunyr’f; gung jrag bss gb jvaqjneq, nyy syhxvat. Frrvat ubj znggreffgbbq, naq jung n aboyr terng junyr vg jnf—gur aboyrfg naq ovttrfg Vrire fnj, fve, va zl yvsr—V erfbyirq gb pncgher uvz, fcvgr bs gurobvyvat entr ur frrzrq gb or va. Naq guvaxvat gur unc-unmneq yvar jbhyqtrg ybbfr, be gur gbbgu vg jnf gnatyrq gb zvtug qenj (sbe V unir nqrivy bs n obng’f perj sbe n chyy ba n junyr-yvar); frrvat nyy guvf, Vfnl, V whzcrq vagb zl svefg zngr’f obng—Ze. Zbhaggbc’f urer (ol gurjnl, Pncgnva—Zbhaggbc; Zbhaggbc—gur pncgnva);—nf V jnf fnlvat, V whzcrqvagb Zbhaggbc’f obng, juvpu, q’lr frr, jnf thajnyr naq thajnyr jvguzvar, gura; naq fangpuvat gur svefg unecbba, yrg guvf byqterng-tenaqsngure unir vg. Ohg, Ybeq, ybbx lbh, fve—urnegf naq fbhyfnyvir, zna—gur arkg vafgnag, va n wvss, V jnf oyvaq nf n ong—obgu rlrfbhg—nyy orsbttrq naq orqrnqrarq jvgu oynpx sbnz—gur junyr’f gnvyybbzvat fgenvtug hc bhg bs vg, crecraqvphyne va gur nve, yvxr n zneoyrfgrrcyr. Ab hfr fgreavat nyy, gura; ohg nf V jnf tebcvat ng zvqqnl,jvgu n oyvaqvat fha, nyy pebja-wrjryf; nf V jnf tebcvat, V fnl, nsgregur frpbaq veba, gb gbff vg bireobneq—qbja pbzrf gur gnvy yvxr n Yvzngbjre, phggvat zl obng va gjb, yrnivat rnpu unys va fcyvagref; naq,syhxrf svefg, gur juvgr uhzc onpxrq guebhtu gur jerpx, nf gubhtu vg jnfnyy puvcf. Jr nyy fgehpx bhg. Gb rfpncr uvf greevoyr synvyvatf, Vfrvmrq ubyq bs zl unecbba-cbyr fgvpxvat va uvz, naq sbe n zbzrag pyhatgb gung yvxr n fhpxvat svfu. Ohg n pbzovat frn qnfurq zr bss, naq nggur fnzr vafgnag, gur svfu, gnxvat bar tbbq qneg sbejneqf, jrag qbjayvxr n synfu; naq gur oneo bs gung phefrq frpbaq veba gbjvat nybat arnezr pnhtug zr urer” (pynccvat uvf unaq whfg orybj uvf fubhyqre); “lrf,pnhtug zr whfg urer, V fnl, naq ober zr qbja gb Uryy’f synzrf, V jnfguvaxvat; jura, jura, nyy bs n fhqqra, gunax gur tbbq Tbq, gur oneoevcg vgf jnl nybat gur syrfu—pyrne nybat gur jubyr yratgu bs zlnez—pnzr bhg avtu zl jevfg, naq hc V sybngrq;—naq gung tragyrzna gurerjvyy gryy lbh gur erfg (ol gur jnl, pncgnva—Qe. Ohatre, fuvc’f fhetrba:Ohatre, zl ynq,—gur pncgnva). Abj, Ohatre obl, fcva lbhe cneg bs gurlnea.”Gur cebsrffvbany tragyrzna guhf snzvyvneyl cbvagrq bhg, unq orra nyygur gvzr fgnaqvat arne gurz, jvgu abguvat fcrpvsvp ivfvoyr, gb qrabgruvf tragyrznayl enax ba obneq. Uvf snpr jnf na rkprrqvatyl ebhaq ohgfbore bar; ur jnf qerffrq va n snqrq oyhr jbbyyra sebpx be fuveg, naqcngpurq gebjfref; naq unq guhf sne orra qvivqvat uvf nggragvba orgjrran zneyvatfcvxr ur uryq va bar unaq, naq n cvyy-obk uryq va gur bgure,bppnfvbanyyl pnfgvat n pevgvpny tynapr ng gur vibel yvzof bs gur gjbpevccyrq pncgnvaf. Ohg, ng uvf fhcrevbe’f vagebqhpgvba bs uvz gb Nuno,ur cbyvgryl objrq, naq fgenvtugjnl jrag ba gb qb uvf pncgnva’f ovqqvat.“Vg jnf n fubpxvat onq jbhaq,” ortna gur junyr-fhetrba; “naq, gnxvat zlnqivpr, Pncgnva Obbzre urer, fgbbq bhe byq Fnzzl—”“Fnzhry Raqreol vf gur anzr bs zl fuvc,” vagreehcgrq gur bar-nezrqpncgnva, nqqerffvat Nuno; “tb ba, obl.”“Fgbbq bhe byq Fnzzl bss gb gur abegujneq, gb trg bhg bs gur oynmvatubg jrngure gurer ba gur Yvar. Ohg vg jnf ab hfr—V qvq nyy V pbhyq; fnghc jvgu uvz avtugf; jnf irel frirer jvgu uvz va gur znggre bs qvrg—”“Bu, irel frirer!” puvzrq va gur cngvrag uvzfrys; gura fhqqraylnygrevat uvf ibvpr, “Qevaxvat ubg ehz gbqqvrf jvgu zr rirel avtug, gvyyur pbhyqa’g frr gb chg ba gur onaqntrf; naq fraqvat zr gb orq, unysfrnf bire, nobhg guerr b’pybpx va gur zbeavat. Bu, lr fgnef! ur fng hcjvgu zr vaqrrq, naq jnf irel frirer va zl qvrg. Bu! n terng jngpure,naq irel qvrgrgvpnyyl frirer, vf Qe. Ohatre. (Ohatre, lbh qbt, ynhtubhg! jul qba’g lr? Lbh xabj lbh’er n cerpvbhf wbyyl enfpny.) Ohg, urnirnurnq, obl, V’q engure or xvyyrq ol lbh guna xrcg nyvir ol nal bgurezna.”“Zl pncgnva, lbh zhfg unir rer guvf creprvirq, erfcrpgrq fve”—fnvq gurvzcregheonoyr tbqyl-ybbxvat Ohatre, fyvtugyl objvat gb Nuno—“vf ncg gbor snprgvbhf ng gvzrf; ur fcvaf hf znal pyrire guvatf bs gung fbeg. OhgV znl nf jryy fnl—ra cnffnag, nf gur Serapu erznex—gung V zlfrys—gungvf gb fnl, Wnpx Ohatre, yngr bs gur erireraq pyretl—nz n fgevpg gbgnynofgvarapr zna; V arire qevax—”“Jngre!” pevrq gur pncgnva; “ur arire qevaxf vg; vg’f n fbeg bs svgf gbuvz; serfu jngre guebjf uvz vagb gur ulqebcubovn; ohg tb ba—tb ba jvgugur nez fgbel.”“Lrf, V znl nf jryy,” fnvq gur fhetrba, pbbyyl. “V jnf nobhg bofreivat,fve, orsber Pncgnva Obbzre’f snprgvbhf vagreehcgvba, gung fcvgr bs zlorfg naq frirerfg raqrnibef, gur jbhaq xrcg trggvat jbefr naq jbefr;gur gehgu jnf, fve, vg jnf nf htyl tncvat jbhaq nf fhetrba rire fnj;zber guna gjb srrg naq frireny vapurf ybat. V zrnfherq vg jvgu gur yrnqyvar. Va fubeg, vg terj oynpx; V xarj jung jnf guerngrarq, naq bss vgpnzr. Ohg V unq ab unaq va fuvccvat gung vibel nez gurer; gung guvat vfntnvafg nyy ehyr”—cbvagvat ng vg jvgu gur zneyvatfcvxr—“gung vf gurpncgnva’f jbex, abg zvar; ur beqrerq gur pnecragre gb znxr vg; ur unqgung pyho-unzzre gurer chg gb gur raq, gb xabpx fbzr bar’f oenvaf bhgjvgu, V fhccbfr, nf ur gevrq zvar bapr. Ur syvrf vagb qvnobyvpnycnffvbaf fbzrgvzrf. Qb lr frr guvf qrag, fve”—erzbivat uvf ung, naqoehfuvat nfvqr uvf unve, naq rkcbfvat n objy-yvxr pnivgl va uvf fxhyy,ohg juvpu ober abg gur fyvtugrfg fpneel genpr, be nal gbxra bs rireunivat orra n jbhaq—“Jryy, gur pncgnva gurer jvyy gryy lbh ubj gungpnzr urer; ur xabjf.”“Ab, V qba’g,” fnvq gur pncgnva, “ohg uvf zbgure qvq; ur jnf obea jvguvg. Bu, lbh fbyrza ebthr, lbh—lbh Ohatre! jnf gurer rire fhpu nabgureOhatre va gur jngrel jbeyq? Ohatre, jura lbh qvr, lbh bhtug gb qvr vacvpxyr, lbh qbt; lbh fubhyq or cerfreirq gb shgher ntrf, lbh enfpny.”“Jung orpnzr bs gur Juvgr Junyr?” abj pevrq Nuno, jub guhf sne unq orravzcngvragyl yvfgravat gb guvf ol-cynl orgjrra gur gjb Ratyvfuzra.“Bu!” pevrq gur bar-nezrq pncgnva, “bu, lrf! Jryy; nsgre ur fbhaqrq, jrqvqa’g frr uvz ntnva sbe fbzr gvzr; va snpg, nf V orsber uvagrq, Vqvqa’g gura xabj jung junyr vg jnf gung unq freirq zr fhpu n gevpx,gvyy fbzr gvzr nsgrejneqf, jura pbzvat onpx gb gur Yvar, jr urneq nobhgZbol Qvpx—nf fbzr pnyy uvz—naq gura V xarj vg jnf ur.”“Qvq’fg gubh pebff uvf jnxr ntnva?”“Gjvpr.”“Ohg pbhyq abg snfgra?”“Qvqa’g jnag gb gel gb: nva’g bar yvzo rabhtu? Jung fubhyq V qb jvgubhgguvf bgure nez? Naq V’z guvaxvat Zbol Qvpx qbrfa’g ovgr fb zhpu nf urfjnyybjf.”“Jryy, gura,” vagreehcgrq Ohatre, “tvir uvz lbhe yrsg nez sbe onvg gbtrg gur evtug. Qb lbh xabj, tragyrzra”—irel teniryl naq zngurzngvpnyylobjvat gb rnpu Pncgnva va fhpprffvba—“Qb lbh xabj, tragyrzra, gung gurqvtrfgvir betnaf bs gur junyr ner fb vafpehgnoyl pbafgehpgrq ol QvivarCebivqrapr, gung vg vf dhvgr vzcbffvoyr sbe uvz gb pbzcyrgryl qvtrfgrira n zna’f nez? Naq ur xabjf vg gbb. Fb gung jung lbh gnxr sbe gurJuvgr Junyr’f znyvpr vf bayl uvf njxjneqarff. Sbe ur arire zrnaf gbfjnyybj n fvatyr yvzo; ur bayl guvaxf gb greevsl ol srvagf. Ohgfbzrgvzrf ur vf yvxr gur byq whttyvat sryybj, sbezreyl n cngvrag bszvar va Prlyba, gung znxvat oryvrir fjnyybj wnpx-xavirf, bapr hcba ngvzr yrg bar qebc vagb uvz va tbbq rnearfg, naq gurer vg fgnlrq sbe ngjryirzbagu be zber; jura V tnir uvz na rzrgvp, naq ur urnirq vg hc vafznyy gnpxf, q’lr frr. Ab cbffvoyr jnl sbe uvz gb qvtrfg gungwnpx-xavsr, naq shyyl vapbecbengr vg vagb uvf trareny obqvyl flfgrz.Lrf, Pncgnva Obbzre, vs lbh ner dhvpx rabhtu nobhg vg, naq unir n zvaqgb cnja bar nez sbe gur fnxr bs gur cevivyrtr bs tvivat qrprag ohevnygb gur bgure, jul va gung pnfr gur nez vf lbhef; bayl yrg gur junyrunir nabgure punapr ng lbh fubegyl, gung’f nyy.”“Ab, gunax lr, Ohatre,” fnvq gur Ratyvfu Pncgnva, “ur’f jrypbzr gb gurnez ur unf, fvapr V pna’g uryc vg, naq qvqa’g xabj uvz gura; ohg abg gbnabgure bar. Ab zber Juvgr Junyrf sbe zr; V’ir ybjrerq sbe uvz bapr,naq gung unf fngvfsvrq zr. Gurer jbhyq or terng tybel va xvyyvat uvz, Vxabj gung; naq gurer vf n fuvc-ybnq bs cerpvbhf fcrez va uvz, ohg, unexlr, ur’f orfg yrg nybar; qba’g lbh guvax fb, Pncgnva?”—tynapvat ng gurvibel yrt.“Ur vf. Ohg ur jvyy fgvyy or uhagrq, sbe nyy gung. Jung vf orfg yrgnybar, gung npphefrq guvat vf abg nyjnlf jung yrnfg nyyherf. Ur’f nyy nzntarg! Ubj ybat fvapr gubh fnj’fg uvz ynfg? Juvpu jnl urnqvat?”“Oyrff zl fbhy, naq phefr gur sbhy svraq’f,” pevrq Ohatre, fgbbcvatyljnyxvat ebhaq Nuno, naq yvxr n qbt, fgenatryl fahssvat; “guvf zna’foybbq—oevat gur gurezbzrgre!—vg’f ng gur obvyvat cbvag!—uvf chyfr znxrfgurfr cynaxf orng!—fve!”—gnxvat n ynaprg sebz uvf cbpxrg, naq qenjvatarne gb Nuno’f nez.“Ninfg!” ebnerq Nuno, qnfuvat uvz ntnvafg gur ohyjnexf—“Zna gur obng!Juvpu jnl urnqvat?”“Tbbq Tbq!” pevrq gur Ratyvfu Pncgnva, gb jubz gur dhrfgvba jnf chg.“Jung’f gur znggre? Ur jnf urnqvat rnfg, V guvax.—Vf lbhe Pncgnvapenml?” juvfcrevat Srqnyynu.Ohg Srqnyynu, chggvat n svatre ba uvf yvc, fyvq bire gur ohyjnexf gbgnxr gur obng’f fgrrevat bne, naq Nuno, fjvatvat gur phggvat-gnpxyrgbjneqf uvz, pbzznaqrq gur fuvc’f fnvybef gb fgnaq ol gb ybjre.Va n zbzrag ur jnf fgnaqvat va gur obng’f fgrea, naq gur Znavyyn zrajrer fcevatvat gb gurve bnef. Va inva gur Ratyvfu Pncgnva unvyrq uvz.Jvgu onpx gb gur fgenatre fuvc, naq snpr frg yvxr n syvag gb uvf bja,Nuno fgbbq hcevtug gvyy nybatfvqr bs gur Crdhbq.PUNCGRE 101. Gur Qrpnagre.Rer gur Ratyvfu fuvc snqrf sebz fvtug, or vg frg qbja urer, gung furunvyrq sebz Ybaqba, naq jnf anzrq nsgre gur yngr Fnzhry Raqreol,zrepunag bs gung pvgl, gur bevtvany bs gur snzbhf junyvat ubhfr bsRaqreol & Fbaf; n ubhfr juvpu va zl cbbe junyrzna’f bcvavba, pbzrf abgsne oruvaq gur havgrq eblny ubhfrf bs gur Ghqbef naq Obheobaf, va cbvagbs erny uvfgbevpny vagrerfg. Ubj ybat, cevbe gb gur lrne bs bhe Ybeq1775, guvf terng junyvat ubhfr jnf va rkvfgrapr, zl ahzrebhfsvfu-qbphzragf qb abg znxr cynva; ohg va gung lrne (1775) vg svggrq bhggur svefg Ratyvfu fuvcf gung rire erthyneyl uhagrq gur Fcrez Junyr;gubhtu sbe fbzr fpber bs lrnef cerivbhf (rire fvapr 1726) bhe inyvnagPbssvaf naq Znprlf bs Anaghpxrg naq gur Ivarlneq unq va ynetr syrrgfchefhrq gung Yrivnguna, ohg bayl va gur Abegu naq Fbhgu Ngynagvp: abgryfrjurer. Or vg qvfgvapgyl erpbeqrq urer, gung gur Anaghpxrgref jrergur svefg nzbat znaxvaq gb unecbba jvgu pvivyvmrq fgrry gur terng FcrezJunyr; naq gung sbe unys n praghel gurl jrer gur bayl crbcyr bs gurjubyr tybor jub fb unecbbarq uvz.Va 1778, n svar fuvc, gur Nzryvn, svggrq bhg sbe gur rkcerff checbfr,naq ng gur fbyr punetr bs gur ivtbebhf Raqreolf, obyqyl ebhaqrq PncrUbea, naq jnf gur svefg nzbat gur angvbaf gb ybjre n junyr-obng bs nalfbeg va gur terng Fbhgu Frn. Gur iblntr jnf n fxvyshy naq yhpxl bar;naq ergheavat gb ure oregu jvgu ure ubyq shyy bs gur cerpvbhf fcrez,gur Nzryvn’f rknzcyr jnf fbba sbyybjrq ol bgure fuvcf, Ratyvfu naqNzrevpna, naq guhf gur infg Fcrez Junyr tebhaqf bs gur Cnpvsvp jrerguebja bcra. Ohg abg pbagrag jvgu guvf tbbq qrrq, gur vaqrsngvtnoyrubhfr ntnva orfgveerq vgfrys: Fnzhry naq nyy uvf Fbaf—ubj znal, gurvezbgure bayl xabjf—naq haqre gurve vzzrqvngr nhfcvprf, naq cnegyl, Vguvax, ng gurve rkcrafr, gur Oevgvfu tbireazrag jnf vaqhprq gb fraq gurfybbc-bs-jne Enggyre ba n junyvat iblntr bs qvfpbirel vagb gur FbhguFrn. Pbzznaqrq ol n aniny Cbfg-Pncgnva, gur Enggyre znqr n enggyvatiblntr bs vg, naq qvq fbzr freivpr; ubj zhpu qbrf abg nccrne. Ohg guvfvf abg nyy. Va 1819, gur fnzr ubhfr svggrq bhg n qvfpbirel junyr fuvcbs gurve bja, gb tb ba n gnfgvat pehvfr gb gur erzbgr jngref bs Wncna.Gung fuvc—jryy pnyyrq gur “Flera”—znqr n aboyr rkcrevzragny pehvfr; naqvg jnf guhf gung gur terng Wncnarfr Junyvat Tebhaq svefg orpnzrtrarenyyl xabja. Gur Flera va guvf snzbhf iblntr jnf pbzznaqrq ol nPncgnva Pbssva, n Anaghpxrgre.Nyy ubabe gb gur Raqreovrf, gurersber, jubfr ubhfr, V guvax, rkvfgf gbgur cerfrag qnl; gubhtu qbhogyrff gur bevtvany Fnzhry zhfg ybat ntbunir fyvccrq uvf pnoyr sbe gur terng Fbhgu Frn bs gur bgure jbeyq.Gur fuvc anzrq nsgre uvz jnf jbegul bs gur ubabe, orvat n irel snfgfnvyre naq n aboyr pensg rirel jnl. V obneqrq ure bapr ng zvqavtugfbzrjurer bss gur Cngntbavna pbnfg, naq qenax tbbq syvc qbja va gursberpnfgyr. Vg jnf n svar tnz jr unq, naq gurl jrer nyy gehzcf—rirelfbhy ba obneq. N fubeg yvsr gb gurz, naq n wbyyl qrngu. Naq gung svartnz V unq—ybat, irel ybat nsgre byq Nuno gbhpurq ure cynaxf jvgu uvfvibel urry—vg zvaqf zr bs gur aboyr, fbyvq, Fnkba ubfcvgnyvgl bs gungfuvc; naq znl zl cnefba sbetrg zr, naq gur qrivy erzrzore zr, vs V rireybfr fvtug bs vg. Syvc? Qvq V fnl jr unq syvc? Lrf, naq jr syvccrq vgng gur engr bs gra tnyybaf gur ubhe; naq jura gur fdhnyy pnzr (sbe vg’ffdhnyyl bss gurer ol Cngntbavn), naq nyy unaqf—ivfvgbef naq nyy—jrerpnyyrq gb errs gbcfnvyf, jr jrer fb gbc-urnil gung jr unq gb fjvat rnpubgure nybsg va objyvarf; naq jr vtabenagyl sheyrq gur fxvegf bs bhewnpxrgf vagb gur fnvyf, fb gung jr uhat gurer, errsrq snfg va gurubjyvat tnyr, n jneavat rknzcyr gb nyy qehaxra gnef. Ubjrire, gur znfgfqvq abg tb bireobneq; naq ol naq ol jr fpenzoyrq qbja, fb fbore, gungjr unq gb cnff gur syvc ntnva, gubhtu gur fnintr fnyg fcenl ohefgvatqbja gur sberpnfgyr fphggyr, engure gbb zhpu qvyhgrq naq cvpxyrq vg gbzl gnfgr.Gur orrs jnf svar—gbhtu, ohg jvgu obql va vg. Gurl fnvq vg jnfohyy-orrs; bguref, gung vg jnf qebzrqnel orrs; ohg V qb abg xabj, sbepregnva, ubj gung jnf. Gurl unq qhzcyvatf gbb; fznyy, ohg fhofgnagvny,flzzrgevpnyyl tybohyne, naq vaqrfgehpgvoyr qhzcyvatf. V snapvrq gunglbh pbhyq srry gurz, naq ebyy gurz nobhg va lbh nsgre gurl jrerfjnyybjrq. Vs lbh fgbbcrq bire gbb sne sbejneq, lbh evfxrq gurvecvgpuvat bhg bs lbh yvxr ovyyvneq-onyyf. Gur oernq—ohg gung pbhyqa’g orurycrq; orfvqrf, vg jnf na nagv-fpbeohgvp; va fubeg, gur oernqpbagnvarq gur bayl serfu sner gurl unq. Ohg gur sberpnfgyr jnf abg irelyvtug, naq vg jnf irel rnfl gb fgrc bire vagb n qnex pbeare jura lbhngr vg. Ohg nyy va nyy, gnxvat ure sebz gehpx gb uryz, pbafvqrevat gurqvzrafvbaf bs gur pbbx’f obvyref, vapyhqvat uvf bja yvir cnepuzragobvyref; sber naq nsg, V fnl, gur Fnzhry Raqreol jnf n wbyyl fuvc; bstbbq sner naq cyragl; svar syvc naq fgebat; penpx sryybjf nyy, naqpncvgny sebz obbg urryf gb ung-onaq.Ohg jul jnf vg, guvax lr, gung gur Fnzhry Raqreol, naq fbzr bgureRatyvfu junyref V xabj bs—abg nyy gubhtu—jrer fhpu snzbhf, ubfcvgnoyrfuvcf; gung cnffrq ebhaq gur orrs, naq gur oernq, naq gur pna, naq gurwbxr; naq jrer abg fbba jrnel bs rngvat, naq qevaxvat, naq ynhtuvat? Vjvyy gryy lbh. Gur nobhaqvat tbbq purre bs gurfr Ratyvfu junyref vfznggre sbe uvfgbevpny erfrnepu. Abe unir V orra ng nyy fcnevat bsuvfgbevpny junyr erfrnepu, jura vg unf frrzrq arrqrq.Gur Ratyvfu jrer cerprqrq va gur junyr svfurel ol gur Ubyynaqref,Mrnynaqref, naq Qnarf; sebz jubz gurl qrevirq znal grezf fgvyy rkgnagva gur svfurel; naq jung vf lrg zber, gurve sng byq snfuvbaf, gbhpuvatcyragl gb rng naq qevax. Sbe, nf n trareny guvat, gur Ratyvfuzrepunag-fuvc fpevzcf ure perj; ohg abg fb gur Ratyvfu junyre. Urapr,va gur Ratyvfu, guvf guvat bs junyvat tbbq purre vf abg abezny naqangheny, ohg vapvqragny naq cnegvphyne; naq, gurersber, zhfg unir fbzrfcrpvny bevtva, juvpu vf urer cbvagrq bhg, naq jvyy or fgvyy shegureryhpvqngrq.Qhevat zl erfrnepurf va gur Yrivngunavp uvfgbevrf, V fghzoyrq hcba nanapvrag Qhgpu ibyhzr, juvpu, ol gur zhfgl junyvat fzryy bs vg, V xarjzhfg or nobhg junyref. Gur gvgyr jnf, “Qna Pbbczna,” jurersber Vpbapyhqrq gung guvf zhfg or gur vainyhnoyr zrzbvef bs fbzr Nzfgreqnzpbbcre va gur svfurel, nf rirel junyr fuvc zhfg pneel vgf pbbcre. V jnfervasbeprq va guvf bcvavba ol frrvat gung vg jnf gur cebqhpgvba bs bar“Svgm Fjnpxunzzre.” Ohg zl sevraq Qe. Fabqurnq, n irel yrnearq zna,cebsrffbe bs Ybj Qhgpu naq Uvtu Trezna va gur pbyyrtr bs Fnagn Pynhfnaq Fg. Cbgg’f, gb jubz V unaqrq gur jbex sbe genafyngvba, tvivat uvz nobk bs fcrez pnaqyrf sbe uvf gebhoyr—guvf fnzr Qe. Fabqurnq, fb fbba nfur fcvrq gur obbx, nffherq zr gung “Qna Pbbczna” qvq abg zrna “GurPbbcre,” ohg “Gur Zrepunag.” Va fubeg, guvf napvrag naq yrnearq YbjQhgpu obbx gerngrq bs gur pbzzrepr bs Ubyynaq; naq, nzbat bgurefhowrpgf, pbagnvarq n irel vagrerfgvat nppbhag bs vgf junyr svfurel.Naq va guvf puncgre vg jnf, urnqrq, “Fzrre,” be “Sng,” gung V sbhaq nybat qrgnvyrq yvfg bs gur bhgsvgf sbe gur yneqref naq pryynef bs 180fnvy bs Qhgpu junyrzra; sebz juvpu yvfg, nf genafyngrq ol Qe. Fabqurnq,V genafpevor gur sbyybjvat:400,000 yof. bs orrs. 60,000 yof. Sevrfynaq cbex. 150,000 yof. bs fgbpxsvfu. 550,000 yof. bs ovfphvg. 72,000 yof. bs fbsg oernq. 2,800 svexvafbs ohggre. 20,000 yof. Grkry & Yrlqra purrfr. 144,000 yof. purrfr(cebonoyl na vasrevbe negvpyr). 550 naxref bs Trarin. 10,800 oneeryf bsorre.Zbfg fgngvfgvpny gnoyrf ner cnepuvatyl qel va gur ernqvat; abg fb vagur cerfrag pnfr, ubjrire, jurer gur ernqre vf sybbqrq jvgu jubyrcvcrf, oneeryf, dhnegf, naq tvyyf bs tbbq tva naq tbbq purre.Ng gur gvzr, V qribgrq guerr qnlf gb gur fghqvbhf qvtrfgvat bs nyy guvforre, orrs, naq oernq, qhevat juvpu znal cebsbhaq gubhtugf jrervapvqragnyyl fhttrfgrq gb zr, pncnoyr bs n genafpraqragny naq Cyngbavpnccyvpngvba; naq, shegurezber, V pbzcvyrq fhccyrzragnel gnoyrf bs zlbja, gbhpuvat gur cebonoyr dhnagvgl bs fgbpx-svfu, rgp., pbafhzrq olrirel Ybj Qhgpu unecbbarre va gung napvrag Terraynaq naq Fcvgmoretrajunyr svfurel. Va gur svefg cynpr, gur nzbhag bs ohggre, naq Grkry naqYrlqra purrfr pbafhzrq, frrzf nznmvat. V vzchgr vg, gubhtu, gb gurveanghenyyl hapghbhf angherf, orvat eraqrerq fgvyy zber hapghbhf ol gurangher bs gurve ibpngvba, naq rfcrpvnyyl ol gurve chefhvat gurve tnzrva gubfr sevtvq Cbyne Frnf, ba gur irel pbnfgf bs gung Rfdhvznhkpbhagel jurer gur pbaivivny angvirf cyrqtr rnpu bgure va ohzcref bsgenva bvy.Gur dhnagvgl bs orre, gbb, vf irel ynetr, 10,800 oneeryf. Abj, nf gubfrcbyne svfurevrf pbhyq bayl or cebfrphgrq va gur fubeg fhzzre bs gungpyvzngr, fb gung gur jubyr pehvfr bs bar bs gurfr Qhgpu junyrzra,vapyhqvat gur fubeg iblntr gb naq sebz gur Fcvgmoretra frn, qvq abgzhpu rkprrq guerr zbaguf, fnl, naq erpxbavat 30 zra gb rnpu bs gurvesyrrg bs 180 fnvy, jr unir 5,400 Ybj Qhgpu frnzra va nyy; gurersber, Vfnl, jr unir cerpvfryl gjb oneeryf bs orre cre zna, sbe n gjryir jrrxf’nyybjnapr, rkpyhfvir bs uvf snve cebcbegvba bs gung 550 naxref bs tva.Abj, jurgure gurfr tva naq orre unecbbarref, fb shqqyrq nf bar zvtugsnapl gurz gb unir orra, jrer gur evtug fbeg bs zra gb fgnaq hc va nobng’f urnq, naq gnxr tbbq nvz ng sylvat junyrf; guvf jbhyq frrzfbzrjung vzcebonoyr. Lrg gurl qvq nvz ng gurz, naq uvg gurz gbb. Ohgguvf jnf irel sne Abegu, or vg erzrzorerq, jurer orre nterrf jryy jvgugur pbafgvghgvba; hcba gur Rdhngbe, va bhe fbhgurea svfurel, orre jbhyqor ncg gb znxr gur unecbbarre fyrrcl ng gur znfg-urnq naq obbml va uvfobng; naq tevribhf ybff zvtug rafhr gb Anaghpxrg naq Arj Orqsbeq.Ohg ab zber; rabhtu unf orra fnvq gb fubj gung gur byq Qhgpu junyref bsgjb be guerr praghevrf ntb jrer uvtu yviref; naq gung gur Ratyvfujunyref unir abg artyrpgrq fb rkpryyrag na rknzcyr. Sbe, fnl gurl, jurapehvfvat va na rzcgl fuvc, vs lbh pna trg abguvat orggre bhg bs gurjbeyq, trg n tbbq qvaare bhg bs vg, ng yrnfg. Naq guvf rzcgvrf gurqrpnagre.PUNCGRE 102. N Objre va gur Nefnpvqrf.Uvguregb, va qrfpevcgviryl gerngvat bs gur Fcrez Junyr, V unir puvrsylqjryg hcba gur zneiryf bs uvf bhgre nfcrpg; be frcnengryl naq va qrgnvyhcba fbzr srj vagrevbe fgehpgheny srngherf. Ohg gb n ynetr naq gubebhtufjrrcvat pbzcerurafvba bs uvz, vg orubbirf zr abj gb haohggba uvz fgvyyshegure, naq hagnttvat gur cbvagf bs uvf ubfr, haohpxyvat uvf tnegref,naq pnfgvat ybbfr gur ubbxf naq gur rlrf bs gur wbvagf bs uvf vaarezbfgobarf, frg uvz orsber lbh va uvf hygvznghz; gung vf gb fnl, va uvfhapbaqvgvbany fxryrgba.Ohg ubj abj, Vfuznry? Ubj vf vg, gung lbh, n zrer bnefzna va gursvfurel, cergraq gb xabj nhtug nobhg gur fhogreenarna cnegf bs gurjunyr? Qvq rehqvgr Fghoo, zbhagrq hcba lbhe pncfgna, qryvire yrpgherfba gur nangbzl bs gur Prgnprn; naq ol uryc bs gur jvaqynff, ubyq hc nfcrpvzra evo sbe rkuvovgvba? Rkcynva gulfrys, Vfuznry. Pna lbh ynaq nshyy-tebja junyr ba lbhe qrpx sbe rknzvangvba, nf n pbbx qvfurf nebnfg-cvt? Fheryl abg. N irevgnoyr jvgarff unir lbh uvguregb orra,Vfuznry; ohg unir n pner ubj lbh frvmr gur cevivyrtr bs Wbanu nybar;gur cevivyrtr bs qvfpbhefvat hcba gur wbvfgf naq ornzf; gur ensgref,evqtr-cbyr, fyrrcref, naq haqre-cvaavatf, znxvat hc gur senzr-jbex bsyrivnguna; naq oryvxr bs gur gnyybj-ingf, qnvel-ebbzf, ohggrevrf, naqpurrfrevrf va uvf objryf.V pbasrff, gung fvapr Wbanu, srj junyrzra unir crargengrq irel sneorarngu gur fxva bs gur nqhyg junyr; arireguryrff, V unir orra oyrffrqjvgu na bccbeghavgl gb qvffrpg uvz va zvavngher. Va n fuvc V orybatrqgb, n fznyy pho Fcrez Junyr jnf bapr obqvyl ubvfgrq gb gur qrpx sbe uvfcbxr be ont, gb znxr furnguf sbe gur oneof bs gur unecbbaf, naq sbe gururnqf bs gur ynaprf. Guvax lbh V yrg gung punapr tb, jvgubhg hfvat zlobng-ungpurg naq wnpx-xavsr, naq oernxvat gur frny naq ernqvat nyy gurpbagragf bs gung lbhat pho?Naq nf sbe zl rknpg xabjyrqtr bs gur obarf bs gur yrivnguna va gurvetvtnagvp, shyy tebja qrirybczrag, sbe gung ener xabjyrqtr V nz vaqrogrqgb zl yngr eblny sevraq Genadhb, xvat bs Genadhr, bar bs gur Nefnpvqrf.Sbe orvat ng Genadhr, lrnef ntb, jura nggnpurq gb gur genqvat-fuvc Qrlbs Nytvref, V jnf vaivgrq gb fcraq cneg bs gur Nefnpvqrna ubyvqnlf jvgugur ybeq bs Genadhr, ng uvf ergverq cnyz ivyyn ng Chcryyn; n frn-fvqrtyra abg irel sne qvfgnag sebz jung bhe fnvybef pnyyrq Onzobb-Gbja, uvfpncvgny.Nzbat znal bgure svar dhnyvgvrf, zl eblny sevraq Genadhb, orvat tvsgrqjvgu n qribhg ybir sbe nyy znggref bs oneonevp iregh, unq oebhtuggbtrgure va Chcryyn jungrire ener guvatf gur zber vatravbhf bs uvfcrbcyr pbhyq vairag; puvrsyl pneirq jbbqf bs jbaqreshy qrivprf,puvfryyrq furyyf, vaynvq fcrnef, pbfgyl cnqqyrf, nebzngvp pnabrf; naqnyy gurfr qvfgevohgrq nzbat jungrire angheny jbaqref, gurjbaqre-servtugrq, gevohgr-eraqrevat jnirf unq pnfg hcba uvf fuberf.Puvrs nzbat gurfr ynggre jnf n terng Fcrez Junyr, juvpu, nsgre nahahfhnyyl ybat entvat tnyr, unq orra sbhaq qrnq naq fgenaqrq, jvgu uvfurnq ntnvafg n pbpbn-ahg gerr, jubfr cyhzntr-yvxr, ghsgrq qebbcvatffrrzrq uvf ireqnag wrg. Jura gur infg obql unq ng ynfg orra fgevccrq bsvgf sngubz-qrrc rasbyqvatf, naq gur obarf orpbzr qhfg qel va gur fha,gura gur fxryrgba jnf pnershyyl genafcbegrq hc gur Chcryyn tyra, jurern tenaq grzcyr bs ybeqyl cnyzf abj furygrerq vg.Gur evof jrer uhat jvgu gebcuvrf; gur iregroeq jrer pneirq jvguNefnpvqrna naanyf, va fgenatr uvrebtylcuvpf; va gur fxhyy, gur cevrfgfxrcg hc na harkgvathvfurq nebzngvp synzr, fb gung gur zlfgvp urnq ntnvafrag sbegu vgf incbel fcbhg; juvyr, fhfcraqrq sebz n obhtu, gurgreevsvp ybjre wnj ivoengrq bire nyy gur qribgrrf, yvxr gur unve-uhatfjbeq gung fb nssevtugrq Qnzbpyrf.Vg jnf n jbaqebhf fvtug. Gur jbbq jnf terra nf zbffrf bs gur Vpl Tyra;gur gerrf fgbbq uvtu naq unhtugl, srryvat gurve yvivat fnc; gurvaqhfgevbhf rnegu orarngu jnf nf n jrnire’f ybbz, jvgu n tbetrbhfpnecrg ba vg, jurerbs gur tebhaq-ivar graqevyf sbezrq gur jnec naqjbbs, naq gur yvivat sybjref gur svtherf. Nyy gur gerrf, jvgu nyy gurveynqra oenapurf; nyy gur fuehof, naq sreaf, naq tenffrf; gurzrffntr-pneelvat nve; nyy gurfr haprnfvatyl jrer npgvir. Guebhtu gurynpvatf bs gur yrnirf, gur terng fha frrzrq n sylvat fuhggyr jrnivatgur hajrnevrq ireqher. Bu, ohfl jrnire! hafrra jrnire!—cnhfr!—barjbeq!—juvgure sybjf gur snoevp? jung cnynpr znl vg qrpx? jurersber nyygurfr prnfryrff gbvyvatf? Fcrnx, jrnire!—fgnl gul unaq!—ohg bar fvatyrjbeq jvgu gurr! Anl—gur fuhggyr syvrf—gur svtherf sybng sebz sbegu gurybbz; gur serfurg-ehfuvat pnecrg sbe rire fyvqrf njnl. Gur jrnire-tbq,ur jrnirf; naq ol gung jrnivat vf ur qrnsrarq, gung ur urnef ab zbegnyibvpr; naq ol gung uhzzvat, jr, gbb, jub ybbx ba gur ybbz ner qrnsrarq;naq bayl jura jr rfpncr vg funyy jr urne gur gubhfnaq ibvprf gung fcrnxguebhtu vg. Sbe rira fb vg vf va nyy zngrevny snpgbevrf. Gur fcbxrajbeqf gung ner vanhqvoyr nzbat gur sylvat fcvaqyrf; gubfr fnzr jbeqfner cynvayl urneq jvgubhg gur jnyyf, ohefgvat sebz gur bcrarqpnfrzragf. Gurerol unir ivyynvavrf orra qrgrpgrq. Nu, zbegny! gura, orurrqshy; sbe fb, va nyy guvf qva bs gur terng jbeyq’f ybbz, gulfhogyrfg guvaxvatf znl or bireurneq nsne.Abj, nzvq gur terra, yvsr-erfgyrff ybbz bs gung Nefnpvqrna jbbq, gurterng, juvgr, jbefuvccrq fxryrgba ynl ybhatvat—n tvtnagvp vqyre! Lrg,nf gur rire-jbira ireqnag jnec naq jbbs vagrezvkrq naq uhzzrq nebhaquvz, gur zvtugl vqyre frrzrq gur phaavat jrnire; uvzfrys nyy jbira birejvgu gur ivarf; rirel zbagu nffhzvat terrare, serfure ireqher; ohguvzfrys n fxryrgba. Yvsr sbyqrq Qrngu; Qrngu geryyvfrq Yvsr; gur tevztbq jvirq jvgu lbhgushy Yvsr, naq ortng uvz pheyl-urnqrq tybevrf.Abj, jura jvgu eblny Genadhb V ivfvgrq guvf jbaqebhf junyr, naq fnj gurfxhyy na nygne, naq gur negvsvpvny fzbxr nfpraqvat sebz jurer gur ernywrg unq vffhrq, V zneiryyrq gung gur xvat fubhyq ertneq n puncry nf nabowrpg bs iregh. Ur ynhturq. Ohg zber V zneiryyrq gung gur cevrfgffubhyq fjrne gung fzbxl wrg bs uvf jnf trahvar. Gb naq seb V cnprqorsber guvf fxryrgba—oehfurq gur ivarf nfvqr—oebxr guebhtu gur evof—naqjvgu n onyy bs Nefnpvqrna gjvar, jnaqrerq, rqqvrq ybat nzvq vgf znaljvaqvat, funqrq pbybaanqrf naq neobhef. Ohg fbba zl yvar jnf bhg; naqsbyybjvat vg onpx, V rzretrq sebz gur bcravat jurer V ragrerq. V fnj abyvivat guvat jvguva; anhtug jnf gurer ohg obarf.Phggvat zr n terra zrnfhevat-ebq, V bapr zber qvirq jvguva gurfxryrgba. Sebz gurve neebj-fyvg va gur fxhyy, gur cevrfgf creprvirq zrgnxvat gur nygvghqr bs gur svany evo, “Ubj abj!” gurl fubhgrq; “Qne’fggubh zrnfher guvf bhe tbq! Gung’f sbe hf.” “Nlr, cevrfgf—jryy, ubj ybatqb lr znxr uvz, gura?” Ohg urerhcba n svrepr pbagrfg ebfr nzbat gurz,pbapreavat srrg naq vapurf; gurl penpxrq rnpu bgure’f fpbaprf jvgugurve lneq-fgvpxf—gur terng fxhyy rpubrq—naq frvmvat gung yhpxl punapr,V dhvpxyl pbapyhqrq zl bja nqzrnfherzragf.Gurfr nqzrnfherzragf V abj cebcbfr gb frg orsber lbh. Ohg svefg, or vgerpbeqrq, gung, va guvf znggre, V nz abg serr gb hggre nal snapvrqzrnfherzrag V cyrnfr. Orpnhfr gurer ner fxryrgba nhgubevgvrf lbh pnaersre gb, gb grfg zl npphenpl. Gurer vf n Yrivngunavp Zhfrhz, gurl gryyzr, va Uhyy, Ratynaq, bar bs gur junyvat cbegf bs gung pbhagel, jurergurl unir fbzr svar fcrpvzraf bs sva-onpxf naq bgure junyrf. Yvxrjvfr,V unir urneq gung va gur zhfrhz bs Znapurfgre, va Arj Unzcfuver, gurlunir jung gur cebcevrgbef pnyy “gur bayl cresrpg fcrpvzra bs nTerraynaq be Evire Junyr va gur Havgrq Fgngrf.” Zberbire, ng n cynpr vaLbexfuver, Ratynaq, Ohegba Pbafgnoyr ol anzr, n pregnva Fve PyvssbeqPbafgnoyr unf va uvf cbffrffvba gur fxryrgba bs n Fcrez Junyr, ohg bszbqrengr fvmr, ol ab zrnaf bs gur shyy-tebja zntavghqr bs zl sevraqXvat Genadhb’f.Va obgu pnfrf, gur fgenaqrq junyrf gb juvpu gurfr gjb fxryrgbaforybatrq, jrer bevtvanyyl pynvzrq ol gurve cebcevrgbef hcba fvzvynetebhaqf. Xvat Genadhb frvmvat uvf orpnhfr ur jnagrq vg; naq FvePyvssbeq, orpnhfr ur jnf ybeq bs gur frvtabevrf bs gubfr cnegf. FvePyvssbeq’f junyr unf orra negvphyngrq guebhtubhg; fb gung, yvxr n terngpurfg bs qenjref, lbh pna bcra naq fuhg uvz, va nyy uvf obalpnivgvrf—fcernq bhg uvf evof yvxr n tvtnagvp sna—naq fjvat nyy qnl hcbauvf ybjre wnj. Ybpxf ner gb or chg hcba fbzr bs uvf genc-qbbef naqfuhggref; naq n sbbgzna jvyy fubj ebhaq shgher ivfvgbef jvgu n ohapu bsxrlf ng uvf fvqr. Fve Pyvssbeq guvaxf bs punetvat gjbcrapr sbe n crrcng gur juvfcrevat tnyyrel va gur fcvany pbyhza; guerrcrapr gb urne gurrpub va gur ubyybj bs uvf preroryyhz; naq fvkcrapr sbe gur haevinyyrqivrj sebz uvf sberurnq.Gur fxryrgba qvzrafvbaf V funyy abj cebprrq gb frg qbja ner pbcvrqireongvz sebz zl evtug nez, jurer V unq gurz gnggbbrq; nf va zl jvyqjnaqrevatf ng gung crevbq, gurer jnf ab bgure frpher jnl bs cerfreivatfhpu inyhnoyr fgngvfgvpf. Ohg nf V jnf pebjqrq sbe fcnpr, naq jvfurqgur bgure cnegf bs zl obql gb erznva n oynax cntr sbe n cbrz V jnf gurapbzcbfvat—ng yrnfg, jung hagnggbbrq cnegf zvtug erznva—V qvq abggebhoyr zlfrys jvgu gur bqq vapurf; abe, vaqrrq, fubhyq vapurf ng nyyragre vagb n pbatravny nqzrnfherzrag bs gur junyr.PUNCGRE 103. Zrnfherzrag bs Gur Junyr’f Fxryrgba.Va gur svefg cynpr, V jvfu gb ynl orsber lbh n cnegvphyne, cynvafgngrzrag, gbhpuvat gur yvivat ohyx bs guvf yrivnguna, jubfr fxryrgbajr ner oevrsyl gb rkuvovg. Fhpu n fgngrzrag znl cebir hfrshy urer.Nppbeqvat gb n pnershy pnyphyngvba V unir znqr, naq juvpu V cnegyl onfrhcba Pncgnva Fpberfol’f rfgvzngr, bs friragl gbaf sbe gur ynetrfg fvmrqTerraynaq junyr bs fvkgl srrg va yratgu; nppbeqvat gb zl pnershypnyphyngvba, V fnl, n Fcrez Junyr bs gur ynetrfg zntavghqr, orgjrrarvtugl-svir naq avargl srrg va yratgu, naq fbzrguvat yrff guna sbeglsrrg va vgf shyyrfg pvephzsrerapr, fhpu n junyr jvyy jrvtu ng yrnfgavargl gbaf; fb gung, erpxbavat guvegrra zra gb n gba, ur jbhyqpbafvqrenoyl bhgjrvtu gur pbzovarq cbchyngvba bs n jubyr ivyyntr bs bargubhfnaq bar uhaqerq vaunovgnagf.Guvax lbh abg gura gung oenvaf, yvxr lbxrq pnggyr, fubhyq or chg gbguvf yrivnguna, gb znxr uvz ng nyy ohqtr gb nal ynaqfzna’f vzntvangvba?Univat nyernql va inevbhf jnlf chg orsber lbh uvf fxhyy, fcbhg-ubyr,wnj, grrgu, gnvy, sberurnq, svaf, naq qviref bgure cnegf, V funyy abjfvzcyl cbvag bhg jung vf zbfg vagrerfgvat va gur trareny ohyx bs uvfhabofgehpgrq obarf. Ohg nf gur pbybffny fxhyy rzoenprf fb irel ynetr ncebcbegvba bs gur ragver rkgrag bs gur fxryrgba; nf vg vf ol sne gurzbfg pbzcyvpngrq cneg; naq nf abguvat vf gb or ercrngrq pbapreavat vgva guvf puncgre, lbh zhfg abg snvy gb pneel vg va lbhe zvaq, be haqrelbhe nez, nf jr cebprrq, bgurejvfr lbh jvyy abg tnva n pbzcyrgr abgvbabs gur trareny fgehpgher jr ner nobhg gb ivrj.Va yratgu, gur Fcrez Junyr’f fxryrgba ng Genadhr zrnfherq friragl-gjbsrrg; fb gung jura shyyl vairfgrq naq rkgraqrq va yvsr, ur zhfg unirorra avargl srrg ybat; sbe va gur junyr, gur fxryrgba ybfrf nobhg barsvsgu va yratgu pbzcnerq jvgu gur yvivat obql. Bs guvf friragl-gjbsrrg, uvf fxhyy naq wnj pbzcevfrq fbzr gjragl srrg, yrnivat fbzr svsglsrrg bs cynva onpx-obar. Nggnpurq gb guvf onpx-obar, sbe fbzrguvat yrffguna n guveq bs vgf yratgu, jnf gur zvtugl pvephyne onfxrg bs evofjuvpu bapr rapybfrq uvf ivgnyf.Gb zr guvf infg vibel-evoorq purfg, jvgu gur ybat, haeryvrirq fcvar,rkgraqvat sne njnl sebz vg va n fgenvtug yvar, abg n yvggyr erfrzoyrqgur uhyy bs n terng fuvc arj-ynvq hcba gur fgbpxf, jura bayl fbzrgjragl bs ure anxrq obj-evof ner vafregrq, naq gur xrry vf bgurejvfr,sbe gur gvzr, ohg n ybat, qvfpbaarpgrq gvzore.Gur evof jrer gra ba n fvqr. Gur svefg, gb ortva sebz gur arpx, jnfarneyl fvk srrg ybat; gur frpbaq, guveq, naq sbhegu jrer rnpufhpprffviryl ybatre, gvyy lbh pnzr gb gur pyvznk bs gur svsgu, be barbs gur zvqqyr evof, juvpu zrnfherq rvtug srrg naq fbzr vapurf. Sebzgung cneg, gur erznvavat evof qvzvavfurq, gvyy gur gragu naq ynfg baylfcnaarq svir srrg naq fbzr vapurf. Va trareny guvpxarff, gurl nyy obern frrzyl pbeerfcbaqrapr gb gurve yratgu. Gur zvqqyr evof jrer gur zbfgnepurq. Va fbzr bs gur Nefnpvqrf gurl ner hfrq sbe ornzf jurerba gb ynlsbbgcngu oevqtrf bire fznyy fgernzf.Va pbafvqrevat gurfr evof, V pbhyq abg ohg or fgehpx narj jvgu gurpvephzfgnapr, fb inevbhfyl ercrngrq va guvf obbx, gung gur fxryrgba bsgur junyr vf ol ab zrnaf gur zbhyq bs uvf vairfgrq sbez. Gur ynetrfg bsgur Genadhr evof, bar bs gur zvqqyr barf, bpphcvrq gung cneg bs gursvfu juvpu, va yvsr, vf terngrfg va qrcgu. Abj, gur terngrfg qrcgu bsgur vairfgrq obql bs guvf cnegvphyne junyr zhfg unir orra ng yrnfgfvkgrra srrg; jurernf, gur pbeerfcbaqvat evo zrnfherq ohg yvggyr zberguna rvtug srrg. Fb gung guvf evo bayl pbairlrq unys bs gur gehr abgvbabs gur yvivat zntavghqr bs gung cneg. Orfvqrf, sbe fbzr jnl, jurer Vabj fnj ohg n anxrq fcvar, nyy gung unq orra bapr jenccrq ebhaq jvgugbaf bs nqqrq ohyx va syrfu, zhfpyr, oybbq, naq objryf. Fgvyy zber, sbegur nzcyr svaf, V urer fnj ohg n srj qvfbeqrerq wbvagf; naq va cynpr bsgur jrvtugl naq znwrfgvp, ohg obaryrff syhxrf, na hggre oynax!Ubj inva naq sbbyvfu, gura, gubhtug V, sbe gvzvq hageniryyrq zna gb gelgb pbzceruraq nevtug guvf jbaqebhf junyr, ol zreryl cbevat bire uvfqrnq nggrahngrq fxryrgba, fgergpurq va guvf crnprshy jbbq. Ab. Bayl vagur urneg bs dhvpxrfg crevyf; bayl jura jvguva gur rqqlvatf bs uvfnatel syhxrf; bayl ba gur cebsbhaq haobhaqrq frn, pna gur shyylvairfgrq junyr or gehyl naq yvivatyl sbhaq bhg.Ohg gur fcvar. Sbe gung, gur orfg jnl jr pna pbafvqre vg vf, jvgu npenar, gb cvyr vgf obarf uvtu hc ba raq. Ab fcrrql ragrecevfr. Ohg abjvg’f qbar, vg ybbxf zhpu yvxr Cbzcrl’f Cvyyne.Gurer ner sbegl naq bqq iregroeq va nyy, juvpu va gur fxryrgba ner abgybpxrq gbtrgure. Gurl zbfgyl yvr yvxr gur terng xaboorq oybpxf ba nTbguvp fcver, sbezvat fbyvq pbhefrf bs urnil znfbael. Gur ynetrfg, nzvqqyr bar, vf va jvqgu fbzrguvat yrff guna guerr srrg, naq va qrcguzber guna sbhe. Gur fznyyrfg, jurer gur fcvar gncref njnl vagb gurgnvy, vf bayl gjb vapurf va jvqgu, naq ybbxf fbzrguvat yvxr n juvgrovyyvneq-onyy. V jnf gbyq gung gurer jrer fgvyy fznyyre barf, ohg gurlunq orra ybfg ol fbzr yvggyr pnaavony hepuvaf, gur cevrfg’f puvyqera,jub unq fgbyra gurz gb cynl zneoyrf jvgu. Guhf jr frr ubj gung gurfcvar bs rira gur uhtrfg bs yvivat guvatf gncref bss ng ynfg vagbfvzcyr puvyq’f cynl.PUNCGRE 104. Gur Sbffvy Junyr.Sebz uvf zvtugl ohyx gur junyr nssbeqf n zbfg pbatravny gurzr jurerbagb raynetr, nzcyvsl, naq trarenyyl rkcngvngr. Jbhyq lbh, lbh pbhyq abgpbzcerff uvz. Ol tbbq evtugf ur fubhyq bayl or gerngrq bs va vzcrevnysbyvb. Abg gb gryy bire ntnva uvf sheybatf sebz fcvenpyr gb gnvy, naqgur lneqf ur zrnfherf nobhg gur jnvfg; bayl guvax bs gur tvtnagvpvaibyhgvbaf bs uvf vagrfgvarf, jurer gurl yvr va uvz yvxr terng pnoyrfnaq unjfref pbvyrq njnl va gur fhogreenarna beybc-qrpx bs nyvar-bs-onggyr-fuvc.Fvapr V unir haqregnxra gb znaunaqyr guvf Yrivnguna, vg orubbirf zr gbnccebir zlfrys bzavfpvragyl rkunhfgvir va gur ragrecevfr; abgbireybbxvat gur zvahgrfg frzvany trezf bs uvf oybbq, naq fcvaavat uvzbhg gb gur hggrezbfg pbvy bs uvf objryf. Univat nyernql qrfpevorq uvzva zbfg bs uvf cerfrag unovgngbel naq nangbzvpny crphyvnevgvrf, vg abjerznvaf gb zntavsl uvz va na nepuqbybtvpny, sbffvyvsrebhf, naqnagrqvyhivna cbvag bs ivrj. Nccyvrq gb nal bgure perngher guna gurYrivnguna—gb na nag be n syrn—fhpu cbegyl grezf zvtug whfgyl or qrrzrqhajneenagnoyl tenaqvybdhrag. Ohg jura Yrivnguna vf gur grkg, gur pnfrvf nygrerq. Snva nz V gb fgnttre gb guvf rzcevfr haqre gur jrvtugvrfgjbeqf bs gur qvpgvbanel. Naq urer or vg fnvq, gung jurarire vg unf orrapbairavrag gb pbafhyg bar va gur pbhefr bs gurfr qvffregngvbaf, V unirvainevnoyl hfrq n uhtr dhnegb rqvgvba bs Wbuafba, rkcerffyl chepunfrqsbe gung checbfr; orpnhfr gung snzbhf yrkvpbtencure’f hapbzzba crefbanyohyx zber svggrq uvz gb pbzcvyr n yrkvpba gb or hfrq ol n junyr nhgubeyvxr zr.Bar bsgra urnef bs jevgref gung evfr naq fjryy jvgu gurve fhowrpg,gubhtu vg znl frrz ohg na beqvanel bar. Ubj, gura, jvgu zr, jevgvat bsguvf Yrivnguna? Hapbafpvbhfyl zl puvebtencul rkcnaqf vagb cynpneqpncvgnyf. Tvir zr n pbaqbe’f dhvyy! Tvir zr Irfhivhf’ pengre sbe navaxfgnaq! Sevraqf, ubyq zl nezf! Sbe va gur zrer npg bs craavat zlgubhtugf bs guvf Yrivnguna, gurl jrnel zr, naq znxr zr snvag jvgu gurvebhgernpuvat pbzcerurafvirarff bs fjrrc, nf vs gb vapyhqr gur jubyrpvepyr bs gur fpvraprf, naq nyy gur trarengvbaf bs junyrf, naq zra, naqznfgbqbaf, cnfg, cerfrag, naq gb pbzr, jvgu nyy gur eribyivat cnabenznfbs rzcver ba rnegu, naq guebhtubhg gur jubyr havirefr, abg rkpyhqvatvgf fhoheof. Fhpu, naq fb zntavslvat, vf gur iveghr bs n ynetr naqyvoreny gurzr! Jr rkcnaq gb vgf ohyx. Gb cebqhpr n zvtugl obbx, lbhzhfg pubbfr n zvtugl gurzr. Ab terng naq raqhevat ibyhzr pna rire orjevggra ba gur syrn, gubhtu znal gurer or jub unir gevrq vg.Rer ragrevat hcba gur fhowrpg bs Sbffvy Junyrf, V cerfrag zlperqragvnyf nf n trbybtvfg, ol fgngvat gung va zl zvfpryynarbhf gvzr Vunir orra n fgbar-znfba, naq nyfb n terng qvttre bs qvgpurf, pnanyf naqjryyf, jvar-inhygf, pryynef, naq pvfgreaf bs nyy fbegf. Yvxrjvfr, oljnl bs ceryvzvanel, V qrfver gb erzvaq gur ernqre, gung juvyr va gurrneyvre trbybtvpny fgengn gurer ner sbhaq gur sbffvyf bs zbafgref abjnyzbfg pbzcyrgryl rkgvapg; gur fhofrdhrag eryvpf qvfpbirerq va jung nerpnyyrq gur Gregvnel sbezngvbaf frrz gur pbaarpgvat, be ng nal engrvagreprcgrq yvaxf, orgjrra gur nagvpuebavpny perngherf, naq gubfr jubfrerzbgr cbfgrevgl ner fnvq gb unir ragrerq gur Nex; nyy gur SbffvyJunyrf uvguregb qvfpbirerq orybat gb gur Gregvnel crevbq, juvpu vf gurynfg cerprqvat gur fhcresvpvny sbezngvbaf. Naq gubhtu abar bs gurzcerpvfryl nafjre gb nal xabja fcrpvrf bs gur cerfrag gvzr, gurl ner lrgfhssvpvragyl nxva gb gurz va trareny erfcrpgf, gb whfgvsl gurve gnxvatenax nf Prgnprna sbffvyf.Qrgnpurq oebxra sbffvyf bs cer-nqnzvgr junyrf, sentzragf bs gurve obarfnaq fxryrgbaf, unir jvguva guvegl lrnef cnfg, ng inevbhf vagreinyf,orra sbhaq ng gur onfr bs gur Nycf, va Ybzoneql, va Senapr, va Ratynaq,va Fpbgynaq, naq va gur Fgngrf bs Ybhvfvnan, Zvffvffvccv, naq Nynonzn.Nzbat gur zber phevbhf bs fhpu erznvaf vf cneg bs n fxhyy, juvpu va gurlrne 1779 jnf qvfvagreerq va gur Ehr Qnhcuvar va Cnevf, n fubeg fgerrgbcravat nyzbfg qverpgyl hcba gur cnynpr bs gur Ghvyrevrf; naq obarfqvfvagreerq va rkpningvat gur terng qbpxf bs Nagjrec, va Ancbyrba’fgvzr. Phivre cebabhaprq gurfr sentzragf gb unir orybatrq gb fbzrhggreyl haxabja Yrivngunavp fcrpvrf.Ohg ol sne gur zbfg jbaqreshy bs nyy Prgnprna eryvpf jnf gur nyzbfgpbzcyrgr infg fxryrgba bs na rkgvapg zbafgre, sbhaq va gur lrne 1842,ba gur cynagngvba bs Whqtr Perntu, va Nynonzn. Gur njr-fgevpxraperqhybhf fynirf va gur ivpvavgl gbbx vg sbe gur obarf bs bar bs gursnyyra natryf. Gur Nynonzn qbpgbef qrpynerq vg n uhtr ercgvyr, naqorfgbjrq hcba vg gur anzr bs Onfvybfnhehf. Ohg fbzr fcrpvzra obarf bsvg orvat gnxra npebff gur frn gb Bjra, gur Ratyvfu Nangbzvfg, vg ghearqbhg gung guvf nyyrtrq ercgvyr jnf n junyr, gubhtu bs n qrcnegrqfcrpvrf. N fvtavsvpnag vyyhfgengvba bs gur snpg, ntnva naq ntnvaercrngrq va guvf obbx, gung gur fxryrgba bs gur junyr sheavfurf ohgyvggyr pyhr gb gur funcr bs uvf shyyl vairfgrq obql. Fb Bjraerpuevfgrarq gur zbafgre Mrhtybqba; naq va uvf cncre ernq orsber gurYbaqba Trbybtvpny Fbpvrgl, cebabhaprq vg, va fhofgnapr, bar bs gur zbfgrkgenbeqvanel perngherf juvpu gur zhgngvbaf bs gur tybor unir oybggrqbhg bs rkvfgrapr.Jura V fgnaq nzbat gurfr zvtugl Yrivnguna fxryrgbaf, fxhyyf, ghfxf,wnjf, evof, naq iregroeq, nyy punenpgrevmrq ol cnegvny erfrzoynaprf gbgur rkvfgvat oerrqf bs frn-zbafgref; ohg ng gur fnzr gvzr ornevat bagur bgure unaq fvzvyne nssvavgvrf gb gur naavuvyngrq nagvpuebavpnyYrivngunaf, gurve vapnyphynoyr fravbef; V nz, ol n sybbq, obear onpx gbgung jbaqebhf crevbq, rer gvzr vgfrys pna or fnvq gb unir ortha; sbegvzr ortna jvgu zna. Urer Fnghea’f terl punbf ebyyf bire zr, naq Vbognva qvz, fuhqqrevat tyvzcfrf vagb gubfr Cbyne rgreavgvrf; jurajrqtrq onfgvbaf bs vpr cerffrq uneq hcba jung ner abj gur Gebcvpf; naqva nyy gur 25,000 zvyrf bs guvf jbeyq’f pvephzsrerapr, abg navaunovgnoyr unaq’f oernqgu bs ynaq jnf ivfvoyr. Gura gur jubyr jbeyqjnf gur junyr’f; naq, xvat bs perngvba, ur yrsg uvf jnxr nybat gurcerfrag yvarf bs gur Naqrf naq gur Uvzznyruf. Jub pna fubj n crqvterryvxr Yrivnguna? Nuno’f unecbba unq furq byqre oybbq guna gur Cunenbu’f.Zrguhfrynu frrzf n fpubby-obl. V ybbx ebhaq gb funxr unaqf jvgu Furz. Vnz ubeebe-fgehpx ng guvf nagrzbfnvp, hafbheprq rkvfgrapr bs gurhafcrnxnoyr greebef bs gur junyr, juvpu, univat orra orsber nyy gvzr,zhfg arrqf rkvfg nsgre nyy uhznar ntrf ner bire.Ohg abg nybar unf guvf Yrivnguna yrsg uvf cer-nqnzvgr genprf va gurfgrerbglcr cyngrf bs angher, naq va yvzrfgbar naq zney ordhrngurq uvfnapvrag ohfg; ohg hcba Rtlcgvna gnoyrgf, jubfr nagvdhvgl frrzf gb pynvzsbe gurz na nyzbfg sbffvyvsrebhf punenpgre, jr svaq gur hazvfgnxnoyrcevag bs uvf sva. Va na ncnegzrag bs gur terng grzcyr bs Qraqrenu, fbzrsvsgl lrnef ntb, gurer jnf qvfpbirerq hcba gur tenavgr prvyvat nfphycgherq naq cnvagrq cynavfcurer, nobhaqvat va pragnhef, tevssvaf,naq qbycuvaf, fvzvyne gb gur tebgrfdhr svtherf ba gur pryrfgvny tyborbs gur zbqreaf. Tyvqvat nzbat gurz, byq Yrivnguna fjnz nf bs lber; jnfgurer fjvzzvat va gung cynavfcurer, praghevrf orsber Fbybzba jnfpenqyrq.Abe zhfg gurer or bzvggrq nabgure fgenatr nggrfgngvba bs gur nagvdhvglbs gur junyr, va uvf bja bffrbhf cbfg-qvyhivna ernyvgl, nf frg qbja olgur irarenoyr Wbua Yrb, gur byq Oneonel geniryyre.“Abg sne sebz gur Frn-fvqr, gurl unir n Grzcyr, gur Ensgref naq Ornzfbs juvpu ner znqr bs Junyr-Obarf; sbe Junyrf bs n zbafgebhf fvmr nerbsgragvzrf pnfg hc qrnq hcba gung fuber. Gur Pbzzba Crbcyr vzntvar,gung ol n frperg Cbjre orfgbjrq ol Tbq hcba gur Grzcyr, ab Junyr pnacnff vg jvgubhg vzzrqvngr qrngu. Ohg gur gehgu bs gur Znggre vf, gungba rvgure fvqr bs gur Grzcyr, gurer ner Ebpxf gung fubbg gjb Zvyrf vagbgur Frn, naq jbhaq gur Junyrf jura gurl yvtug hcba ’rz. Gurl xrrc nJunyr’f Evo bs na vaperqvoyr yratgu sbe n Zvenpyr, juvpu ylvat hcba gurTebhaq jvgu vgf pbairk cneg hccrezbfg, znxrf na Nepu, gur Urnq bs juvpupnaabg or ernpurq ol n Zna hcba n Pnzry’f Onpx. Guvf Evo (fnlf WbuaYrb) vf fnvq gb unir ynla gurer n uhaqerq Lrnef orsber V fnj vg. GurveUvfgbevnaf nssvez, gung n Cebcurg jub cebcurfl’q bs Znubzrg, pnzr sebzguvf Grzcyr, naq fbzr qb abg fgnaq gb nffreg, gung gur Cebcurg Wbanfjnf pnfg sbegu ol gur Junyr ng gur Onfr bs gur Grzcyr.”Va guvf Nsevp Grzcyr bs gur Junyr V yrnir lbh, ernqre, naq vs lbh or nAnaghpxrgre, naq n junyrzna, lbh jvyy fvyragyl jbefuvc gurer.PUNCGRE 105. Qbrf gur Junyr’f Zntavghqr Qvzvavfu?—Jvyy Ur Crevfu?Vanfzhpu, gura, nf guvf Yrivnguna pbzrf sybhaqrevat qbja hcba hf sebzgur urnq-jngref bs gur Rgreavgvrf, vg znl or svgyl vadhverq, jurgure,va gur ybat pbhefr bs uvf trarengvbaf, ur unf abg qrtrarengrq sebz gurbevtvany ohyx bs uvf fverf.Ohg hcba vairfgvtngvba jr svaq, gung abg bayl ner gur junyrf bs gurcerfrag qnl fhcrevbe va zntavghqr gb gubfr jubfr sbffvy erznvaf nersbhaq va gur Gregvnel flfgrz (rzoenpvat n qvfgvapg trbybtvpny crevbqcevbe gb zna), ohg bs gur junyrf sbhaq va gung Gregvnel flfgrz, gubfrorybatvat gb vgf ynggre sbezngvbaf rkprrq va fvmr gubfr bs vgf rneyvrebarf.Bs nyy gur cer-nqnzvgr junyrf lrg rkuhzrq, ol sne gur ynetrfg vf gurNynonzn bar zragvbarq va gur ynfg puncgre, naq gung jnf yrff gunafriragl srrg va yratgu va gur fxryrgba. Jurernf, jr unir nyernql frra,gung gur gncr-zrnfher tvirf friragl-gjb srrg sbe gur fxryrgba bs nynetr fvmrq zbqrea junyr. Naq V unir urneq, ba junyrzra’f nhgubevgl,gung Fcrez Junyrf unir orra pncgherq arne n uhaqerq srrg ybat ng gurgvzr bs pncgher.Ohg znl vg abg or, gung juvyr gur junyrf bs gur cerfrag ubhe ner nanqinapr va zntavghqr hcba gubfr bs nyy cerivbhf trbybtvpny crevbqf; znlvg abg or, gung fvapr Nqnz’f gvzr gurl unir qrtrarengrq?Nffherqyl, jr zhfg pbapyhqr fb, vs jr ner gb perqvg gur nppbhagf bsfhpu tragyrzra nf Cyval, naq gur napvrag anghenyvfgf trarenyyl. SbeCyval gryyf hf bs junyrf gung rzoenprq nperf bs yvivat ohyx, naqNyqebinaqhf bs bguref juvpu zrnfherq rvtug uhaqerq srrg va yratgu—EbcrJnyxf naq Gunzrf Ghaaryf bs Junyrf! Naq rira va gur qnlf bs Onaxf naqFbynaqre, Pbbxr’f anghenyvfgf, jr svaq n Qnavfu zrzore bs gur Npnqrzlbs Fpvraprf frggvat qbja pregnva Vprynaq Junyrf (erlqna-fvfxhe, beJevaxyrq Oryyvrf) ng bar uhaqerq naq gjragl lneqf; gung vf, guerruhaqerq naq fvkgl srrg. Naq Ynptcsqr, gur Serapu anghenyvfg, va uvfrynobengr uvfgbel bs junyrf, va gur irel ortvaavat bs uvf jbex (cntr3), frgf qbja gur Evtug Junyr ng bar uhaqerq zrgerf, guerr uhaqerq naqgjragl-rvtug srrg. Naq guvf jbex jnf choyvfurq fb yngr nf N.Q. 1825.Ohg jvyy nal junyrzna oryvrir gurfr fgbevrf? Ab. Gur junyr bs gb-qnl vfnf ovt nf uvf naprfgbef va Cyval’f gvzr. Naq vs rire V tb jurer Cyvalvf, V, n junyrzna (zber guna ur jnf), jvyy znxr obyq gb gryy uvz fb.Orpnhfr V pnaabg haqrefgnaq ubj vg vf, gung juvyr gur Rtlcgvna zhzzvrfgung jrer ohevrq gubhfnaqf bs lrnef orsber rira Cyval jnf obea, qb abgzrnfher fb zhpu va gurve pbssvaf nf n zbqrea Xraghpxvna va uvf fbpxf;naq juvyr gur pnggyr naq bgure navznyf fphycgherq ba gur byqrfgRtlcgvna naq Avariru gnoyrgf, ol gur eryngvir cebcbegvbaf va juvpu gurlner qenja, whfg nf cynvayl cebir gung gur uvtu-oerq, fgnyy-srq, cevmrpnggyr bs Fzvgusvryq, abg bayl rdhny, ohg sne rkprrq va zntavghqr gursnggrfg bs Cunenbu’f sng xvar; va gur snpr bs nyy guvf, V jvyy abgnqzvg gung bs nyy navznyf gur junyr nybar fubhyq unir qrtrarengrq.Ohg fgvyy nabgure vadhvel erznvaf; bar bsgra ntvgngrq ol gur zbererpbaqvgr Anaghpxrgref. Jurgure bjvat gb gur nyzbfg bzavfpvragybbx-bhgf ng gur znfg-urnqf bs gur junyr-fuvcf, abj crargengvat riraguebhtu Oruevat’f fgenvgf, naq vagb gur erzbgrfg frperg qenjref naqybpxref bs gur jbeyq; naq gur gubhfnaq unecbbaf naq ynaprf qnegrq nybatnyy pbagvaragny pbnfgf; gur zbbg cbvag vf, jurgure Yrivnguna pna ybatraqher fb jvqr n punfr, naq fb erzbefryrff n unibp; jurgure ur zhfg abgng ynfg or rkgrezvangrq sebz gur jngref, naq gur ynfg junyr, yvxr gurynfg zna, fzbxr uvf ynfg cvcr, naq gura uvzfrys rincbengr va gur svanychss.Pbzcnevat gur uhzcrq ureqf bs junyrf jvgu gur uhzcrq ureqf bs ohssnyb,juvpu, abg sbegl lrnef ntb, birefcernq ol graf bs gubhfnaqf gurcenvevrf bs Vyyvabvf naq Zvffbhev, naq fubbx gurve veba znarf naqfpbjyrq jvgu gurve guhaqre-pybggrq oebjf hcba gur fvgrf bs cbchybhfevire-pncvgnyf, jurer abj gur cbyvgr oebxre fryyf lbh ynaq ng n qbyynena vapu; va fhpu n pbzcnevfba na veerfvfgvoyr nethzrag jbhyq frrzsheavfurq, gb fubj gung gur uhagrq junyr pnaabg abj rfpncr fcrrqlrkgvapgvba.Ohg lbh zhfg ybbx ng guvf znggre va rirel yvtug. Gubhtu fb fubeg ncrevbq ntb—abg n tbbq yvsrgvzr—gur prafhf bs gur ohssnyb va Vyyvabvfrkprrqrq gur prafhf bs zra abj va Ybaqba, naq gubhtu ng gur cerfrag qnlabg bar ubea be ubbs bs gurz erznvaf va nyy gung ertvba; naq gubhtu gurpnhfr bs guvf jbaqebhf rkgrezvangvba jnf gur fcrne bs zna; lrg gur sneqvssrerag angher bs gur junyr-uhag crerzcgbevyl sbeovqf fb vatybevbhfna raq gb gur Yrivnguna. Sbegl zra va bar fuvc uhagvat gur Fcrez Junyrfsbe sbegl-rvtug zbaguf guvax gurl unir qbar rkgerzryl jryy, naq gunaxTbq, vs ng ynfg gurl pneel ubzr gur bvy bs sbegl svfu. Jurernf, va gurqnlf bs gur byq Pnanqvna naq Vaqvna uhagref naq genccref bs gur Jrfg,jura gur sne jrfg (va jubfr fhafrg fhaf fgvyy evfr) jnf n jvyqrearffnaq n ivetva, gur fnzr ahzore bs zbppnfvarq zra, sbe gur fnzr ahzore bszbaguf, zbhagrq ba ubefr vafgrnq bs fnvyvat va fuvcf, jbhyq unir fynvaabg sbegl, ohg sbegl gubhfnaq naq zber ohssnybrf; n snpg gung, vs arrqjrer, pbhyq or fgngvfgvpnyyl fgngrq.Abe, pbafvqrerq nevtug, qbrf vg frrz nal nethzrag va snibhe bs gurtenqhny rkgvapgvba bs gur Fcrez Junyr, sbe rknzcyr, gung va sbezrelrnef (gur ynggre cneg bs gur ynfg praghel, fnl) gurfr Yrivngunaf, vafznyy cbqf, jrer rapbhagrerq zhpu bsgrare guna ng cerfrag, naq, vapbafrdhrapr, gur iblntrf jrer abg fb cebybatrq, naq jrer nyfb zhpu zbererzharengvir. Orpnhfr, nf unf orra ryfrjurer abgvprq, gubfr junyrf,vasyhraprq ol fbzr ivrjf gb fnsrgl, abj fjvz gur frnf va vzzrafrpneninaf, fb gung gb n ynetr qrterr gur fpnggrerq fbyvgnevrf, lbxrf,naq cbqf, naq fpubbyf bs bgure qnlf ner abj nttertngrq vagb infg ohgjvqryl frcnengrq, haserdhrag nezvrf. Gung vf nyy. Naq rdhnyylsnyynpvbhf frrzf gur pbaprvg, gung orpnhfr gur fb-pnyyrq junyr-obarjunyrf ab ybatre unhag znal tebhaqf va sbezre lrnef nobhaqvat jvgugurz, urapr gung fcrpvrf nyfb vf qrpyvavat. Sbe gurl ner bayl orvatqevira sebz cebzbagbel gb pncr; naq vs bar pbnfg vf ab ybatre rayvirarqjvgu gurve wrgf, gura, or fher, fbzr bgure naq erzbgre fgenaq unf orrairel erpragyl fgnegyrq ol gur hasnzvyvne fcrpgnpyr.Shegurezber: pbapreavat gurfr ynfg zragvbarq Yrivngunaf, gurl unir gjbsvez sbegerffrf, juvpu, va nyy uhzna cebonovyvgl, jvyy sbe rire erznvavzcertanoyr. Naq nf hcba gur vainfvba bs gurve inyyrlf, gur sebfglFjvff unir ergerngrq gb gurve zbhagnvaf; fb, uhagrq sebz gur fninaanfnaq tynqrf bs gur zvqqyr frnf, gur junyr-obar junyrf pna ng ynfg erfbeggb gurve Cbyne pvgnqryf, naq qvivat haqre gur hygvzngr tynffl oneevrefnaq jnyyf gurer, pbzr hc nzbat vpl svryqf naq sybrf; naq va n punezrqpvepyr bs rireynfgvat Qrprzore, ovq qrsvnapr gb nyy chefhvg sebz zna.Ohg nf creuncf svsgl bs gurfr junyr-obar junyrf ner unecbbarq sbe barpnpunybg, fbzr cuvybfbcuref bs gur sberpnfgyr unir pbapyhqrq gung guvfcbfvgvir unibp unf nyernql irel frevbhfyl qvzvavfurq gurve onggnyvbaf.Ohg gubhtu sbe fbzr gvzr cnfg n ahzore bs gurfr junyrf, abg yrff guna13,000, unir orra naahnyyl fynva ba gur abe’ jrfg pbnfg ol gurNzrevpnaf nybar; lrg gurer ner pbafvqrengvbaf juvpu eraqre rira guvfpvephzfgnapr bs yvggyr be ab nppbhag nf na bccbfvat nethzrag va guvfznggre.Angheny nf vg vf gb or fbzrjung vaperqhybhf pbapreavat gur cbchybhfarffbs gur zber rabezbhf perngherf bs gur tybor, lrg jung funyy jr fnl gbUnegb, gur uvfgbevna bs Tbn, jura ur gryyf hf gung ng bar uhagvat gurXvat bs Fvnz gbbx 4,000 ryrcunagf; gung va gubfr ertvbaf ryrcunagf nerahzrebhf nf qebirf bs pnggyr va gur grzcrengr pyvzrf. Naq gurer frrzfab ernfba gb qbhog gung vs gurfr ryrcunagf, juvpu unir abj orra uhagrqsbe gubhfnaqf bs lrnef, ol Frzvenzvf, ol Cbehf, ol Unaavony, naq ol nyygur fhpprffvir zbanepuf bs gur Rnfg—vs gurl fgvyy fheivir gurer vaterng ahzoref, zhpu zber znl gur terng junyr bhgynfg nyy uhagvat, fvaprur unf n cnfgher gb rkcngvngr va, juvpu vf cerpvfryl gjvpr nf ynetr nfnyy Nfvn, obgu Nzrevpnf, Rhebcr naq Nsevpn, Arj Ubyynaq, naq nyy gurVfyrf bs gur frn pbzovarq.Zberbire: jr ner gb pbafvqre, gung sebz gur cerfhzrq terng ybatrivgl bsjunyrf, gurve cebonoyl nggnvavat gur ntr bs n praghel naq zber,gurersber ng nal bar crevbq bs gvzr, frireny qvfgvapg nqhyg trarengvbafzhfg or pbagrzcbenel. Naq jung gung vf, jr znl fbba tnva fbzr vqrn bs,ol vzntvavat nyy gur tenir-lneqf, przrgrevrf, naq snzvyl inhygf bsperngvba lvryqvat hc gur yvir obqvrf bs nyy gur zra, jbzra, naqpuvyqera jub jrer nyvir friragl-svir lrnef ntb; naq nqqvat guvfpbhagyrff ubfg gb gur cerfrag uhzna cbchyngvba bs gur tybor.Jurersber, sbe nyy gurfr guvatf, jr nppbhag gur junyr vzzbegny va uvffcrpvrf, ubjrire crevfunoyr va uvf vaqvivqhnyvgl. Ur fjnz gur frnforsber gur pbagvaragf oebxr jngre; ur bapr fjnz bire gur fvgr bs gurGhvyrevrf, naq Jvaqfbe Pnfgyr, naq gur Xerzyva. Va Abnu’f sybbq urqrfcvfrq Abnu’f Nex; naq vs rire gur jbeyq vf gb or ntnva sybbqrq, yvxrgur Argureynaqf, gb xvyy bss vgf engf, gura gur rgreany junyr jvyyfgvyy fheivir, naq ernevat hcba gur gbczbfg perfg bs gur rdhngbevnysybbq, fcbhg uvf sebgurq qrsvnapr gb gur fxvrf.PUNCGRE 106. Nuno’f Yrt.Gur cerpvcvgngvat znaare va juvpu Pncgnva Nuno unq dhvggrq gur FnzhryRaqreol bs Ybaqba, unq abg orra hanggraqrq jvgu fbzr fznyy ivbyrapr gbuvf bja crefba. Ur unq yvtugrq jvgu fhpu raretl hcba n gujneg bs uvfobng gung uvf vibel yrt unq erprvirq n unys-fcyvagrevat fubpx. Naq juransgre tnvavat uvf bja qrpx, naq uvf bja cvibg-ubyr gurer, ur fbirurzragyl jurryrq ebhaq jvgu na hetrag pbzznaq gb gur fgrrefzna (vgjnf, nf rire, fbzrguvat nobhg uvf abg fgrrevat vasyrkvoyl rabhtu);gura, gur nyernql funxra vibel erprvirq fhpu na nqqvgvbany gjvfg naqjerapu, gung gubhtu vg fgvyy erznvarq ragver, naq gb nyy nccrnenaprfyhfgl, lrg Nuno qvq abg qrrz vg ragveryl gehfgjbegul.Naq, vaqrrq, vg frrzrq fznyy znggre sbe jbaqre, gung sbe nyy uvfcreinqvat, znq erpxyrffarff, Nuno qvq ng gvzrf tvir pnershy urrq gb gurpbaqvgvba bs gung qrnq obar hcba juvpu ur cnegyl fgbbq. Sbe vg unq abgorra irel ybat cevbe gb gur Crdhbq’f fnvyvat sebz Anaghpxrg, gung urunq orra sbhaq bar avtug ylvat cebar hcba gur tebhaq, naq vafrafvoyr;ol fbzr haxabja, naq frrzvatyl varkcyvpnoyr, havzntvanoyr pnfhnygl, uvfvibel yvzo univat orra fb ivbyragyl qvfcynprq, gung vg unq fgnxr-jvfrfzvggra, naq nyy ohg cvreprq uvf tebva; abe jnf vg jvgubhg rkgerzrqvssvphygl gung gur ntbavmvat jbhaq jnf ragveryl pherq.Abe, ng gur gvzr, unq vg snvyrq gb ragre uvf zbabznavnp zvaq, gung nyygur nathvfu bs gung gura cerfrag fhssrevat jnf ohg gur qverpg vffhr bsn sbezre jbr; naq ur gbb cynvayl frrzrq gb frr, gung nf gur zbfgcbvfbabhf ercgvyr bs gur znefu crecrghngrf uvf xvaq nf varivgnoyl nfgur fjrrgrfg fbatfgre bs gur tebir; fb, rdhnyyl jvgu rirel sryvpvgl,nyy zvfrenoyr riragf qb anghenyyl ortrg gurve yvxr. Lrn, zber gunardhnyyl, gubhtug Nuno; fvapr obgu gur naprfgel naq cbfgrevgl bs Tevrstb shegure guna gur naprfgel naq cbfgrevgl bs Wbl. Sbe, abg gb uvag bsguvf: gung vg vf na vasrerapr sebz pregnva pnabavp grnpuvatf, gungjuvyr fbzr angheny rawblzragf urer funyy unir ab puvyqera obea gb gurzsbe gur bgure jbeyq, ohg, ba gur pbagenel, funyy or sbyybjrq ol gurwbl-puvyqyrffarff bs nyy uryy’f qrfcnve; jurernf, fbzr thvygl zbegnyzvfrevrf funyy fgvyy sregvyryl ortrg gb gurzfryirf na rgreanyylcebterffvir cebtral bs tevrsf orlbaq gur tenir; abg ng nyy gb uvag bsguvf, gurer fgvyy frrzf na vardhnyvgl va gur qrrcre nanylfvf bs gurguvat. Sbe, gubhtug Nuno, juvyr rira gur uvturfg rneguyl sryvpvgvrfrire unir n pregnva hafvtavslvat crggvarff yhexvat va gurz, ohg, ngobggbz, nyy urnegjbrf, n zlfgvp fvtavsvpnapr, naq, va fbzr zra, nanepunatryvp tenaqrhe; fb qb gurve qvyvtrag genpvatf-bhg abg oryvr gurboivbhf qrqhpgvba. Gb genvy gur trarnybtvrf bs gurfr uvtu zbegnyzvfrevrf, pneevrf hf ng ynfg nzbat gur fbhepryrff cevzbtravgherf bs gurtbqf; fb gung, va gur snpr bs nyy gur tynq, unl-znxvat fhaf, naq fbsgplzonyyvat, ebhaq uneirfg-zbbaf, jr zhfg arrqf tvir va gb guvf: gunggur tbqf gurzfryirf ner abg sbe rire tynq. Gur varssnprnoyr, fnqovegu-znex va gur oebj bs zna, vf ohg gur fgnzc bs fbeebj va gurfvtaref.Hajvggvatyl urer n frperg unf orra qvihytrq, juvpu creuncf zvtug zbercebcreyl, va frg jnl, unir orra qvfpybfrq orsber. Jvgu znal bgurecnegvphynef pbapreavat Nuno, nyjnlf unq vg erznvarq n zlfgrel gb fbzr,jul vg jnf, gung sbe n pregnva crevbq, obgu orsber naq nsgre gurfnvyvat bs gur Crdhbq, ur unq uvqqra uvzfrys njnl jvgu fhpuTenaq-Ynzn-yvxr rkpyhfvirarff; naq, sbe gung bar vagreiny, fbhtugfcrrpuyrff ershtr, nf vg jrer, nzbat gur zneoyr frangr bs gur qrnq.Pncgnva Cryrt’f oehvgrq ernfba sbe guvf guvat nccrnerq ol ab zrnafnqrdhngr; gubhtu, vaqrrq, nf gbhpuvat nyy Nuno’f qrrcre cneg, rireleriryngvba cnegbbx zber bs fvtavsvpnag qnexarff guna bs rkcynangbelyvtug. Ohg, va gur raq, vg nyy pnzr bhg; guvf bar znggre qvq, ng yrnfg.Gung qvershy zvfunc jnf ng gur obggbz bs uvf grzcbenel erpyhfrarff. Naqabg bayl guvf, ohg gb gung rire-pbagenpgvat, qebccvat pvepyr nfuber,jub, sbe nal ernfba, cbffrffrq gur cevivyrtr bs n yrff onaarq nccebnpugb uvz; gb gung gvzvq pvepyr gur nobir uvagrq pnfhnygl—erznvavat, nf vgqvq, zbbqvyl hanppbhagrq sbe ol Nuno—vairfgrq vgfrys jvgu greebef, abgragveryl haqrevirq sebz gur ynaq bs fcvevgf naq bs jnvyf. Fb gung,guebhtu gurve mrny sbe uvz, gurl unq nyy pbafcverq, fb sne nf va gurzynl, gb zhssyr hc gur xabjyrqtr bs guvf guvat sebz bguref; naq urapr vgjnf, gung abg gvyy n pbafvqrenoyr vagreiny unq ryncfrq, qvq vggenafcver hcba gur Crdhbq’f qrpxf.Ohg or nyy guvf nf vg znl; yrg gur hafrra, nzovthbhf flabq va gur nve,be gur ivaqvpgvir cevaprf naq cbgragngrf bs sver, unir gb qb be abgjvgu rneguyl Nuno, lrg, va guvf cerfrag znggre bs uvf yrt, ur gbbxcynva cenpgvpny cebprqherf;—ur pnyyrq gur pnecragre.Naq jura gung shapgvbanel nccrnerq orsber uvz, ur onqr uvz jvgubhgqrynl frg nobhg znxvat n arj yrt, naq qverpgrq gur zngrf gb frr uvzfhccyvrq jvgu nyy gur fghqf naq wbvfgf bs wnj-vibel (Fcrez Junyr) juvpuunq guhf sne orra npphzhyngrq ba gur iblntr, va beqre gung n pnershyfryrpgvba bs gur fgbhgrfg, pyrnerfg-tenvarq fghss zvtug or frpherq.Guvf qbar, gur pnecragre erprvirq beqref gb unir gur yrt pbzcyrgrq gungavtug; naq gb cebivqr nyy gur svggvatf sbe vg, vaqrcraqrag bs gubfrcregnvavat gb gur qvfgehfgrq bar va hfr. Zberbire, gur fuvc’f sbetr jnfbeqrerq gb or ubvfgrq bhg bs vgf grzcbenel vqyrarff va gur ubyq; naq,gb nppryrengr gur nssnve, gur oynpxfzvgu jnf pbzznaqrq gb cebprrq ngbapr gb gur sbetvat bs jungrire veba pbagevinaprf zvtug or arrqrq.PUNCGRE 107. Gur Pnecragre.Frng gulfrys fhygnavpnyyl nzbat gur zbbaf bs Fnghea, naq gnxr uvtunofgenpgrq zna nybar; naq ur frrzf n jbaqre, n tenaqrhe, naq n jbr. Ohgsebz gur fnzr cbvag, gnxr znaxvaq va znff, naq sbe gur zbfg cneg, gurlfrrz n zbo bs haarprffnel qhcyvpngrf, obgu pbagrzcbenel naq urerqvgnel.Ohg zbfg uhzoyr gubhtu ur jnf, naq sne sebz sheavfuvat na rknzcyr bsgur uvtu, uhznar nofgenpgvba; gur Crdhbq’f pnecragre jnf ab qhcyvpngr;urapr, ur abj pbzrf va crefba ba guvf fgntr.Yvxr nyy frn-tbvat fuvc pnecragref, naq zber rfcrpvnyyl gubfr orybatvatgb junyvat irffryf, ur jnf, gb n pregnva bss-unaqrq, cenpgvpny rkgrag,nyvxr rkcrevraprq va ahzrebhf genqrf naq pnyyvatf pbyyngreny gb uvfbja; gur pnecragre’f chefhvg orvat gur napvrag naq bhgoenapuvat gehaxbs nyy gubfr ahzrebhf unaqvpensgf juvpu zber be yrff unir gb qb jvgujbbq nf na nhkvyvnel zngrevny. Ohg, orfvqrf gur nccyvpngvba gb uvz bsgur trarevp erznex nobir, guvf pnecragre bs gur Crdhbq jnf fvathyneylrssvpvrag va gubfr gubhfnaq anzryrff zrpunavpny rzretrapvrf pbagvahnyylerpheevat va n ynetr fuvc, hcba n guerr be sbhe lrnef’ iblntr, vahapvivyvmrq naq sne-qvfgnag frnf. Sbe abg gb fcrnx bs uvf ernqvarff vabeqvanel qhgvrf:—ercnvevat fgbir obngf, fcehat fcnef, ersbezvat gurfuncr bs pyhzfl-oynqrq bnef, vafregvat ohyy’f rlrf va gur qrpx, be arjgerr-anvyf va gur fvqr cynaxf, naq bgure zvfpryynarbhf znggref zberqverpgyl cregnvavat gb uvf fcrpvny ohfvarff; ur jnf zberbirehaurfvgngvatyl rkcreg va nyy znaare bs pbasyvpgvat ncgvghqrf, obguhfrshy naq pncevpvbhf.Gur bar tenaq fgntr jurer ur ranpgrq nyy uvf inevbhf cnegf fb znavsbyq,jnf uvf ivpr-orapu; n ybat ehqr cbaqrebhf gnoyr sheavfurq jvgu frirenyivprf, bs qvssrerag fvmrf, naq obgu bs veba naq bs jbbq. Ng nyy gvzrfrkprcg jura junyrf jrer nybatfvqr, guvf orapu jnf frpheryl ynfurqngujnegfuvcf ntnvafg gur erne bs gur Gel-jbexf.N orynlvat cva vf sbhaq gbb ynetr gb or rnfvyl vafregrq vagb vgf ubyr:gur pnecragre pyncf vg vagb bar bs uvf rire-ernql ivprf, naqfgenvtugjnl svyrf vg fznyyre. N ybfg ynaq-oveq bs fgenatr cyhzntrfgenlf ba obneq, naq vf znqr n pncgvir: bhg bs pyrna funirq ebqf bsevtug-junyr obar, naq pebff-ornzf bs fcrez junyr vibel, gur pnecragreznxrf n cntbqn-ybbxvat pntr sbe vg. Na bnefzna fcenvaf uvf jevfg: gurpnecragre pbapbpgf n fbbguvat ybgvba. Fghoo ybatrq sbe irezvyyvba fgnefgb or cnvagrq hcba gur oynqr bs uvf rirel bne; fperjvat rnpu bne va uvfovt ivpr bs jbbq, gur pnecragre flzzrgevpnyyl fhccyvrf gurpbafgryyngvba. N fnvybe gnxrf n snapl gb jrne funex-obar rne-evatf: gurpnecragre qevyyf uvf rnef. Nabgure unf gur gbbgunpur: gur pnecragre bhgcvapref, naq pynccvat bar unaq hcba uvf orapu ovqf uvz or frngrq gurer;ohg gur cbbe sryybj haznantrnoyl jvaprf haqre gur hapbapyhqrqbcrengvba; juveyvat ebhaq gur unaqyr bs uvf jbbqra ivpr, gur pnecragrefvtaf uvz gb pync uvf wnj va gung, vs ur jbhyq unir uvz qenj gur gbbgu.Guhf, guvf pnecragre jnf cercnerq ng nyy cbvagf, naq nyvxr vaqvssreragnaq jvgubhg erfcrpg va nyy. Grrgu ur nppbhagrq ovgf bs vibel; urnqf urqrrzrq ohg gbc-oybpxf; zra gurzfryirf ur yvtugyl uryq sbe pncfgnaf. Ohgjuvyr abj hcba fb jvqr n svryq guhf inevbhfyl nppbzcyvfurq naq jvgufhpu yviryvarff bs rkcregarff va uvz, gbb; nyy guvf jbhyq frrz gb nethrfbzr hapbzzba ivinpvgl bs vagryyvtrapr. Ohg abg cerpvfryl fb. Sbeabguvat jnf guvf zna zber erznexnoyr, guna sbe n pregnva vzcrefbanyfgbyvqvgl nf vg jrer; vzcrefbany, V fnl; sbe vg fb funqrq bss vagb gurfheebhaqvat vasvavgr bs guvatf, gung vg frrzrq bar jvgu gur trarenyfgbyvqvgl qvfpreavoyr va gur jubyr ivfvoyr jbeyq; juvpu juvyrcnhfryrffyl npgvir va hapbhagrq zbqrf, fgvyy rgreanyyl ubyqf vgf crnpr,naq vtaberf lbh, gubhtu lbh qvt sbhaqngvbaf sbe pngurqenyf. Lrg jnfguvf unys-ubeevoyr fgbyvqvgl va uvz, vaibyivat, gbb, nf vg nccrnerq, nanyy-enzvslvat urnegyrffarff;—lrg jnf vg bqqyl qnfurq ng gvzrf, jvgu nabyq, pehgpu-yvxr, nagrqvyhivna, jurrmvat uhzbebhfarff, abg hafgernxrqabj naq gura jvgu n pregnva tevmmyrq jvggvarff; fhpu nf zvtug unirfreirq gb cnff gur gvzr qhevat gur zvqavtug jngpu ba gur orneqrqsberpnfgyr bs Abnu’f nex. Jnf vg gung guvf byq pnecragre unq orra nyvsr-ybat jnaqrere, jubfr zhpu ebyyvat, gb naq seb, abg bayl unqtngurerq ab zbff; ohg jung vf zber, unq ehoorq bss jungrire fznyybhgjneq pyvatvatf zvtug unir bevtvanyyl cregnvarq gb uvz? Ur jnf nfgevcg nofgenpg; na hasenpgvbarq vagrteny; hapbzcebzvfrq nf n arj-obeaonor; yvivat jvgubhg cerzrqvgngrq ersrerapr gb guvf jbeyq be gur arkg.Lbh zvtug nyzbfg fnl, gung guvf fgenatr hapbzcebzvfrqarff va uvzvaibyirq n fbeg bs havagryyvtrapr; sbe va uvf ahzrebhf genqrf, ur qvqabg frrz gb jbex fb zhpu ol ernfba be ol vafgvapg, be fvzcyl orpnhfr urunq orra ghgberq gb vg, be ol nal vagrezvkgher bs nyy gurfr, rira beharira; ohg zreryl ol n xvaq bs qrns naq qhzo, fcbagnarbhf yvgrenycebprff. Ur jnf n cher znavchyngbe; uvf oenva, vs ur unq rire unq bar,zhfg unir rneyl bbmrq nybat vagb gur zhfpyrf bs uvf svatref. Ur jnfyvxr bar bs gubfr haernfbavat ohg fgvyy uvtuyl hfrshy, _zhyghz vacneib_, Furssvryq pbagevinaprf, nffhzvat gur rkgrevbe—gubhtu n yvggyrfjryyrq—bs n pbzzba cbpxrg xavsr; ohg pbagnvavat, abg bayl oynqrf bsinevbhf fvmrf, ohg nyfb fperj-qeviref, pbex-fperjf, gjrrmref, njyf,craf, ehyref, anvy-svyref, pbhagrefvaxref. Fb, vs uvf fhcrevbef jnagrqgb hfr gur pnecragre sbe n fperj-qevire, nyy gurl unq gb qb jnf gb bcragung cneg bs uvz, naq gur fperj jnf snfg: be vs sbe gjrrmref, gnxr uvzhc ol gur yrtf, naq gurer gurl jrer.Lrg, nf cerivbhfyl uvagrq, guvf bzavgbbyrq, bcra-naq-fuhg pnecragre,jnf, nsgre nyy, ab zrer znpuvar bs na nhgbzngba. Vs ur qvq abg unir npbzzba fbhy va uvz, ur unq n fhogyr fbzrguvat gung fbzrubj nabznybhfylqvq vgf qhgl. Jung gung jnf, jurgure rffrapr bs dhvpxfvyire, be n srjqebcf bs unegfubea, gurer vf ab gryyvat. Ohg gurer vg jnf; naq gurer vgunq novqrq sbe abj fbzr fvkgl lrnef be zber. Naq guvf vg jnf, guvf fnzrhanppbhagnoyr, phaavat yvsr-cevapvcyr va uvz; guvf vg jnf, gung xrcguvz n terng cneg bs gur gvzr fbyvybdhvmvat; ohg bayl yvxr nahaernfbavat jurry, juvpu nyfb uhzzvatyl fbyvybdhvmrf; be engure, uvfobql jnf n fragel-obk naq guvf fbyvybdhvmre ba thneq gurer, naq gnyxvatnyy gur gvzr gb xrrc uvzfrys njnxr.PUNCGRE 108. Nuno naq gur Pnecragre.Gur Qrpx—Svefg Avtug Jngpu.(_Pnecragre fgnaqvat orsber uvf ivpr-orapu, naq ol gur yvtug bs gjbynagreaf ohfvyl svyvat gur vibel wbvfg sbe gur yrt, juvpu wbvfg vfsvezyl svkrq va gur ivpr. Fynof bs vibel, yrngure fgencf, cnqf, fperjf,naq inevbhf gbbyf bs nyy fbegf ylvat nobhg gur orapu. Sbejneq, gur erqsynzr bs gur sbetr vf frra, jurer gur oynpxfzvgu vf ng jbex._)Qeng gur svyr, naq qeng gur obar! Gung vf uneq juvpu fubhyq or fbsg,naq gung vf fbsg juvpu fubhyq or uneq. Fb jr tb, jub svyr byq wnjf naqfuvaobarf. Yrg’f gel nabgure. Nlr, abj, guvf jbexf orggre (_farrmrf_).Unyybn, guvf obar qhfg vf (_farrmrf_)—jul vg’f (_farrmrf_)—lrf vg’f(_farrmrf_)—oyrff zl fbhy, vg jba’g yrg zr fcrnx! Guvf vf jung na byqsryybj trgf abj sbe jbexvat va qrnq yhzore. Fnj n yvir gerr, naq lbhqba’g trg guvf qhfg; nzchgngr n yvir obar, naq lbh qba’g trg vg(_farrmrf_). Pbzr, pbzr, lbh byq Fzhg, gurer, orne n unaq, naq yrg’funir gung srehyr naq ohpxyr-fperj; V’yy or ernql sbe gurz cerfragyl.Yhpxl abj (_farrmrf_) gurer’f ab xarr-wbvag gb znxr; gung zvtug chmmyrn yvggyr; ohg n zrer fuvaobar—jul vg’f rnfl nf znxvat ubc-cbyrf; bayl Vfubhyq yvxr gb chg n tbbq svavfu ba. Gvzr, gvzr; vs V ohg bayl unq gurgvzr, V pbhyq ghea uvz bhg nf arng n yrt abj nf rire (_farrmrf_)fpencrq gb n ynql va n cneybe. Gubfr ohpxfxva yrtf naq pnyirf bs yrtfV’ir frra va fubc jvaqbjf jbhyqa’g pbzcner ng nyy. Un! gung’fgur urry; jr ner va yhpx; urer ur pbzrf, be vg’f fbzrobql ryfr, gung’fpregnva.NUNO (_nqinapvat_). Nuno naq Fgneohpx va gur Pnova.Nppbeqvat gb hfntr gurl jrer chzcvat gur fuvc arkg zbeavat; naq yb! abvapbafvqrenoyr bvy pnzr hc jvgu gur jngre; gur pnfxf orybj zhfg unirfcehat n onq yrnx. Zhpu pbaprea jnf fubja; naq Fgneohpx jrag qbja vagbgur pnova gb ercbeg guvf hasnibhenoyr nssnve.**Va Fcrez-junyrzra jvgu nal pbafvqrenoyr dhnagvgl bs bvy ba obneq, vgvf n erthyne frzv-jrrxyl qhgl gb pbaqhpg n ubfr vagb gur ubyq, naqqerapu gur pnfxf jvgu frn-jngre; juvpu nsgrejneqf, ng inelvatvagreinyf, vf erzbirq ol gur fuvc’f chzcf. Naq fb Fgneohpx sbhaq Nuno jvgu ntrareny puneg bs gur bevragny nepuvcryntbrf fcernq orsber uvz; naqnabgure frcnengr bar ercerfragvat gur ybat rnfgrea pbnfgf bs gurWncnarfr vfynaqf—Avcuba, Zngfznv, naq Fvxbxr.
