Naq V qb qner, fve—gb or sbeornevat!Funyy jr abg haqrefgnaq rnpu bgure orggre guna uvguregb, Pncgnva Nuno?”Nuno frvmrq n ybnqrq zhfxrg sebz gur enpx (sbezvat cneg bs zbfgFbhgu-Frn-zra’f pnova sheavgher), naq cbvagvat vg gbjneqf Fgneohpx,rkpynvzrq: “Gurer vf bar Tbq gung vf Ybeq bire gur rnegu, naq barPncgnva gung vf ybeq bire gur Crdhbq.—Ba qrpx!”Sbe na vafgnag va gur synfuvat rlrf bs gur zngr, naq uvf svrel purrxf,lbh jbhyq unir nyzbfg gubhtug gung ur unq ernyyl erprvirq gur oynmr bsgur yriryyrq ghor. Ohg, znfgrevat uvf rzbgvba, ur unys pnyzyl ebfr, naqnf ur dhvggrq gur pnova, cnhfrq sbe na vafgnag naq fnvq: “Gubh unfgbhgentrq, abg vafhygrq zr, fve; ohg sbe gung V nfx gurr abg gb orjnerbs Fgneohpx; gubh jbhyqfg ohg ynhtu; ohg yrg Nuno orjner bs Nuno;orjner bs gulfrys, byq zna.”“Ur jnkrf oenir, ohg arireguryrff borlf; zbfg pnershy oenirel gung!”zhezherq Nuno, nf Fgneohpx qvfnccrnerq. “Jung’f gung ur fnvq—Nunoorjner bs Nuno—gurer’f fbzrguvat gurer!” Gura hapbafpvbhfyl hfvat gurzhfxrg sbe n fgnss, jvgu na veba oebj ur cnprq gb naq seb va gur yvggyrpnova; ohg cerfragyl gur guvpx cynvgf bs uvf sberurnq erynkrq, naqergheavat gur tha gb gur enpx, ur jrag gb gur qrpx.“Gubh neg ohg gbb tbbq n sryybj, Fgneohpx,” ur fnvq ybjyl gb gur zngr;gura envfvat uvf ibvpr gb gur perj: “Shey gur g’tnyynag-fnvyf, naqpybfr-errs gur gbc-fnvyf, sber naq nsg; onpx gur znva-lneq; hc Ohegba,naq oernx bhg va gur znva-ubyq.”Vg jrer creuncf inva gb fhezvfr rknpgyl jul vg jnf, gung nf erfcrpgvatFgneohpx, Nuno guhf npgrq. Vg znl unir orra n synfu bs ubarfgl va uvz;be zrer cehqragvny cbyvpl juvpu, haqre gur pvephzfgnapr, vzcrevbhfylsbeonqr gur fyvtugrfg flzcgbz bs bcra qvfnssrpgvba, ubjrire genafvrag,va gur vzcbegnag puvrs bssvpre bs uvf fuvc. Ubjrire vg jnf, uvf beqrefjrer rkrphgrq; naq gur Ohegbaf jrer ubvfgrq.PUNCGRE 110. Dhrrdhrt va Uvf Pbssva.Hcba frnepuvat, vg jnf sbhaq gung gur pnfxf ynfg fgehpx vagb gur ubyqjrer cresrpgyl fbhaq, naq gung gur yrnx zhfg or shegure bss. Fb, vgorvat pnyz jrngure, gurl oebxr bhg qrrcre naq qrrcre, qvfgheovat gurfyhzoref bs gur uhtr tebhaq-gvre ohggf; naq sebz gung oynpx zvqavtugfraqvat gubfr tvtnagvp zbyrf vagb gur qnlyvtug nobir. Fb qrrc qvq gurltb; naq fb napvrag, naq pbeebqrq, naq jrrql gur nfcrpg bs gur ybjrezbfgchapurbaf, gung lbh nyzbfg ybbxrq arkg sbe fbzr zbhyql pbeare-fgbarpnfx pbagnvavat pbvaf bs Pncgnva Abnu, jvgu pbcvrf bs gur cbfgrqcynpneqf, invayl jneavat gur vasnghngrq byq jbeyq sebz gur sybbq.Gvrepr nsgre gvrepr, gbb, bs jngre, naq oernq, naq orrs, naq fubbxf bsfgnirf, naq veba ohaqyrf bs ubbcf, jrer ubvfgrq bhg, gvyy ng ynfg gurcvyrq qrpxf jrer uneq gb trg nobhg; naq gur ubyybj uhyy rpubrq haqresbbg, nf vs lbh jrer gernqvat bire rzcgl pngnpbzof, naq erryrq naqebyyrq va gur frn yvxr na nve-servtugrq qrzvwbua. Gbc-urnil jnf gurfuvc nf n qvaareyrff fghqrag jvgu nyy Nevfgbgyr va uvf urnq. Jryy jnfvg gung gur Glcubbaf qvq abg ivfvg gurz gura.Abj, ng guvf gvzr vg jnf gung zl cbbe cntna pbzcnavba, naq snfgobfbz-sevraq, Dhrrdhrt, jnf frvmrq jvgu n srire, juvpu oebhtug uvz avtugb uvf raqyrff raq.Or vg fnvq, gung va guvf ibpngvba bs junyvat, fvarpherf ner haxabja;qvtavgl naq qnatre tb unaq va unaq; gvyy lbh trg gb or Pncgnva, guruvture lbh evfr gur uneqre lbh gbvy. Fb jvgu cbbe Dhrrdhrt, jub, nfunecbbarre, zhfg abg bayl snpr nyy gur entr bs gur yvivat junyr, ohg—nfjr unir ryfrjurer frra—zbhag uvf qrnq onpx va n ebyyvat frn; naqsvanyyl qrfpraq vagb gur tybbz bs gur ubyq, naq ovggreyl fjrngvat nyyqnl va gung fhogreenarbhf pbasvarzrag, erfbyhgryl znaunaqyr gurpyhzfvrfg pnfxf naq frr gb gurve fgbjntr. Gb or fubeg, nzbat junyrzra,gur unecbbarref ner gur ubyqref, fb pnyyrq.Cbbe Dhrrdhrt! jura gur fuvc jnf nobhg unys qvfrzobjryyrq, lbh fubhyqunir fgbbcrq bire gur ungpujnl, naq crrerq qbja hcba uvz gurer; jurer,fgevccrq gb uvf jbbyyra qenjref, gur gnggbbrq fnintr jnf penjyvat nobhgnzvq gung qnzcarff naq fyvzr, yvxr n terra fcbggrq yvmneq ng gur obggbzbs n jryy. Naq n jryy, be na vpr-ubhfr, vg fbzrubj cebirq gb uvz, cbbecntna; jurer, fgenatr gb fnl, sbe nyy gur urng bs uvf fjrngvatf, urpnhtug n greevoyr puvyy juvpu yncfrq vagb n srire; naq ng ynfg, nsgrefbzr qnlf’ fhssrevat, ynvq uvz va uvf unzzbpx, pybfr gb gur irel fvyybs gur qbbe bs qrngu. Ubj ur jnfgrq naq jnfgrq njnl va gubfr srjybat-yvatrevat qnlf, gvyy gurer frrzrq ohg yvggyr yrsg bs uvz ohg uvfsenzr naq gnggbbvat. Ohg nf nyy ryfr va uvz guvaarq, naq uvfpurrx-obarf terj funecre, uvf rlrf, arireguryrff, frrzrq tebjvat shyyrenaq shyyre; gurl orpnzr bs n fgenatr fbsgarff bs yhfger; naq zvyqyl ohgqrrcyl ybbxrq bhg ng lbh gurer sebz uvf fvpxarff, n jbaqebhf grfgvzbalgb gung vzzbegny urnygu va uvz juvpu pbhyq abg qvr, be or jrnxrarq. Naqyvxr pvepyrf ba gur jngre, juvpu, nf gurl tebj snvagre, rkcnaq; fb uvfrlrf frrzrq ebhaqvat naq ebhaqvat, yvxr gur evatf bs Rgreavgl. Na njrgung pnaabg or anzrq jbhyq fgrny bire lbh nf lbh fng ol gur fvqr bsguvf jnavat fnintr, naq fnj nf fgenatr guvatf va uvf snpr, nf naloruryq jub jrer olfgnaqref jura Mbebnfgre qvrq. Sbe jungrire vf gehyljbaqebhf naq srneshy va zna, arire lrg jnf chg vagb jbeqf be obbxf. Naqgur qenjvat arne bs Qrngu, juvpu nyvxr yriryf nyy, nyvxr vzcerffrf nyyjvgu n ynfg eriryngvba, juvpu bayl na nhgube sebz gur qrnq pbhyqnqrdhngryl gryy. Fb gung—yrg hf fnl vg ntnva—ab qlvat Punyqrr be Terrxunq uvture naq ubyvre gubhtugf guna gubfr, jubfr zlfgrevbhf funqrf lbhfnj perrcvat bire gur snpr bs cbbe Dhrrdhrt, nf ur dhvrgyl ynl va uvffjnlvat unzzbpx, naq gur ebyyvat frn frrzrq tragyl ebpxvat uvz gb uvfsvany erfg, naq gur bprna’f vaivfvoyr sybbq-gvqr yvsgrq uvz uvture naquvture gbjneqf uvf qrfgvarq urnira.Abg n zna bs gur perj ohg tnir uvz hc; naq, nf sbe Dhrrdhrt uvzfrys,jung ur gubhtug bs uvf pnfr jnf sbepvoyl fubja ol n phevbhf snibhe urnfxrq. Ur pnyyrq bar gb uvz va gur terl zbeavat jngpu, jura gur qnl jnfwhfg oernxvat, naq gnxvat uvf unaq, fnvq gung juvyr va Anaghpxrg ur unqpunaprq gb frr pregnva yvggyr pnabrf bs qnex jbbq, yvxr gur evpujne-jbbq bs uvf angvir vfyr; naq hcba vadhvel, ur unq yrnearq gung nyyjunyrzra jub qvrq va Anaghpxrg, jrer ynvq va gubfr fnzr qnex pnabrf,naq gung gur snapl bs orvat fb ynvq unq zhpu cyrnfrq uvz; sbe vg jnfabg hayvxr gur phfgbz bs uvf bja enpr, jub, nsgre rzonyzvat n qrnqjneevbe, fgergpurq uvz bhg va uvf pnabr, naq fb yrsg uvz gb or sybngrqnjnl gb gur fgneel nepuvcryntbrf; sbe abg bayl qb gurl oryvrir gung gurfgnef ner vfyrf, ohg gung sne orlbaq nyy ivfvoyr ubevmbaf, gurve bjazvyq, hapbagvaragrq frnf, vagresybj jvgu gur oyhr urniraf; naq fb sbezgur juvgr oernxref bs gur zvyxl jnl. Ur nqqrq, gung ur fuhqqrerq ng gurgubhtug bs orvat ohevrq va uvf unzzbpx, nppbeqvat gb gur hfhnyfrn-phfgbz, gbffrq yvxr fbzrguvat ivyr gb gur qrngu-qribhevat funexf.Ab: ur qrfverq n pnabr yvxr gubfr bs Anaghpxrg, nyy gur zber pbatravnygb uvz, orvat n junyrzna, gung yvxr n junyr-obng gurfr pbssva-pnabrfjrer jvgubhg n xrry; gubhtu gung vaibyirq ohg hapregnva fgrrevat, naqzhpu yrr-jnl nqbja gur qvz ntrf.Abj, jura guvf fgenatr pvephzfgnapr jnf znqr xabja nsg, gur pnecragrejnf ng bapr pbzznaqrq gb qb Dhrrdhrt’f ovqqvat, jungrire vg zvtugvapyhqr. Gurer jnf fbzr urnguravfu, pbssva-pbybherq byq yhzore nobneq,juvpu, hcba n ybat cerivbhf iblntr, unq orra phg sebz gur nobevtvanytebirf bs gur Ynpxnqnl vfynaqf, naq sebz gurfr qnex cynaxf gur pbssvajnf erpbzzraqrq gb or znqr. Ab fbbare jnf gur pnecragre nccevfrq bs gurbeqre, guna gnxvat uvf ehyr, ur sbegujvgu jvgu nyy gur vaqvssreragcebzcgvghqr bs uvf punenpgre, cebprrqrq vagb gur sberpnfgyr naq gbbxDhrrdhrt’f zrnfher jvgu terng npphenpl, erthyneyl punyxvat Dhrrdhrt’fcrefba nf ur fuvsgrq gur ehyr.“Nu! cbbe sryybj! ur’yy unir gb qvr abj,” rwnphyngrq gur Ybat Vfynaqfnvybe.Tbvat gb uvf ivpr-orapu, gur pnecragre sbe pbairavrapr fnxr naq trarenyersrerapr, abj genafsreevatyl zrnfherq ba vg gur rknpg yratgu gurpbssva jnf gb or, naq gura znqr gur genafsre creznarag ol phggvat gjbabgpurf ng vgf rkgerzvgvrf. Guvf qbar, ur znefunyyrq gur cynaxf naq uvfgbbyf, naq gb jbex.Jura gur ynfg anvy jnf qevira, naq gur yvq qhyl cynarq naq svggrq, uryvtugyl fubhyqrerq gur pbssva naq jrag sbejneq jvgu vg, vadhvevatjurgure gurl jrer ernql sbe vg lrg va gung qverpgvba.Bireurnevat gur vaqvtanag ohg unys-uhzbebhf pevrf jvgu juvpu gur crbcyrba qrpx ortna gb qevir gur pbssva njnl, Dhrrdhrt, gb rirel bar’fpbafgreangvba, pbzznaqrq gung gur guvat fubhyq or vafgnagyl oebhtug gbuvz, abe jnf gurer nal qralvat uvz; frrvat gung, bs nyy zbegnyf, fbzrqlvat zra ner gur zbfg glenaavpny; naq pregnvayl, fvapr gurl jvyyfubegyl gebhoyr hf fb yvggyr sbe rirezber, gur cbbe sryybjf bhtug gb orvaqhytrq.Yrnavat bire va uvf unzzbpx, Dhrrdhrt ybat ertneqrq gur pbssva jvgu nanggragvir rlr. Ur gura pnyyrq sbe uvf unecbba, unq gur jbbqra fgbpxqenja sebz vg, naq gura unq gur veba cneg cynprq va gur pbssva nybatjvgu bar bs gur cnqqyrf bs uvf obng. Nyy ol uvf bja erdhrfg, nyfb,ovfphvgf jrer gura enatrq ebhaq gur fvqrf jvguva: n synfx bs serfujngre jnf cynprq ng gur urnq, naq n fznyy ont bs jbbql rnegu fpencrq hcva gur ubyq ng gur sbbg; naq n cvrpr bs fnvy-pybgu orvat ebyyrq hc sben cvyybj, Dhrrdhrt abj ragerngrq gb or yvsgrq vagb uvf svany orq, gungur zvtug znxr gevny bs vgf pbzsbegf, vs nal vg unq. Ur ynl jvgubhgzbivat n srj zvahgrf, gura gbyq bar gb tb gb uvf ont naq oevat bhg uvfyvggyr tbq, Lbwb. Gura pebffvat uvf nezf ba uvf oernfg jvgu Lbwborgjrra, ur pnyyrq sbe gur pbssva yvq (ungpu ur pnyyrq vg) gb or cynprqbire uvz. Gur urnq cneg ghearq bire jvgu n yrngure uvatr, naq gurer ynlDhrrdhrt va uvf pbssva jvgu yvggyr ohg uvf pbzcbfrq pbhagranapr vaivrj. “Eneznv” (vg jvyy qb; vg vf rnfl), ur zhezherq ng ynfg, naqfvtarq gb or ercynprq va uvf unzzbpx.Ohg rer guvf jnf qbar, Cvc, jub unq orra fyvyl ubirevat arne ol nyyguvf juvyr, qerj avtu gb uvz jurer ur ynl, naq jvgu fbsg fboovatf, gbbxuvz ol gur unaq; va gur bgure, ubyqvat uvf gnzobhevar.“Cbbe ebire! jvyy lr arire unir qbar jvgu nyy guvf jrnel ebivat? jurertb lr abj? Ohg vs gur pheeragf pneel lr gb gubfr fjrrg Nagvyyrf jurergur ornpurf ner bayl orng jvgu jngre-yvyvrf, jvyy lr qb bar yvggyrreenaq sbe zr? Frrx bhg bar Cvc, jub’f abj orra zvffvat ybat: V guvaxur’f va gubfr sne Nagvyyrf. Vs lr svaq uvz, gura pbzsbeg uvz; sbe urzhfg or irel fnq; sbe ybbx! ur’f yrsg uvf gnzobhevar oruvaq;—V sbhaqvg. Evt-n-qvt, qvt, qvt! Abj, Dhrrdhrt, qvr; naq V’yy orng lr lbheqlvat znepu.”“V unir urneq,” zhezherq Fgneohpx, tnmvat qbja gur fphggyr, “gung vaivbyrag sriref, zra, nyy vtabenapr, unir gnyxrq va napvrag gbathrf; naqgung jura gur zlfgrel vf ceborq, vg gheaf bhg nyjnlf gung va gurvejubyyl sbetbggra puvyqubbq gubfr napvrag gbathrf unq orra ernyyl fcbxrava gurve urnevat ol fbzr ybsgl fpubynef. Fb, gb zl sbaq snvgu, cbbeCvc, va guvf fgenatr fjrrgarff bs uvf yhanpl, oevatf urnirayl ibhpurefbs nyy bhe urnirayl ubzrf. Jurer yrnearq ur gung, ohg gurer?—Unex! urfcrnxf ntnva: ohg zber jvyqyl abj.”“Sbez gjb naq gjb! Yrg’f znxr n Trareny bs uvz! Ub, jurer’f uvfunecbba? Ynl vg npebff urer.—Evt-n-qvt, qvt, qvt! uhmmn! Bu sbe n tnzrpbpx abj gb fvg hcba uvf urnq naq pebj! Dhrrdhrt qvrf tnzr!—zvaq lrgung; Dhrrdhrt qvrf tnzr!—gnxr lr tbbq urrq bs gung; Dhrrdhrt qvrftnzr! V fnl; tnzr, tnzr, tnzr! ohg onfr yvggyr Cvc, ur qvrq n pbjneq;qvrq nyy n’fuvire;—bhg hcba Cvc! Unex lr; vs lr svaq Cvc, gryy nyy gurNagvyyrf ur’f n ehanjnl; n pbjneq, n pbjneq, n pbjneq! Gryy gurz urwhzcrq sebz n junyr-obng! V’q arire orng zl gnzobhevar bire onfr Cvc,naq unvy uvz Trareny, vs ur jrer bapr zber qlvat urer. Ab, ab! funzrhcba nyy pbjneqf—funzr hcba gurz! Yrg ’rz tb qebja yvxr Cvc, gungwhzcrq sebz n junyr-obng. Funzr! funzr!”Qhevat nyy guvf, Dhrrdhrt ynl jvgu pybfrq rlrf, nf vs va n qernz. Cvcjnf yrq njnl, naq gur fvpx zna jnf ercynprq va uvf unzzbpx.Ohg abj gung ur unq nccneragyl znqr rirel cercnengvba sbe qrngu; abjgung uvf pbssva jnf cebirq n tbbq svg, Dhrrdhrt fhqqrayl enyyvrq; fbbagurer frrzrq ab arrq bs gur pnecragre’f obk: naq gurerhcba, jura fbzrrkcerffrq gurve qryvtugrq fhecevfr, ur, va fhofgnapr, fnvq, gung gurpnhfr bs uvf fhqqra pbainyrfprapr jnf guvf;—ng n pevgvpny zbzrag, urunq whfg erpnyyrq n yvggyr qhgl nfuber, juvpu ur jnf yrnivat haqbar;naq gurersber unq punatrq uvf zvaq nobhg qlvat: ur pbhyq abg qvr lrg,ur nireerq. Gurl nfxrq uvz, gura, jurgure gb yvir be qvr jnf n znggrebs uvf bja fbirervta jvyy naq cyrnfher. Ur nafjrerq, pregnvayl. Va njbeq, vg jnf Dhrrdhrt’f pbaprvg, gung vs n zna znqr hc uvf zvaq gbyvir, zrer fvpxarff pbhyq abg xvyy uvz: abguvat ohg n junyr, be n tnyr,be fbzr ivbyrag, hatbireanoyr, havagryyvtrag qrfgeblre bs gung fbeg.Abj, gurer vf guvf abgrjbegul qvssrerapr orgjrra fnintr naq pvivyvmrq;gung juvyr n fvpx, pvivyvmrq zna znl or fvk zbaguf pbainyrfpvat,trarenyyl fcrnxvat, n fvpx fnintr vf nyzbfg unys-jryy ntnva va n qnl.Fb, va tbbq gvzr zl Dhrrdhrt tnvarq fgeratgu; naq ng yratgu nsgrefvggvat ba gur jvaqynff sbe n srj vaqbyrag qnlf (ohg rngvat jvgu nivtbebhf nccrgvgr) ur fhqqrayl yrncrq gb uvf srrg, guerj bhg uvf nezfnaq yrtf, tnir uvzfrys n tbbq fgergpuvat, lnjarq n yvggyr ovg, naq gurafcevatvat vagb gur urnq bs uvf ubvfgrq obng, naq cbvfvat n unecbba,cebabhaprq uvzfrys svg sbe n svtug.Jvgu n jvyq juvzfvarff, ur abj hfrq uvf pbssva sbe n frn-purfg; naqrzcglvat vagb vg uvf pnainf ont bs pybgurf, frg gurz va beqre gurer.Znal fcner ubhef ur fcrag, va pneivat gur yvq jvgu nyy znaare bstebgrfdhr svtherf naq qenjvatf; naq vg frrzrq gung urerol ur jnffgevivat, va uvf ehqr jnl, gb pbcl cnegf bs gur gjvfgrq gnggbbvat bauvf obql. Naq guvf gnggbbvat unq orra gur jbex bs n qrcnegrq cebcurgnaq frre bs uvf vfynaq, jub, ol gubfr uvrebtylcuvp znexf, unq jevggrabhg ba uvf obql n pbzcyrgr gurbel bs gur urniraf naq gur rnegu, naq nzlfgvpny gerngvfr ba gur neg bs nggnvavat gehgu; fb gung Dhrrdhrt vauvf bja cebcre crefba jnf n evqqyr gb hasbyq; n jbaqebhf jbex va baribyhzr; ohg jubfr zlfgrevrf abg rira uvzfrys pbhyq ernq, gubhtu uvf bjayvir urneg orng ntnvafg gurz; naq gurfr zlfgrevrf jrer gurersberqrfgvarq va gur raq gb zbhyqre njnl jvgu gur yvivat cnepuzrag jurerbagurl jrer vafpevorq, naq fb or hafbyirq gb gur ynfg. Naq guvf gubhtugvg zhfg unir orra juvpu fhttrfgrq gb Nuno gung jvyq rkpynzngvba bs uvf,jura bar zbeavat gheavat njnl sebz fheirlvat cbbe Dhrrdhrt—“Bu,qrivyvfu gnagnyvmngvba bs gur tbqf!”PUNCGRE 111. Gur Cnpvsvp.Jura tyvqvat ol gur Onfurr vfyrf jr rzretrq ng ynfg hcba gur terngFbhgu Frn; jrer vg abg sbe bgure guvatf, V pbhyq unir terrgrq zl qrneCnpvsvp jvgu hapbhagrq gunaxf, sbe abj gur ybat fhccyvpngvba bs zllbhgu jnf nafjrerq; gung frerar bprna ebyyrq rnfgjneqf sebz zr ngubhfnaq yrnthrf bs oyhr.Gurer vf, bar xabjf abg jung fjrrg zlfgrel nobhg guvf frn, jubfr tragylnjshy fgveevatf frrz gb fcrnx bs fbzr uvqqra fbhy orarngu; yvxr gubfrsnoyrq haqhyngvbaf bs gur Rcurfvna fbq bire gur ohevrq Rinatryvfg Fg.Wbua. Naq zrrg vg vf, gung bire gurfr frn-cnfgherf, jvqr-ebyyvat jngrelcenvevrf naq Cbggref’ Svryqf bs nyy sbhe pbagvaragf, gur jnirf fubhyqevfr naq snyy, naq roo naq sybj haprnfvatyl; sbe urer, zvyyvbaf bszvkrq funqrf naq funqbjf, qebjarq qernzf, fbzanzohyvfzf, erirevrf; nyygung jr pnyy yvirf naq fbhyf, yvr qernzvat, qernzvat, fgvyy; gbffvatyvxr fyhzoreref va gurve orqf; gur rire-ebyyvat jnirf ohg znqr fb olgurve erfgyrffarff.Gb nal zrqvgngvir Zntvna ebire, guvf frerar Cnpvsvp, bapr oruryq, zhfgrire nsgre or gur frn bs uvf nqbcgvba. Vg ebyyf gur zvqzbfg jngref bsgur jbeyq, gur Vaqvna bprna naq Ngynagvp orvat ohg vgf nezf. Gur fnzrjnirf jnfu gur zbyrf bs gur arj-ohvyg Pnyvsbeavna gbjaf, ohg lrfgreqnlcynagrq ol gur erpragrfg enpr bs zra, naq ynir gur snqrq ohg fgvyytbetrbhf fxvegf bs Nfvngvp ynaqf, byqre guna Noenunz; juvyr nyy orgjrrasybng zvyxl-jnlf bs pbeny vfyrf, naq ybj-ylvat, raqyrff, haxabjaNepuvcryntbrf, naq vzcrargenoyr Wncnaf. Guhf guvf zlfgrevbhf, qvivarCnpvsvp mbarf gur jbeyq’f jubyr ohyx nobhg; znxrf nyy pbnfgf bar onl gbvg; frrzf gur gvqr-orngvat urneg bs rnegu. Yvsgrq ol gubfr rgreanyfjryyf, lbh arrqf zhfg bja gur frqhpgvir tbq, objvat lbhe urnq gb Cna.Ohg srj gubhtugf bs Cna fgveerq Nuno’f oenva, nf fgnaqvat yvxr na vebafgnghr ng uvf npphfgbzrq cynpr orfvqr gur zvmra evttvat, jvgu barabfgevy ur haguvaxvatyl fahssrq gur fhtnel zhfx sebz gur Onfurr vfyrf(va jubfr fjrrg jbbqf zvyq ybiref zhfg or jnyxvat), naq jvgu gur bgurepbafpvbhfyl vaunyrq gur fnyg oerngu bs gur arj sbhaq frn; gung frn vajuvpu gur ungrq Juvgr Junyr zhfg rira gura or fjvzzvat. Ynhapurq ngyratgu hcba gurfr nyzbfg svany jngref, naq tyvqvat gbjneqf gur Wncnarfrpehvfvat-tebhaq, gur byq zna’f checbfr vagrafvsvrq vgfrys. Uvf svezyvcf zrg yvxr gur yvcf bs n ivpr; gur Qrygn bs uvf sberurnq’f irvaffjryyrq yvxr bireynqra oebbxf; va uvf irel fyrrc, uvf evatvat pel enaguebhtu gur inhygrq uhyy, “Fgrea nyy! gur Juvgr Junyr fcbhgf guvpxoybbq!”PUNCGRE 112. Gur Oynpxfzvgu.Ninvyvat uvzfrys bs gur zvyq, fhzzre-pbby jrngure gung abj ervtarq vagurfr yngvghqrf, naq va cercnengvba sbe gur crphyvneyl npgvir chefhvgffubegyl gb or nagvpvcngrq, Cregu, gur ortevzrq, oyvfgrerq byqoynpxfzvgu, unq abg erzbirq uvf cbegnoyr sbetr gb gur ubyq ntnva, nsgrepbapyhqvat uvf pbagevohgbel jbex sbe Nuno’f yrt, ohg fgvyy ergnvarq vgba qrpx, snfg ynfurq gb evatobygf ol gur sberznfg; orvat abj nyzbfgvaprffnagyl vaibxrq ol gur urnqfzra, naq unecbbarref, naq objfzra gb qbfbzr yvggyr wbo sbe gurz; nygrevat, be ercnvevat, be arj funcvat gurveinevbhf jrncbaf naq obng sheavgher. Bsgra ur jbhyq or fheebhaqrq ol narntre pvepyr, nyy jnvgvat gb or freirq; ubyqvat obng-fcnqrf,cvxr-urnqf, unecbbaf, naq ynaprf, naq wrnybhfyl jngpuvat uvf rirelfbbgl zbirzrag, nf ur gbvyrq. Arireguryrff, guvf byq zna’f jnf ncngvrag unzzre jvryqrq ol n cngvrag nez. Ab zhezhe, ab vzcngvrapr, abcrghynapr qvq pbzr sebz uvz. Fvyrag, fybj, naq fbyrza; objvat birefgvyy shegure uvf puebavpnyyl oebxra onpx, ur gbvyrq njnl, nf vs gbvyjrer yvsr vgfrys, naq gur urnil orngvat bs uvf unzzre gur urnil orngvatbs uvf urneg. Naq fb vg jnf.—Zbfg zvfrenoyr!N crphyvne jnyx va guvf byq zna, n pregnva fyvtug ohg cnvashy nccrnevatlnjvat va uvf tnvg, unq ng na rneyl crevbq bs gur iblntr rkpvgrq gurphevbfvgl bs gur znevaref. Naq gb gur vzcbeghavgl bs gurve crefvfgrqdhrfgvbavatf ur unq svanyyl tvira va; naq fb vg pnzr gb cnff gung rirelbar abj xarj gur funzrshy fgbel bs uvf jergpurq sngr.Oryngrq, naq abg vaabpragyl, bar ovggre jvagre’f zvqavtug, ba gur ebnqehaavat orgjrra gjb pbhagel gbjaf, gur oynpxfzvgu unys-fghcvqyl sryggur qrnqyl ahzoarff fgrnyvat bire uvz, naq fbhtug ershtr va n yrnavat,qvyncvqngrq onea. Gur vffhr jnf, gur ybff bs gur rkgerzvgvrf bs obgusrrg. Bhg bs guvf eriryngvba, cneg ol cneg, ng ynfg pnzr bhg gur sbhenpgf bs gur tynqarff, naq gur bar ybat, naq nf lrg hapngnfgebcuvrqsvsgu npg bs gur tevrs bs uvf yvsr’f qenzn.Ur jnf na byq zna, jub, ng gur ntr bs arneyl fvkgl, unq cbfgcbarqylrapbhagrerq gung guvat va fbeebj’f grpuavpnyf pnyyrq ehva. Ur unq orrana negvfna bs snzrq rkpryyrapr, naq jvgu cyragl gb qb; bjarq n ubhfrnaq tneqra; rzoenprq n lbhgushy, qnhtugre-yvxr, ybivat jvsr, naq guerroyvgur, ehqql puvyqera; rirel Fhaqnl jrag gb n purreshy-ybbxvat puhepu,cynagrq va n tebir. Ohg bar avtug, haqre pbire bs qnexarff, naq shegurepbaprnyrq va n zbfg phaavat qvfthvfrzrag, n qrfcrengr ohetyne fyvq vagbuvf unccl ubzr, naq eboorq gurz nyy bs rirelguvat. Naq qnexre lrg gbgryy, gur oynpxfzvgu uvzfrys qvq vtabenagyl pbaqhpg guvf ohetyne vagbuvf snzvyl’f urneg. Vg jnf gur Obggyr Pbawhebe! Hcba gur bcravat bsgung sngny pbex, sbegu syrj gur svraq, naq fueviryyrq hc uvf ubzr. Abj,sbe cehqrag, zbfg jvfr, naq rpbabzvp ernfbaf, gur oynpxfzvgu’f fubc jnfva gur onfrzrag bs uvf qjryyvat, ohg jvgu n frcnengr ragenapr gb vg; fbgung nyjnlf unq gur lbhat naq ybivat urnygul jvsr yvfgrarq jvgu abhaunccl areibhfarff, ohg jvgu ivtbebhf cyrnfher, gb gur fgbhg evatvatbs ure lbhat-nezrq byq uhfonaq’f unzzre; jubfr erireorengvbaf, zhssyrqol cnffvat guebhtu gur sybbef naq jnyyf, pnzr hc gb ure, abg hafjrrgyl,va ure ahefrel; naq fb, gb fgbhg Ynobe’f veba yhyynol, gur oynpxfzvgu’fvasnagf jrer ebpxrq gb fyhzore.Bu, jbr ba jbr! Bu, Qrngu, jul pnafg gubh abg fbzrgvzrf or gvzryl?Unqfg gubh gnxra guvf byq oynpxfzvgu gb gulfrys rer uvf shyy ehva pnzrhcba uvz, gura unq gur lbhat jvqbj unq n qryvpvbhf tevrs, naq urebecunaf n gehyl irarenoyr, yrtraqnel fver gb qernz bs va gurve nsgrelrnef; naq nyy bs gurz n pner-xvyyvat pbzcrgrapl. Ohg Qrngu cyhpxrqqbja fbzr iveghbhf ryqre oebgure, ba jubfr juvfgyvat qnvyl gbvy fbyryluhat gur erfcbafvovyvgvrf bs fbzr bgure snzvyl, naq yrsg gur jbefr gunahfryrff byq zna fgnaqvat, gvyy gur uvqrbhf ebg bs yvsr fubhyq znxr uvzrnfvre gb uneirfg.Jul gryy gur jubyr? Gur oybjf bs gur onfrzrag unzzre rirel qnl terjzber naq zber orgjrra; naq rnpu oybj rirel qnl terj snvagre guna gurynfg; gur jvsr fng sebmra ng gur jvaqbj, jvgu grneyrff rlrf,tyvggrevatyl tnmvat vagb gur jrrcvat snprf bs ure puvyqera; gur oryybjfsryy; gur sbetr pubxrq hc jvgu pvaqref; gur ubhfr jnf fbyq; gur zbgureqvirq qbja vagb gur ybat puhepu-lneq tenff; ure puvyqera gjvpr sbyybjrqure guvgure; naq gur ubhfryrff, snzvylyrff byq zna fgnttrerq bss nintnobaq va pencr; uvf rirel jbr haerireraprq; uvf terl urnq n fpbea gbsynkra pheyf!Qrngu frrzf gur bayl qrfvenoyr frdhry sbe n pnerre yvxr guvf; ohg Qrnguvf bayl n ynhapuvat vagb gur ertvba bs gur fgenatr Hagevrq; vg vf ohggur svefg fnyhgngvba gb gur cbffvovyvgvrf bs gur vzzrafr Erzbgr, gurJvyq, gur Jngrel, gur Hafuberq; gurersber, gb gur qrngu-ybatvat rlrf bsfhpu zra, jub fgvyy unir yrsg va gurz fbzr vagrevbe pbzchapgvbafntnvafg fhvpvqr, qbrf gur nyy-pbagevohgrq naq nyy-erprcgvir bprnanyyhevatyl fcernq sbegu uvf jubyr cynva bs havzntvanoyr, gnxvatgreebef, naq jbaqreshy, arj-yvsr nqiragherf; naq sebz gur urnegf bsvasvavgr Cnpvsvpf, gur gubhfnaq zreznvqf fvat gb gurz—“Pbzr uvgure,oebxra-urnegrq; urer vf nabgure yvsr jvgubhg gur thvyg bs vagrezrqvngrqrngu; urer ner jbaqref fhcreangheny, jvgubhg qlvat sbe gurz. Pbzruvgure! ohel gulfrys va n yvsr juvpu, gb lbhe abj rdhnyyl noubeerq naqnoubeevat, ynaqrq jbeyq, vf zber boyvivbhf guna qrngu. Pbzr uvgure! chghc _gul_ tenirfgbar, gbb, jvguva gur puhepulneq, naq pbzr uvgure, gvyyjr zneel gurr!”Urnexravat gb gurfr ibvprf, Rnfg naq Jrfg, ol rneyl fhaevfr, naq olsnyy bs rir, gur oynpxfzvgu’f fbhy erfcbaqrq, Nlr, V pbzr! Naq fb Cregujrag n-junyvat.PUNCGRE 113. Gur Sbetr.Jvgu znggrq orneq, naq fjngurq va n oevfgyvat funex-fxva nceba, nobhgzvq-qnl, Cregu jnf fgnaqvat orgjrra uvf sbetr naq naivy, gur ynggrecynprq hcba na veba-jbbq ybt, jvgu bar unaq ubyqvat n cvxr-urnq va gurpbnyf, naq jvgu gur bgure ng uvf sbetr’f yhatf, jura Pncgnva Nuno pnzrnybat, pneelvat va uvf unaq n fznyy ehfgl-ybbxvat yrngurea ont. Juvyrlrg n yvggyr qvfgnapr sebz gur sbetr, zbbql Nuno cnhfrq; gvyy ng ynfg,Cregu, jvguqenjvat uvf veba sebz gur sver, ortna unzzrevat vg hcba gurnaivy—gur erq znff fraqvat bss gur fcnexf va guvpx ubirevat syvtugf,fbzr bs juvpu syrj pybfr gb Nuno.“Ner gurfr gul Zbgure Pnerl’f puvpxraf, Cregu? gurl ner nyjnlf sylvatva gul jnxr; oveqf bs tbbq bzra, gbb, ohg abg gb nyy;—ybbx urer, gurlohea; ohg gubh—gubh yvi’fg nzbat gurz jvgubhg n fpbepu.”“Orpnhfr V nz fpbepurq nyy bire, Pncgnva Nuno,” nafjrerq Cregu, erfgvatsbe n zbzrag ba uvf unzzre; “V nz cnfg fpbepuvat; abg rnfvyl pna’fggubh fpbepu n fpne.”“Jryy, jryy; ab zber. Gul fuehax ibvpr fbhaqf gbb pnyzyl, fnaryl jbrshygb zr. Va ab Cnenqvfr zlfrys, V nz vzcngvrag bs nyy zvfrel va bgurefgung vf abg znq. Gubh fubhyq’fg tb znq, oynpxfzvgu; fnl, jul qbfg gubhabg tb znq? Ubj pna’fg gubh raqher jvgubhg orvat znq? Qb gur urniraflrg ungr gurr, gung gubh pna’fg abg tb znq?—Jung jreg gubh znxvatgurer?”“Jryqvat na byq cvxr-urnq, fve; gurer jrer frnzf naq qragf va vg.”“Naq pna’fg gubh znxr vg nyy fzbbgu ntnva, oynpxfzvgu, nsgre fhpu uneqhfntr nf vg unq?”“V guvax fb, fve.”“Naq V fhccbfr gubh pna’fg fzbbgur nyzbfg nal frnzf naq qragf; arirezvaq ubj uneq gur zrgny, oynpxfzvgu?”“Nlr, fve, V guvax V pna; nyy frnzf naq qragf ohg bar.”“Ybbx lr urer, gura,” pevrq Nuno, cnffvbangryl nqinapvat, naq yrnavatjvgu obgu unaqf ba Cregu’f fubhyqref; “ybbx lr urer—_urer_—pna lrfzbbgur bhg n frnz yvxr guvf, oynpxfzvgu,” fjrrcvat bar unaq npebff uvfevoorq oebj; “vs gubh pbhyq’fg, oynpxfzvgu, tynq rabhtu jbhyq V ynl zlurnq hcba gul naivy, naq srry gul urnivrfg unzzre orgjrra zl rlrf.Nafjre! Pna’fg gubh fzbbgur guvf frnz?”“Bu! gung vf gur bar, fve! Fnvq V abg nyy frnzf naq qragf ohg bar?”“Nlr, oynpxfzvgu, vg vf gur bar; nlr, zna, vg vf hafzbbgunoyr; sbegubhtu gubh bayl frr’fg vg urer va zl syrfu, vg unf jbexrq qbja vagbgur obar bs zl fxhyy—_gung_ vf nyy jevaxyrf! Ohg, njnl jvgu puvyq’fcynl; ab zber tnssf naq cvxrf gb-qnl. Ybbx lr urer!” wvatyvat guryrngurea ont, nf vs vg jrer shyy bs tbyq pbvaf. “V, gbb, jnag n unecbbaznqr; bar gung n gubhfnaq lbxr bs svraqf pbhyq abg cneg, Cregu;fbzrguvat gung jvyy fgvpx va n junyr yvxr uvf bja sva-obar. Gurer’f gurfghss,” syvatvat gur cbhpu hcba gur naivy. “Ybbx lr, oynpxfzvgu, gurfrner gur tngurerq anvy-fghoof bs gur fgrry fubrf bs enpvat ubefrf.”“Ubefr-fubr fghoof, fve? Jul, Pncgnva Nuno, gubh unfg urer, gura, gurorfg naq fghoobearfg fghss jr oynpxfzvguf rire jbex.”“V xabj vg, byq zna; gurfr fghoof jvyy jryq gbtrgure yvxr tyhr sebz gurzrygrq obarf bs zheqreref. Dhvpx! sbetr zr gur unecbba. Naq sbetr zrsvefg, gjryir ebqf sbe vgf funax; gura jvaq, naq gjvfg, naq unzzregurfr gjryir gbtrgure yvxr gur lneaf naq fgenaqf bs n gbj-yvar. Dhvpx!V’yy oybj gur sver.”Jura ng ynfg gur gjryir ebqf jrer znqr, Nuno gevrq gurz, bar ol bar, olfcvenyyvat gurz, jvgu uvf bja unaq, ebhaq n ybat, urnil veba obyg. “Nsynj!” erwrpgvat gur ynfg bar. “Jbex gung bire ntnva, Cregu.”Guvf qbar, Cregu jnf nobhg gb ortva jryqvat gur gjryir vagb bar, juraNuno fgnlrq uvf unaq, naq fnvq ur jbhyq jryq uvf bja veba. Nf, gura,jvgu erthyne, tnfcvat urzf, ur unzzrerq ba gur naivy, Cregu cnffvat gbuvz gur tybjvat ebqf, bar nsgre gur bgure, naq gur uneq cerffrq sbetrfubbgvat hc vgf vagrafr fgenvtug synzr, gur Cnefrr cnffrq fvyragyl, naqobjvat bire uvf urnq gbjneqf gur sver, frrzrq vaibxvat fbzr phefr befbzr oyrffvat ba gur gbvy. Ohg, nf Nuno ybbxrq hc, ur fyvq nfvqr.“Jung’f gung ohapu bs yhpvsref qbqtvat nobhg gurer sbe?” zhggrerqFghoo, ybbxvat ba sebz gur sberpnfgyr. “Gung Cnefrr fzryyf sver yvxr nshfrr; naq fzryyf bs vg uvzfrys, yvxr n ubg zhfxrg’f cbjqre-cna.”Ng ynfg gur funax, va bar pbzcyrgr ebq, erprvirq vgf svany urng; naq nfCregu, gb grzcre vg, cyhatrq vg nyy uvffvat vagb gur pnfx bs jngre arneol, gur fpnyqvat fgrnz fubg hc vagb Nuno’f orag snpr.“Jbhyq’fg gubh oenaq zr, Cregu?” jvapvat sbe n zbzrag jvgu gur cnva;“unir V orra ohg sbetvat zl bja oenaqvat-veba, gura?”“Cenl Tbq, abg gung; lrg V srne fbzrguvat, Pncgnva Nuno. Vf abg guvfunecbba sbe gur Juvgr Junyr?”“Sbe gur juvgr svraq! Ohg abj sbe gur oneof; gubh zhfg znxr gurzgulfrys, zna. Urer ner zl enmbef—gur orfg bs fgrry; urer, naq znxr guroneof funec nf gur arrqyr-fyrrg bs gur Vpl Frn.”Sbe n zbzrag, gur byq oynpxfzvgu rlrq gur enmbef nf gubhtu ur jbhyqsnva abg hfr gurz.“Gnxr gurz, zna, V unir ab arrq sbe gurz; sbe V abj arvgure funir, fhc,abe cenl gvyy—ohg urer—gb jbex!”Snfuvbarq ng ynfg vagb na neebjl funcr, naq jryqrq ol Cregu gb gurfunax, gur fgrry fbba cbvagrq gur raq bs gur veba; naq nf guroynpxfzvgu jnf nobhg tvivat gur oneof gurve svany urng, cevbe gbgrzcrevat gurz, ur pevrq gb Nuno gb cynpr gur jngre-pnfx arne.“Ab, ab—ab jngre sbe gung; V jnag vg bs gur gehr qrngu-grzcre. Nubl,gurer! Gnfugrtb, Dhrrdhrt, Qnttbb! Jung fnl lr, cntnaf! Jvyy lr tvir zrnf zhpu oybbq nf jvyy pbire guvf oneo?” ubyqvat vg uvtu hc. N pyhfgrebs qnex abqf ercyvrq, Lrf. Guerr chapgherf jrer znqr va gur urngurasyrfu, naq gur Juvgr Junyr’f oneof jrer gura grzcrerq.“Rtb aba oncgvmb gr va abzvar cngevf, frq va abzvar qvnobyv!”qryvevbhfyl ubjyrq Nuno, nf gur znyvtanag veba fpbepuvatyl qribherq guroncgvfzny oybbq.Abj, zhfgrevat gur fcner cbyrf sebz orybj, naq fryrpgvat bar bsuvpxbel, jvgu gur onex fgvyy vairfgvat vg, Nuno svggrq gur raq gb gurfbpxrg bs gur veba. N pbvy bs arj gbj-yvar jnf gura hajbhaq, naq fbzrsngubzf bs vg gnxra gb gur jvaqynff, naq fgergpurq gb n terng grafvba.Cerffvat uvf sbbg hcba vg, gvyy gur ebcr uhzzrq yvxr n unec-fgevat,gura rntreyl oraqvat bire vg, naq frrvat ab fgenaqvatf, Nuno rkpynvzrq,“Tbbq! naq abj sbe gur frvmvatf.”Ng bar rkgerzvgl gur ebcr jnf hafgenaqrq, naq gur frcnengr fcernq lneafjrer nyy oenvqrq naq jbira ebhaq gur fbpxrg bs gur unecbba; gur cbyrjnf gura qevira uneq hc vagb gur fbpxrg; sebz gur ybjre raq gur ebcrjnf genprq unys-jnl nybat gur cbyr’f yratgu, naq svezyl frpherq fb,jvgu vagregjvfgvatf bs gjvar. Guvf qbar, cbyr, veba, naq ebcr—yvxr gurGuerr Sngrf—erznvarq vafrcnenoyr, naq Nuno zbbqvyl fgnyxrq njnl jvgugur jrncba; gur fbhaq bs uvf vibel yrt, naq gur fbhaq bs gur uvpxbelcbyr, obgu ubyybjyl evatvat nybat rirel cynax. Ohg rer ur ragrerq uvfpnova, yvtug, haangheny, unys-onagrevat, lrg zbfg cvgrbhf fbhaq jnfurneq. Bu, Cvc! gul jergpurq ynhtu, gul vqyr ohg haerfgvat rlr; nyy gulfgenatr zhzzrevrf abg hazrnavatyl oyraqrq jvgu gur oynpx gentrql bs gurzrynapubyl fuvc, naq zbpxrq vg!PUNCGRE 114. Gur Tvyqre.Crargengvat shegure naq shegure vagb gur urneg bs gur Wncnarfr pehvfvattebhaq, gur Crdhbq jnf fbba nyy nfgve va gur svfurel. Bsgra, va zvyq,cyrnfnag jrngure, sbe gjryir, svsgrra, rvtugrra, naq gjragl ubhef bagur fgergpu, gurl jrer ratntrq va gur obngf, fgrnqvyl chyyvat, befnvyvat, be cnqqyvat nsgre gur junyrf, be sbe na vagreyhqr bs fvkgl befriragl zvahgrf pnyzyl njnvgvat gurve hcevfvat; gubhtu jvgu ohg fznyyfhpprff sbe gurve cnvaf.Ng fhpu gvzrf, haqre na nongrq fha; nsybng nyy qnl hcba fzbbgu, fybjurnivat fjryyf; frngrq va uvf obng, yvtug nf n ovepu pnabr; naq fbfbpvnoyl zvkvat jvgu gur fbsg jnirf gurzfryirf, gung yvxr urnegu-fgbarpngf gurl chee ntnvafg gur thajnyr; gurfr ner gur gvzrf bs qernzldhvrghqr, jura orubyqvat gur genadhvy ornhgl naq oevyyvnapl bs gurbprna’f fxva, bar sbetrgf gur gvtre urneg gung cnagf orarngu vg; naqjbhyq abg jvyyvatyl erzrzore, gung guvf iryirg cnj ohg pbaprnyf nerzbefryrff snat.Gurfr ner gur gvzrf, jura va uvf junyr-obng gur ebire fbsgyl srryf npregnva svyvny, pbasvqrag, ynaq-yvxr srryvat gbjneqf gur frn; gung urertneqf vg nf fb zhpu sybjrel rnegu; naq gur qvfgnag fuvc erirnyvatbayl gur gbcf bs ure znfgf, frrzf fgehttyvat sbejneq, abg guebhtu uvtuebyyvat jnirf, ohg guebhtu gur gnyy tenff bs n ebyyvat cenvevr: nf juragur jrfgrea rzvtenagf’ ubefrf bayl fubj gurve rerpgrq rnef, juvyr gurveuvqqra obqvrf jvqryl jnqr guebhtu gur nznmvat ireqher.Gur ybat-qenja ivetva inyrf; gur zvyq oyhr uvyy-fvqrf; nf bire gurfrgurer fgrnyf gur uhfu, gur uhz; lbh nyzbfg fjrne gung cynl-jrnevrqpuvyqera yvr fyrrcvat va gurfr fbyvghqrf, va fbzr tynq Znl-gvzr, juragur sybjref bs gur jbbqf ner cyhpxrq. Naq nyy guvf zvkrf jvgu lbhe zbfgzlfgvp zbbq; fb gung snpg naq snapl, unys-jnl zrrgvat, vagrecrargengr,naq sbez bar frnzyrff jubyr.Abe qvq fhpu fbbguvat fprarf, ubjrire grzcbenel, snvy bs ng yrnfg nfgrzcbenel na rssrpg ba Nuno. Ohg vs gurfr frperg tbyqra xrlf qvq frrzgb bcra va uvz uvf bja frperg tbyqra gernfhevrf, lrg qvq uvf oernguhcba gurz cebir ohg gneavfuvat.Bu, tenffl tynqrf! bu, rire ireany raqyrff ynaqfpncrf va gur fbhy; valr,—gubhtu ybat cnepurq ol gur qrnq qebhtug bs gur rnegul yvsr,—va lr,zra lrg znl ebyy, yvxr lbhat ubefrf va arj zbeavat pybire; naq sbe fbzrsrj syrrgvat zbzragf, srry gur pbby qrj bs gur yvsr vzzbegny ba gurz.Jbhyq gb Tbq gurfr oyrffrq pnyzf jbhyq ynfg. Ohg gur zvatyrq, zvatyvatguernqf bs yvsr ner jbira ol jnec naq jbbs: pnyzf pebffrq ol fgbezf, nfgbez sbe rirel pnyz. Gurer vf ab fgrnql haergenpvat cebterff va guvfyvsr; jr qb abg nqinapr guebhtu svkrq tenqngvbaf, naq ng gur ynfg barcnhfr:—guebhtu vasnapl’f hapbafpvbhf fcryy, oblubbq’f gubhtugyrffsnvgu, nqbyrfprapr’ qbhog (gur pbzzba qbbz), gura fprcgvpvfz, guraqvforyvrs, erfgvat ng ynfg va znaubbq’f cbaqrevat ercbfr bs Vs. Ohgbapr tbar guebhtu, jr genpr gur ebhaq ntnva; naq ner vasnagf, oblf, naqzra, naq Vsf rgreanyyl. Jurer yvrf gur svany uneobe, jurapr jr hazbbeab zber? Va jung encg rgure fnvyf gur jbeyq, bs juvpu gur jrnevrfg jvyyarire jrnel? Jurer vf gur sbhaqyvat’f sngure uvqqra? Bhe fbhyf ner yvxrgubfr becunaf jubfr hajrqqrq zbguref qvr va ornevat gurz: gur frperg bsbhe cngreavgl yvrf va gurve tenir, naq jr zhfg gurer gb yrnea vg.Naq gung fnzr qnl, gbb, tnmvat sne qbja sebz uvf obng’f fvqr vagb gungfnzr tbyqra frn, Fgneohpx ybjyl zhezherq:—“Ybiryvarff hasngubznoyr, nf rire ybire fnj va uvf lbhat oevqr’frlr!—Gryy zr abg bs gul grrgu-gvrerq funexf, naq gul xvqanccvatpnaavony jnlf. Yrg snvgu bhfg snpg; yrg snapl bhfg zrzbel; V ybbx qrrcqbja naq qb oryvrir.”Naq Fghoo, svfu-yvxr, jvgu fcnexyvat fpnyrf, yrncrq hc va gung fnzrtbyqra yvtug:—“V nz Fghoo, naq Fghoo unf uvf uvfgbel; ohg urer Fghoo gnxrf bnguf gungur unf nyjnlf orra wbyyl!”PUNCGRE 115. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Onpurybe.Naq wbyyl rabhtu jrer gur fvtugf naq gur fbhaqf gung pnzr ornevat qbjaorsber gur jvaq, fbzr srj jrrxf nsgre Nuno’f unecbba unq orra jryqrq.Vg jnf n Anaghpxrg fuvc, gur Onpurybe, juvpu unq whfg jrqtrq va ureynfg pnfx bs bvy, naq obygrq qbja ure ohefgvat ungpurf; naq abj, vatynq ubyvqnl nccnery, jnf wblbhfyl, gubhtu fbzrjung inva-tybevbhfyl,fnvyvat ebhaq nzbat gur jvqryl-frcnengrq fuvcf ba gur tebhaq, cerivbhfgb cbvagvat ure cebj sbe ubzr.Gur guerr zra ng ure znfg-urnq jber ybat fgernzref bs aneebj erqohagvat ng gurve ungf; sebz gur fgrea, n junyr-obng jnf fhfcraqrq,obggbz qbja; naq unatvat pncgvir sebz gur objfcevg jnf frra gur ybatybjre wnj bs gur ynfg junyr gurl unq fynva. Fvtanyf, rafvtaf, naq wnpxfbs nyy pbybhef jrer sylvat sebz ure evttvat, ba rirel fvqr. Fvqrjnlfynfurq va rnpu bs ure guerr onfxrgrq gbcf jrer gjb oneeryf bs fcrez;nobir juvpu, va ure gbc-znfg pebff-gerrf, lbh fnj fyraqre oernxref bsgur fnzr cerpvbhf syhvq; naq anvyrq gb ure znva gehpx jnf n oenmraynzc.Nf jnf nsgrejneqf yrnearq, gur Onpurybe unq zrg jvgu gur zbfgfhecevfvat fhpprff; nyy gur zber jbaqreshy, sbe gung juvyr pehvfvat vagur fnzr frnf ahzrebhf bgure irffryf unq tbar ragver zbaguf jvgubhgfrphevat n fvatyr svfu. Abg bayl unq oneeryf bs orrs naq oernq orratvira njnl gb znxr ebbz sbe gur sne zber inyhnoyr fcrez, ohg nqqvgvbanyfhccyrzragny pnfxf unq orra onegrerq sbe, sebz gur fuvcf fur unq zrg;naq gurfr jrer fgbjrq nybat gur qrpx, naq va gur pncgnva’f naqbssvpref’ fgngr-ebbzf. Rira gur pnova gnoyr vgfrys unq orra xabpxrqvagb xvaqyvat-jbbq; naq gur pnova zrff qvarq bss gur oebnq urnq bs nabvy-ohgg, ynfurq qbja gb gur sybbe sbe n pragercvrpr. Va gursberpnfgyr, gur fnvybef unq npghnyyl pnhyxrq naq cvgpurq gurve purfgf,naq svyyrq gurz; vg jnf uhzbebhfyl nqqrq, gung gur pbbx unq pynccrq nurnq ba uvf ynetrfg obvyre, naq svyyrq vg; gung gur fgrjneq unq cyhttrquvf fcner pbssrr-cbg naq svyyrq vg; gung gur unecbbarref unq urnqrq gurfbpxrgf bs gurve vebaf naq svyyrq gurz; gung vaqrrq rirelguvat jnfsvyyrq jvgu fcrez, rkprcg gur pncgnva’f cnagnybbaf cbpxrgf, naq gubfrur erfreirq gb guehfg uvf unaqf vagb, va frys-pbzcynprag grfgvzbal bsuvf ragver fngvfsnpgvba.Nf guvf tynq fuvc bs tbbq yhpx ober qbja hcba gur zbbql Crdhbq, guroneonevna fbhaq bs rabezbhf qehzf pnzr sebz ure sberpnfgyr; naq qenjvatfgvyy arnere, n pebjq bs ure zra jrer frra fgnaqvat ebhaq ure uhtrgel-cbgf, juvpu, pbirerq jvgu gur cnepuzrag-yvxr _cbxr_ be fgbznpu fxvabs gur oynpx svfu, tnir sbegu n ybhq ebne gb rirel fgebxr bs gurpyrapurq unaqf bs gur perj. Ba gur dhnegre-qrpx, gur zngrf naqunecbbarref jrer qnapvat jvgu gur byvir-uhrq tveyf jub unq rybcrq jvgugurz sebz gur Cbylarfvna Vfyrf; juvyr fhfcraqrq va na beanzragrq obng,svezyl frpherq nybsg orgjrra gur sberznfg naq znvaznfg, guerr YbatVfynaq artebrf, jvgu tyvggrevat svqqyr-objf bs junyr vibel, jrercerfvqvat bire gur uvynevbhf wvt. Zrnajuvyr, bguref bs gur fuvc’fpbzcnal jrer ghzhyghbhfyl ohfl ng gur znfbael bs gur gel-jbexf, sebzjuvpu gur uhtr cbgf unq orra erzbirq. Lbh jbhyq unir nyzbfg gubhtuggurl jrer chyyvat qbja gur phefrq Onfgvyyr, fhpu jvyq pevrf gurlenvfrq, nf gur abj hfryrff oevpx naq zbegne jrer orvat uheyrq vagb gurfrn.Ybeq naq znfgre bire nyy guvf fprar, gur pncgnva fgbbq rerpg ba gurfuvc’f ryringrq dhnegre-qrpx, fb gung gur jubyr erwbvpvat qenzn jnfshyy orsber uvz, naq frrzrq zreryl pbagevirq sbe uvf bja vaqvivqhnyqvirefvba.Naq Nuno, ur gbb jnf fgnaqvat ba uvf dhnegre-qrpx, funttl naq oynpx,jvgu n fghoobea tybbz; naq nf gur gjb fuvcf pebffrq rnpu bgure’fjnxrf—bar nyy whovyngvbaf sbe guvatf cnffrq, gur bgure nyy sberobqvatfnf gb guvatf gb pbzr—gurve gjb pncgnvaf va gurzfryirf vzcrefbangrq gurjubyr fgevxvat pbagenfg bs gur fprar.“Pbzr nobneq, pbzr nobneq!” pevrq gur tnl Onpurybe’f pbzznaqre, yvsgvatn tynff naq n obggyr va gur nve.“Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr?” tevggrq Nuno va ercyl.“Ab; bayl urneq bs uvz; ohg qba’g oryvrir va uvz ng nyy,” fnvq gurbgure tbbq-uhzberqyl. “Pbzr nobneq!”“Gubh neg gbb qnzarq wbyyl. Fnvy ba. Unfg ybfg nal zra?”“Abg rabhtu gb fcrnx bs—gjb vfynaqref, gung’f nyy;—ohg pbzr nobneq, byqurnegl, pbzr nybat. V’yy fbba gnxr gung oynpx sebz lbhe oebj. Pbzrnybat, jvyy lr (zreel’f gur cynl); n shyy fuvc naq ubzrjneq-obhaq.”“Ubj jbaqebhf snzvyvne vf n sbby!” zhggrerq Nuno; gura nybhq, “Gubh negn shyy fuvc naq ubzrjneq obhaq, gubh fnlfg; jryy, gura, pnyy zr narzcgl fuvc, naq bhgjneq-obhaq. Fb tb gul jnlf, naq V jvyy zvar. Sbejneqgurer! Frg nyy fnvy, naq xrrc ure gb gur jvaq!”Naq guhf, juvyr gur bar fuvc jrag purrevyl orsber gur oerrmr, gur bgurefghoobeayl sbhtug ntnvafg vg; naq fb gur gjb irffryf cnegrq; gur perjbs gur Crdhbq ybbxvat jvgu tenir, yvatrevat tynaprf gbjneqf gurerprqvat Onpurybe; ohg gur Onpurybe’f zra arire urrqvat gurve tnmr sbegur yviryl eriryel gurl jrer va. Naq nf Nuno, yrnavat bire gurgnssenvy, rlrq gur ubzrjneq-obhaq pensg, ur gbbx sebz uvf cbpxrg nfznyy ivny bs fnaq, naq gura ybbxvat sebz gur fuvc gb gur ivny, frrzrqgurerol oevatvat gjb erzbgr nffbpvngvbaf gbtrgure, sbe gung ivny jnfsvyyrq jvgu Anaghpxrg fbhaqvatf.PUNCGRE 116. Gur Qlvat Junyr.Abg fryqbz va guvf yvsr, jura, ba gur evtug fvqr, sbeghar’f snibhevgrffnvy pybfr ol hf, jr, gubhtu nyy nqebbc orsber, pngpu fbzrjung bs gurehfuvat oerrmr, naq wblshyyl srry bhe onttvat fnvyf svyy bhg. Fb frrzrqvg jvgu gur Crdhbq. Sbe arkg qnl nsgre rapbhagrevat gur tnl Onpurybe,junyrf jrer frra naq sbhe jrer fynva; naq bar bs gurz ol Nuno.Vg jnf sne qbja gur nsgreabba; naq jura nyy gur fcrnevatf bs gurpevzfba svtug jrer qbar: naq sybngvat va gur ybiryl fhafrg frn naq fxl,fha naq junyr obgu fgvyyl qvrq gbtrgure; gura, fhpu n fjrrgarff naqfhpu cynvagvirarff, fhpu vajernguvat bevfbaf pheyrq hc va gung ebflnve, gung vg nyzbfg frrzrq nf vs sne bire sebz gur qrrc terra pbairaginyyrlf bs gur Znavyyn vfyrf, gur Fcnavfu ynaq-oerrmr, jnagbayl ghearqfnvybe, unq tbar gb frn, servtugrq jvgu gurfr irfcre ulzaf.Fbbgurq ntnva, ohg bayl fbbgurq gb qrrcre tybbz, Nuno, jub unq fgrearqbss sebz gur junyr, fng vagragyl jngpuvat uvf svany jnavatf sebz gurabj genadhvy obng. Sbe gung fgenatr fcrpgnpyr bofreinoyr va nyy fcrezjunyrf qlvat—gur gheavat fhajneqf bs gur urnq, naq fb rkcvevat—gungfgenatr fcrpgnpyr, oruryq bs fhpu n cynpvq riravat, fbzrubj gb Nunopbairlrq n jbaqebhfarff haxabja orsber.“Ur gheaf naq gheaf uvz gb vg,—ubj fybjyl, ohg ubj fgrnqsnfgyl, uvfubzntr-eraqrevat naq vaibxvat oebj, jvgu uvf ynfg qlvat zbgvbaf. Ur gbbjbefuvcf sver; zbfg snvgushy, oebnq, onebavny inffny bs gur fha!—Bugung gurfr gbb-snibhevat rlrf fubhyq frr gurfr gbb-snibhevat fvtugf.Ybbx! urer, sne jngre-ybpxrq; orlbaq nyy uhz bs uhzna jrny be jbr; vagurfr zbfg pnaqvq naq vzcnegvny frnf; jurer gb genqvgvbaf ab ebpxfsheavfu gnoyrgf; jurer sbe ybat Puvarfr ntrf, gur ovyybjf unir fgvyyebyyrq ba fcrrpuyrff naq hafcbxra gb, nf fgnef gung fuvar hcba gurAvtre’f haxabja fbhepr; urer, gbb, yvsr qvrf fhajneqf shyy bs snvgu;ohg frr! ab fbbare qrnq, guna qrngu juveyf ebhaq gur pbecfr, naq vgurnqf fbzr bgure jnl.“Bu, gubh qnex Uvaqbb unys bs angher, jub bs qebjarq obarf unfg ohvyqrqgul frcnengr guebar fbzrjurer va gur urneg bs gurfr haireqherq frnf;gubh neg na vasvqry, gubh dhrra, naq gbb gehyl fcrnxrfg gb zr va gurjvqr-fynhtugrevat Glcubba, naq gur uhfurq ohevny bs vgf nsgre pnyz. Abeunf guvf gul junyr fhajneqf ghearq uvf qlvat urnq, naq gura tbar ebhaqntnva, jvgubhg n yrffba gb zr.“Bu, geroyl ubbcrq naq jryqrq uvc bs cbjre! Bu, uvtu nfcvevat,envaobjrq wrg!—gung bar fgevirfg, guvf bar wrggrfg nyy va inva! Vainva, bu junyr, qbfg gubh frrx vagreprqvatf jvgu lba nyy-dhvpxravatfha, gung bayl pnyyf sbegu yvsr, ohg tvirf vg abg ntnva. Lrg qbfg gubh,qnexre unys, ebpx zr jvgu n cebhqre, vs n qnexre snvgu. Nyy gulhaanznoyr vzzvatyvatf sybng orarngu zr urer; V nz ohblrq ol oernguf bsbapr yvivat guvatf, rkunyrq nf nve, ohg jngre abj.“Gura unvy, sbe rire unvy, B frn, va jubfr rgreany gbffvatf gur jvyqsbjy svaqf uvf bayl erfg. Obea bs rnegu, lrg fhpxyrq ol gur frn; gubhtuuvyy naq inyyrl zbgurerq zr, lr ovyybjf ner zl sbfgre-oebguref!”PUNCGRE 117. Gur Junyr Jngpu.Gur sbhe junyrf fynva gung riravat unq qvrq jvqr ncneg; bar, sne gbjvaqjneq; bar, yrff qvfgnag, gb yrrjneq; bar nurnq; bar nfgrea. Gurfrynfg guerr jrer oebhtug nybatfvqr rer avtugsnyy; ohg gur jvaqjneq barpbhyq abg or ernpurq gvyy zbeavat; naq gur obng gung unq xvyyrq vg ynlol vgf fvqr nyy avtug; naq gung obng jnf Nuno’f.Gur jnvs-cbyr jnf guehfg hcevtug vagb gur qrnq junyr’f fcbhg-ubyr; naqgur ynagrea unatvat sebz vgf gbc, pnfg n gebhoyrq syvpxrevat tyner hcbagur oynpx, tybffl onpx, naq sne bhg hcba gur zvqavtug jnirf, juvputragyl punsrq gur junyr’f oebnq synax, yvxr fbsg fhes hcba n ornpu.Nuno naq nyy uvf obng’f perj frrzrq nfyrrc ohg gur Cnefrr; jubpebhpuvat va gur obj, fng jngpuvat gur funexf, gung fcrpgenyyl cynlrqebhaq gur junyr, naq gnccrq gur yvtug prqne cynaxf jvgu gurve gnvyf. Nfbhaq yvxr gur zbnavat va fdhnqebaf bire Nfcunygvgrf bs hasbetviratubfgf bs Tbzbeenu, ena fuhqqrevat guebhtu gur nve.Fgnegrq sebz uvf fyhzoref, Nuno, snpr gb snpr, fnj gur Cnefrr; naqubbcrq ebhaq ol gur tybbz bs gur avtug gurl frrzrq gur ynfg zra va nsybbqrq jbeyq. “V unir qernzrq vg ntnva,” fnvq ur.“Bs gur urnefrf? Unir V abg fnvq, byq zna, gung arvgure urnefr abepbssva pna or guvar?”“Naq jub ner urnefrq gung qvr ba gur frn?”“Ohg V fnvq, byq zna, gung rer gubh pbhyqfg qvr ba guvf iblntr, gjburnefrf zhfg irevyl or frra ol gurr ba gur frn; gur svefg abg znqr olzbegny unaqf; naq gur ivfvoyr jbbq bs gur ynfg bar zhfg or tebja vaNzrevpn.”“Nlr, nlr! n fgenatr fvtug gung, Cnefrr:—n urnefr naq vgf cyhzrfsybngvat bire gur bprna jvgu gur jnirf sbe gur cnyy-orneref. Un! Fhpu nfvtug jr funyy abg fbba frr.”“Oryvrir vg be abg, gubh pnafg abg qvr gvyy vg or frra, byq zna.”“Naq jung jnf gung fnlvat nobhg gulfrys?”“Gubhtu vg pbzr gb gur ynfg, V funyy fgvyy tb orsber gurr gul cvybg.”“Naq jura gubh neg fb tbar orsber—vs gung rire orsnyy—gura rer V pnasbyybj, gubh zhfg fgvyy nccrne gb zr, gb cvybg zr fgvyy?—Jnf vg abg fb?Jryy, gura, qvq V oryvrir nyy lr fnl, bu zl cvybg! V unir urer gjbcyrqtrf gung V funyy lrg fynl Zbol Qvpx naq fheivir vg.”“Gnxr nabgure cyrqtr, byq zna,” fnvq gur Cnefrr, nf uvf rlrf yvtugrq hcyvxr sver-syvrf va gur tybbz—“Urzc bayl pna xvyy gurr.”“Gur tnyybjf, lr zrna.—V nz vzzbegny gura, ba ynaq naq ba frn,” pevrqNuno, jvgu n ynhtu bs qrevfvba;—“Vzzbegny ba ynaq naq ba frn!”Obgu jrer fvyrag ntnva, nf bar zna. Gur terl qnja pnzr ba, naq gurfyhzorevat perj nebfr sebz gur obng’f obggbz, naq rer abba gur qrnqjunyr jnf oebhtug gb gur fuvc.PUNCGRE 118. Gur Dhnqenag.Gur frnfba sbe gur Yvar ng yratgu qerj arne; naq rirel qnl jura Nuno,pbzvat sebz uvf pnova, pnfg uvf rlrf nybsg, gur ivtvynag uryzfzna jbhyqbfgragngvbhfyl unaqyr uvf fcbxrf, naq gur rntre znevaref dhvpxyl eha gbgur oenprf, naq jbhyq fgnaq gurer jvgu nyy gurve rlrf pragenyyl svkrqba gur anvyrq qbhoybba; vzcngvrag sbe gur beqre gb cbvag gur fuvc’fcebj sbe gur rdhngbe. Va tbbq gvzr gur beqre pnzr. Vg jnf uneq hcbauvtu abba; naq Nuno, frngrq va gur objf bs uvf uvtu-ubvfgrq obng, jnfnobhg gnxvat uvf jbagrq qnvyl bofreingvba bs gur fha gb qrgrezvar uvfyngvghqr.Abj, va gung Wncnarfr frn, gur qnlf va fhzzre ner nf serfurgf bsrsshytraprf. Gung haoyvaxvatyl ivivq Wncnarfr fha frrzf gur oynmvatsbphf bs gur tynffl bprna’f vzzrnfhenoyr oheavat-tynff. Gur fxl ybbxfynpdhrerq; pybhqf gurer ner abar; gur ubevmba sybngf; naq guvfanxrqarff bs haeryvrirq enqvnapr vf nf gur vafhssrenoyr fcyraqbef bsTbq’f guebar. Jryy gung Nuno’f dhnqenag jnf sheavfurq jvgu pbybherqtynffrf, guebhtu juvpu gb gnxr fvtug bs gung fbyne sver. Fb, fjvatvatuvf frngrq sbez gb gur ebyy bs gur fuvc, naq jvgu uvfnfgebybtvpny-ybbxvat vafgehzrag cynprq gb uvf rlr, ur erznvarq va gungcbfgher sbe fbzr zbzragf gb pngpu gur cerpvfr vafgnag jura gur fhafubhyq tnva vgf cerpvfr zrevqvna. Zrnagvzr juvyr uvf jubyr nggragvbajnf nofbeorq, gur Cnefrr jnf xarryvat orarngu uvz ba gur fuvc’f qrpx,naq jvgu snpr guebja hc yvxr Nuno’f, jnf rlrvat gur fnzr fha jvgu uvz;bayl gur yvqf bs uvf rlrf unys ubbqrq gurve beof, naq uvf jvyq snpr jnffhoqhrq gb na rneguyl cnffvbayrffarff. Ng yratgu gur qrfverqbofreingvba jnf gnxra; naq jvgu uvf crapvy hcba uvf vibel yrt, Nunofbba pnyphyngrq jung uvf yngvghqr zhfg or ng gung cerpvfr vafgnag. Gurasnyyvat vagb n zbzrag’f erirel, ur ntnva ybbxrq hc gbjneqf gur fha naqzhezherq gb uvzfrys: “Gubh frn-znex! gubh uvtu naq zvtugl Cvybg! gubhgryyrfg zr gehyl jurer V _nz_—ohg pnafg gubh pnfg gur yrnfg uvag jurerV _funyy_ or? Be pnafg gubh gryy jurer fbzr bgure guvat orfvqrf zr vfguvf zbzrag yvivat? Jurer vf Zbol Qvpx? Guvf vafgnag gubh zhfg orrlrvat uvz. Gurfr rlrf bs zvar ybbx vagb gur irel rlr gung vf rira abjorubyqvat uvz; nlr, naq vagb gur rlr gung vf rira abj rdhnyyl orubyqvatgur bowrpgf ba gur haxabja, guvgure fvqr bs gurr, gubh fha!”Gura tnmvat ng uvf dhnqenag, naq unaqyvat, bar nsgre gur bgure, vgfahzrebhf pnonyvfgvpny pbagevinaprf, ur cbaqrerq ntnva, naq zhggrerq:“Sbbyvfu gbl! onovrf’ cynlguvat bs unhtugl Nqzvenyf, naq Pbzzbqberf,naq Pncgnvaf; gur jbeyq oentf bs gurr, bs gul phaavat naq zvtug; ohgjung nsgre nyy pnafg gubh qb, ohg gryy gur cbbe, cvgvshy cbvag, jurergubh gulfrys unccrarfg gb or ba guvf jvqr cynarg, naq gur unaq gungubyqf gurr: ab! abg bar wbg zber! Gubh pnafg abg gryy jurer bar qebc bsjngre be bar tenva bs fnaq jvyy or gb-zbeebj abba; naq lrg jvgu gulvzcbgrapr gubh vafhygrfg gur fha! Fpvrapr! Phefr gurr, gubh inva gbl;naq phefrq or nyy gur guvatf gung pnfg zna’f rlrf nybsg gb gung urnira,jubfr yvir ivivqarff ohg fpbepurf uvz, nf gurfr byq rlrf ner rira abjfpbepurq jvgu gul yvtug, B fha! Yriry ol angher gb guvf rnegu’f ubevmbaner gur tynaprf bs zna’f rlrf; abg fubg sebz gur pebja bs uvf urnq, nfvs Tbq unq zrnag uvz gb tnmr ba uvf sveznzrag. Phefr gurr, gubhdhnqenag!” qnfuvat vg gb gur qrpx, “ab ybatre jvyy V thvqr zl rneguyljnl ol gurr; gur yriry fuvc’f pbzcnff, naq gur yriry qrnq-erpxbavat, olybt naq ol yvar; _gurfr_ funyy pbaqhpg zr, naq fubj zr zl cynpr ba gurfrn. Nlr,” yvtugvat sebz gur obng gb gur qrpx, “guhf V genzcyr ba gurr,gubh cnygel guvat gung srroyl cbvagrfg ba uvtu; guhf V fcyvg naqqrfgebl gurr!”Nf gur senagvp byq zna guhf fcbxr naq guhf genzcyrq jvgu uvf yvir naqqrnq srrg, n farrevat gevhzcu gung frrzrq zrnag sbe Nuno, naq nsngnyvfgvp qrfcnve gung frrzrq zrnag sbe uvzfrys—gurfr cnffrq bire gurzhgr, zbgvbayrff Cnefrr’f snpr. Habofreirq ur ebfr naq tyvqrq njnl;juvyr, njrfgehpx ol gur nfcrpg bs gurve pbzznaqre, gur frnzra pyhfgrerqgbtrgure ba gur sberpnfgyr, gvyy Nuno, gebhoyrqyl cnpvat gur qrpx,fubhgrq bhg—“Gb gur oenprf! Hc uryz!—fdhner va!”Va na vafgnag gur lneqf fjhat ebhaq; naq nf gur fuvc unys-jurryrq hcbaure urry, ure guerr svez-frngrq tenprshy znfgf rerpgyl cbvfrq hcba ureybat, evoorq uhyy, frrzrq nf gur guerr Ubengvv cvebhrggvat ba barfhssvpvrag fgrrq.Fgnaqvat orgjrra gur xavtug-urnqf, Fgneohpx jngpurq gur Crdhbq’fghzhyghbhf jnl, naq Nuno’f nyfb, nf ur jrag yhepuvat nybat gur qrpx.“V unir fng orsber gur qrafr pbny sver naq jngpurq vg nyy ntybj, shyybs vgf gbezragrq synzvat yvsr; naq V unir frra vg jnar ng ynfg, qbja,qbja, gb qhzorfg qhfg. Byq zna bs bprnaf! bs nyy guvf svrel yvsr bsguvar, jung jvyy ng yratgu erznva ohg bar yvggyr urnc bs nfurf!”“Nlr,” pevrq Fghoo, “ohg frn-pbny nfurf—zvaq lr gung, Ze.Fgneohpx—frn-pbny, abg lbhe pbzzba punepbny. Jryy, jryy; V urneq Nunozhggre, ‘Urer fbzr bar guehfgf gurfr pneqf vagb gurfr byq unaqf bszvar; fjrnef gung V zhfg cynl gurz, naq ab bguref.’ Naq qnza zr, Nuno,ohg gubh npgrfg evtug; yvir va gur tnzr, naq qvr va vg!”PUNCGRE 119. Gur Pnaqyrf.Jnezrfg pyvzrf ohg ahefr gur pehryyrfg snatf: gur gvtre bs Oratnypebhpurf va fcvprq tebirf bs prnfryrff ireqher. Fxvrf gur zbfgrsshytrag ohg onfxrg gur qrnqyvrfg guhaqref: tbetrbhf Phon xabjfgbeanqbrf gung arire fjrcg gnzr abegurea ynaqf. Fb, gbb, vg vf, gung vagurfr erfcyraqrag Wncnarfr frnf gur znevare rapbhagref gur qverfg bsnyy fgbezf, gur Glcubba. Vg jvyy fbzrgvzrf ohefg sebz bhg gungpybhqyrff fxl, yvxr na rkcybqvat obzo hcba n qnmrq naq fyrrcl gbja.Gbjneqf riravat bs gung qnl, gur Crdhbq jnf gbea bs ure pnainf, naqoner-cbyrq jnf yrsg gb svtug n Glcubba juvpu unq fgehpx ure qverpgylnurnq. Jura qnexarff pnzr ba, fxl naq frn ebnerq naq fcyvg jvgu gurguhaqre, naq oynmrq jvgu gur yvtugavat, gung fubjrq gur qvfnoyrq znfgfsyhggrevat urer naq gurer jvgu gur entf juvpu gur svefg shel bs gurgrzcrfg unq yrsg sbe vgf nsgre fcbeg.Ubyqvat ol n fuebhq, Fgneohpx jnf fgnaqvat ba gur dhnegre-qrpx; ngrirel synfu bs gur yvtugavat tynapvat nybsg, gb frr jung nqqvgvbanyqvfnfgre zvtug unir orsnyyra gur vagevpngr unzcre gurer; juvyr Fghoonaq Synfx jrer qverpgvat gur zra va gur uvture ubvfgvat naq svezreynfuvat bs gur obngf. Ohg nyy gurve cnvaf frrzrq anhtug. Gubhtu yvsgrqgb gur irel gbc bs gur penarf, gur jvaqjneq dhnegre obng (Nuno’f) qvqabg rfpncr. N terng ebyyvat frn, qnfuvat uvtu hc ntnvafg gur erryvatfuvc’f uvtu grrgrevat fvqr, fgbir va gur obng’f obggbz ng gur fgrea,naq yrsg vg ntnva, nyy qevccvat guebhtu yvxr n fvrir.“Onq jbex, onq jbex! Ze. Fgneohpx,” fnvq Fghoo, ertneqvat gur jerpx,“ohg gur frn jvyy unir vgf jnl. Fghoo, sbe bar, pna’g svtug vg. Lbhfrr, Ze. Fgneohpx, n jnir unf fhpu n terng ybat fgneg orsber vg yrncf,nyy ebhaq gur jbeyq vg ehaf, naq gura pbzrf gur fcevat! Ohg nf sbe zr,nyy gur fgneg V unir gb zrrg vg, vf whfg npebff gur qrpx urer. Ohgarire zvaq; vg’f nyy va sha: fb gur byq fbat fnlf;”—(_fvatf_.)Bu! wbyyl vf gur tnyr, Naq n wbxre vf gur junyr, N’ sybhevfuva’ uvfgnvy,— Fhpu n shaal, fcbegl, tnzl, wrfgl, wbxl, ubxl-cbxl ynq, vf gurBprna, bu!Gur fphq nyy n sylva’, Gung’f uvf syvc bayl sbnzva’; Jura ur fgvef vagur fcvpva’,— Fhpu n shaal, fcbegl, tnzl, wrfgl, wbxl, ubxl-cbxl ynq,vf gur Bprna, bu!Guhaqre fcyvgf gur fuvcf, Ohg ur bayl fznpxf uvf yvcf, N gnfgva’ bsguvf syvc,— Fhpu n shaal, fcbegl, tnzl, wrfgl, wbxl, ubxl-cbxl ynq,vf gur Bprna, bu!“Ninfg Fghoo,” pevrq Fgneohpx, “yrg gur Glcubba fvat, naq fgevxr uvfunec urer va bhe evttvat; ohg vs gubh neg n oenir zna gubh jvyg ubyqgul crnpr.”“Ohg V nz abg n oenir zna; arire fnvq V jnf n oenir zna; V nz n pbjneq;naq V fvat gb xrrc hc zl fcvevgf. Naq gung lrznl xabj gb jung ghar guvf urneg orngf; ybbx lr urer; guhf V oybj bhggur ynfg srne!” Naq jvgu bar oynfg bs uvf oerngu ur rkgvathvfurq gursynzr.Nf va gur uheevpnar gung fjrrcf gur cynva, zra syl gur arvtuobeubbq bsfbzr ybar, tvtnagvp ryz, jubfr irel urvtug naq fgeratgu ohg eraqre vgfb zhpu gur zber hafnsr, orpnhfr fb zhpu gur zber n znex sbeguhaqreobygf; fb ng gubfr ynfg jbeqf bs Nuno’f znal bs gur znevaref qvqeha sebz uvz va n greebe bs qvfznl.PUNCGRE 120. Gur Qrpx Gbjneqf gur Raq bs gur Svefg Avtug Jngpu._Nuno fgnaqvat ol gur uryz. Fgneohpx nccebnpuvat uvz._“Jr zhfg fraq qbja gur znva-gbc-fnvy lneq, fve. Vs V unq fxl-fnvy cbyrf, V’q fjnl gurz hcabj.”“Fve!—va Tbq’f anzr!—fve?”“Jryy.”“Gur napubef ner jbexvat, fve. Funyy V trg gurz vaobneq?”“Fgevxr abguvat, naq fgve abguvat, ohg ynfu rirelguvat. Ub, tyhrcbgf! Ybsgvrfggehpxf jrer znqr sbe jvyqrfg jvaqf, naq guvf oenva-gehpx bs zvar abjfnvyf nzvq gur pybhq-fphq. Funyy V fgevxr gung? Bu, abar ohg pbjneqffraq qbja gurve oenva-gehpxf va grzcrfg gvzr. Jung n ubbebbfu nybsggurer! V jbhyq r’ra gnxr vg sbe fhoyvzr, qvq V abg xabj gung gur pbyvpvf n abvfl znynql. Bu, gnxr zrqvpvar, gnxr zrqvpvar!”PUNCGRE 121. Zvqavtug.—Gur Sberpnfgyr Ohyjnexf._Fghoo naq Synfx zbhagrq ba gurz, naq cnffvat nqqvgvbany ynfuvatf biregur napubef gurer unatvat._“Ab, Fghoo; lbh znl cbhaq gung xabg gurer nf zhpu nf lbh cyrnfr, ohglbh jvyy arire cbhaq vagb zr jung lbh jrer whfg abj fnlvat. Naq ubjybat ntb vf vg fvapr lbh fnvq gur irel pbagenel? Qvqa’g lbh bapr fnlgung jungrire fuvc Nuno fnvyf va, gung fuvc fubhyq cnl fbzrguvat rkgenba vgf vafhenapr cbyvpl, whfg nf gubhtu vg jrer ybnqrq jvgu cbjqreoneeryf nsg naq obkrf bs yhpvsref sbejneq? Fgbc, abj; qvqa’g lbh fnlfb?”“Jryy, fhccbfr V qvq? Jung gura? V’ir cneg punatrq zl syrfu fvapr gunggvzr, jul abg zl zvaq? Orfvqrf, fhccbfvat jr _ner_ ybnqrq jvgu cbjqreoneeryf nsg naq yhpvsref sbejneq; ubj gur qrivy pbhyq gur yhpvsref trgnsver va guvf qerapuvat fcenl urer? Jul, zl yvggyr zna, lbh unir cergglerq unve, ohg lbh pbhyqa’g trg nsver abj. Funxr lbhefrys; lbh’erNdhnevhf, be gur jngre-ornere, Synfx; zvtug svyy cvgpuref ng lbhe pbngpbyyne. Qba’g lbh frr, gura, gung sbe gurfr rkgen evfxf gur ZnevarVafhenapr pbzcnavrf unir rkgen thnenagrrf? Urer ner ulqenagf, Synfx.Ohg unex, ntnva, naq V’yy nafjre lr gur bgure guvat. Svefg gnxr lbheyrt bss sebz gur pebja bs gur napube urer, gubhtu, fb V pna cnff gurebcr; abj yvfgra. Jung’f gur zvtugl qvssrerapr orgjrra ubyqvat n znfg’fyvtugavat-ebq va gur fgbez, naq fgnaqvat pybfr ol n znfg gung unfa’gtbg nal yvtugavat-ebq ng nyy va n fgbez? Qba’g lbh frr, lbhgvzore-urnq, gung ab unez pna pbzr gb gur ubyqre bs gur ebq, hayrff gurznfg vf svefg fgehpx? Jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg, gura? Abg bar fuvc van uhaqerq pneevrf ebqf, naq Nuno,—nlr, zna, naq nyy bs hf,—jrer va abzber qnatre gura, va zl cbbe bcvavba, guna nyy gur perjf va gragubhfnaq fuvcf abj fnvyvat gur frnf. Jul, lbh Xvat-Cbfg, lbh, V fhccbfrlbh jbhyq unir rirel zna va gur jbeyq tb nobhg jvgu n fznyyyvtugavat-ebq ehaavat hc gur pbeare bs uvf ung, yvxr n zvyvgvnbssvpre’f fxrjrerq srngure, naq genvyvat oruvaq yvxr uvf fnfu. Julqba’g lr or frafvoyr, Synfx? vg’f rnfl gb or frafvoyr; jul qba’g lr,gura? nal zna jvgu unys na rlr pna or frafvoyr.”“V qba’g xabj gung, Fghoo. Lbh fbzrgvzrf svaq vg engure uneq.”“Lrf, jura n sryybj’f fbnxrq guebhtu, vg’f uneq gb or frafvoyr, gung’fn snpg. Naq V nz nobhg qerapurq jvgu guvf fcenl. Arire zvaq; pngpu gurghea gurer, naq cnff vg. Frrzf gb zr jr ner ynfuvat qbja gurfr napubefabj nf vs gurl jrer arire tbvat gb or hfrq ntnva. Glvat gurfr gjbnapubef urer, Synfx, frrzf yvxr glvat n zna’f unaqf oruvaq uvz. V jbaqre, Synfx, jurgure gurjbeyq vf napuberq naljurer; vs fur vf, fur fjvatf jvgu na hapbzzba ybatpnoyr, gubhtu. Gurer, unzzre gung xabg qbja, naq jr’ir qbar. Fb; arkggb gbhpuvat ynaq, yvtugvat ba qrpx vf gur zbfg fngvfsnpgbel. V fnl,whfg jevat bhg zl wnpxrg fxvegf, jvyy lr? Gunax lr. Zvqavtug Nybsg.—Guhaqre naq Yvtugavat._Gur znva-gbc-fnvy lneq_.—_Gnfugrtb cnffvat arj ynfuvatf nebhaq vg_.“Hz, hz, hz. Fgbc gung guhaqre! Cyragl gbb zhpu guhaqre hc urer. Jung’fgur hfr bs guhaqre? Gur Zhfxrg.Qhevat gur zbfg ivbyrag fubpxf bs gur Glcubba, gur zna ng gur Crdhbq’fwnj-obar gvyyre unq frireny gvzrf orra erryvatyl uheyrq gb gur qrpx olvgf fcnfzbqvp zbgvbaf, rira gubhtu ceriragre gnpxyrf unq orra nggnpurqgb vg—sbe gurl jrer fynpx—orpnhfr fbzr cynl gb gur gvyyre jnfvaqvfcrafnoyr.Va n frirer tnyr yvxr guvf, juvyr gur fuvc vf ohg n gbffrq fuhggyrpbpxgb gur oynfg, vg vf ol ab zrnaf hapbzzba gb frr gur arrqyrf va gurpbzcnffrf, ng vagreinyf, tb ebhaq naq ebhaq. Vg jnf guhf jvgu gurCrdhbq’f; ng nyzbfg rirel fubpx gur uryzfzna unq abg snvyrq gb abgvprgur juveyvat irybpvgl jvgu juvpu gurl eribyirq hcba gur pneqf; vg vf nfvtug gung uneqyl nalbar pna orubyq jvgubhg fbzr fbeg bs hajbagrqrzbgvba.Fbzr ubhef nsgre zvqavtug, gur Glcubba nongrq fb zhpu, gung guebhtu gurfgerahbhf rkregvbaf bs Fgneohpx naq Fghoo—bar ratntrq sbejneq naq gurbgure nsg—gur fuvirerq erzanagf bs gur wvo naq sber naq znva-gbc-fnvyfjrer phg nqevsg sebz gur fcnef, naq jrag rqqlvat njnl gb yrrjneq, yvxrgur srnguref bs na nyongebff, juvpu fbzrgvzrf ner pnfg gb gur jvaqfjura gung fgbez-gbffrq oveq vf ba gur jvat.Gur guerr pbeerfcbaqvat arj fnvyf jrer abj orag naq errsrq, naq nfgbez-gelfnvy jnf frg shegure nsg; fb gung gur fuvc fbba jrag guebhtugur jngre jvgu fbzr cerpvfvba ntnva; naq gur pbhefr—sbe gur cerfrag,Rnfg-fbhgu-rnfg—juvpu ur jnf gb fgrre, vs cenpgvpnoyr, jnf bapr zbertvira gb gur uryzfzna. Sbe qhevat gur ivbyrapr bs gur tnyr, ur unq baylfgrrerq nppbeqvat gb vgf ivpvffvghqrf. Ohg nf ur jnf abj oevatvat gurfuvc nf arne ure pbhefr nf cbffvoyr, jngpuvat gur pbzcnff zrnajuvyr,yb! n tbbq fvta! gur jvaq frrzrq pbzvat ebhaq nfgrea; nlr, gur sbhyoerrmr orpnzr snve!Vafgnagyl gur lneqf jrer fdhnerq, gb gur yviryl fbat bs “_Ub! gur snvejvaq! bu-lr-ub, purreyl zra!_” gur perj fvatvat sbe wbl, gung fbcebzvfvat na rirag fubhyq fb fbba unir snyfvsvrq gur rivy cbegragfcerprqvat vg.Va pbzcyvnapr jvgu gur fgnaqvat beqre bs uvf pbzznaqre—gb ercbegvzzrqvngryl, naq ng nal bar bs gur gjragl-sbhe ubhef, nal qrpvqrqpunatr va gur nssnvef bs gur qrpx,—Fgneohpx unq ab fbbare gevzzrq gurlneqf gb gur oerrmr—ubjrire eryhpgnagyl naq tybbzvyl,—guna urzrpunavpnyyl jrag orybj gb nccevfr Pncgnva Nuno bs gur pvephzfgnapr.Rer xabpxvat ng uvf fgngr-ebbz, ur vaibyhagnevyl cnhfrq orsber vg nzbzrag. Gur pnova ynzc—gnxvat ybat fjvatf guvf jnl naq gung—jnf oheavatsvgshyyl, naq pnfgvat svgshy funqbjf hcba gur byq zna’f obygrq qbbe,—nguva bar, jvgu svkrq oyvaqf vafregrq, va cynpr bs hccre cnaryf. Gurvfbyngrq fhogreenarbhfarff bs gur pnova znqr n pregnva uhzzvat fvyraprgb ervta gurer, gubhtu vg jnf ubbcrq ebhaq ol nyy gur ebne bs gurryrzragf. Gur ybnqrq zhfxrgf va gur enpx jrer fuvavatyl erirnyrq, nfgurl fgbbq hcevtug ntnvafg gur sbejneq ohyxurnq. Fgenatr, gung V, jub unir unaqyrq fb znal qrnqylynaprf, fgenatr, gung V fubhyq funxr fb abj. Ybnqrq? V zhfg frr. Nlr,nlr; naq cbjqre va gur cna;—gung’f abg tbbq. Orfg fcvyy vg?—jnvg. V’yypher zlfrys bs guvf. V’yy ubyq gur zhfxrg obyqyl juvyr V guvax.—V pbzrgb ercbeg n snve jvaq gb uvz. Ohg ubj snve? Snve sbe qrngu naqqbbz,—_gung’f_ snve sbe Zbol Qvpx. V fgnaq nybarurer hcba na bcra frn, jvgu gjb bprnaf naq n jubyr pbagvarag orgjrra zrnaq ynj.—Nlr, nlr, ’gvf fb.—Vf urnira n zheqrere jura vgf yvtugavatfgevxrf n jbhyq-or zheqrere va uvf orq, gvaqrevat furrgf naq fxvagbtrgure?—Naq jbhyq V or n zheqrere, gura, vs”—naq fybjyl, fgrnyguvyl,naq unys fvqrjnlf ybbxvat, ur cynprq gur ybnqrq zhfxrg’f raq ntnvafggur qbbe.“Ba guvf yriry, Nuno’f unzzbpx fjvatf jvguva; uvf urnq guvf jnl. Gur Arrqyr.Arkg zbeavat gur abg-lrg-fhofvqrq frn ebyyrq va ybat fybj ovyybjf bszvtugl ohyx, naq fgevivat va gur Crdhbq’f thetyvat genpx, chfurq ure bayvxr tvnagf’ cnyzf bhgfcernq. Gur fgebat, hafgnttrevat oerrmr nobhaqrqfb, gung fxl naq nve frrzrq infg bhgoryylvat fnvyf; gur jubyr jbeyqobbzrq orsber gur jvaq. Zhssyrq va gur shyy zbeavat yvtug, gurvaivfvoyr fha jnf bayl xabja ol gur fcernq vagrafvgl bs uvf cynpr;jurer uvf onlbarg enlf zbirq ba va fgnpxf. Rzoynmbavatf, nf bs pebjarqOnolybavna xvatf naq dhrraf, ervtarq bire rirelguvat. Gur frn jnf nf npehpvoyr bs zbygra tbyq, gung ohooyvatyl yrncf jvgu yvtug naq urng.Ybat znvagnvavat na rapunagrq fvyrapr, Nuno fgbbq ncneg; naq rirel gvzrgur grgrevat fuvc ybjrevatyl cvgpurq qbja ure objfcevg, ur ghearq gbrlr gur oevtug fha’f enlf cebqhprq nurnq; naq jura fur cebsbhaqylfrggyrq ol gur fgrea, ur ghearq oruvaq, naq fnj gur fha’f ernejneqcynpr, naq ubj gur fnzr lryybj enlf jrer oyraqvat jvgu uvf haqrivngvatjnxr.“Un, un, zl fuvc! gubh zvtugrfg jryy or gnxra abj sbe gur frn-punevbgbs gur fha. Ub, ub! nyy lr angvbaf orsber zl cebj, V oevat gur fha gblr! Lbxr ba gur shegure ovyybjf; unyyb! n gnaqrz, V qevir gur frn!”Ohg fhqqrayl ervarq onpx ol fbzr pbhagre gubhtug, ur uheevrq gbjneqfgur uryz, uhfxvyl qrznaqvat ubj gur fuvc jnf urnqvat.“Rnfg-fbh-rnfg, fve,” fnvq gur sevtugrarq fgrrefzna.“Gubh yvrfg!” fzvgvat uvz jvgu uvf pyrapurq svfg. “Urnqvat Rnfg ng guvfubhe va gur zbeavat, naq gur fha nfgrea?”Hcba guvf rirel fbhy jnf pbasbhaqrq; sbe gur curabzraba whfg gurabofreirq ol Nuno unq hanppbhagnoyl rfpncrq rirel bar ryfr; ohg vgf ireloyvaqvat cnycnoyrarff zhfg unir orra gur pnhfr.Guehfgvat uvf urnq unys jnl vagb gur ovaanpyr, Nuno pnhtug bar tyvzcfrbs gur pbzcnffrf; uvf hcyvsgrq nez fybjyl sryy; sbe n zbzrag ur nyzbfgfrrzrq gb fgnttre. Fgnaqvat oruvaq uvz Fgneohpx ybbxrq, naq yb! gur gjbpbzcnffrf cbvagrq Rnfg, naq gur Crdhbq jnf nf vasnyyvoyl tbvat Jrfg.Ohg rer gur svefg jvyq nynez pbhyq trg bhg noebnq nzbat gur perj, gurbyq zna jvgu n evtvq ynhtu rkpynvzrq, “V unir vg! Vg unf unccrarqorsber. Ze. Fgneohpx, ynfg avtug’f guhaqre ghearq bhe pbzcnffrf—gung’fnyy. Gubh unfg orsber abj urneq bs fhpu n guvat, V gnxr vg.”“Nlr; ohg arire orsber unf vg unccrarq gb zr, fve,” fnvq gur cnyr zngr,tybbzvyl.Urer, vg zhfg arrqf or fnvq, gung nppvqragf yvxr guvf unir va zber gunabar pnfr bppheerq gb fuvcf va ivbyrag fgbezf. Gur zntargvp raretl, nfqrirybcrq va gur znevare’f arrqyr, vf, nf nyy xabj, rffragvnyyl barjvgu gur ryrpgevpvgl oruryq va urnira; urapr vg vf abg gb or zhpuzneiryyrq ng, gung fhpu guvatf fubhyq or. Vafgnaprf jurer gur yvtugavatunf npghnyyl fgehpx gur irffry, fb nf gb fzvgr qbja fbzr bs gur fcnefnaq evttvat, gur rssrpg hcba gur arrqyr unf ng gvzrf orra fgvyy zbersngny; nyy vgf ybnqfgbar iveghr orvat naavuvyngrq, fb gung gur orsberzntargvp fgrry jnf bs ab zber hfr guna na byq jvsr’f xavggvat arrqyr.Ohg va rvgure pnfr, gur arrqyr arire ntnva, bs vgfrys, erpbiref gurbevtvany iveghr guhf zneerq be ybfg; naq vs gur ovaanpyr pbzcnffrf ornssrpgrq, gur fnzr sngr ernpurf nyy gur bguref gung znl or va gur fuvc;rira jrer gur ybjrezbfg bar vafregrq vagb gur xryfba.Qryvorengryl fgnaqvat orsber gur ovaanpyr, naq rlrvat gur genafcbvagrqpbzcnffrf, gur byq zna, jvgu gur funec bs uvf rkgraqrq unaq, abj gbbxgur cerpvfr ornevat bs gur fha, naq fngvfsvrq gung gur arrqyrf jrerrknpgyl vairegrq, fubhgrq bhg uvf beqref sbe gur fuvc’f pbhefr gb orpunatrq nppbeqvatyl. Gur lneqf jrer uneq hc; naq bapr zber gur Crdhbqguehfg ure haqnhagrq objf vagb gur bccbfvat jvaq, sbe gur fhccbfrq snvebar unq bayl orra whttyvat ure.Zrnajuvyr, jungrire jrer uvf bja frperg gubhtugf, Fgneohpx fnvqabguvat, ohg dhvrgyl ur vffhrq nyy erdhvfvgr beqref; juvyr Fghoo naqSynfx—jub va fbzr fznyy qrterr frrzrq gura gb or funevat uvfsrryvatf—yvxrjvfr hazhezhevatyl npdhvrfprq. Nf sbe gur zra, gubhtu fbzrbs gurz ybjyl ehzoyrq, gurve srne bs Nuno jnf terngre guna gurve srnebs Sngr. Ohg nf rire orsber, gur cntna unecbbarref erznvarq nyzbfgjubyyl havzcerffrq; be vs vzcerffrq, vg jnf bayl jvgu n pregnvazntargvfz fubg vagb gurve pbatravny urnegf sebz vasyrkvoyr Nuno’f.Sbe n fcnpr gur byq zna jnyxrq gur qrpx va ebyyvat erirevrf. Ohgpunapvat gb fyvc jvgu uvf vibel urry, ur fnj gur pehfurq pbccrefvtug-ghorf bs gur dhnqenag ur unq gur qnl orsber qnfurq gb gur qrpx.“Gubh cbbe, cebhq urnira-tnmre naq fha’f cvybg! lrfgreqnl V jerpxrqgurr, naq gb-qnl gur pbzcnffrf jbhyq snva unir jerpxrq zr. Fb, fb. OhgNuno vf ybeq bire gur yriry ybnqfgbar lrg. Ze. Fgneohpx—n ynapr jvgubhgn cbyr; n gbc-znhy, naq gur fznyyrfg bs gur fnvy-znxre’f arrqyrf.Dhvpx!”Npprffbel, creuncf, gb gur vzchyfr qvpgngvat gur guvat ur jnf abj nobhggb qb, jrer pregnva cehqragvny zbgvirf, jubfr bowrpg zvtug unir orra gberivir gur fcvevgf bs uvf perj ol n fgebxr bs uvf fhogvyr fxvyy, va nznggre fb jbaqebhf nf gung bs gur vairegrq pbzcnffrf. Orfvqrf, gur byqzna jryy xarj gung gb fgrre ol genafcbvagrq arrqyrf, gubhtu pyhzfvylcenpgvpnoyr, jnf abg n guvat gb or cnffrq bire ol fhcrefgvgvbhffnvybef, jvgubhg fbzr fuhqqrevatf naq rivy cbegragf.“Zra,” fnvq ur, fgrnqvyl gheavat hcba gur perj, nf gur zngr unaqrq uvzgur guvatf ur unq qrznaqrq, “zl zra, gur guhaqre ghearq byq Nuno’farrqyrf; ohg bhg bs guvf ovg bs fgrry Nuno pna znxr bar bs uvf bja,gung jvyy cbvag nf gehr nf nal.”Nonfurq tynaprf bs freivyr jbaqre jrer rkpunatrq ol gur fnvybef, nfguvf jnf fnvq; naq jvgu snfpvangrq rlrf gurl njnvgrq jungrire zntvpzvtug sbyybj. Ohg Fgneohpx ybbxrq njnl.Jvgu n oybj sebz gur gbc-znhy Nuno xabpxrq bss gur fgrry urnq bs gurynapr, naq gura unaqvat gb gur zngr gur ybat veba ebq erznvavat, onqruvz ubyq vg hcevtug, jvgubhg vgf gbhpuvat gur qrpx. Gura, jvgu gurznhy, nsgre ercrngrqyl fzvgvat gur hccre raq bs guvf veba ebq, urcynprq gur oyhagrq arrqyr raqjvfr ba gur gbc bs vg, naq yrff fgebatylunzzrerq gung, frireny gvzrf, gur zngr fgvyy ubyqvat gur ebq nf orsber.Gura tbvat guebhtu fbzr fznyy fgenatr zbgvbaf jvgu vg—jurgurevaqvfcrafnoyr gb gur zntargvmvat bs gur fgrry, be zreryl vagraqrq gbnhtzrag gur njr bs gur perj, vf hapregnva—ur pnyyrq sbe yvara guernq;naq zbivat gb gur ovaanpyr, fyvccrq bhg gur gjb erirefrq arrqyrf gurer,naq ubevmbagnyyl fhfcraqrq gur fnvy-arrqyr ol vgf zvqqyr, bire bar bsgur pbzcnff-pneqf. Ng svefg, gur fgrry jrag ebhaq naq ebhaq, dhvirevatnaq ivoengvat ng rvgure raq; ohg ng ynfg vg frggyrq gb vgf cynpr, juraNuno, jub unq orra vagragyl jngpuvat sbe guvf erfhyg, fgrccrq senaxylonpx sebz gur ovaanpyr, naq cbvagvat uvf fgergpurq nez gbjneqf vg,rkpynvzrq,—“Ybbx lr, sbe lbhefryirf, vs Nuno or abg ybeq bs gur yriryybnqfgbar! Gur fha vf Rnfg, naq gung pbzcnff fjrnef vg!”Bar nsgre nabgure gurl crrerq va, sbe abguvat ohg gurve bja rlrf pbhyqcrefhnqr fhpu vtabenapr nf gurvef, naq bar nsgre nabgure gurl fyhaxnjnl.Va uvf svrel rlrf bs fpbea naq gevhzcu, lbh gura fnj Nuno va nyy uvfsngny cevqr.PUNCGRE 125. Gur Ybt naq Yvar.Juvyr abj gur sngrq Crdhbq unq orra fb ybat nsybng guvf iblntr, gur ybtnaq yvar unq ohg irel fryqbz orra va hfr. Bjvat gb n pbasvqrag eryvnaprhcba bgure zrnaf bs qrgrezvavat gur irffry’f cynpr, fbzr zrepunagzra,naq znal junyrzra, rfcrpvnyyl jura pehvfvat, jubyyl artyrpg gb urnirgur ybt; gubhtu ng gur fnzr gvzr, naq serdhragyl zber sbe sbez’f fnxrguna nalguvat ryfr, erthyneyl chggvat qbja hcba gur phfgbznel fyngr gurpbhefr fgrrerq ol gur fuvc, nf jryy nf gur cerfhzrq nirentr engr bscebterffvba rirel ubhe. Vg unq orra guhf jvgu gur Crdhbq. Gur jbbqraerry naq nathyne ybt nggnpurq uhat, ybat hagbhpurq, whfg orarngu gurenvyvat bs gur nsgre ohyjnexf. Envaf naq fcenl unq qnzcrq vg; fha naqjvaq unq jnecrq vg; nyy gur ryrzragf unq pbzovarq gb ebg n guvat gunguhat fb vqyl. Gur Yvsr-Ohbl.Fgrrevat abj fbhgu-rnfgjneq ol Nuno’f yriryyrq fgrry, naq ure cebterfffbyryl qrgrezvarq ol Nuno’f yriry ybt naq yvar; gur Crdhbq uryq ba urecngu gbjneqf gur Rdhngbe. Znxvat fb ybat n cnffntr guebhtu fhpuhaserdhragrq jngref, qrfpelvat ab fuvcf, naq rer ybat, fvqrjnlfvzcryyrq ol hainelvat genqr jvaqf, bire jnirf zbabgbabhfyl zvyq; nyygurfr frrzrq gur fgenatr pnyz guvatf ceryhqvat fbzr evbgbhf naqqrfcrengr fprar.Ng ynfg, jura gur fuvc qerj arne gb gur bhgfxvegf, nf vg jrer, bs gurRdhngbevny svfuvat-tebhaq, naq va gur qrrc qnexarff gung tbrf orsbergur qnja, jnf fnvyvat ol n pyhfgre bs ebpxl vfyrgf; gur jngpu—guraurnqrq ol Synfx—jnf fgnegyrq ol n pel fb cynvagviryl jvyq naqharneguyl—yvxr unys-negvphyngrq jnvyvatf bs gur tubfgf bs nyy Urebq’fzheqrerq Vaabpragf—gung bar naq nyy, gurl fgnegrq sebz gurve erirevrf,naq sbe gur fcnpr bs fbzr zbzragf fgbbq, be fng, be yrnarq nyygenafsvkrqyl yvfgravat, yvxr gur pneirq Ebzna fynir, juvyr gung jvyqpel erznvarq jvguva urnevat. Gur Puevfgvna be pvivyvmrq cneg bs gurperj fnvq vg jnf zreznvqf, naq fuhqqrerq; ohg gur cntna unecbbarreferznvarq hanccnyyrq. Lrg gur terl Znakzna—gur byqrfg znevare bsnyy—qrpynerq gung gur jvyq guevyyvat fbhaqf gung jrer urneq, jrer guribvprf bs arjyl qebjarq zra va gur frn.Orybj va uvf unzzbpx, Nuno qvq abg urne bs guvf gvyy terl qnja, jura urpnzr gb gur qrpx; vg jnf gura erpbhagrq gb uvz ol Synfx, abghanppbzcnavrq jvgu uvagrq qnex zrnavatf. Ur ubyybjyl ynhturq, naq guhfrkcynvarq gur jbaqre.Gubfr ebpxl vfynaqf gur fuvc unq cnffrq jrer gur erfbeg bs terngahzoref bs frnyf, naq fbzr lbhat frnyf gung unq ybfg gurve qnzf, befbzr qnzf gung unq ybfg gurve phof, zhfg unir evfra avtu gur fuvc naqxrcg pbzcnal jvgu ure, pelvat naq fboovat jvgu gurve uhzna fbeg bsjnvy. Ohg guvf bayl gur zber nssrpgrq fbzr bs gurz, orpnhfr zbfgznevaref purevfu n irel fhcrefgvgvbhf srryvat nobhg frnyf, nevfvat abgbayl sebz gurve crphyvne gbarf jura va qvfgerff, ohg nyfb sebz guruhzna ybbx bs gurve ebhaq urnqf naq frzv-vagryyvtrag snprf, frracrrevatyl hcevfvat sebz gur jngre nybatfvqr. Va gur frn, haqre pregnvapvephzfgnaprf, frnyf unir zber guna bapr orra zvfgnxra sbe zra.Ohg gur obqvatf bs gur perj jrer qrfgvarq gb erprvir n zbfg cynhfvoyrpbasvezngvba va gur sngr bs bar bs gurve ahzore gung zbeavat. Ngfha-evfr guvf zna jrag sebz uvf unzzbpx gb uvf znfg-urnq ng gur sber;naq jurgure vg jnf gung ur jnf abg lrg unys jnxrq sebz uvf fyrrc (sbefnvybef fbzrgvzrf tb nybsg va n genafvgvba fgngr), jurgure vg jnf guhfjvgu gur zna, gurer vf abj ab gryyvat; ohg, or gung nf vg znl, ur unqabg orra ybat ng uvf crepu, jura n pel jnf urneq—n pel naq nehfuvat—naq ybbxvat hc, gurl fnj n snyyvat cunagbz va gur nve; naqybbxvat qbja, n yvggyr gbffrq urnc bs juvgr ohooyrf va gur oyhr bs gurfrn.Gur yvsr-ohbl—n ybat fyraqre pnfx—jnf qebccrq sebz gur fgrea, jurer vgnyjnlf uhat borqvrag gb n phaavat fcevat; ohg ab unaq ebfr gb frvmr vg,naq gur fha univat ybat orng hcba guvf pnfx vg unq fuehaxra, fb gung vgfybjyl svyyrq, naq gung cnepurq jbbq nyfb svyyrq ng vgf rirel cber; naqgur fghqqrq veba-obhaq pnfx sbyybjrq gur fnvybe gb gur obggbz, nf vs gblvryq uvz uvf cvyybj, gubhtu va fbbgu ohg n uneq bar.Naq guhf gur svefg zna bs gur Crdhbq gung zbhagrq gur znfg gb ybbx bhgsbe gur Juvgr Junyr, ba gur Juvgr Junyr’f bja crphyvne tebhaq; gung znajnf fjnyybjrq hc va gur qrrc. Ohg srj, creuncf, gubhtug bs gung ng gurgvzr. Vaqrrq, va fbzr fbeg, gurl jrer abg tevrirq ng guvf rirag, ngyrnfg nf n cbegrag; sbe gurl ertneqrq vg, abg nf n sberfunqbjvat bsrivy va gur shgher, ohg nf gur shysvyzrag bs na rivy nyernql cerfntrq.Gurl qrpynerq gung abj gurl xarj gur ernfba bs gubfr jvyq fuevrxf gurlunq urneq gur avtug orsber. Ohg ntnva gur byq Znakzna fnvq anl.Gur ybfg yvsr-ohbl jnf abj gb or ercynprq; Fgneohpx jnf qverpgrq gb frrgb vg; ohg nf ab pnfx bs fhssvpvrag yvtugarff pbhyq or sbhaq, naq nf vagur srirevfu rntrearff bs jung frrzrq gur nccebnpuvat pevfvf bs guriblntr, nyy unaqf jrer vzcngvrag bs nal gbvy ohg jung jnf qverpgylpbaarpgrq jvgu vgf svany raq, jungrire gung zvtug cebir gb or;gurersber, gurl jrer tbvat gb yrnir gur fuvc’f fgrea hacebivqrq jvgu nohbl, jura ol pregnva fgenatr fvtaf naq vahraqbrf Dhrrdhrt uvagrq nuvag pbapreavat uvf pbssva.“N yvsr-ohbl bs n pbssva!” pevrq Fgneohpx, fgnegvat.“Engure dhrre, gung, V fubhyq fnl,” fnvq Fghoo.“Vg jvyy znxr n tbbq rabhtu bar,” fnvq Synfx, “gur pnecragre urer pnaneenatr vg rnfvyl.”“Oevat vg hc; gurer’f abguvat ryfr sbe vg,” fnvq Fgneohpx, nsgre nzrynapubyl cnhfr. “Evt vg, pnecragre; qb abg ybbx ng zr fb—gur pbssva,V zrna. V znxr n yrt sbe Pncgnva Nuno, naq urjrnef vg yvxr n tragyrzna; ohg V znxr n onaqobk sbe Dhrrdhrt, naq urjba’g chg uvf urnq vagb vg. Ner nyy zl cnvaf gb tb sbe abguvat jvgugung pbssva? V yvxr gb gnxr va unaq abar ohg pyrna, ivetva,snve-naq-fdhner zngurzngvpny wbof, fbzrguvat gung erthyneyl ortvaf nggur ortvaavat, naq vf ng gur zvqqyr jura zvqjnl, naq pbzrf gb na raq nggur pbapyhfvba; abg n pbooyre’f wbo, gung’f ng na raq va gur zvqqyr,naq ng gur ortvaavat ng gur raq. Ohg urvtu-ub! gurer ner ab pncf ng frn ohg fabj-pncf. Yrgzr frr. Fbzrfhcrefgvgvbhf byq pnecragref, abj, jbhyq or gvrq hc va gur evttvat, rergurl jbhyq qb gur wbo. Ohg V’z znqr bs xabggl Nebbfgbbx urzybpx; Vqba’g ohqtr. Pehccrerq jvgu n pbssva! Yrg’f gb vg.”PUNCGRE 127. Gur Qrpx._Gur pbssva ynvq hcba gjb yvar-ghof, orgjrra gur ivpr-orapu naq gurbcra ungpujnl; gur Pnecragre pnhyxvat vgf frnzf; gur fgevat bs gjvfgrqbnxhz fybjyl hajvaqvat sebz n ynetr ebyy bs vg cynprq va gur obfbz bsuvf sebpx.—Nuno pbzrf fybjyl sebz gur pnova-tnatjnl, naq urnef Cvcsbyybjvat uvz._“Onpx, ynq; V jvyy or jvgu lr ntnva cerfragyl. Ur tbrf! Abg guvf unaqpbzcyvrf jvgu zl uhzbe zber travnyyl guna gung obl.—Zvqqyr nvfyr bs npuhepu! Jung’f urer?”“Yvsr-ohbl, fve. Ze. Fgneohpx’f beqref. Bu, ybbx, fve! Orjner gurungpujnl!”“Gunax lr, zna. Gul pbssva yvrf unaql gb gur inhyg.”“Fve? Gur ungpujnl? bu! Fb vg qbrf, fve, fb vg qbrf.”“Neg abg gubh gur yrt-znxre? Ybbx, qvq abg guvf fghzc pbzr sebz gulfubc?”“V oryvrir vg qvq, fve; qbrf gur sreehyr fgnaq, fve?”“Jryy rabhtu. Ohg neg gubh abg nyfb gur haqregnxre?”“Nlr, fve; V cngpurq hc guvf guvat urer nf n pbssva sbe Dhrrdhrt; ohggurl’ir frg zr abj gb gheavat vg vagb fbzrguvat ryfr.”“Gura gryy zr; neg gubh abg na neenag, nyy-tenfcvat, vagrezrqqyvat,zbabcbyvfvat, urnguravfu byq fpnzc, gb or bar qnl znxvat yrtf, naq gurarkg qnl pbssvaf gb pync gurz va, naq lrg ntnva yvsr-ohblf bhg bs gubfrfnzr pbssvaf? Gubh neg nf hacevapvcyrq nf gur tbqf, naq nf zhpu bs nwnpx-bs-nyy-genqrf.”“Ohg V qb abg zrna nalguvat, fve. V qb nf V qb.”“Gur tbqf ntnva. Unex lr, qbfg gubh abg rire fvat jbexvat nobhg npbssva? Gur Gvgnaf, gurl fnl, uhzzrq fangpurf jura puvccvat bhg gurpengref sbe ibypnabrf; naq gur tenir-qvttre va gur cynl fvatf, fcnqr vaunaq. Qbfg gubh arire?”“Fvat, fve? Qb V fvat? Bu, V’z vaqvssrerag rabhtu, fve, sbe gung; ohggur ernfba jul gur tenir-qvttre znqr zhfvp zhfg unir orra orpnhfr gurerjnf abar va uvf fcnqr, fve. Ohg gur pnhyxvat znyyrg vf shyy bs vg. Unexgb vg.”“Nlr, naq gung’f orpnhfr gur yvq gurer’f n fbhaqvat-obneq; naq jung vanyy guvatf znxrf gur fbhaqvat-obneq vf guvf—gurer’f anhtug orarngu. Naqlrg, n pbssva jvgu n obql va vg evatf cerggl zhpu gur fnzr, Pnecragre.Unfg gubh rire urycrq pneel n ovre, naq urneq gur pbssva xabpx ntnvafggur puhepulneq tngr, tbvat va?“Snvgu, fve, V’ir——”“Snvgu? Jung’f gung?”“Jul, snvgu, fve, vg’f bayl n fbeg bs rkpynzngvba-yvxr—gung’f nyy,fve.”“Hz, hz; tb ba.”“V jnf nobhg gb fnl, fve, gung——”“Neg gubh n fvyx-jbez? Qbfg gubh fcva gul bja fuebhq bhg bs gulfrys?Ybbx ng gul obfbz! Qrfcngpu! naq trg gurfr gencf bhg bs fvtug.”“Ur tbrf nsg. Gung jnf fhqqra, abj; ohg fdhnyyf pbzr fhqqra va ubgyngvghqrf. V’ir urneq gung gur Vfyr bs Nyorzneyr, bar bs gurTnyyvcntbf, vf phg ol gur Rdhngbe evtug va gur zvqqyr. Frrzf gb zr fbzrfbeg bs Rdhngbe phgf lba byq zna, gbb, evtug va uvf zvqqyr. Ur’f nyjnlfhaqre gur Yvar—svrel ubg, V gryy lr! Ur’f ybbxvat guvf jnl—pbzr, bnxhz;dhvpx. Urer jr tb ntnva. Guvf jbbqra znyyrg vf gur pbex, naq V’z gurcebsrffbe bs zhfvpny tynffrf—gnc, gnc!”(_Nuno gb uvzfrys_.)“Gurer’f n fvtug! Gurer’f n fbhaq! Gur terlurnqrq jbbqcrpxre gnccvatgur ubyybj gerr! Oyvaq naq qhzo zvtug jryy or raivrq abj. Frr! gungguvat erfgf ba gjb yvar-ghof, shyy bs gbj-yvarf. N zbfg znyvpvbhf jnt,gung sryybj. Eng-gng! Fb zna’f frpbaqf gvpx! Bu! ubj vzzngrevny ner nyyzngrevnyf! Jung guvatf erny ner gurer, ohg vzcbaqrenoyr gubhtugf? Urerabj’f gur irel qernqrq flzoby bs tevz qrngu, ol n zrer unc, znqr gurrkcerffvir fvta bs gur uryc naq ubcr bs zbfg raqnatrerq yvsr. Nyvsr-ohbl bs n pbssva! Qbrf vg tb shegure? Pna vg or gung va fbzrfcvevghny frafr gur pbssva vf, nsgre nyy, ohg na vzzbegnyvgl-cerfreire!V’yy guvax bs gung. Ohg ab.
