Fbzr haxabja pbaqhvgf sebz gur haxabja jbeyqfzhfg rzcgl vagb gurr!”PUNCGRE 128. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Enpury.Arkg qnl, n ynetr fuvc, gur Enpury, jnf qrfpevrq, ornevat qverpgyl qbjahcba gur Crdhbq, nyy ure fcnef guvpxyl pyhfgrevat jvgu zra. Ng gur gvzrgur Crdhbq jnf znxvat tbbq fcrrq guebhtu gur jngre; ohg nf guroebnq-jvatrq jvaqjneq fgenatre fubg avtu gb ure, gur obnfgshy fnvyf nyysryy gbtrgure nf oynax oynqqref gung ner ohefg, naq nyy yvsr syrq sebzgur fzvggra uhyy.“Onq arjf; fur oevatf onq arjf,” zhggrerq gur byq Znakzna. Ohg rer urepbzznaqre, jub, jvgu gehzcrg gb zbhgu, fgbbq hc va uvf obng; rer urpbhyq ubcrshyyl unvy, Nuno’f ibvpr jnf urneq.“Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”“Nlr, lrfgreqnl. Unir lr frra n junyr-obng nqevsg?”Guebggyvat uvf wbl, Nuno artngviryl nafjrerq guvf harkcrpgrq dhrfgvba;naq jbhyq gura unir snva obneqrq gur fgenatre, jura gur fgenatrepncgnva uvzfrys, univat fgbccrq uvf irffry’f jnl, jnf frra qrfpraqvature fvqr. N srj xrra chyyf, naq uvf obng-ubbx fbba pyvapurq gurCrdhbq’f znva-punvaf, naq ur fcenat gb gur qrpx. Vzzrqvngryl ur jnferpbtavfrq ol Nuno sbe n Anaghpxrgre ur xarj. Ohg ab sbezny fnyhgngvbajnf rkpunatrq.“Jurer jnf ur?—abg xvyyrq!—abg xvyyrq!” pevrq Nuno, pybfryl nqinapvat.“Ubj jnf vg?”Vg frrzrq gung fbzrjung yngr ba gur nsgreabba bs gur qnl cerivbhf,juvyr guerr bs gur fgenatre’f obngf jrer ratntrq jvgu n fubny bsjunyrf, juvpu unq yrq gurz fbzr sbhe be svir zvyrf sebz gur fuvc; naqjuvyr gurl jrer lrg va fjvsg punfr gb jvaqjneq, gur juvgr uhzc naq urnqbs Zbol Qvpx unq fhqqrayl ybbzrq hc bhg bs gur jngre, abg irel sne gbyrrjneq; jurerhcba, gur sbhegu evttrq obng—n erfreirq bar—unq orravafgnagyl ybjrerq va punfr. Nsgre n xrra fnvy orsber gur jvaq, guvfsbhegu obng—gur fjvsgrfg xrryrq bs nyy—frrzrq gb unir fhpprrqrq vasnfgravat—ng yrnfg, nf jryy nf gur zna ng gur znfg-urnq pbhyq gryynalguvat nobhg vg. Va gur qvfgnapr ur fnj gur qvzvavfurq qbggrq obng;naq gura n fjvsg tyrnz bs ohooyvat juvgr jngre; naq nsgre gung abguvatzber; jurapr vg jnf pbapyhqrq gung gur fgevpxra junyr zhfg unirvaqrsvavgryl eha njnl jvgu uvf chefhref, nf bsgra unccraf. Gurer jnffbzr nccerurafvba, ohg ab cbfvgvir nynez, nf lrg. Gur erpnyy fvtanyfjrer cynprq va gur evttvat; qnexarff pnzr ba; naq sbeprq gb cvpx hc ureguerr sne gb jvaqjneq obngf—rer tbvat va dhrfg bs gur sbhegu bar va gurcerpvfryl bccbfvgr qverpgvba—gur fuvc unq abg bayl orra arprffvgngrq gbyrnir gung obng gb vgf sngr gvyy arne zvqavtug, ohg, sbe gur gvzr, gbvapernfr ure qvfgnapr sebz vg. Ohg gur erfg bs ure perj orvat ng ynfgfnsr nobneq, fur pebjqrq nyy fnvy—fghafnvy ba fghafnvy—nsgre gurzvffvat obng; xvaqyvat n sver va ure gel-cbgf sbe n ornpba; naq rirelbgure zna nybsg ba gur ybbx-bhg. Ohg gubhtu jura fur unq guhf fnvyrq nfhssvpvrag qvfgnapr gb tnva gur cerfhzrq cynpr bs gur nofrag barf juraynfg frra; gubhtu fur gura cnhfrq gb ybjre ure fcner obngf gb chyy nyynebhaq ure; naq abg svaqvat nalguvat, unq ntnva qnfurq ba; ntnvacnhfrq, naq ybjrerq ure obngf; naq gubhtu fur unq guhf pbagvahrq qbvatgvyy qnlyvtug; lrg abg gur yrnfg tyvzcfr bs gur zvffvat xrry unq orrafrra.Gur fgbel gbyq, gur fgenatre Pncgnva vzzrqvngryl jrag ba gb erirny uvfbowrpg va obneqvat gur Crdhbq. Ur qrfverq gung fuvc gb havgr jvgu uvfbja va gur frnepu; ol fnvyvat bire gur frn fbzr sbhe be svir zvyrfncneg, ba cnenyyry yvarf, naq fb fjrrcvat n qbhoyr ubevmba, nf vg jrer.“V jvyy jntre fbzrguvat abj,” juvfcrerq Fghoo gb Synfx, “gung fbzr barva gung zvffvat obng jber bss gung Pncgnva’f orfg pbng; znlunc, uvfjngpu—ur’f fb phefrq nakvbhf gb trg vg onpx. Jub rire urneq bs gjbcvbhf junyr-fuvcf pehvfvat nsgre bar zvffvat junyr-obng va gur urvtugbs gur junyvat frnfba? Frr, Synfx, bayl frr ubj cnyr ur ybbxf—cnyr vagur irel ohggbaf bs uvf rlrf—ybbx—vg jnfa’g gur pbng—vg zhfg unir orragur—”“Zl obl, zl bja obl vf nzbat gurz. Sbe Tbq’f fnxr—V ort, Vpbawher”—urer rkpynvzrq gur fgenatre Pncgnva gb Nuno, jub guhf sne unqohg vpvyl erprvirq uvf crgvgvba. “Sbe rvtug-naq-sbegl ubhef yrg zrpunegre lbhe fuvc—V jvyy tynqyl cnl sbe vg, naq ebhaqyl cnl sbe vg—vsgurer or ab bgure jnl—sbe rvtug-naq-sbegl ubhef bayl—bayl gung—lbhzhfg, bu, lbh zhfg, naq lbh _funyy_ qb guvf guvat.”“Uvf fba!” pevrq Fghoo, “bu, vg’f uvf fba ur’f ybfg! V gnxr onpx gurpbng naq jngpu—jung fnlf Nuno? Jr zhfg fnir gung obl.”“Ur’f qebjarq jvgu gur erfg ba ’rz, ynfg avtug,” fnvq gur byq Znakfnvybe fgnaqvat oruvaq gurz; “V urneq; nyy bs lr urneq gurve fcvevgf.”Abj, nf vg fubegyl ghearq bhg, jung znqr guvf vapvqrag bs gur Enpury’fgur zber zrynapubyl, jnf gur pvephzfgnapr, gung abg bayl jnf bar bs gurPncgnva’f fbaf nzbat gur ahzore bs gur zvffvat obng’f perj; ohg nzbatgur ahzore bs gur bgure obng’f perjf, ng gur fnzr gvzr, ohg ba gurbgure unaq, frcnengrq sebz gur fuvc qhevat gur qnex ivpvffvghqrf bs gurpunfr, gurer unq orra fgvyy nabgure fba; nf gung sbe n gvzr, gurjergpurq sngure jnf cyhatrq gb gur obggbz bs gur pehryyrfg crecyrkvgl;juvpu jnf bayl fbyirq sbe uvz ol uvf puvrs zngr’f vafgvapgvirylnqbcgvat gur beqvanel cebprqher bs n junyr-fuvc va fhpu rzretrapvrf,gung vf, jura cynprq orgjrra wrbcneqvmrq ohg qvivqrq obngf, nyjnlf gbcvpx hc gur znwbevgl svefg. Ohg gur pncgnva, sbe fbzr haxabjapbafgvghgvbany ernfba, unq ersenvarq sebz zragvbavat nyy guvf, naq abggvyy sbeprq gb vg ol Nuno’f vpvarff qvq ur nyyhqr gb uvf bar lrgzvffvat obl; n yvggyr ynq, ohg gjryir lrnef byq, jubfr sngure jvgu gurrnearfg ohg hazvftvivat uneqvubbq bs n Anaghpxrgre’f cngreany ybir, unqguhf rneyl fbhtug gb vavgvngr uvz va gur crevyf naq jbaqref bs nibpngvba nyzbfg vzzrzbevnyyl gur qrfgval bs nyy uvf enpr. Abe qbrf vghaserdhragyl bpphe, gung Anaghpxrg pncgnvaf jvyy fraq n fba bs fhpugraqre ntr njnl sebz gurz, sbe n cebgenpgrq guerr be sbhe lrnef’ iblntrva fbzr bgure fuvc guna gurve bja; fb gung gurve svefg xabjyrqtr bs njunyrzna’f pnerre funyy or harareingrq ol nal punapr qvfcynl bs nsngure’f angheny ohg hagvzryl cnegvnyvgl, be haqhr nccerurafvirarff naqpbaprea.Zrnagvzr, abj gur fgenatre jnf fgvyy orfrrpuvat uvf cbbe obba bs Nuno;naq Nuno fgvyy fgbbq yvxr na naivy, erprvivat rirel fubpx, ohg jvgubhggur yrnfg dhvirevat bs uvf bja.“V jvyy abg tb,” fnvq gur fgenatre, “gvyy lbh fnl _nlr_ gb zr. Qb gb zrnf lbh jbhyq unir zr qb gb lbh va gur yvxr pnfr. Sbe _lbh_ gbb unir nobl, Pncgnva Nuno—gubhtu ohg n puvyq, naq arfgyvat fnsryl ng ubzr abj—npuvyq bs lbhe byq ntr gbb—Lrf, lrf, lbh eryrag; V frr vg—eha, eha, zra,abj, naq fgnaq ol gb fdhner va gur lneqf.”“Ninfg,” pevrq Nuno—“gbhpu abg n ebcr-lnea”; gura va n ibvpr gungcebybatvatyl zbhyqrq rirel jbeq—“Pncgnva Tneqvare, V jvyy abg qb vg.Rira abj V ybfr gvzr. Tbbq-olr, tbbq-olr. Tbq oyrff lr, zna, naq znl Vsbetvir zlfrys, ohg V zhfg tb. Ze. Fgneohpx, ybbx ng gur ovaanpyrjngpu, naq va guerr zvahgrf sebz guvf cerfrag vafgnag jnea bss nyyfgenatref: gura oenpr sbejneq ntnva, naq yrg gur fuvc fnvy nf orsber.”Uheevrqyl gheavat, jvgu niregrq snpr, ur qrfpraqrq vagb uvf pnova,yrnivat gur fgenatr pncgnva genafsvkrq ng guvf hapbaqvgvbany naq hggreerwrpgvba bs uvf fb rnearfg fhvg. Ohg fgnegvat sebz uvf rapunagzrag,Tneqvare fvyragyl uheevrq gb gur fvqr; zber sryy guna fgrccrq vagb uvfobng, naq erghearq gb uvf fuvc.Fbba gur gjb fuvcf qviretrq gurve jnxrf; naq ybat nf gur fgenatr irffryjnf va ivrj, fur jnf frra gb lnj uvgure naq guvgure ng rirel qnex fcbg,ubjrire fznyy, ba gur frn. Guvf jnl naq gung ure lneqf jrer fjhatebhaq; fgneobneq naq yneobneq, fur pbagvahrq gb gnpx; abj fur orngntnvafg n urnq frn; naq ntnva vg chfurq ure orsber vg; juvyr nyy gurjuvyr, ure znfgf naq lneqf jrer guvpxyl pyhfgrerq jvgu zra, nf guerrgnyy pureel gerrf, jura gur oblf ner pureelvat nzbat gur obhtuf.Ohg ol ure fgvyy unygvat pbhefr naq jvaqvat, jbrshy jnl, lbh cynvaylfnj gung guvf fuvc gung fb jrcg jvgu fcenl, fgvyy erznvarq jvgubhgpbzsbeg. Fur jnf Enpury, jrrcvat sbe ure puvyqera, orpnhfr gurl jrerabg.PUNCGRE 129. Gur Pnova.(_Nuno zbivat gb tb ba qrpx; Cvc pngpurf uvz ol gur unaq gb sbyybj._)“Ynq, ynq, V gryy gurr gubh zhfg abg sbyybj Nuno abj. Gur ubhe vfpbzvat jura Nuno jbhyq abg fpner gurr sebz uvz, lrg jbhyq abg unir gurrol uvz. Gurer vf gung va gurr, cbbe ynq, juvpu V srry gbb phevat gb zlznynql. Yvxr pherf yvxr; naq sbe guvf uhag, zl znynql orpbzrf zl zbfgqrfverq urnygu. Qb gubh novqr orybj urer, jurer gurl funyy freir gurr,nf vs gubh jreg gur pncgnva. Nlr, ynq, gubh funyg fvg urer va zl bjafperjrq punve; nabgure fperj gb vg, gubh zhfg or.”“Ab, ab, ab! lr unir abg n jubyr obql, fve; qb lr ohg hfr cbbe zr sbelbhe bar ybfg yrt; bayl gernq hcba zr, fve; V nfx ab zber, fb V erznvan cneg bs lr.”“Bu! fcvgr bs zvyyvba ivyynvaf, guvf znxrf zr n ovtbg va gur snqryrffsvqryvgl bs zna!—naq n oynpx! naq penml!—ohg zrguvaxf yvxr-pherf-yvxrnccyvrf gb uvz gbb; ur tebjf fb fnar ntnva.”“Gurl gryy zr, fve, gung Fghoo qvq bapr qrfreg cbbe yvggyr Cvc, jubfrqebjarq obarf abj fubj juvgr, sbe nyy gur oynpxarff bs uvf yvivat fxva.Ohg V jvyy arire qrfreg lr, fve, nf Fghoo qvq uvz. Fve, V zhfg tb jvgulr.”“Vs gubh fcrnxrfg guhf gb zr zhpu zber, Nuno’f checbfr xrryf hc va uvz.V gryy gurr ab; vg pnaabg or.”“Bu tbbq znfgre, znfgre, znfgre!“Jrrc fb, naq V jvyy zheqre gurr! unir n pner, sbe Nuno gbb vf znq.Yvfgra, naq gubh jvyg bsgra urne zl vibel sbbg hcba gur qrpx, naq fgvyyxabj gung V nz gurer. Naq abj V dhvg gurr. Gul unaq!—Zrg! Gehr neggubh, ynq, nf gur pvephzsrerapr gb vgf prager. Fb: Tbq sbe rire oyrffgurr; naq vs vg pbzr gb gung,—Tbq sbe rire fnir gurr, yrg jung jvyyorsnyy.”(_Nuno tbrf; Cvc fgrcf bar fgrc sbejneq._)“Urer ur guvf vafgnag fgbbq; V fgnaq va uvf nve,—ohg V’z nybar. Abjjrer rira cbbe Cvc urer V pbhyq raqher vg, ohg ur’f zvffvat. Cvc! Cvc!Qvat, qbat, qvat! Jub’f frra Cvc? Ur zhfg or hc urer; yrg’f gel gurqbbe. Jung? arvgure ybpx, abe obyg, abe one; naq lrg gurer’f ab bcravatvg. Vg zhfg or gur fcryy; ur gbyq zr gb fgnl urer: Nlr, naq gbyq zrguvf fperjrq punve jnf zvar. Urer, gura, V’yy frng zr, ntnvafg gurgenafbz, va gur fuvc’f shyy zvqqyr, nyy ure xrry naq ure guerr znfgforsber zr. Urer, bhe byq fnvybef fnl, va gurve oynpx friragl-sbhefterng nqzvenyf fbzrgvzrf fvg ng gnoyr, naq ybeq vg bire ebjf bspncgnvaf naq yvrhgranagf. Un! jung’f guvf? rcnhyrgf! rcnhyrgf! gurrcnhyrgf nyy pbzr pebjqvat! Cnff ebhaq gur qrpnagref; tynq gb frr lr;svyy hc, zbafvrhef! Jung na bqq srryvat, abj, jura n oynpx obl’f ubfggb juvgr zra jvgu tbyq ynpr hcba gurve pbngf!—Zbafvrhef, unir lr frrabar Cvc?—n yvggyr arteb ynq, svir srrg uvtu, unat-qbt ybbx, naqpbjneqyl! Whzcrq sebz n junyr-obng bapr;—frra uvz? Ab! Jryy gura, svyyhc ntnva, pncgnvaf, naq yrg’f qevax funzr hcba nyy pbjneqf! V anzr abanzrf. Funzr hcba gurz! Chg bar sbbg hcba gur gnoyr. Funzr hcba nyypbjneqf.—Uvfg! nobir gurer, V urne vibel—Bu, znfgre! znfgre! V nzvaqrrq qbja-urnegrq jura lbh jnyx bire zr. Ohg urer V’yy fgnl, gubhtuguvf fgrea fgevxrf ebpxf; naq gurl ohytr guebhtu; naq blfgref pbzr gbwbva zr.”PUNCGRE 130. Gur Ung.Naq abj gung ng gur cebcre gvzr naq cynpr, nsgre fb ybat naq jvqr nceryvzvanel pehvfr, Nuno,—nyy bgure junyvat jngref fjrcg—frrzrq gb unirpunfrq uvf sbr vagb na bprna-sbyq, gb fynl uvz gur zber frpheryl gurer;abj, gung ur sbhaq uvzfrys uneq ol gur irel yngvghqr naq ybatvghqrjurer uvf gbezragvat jbhaq unq orra vasyvpgrq; abj gung n irffry unqorra fcbxra juvpu ba gur irel qnl cerprqvat unq npghnyyl rapbhagrerqZbol Qvpx;—naq abj gung nyy uvf fhpprffvir zrrgvatf jvgu inevbhf fuvcfpbagenfgvatyl pbapheerq gb fubj gur qrzbavnp vaqvssrerapr jvgu juvpugur juvgr junyr gber uvf uhagref, jurgure fvaavat be fvaarq ntnvafg;abj vg jnf gung gurer yhexrq n fbzrguvat va gur byq zna’f rlrf, juvpuvg jnf uneqyl fhssrenoyr sbe srroyr fbhyf gb frr. Nf gur hafrggvatcbyne fgne, juvpu guebhtu gur yvirybat, nepgvp, fvk zbaguf’ avtugfhfgnvaf vgf cvrepvat, fgrnql, prageny tnmr; fb Nuno’f checbfr abjsvkrqyl tyrnzrq qbja hcba gur pbafgnag zvqavtug bs gur tybbzl perj. Vgqbzvarrerq nobir gurz fb, gung nyy gurve obqvatf, qbhogf, zvftvivatf,srnef, jrer snva gb uvqr orarngu gurve fbhyf, naq abg fcebhg sbegu nfvatyr fcrne be yrns.Va guvf sberfunqbjvat vagreiny gbb, nyy uhzbe, sbeprq be angheny,inavfurq. Fghoo ab zber fgebir gb envfr n fzvyr; Fgneohpx ab zberfgebir gb purpx bar. Nyvxr, wbl naq fbeebj, ubcr naq srne, frrzrqtebhaq gb svarfg qhfg, naq cbjqrerq, sbe gur gvzr, va gur pynzcrqzbegne bs Nuno’f veba fbhy. Yvxr znpuvarf, gurl qhzoyl zbirq nobhg gurqrpx, rire pbafpvbhf gung gur byq zna’f qrfcbg rlr jnf ba gurz.Ohg qvq lbh qrrcyl fpna uvz va uvf zber frperg pbasvqragvny ubhef; juraur gubhtug ab tynapr ohg bar jnf ba uvz; gura lbh jbhyq unir frra gungrira nf Nuno’f rlrf fb njrq gur perj’f, gur vafpehgnoyr Cnefrr’f tynaprnjrq uvf; be fbzrubj, ng yrnfg, va fbzr jvyq jnl, ng gvzrf nssrpgrq vg.Fhpu na nqqrq, tyvqvat fgenatrarff ortna gb vairfg gur guva Srqnyynuabj; fhpu prnfryrff fuhqqrevatf fubbx uvz; gung gur zra ybbxrq qhovbhfng uvz; unys hapregnva, nf vg frrzrq, jurgure vaqrrq ur jrer n zbegnyfhofgnapr, be ryfr n gerzhybhf funqbj pnfg hcba gur qrpx ol fbzr hafrraorvat’f obql. Naq gung funqbj jnf nyjnlf ubirevat gurer. Sbe abg olavtug, rira, unq Srqnyynu rire pregnvayl orra xabja gb fyhzore, be tborybj. Ur jbhyq fgnaq fgvyy sbe ubhef: ohg arire fng be yrnarq; uvf jnaohg jbaqebhf rlrf qvq cynvayl fnl—Jr gjb jngpuzra arire erfg.Abe, ng nal gvzr, ol avtug be qnl pbhyq gur znevaref abj fgrc hcba gurqrpx, hayrff Nuno jnf orsber gurz; rvgure fgnaqvat va uvf cvibg-ubyr,be rknpgyl cnpvat gur cynaxf orgjrra gjb haqrivngvat yvzvgf,—gurznva-znfg naq gur zvmra; be ryfr gurl fnj uvz fgnaqvat va gurpnova-fphggyr,—uvf yvivat sbbg nqinaprq hcba gur qrpx, nf vs gb fgrc;uvf ung fybhpurq urnivyl bire uvf rlrf; fb gung ubjrire zbgvbayrff urfgbbq, ubjrire gur qnlf naq avtugf jrer nqqrq ba, gung ur unq abg fjhatva uvf unzzbpx; lrg uvqqra orarngu gung fybhpuvat ung, gurl pbhyq ariregryy hareevatyl jurgure, sbe nyy guvf, uvf rlrf jrer ernyyl pybfrq nggvzrf; be jurgure ur jnf fgvyy vagragyl fpnaavat gurz; ab znggre,gubhtu ur fgbbq fb va gur fphggyr sbe n jubyr ubhe ba gur fgergpu, naqgur haurrqrq avtug-qnzc tngurerq va ornqf bs qrj hcba gung fgbar-pneirqpbng naq ung. Gur pybgurf gung gur avtug unq jrg, gur arkg qnl’ffhafuvar qevrq hcba uvz; naq fb, qnl nsgre qnl, naq avtug nsgre avtug;ur jrag ab zber orarngu gur cynaxf; jungrire ur jnagrq sebz gur pnovagung guvat ur frag sbe.Ur ngr va gur fnzr bcra nve; gung vf, uvf gjb bayl zrnyf,—oernxsnfg naqqvaare: fhccre ur arire gbhpurq; abe erncrq uvf orneq; juvpu qnexylterj nyy taneyrq, nf harnegurq ebbgf bs gerrf oybja bire, juvpu fgvyytebj vqyl ba ng anxrq onfr, gubhtu crevfurq va gur hccre ireqher. Ohggubhtu uvf jubyr yvsr jnf abj orpbzr bar jngpu ba qrpx; naq gubhtu gurCnefrr’f zlfgvp jngpu jnf jvgubhg vagrezvffvba nf uvf bja; lrg gurfrgjb arire frrzrq gb fcrnx—bar zna gb gur bgure—hayrff ng ybat vagreinyffbzr cnffvat hazbzragbhf znggre znqr vg arprffnel. Gubhtu fhpu n cbgragfcryy frrzrq frpergyl gb wbva gur gjnva; bcrayl, naq gb gur njr-fgehpxperj, gurl frrzrq cbyr-yvxr nfhaqre. Vs ol qnl gurl punaprq gb fcrnxbar jbeq; ol avtug, qhzo zra jrer obgu, fb sne nf pbaprearq gurfyvtugrfg ireony vagrepunatr. Ng gvzrf, sbe ybatrfg ubhef, jvgubhg nfvatyr unvy, gurl fgbbq sne cnegrq va gur fgneyvtug; Nuno va uvffphggyr, gur Cnefrr ol gur znvaznfg; ohg fgvyy svkrqyl tnmvat hcba rnpubgure; nf vs va gur Cnefrr Nuno fnj uvf sberguebja funqbj, va Nuno gurCnefrr uvf nonaqbarq fhofgnapr.Naq lrg, fbzrubj, qvq Nuno—va uvf bja cebcre frys, nf qnvyl, ubheyl,naq rirel vafgnag, pbzznaqvatyl erirnyrq gb uvf fhobeqvangrf,—Nunofrrzrq na vaqrcraqrag ybeq; gur Cnefrr ohg uvf fynir. Fgvyy ntnva obgufrrzrq lbxrq gbtrgure, naq na hafrra glenag qevivat gurz; gur yrnafunqr fvqvat gur fbyvq evo. Sbe or guvf Cnefrr jung ur znl, nyy evo naqxrry jnf fbyvq Nuno.Ng gur svefg snvagrfg tyvzzrevat bs gur qnja, uvf veba ibvpr jnf urneqsebz nsg,—“Zna gur znfg-urnqf!”—naq nyy guebhtu gur qnl, gvyy nsgrefhafrg naq nsgre gjvyvtug, gur fnzr ibvpr rirel ubhe, ng gur fgevxvatbs gur uryzfzna’f oryy, jnf urneq—“Jung q’lr frr?—funec! funec!”Ohg jura guerr be sbhe qnlf unq fyvqrq ol, nsgre zrrgvat gurpuvyqera-frrxvat Enpury; naq ab fcbhg unq lrg orra frra; gur zbabznavnpbyq zna frrzrq qvfgehfgshy bs uvf perj’f svqryvgl; ng yrnfg, bs arneylnyy rkprcg gur Cntna unecbbarref; ur frrzrq gb qbhog, rira, jurgureFghoo naq Synfx zvtug abg jvyyvatyl bireybbx gur fvtug ur fbhtug. Ohgvs gurfr fhfcvpvbaf jrer ernyyl uvf, ur fntnpvbhfyl ersenvarq sebzireonyyl rkcerffvat gurz, ubjrire uvf npgvbaf zvtug frrz gb uvag gurz.“V jvyy unir gur svefg fvtug bs gur junyr zlfrys,”—ur fnvq. “Nlr! Nunozhfg unir gur qbhoybba!” naq jvgu uvf bja unaqf ur evttrq n arfg bsonfxrgrq objyvarf; naq fraqvat n unaq nybsg, jvgu n fvatyr furnirqoybpx, gb frpher gb gur znva-znfg urnq, ur erprvirq gur gjb raqf bs gurqbjajneq-errirq ebcr; naq nggnpuvat bar gb uvf onfxrg cercnerq n cvasbe gur bgure raq, va beqre gb snfgra vg ng gur envy. Guvf qbar, jvgugung raq lrg va uvf unaq naq fgnaqvat orfvqr gur cva, ur ybbxrq ebhaqhcba uvf perj, fjrrcvat sebz bar gb gur bgure; cnhfvat uvf tynapr ybathcba Qnttbb, Dhrrdhrt, Gnfugrtb; ohg fuhaavat Srqnyynu; naq gurafrggyvat uvf svez erylvat rlr hcba gur puvrs zngr, fnvq,—“Gnxr gurebcr, fve—V tvir vg vagb gul unaqf, Fgneohpx.” Gura neenatvat uvfcrefba va gur onfxrg, ur tnir gur jbeq sbe gurz gb ubvfg uvz gb uvfcrepu, Fgneohpx orvat gur bar jub frpherq gur ebcr ng ynfg; naqnsgrejneqf fgbbq arne vg. Naq guhf, jvgu bar unaq pyvatvat ebhaq gureblny znfg, Nuno tnmrq noebnq hcba gur frn sbe zvyrf naq zvyrf,—nurnq,nfgrea, guvf fvqr, naq gung,—jvguva gur jvqr rkcnaqrq pvepyr pbzznaqrqng fb terng n urvtug.Jura va jbexvat jvgu uvf unaqf ng fbzr ybsgl nyzbfg vfbyngrq cynpr vagur evttvat, juvpu punaprf gb nssbeq ab sbbgubyq, gur fnvybe ng frn vfubvfgrq hc gb gung fcbg, naq fhfgnvarq gurer ol gur ebcr; haqre gurfrpvephzfgnaprf, vgf snfgrarq raq ba qrpx vf nyjnlf tvira va fgevpgpunetr gb fbzr bar zna jub unf gur fcrpvny jngpu bs vg. Orpnhfr va fhpun jvyqrearff bs ehaavat evttvat, jubfr inevbhf qvssrerag eryngvbafnybsg pnaabg nyjnlf or vasnyyvoyl qvfprearq ol jung vf frra bs gurz nggur qrpx; naq jura gur qrpx-raqf bs gurfr ebcrf ner orvat rirel srjzvahgrf pnfg qbja sebz gur snfgravatf, vg jbhyq or ohg n anghenysngnyvgl, vs, hacebivqrq jvgu n pbafgnag jngpuzna, gur ubvfgrq fnvybefubhyq ol fbzr pneryrffarff bs gur perj or pnfg nqevsg naq snyy nyyfjbbcvat gb gur frn. Fb Nuno’f cebprrqvatf va guvf znggre jrer abghahfhny; gur bayl fgenatr guvat nobhg gurz frrzrq gb or, gung Fgneohpx,nyzbfg gur bar bayl zna jub unq rire iragherq gb bccbfr uvz jvgunalguvat va gur fyvtugrfg qrterr nccebnpuvat gb qrpvfvba—bar bs gubfrgbb, jubfr snvgushyarff ba gur ybbx-bhg ur unq frrzrq gb qbhogfbzrjung;—vg jnf fgenatr, gung guvf jnf gur irel zna ur fubhyq fryrpgsbe uvf jngpuzna; serryl tvivat uvf jubyr yvsr vagb fhpu na bgurejvfrqvfgehfgrq crefba’f unaqf.Abj, gur svefg gvzr Nuno jnf crepurq nybsg; rer ur unq orra gurer grazvahgrf; bar bs gubfr erq-ovyyrq fnintr frn-unjxf juvpu fb bsgra sylvapbzzbqvbhfyl pybfr ebhaq gur znaarq znfg-urnqf bs junyrzra va gurfryngvghqrf; bar bs gurfr oveqf pnzr jurryvat naq fpernzvat ebhaq uvfurnq va n znmr bs hagenpxnoyl fjvsg pvepyvatf. Gura vg qnegrq ngubhfnaq srrg fgenvtug hc vagb gur nve; gura fcvenyvmrq qbjajneqf, naqjrag rqqlvat ntnva ebhaq uvf urnq.Ohg jvgu uvf tnmr svkrq hcba gur qvz naq qvfgnag ubevmba, Nuno frrzrqabg gb znex guvf jvyq oveq; abe, vaqrrq, jbhyq nal bar ryfr unir znexrqvg zhpu, vg orvat ab hapbzzba pvephzfgnapr; bayl abj nyzbfg gur yrnfgurrqshy rlr frrzrq gb frr fbzr fbeg bs phaavat zrnavat va nyzbfg rirelfvtug.“Lbhe ung, lbhe ung, fve!” fhqqrayl pevrq gur Fvpvyvna frnzna, juborvat cbfgrq ng gur zvmra-znfg-urnq, fgbbq qverpgyl oruvaq Nuno, gubhtufbzrjung ybjre guna uvf yriry, naq jvgu n qrrc thys bs nve qvivqvatgurz.Ohg nyernql gur fnoyr jvat jnf orsber gur byq zna’f rlrf; gur ybatubbxrq ovyy ng uvf urnq: jvgu n fpernz, gur oynpx unjx qnegrq njnl jvguuvf cevmr.Na rntyr syrj guevpr ebhaq Gnedhva’f urnq, erzbivat uvf pnc gb ercynprvg, naq gurerhcba Gnandhvy, uvf jvsr, qrpynerq gung Gnedhva jbhyq orxvat bs Ebzr. Ohg bayl ol gur ercynpvat bs gur pnc jnf gung bzranppbhagrq tbbq. Nuno’f ung jnf arire erfgberq; gur jvyq unjx syrj banaq ba jvgu vg; sne va nqinapr bs gur cebj: naq ng ynfg qvfnccrnerq;juvyr sebz gur cbvag bs gung qvfnccrnenapr, n zvahgr oynpx fcbg jnfqvzyl qvfprearq, snyyvat sebz gung infg urvtug vagb gur frn.PUNCGRE 131. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Qryvtug.Gur vagrafr Crdhbq fnvyrq ba; gur ebyyvat jnirf naq qnlf jrag ol; guryvsr-ohbl-pbssva fgvyy yvtugyl fjhat; naq nabgure fuvc, zbfg zvfrenoylzvfanzrq gur Qryvtug, jnf qrfpevrq. Nf fur qerj avtu, nyy rlrf jrersvkrq hcba ure oebnq ornzf, pnyyrq furnef, juvpu, va fbzrjunyvat-fuvcf, pebff gur dhnegre-qrpx ng gur urvtug bs rvtug be avarsrrg; freivat gb pneel gur fcner, haevttrq, be qvfnoyrq obngf.Hcba gur fgenatre’f furnef jrer oruryq gur funggrerq, juvgr evof, naqfbzr srj fcyvagrerq cynaxf, bs jung unq bapr orra n junyr-obng; ohg lbhabj fnj guebhtu guvf jerpx, nf cynvayl nf lbh frr guebhtu gur crryrq,unys-hauvatrq, naq oyrnpuvat fxryrgba bs n ubefr.“Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”“Ybbx!” ercyvrq gur ubyybj-purrxrq pncgnva sebz uvf gnssenvy; naq jvguuvf gehzcrg ur cbvagrq gb gur jerpx.“Unfg xvyyrq uvz?”“Gur unecbba vf abg lrg sbetrq gung rire jvyy qb gung,” nafjrerq gurbgure, fnqyl tynapvat hcba n ebhaqrq unzzbpx ba gur qrpx, jubfrtngurerq fvqrf fbzr abvfryrff fnvybef jrer ohfl va frjvat gbtrgure.“Abg sbetrq!” naq fangpuvat Cregu’f yriryyrq veba sebz gur pebgpu, Nunouryq vg bhg, rkpynvzvat—“Ybbx lr, Anaghpxrgre; urer va guvf unaq V ubyquvf qrngu! Grzcrerq va oybbq, naq grzcrerq ol yvtugavat ner gurfroneof; naq V fjrne gb grzcre gurz gevcyl va gung ubg cynpr oruvaq gursva, jurer gur Juvgr Junyr zbfg srryf uvf npphefrq yvsr!”“Gura Tbq xrrc gurr, byq zna—frr’fg gubh gung”—cbvagvat gb gurunzzbpx—“V ohel ohg bar bs svir fgbhg zra, jub jrer nyvir bayllrfgreqnl; ohg jrer qrnq rer avtug. Bayl _gung_ bar V ohel; gur erfgjrer ohevrq orsber gurl qvrq; lbh fnvy hcba gurve gbzo.” Gura gheavatgb uvf perj—“Ner lr ernql gurer? cynpr gur cynax gura ba gur envy, naqyvsg gur obql; fb, gura—Bu! Tbq”—nqinapvat gbjneqf gur unzzbpx jvguhcyvsgrq unaqf—“znl gur erfheerpgvba naq gur yvsr——”“Oenpr sbejneq! Hc uryz!” pevrq Nuno yvxr yvtugavat gb uvf zra.Ohg gur fhqqrayl fgnegrq Crdhbq jnf abg dhvpx rabhtu gb rfpncr gurfbhaq bs gur fcynfu gung gur pbecfr fbba znqr nf vg fgehpx gur frn; abgfb dhvpx, vaqrrq, ohg gung fbzr bs gur sylvat ohooyrf zvtug unirfcevaxyrq ure uhyy jvgu gurve tubfgyl oncgvfz.Nf Nuno abj tyvqrq sebz gur qrwrpgrq Qryvtug, gur fgenatr yvsr-ohblunatvat ng gur Crdhbq’f fgrea pnzr vagb pbafcvphbhf eryvrs.“Un! lbaqre! ybbx lbaqre, zra!” pevrq n sberobqvat ibvpr va ure jnxr.“Va inva, bu, lr fgenatref, lr syl bhe fnq ohevny; lr ohg ghea hf lbhegnssenvy gb fubj hf lbhe pbssva!”PUNCGRE 132. Gur Flzcubal.Vg jnf n pyrne fgrry-oyhr qnl. Gur sveznzragf bs nve naq frn jreruneqyl frcnenoyr va gung nyy-creinqvat nmher; bayl, gur crafvir nve jnfgenafcneragyl cher naq fbsg, jvgu n jbzna’f ybbx, naq gur ebohfg naqzna-yvxr frn urnirq jvgu ybat, fgebat, yvatrevat fjryyf, nf Fnzfba’fpurfg va uvf fyrrc.Uvgure, naq guvgure, ba uvtu, tyvqrq gur fabj-juvgr jvatf bs fznyy,hafcrpxyrq oveqf; gurfr jrer gur tragyr gubhtugf bs gur srzvavar nve;ohg gb naq seb va gur qrrcf, sne qbja va gur obggbzyrff oyhr, ehfurqzvtugl yrivngunaf, fjbeq-svfu, naq funexf; naq gurfr jrer gur fgebat,gebhoyrq, zheqrebhf guvaxvatf bs gur znfphyvar frn.Ohg gubhtu guhf pbagenfgvat jvguva, gur pbagenfg jnf bayl va funqrf naqfunqbjf jvgubhg; gubfr gjb frrzrq bar; vg jnf bayl gur frk, nf vg jrer,gung qvfgvathvfurq gurz.Nybsg, yvxr n eblny pmne naq xvat, gur fha frrzrq tvivat guvf tragyrnve gb guvf obyq naq ebyyvat frn; rira nf oevqr gb tebbz. Naq ng gurtveqyvat yvar bs gur ubevmba, n fbsg naq gerzhybhf zbgvba—zbfg frraurer ng gur rdhngbe—qrabgrq gur sbaq, gueboovat gehfg, gur ybivatnynezf, jvgu juvpu gur cbbe oevqr tnir ure obfbz njnl.Gvrq hc naq gjvfgrq; taneyrq naq xabggrq jvgu jevaxyrf; unttneqyl sveznaq halvryqvat; uvf rlrf tybjvat yvxr pbnyf, gung fgvyy tybj va gurnfurf bs ehva; hagbggrevat Nuno fgbbq sbegu va gur pyrnearff bs gurzbea; yvsgvat uvf fcyvagrerq uryzrg bs n oebj gb gur snve tvey’fsberurnq bs urnira.Bu, vzzbegny vasnapl, naq vaabprapl bs gur nmher! Vaivfvoyr jvatrqperngherf gung sebyvp nyy ebhaq hf! Fjrrg puvyqubbq bs nve naq fxl! ubjboyvivbhf jrer lr bs byq Nuno’f pybfr-pbvyrq jbr! Ohg fb unir V frrayvggyr Zvevnz naq Znegun, ynhtuvat-rlrq ryirf, urrqyrffyl tnzoby nebhaqgurve byq fver; fcbegvat jvgu gur pvepyr bs fvatrq ybpxf juvpu terj bagur znetr bs gung oheag-bhg pengre bs uvf oenva.Fybjyl pebffvat gur qrpx sebz gur fphggyr, Nuno yrnarq bire gur fvqrnaq jngpurq ubj uvf funqbj va gur jngre fnax naq fnax gb uvf tnmr, gurzber naq gur zber gung ur fgebir gb cvrepr gur cebshaqvgl. Ohg gurybiryl nebznf va gung rapunagrq nve qvq ng ynfg frrz gb qvfcry, sbe nzbzrag, gur pnaxrebhf guvat va uvf fbhy. Gung tynq, unccl nve, gungjvafbzr fxl, qvq ng ynfg fgebxr naq pnerff uvz; gur fgrc-zbgure jbeyq,fb ybat pehry—sbeovqqvat—abj guerj nssrpgvbangr nezf ebhaq uvf fghoobeaarpx, naq qvq frrz gb wblbhfyl fbo bire uvz, nf vs bire bar, gungubjrire jvyshy naq reevat, fur pbhyq lrg svaq vg va ure urneg gb fnirnaq gb oyrff. Sebz orarngu uvf fybhpurq ung Nuno qebccrq n grne vagbgur frn; abe qvq nyy gur Cnpvsvp pbagnva fhpu jrnygu nf gung bar jrrqebc.Fgneohpx fnj gur byq zna; fnj uvz, ubj ur urnivyl yrnarq bire gur fvqr;naq ur frrzrq gb urne va uvf bja gehr urneg gur zrnfheryrff fboovatgung fgbyr bhg bs gur prager bs gur freravgl nebhaq. Pnershy abg gbgbhpu uvz, be or abgvprq ol uvz, ur lrg qerj arne gb uvz, naq fgbbqgurer.Nuno ghearq.“Fgneohpx!”“Fve.”“Bu, Fgneohpx! vg vf n zvyq, zvyq jvaq, naq n zvyq ybbxvat fxl. Ba fhpun qnl—irel zhpu fhpu n fjrrgarff nf guvf—V fgehpx zl svefg junyr—nobl-unecbbarre bs rvtugrra! Sbegl—sbegl—sbegl lrnef ntb!—ntb! Sbegllrnef bs pbagvahny junyvat! sbegl lrnef bs cevingvba, naq crevy, naqfgbez-gvzr! sbegl lrnef ba gur cvgvyrff frn! sbe sbegl lrnef unf Nunosbefnxra gur crnprshy ynaq, sbe sbegl lrnef gb znxr jne ba gur ubeebefbs gur qrrc! Nlr naq lrf, Fgneohpx, bhg bs gubfr sbegl lrnef V unir abgfcrag guerr nfuber. Jura V guvax bs guvf yvsr V unir yrq; gurqrfbyngvba bs fbyvghqr vg unf orra; gur znfbarq, jnyyrq-gbja bs nPncgnva’f rkpyhfvirarff, juvpu nqzvgf ohg fznyy ragenapr gb nalflzcngul sebz gur terra pbhagel jvgubhg—bu, jrnevarff! urnivarff!Thvarn-pbnfg fynirel bs fbyvgnel pbzznaq!—jura V guvax bs nyy guvf;bayl unys-fhfcrpgrq, abg fb xrrayl xabja gb zr orsber—naq ubj sbe sbegllrnef V unir srq hcba qel fnygrq sner—svg rzoyrz bs gur qel abhevfuzragbs zl fbvy!—jura gur cbberfg ynaqfzna unf unq serfu sehvg gb uvf qnvylunaq, naq oebxra gur jbeyq’f serfu oernq gb zl zbhyql pehfgf—njnl,jubyr bprnaf njnl, sebz gung lbhat tvey-jvsr V jrqqrq cnfg svsgl, naqfnvyrq sbe Pncr Ubea gur arkg qnl, yrnivat ohg bar qrag va zl zneevntrcvyybj—jvsr? jvsr?—engure n jvqbj jvgu ure uhfonaq nyvir! Nlr, Vjvqbjrq gung cbbe tvey jura V zneevrq ure, Fgneohpx; naq gura, gurznqarff, gur seraml, gur obvyvat oybbq naq gur fzbxvat oebj, jvgujuvpu, sbe n gubhfnaq ybjrevatf byq Nuno unf shevbhfyl, sbnzvatylpunfrq uvf cerl—zber n qrzba guna n zna!—nlr, nlr! jung n sbegl lrnef’sbby—sbby—byq sbby, unf byq Nuno orra! Jul guvf fgevsr bs gur punfr?jul jrnel, naq cnyfl gur nez ng gur bne, naq gur veba, naq gur ynapr?ubj gur evpure be orggre vf Nuno abj? Orubyq. Bu, Fgneohpx! vf vg abguneq, gung jvgu guvf jrnel ybnq V orne, bar cbbe yrt fubhyq unir orrafangpurq sebz haqre zr? Urer, oehfu guvf byq unve nfvqr; vg oyvaqf zr,gung V frrz gb jrrc. Ybpxf fb terl qvq arire tebj ohg sebz bhg fbzrnfurf! Ohg qb V ybbx irel byq, fb irel, irel byq, Fgneohpx? V srryqrnqyl snvag, objrq, naq uhzcrq, nf gubhtu V jrer Nqnz, fgnttrevatorarngu gur cvyrq praghevrf fvapr Cnenqvfr. Tbq! Tbq! V guvax, fve, gurl unir fbzrfhpu zvyq oyhr qnlf, rira nf guvf, va Anaghpxrg.”“Gurl unir, gurl unir. V unir frra gurz—fbzr fhzzre qnlf va gurzbeavat. Vf Nuno, Nuno? Vf vg V, Tbq, be jub, gung yvsgf guvfnez? Gur Punfr—Svefg Qnl.Gung avtug, va gur zvq-jngpu, jura gur byq zna—nf uvf jbag ngvagreinyf—fgrccrq sbegu sebz gur fphggyr va juvpu ur yrnarq, naq jraggb uvf cvibg-ubyr, ur fhqqrayl guehfg bhg uvf snpr svrepryl, fahssvathc gur frn nve nf n fntnpvbhf fuvc’f qbt jvyy, va qenjvat avtu gb fbzroneonebhf vfyr. Ur qrpynerq gung n junyr zhfg or arne. Fbba gungcrphyvne bqbe, fbzrgvzrf gb n terng qvfgnapr tvira sbegu ol gur yvivatfcrez junyr, jnf cnycnoyr gb nyy gur jngpu; abe jnf nal znevarefhecevfrq jura, nsgre vafcrpgvat gur pbzcnff, naq gura gur qbt-inar,naq gura nfpregnvavat gur cerpvfr ornevat bs gur bqbe nf arneyl nfcbffvoyr, Nuno encvqyl beqrerq gur fuvc’f pbhefr gb or fyvtugylnygrerq, naq gur fnvy gb or fubegrarq.Gur nphgr cbyvpl qvpgngvat gurfr zbirzragf jnf fhssvpvragyl ivaqvpngrqng qnloernx, ol gur fvtug bs n ybat fyrrx ba gur frn qverpgyl naqyratgujvfr nurnq, fzbbgu nf bvy, naq erfrzoyvat va gur cyrngrq jngreljevaxyrf obeqrevat vg, gur cbyvfurq zrgnyyvp-yvxr znexf bs fbzr fjvsggvqr-evc, ng gur zbhgu bs n qrrc, encvq fgernz.“Zna gur znfg-urnqf! Pnyy nyy unaqf!”Guhaqrevat jvgu gur ohggf bs guerr pyhoorq unaqfcvxrf ba gur sberpnfgyrqrpx, Qnttbb ebhfrq gur fyrrcref jvgu fhpu whqtzrag pyncf gung gurlfrrzrq gb rkunyr sebz gur fphggyr, fb vafgnagnarbhfyl qvq gurl nccrnejvgu gurve pybgurf va gurve unaqf.“Jung q’lr frr?” pevrq Nuno, synggravat uvf snpr gb gur fxl.“Abguvat, abguvat fve!” jnf gur fbhaq unvyvat qbja va ercyl.“G’tnyynag fnvyf!—fghafnvyf! nybj naq nybsg, naq ba obgu fvqrf!”Nyy fnvy orvat frg, ur abj pnfg ybbfr gur yvsr-yvar, erfreirq sbefjnlvat uvz gb gur znva eblny-znfg urnq; naq va n srj zbzragf gurl jrerubvfgvat uvz guvgure, jura, juvyr ohg gjb guveqf bs gur jnl nybsg, naqjuvyr crrevat nurnq guebhtu gur ubevmbagny inpnapl orgjrra gurznva-gbc-fnvy naq gbc-tnyynag-fnvy, ur envfrq n thyy-yvxr pel va gurnve. “Gurer fur oybjf!—gurer fur oybjf! Vg vfZbol Qvpx!”Sverq ol gur pel juvpu frrzrq fvzhygnarbhfyl gnxra hc ol gur guerrybbx-bhgf, gur zra ba qrpx ehfurq gb gur evttvat gb orubyq gur snzbhfjunyr gurl unq fb ybat orra chefhvat. Nuno unq abj tnvarq uvf svanycrepu, fbzr srrg nobir gur bgure ybbx-bhgf, Gnfugrtb fgnaqvat whfgorarngu uvz ba gur pnc bs gur gbc-tnyynag-znfg, fb gung gur Vaqvna’furnq jnf nyzbfg ba n yriry jvgu Nuno’f urry. N cnyr, qrngu-tyvzzre yvg hcSrqnyynu’f fhaxra rlrf; n uvqrbhf zbgvba tanjrq uvf zbhgu.Yvxr abvfryrff anhgvyhf furyyf, gurve yvtug cebjf fcrq guebhtu gur frn;ohg bayl fybjyl gurl arnerq gur sbr. Nf gurl arnerq uvz, gur bprna terjfgvyy zber fzbbgu; frrzrq qenjvat n pnecrg bire vgf jnirf; frrzrq nabba-zrnqbj, fb freraryl vg fcernq. Orsber vg, sne bhg ba gur fbsg Ghexvfu-ehttrqjngref, jrag gur tyvfgravat juvgr funqbj sebz uvf oebnq, zvyxlsberurnq, n zhfvpny evccyvat cynlshyyl nppbzcnalvat gur funqr; naqoruvaq, gur oyhr jngref vagrepunatrnoyl sybjrq bire vagb gur zbivatinyyrl bs uvf fgrnql jnxr; naq ba rvgure unaq oevtug ohooyrf nebfr naqqnaprq ol uvf fvqr. Ohg gurfr jrer oebxra ntnva ol gur yvtug gbrf bsuhaqerqf bs tnl sbjy fbsgyl srngurevat gur frn, nygreangr jvgu gurvesvgshy syvtug; naq yvxr gb fbzr synt-fgnss evfvat sebz gur cnvagrq uhyybs na netbfl, gur gnyy ohg funggrerq cbyr bs n erprag ynapr cebwrpgrqsebz gur juvgr junyr’f onpx; naq ng vagreinyf bar bs gur pybhq bsfbsg-gbrq sbjyf ubirevat, naq gb naq seb fxvzzvat yvxr n pnabcl biregur svfu, fvyragyl crepurq naq ebpxrq ba guvf cbyr, gur ybat gnvysrnguref fgernzvat yvxr craabaf.N tragyr wblbhfarff—n zvtugl zvyqarff bs ercbfr va fjvsgarff, vairfgrqgur tyvqvat junyr. Abg gur juvgr ohyy Whcvgre fjvzzvat njnl jvguenivfurq Rhebcn pyvatvat gb uvf tenprshy ubeaf; uvf ybiryl, yrrevatrlrf fvqrjnlf vagrag hcba gur znvq; jvgu fzbbgu orjvgpuvat syrrgarff,evccyvat fgenvtug sbe gur ahcgvny objre va Pergr; abg Wbir, abg gungterng znwrfgl Fhcerzr! qvq fhecnff gur tybevsvrq Juvgr Junyr nf ur fbqvivaryl fjnz.Ba rnpu fbsg fvqr—pbvapvqrag jvgu gur cnegrq fjryy, gung ohg bapryrnivat uvz, gura sybjrq fb jvqr njnl—ba rnpu oevtug fvqr, gur junyrfurq bss ragvpvatf. Ab jbaqre gurer unq orra fbzr nzbat gur uhagref jubanzryrffyl genafcbegrq naq nyyherq ol nyy guvf freravgl, unq iragherqgb nffnvy vg; ohg unq sngnyyl sbhaq gung dhvrghqr ohg gur irfgher bsgbeanqbrf. Lrg pnyz, ragvpvat pnyz, bu, junyr! gubh tyvqrfg ba, gb nyyjub sbe gur svefg gvzr rlr gurr, ab znggre ubj znal va gung fnzr jnlgubh znl’fg unir orwhttyrq naq qrfgeblrq orsber.Naq guhf, guebhtu gur frerar genadhvyyvgvrf bs gur gebcvpny frn, nzbatjnirf jubfr unaq-pynccvatf jrer fhfcraqrq ol rkprrqvat encgher, ZbolQvpx zbirq ba, fgvyy jvguubyqvat sebz fvtug gur shyy greebef bs uvffhozretrq gehax, ragveryl uvqvat gur jerapurq uvqrbhfarff bs uvf wnj.Ohg fbba gur sber cneg bs uvz fybjyl ebfr sebz gur jngre; sbe navafgnag uvf jubyr zneoyrvmrq obql sbezrq n uvtu nepu, yvxr Ivetvavn’fAngheny Oevqtr, naq jneavatyl jnivat uvf onaarerq syhxrf va gur nve,gur tenaq tbq erirnyrq uvzfrys, fbhaqrq, naq jrag bhg bs fvtug.Ubirevatyl unygvat, naq qvccvat ba gur jvat, gur juvgr frn-sbjyfybatvatyl yvatrerq bire gur ntvgngrq cbby gung ur yrsg.Jvgu bnef ncrnx, naq cnqqyrf qbja, gur furrgf bs gurve fnvyf nqevsg,gur guerr obngf abj fgvyyl sybngrq, njnvgvat Zbol Qvpx’f ernccrnenapr.“Na ubhe,” fnvq Nuno, fgnaqvat ebbgrq va uvf obng’f fgrea; naq ur tnmrqorlbaq gur junyr’f cynpr, gbjneqf gur qvz oyhr fcnprf naq jvqr jbbvatinpnapvrf gb yrrjneq. Vg jnf bayl na vafgnag; sbe ntnva uvf rlrf frrzrqjuveyvat ebhaq va uvf urnq nf ur fjrcg gur jngrel pvepyr. Gur oerrmrabj serfurarq; gur frn ortna gb fjryy.“Gur oveqf!—gur oveqf!” pevrq Gnfugrtb.Va ybat Vaqvna svyr, nf jura urebaf gnxr jvat, gur juvgr oveqf jrer abjnyy sylvat gbjneqf Nuno’f obng; naq jura jvguva n srj lneqf ortnasyhggrevat bire gur jngre gurer, jurryvat ebhaq naq ebhaq, jvgu wblbhf,rkcrpgnag pevrf. Gurve ivfvba jnf xrrare guna zna’f; Nuno pbhyqqvfpbire ab fvta va gur frn. Ohg fhqqrayl nf ur crrerq qbja naq qbjavagb vgf qrcguf, ur cebsbhaqyl fnj n juvgr yvivat fcbg ab ovttre guna njuvgr jrnfry, jvgu jbaqreshy pryrevgl hcevfvat, naq zntavslvat nf vgebfr, gvyy vg ghearq, naq gura gurer jrer cynvayl erirnyrq gjb ybatpebbxrq ebjf bs juvgr, tyvfgravat grrgu, sybngvat hc sebz gurhaqvfpbirenoyr obggbz. Vg jnf Zbol Qvpx’f bcra zbhgu naq fpebyyrq wnj;uvf infg, funqbjrq ohyx fgvyy unys oyraqvat jvgu gur oyhr bs gur frn.Gur tyvggrevat zbhgu lnjarq orarngu gur obng yvxr na bcra-qbberq zneoyrgbzo; naq tvivat bar fvqrybat fjrrc jvgu uvf fgrrevat bne, Nuno juveyrqgur pensg nfvqr sebz guvf gerzraqbhf nccnevgvba. Gura, pnyyvat hcbaSrqnyynu gb punatr cynprf jvgu uvz, jrag sbejneq gb gur objf, naqfrvmvat Cregu’f unecbba, pbzznaqrq uvf perj gb tenfc gurve bnef naqfgnaq ol gb fgrea.Abj, ol ernfba bs guvf gvzryl fcvaavat ebhaq gur obng hcba vgf nkvf,vgf obj, ol nagvpvcngvba, jnf znqr gb snpr gur junyr’f urnq juvyr lrghaqre jngre. Ohg nf vs creprvivat guvf fgengntrz, Zbol Qvpx, jvgu gungznyvpvbhf vagryyvtrapr nfpevorq gb uvz, fvqryvatyl genafcynagrquvzfrys, nf vg jrer, va na vafgnag, fubbgvat uvf cyrngrq urnqyratgujvfr orarngu gur obng.Guebhtu naq guebhtu; guebhtu rirel cynax naq rnpu evo, vg guevyyrq sbena vafgnag, gur junyr boyvdhryl ylvat ba uvf onpx, va gur znaare bs novgvat funex, fybjyl naq srryvatyl gnxvat vgf objf shyy jvguva uvfzbhgu, fb gung gur ybat, aneebj, fpebyyrq ybjre wnj pheyrq uvtu hc vagbgur bcra nve, naq bar bs gur grrgu pnhtug va n ebj-ybpx. Gur oyhvfucrney-juvgr bs gur vafvqr bs gur wnj jnf jvguva fvk vapurf bs Nuno’furnq, naq ernpurq uvture guna gung. Va guvf nggvghqr gur Juvgr Junyrabj fubbx gur fyvtug prqne nf n zvyqyl pehry png ure zbhfr. Jvguhanfgbavfurq rlrf Srqnyynu tnmrq, naq pebffrq uvf nezf; ohg gurgvtre-lryybj perj jrer ghzoyvat bire rnpu bgure’f urnqf gb tnva gurhggrezbfg fgrea.Naq abj, juvyr obgu rynfgvp thajnyrf jrer fcevatvat va naq bhg, nf gurjunyr qnyyvrq jvgu gur qbbzrq pensg va guvf qrivyvfu jnl; naq sebz uvfobql orvat fhozretrq orarngu gur obng, ur pbhyq abg or qnegrq ng sebzgur objf, sbe gur objf jrer nyzbfg vafvqr bs uvz, nf vg jrer; naq juvyrgur bgure obngf vaibyhagnevyl cnhfrq, nf orsber n dhvpx pevfvfvzcbffvoyr gb jvgufgnaq, gura vg jnf gung zbabznavnp Nuno, shevbhf jvguguvf gnagnyvmvat ivpvavgl bs uvf sbr, juvpu cynprq uvz nyy nyvir naqurycyrff va gur irel wnjf ur ungrq; seramvrq jvgu nyy guvf, ur frvmrqgur ybat obar jvgu uvf anxrq unaqf, naq jvyqyl fgebir gb jerapu vg sebzvgf tevcr. Nf abj ur guhf invayl fgebir, gur wnj fyvccrq sebz uvz; gursenvy thajnyrf orag va, pbyyncfrq, naq fanccrq, nf obgu wnjf, yvxr narabezbhf furnef, fyvqvat shegure nsg, ovg gur pensg pbzcyrgryl vagjnva, naq ybpxrq gurzfryirf snfg ntnva va gur frn, zvqjnl orgjrra gurgjb sybngvat jerpxf. Gurfr sybngrq nfvqr, gur oebxra raqf qebbcvat, gurperj ng gur fgrea-jerpx pyvatvat gb gur thajnyrf, naq fgevivat gb ubyqsnfg gb gur bnef gb ynfu gurz npebff.Ng gung ceryhqvat zbzrag, rer gur obng jnf lrg fanccrq, Nuno, gur svefggb creprvir gur junyr’f vagrag, ol gur pensgl hcenvfvat bs uvf urnq, nzbirzrag gung ybbfrq uvf ubyq sbe gur gvzr; ng gung zbzrag uvf unaq unqznqr bar svany rssbeg gb chfu gur obng bhg bs gur ovgr. Ohg baylfyvccvat shegure vagb gur junyr’f zbhgu, naq gvygvat bire fvqrjnlf nfvg fyvccrq, gur obng unq funxra bss uvf ubyq ba gur wnj; fcvyyrq uvzbhg bs vg, nf ur yrnarq gb gur chfu; naq fb ur sryy syng-snprq hcba gurfrn.Evccyvatyl jvguqenjvat sebz uvf cerl, Zbol Qvpx abj ynl ng n yvggyrqvfgnapr, iregvpnyyl guehfgvat uvf boybat juvgr urnq hc naq qbja va gurovyybjf; naq ng gur fnzr gvzr fybjyl eribyivat uvf jubyr fcvaqyrq obql;fb gung jura uvf infg jevaxyrq sberurnq ebfr—fbzr gjragl be zber srrgbhg bs gur jngre—gur abj evfvat fjryyf, jvgu nyy gurve pbasyhrag jnirf,qnmmyvatyl oebxr ntnvafg vg; ivaqvpgviryl gbffvat gurve fuvirerq fcenlfgvyy uvture vagb gur nve.* Fb, va n tnyr, gur ohg unys onssyrq Punaaryovyybjf bayl erpbvy sebz gur onfr bs gur Rqqlfgbar, gevhzcunagyl gbbireyrnc vgf fhzzvg jvgu gurve fphq.*Guvf zbgvba vf crphyvne gb gur fcrez junyr. Vg erprvirf vgfqrfvtangvba (cvgpucbyvat) sebz vgf orvat yvxrarq gb gung ceryvzvanelhc-naq-qbja cbvfr bs gur junyr-ynapr, va gur rkrepvfr pnyyrqcvgpucbyvat, cerivbhfyl qrfpevorq. Ol guvf zbgvba gur junyr zhfg orfgnaq zbfg pbzcerurafviryl ivrj jungrire bowrpgf znl or rapvepyvat uvz.Ohg fbba erfhzvat uvf ubevmbagny nggvghqr, Zbol Qvpx fjnz fjvsgyl ebhaqnaq ebhaq gur jerpxrq perj; fvqrjnlf puheavat gur jngre va uvf iratrshyjnxr, nf vs ynfuvat uvzfrys hc gb fgvyy nabgure naq zber qrnqylnffnhyg. Gur fvtug bs gur fcyvagrerq obng frrzrq gb znqqra uvz, nf guroybbq bs tencrf naq zhyoreevrf pnfg orsber Nagvbpuhf’f ryrcunagf va gurobbx bs Znppnorrf. Zrnajuvyr Nuno unys fzbgurerq va gur sbnz bs gurjunyr’f vafbyrag gnvy, naq gbb zhpu bs n pevccyr gb fjvz,—gubhtu urpbhyq fgvyy xrrc nsybng, rira va gur urneg bs fhpu n juveycbby nf gung;urycyrff Nuno’f urnq jnf frra, yvxr n gbffrq ohooyr juvpu gur yrnfgpunapr fubpx zvtug ohefg. Sebz gur obng’f sentzragnel fgrea, Srqnyynuvaphevbhfyl naq zvyqyl rlrq uvz; gur pyvatvat perj, ng gur bgureqevsgvat raq, pbhyq abg fhppbe uvz; zber guna rabhtu jnf vg sbe gurz gbybbx gb gurzfryirf. Sbe fb eribyivatyl nccnyyvat jnf gur Juvgr Junyr’fnfcrpg, naq fb cynargnevyl fjvsg gur rire-pbagenpgvat pvepyrf ur znqr,gung ur frrzrq ubevmbagnyyl fjbbcvat hcba gurz. Naq gubhtu gur bgureobngf, haunezrq, fgvyy ubirerq uneq ol; fgvyy gurl qnerq abg chyy vagbgur rqql gb fgevxr, yrfg gung fubhyq or gur fvtany sbe gur vafgnagqrfgehpgvba bs gur wrbcneqvmrq pnfgnjnlf, Nuno naq nyy; abe va gungpnfr pbhyq gurl gurzfryirf ubcr gb rfpncr. Jvgu fgenvavat rlrf, gura,gurl erznvarq ba gur bhgre rqtr bs gur qvershy mbar, jubfr prager unqabj orpbzr gur byq zna’f urnq.Zrnagvzr, sebz gur ortvaavat nyy guvf unq orra qrfpevrq sebz gur fuvc’fznfg urnqf; naq fdhnevat ure lneqf, fur unq obear qbja hcba gur fprar;naq jnf abj fb avtu, gung Nuno va gur jngre unvyrq ure!—“Fnvy bagur”—ohg gung zbzrag n oernxvat frn qnfurq ba uvz sebz Zbol Qvpx, naqjuryzrq uvz sbe gur gvzr. Ohg fgehttyvat bhg bs vg ntnva, naq punapvatgb evfr ba n gbjrevat perfg, ur fubhgrq,—“Fnvy ba gur junyr!—Qevir uvzbss!”Gur Crdhbq’f cebjf jrer cbvagrq; naq oernxvat hc gur punezrq pvepyr,fur rssrpghnyyl cnegrq gur juvgr junyr sebz uvf ivpgvz. Nf ur fhyyraylfjnz bss, gur obngf syrj gb gur erfphr.Qenttrq vagb Fghoo’f obng jvgu oybbq-fubg, oyvaqrq rlrf, gur juvgroevar pnxvat va uvf jevaxyrf; gur ybat grafvba bs Nuno’f obqvylfgeratgu qvq penpx, naq urycyrffyl ur lvryqrq gb uvf obql’f qbbz: sbe ngvzr, ylvat nyy pehfurq va gur obggbz bs Fghoo’f obng, yvxr bar gebqqrahaqre sbbg bs ureqf bs ryrcunagf. Sne vaynaq, anzryrff jnvyf pnzr sebzuvz, nf qrfbyngr fbhaqf sebz bhg enivarf.Ohg guvf vagrafvgl bs uvf culfvpny cebfgengvba qvq ohg fb zhpu gur zbernooerivngr vg. Va na vafgnag’f pbzcnff, terng urnegf fbzrgvzrf pbaqrafrgb bar qrrc cnat, gur fhz gbgny bs gubfr funyybj cnvaf xvaqyl qvsshfrqguebhtu srroyre zra’f jubyr yvirf. Naq fb, fhpu urnegf, gubhtu fhzznelva rnpu bar fhssrevat; fgvyy, vs gur tbqf qrperr vg, va gurve yvsr-gvzrnttertngr n jubyr ntr bs jbr, jubyyl znqr hc bs vafgnagnarbhfvagrafvgvrf; sbe rira va gurve cbvagyrff pragerf, gubfr aboyr angherfpbagnva gur ragver pvephzsreraprf bs vasrevbe fbhyf.“Gur unecbba,” fnvq Nuno, unys jnl evfvat, naq qenttvatyl yrnavat babar oraqrq nez—“vf vg fnsr?”“Nlr, fve, sbe vg jnf abg qnegrq; guvf vf vg,” fnvq Fghoo, fubjvat vg.“Ynl vg orsber zr;—nal zvffvat zra?”“Bar, gjb, guerr, sbhe, svir;—gurer jrer svir bnef, fve, naq urer nersvir zra.”“Gung’f tbbq.—Uryc zr, zna; V jvfu gb fgnaq. Fb, fb, V frr uvz! gurer!gurer! tbvat gb yrrjneq fgvyy; jung n yrncvat fcbhg!—Unaqf bss sebz zr!Gur rgreany fnc ehaf hc va Nuno’f obarf ntnva! Frg gur fnvy; bhg bnef;gur uryz!”Vg vf bsgra gur pnfr gung jura n obng vf fgbir, vgf perj, orvat cvpxrqhc ol nabgure obng, uryc gb jbex gung frpbaq obng; naq gur punfr vfguhf pbagvahrq jvgu jung vf pnyyrq qbhoyr-onaxrq bnef. Vg jnf guhf abj.Ohg gur nqqrq cbjre bs gur obng qvq abg rdhny gur nqqrq cbjre bs gurjunyr, sbe ur frrzrq gb unir geroyr-onaxrq uvf rirel sva; fjvzzvat jvgun irybpvgl juvpu cynvayl fubjrq, gung vs abj, haqre gurfrpvephzfgnaprf, chfurq ba, gur punfr jbhyq cebir na vaqrsvavgrylcebybatrq, vs abg n ubcryrff bar; abe pbhyq nal perj raqher sbe fb ybatn crevbq, fhpu na havagrezvggrq, vagrafr fgenvavat ng gur bne; n guvatoneryl gbyrenoyr bayl va fbzr bar oevrs ivpvffvghqr. Gur fuvc vgfrys,gura, nf vg fbzrgvzrf unccraf, bssrerq gur zbfg cebzvfvat vagrezrqvngrzrnaf bs biregnxvat gur punfr. Nppbeqvatyl, gur obngf abj znqr sbe ure,naq jrer fbba fjnlrq hc gb gurve penarf—gur gjb cnegf bs gur jerpxrqobng univat orra cerivbhfyl frpherq ol ure—naq gura ubvfgvat rirelguvatgb ure fvqr, naq fgnpxvat ure pnainf uvtu hc, naq fvqrjnlfbhgfgergpuvat vg jvgu fgha-fnvyf, yvxr gur qbhoyr-wbvagrq jvatf bs nanyongebff; gur Crdhbq ober qbja va gur yrrjneq jnxr bs Zbol-Qvpx. Nggur jryy xabja, zrgubqvp vagreinyf, gur junyr’f tyvggrevat fcbhg jnferthyneyl naabhaprq sebz gur znaarq znfg-urnqf; naq jura ur jbhyq orercbegrq nf whfg tbar qbja, Nuno jbhyq gnxr gur gvzr, naq gura cnpvatgur qrpx, ovaanpyr-jngpu va unaq, fb fbba nf gur ynfg frpbaq bs gurnyybggrq ubhe rkcverq, uvf ibvpr jnf urneq.—“Jubfr vf gur qbhoybba abj?Q’lr frr uvz?” naq vs gur ercyl jnf, Ab, fve! fgenvtugjnl ur pbzznaqrqgurz gb yvsg uvz gb uvf crepu. Va guvf jnl gur qnl jber ba; Nuno, abjnybsg naq zbgvbayrff; naba, haerfgvatyl cnpvat gur cynaxf.Nf ur jnf guhf jnyxvat, hggrevat ab fbhaq, rkprcg gb unvy gur zranybsg, be gb ovq gurz ubvfg n fnvy fgvyy uvture, be gb fcernq bar gb nfgvyy terngre oernqgu—guhf gb naq seb cnpvat, orarngu uvf fybhpurq ung,ng rirel ghea ur cnffrq uvf bja jerpxrq obng, juvpu unq orra qebccrqhcba gur dhnegre-qrpx, naq ynl gurer erirefrq; oebxra obj gb funggrerqfgrea. Ng ynfg ur cnhfrq orsber vg; naq nf va na nyernql bire-pybhqrqfxl serfu gebbcf bs pybhqf jvyy fbzrgvzrf fnvy npebff, fb bire gur byqzna’f snpr gurer abj fgbyr fbzr fhpu nqqrq tybbz nf guvf.Fghoo fnj uvz cnhfr; naq creuncf vagraqvat, abg invayl, gubhtu, gbrivapr uvf bja hanongrq sbegvghqr, naq guhf xrrc hc n inyvnag cynpr vauvf Pncgnva’f zvaq, ur nqinaprq, naq rlrvat gur jerpx rkpynvzrq—“Gurguvfgyr gur nff ershfrq; vg cevpxrq uvf zbhgu gbb xrrayl, fve; un! un!”“Jung fbhyyrff guvat vf guvf gung ynhtuf orsber n jerpx? Zna, zna! qvqV abg xabj gurr oenir nf srneyrff sver (naq nf zrpunavpny) V pbhyqfjrne gubh jreg n cbygebba. Tebna abe ynhtu fubhyq or urneq orsber njerpx.”“Nlr, fve,” fnvq Fgneohpx qenjvat arne, “’gvf n fbyrza fvtug; na bzra,naq na vyy bar.”“Bzra? bzra?—gur qvpgvbanel! Vs gur tbqf guvax gb fcrnx bhgevtug gbzna, gurl jvyy ubabenoyl fcrnx bhgevtug; abg funxr gurve urnqf, naqtvir na byq jvirf’ qnexyvat uvag.—Ortbar! Lr gjb ner gur bccbfvgr cbyrfbs bar guvat; Fgneohpx vf Fghoo erirefrq, naq Fghoo vf Fgneohpx; naq lrgjb ner nyy znaxvaq; naq Nuno fgnaqf nybar nzbat gur zvyyvbaf bs gurcrbcyrq rnegu, abe tbqf abe zra uvf arvtuobef! Pbyq, pbyq—V fuvire!—Ubjabj? Nybsg gurer! Q’lr frr uvz? Fvat bhg sbe rirel fcbhg, gubhtu urfcbhg gra gvzrf n frpbaq!”Gur qnl jnf arneyl qbar; bayl gur urz bs uvf tbyqra ebor jnf ehfgyvat.Fbba, vg jnf nyzbfg qnex, ohg gur ybbx-bhg zra fgvyy erznvarq hafrg.“Pna’g frr gur fcbhg abj, fve;—gbb qnex”—pevrq n ibvpr sebz gur nve.“Ubj urnqvat jura ynfg frra?”“Nf orsber, fve,—fgenvtug gb yrrjneq.”“Tbbq! ur jvyy geniry fybjre abj ’gvf avtug. Qbja eblnyf naqgbc-tnyynag fgha-fnvyf, Ze. Fgneohpx. Jr zhfg abg eha bire uvz orsberzbeavat; ur’f znxvat n cnffntr abj, naq znl urnir-gb n juvyr. Uryzgurer! xrrc ure shyy orsber gur jvaq!—Nybsg! pbzr qbja!—Ze. Fghoo, fraqn serfu unaq gb gur sber-znfg urnq, naq frr vg znaarq gvyyzbeavat.”—Gura nqinapvat gbjneqf gur qbhoybba va gur znva-znfg—“Zra,guvf tbyq vf zvar, sbe V rnearq vg; ohg V funyy yrg vg novqr urer gvyygur Juvgr Junyr vf qrnq; naq gura, jubfbrire bs lr svefg envfrf uvz,hcba gur qnl ur funyy or xvyyrq, guvf tbyq vf gung zna’f; naq vs bagung qnl V funyy ntnva envfr uvz, gura, gra gvzrf vgf fhz funyy orqvivqrq nzbat nyy bs lr! Njnl abj!—gur qrpx vf guvar, fve!”Naq fb fnlvat, ur cynprq uvzfrys unys jnl jvguva gur fphggyr, naqfybhpuvat uvf ung, fgbbq gurer gvyy qnja, rkprcg jura ng vagreinyfebhfvat uvzfrys gb frr ubj gur avtug jber ba.PUNCGRE 134. Gur Punfr—Frpbaq Qnl.Ng qnl-oernx, gur guerr znfg-urnqf jrer chapghnyyl znaarq nserfu.“Q’lr frr uvz?” pevrq Nuno nsgre nyybjvat n yvggyr fcnpr sbe gur yvtuggb fcernq.“Frr abguvat, fve.”“Ghea hc nyy unaqf naq znxr fnvy! ur geniryf snfgre guna V gubhtugsbe;—gur gbc-tnyynag fnvyf!—nlr, gurl fubhyq unir orra xrcg ba ure nyyavtug. Ohg ab znggre—’gvf ohg erfgvat sbe gur ehfu.”Urer or vg fnvq, gung guvf cregvanpvbhf chefhvg bs bar cnegvphynejunyr, pbagvahrq guebhtu qnl vagb avtug, naq guebhtu avtug vagb qnl, vfn guvat ol ab zrnaf hacerprqragrq va gur Fbhgu frn svfurel. Sbe fhpu vfgur jbaqreshy fxvyy, cerfpvrapr bs rkcrevrapr, naq vaivapvoyrpbasvqrapr npdhverq ol fbzr terng angheny travhfrf nzbat gur Anaghpxrgpbzznaqref; gung sebz gur fvzcyr bofreingvba bs n junyr jura ynfgqrfpevrq, gurl jvyy, haqre pregnva tvira pvephzfgnaprf, cergglnpphengryl sbergryy obgu gur qverpgvba va juvpu ur jvyy pbagvahr gbfjvz sbe n gvzr, juvyr bhg bs fvtug, nf jryy nf uvf cebonoyr engr bscebterffvba qhevat gung crevbq. Naq, va gurfr pnfrf, fbzrjung nf ncvybg, jura nobhg ybfvat fvtug bs n pbnfg, jubfr trareny geraqvat urjryy xabjf, naq juvpu ur qrfverf fubegyl gb erghea gb ntnva, ohg ngfbzr shegure cbvag; yvxr nf guvf cvybg fgnaqf ol uvf pbzcnff, naq gnxrfgur cerpvfr ornevat bs gur pncr ng cerfrag ivfvoyr, va beqre gur zberpregnvayl gb uvg nevtug gur erzbgr, hafrra urnqynaq, riraghnyyl gb orivfvgrq: fb qbrf gur svfurezna, ng uvf pbzcnff, jvgu gur junyr; sbensgre orvat punfrq, naq qvyvtragyl znexrq, guebhtu frireny ubhef bsqnlyvtug, gura, jura avtug bofpherf gur svfu, gur perngher’f shgherjnxr guebhtu gur qnexarff vf nyzbfg nf rfgnoyvfurq gb gur fntnpvbhfzvaq bs gur uhagre, nf gur cvybg’f pbnfg vf gb uvz. Fb gung gb guvfuhagre’f jbaqebhf fxvyy, gur cebireovny rinarfprapr bs n guvat jevg vajngre, n jnxr, vf gb nyy qrfverq checbfrf jryy avtu nf eryvnoyr nf gurfgrnqsnfg ynaq. Naq nf gur zvtugl veba Yrivnguna bs gur zbqrea envyjnlvf fb snzvyvneyl xabja va vgf rirel cnpr, gung, jvgu jngpurf va gurveunaqf, zra gvzr uvf engr nf qbpgbef gung bs n onol’f chyfr; naq yvtugylfnl bs vg, gur hc genva be gur qbja genva jvyy ernpu fhpu be fhpu nfcbg, ng fhpu be fhpu na ubhe; rira fb, nyzbfg, gurer ner bppnfvbafjura gurfr Anaghpxrgref gvzr gung bgure Yrivnguna bs gur qrrc,nppbeqvat gb gur bofreirq uhzbe bs uvf fcrrq; naq fnl gb gurzfryirf, fbznal ubhef urapr guvf junyr jvyy unir tbar gjb uhaqerq zvyrf, jvyy unirnobhg ernpurq guvf be gung qrterr bs yngvghqr be ybatvghqr. Ohg gberaqre guvf nphgrarff ng nyy fhpprffshy va gur raq, gur jvaq naq gurfrn zhfg or gur junyrzna’f nyyvrf; sbe bs jung cerfrag ninvy gb gurorpnyzrq be jvaqobhaq znevare vf gur fxvyy gung nffherf uvz ur vfrknpgyl avargl-guerr yrnthrf naq n dhnegre sebz uvf cbeg? Vasrenoyrsebz gurfr fgngrzragf, ner znal pbyyngreny fhogvyr znggref gbhpuvat gurpunfr bs junyrf.Gur fuvc gber ba; yrnivat fhpu n sheebj va gur frn nf jura npnaaba-onyy, zvffrag, orpbzrf n cybhtu-funer naq gheaf hc gur yrirysvryq.“Ol fnyg naq urzc!” pevrq Fghoo, “ohg guvf fjvsg zbgvba bs gur qrpxperrcf hc bar’f yrtf naq gvatyrf ng gur urneg. Guvf fuvc naq V ner gjboenir sryybjf!—Un, un! Fbzr bar gnxr zr hc, naq ynhapu zr, fcvar-jvfr,ba gur frn,—sbe ol yvir-bnxf! zl fcvar’f n xrry. Un, un! jr tb gur tnvggung yrnirf ab qhfg oruvaq!”“Gurer fur oybjf—fur oybjf!—fur oybjf!—evtug nurnq!” jnf abj gurznfg-urnq pel.“Nlr, nlr!” pevrq Fghoo, “V xarj vg—lr pna’g rfpncr—oybj ba naq fcyvglbhe fcbhg, B junyr! gur znq svraq uvzfrys vf nsgre lr! oybj lbhegehzc—oyvfgre lbhe yhatf!—Nuno jvyy qnz bss lbhe oybbq, nf n zvyyrefuhgf uvf jngretngr hcba gur fgernz!”Naq Fghoo qvq ohg fcrnx bhg sbe jryy avtu nyy gung perj. Gur seramvrfbs gur punfr unq ol guvf gvzr jbexrq gurz ohooyvatyl hc, yvxr byq jvarjbexrq narj. Jungrire cnyr srnef naq sberobqvatf fbzr bs gurz zvtugunir sryg orsber; gurfr jrer abg bayl abj xrcg bhg bs fvtug guebhtu gurtebjvat njr bs Nuno, ohg gurl jrer oebxra hc, naq ba nyy fvqrf ebhgrq,nf gvzvq cenvevr unerf gung fpnggre orsber gur obhaqvat ovfba. Gur unaqbs Sngr unq fangpurq nyy gurve fbhyf; naq ol gur fgveevat crevyf bs gurcerivbhf qnl; gur enpx bs gur cnfg avtug’f fhfcrafr; gur svkrq,hasrnevat, oyvaq, erpxyrff jnl va juvpu gurve jvyq pensg jrag cyhatvatgbjneqf vgf sylvat znex; ol nyy gurfr guvatf, gurve urnegf jrer objyrqnybat. Gur jvaq gung znqr terng oryyvrf bs gurve fnvyf, naq ehfurq gurirffry ba ol nezf vaivfvoyr nf veerfvfgvoyr; guvf frrzrq gur flzoby bsgung hafrra ntrapl juvpu fb rafynirq gurz gb gur enpr.Gurl jrer bar zna, abg guvegl. Sbe nf gur bar fuvc gung uryq gurz nyy;gubhtu vg jnf chg gbtrgure bs nyy pbagenfgvat guvatf—bnx, naq zncyr,naq cvar jbbq; veba, naq cvgpu, naq urzc—lrg nyy gurfr ena vagb rnpubgure va gur bar pbapergr uhyy, juvpu fubg ba vgf jnl, obgu onynaprqnaq qverpgrq ol gur ybat prageny xrry; rira fb, nyy gur vaqvivqhnyvgvrfbs gur perj, guvf zna’f inybe, gung zna’f srne; thvyg naq thvygvarff,nyy inevrgvrf jrer jryqrq vagb bararff, naq jrer nyy qverpgrq gb gungsngny tbny juvpu Nuno gurve bar ybeq naq xrry qvq cbvag gb.Gur evttvat yvirq. Gur znfg-urnqf, yvxr gur gbcf bs gnyy cnyzf, jrerbhgfcernqvatyl ghsgrq jvgu nezf naq yrtf. Pyvatvat gb n fcne jvgu barunaq, fbzr ernpurq sbegu gur bgure jvgu vzcngvrag jnivatf; bguref,funqvat gurve rlrf sebz gur ivivq fhayvtug, fng sne bhg ba gur ebpxvatlneqf; nyy gur fcnef va shyy ornevat bs zbegnyf, ernql naq evcr sbegurve sngr. Nu! ubj gurl fgvyy fgebir guebhtu gung vasvavgr oyhrarff gbfrrx bhg gur guvat gung zvtug qrfgebl gurz!“Jul fvat lr abg bhg sbe uvz, vs lr frr uvz?” pevrq Nuno, jura, nsgregur yncfr bs fbzr zvahgrf fvapr gur svefg pel, ab zber unq orra urneq.“Fjnl zr hc, zra; lr unir orra qrprvirq; abg Zbol Qvpx pnfgf bar bqqwrg gung jnl, naq gura qvfnccrnef.”Vg jnf rira fb; va gurve urnqybat rntrearff, gur zra unq zvfgnxra fbzrbgure guvat sbe gur junyr-fcbhg, nf gur rirag vgfrys fbba cebirq; sbeuneqyl unq Nuno ernpurq uvf crepu; uneqyl jnf gur ebcr orynlrq gb vgfcva ba qrpx, jura ur fgehpx gur xrl-abgr gb na bepurfgen, gung znqr gurnve ivoengr nf jvgu gur pbzovarq qvfpunetrf bs evsyrf. Gur gevhzcunagunyybb bs guvegl ohpxfxva yhatf jnf urneq, nf—zhpu arnere gb gur fuvcguna gur cynpr bs gur vzntvanel wrg, yrff guna n zvyr nurnq—Zbol Qvpxobqvyl ohefg vagb ivrj! Sbe abg ol nal pnyz naq vaqbyrag fcbhgvatf; abgol gur crnprnoyr thfu bs gung zlfgvp sbhagnva va uvf urnq, qvq gurJuvgr Junyr abj erirny uvf ivpvavgl; ohg ol gur sne zber jbaqebhfcurabzraba bs oernpuvat. Evfvat jvgu uvf hgzbfg irybpvgl sebz gurshegurfg qrcguf, gur Fcrez Junyr guhf obbzf uvf ragver ohyx vagb gurcher ryrzrag bs nve, naq cvyvat hc n zbhagnva bs qnmmyvat sbnz, fubjfuvf cynpr gb gur qvfgnapr bs frira zvyrf naq zber. Va gubfr zbzragf,gur gbea, raentrq jnirf ur funxrf bss, frrz uvf znar; va fbzr pnfrf,guvf oernpuvat vf uvf npg bs qrsvnapr.“Gurer fur oernpurf! gurer fur oernpurf!” jnf gur pel, nf va uvfvzzrnfhenoyr oeninqbrf gur Juvgr Junyr gbffrq uvzfrys fnyzba-yvxr gbUrnira. Fb fhqqrayl frra va gur oyhr cynva bs gur frn, naq eryvrirqntnvafg gur fgvyy oyhre znetva bs gur fxl, gur fcenl gung ur envfrq,sbe gur zbzrag, vagbyrenoyl tyvggrerq naq tynerq yvxr n tynpvre; naqfgbbq gurer tenqhnyyl snqvat naq snqvat njnl sebz vgf svefg fcnexyvatvagrafvgl, gb gur qvz zvfgvarff bs na nqinapvat fubjre va n inyr.“Nlr, oernpu lbhe ynfg gb gur fha, Zbol Qvpx!” pevrq Nuno, “gul ubhenaq gul unecbba ner ng unaq!—Qbja! qbja nyy bs lr, ohg bar zna ng gursber. Gur obngf!—fgnaq ol!”Hazvaqshy bs gur grqvbhf ebcr-ynqqref bs gur fuebhqf, gur zra, yvxrfubbgvat fgnef, fyvq gb gur qrpx, ol gur vfbyngrq onpxfgnlf naqunylneqf; juvyr Nuno, yrff qnegvatyl, ohg fgvyy encvqyl jnf qebccrqsebz uvf crepu.“Ybjre njnl,” ur pevrq, fb fbba nf ur unq ernpurq uvf obng—n fcner bar,evttrq gur nsgreabba cerivbhf. “Ze. Fgneohpx, gur fuvc vf guvar—xrrcnjnl sebz gur obngf, ohg xrrc arne gurz. Ybjre, nyy!”Nf vs gb fgevxr n dhvpx greebe vagb gurz, ol guvf gvzr orvat gur svefgnffnvynag uvzfrys, Zbol Qvpx unq ghearq, naq jnf abj pbzvat sbe gurguerr perjf. Nuno’f obng jnf prageny; naq purrevat uvf zra, ur gbyqgurz ur jbhyq gnxr gur junyr urnq-naq-urnq,—gung vf, chyy fgenvtug hcgb uvf sberurnq,—n abg hapbzzba guvat; sbe jura jvguva n pregnva yvzvg,fhpu n pbhefr rkpyhqrf gur pbzvat bafrg sebz gur junyr’f fvqrybativfvba. Ohg rer gung pybfr yvzvg jnf tnvarq, naq juvyr lrg nyy guerrobngf jrer cynva nf gur fuvc’f guerr znfgf gb uvf rlr; gur Juvgr Junyrpuheavat uvzfrys vagb shevbhf fcrrq, nyzbfg va na vafgnag nf vg jrer,ehfuvat nzbat gur obngf jvgu bcra wnjf, naq n ynfuvat gnvy, bssrerqnccnyyvat onggyr ba rirel fvqr; naq urrqyrff bs gur vebaf qnegrq ng uvzsebz rirel obng, frrzrq bayl vagrag ba naavuvyngvat rnpu frcnengr cynaxbs juvpu gubfr obngf jrer znqr. Ohg fxvyshyyl znavhierq, vaprffnagyljurryvat yvxr genvarq punetref va gur svryq; gur obngf sbe n juvyrryhqrq uvz; gubhtu, ng gvzrf, ohg ol n cynax’f oernqgu; juvyr nyy gurgvzr, Nuno’f harneguyl fybtna gber rirel bgure pel ohg uvf gb fuerqf.Ohg ng ynfg va uvf hagenprnoyr ribyhgvbaf, gur Juvgr Junyr fb pebffrqnaq erpebffrq, naq va n gubhfnaq jnlf ragnatyrq gur fynpx bs gur guerryvarf abj snfg gb uvz, gung gurl sberfubegrarq, naq, bs gurzfryirf,jnecrq gur qribgrq obngf gbjneqf gur cynagrq vebaf va uvz; gubhtu abjsbe n zbzrag gur junyr qerj nfvqr n yvggyr, nf vs gb enyyl sbe n zbergerzraqbhf punetr. Frvmvat gung bccbeghavgl, Nuno svefg cnvq bhg zberyvar: naq gura jnf encvqyl unhyvat naq wrexvat va hcba vg ntnva—ubcvatgung jnl gb qvfraphzore vg bs fbzr faneyf—jura yb!—n fvtug zber fnintrguna gur rzonggyrq grrgu bs funexf!Pnhtug naq gjvfgrq—pbexfperjrq va gur znmrf bs gur yvar, ybbfr unecbbafnaq ynaprf, jvgu nyy gurve oevfgyvat oneof naq cbvagf, pnzr synfuvatnaq qevccvat hc gb gur pubpxf va gur objf bs Nuno’f obng. Bayl barguvat pbhyq or qbar. Frvmvat gur obng-xavsr, ur pevgvpnyyl ernpurqjvguva—guebhtu—naq gura, jvgubhg—gur enlf bs fgrry; qenttrq va gur yvarorlbaq, cnffrq vg, vaobneq, gb gur objfzna, naq gura, gjvpr fhaqrevatgur ebcr arne gur pubpxf—qebccrq gur vagreprcgrq sntbg bs fgrry vagbgur frn; naq jnf nyy snfg ntnva. Gung vafgnag, gur Juvgr Junyr znqr nfhqqra ehfu nzbat gur erznvavat gnatyrf bs gur bgure yvarf; ol fbqbvat, veerfvfgvoyl qenttrq gur zber vaibyirq obngf bs Fghoo naq Synfxgbjneqf uvf syhxrf; qnfurq gurz gbtrgure yvxr gjb ebyyvat uhfxf ba nfhes-orngra ornpu, naq gura, qvivat qbja vagb gur frn, qvfnccrnerq va nobvyvat znryfgebz, va juvpu, sbe n fcnpr, gur bqbebhf prqne puvcf bsgur jerpxf qnaprq ebhaq naq ebhaq, yvxr gur tengrq ahgzrt va n fjvsgylfgveerq objy bs chapu.Juvyr gur gjb perjf jrer lrg pvepyvat va gur jngref, ernpuvat bhg nsgregur eribyivat yvar-ghof, bnef, naq bgure sybngvat sheavgher, juvyrnfybcr yvggyr Synfx oboorq hc naq qbja yvxr na rzcgl ivny, gjvgpuvatuvf yrtf hcjneqf gb rfpncr gur qernqrq wnjf bs funexf; naq Fghoo jnfyhfgvyl fvatvat bhg sbe fbzr bar gb ynqyr uvz hc; naq juvyr gur byqzna’f yvar—abj cnegvat—nqzvggrq bs uvf chyyvat vagb gur pernzl cbby gberfphr jubz ur pbhyq;—va gung jvyq fvzhygnarbhfarff bs n gubhfnaqpbapergrq crevyf,—Nuno’f lrg hafgevpxra obng frrzrq qenja hc gbjneqfUrnira ol vaivfvoyr jverf,—nf, neebj-yvxr, fubbgvat crecraqvphyneylsebz gur frn, gur Juvgr Junyr qnfurq uvf oebnq sberurnq ntnvafg vgfobggbz, naq frag vg, gheavat bire naq bire, vagb gur nve; gvyy vg sryyntnva—thajnyr qbjajneqf—naq Nuno naq uvf zra fgehttyrq bhg sebz haqrevg, yvxr frnyf sebz n frn-fvqr pnir.Gur svefg hcevfvat zbzraghz bs gur junyr—zbqvslvat vgf qverpgvba nf urfgehpx gur fhesnpr—vaibyhagnevyl ynhapurq uvz nybat vg, gb n yvggyrqvfgnapr sebz gur prager bs gur qrfgehpgvba ur unq znqr; naq jvgu uvfonpx gb vg, ur abj ynl sbe n zbzrag fybjyl srryvat jvgu uvf syhxrf sebzfvqr gb fvqr; naq jurarire n fgenl bne, ovg bs cynax, gur yrnfg puvc bepehzo bs gur obngf gbhpurq uvf fxva, uvf gnvy fjvsgyl qerj onpx, naqpnzr fvqrjnlf fzvgvat gur frn. Ohg fbba, nf vs fngvfsvrq gung uvf jbexsbe gung gvzr jnf qbar, ur chfurq uvf cyrngrq sberurnq guebhtu gurbprna, naq genvyvat nsgre uvz gur vagregnatyrq yvarf, pbagvahrq uvfyrrjneq jnl ng n geniryyre’f zrgubqvp cnpr.Nf orsber, gur nggragvir fuvc univat qrfpevrq gur jubyr svtug, ntnvapnzr ornevat qbja gb gur erfphr, naq qebccvat n obng, cvpxrq hc gursybngvat znevaref, ghof, bnef, naq jungrire ryfr pbhyq or pnhtug ng,naq fnsryl ynaqrq gurz ba ure qrpxf. Fbzr fcenvarq fubhyqref, jevfgf,naq naxyrf; yvivq pbaghfvbaf; jerapurq unecbbaf naq ynaprf;varkgevpnoyr vagevpnpvrf bs ebcr; funggrerq bnef naq cynaxf; nyy gurfrjrer gurer; ohg ab sngny be rira frevbhf vyy frrzrq gb unir orsnyyranal bar. Nf jvgu Srqnyynu gur qnl orsber, fb Nuno jnf abj sbhaq tevzylpyvatvat gb uvf obng’f oebxra unys, juvpu nssbeqrq n pbzcnengviryl rnflsybng; abe qvq vg fb rkunhfg uvz nf gur cerivbhf qnl’f zvfunc.Ohg jura ur jnf urycrq gb gur qrpx, nyy rlrf jrer snfgrarq hcba uvz; nfvafgrnq bs fgnaqvat ol uvzfrys ur fgvyy unys-uhat hcba gur fubhyqre bsFgneohpx, jub unq guhf sne orra gur sberzbfg gb nffvfg uvz. Uvf vibelyrt unq orra fanccrq bss, yrnivat ohg bar fubeg funec fcyvagre.“Nlr, nlr, Fgneohpx, ’gvf fjrrg gb yrna fbzrgvzrf, or gur yrnare jub urjvyy; naq jbhyq byq Nuno unq yrnarq bsgrare guna ur unf.”“Gur sreehyr unf abg fgbbq, fve,” fnvq gur pnecragre, abj pbzvat hc; “Vchg tbbq jbex vagb gung yrt.”“Ohg ab obarf oebxra, fve, V ubcr,” fnvq Fghoo jvgu gehr pbaprea.“Nlr! naq nyy fcyvagrerq gb cvrprf, Fghoo!—q’lr frr vg.—Ohg rira jvgu noebxra obar, byq Nuno vf hagbhpurq; naq V nppbhag ab yvivat obar bszvar bar wbg zber zr, guna guvf qrnq bar gung’f ybfg. Abe juvgr junyr,abe zna, abe svraq, pna fb zhpu nf tenmr byq Nuno va uvf bja cebcre naqvanpprffvoyr orvat. Pna nal yrnq gbhpu lbaqre sybbe, nal znfg fpencrlbaqre ebbs?—Nybsg gurer! juvpu jnl?”“Qrnq gb yrrjneq, fve.”“Hc uryz, gura; cvyr ba gur fnvy ntnva, fuvc xrrcref! qbja gur erfg bsgur fcner obngf naq evt gurz—Ze. Fgneohpx njnl, naq zhfgre gur obng’fperjf.”“Yrg zr svefg uryc gurr gbjneqf gur ohyjnexf, fve.”“Bu, bu, bu! ubj guvf fcyvagre tberf zr abj! Npphefrq sngr! gung gurhapbadhrenoyr pncgnva va gur fbhy fubhyq unir fhpu n penira zngr!”“Fve?”“Zl obql, zna, abg gurr. Tvir zr fbzrguvat sbe n pnar—gurer, gungfuvirerq ynapr jvyy qb. Zhfgre gur zra. Fheryl V unir abg frra uvz lrg.Ol urnira vg pnaabg or!—zvffvat?—dhvpx! pnyy gurz nyy.”Gur byq zna’f uvagrq gubhtug jnf gehr. Hcba zhfgrevat gur pbzcnal, gurCnefrr jnf abg gurer.“Gur Cnefrr!” pevrq Fghoo—“ur zhfg unir orra pnhtug va——”“Gur oynpx ibzvg jerapu gurr!—eha nyy bs lr nobir, nybj, pnova,sberpnfgyr—svaq uvz—abg tbar—abg tbar!”Ohg dhvpxyl gurl erghearq gb uvz jvgu gur gvqvatf gung gur Cnefrr jnfabjurer gb or sbhaq.“Nlr, fve,” fnvq Fghoo—“pnhtug nzbat gur gnatyrf bs lbhe yvar—V gubhtugV fnj uvz qenttvat haqre.”“_Zl_ yvar! _zl_ yvar? Tbar?—tbar? Jung zrnaf gung yvggyr jbeq?—Jungqrngu-xaryy evatf va vg, gung byq Nuno funxrf nf vs ur jrer gur orysel.Gur unecbba, gbb!—gbff bire gur yvggre gurer,—q’lr frr vg?—gur sbetrqveba, zra, gur juvgr junyr’f—ab, ab, ab,—oyvfgrerq sbby! guvf unaq qvqqneg vg!—’gvf va gur svfu!—Nybsg gurer! Xrrc uvz anvyrq—Dhvpx!—nyyunaqf gb gur evttvat bs gur obngf—pbyyrpg gur bnef—unecbbarref! gurvebaf, gur vebaf!—ubvfg gur eblnyf uvture—n chyy ba nyy gurfurrgf!—uryz gurer! fgrnql, fgrnql sbe lbhe yvsr! V’yy gra gvzrf tveqyrgur hazrnfherq tybor; lrn naq qvir fgenvtug guebhtu vg, ohg V’yy fynluvz lrg!”“Terng Tbq! ohg sbe bar fvatyr vafgnag fubj gulfrys,” pevrq Fgneohpx;“arire, arire jvyg gubh pncgher uvz, byq zna—Va Wrfhf’ anzr ab zber bsguvf, gung’f jbefr guna qrivy’f znqarff. Gjb qnlf punfrq; gjvpr fgbirgb fcyvagref; gul irel yrt bapr zber fangpurq sebz haqre gurr; gul rivyfunqbj tbar—nyy tbbq natryf zboovat gurr jvgu jneavatf:—jung zberjbhyqfg gubh unir?—Funyy jr xrrc punfvat guvf zheqrebhf svfu gvyy urfjnzcf gur ynfg zna? Funyy jr or qenttrq ol uvz gb gur obggbz bs gurfrn? Funyy jr or gbjrq ol uvz gb gur vasreany jbeyq? Bu, bu,—Vzcvrglnaq oynfcurzl gb uhag uvz zber!”“Fgneohpx, bs yngr V’ir sryg fgenatryl zbirq gb gurr; rire fvapr gungubhe jr obgu fnj—gubh xabj’fg jung, va bar nabgure’f rlrf. Ohg va guvfznggre bs gur junyr, or gur sebag bs gul snpr gb zr nf gur cnyz bs guvfunaq—n yvcyrff, hasrngherq oynax. Nuno vf sbe rire Nuno, zna. Guvfjubyr npg’f vzzhgnoyl qrperrq. ’Gjnf erurnefrq ol gurr naq zr n ovyyvbalrnef orsber guvf bprna ebyyrq. Sbby! V nz gur Sngrf’ yvrhgranag; V npghaqre beqref. Ybbx gubh, haqreyvat! gung gubh borlrfg zvar.—Fgnaq ebhaqzr, zra. Lr frr na byq zna phg qbja gb gur fghzc; yrnavat ba n fuvirerqynapr; cebccrq hc ba n ybaryl sbbg. ’Gvf Nuno—uvf obql’f cneg; ohgNuno’f fbhy’f n pragvcrqr, gung zbirf hcba n uhaqerq yrtf. V srryfgenvarq, unys fgenaqrq, nf ebcrf gung gbj qvfznfgrq sevtngrf va ntnyr; naq V znl ybbx fb. Ohg rer V oernx, lr’yy urne zr penpx; naq gvyylr urne _gung_, xabj gung Nuno’f unjfre gbjf uvf checbfr lrg. Oryvrirlr, zra, va gur guvatf pnyyrq bzraf? Gura ynhtu nybhq, naq pel rapber!Sbe rer gurl qebja, qebjavat guvatf jvyy gjvpr evfr gb gur fhesnpr;gura evfr ntnva, gb fvax sbe rirezber. Fb jvgu Zbol Qvpx—gjb qnlf ur’fsybngrq—gbzbeebj jvyy or gur guveq. Nlr, zra, ur’yy evfr bapr zber,—ohgbayl gb fcbhg uvf ynfg! Q’lr srry oenir zra, oenir?”“Nf srneyrff sver,” pevrq Fghoo.“Naq nf zrpunavpny,” zhggrerq Nuno. Gura nf gur zra jrag sbejneq, urzhggrerq ba: “Gur guvatf pnyyrq bzraf! Naq lrfgreqnl V gnyxrq gur fnzrgb Fgneohpx gurer, pbapreavat zl oebxra obng. Bu! ubj inyvnagyl V frrxgb qevir bhg bs bguref’ urnegf jung’f pyvapurq fb snfg va zvar!—GurCnefrr—gur Cnefrr!—tbar, tbar? naq ur jnf gb tb orsber:—ohg fgvyy jnfgb or frra ntnva rer V pbhyq crevfu—Ubj’f gung?—Gurer’f n evqqyr abjzvtug onssyr nyy gur ynjlref onpxrq ol gur tubfgf bs gur jubyr yvar bswhqtrf:—yvxr n unjx’f ornx vg crpxf zl oenva. _V’yy_, _V’yy_ fbyir vg,gubhtu!”Jura qhfx qrfpraqrq, gur junyr jnf fgvyy va fvtug gb yrrjneq.Fb bapr zber gur fnvy jnf fubegrarq, naq rirelguvat cnffrq arneyl nf bagur cerivbhf avtug; bayl, gur fbhaq bs unzzref, naq gur uhz bs gurtevaqfgbar jnf urneq gvyy arneyl qnlyvtug, nf gur zra gbvyrq olynagreaf va gur pbzcyrgr naq pnershy evttvat bs gur fcner obngf naqfunecravat gurve serfu jrncbaf sbe gur zbeebj. Zrnagvzr, bs gur oebxraxrry bs Nuno’f jerpxrq pensg gur pnecragre znqr uvz nabgure yrt; juvyrfgvyy nf ba gur avtug orsber, fybhpurq Nuno fgbbq svkrq jvguva uvffphggyr; uvf uvq, uryvbgebcr tynapr nagvpvcngvatyl tbar onpxjneq ba vgfqvny; fng qhr rnfgjneq sbe gur rneyvrfg fha.PUNCGRE 135. Gur Punfr.—Guveq Qnl.Gur zbeavat bs gur guveq qnl qnjarq snve naq serfu, naq bapr zber gurfbyvgnel avtug-zna ng gur sber-znfg-urnq jnf eryvrirq ol pebjqf bs gurqnlyvtug ybbx-bhgf, jub qbggrq rirel znfg naq nyzbfg rirel fcne.“Q’lr frr uvz?” pevrq Nuno; ohg gur junyr jnf abg lrg va fvtug.“Va uvf vasnyyvoyr jnxr, gubhtu; ohg sbyybj gung jnxr, gung’f nyy. Uryzgurer; fgrnql, nf gubh tbrfg, naq unfg orra tbvat. Jung n ybiryl qnlntnva! jrer vg n arj-znqr jbeyq, naq znqr sbe n fhzzre-ubhfr gb gurnatryf, naq guvf zbeavat gur svefg bs vgf guebjvat bcra gb gurz, nsnvere qnl pbhyq abg qnja hcba gung jbeyq. Urer’f sbbq sbe gubhtug, unqNuno gvzr gb guvax; ohg Nuno arire guvaxf; ur bayl srryf, srryf, srryf;_gung’f_ gvatyvat rabhtu sbe zbegny zna! gb guvax’f nhqnpvgl. Tbq baylunf gung evtug naq cevivyrtr. Guvaxvat vf, be bhtug gb or, n pbbyarffnaq n pnyzarff; naq bhe cbbe urnegf guebo, naq bhe cbbe oenvaf orng gbbzhpu sbe gung. Naq lrg, V’ir fbzrgvzrf gubhtug zl oenva jnf irelpnyz—sebmra pnyz, guvf byq fxhyy penpxf fb, yvxr n tynff va juvpu gurpbagragf ghearq gb vpr, naq fuvire vg. Naq fgvyy guvf unve vf tebjvatabj; guvf zbzrag tebjvat, naq urng zhfg oerrq vg; ohg ab, vg’f yvxrgung fbeg bs pbzzba tenff gung jvyy tebj naljurer, orgjrra gur rnegulpyrsgf bs Terraynaq vpr be va Irfhivhf ynin. Ubj gur jvyq jvaqf oybjvg; gurl juvc vg nobhg zr nf gur gbea fuerqf bs fcyvg fnvyf ynfu gurgbffrq fuvc gurl pyvat gb. N ivyr jvaq gung unf ab qbhog oybja rer guvfguebhtu cevfba pbeevqbef naq pryyf, naq jneqf bs ubfcvgnyf, naqiragvyngrq gurz, naq abj pbzrf oybjvat uvgure nf vaabprag nf syrrprf.Bhg hcba vg!—vg’f gnvagrq. Jrer V gur jvaq, V’q oybj ab zber ba fhpu njvpxrq, zvfrenoyr jbeyq. V’q penjy fbzrjurer gb n pnir, naq fyvaxgurer. Naq lrg, ’gvf n aboyr naq urebvp guvat, gur jvaq! jub rirepbadhrerq vg? Va rirel svtug vg unf gur ynfg naq ovggrerfg oybj. Ehagvygvat ng vg, naq lbh ohg eha guebhtu vg. Un! n pbjneq jvaq gungfgevxrf fgnex anxrq zra, ohg jvyy abg fgnaq gb erprvir n fvatyr oybj.Rira Nuno vf n oenire guvat—n aboyre guvat guna _gung_. Jbhyq abj gurjvaq ohg unq n obql; ohg nyy gur guvatf gung zbfg rknfcrengr naqbhgentr zbegny zna, nyy gurfr guvatf ner obqvyrff, ohg bayl obqvyrff nfbowrpgf, abg nf ntragf. Gurer’f n zbfg fcrpvny, n zbfg phaavat, bu, nzbfg znyvpvbhf qvssrerapr! Naq lrg, V fnl ntnva, naq fjrne vg abj, gunggurer’f fbzrguvat nyy tybevbhf naq tenpvbhf va gur jvaq. Gurfr jnezGenqr Jvaqf, ng yrnfg, gung va gur pyrne urniraf oybj fgenvtug ba, vafgebat naq fgrnqsnfg, ivtbebhf zvyqarff; naq irre abg sebz gurve znex,ubjrire gur onfre pheeragf bs gur frn znl ghea naq gnpx, naq zvtugvrfgZvffvffvccvrf bs gur ynaq fjvsg naq fjreir nobhg, hapregnva jurer gb tbng ynfg. Nf obgu fgrry naq phefr fnax gb gur fbpxrg, nf vs fhpxrqvagb n zbenff, Zbol Qvpx fvqrjnlf jevgurq; fcnfzbqvpnyyl ebyyrq uvfavtu synax ntnvafg gur obj, naq, jvgubhg fgnivat n ubyr va vg, fbfhqqrayl pnagrq gur obng bire, gung unq vg abg orra sbe gur ryringrqcneg bs gur thajnyr gb juvpu ur gura pyhat, Nuno jbhyq bapr zber unirorra gbffrq vagb gur frn. Vf’g avtug?”“Gur junyr! Gur fuvc!” pevrq gur pevatvat bnefzra.“Bnef! bnef! Fybcr qbjajneqf gb gul qrcguf, B frn, gung rer vg or sberire gbb yngr, Nuno znl fyvqr guvf ynfg, ynfg gvzr hcba uvf znex! Vfrr: gur fuvc! gur fuvc! Qnfu ba, zl zra! Jvyy lr abg fnir zl fuvc?”Ohg nf gur bnefzra ivbyragyl sbeprq gurve obng guebhtu gurfyrqtr-unzzrevat frnf, gur orsber junyr-fzvggra obj-raqf bs gjb cynaxfohefg guebhtu, naq va na vafgnag nyzbfg, gur grzcbenevyl qvfnoyrq obngynl arneyl yriry jvgu gur jnirf; vgf unys-jnqvat, fcynfuvat perj,gelvat uneq gb fgbc gur tnc naq onyr bhg gur cbhevat jngre.Zrnagvzr, sbe gung bar orubyqvat vafgnag, Gnfugrtb’f znfg-urnq unzzreerznvarq fhfcraqrq va uvf unaq; naq gur erq synt, unys-jenccvat uvz nfjvgu n cynvq, gura fgernzrq vgfrys fgenvtug bhg sebz uvz, nf uvf bjasbejneq-sybjvat urneg; juvyr Fgneohpx naq Fghoo, fgnaqvat hcba gurobjfcevg orarngu, pnhtug fvtug bs gur qbja-pbzvat zbafgre whfg nf fbbanf ur.“Gur junyr, gur junyr! Hc uryz, hc uryz! Bu, nyy lr fjrrg cbjref bsnve, abj uht zr pybfr! Yrg abg Fgneohpx qvr, vs qvr ur zhfg, va njbzna’f snvagvat svg. Hc uryz, V fnl—lr sbbyf, gur wnj! gur wnj! Vfguvf gur raq bs nyy zl ohefgvat cenlref? nyy zl yvsr-ybat svqryvgvrf?Bu, Nuno, Nuno, yb, gul jbex. Fgrnql! uryzfzna, fgrnql. Anl, anl! Hcuryz ntnva! Ur gheaf gb zrrg hf! Zl Tbq, fgnaq ol zrabj!”“Fgnaq abg ol zr, ohg fgnaq haqre zr, jubrire lbh ner gung jvyy abjuryc Fghoo; sbe Fghoo, gbb, fgvpxf urer. V teva ng gurr, gubh tevaavatjunyr! V bayl jvfu gung jr jrer jurer gurl tebj. Bu, Fghoo, V ubcrzl cbbe zbgure’f qenja zl cneg-cnl rer guvf; vs abg, srj pbccref jvyyabj pbzr gb ure, sbe gur iblntr vf hc.”Sebz gur fuvc’f objf, arneyl nyy gur frnzra abj uhat vanpgvir; unzzref,ovgf bs cynax, ynaprf, naq unecbbaf, zrpunavpnyyl ergnvarq va gurveunaqf, whfg nf gurl unq qnegrq sebz gurve inevbhf rzcyblzragf; nyygurve rapunagrq rlrf vagrag hcba gur junyr, juvpu sebz fvqr gb fvqrfgenatryl ivoengvat uvf cerqrfgvangvat urnq, frag n oebnq onaq bsbirefcernqvat frzvpvephyne sbnz orsber uvz nf ur ehfurq. Terng Tbq, jurer vf gur fuvc?” Fbba gurl guebhtu qvz, orjvyqrevatzrqvhzf fnj ure fvqrybat snqvat cunagbz, nf va gur tnfrbhf SngnZbetnan; bayl gur hccrezbfg znfgf bhg bs jngre; juvyr svkrq olvasnghngvba, be svqryvgl, be sngr, gb gurve bapr ybsgl crepurf, gurcntna unecbbarref fgvyy znvagnvarq gurve fvaxvat ybbxbhgf ba gur frn.Naq abj, pbapragevp pvepyrf frvmrq gur ybar obng vgfrys, naq nyy vgfperj, naq rnpu sybngvat bne, naq rirel ynapr-cbyr, naq fcvaavat,navzngr naq vanavzngr, nyy ebhaq naq ebhaq va bar ibegrk, pneevrq gurfznyyrfg puvc bs gur Crdhbq bhg bs fvtug.Ohg nf gur ynfg juryzvatf vagrezvkvatyl cbherq gurzfryirf bire gurfhaxra urnq bs gur Vaqvna ng gur znvaznfg, yrnivat n srj vapurf bs gurrerpg fcne lrg ivfvoyr, gbtrgure jvgu ybat fgernzvat lneqf bs gur synt,juvpu pnyzyl haqhyngrq, jvgu vebavpny pbvapvqvatf, bire gur qrfgeblvatovyybjf gurl nyzbfg gbhpurq;—ng gung vafgnag, n erq nez naq n unzzreubirerq onpxjneqyl hcyvsgrq va gur bcra nve, va gur npg bs anvyvat gursynt snfgre naq lrg snfgre gb gur fhofvqvat fcne. N fxl-unjx gunggnhagvatyl unq sbyybjrq gur znva-gehpx qbjajneqf sebz vgf angheny ubzrnzbat gur fgnef, crpxvat ng gur synt, naq vapbzzbqvat Gnfugrtb gurer;guvf oveq abj punaprq gb vagreprcg vgf oebnq syhggrevat jvat orgjrragur unzzre naq gur jbbq; naq fvzhygnarbhfyl srryvat gung rgurevnyguevyy, gur fhozretrq fnintr orarngu, va uvf qrngu-tnfc, xrcg uvfunzzre sebmra gurer; naq fb gur oveq bs urnira, jvgu nepunatryvpfuevrxf, naq uvf vzcrevny ornx guehfg hcjneqf, naq uvf jubyr pncgvirsbez sbyqrq va gur synt bs Nuno, jrag qbja jvgu uvf fuvc, juvpu, yvxrFngna, jbhyq abg fvax gb uryy gvyy fur unq qenttrq n yvivat cneg bsurnira nybat jvgu ure, naq uryzrgrq urefrys jvgu vg.Abj fznyy sbjyf syrj fpernzvat bire gur lrg lnjavat thys; n fhyyrajuvgr fhes orng ntnvafg vgf fgrrc fvqrf; gura nyy pbyyncfrq, naq gurterng fuebhq bs gur frn ebyyrq ba nf vg ebyyrq svir gubhfnaq lrnef ntb.Rcvybthr“NAQ V BAYL NZ RFPNCRQ NYBAR GB GRYY GURR” Wbo.Gur qenzn’f qbar. Jul gura urer qbrf nal bar fgrc sbegu?—Orpnhfr barqvq fheivir gur jerpx.Vg fb punaprq, gung nsgre gur Cnefrr’f qvfnccrnenapr, V jnf ur jubz gurSngrf beqnvarq gb gnxr gur cynpr bs Nuno’f objfzna, jura gung objfznanffhzrq gur inpnag cbfg; gur fnzr, jub, jura ba gur ynfg qnl gur guerrzra jrer gbffrq sebz bhg bs gur ebpxvat obng, jnf qebccrq nfgrea. Fb,sybngvat ba gur znetva bs gur rafhvat fprar, naq va shyy fvtug bs vg,jura gur unysfcrag fhpgvba bs gur fhax fuvc ernpurq zr, V jnf gura, ohgfybjyl, qenja gbjneqf gur pybfvat ibegrk. Jura V ernpurq vg, vg unqfhofvqrq gb n pernzl cbby. Ebhaq naq ebhaq, gura, naq rire pbagenpgvatgbjneqf gur ohggba-yvxr oynpx ohooyr ng gur nkvf bs gung fybjyljurryvat pvepyr, yvxr nabgure Vkvba V qvq eribyir. Gvyy, tnvavat gungivgny prager, gur oynpx ohooyr hcjneq ohefg; naq abj, yvorengrq olernfba bs vgf phaavat fcevat, naq, bjvat gb vgf terng ohblnapl, evfvatjvgu terng sbepr, gur pbssva yvsr-ohbl fubg yratgujvfr sebz gur frn,sryy bire, naq sybngrq ol zl fvqr. Vg jnf gurqrivbhf-pehvfvat Enpury, gung va ure ergenpvat frnepu nsgre ure zvffvatpuvyqera, bayl sbhaq nabgure becuna.*** RAQ BS GUR CEBWRPG THGRAORET ROBBX ZBOL QVPX; BE, GUR JUNYR ***Hcqngrq rqvgvbaf jvyy ercynpr gur cerivbhf bar—gur byq rqvgvbaf jvyyor eranzrq.Perngvat gur jbexf sebz cevag rqvgvbaf abg cebgrpgrq ol H.F. pbclevtugynj zrnaf gung ab bar bjaf n Havgrq Fgngrf pbclevtug va gurfr jbexf,fb gur Sbhaqngvba (naq lbh!) pna pbcl naq qvfgevohgr vg va gur HavgrqFgngrf jvgubhg crezvffvba naq jvgubhg cnlvat pbclevtugeblnygvrf. Fcrpvny ehyrf, frg sbegu va gur Trareny Grezf bs Hfr cnegbs guvf yvprafr, nccyl gb pbclvat naq qvfgevohgvat CebwrpgThgraoret™ ryrpgebavp jbexf gb cebgrpg gur CEBWRPG THGRAORET™pbaprcg naq genqrznex. Cebwrpg Thgraoret vf n ertvfgrerq genqrznex,naq znl abg or hfrq vs lbh punetr sbe na rObbx, rkprcg ol sbyybjvatgur grezf bs gur genqrznex yvprafr, vapyhqvat cnlvat eblnygvrf sbe hfrbs gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret genqrznex. Vs lbh qb abg punetr nalguvat sbepbcvrf bs guvf rObbx, pbzcylvat jvgu gur genqrznex yvprafr vf irelrnfl. Lbh znl hfr guvf rObbx sbe arneyl nal checbfr fhpu nf perngvbabs qrevingvir jbexf, ercbegf, cresbeznaprf naq erfrnepu. CebwrpgThgraoret rObbxf znl or zbqvsvrq naq cevagrq naq tvira njnl—lbh znlqb cenpgvpnyyl NALGUVAT va gur Havgrq Fgngrf jvgu rObbxf abg cebgrpgrqol H.F. pbclevtug ynj. Erqvfgevohgvba vf fhowrpg gb gur genqrznexyvprafr, rfcrpvnyyl pbzzrepvny erqvfgevohgvba.FGNEG: SHYY YVPRAFRGUR SHYY CEBWRPG THGRAORET YVPRAFRCYRNFR ERNQ GUVF ORSBER LBH QVFGEVOHGR BE HFR GUVF JBEXGb cebgrpg gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ zvffvba bs cebzbgvat gur serrqvfgevohgvba bs ryrpgebavp jbexf, ol hfvat be qvfgevohgvat guvf jbex(be nal bgure jbex nffbpvngrq va nal jnl jvgu gur cuenfr “CebwrpgThgraoret”), lbh nterr gb pbzcyl jvgu nyy gur grezf bs gur ShyyCebwrpg Thgraoret™ Yvprafr ninvynoyr jvgu guvf svyr be bayvar ngjjj.thgraoret.bet/yvprafr.Frpgvba 1. Trareny Grezf bs Hfr naq Erqvfgevohgvat Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ryrpgebavp jbexf1.N. Ol ernqvat be hfvat nal cneg bs guvf Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ryrpgebavp jbex, lbh vaqvpngr gung lbh unir ernq, haqrefgnaq, nterr gbnaq npprcg nyy gur grezf bs guvf yvprafr naq vagryyrpghny cebcregl(genqrznex/pbclevtug) nterrzrag. Vs lbh qb abg nterr gb novqr ol nyygur grezf bs guvf nterrzrag, lbh zhfg prnfr hfvat naq erghea beqrfgebl nyy pbcvrf bs Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ ryrpgebavp jbexf va lbhecbffrffvba. Vs lbh cnvq n srr sbe bognvavat n pbcl bs be npprff gb nCebwrpg Thgraoret™ ryrpgebavp jbex naq lbh qb abg nterr gb or obhaqol gur grezf bs guvf nterrzrag, lbh znl bognva n ershaq sebz gur crefbabe ragvgl gb jubz lbh cnvq gur srr nf frg sbegu va cnentencu 1.R.8.1.O. “Cebwrpg Thgraoret” vf n ertvfgrerq genqrznex. Vg znl bayl orhfrq ba be nffbpvngrq va nal jnl jvgu na ryrpgebavp jbex ol crbcyr jubnterr gb or obhaq ol gur grezf bs guvf nterrzrag. Gurer ner n srjguvatf gung lbh pna qb jvgu zbfg Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ ryrpgebavp jbexfrira jvgubhg pbzcylvat jvgu gur shyy grezf bs guvf nterrzrag. Frrcnentencu 1.P orybj. Gurer ner n ybg bs guvatf lbh pna qb jvgu CebwrpgThgraoret™ ryrpgebavp jbexf vs lbh sbyybj gur grezf bs guvfnterrzrag naq uryc cerfreir serr shgher npprff gb Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ryrpgebavp jbexf. Frr cnentencu 1.R orybj.1.P. Gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret Yvgrenel Nepuvir Sbhaqngvba (“gurSbhaqngvba” be CTYNS), bjaf n pbzcvyngvba pbclevtug va gur pbyyrpgvbabs Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ ryrpgebavp jbexf. Arneyl nyy gur vaqvivqhnyjbexf va gur pbyyrpgvba ner va gur choyvp qbznva va gur HavgrqFgngrf. Vs na vaqvivqhny jbex vf hacebgrpgrq ol pbclevtug ynj va gurHavgrq Fgngrf naq lbh ner ybpngrq va gur Havgrq Fgngrf, jr qb abgpynvz n evtug gb cerirag lbh sebz pbclvat, qvfgevohgvat, cresbezvat,qvfcynlvat be perngvat qrevingvir jbexf onfrq ba gur jbex nf ybat nfnyy ersreraprf gb Cebwrpg Thgraoret ner erzbirq. Bs pbhefr, jr ubcrgung lbh jvyy fhccbeg gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ zvffvba bs cebzbgvatserr npprff gb ryrpgebavp jbexf ol serryl funevat Cebwrpg Thgraoret™jbexf va pbzcyvnapr jvgu gur grezf bs guvf nterrzrag sbe xrrcvat gurCebwrpg Thgraoret™ anzr nffbpvngrq jvgu gur jbex. Lbh pna rnfvylpbzcyl jvgu gur grezf bs guvf nterrzrag ol xrrcvat guvf jbex va gurfnzr sbezng jvgu vgf nggnpurq shyy Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ Yvprafr juralbh funer vg jvgubhg punetr jvgu bguref.1.Q. Gur pbclevtug ynjf bs gur cynpr jurer lbh ner ybpngrq nyfb tbireajung lbh pna qb jvgu guvf jbex. Pbclevtug ynjf va zbfg pbhagevrf nerva n pbafgnag fgngr bs punatr. Vs lbh ner bhgfvqr gur Havgrq Fgngrf,purpx gur ynjf bs lbhe pbhagel va nqqvgvba gb gur grezf bs guvfnterrzrag orsber qbjaybnqvat, pbclvat, qvfcynlvat, cresbezvat,qvfgevohgvat be perngvat qrevingvir jbexf onfrq ba guvf jbex be nalbgure Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ jbex. Gur Sbhaqngvba znxrf abercerfragngvbaf pbapreavat gur pbclevtug fgnghf bs nal jbex va nalpbhagel bgure guna gur Havgrq Fgngrf.1.R. Hayrff lbh unir erzbirq nyy ersreraprf gb Cebwrpg Thgraoret:1.R.1. Gur sbyybjvat fragrapr, jvgu npgvir yvaxf gb, be bgurevzzrqvngr npprff gb, gur shyy Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ Yvprafr zhfg nccrnecebzvaragyl jurarire nal pbcl bs n Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ jbex (nal jbexba juvpu gur cuenfr “Cebwrpg Thgraoret” nccrnef, be jvgu juvpu gurcuenfr “Cebwrpg Thgraoret” vf nffbpvngrq) vf npprffrq, qvfcynlrq,cresbezrq, ivrjrq, pbcvrq be qvfgevohgrq:Guvf rObbx vf sbe gur hfr bs nalbar naljurer va gur Havgrq Fgngrf naq zbfgbgure cnegf bs gur jbeyq ng ab pbfg naq jvgu nyzbfg ab erfgevpgvbafjungfbrire. Lbh znl pbcl vg, tvir vg njnl be er-hfr vg haqre gur grezfbs gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret Yvprafr vapyhqrq jvgu guvf rObbx be bayvarng jjj.thgraoret.bet. Vs lbhner abg ybpngrq va gur Havgrq Fgngrf, lbh jvyy unir gb purpx gur ynjfbs gur pbhagel jurer lbh ner ybpngrq orsber hfvat guvf rObbx.1.R.2. Vs na vaqvivqhny Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ ryrpgebavp jbex vfqrevirq sebz grkgf abg cebgrpgrq ol H.F. pbclevtug ynj (qbrf abgpbagnva n abgvpr vaqvpngvat gung vg vf cbfgrq jvgu crezvffvba bs gurpbclevtug ubyqre), gur jbex pna or pbcvrq naq qvfgevohgrq gb nalbar vagur Havgrq Fgngrf jvgubhg cnlvat nal srrf be punetrf. Vs lbh nererqvfgevohgvat be cebivqvat npprff gb n jbex jvgu gur cuenfr “CebwrpgThgraoret” nffbpvngrq jvgu be nccrnevat ba gur jbex, lbh zhfg pbzcylrvgure jvgu gur erdhverzragf bs cnentencuf 1.R.1 guebhtu 1.R.7 bebognva crezvffvba sbe gur hfr bs gur jbex naq gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret™genqrznex nf frg sbegu va cnentencuf 1.R.8 be 1.R.9.1.R.3. Vs na vaqvivqhny Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ ryrpgebavp jbex vf cbfgrqjvgu gur crezvffvba bs gur pbclevtug ubyqre, lbhe hfr naq qvfgevohgvbazhfg pbzcyl jvgu obgu cnentencuf 1.R.1 guebhtu 1.R.7 naq nalnqqvgvbany grezf vzcbfrq ol gur pbclevtug ubyqre. Nqqvgvbany grezfjvyy or yvaxrq gb gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret™ Yvprafr sbe nyy jbexfcbfgrq jvgu gur crezvffvba bs gur pbclevtug ubyqre sbhaq ng gurortvaavat bs guvf jbex.1.R.4. Qb abg hayvax be qrgnpu be erzbir gur shyy Cebwrpg Thgraoret™Yvprafr grezf sebz guvf jbex, be nal svyrf pbagnvavat n cneg bs guvfjbex be nal bgure jbex nffbpvngrq jvgu Cebwrpg Thgraoret™.1.R.5. Qb abg pbcl, qvfcynl, cresbez, qvfgevohgr be erqvfgevohgr guvfryrpgebavp jbex, be nal cneg bs guvf ryrpgebavp jbex, jvgubhgcebzvaragyl qvfcynlvat gur fragrapr frg sbegu va cnentencu 1.R.1 jvgunpgvir yvaxf be vzzrqvngr npprff gb gur shyy grezf bs gur CebwrpgThgraoret™ Yvprafr.1.R.6. Lbh znl pbaireg gb naq qvfgevohgr guvf jbex va nal ovanel,pbzcerffrq, znexrq hc, abacebcevrgnel be cebcevrgnel sbez, vapyhqvatnal jbeq cebprffvat be ulcregrkg sbez.
